@000 *, ,MDO SMAD CHOS 'BYUNG,

@002	(DPE SKRUN GSAL BSHAD,)

THUB KYI YID RTON RUNG BA SOGS PHUL DU BYUNG BA'I KHYAD CHOS
LDAN PA BCAS BSNGAGS 'OS PA'I GNAS SU GYUR TO, ,

GZHUNG 'DIR YUL MDO SMAD KYI LJONGS SU BSTAN PA'I 'PHEL 'GRIB
DANG, LUNG BA SHOG PA, CHAB SRID

DPAL 'BYOR, RIG GNAS SLOB GSO, RANG BYUNG GI KHAMS BCAS ZHIB
CING RGYAS TZAM SNANG LA, DGON

SGRUB SDE'I GDAN RABS DANG, LHA RTEN CHOS GSUM, DPE MDZOD GTZUG
LAG GRVA TSANG MANG PO, RAB TU

BYUNG BA'I MANG NYUNG SOGS 'DUS SHING, KHYAD PAR BLA BRANG DGON
PA DANG GZHAN DGON RNYING CHE GRAS GTZO CHE BA

RNAMS KYI LO RGYUS DE BAS KYANG GSAL,

MDO SMAD CHOS 'BYUNG GI DPAR NI AA MCHOG DGON DGA' LDAN CHOS
'KHOR GLING GIS BRKOS ZIN RJES MA

'GYANGS PAR M'A PU HPHANG JAG DMAG GIS MER BSREGS PAS DPAR DU
THEBS PA'I TSAR GRANGS MI MANG BAR NGES,

DENG SANG BLA BRANG DGON PA'I DPE MDZOD KYI KHROD DU'ANG TSAR
GCIG GNYIS LAS MI 'DUG PAS, DEB THER RTZA CHEN

'DI NYID DA LTA DPAR DU BSKRUN RGYU NI, BOD MI DMANGS RGYA CHEN
PO DANG ZHIB 'JUG GI LAS LA GZHOL BA RNAMS KYI RE

'DUN DANG DGOS MKHO CHEN PO ZHIG TU GYUR YOD,

DEB THER 'DIR BRJOD DON GSAL ZHING NYER MKHO 'DUS CHE BA, RIGS
PA'I GZHUNG LUGS KYI KHUNGS BTZAN

PA; MKHAS PA SNGA RABS PA MANG BOS BRTZAMS PA'I YUL MDO SMAD KYI
LO RGYUS KYI GZHUNG GZHAN LAS RGYAS SHING 'PHYI

SHOS YIN PA MA ZAD RMAD DU BYUNG BAR GRAGS 'DUG PA, BAR SKABS
TSIGS BCAD DANG, MNGON BRJOD, BRDA

RNYING SOGS KYIS MA BCINGS PAR BRTZAMS PA LAGS PAS, KLOG PA PO
RNAMS KYIS RTOGS SLA BA DANG, 'BREL YOD

SDE KHAG GIS SA MING, RI MING, CHU MING SOGS KHUNGS GTUGS PA
LA'ANG MED DU MI RUNG BA ZHIG TU MNGON, 'ON

KYANG; RTZOM PA PO RANG NYID KYIS MJUG BYANG DU, RANG NYID
BGRANG BYA'I KHUR DANG 'DU BA 'KHRUGS PA'I RKYEN GYIS

NON PA DANG, BREL BA SNA TSOGS PAS GA-YENGS PA'I DBANG GIS RTOG
'JUG ZHIB MO MA NUS PAS TSIG DON GYI CHA LA

NONGS PAR GYUR PA GANG MCHIS MKHAS PA RNAM DPYOD KYI NOR DANG
LDAN PA DAG 'PHYA SMOD KYI GNAS SU MI MDZAD PAR

LEGS PAR 'CHOS RIGS SO, ,ZHES GDAMS PA BZHIN, RTZOM PA'I SKABS
KYI SPYI TSOGS DANG DUS RABS, RTZOM

PA BO KHONG NANG BA'I CHOS LUGS PAR LAGS PAS SEMS GTZO RING LUGS
KYI LTA BA DANG RMONGS DAD KYI BSHAD LUGS

MANG BO BSRES PA, LHO MTHA'I CHA LAS LA NGAG RGYUN JI BZHIN DU
BRIS PA SOGS KYI SKYON YANG MCHIS PA, KLOG

PA PO RNAMS KYIS BLANG DOR GANG 'TSAM GNANG BAR ZHU ZHES ZHU'O,
,

NGA TSOS CHOS 'BYUNG 'DI DPAR DU BSKRUN PA'I CHED DU, SMON LAM
RGYA MTSO LAGS LA ZHU DAG MDZAD RGYU ZHUS

BCOL LTAR, MING GCIG LA GDAM NGAR RUNG BA'I YI GE DAG RANG SOR
BZHAG PA MA GTOGS, MI'I MING,

SA'I MING, 'JA' SA SOGS KYI MING GCIG LA YI GE MI 'DRA BA GNYIS
GSUM BZHI RE 'DUG PA DANG, GZHAN

YIG NOR SOGS LAG NYE'I DPE DAG PA RER KHUNGS GTUGS CI THUB KYIS
GCIG GYUR TU BCOS PA LAGS PAS,

KHONG LA SNYING THAG PA NAS BKA' DRIN CHE ZHU, ZHES KAN SU'U MI
RIGS DPE SKRUN KHANG GIS,

PHYI LO 1981 ZLA 5 TSES 18 LA

@001	(DPE SKRUN GSAL BSHAD,)

*, ,DPE SKRUN GSAL BSHAD,

*, ,BOD RIGS MI DMANGS KYI RIG PA'I GNAS RNAMS MI NYAMS GONG
SPEL DANG, BOD KYI CHAB SRID,

DPAL 'BYOR, RIG GNAS, CHOS LUGS, SPYI TSOGS 'PHEL RGYAS KYI LO
RGYUS RNAMS RTZAL DU BTON TE

ZHIB DPYOD KYI GNAS SU 'JUG PA'I SLAD DU, DEB THER RGYA MTSO'AM
MDO SMAD CHOS 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI, 'DI

GA DPE SKRUN KHANG GIS DPAR DU BSKRUN PA YIN,

GZHUNG 'DI MDZAD PA PO NI, KAN SU'U ZHING CHEN ZH'A HO RDZONG
KHONGS GTZOS BSTAN 'DZIN SDE KHROD DU RAB BYUNG

BCU GSUM PA'I LCAGS BYA (SPYI LO 1801) LOR SKU 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG
LO LNGA BA NA KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS

BZHAD PA SKU 'PHRENG GSUM PAS BRAG DGON PA BLO BZANG SHES RAB
KYI SPRUL SKUR THAG BCAD, DGUNG LO DRUG PAR

DPAL MANG PAndI TA LAS RAB TU BYUNG STE MTSAN DKON MCHOG BSTAN
PA RAB RGYAS SU GSOL, DGUNG LO DGU PA

NAS DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING DANG, LHAG PAR BLA BRANG BKRA
SHIS 'KHYIL DU MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS

PAR THUGS GNYER DPYIS PHYIN GNANG THOG DBUS SU LAN GNYIS PHEBS,
STAG PHU YONGS 'DZIN YE SHES RGYA MTSO

SOGS SPYIR BLA MA SUM CU RTZA GRANGS BSTEN TE, DBANG LUNG MAN
NGAG GI GDAMS PA RGYA CHER GSAN, SGOS SU

DGUNG LO DGU BA NAS NGA GSUM BZHES KYI BAR DPAL MANG PAndI TA
DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN GYI DRUNG DU BCAR

BZHUGS GNANG STE BSAM SBYOR GNYIS KYIS TSUL BZHIN BSTEN CING
MKHAS PA'I DBANG BOR SON,

MKHAS DBANG DE NYID BYON PA'I DUS KYANG YUL MDO SMAD KYI LJONGS
SU DGE LUGS PA'I GRUB MTHA' 'PHEL RGYAS

KYI SKABS YIN LA, BLA BRANG DGON PA LTE BAR BYAS PA'I CHOS SRID
ZUNG 'BREL GYI SROL YANG DAR YOD, DGON DER

YANG SGRA DANG TSAD MA, BZO DANG GSO BA, NANG RIG PA, SNYAN NGAG
SDEB SBYOR, RTZIS DANG MNGON BRJOD, ZLOS

GAR BCAS RIG GNAS BCU BO 'CHAD NYAN SLOB GNYER GYI GRVA TSANG
NGAM 'DZIN GRVA TSUGS YOD GSHIS, BOD KYI RIG

GNAS 'PHEL RGYAS LA'ANG PHAN THOGS CHEN PO BYUNG SNANG, SKABS DE
TZA NA, DBAL MANG PAndI TAS AA MDO'I

RGYU MTSAN SHES MKHAN DKON PAS CHOS 'BYUNG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG 'BRI
DGOS ZHES PA'I BKA' DANG, GZHAN YANG,

DGA' LDAN THE BO SPRUL PA'I SKU, DPA' RE SNGO KHO NGAG DBANG
LEGS BSHAD NYI MA SOGS GNAS NGA RIG PA'I GTER

MDZOD DU GYUR PA DU MAS YANG YANG BSKUL BAR BRTEN, RTZOM PA POS
SKABS DE'I DGOS PA DANG BSTUN, BRTZAM

PAR BYA BA'I 'GAN 'KHRI LHUR BZHES TE, BKA' CHEMS, CHOS 'BYUNG,
DEB THER, LO RGYUS, RNAM

THAR; BSTAN RTZIS, 'KHRUNGS RABS, GDUNG RABS, RGYAL RABS, GDAN
RABS, RTOGS

BRJOD; DKAR CHAG RUS MDZOD SOGS LO RGYUS RIG PA'I RTZOM GZHUNG
RNAM GRANGS LNGA BRGYA SUM CU LHAG

GSAN GZIGS GNANG ZHING, RMA CHU, KLU CHU, BSANG CHU, DGU CHU,
TZONG CHU'I RGYUD SOGS YUL

GRU DANG SA KHUL MANG BOR CHIBS BSKYOD DE, DRI GTUGS DNGOS KYI
THOG RTZOM SGRIG GNANG BAS, SPYI KHOG LA TSAD

@001	(BOD KYI YUL KHAMS SPYIR BSHAD PA,)

*, ,BOD KYI YUL KHAMS SPYIR BSHAD PA,

NA MO SARBA DZNY'A GU RA WE, ,SKYE 'JIG GNAS PA'I MTSAN MA KUN
BRAL DAG PA GNYIS LDAN CHOS DBYINGS

MTHAR THUG RANG BZHIN RNAM DAG 'OD GSAL BA, ,CHOS KUN YANG DAG
GZIGS PA MTHAR PHYIN ZAG MED YE SHES

YON TAN RAB RDZOGS RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I MDZOD, ,MKHA'
KHYAB ZHING DU MTSAN DPE'I SKU MNGA' KUN

BZANG 'KHOR DBUS CHOS KYI SGRA CHEN RTAG TU RAB SGROGS LONGS
SPYOD RDZOGS, ,'PHRIN LAS THABS KYI RNAM PA KUN

RDZOGS RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS SKU BZHI'I BDAG NYID BU RAM SHING
BAS BDAG SKYONGS SHIG ,LUNG RTOGS CHOS TSUL

RDUL DKAR 'BUM 'DZAGS PHAN BDE'I KU MUD BZHAD PA'I GNYEN, ,'GRO
KHAMS RGYA MTSO'I MOS PA'I RDZING

BUR 'GOG PA MED PAR RTAG 'JUG PHYIR, ,BSHAD SGRUB GO LA'I BGROD
PAS NYER BSTEN 'PHAGS BOD TZI NA'I

ZHING KHAMS KUN, ,GSAL MDZAD BDAG NYID CHE RNAMS SPYI DANG BLA
MA'I ZHABS LA PHYAG BYAS NAS, ,SPYAN RAS

GZIGS DBANG PHYAG NA PADMO'I ZHING GI CHA SHAS BYANG GNYIS PAR,
,MDO SNGAGS THUB BSTAN JI LTAR 'PHOS PA NGO

MTSAR RIN CHEN BYE BA'I GTER, ,'DZIN PA DEB THER RGYA MTSO'I
'JUG NGOGS GSAL BAR BYA YIS DON GNYER

GYI; ;YID CAN SKYES BU DON MTHUN TSOGS RNAMS RTZE DGA'I GAR GYIS
'JUG BYAR RIGS, ,DE YANG 'PHAGS

YUL RDO RJE GDAN NAS BYANG DU DPAG TSAD BRGYA BRGAL BA NA DPAL
SA SKYA'I CHOS GRVA CHEN PO YOD PAR GSUNGS LA,

DE NAS BYANG DU DPAG TSAD BRGYA LHAG TSE MDO SMAD KYI SA SNE ZIN
PA'I BOD YUL 'DI LA NANG GSES KYIS PHYE BA'I STOD

MNGA' RIS SKOR GSUM NI, SPU RANGS MANG YUL ZANGS DKAR GSUM SKOR
GCIG ,LI BRU SHA SBAL TI GSUM

SKOR GCIG ,ZHANG ZHUNG KHRI TE STOD SMAD GSUM SKOR GCIG TU BYED,
,BAR DBUS GTZANG RU BZHI NI, SNGAR

GTZANG LA GA-YAS RU DANG, RU LAG GNYIS, DBUS LA DBU RU DANG,
GA-YO RU GNYIS ZER YANG, CHOS RGYAL KU

SHRI HAN GYIS BOD KHRI SKOR BCU GSUM DBANG DU BSDUS TE RGYAL
DBANG RIN PO CHER PHUL PHYIN LA GA-YAS RU, GA-YON

RU; SBUS RI, GUNG RI BZHIR BYED DO, ,MDO KHAMS SGANG DRUG NI,
ZAL MO SGANG, TSA BA SGANG, SMAR

KHAMS SGANG, SPO 'BOR SGANG, DMAR RDZA SGANG, MI NYAG RAB SGANG
DANG DRUG LA BYED CING DE RNAMS BAR KHAMS

SU GTOGS SO, ,YANG SGANG GSUM LA BYED TSE MDO KHAMS LA SMAR
KHAMS BTAGS PA KHAMS GCIG ,MDO SMAD

LA GA-YER MO THANG BTAGS PA KHAMS GCIG ,TZONG KHA LA GYI THANG
BTAGS PA KHAMS GCIG TU BYED PAS 'DI THAMS

CAD ZA MA TOG BKOD PA SOGS MDO SDE DU MAR SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI
'DUL ZHING KHA BA CAN GYI RGYAL KHAMS ZHES

BSHAD PA DE YIN PA NI, BKA' GDAMS GLEGS BAM DU, SHAR RDO RJE
GDAN GYI BYANG PHYOGS NA, ,GNAS PUR

RGYAL BOD CES BYA BA YOD, ,CES BOD KHAMS SPYI DANG, KHYAD PAR
BOD GANGS CAN DU 'DOGS PA'I RTZA BA NI,

GANGS DKAR BO SHEL GYI MCHOD RTEN YOD, ,MTSO DMA' MO GA-YU YI
MAndAL YOD, ,CES TE SE NAS RMA CHEN@002 (BOD KYI YUL KHAMS SPYIR BSHAD PA,)

GANGS KYI BAR BOD SKYOB PA'I GANGS CHEN BRGYAD LA NGOS 'DZIN PAR
GSUNGS PAS SHES LA, BSTAN PA'I CHU RGYUN

GANG LAS 'DREN PA'I GZHI DANG, GANG DU 'KHYIL BA'I GNAS KYI RTEN
'BREL GYIS MTSAMS 'DZIN LTA BU'I TSUL DU

GSUNGS PA'I GANGS DKAR BO SHEL GYI MCHOD RTEN LA GANGS TE SE
DANG, ,RMA CHEN GYI GANGS RI, MTSO DMA'

MO GA-YU'I MAntAL YANG RGYAL GYI LHA MO'I BLA MTSO DANG MTSO
SNGON, SHAR GYI RGYA MTSO BCAS LA NGOS 'DZIN CING, GCIG

TU MA NGES LA, DE YANG GNAS DANG GANG ZAG GNYIS KA LA SBYOR DGOS
PAR GSUNGS SO, ,CHOS RGYAL SRONG BTZAN

SGAM POS KYANG RANG GZHING GI KHYAD CHOS BRJOD PA'I TSE, TZA RI
TZA GONG BDE MCHOG RANG BYON DANG, ,RDO CHU RIN

PO CHE YANG DE NA YOD, ,TE SE'I GANGS LA DGRA BCOM LNGA BRGYA
BZHUGS, ,BDUD RTZI'I CHU YANG RI BO DE NA

YOD; ;GYE RE'I BRAG LA YIG 'BRU RANG BYUNG DANG, ,MKHA' 'GRO'I
PHYAG RGYA RI BO DE NA YOD, ,MA BANG MTSO

LA KLU RGYAL BYANG SEMS GNAS, ,CHU BO YON TAN CAN YANG DE NA
YOD, ,KHRI BSHOR MTSO LA KLU BLON BYANG CHUB

SEMS; ;CHU BO CHEN PO KUN LA PHAN PAR MDZAD, ,GNAM MTSO PHYUG
MO'I NANG NA BYANG CHUB SEMS, ,THANG

LHA'I BRAG LA DGRA BCOM LNGA BRGYA YOD, ,SBUBS MTSO'I GLING NA
KLU RGYAL BYANG CHUB SEMS, ,KHA 'U'I GANGS LA

DGRA BCOM MANG PO YOD, ,RI MTHO SA GTZANG GANGS RI GNYAN GYIS
BSKOR, ,ZHES GSUNG PA'I GANGS

LJONGS NI DBUS GTZANG KHO NAR NGOS 'DZIN PA RGYA CHUNG LA, ,'BRI
CHU'I SE BO'I LUNG RING BRGAL BA'I BA YAN HA

RA'I SHAR NGOS AA CHEN GANGS RGYAB KYI RI DANG, MDO LA GNYIS KYI
MING BSDOMS PAS DE MAN CHAD LA AA MDO ZER,

DE NGOS KYI CHU RNAMS PHYOGS 'DRES KYIS RMA GA-YANG PHYUG MO'I
GZHUNG DU 'BAB PA LA RMA CHUR GRAGS PA MTSO SO LO MA'AM

SKYA RENGS KYI GZHUNG BRGYUD LHO PHYOGS SU 'KHYOG PA'I KHUG SO
MAN CHAD AA MDO NYID LA NGOS 'DZIN DGOS PA NI,

CHOL KHA GSUM DU PHYE TSE MNGA' RIS GUNG THANG NAS SOG LA SKYA
BO YAN CHAD DBUS GTZANG CHOS KYI CHOL KHA, DE NAS RMA

CHU'I KHUG PA YAN MDO STOD MI'I TSOL KHA, DE NAS RGYA'I MCHOD
RTEN DKAR PO YAN MDO SMAD RTA'I CHOL KHAR BYED

PAS SHES SO, ,DE YANG BYANG PHYOGS KHA BA CAN GYI LJONGS 'DI LA
GNYIS SU BYAS PA'I BOD YUL DBUS GTZANG NI,

CHOS SRID GANG GI CHA NAS 'GRAN ZLA DANG BRAL ZHING BSTAN PA'I
'BYUNG KHUNGS ZLA MED PA YIN LA, BAR KHAMS YANG

GRUB MTHA' SNA TSOGS KYI CHOS LUGS, STOBS DANG LONGS SPYOD GANG
NGOS NAS DAR RGYAS CHE BA LA BLTAS NA AA MDO

SA CHA DANG CHOS SRID GANG THAD NAS RGYA CHUNG BAS BRI RIN MED
PA LTA BUR MCHIS MOD, 'ON KYANG PAn CHEN GA YA DH'A

RAS DGE SBYOR BYED PA LA RGYA GAR LAS BOD 'DI CHU BZANG, SA'I
BSIL DROD SNYOMS, SROG CHAGS NYUNG, ZAS

BCUD CHE BAS NGA RGYA GAR DU MI 'GRO ,BOD DU SDOD GSUNGS PA
BZHIN MDO SMAD 'DI YANG SNOD BCUD KYI CHA NAS

CHOS SGRUB PA'I GNAS DANG RTEN KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS SHING, KHRO
PHU LO TZ'A PAS PAn CHEN SH'AKYA SHR'I SBYAN 'DREN GYI

SKABS PHUL BA'I ZHU YIG LAS, MA GA DH'A SOGS RIG 'BYUNG GNAS NA
SDIG TO YI, ,DMAG TSOGS KYIS BCOM

AO RGYAN KHA CHE BAL YUL YANG, ,LOG SPYOD KYIS KHENGS DENG SANG
BSTAN SROG LEGS GNAS PA, ,BOD YUL

'DIR ZAD SKYES CHEN BYANG PHYOGS ZHABS BSKYOD ZHU, ,ZHES PA DE
SKABS RGYA BA LAN PAntI TA CHEN PO DU MA BZHUGS

@003 (CHOS 'BYUNG RNAM THAR GYI THO BKOD PA DANG SBRAGS, DEB
THER 'DI BRTZAMS PA'I LUNG KHUNGS BSTAN PA,)

PAS BSTAN PA'I 'BYUNG KHUNGS SU BRTZI DUS YIN YANG, BSTAN PA
BYANG NAS BYANG DU 'PHO BA'I RTEN 'BREL GYIS

LJON SHING YAR SKYE BZHIN 'PHEL SKYED BOD CHE BAR GSUNGS PA
DANG, KHRUS KHANG LO TZ'A PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS

KYANG; LAR DUS GSUM RGYAL BA'I THUGS RJE DANG, ,RGYAL SRAS PAD
DKAR ZHABS DRIN LAS, ,BOD KYI YUL

KHAMS 'DI NYID KYANG, ,'PHAGS YUL DANG SKAL BA MNYAM PA SNYAM,
,ZHES BSNGAGS PAS KYANG DPOG NUS

SO; ;DES NA RGYAL SRAS PHYAG NA PADMA'I 'DUL ZHING BOD YUL GYI
NANG GSES BYANG GNYIS PA MDO SMAD KYI LJONGS

'DIR YANG BSTAN PA'I 'PHEL RGYAS RIM GYIS BYUNG BA'I TSUL NI
GANG BSHAD PAR BYA BA'I CHOS SO,, ,,

*, ,CHOS 'BYUNG RNAM THAR GYI THO BKOD PA DANG SBRAGS,

DEB THER 'DI BRTZAMS PA'I LUNG KHUNGS BSTAN PA,

*, ,DE LA THOG MAR BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SPYI DANG BYE BRAG GI
BYUNG TSUL BRJOD PA CHOS 'BYUNG RNAM THAR GYI THO

'GOD PA NI, ` CHOS RGYAL SRONG BTZAN GYI BKA' CHEMS BKA' KHOL
MA, BSAM YAS DKAR CHAG CHEN MO'AM RGYAL

RABS SBA BZHED CHE 'BRING, KHU STON BRTZON 'GRUS GA-YUNG DRUNG
GI LO RGYUS CHEN MO'AM LOG GNON CHEN MOR GRAGS

PA; SDE STON GYI CHOS 'BYUNG, YAR LUNG JO BO'I CHOS 'BYUNG, KUN
MKHYEN BU'I BSTAN PA SPYI'I CHOS 'BYUNG, DEB

THER SNGON PO, TSAL BA'I DBE DMAR, SI TU BYANG CHUB RGYAL MTSAN
GYI BKA' CHEMS DEB THER, 'JA' MO DGE

SLONG GI BSTAN PA SPYI'I CHOS 'BYUNG, 'BRUG PA PADMA DKAR PO'I
CHOS 'BYUNG BSTAN PA'I PADMA RGYAS PA'I NYIN BYED,

DPA' BO GTZUG LAG PA'I CHOS 'BYUNG MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON, RJE LA
N'A RO CHOS DRUG ZHU MKHAN SPYAN SNGA NYER

GNYIS PA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN GYI CHOS 'BYUNG MIG 'BYED 'OD
STONG, NE LA PA PAntI TA SMON LAM TSUL KHRIMS

KYI CHOS 'BYUNG, KAM KAM PA DON GRUB DPAL GYI CHOS 'BYUNG BSTAN
PA RIN PO CHE'I GSAL BYED, DVAGS PO 'OD

ZER SENG GE'AM DGE YE BA TSUL KHRIMS SENG+GE'I CHOS 'BYUNG,
ZHOGS STON MTSE MA'I CHOS 'BYUNG, SHA GZUGS PA

BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL GYI CHOS 'BYUNG PHAN BDE DPAG BSAM RAB TU
RGYAS PA'I 'DOD 'JO, DGA' LDAN LHO RONG

CHOS 'BYUNG, KLONG CHEN RAB 'BYAMS PA'I CHOS 'BYUNG, RGYAL SRAS
THUGS MCHOG RDO RJE'I CHOS 'BYUNG RIN CHEN

GTER MDZOD, LAS CHEN KUN RGYAL PA'I BKA' GDAMS CHOS 'BYUNG CHEN
MO, DE'I ZUR 'DEBS YANG GSAL

SGRON ME, PAn CHEN YE SHES RTZE MO'I BKA' GDAMS CHOS 'BYUNG,
BSOD NAMS LHA DBANG GI BKA' GDAMS

CHOS 'BYUNG, BKA' GDAMS CHOS 'BYUNG YID KYI MDZES RGYAN, MKHAR
NAG LO TZ'A BA'I DGE LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG

DPAG BSAM LJON PA, BEE SER, KUN MKHYEN DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED
DBANG POS MDZAD PA'I DGE LDAN

CHOS 'BYUNG RTZOM 'PHRO, KHRI RIN PO CHE 'OD ZER PA'I CHOS
'BYUNG, MKHAS PA NOR BU BZANG PO'I CHOS 'BYUNG,

STAG LUNG BRAG PA'I DGA' LDAN GDAN RABS, 'DI GSUM KUN MKHYEN BLA
MAS TSAD THUB MDZAD, KUN MKHYEN

@004 (CHOS 'BYUNG RNAM THAR GYI THO BKOD PA DANG SBRAGS, DEB
THER 'DI BRTZAMS PA'I LUNG KHUNGS BSTAN PA,)

GONG MA'I BSTAN RTZIS RE'U MIG KHYAD 'PHAGS, THAR BA LHUN GRUB
RIN CHEN GYI DGE LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG, MI NYAG RDO

RJE BZANG PO'I SKYE BAR GRAGS PA TSUL KHRIMS MGON PO'I DGA' LDAN
CHOS 'BYUNG DANG GSANG SNGAGS MKHAR GYI CHOS

'BYUNG; GTZANG BA BDUN BRGYUD KYI DRUG PA RJE BLO GROS BSTAN
PA'I DGE LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG, ZHANG ZHUNG BSHES

GNYEN DPAL 'BYOR BZANG PO, DGE BSNYEN RDO RJE MGON PO, LI THANG
MKHAN PO BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS RNAMS

KYIS MDZAD PA'I CHOS 'BYUNG GSUM, RGYA DKAR NAG GI CHOS 'BYUNG,
RGYA GAR GTZUG LAG KHANG GI LO RGYUS, JO

GDAN BSOD NAMS BZANG PO, CHOS KYI GRAGS PA, KHRI SPRUL BLO BZANG
BSTAN PA'I NYI MA RNAMS KYI SMYUNG GNAS BLA

BRGYUD RNAM THAR, DRUNG PA RGYAL TSAB PA, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE
SHES, DVAGS RAMS PA BLO BZANG CHOS

GRAGS; GZIMS SHAG MKHAN PO'I SLOB MA NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS,
YONGS 'DZIN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN RNAMS

KYIS MDZAD PA'I LAM RIM BLA BRGYUD RNAM THAR, GRUB CHEN BRGYAD
CU'I RTOGS BRJOD, PAn CHEN CHOS RGYAN GYI

DGE LDAN BKA' BRGYUD RIN PO CHE'I ZAB LAM BRGYUD PA'I RNAM THAR,
SER SMAD MKHAN PO GRAGS PA MKHAS GRUB KYI

DGA' LDAN KHRI RNAM NOR BU'I PHRENG BA DANG, SHAR RTZE'I CHOS
'BYUNG, LO CHEN DH'ARMA SHR'I'I SO THAR SDOM RGYUN GYI RNAM

THAR NYUNG GSAL SGRON ME, PAn CHEN BSOD GRAGS PA DANG, YONGS
'DZIN RNAM GNYIS KYI 'DUL BA'I CHOS

'BYUNG; PAn CHEN SH'AKYA MCHOG LDAN GYI DBU MA'I CHOS 'BYUNG,
SPRUL SKU BSOD NAMS YE SHES DBANG PO'I

BSTAN PA SPYI'I RNAM GZHAG BU STON GYI BDE GSANG DUS YOG GI CHOS
'BYUNG BZHI, RONG tIKA PA'I RNAL 'BYOR RGYUD

KYI CHOS 'BYUNG, CHAG LO GSUM PA RIN CHEN CHOS RGYAL GYI DUS
'KHOR CHOS 'BYUNG, GO RAMS PA'I BDE MCHOG

DANG LAM 'BRAS CHOS 'BYUNG, T'A RA N'A THA'I STON PA DANG, GTAD
RABS BDUN, BKA' BABS BDUN LDAN

GYI RNAM THAR GSUM, GSANG 'DUS, DUS 'KHOR, 'JIGS BYED, BDE MCHOG
RNAMS KYI CHOS 'BYUNG

DANG; RGYA GAR CHOS 'BYUNG, GRUB THOB GSER SDING PAS MDZAD PA'I
RIM LNGA'I BLA BRGYUD RNAM THAR RTOGS PA DON

GYI LO RGYUS, MKHON STON DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB KYI 'JIGS BYED
CHOS 'BYUNG, KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS

BZHAD PA'I 'JIGS BYED CHOS 'BYUNG CHEN MO, GTZANG SMYON GYI BDE
MCHOG SNGON BYUNG GI LO RGYUS, SHAR 'BUM CHU

PA DPAL LDAN GRAGS PA'I KHYUNG NAG CHOS 'BYUNG, RGYA STON KUN
DGA' BRTZON 'GRUS KYI 'JAM DKAR CHOS 'BYUNG,

KHRO PHU LO TZ'A PA'I THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I CHOS 'BYUNG, RMUG
'DZIN 'CHOG PA'I CHOS 'BYUNG, GRONG KHYER SHING THAG

CAN GYI LO RGYUS, LNGA PA'I YANG GSANG CHOS 'BYUNG, SOG BZLOG PA
BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN GYI PHUR BA'I CHOS 'BYUNG,

RNAM SRAS SPRIN GSEB MA DANG BE DKAR AAR GTAD KYI CHOS 'BYUNG,
KARMA RANG BYUNG RDO RJE'I DO HA'I CHOS 'BYUNG,

RIG 'DZIN PADMA 'PHRIN LAS KYI 'DUS PA MDO DBANG GI BLA BRGYUD
RNAM THAR, SGAM SMYON PHYAG RDOR NOR BU'I BYANG

GTER BLA BRGYUD RNAM THAR, LA STOD SHES RAB MGON PO'I BKA'
BRGYUD BLA MA RNAMS KYI RNAM THAR, ZHANG COG

GRU BLA MA SOGS KYI LO RGYUS COG RABS RIN CHEN 'PHRENG BA, SPYAN
SNGA'I RI CHOS 'BYUNG KHUNGS, SKYID SMAD PA

LUM PA CHOS GRAGS SAM SHE'U LO TZ'A PA KUN DGA' CHOS GRAGS KYI
GSUNG NGAG CHOS 'BYUNG, DPAL LDAN BLA MA'I

@005 (CHOS 'BYUNG RNAM THAR GYI THO BKOD PA DANG SBRAGS, DEB
THER 'DI BRTZAMS PA'I LUNG KHUNGS BSTAN PA,)

LAM 'BRAS BLA BRGYUD RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR SNANG BA, BLA MA DAM PA
BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN DANG, MNGA'

RIS PA TSUL KHRIMS 'OD ZER GYI LAM 'BRAS CHOS 'BYUNG, MANG THOS
KLU SGRUB RGYA MTSO'I LAM 'BRAS CHOS 'BYUNG

DANG BSTAN RTZIS, 'JAM DBYANGS MKHYEN BRTZE'I LAM 'BRAS GDAMS
PA'I BYUNG TSUL GSANG CHEN BSTAN PA RGYAS

BYED; NGOR BA DKON MCHOG LHUN GRUB KYI CHOS 'BYUNG BYA BRAL
SANGS RGYAS LHUN GRUB KYI KHA SKONG CAN, AA MES NGAG

DBANG KUN BSOD KYI GSUNG NGAG CHOS 'BYUNG, SA SKYA PA KUN DGA'
BSOD NAMS KYI BDE MCHOG ,MGON PO,

LAM 'BRAS KYI CHOS 'BYUNG GSUM, SHAR BA BYAMS PA KUN DGA' BKRA
SHIS KYI MGON PO'I LO RGYUS, LCOG BYANG

CHUB DPAL LDAN PA'I RNAM THAR RAGS BSDUS CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO'I
'BYUNG KHUNGS DANG BCAS PA, SLE LUNG GI DAM

CAN RGYA MTSO'I RTOGS BRJOD, LHO RONG RDZONG PA RTA TSAG TSE
DBANG RGYAL PO'I BKA' BRGYUD CHOS 'BYUNG, SANGS

RGYAS DAR BO DPAL BZANG GI BKA' BRGYUD CHOS 'BYUNG, SI TU BSTAN
PA'I NYIN BYED KYI STOD CHA DANG, ZUR

MANG GSUNG RAB RGYA MTSOS SMAD CHA BSGRIGS PA'I BKA' RGYUD CHOS
'BYUNG POTA GNYIS, ZHAL SNGA BKA' RGYUD KYI

CHOS 'BYUNG, SI TU CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GI KARMA'I CHOS 'BYUNG
ZUR MANG KUN KHYAB KYI KHA SKONG BCAS, STAG LUNG

ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG RNAM RGYAL GYI STAG LUNG CHOS 'BYUNG NGO
MTSAR RGYA MTSO, MYANG STOD SMAD PAR GSUM GYI CHOS

'BYUNG DANG MYANG YUL STOD SMAD KYI GNAS BSHAD, RGYAL RTZE'I
CHOS 'BYUNG, MI NYAG CHOS 'BYUNG, MI NYAG MKHAS

PA MI LNGA'I RNAM THAR RI KHUD BLA MA SH'AKYA KUN DGAS MDZAD PA,
SBO BO CHOS 'BYUNG, LHA MGON PHUN TSOGS RNAM

RGYAL GYI R'A LA'I CHOS 'BYUNG, 'OL KHA'I CHOS 'BYUNG DANG STON
PA'I NYAN THOS KYI RNAM THAR MKHAR NAG PA RDO RJE RNAM

BRTAN GYIS MDZAD PA, GCOD KYI LO RGYUS 'KHRUL SEL SGRON ME,
GA-YU THOG GSAR RNYING GI RNAM THAR, GSO RIG

CHOS 'BYUNG SHES BYA RAB GSAL, BYANG SMAD PA BSOD NAMS YE SHES
RGYAL MTSAN GYI GSO RIG CHOS 'BYUNG PAD TSAL

BZHAD PA'I NYIN BYED, RIN CHEN STENG BA BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO'I
GSO RIG CHOS 'BYUNG DRANG SRONG DGONGS RGYAN, TSA

RONG PA'I GSO RIG CHOS 'BYUNG SKAL BZANG 'GRO BA'I MYUR LAM, ZUR
MKHAR PA'I SHES BYA SPYI'I KHOG DBUB, SDE

SRID KYI GSO RIG KHOG PHUB, DGA' LDAN PA RJE YE SHES THUB BSTAN
RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I DGE LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG

DANG SHAR RTZE'I CHOS 'BYUNG 'JAM DPAL SNYING PO'I DGONGS RGYAN
RAB TU GSAL BA'I ME LONG, BYANG RTZE'I CHOS

'BYUNG SNGON MED LEGS BSHAD MTHONG BA 'DZUM SHOR, MDO KHAMS KYI
CHOS 'BYUNG NGO MTSAR GTAM GYI SGO BRGYA

'BYED PA'I LDE'U MIG RUS MDZOD LAS 'PHROS PA'I GTAM DU BSNYAD PA
MU TIG 'KHRI SHING DANG LNGA, HOR KHAG

LNGA'I LO RGYUS, GRUB CHEN SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I AA
MDO'I CHOS 'BYUNG GI SDOM TSIGS BCAD LHUG GNYIS,

LI KYA DPON PO SHES RAB DPAL BZANG GI MDO SMAD KYI RTEN RAGS RIM
GYI DKAR CHAG PAn CHEN GYI SHAM BHA LA'I

YUL GYI RNAM BSHAD 'PHAGS YUL GYI RTOGS BRJOD DANG BCAS PA NGO
MTSAR BYE BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS, RGYAL SRAS SKAL

BZANG THUB BSTAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I CHOS RGYAL RIGS LDAN BYUNG
TSUL, BSTAN PA'I GNAS TSAD LEGS BSHAD

GSAL BA'I SGRON ME, RJE BLA MA DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD
PA'I RGYA BOD HOR SOG GI LO RGYUS, SMIN GROL

@006 (CHOS 'BYUNG RNAM THAR GYI THO BKOD PA DANG SBRAG, DEB THEG
'DI BRTZAMS PA'I LUNG KHUNG BSTAN PA,)

SPRUL SKU 'JAM DPAL CHOS KYI BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS KYI 'DZAM
GLING SPYI BSHAD, GUNG MGON PO SKYABS KYI RGYA NAG

CHOS 'BYUNG DANG, DGRA BCOM LNGA BRGYA'I LO RGYUS, RTZE LNGA'I
BKOD PA GSAL BAR BYED PA LHUN PO'I RGYAN BYANG

GZHON BYA BAS MDZAD PA, DVANGS BSIL DKAR CHAG LCANG SKYA ROL
PA'I RDO RJE'I GSUNG LCANG LUNG PAntI TA'I KHA SKONG

CAN; KU SHRI TSE 'PHEL GYI CHEN PO HOR GYI RGYAL RABS, GRAGS PA
BSHAD SGRUB KYI RGYAL RABS DANG 'BREL PA'I RGYA

BOD KYI CHOS 'BYUNG DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG, SUM PA MKHAN CHEN GYI
CHOS 'BYUNG DPAG BSAM LJON PA,

'DZAM GLING SPYI BSHAD NGO MTSAR GTAM SNYAN, MTSO SNGON LO RGYUS
TSANGS GLU GSAR SNYAN GSUM, THU'U BKVAN RIN

PO CHE BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MAS MDZAD PA'I BOD KYI GRUB MTHA'I
BYUNG TSUL SHEL DKAR ME LONG, CHOS 'BYUNG BSTAN

PA'I RGYA MTSOR 'JUG PA'I GRU CHEN GYI STOD CHA NGOR BA DKON
MCHOG LHUN GRUB DANG, SMAD CHA SANGS RGYAS PHUN TSOGS

KYIS MDZAD PA, RGYAL RABS GSAL BA'I ME LONG, 'DI LHA SA'I DKON
GNYER DPON LEGS PA'I SHES RAB KYIS

PAR DU BRKOS SHING, BRTZAMS BYANG LA SA SKYA PA BSOD NAMS RGYAL
MTSAN ZER BA YOD, RGYAL DBANG GI DEB THER

DPYID KYI RGYAL MO'I GLU DBYANGS DANG, DEB THER RDZOGS LDAN
GZHON NU'I DGA' STON GNYIS, BE HU SH'AKYA BZANG

PO'I DEB THER SHOG DRIL CAN, PAn CHEN BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA'I RGYAL
RABS DANG BSTAN RTZIS, LHA BTZUN

TSUL KHRIMS BZANG PO'I RGYAL RABS, SPAG SHOD PA RAG SPRUL SKU'I
RGYAL RABS, 'JAM MGON KUN BSOD,

SA CHEN BSOD NAMS RTZE MO, NGOR BA DKON MCHOG LHUN GRUB, CHOS
RJE NYI LDE PA, GTZANG BA BYAMS PA RDO RJE

RGYAL MTSAN, DAM PA KUN DGA' GRAGS, SHAR BA BYAMS PA KUN DGA'
BKRA SHIS, SHES RAB RDO RJE, STAG

TSANG LO TZ'A PA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I SA SKYA'I GDUNG RABS, GLO
BO MKHAN CHEN GU GE CHOS DPAL BZANG PO, KVAN

TING KU SHRI NAM MKHA' BZANG PO RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I NGOR SHAR
BA'I GDUNG RABS LNGA, RJES MA 'DIS MKHAS

GRUB RIN PO CHER DGAG PA'I RNAM PA ZHIG PHUL PA'I LAN GSUNG 'BUM
THOR BUR BZHUGS, SGAM PO KHRI GDUNG RNAM

THAR BEEt'UR+YA'I 'PHRENG BA, BRANG TI'I GDUNG RABS, BLO MCHOG
RDO RJE'I RLANGS KYI GDUNG RABS, RLANGS PO TA

BSE RUR GRAGS PA, PAn CHEN BYAMS PA GLING PA'I YAR RGYAB PA'I
GDUNG RABS, RIN SPUNGS PA'I GDUNG

RABS MKHAS PA DKAR SHAG PAS MDZAD PA, MDO DBANG RNAM THAR TU
GRAGS PA ZUR CHE CHUNG GI GDUNG RABS,

SDE BA SKYID SHOD PA'I GDUNG RABS STOD CHA AA KHU BKRA SHIS
DANG, SMAD CHA BKA' BLON MDO MKHAR BA TSE RING DBANG

RGYAL GYI YAB ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG TSANGS PA'I DBYANGS KYIS
BSGRIGS PA, SDE BA LHA RGYA RI BA'I GDUNG RABS,

RDO RING PAntI TA BSOD NAMS BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS BSGRIGS PA'I RDO
RING GDUNG RABS, STAG LUNG 'OD 'JO PA

NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS BSGRIGS PA'I RVA KHA SHAG GI GDUNG
RABS, STAG LUNG GDUNG RABS ZHABS DRUNG TSE

RING DBANG RGYAL DANG, STAG LUNG 'OD 'JO BA NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI
DPAL 'BYOR GYIS BSGRIGS PA, ZHVA LU SKU

ZHANG GI GDUNG RABS, BYAMS PA KUN DGAS BRTZAMS PA'I SDE DGE'I
GDUNG RABS, 'BRI GUNG CHOS 'BYUNG

'BRI GUNG CHE TSANG BSTAN 'DZIN PADMA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD
PA, 'BRI GUNG GDAN RABS, NGOR GYI GDAN

@007 (CHOS 'BYUNG RNAM THAR GYI THO BKOD PA DANG SBRAGS, DEB
THER 'DI BRTZAMS PA'I LUNG KHUNGS BSTAN PA,)

RABS; NGOR CHEN SANGS RGYAS PHUN TSOGS KYI KHA SKONG DANG BCAS
PA, NYI THANG SMAN RGYAL PA'I GSANG PHU'I GDAN

RABS; HOR SPRUL SKU RABS BRTAN RGYA MTSOS BSGRIGS PA'I SGO MANG
DANG, SKYOR LUNG CHOS 'BYUNG GNYIS RTZOM

'PHRO; DVAGS PO GRVA TSANG GI GDAN RABS STOD CHA GZIMS SHAG
MKHAN PO BLO BZANG MKHAS BTZUN DANG, SMAD CHA

DE'I SLOB MA NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS KYI MDZAD PA, PHYI MA 'DIS
MDZAD PA'I 'CHAD DKAR CHOS SDE'I GDAN

RABS; DRUNG CHEN PA'I RVA BA SMAD KYI GDAN RABS BSTAN PA'I RTZA
LAG KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I

DNGOS SLOB CHAB MDO PA 'PHAGS PA RIN PO CHES MDZAD PA'I CHAB
MDO'I GDAN RABS, DPON BKRA SHIS RGYAL

MTSAN GYI YANG STENG GDAN RABS, GSANG PHU'I GDAN RABS ZHABS
DRUNG RIN CHEN 'BYOR LDAN GYIS MDZAD PA,

'PHYONG RGYAS RI BO BDE CHEN DANG, GSER MDOG CAN GYI GDAN RABS,
BLA MA LEGS PA LA SKAL BZANG CHOS

GRAGS KYIS MDZAD PA'I MNGA' RIS GRVA TSANG GI GDAN RABS, DPAL
ZHVA LU PA CHEN PO BLO GSAL BSTAN SKYONG GIS

MDZAD PA'I ZHVA LU GSER KHANG GI GDAN RABS CHOS 'BYUNG NGO MTSAR
DAD PA'I 'JUG NGOGS, BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I

SNGAGS PA GRVA TSANG GI GDAN RABS GU GE YONGS 'DZIN BLO BZANG
BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS MDZAD PA, DEB DKAR DU

GRAGS PA SNGON GYI BKA' 'GYUR DKAR CHAG BKA' 'GYUR DKAR CHAG NYI
MA'I 'OD ZER DANG, BKA' BSTAN

DKAR CHAG BSTAN PA RGYAS PA GNYIS BCOM LDAN RIG RAL GYIS MDZAD
PA, BU STON GYI ZHVA LU'I BSTAN 'GYUR

DKAR CHAG SNE GDONG DU TA'I SI TU BYANG CHUB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS
BZHENGS PA'I BSTAN 'GYUR DKAR CHAG THUGS SRAS

RIN CHEN RNAM RGYAL GYIS MDZAD PA, SI TU GTZUG LAG CHOS KYI
SNANG BA'I SDE DGE'I BKA' 'GYUR DKAR CHAG ZHU

CHEN PA TSUL KHRIMS RIN CHEN GYIS BSGRIGS PA'I BSTAN 'GYUR DKAR
CHAG DBUS PA BLO GSAL GYI BKA' BSTAN

DKAR CHAG DANG CHOS 'BYUNG, KLONG RDOL BLA MAS BRAG YAB TU BKA'
'GYUR BZHENGS PA'I DKAR CHA YONGS

'DZIN GYI BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING GI BKA' BSTAN DKAR CHAG
DANG, PHUG PO CHE'I DKAR CHAG DGE RTZE SPRUL

SKU 'GYUR MED TSE DBANG MCHOG GRUB KYI RNYING MA RGYUD 'BUM DKAR
CHAG SNAR THANG BSTAN 'GYUR DKAR CHAG BLA MA

BYAMS PA'I MDZAD BYANG CAN, KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED DBANG PO'I SDES
MDZAD PA'I CO NE'I BSTAN 'GYUR

DKAR CHAG NOR BU'I PHRENG BA, BLA MA BYAMS PAS MDZAD PA'I GRVA
SA CHEN PO BZHI DANG RGYUD STOD SMAD CHAGS TSUL,

KLONG RDOL BLA MAS MDZAD PA'I BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU DANG,
BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BYUNG TSUL, GSUNG 'BUM

DANG YIG CHA MANG PO'I MTSAN THO, SDE SRID KYI LNGA PA'I GSER
GDUNG DKAR CHAG SHIN TU RGYAS PA, PAn CHEN DPAL

LDAN YE SHES KYIS MDZAD PA'I RGYAL BA SKAL BZANG PA'I GSER GDUNG
DKAR CHAG STAG PHU BLO BZANG CHOS KYI

DBANG PHYUG GI SNGA 'GYUR BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED PADMA THEG MCHOG
BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYI GSER GDUNG DKAR

CHAG PUR TSA ME 'DZIN MA'I DKAR CHAG YER BA'I DKAR CHAG BSTAN PA
DAR RGYAS MA DANG, LHA LUNG DPAL

RDOR MA GNYIS, BSAM YAS DKAR CHAG RVA SGRENG DKAR CHAG 'BROM ME
LCE 'PHRENG BAS BSGRIGS PA DANG MDZAD

BYANG MED PA GNYIS, PO TA LA'I DKAR CHAG LHA SA'I DKAR CHAG SHEL
DKAR ME LONG, PHA BONG KHA'I DKAR

@008 (CHOS 'BYUNG RNAM THAR GYI THO BKOD PA DANG SBRAGS, DEB
THER 'DI BRTZAMS PA'I LUNG KHUNGS BSTAN PA,)

CHAG 'KHON STON GYIS MDZAD PA, BTZUN MO TSAL GYI DKAR CHAG ,GNAS
CHUNG DANG LA MO'I DKAR CHAG BKRAS

LHUN MCHOD RTEN DKAR CHAG THANG BO CHE'I DKAR CHAG KHRA 'BRUG
DKAR CHAG SA SKYA'I NANG RTEN DKAR

CHAG BSOD NAMS SENG GES MDZAD PA, SGO RUM MKHAN CHEN KUN RIN GYI
SA SKYA'I RTEN BRTEN PA'I DKAR CHAG

GUNG THANG GI DKAR CHAG BDUD RTZI'I CHU RGYUN 'JOG RI NGAG DBANG
BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS KYIS MDZAD PA, MU LE

LHA KHANG GI DKAR CHAG DANG, MU LI GONG MA'I RNAM THAR, ZHVA
DMAR DRUG PA CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GIS MDZAD PA'I

KONG PO GNAS NANG GI DKAR CHAG SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN
MTHU STOBS KYI DGON GSAR DGA' LDAN CHOS

'PHEL GLING GI DKAR CHAG ZHVA LHA KHANG GI DKAR CHAG KLONG RAMS
PAS MDZAD PA, RGYAL THANG SUM RTZEN GLING GI

DKAR CHAG DKAR SHOS CHOS 'KHOR DGON GYI DKAR CHAG RI BO BDE CHEN
GYI DKAR CHAG DANG BLA RABS,

MKHAR RDO BSAM GTAN GLING GI BLA RABS MGUR MA, 'PHAGS PA LHA
KHANG SOGS KYI RTEN THO, ZHVA LU'I KHA SAR PA

nI'I DKAR CHAG BKA' BABS GSUM GYI YO GA DANG RNAM SRAS DBYANGS
KYI DKAR CHAG ZHVA LU'I CHE BRJOD,

DKYIL 'KHOR GYI ZHAL GRANGS, BUM CHU RIN PO CHE BYUNG TSUL GSUM
RI MTHIL DBU MDZAD CHOS DBANG BSTAN PA'I

RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BSGRIGS PA, CHAG LO'I RGYA GAR LAM YIG BAL YUL
GYI LAM YIG LHA MTHONG LO TZ'A PAS MDZAD

PA; RDO RJE GDAN GYI LAM YIG AO RGYAN LAM YIG MAN LUNG GU RU
DANG, CHOS RJE 'BYOR LDAN GRAGS PA'I

SHAMBHA LA'I LAM YIG SNA NAM GYI BTZUN PA SKAL BZANG CHOS KYI
RGYA MTSO BSOD NAMS DBANG PO, BCOM LDAN RIG

RAL; KHRIMS KHANG LO TZ'A PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO, BOD MKHAS PA
RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I STON PA'I RNAM THAR,

'KHRI SHING ME TOG TSIGS BCAD MA DANG, GTAM RGYUD DPAG BSAM
'BRAS BU, 'KHRI SHING GI 'GREL BA 'DAR

LOS MDZAD PA, BU STON GYI SANGS RGYAS RNAM THAR CHEN MO, ZHVA
DMAR GAR DBANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GI STON PA'I

MDZAD PA BCU GNYIS KYI RTOGS BRJOD, DGE YE TSUL KHRIMS SENG GE'I
SANGS RGYAS NYAN THOS BCAS KYI RNAM THAR,

MDO MKHAR PA TSE RING DBANG RGYAL GYI SANGS RGYAS KYI RTOGS PA
BRJOD PA LNGA BRGYA PA SKAD GNYIS SHAN SBYAR, CHAG LO,

SNAR THANG PA, LNGA BA CHEN PO, MKHAR NAG LO TZ'A PA, SDINGS PO
CHE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG SNYAN GRAGS RNAMS KYI

GNAS BCU'I RTOGS BRJOD, BKA' GDAMS PHA CHOS BU CHOS MCHAN MA, JO
BO'I RNAM THAR CHE CHUNG, ZANG

ZING NE RING PA 'CHI MED RAB RGYAS, LHU LA BKA' BCU BA, JO GDAN
BSOD NAMS LHUN GRUB, LEGS BZANG

PA; GNAS RNYING KUN DGA' BDE LEGS, KU COR RTOGS LDAN PA, MNGA'
RIS PA NGAG DBANG 'JAM

DBYANGS NYI MA BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, SMAR KHAMS 'OD ZER BLA MA
DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN, MKHAS PA SHES

RAB RIN CHEN, RTA TSAG RJE DRUNG NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG
GSER KHANG CHOS RJE GU NA MA TI, YONGS

'DZIN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN, 'BRUG RGYAL DBANG SPRUL SKU RNAMS
KYIS MDZAD PA'I RJE'I RNAM THAR, BRAG SGO RAB

'BYAMS PA PHUN TSOGS RGYAL MTSAN GYI RJE'I RNAM THAR DANG, SANGS
RGYAS KYI RNAM THAR RGYAS PA, GUNG RU RGYAN

BZANG GI RTOGS BRJOD 'DUN LEGS MA'I tAKKI, BRAG YAB BLO BZANG
BSTAN PAS MDZAD PA'I RJE YAB SRAS GSUM

@009 (CHOS 'BYUNG RNAM THAR GYI THO BKOD PA DANG SBRAGS, DEB
THER 'DI BRTZAMS PA'I LUNG KHUNGS BSTAN PA,)

GYI RNAM THAR, MKHAS GRUB RJE'I RNAM THAR CHOS LDAN RAB 'BYOR,
SE RA RJE BTZUN PA, BDE LEGS NYI MA RNAMS

KYIS MDZAD PA, GTZANG STON KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN DANG, BLO GROS
RIN CHEN SENG GE GNYIS KYIS MDZAD PA'I

'JAM DBYANGS CHOS RJE'I RNAM THAR, BRA TI DGE BSHES KYI BYAMS
CHEN CHOS RJE'I RNAM THAR TSIGS BCAD MA, BA

SO CHOS RGYAN GYI RNAM THAR 'BRONG RTZE LHA BTZUN GYIS MDZAD PA,
RJE SHES RAB SENG GE'I RNAM THAR NOR BU'I DO SHAL,

RJE DGE 'DUN GRUB KYI RNAM THAR PAn CHEN YE SHES RTZE MO DANG,
LAS CHEN KUN RGYAL PAS MDZAD PA, RJE DGE

'DUN RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR RANG RTZOM, YANG DE NYID KYI RNAM
THAR DPAG BSAM LJON SHING GA-YANG BA CHOS RJE PHYOGS

LAS RNAM RGYAL GYIS MDZAD PA LHA RJE DKON MCHOG SKYABS KYI KHA
SKONG BCAS DANG, PAn CHEN BSOD GRAGS PAS

MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR, RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR
SKAL LDAN SHING RTA DANG, DGUNG LO BCO LNGA PA

YAN GYI RNAM THAR TSIGS BCAD MA, YANG DE NYID KYI RNAM THAR
RGYAL DBANG LNGA PA, MKHAR NAG PA, GZHU KHANG PA

DGE LEGS LHUN GRUB, DRUNG YIG 'JAM SRAS PA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA,
RGYAL BA YON TAN RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR

GZHU KHANG PA DANG, MKHAR NAG LO TZ'A PAS MDZAD PA, ZUR CHOS
DBYINGS RANG GROL DANG, SMON 'GRO 'JAM

DBYANGS DBANG RGYAL RDO RJES MDZAD PA'I LNGA PA CHEN PO'I RNAM
THAR, DE NYID KYI 'KHRUNGS RABS RNAM THAR BDUD

RTZI'I THIGS PA PHA BONG KHA PA 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PAS MDZAD PA,
SDE SRID KYI DU K'U LA'I KHA SKONG PO TA GSUM

DANG; TSANG RNAM GSER GYI SNYE MA, DAR RGYAS NO MON HAN GYI
TSANGS DBYANGS PA'I RNAM THAR, RGYAL DBANG

BDUN PA'I RNAM THAR LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJES MDZAD PA, RTA
TSAG RJE DRUNG GIS MDZAD PA'I RGYAL BA 'JAM DPAL

RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR 'DZAM GLING MTHA' GRU YANGS PA'I RGYAN,
RGYAL DBANG LUNG RTOGS RGYA MTSO 'KHRUL MED NGES PA

RNYED PA'I LO RGYUS 'PHRIN LAS NYIN BYED 'DREN PA'I SKYA RENGS,
DE'I RNAM THAR DAD PA'I YIG 'PHROG DE MO BLO BZANG

THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG
CHOS RGYAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I DBEN SA PA SOGS

MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO GSUM GYI RTOGS BRJOD, DGE LDAN DKA' RGYUD RIN
PO CHE'I ZAB LAM BRGYUD PA'I RNAM THAR

MDOR BSDUS, RJE NYID KYI GSANG RNAM BA SO SPRUL SKU LA GNANG BA
DANG, 'OD ZER SKU SKYE LA GNANG BA'I 'KHRUNGS

RABS; RNAM THAR RGYAS PA MKHAR NAG LO TZ'A PAS MDZAD PA, RTOGS
BRJOD SNYAN NGAG DBYANGS CAN NGAG GI ROL

MTSO KHA SKONG DANG BCAS PA, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES KYI RNAM
THAR DPON TSANG DGE 'DUN DON GRUB KYIS

MDZAD PA, PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYI RNAM THAR NYI MA'I 'OD
ZER, PAn CHEN BSOD GRAGS PA'I RANG

RNAM MGUR MA DANG BYA BRAL LHA DBANG RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I RNAM
THAR NGO MTSAR RMAD BYUNG ROL RTZED, GTZANG NAG

PAS MDZAD PA'I CHA BA CHOS SENG GI RNAM THAR DAD PA'I 'OD ZER
PHYOGS BRGYAR 'GYED PA, KHA CHE'I PAn CHEN SH'AKYA

SHR'I'I RNAM THAR, LO CHEN RIN CHEN BZANG PO'I RNAM THAR DE'I
SLOB MNGA' RIS KHRI STENG BA SHR'I DZNY'A NAS BKOD PA

DANG; RTOGS BRJOD ZHANG ZHUNG CHOS DBANG GRAGS PAS MDZAD PA, 'U
YUG PA'I RVA LO'I RNAM THAR DAD PA'I 'OD

ZER PHYOGS BCUR 'PHRO BA DANG, RVA YE SHES SENG GES MDZAD PA
LHAN THABS DANG BCAS PA, SLOB DPON PADMA'I

@010 (CHOS 'BYUNG RNAM THAR GYI THO BKOD PA DANG SBRAGS, DEB
THER 'DI BRTZAMS PA'I LUNG KHUNGS BSTAN PA,)

RNAM THAR T'A RA N'A THA DANG, SNGAGS 'CHANG KUN RIN GYI SRAS
BSOD NAMS DBANG BOS MDZAD PA, PADMA BKA'

THANG TSIGS BCAD LHUG GNYIS, PAG SHI GNAS BRTAN GYI KLU ME'I
RNAM THAR, ZHVA DMAR BZHI PA CHOS KYI GRAGS

PAS MDZAD PA'I KHRIMS KHANG LO TZ'A PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I
RNAM THAR DANG, DE'I BSTOD CHEN, PAn CHEN

SH'AKYA MCHOG LDAN GYI RONG tIKA PA'I RNAM THAR, SA SKYA PAntI
TA'I RTOGS BRJOD SKAL BA BZANG PO'I LEGS LAM,

DE NYID KYI SLOB MA LHO PA RIN CHEN DPAL, CHOS RGYAL 'PHAGS PA,
'U YUG PA RIGS PA'I SENG GE RIN SBUNGS

NGAG DBANG 'JIGS GRAGS RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I SA PAn GYI RNAM
THAR, 'PHAGS PA'I RNAM THAR YE SHES RGYAL

MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA, GNYAG SNYING PO RGYAL MTSAN GYI TSOGS SGOM
RIN PO CHE'I RNAM THAR, DKAR BO BRAG PA'I

RANG RNAM DANG, DES MDZAD PA'I NYAN CHEN BSOD NAMS BRTAN PA'I
RNAM THAR, DGE SLONG DPAL LDAN GYI ZHANG

DKON MCHOG DPAL PA'I RNAM THAR, BLO BRTAN GYI NA BZA' BRAG PHUG
PA'I RNAM THAR, BLA MA DAM PA BSOD

NAMS RGYAL MTSAN GYI RNAM THAR DPAL LDAN TSUL KHRIMS DANG LO
CHEN BYANG CHUB RTZE MOS MDZAD PA GNYIS, BUDDHA

SHR'I'I RNAM THAR NGOR BAS MDZAD PA, RI KHROD PA BLO BRTAN GYI
RNAM THAR DPAL LDAN TSUL KHRIMS KYIS MDZAD PA,

GUNG RU SHER BZANG GI MUS CHEN DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN GYI RNAM
THAR, RJE MUS PA'I RNAM THAR RGYAS PA NGO MTSAR RGYA

MTSO KHA SKONG BCAS BSOD NAMS SENG GES MDZAD PA, GO RAMS PA'I
RNAM THAR, TSAR CHEN GYIS MDZAD PA'I

BDAG CHEN BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN, RDO RING BA, RJE BTZUN SDINGS MA
PA CHEN PO RNAMS KYI RNAM THAR, BYA BRAL

SANGS RGYAS PHUN TSOGS, GU GE DPON PO NAM MKHA' BLO GSAL, CHOS
DPAL BZANG PO RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I

NGOR BA KUN BZANG GI RNAM THAR, NGOR PA'I RNAM THAR MUS CHEN
GYIS MDZAD PA, 'JAM MGON KUN BSOD PA'I

RTOGS BRJOD NGO MTSAR RGYA MTSO'I RAB RLABS DANG KHA SKONG DAD
PA'I CHU RGYUN, TSAR CHEN RNAM THAR LNGA BAS MDZAD PA,

TSAR CHEN LAM GLU, 'JAM DBYANGS MKHYEN BRTZE'I RANG RNAM THUN
MONG DANG THUN MONG MA YIN PA DBANG PHYUG RAB

BRTAN GYI KHA SKONG CAN, SNGAGS 'CHANG KUN RIN PA'I RNAM THAR
NGO MTSAR RGYA MTSO, BZHAD PA MKHYEN BRTZES

MDZAD PA'I SGO RUM PA KUN DGA' LEGS PA'I RNAM THAR, RED MDA'
BA'I RNAM THAR MNGA' RIS PA BSOD NAMS

RTZE MO DANG, 'DUL 'DZIN GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA, BU
STON RNAM THAR RIN CHEN PHRENG BA, DE'I

RTOGS BRJOD KHRO PHU BSOD NAMS SENG GES MDZAD PA, SNYE MO SKU
ZHANG CHOS RJE'I RNAM THAR DUS ZHABS PA SH'AKYA

DBANG PHYUG GIS MDZAD PA, SKU ZHANG BSOD NAMS MCHOG GRUB KYI
RNAM THAR GRVA LNGA RDO RJES MDZAD PA, ZHVA LU CHOS

RJE RIN CHEN MKHYEN RAB MCHOG GRUB KYI RNAM THAR MTHONG BA DON
LDAN DANG, KHA SKONG SKAL BZANG GDUL BYA'I

GNYEN; SKYOG STON RIG 'DZIN RGYAL PO'I RNAM THAR SKYOG STON BSOD
NAMS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA, PAn

CHEN 'BUM PHRAG GSUM PA RIN CHEN CHOS DBANG DANG, SKYOG STON RIN
CHEN BKRA SHIS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I

ZHVA LU LO TZ'A PA CHOS SKYONG BZANG PO'I RNAM THAR, YANG DE
NYID KYI RNAM THAR TSIGS BCAD BYANG BA LO CHEN RATNA BHA DRAS

MDZAD PA, MAR MI RAS CHUNG GI RNAM MGUR, MI LA'I RNAM THAR MDZOD
NAG MA, DPON PO BSOD NAMS LHUN

@011 (CHOS 'BYUNG RNAM THAR GYI THO BKOD PA DANG SBRAGS, DEB DEB
THER 'DIS BRTZAMS PA'I LUNG KHUNG BSTAN PA,)

GRUB ZLA 'OD RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I SGAM PO'I RNAM THAR,
TSAL BA SI TU DGE BLO'I BLA MA ZHANG GI RNAM THAR,

BDE GSHEGS PHAG MO GRU PA'I RNAM THAR CHOS SGO PA BSOD NAMS DPAL
GYIS MDZAD PA, GTZANG BA RGYA RAS KYI RNAM

THAR DAD PA'I RLABS PHRENG DANG MGUR 'BUM, GTZANG SMYON HE RU KA
DANG LO RAS KYI RNAM THAR RGOD TSANG PAS MDZAD

PA; STAG LUNG MA THANG GI RNAM THAR MU TIG PHRENG PA, STAG LUNG
NGAG DBANG RNAM RGYAL GYI 'KHRUNGS RABS RNAM

THAR; 'BA' RA BA RGYAL MTSAN BZANG PO'I RNAM MGUR, 'BA' RA'I
RGYUD 'DZIN NGAG DBANG YE SHES KYI RNAM

THAR CHOS DBYINGS RDO RJES MDZAD PA, ZHVA DMAR GAR DBANG CHOS
KYI DBANG PHYUG GI RTOGS BRJOD 'DOD 'JO'I BA

MO; DOL BO PA SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN GYI RNAM THAR NYID KYI SLOB
MA 'GA' RONG BA DANG, ZHVA LU LO TZ'A PAS MDZAD

PA; PHUR LCOG SKU TSA DKA' BCU BYAMS PA BLO GROS KYIS MDZAD PA'I
'PHAGS PA LHA RIM BYON GYI RNAM THAR, ZHVA LU

LO TZ'A PA'I DBANG LO'I RNAM THAR, BLO BRTAN GSUM PA'I RNAM THAR
DBON PO LO CHEN BYANG CHUB RTZE MOS MDZAD PA,

LO CHEN BYANG RTZE'I RNAM THAR ZHVA LU PA GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN
GYIS MDZAD PA, DE'I DBON PO BO DONG PHYOGS LAS RNAM

RGYAL GYI RNAM THAR NGO MTHAR DGA' STON, YANG DE NYID KYI RNAM
THAR NGAG DBANG MA DANG, DBON YIG PA DKON

MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN GYI ZIN BRIS MA, KUN DGA' GROL MCHOG GI
'KHRUNGS RABS RNAM THAR, MANG THOS KLU SGRUB

PA'I SKYID GSHONG BA SANGS RGYAS 'OD ZER GYI RTOGS BRJOD, SNYE
MDO THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA KUN DGA' DON GRUB KYI

RNAM THAR SLOB DPON H'Um KA RAS MDZAD PA, RGYAL KHANG RTZE PA
DPAL 'BYOR RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR CHOS RJE SKU SKYE TSE RING

MGON POS MDZAD PA SOGS GSUM, YANG DGON PA'I PHYI NANG GSANG GSUM
GYI RNAM THAR, DRAN MCHOG DON

YOD RGYAL MTSAN GYI RNAM THAR YAB RJE KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN GYIS
MDZAD PA, RJE'I SLOB MA SMAR KHAMS PA GRAGS PA

BZANG PO'I RNAM THAR STAG TSANG LO TZ'A PA DANG, PAn CHEN CHOS
RGYAN GYIS MDZAD PA, BLO GROS RIN CHEN GYI SEMS

DPA' CHEN PO DPAL LDAN SENG GE'I RNAM THAR, SE RA RJE BTZUN PA'I
GNAS RNYING KUN DGA' BDE LEGS KYI RNAM

THAR; SEMS DPA' CHEN PO GZHON NU RGYAL MCHOG GI RNAM THAR MUS
CHEN GYIS MDZAD PA, RIN CHEN TSUL KHRIMS

KYIS MDZAD PA'I 'BRONG RTZE LHA BTZUN GYI RNAM THAR, 'BROM SENG
GE RGYAL MTSAN GYI RTOGS BRJOD STAG LOS MDZAD

PA; SPOS KHANG BLO BZANG MCHOG GRUB KYI THANG SAG PA DNGOS GRUB
RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR, DE MO SPRUL SKU DBANG RGYAL

DON GRUB KYI RANG GI SKYE RABS DRANG THIG GSAL BAR STON PA'I ME
LONG, 'OL KHA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYI RANG RNAM

MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON DANG, DGE RGAN 'OL KHA PA ZANGS RI DAM CHOS
RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR ROL MO,

RJE DRUNG SPRUL SKU DGE 'DUN CHOS RGYAL DBANG PHYUG GI RNAM THAR
GRUB DBANG DGYES PA'I ROL MTSO, GTZANG BA YE

SHES DPAL 'BYOR GYI RNAM THAR MTSO SNA RGOD RTZE SPRUL SKUS
BSGRIGS PA, SER BYES BLA ZUR BYAMS CHEN MKHAN PO BLO

BZANG NOR BU'I RNAM THAR DAD PA'I SGO 'BYED BYIN RLABS KYI ROL
MTSO, SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I SKYID SHOD BSTAN

'DZIN BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR, LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO
RJES MDZAD PA'I RVA SGRENG KHRI CHEN GYI RNAM THAR, RTA

TSAG RJE DRUNG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I MGON PO'I RNAM THAR 'BRUG
RGYAL DBANG SPRUL SKUS BSGRIGS PA, NA KHA PA THAR
@012 (CHOS 'BYUNG RNAM THAR GYI THO BKOD PA DANG SBRAGS, DEB
THER 'DI BRTZAMS PA'I LUNG KHUNGS BSTAN PA,)

PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYI RNAM THAR ZUNG 'JUG RIN CHEN 'DREN PA'I
SHING RTA NYID KYI SLOB MA DVAGS ZUR BLO BZANG MKHAS

BTZUN GYIS MDZAD PA DANG, RNAM THAR BSDUS PA BIKshUG GA SVA GA
RAS MDZAD PA, 'JOG RI PA'I RANG RNAM DVANGS

SHEL NOR BU'I 'PHRENG BA, MU LI BTZAN RA DGE BSHES BLO GROS
BSTAN 'DZIN GYI RNAM THAR RANG RTZOM, GZIMS

SHAG MKHAN PO'I RNAM THAR DE'I SLOB MA DRUNG RAMS PA NGAG DBANG
CHOS GRAGS KYIS MDZAD PA, SDINGS PO CHE BA NGAG

DBANG SNYAN GRAGS KYI RNAM THAR PHUG MO CHE BAS MDZAD PA, DBUS
SMYON KUN DGA' BZANG PO'I RNAM THAR STOD CHA

GNYUG LA PAn CHEN NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA DANG, SMAD CHA LHA MTHONG
LO TZ'A PAS MDZAD PA, GZIMS SHAG MKHAN

PO'I SLOB MA MKHA' SPYOD BLA MA NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS
KYIS MDZAD PA'I GZIMS SHAG LHO PA MKHAN PO'I RNAM

THAR DANG, YER PA PHUN TSOGS RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR, YANG YER PA
BA'I GSANG RNAM DANG MGUR 'GREL KHYAD

'PHAGS; STAG PHU KU SHRI DPAL LDAN DON GRUB KYI RNAM THAR 'BRUG
PA KUN LEGS KYI SPRUL SKU'I KHA SKONG CAN,

'BRUG PA KUN LEGS KYI RANG RNAM, 'BRUG PA NGAG DBANG RNAM RGYAL
GYI RNAM THAR CHOS KYI SPRIN CHEN PO'I DBYANGS,

'BRUG PA PAD DKAR GYI RNAM THAR RANG RTZOM THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I
ZLOS GAR DANG, SANGS RGYAS RDO RJES MDZAD PA'I

RNAM THAR KHA SKONG SOGS 'BRUG PA RIM BYON LA RNAM THAR POT RE
RE, SPYAN SNGA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I

SANGS RGYAS RIN CHEN SGANG PA KHU DBON GYI RNAM THAR, LNGA PA'I
ZUR CHEN GYI RNAM THAR, DON GRUB RGYAL PO'I

GTER STON RATNA GLING PA'I RNAM THAR, KARMA DUS GSUM MKHYEN PA'I
RNAM THAR RE'U MIG MA GZHON NU BYANG CHUB

KYIS MDZAD PA, SGANG LO TZ'A PAS MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR GSER GLING
MA, RA GA AA S+YE'I RNAM THAR POT GCIG LHA

RTZE NGAG DBANG BZANG PO'I RNAM THAR NGAG DBANG SANGS RGYAS RDO
RJES ZIN BRIS SU BTAB PA, NGAG DBANG BSOD

NAMS DBANG PHYUG GI RNAM THAR SRAS NGAG DBANG KUN DGA' BKRA SHIS
KYIS MDZAD PA, 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS RJE'I

DNGOS SLOB KONG PO ZA YUL PA RIN CHEN RNAM RGYAL GYI RNAM THAR
PAD DKAR CHUN PO NYID KYI SLOB MA TSUL KHRIMS BZANG

POS MDZAD PA, MI NYAG RGYUD ZUR BLO BZANG RIN CHEN GYI RNAM THAR
RANG RTZOM MJUG MA TSANG BA, STAG LUNG ZHABS

DRUNG NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS DPAL GRUB KYI RNAM THAR RGYAS PA POT
GCIG DKYIL KHANG DPON SLOB GU GE BRTZON 'GRUS

RGYAL MTSAN GYI RNAM THAR RGYAL SRAS BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS
MDZAD PA DANG, 'PHYONG RGYAS PAndI TA BLO BZANG

BSTAN 'PHEL GYIS MDZAD PA GNYIS, LHA RTZE YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN
GYI RNAM THAR RNAM GROL 'BRAS BZANG GRUB PA'I

DGA' STON, DVAGS NYAG RIG RAL GYI SPRUL SKU AE LUM PA BYAMS PA
BSTAN PA'I RTOGS BRJOD RANG RTZOM DPAG

BSAM 'KHRI SHING, RJE BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL PA'I RNAM THAR NGO
MTSAR RGYA MTSO KARMA 'PHRIN LAS KYIS MDZAD PA,

'BRUG RGYAL DBANG SPRUL SKU'I RNAM THAR RANG RTZOM, STAG PHU GAR
DBANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GI RANG RNAM DVANGS SHEL

ME LONG, RGYAL RONG PA RONG STON SH'AKYA RGYAL MTSAN GYI RNAM
THAR NAM MKHA' DPAL BZANG DANG, SH'AKYA MCHOG

LDAN GYIS MDZAD PA GNYIS, KUN MKHYEN GYI BLA MA AE GZIMS SHAG PA
BLO BZANG MKHAS BTZUN GYI RNAM THAR DRUNG

RAMS PA NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS DANG, MKHA' SPYOD PA NGAG DBANG
BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS KYIS MDZAD PA GNYIS,

@013 (CHOS 'BYUNG RNAM THAR GYI THO BKOD PA DANG SBRAGS, DEB
THER 'DI BRTZAMS PA'I LUNG KHUNGS BSTAN PA,)

DPON SLOB DBU MDZAD CHOS 'PHEL RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BSGRIGS PA'I BDE
CHEN PA YE SHES SBYIN PA'I RNAM THAR SKAL

BZANG RNA BA'I BDUD RTZI TAMBU RA'I SGRA DBYANGS, MI NYAG LHA
'BRI STON PA SHES RAB RDO RJE'I RNAM THAR DE'I SLOB MA

RGYAL RONG PA RONG STON BLO GROS MTSUNGS MED KYIS MDZAD PA 'PHRO
CAN, SHE'U LO'I SPYAN SNGA NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS

RGYAL MTSAN GYI RNAM THAR RTZOM 'PHRO, KHRI NGAG DBANG CHOS
'PHEL GYI RNAM THAR RANG RTZOM DGE LDAN RING LUGS RGYAS

BYED DKA' CHEN DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN GYI KHA SKONG BCAS, KHRI
BYANG CHUB CHOS 'PHEL GYI RNAM THAR DGE LDAN BSTAN

PA'I MDZES RGYAN MKHAN SPRUL BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS RNAM RGYAL
GYIS MDZAD PA, T'A RA N'A THA'I GRUB CHEN BUDDHA GRUB TA

DANG; SLOB DPON SPYOD 'CHANG DBANG PO'I RNAM THAR, RIN CHEN RNAM
RGYAL GYI RGYAL DBANG CHOS RJE KUN DGA'

DPAL 'BYOR GYI RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR BDUD RTZI'I THIGS PA, GA-YU
BRAG PA ZHANG BRTZON 'GRUS GRAGS PA'I RANG RNAM

DGE SLONG SHES RAB GRUB PA'I NGOR GNANG BA, RNAM THAR BSAM YAS
BKA' RGYA MA LE TSAN GNYIS, GSANG SNGAGS

RDO RJE THEG PA'I RNAM THAR GSANG LAM RDO RJE THEG PA'I SBAS PA
BKA' RGYA MA, KONG PO CHOS MDZAD BGRES PA SKAL

BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR 'BUM PHRAG 'CHAR BA'I
DVANGS SHEL CHOS MDZAD GZHON PA YE SHES BRTZON

'GRUS KYIS MDZAD PA, MANG THOS KLU SGRUB PA'I RANG RNAM, MDO
MKHAR PA ME TRI DON GRUB RGYAL MTSAN GYI RNAM

THAR SPYAN SNGA MI PHAM CHOS RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA, YOL BLA CHEN
BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I GZHON NU BLO GROS

KYI RNAM THAR, SNGAGS 'CHANG BSOD NAMS CHOS 'PHEL GYI RNAM THAR
RANG RTZOM MCHOD DPON DKON MCHOG RDO RJE'I

KHA SKONG BCAS, BSLAB GSUM RGYAL MTSAN GYI RNAM THAR DBANG PHYUG
RAB BRTAN GYIS MDZAD PA, LNGA PA CHEN POS

MDZAD PA'I RDO RJE 'CHANG DBANG PHYUG RAB BRTAN, BKA' 'GYUR PA
MGON PO BSOD NAMS MCHOG LDAN, ZHVA LU

PA RIN CHEN BSOD NAMS MCHOG GRUB GSUM GYI RNAM THAR, GRUB CHEN
KUN DGA' BLO GROS KYI RNAM THAR 'JAM

DBYANGS DKON MCHOG BZANG POS MDZAD PA, LHO BRAG PHYAG RDOR BAS
MDZAD PAR GRAGS PA'I SNGAGS 'CHANG KUN

BLO'I RNAM THAR, YON BDAG BKRA SHIS SKYID DANG, NAM MKHA' CHOS
GRAGS KYI SKYE RGYUS, SHUD BU'I ZHAL NGO

'GA' ZHIG GI SKYES RABS LUNG BSTAN, RJE RANG GI RNAM THAR PHYI
NANG GSANG GSUM, PHYI'I RNAM THAR BDUD RTZI'I

PHRENG BA 'BRING PO, PHYI'I RNAM THAR GDUNG RABS DANG BCAS PA,
RNAM THAR SKYES RABS BSDUS PA, YONGS

'DZIN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I GRUB DBANG BLO BZANG
RNAM RGYAL GYI RNAM THAR THUB BSTAN MDZES RGYAN

DANG GSANG RNAM, GNAS BRTAN BCU DRUG DANG SENG GE BZANG PO'I
RTOGS BRJOD, RGYAL BA 'JAM DPAL RGYA

MTSOS MDZAD PA'I YONGS 'DZIN RNAM THAR THUB BSTAN PADMO 'BYED
PA'I NYIN BYED DANG, GSOL 'DEBS GSANG

RNAM DANG 'BREL BA, STAG PHU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN
GYI RANG GI SKYES RABS PHAN BDE'I LJON PA BSKYED

PA'I SA BON, RTA TSAG RJE DRUNG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I MGON POS
MDZAD PA'I KLONG RDOL BLA MA'I RNAM THAR RGYAL SRAS

SPYOD PA'I MDZES RGYAN DANG, 'KHRUNGS RABS STAG PHUS MDZAD PA,
PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS MDZAD

PA'I GNAS BCU'I RTOGS BRJOD, BLA MA BYAMS PA'I RNAM THAR, RJE
BLO BZANG BZOD PA'I RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR

@014 (CHOS 'BYUNG RNAM THAR GYI THO BKOD PA DANG SBRAGS, DEB
THER 'DI BRTZAMS PA'I LUNG KHUNGS BSTAN PA,)

DPAG MED GSUM, NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS KYI RNAM THAR NGAG DBANG
BSOD NAMS KYIS MDZAD PA, TRE BO BLO

BZANG NOR BU'I RNAM THAR DE'I SLOB MA SE RA RGYAL BYED KHAM TSAN
GYI RIGS RAMS PA ZHIG GIS BSGRIGS PA, ZHI BA

LHA GONG MA 'PHAGS PA DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I DE MO
NGAG DBANG 'JAM DPAL GYI RNAM THAR, PHO

GANG BKA' 'GYUR PA BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GYI RNAM THAR BSTAN PA'I
MDZES RGYAN, CHOS MDZAD BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS

KYIS BSGRIGS PA'I KE'U TSANG BLA MA RNAM GROL GYI RNAM THAR, PAn
CHEN SHANTI BA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN GYI RNAM THAR

RTOGS BRJOD SNYAN NGAG PHAN BDE'I 'BYUNG GNAS MNGA' RIS ZHANG
ZHUNG PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS

MDZAD PA, GTZUG LAG CHOS KYI SNANG BA'I RANG TSUL DRANG POR
BRJOD PA DRI BRAL SHEL GYI ME LONG KARMA KUN KHYAB KYI KHA

SKONG CAN, YANG DE NYID KYI RTOGS BRJOD SNYAN NGAG YID 'ONG LCUG
PHRAN GZHON NU KARMA NGES LEGS KYIS BSGRIGS

PA; GZHUNG SHER DPON DRUNG PA TSE BRTAN GYIS BSGRIGS PA'I GTAM
RGYUD LHA MI DGYES PA'I ROL MO, ZLA 'OD

GZHON NU'I GTAM RGYUD LCANG GRONG PA SKAL BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DBANG
PHYUG GIS BSGRIGS PA, ZHABS DRUNG MDO

MKHAR PA TSE RING DBANG RGYAL GYIS BSGRIGS PA'I GZHON NU ZLA MED
KYI RTOGS BRJOD DANG, MI DBANG RTOGS BRJOD

'JIG RTEN KUN TU DGA' BA'I GTAM, RI BO BDE CHEN PA 'BRAS SPUNGS
DGE BSHES YAR 'BROG PAR GRAGS PA

LEGS BSHAD RGYA MTSO'I RGYAL RABS LO RGYUS MES PO'I DRANG THIG
GONG DKAR BA DPON SLOB PO TA LA PA, LHO BRAG

MKHAR CHU PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG LHA MCHOG RTA NAG MKHAN CHEN
BRAG YAB PA BZANG PO RGYAL MTSAN, RTZE DANG

LAS CHEN GYI SLOB MA KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN, DGE BSHES GRVA BA,
'GRO MGON BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN,

RDO RJE GDAN PA KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN, RJE DRUNG BSOD NAMS DBANG
BO, MKHA' 'GRO MA BSOD NAMS DPAL

'DREN; DGE BSHES STOD LUNG PA, GRUB DBANG DPAL 'BYOR BZANG PO,
'PHAGS PA SANGS RGYAS, YONGS

'DZIN NGAG DBANG KUN DGA' LHUN GRUB, ZHVA DMAR LNGA PA'I SLOB MA
KHYAB BDAG GRUB MCHOG DBANG BO, KHAM

'BROG LUNG PA BLO BZANG RIN CHEN, GLANG THAR PA BRAG YAG BYA
BTANG RIN CHEN PHUN TSOGS, HOR TSANG CHOS RJE

NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS, 'BRI DPON LHA RGYAL GYI RGYUD PA BLA MA
CHOS 'BUM, SKYID GRONG BLA MA DGE BSHES BLO

BZANG CHOS 'KHOR, SA BZANG BLA MA NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN, KLONG
CHEN GSUM PA 'JIGS MED GLING PA

MKHYEN BRTZE 'OD ZER, SNGAGS CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL, MKHAR
RDO BZOD PA RGYA MTSO, BLO BZANG 'PHRIN

LAS DBANG PO, MO LHA PA DGA' LDAN BYANG RTZE PHUN TSOGS RGYA
MTSO, KARMA'I NYE BA YOR GSHIS PA BYANG SEMS SHES

RAB BZANG PO, KHYUNG PO ZLA THANG NGAM RGYANG SHOD DIL MGO PA
SER BYES PO TI BLA MA RJE DRUNG SHES RAB DBANG PO,

DVAGS PO 'BRUM MDA' PA BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL, THANG SAG MKHAN PO
RTZE DBANG BA DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO, MI NYAG RI

KHUD BSAM GRUB CHOS GLING GI MKHAN PO GTZANG GSER MDOG CAN DANG
NYE BA DKAR PO BRAG PA 'JAM DBYANGS

BSAM 'GRUB BZANG PO, SPOS STON SH'AKYA KUN DGA' SPRUL SKU
SH'AKYA DAR RGYAS, SPOS DKAR DPON SLOB BLO BZANG

MCHOG GRUB, DAR MO SMAN RAMS PA BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS, BLANG
GLANG MKHAN PO RAS CHEN ZLA BA RGYAL MTSAN, PAn

@015 (MDO SMAD LJONGS SU BSTAN PA'I SROL DAR TSUL LAS BRTZAMS
SPYIR BSHAD PA,)

CHEN YE SHES RTZE MO, KHRA TSANG PA, GSER KHANG CHOS RJE GU nA
MA TI, AE CUNG DGA' MTHO YOR BA RGYUD SMAD BLA MA DBU

MDZAD BYAMS PA CHOS LDAN, SNGAGS CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG BLO BZANG
BSTAN 'DZIN DPAL 'BYOR RAM 'JAM DBYANGS

SMON LAM, RGYAL RTZE RAB BRTAN KUN BZANG 'PHAGS RNAMS KYI RNAM
THAR, GZHAN YANG MI NYAG GI MKHAS PA RE

RER RNAM THAR PO TI RE RE DANG, ZHI 'PHAGS SKU PHRENG, BRAG YAB
CHE CHUNG SKU PHRENG, RGYAL SRAS SKU PHRENG SOGS KYI

RNAM THAR PO TA LONGS PA DU MA BZHUGS SHING, 'DI DAG NI RANG GI
MTHONG THOS KYI YUL DU GYUR BA RAGS RIM BKOD

PA YIN LA 'GA' ZHIG 'OG TU 'BYUNG NGO, ,CHOS 'BYUNG DANG RNAM
THAR GYI THO BKOD PA'I SKABS SO,, ,,

*, ,MDO SMAD LJONGS SU BSTAN PA'I SROL DAR TSUL LAS BRTZAMS
SPYIR BSHAD PA,

DA NI YUL MDO SMAD KYI LJONGS SU BSTAN PA'I SROL JI LTAR DAR
BA'I TSUL LAS BRTZAMS SPYIR BSHAD PAR BYA STE,

DE YANG STON PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS BCOM LDAN
'DAS DE NYID SANGS RGYAS PA'I PHYI DE LO CHU RTA LA

DPAL LDAN 'BRAS SPUNGS SU DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I RTZA RGYUD
GSUNGS PA NAS LO DRUG BRGYA DANG ZHE GSUM NA BOD

YUL CHOS RGYAL THOG MA GNYA' KHRI BTZAN PO BYUNG ZHING, DE NAS
BRTZIS PA'I LO BRGYAD BRGYA DANG NGA GCIG PA ME GLANG

LA SPYAN RAS GZIGS DBANG SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO
BCU PA LA RGYAL SAR BZHUGS, MI CHOS

GTZANG MA BCU DRUG GI KHRIMS BCAS, DBUS SU PHEBS NAS DMAR PO RIR
PHO BRANG BRTZIGS, THON MI RGYA GAR DU

BRDZANGS NAS YI GE'I SROL BTOD, MTHA' BZHI'I RGYAL PO DBANG DU
BSDUS, DE SKABS RGYA BAL GYI RGYAL BO GNYIS

STOBS 'BYOR DANG RGYAL BSTAN DAR RGYAS CHE BA JO BO'I SKU BRNYAN
RNAM GNYIS KYI THUGS RJE YIN PAR DGONGS NAS DE

GNYIS BOD DU SPYAN 'DREN PA SOGS KYI CHED BAL BZA' KHRI BTZAN
DANG, RGYA BZA' 'UN SHING KONG JO GNYIS KHAB

TU BZHES, KONG JO BOD DU PHEBS SKABS DPON GA-YOG MDO KHAMS KYI
PHYOGS 'DIR BYON, BLON PO MGAR RGYAS

MI TSAB TU BKAGS PA LA SGUG PHYIR BRAG LA RGYAS PA'I DBU DU MA
DANG BZANG SPYOD, RDO SKU KHRU BRGYAD CU PA RNAMS

BRKOS; RDZU 'PHRUL GYIS SHA BA BZUNG NAS ZHING RMOS, CHU SKOR
BTZUGS, NAGS KHROD LA BRTUGS PA LTAR

BYAS; RGYA MO 'PHRANG LAM BCOS SHING SE BA SOGS LA BLTAR 'GRO
GSUNG YUL KHAMS THAMS CAD DU BYON PAS BLON

PO 'GA' RES LAM DU CI 'GOR BYED PA MTHONG, LA LAS SE BA SOGS LA
GZIGS PA MTHONG, 'GA' ZHIG GIS

SGROL MA DANG THUB PA'I SKUS BOD YUL THAMS CAD ZHABS KYIS BCAGS
TE BYIN GYIS RLOBS PAR MTHONG BA SOGS MI

'DRA BA BYUNG, MGAR GYIS RGYA YUL DU NGAN SNA DGU BTANG STE BOD
KYI RI GNYAN MTHONG SAR LHA GSOL KHUL GYIS

PHEBS BROS MDZAD PA'I RI LA KHAMS KYI MGAR THAR DU GRAGS, KONG
JO DPON GA-YOG SGO DONG SGO MO'I RTZAR 'BYOR

TSE RGYA NAG GI PHYVA GA-YANG NYAMS PAS RGYA'I LHA SRUNG 'KHRUGS
TE KHA BA TSAD MED BABS PAS NAGS THAMS CAD PHAN TSUN

'DZINGS PA LTAR BSGYEL BAS LAM 'GAGS TE ZLA BA GNYIS 'GOR BAR
MGAR GYIS SNUN NAS MAR SLEBS, BSANG

DANG PHUD GTOR TE RGYA'I LHA MCHOD PAS KHA BA CHAD, NAGS MA
RNAMS LANGS NAS LAM DOD KYANG KONG JO YUL LA

@016 (MDO SMAD LJONGS SU BSTAN PA'I SROL DAR TSUL LAS BRTZAMS
SPYIR BSHAD PA,)

'PHRANG BA'I RNAM PAS PHYIR PHEBS RTZIS MDZAD PAR, SNGAR RGYA
NAS PHEBS KHAR YAB RGYAL PO LA GSER DNGUL GYI NYI ZLA

YOD PA BSLANGS PA RGYAL POS STER MA PHOD PAR MGAR LA DRIS PAS
RDO DE 'DRA GNYIS BZOS LA GSER TSOS DANG

DNGUL TSOS BRGYAB STE KO RLONG GYIS BTUMS NAS DBUS GTZANG DU MA
SLEBS BAR DU KHA MI 'BYED PAS CHOG CES

BSHAD PA BDEN PAR RLOMS TE DE LTAR BYAS YOD PA LA, MGAR GYIS
KHYED KYI YAB YUM GNYIS KHYED LA DE TZAM MTHONG

CHEN PO YOD MED NYI ZLA LA GZIGS ZHUS PA LTAR GZIGS PAS KO RLON
GYI NGOS LA RTZI 'BYAR BAS RDO YIN PA MKHYEN NAS

THUGS KHROS TSUL GYIS GA-YAS GA-YON DU RBAB LA BSGRIL BA LA RDO
NYI ZLAR GRAGS SHING, 'DI NAS MGAR GYIS PHEBS

RJES ZIN PA DANG, GONG MA'I PHO BRANG ZHIS NGAN PHU YIN PAS 'DI
PHYOGS PHEBS LAM 'KHRUL MED DANG, 'BUM

GLING GI BYAMS SKU YANG LHA GCIG DE NYID KYIS BZHENGS PA'I GSUNG
RGYUN THOS LA, DES NA RGYAL YUM LHA GCIG KONG

JO DANG, THON MI SAM BHO tA, BLON PO MGAR SOGS KYIS RGYAL BA
RANG NYID DANG BYIN RLABS MTSUNGS PA'I SH'AKYA

MU NI'I SNANG BRNYAN SPYAN DRANGS TE SA PHYOGS PHAL CHER ZHABS
KYIS BCAGS BYIN GYIS BRLABS PAS MDO SMAD KYI

LJONGS SU RGYAL BSTAN 'PHEL RGYAS 'BYUNG BA'I RTEN 'BREL GYI SGO
THOG MAR PHYE BA YIN NO, ,YANG RGYA NAG THANG BANG GI

DUS RGYA GAR NAS PAndI TA LNGA BRGYA RI BO RTZE LNGAR SPYAN
DRANGS, DE SKABS DGRA BCOM THOB PA RNAMS RDZU 'PHRUL GYIS TE

THUNG BRAG DGON DU PHEBS NAS BKRA SHIS GSO SBYONG DANG DBYAR
GNAS PA MDZAD PAS BSTAN PA'I DBU BRNYES PAR

BSHAD PA DANG, RGYA YUL DU BSTAN PA DAR BA'I THOG MAR 'JAM
DBYANGS RNAM 'PHRUL AU LBUG MANYDZU SHR'IS SA 'DUL

MDZAD PA'I GNAS KYANG PADMA'I RI BO LEN HVA SHAN DU GRAGS PA YIN
GSUNGS, SRONG BTZAN GYA GNYIS PA SA KHYI LA

GSHEGS NAS LO BRGYAD CU SONG BA'I SA RTA LA KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN
'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PA SA STAG LA

BSAM YAS GTZUG LAG KHANG BZHENGS, LO BZHI LA GRUB, STON PA'I
'KHRUNGS LO SOGS LA MI MTHUN PA MANG YANG

'DIR KUN MKHYEN BSTAN RTZIS LTAR BKOD, MKHAN SLOB CHOS GSUM BKA'
BGROS TE BE HAR SKU LNGA BSAM YAS

SRUNG MAR 'GUG CHED RGYAL POS NGAN LAM TA RA KLU GONG DMAG DPON
DU BSKOS TE DMAG BTANG, BHATA HOR GYI

SGOM GRVA BCOM, RGYAL BU DHARMA PA LA DANG GA-YU'I THUB PA RANG
BYON, BSE 'GAG SMUG CHUNG SOGS RDZAS DANG YO

BYAD THAMS CAD KHYER, SLOB DPON PADMAS PHYAG RDOR GYI TING NGE
'DZIN MDZAD DE RNAM SRAS 'KHOR BCAS KYI DMAG

GIS CHOS SKYONG BKUG NAS BE HAR DKOR MDZOD GLING GI LCOG TU RTEN
BTZUGS DAM LA BTAGS ZHES BSHAD PA'I

HOR YUL NI KAN GRU'U DANG NYE BA'I YU GUR GYI SAR NGOS 'DZIN
CING, BYANG GRU GU'I RGYAL KHAB TU DMAG DRANGS PAR

BSHAD PA'ANG LHO RGYUD GRU GU'I YUL KHAMS LA BYED DO, ,HOR GYI
SGOM GRVA BCOM SKABS DMAG NANG NAS SKYEN PO

BTUS PA'I DPA' BO MI DGU DMAG DANG BCAS PA HOR BOD KYI MTSAMS SU
BZHAG STE RGYAL PO'I BKA' MA BYUNG BAR

DU LDOG TU MED GSUNGS PAS DPA' BO MI DGU'I RGYUD PA LA KA MA LOG
TU THOGS SHING, MDO SMAD LHO BYANG GI MI RGYUD

PHAL CHER BOD CHOS RGYAL GYIS RGYA BOD SO MTSAMS SU BZHAG PA LAS
MCHED PA SHA STAG YIN PAS SKAD RIGS LA'ANG

BRDA RNYING MA 'GYUR BA MANG, DE BZHIN DU SA SKYA 'KHON GYI
GDUNG RGYUD DU MA DANG, SGRA BSGYUR MAR BA LO TZ'A,

@017 (MDO SMAD LJONGS SU BSTAN PA'I SROL DAR TSUL LAS BRTZAMS
SPYIR BSHAD PA,)

DPAL CHEN RGA LO, RNGOG CHOS SKU RDO RJE, GTZANG RGYAL BA LO RAS
RNAMS KYI RGYUD PA YIN ZER BA 'GA' RE DENG SANG

YANG NGOS 'DZIN RGYU SNANG, LO CHEN BEE RO TZA NA DGOS DBANG GIS
RGYAL MO TSA BA RONG DU BYON PAR BSHAD PA'I YUL

TSA KHOR NGOS 'DZIN CING SLOB MA GA-YU SGRA SNYING PO SOGS KYANG
BYUNG, AU RGYAN GYIS SPRUL BA DU MA BKYE NAS DAN TIG

YANG TIG MTSO RNYING GNYA' GONG BRAG DKAR SOGS GNAS SGO GRANGS
MED PHYE, DE DANG DUS MTSUNGS SU RNAL 'BYOR

SMYON PA BYA BAS MDO SMAD KYI GZHI BDAG RNAMS DAM LA BTAGS,
MNGA' BDAG KHRI RAL GYI DUS RGYA NAG GI RGYAL PO

DANG DBON ZHANG 'DUM BYA BAR MA MTHUN NAS BOD RU RE NAS DMAG
STONG SDE BCO BRGYAD RE DAR TSAN KHRIG GE PA KHRID

DE RGYA'I GEN PO RNAMS BKUMS, RGYA CHAM LA PHAB, DPON PO MNYES
PA'I SKYES PHUL, BOD KYI MCHOD GNAS LO

PAn RNAMS DANG, RGYA'I HVA SHANG RNAMS KYIS DBANG PO MDZAD,
RGYA'I GONG GU RME RU BYA BAR RGYA BOD KYI SA MTSAMS

BYAS TE DER BOD BTZAD PO'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG RGYA RJE'I GTZUG
LAG KHANG BRTZIGS PAR BSHAD PA MCHOD RTEN

DKAR POR NGOS 'DZIN PA DANG, MNGA' BDAG KHRI RAL NYID DNGOS SU
PHEBS SHING RAL BA NANG BZHUGS KYI MCHOD

RTEN KHRI KAR YOD PA GRAGS CHE, MDO SMAD 'DI LA BSTAN PA SNGA
DAR DANG PHYI DAR GYI THA SNYAD MED PAR BSHAD PA'ANG

SNANG MOD, GANG LTAR SNGA DAR GYI DUS SU MKHAS GRUB RGYAL BLON
MANG POS MNGON PA DANG MI MNGON PA CI RIGS KYIS

BSTAN 'GROR SMAN PA'I MDZAD RGYUN RLABS CHEN BSGRUBS PAR GOR MA
CHAGS, KHYAD PAR BOD DU GLANG DAR MAS

BSTAN PA BSNUBS PA'I DUS SU DPAL CHEN CHU BO RI'I SGOM GRVA NAS,
GA-YOR STOD KYI DMAR PAn SH'AKYA MU NI,

DRAD CHUNG MDO'I GA-YO DGE 'BYUNG, RGYA RAB PA'I GTZANG RAB GSAL
GSUM GYIS 'DUL BA DRE'U KHAL ZHIG BKAL TE

MNGA' RIS STOD DU BROS, GAR LOG NAS LAM THON, HOR YUL LA BYAS,
MDO SMAD LHO NGOS KYI BE RI'I TSA MTSO

NAS TSUR BYON TE RMA LUNG RDO RJE BRAG RA, AAN CHUNG GNAM
RDZONG, DAN TIG SHEL GYI YANG DGON SOGS NA SGOM

ZHING YOD PA RMA CHU KHA'I PHYUGS RDZIS MTHONG STE, DGONG GA MI
'DUS PA RNAMS LA SMRAS PAS, TZONG KHA BDE KHAMS

KYI DMU ZU GSAL 'BAR BYA BA'I KHYE'U ZHIG DAD PA SKYES TE RAB
BYUNG ZHUS PAS GTZANG GIS MKHAN PO DANG, GA-YO

DANG DMAR GYIS SLOB DPON BYAS TE RAB TU BYUNG ZHING BSNYEN PAR
RDZOGS, MTSAN LA DGE BA RAB GSAL DANG,

PHYIS SU THUGS RAB CHE BAS DGONGS PA RAB GSAL DU GRAGS, MKHAN
SLOB DANG, BYANG PHYOGS MI NYAG GHA'I YUL

DU GO RONG SENG GE GRAGS LA 'DUL BA DANG, SHAR PHYOGS LHA RTZE
BHI TIG TU SNGON GYI LHA RTEN MANG DU BZHUGS PA'I

DGE 'DUN GYI GNAS SHIG TU KVA 'OD MCHOG GRAGS PA LAS 'BUM tIKA
DANG, THEG CHEN GYI CHOS MNGON PA LO BCU

GNYIS SU GSAN, DAN TIG TU BZHUGS PA'I SKABS THOG MAR SPA GOR YE
SHES GA-YUNG DRUNG DANG, DE NAS BAR

GNAS BRTAN GRAGS PA RAB TU BYUNG STE SPA BAR GNYIS, JA BA GRAGS
PA DANG, COG CHEN SHES RAB 'BYUNG

GNAS STE JA COG GNYIS, BZHAD DPAL GYI RDO RJE DANG SRAGS RGYA
MTSO STE BZHAD SRAGS GNYIS, 'AL BA RDO RJE

DBANG PHYUG DANG SNUBS LAB SHI DPAL GYI DBANG PHYUG STE 'AL
SNUBS GNYIS, ZOD MCHOG CHOS SKYONG DANG MTSUR

SHES RAB MCHOG STE ZOD MTSUR GNYIS TE MI BCUS BKA' DRIN ZHUS
PA'I MTSUR GYI MKHAN BU KLU MES SHES RAB TSUL

@018 (MDO SMAD LJONGS SU BSTAN PA'I SROL DAR TSUL LAS BRTZAMS
SPYIR BSHAD PA,)

KHRIMS SOGS DBUS GTZANG BA RNAMS YIN PAR BSHAD PA DANG, YANG
RGYAL RABS GSAL BA'I ME LONG DU, CHU BO

RI NAS THOG MAR DMAR GA-YO GTZANG GSUM DANG, KVA 'OD MCHOG GRAGS
PA, RONG STON SENG GE RGYAL MTSAN,

LHA LUNG DPAL RDOR DANG GSUM SNGA RTING DU BROS, DANG PO GSUM
MKHAN SLOB BYAS TE BON PO'I BU RMU ZA GSAL RAB

TU BYUNG BA'I MING SH'AKYA DGE BA GSAL TU BTAGS, DE LA BRTEN NAS
KHAMS PA'I MI BAL RDO RJE DBANG PHYUG

SNUBS DPAL GYI BYANG CHUB, YANG GOR YE SHES GA-YUNG DRUNG, SPAR
RIN CHEN, LCANG YE SHES SENG GE SHONG CHUNG

SHES RAB GRAGS, AUN 'BAR BA BYANG CHUB, GRUM YE SHES RGYAL
MTSAN, CO RE SHES RAB BYANG CHUB, SNUBS

DPAL GYI BYANG CHUB, SGRO MANYDZU SHRI SOGS MKHAS BTZUN MANG PO
BYON, BSTAN BSNUBS BRGYAD CU PA LA BSAM

YAS KYI BTZAD PO TSAN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BDAG RKYEN MDZAD
PAS, KLU MES SHES RAB TSUL KHRIMS, 'BRING

YE SHES YON TAN, TSONG DGE SHES RAB SENG GE LO STON RDO RJE
DBANG PHYUG SUM PA YE SHES BLO GROS, RGYA BLO GROS

SHES RAB, GZHON BAN CHOS MCHOG STE DBUS GTZANG GI MI BDUN GYIS
GRUM YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN LA MKHAN PO DANG,

CO RO SHES RAB BYANG CHUB LA SLOB DPON ZHUS TE THOG MAR BKA'
DRIN MNOS, DE'I RTING LA MTHA' BZHI RGYAL

'PHAGS; RAG SHI TSUL KHRIMS 'BYUNG GNAS, BA BTZUN BLO GROS DBANG
PHYUG SKYE LEGS NYANG BRAN CHOS

SKYABS; GRAM SHING SHES RAB SMON LAM STE LNGA ZER, 'ON KYANG BLA
CHEN DGONGS PA RAB GSAL ZHES PA 'PHAN YUL

ZHOGS PA'I RMU GSAL GSHEN 'BAR BYA BA'I BON PO'I BU, RMU ZA
'PHEN BYA BA KHAMS SU RAB TU BYUNG BA'I MING LA

'DOD PA BRTAG DGOS, YANG LO RGYUS CHEN MO BYA BAR, ZHANG MDA'
'JAM DPAL DANG, YANG GONG SHES RAB

'BYUNG GNAS GNYIS KHAMS SU BYON, YANG GONG GIS KHUNGS BSTAN NAS
ZHANG MDA' 'JAM DPAL LAS BLA CHEN

BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, DE'I MKHAN BU COG RO DPAL GYI DBANG PHYUG
DANG, GRUM PHYING LHAG CAN GNYIS LA GTZANG

NAS LO TSOD GNYIS DANG, DBUS NAS KLU MES DANG 'BRING STE BZHIS
BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS ZHES KYANG BSHAD,

YONGS GRAGS LA KLU MES TSUL KHRIMS SHES RAB, 'BRING YE SHES YON
TAN, RAG SHI TSUL KHRIMS 'BYUNG GNAS,

RBA TSUL KHRIMS BLO GROS, SUM PA YE SHES BLO GROS TE DBUS KYI
LNGA, LO STON RDO RJE DBANG PHYUG TSONG BTZUN SHES

RAB SENG GE BO DONG PA AU BA DE KAR TE GTZANG GI GSUM, MNGA' RIS
PA 'O BRGYAD SPUN GNYIS BCAS MDO SMAD

DU PHEBS TE BLA CHEN LA BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS, KLU MES YAR PHEBS
DUS DBU ZHVA GSOL 'PHRO SA SER BTAB PA GNANG

STE 'DI GYON LA NGA RJES SU DRAN PAR GYIS GSUNGS PAS 'DUL 'DZIN
RNAMS KYIS DBU ZHVA SER PO BZHES PA DAR

ZHING; PHYI DAR GYI BSTAN PA'I DNGOS GZHI DGE LDAN RING LUGS YIN
PAR LUNG YANG BSTAN TE BKA' GDAMS

GLEGS BAM DU, YAN LAG GI MING DE MA MO LA BTAGS NA LEGS, LUS LAS
YAN LAG RGYAS BYA BA'I LUGS YIN

GSUNGS PA 'DI LA GO RGYU MANG BAR SNANG, KLU MES NAS BRGYUD DE
GZUS 'DUL 'DZIN BU BZHI SLOB RGYUD DANG BCAS

PA; RGYA 'DUL 'DZIN SOGS 'DUL 'DZIN PHAL CHE BA, SKU MCHED GSUM,
GLANG SHAR GNYIS, SNAR THANG PA

SOGS BKA' GDAMS PA RNAMS DENG SANG GI BAR DU RAB TU BYUNG ZHING
BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS PA LA BLA CHEN MKHAN BRGYUD

@019 (MDO SMAD LJONGS SU BSTAN PA'I SROL DAR TSUL LAS BRTZAMS
SPYIR BSHAD PA,)

CES GRAGS TE, MKHAN PO BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I 'PHRIN LAS KYI
KHYAB BRDAL RGYUN CHAGS PA'I BKA' DRIN SHES

DGOS PAS SDOM RGYUN DAG MA DAG DPYAD KHUL GYIS 'DI KHO NA PHYOGS
'PHUL BYED PA RIGS MIN GYI BYI DOR MKHAS

GRUB SMRA PA'I NYI MAS MDZAD ZIN PA SLAR YANG THUB BSTAN DRI MA
CAN DU MI BYA LA, KUN MKHYEN GONG MAS NAG PHYOGS

RE GNYIS KYIS DKRUG BSAM KYANG SLAR CHES CHER 'PHEL BAR GSUNGS
PA BKA' GDAMS RING LUGS 'DZIN PA DAG

GIS GDAMS NGAG TU GO DGOS SO, ,DE YANG SRONG BTZAN RGYAL SAR
BYON PA'I SA MO GLANG NAS RAL BA CAN 'DAS

PA'I LCAGS BYA YAN CHAD LA LO NYIS BRGYA DANG BCU GCIG SONG 'DUG
PA'I RING LA BOD DU BSTAN PA SNGA DAR GYI THA SNYAD

BYAS; DE NAS RAB BYUNG BCU BHZI PA'I SA BYA YAN LA LO STONG DANG
DGU SONG, GLANG DAR BKRONGS NAS LNGA BCU


'DAS PA'I CHU BYI LA BLA CHEN DGONGS PA RAB GSAL 'KHRUNGS, DE
NAS LO BDUN PA SA RTA LA LO CHEN RIN CHEN

BZANG PO 'KHRUNGS, DE NAS BCO LNGA 'DAS PA BSTAN BSUBS DON GSUM
PA CHU BYA LA PHYI DAR GYI MGO TSUGS PA

KUN MKHYEN BU BZHED, DE NAS LO DRUG PA SA STAG BLA CHEN GYI NYER
BDUN PA LA PHYI DAR MGO TSUGS PA 'BROM BZHED

PA BLA CHEN BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS NAS LO LNGA PA LA DMIGS BSAL GYIS
DBUS GTZANG GI MI BCU BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS TE

DGU YAR PHEBS PA'I PHYI LO KLU MES DBUS SU PHEBS PAR GSUNGS PA
DANG SHIN TU 'GRIG SA STAG DE NAS RE LNGA PA CHU

RTA LA MNYAM MED JO BO CHEN PO BOD DU BYON, DE DUS DBUS GTZANG
GI MI DRUG GAM BCU'I NANG TSAN SUM PA YE SHES

BZHUGS PA GRAGS CHE, BLA CHEN GYI DON DRUG PA LA ME MKHA' RGYA
MTSO RDZOGS NAS RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I ME YOS SHAR,

DE NAS BRGYAD 'DAS PA GYA BZHI PA SHING PHAG LA GSHEGS, DE NAS
LO BRGYAD BRGYA DANG BCO LNGA PA SA BYA 'DI YIN,

KHA CIG 'KHRUNGS LO CHU BYI 'DIR BYAS TSE DMAR GA-YO GTZANG GSUM
LO DGU BCU LHAG RE LON DGOS PAS 'PHYIS

ZER NAS RAL BA CAN ME KHYI LA 'KHRUNGS PA'I NYER BDUN PA CHU BYI
DE LA 'KHRUNGS ZER, DE LTAR NA DE NAS LO BCU PA

LCAGS BYA LA CHOS RGYAL BKRONGS, DE NAS NGA BRGYAD PA SA RTA LA
LO CHEN RIN CHEN BZANG PO 'KHRUNGS, BLA CHEN GYA

BZHI PA SHING PHAG LA GSHEGS PAR BYAS NA, DE DUS 'BROM BZHED
PA'I PHYI DAR GYI MGO MA TSUGS DGOS SHING,

DE'I RJES KYI SHING PHAG LA BYAS NA BRGYA DANG ZHE BZHI PA YIN
'DUG LA, SAD MI MI BDUN GYI NANG TSAN WA RATNA'I

MKHAN BU LI YE SHES RIN CHEN, DE'I MKHAN BU GA-YO DGE 'BYUNG
SOGS DANG MI BCUS GTZANG LA BKA' DRIN ZHUS

DUS NGA RGAS PAS MKHAN BU MI 'KHYONGS GSUNGS PA YANG YONGS GRAGS
YIN LA, BLA CHEN DGUNG LO BZHI BCU RTZDGU SO

PA LA DAN TIG TU BYON NAS LO SUM CU RTZA LNGA BZHUGS PA DANG,
SKU TSE'I MJUG TU GNAS 'DIR GTZUG LAG KHANG

BZHENGS; 'KHOR DGE 'DUN DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS TE MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS
PAR GSUNGS PA GNYIS 'GAL BAR

MI SEMS SO, ,GANG LTAR MKHAS PA MI GSUM DANG BLA CHEN PO'I BKA'
DRIN LAS BSTAN PA'I ME RO GANG NAS BSLANG

BA'I GZHIR GYUR PAS 'PHAGS YUL DBUS 'GYUR 'CHANG GNYIS PAR
BSNGAGS 'OS PA 'DI BYUNG, DAN TIG RGYAL

BU DON GRUB PHEBS PA'I GNAS SU BSHAD CING LHA LUNG DPAL RDOR
GYIS YUN RING SGRUB PA MDZAD, BKA' GDAMS

GLEGS BAM NAS 'BYUNG BA'I RGYAL BU BLO GROS 'PHEL DANG, DE NYID
KYI BLA MA AA WA BH'U TI, BAL YUL LA SAR BA

@020 (MDO SMAD LJONGS SU BSTAN PA'I SROL DAR TSUL LAS BRTZAMS
SPYIR BSHAD PA,)

MANYDZU SHRI GRUB PE, BAL BO PHAM MTHING BA SOGS KYIS KYANG YUL
BYANG PHYOGS KYI RGYUD DU 'GRO DON DPAG MED MDZAD,

PHYI MA 'DIS MI NYAG RGYAL BO LA DBANG BSKUR BA'I BLA MA GNANG,
DE DUS MI NYAG GI YUL NI, BYANG GI BOD SOG GI

MTSAMS CHU NAG DANG NYE BA'I SAR MI NYAG RGYAL BO'I THOG MA SI
HU'I GA'I JU ZHES PA BYUNG STE RGYA HOR PHAL CHER GYI

BDAG PO BYAS, SHAR NA RGYA NAG LHO NA 'JANG, NUB NA BOD, BYANG
HOR GYIS BCAD PA'I DBUS NI MI NYAG

GI RGYAL KHAMS TE GO TAN GYIS BZUNG BA'I GHA DANG BYANG NGOS
SOGS NI YUL GYI DNGOS GZHI YIN LA, RAB STOD TSAR

SGANG GI SA RNAMS KYANG MI NYAG LA GTOGS ZHES BSHAD, MI NYAG
RGYAL RABS LNGA PA THE HUS KARMA DUS GSUM MKHYEN

PA GDAN 'DREN ZHUS PA MA PHEBS PAR DGE BSHES GTZANG PO SKU TSAB
TU BTANG, MTSUR PHU'I DPAL LDAN 'BRAS

SPUNGS KYI MCHOD RTEN LA GSER ZANGS KYI NA BZA' DANG BLA BRE
BSKUR, DE'I SRAS MI NYAG RGYAL RGOD YIN PAR

GRAGS; BOD KYI BSAM YAS BZHENGS SKABS LHA SRIN GDUG PA CAN RNAMS
'DUL BA'I CHED MKHAN PO'I BKAS,

SHAR MI NYAG GHA ZHES BYA BA'I RNAM THOS KYI ZHING KHAMS NA, GHA
BA RDO RJE GZHON NU ZHES PA RNAM THOS SRAS KYI SPRUL BA

ZHIG YOD PA GDAN DRANGS NA LEGS PAR GSUNGS ZHES BLO GROS RIN
CHEN SENG GES MDZAD PA'I 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS

RJE'I RNAM THAR LAS 'BYUNG, JO BO BOD DU MA BYON PA'I GONG TZAM
LA PRA SGOM CHOS KYI RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA 'JU LAG DANG

NYE BAR 'KHRUNGS PAS PRA SDE SGAR BA BCU GSUM BYUNG, PHA DAM PA
DANG LAB SGRON YUM SRAS KYANG PHYOGS 'DIR BYON

PAS LAM GYI SGOM KHANG DANG, DAM PA'I 'OB TU GRAGS PA SOGS KYANG
YOD LA, KHYAD PAR LAM SGRON CHU RTA LA

'KHRUNGS PA'I GYA GSUM DANG SA YOS LA 'KHRUNGS PA'I GYU DRUG PA
RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I SHING 'BRUG HOR ZLA GSUM

PA'I CHOS BCUR GA-YA' RI'I GTER 'DI SBAS ZHES KUN MKHYEN GSUNGS,
HOR JING GIR RGYAL PO BOD DU BYON,

STOD MNGA' RIS TSUN DBANG DU BSDUS, GTZANG DU MI SNA BTANG NAS
SA CHEN KUN DGA' SNYING PO LA 'BUL NOD

BGYIS TE MCHOD YON DU GYUR, SLAR SOG YUL DU GDAN 'DREN GYI SNYAN
GSAN PHUL, RTEN GSUM 'GA' ZHIG

GDAN DRANGS, DE LA BRTEN SOG PO RNAMS BSTAN PA LA DAD PAR GYUR
TE DKON MCHOG MCHOD PA'I MGO TSUGS,

DGE BSNYEN SOGS KYI SDOM PA LEN PA'ANG BYUNG STE BSTAN PA'I DBU
BRNYES, 'DI STON PA'I 'DAS LO LCAGS 'BRUG

LA 'DOD PA'I LUGS LTAR NA LO NYIS STONG GYA BDUN DANG, ME YOS LA
'DOD PA LTAR NA NYIS STONG ZHE GCIG PA RAB

BYUNG BZHI PA'I ME YOS LO YIN LA, DE NAS RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I
LCAGS 'BRUG BAR LNGA BRGYA DANG GSUM 'DAS

PAR GSUNGS PAS, DE'I STENG DU RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI BA'I SA BYA BAR
BSNAN PAS LNGA BRGYA GO GSUM TZAM SONG BAR

SNANG; DE'I SRAS AO GO TA'I BU GO YUG DANG GO DAN GNYIS KYIS
PHYOGS 'DIR KHAMS KYI RGYAL PO BYED SKABS GO DAN

GYIS SA SKYA PAn CHEN GDAN DANGS PA BLA MA'I LUNG BSTAN DANG
MTHUN RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I SHING 'BRUG

LA 'PHAGS PA DANG PHYAG NA BCAS PHEBS PA ME LUG LA RGYAL BO DANG
ZHAL 'DZOMS, RGYAL BO 'KHOR BCAS LA KYEE RDO

RJE'I DBANG GNANG, RDZU 'PHRUL SNA TSOGS BSTAN NAS DAD PAR
MDZAD, BUD MED CIG GIS PAGS PA MNYED

PA'I SHING SOG LE'I KHA LTA BU THOGS TE MJAL BAS DE'I DBYIBS CAN
GYI SOG YIG BKOD, DE'I GCUNG SE CHEN

@021 (MDO SMAD LJONGS SU BSTAN PA'I SROL DAR TSUL LAS BRTZAMS
SPYIR BSHAD PA,)

RGYAL BO MNGA' THANG SHIN TU CHE ZHING RGYA BOD HOR GSUM DANG,
RGYA GAR GYI PHYED TZAM DANG KHA CHE MTHA' TSUN LA DBANG

BSGYUR; 'GRO MGON 'PHAGS PA GDAN DRANGS, RDZU 'PHRUL GYIS RGYAL
PO DAD PAR BYAS TE DBANG BSKUR,

GA-YER MO THANG GI SA'I CHA SHING KUN DANG, RGYA BOD KYI SA
MTSAMS CHU MA MKHAR SOGS SU PHEBS, RGYAL POS SMAN

TZE BCOM PA'I SDIG BSHAGS SU PHO BRANG NAS LHO NUB MTSAMS SU
DGON PA BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD BZHENGS BCUG PAS CO NE

KHAG LNGA SOGS BYUNG BAR GRAGS, 'PHAGS PA'I GRVA CHEN BZHIS MDO
SMAD LHO RGYUD KYI BON BSGYUR TE SO SOS GNAS

GZHI BRTZIGS, SA SKYAR THUGS GNYER MDZAD PAS MKHAS GRUB CHEN POR
GYUR PA ZI NA DGE BSHES LA SGROL MAS LUNG

BSTAN TE MDO SMAD DU BYON PA JING GIR GYIS BLA MAR BKUR, ZI NA
MKHAN PO SHES RAB YE SHES KYIS 'GRO MGON

'PHAGS PA DANG RGYAL PO MCHOD YON GYI PHYAG GA-YOG THUGS ZIN
BSGRUB PAS TZONG KHA BDE KHAMS KYI SA CHA GNANG BAS

PHYOGS DER DPON RGYUD RIM BYON GYIS PHYAG GA-YOG THUGS ZIN
BSGRUB PAS TZONG KHA BDE KHAMS KYI SA CHA GNANG BAS

AU RGYAN PA RIN CHEN DPAL YANG GDAN 'DREN ZHUS TE CHOS KYI BKA'
DRIN NOD, HOR MUNG KHE RGYAL PO'I DUS SU

KARMA PAKSHI BYON, ME CHU GA-YANG GSUM DU BSKYUR KYANG MTSUGS PA
SOGS GRUB RTAGS LAN GSUM BSTAN NAS HOR

RNAMS DAD PAR MDZAD, KARMA RANG BYUNG RDO REJ, ROL BA'I RDO RJE,
DE BZHIN GSEGS PA RNAMS PHEBS TE RDZU

'PHRUL GYI BKOD PA SNA TSOGS DANG CHOS KYI CHAR PHAB, KARMA'I
SGRUB SDE DANG GTZUG LAG KHANG MANG DU BSKRUN,

GZHAN YANG ZHVA DMAR BA DPAL CHOS KYI GRAGS PA, MAN LUNG GU RU,
KUN MKHYEN CHOS SKU 'OD ZER, MCHIM

'JAM PA'I DBYANGS, GA-YUNG STON RDO RJE DPAL BA RNAMS KYANG
PHEBS NAS DAM PA'I CHOS KYI SGRON ME SPAR,

'BRAS KLU 'BUM PA NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN PA'I BYA KHYUNG GDAN
RABS LTAR NA, BLA CHEN GSHEGS PA'I SHING PHAG

NAS LO NYIS BRGYA DON BZHI 'DAS PA RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I SA BYA LA
CHOS RJE DON GRUB RIN CHEN 'KHRUNGS SHING, NYID KYI

ZHE GCIG PA RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SA GLANG LA BYA KHYUNG THEG CHEN
YON TAN DAR RGYAS GLING BTAB, DE NAS LO BRGYAD PA

ME SPREL LA ZIN RTOGS LDAN 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO DANG, PHYI LO ME
BYA LA RGYAL BA GNYIS PA SHAR TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO BLO

BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL ZHES BYA BA MDO SMAD TZONG KHA'I YUL DU
SKU BLTAMS PAS SANGS RGYAS 'JIG RTEN DU BYON PA

LTA BU BYUNG, DE LA MKHAS GRUB KYI SLOB MA SA KHYAB PA BYUNG
BA'I NANG NAS SRAS SNGA TSAR BZHI'I NANG TSAN TSA KHO DPON PO

NGAG DBANG GRAGS PAS LHO STOD NGOS SU DGON SDE BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD
BTAB, DE DANG MTSUNGS SU BSTAN PA PHYOGS

MTHAR SKYONG BA'I DAR CHEN BDUN GYI GRAS RONG PA LJAGS NAG PA
DGE 'DUN RGYAL MTSAN GYIS K'A LA RI'I SDE

BTZUGS; MEN JU DE TSANG CHOS RJE BKRA SHIS DPAL LDAN LA YANG,
RJE'I ZHAL NAS, KHYOD LA NUS MTHU YOD

PAR 'DUG PAS DA GZOD RGYA NAG GI YUL DU SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN
PA'I GZHI MA 'DUL BA'I NGANG TSUGS LA GZHI

BLANGS PA'I CHOS SDE BTZUGS NA 'DI PHYI GNYIS KAR RANG GZHAN LA
PHAN 'DOGS RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BA YIN ZHING

BSTAN PA LA BYA BA BYAS PA YIN GSUNGS PAR BRTEN MEN JU CHOS SDER
RNAM RGYAL GLING BYA BA'I GZHI GSUM GYYYI PHYAG LEN

DANG MDO'I 'CHD NYAN SKYONG BA'I DGE 'DUN GYI SDE BTZUGS SHING,
DRE'U TSAD CHOS RJE SH'AKYA DPAL BZANG POS
@022 (MDO SMAD LJONGS SU BSTAN PA'I SROL DAR TSUL LAS BRTZAMS
SPYIR BSHAD PA,)

KYANG RJE'I ZHABS LA GTUGS TE CHOS RDZONG DGON BSKYANGS, RJE'I
DNGOS SLOB MI DBANG GTZUG NA MDZES PA'I TI SHRI

GNYIS SU GRAGS PA BYAMS CHEN CHOS RJE SH'AKYA SHRI DANG, BYANG
BLA MA CHOS KYI RGYAL PO GNYIS KYI 'PHRIN LAS LAS MDZO MO

MKHAR DANG KHA TI'I KHA SOGS BYUNG, GLANG DKAR BA SANGS RGYAS
BKRA SHIS DANG, CHOS RJE BSAM GTAN BLO GROS

KHU DBON GYIS GRO TSANG DGON, ZI NA BLA MA CHOS 'PHAGS RGYAL
MTSAN GYIS ZI NA BSAM 'GRUB GLING, DRUNG DON

YOD RGYAL MTSAN PAS HAN DGON PA RNAMS BTAB STE THAMS CAD TA'I
MING GI TI SHRI MDZAD, RGYAL TSAB RJE'I

DNGOS SLOB SHAR BA BRTZON RIN KHU DBON GYIS SHAR YUL DU BSTAN PA
BSKYANGS, DE NAS RIM GYIS THAMS CAD

MKHYEN PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO, RGYAL DBANG YON TAN RGYA MTSO,
KUN GZIGS LNGA BA CHEN PO, PAn CHEN

DPAL LDAN YE SHES, SPRUL SKU BSOD NAMS YE SHES DBANG PO, RGYAL
SRAS DON YOD RGYA MTSO SKU SNGA PHYI, STONG

'KHOR SKU 'PHRENG, MDUNG RTZE KUN DGA' DPAL BZANG, SKYID SHOD
SDE BA CHOS RJE SOGS DAM PA DU MAS LHO BYANG

GI YUL GRU PHAL MO CHE SKU DNGOS KYIS BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA'I RTEN
'BREL GYI DBANG GIS MDO SMAD NOR 'DZIN GYI KHYON

MTHA' DAG GSER MDOG COD PAn 'CHANG BA'I RING LUGS DRI MA MED PAS
YONGS SU KHYAB PAR GYUR TO, ,DE

YANG MDO SMAD 'DI LA RGYA GAR CHU BO GANG+G'A GNYIS PA YAN LAG
BRGYAD DANG LDAN PA'I KLUNG CHEN RMA CHU BGROD TSUL GYI

DBANG GIS BYANG RGYUD DANG LHO RGYUD GNYIS YOD PA LAS, BYANG
NGOS LA NUB KYI CHA MTSO SNGON DANG, SHAR GYI CHA TZONG

KHA GNYIS SU BYAS PA'I SNGA MA NI AA MDO'I THOG MA LTA BUR YOD
LA, DER CHAB TSA THIG CHEN CHOS 'KHOR GLING SOGS

SNGON GYI DGON RNYING GSUM, STONG 'KHOR MKHAR NANG DU DGA' LDAN
BSTAN RGYAS GLING, MKHAR DANG NYE BAR GRVA

TSANG DGON DANG RI KHROD KHA SHAS, MTSO SNGON GYI MGO TSA GAN
THO LO GE PHYOGS KYI CHU RNAMS DANG, GA-YON NGOS KYI CHU

RNAMS DKAR THANG MAR KHU'I MTSO MOR 'BOD PA 'O RO CHU 'GAG NAS
PHYOGS GCIG TU 'DRES PA LA TZONG CHU ZER,

DE LA LHO BYANG GNYIS PHYE BA'I BYANG RGYUD DU BLA CHEN PO'I SKU
GDUNG RIL BOR BZHUGS PA'I GNAS DMAR GTZANG BRAG

MDO SMAD BSHAD GRVA KUN GYI PHYI MO DGON LUNG BYAMS PA GLING
SGRUB SDE DANG BCAS PA, THU'U BAKVAN THUGS RJE CHEN

PO; BA 'ONG 'JIG RTEN MGON PO, SHA RA 'OD DPAG MED SOGS RTEN NAM
'PHANG CAN DU MA BZHUGS PA'I

GNAS; CHOS BZANG RI KHROD, BSHAD GRVA BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING,
RGYUD PA SGAR, M'A YANG DGON SOGS DGON

SGRUB SDE MANG PO, DGON LUNG NUB BYANG NAS YAR RIM PAR PRA TI
LNGA MCHOD SGAR, MANG 'DUS RI KHROD, SHING

LUNG RAB BRTAN, BUM PAR CHOS LUNG RNAMS DANG, CHU BZANG DGON
DGA' LDAN MI 'GYUR GLING, GSER

KHOG TU BTZAN PO DGON DGA' LDAN DAM CHOS GLING DANG, SGRUB SDE
GONG 'OG ZHVA KHOG STOD DU 'DUL BA DGON

SOGS DANG, BO KHOG TU THA YAN CHI CHE CHUNG, STAG RI GA-YAG RI'I
RI KHROD SOGS DGON SDE DU MA, 'JU LAG

RGYUD DU BAN RGUD DGON, GAN CHEN DGON THEG CHEN THAR BA GLING RI
DGON GNYIS, ZAB LUNG RI KHROD, TE

THUNG DGON CHUNG BA, BYANG NGOS STOD NAS MAR RGYA RDOG DGON,
SEMS NYID DGON DGA' LDAN DAR RGYAS GLING,

'BRU GU RI DGON, KA DROD BRAG DKAR GNAS RI, MCHOD RTEN THANG,
RGYA ZHVA DANG DMAR ZHU RI KHROD, TE THUNG

@023 (MDO SMAD LJONGS SU BSTAN PA'I SROL DAR TSUL LAS BRTZAMS
SPYIR BSHAD PA,)

DGON CHEN SOGS DANG, JAG RUNG YAR LUNG THUR CHEN DGON, ZUNG SHAN
STAG LUNG, PRA TI RAB RGYAS

DGON; NAG YANG DGON GONG 'OG GYANG RING DGON GONG 'OG SOGS SE
'BRAS YIG CHA'I STENG NAS BKA'

POt KYI 'CHAD NYAN SKYONG BA'I BSHAD GRVA DANG SGRUB GRANGS KYIS
MI LANG, DE BZHIN DU GAN LANG SHUS GSUM PHYOGS

SU MDUNG NAG 'JAM DBYANGS DGON SOGS DGON SDE CHE PHRA MANG PO,
LANG GRU'U SDE BZHI, PHAG MO RANG BYON,

LHA CHEN BYAMS PA, GAN GRU'U SGROL MA RANG BYON, RGYAL BU BLO
GROS 'PHEL GYIS KLU BDUD BTUL BA'I GNAS, DE

NYID KYI BLA MA AA WA DH'U TI PA'I SGRUB PHUG SHUS GRU'U 'JAM
DBYANGS RANG BYON SOGS GNAS RTEN BYIN CAN MANG,

TZONG LA LHO BYANG GNYIS BYAS PA'I BYANG DANG TZONG CHU LHO
RGYUD DU RJE RGYAL BA GNYIS PA SHAR TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO SKU
BLTAMS

PA'I GNAS SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING, SA BZANG DGON DGE LDAN CHOS
SDINGS, GSER TOG DGON, ZI NA

BSAM 'GRUB GLING, ZI LING MKHAR DU MKHAS PA MI GSUM GYI SKU
GDUNG, CHOS RJE DON RIN PA'I BZHUGS

GNAS CHA DKAR DANG, KARMA ROL BA'I RDO RJE'I BZHUGS GNAS SHAR
RDZONG RI KHROD, GRUB CHEN GLANG DKAR BA'I

FGDAN SA GRO TSANG LHA KHANG KO TAM SDE DANG, GRO TSANG DGON,
THANG RING DGON DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING,

P'A JO'I DGON BSTAN DAR GLING SOGS BSHAD SGRUB KYI SDE MANG PO,
STOD NGOS SU STONG 'KHOR DGON BSHAD SGRUB GLING

SOGS YOD, TZONG LA LHO RGYUD DU CHOS RJE DON GRUB RIN CHEN DANG,
RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO YAB SRAS KYI GDAN SA

BYA KHYUNG DGON THEG CHEN YON TAN DAR RGYAS GLING, SNGON GYI
SGRUB GNAS KHYAD 'PHAGS SKYES RI'I GSER KHANG,

BA YAN STOD THA SMAD THA'I DGON SOGS BYA KHYUNG DGON MA LAG BCO
BRGYAD, STOD NGOS SU SGO ME MCHOD RTEN SKIS

DANG GSANG SNGAGS BDE CHEN, DE'I NUB SHA RA HO THO'I MKHAR DANG
NYE BAR RDO NYI ZLA, RMA CHU'I KHUG SO'I NUB NGOS

AA RIG GI SA HANG NGE GZHUNG DU SNGON GYI DGON RNYING PHUN TSOGS
RNAM RGYAL GLING, DE DANG NYE BAR TZA RI DANG BYIN

RLABS MNYAM PA BRAG DKAR SPREL RDZONG, BYA KHYUNG GI SMAD DU KA
MDO BKRA SHIS CHOS RDZONG, RGYAL BU DON GRUB KYI

MDO NAS 'BYUNG ZHING, MKHAS PA MI GSUM DANG BLA CHEN GYI BZHUGS
GNAS RI BO DAN TIG SOGS SGAR BA KHA DRUG

YANG TIG GRUB GNAS, AU SHI BRAG SGRUB GNAS DANG DGON CHEN BSHAD
SGRUB CHOS 'KHOR GLING, BYANG BLA MA'I

GDAN SA KHA TA'I KHA, KONG TZES BZHENGS PAR GRAGS PA'I BYAMS PA
'BUM GLING DANG LHA MDUN DGON, SGROL MA

RANG BYON BZHUGS PA SGROL MA'I PHU, MCHOD RTEN DKAR PO, BDE
MCHOG RANG BYON DU GRAGS PA'I GNAS LO KY'A

TUN; THUGS RJE CHEN PO RANG BYON BZHUGS PA KAN GO'U ZI, BYAMS
CHEN CHOS RJE'I GDAN SA MDZO MO MKHAR,

GZHAN YANG RGYA BOD KYI DGON SDE BGRANG LAS 'DAS PA MCHIS SO, ,

LHO RGYUD RMA STOD PHAL CHER MGO LOG DBAL SHUL, MDZOD DGE NYIN
SRIB, SOG PO MDA' BCU GCIG

AA RIG SOGS RU BA KHO NAS BZUNG BAS DGON SDE MANG PO MED LA, 'ON
KYANG MGO LOG TU DGON GSAR BSAM

'GRUB BDE LDAN SOGS DANG, DBAL SHUL GYI SAR MTSAN SGROGS DGON
DGA' LDAN RAB RGYAS GLING, MDZOD

DGE STOD NGOS SKA RME 'DRES MTSAMS SU SOG TSANG RGYUD STOD GRVA
TSANG, DE DANG NYE BAR BYAMS ME 'BRAS SPUNGS

@024 (MDO SMAD LJONGS SU BSTAN PA'I SRUL DAR TSUL LAS BRTZAMS
SPYIR BSHAD PA,)

DGON; RMA RME 'DRE MDOR TSA GAN PE SHING, RTZE DBUS GCOD PA'I RI
KHROD, SOG POR AURGE GRVA TSANG GSANG

SNGAGS SMIN RGYAS GLING, AA RIG GI SAR GTZANG SGAR DON GRUB RAB
BRTAN GLING DANG, RVA RGYA BKRA SHIS 'BYUNG

GNAS RNAMS YOD LA, DE NAS RMA MGUR DU THUG CING DER LA MO BDE
CHEN CHOS GLING, RNGA SGAR BYANG CHUB GLING,

CHOS RJE DON RIN PAS BZHENGS PA'I SNANG RA'I GSER KHANG, LHA
LUNG DPAL RDOR GYI SGRUB GNAS LO RDO RJE BRAG

DE DANG NYE BAR LO BA'I YUM, KO'U BA DGON GSAR RNYING SOGS DGON
SDE CHE CHUNG MANG PO, MKHAS PA MI GSUM

GYI BZHUGS GNAS AAN CHUNG GNAM RDZONG, KHRI KA GONG 'OG TU CHAS
PA RIN PO CHE'I RI KHROD BRAG SKYA RDO RJE RDZONG,

BRAG DKAR ME LONG SOGS GRVA TSANG GRUB SDE GRANGS MANG DANG,
BYIN RLABS CAN GYI RTEN BZHIR GRAGS PA RNAMS

BZHUGS SO, ,DGU CHU RGYUD REB GONG GSER MO LJONGS SU GRUB PA'I
DBANG PHYUG SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO KHU DBON GYI

GDAN SA MDO SNGAGS KYI BSHAD GRVA BDE CHEN CHOS 'KHOR GLING
DANG, SGRUB RGYUD BSTAN PA'I 'BYUNG GNAS BKRA SHIS

'KHYIL GYI GTZOS SGRUB SDE BCO BRGYAD SOGS DGON SDE MANG, GRUB
PA THOB PA'I GNAS BRGYAD, KHRE TZE BZHI SO

SO'I DGON, KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED ZHABS KYIS PHYAG 'DEBS MDZAD PA
DME SHUL DKAR PO GSHONG, MGAR

RTZE SHUG GU NYIN DGON MA LAG LNGA, MAR NANG TSE LNGA'I SAR RJE
SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I GDAN SA GSUM GYI NANG TSAN SHING

LAS KHA BKRA SHIS CHOS RDZONG, KVA RING THAR BA GLING, BIS MDO'I
DGON CHEN, GCU 'KHOR GSANG SNGAGS CHOS

SDINGS; BSE CHANG DGON RNYING, SGO RIS GRVA TSANG DGON MA LAG
BCU GSUM, DUNG RI GA-YU MTSO, DE'I ZHOL

DU LHA LUNG DPAL RDOR GYI BZHUGS GNAS, STAG LUNG DAR RGYAS GLING
LE LAG DANG BCAS PA, NYIN KHRON LUNG PA'I

STOD SMAD DU DGON SGRUB SDE BCU, RMA KHAR RTA MGRIN RANG BYON
GYI GNAS AA 'GANG DGON PHYI NANG GNYIS,

MGON PO BYIN CAN BZHUGS PA MA H'A KA LA'I LHA KHANG, BSANG CHU
RGYUD DU KUN MKHYEN BLA MA YAB SRAS KYI GDAN SA

CHOS GRVA CHEN PO DPAL LDAN BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL, SGRUB SDE GONG 'OG
