LHA CHAB SGAR SOGS DANG, GA-YA' RI'I

GA-YAS SDINGS SU RTA RDZONG GA-YU MTSO DANG, GA-YON NGOS GTER
LUNG MKHA' 'GRO'I GNAS, DE DANG NYE BAR KHRI

RGAN SPRUL BA'I SKU NGAG DBANG 'JAM DBYANGS BKRA SHIS SKU PHRENG
GI BZHUGS GNAS GTER LUNG SGAR, BSANG CHUR

LHO NAS 'BAB PA'I GA-YON CHU'I RGYUD DU AA KHYUNG SGAR DANG SGOM
GRVA SMAN LUNG SGAR, RU NGAR SGAR RI KHROD BCAS,

STOD NGOS SU SGO MANG MCHOD RTEN SHAR, MDZOD DGE DGON PA GSUM,
GSHAG RAL GRUB GNAS GONG 'OG

RKANG TSA, KHA GYA, GTZOS, TZA YUS, RGAN GYA STE KHA GYA TSO
DRUG GI SAR RANG RANG GI DGON SGRUB SDE DU MA, PHYI

MA 'DIR BDE MCHOG PHO BRANG GNYA' GONG BRAG DKAR GYI GNAS RI,
HOR TSANG CHE CHUNG GNYIS SU SGAR SGRUB SDE BCU

GNYIS; SMAN BLA BCU GCIG SHING SGO MAN DU RGYA DGON MANG PO, MO
NI KO'U RI KHROD, MGO MOG DGON BKRA

SHIS BDE CHEN GLING, 'GRO MGON 'PHAGS PA'I GRVA CHEN T'A DPON
PO'I GDAN SA HAN DGON PA GSAR RNYING,

SGANG KHA RI KHROD, KA JU'I MKHAR DU T'A ZI DANG BYAMS CHEN ZI,
PHYI ROL TU MCHOD RTEN RING MO, HAN GYA DGON

RNAMS YOD DO, ,KLU CHU'I RGYUD STOD NGOS SU CHOS 'KHOR SGAR SHER
PHYIN GLING, RMOG RI DGON, GUG CHEN RI

@025 (MDO SMAD LJONGS SU BSTAN PA'I SROL DAR TSUL LAS BRTZAMS
SPYIR BSHAD PA,)

KHROD; NYANG GRUB PA DGU BRGYUD KYI GDAN SA NYANG TSANG GDONG
ZUG SPANG MTHIL RI KHROD, KLU SHOD KYI SAR CO NE

AANG SMON GONG MAS BTAB PA'I GDON GSUM, WA TIS DGON GONG 'OG MU
TO DGON SOGS DANG, BYANG NAS

'BAB PA'I DOG CHU'I STOD DU BDE MO THANG DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR
GLING, SHAR GYI CHAR SNGON PO THANG DGA' LDAN

BSHAD SGRUB GLING, GA-YAS NGOS LUNG LAG TU SGYIS TSANG SGAR, DME
SHUL SGAR GSAR, KLU DOG 'DRES MTSAMS

SU RNGA RGOD SGANG BKRA SHIS BSHAD SGRUB GLING, DE'I SHAR DU REB
TSA RGYAL MO DGON BSAM 'GRUB GLING DANG LUNG PHRAN

RNAMS SU DER GTOGS PA'I DGON SGRUB SDE BCO BRGYAD PHAL CHER YOD,
RTZE DBUS RI KHROD SOGS SGANG BA'I SGRUB

SDE BZHI, KLU CHUNG DGON CHEN DANG RGYUD STOD GRVA TSANG, STAG
TSANG DPON SLOB GYI RI KHROD, AA 'KHOR BRAG DKAR

GNAS RI DANG SGRUB SDE BYANG CHUB GLING, CHAS PA RGYA MKHAR DANG
YAR THANG DGON RGYUD PA DANG BCAS PA, SRIB NGOS

SU BDE THANG MKHAN PO DGON, CHAS PA'I GSHIS SOGS SU DGON RI
KHROD MANG PO, CHAS PA DAR DGE DGON,

NYIN NGOS SU DGON LI MKHAS MCHOG GI GDAN SA DGON LI RI KHROD,
B'A TZE MKHAR, DE DANG NYE BAR MAR BSNYUNG

DGON; RGYAL LUNG RI KHROD, CO NE'I DGON CHEN TING 'DZIN DAR
RGYAS GLING DANG DPON NA RIM GYI BZHUGS

GNAS YONGS 'DUS RGYAL KHAB, RGYAB NGOS SU YER BA'I BSHAD GRVA,
DE'I MDUN THO'U JU'I MKHAR DANG NYE BAR TSA

RDOR DGON, CO NE DGON CHEN GYI MDUN DU GUR YAG RI KHROD, NAGS
MDO DANG GONG SO DGON, MEN JU

MKHAR DANG NYE BAR CHOS SDE JO BO BZHUGS PA'I GNAS LHUN GRUB BDE
CHEN, CHOS RDZONG DPAL MCHOG SDE GNYIS KYI

DGON LAG DRUG CUR NYE BA, SGROL MA RANG BYON GYI LHA KHANG,
SDONG NAG DPON CHEN DGON, DE NAS CHOS RGYAL

'PHAGS PA'I 'DRA SKU GSUNG BYON MA BZHUGS PA'I GNAS SHING KUN
MKHAR, DER SA DGE'I DGON SDE DU MA DANG,

DGON LAG RGYA DGON MANG PO, KLU CHU BYANG DU 'KHYOGS PA'I NYIN
NGOS SU KHYA DGE LEGS BSHAD GLING, SGRUB SDE

GONG 'OG DE DANG HA CANG MI RING BA NA BKA' CHIMS BKA' KHOL MA
LAS 'BYUNG BA'I RI BO PADMA CAN, DE'I STOD

DU SER SMAD 'DUL 'DZIN SHO BA RIN PO CHES BTAB PA'I DGON PA
GSUM, CHAG RI DPAL GYI NAGS KHROD,

BRAG DKAR GYI RGYAB NGOS RIM PAR GRU GU'I DGON LAG BCO BRGYAD,
STOD DU SHAR BA BRTZON 'GRUS RIN CHEN GYI

GDAN SA M'A G'A SGO MO CHE DGON MA LAG NYI SHU, SPEN LE PHYOGS
SU THUGS RJE CHEN PO RANG BYON MCHED GSUM

BZHUGS PA'I GNAS RNAMS DANG, 'JIGS BYED RANG BYON BZHUGS PA B'A
TZA ZI SOGS RGYA DGON BGRANG LAS

'DAS PA MCHIS SO, ` ,KLU CHU GANG LAS 'BAB PA'I LHO NGOS MI RING
BA NA STAG TSANG LHA MO'I GRUB GNAS, DER LHA

MO NYIN SRIB KYI MDO SNGAGS KYI BSHAD GRVA, MDZOD DGE KHANG SAR,
DRAN PA'I DGON, MAN LUNG PA'I LAM YIG

LAS 'BYUNG BA'I RKYANG TSA'I CHAB TSAN DANG, 'BRING BA'I BRAG
DKAR, LUNG BZANG DPON CHUNG GI RI KHROD,

GZA' RU'I STOD DU BRAG BYA RGOD, GZA' TSONG DANG GA-YIS STOD
SMAD RNAMS SU DGON SDE DU MA, DPAL SHES RAB

'BAR GYI GDAN SA DPAL SHES NANG GONG 'OG AA SKYID DU KUN SPANGS
STOBS LDAN PA'I GDAN SA RI KHROD PHAN TSUN,

GRO DH'I: PHUG SOGS DGON SDE KHA SHAS, 'DI PHYOGS KYI CHU THAMS
CAD 'DRES TE RONG PHYOGS SU 'BAB PA'I RGYUD DU

@026 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

BANG TSANG DGON, GSER THANG DGON SOGS DGON SDE MANG PO, CHU DKAR
CHU NAG GI STOD NGOS SU RGYA DANG BON GYI

DGON PHRAN RE GNYIS, ZUNG JU'I SAR ZUNG 'PHAN MKHAR, MDO'I MCHAD
NYAN SKYONG PA'I DGON SER PO DANG

BRAG RA GNYIS, RONG CHU NAG GO STOD DU BSHAD GRVA DGU DGE 'KHOR
LO'I DGON RNAMS YOD DO, ,RNGA CHU RGYUD RNGA BA

KHAG GSUM GYI SAR RNGA BA'I SGO MANG SGAR SOGS DGON RI KHROD
GRANGS MANG, RVA CHU RGYUD DU AA MCHOG MTSAN NYID

DGON SGRUB SDE LNGA DANG BCAS PA, RVA CHU DANG RNGA CHU 'DRES
MTSAMS MAN TSA KHOR GTOGS SHING WAM PA DGON

SOGS DGON PHRAN DU MA, TSA BA KHA GSUM GYI SAR DA TSANG LHUN
GRUB GLING SOGS DANG, SA STOD DU KIRTI'I K'A LA

RI'I DGON, DE NAS RNGA BA DANG TSA KHO'I CHU RNAMS CHU CHEN DANG
'DRES RGYAL MO RONG BRGYUD NAS 'GRO ZHING, DER

GA-YUNG DRUNG LHA STENG SOGS DGE DGON 'GA' ZHIG MCHIS KYANG PHAL
CHER KHAMS SU GTOGS SO, ,BYANG DU TZONG

'JU LAG LHO RGYUD DU DGU KLU BSANG GSUM RNAMS RMA CHUR 'BAB LA,
STAG TSANG LHA MO DANG BZA' TSONG SOGS

KYI CHU RNAMS GCIG TU 'DRES NAS THE BO RONG DANG KA SA JU'I
MKHAR BRGYUD LHOR 'GRO ZHONG, DMU DGE DANG ZUNG

JU'I CHU RNAMS KYANG M'O JU'I MKHAR GYI GONG NAS 'DRES TE CHIN
DU PHUR 'BAB PAS CHU CHEN DE DAG GIS AA MDO'I

GZHUNG PHAL CHER RDZOGS SAM SNYAM MO, ,SPYIR BSHAD PA'I SKABS
SO,, ,,

*, ,MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,

*, ,GZHUNG DNGOS 'CHAD PAR BYANG RGYUD DANG LHO RGYUD GNYIS LAS,
GO RIM STABS 'BREL GYI DBANG GIS BYANG

RGYUD KYI THOG MA MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'CHAD PA LA,
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SKYED PA RABS KYI RGYUD LAS,

DE NAS AAndA RNYIL GYI 'OD LTAR SNGO, ,NYI MA'I 'OD KYIS GNAM
SNGON BZHU BA BZHIN, ,KHO RA KHOR YUG CHU 'BRAM LTAR

MI SNANG, ,GTING DPAG DKA' BA'I MTSO 'JINGS NANG DU ZHUGS, ,ZHES
RGYA MTSO LA BSNGAGS PA BZHIN, RGYA CHE

LA GTING ZAB PA, GNAM SNGON DVANGS PA'I KHA DOG GI SGO NAS YID
DANG MIG 'DZIN PA'I MTSO CHEN PO KHRI BSHOR

RGYAL MOR GRAGS PA'I DBUS KYI MTSO SNYING NI, RJE SKAL LDAN RGYA
MTSOS, MTSO DE DKYIL RI GLING CHAGS PA LA, ,

DUS DENG SANG MA H'A DE BA ZER, ,SNGON CHOS RGYAL SRONG BTZAN
SGAM PO DANG, ,DPAL AU RGYAN PAD MAS LUNG BSTAN

CING; ;KLU BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' GNAS PA'I SA, ,RJE GRUB THOB
MANG PO BZHUGS PA'I GNAS, ,ZHES

BSNGAGS PA'I SGRUB GNAS KHYAD PAR CAN YIN LA, STOD DU GLO BA RI
DANG, SMAD DU MTSER BA RI, MGON PO

GDONG DU GRAGS PA'I BRAG KHUNG DANG, KHRO BO'I RNAM PA, BSKANG
RDZAS 'DRA BA RANG BYUNG DU MA YOD PA'I GNAS

DANG; GA-YAS GA-YON NA RNA LUNG DU GRAGS PA'I MTSO CHUNG ZUNG
YOD LA, DE DANG 'BREL BAR LNGA BA CHEN PO RGYA PHEBS

DUS KHRI GSAR BRTZIGS KYI STENG NAS THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I RJES
GNANG MDZAD PAR GSUNGS PA'I GNAS SHI RE THANG

@027 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

NGAM DA LTA PHYAG MDZOD THER THER DU GRAGS PA TING NEL THUR,
RGYAL BA YAB SRAS GONG MA SO SOR MTSO SNGON GYI DPON

GONG MA RNAMS KYIS SRI ZHU PHU DUD MDZAD PA'I BZHUGS KHRI TSAR
DU DANG RA BA YOD LA, 'DI'I NUB NA RGYAL BA BSOD

NAMS RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR TU RMA CHEN RANG NYID RTA PA NYIS
BRGYA SKOR GYIS BSKOR BA'I GTZO BO BON ZHVA GYON PA'I RNAM

PAR SPRUL TE BSU BA DANG BSNYEN BKUR DNGOS SU MDZAD, SPYAN RAS
GZIGS KYI RJES GNANG ZHUS PAR GSUNGS

SHING; KUN GZIGS LNGA BAS RMA CHEN GYI GSOL MCHOD RTZE MO RAB
DKAR MA BRTZAMS PA'I GNAS AA RIG CHU TSAN DU

GRAGS PA RANG BYUNG KHRUS KYI RDZING BU YOD, DE DANG PHYOGS
MTSUNGS 'DAB CHAGS PA'I TSUL DU GE SAR GYI DUS HOR

DMAG GIS RI LUNG BKANG ZER BA'I AAB CHI DUG THANG, GE SAR GYI
BZHUGS GNAS LHA LUNG GA-YU MDO, MDZO

'DOGS SA YIN ZER BA'I RI DE'U ZHIG GI NYE 'GRAM DU SPANG SNGON
PO LA BRAG DKAR BO SROG CHAGS KYI RNAM PA 'BUR DU

DOD PA'I SA 'DZIN MDZO KHRA SDINGS, STOD DU MTSO SKYA RENGS SAM
TSA GEN NOR DANG, AA LAG NOR RAM SNGO RENGS

GNYIS; BE'U DUG MTSO, STONG RU MTSO NAG THO SU NOR TE MTSO SMAN
PHYUG MO LNGAR GRAGS PA DANG, BYANG DU

KHUR LUG GI MTSO, NO KVAN NOR, SHA LA THU'I NOR, HA RA NOR, LHO
DANG NUB TU BA YAN NOR, KUN DGA'

NOR; ZHE NE NOR SOGS MTSO PHRAN DU MAS BSKOR BA, NUB DANG BYANG
DU CHU 'GI DANG, KHUR LUG GI TSVA MTSO

GNYIS; KHUR LUG GI STOD DU AO'U KHUN GANGS RI ZHES PA'I PHYOGS
BZHI NAS AU LAN MU RUN, BO'U HA, AE JE

CE; SU RE THO LI'I CHU CHEN BZHI 'BAB LA, DE DANG 'JU LAG PHYOGS
SU GANGS RI MANG PO DANG, BO RO TSUD KHUG

TU GRAGS PA DKAR THANG MAR KHU'I MTSO MO, SHAR DU RDO NYI ZLA,
SHAR LHOR TZONG LA RING MO, LHO NGOS ZO DGU GA-YAS

RI GSER CHEN DANG, GA-YON RI SMON LAM MTHON PO, 'DI DAG THAMS
CAD KYI LHO AA MDO SPYI'I NUB NGOS DRANG

POR RMA CHEN SBOM RA'I GANGS RI SA 'DZIN GYI DBUS NA SHEL GYI
MCHOD RTEN BZHIN DU 'OD 'TSER ZHING RGYAL MTSAN GYI

TOG LTAR MNGON PAR 'PHAGS PA YOD DO, ,MTSO MGOR GRAGS PA TSA GAN
THO LO GE PHYOGS DANG, STOD NAS BU HA

DANG; AU LAN HO SHO HAR GVEL SOGS KYI CHU CHEN DU MA MTSO GZHUNG
BRGYUD, BYANG GI TSUNG 'GAG GI CHU DANG

'DRES NAS SHAR PHYOGS SU 'BAB PA LA TZONG CHUR GRAGS, GZHAN YANG
SMAN CHU DANG CHU TSAN MANG PO, SMAN RIGS

SNA TSOGS DANG LJON SHING DU MA, RI DANG KLUNG GI 'DAB CHAGS
RIGS MANG PO, SPANG DANG NAGS KYI SKYED TSAL GYIS

BRGYAN PA MDOR NA SNOD LA DGE BCU DANG, BCUD KYI YID LA DAD PA
DANG SNYING STOBS DPA' RTZAL DANG LONGS SPYOD

KYI 'DU 'GOD GANG NGOS NAS BSNGAGS BRJOD RGYA CHE BA DON LA
GNAS, DE YANG CHOS RGYAL KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYIS

MKHAN CHEN BO BHI SA TVA LA 'OM BU TSAL DU MJAL SKABS, RGYAL BOS
ZHVA DANG LHAM GYON CING SKA RAGS MED PAR PHYAG

RTEN GSER KA tO RA GANG PHUL BA LA, MKHAN CHEN GYIS, RGYAL PO
KHYOD KYIS ZHVA GYON PA'I RTEN 'BREL GYIS KHYOD KYI

GDUNG RGYUD STOD MNGA' RIS SU ZHVA TZAM DANG, LHA MGYON PAS MDO
SMAD DU LHAM TZAM ZHIG 'BYUNG, SKA RAGS MA

BCINGS PAS BAR DU RGYAL KHRIMS LHOD, 'ON KYANG GSER PHUL BAS
DAMPA'I CHOS DAR BA BYAR BTUB CES LUNG

BSTAN PA BZHIN KHRI SRONG GI SRAS CHUNG BA MU TIG BTZAN PO'AM
SAD NA LEGS 'JING YON, DE'I SRAS DAR MA, DE'I

@028 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS BSHAD PA,)

SRAS GNAM SDE 'OD BSRUNG, DE'I SRAS MNGA' BDAG DPAL 'KHOR BTZAN,
DE'I SRAS KHRI BKRA SHIS BRTZIGS PA

DPAL; DE'I SRAS 'OD SDE LA SRAS BZHI BYUNG BA'I GNYIS PA KHRI
LDE MDO KHAMS SU BYUNG, MTSO SNGON 'DIR GZHI

BZUNG STE KHRI DPON MDZAD, TZONG KHA YUL CHEN BCO BRGYAD SOGS
MDO SMAD PHAL CHER LA MNGA' MDZAD PA'I RGYUD

DU SPYAN SNGA DON CHEN PA SOGS BYUNG BAR BSHAD LA, DA DUNG YANG
KHRI DPON DE'I RGYUD PA DPA' RE PHYOGS SU YOD PA

LA 'PHAN YUL RANG SKAD MA NYAMS PAS KHYI DPON DU 'BOD PA YOD
SNANG, YANG DE KAR HOR GO TAN GYI BLON RGYUD,

KYI'U KYA, LI KYA, LU 'U KYA, YANG KYA SOGS DPON PHRAN MANG ZER,
BAR SKABS BOD AA CHI'I DPON RTA

MANG PO YOD PAS KHRI RTA DMAR CAN DU GRAGS PA 'BANGS BCAS KYIS
YUL LJONGS SU DBANG BSGYUR BA DANG, DE

DUS GRUB CHEN GLANG DKAR BA PHEBS PAR BSHAD DE BRTAG DGOS, RAB
BYUNG BCU PA'I LCAGS LUG LOR CHA HAR AAL

THAN RGYAL PO LA CHOS KYI SNANG BA SKYES TE, PHYOGS DER MDZOD
DGE AA SENG BLA MA ZHES BYA BA ZHIG YOD PA LA DRI BA BYAS

PAR; RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR ZHIB TU BSHAD PAS
BZLOG TU MED PA'I DAD PA SKAYES TE BYANG PHYOGS

SU PHEBS DGOS KYI SNYAN GSAN 'BUL BAR GSER YIG PA MNGAGS, RGYAL
BA RIN PO CHE MCHOD YON MTSO KHAR DNGOS

MJAL DANG, RE ZHIG ZLA MCHOD DUI 'DUL BA SLOB DPON BRTZON 'GRUS
BZANG PO RDZONG STA MDZAD, BUM CHU GNANG

BA RGYAL POS THOG DRANGS MI KHRI PHRAG GIS BTUNG YANG ZAD MI
SHES PA BYUNG, SA STAG LOR CHIBS BSGYUR DUS AA RIG GI

SAR BSU BA DANG PO YONG SHA BU'I BAR KU THA'I JI, KHA THAN B'A
THUR, THU MED KYI MA ZIN PAKSHI RNAMS KYIS GTZOS RTA BA

BRGYAD BRGYA SKOR 'BYOR DUS RGYAL BAS CHU LA SDIGS MDZUB MDZAD
DE GYEN DU BZLOG PA'I RDZU 'PHRUL BSTAN PAS DAD

PAR BYAS, GDAN 'DREN GNYIS PAR, 'UR BSDUS RGYAL RIGS SE CHEN
HUNG THA'I JI DANG, THU MED RGYAL

RIGS D'A YAN NO YON GYIS GTZOS RTA BA STONG PHRAG GSUM TZAM
BSLEBS, HUNG THA'I JIS THUGS RJE CHEN PO PHYAG BZHI

BAR MTHONG, GDAN 'DREN GSUM PAR JO RIG THU THA'I JI DANG, CHING
B'A THUR SOGS 'BYOR, MTSO KHAR RGYAL

PO DNGOS DANG MJAL DUS KHROM 'BUM TZAM 'TSOGS PA'I DBUS SU HUNG
THA'I JIS GTAM BTANG, KU SHRI PAKSHIS

LO TZ'A BSGYUR TE, MCHOD YON NYI ZLA ZUNG GCIG GIS DAM PA'I CHOS
KYI LAM BTOD, KHRAG MTSO'O MAR BSGYUR BA

'DI BKA' DRIN CHE, SNGAR SOG PO'I MI SHI BA'I RJES SU, DRAG ZHAN
GYI DBYE BAS RANG GI CHUNG MA BRAN GA-YOG RTA NOR

SOGS SROG GCOD PA LA DA PHYIN CHAD JI TZAM 'OS PA BLOS BCAD DE
BLA MA DANG DGE 'DUN LA PHUL, BSNGO PA SMON

LAM ZHUS, SROG GCOD GTAN NAS BYAS MI CHOS MI BSAD NA LUS SROG
'BRAL, RTA PHYUGS BSAD NA NOR 'PHROG

RAB BYUNG GI RTAGS CAN LA LAG BZHAG NA GZHI MA GTOR, SNGAR AOD
KOD DU GRAGS PA ZLA DUS KYI KHRAG MCHOD DANG,

LO DUS KYI SROG GCOD KYIS MCHOD DGO PA'I GSHIN PO'I GZUGS BRNYAN
RNAMS ME LA BSREG DGOS, DE ME LA

MA BSREGS NA KHYIM GTOR, DE'I TSAB TU MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I
SKU RE BZHENGS TE DKAR GSUM GYIS MCHOD PA

DANG; NYA STOD BRGYAD GSUM LA BSNYEN GNAS BSRUNG BA, RGYA BOD LA
'PHROG BCOM MI BYED PA SOGS DBUS GTZANG

LTAR DGOS PAR BKAS BCAD, MCHOD YON ZHAL 'DZOMS SAR SA 'DUL MDZAD
DE, CHAB TSA THEG CHEN CHOS

@029 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

'KHOR GLING DU RGYA NAG GI BZO BO MKHAS PA MANG PO BKUG NAS
BZHENGS PA'I GTZANG KHANG LA DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS,

RJE BLA MA, RJE NYID KYI SKU 'DRA, GA-YAS GA-YON MDUN GSUM DU
'JIGS BYED, SPYAN RAS GZIGS RNAMS KYI LHA

KHANG RE RE LA KA BA BCU DRUG GI KHYON TZAM YOD PA, DE'I BAR BAR
DU SEMS DPA' DANG GNOD SBYIN GNYIS KYI LHA

KHANG; BE DKAR LCOG MDUN GYI GA-YAS GA-YON DU GZIMS CHUNG 'OD
GSAL PHO BRANG DANG BDE CHEN PHO BRANG,

THAMS CAD LA RGYA PHIBS SOGS RGYA NAG GI LUGS LTAR DANG, LCAGS
RI RIM PA GSUM GYIS BSKOR BA'I GTZUG

LAG KHANG SDE DANG BCAS PA LA RAB GNAS RGYAS PA DANG ZHI RGYAS
DBANG DRAG GI SBYIN SREG GNANG, SAD MI MI BDUN

BZHIN RGYAL PO'I BKAS RGYAL RIGS GSUM GYIS THOG DRANGS PA'I
BTZUN PA BRGYA PHRAG BRGAL BA RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS,

YUL DE'I LHA SRIN RNAMS DNGOS SU 'ONGS NAS CHOS NYAN, RGYAL POS
BKUR BA'I SDIG TO'I LHA RTEN MGON PO ZHAL

GYI SBYIN BSREG GI SGO NAS ME MA BSREGS, RGYAL BA LA KHYAB BDAG
RDO RJE 'CHANG GI LAS KA PHUL, RGYAL PO LA KYEE RDOR

GYI DBANG GNANG, SA YOS LOR CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM BTZUGS, LHA MO'I
TSES GTOR LAS BDUD RTZI'I RGYUN BABS

PA RGYA BOD HOR GSUM DU MAS BTUNG YANG ZAD MI SHES PA LTA BUR
'PHEL, LNGA BA CHEN PO RGYA PHEBS YAR LAM DU TSA

GAN THO LO GE NAS BA YAN NOR DANG CHAB TSA LHA KHANG GE NYE
'DABS, DE NAS RIM GYIS AA RIG CHU TSAN KHAR PHEBS

TSUL GSUNGS KYANG DA LTA MED 'DRA, 'UR BSDUS KYI RGYAL BU BHIN
DUS RGYAL BA SPYAN DRANGS, DRAG PO'I SBYIN SREG

MDZAD PAS RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED ZHAL GZIGS, THUGS KA'I TING NGE
'DZIN SEMS DPA' DANG DBYER MED DU GYUR

PA'I SNANG BA BYUNG, RGYA 'DRE'O CHO 'PHRUL MTHA DAG NGANG GIS
ZHI, GTZUG LAG KHANG GSAR DU BZHENGS PA LA PHUN

TSOGS GZHAN PHAN SDE DANG, SE CHEN TA'I CHING GIS GTZUG LAG
KHANG DANG 'DUS SDE BZHENGS PA LA RAB GNAS,

GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI DRAG PO'I SBYIN SREG GI SGO NAS NAG PHYOGS
RNAMS TSAR BCAD, DGON DE LA PHUN TSOGS DAR RGYAS

GLING BTAGS GSUNGS PA GNYIS SA CHA NGOS MA ZIN, SA YOS LO RGYAL
BA KHAMS SU PHEBS SKABS RGYAL BO DANG BKA'

BGROS KYIS RGYA BOD KYI GSER ZAM SPREL BA SOGS LA MTSO KHAR DPON
PO KHO LI CHI CHING B'A THUR 'KHOR BCAS BZHAG

SOG YUL DU SKU TSAB LA RE ZHIG STONG 'KHOR YON TAN RGYA MTSO
RDZONG STA MDZAD, RJE SKAL LDAN PAS, SPRUL SKU BSOD

NAMS RGYA MTSO'I DUS, ,GZIMS KHANG GONG GI SPRUL PA'I SKU, ,BSOD
NAMS YE SHES DBANG PO DANG, ,STONG

'KHOR YON TAN RGYA MTSO DANG, MDUNG RTZE KUN DGA' DPAL BZANG
SOGS, ,SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS DU MA

YIS; ;MDO SMAD PHYOGS 'DI YONGS SU GANG, ,ZHES GSUNGS LA, MDUNG
RTZE BA NI 'BRAS SPUNGS GDAN

RABS GNYIS PA CHOS RJE DPAL LDAN SENG GE'I DNGOS SLOB DMIGS
BRTZE MA'I LAS TSOGS MDZAD MKHAN BLA MA BUM PA

CAN NAS BZUNG DMIGS BRTZE MA'I GRUB THOB ZAM MA CHAD PA'I DPON
RGYUD RGYAL BA YON TAN RGYA MTSO SKU NA PHRA DUS

SOG YUL NA MJAL MKHAN DE YIN 'DRA, AAL THAL GYI SKU MCHED SU MI
THA'I JI'I SRAS SU RGYAL BA YUON TAN RGYA MTSO

'KHRUNGS; ;CHU YOS DDBUS PHEBS SKABS SA THAG 'DUM PA'I KHYAD
BCAS RGYA'I LCAGS RI DANG NYE BA'I PHYI LOGS

KYI LAM BRGYUD DE MTSO KHAR PHEBS, DPON PO KHO LI CHIS PHEBS
RDZONG GRA MA 'GRIGS PAR BSNYAD ZHAG 'PHUL NYIN

@030 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

BYAS PA LA LTOS MED DU CHIBS BSGYUR PAS MTSO SKYA RENGS SNGO
RINGS KYI BAR DU PHEBS RJES BSNYEGS, LHA BTZUN

BGRES GZHON GNYIS BYUNG BA'I GNYIS KAS PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS
KYI RGYAL MTSAN LA BSNYEN RDZOGS DANG SNGA PHYIR

CHOS BKA' MTHA' YAS MNYAN, RAB BYUNG BCU BA'I SA RTA LOR DE
GNYIS DANG SE CHEN TA'I CHING SOGS THU MED KYI

RGYAL RGYUD HAR HU LA, KHUN DU LUNG CHOS KHUR SOGS HAL HA'I
RGYAL RGYUD, SDE BA SKYID SHOD PA BSOD NAMS RGYAL

MTSAN; SE 'BRAS KYI GROS DBANG DU MA PHYOGS GCIG BYAS SOGS DMAG
SKYID SHOD PA'I SKYA DMAG RNAMS CHAS,

LO DER PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE MNGA' RIS RGYAL POS GDAN DRANGS, LHA
SA'I HO BO LA SPYAN CHAB BYUNG, GTZANG RGYAL

KARMA PHUN TSOGS KYIS BOD KHRI SKOR BCU GSUM GYI DMAG BSKUL LHA
SAR LHAGS, ` DRUG PA'I BCO LNGA LA 'HAB

DUS BTAB PAS GTZANG PA'I DMAG MI STONG PHRAG DU MA LHA SAR KHA
BTABS, GTZANG DAG GI DPA' BO MANG PO

'BRAS SPUNGS 'JOMS RTZIS KYIS RGYAB RI'I RTZER LHAGS, ,D'A'I
CHING GIS SNA DRANGS PA'I SOG DMAG GTZANG DPUNG

NANG DU BRGYUGS GTZANG DMAG MA LUS PAR BSAD PAS GCIG KYANG YUL
DU LDOG RGYU MA BYUNG, PHYI NYIN SKYID CHU'I

'GRAM DU GTZANG PAS DMAG SGAR SNGAR LAS CHE BAR BTAB PAS SOG
DMAG RNAMS SKRAG STE 'BROS MGO BRTZAMS, GLO

BUR DU SE 'BRAS KYI BTZUN PA RNAMS DANG, SDE BA SKYID SHOD PA
SOGS SKYA BO RNAMS 'UR TE 'PHAN YUL DANG STAG

LUNG STOGS SU BROS, GTZANG DMAG GIS SE 'BRAS BCOM, SKYID SHOD
PA'I RDZONG BZHIS THAMS CAAD BLANGS PAS

SDE BA CHOS RJE YANG MTSO KHAR PHEBS DGOS BYUNG, STAG LUNG BAS
SKOR 'PHEN GYI BAR CHINGS BYAS, SE 'BRAS SNGAR

SHUL DU BZHUGS CHOG PA DANG, DGON BLUS 'BRAS SPUNGS PAS GSER ZHO
NYIS BRGYA DANG SE RAS BRGYA 'BUL DGOS

BYAS; GTZANG PAS DGON BLUS 'BUL BA LA ZHAL NGO BSOD NAMS CHOS
'PHEL GTZANG DU 'BYON DGOS TSUL BYUNG

BAR SE 'BRAS LA DMAG PHOGS TE LCAGS ZAD LDER ZAD LA SONG BAS
'BUL RGYU MED, RGYAL DU RJE GONG MA'I MDZOD

NAG CIG YOD PA 'DON DGOS 'DUG BYAS TE MGO BSKOR GYIS GTZANG PA'I
SKU TSAB KHRID RGYAL DU PHEBS RDZU'I LA ZHIG

LA PHEBS SKABS YIBS TE NYANG KONG BRGYUD SOG YUL DU PHEBS, LCAGS
BYA LOR LHA BTZUN CHUNG BA BLO BZANG BSTAN

'DZIN RGYA MTSO, GU RU HONG THA'I JI GNYIS KYI GTZOS HOR SOGS GI
DMAG STONG PHRAG GNYIS LHAG DANG GTZANG PA'I

DPUNG CHEN LHA SA RKYANG THANG SGANG DU GA-YUL SPRAD, BOD DMAG
GIS MA THUB PAR LCAGS PO RIR 'TSANGS, PAn

CHEN RIN PO CHE, DGA' LDAN KHRI BA TSUL KHRIMS CHOS 'PHEL, 'JAM
DBYANGS BLA MA DKON MCHOG CHOS 'PHEL,

STAG LUNG ZHABS DRUNG KHU DBON GYI SKU TSAB BCAS 'DZOMS THOG
CHINGS MDZAD DE, DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG DU CHOS

'KHOR LHA SAS GTZOS RAG MAN GYI SA RIS RNAMS GSAR CHOD, SE 'BRAS
KYI MCHOD GZHI'I RNAMS SPROD 'JAGS,

FDBUS GTZANG GI DGE LUGS CHOS SDE GRUB MTHA' BSGYUR BA DANG, SA
RIS SHOR BA RNAMS SNGAR BABS SU SLOG

SDE BSKYID SHOD PA LA BDE CHEN TSAB TU 'PHAN YUL MKHAR RTZE BYIN
TE BKAG PO TSANG CHUNG, ZHAL NGO BSOD NAMS

RAB BRTAN DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG DU GZHI PHAN NAS BZHUGS RGYA SOGS
BKA' KHRA BOD DU GZI BRJID CHE BA BZHAG

LHA BTZUN GYI MI SNA DH'ARMA KHI YA THA'I JI, HUNG THA'I JI'I MI
SNA CO NE CHOS RJE SBYIN PA DAR RGYAS SOGS MNGAGS TE GTZANG

@031 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

PAR ZHUS NAS CHU KHYI LO LNGA BA CHEN PO GDAN SAR BKOD, MTSO
KHAR GDAN 'DREN DANG, MA PHEBS NA DPUNG SHED

KYIS 'KHYER RGYU 'DANGS SHIG BYUNG BAS RGYAL BA GSANG STABS KYIS
AE RI SGOR RE ZHIG BZHUGS DGOS BYUNG, PHA BU

THAMS CAD KYIS SDE BA CHOS RJE LA RANG GI 'DOD PA'I CHOS ZHUS
DANG, HO LI RDZI DANG, LHA BTZUN CHE BA BSTAN SKYONG

BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO GNYIS KAS DGON RE BTAB PAR CHU BZANG RNAM
RGYAL DPAL 'BYOR, GSER KHANG PA 'PHRIN LAS

PHUN TSOGS, GTZANG RI PHUG PA DGE 'DUN RGYAL MTAN PA 'CHAD NYAN
PAR BSKOS KYANG YUN RING MA GNAS, HUNG

THA'I JI DANG, NU BO NANG 'KHRUGS BYUNG BA SDE BA CHOS REJ DANG,
CHU BZANG BA GNYIS KYIS BAR CHINGS MDZAD PAS

CUNG ZAD PHAN THOGS, LCAGS RTA'I LO MJUG LHA BTZUN SOGS KYI DMAG
GIS HUNG THA'I JI SOGS SA CHA BYANG RGYUD

KYI THU MED RU SDE RNAMS BCOM, SDE BA CHOS RJE SKU MCHED DPON
GA-YOG MANG RA PHYOGS SU PHEBS DGOS BYUNG,

LCAGS LUG LO LHA BTZUN CHE BA GSHEGS, HAL HA AA KHA'I DA'I CHIN
AO ROD KYI DMAG MANG POS BSKOR BA'I DKYIL

NAS GA-YUL 'KHRUGS BZHIN PAR 'ONGS PA'I DPA' SKAD CAN GYIS GTZOS
HA LA HA DANG, MERGAN NO YON MGO

BYAS AOD ROD PA, THU MED SUM BRGYA SKOR SOGS DBUS SU LHA MJAL DU
PHYIN, SA 'BRUG LOO NAS CHA HAR LEN

TAN RGYAL POS CHA GAR DU NANG 'KHRUGS BSLANGS, DE'I DBANG GIS
CHU SPREL LO YONG SHA YI BU'I DPON PO BZHI CHAS

NGAM PHYOGS SU YUL BTON PA'I NANG NAS STAG LUNG BA'I SBYIN BDAG
BLA MA SKYABS CHO KHUR 'DAM DU 'BYOR, JO

MJAL DANG SBRAGS RGYAL DBANG LA TSE DBANG ZHUS, CHA GAR BA MANG
PO HAL HAR SONG BA NANG 'KHRUGS KYI RKYEN DU SONG

BAS CHOG THU DMAG BCAS HAL HA NAS BSKRAD, RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG
PA'I CHU SPREL LO MTSO SNGON DU BSLEBS TE THU

MED KYI RU SDE THAMS CAD BCOM, RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I SA YOS NAS 'DI
BAR LO NGO NGA BZHI TZAM LA THU MED CHING B'A

THUR; HUNG THA'I JI, LHA BTZUN GNYIS SOGS STOBS DANG DBANG SHED
CHE BAS MDO DBUS GNYIS KAR DBANG

BSGYUR BA LTA BU BYAS SNANG, DE'I RJES SU KHU YA THA'I JI, PHAG
THAR HO LI CHI SOGS THA'I JI MANG PO RIM PAR RMA

LHO RGYUD DU BYUNG BAS RONG GI YUL GRU MANG POR 'PHROG BCOM
DANG, LHA BTZUN CHUNG BAS SDE BA CHOS RJE LA BYANG CHUB

SEMS SBYONG GI GDAMS PA RTZOM PAR BSKUL TSUL 'DUG GZHAN ZHIB CHA
MA NGES, CHA GAR LEN TAN DGE BSTAN

LA 'TSE 'DOD KYIS MTSO KHAR 'ONGS PA SHA RA THA LAR BKRONG, CHOG
THU BKA RGYUD LA MOS KHUL GYIS DON LA RGYA'I

TO'I ZIR DAD CING BSTAN PA LAS PHYIR PHYOGS PA ZHIG YIN YANG SDE
BA CHOS RJE MTSO KHAR GDAN DRANGS, GRUB MTHA'

LA CHAGS SDANG MI MNGA' BA DANG, CHOS GTAM BYAS PA'I LAN LA DGA'
BAS GZOS SGO DANG, BLA MA KHYED MTHOG NA

DAD PA SKYED KYANG, ZHVA 'DI RIG NA SNYING NA ZHUS, BU GZHON PA
ZHIG GIS CHOS 'BREL BZHAG GZHAN DER

GNAS KYI SA 'BRUG KAR GSUM GYI GRUB MTHA' DZIN PA MANG PO DANG,
KARMA BA'I BSTAN 'DZIN ZHVA DMAR RAB

'BYAMS PAS LKOG CHOS MANG PO MNYAN, BYA LOR YOD SHA YI BU KARMA
YIL NGAN LHA SAR YONG, RGYAL BA LA TSE RTE'I

RJES GNANG ZHUS TE MTSUR PHUR SONG YANG, KARMA BA MA DGYES PA'I
NYAMS KYIS ZHAL MJAL TZAM LAS PHYAG DBANG MA

GNANG BAS THA'I JI KHROS, MTSUR PHU'I DKAR ME RU BA BRGYAB,
SHING KHYI LOR AAR SA LANG GIS HAL HA AA KHA'@032 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

DA'I CHIN BSLUS TE DME BYAS PAS SROL NGAN BTOD, LO SNGA PHYIR
CHA HAR, CHOG THU, BE RI RNAMS KYIS RGYA BOD

KYI GSER ZAM BCAD PAS AA MDO BA SNYING STOBS CAN 'GA' RGYA
GZHUNG BGROD, DAR RTZE MDO NAS BKAR KHAMS

BRGYUD DBUS SU SONG, SHING PHAG LOR CHOG THU PHA BU TSO DANG,
ZHVA DMAR RAB 'BYAMS PA BCAS GTZANG BA DANG

GZHUNG GCIG BYED RGYU, DGE LUGS MING MED DU GTONG RGYU, KAR
'BRUG GI SBYIN BDAG BYED SHOM SOGS KYI GROS

BYAS TE, THA'I JI AAR SA LANG KHRI DMAG BCAS BTANG BA 'DAM DU
'BYOR, YUNG SHA'I BU DPON KHAG BZHI DUS

GCIG LA BCOM, BLA MA SKYABS CHO KHUR STOD LA SONG BA DANG 'GRIG
KARMA CHUNG NA DANG NOM CHI GNYIS BSAD,

BU NOR BU RIN CHEN DANG, KARMA CHE BA GNYIS BROS PAS DE LAN THAR
KYANG CHU RTA LO NOR BU RIN CHEN KU SHRI'I DMAG

LA LCEBS MCHONG RGYAB PAS BSAD, AAR SA LANG CHOS SKAD CHE BAS
KARMA BA THUGS SPUGS 'THUMS, MTSUR PHU NAS

DOL BRGYAD GRAR THEGS PA THA'I JI'I SEMS LA PHOGS TE MA BSAM PA
BRGYA'I MGO BRTZAMS, DGUN SMAD SOG PO'I

GA-YAS RU 'BRI GUNG DANG GA-YON DU GTZANG BYANG RGYUD LA BTEGS,
THA'I JIS GTZOS DMANGS YAR 'BROG TU KHA

BSTAD PA'I BDE GZAR CHEN POS GNAM SA 'GAS PA LTA BU'I 'JIGS
SKRAG BYUNG YANG SOG DMAG GIS GAM PA LA

THOG NAS BLTAS PAS LUNG PA'I DKYIL DU TSUD PA LTA BU'I 'TSABS
SHAS BROS MA THABS KYIS LO GSAR SKABS DMAG

RNAMS SKYID SHOD 'GRIM, THA'I JIS PHYAG MI 'TSAL BA'I KHRIMS
BYAS TE DGA' LDAN KHANG GSAR DU PHYIN SKABS RGYAL

BA MTHONG MA THAG SDANG SEMS ZHI STE PHYAG BTZAL, BYIN BRLABS
DANG CHOS GTAM GYI DRI BA ZHUS, RVA MO CHE MJAL

DUS 'GA' ZHIG GIS DE RING KHRIMS SUS BSHIG BYAS PAS MTHA' JIS
NGA RANG BLO 'GYUR ZHES LAN BTAB, THA'I JI

GLO BUR DU SMYOS SHING SDE KHROD DU THOG 'KHYUG GI 'JIGS PA
BYUNG BA RNYING MA'I SOG BZLOG GI MTHUR GSUNGS, ME BYI'I

LOR CUNG GAR NAS KU SHRI HAN GYIS RANG DON MA 'KHRIS PA'I BSTAN
DON KHO NAR GA-YUL BSHAMS PA'I DMAG ROGS

B'A THUR HUNG THA'I JIS BYAS AO ROD KYI DMAG KHRI PHRAG LHAG
TZAM GYIS YI LE DANG THA RIM, HAS DAG GI CHU KLUNG DANG

'DAM CHEN PO STON DGUN MTSAMS KYI 'KHYAG STENG NAS BRGAL, MTSO
SNGON SA SNE BU LUNG GER DU 'BYOR, MI RTAS

NGAL BSOS, RI DVAGS GNA' BA MANG PO LA BRTEN TE BSDAD PA'I RI LA
MING KVAN YA MA THUR GRAGS, ME GLANG ZLA BA

DANG POR MTSO SNGON GYI STOD DU PHEBS, CHOG THU DMAG KHRI PHRAG
GSUM DU NYE BA DUS GCIG LA BCOM, RI SNE GNYIS

KHRAG GIS DMAR POR GYUR PA LA AU LAN HO SHO CHE CHUNG ZER, SRAS
T'A YAN THA'I JI SOGS KYI DPUNG GI DMAG LHAG

MA HAR GER 'KHYAG ROM SA STENG DED NAS PHAM, 'GA' ZHIG DE'I SHAR
NGOS LUNG PAR GTAD NAS BLANGS PAS DENG

SANG SHA HAL DU GRAGS, CHOG THU DPON BROS TE 'PHYI KHUNG ZHIG TU
'DZUL BA BZUNG, SNGA LO ZHVA DMAR RAB 'BYAMS

PA DANG BLON PO THA'I JIN GNYIS KYIS BOD NAS BANG CHEN BTANG STE
BU AAR SA LANG 'DIS YAB KYI GSUNG LTAR MA BYAS

PAS JI LTAR BYED DRIS PAR, CHOG THUS BSLU THABS KYIS SOD CES LAN
BYUNG, AAR SA LANG PHYIR LOG BE RI BCOM

PA'I NOM PA LA MGO 'KHOR SKABS NANG 'KHRUGS BYUNG STE DPON BLON
GSUM DUS GCIG LA BSAD PAS CHOG THU

PHYOGS RJES MED DU SONG, KU SHRIS SDE BA CHOS RJE MTSO KHAR GDAN
DRANGS, DBANG LUNG RJES GSUM MANG PO ZHUS,

@033 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

B'A THUR HUNG THA'I JI DPON GA-YOG GIS KYANG RDO RJE 'PHRENG
BA'I DBANG ZHUS TE RANG YUL DU LOG KU SHRI DPON GA-YOG

DANG; SKYID SHOD SDE BA YID BZHIN SOGS DBUS SU PHEBS, GZHUNG NAS
JO SHAK GI MDUN DU RGYAL PO LA BSTAN 'DZIN

CHOS RGYAL GYI CHO LO PHUL, SA STAG LOR RGYAL POS MERGAN BKA'
BCU SHES RAB RGYA MTSO RGYAL BA MTSO KHAR GDAN 'DREN

DU BTANG BA GTZANG SDE SRID KYIS CHOS SDE CHEN PO GSAR RGYAG
MDZAD PA'I 'GO SGANG DANG THUG 'U LAG RNAMS KYIS

BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I RGYAB RI NAS RDO BTZAL BA'I RBAB BSGRIL BAS
SPYIL PO 'DRA LA GNOD PA SOGS RGYAL BA YAB SRAS LA

THUGS SUN SNA TSOGS ZHU BA'I MTHONG THOS THAMS CAD YOS LO PHYIR
'KHOR DUS RGYAL POR ZHUS PAS THUGS KHROS,

'BRUG LOR GLO BUR DU DMAG POD PHYOGS SU BTEGS PA LAM NAS KHAMS
SU BYON, LCAGS 'BRUG SMON LAM GYI SGANG

LA MDO KHAMS SGANG DRUG THAMS CAD DBANG DU BSDUS, BE RI RGYAL PO
BROS PAS THAR KYANG LAS DBANG GIS PHYE MA LEB

DANG MAR ME'I DPE BZHIN PHYAG TU 'BYOR, SA DGE KAR 'BRUG 'BRI
STAG GI BLA MA MI DPON MANG PO BTZON DU BCUt

PA BTON, LCAGS SBRUL LOR RGYAL PA DMAG CHEN BCAS 'DAM BRGYUD
GTZANG DU PHEBS, SNGA PHYI 'DI DAG TU ZHAL

NGO BSOD NAMS RAB BRTAN GYIS LNGA PA CHEN POR BSTAN DON DU LAS
SBYOR GNANG DGOS TSUL DANG, DE YANG GSAR

MA'I GSHED SKOR DE LEGS PO YIN 'DUG RUNG SNGAR BYAS DUS PHAR
YANG NUS PA CHE MDOG LA, TSUR YANG 'PHROD

NYAMS MA BYUNG TSUL DANG, RMA KHAR PHAN NA KHYI TSIL GYI DPE
BZHIN RNYING MA RANG NAS MDZAD DGOS ZHUS PA BZHIN

'PHANG BSREG MNAN GSUM GYIS MTSON PA'I LAS SBYOR MTHA' DAG
RNYING PHYOGS KHO NA LA BRTEN TSUL GSUNGS PA

MCHOD YON THAMS CAD NAS, 'PHRAL PHUGS RGYANG GSUM GYIS RANG
BSTAN 'DI LA GCIG TU GCES PAR MDZAD PA'I

BKA' DRIN SHES DGOS, 'ON KYANG BSTAN DON DU 'PHRIN LAS DUS LAS
MI YOL BAS DE DUS 'BRAS SPUNGS 'JIGS

BYED KYI ZHAL NAS KHRAG NYIN GANG BABS, CHOS RGYAL 'BYON GRABS
LA LCAGS THAG 'BUL DGOS BYUNG, TEL BA'I

ZHAL NAS KHRAG 'DZAG DGA' LDAN CHOS RGYAL NGAR BA'I SGRA MANG
POS MNGON SUM DU THOS, GTZANG NAS SKYA BTZUN

GNYIS KYI RJES LA RDE'U 'KHYER BA'I RLUNG NAG GI GSEB NAS RAL BA
RTING BAR SLEBS PA'I BUD MED NAG MO MI RO

MANG PO KHUR TE DRE'U LA ZHON PA ZHIG YUL MI 'GAS MTHONG ZHING
SDE SRID GTZANG PA'I BLA KHYER ZHES LAB, 'BRAS SPUNGS

DGON GSHAM NAS BUD MED KYI SKAD 'DRA BA'I NGA RO DRAG PO LHANG
LHANG SGROGS PA SOGS DUS KYI CHAD PA BZLOG TU MED

PA'I LTAS MANG DU BYUNG SNANG, GTZANG PAS SE 'BRAS KYI KHA GNON
DU BRTZIGS PA'I GDONG DKAR RDZONG SHIN TU BTZAN

RUNG CHOS BZHIS RNYING KHUNGS SHUN PA'I DMAG GIS 'TSANGS PAS
RDZONG ZHOL GNYIS KA 'PHRAL DU LON, BDE CHEN DANG

SNE'U RDZONG GI GTZANG BA'I 'DZIN CHAB RNAMS KYIS BAB PHUL, CHU
RTA ZLA BA GSUM PA'I TSES 'GOR BSTAN 'DZIN

CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I MNGA' 'OG TU BOD SHING SGO CAN THAMS CAD
CHUD PAS TSES BCU GCIG LA RGYAL POS GDAN 'DREN

ZHUS TE LNGA BA CHEN PO GTZANG DU PHEBS, THOB RGYAL GYIS MDA'
BDE CHEN DU RGYAL POS BSU BA MDZAD DE MJAL DAR

DU 'PHAGS PA RIN PO CHE'I MAN HO'I PHYAG DRIL DANG, MARGAD KYI
GSOL JAN BOD KHRI SKOR BCU GSUM DANG GA-YAS

BZHAG GA-YON BZHAG YIN ZER BA DE PHUL, BSAM 'GRUB RTZE'I TSOMS
CHEN DU BOD SOG GRANGS MED 'TSOGS

@034 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

PA'I BZHUGS GRAL GYI TSE GONG MA SE CHEN GYIS 'PHAGS PA RIN PO
CHER 'BUL CHEN GSUM MDZAD PA'I PHYI MA MA SKYES

DGRA'I RTEN SKAL GYI STON PA'I 'PHEL GDUNG, KHRUS LOD MA nI MA,
RIN SPUNGS NGAG DBANG 'JIGS GRAGS

KYI ZHAL BKOD RIGS LDAN YOL BA KHYAD 'PHAGS KYIS SNA DRANGS BOD
KHRI SKOR BCU GSUM YONGS SU RDZOGS PA PHUL,

RGYAL DBANG MCHOG GIS BSTAN DON LA RGYA LA MI BTUB PA DANG, TSUR
RGOL GYI ZHABS 'DREN MA BYUNG PHYIN GRUB

MTHA' MTHA' DAG RANG 'JAGS SU BZHAG NA RANG GZHAN TSANG MAR
SLEBS CHE TSUL CHOS RGYAL 'PHAGS PA'I RNAM THAR

DPER DRANGS NAS GSUNGS PAS RGYAL PO THUGS DAD SHIN TU 'PHEL, DE
SKABS RNYING LUGS DGON CHEN NAD MI

THEGS PA'I RIGS MA GTOGS, DMANGS MA RNAMS NI SPYI LUNG GSUNGS
PA'I GAL MDOR, LO DGU'I

BAR DU DBUS GTZANG DBU RUR 'TSOGS ZHES DANG, SNANG RTZE'I GSANG
LUNG DU, BSTAN PA DBUS GTZANG

YONGS LA BCU BAR BYED CES PA'I DON MA KHROL BAR ZHU DON BYED
MKHAN YONGS MI NYUNG BA BYUNG GSUNGS PA DGONGS

GZHI CAN DU SEMS, STON DUS GTZANG DANG KONG PO'I KAR SRID PA
TSOS BSKYAR LANGS BYAS DUS KARMA BA'I MI

SNA JA MA CHOS DBYINGS BTZON DU BZUNG BA'I GA'U'I NANG DU RGYAL
PO MCHOD YON DGRONG, RGYAL BA YAB SRAS KONG POR

GDAN 'DREN, DGE DGON RNAMS BSHIG RIN SPUNGS PA LHO STOD PA SOGS
BKAG PO TSANG 'DZUD, GTZANG

BA GZHIS KA SNE 'UR YOD PA BTON NAS KHYOD KYIS SA SKYA DANG, JO
NANG GI SBYIN BDAG BYAS TE KAR LUGS PA

'BA' ZHIG MA BYAS PA'I BSGYUR SBYANGS DANG BCAS GZHIS KA RTZE,
SHANGS RNAM GLING, BA NAM GSUM GTONG

RGYU; SDE BA SKYID SHOD PA 'DI GZHAN DU MA 'KHYAR BA 'GAB PAS
BDE CHEN TSAL STER RGYU SOGS NGAN GROS KYI YI GE THON

PAS RGYAL PO LHAG PAR THUGS KHROS TE KAR BSTAN CHAG 'JIG GI RTZA
BAR GYUR, CHU LUG LO BAR CHINGS KYI MJUG

SDOM DU BKA' KHRA GNANG BAR, NGED AO ROD MUN PA'I GLING LTA BUR
SKYES KYANG RGYAL BA YAB SRAS KYI BKA' DRIN

LAS DGE SDIG GI 'BRAS BU BZANG NGAN NGO SHES, DE'I THUGS RJE
DANG 'PHRIN LAS KYI RJES SU ZHUGS TE DGE LUGS

KYI BSTAN PA'I RGYUN DANG 'BREL BA'I ZHVA SER PA DANG MDUN MA
GCIG BYED PA YIN, SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA LA RIS

SU BCAD DE PHYOGS 'DZIN BYED BSAM PA MED KYANG MTSO SNGON DU
CHOG THUS BSTAN PA SPYI LA GNOD PA CHEN PO BYAS PA MA

BZOD PAR, NGED KYIS DMAG CHEN PO 'ONGS NAS CHOG THU BLANGS,
PHYOGS RIS MED PAR SER MO PA THAMS CAD LA

PHAN THOGS BZANG PO'I LUGS YIN, DE MTSAMS BE RIS BON PO LA
SKYABS BCOL TE SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA LA

KHYAD DU GSOD, NYES MED KYI DGON PA RNAMS LA 'PHROG BCOM, BLA MA
MGON CHE BA'I RIGS LA KHRIMS GCOD RGYA

DBUS KYI GSER ZAM GCAD PA SOGS MI 'TSAM PA MANG PO BYAS BYUNG
BAS NGED RANG SMRA KHAMS SU SONG BE RI BLANGS,

SPYIR BSTAN PA RIS MED, KHYAD PAR SA SKYA, KAR 'BRUG 'JANG SOGS
LA PHAN CHEN PO BTAGS, KARMAS

GTZOS BLA MA DGE 'DUN RNAMS LA KHRAL MED PA SOGS ZHABS TOG CI
'GRUB BYAS, SDE BA GTZANG PAS CHOS LUGS

GRUB MTHA'I GTZOS LUGS GNYIS CHAR NAS PHYOGS RIS MED PA YIN ZER
KHA BO CHEN PO BYED KYANG, DON LA RANG

GZHAN DANG GRUB MTHA'I PHYOGS LHUNG CHE BA'I KHAR, ZHVA SER BA
PHYOGS GTOGS DANG BCAS PAR GNOD CI THUB KYIS

@035 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

SDE BA SKYID SHOD PA RTZA PHUD LA BTANG 'DUG PAR, MTHUN PHYOGS
KYI GTAM GYI SGOS DON 'GRUB NA BZANG BSAM MI

SNA SNGA RTING BTANG STE NGED RANG GNYIS SEMS NANG NYE BAS LHO
THUB BYANG THUB BYED, SKYID SHOD PA LA SA CHA RNYING BA'I

THOG TU NGED KYI BLO DANG MTHUN PA STER DGOS, DE MA BYAS TSE NGA
KHYED KYI RDZONG BSAM 'GRUB RTZE'I SGOR YONG RGYU YIN

PA'I TSIG GTAM RONG BA RTA MGRIN LA BSKUR BA YIN YANG, NGED KYI
TSIG LA BDAG RKYEN MED CING KHYED KYI NGO LA

'PHAN YUL MKHAR RTZE STER ZER BAS GTZANG THOG TU YONG DGOS
BYUNG, SNGAR NAS GRUB MTHA' PHYOGS 'THEN GYI

KUN SLONG MED CING, CHOG THU DANG BE RI SOGS KYI SKYON MTHONG
BAS KYANG LHAG PAR BYED MA 'DOD, BSTAN

PA SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR KARMA PA PHYOGS GTOGS LA GNOD PA SPU TZAM
YANG MA BSKYAL, BSAM 'GRUB RTZER SKOR RGYUG

BYED RGYU'I SPRUL ZLA LNGA BA'I NANG DU RGYAL BA KARMA PAS, DA
LAM KHYED KYI 'GRO TSUL BZANG, SNYING STOBS BSKYED

NA DON 'GRUB 'ONG, SLAR DBUS GTZANG DU NGOS 'PHRAD KYI ZHIB CHA
BYED GSUNGS BKA' SHOG GNANG, DE RJES

ZUR RI BLA MA DANG, GRUB RGYAL GLING PA 'ONGS NAS BSTAN PA DANG
SEMS CAN LA BSAM PA BZANG PO BYED DGOS

RGYU YIN ZER BAR, DE 'DRA YIN TSE GTZANG BA DANG NGED KYI BAR DU
KHYED MI SNA TSOS SKOR YANG GYIS BYAS PAR,

BSKOR YANGS LA GTZANG PAS MI NYAN, PHYI RGYA TZAM MA GTOGS DON
LA KAR DGE LUGS LEGS DGOS RGYU YIN

ZER; 'O NA KAR DGE GNYIS KYI LAB RGYU THAG CHOD, LUGS LEGS KYIS
BYAS DUS, KARMA PA'I SKU ZHABS

NAS LUGS LEGS DGONGS GSUNGS PA LAS DON 'DI BGYIS GSAL KHA MED,
NGED MI SNAS THAG MI CHOD ZER DON

SKYEL MED PAR LOG SONG, DE RJES NGED DANG GTZANG BA'I BAR LA BLA
MA CHE BA PHEBS KYANG MDZAD DKA' YONG RGYU RED

BSAM; MA PHEBS PA DGA' ZHES THAMS CAD LA ZHUS, GTZANG BA BLANGS
TSAR NAS DRUNG PA RIN PO CHE PHEBS,

PHYI NANG GI PHEBS SGO GNANG BA LA 'OS 'THAD KYI ZHU LAN PHUL,
MCHOD YON LUGS LEGS YONGS 'DRA BSAM THOG

KARMA PA NGOS KYIS PHEBS, GTZANG BA 'DI NGED KYI YON BDAG MIN
KYANG, PHA MES KARMA PA'I YON BDAG

YIN PAS GZHIS KA RTZE, RGYAL RTZE, BA NAM, LHA RTZE, RNAM GLING
RNAMS SBYIN DGOS, 'DI MA BYIN

TSE NGED RANG GNYIS MCHOD YON MI YONG GSUNGS PAR, GTZANG PA MA
BLANGS GONG KHYOD KYI 'GRO TSUL BZANG GSUNGS

PA DANG, BLANGS TSAR NAS GSUNGS 'DI 'BYON PA NGED KYI SEMS LA MI
'THAD, KARMAS GTZANG PA'I GROGS

MDZAD DON NGA LA MI DGOS BYAS NAS, MCHOD YON BAR DU ZHU GNANG
MANG PO BYUNG BA DE YIN, MTHAR GTZANG

DON MI LAB PAR, KAR DGE LUGS LEGS SHING MCHOD YON NANG GTZANG
BA'I BKA' GROS DBUS SU GLENG BAR

THAG BCAD BYAS NGED RANG MCHOD YON CI MGYOGS SU YONG YANG RGYAL
BA KARMA PA LHO BRAG TU PHEBS GRUB, GRUB RGYAL

GLING PA MI SNAR BZHAG NAS KARMA PA'I LUGS SROL LA 'JIG RTEN GYI
KHUR CHOS SDE KHAG GI BLA GNYER GYIS BYED PA YIN

PAS; RGYAL POS GSUNG BKOD YOD NA BLA GNYER SDUD RGYU YIN ZER
BAR, KARMA RANG GIS NGED MCHOD YON

LA BKA' BKOD GNANG RGYU YOD GSUNGS PAS CI MYUR YONG BA YIN, BLA
GNYER BSDUS NAS NGED LA GTAM RGYU MED

BYAS; GRUB GLING BAS LHO BRAG TU SKOR YANGS GTONG ZER ZHAG BCU
GCIG BSDAD KYANG SLEBS MA BYUNG, DA

@036 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

DUNG YANG KARMA PAS GSUNG BZANG PO GNANG YONG GZHIR BZHAG GIS
MCHOD GZHIS GSAR BA KHA SHAS BSDAM, ZOG

GI RIGS MA 'THOR BA BYAS, RONG BA RTA MGRIN DANG, SGAR BA RAB
'BYAMS PA BTANG YANG MGO SKOR DON

MED KYI BKA' SHOG NYAN NYIS TZAM LAS GNANG MA NYAN, STOD SMAD
BAR GSUM DU MI BDE BA, DBUS DVAGS

GONG GI SKYA SER MANG POS SDUG BSNGAL MYONG DGOS PA SUS LAN DKON
MCHOG MKHYEN PA DE YIN, NGED KONG PA PHYIR

'KHOR LA, KARMAS SGAR BA RAB 'BYAMS PAR, BKA' SHOG DAG MA GNANG
NAS BYA BA TSABS CHEN 'DI 'DRA

YONG BA BSAM PA MED KYANG NGED KYI GRVA BA KHA SHAS KYI SNYING
LA 'DRE ZHUGS NAS DE LTAR BYAS SONG, KHYED RANG GI CI

ZER NYAN RGYU YIN PAS, KAR LUGS KYI DGON PA SNGAR PHAN SKYON MA
BYUNG BA RNAMS GNAS DGOS GSUNGS DUS,

MI SNA YONG BA 'PHYIS KYANG DGON PA YOD GRAS LA GSAR 'TSE MI
GTONG, KARMA PA RANG TSUR NAM PHEBS DUS GROS

BYED ZHUS YANG RGYAL POS GANG GSUNG BYED PA'I THAG DRUNG BA RIN
PO CHES CHOD PAS PHEBS RGYU YIN GSUNGS PAR BLO

BKAL RUNG, RNAM GLING SKYA SER RNAMS KYIS DRUNG BA LA MI NYAN
ZER BA DANG, GONG DMAG SLONG LUGS BCAS

YID MI CHES PAS, 7 RGYAL BA YAB SRAS STAG LUNG ZHABS DRUNG SOGS
DBANG BZHUGS MDZAD RTZIS KYIS KARMA'I

SKU ZHABS SU MI SNA BTANG, DRUNG BA PHEBS DGOS ZHUS KYANG PHEBS
MA NYAN, SGAR GZHUNG DANG CHOS SDE BSKYAR

LANGS DNGOS GTAD BYAS PA RNAMS LA BYED LUGS DANG BSTUN PA LAS
LAM DON SKYEL GYI 'JOG SO BYED MA SHES,

BSKYAR LANGS DNGOS SU MA BYAS PA'I KHUL RNAMS KYANG, 'GROS GCIG
GI DMAG GRAB MI SNA BANG PHYIN GYI 'GRUL

RGYAB YONGS SU GRAGS, KAR LUGS KYIS NGED MCHOD YON THOG TU 'GEL
RGYU'I SA GCAD LA BSAM NA 'JOG MTSAMS

CI LA THUB, DE LAN CI THUB BYED PA 'JIG RTEN PA'I LUGS YIN YANG
CHE GRAGS 'DOD NAS RGYU 'BRAS KHYAD GSOD

MDZAD MI RNAMS LA MA BLTAS PAR THUB BSTAN SPYI, KARMA GONG MA'I
BSTAN RGYUN, STAG LUNG SA SKYA RTZE GDONG

SOGS NAS BSAM PA BZANG PO GYIS GSUNGS PA DANG, DRUNG BAS GTZO
MDZAD DGON KHAG DMIGS BSAL SO SO

NAS RANG GZHAN GYI PHAN BDE THUGS LA DGONGS PA'I DGE LEGS MCHOD
YON PHYOGS GTOGS DANG BCAS PAR

LUGS GNYIS CHAR NAS GNOD 'GAL DU 'GRO BA MI MDZAD CING, CHOS
MTHUN BZHUGS MKHYEN MDZAD PA'I RTZIS

KHA DAM BZHAG STAG LUNG ZHABS DRUNG NAS 'GAN BZHES GRUB PA DANG,
KHYAD PAR 7 RGYAL BA YAB SRAS KYI DGONGS

PA DANG BSTUN PA'I CHOD DON GYIS 'THUGS KHA BYAS TSUL, PHYIN
CHAD DGON DANG SA RIS KYI BCAD MTSAMS SOGS

ZHIB LA RGYAS PA BSTZAL SNANG, DE NAS BZUNG DUS BDE ZHING, BOD
LA MGO CHINGS YOD PAS GZHAN PHYOGS PA

RNAMS KYANG RANG BABS SU GNAS PA BYUNG, 'JANG DANG RGYA GAR BAL
BO TSUN GYI RGYAL PO RNAMS KYIS GUS 'DUD

DANG SKYES PHUL, GONG MA BDAG PO CHEN POS KYANG LUNG LAS KYIS
GZENGS BSTOD PAS CHOS SRID GANG GI NGOS NAS

GNAM SA'I DBANG PHYUG CES PA DON GNAS KYI BSNGAGS BRJOD YIN, DON
GSUM PA SHING RTA LA GSHEGS,

RATNA SPYI LUNG SOGS SU RGYAL PO 'DI PHYAG NA RDO RJE'I SPRUL
BAR LUNG BSTAN CING, KHYAD PAR DU 'JAM DPAL RTZA

RGYUD LAS, YI GE HA MING SLAR LO GNAS, ,KLA KLO'I RGYAL POS RAB
TU MCHOD, ,YI GE HA BYA DGE DANG,

@037 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

LDAN; ;DGE BA'I DON GYIS LUS KYIS NI, ,JI LTAR 'DOD PA'I 'GROS
DAG GIS, ,RANG GIS YUL

NI NYID DU PHYIN, ,DE NYID KYI NI LAS BYAS PAS, ,RGYAL SRID DGA'
DANG LDAN PA THOB, ,CES KLA KLO STE

SOG RGYAL, KE KE HAN NI, KO SHRI HAN GYI MTSAN SGRA, GANG DU
PHEBS KYANG PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL PA'I

'PHRIN LAS KYIS DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG PA'I CHAB SRID 'BYUNG BAR
GSUNGS LA, RGYAL RGYUD RNAMS KYANG CHAB SRID

YAR LDAN GYI RTEN 'BREL MA 'CHUG PA'I RING LA ZHVA SER GYI SBYIN
BDAG THUN MONG MA YIN PAR GYUR BA YIN NO, ,

RGYAL PO'I BTZUN MO CHE BA THOR GOD ZA LA SRAS BZHI, 'BRING PO
HO THOB ZA LA SRAS LNGA, BOD ZA AER KHE HA THON

LA GCIG STE BCU YOD PA'I DANG PO TZIG SHE THU HAN H'A YAN RGYAL
PO LCAGS BYI LOR RGYAL SAR BZHUGS, DON

GSUM PA SA SPREL LA GSHEGS PAR GSUNGS PAS DGUNG SNYING ME SPREL
DANG, DE YANG YAB DGUNG LO BCO LNGA PA LA

'KHRUNGS PAR SNANG, DE LA SRAS RATNA T'A LE HAN, MERGAN NO YON,
BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS BE LE,

DGE 'DUN MERGAN NO YON, BSOD NAMS MGON PO, BSOD NAMS BKRA SHIS
DRUG SRAS CHE BA D'A LE

HAN LCAGS PHAG LA KHRIR BZHUGS, DE'I SRAS CHE BA BSTAN 'DZIN
DBANG RGYAL LA SRAS MED, SRAS CHUNG BA LHA

BZANG KLU DPAL CHU LUG LOR RGYAL SAR 'KHOD KYANG SDE SRID SANGS
RGYAS RGYA MTSO DANG GZHUNG MA LEGS PAS SDE SRID

KYIS LHA BZANG 'DZIN RGYU BYAS KYANG SE 'BRAS KYI BLA MA RNAMS
KYIS BSHOL TE SHING BYA LO RGYAL PO MTSO KHAR PHEBS,

NAG CHUR SLEBS NAS DMAG DANG BCAS SLAR LOG BLA MA RNAMS KYIS
RGYAL PO DANG SDE BA'I BAR CHINGS BYAS,

SDE SRID GONG DKAR RDZONG LA BZHUGS, GZHUNG RGYAL PO LA SPRAD,
ME PHAG LA PAD DKAR 'DZIN PA NGAG DBANG

YE SHES RGYA MTSO PO TA LAR KHRI 'DON MDZAD, LO BCU GNYIS KYI
BAR DU RGYAL SRID BSKYANGS, SRID SKYONG GI BYA

BA LA MKHAS PAR MA ZAD CHOS PHYOGS LA MKHYEN PA YANGS PAS RGYAL
PO DANG SDE SRID GNYIS LONGS SKU NGES PA LNGA LDAN

YIN MIN BRTZAD DE, RGYAL PAS RJE RIN PO CHE LONGS SKU NGES PA
LNGA LDAN MI BZHED ZER, SDE BAS BZHED CES

THAG MA CHOD PA KUN MKHYEN GONG MAR ZHUS PAS GSER 'PHRENG TSIG
ZIN LA MI GSAL KYANG DON LA BZHED CES

GSUNGS PAS SDE SRID CHEN MO YANG THUGS MNYES PA DANG, SE RA BA
BLO BZANG NOR BU LA 'PHROS PA MDZAD PAR

DON GYI 'OD GSAL SKABS SU SGYU LUS MED KYANG SGYU'I LUS KYI
SNANG BA YOD BYAS PAS RGYAL POS PHYAG BRDAB NAS BZHAD

PAR 'OL KHA'I RANG RNAM LAS BYUNG, ME BYA LOR MNGA' RIS RDZONG
DPON KHANG CHEN NAS KYIS YER KHEN PA GCIG

NAS GCIG BRGYUD LA, CUNG GAR GYI DMAG STONG PHRAG DRUG LAM DU
CHAS ZER BA DGRA GNYEN GANG YIN SHES DKA'

NAS SA MTSAMS BSRUNG DGOS TSUL ZHUS KYANG RIM 'GYANGS KYI MUR
CUNG GAR DMAG GI LAM GSAR BA BTOD DE,

RGYAL PO'I SRAS BTZUN MO BCAS PHYIR SKYEL MKHAN YIN PA'I MGO
SKOR GYIS ZLA BA BRGYAD PA'I NANG DU THANG LHA'I ZHOL

RI BO KHU 'DUS SU DMAG SGAR BTAB, RGYAL POS DMAG BSDU GSOG DANG,
GNAS CHUNG LA LUNG BSTAN ZHUS PAR,

SHA ZAN RGYAL PO'I BU BYANG PHYOGS SU BSKYOD DUS 'DRE LA DRI BA
MED PAS BLANG DOR LUNG STON PA DKA' YANG DPUNG

BSKYED TSA NAN DGOS GSUNGS, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE SOGS BLA CHEN
MANG PO PHEBS KYANG CHINGS MA DAN PAR BCU

@038 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

PA'I ZLA MJUG CUNG GAR DMAG GRONG SMAD DU BAB, PHO LHA THA'I JI
SOGS KYIS RGYAL PO LA MTSO SNGON DU BROS NA ZHUS

PA'I ZLA MJUG CUNG GAR DMAG GRONG SMAD DU BAB, PHO LHA THA'I JI
SOGS KYIS RGYAL PO LA MTSO SNGON DU BROS NA ZHUS

PAR BLO CHUNG MA BYED, NGA PHA MES BZANG PO'I RGYUD DU BYUNG BAS
GZHUNG BSTAN LA RGYA DGRA LA SPRAD NAS, RANG

SROG GCES 'DZIN GYIS BROS NA GTAM DON LA MI BTUB, LAS DBANG
BZLOG TU MED TSE SRIN PO MGRIN BCU SPRIN

GYI GSEB TU ZHUGS KYANG RA MA nAS MDA' BRGYAB STE BKUM 'DUG LAS
ZHUGS MA RDZOGS NA SKYON MI YONG, GANG

LTAR BSTAN DON LA 'CHI RGYU BYUNG NA SKAL BA BZANG ZHES SNYING
STOBS MTSON PA'I GSUNG GNANG, CUNG GAR DPUNG

GI MGO PA CHOS 'PHEL JE SANG DANG, GDUGS DKAR RJE SANG GNYIS MI
TSE GA-YUL LA GOMS PA'I GA-YO DANG,

BOD DMAG NANG LOD PAS TSES NYIR DGU'I NYIN RGYAL PO PO TA LAR
'BROS DGOS BYUNG, MGO ZLA'I TSES GCIG

NYIN RGYAL POS SUR TSA LA, NGA MI GCIG GI DON DU MI MANG PO SDUG
LA BKOL BAS CI BYA, PHYIR THON TE SROG

'DOR BA'I BAR LA KHYOD RANG BYANG LAM DU AE CHUD LTOS ZHES RTA
LA CHIBS PA 'KHOR MANG POS BZLOG KYANG MA NYAN PAR

SOG PO BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL ZHABS PHYIR KHRID, CHAB SGO SHAR MA
NAS THON TE KLU SBUG LJONGS SU PHEBS, CUNG

GAR DMAG MI 'GA' RJES BSNYEGS BYUNG BA RJE BLON GNYIS POS PHAM
PAR BYAS KYANG MTSON CHA ZAD PAS MTHAR DRAN

LAM DU GYUR, DE LA SRAS DGA' LDAN BSTAN 'DZIN, SUR TSA, RNAM
RGYAL TSE BRTAN GSUM LAS, DANG

PO LA CUNG DKAR RGYAL PO TSE DBANG RAB BRTAN GYI SRAS MI KHAB TU
BSU RGYU BYAS, CUNG GAR GYIS RIN DNGUL SRANG

'BUM PHRAG DANG, SRAS CUNG GAR DU PHEBS DGOS BYAS, RGYAL PO
THUGS MA CHES PAR RE ZHIG 'THEN KYANG SRAS

KYIS 'GROR MA BCUG NA LAG NYES BYED RGYU'I SBYOR BA BRTZAMS PAS
LA MO CHOS SKYONG LA LUNG BSTAN ZHUS PAR, RDZING

YUR BA RTZA YIS GZUNG BA LA, ,PHYI CHU TSAGS MKHAS PAS DAM DU
CINGS, ,SNYING RJE BA'I GNAS LUGS BLO

LDAN LA, SO CHU GNYER GCIG RJES GCIG GIS NON, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA
DPYAD MA ZHOG PAR SLAR ZHUS DUS,

NAN GYIS MA LDOG DNGOS PO'I GSHIS LA THONGS, ,NAR GYIS BSKYANGS
NA RNAM RTOGS MA LUS RTOGS, ,

GSUNGS PA YAB SRAS GNYIS KAS 'THEN PHYOGS SO SOR MDZAD KYANG
SRAS KYI 'DOD PA DANG BSTUN CUNG GAR DU BTANG

BA'I SRAS DPAL 'BYOR ZER, SRAS CHE BA CUNG GAR DU BTANG BA LA
RGYAS DOGS PA SE CHED SUR TSA MTSO KHAR

BTANG; BTZUN MO BLANGS TE PHYIR 'DAM DU 'BYOR BA'I DGA' STON GYI
SKABS CUNG GAR BSLEBS TE LHA SAR

BKRONGS; 'DI DPON MKHA' 'GRO'I SKYES PAR GRAGS, SUR TSA'I SRAS
GRAGS PA DANG NAG TSA GNYIS,

` T'A YAN SRAS GNYIS PA MERGAN NO YON GYI SRAS AERTI NI CHING
THA'I JI TSE BRTAN DANG, CHOS KHUR THA'I RJI GNYIS,

DANG PO'I SRAS BKRA SHIS DON GRUB, DE'I SRAS BKRA SHIS DPAL
'BYOR, GNYIS PA'I SRAS DGA' LDAN BKRA

SHIS KUN, DE LA SRAS RGYAL MTSAN DON GRUB, BSTAN 'DZIN RNAM
RGYAL GUNG, GUNG BSOD NAMS DPAL BSOD NAMS DPAL 

RGYAS; ` BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS BE LI'I SRAS BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS
DANG, BO SHOG THU RAB BRTAN DBANG PO

GNYIS LA SRAS MED, ` DGE 'DUN MERGAN NO YON GYI SRAS TSE RING
GUNG DANG DPAL 'BYOR GNYIS, DANG PO LA

GUNG TSE RING RAB BRTAN DANG DKON MCHOG SKYABS KUN GNYIS, 'DI'I
SRAS CHOS SKYABS GUNG DANG DGA' LDAN

@039 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

GNYIS; DPAL 'BYOR SRAS BLA MA KUN BZANG, HUL TSAN, DAM PA RGYA
MTSO, BSTAN 'PHEL BZHI,

` BSOD NAMS MGON PO'I SRAS TSE RING GUNG DANG CHOS BZANG RGYA
MTSO GNYIS, DANG PO'I SRAS BKRA SHIS RDO RJE,

BKRA SHIS SKYABS GUNG, YI DAM THAR, CHOS BZANG RGYA MTSO'I SRAS
BAN DE, ` ,BSOD NAMS BKRA SHIS

KYI SRAS LHUN GRUB DANG GNAM GANG GNYIS LA SRAS MED, 'BRING BO
NOR BU PHUN TSOGS BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BYOR,

` SRAS GNYIS PA AA TZA RA HUNG THA'I JI LA SRAS CO RIG THU D'A'I
CHING DANG MERGAN HUNG THA'I JI GNYIS, DANG PO LA

` SRAS BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS, DE'I BU 'JIGS BYED SKYABS JA SAG
DE'I BU TSE RING RDO RJE JA SAG ` ,MERGAN HUNG

THA'I JI LA SRAS LNGA LAS DANG PO AE RTI NI HUNG THA'I JI RIN
CHEN RNAM RGYAL GYI SRAS CHE BA CING HUNG THA'I JI 'BYOR BRTAN

LA SRAS MED, CHUNG BA BLO BZANG TSE DBANG GUNG GI BU LHA RJE JA
SAG DGE LEGS STOBS RGYAS, RGYAL MTSAN

GRAGS PA, TSE RING BSOD NAMS BZHI, LHA RJE'I BU KUN BZANG JA SAG
GNYIS PA RIN CHEN BKRA SHIS

LA SRAS PAD MA TSE BRTAN, RAB BRTAN, RTA MGRIN TSE BRTAN, BSTAN
'DZIN, BO BO THA'I JI LNGA,

CHE BA'I BU YE SHES BZANG PO, DBANG RGYAL JA SAG GNYIS, YE SHES
BU MGON PO, RAB BRTAN LA SRAS

MED; RTA MGRIN TSE BRTAN BU SHES RAB NYI MA, GSUM PA DAR RGYAS
LA SRAS MED, BZHI PA Y KHE RAB

BRTAN LA MGON PO RAB BRTAN JA SAG MGON PO RAB RGYAS GNYIS KYI
CHE BA'I BU MAN JI, LNGA BA BLA MA 'PHRIN

LAS; ` SRAS GSUM PA AA YU SHI T'A LE AU BA SHI'I SRAS SNGA MA
MERGAN HUNG THA'I JI, AER KHE THA'I JI, DU

RAL THA'I JI, BA THU JU NANG HO RO LI, HA SHA HA, BODHI DPON PO
LOD, DPON PO BCAS BRGYAD

LAS AER KHE THA'I JI, DU RAL THA'I JI, DPON PO LOD GSUM LA SRAS
MED, DANG PO MERGAN HUNG THA'I

JI'I BU SHA RA YI GU LA, SHA RA B'A THUR, BLO BZANG GSUM, YI GUL
GYI BU DGE 'DUN NO YON, GOL

GO BKRA SHIS GSUM, DGE 'DUN BU RGYAL MTSAN THA'I JI, DE'I BU THO
YON CHOS 'BYOR, GOL

GO'I BU MA MO, DE'I BU AO BA SHI BKRA SHIS BU YI DAM, THU SA LAG
CHI, DE'I BU TSE MGON, BSOD

NAMS RDO RJE, NYI MA THO YON, BLO BZANG BU NO YON BKA' BCU, 7 BA
THU JU NANG GI SRAS BA THU,

YUM CHUNG, AA'U WANG, 'CHI MED, 'BUM JU NANG, BSTAN 'DZIN DRUG
BA THU'I BU KUN

DGA' RAB BRTAN DANG, YUM CHUNG BU SHA BI RDO RJE BE SI GNYIS LA
SRAS MED, AA'U WANG GI SRAS MGON PO AA GI

DANG BLO BZANG RDO RJE CHIN WANG GNYIS KYI DANG PO LA SRAS MED,
PHYI MA'I SRAS KUN AE PHU DBANG CHEN DPAL 'BAR,

MA H'A BA LA, AA G'A DBANG CHEN TSE RING, GA-YUNG DRUNG TSE
BRTAN, BAN BYUNG LNGA, 'CHI MED BU DKON

MCHOG GUNG, AU BA SHI BLA MA BKRA SHIS, SHA RA HAN BZHI'I PHYI
MA GSUM LA SRAS MED, DANG PO'I

BU DVAGS PO ZHABS DRUNG, RDO RJE TSE BRTAN GUNG, BAN DE, 'BUM JU
NANG LA SRAS MED, BSTAN

'DZIN BU BSOD NAMS RDO RJE GUNG, DE'I BU AOR THUN SU THU GUNG, 7
HA SHA HA'I BU RIN CHEN, BLO

BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN, AE RTI NI GSUM, BLO BZANG BU BSOD NAMS BKRA
SHIS, BADZRA GNYIS, DANG

@040 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

PO'I BU DON GRUB, MGON PO, MKHAS GRUB THU SA LAG CHI, BU BE
BZHI, MKHAS GRUB BU 'JIGS BYED

THU SA LAG CHI, BADZRA BU DAR RGYAS NO MON HAN, 7 BO DHI'I SRAS
PAD MA TSE DBANG, 7 DPON PO'I

BU B'A RANG THA'I JI 'DI GNYIS LA SRAS MED, 7 YANG T'A LE AAB
SHI'I SRAS PHYI MA BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL, NOR

BU RGYA MTSO, AI THI GEL, THO YON, AI NANTA, BOD PA, CA BA, RDO
RJE SKYABS BRGYAD LAS

PHYI MA 'DI LA SRAS MED, DANG PO BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GYI BU DON
GRUB MERGAN NO YON, DE'I BU DGE TSUL

THA'I JI, TSE DBANG RDO RJE, BSOD NAMS RDO RJE, BLO BZANG NYI
MA, 7 NOR BU RGYA MTSO'I BU RAB RGYAS

LA SRAS MED, AI THI GEL GYI BU GSUM LAS TSE RING THAR GYI SRAS
MGON PO, TSE DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI BU

GRAGS PA, TSE RING 'BUM GYI BU MA NA SA, AI NANTA'I BU PAD MA
BKRA SHIS, AU BA SHI 'DI GNYIS LA SRAS

MED; 7 BOD PA'I BU HON CHIBS, AA PO GNYIS, 'DI'I BU TSE GZUNGS,
CAB GYI BU D'A KHI,

DKON MCHOG MAN JI, BO BO BZHI, DANG PO'I BU SANGS RGYAS DANG
BSOD NAMS TSE RING GNYIS,

MAN JI'I BU RDO RJE 'BUM, BO BO'I BU MGON PO TSE RING, ` SRAS
BZHI PA D'A LEN THE'I SRAS AA CHI B'A THUR MGON

PO; DE'I BU AERTI NI AER KHE THOG THON WANG, PHUN TSOGS, NGAG
DBANG GRAGS PA GSUM, DANG PO'I

BU AU BA SHI RAB RGYAS, BSOD NAMS BKRA SHIS, BSOD NAMS BSTAN
'DZIN WANG, TSE RING RDO

RJE LNGA LAS AU BA SHI LA SRAS MED, RAB RGYAS BU RDO RJE GUNG,
LHA MGON, THO YON GSUM, BSOD 'DZIN BE SI GSUM, DANG PO'

NAMS BKRA SHIS BU KUN DGA' TSE RING, BSOD NAMS BSTAN 'DZIN BU
DKON MCHOG SKYABS, DE'I BU DON

GRUB RNAM RGYAL WANG, TSE RING RDO RJE'I BU KUN DGA' JA SAG 7
PHUN TSOGS LA SRAS MED, NGAG DBANG

GRAGS PA'I BU RDO RJE TSE RING, ` SRAS LNGA BA TSE RING AEL DU
CHI'I SRAS MKHA' 'GRO LA SRAS MED, DAR RGYAL BO SHOG

THU'I SRAS DPAL 'BAR, BSTAN 'DZIN TSE BRTAN, D'A'I CHING HO SHO
CHI, KHEN THAR BZHI, DPAL

'BAR SRAS AER KHE TA'I CHING, DON GRUB, AA CHI THU NO MON HAN, 7
BSTAN 'DZIN TSE BRTAN BU LHA SKYABS,

DE'I BU TSE DBANG RAB BRTAN, DBANG PHYUG RAB BRTAN, CHIN WANG
BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG PHYUG GSUM, DBANG

PHYUG RAB BRTAN SRAS NGAG DBANG DAR RGYAS, PHYI MA'I SRAS DBANG
LDAN RDO RJE PHA LAM, 7 D'A'I CHING HO SHO

CHI'I SRAS DON GRUB DBANG RGYAL, 7 KHEN THAR BU BSTAN SKYONG, `
SRAS DRUG PA RDO RJE T'A LA'I HUNG THA'I JI'I SRAS

BE RO TZA NA, DGA' LDAN TSE DBANG, D'A LA'I D'A'I CHING, D'A YAN
MERGAN D'A'I CHING BZHI, DANG PO'I

BU AERTI NI THA'I JI TSE DBANG SKYABS, AA PU JI CHI CHEN THA'I
JI GNYIS LAS PHYI MA 'DI DANG DGA' LDAN TSE DBANG

GNYIS LA SRAS MED, D'A LA'I TA'I CHING GI BU 'JAM DPAL AERTI NI
THA'I JI, AER KHE THA'I JI DPAL RDOR GNYIS,

'DI'I BU PHUN TSOGS DBANG RGYAL WANG, YE SHES SGROL SKYABS, RDO
RJE RNAM RGYAL GSUM, DANG PO'I BU

DKON MCHOG BKRA SHIS WANG, DAM CHOS, DGA' LDAN RAB BRTAN WANG
GSUM, PHYI MA'I BU T'A LE HU

THOG THU, SGROL SKYABS BU DAR RGYAS TSE RING JA SAG 7 ,MERGAN
D'A'I CHING BU T'A YAN HUNG THA'I JI,

@041 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,) 

7SRAS BDUN PA HU RIM SHI AE RTI NI TA'I CHING GI BU THAR PA,
DBANG CHEN, PHUN TSOGS, LHA 'BUM, BING

THU JI BSOD NAMS DAR RGYAS, SENG+GE HA THAN B'A THUR DRUG
THARPA'I BU NGAG DBANG CHOS DPAL, DE'I

BU TSE RING DON GRUB, DBANG CHEN BU CHOS GRAGS NOM CHI THA'I JI,
DPAL 'BAR GNYIS, LHA 'BUM BU

BSTAN 'DZIN RAB BRTAN, DE'I BU BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS, BSOD NAMS
DAR RGYAS BU BSTAN 'DZIN BO

SHOG THU, TSE DBANG BKRA SHIS, BSTAN 'DZIN BE SI GSUM, DANG PO'I
BU TSE RING RDO RJE, PHYI MA'I

BU PHYAG RDOR SKYABS BE SI, 7 SENG GE B'A THUR SRAS BKRA SHIS
DON 'GRUB, ` SRAS BRGYAD PA MGON PO TSE DBANG

LA BU MED, ` SRAS DGU PAS SANG+GHA RGYAL GYI SRAS, THA B'I BO
LOD HO SHO CHI'I BU T'A'I BUD DON GRUB BKRA SHIS,

BSOD NAMS BKRA SHIS BE SI GNYIS, 'DI'I BU DGA' LDAN DON GRUB,
DGA' LDAN DBANG RGYAL, MANG

NE BI GSUM, 'DI'I BU BLO BZANG TSE BRTAN BE SI DANG, YI DAM
SKYABS GNYIS, ` SRAS BCU PA AA

KHU BKRA SHIS B'A THUR GYI SRAS THANG LHA SKYABS, BLO BZANG
BSTAN 'DZIN, 'DI'I BU B'A B'A RAD, TSE

GVAN AE BU GEN ZHES BSHAD SNANG, SA STAG SOGS NAS RIM PAR KU
SHRI'I CUNG GAR GYI RU SDE RNAM MTSO KHAR 'BYOR,

THOG MAR MTSO SNGON THOD LE ZHES PAR GZHI BZUNG BAS, A'O LOD PA
RON GVAR ZHES GRAGS, LNGA BA CHEN POS

KYANG RGYA BOD HOR GSUM 'DU BA'I SA GNAD YIN PA DANG, PHAG MO
GRU PA'I DUS DANG, GTZANG DUS SOGS

DANG MI 'DRA BAR, DENG SANG ZHVA SER 'CHANG BA'I BSTAN PA 'DI
BYANG PHYOGS KYI SBYIN BDAG RNAMS DANG KHAD NYE

BAR MTSO SNGON PHYOGS KYI DUS BDE DOGS LA RAG LAS GSUNGS TE D'A
YAN RGYAL PO SKU MCHED RNAMS LA GSHIN GYI RJES

GNANG SGO NAS DAM TSIG SBREL, AO ROD KYI RGYAL RGYUD 'DIS SRONG
BTZAN GYI GDAN SAR DBANG BSGYUR BA DANG,

HAL HA JING GIR GYI GDAN SA YIN GSUNGS TE BKUR GZOS SHIN TU CHE
BA GNANG, RGYA SOG GI SA MTSAMS PHYE,

RKUN JAG BSDOMS, TSONG LAM BTOD, SA MTSAMS SU STOD MKHAS BYED
RGYU SOGS KYI GSUNG BKOD DANG,

NANG 'KHRUGS BYUNG BAR SGO MANG DPON SLOB 'PHRIN LAS LHUN GRUB
MTSO KHAR MNGAGS, 'JU LAG STOD KYI SHUG

SHA BAD SDONG GI CHU'I 'DUS MDO STAG SNA DGON DANG NYE BAR DPON
PO THAMS CAD BSDUS TE MTSER SA BGOS,

GA-YAS RU DANG GA-YON RU PHYE STE BDE 'JAGS MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU
GNYIS PA'I ME GLANG LOR, LCANG SKYA NGAG

DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN RGYAL DBANG LA GSER YI 'BUL DU PHEBS
DUS, GONG MA KHANG ZHI NYUL GYI TSUL DU

NYING SHA MKHAR DU PHEBS PA DANG, MJAL TE GSUNG 'PHROS NANG LUGS
GNANG BA BZHIN DPON PO RNAMS LA GONG MA'I

MJAL KHAR 'GRO DGOS KYI GSUNG PHEBS, DPON KHAG RNAMS KYIS DBANG
DU BLANGS TE RGYAL POR 'TSAMS ZHUS PHUL

BAR KU SHRI'I SRAS GZHON PA BKRA SHIS B'A THUR LA CHING WANG GI
THOB DANG, GZHAN RNAMS LA JUN WANG SOGS 'OS

'TSAM DANG GNANG SBYIN RGYA CHER MDZAD PAS RGYA SOG LA RGYA GCIG
PA'I 'BREL BA LU GU RGYUD DU SBREL, BKRA SHIS B'A THUR

KU SHRI'I GA-YOG MO ZHIG GI SRAS YIN LA, RGYAL DBANG GIS MTSO
SNGON DPON KHAG RNAMS LA 'DI KU SHRI RANG GI SRAS

NGO MA KHYED TSO'I AA KHU YIN PAS SPYI DPON DU BSKOS GSUNGS,
RGYA BOD HOR SOG GI LO RGYUS LAS, LNGA BA CHEN@042 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

POS BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BTZUN MO BZHI BA DANG, SRAS
BKRA SHIS ZHES GSUNG 'DUG LA GSUNGS PA'ANG

'DI NYID YIN 'DRA, SHING RTA LOR BKRA SHIS B'A THUR WANG GSHEGS,
'DI DUS KUN MKHYEN GONG MAS, AA KHU

GSHEGS SONG BA DE LTAS NGAN GYI DANG PO YIN, RE ZHIG BSDAD NA
MTSO KHA BA TSO LA BZANG YANG DA 'PHRO 'DI NAS

BDE SKYID CI 'DRA YONG MI SHES GSUNGS, DE'I SRAS BSTAN 'DZIN
WANG GIS MTSO SNGON KHRI PA BYAS, AA KHU'I

ZHAL CHEMS BZHIN GA-YAS RU'I DPON JU NANG GIS SROG BZUNG, DPON
PO THAMS CAD 'DUN PA GCIG DRIL

GYIS RGYAL MCHOG SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO SKU 'BUM DU GDAN DRANGS,
BOD DU PHEBS RGYU DANG, LNGA PA CHEN PO'I

DUS LTAR 'JA' SA GNANG RGYU SOGS MTSO SNGON SPYI NAS GONG MA
CHEN POR ZHUS, 7GONG NAS KYANG RIGS SRAS BCU

BDUN PA TZANG JUN WANG SOGS BKAS MNGAGS TE RGYA SOG GNYIS PO T'A
LA'I BLA MA'I ZHABS 'DEGS DANG ZHVA SER GYI

BSTAN PA, GONG MA'I CHAB SRID LA RGYA BCAS LA BLO SEMS GCIG DGOS
KYI BKA' GNANG, LCAGS BYI LOR RGYAL

BA PO TA LAR GDAN 'DREN DU THU'U BAKVAN SKU GONG MA CHOS RGYA
MTSO, GSER KHOG PA T'A BLA MA BKA' 'GYUR BA BLO

BZANG 'PHRIN LAS, GONG NAS MNGAGS PA'I LHO BYANG GI TZANG JUN
GNYIS, BLON CHEN AA TA HA TA, KHO SHAS

AE TZIN SOGS DANG, MTSO SNGON BSTAN 'DZIN CHING WANG, DGA' LDAN
AE RTI NI JU NANG, AE RTI NI AER

KHE; AE RTI NI T'A LE BO SHOG THU, MERGAN D'A'I CHING, CHING
HONG THA'I JI, 'JIGS BYED SKYABS,

DGE LEGS JU NANG, DGA' LDAN BKRA SHIS, TA'I BUNG THI'I JI, AA
LAG SHA NAS AE PHU BE LI, HAL

HA NAS DON GRUB WANG, GUNG TSE DBANG NOR BU, THA'I JI LHA DBANG
RGYA MTSO SOGS RGYA BOD HOR GSUM GYI

CHE RGU DU MA GNAM SA GA-YO BA TZAM PHEBS PAS SNYAN PA'I BA DAN
'JIG RTEN GSUM DU GRAGS PAR BYAS, 'ON KYANG

KHRI 'DON STON MO'I DUS RGYA DPON RNAMS DBUS GRAL MTSO SNGON PA
RNAMS RGYAB BRAL DU BSNYEN BKUR CHUNG BA DANG,

SDE BA STAG RTZE PA'I SROG BSLANGS PAS NGO CHEN MA BYUNG BA
DANG, SNGON GYI SROL BZHIN BOD RGYAL DU AE BSKO LA KHANG

CHEN NAS SDE SRID DU BSKOS PA SOGS RKYEN DU MA LA BSNYAD RGYA LA
DUS ZING SLONG BAR BYAS TE MNA' BCAD, DBUS

PA PHYIR 'KHOR LA BSTAN 'DZIN WANG GIS MGO BSDUS ZI LING PHYOGS
KYI RGYA GRONG MANG PO BCOM, SAN YANG JING

GI MKHAR GTOR, DGON PA 'GA' RES KYANG SOG PO'I SHED BZUNG NAS
RGYA LA RTZIS MED MANG PO BYAS, PHAN

TSUN DMAG RGYAG RES, RGYA KHROD KYI RKUN MA BZUNG NAS SNGAR MA
GRAGS PA'I KHRIMS GCOD SOGS SNANG BA GANG DRAN

BYAS PAS RGYA'I DMAG DPON YO'I JANG JUN DANG, NYAN GUNG YE GNYIS
KYIS SNA DRANGS RGYA DMAG DBYAR GYI SHVA

'OD RDOL BA BZHIN BYUNG BAS BSTAN 'DZIN WANG CUNG GAR DU BROS,
SHING 'BRUG LOR GONG GI BKAS, AA

LAG SHA BA YONGS RDZOGS MTSO SNGON DU BAB, LO NGO DGU BA LA SLAR
SPOS, GONG NAS GZIGS BSKYANG GIS

SLAR YANG MTSO SNGON DU DPON KHAG RNAMS LA THOB PA DANG BDAG
RKYEN SNGAR LUGS LTAR GNANG, LA MO'I LUNG

BSTAN CHEN MOR, BYANG GI MTSO SNGON RVA DZA'I PHO BRANG RNAMS,
,SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI BKA' LA NYAN NA

DGA'; ;ZHES GSUNGS PAS CHOS SRID GANG LA YANG YAR LDAN DU 'GRO
BA'I RTEN 'BREL MA 'PHYUG PA DGOS

@043 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

SNANG; ;YANG SOG PO'I YIG TSANG LAS, BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS KYI RGYAL
PO LA BTZUN MO CHE CHUNG GNYIS BSUS

PA'I CHE BA'I SRAS TSE RING AEL TI CHI, RDO RJE T'A LA'I HUNG
THA'I JI, HO RIM SHI AERTI NI TA'I CHING,

SANG GAR TSA, MGON PO TSE DBANG, BKRA SHIS PA THUR THA'I JI DRUG
CHUNG BA'I SRAS TZIG SHE THU

BSTAN 'DZIN D'A YAN RGYAL PO, AA TZAR TSA TSE CHEN HONG THA'I
JI, AA YU SHE BA YAN AA BA KE DA

LAN TH'E BCAS YOD PA'I TSE RING AEL TI CHI'I RGYUD MTSO GA-YAS
RU YIN PAS 'OG TU 'CHAD LA, SRAS DRUG PA YAN

GYI RGYUD PA MTSO GA-YAS RU YIN ZER BA ZHIG KYANG MTHONG, ` CHOS
RGYAL SRAS GNYIS PA RDO RJE T'A LE HUNG THA'I JI'I

SRAS; B'A THUR HONG THA'I JI, T'A LE T'A CHING HONG THA'I JI,
B'E RO TZA NA, DGA' LDAN D'A'I CHING BZHI,

B'A THUR HUNG THA'I JI'I SRAS AER KHE NO YON, BSTAN 'DZIN HUNG
THA'I JI, SKAL LDAN BKRA SHIS, SKAL

LDAN BSTAN 'DZIN BZHI, DANG PO DANG GSUM PAR SRAS MED, GNYIS
PA'I SRAS BSTAN 'DZIN RNAM RGYAL LA

SRAS MED, BZHI BA SKAL LDAN D'A'I CHING GI SRAS BE LI BKRA SHIS
TSE RING, DE'I SRAS BE LI BSTAN PA TSE RING,

DE'I SRAS BE LI 'JIGS MED YE SHES, LHA MGON NAM DPAL LDAN AA BE,
BLA MA T'A LE SHI RE THU'AM 'JIGS

MED KUN DGA' GSUM, DANG PO'I SRAS BE LI 'JAM DPAL DAR RGYAS,
DE'I SRAS BE LI NAM MKHA' DBANG

RGYAL; BE LI BLO BZANG SBYIN PA GSUM, DANG PO'I SRAS BE LI TSE
RING NOR BU LO BDUN PA LA 'DAS PAS

AA KHU BLO BZANG SBYIN PA LA BE LI BYUNG, DE'I SRAS CHING BO PO,
LHA MGON GYI SRAS SKYA BO THA'I JI DENG SANG YOD,

` D'A'I CHING HUNG THA'I JI'I SRAS AER KHE THA'I JI, DE'I SRAS
JUN WANG PHUN TSOGS, JA SAG SGROL MA SKYABS,

RDO RJE RNAM RGYAL, TSE 'PHEL AERTI NI THA'I JI BZHI, PHUN TSOGS
KYI SRAS JUN WANG DKON MCHOG BKRA SHIS,

BLO BZANG DAM CHOS, DGA' LDAN AA BO DANG GSUM, DANG PO'I SRAS
BSOD NAMS RDO RJE WANG, YAB

SRAS 'DI GNYIS BSTAN PA LA THUGS RUS CHE ZHING DAD PA DANG DAM
TSIG GTZANG, YAB KYIS PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE

LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS BSGRUBS PAS LHA BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSO
ZER, TU LAN GYI DGON PA GTZUG LAG KHANG

DANG BCAS PA BZHENGS, KUN MKHYEN SKU 'PHRENG GNYIS PA GDAN
DRANGS TE, WANG YUM SRAS, T'A LE HU

THOG THU, BOD PA MERGAN CHOS RJE SOGS SKYA SER NYIS BRGYA LHAG
GIS DUS 'KHOR, BDE GSANG, TSE DBANG,

GDUGS DKAR RNAMS KYI DBANG, RJES GNANG MANG PO, LTA KHRID SOGS
CHOS MTHA' YAS PA NYAN, RANG

RIS KYI BSOD NAMS ZLA BA LHA RAMS PA BYAS TE GRVA SA'I DGE BSHES
TON PA RGYAL BA SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO LA GRVA RGYUN DU

PHUL NAS RTZE'I RNAM RGYAL GRVA TSANG DU DUS 'KHOR GYI SKOR LA
PHYAG LEN ZHIB TU SBYANGS, 'DI DANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL KHRI

CHEN BSOD NAMS DBANG RGYAL BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA GSUM LA MTSO KHA'I
BSOD RNAMS RNAM GSUM ZHES DUS THOG

DE NA MTSAN SNYAN 'DRA BAR BYED, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS TE
DUS 'KHOR GRVA TSANG BA RNAMS LA CHO GA'I GDANGS

'DUR RDUL TSON SOGS KYI PHYAG LEN MTHA' DAG ZHIB TU KHRID, NYID
NAS KHUR LEN GYIS RDUL TSON BTAB STE KUN

MKHYEN MCHOG NAS GDAN SAR DUS 'KHOR DBANG GNANG, SRAS BSOD NAMS
RDO RJE WANG GIS KYANG KUN MKHYEN

@044 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

MCHOG SNGA PHYIR GDAN DRANGS, MI TRA'I DBANG CHEN, DUS 'KHOR
DBANG SOGS DANG, DUG SBYONG GI

DBANG DANG MAN NGAG GI SKOR CHIG RGYUD DU GSAN PA SOGS DAD GUS
TSAD LAS 'DAS, DE NAS MA 'GYANGS PAR

CHING WANG GI THOB KYANG 'BAD RTZOL MED PAR BYUNG, DE'I SRAS
WANG TSE RING DON GRUB, DE'I SRAS AO RGYAN

SKYABS; JA SAG RIN CHEN RNAM GROL, SKU 'BUM MI NYAG SPRUL SKU
GSUM, BLO BZANG DAM CHOS LA SRAS

MED; DGA' LDAN RAB BRTAN AA BO'I SRAS T'A LE HU THOG THU SKAL
BZANG RAB RGYAS, SGROL MA SKYABS KYI

SRAS JA SAG DAR RGYAS TSE RING, RDO RJE RNAM RGYAL LA SRAS MED,
'JAM DPAL TSE 'PHEL GYI SRAS BLO BZANG TSE

RING; DE'I SRAS THU SA LAG CHI DPAL 'BYOR JA SAG 'DI LA SRAS MED
PAR BSOD NAMS RDO RJE WANG GI NU

BO RDO RJE BSAM GRUB KYIS JA SAG BYAS, DE'I SRAS JA SAG DBANG
CHEN DON GRUB, DE'I SRAS JA SAG DPAL

'BAR BKRA SHIS LHUN GRUB, DE LA SRAS MED PAS JA SAG RIN CHEN
RNAM GROL DE'I GO SAR BSDAD, SRAS

'GA' YOD, B'E RO TZA NA'I SRAS DU RAL THA'I JI, AA BO CHE CHEN
THA'I JI, GZUNGS SKYABS AE RTI NI THA'I

JI GSUM RGYAL SRID DON DU KHRIMS LA SBYAR ZER, ` CHOS RGYAL SRAS
GSUM PA HO RIM SHI AE RTI NI TA'I CHING LA,

THAR BA, PHUN TSOGS, DBANG CHEN, LHA 'BUM, BANG THU JI TA'I
CHING, SENG GE HA THAN PA

DUR BCAS DRUG THAR BA'I SRAS NGAG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL, DE'I SRAS BE
SI TSE RING DON GRUB 'DI DANG GONG

GI PHUN TSOGS GNYIS LA SRAS MED, DBANG CHEN GYI SRAS CHOS GRAGS,
DE'I SRAS AE RTI NI BO SHOG THU DANG

DPAL 'BAR GNYIS LA SRAS MED, LHA 'BUM SRAS RDO RJE TSE BRTAN LA
BU MED, BANG THU TA'I CHING GI SRAS JA

SAG TSE BRTAN BO SHOG THU DANG BSTAN 'DZIN BE SI GNYIS, TSE
BRTAN GYI BU JA SAG TSE RING RDO RJE, DE'I SRAS

BLO BZANG TSE RING, DE'I SRAS DPAL 'BYOR JA SAG DE'I BU'AM GO
SAR BSDAD PA DGA' LDAN BSTAN SKYONG,

DANG PO'I BU JA SAG DGE LEGS RAB BRTAN DANG LING HO B'E GNYIS,
DANG PO'I BU JA SAG BU YAN T'A LE, DE

LA YANG SRAS GCIG YOD SNANG, BSTAN 'DZIN BE SI'I SRAS PHYAG RDOR
SKYABS BE SI, DE'I SRAS GSER TOG

TA'I CHING GI SPRUL SKU 'JAM DPAL RDO RJE, BE SI T'A LE'I CHE
CHEN SHOG THU MTSO SKYES RDO RJE, TSE DBANG RIG

'DZIN; BYA KHYUNG MDO PA ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG DBANG PHYUG RGYA
MTSO BZHI, MTSO SKYES RDO RJE'AM TSE BRTAN RDO

RJE'I SRAS BE SI RATNA SIDDHI, DE'I SRAS BE SI BSOD NAMS 'PHEL
RGYAS, 'DI LA DENG SANG GSER TOG BE SI

ZER; TA'I CHING NO YON TSE DBANG RIG 'DZIN BU SKU 'BUM SMON RAMS
PA BYAMS PA DANG THO YON BLO GSAL GNYIS,

ZUR BU THUB BSTAN NYI MA GSUM, SENG GE HAN DAN GYI SRAS BKRA
SHIS DON GRUB LA SRAS MED, ` CHOS RGYAL

SRAS BZHI PA SANG GAR TSA'I SRAS PO LOD HO SHUS CHI, DE'I SRAS
T'A BUNG BE LI DANG, BSOD NAMS BKRA SHIS

GNYIS; T'A BUNG GI SRAS RIN CHEN RNAM RGYAL LA SRAS MED, BSOD
NAMS BKRA SHIS KYI SRAS THU SA LAG CHI SKAL

LDAN DON GRUB, SKAL LDAN DBANG RGYAL, BE SI LING N'E GSUM LAS
DANG PO GNYIS LA SRAS MED, MING

N'E'I BU BE SI BLO BZANG TSE BRTAN, JA SAG DPAL SKYID, YI DAM,
TSE GZUNGS BZHI, DANG PO'I BU

@045 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

DBANG RGYAL BSTAN 'DZIN, PHUN TSOGS RAB BRTAN, TSE RING DAR
RGYAS GSUM, DANG PO'I SRAS BE SI

DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL ZER BA DANG, YANG BLO BZANG TSE BRTAN GYI BU
THU SA LAG CHI TSE RING RDO RJE, DAR RGYAS TSE

RING; DKON MCHOG RAB BRTAN, BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG RGYAL, LHA BSRUNG
SKYABS, BSAM 'GRUB

RGYA MTSO ZER BA DRUG SNANG, DPAL SKYID SRAS LHA SKYABS, YI DAM
TSE GZUNGS GNYIS LA SRAS MED, ` CHOS

SPYI DPON DU BSKOS, DE'I SRAS BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN WANG DANG,
THANG LHA SKYABS GNYIS, BSTAN

'DZIN WANG GI SRAS B'A THE TSA GAN DANG, AE MIN GAN GNYIS PHO
BRANG DU BSDAD PA'I PHYI MA'I BU CHE BA GCIG DANG,

KH'A 'JIGS BYED SKYABS GNYIS KYA CHIN RGYAL PO'I DUS YOD ZER BA
THOS, THANG LHA SKYABS LA SRAS MED,

` CHOS RGYAL SRAS BDUN PA BSTAN 'DZIN D'A YAN RGYAL PO, DE LA
SRAS RATNA D'A LA'I HAN, BSOD NAMS BKRA

SHIS; BSOD NAMS RDO RJE, BSOD NAMS MGON PO, DGE 'DUN MERGAN NO
YON DANG LNGA, RATNA'I

SRAS BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG RGYAL, LHA BZANG GNYIS LAS DANG PO LA BU
MED, LHA BZANG SRAS DGA' LDAN BSTAN

'DZIN DANG SUR TSA GNYIS, SNGA MAS HUNG THA'I JI'I BU DOD BYAS,
SUR TSA'I SRAS TSE BRTAN GUNG ZER BA CHA

HAR DU BSDAD PA'I BU GCIG DENG SANG YOD ZER, BSOD NAMS BKRA SHIS
SRAS NOR BU PHUN TSOGS, DE'I

SRAS BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BYOR, DE LA SRAS MED, BSOD NAMS RDO RJE'I
SRAS CHOS 'KHOR, DE'I BU SKAL

LDAN GUNG, DE'I SRAS BSTAN 'DZIN GUNG, THU SA LAG CHI RGYAL
MTSAN, GUNG DPAL CHEN GSUM LA SRAS

MED; BSOD NAMS MGON PO'I SRAS TSE RING GUNG DANG, THU SA LAG CHI
CHOS SKYONG RGYA MTSO GNYIS, TSE

RING GUNG GI SRAS GUNG BKRA SHIS SKYABS, DE'I SRAS GUNG DGE 'DUN
DON GRUB, DE'I SRAS YE SHES DAR RGYAS

DANG; THA'I JI LEGS BSHAD DAM RNAM 'JOMS GNYIS, DANG PO'I BU
GUNG 'GYUR MED THUB BSTAN TSE RING,

DE'I BU GUNG CHOS DAR, CHOS SKYONG RGYA MTSO'I BU GUNG BSOD NAMS
STOBS RGYAS, DE LA BU MED PAS NU BO

RATNA SIDDHIS GO SA BZUNG, DE'I BU TSE DPAG GUNG, THA'I JI LEGS
BSHAD KYI BU THU SA LAG CHI RTA MGRIN,

DGE 'DUN MERGAN NO YON GYI SRAS TSE RING GUNG DANG DPAL 'BYOR
GNYIS, DANG PO'I SRAS TSE BRTAN GUNG, GUNG

DKON MCHOG SKYABS GNYIS, DANG PO LA SRAS MED, DKON MCHOG GUNG GI
SRAS GUNG CHOS SKYONG SKYABS DANG

NGAG DBANG LEGS BSHAD GNYIS, DANG PO'I SRAS DGE LEGS RAB RGYAS,
DE'I SRAS GUNG RTA MGRIN SKYABS,

DE LA BU RU RUS DANG BAN DE GNYIS YOD ZER, THU SA LAG CHI DPAL
'BYOR GYI SRAS MGON PO SKYABS, KUN BZANG,

TSE DPAG RGYA MTSO, ,SE RA'I DGE BSHES BSTAN 'PHEL THO YON, THU
SA LAG CHI TSE DBANG GRAGS PA BCAS LNGA,

DANG PO'I SRAS TSE GZUNGS SKYABS, THO YON CHOS 'PHEL, B'A YE T'A
GSUM, ` CHOS RGYAL SRAS BRGYAD PA

AA TZA RA CHE CHEN HUNG THA'I JI'I SRAS MERGAN HUNG THA'I JI,
CHE CHEN THA'I JI, JO RIG THU D'A'I CHING GSUM,

MERGAN HUNG THA'I JI'I SRAS RNAM RGYAL AE RTI NI HUNG THA'I JI,
MERGAN D'A'I CHING AA BA KA RAB BRTAN GSUM, RNAM

@046 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

RGYAL SRAS CHING HUNG THA'I JI DANG WANG BLO BZANG TSE DBANG
GNYIS, 'DI'I SRAS GUNG LHA RGYAL D'A'I CHING, 'JAM

DPAL GRAGS PA, DGE LEGS STOBS RGYAS, RDO RJE TSE RING BZHI, LHA
RGYAL SRAS JA SAG KUN BZANG TSE

RING LA SRAS MED PAR AA KHU GCIG GI BU DNGOS GRUB DBANG PHYUG LA
JA SAG BYUNG, DE'I SRAS DA LTA'I JA SAG DHARMA

SHRI; DNGOS GRUB DBANG PHYUG GI KHU BO THA'I JI BZANG PO, DE'I
SRAS MU KHEN THA'I JI, STOBS RGYAS SRAS RDO

RJE DANG, THO YON RAB 'BYAMS PA TSUL KHRIMS BZANG PO SOGS GSUM,
RDO RJE TSE RING GI BU DBANG RGYAL,

RTA MGRIN, YE SHES DBANG RGYAL GSUM, 'DI'I SRAS MERGAN D'A'I
CHING RIN CHEN BKRA SHIS, DE'I SRAS

RTA MGRIN TSE BRTAN, JA SAG BO BO, JA SAG PAD MA TSE BRTAN GSUM,
RTA MGRIN TSE BRTAN BU SHES RAB

NYI MA DANG, BO BO GNYIS LA SRAS MED, JA SAG PAD MA TSE BRTAN
GYI BU DBANG RGYAL JA SAG DE'I SRAS

DGE 'DUN SKYABS, DE'I SRAS JA SAG MGON PO SKYABS, DE LA YANG
SRAS 'GA' YOD ZER, AA BA KA

RAB BRTAN GYI SRAS JA SAG MGON PO RAB BRTAN, DE'I SRAS JA SAG
MANJI BAN DHE, DE'I SRAS JA SAG BSOD

NAMS MI 'GYUR, DE'I SRAS JA SAG DON GRUB DBANG RGYAL LA SRAS
'GA' YOD, JO RIG THU D'A'I CHING GI

SRAS BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS, CHE CHEN D'A'I CHING GI SRAS 'JIGS
BYED SKYABS DANG JA SAG TSE RING RDO RJE GNYIS,

PHYI MA'I SRAS JA SAG GRAGS PA RNAM RGYAL, DE'I SRAS JA SAG NOR
BU RIN CHEN, DE'I SRAS JA SAG 'JIGS

MED DANG THO YON DGE 'PHEL GNYIS, 'JIGS MED LA SRAS MED PAS THU
SA LAG CHI DON GO ZER BA'I BU THO YON

SHES RAB RGYA MTSO'I NU BO BSOD NAMS DBANG RGYAL LA JA SAG
BYUNG, DE'I BU THO YON GCIG DANG JA SAG LHA

MGON TSE RGYAL, 'DI LA YANG SRAS 'GA' YOD, ` CHOS RGYAL SRAS DGU
BA AA YU SHI T'A LE AU BA SHA'I SRAS AER

KHE THA'I JI, SANG+GA MERGAN THA'I JI, B'A DUR JU NANG, BO DHI
NOR BU RGYA MTSO, DOL BA CHOS RJE, THU

SHE YE THU HA SHA GA AE THE GEL, NYIG THA, BOD PA, BO LO DPON
PO, RDO RJE SKYABS, CAB

BCAS YIN, SANG+GHA MERGAN SRAS, SHA RA GOL, B'A DUR JU NANG GI
SRAS BLO BZANG RDO RJE GONG MA'I MAG

PAR AA LAG SHAR SONG BA AE B'OO WANG, DE'I SRAS AA LAG SHA JAN
JUNG SOGS DA LTA'I BAR WANG RIM PAR BYUNG,

BOD PA'I SRAS TSE RING DON GRUB, HON CHI B'E, AA BO NO YON GSUM,
HON CHI'I BU LI THAR GUNG, DE'I

BU SANGS RGYAS, DBANG RGYAL, TSE KHO, LHA 'BUM, 'JAM DBYANGS
GRAGS PA BCAS LNGA, AA BO

NO YON SRAS TSE GZUNGS, DE'I SRAS THU SA LAG CHI BSOD NAMS DAR
RGYAS, MTHU STOBS GNYIS, CAB

KYI BU JA SAG T'A KHI, DE'I SRAS SANGS RGYAS YE SHES, DE'I SRAS
JA SAG TSE RING RDO RJE, THO YON DPAL

'BYOR; JA SAG LHA SRUNG GSUM, PHYI MA'I BU BAN DHE GCIG DANG JA
SAG DON GSUM, DE'I BU JA SAG

CHUNG CHUNG ZHIG YOD PA MING MA NGES, RGYUD PA GZHAN MI GSAL ZER
BA SOGS 'DI THAD LA THAMS CAD MI MTHUN

PA CHE, ` CHOS RGYAL SRAS BCU PA D'A LAN THA'I JI'I SRAS AA CHI
B'A THUR DANG PHUN TSOGS GNYIS LAS PHYI MA LA SRAS

MED; DANG PO'I SRAS THOG THO NOR AE RTI NI WANG, DE'I SRAS THAR
BA, RAB RGYAS GUNG, THU SA LAG

@047 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

CHI BSOD NAMS BKRA SHIS, JUN WANG BSOD NAMS BSTAN 'DZIN, JA SAG
BLO BZANG SKYABS, RDO RJE

GUNG; THAR BA LA SRAS MED, RAB RGYAS GUNG GI SRAS THU SA LAG CHI
LHA MGON, DE'I SRAS THU SA LAG CHI

DON GRUB, BSOD NAMS BKRA SHIS SRAS KUN DGA', BSOD NAMS BSTAN
'DZIN WANG GI SRAS TZANG TZA WANG

DKON MCHOG SKYABS, DE'I SRAS JUN WANG DON GRUB DBANG RGYAL, YE
SHES DAR RGYAS, SHA CIN DEL GIR

GSUM; DANG PO'I SRAS GANGS DKAR WANG, DE LA SRAS MED PAS KHU BO
YE SHES DAR RGYAS LA WANG BYUNG,

JA SAG BLO BZANG SKYABS KYI SRAS JA SAG KUN DGA' TSE BRTAN, DE'I
SRAS JA SAG PHYAG RDOR, YE SHES DAR

RGYAS LA SRAS MED PAR 'DI LA WANG BYUNG BAS JA SAG THAM KA PHYIR
'BUL GYIS SDE BA GNYIS BSRES, HO SHOD GCIG

BYAS; DE'I SRAS DA LTA'I ME RIN WANG DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED, DE LA
SRAS D'A'I CHING ZER BA DANG, SKU

'BUM NA THO YON NGAG DBANG PHUL BYUNG, DANG PO LA YANG SRAS RE
GNYIS YOD ZER, RDO RJE GUNG GI BU THU SA

LAG CHI, DGE SLONG SOGS 'GA' YOD PA'I CHUNG BA DON GRUB KYI BU
B'A BE, DPON CHUNG GNYIS, DANG PO'I

SRAS GU RU YIN, KU SHRI CHOS RGYAL GYI PHU BO B'A B'A KA SU,
KHUN DU LID AO BA SHI GNYIS, DANG PO'I SRAS GAL

TA MA, GNYIS PA'I SRAS HA MI KA DE LAS MI GSAL, NU BO DO NO JA
SAG THU, BO YIN AONG HON

GNYIS; SKU MCHED 'DI LNGA LA STAG LNGA ZER, YUM MI GCIG PA'I NU
BO HA MI KA'I BID DU DANG, HA NAG

THU SHE YE THU GNYIS TE BDUN LAS HA MI KA BID DU'I RGYUD MED,
STAG BZHI BA DO NO JA SAG THU'I RGYUD DU JA SAG

HAR GAS ZER BA BYUNG, DE'I TSA RGYUD DU TSAD MA JA SAG CHOS
SKYONG SKYABS, DE'I BU JA SAG LHA MGON RDO RJE,

BLA MA 'DRA MO GCIG THA'I JI AER KHE JIR GAL DANG GSUM, LHA MGON
GYI SRAS JA SAG AER KHE BA YAR DANG AOS TZI THU GNYIS, DANG PO'I
SRAS JA SAG 'JIGS MED DBANG PHYUG 'PHRIN LAS NAM MKHA', SKU

'BUM DUS 'KHOR BLA ZUR THO YON 'JAM DPAL DAR RGYAS, JA SAG DUNG
SKYONG DKAR BO BZHI, DANG PO LA

SRAS MED, 'PHRIN LAS SRAS TH'E LUNG, THONG GA LAG GRA BA GCIG
BCAS GSUM, JA SAG 'JIGS

MED DBANG PHYUG GRONGS NAS DUNG SKYONG LA JA SAG BYUNG, 'DI JA
SAG TU 'KHOD 'PHRAL NAS CHOS DAM LA DGRA RGYUG

PA'I MGO TSUGS, BLA MA 'DRA MO LA YANG BU 'GA' YOD, ` HA NAG THU
SHE THU'I RGYUD PAR CHOS DAM THA'I JI NAR JA

SAG BKRA SHIS TSE 'PHEL BYUNG, DE'I BU JA SAG DON GRUB RNAM
RGYAL DANG KUN BZANG GNYIS, DANG PO'I BU

BDE SBYIN JA SAG DE LA BU MED PAS KUN BZANG LA JA SAG BYUNG, DA
LTA DE'I NYE RIGS JA SAG DBANG CHEN

RGYA MTSO YOD, 'DI THAMS CAD LA HO SHOD ZER, ` ,YANG STAG LNGA'I
DANG PO PHU BO B'A B'A KA SU'I SRAS AO CHIR

THU CHE CHEN HAN DANG, AA BA LE B'A THUR SPUN GNYIS, SNGA MA'I
SRAS GHAL TA MO ZHES PA'I DPA' BO DES HA SAG

PU RAD, HO THON PHAL CHER DBANG DU BSDUS, AER CHID KYI CHU'I
TSUR KHA'I AU RU SU PHAR KHAR BSKRAD PAS

STOBS CHE BAR GYUR, CHAS DAM GYI THA'I JI NAR SO GSUM YANG BE'I
BA KVA'I RGYUD PA YIN, STAG GNYIS

PA KHUN DU LID LA SRAS CHING B'A THUR, AI NAG B'A THUR SOGS YOD,
PHYIS SU MTSO SNGON BSTAN 'DZIN THU SA

@048 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

LAG CHI, TSE RING RNAM RGYAL THU SA LAG CHI GNYIS YIN, ` STAG
BZHI PA JA SAG THU DO NO'I RGYUD PA PHYIS SU

MO TZA RA, TSO LON THA'I JI, HAR KVAS JA SAG JA SAG CHOS SKYONG
SKYABS, ` STAG LNGA BA BO YON AONG

HON HA THAN B'A THUR LA RGYUD MED CES BRIS SNANG, ` YANG YI GE
GCIG TU, CHOS RGYAL DANG YUM MI GCIG PA'I

NU BO, HA MA HE BANG THU DANG, HA NAG THU SHE YA THU GNYIS, DANG
PO'I SRAS AOm PO, THO GOS CHOG THU,

M'A LA MERGAN, B'A TSAR THA'I JI BZHI, THO GOL CHOG THU LA, SENG
GE RIN CHEN, THAR BA, DAM PA,

RDO RJE, 'JAM DBYANGS BZHI, DANG PO'I SRAS JA SAG TSE RING RNAM
RGYAL, DE'I SRAS THA'I JI NOR BU,

DE LA BSOD NAMS RAB BRTAN, SENG SRAS SHE NI, DNGO SGRUB SOGS
BZHI LAS PHYI MA 'DII BU RAB RGYAS,

SHE NI'I BU CAB YIN, THAR BA'I SRAS RIN CHEN DON GRUB AA SHIG
THI DANG, RTA MGRIN GNYIS, DANG PO'I

BU RAB RGYAS, MAL CHING, BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS GSUM, RAB RGYAS BU
MGON PO MUNG KHU, LUNG RIGS,

HA MAR NG'E GSUM, RTA MGRIN BU JA SAG DPAL LDAN, DE'I SRAS JA
SAG BKRA SHIS CHOS 'PHEL, B'A

LAR BKRA SHIS TSE 'PHEL GNYIS, DANG PO'I SRAS DON GRUB RNAM
RGYAL, BA YAR SRAS BSOD NAMS DBANG RGYAL,

'JAM DBYANGS KYI SRAS NGAG DBANG DON GRUB DANG BI LIG GNYIS,
DANG PO'I SRAS TSE BRTAN, DE'I SRAS DGE

'DUN; BI LIG SRAS CHA BUG SHE NI, BRTZON 'GRUS GSUM, CHA BUG GI
SRAS LEGS BSHAD,

MAL MERGAN THA'I JI'I SRAS THU SA LAG CHI TSE RING, DE'I SRAS
SGROL MA SKYABS DANG BSTAN DAR GNYIS, SGROL

MA SKYABS KYI BU SKAL BZANG, BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS, HO TZO GSUM,
SKAL BZANG GI BU THU SA LAG CHI AANG

KHI BE HU BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS, DE'I BU BSOD NAMS, HO TZO'I BU
B'A DO RUG DE'I BU KHUG ZU KHU,

` HA NAG THU SHE YA THU'I SRAS T'A LE AO BA SHI DANG MO NOG CU
NAG JO RIG THU, AO B'I SHI L NGA, JO

RIG THU'I BU GUNG GUNG, DE'I BU RAB BRTAN DANG SHI RE, RAB BRTAN
GYI BU DBANG RGYAL, DE'I BU BSTAN

PA ` DE'I BU KUN DGA', SKAL LDAN, CHOS GRAGS GSUM, CHOS GRAGS
KYI BU BSAM GRUB, SHI

RE'I BU TSO HAN, DE'I BU CAL DANG TSE 'PHEL GNYIS, DANG PO LA HO
SHUS TZANG GI BA BO TZIN, HO RI MTHU,

AAL THAN BA BO TZI GSUM, DANG PO'I BU B'A THUR DANG SBYIN PA
GNYIS, HO RI THU'I BU HO SHUS TZANG GI BSOD

NAMS; DE'I BU DON GRUB, AAL THAN GYI BU CHOS LDAN TSE 'BE, DE'I
BU CHA BUG DANG, CHOS LDAN DGE

SLONG; DAM PA DGE SLONG GSUM, CHA BUG GI BU, MOO KHU BUN TE CHAS
DAM GYI THA'I JI SO GSUM DE YIN ZER

BA MTHONG, KU SHRI'I SKU RUS SU MI GTOGS PA'I MTSO SNGON DPON
KHAG GZHAN NI, SNGON DUS GAL GVA SU DANG,

CUNG GAR THOR RGOD PHAN TSUN NYE 'BREL BYAS, SKABS SHIG NANG
'GRIG PO MA BYUNG BAR CUNG GAR MI RGYUD TSE BRTAN

THA'I JI ZER BA MTSO SNGON DU 'ONGS, RGYAL MCHOG TSANGS DBYANGS
RGYA MTSO RGYA PHEBS DUS DANG CHU YOS DUS 'KHRUGS

SKABS PHAN 'GYUR BYAS PAS CHE CHEN WANG GI THOB BYUNG, DE'I SRAS
TSE RING WANG, DE'I SRAS RDO RJE WANG DANG

TSE BRTAN WANG GNYIS, DE LA SRAS MED PAR DUS GCIG PA'I THA'I JI
CHOS 'PHEL LA BE LI BYUNG, DE'I SRAS

@049 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

BE LI CHOS SKYONG SKYABS, DE'I SRAS BE LI 'PHRIN LAS DPAL 'BYOR
DANG THA'I JI BZANG PO GNYIS, DANG PO'I

SRAS BE LI RNAM RGYAL ZLA BA, GNYIS PA'I SRAS BYAMS PA THU SA
LAG CHI, THA'I JI TSE RING DAR RGYAS, THON

YON BSAM GTAN GSUM, TSE RING DAR RGYAS SRAS SHES RAB DANG YUN
LEN BANDHE GNYIS, ` YANG CUNG GAR

AERTI NI B'A THUR HUNG THA'I JI LA SRAS BCU YOD PA'I GNYIS PA JO
RIG THU HO SHU CHI, DE'I SRAS 'BRING PO NAM MKHA'

RGYAL MTSAN, DE'I SRAS RAB BRTAN GUNG GIS D'A CHING HUNG THA'I
JI'I MAG PA BYAS, KUN MKHYEN GONG MA MTSO

SNGON DU PHEBS DUS SRAS 'KHRUNGS MA THAG PA LA SKYABS 'JUG ZHUS
PAS, KHA DAR 'DOMS SU GZHAL BA LA MDUD

PA GNANG STE BCINGS, TSE RING ZHING NGA'I DGON PAR PHAN THOGS
ZHES LUNG BSTAN PA'I KHU BE THU GUNG RNAM RGYAL TSE

RING 'DIS T'A LE B'A THUR GYI 'KHRUGS PA'I DUS SO BOD KYI MGO
MNAN TE 'KHRUG PA ZHI BAR BYAS, 'DAM SOG MDA'

TSAN DU BKOD PAS BE SI'I THOB GNANG, DBUS KYI CHO LO DANG SBRAGS
BE SI B'A THUR D'A'I CHING ZER, LHA RGYAL

D'A'I CHING GI SRAS MO ZHIG BTZUN MOR BSUS PA LA SRAS MED PAR MO
RANG GI AA KHU DGE LEGS STOBS RGYAS KYI SRAS

CHUNG BA SKYES 'PHRAL DU BLANGS TE GSOS PA 'CHI MED ZLA BA, PAn
CHEN RIN PO CHES MING MI 'GYUR RAB BRTAN RDO

RJER BSTZAL BA LA GONG GIS GNANG NBA'I CHO LO DANG SBREL MI
'GYUR BE SIR GRAGS, DE'I SRAS BE SI RATNA SIDDHI,

DE'I SRAS BE SI YI DAM TSE RING, 'DI KHAG GNYIS LA JUNG GAR CHO
RO SU ZER, ` THOR GOD NAS MERGAN JU

NANG YONG BA AA KHU B'A THUR THA'I JI'I MAG PA BYAS, KU SHRI HAN
GYIS DMAG DPON DU BSKOS, DE'I SRAS AER

KHE JU NANG, DE'I SRAS AE RTI NI JU NANG, DE'I SRAS JA SAG RNAM
SRAS TSE DBANG, 'DI SA BYI LOR GSHEGS

PA'I GSHIN SNGAS SU KUN MKHYEN BAR MA GDAN DRANGS, YAB MES KYIS
DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG BA'I BSTAN SRID KYI RTZA

BA LTA BU MDZAD SKABS PHYAG TU 'BYOR BA'I NANG RTEN RJE'I NA
BZA' GOS ZER, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN GYI

MTHANG GOS BCAS PHUL, SRAS MED PAR RUS GCIG PA'I SGROL MA SKYABS
LA JA SAG BYUNG, DE'I SRAS JA SAG

DGE BSNYEN NAM BLO BZANG CHOS DAR DANG RIN CHEN ZLA BA GNYIS,
SNGA MA'I SRAS JA SAG RAB DGA', RGYAL

MCHOG SBYIN PA, B'A BA, THO YON CHOS DPAL RNAMS DANG, PHYI MA'I
SRAS CHOS 'BYOR RAM KHAS CIS,

'BRAS SPUNGS RDO RAMS PA THO YON THUB BSTAN, AA RIG LHO BA TSANG
GI SPRUL SKU DANG GSUM, SNGA MA'I SRAS

SBYIN PA DANG BAN DE GNYIS, ` YANG THOR GOD BA DAN DANG THAR BA
ZER BA'I THA'I JI SPUN GNYIS, BA DAN GYI

SRAS PO BE BSOD NAMS DAR RGYAS LA DANG POR JA SAG BYUNG, DE'I
SRAS DUNG JA SAG DE'I SRAS SA RA JA

SAG DE'I SRAS JA SAG BKRA SHIS RAB BRTAN, CHOS MDZAD BLO BZANG
MKHAS MCHOG JA SAG BSAM

'GRUB RGYA MTSO GSUM, THAR BA'I BU THU SA LAG CHI, GZUNGS THAR
DANG GRVA BA GCIG, DANG PO'I BU THU SA

LAG CHI PHUN TSOGS, SHU B'E GNYIS, DANG PO'I SRAS JA SAG RDO RJE
DBANG RGYAL LA BSAM 'GRUB RGYA MTSO'I JA

SAG BYUNG, DE'I SRAS JA SAG DON GRUB RNAM RGYAL, DE LA SRAS TSE
DBANG RIG 'DZIN, DKON MCHOG

SNYAN GRAGS SAM NYI THAR, BSOD NAMS RAB BRTAN GSUM YOD, BU BE'I
BU THU SA LAG CHI MON TH'O LE,

@050 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

JA SAG RDO RJE DBANG RGYAL GYIS KHO RANG GI BU LA JA SAG SPRAD,
DPON SLOB GSER KHANG PA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS TE

LHA SAR MJAL, DA LTA STONG 'KHOR MKHAR NANG GI DGON CHUNG DER
YOD, MING LA BLO BZANG MCHOG GRUB ZER,

` YANG THOR GOD NO YON DGE SLONG GI SRAS JA SAG TSE THAR 'BUM,
DE'I SRAS AO RGYAN JA SAG 'DI LA SRAS

MED PAR RUS GCIG PA'I THA'I JI YI DAM JA SAG BYAS, DE LA SRAS
MED CING HO SHOD DU RUS MTHUN MED PAR JA

SAG BSAM 'GRUB RGYA MTSO'I HO SHOD NAS RUS GCIG PA'I THA'I JI
KUN DGA' LA JA SAG BYUNG, DE'I BU LU GU,

BYAMS PA, DBANG PHYUG YAR 'PHEL BZHI YOD PA'I THOG MTHA' GNYIS
LA SRAS MED, DBANG PHYUG BU JA SAG

RTA MGRIN TSE RING, 'DI LA SNGAR BU MA BYUNG BAS JA SAG DON GRUB
RNAM RGYAL GYI BU CHUNG BA BSOD NAMS RAB BRTAN

BU 'TSAB TSE DBANG BLANG 'DUG BYAMS PA'I BU THU SA LAG CHI DBANG
DRAG DE LA BU 'GA' YOD ZER, ` YANG

THOR GOD TSE DBANG RAB BRTAN GYI RGYUD GA-YAS RUR YOD LA, DE
RNAMS THOR GOD RIGS YIN, ` YANG CHOS

'BYOR THA'I JI 'ONGS PA LA MTSO SNGON DUS ZING SKABS AUA TZING
GUNG GI THOB BYUNG, DE'I SRAS GUNG NGAG DBANG

THAR BA, DE'I SRAS GUNG DBANG RGYAL DON GRUB DANG BANDHE THU SA
LAG CHI GNYIS, DANG PO'I SRAS RTA MGRIN

GUNG; DBANG CHEN, PAD MA RIG 'DZIN GSUM, RTA MGRIN BU GUNG RIN
CHEN DBANG PHYUG DE'I BU

GUNG RDO RJE BYAMS, DBANG CHEN SRAS THUB BSTAN DPAL BZANG, TSE
DBANG, KARMA BKRA SHIS GSUM,

THU SA LAG CHI BAN DE'I SRAS PAD MA TSE BRTAN, 'DI RNAMS LA HO
SHOD ZER, ` HAL HA NAS DGE 'DUN JA

SAG 'ONGS, MTSO SNGON DANG 'GRIG MIN GYIS TORGE AAMBHAN GYIS
RANG YUL DU BTANG, DE'I SHUL DU BKRA SHIS

DON GRUB JA SAG LA BZHAG DE'I SRAS JA SAG BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL,
DE'I BU JA SAG TSE THAR, DE'I

GSUM YOD ZER, 'DI LA HAL HA TSANG DU GRAGS, ` SPYIR MTSO GA-YAS
RU GA-YON RUR DPON KHAG CHE BA SO

GSUM DANG MDA' BRGYA DANG GCIG YOD ZER ZHING, DA LTA WANG JA SAG
NYER DGU BZHUGS PA'I MTSAN ZUR DU

BKOD NA, GA-YAS RU'I WANG BKRA SHIS DBANG RGYAL, BLA DPON ZUNG
'BREL LA MO TSANG, MGON PO RDO RJE

JA SAG KLU 'BUM JA SAG THOR GOD JA SAG STE LNGA, ` GA-YON RUR BE
LI BLO BZANG SBYIN PA, TSE

RING DON GRUB WANG, JA SAG RIN CHEN RNAM GROL, BU YAN H'A LE JA
SAG BE LI BSOD NAMS 'PHEL

RGYAS; BE SI DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL, CHOS DAR GUNG, TSE DPAG GUNG,
GUNG RTA MGRIN SKYABS,

JA SAG DHARMA SHRI, JA SAG MGON PO SKYABS, JA SAG DON GRUB DBANG
RGYAL, JA SAG LHA MGON TSE RGYAL,
