JA SAG DON GRUB KYI BU JA SAG CHUNG CHUNG GCIG ME RIN WANG 'JIGS
MED, CHAS DAM JA SAG DUNG SKYONG

DKAR PO DANG DBANG CHEN RGYA MTSO GNYIS, CUNG GAR BE LI RNAM
RGYAL ZLA BA, BE SI YI DAM TSE RING, THOR

GOD RAB DGA' JA SAG JA SAG DON GRUB RNAM RGYAL, JA SAG RTA MGRIN
TSE RING, JA SAG BSOD

NAMS RAB BRTAN, HO SHOD NAS GUNG RDO RJE BYAMS, HAL HA JA SAG
TSE DPAG RDO RJE RNAMS BZHUGS, 'DI

@051 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

SKOR YI GE RNAMS MI MTHUN PA MANG ZHING BDAG NI RGYUS MED PA
DANG SKAD RIGS LA RMONGS PAS DPYAD PA BYED MA

BZOD; TSIG TSOGS MANG PA LA MA MDZEM APR BKOD YOD PAS SLAD NAS
LO RGYUS SMRA BA RNAMS KYI DPYAD PA'I RTEN

DU MDZAD PA DANG, CHOS LDAN GYI RGYAL PO RNAMS KYIS BSTAN PA
BSTAN 'DZIN LA GUS MCHOD MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR

NI RGYU 'BRAS GNYIS KA'I CHA NAS RJES SU YI RANG, RANG PHYOGS
RGYAL 'DOD KYIS RANG GZHAN BRLAG PAI BYA BA CI

BRTZAMS PA DON MED KHO NAR SONG STE DA LTA RIGS DRUG SO SO'I
GNAS NA LAS DKAR NAG GI 'BRAS BU LONGS SPYOD

BZHIN GNAS PA'I NGANG TSUL LA YID 'BYUNG YANG BSKYED PAR RIGS
SO, ` ,RGYAL BA RIN PO C HER PHUL BA'I SDE LA

GZHUNG SDE DANG, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHER PHUL BA LA BKRA SDE ZER,
SO SO'I MKHAN PO YANG GTONG BZHIN PA'I

GZHUNG SDE MKHAN PO LA SO LO MA'I MKHAN PO ZER, STONG 'KHOR DGON
DANG NYE BAR DGON CHUNG ZHIG KYANG YOD

SNANG; ` ;STONG 'KHOR MKHAR NI MTSO SNGON DUS 'KHRUGS KYI RJES
SU GSAR DU GZUNG BAR GRAGS LA, MKHAR

NANG GI CING HO ZI DGA' LDAN BSTAN RGYAS GLING GRONG CHOG PA
'GA' LHAN DU 'DUS NAS DGON PA BRGYA, PHYIS

SU STONG 'KHOR SPRUL SKU 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSOR
PHUL, ` ,GRVA TSANG DGON DGA' LDAN CHOS

'KHOR GLING NI, KU SHRI BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS RGYAL GYIS SBYIN BDAG
BYAS, GONG SA LNGA PA'I DNGOS SLOB GRVA TSANG

CHOS RJE 'JAM DBYANGS SHES RAB KYIS ME GLENG LOR BTAB, DE'I
SPRUL SKU DAR HAN DU THOG TU NGAG DBANG DKON

MCHOG YIN ZER, DENG SANG YANG SKYES RGYUD YOD SNANG, DGON PA CHU
BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG GIS

KHRI MDZAD DE SKU TSAB TU CHIN CI RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG 'JAM
DBYANGS BSKOS PA NAS BZUNG SKU 'PHRENG RIM BYON

LA 'JAGS 'DRA, DER KU SHRI'I PHYAG SHAN, LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN GYI
PHYAG DRIL, LI THANG BKA' 'GYUR SOGS

RTEN BZANG, ` ,RA LA'I RI KHROD BYA KHYUNG MKHAN PO RA LA NO MON
HAN DON YOD RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BTAB ZER,

` ,MNGA' RIS HU THOG THU'I SKU THOG DANG PO MNGA' RIS PA DAR HAN
CHOS RJE RGYAL PO DAR RGYAL MNGA' RIS SU

DMAG LA PHEBS DUS KHRID 'ONGS PA'I MI RGYUD ZHIG TU 'KHRUNGS,
BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI GRVA RGAN KUN MKHYEN GONG

MA'I ZHABS ZIN TSE MJUG SOG YUL DU BZHUGS, 'BYOR BA SHIN TU CHE,
AUN 'DU LUNG YONGS RDZOGS

DPON BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG PHYUG GIS GNANG, RU BSKYAS DUS S HIG LA
LUG MANG ZHIG GI MTHAR THON DKA' BA

BYUNG BA SU'I YIN DRIS PAR, NYIDKYI YIN TSUL ZHUS PAS HA CANG
MANG 'DUG MA BZANG GSUNGS TE BKRA SHIS

'KHYIL DU CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM YONGS RDZOGS BTANG, NYIN GCIG RING
GI RTA BRANG MTHONG BAS YID PHYUNG STE,

JO KHANG RNYING BAR RGYAL BA SENG GE NGA RO'I SKU THOG TSAD MA
SHAR BA LHA BZOS BZHENGS, 'DI BLTA BAS CHOG MI SHES

SHING 'DZAM BU CHU BO'I GSER MDANGS CAN DU GRAGS, PAR GSAR BRKOS
KYI MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE THOG MAR YIG

CHA'I BLO RTAGS DANG, GZHAN YANG MANG DU BRKOS PA'I PAR BYANG
KUN MKHYEN GNYIS PAS MDZAD, GA-YAS

RU'I WANG SE DOD DANG BCAS PAS BLA MAR BKUR BA'I CHOS SRID KYI
'GYING BAG CAN YIN PAS DBUS SU PHEBS DUS

RGYAL BA'I MDUN DU HAN THA'I JI DANG, NO YON NANG SO SOGS KYI
GRAL ZHABS SU BZHAG PAR, DE NAS MI
@052 (MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI LO RGYUS 'GA' BSHAD PA,)

SDOD; NGA MDO SMAD NA YOD DUS KHONG TSO'I BLA MA YIN, BSTAN PA'I
BDAG PO'I MDUN NAS BSTAN PA MGO

ZHABS LOG DON MED MOD BYAS PAS NO YON CHOS RJE SOGS LANGS TE
GRAL PHUL, SOG YUL DU GSHEGS, DE'I

SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS AA RIG TU 'KHRUNGS PA
MNGA' RIS PA TSANG GIS MA BLUS, ` ,SGAR SDE T'A LE

HU THOG THU GONG MA NGAG DBANG BSHAD SGRUB RGYA MTSO NI, KHAMS
SU ZLA GRAGS NYI GRAGS ZER BA'I GRAGS CHEN GNYIS

BYUNG; ZLA GRAGS MTSO SNGON DU 'ONGS PA'I SPRUL SKU YIN, BOD DU
SMIN GLING GTER STON SKU MCHED LA GTUGS,

AA MDO NAS THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I CHOS BDAG GNYIS YONG BA'I RTA LO
BA DANG, 'O BRAN DPAL GYI DBANG PHYUG GI

SKYE BAR LUNG BSTAN, 'OL KHA RJE DRUNG LA YANG CHOS NYAN, GSAN
YIG POTA KHA SHAS ZHIG SHEL BRAG BLA MA'I DPE

KHROD DU SNANG, BYAMS GLING MKHAN PO BYAS, 'DIR PHEBS NAS KYANG
'PHRIN LAS RGYAS, KHRI GAR DGON

PA BTAB, BOD NAS RNYING MA RGYUD 'BUM POTA SUM CU SKOR BZHENGS
TE GDAN DRANGS PA 'DIR BZHUGS,

PHYIS SU SE CHEN SPRUL SKU DANG, SGO ME TING KYA DPON SLOB GNYIS
KYIS KHUR BLANGS SDE DGER GDAN DRANGS TE PAR

GYI MA YIG KYANG BYAS, RGYAL MCHOG SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO DANG,
KHRI NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN YAB SRAS GNYIS

KAS CHU BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG LA, MTSO SNGON PHYOGS SU
RNYING MA'I GRUB MTHA' 'DZIN PA 'GA' YOD KYANG

GZHAN 'GANGS MI CHE, T'A LE HU THOG THUS SMIN GROL GLING DANG,
'OL KHA RJE DRUNG BSTEN NAS RNYING CHOS SBYANGS

PA CHE STABS DE PHYOGS PA RNAMS RNYING MAR 'GYUR DOGS CHE BAS
KHYED KYIS BSGYUR THABS REM ZHES BKA' GNANG

'DUG STE, GSER SIL MA'I PHUNG PO KHRAG DANG 'DRES, ,'DRE YI
DVAGS PHRU GU RGYUG CING 'PHYONG, ,MTSO

RBA RLABS 'KHRUGS PA KHAD KYIS NYAMS ZHES LUNG BSTAN GYI DUS BAB
DANG RTEN 'BREL GYI NUS PA DBANG BTZAN PAR

SNANG; JO NANG JA SAG GI SDE KHROD DU BZHUGS PA LA GRVA SDE
KHYIM GRANGS SUM BRGYA LHAG BYUNG, DE'I SPRUL SKU SKAL

BZANG RAB RGYAS RGYA MTSO RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA SPRUL LO
BA, SKU GONG MA GSHEGS KHAR MNGA' 'BANGS SKYONG

DGOS PAS DBANG DANG STOBS SHED CHE BA ZHIG TU SMON LAM 'DEBS
DGOS, SU BZANG DRIS PAR, DKON

MCHOG WANG TSANG GRAGS CHE TSUL ZHUS PAS, WANG GI NU BO DGA'
LDAN AA BO'I SRAS SU 'KHRUNGS ZER, SKU NA

PHRA DUS YAB KYIS DBUS SU KHYER, RGYAL BA YAB SRAS MJAL, BLA MA
BYAMS PA LA CHOS 'BREL GSAN, MDO

SMAD DU BYON TE DGUNG LO BRGYAD PA LA CHU BZANG GONG MA'I DRUNG
DU RAB BYUNG DANG BCU GNYIS PA LA DGE TSUL, NYI

SHU PA LA BSNYEN RDZOGS BSGRUBS, SNGA PHYIR DBANG LUNG RJES GSUM
KHRID SOGS DU MA, GRUB MTHA' GTZANG

DGOS KYI BSLAB DON SHA TSAR SBYAR BA GNANG, CHU BZANG DGON DU
CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, BKA' PO TA YONGS

RDZOGS LA SLOB GNYER MDZAD, KUN MKHYEN BAR MA LAS MTSO KHAR DUS
'KHOR DANG MI TRA SOGS BUM PA GANG BYOR

GSAN; SO GCIG PA LA DBUS GTZANG DU PHEBS, SER BYES SU THUGS
GNYER DANG, KHRI BLO BZANG BSTAN

PA; YONGS 'DZIN RIN PO CHE, KLONG RDOL BLA MA SOGS BSTEN, RGYAL
DBANG NAS AERTI NI MANYDZU SHR'I NO MON

HAN GYI CHO LO DANG MKHAN CHAS GNANG, SO LNGA PA LA RANG YUL DU
PHEBS, LCANG SKYA MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHER

@053 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BKA' CHOS MANG PO PHUL, CHU BZANG KHRIR LAN GNYIS DANG SKU 'BUM
KHRIR BZHUGS, SPYI CHOS DANG SGER CHOS

MANG PO GNANG, KHENGS DREGS MI MNGA' ZHING MDZAD SPYOD DAG PA'I
RNAM THAR 'GANGS CHE, DRUG CU PA SA 'BRUG

LA GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU CHU BZANG RIN PO CHE'I SLOB MA DA LTA
MTSO SNGON DU BZHUGS, 'DI PA'I GRVA SDE'I KHROD

DU SMRA KHAMS ZHABS DRUNG CHE CHUNG, RVA TSA CHOS RJE, SOG PO
ZHABS DRUNG CHE CHUNG RNAMS BYUNG, SMRA KHAMS

CHE BA 'BRAS SGO MANG CHOS GRVAR GZHUNG LUGS LA SBYANGS, GUNG
THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS DANG GRA THOG GCIG

RANG YUL DU 'BYON SKABS 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS NAS 'BRAS SPUNGS BKOD
PA PHYAG DRIS MDZAD NAS GNANG, NGAS

'DI LA BLTA GI BSDAD NA 'BRAS SPUNGS DRAN RGYU RED ZHUS, SKU
TSE'I MJUG SLAR DBUS SU PHEBS, KE'U TSANG SHAR

NUB SOGS SU SGRUB PA LA GZHOL BA'I MOD GSHEGS, CHUNG BA BYA KYA
TSANG YANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYI DGE PHRUG

YIN NO, ,RVA TSA CHOS RJE 'PHRIN LAS CHE, BKA' BSTAN DANG RTEN
RNAMS BYA KHYUNG DU GDAN DRANGS TE NYID DE

KA'I RGYUD PA DANG DUS 'KHOR KHRI YANG MDZAD DO, ,SOG PO ZHABS
DRUNG CHE BA BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS RGYA MTSO GRVA SA

'BRAS SPUNGS, RANG YUL DU 'BYOR BA RGYAS PAS BKA' BSTAN SOGS
RTEN BZHENGS CHE, SKYABS MGON BAR

MAR KHRI DRUG 'GYOG GI RGYU MTSAN ZHUS PAR, GUR DRAG THON LA
SDOD CES ZHAL RTZED DANG, DE SANGS RGYAS BCOM

LDAN 'DAS SKU NA SMIN PA'I TSUL BSTAN SKABS SA BCU'I BYANG SEMS
RNAMS KYIS SKU SKYOR MDZAD PA'I RNAM PA YIN

GSUNGS; PHYIS SU DGRA JAG GIS GTZES PAS STONG 'KHOR DGON DU GZHI
BZUNG, DE'I SPRUL SKU GNYIS 'KHRUNGS

PA'I GCIG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS PA GSHEGS, DE
TSANG LA ZHABS DRUNG GSUM TZAM 'DUG KYANG

ZHIB PAR MA NGES, GZHAN YANG BSOD NAMS RDO RJE WANG GI TO BA
LANG DGON DANG, BE LI CHOS SKYABS SHOG

GRVA TSANG BKRA SHIS DGA' LDAN DPAL 'BYOR GLING, DGE 'DUN GUNG
GI DGON PA BKRA SHIS CHOS 'BYOR GLING,

BLA MA SHI RE THU'I DGON PA SOGS MANG BAR SNANG, AA MDO'I THOG
MA MTSO SNGON GYI SKABS SO,, ,,

	*, ,TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,

*, ,GNYIS PA BYANG RGYUD DNGOS NI, RJE NGES DON CHOS KYI NYI
MAS, DE NAS GANG+G'A'I SRING MO DAL 'GRO MA, ,

TZONG CHU ZHES BYAR GRAGS PA'I KLUNG CHEN GYIS, ,GDAGS DANG SRIB
TU BGOS PA'I 'DZIN MA'I KHYON, ,TZONG KHA

ZHES GRAGS SKYID PA'I LJONGS SHIG MCHIS, ,DE YI LHO PHYOGS TZONG
LA'I RDZA RGYUD NI, ,GSER LDAN PHA MTHA'

'TSOL LA ZHUGS 'DRA'I 'DABS, ,BLO BZANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA SKU
BLTAMS PA'I, ,GNAS MCHOG LEMBHI DGA'

TSAL GNYIS PA YOD, ,CES BSNGAGS PA LTAR GANG+G'A GNYIS PA TZONG
CHU'I GDAGS SRIB DANG, TZONG LA RING MO LHO

BYANG GI SA'I CHA KHAMS KYI GA-YER MO THANG NGAM, SHAR MDO SMAD
TZONG KHA SPRUL PA'I ZHING ZHES YONGS SU GRAGS PA 'DI

@0054 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

NYID KYI GNAS KYI SNYING PO RJE RGYAL BA GNYIS PA SKU BLTAMS
PA'I GNAS LIMBHI DGA' TSAL GNYIS PA SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA

GLING YIN LA, 'ON KYANG BSHAD PA'I GO RIM GYI DBANG GIS TZONG
NYIN DANG 'JU LAG GI RGYUD LAS BRTZAMS TE 'CHAD

PA LA, TZONG CHU BYANG RGYUD DAM TZONG NYIN DBUS KYI DMAR GTZANG
BRAG NI, DMAR SH'AKYA MU NI DANG GTZANG RAB GSAL

GNYIS KYI BZHUGS GNAS YIN PAS MTSAN DE LTAR THOGS SHING, GNAS
'DIR BLA CHEN POS GTZUG LAG KHANG

BZHENGS; DGE 'DUN GYI SDE BTZUGS, SKU MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA'I SKU
GDUNG RIL PO LA PHYI NAS SMAN 'DAM

GYIS BYUGS TE SKU BRNYAN BZHENGS PA YIN PAS MDZOD SPU'I RNAM PA
GSAL BA DANG, SKU LA GSOL BA'I NA BZA' LA

SKYID DREGS CHAGS SHING, THUGS KA'I THAD DU REG NA DROD YOD PA
LTA BU'I NYAMS DANG ZHAL RAS KYI MDANGS LA

MTHONG SNANG MI 'DRA BA 'BYUNG BA DANG, SKABS 'GAR RNGUL CHU
THON ZHING, SKU MDANGS SMUG PO BYUNG NA YUL KHAMS

'KHRUG PA SOGS MI SHIS PA 'BYUNG BA DANG, MDANGS BZANG ZHING DRI
ZHIM PO BYUNG NA YUL PHYOGS SU BKRA SHIS PAS,

THU'U BKVAN RJES, THUB BSTAN NYUNG 'BRU'I TSAD DU GYUR PA NYID,
,DPAG BSAM SHING LTAR RGYAS MDZAD BKA'

DRIN CAN, ,DGONGS PA RAB GSAL SKU GDUNG RIL BO RU, ,DMAR GTZANG
BRAG NA BZHUGS PA MJAL LAGS

SAM; ;DE YI ZHAL MDANGS NYIN BZHIN 'GYUR BA DANG, ,NA BZA' SKYI
CHAGS THUGS KA DROD DANG LDAN, ,

SKABS 'GAR TSUL KHRIMS DRI BZANG 'THUL BA SOGS, ,NGO MTSAR KHYAD
CHOS LDAN PA GZIGS LAGS SAM, ,

ZHES GSUNGS LA, ,ZHAL TZONG CHU'I RGYUD LA GZIGS PA BSTAN PA'I
RGYUN BZANG PO RING DU GNAS PA'I RTEN 'BREL

DANG; DGON LUNG GIS GNAS 'DZIN MDZAD CING DGE 'DUN RNAMS SKABS
BABS SU 'DIR PHEBS NAS GSO

SBYONG MDZAD PA'I PHYAG SROL SNGA MO NAS YOD 'DUG PA BSTAN PA'I
BYA BA RMAD DU BYUNG BAR SEMS, GA-YON GYI LHA KHANG

CHUNG NGUR PHYAG RDOR GYI TSAB LA LHA LUNG DPAL RDOR GA-YAS
THUGS KAR RDO RJE DANG, GA-YON MNYAM BZHAG, RDO RJE

SKYIL KRUNG DANG GOS SNGON GYIS NA BZA' CAN GYIS BYAS PA'I RIGS
GSUM MGON PO, KHA SKONG GI HVA SHANG GNYIS KYI 'DRA

SKU GCIG SMAG CHAS ZHVA 'BOG BSNAMS PA THUGS KAR THAL SBYAR,
GCIG PHU DUNG GI STENG DU CHOS GOS GYON PA PHYAG

GNYIS THUGS KAR BSNOL THABS LA MNYAM PA'I STABS KYIS BZHENGS PA,
GA-YAS NGOS SU BYAMS PA RANG BYON DU

GRAGS PA'I BRAG RI RING BO, DMAR GTZANG GRONG SDE GONG 'OG GNYIS
KA'I LHA KHANG SO SOR DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS

KYI SKU MI TSAD TZAM RE RE BZHUGS, ` ,DE'I GA-YAS NGOS LUNG PAR
CHOS SDE CHEN PO DGON LUNG BYAMS PA GLING NI, RGYAL

BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO SOG YUL DU PHEBS SKABS, BRAG RGYAR BZHUGS
ZHAG MDZAD DUS GZIGS SNANG KHYAD PAR

CAN BYUNG, GNAS GZHI'I THAD DU 'JA' ZUG PAS 'DIR MA 'ONGS PA NA
TSAD MA'I SKYES BU ZHIG GIS BKA'

GDAMS KYI BSTAN PA RGYAS PAR BYED CES LUNG BSTAN, RJE DRUNG
SPRUL PA'I SKU BSTAN PA RGYA MTSOS GSANG BDAG GI

SKUR BZHENGS TE MI MA YIN GDUG CAN BTUL, KHYAD PAR DU BRAG SRIN
MO'I 'DOMS LTA BU'I 'OG TU CHU MIG GNYAN

POR KLU BDUD MA RUNGS PA GNAS PA LA THOG PHAB STE LUNG PA'I MDAR
BSKRAD, RGYAL BA YON TAN RGYA MTSO DBUS SU

PHEBS DUS DGON GSAR 'DEBS KYI THUGS DGONGS GTAD KYANG DE RES MA
GRUB, RAB BYUNG BCU BA'I CHU YOS

@055 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

PRA TI SGAR BA NANG SO SHES RAB GRAGS, GLANG KYA DKA' BCU BSOD
NAMS RGYAL MTSAN GNYIS KYIS GROS

MGO BTON, AA KYA SGAR BA, HO'U 'BUL DPON, DPA' RIN SGAR BA, TZOG
TSA SGAR BA, MDA' RA 'BUL

DPON; SE TSA 'BUL DPON BCAS THAMS CAD BGROS THOG NAS PRA TI,
GLANG BYA, HO'U, MDA' RA 'BUL

DPON BCAS BOD DU PHYIN, 'BRAS SPUNGS KUN DGA' RA BAR RGYAL BA
YON TAN RGYA MTSO MJAL, GDAN 'DREN

GYI SNYAN GSAN PHUL DUS, LHA BLA MA KHU DBON GYI RNAM THAR BZHIN
BSTAN PA SEMS LA BZHAG NAS YUL THAG RING

BA KHYAD DU BSAD DE 'ONG BA RJES SU YI RANG ZHES DBUGS DBYUNG,
'BYON BZHED CHE YANG SDE SRID GTZANG BA DANG,

KARMA MCHOD YON GYIS DGE LUGS MING MED DU GTONG BA'I SBYOR BA
RTZOM SKABS YIN PAS PHEBS PA MA SHAR, GLANG

KYA DKA' BCUS SNGAR RGYAL SRAS LUNG BSTAN YOD PAS KHONG DANG,
MDA' RA 'BUL DPON GYIS SEMS DPA' RIN

PO CHE ZHU 'DOD KYIS RNAM GNYIS GDAN DRANGS, LHA SAR JO KHANG DU
PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN DANG RGYAL BA ZHAL

LHAN RGYAS KYI DRUNG DU, BLA MA GNYIS DANG, MI SNA RNAMS DANG
BCAS THAMS CAD 'DZOMS SAR, RGYAL BA MCHOG

GIS DGON PA 'DEBS AA MDO DANG, MKHAR SNGON PO GANG LEGS, BLA MA
RNAM GNYIS GANG PHEBS NA LEGS

PA'I BRTAG BSGRIL MDZAD PAS, GNAS AA MDO DANG BLA MA RGYAL SRAS
LA BAB, THU MED KHO LO CHI DBANG CHE BAS DE'I

NYE SAR DVAGS RAMS PA ZHIG YIN ZHES GSANG STABS KYIS PHEBS, DPA'
RE PHYOGS KYI SGAR BA, SGOM SDER GRAGS PA

SPYI DANG, STAG LUNG, 'BRI KHUNG NANG SO, ZI NA TA'I KU SHRI
CHEN PO SOGS KYIS BSNYEN BKUR DANG, BSTAN PA

SPEL BA'I ROGS RAM ZHAL GYIS BZHES, PRA TI NANG SO SHES RAB
GRAGS PAS DUS RGYUN KHUR BZHES DANG, BRGYA

'BUL GYIS THOG DRANGS, HU LA GU RU'I DGON GONG 'OG GNYIS KYI
DPON CHUNG, KHA LI CI, GCAN TSA,

TZONG NYIN SRIB KYI MI SOGS SKYA SER DRAG ZHAN DU MAS DGON SDE'I
PHYIR 'BUL BA MANG DU BYUNG, CHU MIG RGYAS PA,

ZLA BA BCU BA'I ZLA MJUG TU 'BRUG SGRA DANG, BCU GCIG PA'I MJUG
LA ME TOG 'CHAR BA SOGS PHYOGS 'DIR

BSHAD SGRUB KYI BSTAN PA DANG, DAM CHOS DAR BA, BSTAN PA DRI MA
MED PA RGYAS PA'I RTEN 'BREL MANG DU

BYUNG; RGYA GAR BLA MA GU RU ZER BAS MJAL, DGON 'DEBS YUL 'PHRAL
LTAS LEGS PA MANG DU 'DUG

NA YANG RGYAL BA'I LUNG BSTAN DANG, RGYAL SRAS LA SNGAR RGYAL
GYI LHA MO BLA MTSOR GZIGS SNANG BYUNG BA DANG BSTUN

GNAS 'DIR DGON 'DEBS PAR THAG BCAD, RGYA NAG RGYAL PO THEN CHI
KHRIR BZHUGS LO BCO BRGYAD PA RAB BYUNG

BCU BA'I SHING 'BRUG LO'I NAG ZLA'I TSES LA RGYAL SRAS RIN PO
CHE DANG, SUM PA SLOB DPON PA SOGS KYIS BKRA

SHIS GSO SBYONG MDZAD, GZIMS KHANG DANG, GRVA SHAG BRGYA LHAG SE
TSA 'BUL DPON GYIS SBYIN BDAG BYAS

'DU KHANG NYIS THOG RUNG KHANG BCAS GRUB, HO'U 'BUL DPON PA DGE
BSKOS DANG, HO'U DKA' BCU RO LANGS

PA DBU MDZAD DU BSKOS, SUM PA SLOB DPON, LHA BA CHOS RJE BKRA
SHIS RGYAL MTSAN, THU'U BKVAN DPON RAMS

PA; LNGA MCHOD 'BUL DPON SHES RAB GRAGS SOGS KYIS BGRO GLENG
TSUGS, SHING SBRUL CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM RGYAL

SRAS RANG GIS BTANG, PHYAG LEN PHAL CHER CHOS 'KHOR RGYAL DANG
MTHUN PA MDZAD, CHI KYA DPON RGAN GYIS 'DU

@056 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

KHANG RGYA BSKYED, RGYAL SRAS KYIS BRAG MO RGYAL GYI LHA ZHOL
NAS DPAL MGON GYI ZHAL 'BAG GTER NAS BZHES,

LO SEMS DPA'I LUNG BSTAN DANG MTHUN PAR RNAM SRAS MDUNG DMAR CAN
CHOS SKYONG DU BSKOS, SBAS YUL DKAR

PO RDZONG GI GNAS SGO PHYE, SKU'I BKOD PA GSUM CIG CHAR DU
BSTAN, DGON PA'I NYE 'KHOR DU CHU MIG 'DREN PA

SOGS GRUB RTAGS MANG DU BSTAN, LO DRUG GI BAR DU 'DZIN SKYONG
MDZAD, NYID KYIS MDO KHAMS KYI LO RGYUS RNAMS

HRIL GYIS DRIL NA SHO LO KA GCIG PU 'DIR 'DUS ZHES NYAMS DGA'I
TSIGS BCAD DU, KHA LI RTZA BAR KHU YUG GEGS

SNYIR TSUD GRAB MA ZOS DKON MCHOG GIS, ,KHA LI RTZE MO'I KHYUNG
CHEN GSHOG YANGS KHAR BZHAG MTHON POR THUGS

RJES KHYER, ,TZONG KHA'I BYA TSOGS BSTAN 'GRO'I DPAL GYUR GEGS
NI KUN GYIS MCHOD BYAS SHING, ,SPROS BRAL

MKHA' LA CHOS SGROGS GSHOG 'GROS DA NI GAR YANG 'GYED, ,CES
GSUNGS SNANG, ` RGYAL SRAS SKU 'PHRENG NI, RGYAL

SRAS MI TRA DZO KI ZHI BA LHA, RIGS PA'I KHU BYUG BOD DU PHU
CHUNG BA, SNE'U ZUR BA, RGYAL SRAS THOGS

MED PA, RTOGS LDAN 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO, RGYAL SRAS SHES RAB
'PHEL, SPRUL SKU CHOS 'PHEL RGYA MTSO, DE

NAS RGYAL SRAS DON YOD CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO, 'DI PA DVAGS POR
'KHRUNGS, RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS NGOS

'DZIN MDZAD DE RAB TU BYUNG, DVAGS PO GRVA TSANG DU SLOB GNYER
MDZAD DUS DKA' SPYAD CHE BAS ZHAL NAS KYANG PHYI

GOS DAR GANG LEGS KYIS CHANG BZHIN DU BSNYAL, NANG BZA' BTUNG
SNA TSOGS KYIS PHAG BZHIN DU GSOS, KHA

NGOMS GROD PA 'GRANGS PA'I STABS YAG DUS SLOB GNYER BYAS, NYES
DUS 'JOG PA DBYAR SHI DGUN LANGS KYI

RTZA'I 'BU BZHIN BYAS NA THA MAL PA LA SLOB GNYER YAG PO YONG
BA'I DPE MI 'DUG MIG MAR BLTAS MA BYAS PAR

DKA' SPYAD DANG DU BLANGS, BYANG SEMS RTAG TU NGU, NOR BZANG, MI
LA RAS PA TSO LA MIG YAR BLTAS BYAS TE

YON TAN MA BYUNG NA'ANG BYED LUGS 'GYOD MED BSTAN PA'I MIG RKYEN
LA PHAN PAR BYAS PA YIN GSUNGS, RGYAL BA

BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN, GRUB CHEN NA
KHA BA THAR PA'I RGYAL MTSAN SOGS BSTEN,

DAG PA'I GZIGS SNANG MANG YANG RI BO DGE LDAN PA'I PHYAG SROL
'DI LA ZOG DANG MNGON SHES SOGS MI SHES DGU SHES

KYI 'CHAD LUGS MED GSUNGS TE, ZHAL GZIGS SOGS KYI GSUNG 'PHROS
MI MDZAD, 'PHAN YUL 'JOG PO RIR

MKHAS GRUB KHYUNG BO'I SGRUB KHANG DU PHEBS TE GRUB RTAGS MANG
DU BSTAN, RGYA'I DPON PO M'A SING YES ZHES PAS

STONG 'KHOR MDO RGYUD RGYA MTSO LA, NGA'I YI DAM GANG YIN, DA
NANG ZHOGS PA CI SGOM 'DUG SEMS THOG TU YONG RGYU

ZHIG YOD PA MI YONG 'DUG PA CIS LAN ZHUS PAR, YI DAM THUGS RJE
CHEN PO RED, DA NANG YANG DE BSGOM

'DUG PHYI MA DE NGA DANG KHYOD LA LAS 'BREL MED, SPYAN RAS GZIGS
KYI RNAM 'PHRUL BLA MA ZHIG DANG 'PHRAD 'ONG,

DES STON GSUNGS PA LTAR, PHYIS RGYAL SRAS LA ZHUS PAS SNGA MA
GNYIS DE DANG MTHUN PAS YID CHES, ZHAG BDUN

LUS GNAD BCOS NAS BSGOMS PAS GROL LAM THOB SKAD, DVAGS PO GRVA
TSANG GI YANG MKHAN KHRIR BZHUGS,

DGON 'DI'I GTZOS DNGOS DANG BRGYUD PAS DGON CHEN BCU GSUM, SGRUB
SDE BCU GSUM BTZUGS, DE'I PHYI MA

RGYAL SRAS BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SHING
SPRUL LOR 'DIR PHEBS TE MGON KHANG DU LHA MO'I

@057 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

ZHAL GZIGS, RGYAB RI'I GA-YAS ZUR GYI RTZER SGROL MA GZIGS PAS
DENG SANG SGROL MA RIR GRAGS, DE'I NYE

'DABS NAS KARMA ROL BA'I RDO RJE'I ZHABS RJES RNYED, BYANG CHUB
GLING GI BRAG RI DMAR PO GCIG GI DKYIL DU

LCAM SRING GZIGS, SPYAN 'DREN H'Um BRDUNG MA'I DBYANGS MDZAD, DE
NAS RGYAL SRAS 'JIGS MED YE SHES GRAGS

PA; DE'I SPRUL SKU SKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO, DA
LTA BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG THOGS MED BSTAN

'DZIN RGYA MTSO BZHUGS, ` GDAN RABS GNYIS PA SUM PA DAM CHOS
RGYA MTSO SUM PA ZHES PA'I GRONG TSOR 'KHRUNGS,

SGROL MA'I LUNG BSTAN BYUNG BA BZHIN, BKRAS LHUN SHAR RTZER
BSDUS TSAD LA SBYANGS, 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG DU CHU

BZANG BA BYAMS PA LHUN GRUB BSTEN, BYAMS CHOS, RIGS TSOGS, MNGON
'DUL BCAS DANG, SMAD RGYUD

DU SNGAGS LA ZHIB TU SBYANGS, CHAB MDOR RGYAL BA 'PHAGS PA LHA'I
DRUNG NAS MI TRA LHA DRUG GSAN, CHAB MDO'I

SLOB DPON MDZAD PAS SLOB DPON PAR GRAGS, GZHI BDAG GIS BSKUL BA
LTAR RANG YUL DU BYON, SA BYA LA

'DI KA'I KHRIR BZHUGS TE CHOS KYI CHAR PHABS, THOS BSAM 'PHEL
BAS 'JAM PA CHOS RGYA MTSO, LCANG SKYA

GRAGS PA 'OD ZER, SUM PA DAM CHOS RGYAL MTSAN, 'DAN MA TSUL
KHRIMS RGYA MTSO, L'U KYA GRUB CHEN DGE

'DUN DAR RGYAS SOGS THON SHIN TU CHE, SKU 'PHRENG PHYI MA KHRI
CHEN BLO GROS RGYA MTSO YIN PAR GRAGS, ` SHAR KVA

RING DKA' BCU PHUN TSOGS RNAM RGYAL NYID KYI ZHE BDUN PA CHU
BYI'I LOR KHRIR PHEBS TE LO LNGA'I BAR CHOS KHRIMS SHIN

TU DAM PA DANG, 'CHAD NYAN DMAR BAR MDZAD, SPYI CHOS LA LAM RIM
DANG BKA' GDAMS GLEGS BAM, DPE

CHOS RIN CHEN SPUNGS PA SOGS TSAD MED PA GNANG BAS BSLAB GSUM
GYI NYAMS LEN DANG, 'GRIG LAM BRTAN

CHAGS PA BYUNG, BCA' KHRIMS KYI YI GE SOGS BZHAG PA KUN GYIS
SPYI MTHUN DU TSAD MAR BKUR, SNGAR GTZUG

LAG KHANG BZHENGS RGYUR 'GAL RKYEN MANG PO BYUNG BAS SUS KYANG
RNGO MA THOGS PAR LUS PA MNGON PA DANG MI MNGON

PA'I SA'I BDAG PO RNAMS LA THABS MKHAS KYIS GSOL TE, BYAMS MGON
BZANG PO'I BZHUGS STANGS CAN RGYA

BOD KYI RTEN BYIN BRLABS CAN MTHA' YAS PAS GTAMS PA MTSAR CHAGS
DANG LDAN PAS GTZOS LDER SKU MANG PO

DANG; GNAS BCU SOGS KYI RI MO'I BKOD PA PHUN SUM TSOGS PA'I
GTZUG LAG KHANG RTEN DANG BRTEN PAR BCAS

PA BZHENGS, ` SUM PA BKRA SHIS PHUN TSOGS LHA BA ZHES PAR
'KHRUNGS, 'BRAS SPUNGS DANG RGYUD SMAD DU GSAN

BSAM DANG, ME SPRUL LA KHRIR PHEBS, ` LCAGS BYA NAS SLAR YANG LO
NGO BDUN TZAM SUM PA DAM CHOS RGYA MTSO

BZHUGS; ` 'JAM PA CHOS RGYA MTSOS DGON LUNG DANG BKRAS LHUN DU
THUGS GNYER MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU

GCIG PA'I ME YOS LA KHRIR PHEBS, ` LCANG SKYA GRAGS PA 'OD ZER
THOG MAR DGON 'DIR SUM PA DAM CHOS RGYA

MTSO BSTEN THUGS GNYER DANG, 'BRAS SPUNGS SU DBU PHAR 'DUL MDZOD
THAMS CAD SBYANGS, NGANG TSUGS

BZANG BAS LTAG SGO'I DGE SLONG ZHES BTZUN PA'I TSAD BYED, NGAM
RING DU RAB 'BYAMS PA'I MTSAN BTAGS

MDZAD; LCAGS RTA LOR KHRIR BZHUGS, 'DI'I SPRUL SKU RJE NGAG
DBANG CHOS LDAN YIN NO, ` ,SUM PA SLOB

DPON PA'I GCUNG DAM CHOS RGYAL MTSAN CHU BYA LA BZHUGS, LO'I
TZIS 'KHRUG PA BYUNG SKABS RJE 'DI DANG, CHU

@058 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BZANG RNAM RGYAL DPAL 'BYOR GNYIS KYIS ZI LING DU THABS MKHAS
KYI MDZAD SGO DANG, LCAGS MKHAR SOGS KYI

LAS SBYOR MDZAD PAS SDE 'DIR GNOD PA MA BYUNG, ` 'DAN MA GRUB
CHEN TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO ME GLANG LA KHRIR

PHEBS; ` CHU BZANG BA RNAM RGYAL DPAL 'BYOR SA YOS LO BZHUGS, `
BTZAN PO DON GRUB RGYA MTSOS BYI LA

KHRIR PHEBS, ` BSAM SGANG BA BLO BZANG NGAG GI DBANG PO SOG YUL
DU PHEBS PA'I YAR LAM LCAGS STAG LO'I

DPYID CHOS GNYIS TZAM LA KHRI KHAR 'CHAD NYAN GNANG STE DBUS SU
PHEBS, ` HOR GDONG DON YOD RGYAL

MTSAN; ` 'DAN CHUNG BKRA SHIS 'OD ZER CHU SPRUL LA KHRIR BZHUGS,
LCANG SKYA GONG MA'I RNAM THAR TU BSNGAGS

BRJOD CHE, GONG SA LNGA PA RGYA NAS YAR PHEBS DUS DGON PAR GDAN
DRANGS, SNGAR STONG 'KHOR BA DANG, SKYID

SHOD CHOS RJE SOGS BLA CHEN DU GRAGS PA MANG PO GLO BUR GRONGS
PA'I GZHI BDAG NAG PHYOGS PA'I BRJOD GLENG LA

BRTEN DE MO SPRUL SKU SOGS SGAR DMANGS ZI LING GZHUNG BRGYUD,
CHIBS RAGS SUM BRGYA TZAM GYIS PHEBS,

DGON PA'I GA-YAS NGOS KYI RI LA CHOS KHRI GSAR BRTZIGS KYI STENG
NAS SKYA SER GYI KHROM KHRI PHRAG BRGAL BAR CHOS THUN

GCIG LA LAM RIM GZAB BSHAD, 'DU KHANG DU DKAR SPRO DMAR SPRO'I
GZHIS LEN, TSOGS CHEN LA 'JAM

DBYANGS AA RA PA TZA NA'I RJES GNANG GNANG, YUL LUGS KYI DNGOS
'BUL GZAB, ME SPREL LOR GSHEGS,

` THAR PO BA BKRA SHIS RGYAL MTSAN ME BYA LA KHRIR 'KHOD, ` L'U
KYA DON YOD CHOS GRAGS MDO DBUS GNYIS KAR

MDO SNGAGS LA SBYANGS, LCAGS GLANG LA KHRIR BZHUGS, SHING SPRUL
LA RGYAL SRAS BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN PHEBS

PAR GZHIS LEN MDZAD, ` BDE RGU DPAL 'BYOR RGYA MTSO SHING SPRUL
LOR BZHUGS, ` THU'U BKVAN BLO BZANG

RAB BRTAN PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN GYI DNGOS SLOB MDO
SNGAGS KYI GDAMS PA RGYA MTSO LTA BU GSAN, CHU BYI

LOR KHRIR PHEBS, SKU NA SMIN NAS BO RO CHU 'GAG GI SA'I CHA ZHIG
TU SKU GSHEGS PA'I GDUNG SA 'BUM DE NA YOD,

'DI'I SPRUL SKU RJE NGAG DBANG CHOS RGYA MTSO YIN NO, ` ,L'I KYA
BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN DGON 'DIR BSDUS TSAD,

BKRAS LHUN DANG 'BRAS SPUNGS SU DBU PHAR 'DUL MDZOD LA SBYANGS,
'BRAS SPUNGS DGE 'PHEL DU LO NYER GCIG

TZAM LA SGRUB PA MDZAD, SHING YOS LA KHRIR BZHUGS, BYANG CHUB
KYI SEMS DANG YANG DAG PA'I LTA BA ZUNG 'BREL LA

THUGS DAM GYI GTZO BO DANG, RTEN 'BREL GYI DON LA RANG GI RTOGS
PA'I 'CHAR LUGS MGUR DU BZHES PA BYIN

BRLABS CAN DU BYED, ` CHU BZANG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN
LCAGS SPREL LA KHRIR PHEBS, KHRI BLO GROS

RGYA MTSO DGON LUNG DU GDAN DRANGS, CHOS ZHUS DANG 'BUL BA GZAB,
` LCANG SGYA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NGAG

DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN TZONG SRIB GA-YI DGE'I CHAR GTOGS RTA
PHYUG CES PA'I GRONG DU RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I

CHU RTA LA 'KHRUNGS, 'DI KAR CHOS GRVAR PHEBS PAS THUGS 'DZIN
BGRO GLENG SOGS LA MKHAS PA'I GRAGS PA THOB,

YUL DBUS SGO MANG DU HOR NO MON HAN LA PHAR PHYIN DANG, KHRI BLO
GROS RGYA MTSO'I MDUN NAS DBU MA DANG MDZOD

'DUL GSAN, KUN MKHYEN GONG MA CHOS GRVAR GSAR ZHUGS KYI DGUN
CHOS SKABS DGE BSHES SU BZANG GZIGS

RTOG MDZAD DUS THAR SHUL CHOS SKYONG RGYA MTSO'I 'PHROR, GRVA BA
SPYAN DMAR KHYU RE BA ZHIG BZHENGS TE, KUN BTAGS

@059 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CIG BYAS MA BYAS TSUL ZER BGRO GLENG MDZAD SONG BA DRIS PAS BSAM
BLO LCANG SKYA SKU SKYE YIN, YON TAN LA 'GRAN ZLA

MED ZER, SNGON GYI LAS 'BREL GYIS THUGS DAD 'KHRUNGS TE DGE RGAN
DU BSTEN, NYER DGU BA LCAGS KHYI'I LOR

LHA LDAN GRVA SKOR DANG, RGYUD DU GSANG SNGAGS LA SBYANGS PA
CHEN PO MDZAD, KUN MKHYEN GONG MA'I RNAM THAR BKA'

RTZOM LAS, 'JUG SGO TSAL DANG LHO 'BRUG RA LUNG PAR, ,'JIGS BYED
DRAG PO'I GTOR CHEN DRUG CU PA, ,RDO

RJE 'CHANG DNGOS BLO GROS RGYA MTSO DANG, ,LCANG SKYA MCHOG GI
SPRUL SKU HE RU KA ,BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN RNAM GNYIS ZHABS

DRUNG NAS, ,DE YI THIG DBYANGS RNGA CHINGS GNAM DANG SA'I,
,'KHOR LO GNYIS DANG ZAN LING SHOG LING GI ,

MAN NGAG KUN THOS LAS MKHAN BDAG LA BSTZAL, ,ZHES GSUNGS PAS DE
DUS NAS SNYAN BRGYUD MAN NGAG GI BDAG

POR GRUB LA, RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA SRE RGYUD DANG, RJE 'DI
DBEN SA NGOS, GA-YER GSHONG SNGAGS RAMS

PA 'JAM DBYANGS BLO GROS ZHVA LU PHYOGS BRGYUD DE RJE RIN PO CHE
DANG, BU STON THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I GDAMS NGAG

SNGAR MA THOS PA RNAMS GSAN CING, GTZANG STOD CIG NAS LHAN DU
'DZOMS TE BAL BOD KYI MTSAMS LTA BU'I 'DRES

MED KYI YUL DU SGRUB PA 'BA' ZHIG MDZAD 'DUN GYIS YAB SRAS GSUM
CHAR RTA PHUG PA DAM CHOS RGYAL MTSAN GYI DRUNG

DU PHEBS, RGYU MTSAN ZHUS PAR, DUNG PA RIN PO CHES RGYAL BA
TZONG KHA PA'I BSTAN PA BLOS BTANG NAS, RAN

NYID GCIG PU'I MGO AE THON BLTA 'DOD PA DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN
CHEN PO KHYED 'DRA BA RNAMS LA BAB MI MTSUNGS,

THUGS DGONGS DE BSHOL NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON RLABS PO CHE MDZAD
DGOS TSUL NAN TAN GNANG TSUL NGAG RGYUN

TSAD LDAN DUS GRAGS LA, DE DUS 'DI PAS LTA KHRID DANG LAM RIM
BLO SBYONG GI SKOR, BSKYED RDZOGS SOGS KYI SKOR,

MAN NGAG SNA TSOGS KYI SKOR BCAS PHYAG BRIS SHIN TU ZHIB PA'I
POTA CHUNG AAM PHRAG TU BCUG CHOG PA GSUM YOD PAS

PHYIS SU KUN MKHYEN DANG ZHAL 'DZOMS DUS RANG RE'I 'BUM KHU TSUR
AE YOD KYI BKA' 'DRI GNANG 'DUG SO GSUM

PA SHING STAG LOR GTZANG DU PHEBS TE, SHAR RTZE BLO BANG PAD MA
LAS RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM SOGS DANG, SNGAGS PA

DPON SLOB DGE 'DUN DON GRUB PA LA DBANG RJES GNANG MANG PO GSAN,
SHING YOS LOR SLAR YANG PHEBS TE

SNGAGS CHEN DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN LAS, DBEN SA LUGS KYI GDAMS
PA MANG PO DANG, DRUNG PA RGYAL TSAB PA

LA LAM KHRID DANG BLO SBYONG, ZHE GCIG PA CHU KHYI'I LOR SRAD
RGYUD RDO RJE 'CHANG LAS KHRID CHEN RNAMS GSAN CING SRAS

KYI THU BO RDO RJE MCHED LNGA'I NANG TSAN BDE MCHOG GI BKA' BAB
YIN, CHU PHAG LA MDO SMAD DU 'BYON KHANG KUN

MKHYEN BLA MAS CHOS SBYIN GYI SGO 'BYED PA'I RTEN 'BREL BSGRIGS
PAS, RANG RNAM BKA' RTZOM LAS, MDO SNGAGS

RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA'I DBANG PHYUG MCHOG ,NGAG DBANG BRTZON 'GRUS
DGE GZHON MANG PO DANG, ,BCAS PAS

MDO SDE RGYAN GYI BKLAGS LUNG GSAN, ,DAM CHOS 'CHD PA'I RTEN
'BREL LEGS PAR 'GRIG ,CES GSUNGS

SO; ;

KHRI CHEN BLO GROS RGYA MTSO HAL HA DANG AO ROD KYI GZHUNG BSTAN
LA RGYA'I DON DU PHEBS PA'I ZHABS PHYI MDZAD DE,

ME YOS LOR PE CING DU YANG PHEBS, SA 'BRUG LOR 'DI KA'I KHRIR
BZHUGS TE CHOS GRVA PA RNAMS LA SLOB GNYER GYI

@060 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RTING BSKUL DANG BRTZI BZHAG 'CHAG MED DU GNANG, GZHI PA RNAMS
LAM RIM LA BLTA RTOG BYED DU BCUG STE THABS

MKHAS KYIS 'CHAD NYAN SHIN TU 'PHEL, THAR SHUL CHOS SKYONG RGYA
MTSO, BDE CHEN DPON SLOB BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS,

B'A JO'I BLA MA BLO BZANG 'OD ZER, DKA' CHEN BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS
SOGS BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU DU MA LA DBANG

CHOS MAN NGAG GI SGO PHYE, CHU SPREL LOR TSOGS PA KHRIR NYE BA
LA RDO RJE 'PHRENG BA'I DBANG GNANG, CHU BYA'I LOR PHO

BRANG DU PHEBS, MKHYEN BRTZE NUS PA'I GZI BYIN GYIS GONG NAS DBU
BLAR BKUR, NGA DRUG PA ME GLANG LA RGYAL

DBANG MCHOG LA GSER YIG 'BUL BAR DBUS SU PHEBS, DRUG PA RIN PO
CHE TSANGS DBYANGS RGYA MTSO PO TA LAR

PHEBS PA DANG DUS 'GRIG DNGOS 'BUL RGYA CHE BA PHUL, KUN MKHYEN
GONG MA SKU ZHABS SU BCAR BZHUGS MDZAD

CING SKYES CHEN DU MAR ZAB CHOS BSTZAL, NGA BDUN PA SA STAG LA
SLAR PHEBS, BOD DU SDE SRID LA PHYAG 'BUL ZHUS

PAS GONG NAS RE ZHIG DGONGS PHOG GI RNAM PA BYUNG BA RKYEN NGAN
GROGS SHAR GYIS THUGS DAM 'PHEL, NGA DGU BA

LCAGS 'BRUG LA GONG MAS MTSO BDUN DU LHA KHANG GSAR RGYAG MDZAD
PA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG RTEN GSUM THAMS CAD

RJE 'DI LA GTAD, RE LNGA BA ME KHYI'I LOR KOO SHRI'I LUNG DANG
GSER THAM BYUNG, RE DGU BA LCAGS STAG LOR DGON

'DIR PHEBS TE DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DU MA LA THUGS BZHED KYI CHOS
BKA' DANG, KHYAD PAR DU BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL

NAS SRAS KYI THU BO KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE
PHEBS TE SRAD RGYUD NAS BRGYUD PA'I 'JIGS BYED

BCU GSUM MA'I DBANG DANG, CHOS RGYAL SBRAGS SGRUB KYI RJES GNANG
CHIG BRGYUD MA ZHUS, 'DU KHANG CHEN MO SHING

RTZI LOGS RIS DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM NA LHAG PA GSAR BSKRUN LA
RAB GNAS LHAN DU MDZAD CING, DGONGS

BZHED GCIG TU DRIL TE RGYUD GRVA GSAR 'DZUGS SOGS SKU TSE DU MAR
YAB SRAS THUGS SMON LU GU RGYUD DU 'BREL BAS

YAB RJE BLA MA'I BSTAN PA'I SNANG BYED NYI MA DANG ZLA BA LTA
BUR GRAGS PA YIN NO, ,RGYA NAG TU SLAR PHEBS TE RNAM

DKAR 'PHRIN LAS KYIS SA KUN KHYAB PAR BYED BZHIN DON GSUM PA
SHING RTA LA GSHEGS, ` NGAM RING RAB

'BYAMS PA RDO BA DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO LCAGS RTA LOR KHRIR BZHUGS,
DAM PA GONG MA'I RNAM THAR MANG POR SDE SNOD

'DZIN PA ZHES BSNGAGS BRJOD CHE, ` THEG CHEN SBYOR LAM GYI RTOGS
PA BRNYES PAR GRAGS PA BDE RGU BLA MA CHUNG BA

KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN CHU BYA LA KHRIR BZHUGS, ` GTZANG RTA NAG
PA KUN DGA' RNAM SRAS KYI SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG

BSTAN PA CHOS KYI NYI MA RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I LCAGS SPRUL LA
BZHUGS, ` SEMS DPA' CHEN PO CHOS RGYA MTSO

LCAGS SPREL LA SKU 'KHRUNGS, BOD DU PHEBS NAS KUN MKHYEN GONG MA
SOGS MKHAS GRUB TSAD LDAN DU MA BSTEN TE

MDO SNGAGS YONGS RDZOGS KYI THOS BAMS RGYA CHE, RGYAL SRAS RIN
PO CHE'I BKA' LTAR SHING SPREL LOR KHRIR BZHUGS,

GONG MA YUNG dING GIS MCHOD GNAS SU BKUR TE PHOB RANG NANG GI
THAM KA BLA MA MDZAD, RGYAL BA BSKAL BZANG SKU 'BUM

NAS BOD DU GDAN DRANGS, KUN MKHYEN BLA MA DANG, CHU BZANG RIN PO
CHE SOGS LA NO MON HAN GYI CHO LO DANG

THAM KA 'BUL BA'I MGO 'DREN MDZAD, MTSO SNGON DUS 'KHRUGS KYIS
DGON PA SHUL MED DU SONG BA SLAR GSOS,

AANG DKAR GYIS KYANG, BLA MA SANGS RGYAS DNGOS SU MTHONG, ,RGYAL
BA BYAMS PAS GSUNG YANG BYON, ,GRUB

@061 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CHEN THU'U BKVAN ZHABS DRUNG LA, ,ZHES BSNGAGS, NGA BDUN PA ME
'BRUG LA GSHEGS, ` SLAR YANG CHU BZANG

BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN CHU 'BRUG LOR KHRIR BZHUGS, `
'DAN MA GRUB CHEN GYI SKU SKYE NGAG DBANG

BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS, CHU YOS LOR KHRIR BZHUGS KYANG DUS
'KHRUG DANG DUS MTSUNGS LTA BUS 'CHAD NYAN

GNANG RGYU MA BYUNG, SHING 'BRUG ZLA BA DANG PO'I NANG DU RGYA'I
DMAG CHEN SLEB, SKU RTEN ZHIG GIS, PHO DPA'

BOS BSTAN PA 'DZIN PA'I DUS ZHES LUNG BSTAN RGYAB CING, MI NGAN
KHA SHAS KYI MDUN GROS LA BRTEN RONG 'BROG

GI SDE KHROD NAS DMAG BSDUS TE 'THAB KHUL BYAS KYANG GA-YUL PHAM
STE 'DU KHANG, GTZUG LAG KHANG SPYIL BO RNAMS

DANG BKA' BSTAN BCU BZHI SOGS RTEN RNAMS MER BSREGS TE RJES SHUL
MED PAR BTANG, RIM GYIS LCANG SKYA

RIN PO CHE DANG, THU'I BKVAN GONG MA GNYIS KYI BKA' DRIN GYIS
GRVA BA RNAMS BYANG CHUB GLING, CHOS BZANG,

MANG 'DUS RI KHROD GSUM DU BSDAD CHOG PA BYUNG ZHING, RGYA NAG
PHO BRANG DU SA GA-YOS DANG RDO CHAR SOGS CHO 'PHRUL

'JIGS SU RUNG BA DANG, BLA MA YAB SRAS KYI MDZAD SGO BZANG BAS
SA BYA LOR GSUM PA'I TSES BRGYAD LA DGE 'DUN

RNAMS DANG, SPYI BLA BRANG SO SO NAS DGON GNAS SU PHEBS TE RAS
GUR GSUM DU BZHUGS, MANG 'GYED DANG,

BKRA SHIS GSO SBYONG MDZAD NAS SLAR GSO BA'I SKAR 'DZIN MDZAD, `
GDAN SA GSAR BAR SUM PA 'DUL 'DZIN

PHUN TSOGS RNAM RGYAL BZHUGS, 'DI BAS BOD DU THUGS GNYER DANG,
NGAM RING GRVA SKOR MDZAD, RGYUD SMAD DU

YUN RING BZHUGS 'DUL 'DZIN GYI SNYAN GRAGS CHE, ` WANG CHOS RJE
GRAGS PA DPAL 'BYOR SHING STAG LOR KHRIR

BZHUGS; KHYUNG TSA DGE BSHES RAB BRTAN GYI SKU SKYE NGAG DBANG
RNAM RGYAL, ME SBRUL LOR KHRIR PHEBS, ` BDE

RGU CHE BA DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I SKU SKYE GSUM PA NGAG DBANG DGE
LEGS RGYA MTSO, BA 'OD DKA' BCU DANG 'DI

BA GNYIS RGYAL SRAS SPRUL PA'I SKU SBYAN 'DREN DU SNGA PHYIR
BYON KYANG PHO LHA BAS DGONGS PA MA KHROL, LCAGS SPREL LOR

KHRIR BZHUGS, ` BLA MA BTZAN PO PA'I SKU SKYE RGYA TIG RAB
'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG DON GRUB CHU PHAG LOR KHRIR

'KHOD; SKYE BRGYUD KYANG YOD SNANG, ` SUM PA MKHAN CHEN YE SHES
DPAL 'BYOR PA NI BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS RGYAL

GYI TSA BO MTSO SNGON AERTI NI THA'I JI TSANGS PA SKYABS KYI
SHOG TU RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SHING SPREL LOR 'KHRUNGS,

GONG BA'I BRAG DKAR ME LONG DU KLOG DANG CHOS SPYOD BSLABS,
LCANG SKYA GONG MA'I KUN MKHYEN BLA MA LA GNYER DAM

MDZAD PA BZHIN DGON LUNG NAS PHYIR PHEBS DUS AERTI NI THA'I JI
LA BKA' GNANG, SKU NA PHRA YANG SPOBS PA MTHO

BAS KUN MKHYEN GYIS SU YIN DRIS PAR NGA SEMS PA YIN ZHUS, SUM PA
MA 'KHYOL BA RED GSUNGS, GANG NAS

'ONG DRIS PAR RGYA NAG NAS 'ONG ZHUS, RKANG THANG NGAM BZHON PA
ZHON NAS 'ONG DRIS PAR, DE GNYIS GANG YANG MA

YIN PA'I 'ONG LUGS SNANG ZHUS, BAR DO YIN PAS BDEN 'DUG GSUNGS,
BLA MA YIN NA SLOG PA CI LA GYON DRIS,

KHYED KYIS PAGS THUL CI LA GYON ZHUS, BLA MA YIN NA CHOS SHOD
BYAS PAR, BRJED RGYU MED DAM ZHUS, DE RE RE LA

PHYAG 'DZUB RE MNAN TE NGA LA 'KHOR GSUM SONG, SHES RAB CAN ZHIG
'ONG GSUNGS TE SKU 'GAG BSTZAL, GDAN

SAR BKOD MTSAMS DANG THAR SHUL CHOS SKYONG RGYA MTSO YONGS 'DZIN
DU BSTEN RGYU SOGS GSUNG BKOD GANG DGOS@062 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MDZAD PAS BKA' DRIN CHE BA'I BLA MA GCIG TU BYED, THAR SHUL DGON
NAS DPON SLOB KYI DRUNG DU LCAGS STAG LOR

RAB TU BYUNG, CHU SPREL LA DGON LUNG CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, BSLAB
SBYANGS LEGS, NYI SHU PA CHU YOS LA DPA' RIN

NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS LA RDOR 'PHRENG GSAN, DBUS SU BYON, SGO
MANG CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS TE CUNG GAR DUS DGE

BSHES BRGYAD LA AANG DANG BYUNG BA'I NANG GI DPON SLOB LA MO NAM
MKHA' LA BRTZI BZHAG GSAN, DGUN CHOS NAS

PHAR PHYIN TSUGS, KLU 'BUM PA MOG KY'A 'JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSO
DGE RGAN DU BSTEN, DE DUS RTA TSAG RJE DRUNG,

THOR GOD SGO MANG SPRUL SKU, MNGA' RIS SPRUL SKU, BTZAN PO NO
MON HAN RNAMS CHOS GRVAR PHEBS, ME RTA LOR

GLING BSRE DKA' BCU BYAS, 'BRAS SPUNGS DGE 'PHEL DU PO'U KYA
MNYAM BZHAG PA DANG, MKHAR RDO BZOD PA

RGYA MTSO, ZHOGS DON YOD MKHAS GRUB, CHU MIG LUNG PA BLA MA 'JAM
DBYANGS PA SOGS LA CHOS 'BREL DANG,

SNGA PHYIR KHRI NAM MKHA' BZANG, KHRI NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN,
KONG PO BKA' 'GYUR BA CHOS RIN CHEN, ZHVA

DMAR SHES RAB RGYA MTSO, SGO MANG BLA MA SEMS NYID DAM CHOS SOGS
LAS GSAN BZHES RGYA CHE BA MDZAD, PRA TI

DGE BSHES KYI SLOB MA MDZO MO MKHAR BA SMON LAM LHUN GRUB LAS
SGRA RIS, SKU 'BUM PA BSAM BLO MI THUNG LAS SUM

RTAGS; BTZAN PO MI TSAN PA TZA GRAGS PA LHUN GRUB LAS YIG RIS
SNA TSOGS DANG THIG SOGS DANG, SDE SRID

DNGOS SLOB SKYOR MO LUNG GI SDE BA LHA DBANG PA DANG, BEE DKAR
LA SNYAN SGRON 'BUL MKHAN LUG MGO BLA MKHYEN NGAG

DBANG GI SLOB MA SOG RAMS PA NGAG DBANG RGYA MTSO LAS RTZIS DKAR
NAG LA SBYANGS, SA SBRUL LOR GNAS MJAL

LA PHEBS TE TZA RI BAR SKOR DU TZA RI DANG 'DABS 'BREL BA'I
RTZVA MCHOG GRONG DANG, LHO PHYOGS RGYANG RING POR AA

TZA RA RNAMS KYI SA SA MI SVA RA DANG, BOD PAS RGYA GAR SENG GE
LA ZER BA RI SHIN TU MTHO BA GZIGS, LCAGS PHAG

LOR RANG YUL DU PHEBS, KHRI KA'I DKON PA GONG MAR MTSAN SGROGS
MKHAN CHEN DGE 'DUN DON 'GRUB LAS DUS

'KHOR DBANG SOGS DANG, LA MO BDE CHEN DU KHRI CHEN SPRUL SKU,
DKA' CHEN SMON LAM PA, TSIS KA'I SNGAGS RAMS

PA SOGS LAS CHOS BKA' DANG, GRO TSANG BRAG SPRUL PA'I SKUR KUN
MKHYEN GONG MA NAS BRGYUD PA'I MAN NGAG GSUM

SOGS GDAMS PA MANG DU ZHUS, 'BRUG LOR DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB
GLING DU RDOR 'PHRENG DBANG GNANG, ME SPRUL

LOR RGYA NAG TU PHEBS TE RGYAL POR 'TSAMS ZHU MDZAD, SA RTA LOR
MTSO BDUN LHA KHANG GI RGYAB SHAN LI ZER BA'I

CHU KLUNG GI 'GRAM DU BZHUGS DUS, HAL HA DON GRUB WANG GI SRAS
LA 'KHRUNGS PA'I RJE BTZUN DAM PA'I SPRUL SKU

CUNG GAR GYI DMAG BYOL LA PHEBS PA DANG MJAL, SA LUG LOR PHYIR
PHEBS, LCAGS SPREL LA DGON LUNG RI KHROD

DANG; ZHVA KHOG GI BDE SKYID SGRUB SDE GNYIS KYI 'DU KHANG DANG,
DGON LUNG DGA' LDAN LHAN RTZE BZHENGS, SRI

GNON 'BUM PA CHEN PO DANG, SUM PA'I ZIN YON LHA KHANG, DMAR
GTZANG LHA KHANG BCAS LA ZHIG GSOS DANG,

DGON LUNG LHA KHANG CHEN MOR BYAMS CHEN DANG, BYAMS KHANG GA-YAS
GA-YON GYI LHA KHANG SKU BRNYAN GSUM, GLING

'DABS KYI MCHOD RTEN CHEN MO RNAMS BZHENGS, CHU KHYI LOR PE CING
DU PHEBS PAS PHAG LOR PHYIR 'KHOR, LO SNGA

PHYIR BO KHOG GI BO SHOG THU'I DGON DU LHA KHANG RTEN BCAS
BZHENGS, ME STAG LOR 'DI KA'I KHRIR BZHUGS PA

@063 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BCAS SNGA PHYIR LAN GSUM MDZAD, LCAGS RTA LOR RI BO RTZE LNGAR
PHEBS, BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING, SER LUNG,

'BRUG LUNG, 'DUL BA DGON, DGA' LDAN RIN CHEN GLING, PHO ROD PRA
STI DGON SOGS KYI KHRI YANG MDZAD,

BSTAN PA SPYI'I CHOS 'BYUNG DPAG BSAM LJON BZANG SOGS GSUNG
RTZOM POT MANG ZHING, RTZIS KYI SKOR LA DGE LDAN

RTZIS GSAR ZHES GRAGS CHE, THA SNYAD RIG GNAS, SNGON BYUNG GI LO
RGYUS SGRUNG TSUN CHAD LA SMRA BA THOGS PA MED

PAS PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA SKU 'BUM DU BZHUGS SKABS, SKU
ZHABS SU NAM BCAR DUS GZA' SKAR,

GSO RIG SOGS KYI SKOR DANG, RES 'GA' PHYI NANG DANG, KLA KLO'I
SA SKYONG, BLON PO, DMAG DPON SOGS

KYI 'DOD YON DANG KUN SPYOD SNA TSOGS SKOR, SKABS 'GAR STAG SOGS
GCAN GZAN DANG, BYA RI DVAGS SOGS

KYI SPYOD TSUL LAS BRTZAMS PA'I GSUNG GLENG SHIN TU DMAR, GSUNG
CHOS KYI 'DOD PA 'JO BAS THU'U BAKVAN RIN PO

CHE LTA BU SLOB MAR 'DUS, RJE NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO'I
SKU GDUNG LA SRI ZHU PHUL SKABS BZHUGS MAL DU ZHUN

THIG MTHE BONG TZAM ZHIG PHEBS 'DUG PA ZHAL DU BLANGS PAS SKU
TSE RING ZHING 'BYOR BA CHE BA BYUNG GSUNGS, GYA LNGA BA

SA SPREL LA GSHEGS, SKU GDUNG MCHOD RTEN LA KUN MKHYEN BAR MAS
RAB GNAS MDZAD, RNAM THAR RANG RTZOM

YOD; SUM PA NI SPYIR BOD KYI RUS CHEN BCO BRGYAD KYI NANG TSAN
DU GRAGS LA, 'DI KA'I SUM PA YANG RGYA NAG WAN

LI RGYAL PO'I YUM GYIS GSER GYI BKA' 'GYUR TSAR BRGYA BZHENGS,
RGYAL POR ZHUS TE MDO SMAD 'DIR GTZUG LAG

KHANG MANG DU BSKRUN TE LHA SDE PHUL, LHA KHANG GI BDAG POR LUNG
GIS BSNGAGS PA ZI YON BCU GSUM GYI NANG TSAN

GCIG YIN, SUM PA SLOB DPON CHE CHUNG, RGYA KHO CHE CHUNG SOGS DA
LTA'I BAR DU SKYES BU DAM PA BAR MA CHAD PAR BYUNG

BA'I NANG TSAN SLOB DPON CHUNG BA DAM CHOS RGYA MTSO'I SPRUL SKU
BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DGON LUNG LHA SDE'I

KHROD DU 'KHRUNGS, DBUS SU PHEBS TE GSAN BZHES DANG SMON LAM
GRVA SKOR MDZAD, RANG YUL DU THUGS DAM DGE

SBYOR LEGS PA LCANG SKYA GONG MA RGYA PHEBS KYI SKABS SKU DRUNG
DU BCAR BZHUGS KYI ZHABS 'GYUR MDZAD PAS RNAM THAR

TU BSNGAGS BRJOD CHE, DE'I SPRUL SKU 'DI YIN LA, DE'I RJES MA
'JAM DPAL TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN 'DZIN, SUM

BHA LHA RAMS PA DGE RGAN DU BSTEN TE DGON LUNG RANG DU THUGS
GNYER DANG DBUS SU PHEBS, GUNG THANG 'JAM

PA'I DBYANGS, GA-YON RU DPON SLOB BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS SOGS LAS
CHOS BKA' MANG DU GSAN, TSUL KHRIMS

SHIN TU DAG CING GRUB RTAGS KYI RNAM PA MANG BAS THAMS CAD DAD
GUS CHE BA ZHIG YOD SNANG, DE'I SPRUL SKU AA RIG

NAS 'KHRUNGS PA DA LTA BZHUGS, ` CHU BZANG SPRUL PA'I SKU NGAG
DBANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG RAB BYUNG BCU

GSUM PA'I SA SBRUL LA BZHUGS, ` LI KYA BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN GYI
SKU SKYE LI KYA ZHABS DRUNG PHUN TSOGS GRAGS PA

BSTAN 'DZIN SHING KHYI LOR KHRIR 'KHOD, ` SLAR YANG ME BYI LOR
SUM PA DPON SLOB YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR, THU'U

BAKVAN RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MA NI PHO ROD LANG
GRU'I PHYOGS PHUN TSOGS LUNG PAR PRA STI'I RIGS SU RAB BYUNG

BCU GNYIS PA'I ME SBRUL LOR 'KHRUNGS, CHU KHYI LOR DGON LUNG DU
SKU GONG MA'I GDAN SAR PHEBS, BDE RGU ZHAL

SNGA NAS NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO'I DRUNG DU DGE BSNYEN
BSGRUBS, DMAR GTZANG DPON CHUNG BLO BZANG CHOS

@064 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

'DZIN LAS YI GE BSLABS, ME YOS LOR SUM PA MKHAN CHEN LAS RAB TU
BYUNG, CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS TE THUGS RIG

'GRAN ZLA MED PAS BSLAB SBYANGS KYI RTZER SON, SA SBRUL LOR
THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA ROL PA'I RDO RJE CHOS SDE 'DIR

CHIBS BSGYUR DUS LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHES SLOB DPON DANG, BDE RGU
ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG BLO GSAL RGYA MTSOS

DUS GO PA MDZAD DE DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, KUN MKHYEN GNYIS PA DER
PHEBS PA DANG THUGS YID GCIG TU 'DRES,

BCU DGU BA SHING PHAG LA DBUS SU PHEBS, RGYAL BA SKAL BZANG RGYA
MTSOR MJAL, SA DKAR CHOS THOG LA SGO MANG

CHOS GRVAR PHEBS, KUN MKHYEN MCHOG DGE RGAN DU BSTEN, MDO SMAD
DU BZHUGS DUS NAS THUGS NANG SHIN TU

GTZANG BA'I DBANG GIS CHOS DANG 'JIG RTEN GYI BYA BZHAG THA NA
NYIN GCIG GI 'GRO BSDAD GAL CHE BA TSUN CHAD

KYI BLANG DOR CI GSUNG BSGRUB CING LUNG CHOS MAN NGAG MTHA' YAS
PA DANG, SKYOR MO LUNG RJE'I GZIMS KHANG MAR

KHU BU SKYUR SA RGYAN SBYAR BA'I GDAMS PA GSAN ZHING BLA MA DANG
GNAS KYI CHE BAS LHAG PAR THUGS RAB 'PHEL, STON

DPYID PHUR BU COG TU BLA MA BYAMS PA RIN PO CHE LAS 'JAM DPAL
ZHAL LUNG DANG BDE LAM GYI ZAB KHRID, BDE

GSANG 'JIGS GSUM GYI BSKYED RDZOGS KYI KHRID RES MOS SU GNANG BA
LAN MANG DU GSAN ZHING NYER GCIG PA ME

GLANG LOR BSNYEN RDZOGS BSGRUBS, LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE DBUS SU
PHEBS, CHOS BKA' RGYA CHE BA DANG, GZHAN

YANG PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES, STAG PHU BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE,
YANG DGON SNGAGS RAMS PA, 'BRU LA MKHAN

CHEN YE SHES BSTAN SGRON, BA RI ZHAL SNGA NAS NGAG DBANG DON
GRUB SOGS LAS GSAN PA PHUL PHYIN MDZAD, NYER

GSUM PA SA YOS LA GZHUNG NAS ZHVA LU MKHAN POR BSKOS, SA SKYA
BDAG CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG KUN DGA' BLO GROS LAS

ZAB CHOS MANG DU GSAN, DGE BSHES MANG POR LAM RIM MCHAN SUM
SBRAGS SOGS CHOS BKA' RGYA CHEN GNANG,

NYER LNGA BA LCAGS SBRUL LA MDO SMAD DU PHEBS, SUM PA MKHAN CHEN
SOGS BLA SLOB THAMS CAD KYI THUGS BZHED

LTAR KHRIR BZHUGS, BRTZI BZHAG THUGS THOG NAS GNANG BA SOGS
SNGAR SROL GYI 'GRIG LAM GZHIR BZUNG TSAR

GCOD RJES 'DZIN GANG DRAG MDZAD PAS BZHUGS YUN THUNG YANG THUGS
RJE BYIN BRLABS THABS MKHAS KYI RTING

BSKUL SOGS GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA BA'I DBANG GIS 'CHAD NYAN ME LTAR
'BAR, LUG LOR GSER GYI RGYAL KHAB TU

PHEBS DGOS BYUNG BAS BLA MA GSAR BA'I BSKO BZHAG GI MTSAMS LA, `
'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA RIN PO CHER

GSOL BA BTAB NA LEGS TSUL BKA' GNANG, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA CHEN
POS CHAN ZHI'I LUNG LAS GNANG STE

'PHRIN LAS KYIS SA STENG KHYAB, ` RGYUD PA BLA MA BLO BZANG DGE
LEGS, LO DKAR NANG SO, THU'U BAKVAN PHYAG

MDZOD SOGS BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS TE KUN MKHYEN MCHOG LA
KHRI'I SNYAN 'BUL ZHUS PAR KHRIR SDOD THUB MI THUB

GANG LTAR YANG, SPRUL PA'I SKU SA THAG RING POR PHEBS RGYU YIN
'DUG PAS MJAL 'PHRAD BYED PAR CIS KYANG 'GRO

DGOS GSUNG STE 'PHRAL DU PHEBS, THAMS CAD KYIS GSOL BA YANG YANG
BTAB PAS ZLA TSES BZANG PO LA KHRI 'DON

MDZAD; LO DE'I ZLA BA BCU GCIG PA'I NANG DU LCANG SKYA RDO RJE
'CHANG YE SHES BSAN PA'I SGRON ME CHIBS BSGYUR,

CHOS SRID GANG THAD NAS LEGS TSOGS YAR ZLA LTAR 'PHEL, SHING
SPREL LOR MTSAMS 'DIR LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE

@065 (TZONG CHU'I BYUNG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

KHRIR BZHUGS RGYU BYUNG NA RTEN 'BREL DANG BYIN BRLABS KYI KHYAD
CHE TSUL GSUNG STE KHRI'I DGONGS PA ZHUS, ` LCANG

SKYA RDO RJE 'CHANG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME BYA LA ZHVA
DMAR PHA PHRA'I PHYOGS SU 'KHRUNGS, KUN MKHYEN GONG MAS

NGA'I BLA MA'I SPRUL SKU 'KHRUL MED YIN GSUNGS SHING, RGYAL BA
YAB SRAS THAMS CAD KYI LUNG MTHUN GYIS GDAN SAR

BKOD; DGUNG LO BRGYAD PA LA GONG MA YUNG tING GIS RGYAL KHAB
CHEN POR GDAN DRANGS, KHRI CHEN MCHOG SPRUL BLO

BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MA, DKA' CHEN SHES RAB DAR RGYAS SOGS BSTEN
TE GZHUNG LUGS LA SBYANGS PAS GZHAN

DRING MI 'JOG PA'I SPOBS PA BRNYES, SHING YOS LOR SKYABS MCHOG
SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO MGAR THAR NAS BOD DU

GDAN 'DREN PAR PHEBS, RGYAL MCHOG DE DANG, KHRI NGAG DBANG MCHOG
LDAN YAB SRAS GNYIS LAS RI BO DGE

LDAN PA'I SNYAN BRGYUD KYI GDAMS PA YONGS RDZOGS GSAN, SGO MANG
CHOS GRVAR RTEN 'BREL BSTOD PA'I BSHAD LUNG

GNANG BAS SNYAN GRAGS KYIS 'DZAM GLING KHYAB STE MKHAS RGU'I
GTZUG RGYAN DU BKUR, DPON SLOB CHOS GRAGS PA LTA

BU THAL 'GYUR GYIS BCOM NA GZHAN LTA CI SMOS, CHEN LUNG LHAS
SKYONG RGYAL POR BDE MCHOG GI DBANG GNANG,

MKHAS GRUB GNYIS KYI SGO NAS 'GRAN ZLA DANG BRAL, LCAGS GLANG
LOR SLAR YANG DBUS SU PHEBS, RGYUD STOD SMAD

KYIS BDE GSANG GI DBANG ZHUS, RGYAL BA SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I
RNAM THAR BRTZAMS, GONG SA 'JAM DPAL RGYA

MTSO RGYAL BA'I SPRUL SKUR NGOR BZUNG, SPYAN GYIS MI GZIGS PA'I
TSUL MDZAD KYANG PHYAG GIS REG PAS MDO RGYUD KYI

DPE GZIGS DANG BKLAG LUNG THOGS MED DU GNANG, LEGS BSHAD MANG DU
BRTZAMS SHING KHYAD PAR GRUB MTHA'

LHUN PO'I MDZES RGYAN BRTZAMS TE BSTAN PA LA BYA BA MDZAD, NGAS
'DI 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I GRUB MTHA'

CHEN MO NAS NYER MKHO NYUNG NGU ZHIG BTUS PA YIN, GRUB MTHA'I
'GRO PHYOGS SHIG SHES 'DOD TSE BLTA NA BLTA

RGYU DER YOD CES KHRI CHEN NO MON HAN NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS LA
GSUNGS 'DUG PA MKHAS PA'I LEGS BSHAD DU

SHES PA LA GZUR GNAS BLO DANG LDAN PA'I MKHAS PA ZHIG DGOS PA'I
GSUNG DU SNANG, DE DUS SMAD RGYA NAG GI RGYAL

KHAB NA MCHOD YON 'DI GNYIS ZHAL 'DZOMS, STOD DBUS GTZANG NA
RGYAL BA SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO DANG PAn CHEN

DPAL LDAN YE SHES GSER ZHAL LHAN RGYAS, MDO SMAD KYI LJONGS 'DI
NA KUN MKHYEN SKU 'PHRENG GNYIS PA, THU'U

BAKVAN RIN PO CHE SOGS GCIG LAS GCIG LHAG GI MKHAS GRUB DU MA
GDAN 'DZOMS PA BYUNG, RNAM THAR RGYAS PA

THU'U BAKVAN RIN PO CHES MDZAD PA'I DGE LDAN BSTAN PA'I MDZES
RGYAN LAS SHES PAR BYA LA, DE'I SPRUL SKU YE SHES

BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN RVA LO THANG DU 'KHRUNGS PA SGO MANG DU
THUGS GNYER DANG, RVA SGRENG KHRI CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN
PA RAB RGYAS GTZO BOR GYUR PA'I BLA MA DU MA LAS CHOS BKA' MANG
PO GSAN, SDE KHRI RIN PO CHE LAS DUS 'KHOR

GYI DBANG GSAN ZHING, PHAN TSUN BLA SLOB TU GYUR, RGYAL BA TSUL
KHRIMS RGYA MTSO DANG, MKHAS GRUB RGYA MTSO

GDAN SAR RIM PHEBS LA DBUS SU CHIBS BSGYUR DANG, CHU BZANG DGON
DU JO KHANG 'GRAN ZLA DANG BRAL BA GSAR

BZHENGS SOGS MDZAD PA PHYAG RJES CHE, RE GCIG PA ME RTA LA
GSHEGS, RNAM THAR 'BRUG RGYAL DBANG CHOS RJES

MDZAD PA YOD SNANG, DA LTA MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG THUB
BSTAN DAR RGYAS LEGS MDZAD GONG 'PHEL DU

@066 (TZONG CHU'I BYUNG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MCHIS; ` ME PHAG LA CHU BZANG RIN PO CHE NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN
DBANG PHYUG ` LCAGS STAG LA SER SDING

ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG CHOS LDAN BZHUGS PA LO MJUG LA GTAD NAS
GSHEGS, ` DGE 'DUN MANG GIS KHRI

BYIN GYIS RLOBS PA'I CHED DU, THU'U BAKVAN RIN PO CHE LA BZHUGS
DGOS KYI GSOL BA BTAB, CHOS GRVAR 'CHAG

MED KYI BRTZI BZHAG DANG, THOG MA'I BLO SBYONG GI BSHAD PA YID
'KHUL BA GNANG BAS YAR SKYED GSAR TSES KYI ZLA BA

BZHIN BYUNG, MGYOGS MYUR RGYAL KHAB CHEN POR PHEBS DGOS BYUNG
BAS, ` RDO BA ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG

GRAGS PA RNAM RGYAL KHRIR BZHUGS, ME SPREL LOR KHRI PA BRJE
MTSAMS LA LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHER DGONGS BSTUN GYI ZHU

SHOG PHUL BA'I PHYIR PHEBS SU MCHDO RTEN THANG GI BDE RGU 'DUL
'DZIN DAR RGYAS RGYA MTSO BSNGAGS BRJOD DANG BCAS

KHRI PAR 'ONG BA'I BKA' BABS PA BZHIN BZHUGS, 'DI GNYIS KHRIR
BZHUGS RING DGON PA'I CHOS SRID KYI DON

MTHA' DAG THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHER THUGS RTZE GTAD DE LJAGS BKOD
GANG GNANG BZHIN BSGRUB PAS CHOS KHRIMS

DAM ZHING 'CHAD NYAN SHIN TU 'PHEL, CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM SBYIN
BDAG SOGS GANG BZANG RIM PAR BYUNG BAS CHOS

SRID GNYIS KA'I CHA NAS GZHAN LA 'GRAM CHU LDANG MI DGOS PA
BYUNG, ` LCAGS GLANG LO NAS SUM PA MKHAN CHEN

BZHUGS; ` WANG HU THOG THU SKAL BZANG YE SHES DAR RGYAS THU'U
BAKVAN RIN PO CHE BOD DU BZHUGS SKABS GRVA SAR

PHEBS PAS SPRUL SKU CHE BA'I LUGS KYIS 'GRIG LA ZHUGS RGYUS
MTSON SKU NA GZHON DUS NAS CHOS DANG ZANG ZING GI

BKA' DRIN TSAD MED PAS BSKYANGS, NYID KYANG SKU MDUN DU BCAR
BZHUGS KYIS YUN RING PHYAG GA-YOG ZHUS PA'I

THUGS ZIN GYI SLOB SRAS YIN ZHING, BKA' LTAR HAR CHIN WANG GI
MCHOD GNAS SU YANG LO MANG DU BZHUGS, AO

'U HAN DU LAM RIM MCHAN BZHI SBRAGS KYI PAR BRKOS, DE'I SPRUL
SKU SKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA,

GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYI DNGOS SLOB SKU YON LEGS PAS
SLOB MA MANG DU 'DUS, GSUNG RTZOM KYANG 'GA'

RE SNANG, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL TSUL KHRIMS BTZAN
PO DA LTA'I 'DI PA DANG SKU MCHED DU 'KHRUNGS PA

DGON LUNG CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, DA LTA SOG YUL DU BYON, ` SA SPREL
LOR THU'U BAKVAN RIN PO CHE NAS BYA KHYUNG GI

KHRI DANG GNYIS 'DZIN MDZAD DE CHOS GRVA MA CHAGS PA DANG GSUNG
CHOS SU SPYOD 'JUG GI BSHAD PA MDZAD PAS GSUNG

TSUL HA CANG MKHAS PAS MCHOG DMAN MTHA' DAG GI YID RANG DBANG
MED PAR 'PHROG STE TSOGS CHOS GRVA 'DZIN SKYOR

MTHA' DAG LA BSKUL MA NANG NAS THEBS, DGON PA'I GLING 'DABS SU
RGYA MIS SA RMOS NAS ZHING 'DEBS PA SOGS

MI 'TSAM PA'I SROL NGAN BTZUGS 'DUG PAR TSOGS GTAM BTZAN BRJID
CAN GNANG STE RGYA GRONG BSHIGS, SMAD

DU 'BUL SDUD PA BTANG STE GRVA JA DANG GRVA 'GYED KYI JA TSUL
BTZUGS PA SOGS GDAN SAR BZHUGS MIN LA MA LTOS

PAR SKU TSE 'KHYONGS KYI BAR CHOS 'CHAD NYAN 'GRIG LAM NYAMS
GSOS, BSNYEN BKUR ZHABS TOG TSAD MED, SKU

GSUNG THUGS KYI RTEN DANG MCHOD RDZAS GRANGS DANG TSAD KYIS DPOG
PAR MI NUS GSAR BSKRUN GYIS 'KHOR LO GSUM

GYI MDZAD PA MTHA' KLAS PA'I SGO NAS BSKYANGS SHING, MDOR NA
BSTAN PA 'DZIN SKYONG BSRUNG GSUM LA MNYAM

MED JO BO CHEN PO DANG, RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO'I RNAM THAR KHUR
DU BZHES TE BSTAN 'GRO YONGS KYI MGON SKYABS

@067 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR RGYAS PA GUNG THANG 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MAS
MDZAD PA'I RTOGS BRJOD PAD MA DKAR PO LAS

SHES PAR BYA LA, MCHOG GI SPRUL PA'I SKU RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG
THUB BSTAN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN YANG KUN MKHYEN

MTHONG BA DON LDAN YAB SRAS ZUNG GIS 'GAN BZHES KYIS RJE GONG
MA'I BZHUGS KHRIR MNGA' GSOL, ZAB RGYAS

MAN NGAG GI CHOS RGYUN YONGS SU RDZOGS PA PHUL, SEMS NYID SPRUL
SKU LAS CHOS BKA' MANG DU GSAN, DBUS

SU THUGS GNYER GYIS MTSON CHOS SRID ZUNG GI MDZAD PA SKU GONG MA
DANG MTSUNGS SHING GDAN SA'I KHRI MDZAD,

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU LAM GTZO'I GZAB BSHAD GNANG, GONG MA'I RGYAL
KHAB TU PHEBS, 'PHRIN LAS

KYIS SA STENG KHYAB PAR RTZOM PA'I MOD LA BAR CHAD KYI RNAM PAS
NYER LNGA BA ME PHAG LA GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL PA'I SKU

GDAN SAR BKOD 'PHRAL LTA BUR SKU'I ME TOG YAL ZHING, DA LTA'I
MCHOG SPRUL BSTAN PA'I NYI MA CHEN PO BLO BZANG

DBANG PHYUG BSHAD SGRUB RGYA MTSO SA PHAG LOR ZHVA DMAR DU
'KHRUNGS, SPRUL SKU'I DOGS GNAS SUM CU TZAM B UNG BA

GNAS BDAG LA ZHUS PAR, DON NYI MA'I DKYIL 'KHOR SHAR NAS 'CHAR,
,LHO GA-YU 'BRUG SNGON PO'I SKAD LA

NYON; ;ZHES PA'I LUNG PHEBS LA BRTEN BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU KUN
MKHYEN SKU 'PHRENG GSUM PAR ZHUS TE NGO MTHO BA

GSUM BSAL, GUNG THANG MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE DBUS SU BZHUGS PAR
CHED GTAD KYIS RTZE NAS SNGA SROL LTAR

THAG BCAD, GRE TZE BABS BSTUN GDAN SAR BKOD, KUN GZIGS MTHONG BA
DON LDAN MCHOG GDAN DRANGS

TE DBEN GNAS THAR BA GLING DU RAB BYUNG BZHES, 'JIGS BYED DPA'
GCIG DANG BCU GSUM MA, THUGS RJE

CHEN PO RNAMS KYI DBANG, SNAR THANG BRGYA RTZA, MGON PO DKAR NAG
GIR JES GNANG SOGS GSAN,RJE DE NYID

NAS RDO RAMS PA AA MCHOG BLO BZANG, RAB 'BYAMS PA DPAL LDAN
GRAGS PA GNYIS RIM PAR BTANG STE GSAN

SBYONG GI ZHABS BSKUL DANG, GSOL TSIGS KYI THEBS SU LO RE BZHIN
DNGUL SRAS LNGA BCU RE BSKUR GNANG SOGS

CHOS SRID GANG THAD NAS THUGS 'DOGS CHE, CHU BYI LOR BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL DU PHEBS, SKYABS MGON RANG NYID

KYIS YONGS 'DZIN MDZAD DE MTSAN NYID GSAN SBYONG TSUGS, BKA'
LTAR BSE'I BSDUS GRVA THUGS 'DZIN MDZAD,

SKU MDUN NAS NYIN RE BZHIN RGYUG BZHES DANG DPE KHRID 'CHAG MED,
ZUR CHOS SU 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS SKOR

SOGS MANG DU GNANG BA GSAN, DBYAR DNGUL RAR PHEBS PAR ZHABS PHYI
NANG MA'I TSUL GYIS YAB SRAS LHAN RGYAS

CHIBS BSGYUR, ZHAL 'DRIS CHE ZHING THUGS NANG SHIN TU NYE, MAN
NGAG ZHAL SHES KYANG KHA SHAS GNANG, CHU GLANG LOR

ONG GI BKA' PHEBS BZHIN, PE CING DU PHEBS PAR PHYAG DAR ZI LING
DU BABS PA SOGS RJE GONG MA'I DUS LTAR

THOG MTHA' BAR GSUM DU GZIGS BSKYANGS CHE BA BYUNG, DGUNG LO BCO
BRGYAD PA ME 'BRUG LOR DGON LUNG CHOS

GRVAR ZHUGS TE THUGS GNYER 'PHRO SKYONG NGANG, LCAGS SPREL LOR
BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU, KUN GZIGS MCHOG SPRUL

RIN PO CHE TSOGS DBUS ZHUS TE 'BUL BA SPAM MTHO BA DANG, NYID
NAS BRTAN BZHUGS KYI BSHAD PA GANG RGYAS

PHUL; TSOGS MANG LA DGA' LDAN LHA BRGYA MA'I GZAB KHRID BSTZAL,
SDE KHRI RIN PO CHE LAS BDE GSANG GI DBANG

SOGS DANG, PHYI LOR CHED GNYER GYIS PHEBS TE DUS 'KHOR DBANG
GSAN, GZHAN YANG SUM PA MKHAN CHEN,

@068 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

'DAM PA SPRUL PA'I SKU, CHOS SHES DPON SLOB, YONGS 'DZIN ZHANG
LA RAB 'BYAMS PA BSTAN PA RGYA MTSO SOGS

LAS SNGA PHYIR CHOS BKA' GSAN BZHES RGYA CHER MDZAD, DA LTA PE
CING DU PHEBS TE LUGS GNYIS KYI LEGS MDZAD

YAR ZLA LTAR 'PHEL BA'I SKABS SO, ` ,'KHRUNGS RABS GONG MA YANG
BYANG SEMS NGES DON DBYANGS SGROGS,

MGRIN SNGON ZLA BA'I THUGS SRAS BYI'U ZLA SHEL, MA CIG SRAS
MCHOG THOD SMYON BSAM 'GRUB, PRA SGOM CHOS KYI RDO

RJE; 'BRI GUNG 'JIG RTEN MGON PO, SNGAGS 'CHANG SH'AKYA 'BUM,
'DUL NAG PA DPAL LDAN BZANG PO, NA

BZA' BRAG PHUG PA, MANG THOS KLU SGRUB RGYA MTSO, MI DBANG SA
SKYONG CHEN PO, TZI NA'I YIG MKHAN MKHAS PA,

RJE BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN, SEMS DPA' CHOS RGYA MTSO'I BAR RO, `
,SLAR YANG SHING YOS LOR CHU BZANG THUB

BSTAN DBANG PHYUG ` ,MTSAMS 'DIR DGE 'DUN MANG GIS 'CHAD NYAN
DANG, 'GRIG LAM NYAMS GSO

THUB NGES KYI BLA MA ZHIG GAL CHE ZHES ZI LING AAMBHAN LA ZHUS
TE THAMS CAD BGROS THOG NAS THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE'I SKU

TSAB; AAMBHAN GYI THONG SHI RGYU PA BLA MA SOGS LAS SNE RAG
BSDUS BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS TE 'JAM DBYANGS

BLA MA BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME GDAN 'DREN GYI SNYAN GSAN PHUL, 'DI
DUS ZHAL NAS DA LTA DUS DBANG GIS DGON PA'I

'DZIN SKYONG DU GRAGS PA RNAMS KYANG SRID DANG MA 'BREL BA'I
CHOS RNAM DAG GCIG 'ONG DKA' LA, 'KHOR BA'I BYA

BA ZHIG DANG 'BREL PHYIN BRJOD GLENG DANG GTAM GYI GZHI MA PHAR
JE RGYAS SU SONG STE, 'THAB RTZOD SOGS KYI RKYEN LAS

MA 'DAS PAS MDZOD LAS KYANG, DE DAG NYID DUS GTAM GZHI DANG,
,ZHES DANG, SA'I DNGOS GZHIR MDO

DRANGS PA LAS, SEMS CAN BRJOD PA'I 'DU SHES CAN, ,BRJOD BYA LA
NI GNAS PA RNAMS, ,ZHES GSUNGS

LA; MTSAMS 'DIR SNGA MA'I BRJOD GLENG GI 'PHRO DE MA THAG TU
SONG BAS BYED SPRO BA ZHIG MI 'DUG SKABS 'DIR

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI KHRI'I KHUR YANG 'DZIN BZHIN PA YIN PAS
PHAN TSUN GNYIS KA 'CHAD NYAN GYI GRVA SA YIN STABS

LHAN DU SKYONG RGYU SHIN TU DKA', 'ON KYANG AAMBHAN DBANG CHE
NA'ANG THABS KYIS BSHOL LUGS YOD LA, BLA MA'I

GSUNG NAN CHE BA BZLOG TSUL DANG MNGON LKOG BYED LUGS MED PAS
DANG DU LEN DGOS BYUNG GSUNGS, ME SBRUL

SNRON ZLA'I YAR TSES BZANG POR KHRI LA ZHABS SEN BKOD, CHOS
GRVAR BRTZI BZHAG 'BAD MED DU GNANG BA'I ZHAR

LA SPYI CHOS KYANG MANG DU GNANG, GRVA MANG GIS DAD 'DUN RTZE
GCIG PAS GSUNG BKOD DANG DU BLANGS PAS DGE

'DUN RNAMS THUGS MTHUN ZHING 'CHAD NYAN 'PHEL BA, YUL KHAMS SU
LO CHU SOGS SHIN TU LEGS PAS MTSON

RANG SKYID GZHAN SMON KHO NAR GYUR, ` HAR CHIN THO YON MTHU
STOBS NYI MA SKU NA GZHON DUS NAS THU'U BKVAN

RIN PO CHE'I ZHABS BSTEN, RJE DE NYID KYIS YAB WANG RATNA SIDDHI
LA 'DI PA GRVA SA GCIG TU BZHAG NA LEGS ZHES

BKA' GNANG STE LO MANG POR 'DI KAR LHAN BZHUGS KYIS CHOS GRVA
'GRIM, SA KHYI LOR PHYAG MDZOD DON GRUB DBANG

RGYAL BOD DU DGE SGRUB LA BKAS MNGAGS PA DANG LHAN DU GSER KHRI
SPRUL BA'I SKU DANG 'DI PA GNYIS GRVA SAR BSKYAL

SKABS BSLAB BYA GNANG STE, RA STOD BLA MA RIN PO CHER GTAD GNYER
MDZAD PA BZHIN BLA MA'I GTZO BO, YONGS

'DZIN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN, KUN MKHYEN BAR MA RNAMS BSTEN TE,
'DUL KHRIMS RNAM PAR DAG PA'I SGO NAS

@069 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

THUGS GNYER DANG, CHOS BKA' GSAN BZHES, SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MTHAR
PHYIN CING, LHA RAMS PA DANG

SGO MANG MKHAN PO RIM GYIS BYUNG NAS 'KHOR LO GSUM GYI BYA BAS
BSTAN PA LA BYA BA MDZAD PA'I THUGS ZIN GYI SLOB

MAR GYUR, SGO MANG GI MKHAN KHRI BRJES MTSAMS RANG YUL DU 'BYON
DGOS KYI BKOD KHYAB GNANG BAR, 'GRO

'DUG GANG BYED LAS LA BLTA DGOS PA 'DUG CES GSAL KHA MA BYUNG
BAS ME SPRUL LOR YANG BSKYAR GSUNG SHOG TU,

JA 'THUNG RGYU'I LAS BSAGS YOD NA YANG RANG GIS RTZOL BA MA BYAS
PAR LAS LA BLTA DGOS ZHES BSDAD PAS KHA NANG

DU JA MI YONG BA BZHIN DU 'GRO 'DUG KYANG RANG GI 'BAD RTZOL LA
MI LTOS PAR RANG BZHIN LHUN GYIS GRUB PA YONG

DKA' BAS DA LAN RANG YUL DU 'BYON PA'I RTZOL BA GYIS ZHES NAN
TAN MDZAD PA BZHIN SA LUG LOR RANG YUL DU

PHEBS; LO DE'I DGU PA'I YAR TSES LA KHRI 'DON GNANG, HAR CHIN DU
RI KHROD BTAB STE KUN SPANGS MDZAD,

GSUNG RTZOM KHA SHAS DANG, TZONG LI MKHAN POS MDZAD PA'I RNAM
THAR YOD SNANG, ` LCAGS SPREL LOR RGYA TIG

ZHABS DRUNG YE SHES SENG GE RGYAL MTSAN, ` SUM PA ZHABS DRUNG, `
LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE YE SHES BSTAN PA'I

RGYAL MTSAN, ` 'DAN MA MKHAN CHEN DPAL LDAN THUB BSTAN RGYA
MTSO, ` AU SHRI ZHABS DRUNG, 'DI LA

SKYE BRGYUD YOD, ` SLAR YANG SUM PA ZHABS DRUNG, ` LI KY'A RGYUD
PA ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG 'JAM DBYANGS

BSTAN 'DZIN, ` YANG 'DAN MA MKHAN CHEN, ` SUM BHA LHA RAMS PA, `
KHYUNG TSA ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG

BSTAN PA'I NYI MA, SKYE BRGYUD YOD, ` THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE BLO
BZANG THUB BSTAN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN, `

SUM PA MKHAN CHEN 'JAM DPAL TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN 'DZIN, RDO BA
ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG LUNG RIGS NYI MA, RJE

CHOS KYI NYI MA'I SKU TSAR 'KHRUNGS, MDZAD PA LEGS PAS THUGS ZIN
GYI SLOB MAR GYUR, DE'I SPRUL SKU AA RIG LHA

CHEN GYI SRAS SU 'KHRUNGS, THU'U BAKVAN 'DI PAS THAG BCAD DE
KHUR BZHES KYIS GDAN SAR BKOD, ` WANG

SPRUL SKU SKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA, ` YANG KHYUNG
TSA ZHABS DRUNG, ` BDE RGU BLA MA CHUNG BA, `

CHU BZANG RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DAR RGYAS, ` LI KY'A
SGOM ZHIS SPRUL SKU TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA

MTSO; ` SLAR YANG RDO BA ZHABS DRUNG, ` SER LDING ZHABS DRUNG, `
THU'U BAKVAN ZHABS DRUNG DKON

MCHOG LEGS BSHAD, DGON LUNG DGE BSHES, RGYUD GRVA YUN RING
'GRIMS PAS PHYAG LEN NGES CHA CHE, DBUS

SU PHEBS, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS DANG
SDE KHRI RIN PO CHE YAB SRAS LA GTUGS, GZHAN

RJE GSER KHANG PA SKU MCHED SOGS DAM PA DU MA LAS CHOS BKA' MANG
DU GSAN, 'DI KA'I RGYUD KHRI'I SKABS 'GREL

BA BZHI SBRAGS DANG, SBAS DON KUN GSAL GYI LUNG GSAN NAS CHOS
GRVAR TSAR PHUD, BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM

GYI DBANG GNANG, GSANG BDE GNYIS KYI RGYAS DBANG GI SBYIN SREG
TSUGS, ` BDE RGU ZHABS DRUNG, ` RGYA

TIG ZHABS DRUNG 'JAM DPAL BSTAN 'DZIN NYI MA, ` LI KY'A ZHABS
DRUNG 'JAM DPAL YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA

MTSO; ` BDE RGU SKU RTEN DANG SKU MCHED DU 'KHRUNGS, KUN MKHYEN
GSUM PA, GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS

SOGS LA GTUGS, SKU BSOD RGYAS, ` HOR CONG ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG
BLO BZANG RGYA MTSAN, ` STONG

@070 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

KY'A MKHAN PO BLO BZANG YE SHES SNYAN GRAGS KYI BAR RNAMS BZHUGS
TE 'CHAD NYAN BSKYANGS, 'DI DAG GI RNAM THAR

PHAR ZAD MTSAN YANG MA NGES PA MANG RUNG DKAR CHAG KHA SKONG THO
TZAM KHA TSANG KHUL DU YOD, ` RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG NI,

SNGAR RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHES 'DZUGS BZHED MDZAD KYANG GSANG 'DUS
RDZOGS RIM GYI DPE ZHIG THOG MAR 'BUL

MKHAN BYUNG BAS DA RES BTZUGS KYANG YUN RING MI GNAS PA 'DUG
PHYIS SU 'DZUGS MKHAN 'ONG ZHES LUNG

BSTAN PA'I DUS BAB DANG MTHUN PAR KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD
PA DBUS NA BZHUGS SKABS LCANG SKYA GONG

MAR ZHU SHOG PHUL TE DGON LUNG DU MTSAN NYID KYI 'CHAD NYAN 'DUG
KYANG SNGAGS KYI 'CHAD NYAN MI 'DUG PAS,

RGYUD GRVA ZHIG GSAR 'DZUGS MDZAD DGOS ZHES ZHUS, PHYIS LCAGS
STAG LOR CHOS SDE 'DIR YAB SRAS ZHAL 'DZOMS

SKABS LCANG SKYA MCHOG GIS, KUN MKHYEN BLA MAR SNGA SOR KHYOD
KYIS SNGAGS KYI 'CHAD NYAN 'DZUGS DGOS GSUNGS

PA DUS LA BAB 'DUG PAS, DA LAN KHYED KYIS 'DZUGS DGOS ZHES BKA'
GNANG BAR KHONG GIS KYANG BLA MA'I

BKA' BZHIN BSGRUB STE CHOS SDE'I KHRI RIN PO CHE DANG, 'DAN MA
ZHABS DRUNG SOGS LA 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS KYI

BSHAD LUNG DANG, SRAD RGYUD RDO RJE 'CHANG GI PHYAG MDUD NAG PO
ZHIG GNANG STE DAM CAN GYI RTEN BTZUGS PAR

GNYAN CHA CHE, DA LTA SKU BRNYAN YANG YOD, RGYUD GRVA'I SLOB
DPON DU 'DAN MA ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG BSTAN

'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS DANG, KAN CHEN BLO GROS RGYA MTSO BLA MA DBU
MDZAD PAR BSKOS TE RGYUD GRVA BTZUGS TSUL NI LCANG

SKYA'I RANG RNAM LAS, MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO BLA MA NGAG DBANG PA,
,GRAGS PA DON LDAN BYON NAS DBUS RANG

DANG; ;SOG RANG GNYIS KA'I STER CHA CHEN PO MDZAD, ,KHONG RANG
SNGAR NAS DGON 'DIR RGYUD GRVA ZHIG ,TSUGS

NA SNYAM PA'I THUGS BZHED CHE BA DANG, ,NGED CAG RNAMS KYIS
BSKUL MA ZHUS PA LTAR, ,BLA MA KHRI BA LDAN MA

ZHABS DRUNG SOGS, ,RGAN PA MANG POR 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS KYI,
,LUNG DANG GZAB BSHAD GNANG ZHING BSLAB

DON BTZAL, ,ZHES GSUNGS LA, DE DUS YAB SRAS GNYIS KAS RJE NGAG
DBANG CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO LA, RGYUD GRVA

'DI DA LAN RANG RE GSUM GYIS BTAB KYANG SLAR NYAMS CHAG TU SONG
DUS KHYED KYIS SEMS LA 'DZIN DGOS ZHES

LUNG BSTAN PA LTAR, MTSO SNGON DUS ZING LA BRTEN NAS DGON PA
GNAS MA THUB PA SLAR CHAGS PA'I TSE THU'U BAKVAN

GONG MAS YANG BSKYAR GYIS BTAB, RAG DUNG CHOS RJE TSUL KHRIMS
DAR RGYAS KYIS SLOB DPON GNANG, KUN

MKHYEN SKU 'PHRENG GNYIS PA DANG, THU'U BAKVAN RIN PO CHE GNYIS
KYIS CHU SPRUL LOR 'DU KHANG GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD,

DPON SLOB BLO BZANG DGE LEGS, CHING KY'A CHOS RJE, DPA' RIN NGAG
DBANG BSAM 'GRUB, 'DI DANG RVA

ZHIS DKA' BCU NGAG DBANG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KYIS BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL DU DAM BCA' BZHAG SUM PA CHOS

RJE; RGYA TIG ZHABS DRUNG, GTZUG SHUL DAM CHOS NI SGO MANG GI
DGE BSHES YANG RTZE, LHA RAMS PA BYAS, GUNG

THANG RIN PO CHE'I MTSAN BTAGS KYI GRVA TSANG DAM BCA'I SKABS
RIGS LUNG PHUL BAS MDZOD KYI KHAS LEN GCIG SHOR

GSUNGS; BLA RABS RJES MA MA RNYED, MTSAN NYID GRVA TSANG GI BCA'
YIG LNGA PA CHEN POS GNANG ZHING, BSDUS

GRVA CHE CHUNG, BLO RTAGS GNYIS, DON BDUN CU, GZHUNG GSAR, SEMS
BSKYED, CHOS 'KHOR,

@071 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SKABS BZHI PA, DBU MA, MDZOD, RNAM 'GREL, 'DUL BA STE 'DZIN GRVA
BCU GSUM GYIS SGO MANG YIG CHA

RNYING BA'I DBU PHAR GNYIS, DKYIL KHANG PA'I 'DUL BA, CHOS MNGON
RIN CHEN 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA'I STENG NAS

MDZOD; LCANG SKYA ROL BA'I RDO RJE'I GSUNG GI RNAM 'GREL BCAS
BKA' POTA LNGA'I 'CHAD NYAN ZLA MED, CHOS

THOG KYANG ZLA CHOS BZHI, BAR CHOS GNYIS,DPYID CHOS LA NYE LOGS
DAM BCA' TSUGS PA DANG, DBYAR

GNAS RING CHOS THOG YIN LA, BDUN PA'I YAR NGOR PO TI LNGA KA'I
THAL 'PHRENG ZUR BKOL BSDUS GRVA BCAS KYI

TSOGS GLENG, ZLA MJUG NYIN LNGAR DKA' BCU GNYIS KYIS DAM BCA'
'JOG 'DI SKAS KHAS LEN NGES PO

MED NA RGAN PA CHOS BSDIG MO BYED SNANG, LO MJUG MGON PO'I GTOR
CHEN 'CHAM BCAS DANG LO SAR TSES

GTOR; CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM NYIN BCO LNGA, MJUG TU DBEN SA LUGS
KYI LCAGS MKHAR 'CHAM CHEN DANG BCAS

PA YOD KYANG CHAB MDO'I 'CHAM RGYUD YIN ZER, RDO RJE SLOB DPON
GYIS RTZA SNGAGS BYE BA NGES CAN 'GRO DGOS SHING

ZHAL SHES DMIGS RNAM SKOR SNGA MAS PHYI MAR CHIG BRGYUD DU SPEL
BA DANG, DNGOS GZHI'I DUS CHU LEN GYIS NGAG

BSDAM DGOS PA SOGS PHYAG LEN SHIN TU DAM, CHOS 'KHOR SMON LAM
NYIN BDUN BCAS DUS CHOS DANG DUS RIM

SGRIGS BSTAR GTAN CHAGS SU GNAS, RGYUD GRVAR 'GREL BA TSAR PHUD
NGES CAN, SGRUB MCHOD SKOR, GTOR

CHEN; DUS BZHI'I GTOR RGYAG LHUNG BZED MCHOD PA, RGYUD MCHOG
SOGS RGYUD SMAD NANG BZHIN LA, KUN

MKHYEN GONG MAS MDZAD PAR GRAGS PA'I TSOGS GTAM GYI YI GE BLO
'DZIN GYIS GTONG BA DANG, RJE DE NYID KYI 'DAS

MCHOD KYANG YOD,BLA MA DBU MDZAD RGYUD GRVA YUN RING 'GRIM PA
ZHIG DGOS SHING TSOGS CHOS MA CHAG PA BYED,TSES

GTOR DGU GTOR TZAM MA GTOGS SGER 'TSOGS KYI 'GRIG KHRIMS DAM,
GZHAN YANG SDE 'DIR BRGYA BZHI,

'BAR MA SOGS DANG, RJE CHOS KYI NYI MA'I GSUNG GI GTOR BZLOG
MDOS RIGS GANG YOD, LAS BZHI'I

SBYIN SREG BCAS KYI DBYANGS RTA PHYAG LEN NGOS GTZANG YID 'PHROG
PA MCHIS, ` 'DU KHANG PHUG TU LHA SA'I JO

BO'I BLUG PHUD DU BZHENGS PAR GRAGS PA'I THUB PA CHOS 'KHOR MA,
RJE NGA 'DRA MA, RGYA GAR GYI PAn GRUB CIG GIS

BZHENGS PA'I DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS, BYAMS CHEN CHOS RJE DANG,GONG
MA T'A'I MING YON MCHOD KYI THUGS DAM

RTEN LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJES GNANG BA'I BKA' 'GYUR 'DZAM
GLING GA-YAS BZHAG STENG DU DZHI KshIm LAS GRUB PA'I

BYAMS SKU RGYA GAR SHAR LI GSUNG 'BYON RANG RGYAL PHYAG MDZUB
MAR GRAGS PA, DE DANG LDAN DU BZHUGS PA'I

BYAMS PA GTZO 'KHOR GSUM, THUB PA'I DNGUL SKU TSUL KHRIMS KYI
DRI NGAD 'PHRO BA RNAMS DANG, LHA MO'I PHO BRANG

NANG MA'I RTEN GTZO LHA MO'I SKU THANG SMAN THANG PA'I PHYAG
BRIS MA RGYAL BA DGE 'DUN GRUB NAS BZUNG SKU 'PHRENG GSUM

GYI THUGS DAM RTEN, MGON PO'I GSANG THANG, CHOS RGYAL NANG
SGRUB, KUN MKHYEN GONG MA'I THUGS DAM RTEN

RNAM 'JOMS KYI SNANG BRNYAN, LI MA KHANG DU, 'JIGS BYED BLOS
BSLANGS SA GA-YOS SKABS THIBS 'OG TU SHOR

KYANG SKYON MA BYUNG BA'I LO RGYUS CAN SOGS MANG, ` RGYUD KHANG
DU, RJE DANG 'DUL 'DZIN GYI SHANGS KHRAG GIS

BZHENGS PA'I 'JIGS BYED BCU GSUM MA'I DKYIL THANG MKHAS GRUB
RJES THIG DANG TSON BKYE ZHING RAB GNAS@072 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MDZAD PA, RJE DGE 'DUN GRUB PA'I PHYAG BRIS KYI SGRON GSAL DPE,
RDO RJE 'CHANG GI SKU BRNYAN KHYAD 'PHAGS,

GUNG THANG GI THUB SKU ME THUB MA, CHOS SKYONG SKOR, ` LHA KHANG
CHEN MOR, SUM PA MKHAN CHEN GYIS BZHENGS

PA'I BYAMS SKU, ` SGAR KHAG LCANG SKYA BLA BRANG DU, JO BO LO KE
SHVA RA GLANG DAR KHRIMS PHOG MA DANG, BYAMS

CHEN CHOS RJE'I THUGS DAM RTEN TZAN DAN LAS GRUB PA'I BYAMS SKU
KHYAD 'PHAGS SOGS MTHA' YAS PA BZHUGS, `

THU'U BAKVAN BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'OD 'BAR DU, DRI GTZANG KHANG
RIM PA DU MA, KHYAMS SKOR PHYI NANG MANG PO YOD

KYANG GTZO BO 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MAS MKHYEN YANGS GLING DU
BSNGAGS PA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG CHEN PO DBUS MA DANG,

GZIMS CHUNG RNYOG BRAL BSTI GNAS, AOO tI YA NA, BDE CHEN PHUG
'CHI MED DGA' TSAL, BYIN RLABS

GTER MDZOD, GTUM DRAG ROL BA, MGON KHANG BSIL BA TSAL, KUN RIG
KHANG, GRUB THOB KHANG RNAMS

YIN LA, MKHYEN YANGS GLING DU DBUS SU RGYAL BA SENG GE NGA RO,
GA-YAS SU MI 'KHRUGS PA DANG 'OD DPAG MED

GTZO 'KHOR GSUM PA, GA-YON DU SMAN BLA DANG, THUB DBANG GTZO
'KHOR GSUM PA RNAMS MI TSAD LHAG TZAM DANG,

YANG MI 'KHRUGS PA BYIS PA LO BRGYAD KYI TSAD TZAM GNYIS, GA-YAS
GA-YON GYI KUN RVA'I NANG DU TZANDAN DMAR BO

LAS GRUB PA'I BDE GSHEGS MCHOD RTEN BRGYAD, DUS 'KHOR DANG RNAM
RGYAL MCHOD RTEN KHRU GSUM RE'I TSAD,

BKA' BSTAN MTSAL PAR TSAR RE, RI BO RTZE LNGA NAS GDAN DRANGS
PA'I THUB SKU ME RDUG MA RGYA GAR GYI LI MA, GONG

MA YUNG LO'I THUGS DAM BRTEN KYEE RDOR MDA' GANG LA, BDE MCHOG
PHYAG RDOR 'KHOR CHEN, 'JIGS BYED

RNAMS KYI GSER SKU KHRU TSAD LONG BA SOGS 'BUR SKU DANG THANG
SKU MANG, NGOS GCIG TU, LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO

RJE; STONG 'KHOR BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO, KUN MKHYEN BLA MA, THU'U
BAKVAN RIN PO CHE SKU 'PHRENG RIM BYON GYI

ZHABS SEN BKOD DE CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO BSKOR BA'I BZHUGS KHRI BYIN
RLABS CAN, STENG GI GTZANG KHANG DBUS MA'I

DKYIL DU SHEL GUR NANG DU 'JIGS BYED LHA BCU GSUM MA'I BLOS
BSLANGS LO RGYUS CAN, DE'I MDUN NGOS SU GUNG

THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYIS SPRUL BA'I BZO BOR BSNGAGS PA DE
NYID KYIS BZHENGS PA'I LUNG STON BYAMS PA, RGYAL

BA TZONG KHA PA'I SKU BRNYAN GZHAN PHAN MA, GA-YAS GA-YON DANG,
MDUN DU LCANG SKYA ROL BA'I RDO RJE, BLA MA BYAMS

PA; KUN MKHYEN BAR MA RNAMS KYI SNANG BRNYAN MTHONG BA DON LDAN,
DE DAG GI GA-YAS GA-YON DU TSE DPAG MED

GNYIS; SGROL DKAR, RNAM SNANG MNGON BYANG RNAMS KYI GSER SKU
KHRU TSAD MA, MTHA' SKOR DU GANDHOL DRA MIG

SHEL SGO CAN DU MAR LAM RIM BLA BRGYUD TSANG MA, RJE YAB SRAS,
RGYAL BA SKU NA RIM, PAn CHEN SKU SNGA PHYI,

LCANG SKYA SKU 'PHRENG, RGYAL SRAS SNGA PHYI SOGS DANG, BDE
GSANG 'JIGS GSUM, DUS 'KHOR, 'KHOR

CHEN; RGYAL BA RGYA MTSO, KU RU KULLE, MKHA' SPYOD SKOR GSUM,
SENG GDONG MA, BDE MCHOG DKAR PO,

RTA MGRIN, RNAM RGYAL MA, SGROL MA DKAR LJANG, GDUGS DKAR SOGS
DANG, BSHAGS LHA SO LNGA

TSAR GNYIS, NYE SRAS BRGYAD, CHOS SKYONG DU MA, MCHOD RTEN
BRGYAD TSAD MTSUNGS LNGA, 'KHRI SHING SOGS

BRIS THANG MANG PO, PHYAG DPE POT BRGYA PHRAG DU MA, LHA'I NYER
SPYAD LTA BU'I MCHOD RDZAS GANG MANG, GA-YAS KYI

@073 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GTZANG KHANG BYIN RLABS GTER MDZOD DU, KLU 'JIM LAS GRUB PA'I
THUB DBANG MTHA' SKOR DU MDZAD BCU'I

BKOD PA CAN DANG, BCU GCIG ZHAL GNYIS, DZHI KHYIm GYI THUB SKU
DANG 'OD DPAG MED, THUB PA'I DNGUL

SKU GSUNG 'BYON, RJE MI LA'I SKU KHYAD 'PHAGS, RJE'I GSER SKU
GLANG CHIBS DANG SLE'U CHUNG MA GNYIS, BLA CHEN

'BROG MI, 'BRI KHUNG 'JIG RTEN MGON PO, THANG STONG RGYAL PO,
SPYAN SNGA BCU GNYIS PA, LNGA PA CHEN PO

RNAMS KYI SKU BRNYAN, PHAG MO GRU PA'I SNANG BRNYAN MTHONG GROL
MA, T'A RA N'A THA'I SNANG BRNYAN TING 'DZIN MA,

BSIL BA TSAL GYI RDO NAG LAS GRUB PA'I HE RU KA DZA WA RI BA'I
THUGS DAM RTEN 'KHOR CHEN YAB RKYANG SBRUL GYI

GDENGS KA CAN, BDE MCHOG DANG RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA'I SKU BRNYAN
PHYAG RGYA GAR LI MA SOGS RE RE BZHIN RTEN GTZOR

'OS PA'I LO RGYUS YA MTSAN CAN, DE MTSUNGS KU RU KULLE'I GSANG
THANG, MKHA' SPYOD MA'I GSANG THANG, 'OD

DPAG MED KYI ZHING BKROD BAL BRIS MA SOGS DANG, TZAN DAN GYI
PHUR BU STENG 'PHUR MA CHE CHUNG NYER BRGYAD,

RATNA GLING PA'I GTER BYON GNAM LCAGS KYI RDO RJE, LHO BRAG
PHYAG RDOR BA'I MGUL PHUR SOGS NANG RTEN SO SO'I LO

RGYUS DKAR CHAG TU GSAL, GZHAN KUN RVA SHEL SGO CAN DU MA'I NANG
DU MKHA' SPYOD MA'I DNGUL SKU DANG, RTA

MGRIN YANG GSANG GI SKU CHE BA, TZAN DAN GYI THUB SKU DANG NYE
SRAS BRGYAD, PADMA'I SDONG PO LA BZHUGS PA'I RGYA'I

LUGS KYI LHA SKU CHE TZAM GNYIS SOGS GSER ZANGS DANG TZAN DAN
GYI SNANG BRNYAN RGYA BZO BOD BZO DU MA, BU STON

PHYAG DPE BRGYAD STONG PA RGYA GAR DPE, SKYES CHEN DU MA'I NA
BZA' DANG NYER SPYAD SOGS BYIN RTEN BSAM GYIS MI

KHYAB PA SO SOR KHA BYANG CAN, GA-YON NGOS MGON KHANG GTUM DRAG
ROL PA'I PHO BRANG GI PHUGS SU GNYAN MGON

GSANG THANG TSAR CHEN GYI SHANGS MTSAL LAS BZHENGS PA GCIG DANG,
BLA MA DAM PA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN GYI

SHANGS MTSAL LAS GRUB PA GCIG RJE NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO
SKU SNGA PHYIS BZHENGS PA GNYIS BCAS SHIN TU

GNYAN PA'I LO RGYUS CAN, DE DAG GI GONG GNON GYI MKHA' SPYOD NAG
MO'I ZHAL THANG, KHA'U BRAG RDZONG GI DPAL

MGON THIM PA'I SA LAS GRUB PA'I BRAM GZUGS DANG, GZHAN BRAM
GZUGS MI TSAD TZAM YUM CHEN BZHI BCAS,

DAR GUR NANG DU RDO NAG ZUR GSUM PA'I NGOS GSUM LA ZHAL SGRUB
DUS DANG, GDONG GNYAN CAN, DKAR PO TSE

'PHEL BCAS RANG BYON DU PHEBS PA, GRUB CHEN ZHIG GI RDO NAG
MAndAL, PHYI NANG GSANG PA'I RTEN RDZAS MAN NGAG

BZHIN BKOD PA, MGON KHANG PHYI MAR JO BO RGYAL MTSAN PA DANG,
DAM CAN GYI SKU BRIS 'BUR SPYAN GZIGS

DANG RTEN RDZAS DKOR NOR BCAS BZHUGS, GRUB THOB KHANG GI DRA MIG
TU TZAN DAN DKAR PO LAS GRUB PA'I NYI MA

SBAS PA'I LUGS KYI SGROL MA NYER GCIG GA-YAS GA-YON DU GRUB THOB
BRGYAD CU GYA BRGYAD KYI 'BUR SKU DANG THANG KA

MANG PO, MGON KHANG BSIL BA TSAL GYI SBUG TU MGON PO PHYAG DRUG
PA DANG MGON DKAR GSANG YUM GNOD SBYIN

BZHI DANG BCAS PA, CHOS RGYAL PHYI NANG GSANG GSUM, LHA MO GDONG
CAN GNYIS BCAS, RNAM SRAS RTA BDAG

BRGYAD; BEG TZE LAS MKHAN BCAS, RGYAL PO SKU LNGA RNAMS KYI 'BAG
SKU MI TSAD TZAM PA, KUN MKHYEN GONG MAS

MAN NGAG LTAR BZHENGS PA'I MGON PO'I GSANG THANG, PAn CHEN GONG
MA'I SHANGS MTSAL GYI MGON CHOS, RGYAL

@074 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SRAS BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN PA'I SHANGS MTSAL GYI 'JIGS BYED MGON
DKAR NAG RJE GONG MAS BZHENGS PA'I

CHOS SKYONG DE DAG GI GSANG THANG BZHUGS LA, MAN NGAG BZHIN TSAD
LDAN BSGRUB PA'I RTEN RDZAS RNAMS DANG,

MGON KHANG PHYI MAR TZAN DAN DKAR PO LAS GRUB PA'I 'JIGS BYED
ZHAL PHYAG YONGS RDZOGS YAB YUM GYI SKU BRNYAN,

DRA MIG SHEL SGO CAN DU MGON DKAR NAG GUR ZHAL, CHOS RGYAL, LHA
MO, RNAM SRAS DMAR SER, BEG

TZE BCAS KYI GSER SKU, PHYAG MTSAN DANG GO MTSON SNA TSOGS KYI
SPYAN GZIGS, KUN RIG LHA KHANG DU, NGAN

SONG SBYONG BA LHA SO BDUN GYI 'BUR SKU KHRU LHAG RJE RIN PO CHE
DANG, RJE BTZUN MI LA'I RNAM THAR THANG KA

GZIMS KHANG RNYOG BRAL BSTI GNAS SU, KUN RVA SHEL SGO CAN GYI
NANG DU RNAM RGYAL MA'I DNGUL SKU KHRU GANG BA SOGS

SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS KYI GSER SKU DU MA, GA-YAS GA-YON DU GONG
MA YUNG LOS BZHENGS PA'I DUS GSUM SANGS

RGYAS; RDO RJE 'CHANG, BYAMS PA, SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI GSER SKU
RNAMS KHRU DO RE'I TSAD, AOO tI YA NAR

SPRUL SKU CHOS DBYINGS RGYA MTSO'I PHYAG BRIS PAn CHEN CHOS
RGYAN GYI GSANG RNAM THANG KA DNGUL GAR BLUGS KYI SKU

BRNYAN DU MA, GZHAN BDE CHEN PHUG 'CHI MED DGA' TSAL SOGS GONG
'OG THAMS CAD DU TZAN DAN DANG NAN

MO 'PHRUL MA'I GUR KHANG SHEL SGO CAN DBYIBS MI 'DRA BA DU MA'I
NANG DU GSER DNGUL, CHU SHEL, BA SO, TZANDAN

DKAR DMAR, GSER ZANGS SOGS LAS GRUB PA'I 'BUR SKU DANG MCHOD
RTEN, BAL THANG DU MA, RGYA LUGS

KYI SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS DANG, HVA SHANG GRUB THOB MANG PO'I
BRIS 'BUR GYI SNANG BRNYAN SOGS BSAM LAS 'DAS

PA BZHUGS, SUM PA BLA BRANG DU NANG RTEN LA BSIL BA TSAL GYI RDO
NAG LAS GRUB PA'I HE RU KA'I SKU BRNYAN 'PHUR

SHES SU GRAGS PA, DPAL NA LENTRA'I RTEN KHROD LAS PHAM MTHING PA
DANG, RGA LO SOGS BRGYUD STAG LUNG THANG PA'I

NANG RTEN DU BZHUGS PA PHYIS DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG DU GDAN DRANGS,
DRUG PA CHEN PO TSANGS DBYANGS PA RGYA PHEBS

SKABS BSNAMS BYON 'KHYAR BA DANG, SRONG BTZAN SOG RUS LA SPYAN
RAS GZIGS RANG BYON YOD PA, GZHUNG

NAS MAL MKHAN PO 'BUL SDUD LA MNGAGS DUS RTEN MJAL GTONG CHED
BYIN PA MTSO SNGON DUS 'KHRUGS KYIS YAR

'BUL RGYU MA BYUNG BAR LUS PA DANG, RJE RIN PO CHES BYAMS CHEN
CHOS RJE LA GNANG PA'I TSEMS RING BSREL MA, LO

KY'A TUN GYI BDE MCHOG GI PHYAG GA-YAS PA'I MTHE'U CHUNG NANG
BZHUGS SU YOD PA'I BDE MCHOG SNANG BRNYAN, PADMA

GLING PA'I GTER PHUR DRUG PA CHEN POS BSNAMS PHEBS LHA BZANG
MGRON GNYER SOG PO BLO BZANG MKHAS GRUB KYI

LAG TU BYUNG BA RIM 'KHYAR, SMAN THANG BA'I PHYAG BRIS MDZAD
BCU'I THANG KA SOGS MANG, CHU BZANG BLA BRANG,

WANG BLA BRANG STE 'DI LNGA LA BLA BRANG CHE KHAG LNGA ZER,
GZHAN YANG BDE RGU BLA BRANG, RDO PA BLA BRANG, KHYUNG TSA BLA

BRANG; LI KY'A BLA BRANG SOGS NANG KHAG 'GA' SNANG, GLANG KYA
DKA' BCU'I GZHIS SU RGYAL SRAS NYID NAS GNANG

BA'I LHA MO'I ZHAL THANG BYIN CAN DANG, DGON PA GSAR 'DEBS DUS
DRE'U SKAD THOS SAR BTZAL BAS LHA MO'I RDO

SKU RANG BYON RNYED PA GRVA SHAG ZHIG TU BZHUGS, ` SKOR LAM DU
RJE DRUNG BSTAN PA RGYA MTSO, GONG SA LNGA PA,

RGYAL SRAS SKU SNGA PHYI RNAMS KYI BZHUGS KHRI, KARMA ROL PA'I
RDO RJE DANG, RGYAL SRAS BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS

@075 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

KYI ZHABS RJES, RNAM SRAS PHO BRANG GI SGOR NE'U LE'I RJES, AU
RGYAN SGRUB PHUG TU GRAGS PA'I BRAG PHUG SHING DRA

CAN; ` SBAS YUL DKAR PO LJONGS SU, RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHES GNAS
SGO DANG POR PHYE DUS ZHABS KYI RJES

GSAL BAR BABS PA'I BRAG SUM PA DAM CHOS RGYA MTSO KHU DBON GYI
SKU GDUNG MCHOD RTEN GNYIS, SPYAN RAS

GZIGS RANG BYON, SHAR GYI BRAG LA PHYAG RDOR, SGROL MA, LHA MO
SOGS RANG BYON DANG SGRUB CHU MANG, NUB

BYANG MTSAMS KYI RDO RJE RIR AU RGYAN SGRUB KHANG, STON PA RI
DANG, GNAS BRTAN BCU DRUG GIS GSO SBYONG MDZAD

PA'I BRAG RI, LCAM SRING DANG, BRAM GZIGS GNAS PA'I BRAG STENG
GI NGOS SU GRUB CHEN BRGYAD CU'I SGRUB PHUG

YOD PA'I LVA BA PA DANG, SHANTI PA'I SGRUB PHUG LA DA LTA YANG
LVA BA PHUG DANG, SHANTI PHUG TU GRAGS, ` RI BO

SENG MTHOR, KARMA PA'I PHYAG 'DEBS DANG, SKU GZIGS TSANG MA'I
RJES BRAG LA PAR BTAB PA BZHIN BYON PA

DANG; MI MA YIN DU MA LA CHOS GSUNGS SHING GZHI BDAG SENG MTHO
DGE BSNYEN DU BSGRUB PA'I CHOS KHRI DANG, SKU

GDUNG GI CHA SHAS KYANG BZHUGS PAR GRAGS, ` BRAG RTZE MKHA'
SPYOD RTZE'I LHA KHANG LA THU'U BAKVAN RIN PO CHES

ZHIG GSOS DANG, DE DANG 'DABS CHAGS PAR GZIMS CHUNG MKHA' SPYOD
YANG RTZE RVA SKOR DANG BCAS PA GSAR

DU BSKRUN, LHA KHANG NANG DU SKU GONG MA CHOS RGYA MTSO'I THUGS
DANG, GDUNG RUS KYI YI GE RANG BYON, 'BRAL SPANG

THUB SKU LO RGYUS CAN SOGS NANG RTEN DU BZHUGS PA'I DNGUL GYI
MCHOD RTEN THOG TSAD MA BCAS SKU 'PHRENG GSUM GYI

GDUNG RTEN LHA BAB MCHOD RTEN GSUM, LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE'I
GZIMS KHANG RNYING BAR RJE GRAGS PA 'OD ZER GYI SKU

GDUNG SA 'BUM, RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHE'I GZIMS KHANG DU RJE DE
NYID KYI BZHUGS KHRI BZHUGS GDAN GOS BER

BCAS; SUM PA'I GZIMS CHUNG DU RJE YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR PA'I GDUNG
RTEN, GNAS CHUNG BTZAN KHANG DU SKU

LNGA'I SNANG BRNYAN LA RJE CHOS KYI NYI MAS GZUNGS GZHUG MAN
NGAG LTAR PHUL ZHING, GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYIS

RAB GNAS MDZAD, GNAS BDAG KHANG DU, JING GIR HAN GYI BLON PO KE
REL THU ZER BA MI MA YIN STOBS LDAN

DU SKYES TE BRAG 'DIR GNAS PA RJE DRUNG BSTAN PA RGYA MTSOS GNAS
BDAG TU BSKOS, MING BOD SKAD DU BSGYUR TE

'OD LDAN RGYA MTSOR BTAGS PA MTHU RTZAL CAN BZHUGS, SNGAR GNAS
'DIR SA SKYA'I DGON CHAGS, KARMA ROL

PA'I RDO RJE YUN RING BAR BZHUGS, HOR RGYAL GYI DUS BTZUGS PA'I
RGYA SGO DUS HPYIS BAR DU YOD CING, DA LTA

DE'I SHUL NGOS 'DZIN RGYU SNANG BA BKA' GDAMS GLEGS BAM LAS, DE
YI GZHUNG LA 'JUG NGOGS YOD, ,CES

PA'I LUNG BSTAN DANG MTHUN, RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I SHING 'BRUG LA
CHOS SDE 'DI BTAB CING 'CHAD NYAN BTZUGS

NAS NYIS BRGYA ZHE DRUG PA RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SA BYA 'DI
YIN LA, SHING 'BRUG DE NAS LO DGU PA CHU BYI LA SKU

'BUM DU MTSAN NYID GRVA TSANG BTZUGS, DE NAS LO BRGYAD PA SA LUG
LA THANG RING DANG GRO TSANG DGON GNYIS BTAB,

P'A JO'I DGON BTAB LO MA RNYED KYANG THANG RING GI RJES YIN, SA
LUG DE NAS LNGA PA CHU PHAG LA BYA KHYUNG DU MTSAN NYID

BTZUGS; DE NAS LO BZHI PA ME STAG LA RDO SBIS SGO RIS GRVA TSANG
BTZUGS, DE NAS LO LNGA PA RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG

PA'I LCAGS RTA LA RJE SKAL LDAN PAS RONG POR MTSAN NYID BTZUGS,
DE NAS LO BRGYAD PA ME GLANG LA BSTAN 'DZIN

@076 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CHOS RGYAL GYIS CHOG THU BCOM, DE NAS LO BZHI PA LCAGS 'BRUG LA
BE RI RGYAL PO BTZON DU BZUNG, DE NAS LO

GSUM PA CHU RTA LA GTZANG RGYAL BCOM STE DBUS GTZANG GLING DGU
DBANG DU BSDUS, DE NAS LO BZHI PA SHING BYA LA RGYA

NAG GI RGYAL SA JUR CID KYIS THOB, DE'I PHYI LO ME KHYI LA LA MO
BLO GROS RGYA MTSOS RMA MGUR DU 'CHAD NYAN BTZUGS,

DE NAS LO BZHI PA SA GLANG LA CHU BZANG RNAM RGYAL DPAL 'BYOR
GYIS CHU BZANG DGON DANG, PHYI LO LCAGS STAG LA

BTZAN PO DON GRUB RGYA MTSOS GSER KHOG DGON BTAB, DE NAS LO GSUM
PA CHU 'BRUG LA LNGA PA CHEN PO RGYA NAG TU

BYON; DE NAS SO GCIG PA CHU KHYI LA LA MO BDE CHEN BTAB, DE NAS
NYER BRGYAD PA RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA

GLANG LA KUN MKHYEN BLA MAS BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD,
DE NAS LO DRUG PA SHING RTA LA DPON SLOB

GRAGS PA BSHAD SGRUB KYIS CO NE DGON CHEN DU MTSAN NYID BTZUGS
LA, DES NA CHOS SDE CHEN PO 'DI NYID MDO

SMAD 'DIR MTSAN NYID KYI BSHAD GRVA THAMS CAD LAS PHYI MOR GYUR
CING, RGYAL BA SRAS DANG BCAS PA'I THUGS

BSKYED DANG 'PHRIN LAS LHUN GYIS GRUB PAS BSTAN PA'I CHU RGYUN
RING MO LAS PHYOGS BRGYAR 'PHEL BA'I TSUL LA DAD

PA DANG GUS PA YANG DAG PAR BSKYED RIGS SO, ,GNAS KYI KHYAD PAR
YANG RGYAL SRAS BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS

MDZAD PA'I GNAS BSTOD KA LA PING KA'I SGRA DBYANGS LAS, MDUN GYI
TZONG KHA'I RI RGYUD RING BA NI, ,BLO BZANG

BSTAN PA YUN RING GNAS PA'I RTAGS, ,ZHES DANG, 'DI NAS SHAR
LHO'I PHYOGS MTSAMS SU, ,BA YAN

LUNG PA ZHES BYA BAR, ,GE SAR RGYAL PO'I GO KHRAB DANG, ,GRUB
RTAGS MTSAN MA LEGS PAR GSAL, ,DE NAS

SHAR LHO'I PHYOGS SU SENG MTHO'I RI, ,SRID PA'I LHA CHEN RMA
CHEN SBOM RA YI, ,GNAS GZHI YIN ZHING SRAS MCHOG

SENG MTHOR 'BOD, ,RI GNAS DE NI NGO MTSAR SHIN TU CHE, ,ZHES
DANG, SBAS YUL MDA' RU BLA CHEN DGONGS

PA GSAL, ,SHAR DU RGYAL BA 'OD DPAG MED MGON BZHUGS, ,STOD DU BA
'OD 'JIG RTEN MGON PO DANG, ,

BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED SGRUB SDE BYAMS GLING SOGS, ,MTHONG THOS
DRAN REG MCHOD PA SUS BYAS KYANG, ,THAR

PA'I SA BON 'JOG PAR NGES ZHES GSUNGS LA RGYAS PAR DPYOD LDAN
YID DBANG 'GUGS PA'I PHO NYA LAS SHES PAR

BYA; MCHOD GZHIS LA, SNGAR JUNG GAR RGYAL PO B'A THUR HONG THA'I
JI DANG, DPON MO AA NU SOGS KYIS SBYIN

BDAG GI GTZO BO MDZAD, AE JE NA'I GSHAM GYI GOD BU SE'AM, STAG
