RNA DGON YAN CHAD PHUL, KU SHRI BSTAN

'DZIN CHOS RGYAL GYIS STONG SHAGS KYI MTSO YAN CHAD, ZHVA KHOG
GI CHU MAN CHAD KYI DPA' RIS TZONG KHA DANG 'JU LAG

RONG 'BROG GI SDE RNAMS PHUL BA'I 'BROG SDE BRGYAD KYIS DBYAR
GNAS DANG CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM YANG BTANG,

DPON MO AA NUS SKYID SHOD SDE BA CHOS RJE LAS CHOS GSAN PA'I YON
DU RMA CHU'I 'GRAM GYI SHAR DRANG DPON PO'I MI SDE

SOGS PHUL BA 'DIR SBYAR BA MANG PO DUS 'KHRUGS SKABS RGYA 'OG TU
SHOR KYANG DA LTA YANG 'BROG SDE TSO BRGYAD, GRONG

BA LUNG DRUG YU GUR TSO BDUN, MDUNG NAG KHA GSUM SOGS RGYA CHE
LA GSER GYI RGYAL KHAB TSUN GYI BSTAN PA'I

SBYIN BDAG DAG GIS MCHOD PA'I GNAS YIN NO, ` ,DGON PA'I GA-YAS
KYI LUNG BAR DBEN GNAS GSANG

SNGAGS BDE CHEN, RJE ROL PA'I RDO RJES DGON LUNG KHRIR BZHUGS
SKABS BZHENGS NAS BLA MA MGON PO'I BSNYEN

@077 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SGRUB MDZAD PAS RTAGS KHYAD PAR CAN BYUNG, ` LUNG PA'I PHUR
RGYAL SRAS GONG MA DANG SUM PA SLOB DPON PA

DGONGS MTHUN GYIS PHYAG 'DEBS MDZAD CING, BSHAD SGRUB KYI SDE
GNYIS KYI YA GYAL SGRUB SDE BYANG CHUB GLING,

SUM PAS BSHAD SGRUB GLING ZHES GSUNGS, THU'U BAKVAN RIN PO CHE
NAS CHOS SRID KYIS GZIGS BSKYANGS TSAD MED

PA DANG 'DU KHANG GSAR BSKRUN MDZAD, ` LUNG MDAR THU'U BAKVAN
THUGS RJE CHEN PO NI MDO KHAMS SU SKU GSUNG

THUGS RTEN BZHENGS PA'I THOG MA YIN ZER BA LAS LO RGYUS GZHAN MI
SNANG LA, SKU RGYU TZAN DAN LAS GRUB PA'I

THUGS RJE CHEN PO PHYAG BZHI PA MI TSAD TZAM BYIN BRLABS CAN DU
GRAGS, THU'U BAKVAN GONG MAS BZHENGS PA'I DUS

GSUM SANGS RGYAS LHA KHANG RTEN DANG BRTEN PAR BCAS PA ZHIG RAL
DU SONG BA SKU 'PHRENG RJES MAS ZHIG GSOS

DANG; SKU BRNYAN RNYING BA RNAMS LA BZO BCOS GSER CHOS, KHRU
GSUM RE YOD PA'I BDE GSHEGS MCHOD RTEN BRGYAD

GSAR BZHENGS, DE DANG 'DABS CHAGS PAR LJON SHING, ME TOG GI LDUM
RVA GZIMS SHAG BCAS BSKRUN,

LCANG SKYA NA, LCANG SKYA GONG MA GRAGS PA 'OD ZER GYI GDUNG RUS
MCHOD RTEN, ` BA 'OD 'JIG RTEN MGON PO NI,

'BRI KHUNG SKYU RA RIN PO CHE'I SKU BRNYAN YIN ZHING, SKYU RA'I
DPON PO ZHIG GIS DZAMBHA LA BSGRUB PAS, SKABS ZHIG

SKU BRNYAN ZHIG YOD PA DE'I GSUS PA CHE RU SONG BAR, NGED LA
DNGOS GRUB MI STER BAR KHYED KYI GSUS PA CHE BAS

CI PHAN ZHES 'DZUB MOS BSNUN PAS SKU 'DRA'I GSUS PA BRDOL TE
DNGUL CHU ZAD MI SHES PA BYUNG, DNGUL GYI PHUD

DES 'JIG RTEN MGON PO'I SKU MANG DU BZHENGS PA'I GCIG YIN PAR
GRAGS, LU'U TZIS DMAG GIS SNYAN LA RAL

GRI BRGYAB PAS 'PHUR TE LHA KHANG GI LCAM 'OG TU BYON, DER DED
DE SKU MCHAN LA MDUNG BRGYAB PAS 'PHUR TE RI

PHUG ZHIG TU BYON, BA 'OD KYI YUG SA MO ZHIG GIS 'JIG RTEN MGON
PO ZHES 'BOD KYIN BTZAL BAS, SA PHUG

ZHIG NAS NGA 'DI NA YOD CES GSUNG BYON, YUG MOS GZHAN GYIS
'PHROG DOGS MO RANG GI GOS KYIS DRIL NAS KHYER

YONG BAS SKU GRIB PHOG STE PHYIN CHAD DNGOS SU GSUNG 'BYON 'PHRO
CHAD ZER, RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHE'I ZHABS LHAM

GCIG KYANG BZHUGS, ` SHA BAR NANG SO NA RIM GYI MCHOD GNAS SHA
BAR 'OD DPAG MED NI, CHOS RGYAL SRONG

BTZAN SGAM PO'I SPRUL PA DGE SLONG AA KA RA MA TIS RGYA MTSO'I
'GRAM GYI TZAN DAN SPRUL SNYING NAS RANG BYON MCHED LNGA

SPYAN DRANGS PA'I GCIG SKYID GRONG CES GSUNGS, RTZI'I LO KE SHVA
RA DANG SKU TSAD SOGS NYAMS SHIN TU 'DRA BA,

GNYIS GAR BZHUGS RTZAD MCHOD CES GSUNGS, RTZE'I LO KE SHVA RA
DANG SKU TSAD SOGS NYAMS SHIN TU 'DRA BA,

BZHENGS SKU KHRU DO PA LONGS SKU'I CHA BYAD CAN, GZHAN YANG RANG
BYON GYI LO RGYUS CAN GYI RJE GTZO 'KHOR GSUM MA,

THUB PA RDOR GDAN MA, TZAN DAN GYI 'OD DPAG MED DANG, TZAN DAN
JO BO'I SNANG BRNYAN CHUNG NGU, RGYAL SRAS

RIN PO CHE'I GOS BER SOGS NANG RTEN MANG, NANG SO GONG MA BLA MA
CHOS DPAL BZANG PO RGYA NAG MCHOD GNAS SU

BKUR BA'I BKA' SHOG THAM KA YOD, ` CHOS BZANG RI KHROD DU, THU'U
BKVAN GONG MA RJE NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI

RGYA MTSO BZHUGS SHING THUGS DAM NYAMS RTOGS SHIN TU 'PHEL, RDO
RJE 'JIGS BYED, SANGS RGYAS SO LNGA,

GNAS BRTAN BCU DRUG RNAMS KYI ZHAL GZIGS, TSE BLOS BTANG GI BSAM
GTAN PA BDUN BZHUGS PA'I SGRUB SDE

@078 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BTZUGS; RJE CHOS KYI NYI MA'I SKU DUS SKU GONG MAR BSHAGS LHA
ZHAL GZIGS PA'I GZIMS CHUNG GYANG LOGS LA MI

'KHRUGS PA'I 'BUR SKU STONG, BAR MTSAMS KYI YUL LJONGS LA SPYAN
RAS GZIGS KYI RIGS DRUG 'DREN TSUL

SOGS RNAM THAR MANG PO'I BKOD PA, SANGS RGYAS SO LNGA'I SMAN SKU
BYIS PA LO BRGYAD KYI TSAD TZAM PA DANG 'DU KHANG

GSAR BZO, STENG 'OG TU MCHOD KHANG, MGON KHANG DU DPAL MGON BRAM
GZUGS KYI SKU MI TSAD LONG BA YUM BZHI

DANG BCAS PA, BKA' 'GYUR KHANG SOGS DRI GTZANG KHANG MANG DU YOD
PA'I BKOD PA KHYAD THON, BRIS 'BUR GYI

DU RTEN DANG MCHOD RDZAS RNAMS GRANGS MANG PO, DGE 'DUN GYI GNAS
MAL YO BYAD, JA TSUL GYI THEBS SOGS

BZHAG RJE RNAG NYID KYIS RAB GNAS MDZAD DE RI KHROD LA BDE CHEN
CHOS GLIG ZHIS MING BTAGS, SMON LAM,

DBYAR GNAS, LNGA MCHOD, DGU GTOR, GSHEGS GTOR, DUS MCHOD SOGS
KYI ZHAL 'DON GYIS MTSON

PA'I PHYAG LEN RNAMS LA DAG THER DANG, KHYAD PAR BSTAN PA JI
SRID GNAS KYI BAR DU ZLA RE BZHIN RDO RJE RNAL

'BYOR MA'I SGRUB MCHOD LAN GNYIS RE GTONG RGYUR DKYIL 'KHOR GYI
BCA' SHOMS, GOS DANG GSER DNGUL SOGS

LAS BSGRUBS PA'I MCHOD RDZAS, tA DRIL DBANG CHAS SOGS RNAL 'BYOR
GYI YO BYAD, MCHOD 'PHRENG GI 'CHAMS

GOS DANG RUS RGYAN SOGS SHIN TU SPUS LEGS, DUS BZHI'I SGRUB
MCHOD CHEN MO, HOR ZLA BCU GCIG PA'I

NYER LNGA, ZLA BA DANG PO DANG BZHI PA BDUN PA RNAMS KYI YAR
NGO'I TSES BCU RNAMS LA MCHOD 'PHRENG LA SLEB PA

NA MCHOD GAR BA RNAMS KYIS 'CHAMS GOS DANG RUS RGYAN SOGS TSUL
MTHUN GYIS GYON, SKABS GANG YIN GYI

MCHOD RDZAS RNAMS THOGS TE ROL MO DANG BCAS GAR 'GROS KYIS 'ONG
NAS DKYIL 'KHOR LA GA-YON BSKOR BYAS

TE MDUN PHYOGS SU 'GRENGS SHING, CHO GA BA RNAMS KYIS SKABS GANG
YIN GYI MCHOD 'BUL, RIG MA MA CU

DRUG GI 'CHAMS DANG BCAS RDO RJE GLU SOGS PHYAG LEN KHUNGS THUB
GANG YOD KYI RTA DBYANGS DANG PHYAG RGYA, MCHOD

GAR PA RNAMS KYI GAR 'GROS, ROL MO PA RNAMS LA DUNG CHEN DANG
RGYA GLING 'BUD TSUL, RNGA SBUB BRDUNG LUGS,

MCHOD GA-YOG PA RNAMS KYIS MCHOD GTOR BSHAMS LUGS, TSOGS RDZAS
'GREM LUGS TSUN CHAD RJE NYID NAS

BSLABS; 'DI LA GNANG BA'I DPYID GLU'I GDANGS 'DI RDO RJE 'CHANG
LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJE SKU NA RIM GY IS

MKHA' 'GROS GLU LEN PA DNGOS SU GSAN NAS DE DANG RNAM PA MTHUN
PAR MDZAD PA'I BYIN RLABS CAN YIN PAS

BCOS BSGYUR MI CHOG PA'I BKA' BCAD MDZAD CING, RJE NYID KYIS
RNAL 'BYOR GSANG MTHA'I NYE LAM LA BRTEN

NAS PHYI NANG GI MKHA' SPYOD GRUB PA'I RTOG PA GSAR DU BRNYES
PA'I TSUL MDZAD PA'I GNAS YIN, DE DANG SA KHAD

HA CANG MI RING BA NA SNGON KARMA ROL PA'I RDO RJE YUN RING DU
BZHUGS NAS BYIN GYIS BRLABS SHING, GA-YAS GA-YON GYI

BRAG NGOS LA DBANG PHYUG YAB YUM GYI MTSAN MA DNGOS SU DOD PA
SOGS RGYUD SDE RNAMS LAS RNAL 'BYOR BSGRUB PA'I

GNAS SU BSNGAGS PA'I MTSAN NYID DANG LDAN PAR DON GRUB GZHIS KA
GZIMS KHANG AU RGYAN GLING RVA SKOR DANG BCAS

PA; DE DANG 'DABS CHAGS PAR SKYED TSAL YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL,
MTHA' BSKOR DU LJON SHING GI RVA BA, DE'I

@079 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

NANG DU SPANGS LJONGS DANG BCOS MA'I RI PHRAN SPEL MAS YONGS SU
BSKOR CING DBUS SU DVANGS BSIL GYI CHU MTSO CHEN

PO; MTSO 'GRAM DANG THANG DANG RI SUL RNAMS SU YUL GRU MI 'DRA
BA NAS THON PA'I SHING DANG ME TOG RIGS MI

GCIG PA'I TSAL, BAR BAR DU DBYIBS BKOD MI 'DRA BA'I KHANG BZANG
THOG GCIG PA DANG BRTZEGS MA SHEL GYI BA

GAM LTA BU DU MA DANG, RANG BYUNG GI LO MA'I SPYIL BU SOGS BKOD
PA NGO MTSAR BA, PHO BRANG THEG CHEN CHOS KYI BA

PRA STI CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG DE 'DUN GYIS BTAB, THU'U BKVAN RIN
PO CHES 'DU KHANG GSAR BSKRUN GNANG, PRA

STE SKU SKYES GTZOS GRVA MANG DANG MCHOD GZHIS RNAMS KYIS RI
KHROD MGO 'DZUL BYAS, PRA STI SGAR BA'I NANG RTEN THO

BCAS NYID LA RTZIS SPROD ZHUS, 'PHAGS PA SH'A RI'I BU'I SNAM
SBYAR SOGS NANG RTEN MANG, ` CHOS RJE DGE

'DUN RAB BRTAN GYIS RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA STG LOR BTAB PA
PHRA MA LUNG RI KHROD, ` DE'I ZUR GYI

RDZONG ZHI RI KHROD NI RAB 'BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SHING SPRUL LPR
LI KY'A DGE SLONG GRAGS PA BKRA SHIS KYIS BTAB, `

SGOM ZHIS PA'I BZHUGS GNAS SU, DE'I DPON PO L'U KY'A RAB 'BYAMS
PA DON YOD BLO GROS KYIS BTAB PA 'BRUG

LUNG DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GONG MA TO'U BKVANG KHRI LO
DANG PO LA DGON GNAS SPOR, SA GLANG LOR BYAMS SKU

DGUNG LO BRGYAD PA'I SKU TSAD RTEN BRTEN PA BZHENGS, THU'U BKVAN
RIN PO CHE 'DIR YANG KHRIR BZHUGS, `

RI KHROD BSAM GTAN RTZE NI L'U KY'A SGOM RGAN DGE 'DUN DAR RGYAS
KYIS BTAB, DE DANG POR 'BRAS SPUNGS SU

BSDUS GRVA'I TSIG BZHAG ZLA BA PHYED DU MA ZIN PAS DGE 'PHEL DU
'JAM DBYANGS DKAR PO BSGRUBS PAS ZHAL

GZIGS SAM YANG ZER, SHES RAB 'PHEL TE 'DZIN GRVA GNYIS GSUM GYI
BRTZI BZHAG ZIN PA DANG, 'JIGS

BYED BSKYED RIM SOGS RTZOM PA 'GA' ZHIG KYANG MDZAD PAR GSUNGS,
` LHA GNYAN SENG MTHO'I GSHAM GYI TSANG

KYA'I SKU 'BUM NI DGON LUNG PA TSANG KYA DKA' BCU NANG SOS BTAB,
` STONG SHAGS BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING NI,

SGOM ZHIS GRUB CHEN DGE 'DUN BZANG PO'AM DGE 'DUN BLO GROS KYIS
BTAB, KHONG RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I

LCAGS LUG LA L'U KY'A SGOM RGAN PA'I TSA BOR 'KHRUNGS, CHUNG DUS
KHU BO SGOM RGAN PA'I DRUNG DU BROS STABS KYIS BYON

NAS RAB TU BYUNG, MAR BAS MI LA TSAR BCAD PA LTAR GNANG YANG
TSUL BZHIN BSTEN PAS THUGS MNYES NAS MDO

SNGAGS KYI GDAMS PA MANG DU GNANG, DBUS SU BYON TE 'BRAS SGO
MANG DU THUGS GNYER DANG RGYAL BA PAn CHEN,

RGYAL SRAS RIN PO C HE, SPRUL SKU GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN SOGS
BSTEN NAS ZAB CHOS DU MA GSAN, DKA' BCU'I

MTSAN BTAGS GRUB BSTUN DGE 'PHEL DU BYON, LAM KHRID BSKYANGS,
BDE MCHOG LA RTZAL 'DON GYI THUGS DAM

MDZAD PAS RDZOGS RIM GYI RTOGS PA BRNYES, MDO SMAD DU 'B YON PAR
DGONGS RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHER ZHUS PAR

BSHAD SGRUB KYI SDE GNYIS 'DZUGS PAR LUNG BSTAN CING JO BO RGYAL
MTSAN PA SRUNG MAR BSKOS, RANG YUL DU BYON

NAS RGYA DPON SOGS MI 'DRA 'GA' ZHIG MA GUS PAS NYAMS SAD CI
RIGS BYAS PAR GRUB PA'I RTAGS MTSAN DNGOS

SU BSTAN PAS L'U KYA GRUB CHEN DU GRAGS, DGON LUNG DU RGYAL SRAS
DON YOD CHOS RGYA MTSO'I ZHABS LA GTUGS TE

@080 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BYAMS KHANG GSAR BZHENGS KYI RGYU RKYEN SBYAR ZHES 'DI'I GDAN
RABS TSIGS BCAD MAR BSHAD KYANG RGYAL SRAS RJES

MA YIN NAM DPYAD, LCANG SKYA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN LA
PHRENG BA'I DBANG ZHUS, SGRUB SDE BSAM GTAN

RTZER LHA KHANG BYAMS SKU SOGS RTEN BZHENGS MDZAD, NGA BDUN PA
RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I MO ME YOS LOR DGON

PA BTAB, DGON LUNG CHOS SKYKONG GIS BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING DU
BNGAS, BEG TZE SRUNG MAR BSTEN TE GSHEGS GTOR

BTZUGS; BYAMS SKU BZHENGS, NYIN GCIG PHA BONG MANG PO CHUS KHYER
BYUNG BAR LTA SANGS MDZAD PAS PHYGOS SU

BSGYUR TE RTE PHYIS SU 'DI LA CHU 'JIGS MI YONG GSUNGS, RE GCIG
PA LCAGS LUG LA BSHAD GRVA BTZUGS, DE'I SPRUL

SKU MCHOG GRUB RGYAL MTSAN MTSO SNGON SOG ROL TSO BAR 'KHRUNGS,
DGUNG LO DRUG PA LA GDAN SAR BKOD, DGON

LUN DANG YUL DBUS SGO MANG CHOS GRVAR THUGS GNYER MDZAD, RANG
YUL DU BYON NAS MDUNG NAG 'JAM DBYANGS

DGON DANG 'DI KA'I KHRIR BZHUGS TE LUGS GNYIS KYIS BSKYANGS,
SLAR BOD DU TSOGS GSOG LA BYON SKABS RGYAL

DBANG MCHOG NAS AE RTI NI HU THOG THU'I CHO LO DANG, PHUR BU
SOGS RTEN CHAS MANG DU BSTZAL, PHYIR PHEBS LAM

THO SU NOR NAS MTSO KHA DANG RGYA'I DUS ZING GIS SKU 'BUM, DGON
LUNG, GSER KHOG SOGS LA SKYON BYUNG BA'I

GNAS TSUL GSAN 'PHRAL ZHI BAR GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU LANG JU'I
PADMO SDER 'KHRUNGS PA PHUN TSOGS GRAGS PA

DAR RGYAS KYIS SUM BHA MKHAN CHEN SOGS LA GTUGS, MTSAMS 'DIR
RGYA TIG NAS 'KHRUNGS PA ZHIG YOD ZER TE

ZHIB CHA MA NGES, DE'I RJES MA TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO
LCANG SKYA GONG MA DANG SKU MCHED DU CHU STAG LA

'KHRUNGS; SDE KHRI RIN PO CHE'I DNGOS SLOB, BTZUN TSUGS LEGS,
RTZE LNGAR LAN GNYIS DANG DBUS SU YANG

PHEBS; DGON LUNG KHRIR BZHUGS, DON GNYIS PA CHU GLANG LA GSHEGS,
LO DER LCANG SKYA 'DI PA DANG SKU

MCHED DU 'KHRUNGS PA TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS LHA RAMS PA
BSAM GTAN PHUN TSOGS BSTEN NAS LEGS

MDZAD YAR LDAN DU MCHIS, ` 'CHAD NYAN GSAR TSUGS KYI THOG MAR
GNAS LNGA RIG PA BZANG PO DAR GYAS PAS

SLOB DPON MDZAD, GZHI GSUM GYI PHAYG LEN DANG GAR THIG DBYANGS
GTSUM SOGS BSLABS, SA YOS LOR 'DU

KHANG BZHENGS, CHU RTA LA RDO RJE 'CHANG BLO GROS RGYA MTSO
BZHUGS TE KA BA BRGYA DANG BCO BRGYAD YOD PA'I 'DU KHANG

RGYAB; SUM PA CHOS RJE PHUN TSOGS RNAM RGYAL LCAGS YOS LA
BZHUGS, MNGON RTOGS RGYAN BTZUGS, CHU SBRUL

LOR DON GRUB RGYA MTSO KHRIR PHEBS NAS BSDUS GRVA, BLO RTAGS,
DBU PHAR, LAM RIM BCAS LA 'CHAD NYAN

DMAR; DGON LUNG WANG GRAGS PA DPAL 'BYOR ME SPREL LA BZHUGS, SA
PHAG LA GRUB DBANG SPRUL SKU MCHOG

GRUB RGYAL MTSAN, SHING 'BRUG LOR RJE CHOS DBANG RGYA MTSO LO
GCIG TZAM BZHUGS TE YO BYAD GANG YOD TSOGS SU

PHUL NAS BYA BTANG GIS RI KHROS DU PHEBS, 'DIS BRTZAMS PA'I GDAN
RABS TSIGS BCAD YOD, SHING SBRUL

LA KHYUNG TSA DGE BSHES RAB BRTAN GYI SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG BLO
BZANG, ME LUG LA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN, SA BYA LOR

BSHES GNYEN BZANG PO BSAM GTAN BZHUGS, CHU GLUNG LOR SUM PA YE
SHES DPAL 'BYOR PHEBS NAS MDO

SNGAGS LA BSHAD NYAN DANG MI TRA SOGS RGYUD SDE'I DBANG BKA'
MANG DU BSTZAL, THU'U BAKVAN RIN PO CHE YANG KHRIR

@081 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BZHUGS TE 'GRIG LAM BCA' YIG NANG LTAR BSDAMS SHING 'DZIN GRVA
THAMS CAD LA BGRO GLENG DANG BRTZI BZHAG GI

RGYUG BZHES DANG 'CHAD NYAN GANG LEGS GNANG, SLOB CHUNG DU LHA
RAMS PA DON GRUB RGYA MTSO BSKOS, SGA ZA SKU

THOG DANG PO BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO DBUS KYI DGE BSHES, DE'I RJES
MA BA YID TSO BAR 'KHRUNGS PA TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MA

TSO PA'I BAR BYON CING, PHYIS SU SKU 'BUM DKA' BCU CHOS GRAGS
'OD ZER DANG, PHUR TSA ZHABS DRUNG GNYIS

KYANG KHRIR BZHUGS, RJE'I ZHAL THANG PHYAG NAS MA GRUB DBANG SKU
PHRENG GNYIS PAS GDAN DRANGS PA'I BYIN CAN,

BKA' BSTAN SOGS RTEN GSUM MANG, RAB NYI'I ME YOS LA CHOS SDE
BTAB NAS LO BRGYA DANG RE GSUM PA RAB

YID SA BYA YIN LA BSHAD GRVA SHIN TU BZANG ZHING GRVA TSOGS SUM
BRGYA BRGAL BA YOD SNANG, 'DI DANG BSAM GTAN

RTZE; 'BRUG LUNG STE SGAR GSUM GYI MCHOD GZHIS SGA ZA KHAG
GNYIS, DBYANGS CHUNG BA YID TSO BA, KHYI GYA LA

KHA'I P'A YE STE TSO BZHI YOD, ` STONG BSHAG SMAD SER SDING RI
KHROD SER SDING GRVA RIGS ZHIG BSDAD PA LAS CHAGS

ZER; DENG SANG THANG RING GI GONG BA SKU SKYES KYIS BDG BYED, `
SMON RAMS PA AA KY'A ZHABS DRUNG SBYIN PA RGYA

MTSOS BTAB PA AA KY'A RI KHROD, ` ,M'A CHI RI KHROD SRE YU SGOM
CHEN PHUN TSOGS RGYA MTSOS BTAB, ` RGYUD PA

SGAR CHOS 'KHOR GLING NI DBUS NAS RGYUD PAS BTANG PA'I 'BUL SDUD
PA ZHIG BSDAD PA'I SGAR LA BRTEN NAS CHAGS

SHING; 'DI LA RGYAL DBANG GIS GNANG BA'I BKA' SHOG NGO MTSAR BA
DENG SANG YOD, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD

MKHYEN PAS THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE LA DGON ZHIG GSAR 'DZIN GYI
BKOD KHYAB GNANG BAR BRTEN LUNG BSTAN ZHUS

PAS; BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING GI 'BROG SDE'I KHROD SA DPYAD LEGS
SHING GNAS BKRA BZANG BA TZ'A TSE ZER BAR BAB PA

DER DGON GSAR THAR BA GLING GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD PA DANG BSGRIL BA
YIN LA, DE YANG LCAGS GLANG LOR RDO RJE

'CHANG NYID DER PHEBS TE SA BCOS DANG LHO 'PHYE'I BRTAG PA SOGS
MDZAD DE BUM GTER BCUG AA NAM TSO BA LA

BKA' GNANG STE, GA-YAS GA-YON GYI MCHOD RTEN LUNG PA DANG, BKRA
SHIS LUNG PA, LHA LUNG SOGS SA MTSAMS

BCAD; 'DU KHANG DBUS 'PHUG GI DBUS SU NYID KYI BZHUGS KHRI,
GA-YAS GA-YON DU LAM RIM BLA BRGYUD KYI SKU

BRNYAN BYIS PA LO BRGYAD KYI BONGS TSOD TZAM LNGA BCU NGA DGU,
'OG SHOD LOGS BRIS LA MDZAD BCU DANG, RJE'I

RNAM THAR RGYAS PA, RGYA MTHONG DU BLA BRGYUD SOGS KYI LDEBS
BRIS, STENG DU GSER ZANGS KYI GNYDZI RA, STENG

SHOD GA-YAS KYI MCHOD KHANG DU JO BO'I SKU BRNYAN MTHONG BA DON
LDAN GYIS GTZOS PA'I BRIS 'BUR GYI SKU DU MA, GA-YON

GYI MGON KHANG DU RGYAL GYI LHA MO'I BLA MTSO'I CHU DANG, BYE MA
RDE'U SOGS RGYA BOD KYI GNAS CHEN RNAMS DANG MGON

KHANG DUR KHROD MANG PO'I SA RDO, DAM PA MANG PO'I DBU LO NA
BZA' SOGS PHYOGS BSDEBS KYIS SKU RGYU BYAS SHING,

THUGS KAR SROG 'KHOR BRIS SGRUB SOGS GZUNGS GZHUG TSAD LDAN GYI
DMAG ZOR LHA MO'I SKU BRNYAN MTHO BCU TZAM

PA; SKU THANG BYIN CHEN, RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHES GNANG BA'I TZAN
DANG YI BE CON SOGS SPYAN GZIGS SNA TSOGS,

DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG DGA' BLOS BZHENGS PA'I LHA KHANG RGYA 'PHUG
GYO THOG CAN DU BKA' 'GYUR RO COG GI CHOS

'KHOR CHEN MO, BTZAN KHANG PHO BRANG NANG MAR DAM CAN GSANG
'GRUB, NOR SGRUB, MGAR NAG GSUM GYI SKU@082 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BRNYAN MTHO BDUN RE TZAM PA SHIN TU BKA' GNYAN PA, PHO BRANG
PHYI MAR BZANG GOS SNA TSOGS KYI DRA BA DRA PHYED SOGS

SPYAN GZIGS SPUS GTZANG, MI 'KHRUGS PA'I GOS SKU SRID DU 'DOM
BRGYAD CAN SOGS BZHUGS, MCHOD RDZAS

DANG; DGE 'DUN LA BSNYEN BKUR GYI YO BYAD GRANGS MANG, BLA BRANG
GI DBUS KYI LHA KHANG DU DUS GSUM SANGS

RGYAS KYI GSER SKU YUNG LO'I THUGS DAM MAR GRAGS PA BYIN CAN
BZHUGS KHRI RGYAB YOL BCAS, TZANDAN GYI PAn CHEN

RIN PO CHE'I 'DRA SKU KHRU GANG BA BKRAS LHUN NANG RTEN NAS
BYUNG BA, TZAN DMAR GYI BDE GSHEGS BRGYAD KYI SKU BRNYAN

DANG; LHA BAB MCHOD RTEN CHE BA, RJE GLING 'PHUR MA SOGS TZAN
DAN DANG GSER ZANGS KYI SKU BRNYAN DU MA,

THUB PA'I DBANG BO DANG, JO BO CHEN PO, RJE RIN PO CHE, RGYAL
DBANG BCAS KYI RNAM THAR, LAM RIM TSOGS

ZHING SOGS SKU THANG MANG PO, STENG SHOD DU BKA' 'GYUR DBUS PAR
DANG PHYAG DPE PO TI BRGYA PHRAG BRGAL BA,

'PHAGS PA BCU GCIG ZHAL GYI SKU BRNYAN CHE BA SOGS BRIS 'BUR GYI
SKU DU MA, MGON KHANG DU DPAL MGON ZHAL

GYI RTEN THANG BSKANG RDZAS SPYAN GZIGS, GZIMS KHANG RNAMS SU
BYAMS PA RIN PO CHE SOGS RTZA BA'I BLA MA RNAMS

DANG; BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM, N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD, RTA MGRIN GSANG
SGRUB SOGS THUGS DAM GYI SKU

BRNYAN BRIS 'BUR, MCHOD RDZAS DANG, MCHOD PA'I YO BYAD, KHANG
RGYAN GYI SNOD SPYAD MTHA' YAS PA TSAR DU

DNGAR BA, MDUN NGOS KLU SDINGS SU RIGS MI 'DRA BA'I SA BON DU
MAS BSKYED PA'I RTZI SHING DANG, ME TOG PAD

MA SNA TSOGS KYIS GANG BA'I SKYED TSAL, CHOS SPYOD KYI MDZAD PA
YANG GZHI GSUM GYI PHYAG LEN, TSOGS PA'I ZHAL

'DON DU MI 'KHRUGS PA'I CHO GA GTAN CHAGS, SGRUB MCHOD, CHO
'PHRUL SMON LAM, BEG TZE GTZO 'KHOR

GSUM; GRI THOG BSHAN PA BRGYAD, DAM CAN, KENG RUS GNYIS, AA TZA
RA GNYIS DANG BCAS PA'I 'CHAM

BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I PHYAG LEN, BZHI BA DANG DGU BA'I SMYUNG
GNAS, DRUG PA'I SMON LAM, LO SAR LHA MO'I TSES

GTOR SOGS KYI 'GRIG KHRIMS NGOS GTZANG, KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS
BZHAD PAS GTZOS SKYES CHEN DU MA GDAN

DRANGS TE RAB GNAS, ZAB RGYAS KYI CHOS 'KHOR BSKOR BAS SNOD BCUD
LA YE SHES KYI BYIN CHEN PO DBAB, BLA MA

HOR SGOM PA NGAG DBANG RAB BRTAN GYIS SNGA PHYIR LAM KHRID DANG,
DBANG TSAR MANG DU GNANG ZHING, DGON

'DABS SU MCHOD RTEN CHE BA THOG TSAD GSUM YOD PA BZHENGS, 'DI PA
'BRAS SPUNGS DGE BSHES, DGE 'PHEL

DU BZHUGS, RLUNG GI RNAL 'BYOR TSAD DU PHYIN, KHRI BSOD NAMS
GRAGS PA DANG GRVA THOG MNYAM, THOG MAR

DKA' BCU 'JIGS MED RGYAL MTSAN CHOS KHRIMS PA DANG, MAR TSANG
CHOS RJE BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN SLOB DPON

DU BSKOS, DE NAS LO DKAR DKA' BCU NGAG DBANG BSTAN DAR, DE'I
RJES SU PHUR TSA CHOS RJE SOGS RIM BSKOS

KYIS BSKYANGS, MCHOD RTEN LUNG PA'I NYE 'DABS SU RI KHROD ZHIG
KYANG BTAB, BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING SOGS PHYOGS

DE'I DGON PA DRUG GI LAS SNA DANG, MCHOD GZHIS SGA PHUR SOGS TSO
BA DGU'I MGO YOD RNAMS BSDUS TE GRUB STON

KYANG MDZAD, ` LEN H'A THE DGA' LDAN GNAS BCU 'PHEL RGYAS GLING
NI, LI KY'A SKU SKYE NGAG DBANG CHOS RGYAL GYIS

RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SHING KHYI LA BTAB PAR BSHAD PAS BRGYA
DANG NGA DRUG PA SA BYA 'DI YIN LA, BTZAN PO'I

@083 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BSDUS GRVA, YUM SOGS GSUNG RAB KYI PAR MANG, ` DGON LUNG NUB
BYANG NAS YAR RIM PAR, PHRA STI LNGA MCHOD

SGAR BA NI, BOD CHOS RGYAL GYI GDUNG RGYUD ZHIG AA MDOR PHEBS
PA'I SKABS, RUS CHEN PRA 'BRU LDONG GSUM GYI NANG

TSAN PRA'I SDE TSO ZHIG THON TE MDO SMAD DU GZHI CHAGS PA LA ZUR
NYAMS TE PRA STI ZHES GRAGS, DE'I RGYUD PAR JO BO RJE

BOD DU MA BYON GONG TZAM DU PRA SGOM CHOS KYI RDO RJE 'KHRUNGS,
MTSO SNYING NAS SGRUB PA MDZAD PAS MNGON SHES DANG RDZU

'PHRUL THOB, CHAB BSIL SKABS CHOS GOS NYI ZER LA BKAL BAS NYE
'KHOR GYI RTOG GE PA PHUR SGOM BYA BA BTUL TE

GDAMS PA ZHUS, CHOS THUN MA RDZOGS PAR NYI MA NUB TU NYE BA RTEN
'BREL MDZAD DE NYI MA BZUNG BAS BRA BUR NYI MA

THAG STOD DU GRAGS, MTSO 'GRAM GYI BOD SDE'I DPON PO KE KHOD
RGYA BYA BAS KLA KLO'I DPON MA RUNGS PA ZHIG LA LO

RER BU BU MO BCU RE'I KHRAL STER DGOS PAR, SKABS SHIG KLA KLO'I
DPON DE NAD KYIS BTAB PA PRA SGOM LA GSOL

BA BTAB PAS NAD SOS, GTANG RAG TU BOD DPON LAS MI KHRAL MI LEN
PA'I BKA' GNANG, BOD DPON DGA'

STE 'BUL CHEN PHUL NAS BLA MAR BKUR, BOD KHAMS THAMS CAD KYIS
PRA SGOM KHO NA BLA MAR BZUNG DGOS PA'I DRIL

BSGRAGS PAS THAG RING NA YOD PA'I BOD SDE RNAMS LA GRVA BA RE
MCHOD GNAS SU BTANG BAS PRA SDE'I SGAR BA BCU

GSUM SOGS BYUNG, BOD DPON 'CHI NAD KYIS THEBS TE NGAN SONG
SBYONG BA'I DBANG ZHUS, PHYI LO 'CHI DUS

MTSO KHA NAS BSANG DUD CHEN PO BTANG BAS 'GA' ZHIG GIS DAR LAM
'THEN PA DANG, LA LAR ZHABS CHU LA MI

BYING BA SOGS KYI MTHONG SNANG SNA TSOGS KYIS BYON, BOD DPON LA
DBANG DANG 'PHO BA MDZAD DE RDZU 'PHRUL GYIS

PHYIR GSHEGS, 'JU LAG GI 'GRAM DU 'KHOD BA'I BOD SDE RNAMS KYIS
SPYAN DRANGS MCHOD BKUR BGYIS PA LA,

BON PO'I GTZO BO ZHIG YOD PAS PHRAG DOG BYAS TE NUS PA 'GRAN
DGOS ZER BAR, BON NAG 'DI LA NUS PA MA

THON NA GSANG SNGAGS KYI CHE BA MI THON PAS, SA CHU GNAM GSUM
GRU GSUM GYI DBYIBS SU YOD PA ZHIG TU GRUB DGOS

GSUNGS PA BZHIN BON PO 'JU LAG GI CHUS KHYER TE MTHAR CHU PHYOGS
GNYIS SU GYE BA'I DBUS KYI SA GRU GSUM DU YOD

PA ZHIG TU SHI NAS RO THON, DA LTA YANG 'BRUB KHUNG GI RNAM PA
MA NYAMS SHING, CHU BRGYAL SA'I RABS LA BON

RABS ZER SNANG, SGRUB PA MDZAD PA'I SGRUB KHANG GI SHUL YANG
YOD, 'JU LAG GI CHU'I MING LA CHU SNGON ZER

BAR; KLU SRIN MA RUNGS PA ZHIG GI SA GNAS BCAS TE CHU 'GRAM GYI
MI PHYUGS MANG PO ZOS PAS MI RNAMS KYIS CHU

NANG GI SROG CHAGS DES 'JUS NAS BRLAG SONG ZHES CHO NGE BYAS PAS
CHU'I MING LA 'JU BRLAG THOGS PA DA LTA ZUR

NYAMS; KLU DE THABS GANG GIS MA THUL BA BRA SGOM GYIS RTEN 'BREL
ZHIG MDZAD PAS CHU KHAR THON TE BTUL, BYANG

LAM DU BUD MED CIG SHI BA'I RO LA 'DRE ZHUGS TE DBUS SU 'GRO
MKHAN BCOM PA BSGRAL, 'DRE THOD SGAR BA ZHIG

GI RTEN GRAS SU YOD SNANG, PRA SGOM BOD DU BYON NAS BSAM YAS SU
BZHUGS SKABS BE HAR GYIS CHO 'PHRUL BRTZAMS

PAR; RGYAL PO AAR GTAD KYI GDAMS PA GTER NAS BTON TE BTUL BA'I
LO RGYUS GTER MA'I BLA RGYUD RNAM THAR

DU BSHAD, SKU TSE MTHAR 'JA' TSON DU GYUR NAS NAM MKHA' LA YAL
ZHES BSHAD PAS 'JA' LUS BRNYES PAR

MNGON; DPON RGYUD LA GRUB THOB MANG DU BYON PAS MDO KHAMS KYI
GDUNG RGYUD GCIG LA BYIN BRLABS CAN DU

@084 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BYED; PRA SDE TSE PHYUG 'PHAN BYA BAS BOD KYI KHRI DPON BYAS
PA'I RGYUD PAR GLE GSHIN BON DMAR BYA BA'I BON LUGS KYI

GRUB THOB CIG BYUNG BA DES BOD 'BANGS MI NYUNG TZAM KHRID NAS
MDO SMAD KYI BYANG NGOS RI BRAG DANG NAGS YOD SAR

GNAS BZUNG, SER DRAG CIG BABS PA SHAR PHYOGS SU SONG BA'I BRAG
GSEB TU RTA DKAR PO GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA

BA ZHIG 'THENG NAS 'GRO MA NUS PAR LUS YOD PAR BLTAS PAS, RKANG
RMIG GI GSEB TU YUNGS 'BRU ZUG 'DUG PA

BTON TE RMA SOS KYI SNGAGS BTAB PAS DE MA THAG SPRIN GYIS BTUM
NAS NAM MKHA' LA 'PHUR, DE NUB RMI LAM

DU; RTA DE RMA CHEN GYI CHIBS PA YIN, SER SRUNG NUS LDAN GYIS
THUN BRGYAB PA KHYOD KYIS BTON PA LEGS, SANG

NYIN NUB PHYOGS KYI BRAG DKAR PO SHEL GYI MCHOD RTEN 'DRA BA'I
RTZAR SHOG LA DNGOS GRUB LONGS ZER BA BYUNG, PHYI

NYIN SA DER BU MO MDZES MA ZHIG DANG, JU THIG CIG 'DUG PA
BLANGS, BU MO DE DANG KHYIM THABS BYAS NAS LO

GCIG SONG BA NA GROD PA ZHIG BTZAS PA'I NANG NAS KHYE'U YID
'PHROG PA BRGYAD BYUNG 'PHRAL BU MO YANG MI SNANG BAR

GYUR; BU BRGYAD KYI MA BRAG RTZA NAS RNYED PAS BRAG TSA BRGYAD
DU GRAGS, BU MO DE RMA CHEN GYI SRAS MO YIN PAS BRAG TSA

RNAMS RMA CHEN GYI TSA BO DANG, RMA CHEN PRA'I RUS LHA YIN ZER,
JU THIG DE LA MO BTAB PAS SHIN TU THIG PA BYUNG

STE HOR RGYAL POS KYANG BLANG DOR 'DRI BA BYUNG, JU THIG SHA
BA'I SPU LAS BYAS PA DENG SANG YANG YOD SKAD, HOR GYI

BLON PO YAS SKU GROD LOD KYI BU MO BRAG TSA CHE BA'I KHYIM THAG
TU BSUS PAR BU GSUM BYUNG BA'I CHE BA DES ZHVA'I STENG DU

PHOD KA DMAR PO BTZUGS TE SOG CHAS SPRAD PAS ZHVA DMAR DU GRAGS
PA DANG, SRAS THA CHUNG GI RGYUD PAR PHYAG RDOR

GYI RNAL 'BYOR BA, THOG DNGOS SU 'BEBS NUS PA'I PRA STI TSANGS
PA THOG 'BEBS SOGS SNGAGS NUS CAN MANG

PO DANG, PHYIS SU RDO RJE 'CHANG CHOS KYI NYI MA 'KHRUNGS, PRA
STI LNGA MCHOD 'BUL DPON SHES RAB GRAGS KYIS RGYAL

SRAS RIN PO CHE GDAN DRANGS, L'U'U TZIR GRAGS PA'I DAR TZE MDO'I
RKUN MA DRUG GIS RGYA'I RGYAL SA 'PHROG DUS NYE

'KHOR GYI HOS HOS 'GA' ZHIG GIS SNA DRANGS, L'U'U RTZIS DMAG
DPON DGON LUNG DU YONG RTZIS KYIS HOR DUM

DANG; DO LON SOGS MCHOD GZHIS GRONG TSO 'GA' BCOM STE SLEB PA LA
NYE DUS LNGA MCHOD NANG SO BZOD PA BRTZON

'GRUS SOGS KYIS RGYA'I TZUNG LI GSUM DANG BLO DRIL NAS 'KHRUGS
PA MNAN, DGON LUNG PAS 'JU LAG CHU LA ZAM

PA BTZUGS PAR RGYA RDOG GI JAG PA THON TE RGYA'I MDZOD DNGUL
SKYEL MKHAN BCOM PAS RGYA DMAG GIS DGON PA GTOR

BAR BRTZAMS DUS LNGA MCHOD NANG SO BZOD PA, NANG SO BZANG PO,
NANG SO NOR BU SOGS KYIS NOR RDZAS PHANGS

MED BYIN TE DMAG BZLOG PAS PRA TI'I SGAR BA RNAMS KYIS DGON LUNG
LA BYAS PA CHE, NANG SO GONG MA RNAMS STAG

LUNG PA DANG 'BREL CHE BAS BRAG BTZAN SRUNG MAR BSTEN CING, SGAR
BA KHAG GI NANG RTEN LA STAG LUNG PHU MDO SOGS

BKA' BRGYUD PHYOGS NAS BYUNG BA'I RTEN BYIN BRLABS CAN MANG LA,
'DIR SGROL MA GSUNG 'BYON GYI GSUNG

GDANGS THOS BZHIN PA DAM 'BYAR MA, MKHA' 'GRO MA SU KHA SIDDHI'I
DBU THOD SKRA DANG BCAS PA RNA RGYAN DAR

DPYANGS CAN, AA YIG RANG BYON DU YOD PA'I RJE'I TSEMS DANG NA
BZA' CHA TSANG, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN

GYI NA BZA' CHA TSANG, YOL BA NGAN SONG SGO GCOD, AAL THAN RGYAL
PO'I DBU ZHVA'I TOG DANG 'PHRENG BA GSER THUR,

@085 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RJE'I THUGS DAM RTEN 'JIGS BYED KYI SKU DANG, LAB SGRON SKU BYIN
CAN, RJE'I DBU SKRA BUB GSUM NANG BZHUGS

SU YOD PA'I RJE'I SNANG BRNYAN RIGS GSUM MA TSUL KHRIMS KYI DRI
BSUNG CHIL LE BYED PA SOGS PRA STI'I RTEN SNA STONG DU

GRAGS PA BZHUGS, LHA KHANG LA ME SHOR SKABS ME MA BZHES PA DANG,
ME SKYON CUNG ZAD RE LAS MED PA MANG DU

SNANG; ;LI KY'A SMON RAMS PAS BTAB PA'I MANG 'DUS RI KHROD CHOS
LUNG DGE 'PHEL GLING, PHYIS SU THU'U

BKVAN RIN PO CHES 'DU KHANG GSAR BZHENGS SU SLOB CHUNG LU KYA
CHOS RJES BZHENGS PA'I THU'U BKVAN 'DRA SKU, LU KYA

CHOS RJE'I RJES SU M'A KYA RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BZANG PO
BZHUGS, ` DGON LUNG BA BA RI DKA' BCU GRAGS

PAS BTAB BA SHING LUNG RAB BRTAN BSAM 'GRUB GLING, ` SNGAR RI
KHROD PA 'GA' ZHIG BSDAD PA LAS CHAGS PA

BUM PAR CHOS LUNG, ` CHU BZANG DGON DGA' LDAN MI 'GYUR GLING
'DEBS PA BO NI, SKU THOG DANG PO RJE'I

DNGOS SLOB GSUNG RAB MANG DU MKHYEN PA'I BSTAN 'DZIN BCU GNYIS
KYI DANG PO 'BROM BTZUN SHER 'BYUNG BLO GROS

SBAS PA, DE'I SKYE BA RI BO RTZE LNGAR HVA SHANG ZHIG TU SKU
'KHRUNGS LA, DE YANG BOD DU SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA DAR BA

LAS SNGA BAR RGYA GAR GYI DGRA BCOM PA MA TINGKA BA SOGS BYON
NAS RGYA YUL DU SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA DAR BAR MDZAD

PA'I RJES 'BRANG LA HVA SHANG ZER, CHA LUGS DANG SKAD RIGS TZAM
MA GTOGS BOD KYI RAB BYUNG DANG 'DRA, DGE

SLONG GI BSLAB BYA YANG PHAL CHER 'DRA LA, SHA RJEN PAR MTHONG
BA NGO TSAR BRTZI BAS DE SGRIB BYED DANG, KHYIM PA'I GOS

LAS KHYAD PAR 'BYED BYED PHU DUNG SHIN TU YANGS PA DANG, DMAR
SER TSOS CHEN DU BYED PAS RUNG MTHUN GYI SNGON

PO GYON PA SOGS YUL DUS KYI DBANG YIN LA, NANG GSES L'U'U MIN,
TZONG MIN, KYO'I ZHVA ZER BA GSUM YOD

PA'I SNGA MA BSLAB KHRIMS BLANGS PA'I DGE TSUL SLONG DANG, BAR
MA BSAM GTAN PA, PHYI MA THOS BSAM PA'I MING

YIN; SDE SNOD GSUM LA MKHAS PA'I PAndI TA DANG, GRUB PA'I GO
'PHANG MTHON POR GSHEGS PA BSAM GYIS MI

KHYAB PA BYON, YUM 'BUM PA'I DON BLO THOG NAS 'CHAD PA, YUM GYI
'GREL CHEN MDZAD PA YANG MANG DU BYUNG,

PHAL CHER GYI LTA BA SEMS TZAM DANG MTHUN LA, THAL 'GYUR BA'I
LUGS 'DZIN YANG 'GA' BYUNG BAS HVA SHANG ZER

TSAD BOD DU 'ONGS PA'I MA H'A YA NA'I RJES 'BRANG DU BSAM NAS
SDANG BA DANG SMAD PAR MI BYA LA, DE NAS CHU BZANG

RNAM RGYAL DPAL 'BYOR NI STOD LUNG DKAR LEB KHANG SAR DU YAB
BSOD NAMS MGON PO DANG, YUM MA MA BRE SANG

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I SA STAG LA 'KHRUNGS, RGYUD
SMAD CHU MIG LUNG DU DBYAR GNAS MDZAD PA'I TSE

BROS STABS KYIS BYON TE RGYUD CHEN RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG LAS RAB
TU BYUNG, RVA BA STOD DU STAG LUNG BRAG PA BLO

GROS RGYA MTSO BSTEN TE BSDUS TSAD DANG, 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG
DU GZHU KHANG DGE LEGS LHUN GRUB PA LAS DBU

PHAR 'DUL MDZOD LA SBYANGS TE GLING BSRE'I MTSAN BTAGS DANG, SE
RA, DGA' LDAN, BKRA SHIS LHUN PO,

DPAL 'KHOR CHOS SDE, NGAM RING SOGS MTSAN NYID KYI GRVA SA DU
MAR GRVA SKOR MDZAD, BKRA SHIS LHUN POR BZHUGS

SKABS GZHIS KA BSAM 'GRUB RTZE NAS GTZANG RGYAL GYIS 'DIR SA
SKYA DANG, KARMA'I DGE BSHES GNYIS RTZOD PHYIR

'ONG BAS DGE LUGS PHYOGS NAS RTZOD LAN BYED MI ZHIG THONGS ZHES
PAn CHEN CHOS RGYAN LA ZHUS PA BZHIN RJE 'DI PA

@086 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BTANG BAS DE GNYIS LUNG RIGS KYI TSAR BCAD DE, TSUL 'DIS RGYAL
BA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA MNYES PAR GYUR

CIG CES KHROM DBUS SU MCHOD YAR MDZAD PAS SDE SRID GTZANG BA
SOGS BZHIN 'GYUR ZHING SDE SRID BSOD NAMS

CHOS 'PHEL GYIS LKOG NAS BDAG RKYEN GNANG, SGO MANG GI DGE BSKOS
THOG MA DANG RGYUD SMAD DU GSANG SNGAG LA

SBYANGS; LCAGS PHAG LOR PAn CHEN DRUNG DU RDOR 'PHRENG SOGS CHOS
BKA' MANG PO GSAN, BSNYEN RDZOGS

BSGRUBS; HAN STAG LUNG NAS, HAN AA BU BLA MA DANG, STAG LUNG
DPON PO SOGS KYIS RGYAL BA YON TAN RGYA

MTSO LA MCHOD GNAS BLA MA BZANG BA ZHIG DGOS TSUL ZHUS PA BZHIN
LAM PA RAB 'BYAMS PA BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA

LA BKA' GNANG YANG DGONGS PA ZHUS PAS 'DI PA BYON, THU MED HO LO
CHIS CHOS ZHUS, MTSO SRIB TU LO GCIG

TZAM DANG, THAR KHIR ZHES PAR LO KHA SHAS BZHUGS TE SGRUB PA
MDZAD, 'JIGS BYED RDZOGS RIM GYI KHRID YIG

BRTZAMS; CHOG THUS THU MED BCOM DUS NANG PHYOGS SU BYON, SKU
'BUM KHRIR BZHUGS DUS CHOG THUS MTSO

KHAR GDAN DRANGS, DRI BA'I LAN LA DGA' STE ZHVA RED NA MA GTOGS
SDE BA CHOS RJE DANG, KHYED GNYIS NGA'I

BLA MAR 'OS ZHES SMRAS, ME BYI'I LO MJUG BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS RGYAL
DANG, B'A DUR HUNG THA'I JI GNYIS KYIS

CHOG THU BCOM STE ME GLANG LOR 'DI PA MJAL, DGE LUGS BSTAN DGRA
BE RI DANG, GTZANG BA 'DUL DGOS

KYI BKA' NANG SBYAR PHEBS, SA STAG LOR DGON LUNG DU SDE BA CHOS
RJE GSHEGS PA'I GDUNG ZHUGS 'BUL DANG,

SA YOS LO NAS DGON DE'I KHRIR LO BCU BZHUGS, KU SHRIS DPA' RIS
THAMS CAD DGON LUNG GI MCHOD GZHIS

SU PHUL, SA GLANG LOR 'BUM LUNG BKRA SHIS THANG DU DGON 'DI
BTAB, DON BZHI PA LCAGS YOS LA GSHEGS,

DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN CHU 'BRUG LA
'KHRUNGS, BTZAN PO DON GRUB RGYA MTSO LAS RAB TU

BYUNG; YUL DBUS SU THUGS GNYER DANG RTZE THANG DU GRVA SKOR
MDZAD, LNGA PA CHEN MO LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS BSGRUBS,

SKU 'BUM RGYUD PA'I KHRI DANG, LCAGS SPREL LA DGON LUNG KHRIR
BZHUGS, ZHE LNGA PA ME BYI NAS SKU 'BUM KHRIR

LO BCU BDUN BZHUGS, GONG MA CHEN POR ZHUS TE SA STAG LOR JIN
LENG JIN THO'I SDE BYANG CHUB MCHOG GI 'JUG

NGOGS ZHES PA'I PEN BSTZAL, DPYID CHOS DANG DBYAR GNAS KYI DAM
BCA' DANG SMON LAM TSOGS GLENG GI SROL

BTZUGS; 'GRIG LAM LA DAG THER DANG BCA' YIG GSAR RTZOM GNANG,
LCAGS SPRUL LOR RGYAL BA SENG GE

NGA RO'I GOS SKU BZHENGS, MTSO SNGON KHRI BA AA KHU BKRA SHIS
B'A THUR, DPON JU NANG, DPON BSOD

NAMS BKRA SHIS SOGS KYIS SBYIN BDAG BYAS TE SA BYI LOR GSER
GDUNG CHEN MO'I LHA KHANG GSAR BZO DANG,

LCAGS STAG LOR DPON JU NANG GIS GSER ZANGS KYI RGYA PHIBS KHYAD
'PHAGS BSKRUN, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS

PA'I ME SPREL LOR RGYAL DBANG BDUN PA SKU 'BUM DU PHEBS PAR
'JIGS BYED DBANG CHEN SOGS RGYUD SDE RNAM BZHI'I

DBANG RJES GNANG LUNG KHRID SOGS MTHA' YAS PA GNANG, CHU STAG
LOR WANG BKRA SHIS B'A THUR GYIS MCHOD SDONG

DANG RANG NYID RGYA BSKYED PA THAMS CAD LA RAB GNAS DANG DNGUL
SRANG KHRI PHRAG GNYIS KYI MTHUN RKYEN GNANG, CHU

YOS DUS 'KHRUGS SKABS RGYA RDOG DGON GYI BLA MA GSER KHOG PA
GLING TA LE CHOS RJES DMAG DPON BYAS, RGYA RDOG

@087 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GI BOD DMAG KHA SHAS RGYA MKHAR DU BRGYUG PA DANG, BTZAN PO SE
CHEN RAB 'BYAMS PAS RIGS GTOGS GRVA PA

MANG PO KHRID NAS SAN YAN CING GI BCOM RDZAS BLANGS PA RGYA DMAG
GIS BZUNG, SMRA NYES PA'I SKYON DU MAS RGYA

DMAG GIS GSER KHOG DANG DGON 'DI GTOR, BTZUN PA NYES MED BRGYA
LHAG BKRONG, 'DU KHANG GTZUG

LAG KHANG SOGS MER BSREGS, ZHVA KHOG GI DGON PA GSUM, 'JU LAG GI
RGYA RDOG DANG SEMS NYID

HO ROD KYI PRA STI DGON RNAMS LA NYAMS NYES CHENPO BYUNG BA NI,
BAG MED PA NI KUN TU 'CHI ZHES CHOS SRID GNYIS

KA LA PHYOGS MTSUNGS SU GSUNGS PA DE ZAD LA, CHU BZANG RIN PO
CHEN MDZAD SPYOD NYES PA CUNG ZAD MED KYANG

GSER DGON BLA MA LAS THOG PA YIN PA'I NYEN PAS KHONG GIS GTZOS
PA'I GRVA RGAN BCU BDUN TZAM GA-YO SGYUS Y'A MIN

GRONG RTZER ME ZHUGS PHUL BA GDUL BYA'I SNANG TSUL DANG LAS
DBANG MTHU BTZAN PA'I DBANG DU BYAS NA NGES PA MED PA

'PHAGS PA MO'U 'GAL GYI BU DANG, 'CHAR KA'I BYUNG BA BZHIN DU
DAM PA'I MDZAD PA LA SKYON DU MI GDAGS PAR

RANG NYID BAG YOD PA'I LAS LA GNAS PAR RIGS SO, ,'DI PA'I RANG
RNAM NYAMS DGA'I ROL RTZED CES PA ZHIG

YOD 'DUG AANG DKAR GYIS, BCOM LDAN 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO DNGOS,
,RGYAL DBANG BDUN PA'I GTZUG

GI RGYAN, ,ZHES BSNGAGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN
DBANG PHYUG RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SHING SBRUL

LOR LCANG SKYA ROL BA'I RDO RJE'I SKU MCHED DU 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG
LO LNGA DRUG TZAM NAS DGE SLONG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA

MTSOS KLOG BSLAB, DGON LUNG PA SUM PA PHUN TSOGS RNAM RGYAL LAS
DGE BSNYEN BSGRUBS TE MTSAN NGAG DBANG

BSTAN 'DZIN DPAL BZANG BTAGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR THU'U BKVAN GONG
MA CHOS RGYA MTSOS BKA' SHOG TSA

NAN PHEBS TE 'PHRAL DU GDAN SAR BKOD PA'I BZHUGS GRAL DU DGON
LUNG PA RAG DONG DKA' BCU TSUL KHRIMS

DAR RGYAS DANG, GSER DGON NAS RBU RABS 'BYAMS PA YON TAN DAR
RGYAS GNYIS TSOS GLENG BYAS PAR THUGS

MNYES TE THALR DEB KYI RNAM 'GYUR MDZAD, RBU DPON SLOB DPON SLOB
BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN PAS BDEN TSIG GI SHIS PA BRJOD,

GSER DGON DU PHEBS NAS SMIN GROL BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO
MKHAN PO, DPON SLOB ZHVA LU BAS SLOB

DPON MDZAD DE RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL MNYAM DU BSGRUBS TE MTSAN
NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG GSOL,,

DKA' BCU GRAGS PA BKRA SHIS KYIS 'DON CHOS BSLAB, BCU GCIG PA LA
GSER DGON CHOS GRVAR RBU DPON

SLOB LAS BSDUS GRVA'I BRTZI BZHAG DANG MGON CHEN BCU GSUM SOGS
SNGA PHYIR CHOS MANG PO GSAN, GCAN TSA

DKA' BCU NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA DGE RGAN DU BSTEN THUGS GNYER MDZAD
PAS CHOS THOG GCIG GNYIS NAS RTAGS

GSAL GTONG THUB, DGON LUNG DU RAG DONG DKA' BCUS DGE RGAN BYAS
CHOS GRVA 'GRIM, KHRI THOG PA PHUN

TSOGS RNAM RGYAL LAS BRTZI BZHAG DANG BSKYED RIM GYI KHRID SOGS
CHOS BKA' 'GA' GSAN, BSDUS GRVA CHE 'BRING,

LAM KHRID BLO SBYONG, BSLAB BYA SOGS KUN LA GZIGS SHING NYAMS
BZHES DANG, SA LUG LOR PHAR PHYIN TSUGS,

RJE NYID KYI THUGS BZHED DANG LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJE'I BKA'
BZHIN DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD PA CHU KHYI LOR DBUS SU

PHEBS; LHA LHAN DU RTZER MJAL ZHUS SKABS RGYAL DBANG MCHOG NAS
NGA'I BLA MA'I SPRUL SKU 'KHRUL MED DU 'DUG

@088 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CES PHYAG THAL MO SBYOR TSUL MDZAD PAS MA RUNGS PA DGAG KYANG HA
LAS, MI DBANG GIS KYANG BKUR BZOS DANG,

GSUNG 'PHROS KYIS YID TSIM STE GANG GSUNG CHOS SRID KYI BAB DANG
MTHUN PAS YUN RING BZHUGS ZHUS, SGO MANG

CHOS GRVAR BGRO GLENG LA BZHENGS PAS THAMS CAD KYIS BSNGAGS
BRJOD CHE, GONG NAS DPAL SHUL DGE BSHES

CHOS RGYA MTSO DGE RGAN DU BSKOS, SGO MANG ZUR BA LA MO NGAG
DBANG NAM MKHAS KHYED SPRUL SKU CHE KHAG YIN PAS

MDO SNGAGS LA NANG BYAN CHUD PA'I SLOB GNYER GNANG DGOS, KHYED
KYI DGON PA SA CHA GANG 'DRA ZHIG TU YOD GSUNGS

PAR; GSER KHOG DANG DGON LUNG GI BAR 'BUM LUNG BKRA SHIS THANG
ZER BAR YOD KYANG BLA BRANG ZHIG DANG,

GRVA SHAG NYUNG SHAS LAS MED PAS DGON PA'I THA SNYAD CHER MED
ZHUS PAR, DE 'DRA GSUNG MI DGOS, RJES

SOR GRVA SA YAG PO YONG TSUL DANG, 'JAM DBYANGS KYI THANG KA
ZHIG GNANG STE SLOB GNYER BA RNAMS KYIS 'DI LA

GSOL BA 'DEBS DGOS, NGAS KYANG 'DI LA GSOL BA BTAB PAS DGE BSHES
NAM MKHA'I MING THOB PA YIN

GSUNGS; THANG KA DE DA LTA CHU BZANG BLA BRANG DU BZHUGS, RJE
NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA, SHAR CHEN NAM

MKHA' BZANG GNYIS LA MJAL BAR YANG DGYES GUS CHER MDZAD, SMRA
DBANG BSOD NAMS BKRA SHIS SOGS

DGE BSHES KHA SHAS RGYUN DU SKU BCAR GYIS BGRO GLENG DANG DOGS
GCOD MDZAD PAS KHO RANG TSO LA YANG SMAN YON DU

GYUR; CHU PHAG SMON LAM GRVA SKOR PA LA BGRO GLENG GNANG BAS
MKHAS BLUN THAMS CAD KYI YID 'PHROG RGYAL BA'I

DBANG BO NAS THUGS RIG GTZANG ZHING RIGS PA BYANG PO 'DUG PAS
SPRO BA 'PHEL GSUNG STE DOGS GCOD 'GA' RE

GNANG BAR LAN PHUL BAS THUGS SHIN TU DGYES NAS GNANG SKYES DANG
BCAS SKU YON LA GANG YANG YANG SBYONGS, LHAG

PAR GZHUNG PO TI LNGA'I RANG LUGS 'THAD LDAN DU BZHAG PA RNAMS
BYANG CHUB LAM RIM GYI STENG DU HRIL GYIS 'DUS

'ONG BAS YIG CHA 'DZIN PA DANG, SLOB GNYER GYI ZHOR DU LAM RIM
CHE CHUNG LA GO BA BSKYED CHUG CES BSLAB BYA

GNANG BAS PHYAG 'BUL ZHUS TE RGYAL YUM SHER PHYIN GYI DGONGS PA
KLU SGRUB YAB SRAS KYIS BKRAL BA LTAR KHONG DU CHUD

NAS BSTAN 'GROR PHAN PA SGRUB CHOG PA'I SKYABS 'JUG ZHUS, BDUD
LAS RNAM RGYAL GYI DBANG DANG, 'JAM

DBYANGS CHOS SKOR GYI RJES GNANG, NYID GCIG PUR 'JAM DKAR GYI
RJES GNANG LUNG MAN NGAG RNAMS KYANG

GNANG BA BCAS BZHED CHOS MTHA' DAG SNGA PHYIR BSTZAL, KHRI NGAG
DBANG MCHOG LDAN LA LAM MCHAN SUM SBRAGS

MA GSAN PAS PHYIS SU YANG, NGA BOD NA YOD DUS, KHRI RIN PO CHE
LAS LAM RIM MO ZHIG NYAN PA YIN TE,

SKYE BA 'DI'I CHOS SRID KYI BYA BA LEGS SHOS 'BYUNG RGYU'I RTEN
'BREL GYI MGO ZUG PA RED, BLA MA'I BYIN BRLABS

KYIS DE PHYIN CHAD SPRANG PO GCIG LA ZAN GCIG STER YANG SNYING
RJE 'DRA BA RE SHAR YONG GIN SNANG, NGA LA LUNG RTOGS

KYI YON TAN CHEN PO MED DE, YIN YANG BLA MA'I THUGS RJES SKYABS
'GRO BYED SKABS TSAD MED BZHI'I STENG NAS

DGA' BA CHEN PO RE 'GRO GIN YOD CES NYAMS 'CHAR GYI GSUNG GNANG,
BKRA SHIS LHUN POR PAn CHEN GONG MA

DGUNG LO DRUG BZHES PA MJAL, JUNG GAR GYI MI SNA 'ONG BA RNAMS
KYIS DGE BSHES TSO LA BGRO GLENG BYED BCUG

STE SKABS BSTUN GYI BDAG RKYEN BYED SKABS 'DI PA'I RIGS LUNG GIS
YID 'PHROG STE 'DZIN GRVA DMA' NA YANG DGE

@089 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BSHES CHEN PO'I NYAMS 'DUG CES BSNGAGS BRJOD DANG CHOS 'BREL
ZHUS, NYI SHU PA LA THUGS GNYER GYI ZHOR

RGYUD 'GREL DANG BSKYED RDZOGS LA YANG GZIGS, BLA MA GLING SPO
'BOR BA'I DGE BSHES DRAG PA ZHIG DANG MNYAM

DU DRANG NGES RNAM 'BYED KYI TSOGS GLENG MDZAD SKABS GZUNG 'DZIN
SKYES 'DRA 'GOG PA'I RIGS PA'I STENG NAS PHA

ROL BO TSAR BCAD, PO TI PHYI MA RNAMS LA YANG ZHIB GZIGS KYIS
SKU BCAR DGE BSHES RNAMS LA DOGS SLONG

MANG DU GNANG BAS DE DAG GIS KYANG BRTZON PA BYED MI DGOS PAR
RIGS PA BYANG BO 'DI LTAR YIN TSE, RANG RE

TSO MI TSE STONG ZAD KYI NGANG LA LUS PA RED ZER BA BYUNG, PHUR
BU LCOG PA CHEN PO DANG, KHRI CHEN GNYIS LAS

CHOS BKA' MANG DU GSAN ZHING, MGON CHEN BCU GSUM SKABS KHRI RIN
PO CHE'I MNAL LAM DU, MI NAG PO

'JIGS SU RUNG BA ZHIG GIS KHYOD KYI SLOB MA'I NANG 'DI NA SKYE
BA MANG POR GSHIN RJE GSHED KYIS RJES SU BZUNG BA'I

GANG ZAG KHYAD PAR CAN ZHIG 'DUG PAS DE LA NGA'I GDAMS PA MA LUS
PA BYIN ZER BA BYANG TSUL NANG 'KHOR RE

GNYIS LA GSUNGS, BLA MGON DBYER MED SKABS MCHOD DPON LAG PA 'DAR
NAS GTOR MA SA LA BRDAB KYANG

NYES SKYON CI YANG MA BYUNG BAS, KHRI CHEN GYIS, KHYED RANG ZHED
PO RED, 'PHRIN LAS LA BAR CHAD CHE YANG

GLAGS MI KHEL 'DUG ,THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I CHOS SKYONG 'DI RANG
BSTEN ZHES SNYING ZHUGS KYI SKOR SOGS ZHAL

SHES MANG PO LKOG CHOS SU GNANG, NYER GCIG PA SHING GLANG LOR
TZE'I GZIMS CHUNG NYI 'OD DU RGYAL MCHOG SKAL

BZANG RGYA MTSOS MKHAN PO, MNGA' RIS SPRUL PA'I SKUS LAS SLOB,
BLO GLING BLA MAS GSANG STON MDZAD DE

BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, RANG YUL NAS GDAN 'DREN PA 'BYOR YANG RGYAL
DBANG YAB SRAS NAS, SPRUL PA'I SKU

GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA BAS DA DUNG MDO SNGAGS LA NANG BYAN CHUD PA'I
SLOB SBYONG GNANG NA PHYIS SU BSTAN 'GRO SPYI DANG,

SGER LTOS THAMS CAD LA PHAN PA CHEN PO YOD 'GRO, DA LAN PHEBS NA
CHOS KYI BAR CHAD DU 'GYUR ZHES GSUNG NAN

BSTZAL; CHOS MTSAMS PHAL CHER DU DGA' LDAN PHUG RJE'I SGRUB
KHANG, DGE 'PHEL SOGS SU DPE MTSAMS

DANG; DGA' GDONG 'JAM DBYANGS KHANG DU 'JAM DBYANGS KYI BSNYEN
SGRUB MDZAD PAS RTAGS MTSAN KHYAD PAR

CAN BYUNG, ME STAG LOR KHRI CHEN LAS 'JIGS BYED BSKYED RIM GYI
KHRID GSAN PA'I MJUG LA SLEBS SKABS GLO

BUR DU KHRI CHEN THUGS 'TSUB STE BKA' BKYON MANG DU GNANG, DE
NUB DRUG CU PA BSNGOS PA MCHOD DPON GYIS

BKA' CHOS PA TSO LA BSHAD PAS SKU MDUN DU PHEBS MA NUS PA LA
BRDA GNANG STE SHOG DANG KHA SANG GI 'PHRO SKYONG

DGOS GSUNGS, MAntAL PHUL TSAR RJES 'DZUM PA ZHIG MDZAD DE KHYED
TSO'I NANG NA 'JIGS BYED KYI BSKYED RIM

MTHAR PHYIN NAS RDZOGS RIM LA MYONG BA THON LA KHAD PA GCIG 'DUG
DE SU YIN GSUNG BAR KUN HA THENG NAS 

ZHU RGYU MA RNYED PAS SPRUL SKU KHYOD KYIS YOD MA LA GSOL BA
THOB DANG DGA' MO YONG 'GRO, GANG LTAR YANG RTOGS PA

KHYAD PAR CAN BRNYES PA LA BAR CHAD CHEN PO ZHIG YOD TSOD 'DUG
,KHO BOS KYANG YI DAM LA GSOL BA MANG DU

BTAB STE CHOS RGYAL DANG, PHYOGS SKYONG LA GTOR MA BTANG, 'PHRIN
LAS BCOL BAS BAR CHAD BZLOG PA'I

RTAGS SHAR GSUNGS, ME YOS LA DBU MA TSUGS, MI DBANG GSHEGS
'PHRAL, SGO MANG DPON SLOB CHOS

@090 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GRAGS KYIS 'DIR PAR, RGYAL PO 'DIS RGYAL BA LA THUGS SUN ZHUS PA
YONGS GRAGS YIN RUNG, GDAN SA

GSUM LA SKU DRIN CHE ZHING LHAG TU SGO MANG GRVA TSANG LA THUGS
'DOGS BDAG RKYEN CHE BA DE BZHIN LAGS PAS RGYAL BA

DGA' LDAN KHANG GSAR DU PHEBS NAS 'PHO BA DANG SMON LAM GCIG MA
GNANG NA BU TSA RGYUD RNAMS SEMS PHAM ZHING

SLAR BSTAN SRID LA YAG PO MI YONG YANG KHO RANG TSOS ZHU MI PHOD
'DUG GZHAN SNYAN ZHUS 'BUL MKHAN 'KHAG PAS

KHYED KYIS REM GSUNG BYUNG, 'DI PAS SPYIR NGA RANG LTA BU'I MI
CHUNG CHUNG ZHIG GIS RGYAL BA LA DE 'DRA ZHU BAB GA LA

YOD; 'ON KYANG DPON SLOB RIN PO CHE NGA LA BKA' DRIN SHIN TU CHE
BA'I DGE RGAN YIN STABS GSUNG GCOG LUGS

MI 'DUG BSTAN PA'I ZHABS TOG LA PHAN PHYIN ZHU BA LOS BYED
GSUNGS TE 'PHRAL DU DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG DU

PHEBS; MI DBANG GSHEGS TSUL, KHO RANG GI NYE DU RNAMS GTOL MED
DU GYUR TSUL, DA CHA ZHU BA 'BUL

MKHAN YOD MED LA MA LTOS PAR DGA' LDAN KHANG GSRA DU PHEBS TE
LJAGS BSNGO SOGS CHOS SBYIN GNANG RGYU,

MNGA' RIS GUNG DANG D'A LAS WA THUR BCAS LA ZHAL BKOD DANG SEMS
GSO NANG RGYU RGYAL DBANG 'JIG RTEN

GSUM GYI MGON PO NYID MKHYEN ZHUS PAS DE 'PHRAL SKYABS MGON CHEN
POS SPRUL PA'I SKU BSTAN 'GRO SPYI'I LA RGYAR

DGONGS PA'I THUGS DGONGS GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA ZHES DPON GA-YOG
NYUNG BSDUS KYIS PHEBS, 'PHO DMIGS

DANG SEMS GSO BKA' DRIN BSKYANGS, BYAMS PA RIN PO CHES KHYED PHO
SKYES BYUNG, SNYIGS MA'I DUS 'DIR

SEMS CAN GYI DON BYED PA LA THABS MKHAS DE 'DRA DGOS GSUNGS, SA
'BRUG NAS MDZOD 'DUL LA THUGS

GNYER MDZAD, DPON SLOB SANGS RGYAS RDO RJES SMON LAM GRVA SKOR
PHUL, CHU BZANG, GSER DGON,

DGON LUNG BCAS NAS MI SNA GDAN 'DREN LA 'BYOR, 'DI BAS DA DUNG
KHYED RANG TSO LA PHAN THOGS PA'I YON

TAN GCIG BSLAB RGYU'I MA SONG, BKA' CHOS YANG MANG PO NYAN RGYU
YOD, BYUNG NA SNGON GYI DAM PA TSO LTAR SGRUB

PA SNYING POR BYED 'DOD YOD, DE TZAM MA BYUNG YANG RJE'I BSTAN
PA DANG, RANG DGON TSO LA YON TAN GYIS

PHAN DGOS PAS 'GRO MI THUB, RGYAL BA YAB SRAS KYANG THUGS MNYES
PO MI YONG GSUNGS KYANG KHONG TSOS PHOD BTZONGS

TE RGYAL BA RIN PO CHER ZHUS PAS, LO SNGA MA RNAMS SU KHYER RANG
TSO'I GDAN 'DREN PA YONG DUS NGAS DGONGS PA

MA BYIN, DA LTA 'DI BA THUGS GNYER MTHAR PHYIN YAG PO RED, DUS
KYI 'PHO 'GYUR 'DI SNA TSOGS'ONG GI

'DUG STABS DA CHA RANG YUL DU PHEBS TE RANG DGON BDAG MDZAD NA
STAN 'GRO LA PHAN PA KHYAB CHE GSUNGS PAS

KHONG TSO LA DGA' SPRO'I NYI MA SHAR, KHRI RIN PO CHES RGAL
DBANG MCHOG NAS GONG MA'I BKA' DRIN LA DGONGS DBANG

LUNG SOGS BUM PA GANG BYOR GNANG, KHONG THUGS RIG BRTAN CING BAB
CHE BAS PHYAG LEN SOGS GANG ZHIB ZHIB

NAS NGES BCUG YOD, KHYED TSO SKAL BA BZANG PO RED GSUNGS, SGO
MANG BLA MA LA ZHVA DMAR CHOS RGYA TSO 'DI RANG

BZHIN BZANG ZHING, BSTAN PA LA PHAN THOGS YOD DNGES KYI TSOD DU
'DUG PAS NGA'I SKAL BA'I GRVA SKOR DE LA GNAN

ROGS KYI ZHUS PAS DE 'DRA'I DPE SROL MI 'DUG STE, KHYOD KYIS
LUNG BSTAN GNANG BA YIN TSE THUGS BZHED BSGRUB

GSUNGS; ZHVA DMAR BA LA GTONG SGO'I THEBS DANG ZHAL TA GNANG,
PHYIS SU KHO RANG RGYUD SMAD MKHAN PO'I SKABS

@091 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CHOS GRVA'I SA CHA LA RTZOD GLENG MANG DU BYUNG YANG MI LA MA
SHOR BAS LUNG BSTAN RED ZER MKHAN BYUNG, RTZE'I TSOMS CHEN

DU STON CHEN DANG 'BREL BAR THON PHYAG THOG RGYAL DBANG MCHOG
GIS GSUNG MTHON POS RGYA BOD HOR GSUM GYI MI

SNAS MTSON SER SKYA TSANG MAS NGES RGYUR, KHYAB BDAG 'KHOR LO'I
MGON PO RDO RJE 'CHANG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I

RGYAL MTSAN GYI SPRUL SKU 'DI THUGS RIG GSAL ZHING, SKYE BA
SNGON MA'I YON TAN RNAMS THUGS LA GSAL BAR NGES

'DUG BOD DU PHEBS NAS KYANG SNYING STOBS CHEN POS THOS BSAM LA
CHIG DRIL DU BRTZON ZHING, MDZAD PA

KUN SPYOD GTZANG BA, DMAN SA 'DZIN PA SOGS KYIS KHYAD PAR DU
'PHAGS PAS, SNGA MA RANG YUL NAS GDAN

'DREN PA KHA SHAS 'BYOR DUS NGAS DGONGS PA MA PHUL, DA LAN SKU
YON GANG SA NAS MTHR PHYIN PAS GNANG BA

MA PHUL BA'I THABS MA BYUNG BAR, BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED AA CHI THU
AERTI NI NO MON HAN ZHES BSNGAGS SHING GZENGS

BSTOD NAS BKA' SHOG THAM KA PHUL BA YIN PAS TSANG MAS NGOS DANG
KHYAD MED KYI GUS 'DUD BYED DGOS GSUNGS,

PHEBS KHAR YANG RGYAL BAS LHA MO'I SKU THANG DANG BKA' BSGO
GNANG, KHYED RANG GI DGON PA DER 'CHAD NYAN ZHIG

TSUGS; GRUB MTHA' GTZANG BA GYIS, 'PHRIN LAS THAMS CAD LHA MOS
BSGRUB YONG, NGA RANG GIS KYANG SEMS DANG

SEMS KYI CHOS NYID BZHIN DU YID LA 'DU 'BRAL MED PAR SKYABS 'JUG
BGYID GSUNGS TE SPYAN CHAB BSIL PAS

NYID KYANG SPYAN CHAB NA BZA' BANG BA TZAM BYUNG ZHING 'BRAL MI
PHOD BZHIN PO TA LA'I ZHOL BAR PHYI 'GROS KYIS PHEBS,

SKU MDUN PA SKAL BZANG YON TAN DANG, MGRON GNYER YON TAN LEGS
GRUB SOGS KYIS KYANG MCHI MA BTANG STE

RGYAL BA RIN PO CHE LA MKHAS BTZUN BZANG GSUM 'DZOMS PA'I SLOB
MA GRANGS KYIS MI CHOD KYANG PHAR THUGS BRTZE BA,

TSUR DAD GUS 'DZOMS PA 'DI 'DRA DKA', MAR BA N'A RO'I DRUNG NAS
BYON PA'I LO RGYUS DE DE RING MNGON DU GYUR

ZER; WANG T'A LE NAS KYANG PHEBS RDZONG GZABS, HAR SDONG PA CHOS
'BRAS SRPUNGS RDO BCAL CHEN MOR GDAN

DRANGS TE LEGS 'BUL ZHUS, MTSO SO LO MA'I MKHAN PO BSOD NAMS
BKRA SHIS DANG, HAR SDONG MKHAN PO BZOD

PA RGYA MTSO SOGS DKA' RAMS LNGA BCU SKOR BCAS PHEBS TE THOG MAR
GSER DGON DANG, DE NAS CHU BZANG

DU PHEBS, GSER DGON DU DAM BCA' 'JOG BZHED LA CHOS GRVAR BZHUGS
KHRI BSHAMS NA MDZES SAM ZHUS PAR

KHRI MTHO BA DANG GOS BZANG BAS BSTAN PA LA PHAN MI YONG, NGA
DGON PA 'DI'I GRVA RGYUN DANG, DBUS SU SLOB

GNYER ZHIG BYED KHUL BYAS PAS, DA RES NANG GTZANG GIS BSTAN PA'I
DMIGS RKYEN LA PHAN PA ZHIG BGYIS TSE,

PHYIS SU GRVA SA 'DI NAS DBUS GTZANG LA PHEBS MKHAN TSO MAR
'ONGS NAS DAM BCA' RE BZHAG NA BLO SKYED CHE ZHING,

RTZOD PA 'PHEL RGYAS KYI THABS SU AE 'GRO BSAM PA YIN PAS RDO
BCAL MTHIL DU BSDAD NA CHOG GSUNGS, NYER LNGA

BA SA SPRUL LA SKU 'BUM DANG, DGON LUNG DU PHEBS DAM BCA' BZHAG
SKABS GTZUG SHUL DKA' BCU PHUN

TSOGS DGE LEGS KYIS, KHYED GOS DAR GYIS BTUMS PA'I BLA CHEN GSON
BEM ZHIG MA YIN 'DUG PAS NGO MTSAR

CHE ZER, LO DER DGON LUNG KHRI DANG, LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE RANG
YUL DU PHEBS PA ZUNG SHAN GYI CHIBS BSU'I

SAR MJAL, DKA' GNAD MANG PO'I BKA' 'DRI LA LAN PHUL BAS THUGS
SHIN TU MNYES, CHU BZANG DU@092 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GDAN DRANGS SKABS 'DI PA DANG, MKHAN PO BSOD NAMS BKRA SHIS, BLA
MA GRAGS PA LHUN GRUB SOGS

NYIN MANG POR CHOS KYI DOGS SLONG DANG 'GRO BA MDZAD, 'CHAD NYAN
ZHIG TSUGS NA LEGS GSUNGS, YU

GUR BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING GI 'DZIN BDAG MDZAD, NYER BRGYAD PA CHU
SPREL LA SKU 'BUM KHRIR BZHUGS, CHU BZANG

NAS SER RTZUD GRAGS PA LHUN GRUB DANG, M'A DKA' BCU, DGON LUNG
BA GTZUG SHUL DKA' BCU GSUM

BCAS MI LNGAS DAM BCA' BZHAG 'CHAD NYAN LA RTING BSKUL GANG DRAG
MDZAD PAS TSOGS RGYUG 'BUL BA,

SKYOR SBYANGS MTSAN PHUD BYED PA MANG PO BYUNG, DNGUL SRANG CHIG
STONG LHAG GIS BLA BRANG CHEN MO GSAR DU BZOS,

SHING KHYI LOR SKU 'BUM NA LNGA MCHOD DANG LO GSAR LA SHA 'GYED
GTONG BA BCAD NAS 'KHUR BA DANG THUD KYI TSAB RA

'BUL SROL BTZUGS, NYID KYIS ZHAL BKOD LTAR BE SI RNAM RGYAL TSE
RING SOGS KYIS 'DU KHANG GI GA-YAB SKOR

DANG; WANG DKON MCHOG BKRA SHIS KYIS LDEBS BRIS BCAS BZHENGS PAR
RJE 'DI DANG, RGYUD PA BLA MA DGA'

LDAN YE SHES SKAL BZANG, B'A JUS DPON SLOB SHES RAB LHUN GRUB
SOGS KYIS RAB GNAS MDZAD, SNGAR

RGYAL BAS BOD DU PHEBS DGOS GSUNG YOD KYANG PHEBS MA THUB PAR
BYANG BA DKA' BCU AEL CHIR BTANG STE BRTAN

BZHUGS DANG MANG 'GYED RGYAS PA BSKUR, RA KHO DPON SLOB SHES RAB
CHOS 'BYOR LAS DBANG LUNG 'GA' RE

GSAN SKABS PHYAG NAS 'JUS TE 'KHOR PA'I SNYAN GRAGS SOGS CHEN
POR 'OS PA'I BYA BA MTHA' DAG CHU SHING LTA

BU'I SNYING PO MED PA ZHIG RED, DE LA NGES PA MED, ZHABS 'BRANG
BA TSO'I KHAR MA NYAN, KHYED RANG GIS

KHYED RANG GI SKU DON LA REM ZHUS, ME KHYI LOR BTZAN KHANG RGYUD
KHANG SOGS GSAR BZHENGS, ME GLANG 'DU

KHANG GI LDEBS BRIS DANG SMAN PA GRVA TSANG GSAR 'DZUGS MDZAD,
RGYAL BA'I DGONGS RDZOGS LA DNGUL SRANG STONG

DANG LNGA BRGYA SOGS GTOS CHE BA 'BUL BAR DKA' BCU TSE BRTAN
RGYA MTSO DANG, YE KY'A DKA' BCU GNYIS MNGAt,

RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I SKU GDUNG MCHOD RTEN DNGUL GYIS
BTUMS TE MDZOD DGE GRO TSANG PAndI TA BLO BZANG

BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN LA BKA' GNANG NAS SA STAG LOR RAB GNAS
MDZAD, GUNG THANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN

PA'I RGYAL MTSAN PHO BRANG DU PHEBS ZHOR SKU 'BUM DU PHEBS PA
TSOGS DBUR GDAN DRANGS TE LAM GTZO'I BSHAD

LUNG GSAN ZHING ZHABS BRTAN PHUL, PHAR YANG DBANG RJES GNANG
'GA' PHUL BAS KHONG GIS, RJE SHER

'BYUNG BLO GROS DUS MTHAR YANG, ,BYAMS SNYING RJE'I MNGA' BDAG
SPRUL PA'I SKU, KUN MTHONG THOS DRAN REG

DON LDAN PA, DUS DA LTAR MJAL 'DI SKAL BA BZANG, ,ZHES SOGS KYI
MGUR MCHOD PHUL, LCAGS

SBRUL MNAL LAM DU, CHU BZANG NAS RJE NYID PHYOGS KUN TU ZHAL
GZIGS NAS CHOS DUNG LAN MANG 'BUD PA'I

MNAL LAM BYUNG BSTUN, LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHES THUB PA'I DNGUL SKU
GNANG BA GDAN SAR 'BYOR BAS THUGS DGYES

TE NGA'I DGON PA 'DIR THUB PA'I RING LUGS DAR RGYAS KYI SNYAN
GRAGS 'BYUNG BA'I LTAS SU MNGON GSUNGS, BOD

NAS PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE DANG, DE MO NO MON HAN SOGS KYIS RGYAL
BA 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO'I YONGS 'DZIN GYI

'OS THOR RJE 'DI PHUL BA BZHIN GONG MA'I BKA' ZI LING AAMBHAN
BRGYUD DE BABS PAS SKU 'BUM KHRI'I DGONGS PA

@093 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

ZHUS KYANG LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHES DGONGS KHROL ZHUS PAS PHEBS MA
DGOS, CHU LUG LOR YAB GSHEGS PAR LCANG SKYA

RIN PO CHE PHEBS, SHING BYA LOR GONG NAS CHU BZANG LA THUB BSTAN
RAB RGYAS GLING ZHES PA'I PEN BSTZAL, ZLA

BA BRGYAD PAR SHOD SHAN STAG LUNG, AA LAG SHA AORTU SU, CHA GAR
DO LO NOR SOGS BRGYUD PE CING DU

TZAN DAN JO BO DANG, ZUNG GRU ZIR LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHER MJAL,
GONG NAS LCANG SKYA MCHOG LA KHYED KYI SKU MCHED

BLA MA YONG YOD DAM ZHES DANG, DE YON TAN CAN YIN ZER TE MTHONG
MA MYONG GSUNGS, KHONG GIS KHRID DE

RGYAL PO LA 'TSAMS ZHUS PHUL PAS THUGS DGYES ME KHYI LOR NYID
KYIS ZHUS TE LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHES RDOR 'PHRENG DBANG

GNANG; SGOM CHEN BLO BZANG DON GRUB LAS RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM PHAL
CHER GYI LUNG DANG, MTSAN SGROGS MKHAN

CHEN BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS LA 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS DANG, RJE DGE
'DUN RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG 'BUM LUNG SOGS GSAN,

GONG MA CHEN PO NAS LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE DANG 'DI PA RNAM GNYIS
LA KHYAB PA'I DMIGS PA SOGS ZHI GNAS KYI DMIGS

PA BZHI'I SKOR LAS BRTZAMS TE BKA' 'DRI DANG DOGS SLONG MDZAD DE
BZHAD MO GNANG, RTZE LNGA'I GNAS MJAL

SKABS NOR BZANG PHUG TU GZHON NU MDZES PA ZHIG GIS RTEN 'BREL
GYI RDZAS SHIG PHUL, ZHAL NAS, NGA LA

DBUS NAS RGYAL BA SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS 'JAM DKAR GYI CHOS SKOR
GNANG BAS GSUNG RAB LA BLO GROS CUNG ZAD

RGYAS PAS RANG MGO THON TZAM BYUNG, RI BO RTZE LNGAR BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA'I SPO ZHES PAR 'JAM DBYANGS KYI BSNYEN

SGRUB BYAS PAS GNAS KYI BYIN BRLABS YIN NAM RTAGS DANG LTAS 'GA'
BYUNG, DE PHYIN CHAD CHOS KYI GNAS LUGS

LA MI RMONGS SHING, RGYUD JE GSAL DU SONG NAS THOS DON BLO LA
KHEL CHOG PA ZHIG TU SONG GSUNGS, RANG YUL DU PHEBS

SHING SKU 'BUM DU KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED ZHABS KHRIR BZHUGS PA
DANG MJAL 'DZOMS DANG SNGA PHYIR CHOS SRID KYI

DGA' STON SPEL BAS THUGS 'BREL SHIN TU ZAB, RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG
DBANG DPAL BZANG, TSIN TZA RAB

'BYAMS PA 'JAM DBYANGS, SHAR BA BSOD NAMS GSUM LA DAM BCA' 'JOG
TU BCUG ME PHAG LOR

GSER DGON GYI KHRIR PHEBS, SEMS NYID DANG RGYAB RTZE MA MTHUN
PA'I 'DUM MDZAD, DGON LUNG KHRIR YANG

BSKYAR PHEBS, CHU BZANG GI 'DU KHANG GSAR BZHENGS KYI MGO
BTZUGS, LCAGS STAG SKU 'BUM DU MGON

KYA GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN SOGS LA LCANG SKYA GONG MA DANG PAn
CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN GYI GSUNG 'BUM LUNG GNANG,

BYA KHYUNG KHRIR BZHUGS, ME SPREL LOR SLAR YANG SKU 'BUM KHRIR
PHEBS, SBAL BA CHU MIG SKAM PA SLAR GSOS,

SA PHAG LOR PAn CHEN CHIBS BSUR PHEBS ZHOR BRAG DKAR SPEL RDZONG
MJAL, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHER, BYA

KHYUNG CHU BZANG GI AAR BO'I SKABS SBRUL CHEN PO GNYIS 'ONG NAS
'O MA BLUD NA 'THUNG NAS BUD 'GRO BA ZHIG BYUNG TSUL

ZHUS PAS, KHYED RANG CHOS RJE DON RIN PA'I SKYES PA BZHES SKABS
MGON PO ZHAL DANG LCAM SRING BSTEN BZHIN

YOD PA SKYUR BZHAG PAS MA BYUNG BA RED, DA BSNYEN NA SHIN TU
BZANG, NGA LA DE GNYIS 'KHOR GYIN YOD PAS

BYIN BRLABS BYAS CHOG GSUNGS RJES GNANG DANG ZAB CHOS MANG PO
BSTZAL, DNGOS 'BUL RGYA CHE ZHING RNAM GRANGS

MANG BA PHUL, 'GA' ZHIG GIS DE TZAM RGYAS DRAG ZHUS PAR DGONGS
GZHI CAN GYI GSUNG PHEBS, CHU STAG

@094 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RMA CHU CHE BAS SMAD PHYOGS SU GNOD TSABS CHEN PO BYUNG BAR GONG
MAS, CHU BZANG HO THOG THUGS RMA CHEN LA 'PHRIN

BCOL MDZAD NA PHAN PA'I GSER YIG BAB PAS SKAR MA THANG DU PHEBS,
GSOL MCHOD MDZAD PAS LTAS NGO MTSAR

BA BYUNG, SNGA LOR DPON CHUNG RIN CHEN GRAGS PA DBUS SU SONG NAS
SMON LAM CHEN MOR MANG 'GYED, RGYAL

BA RIN PO CHER TSOGS DBUS 'BUL CHEN, JO SH'AKA LA MCHOD 'BUL
SOGS GRUB NAS RGYA RTZE LHA RAMS PA BLO BZANG

MKHAS GRUB BCAS 'BYOR BAS THUGS DGYES, ME LUG LOR STONG 'KHOR
SPRUL PA'I SKU LA BKA' CHOS MANG PO DANG,

LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE'I RNAM THAR BRTZAMS, LCAGS KHYIR LCANG
SKYA MCHOG SPRUL DGON LUNG DU GDAN SAR BKOD PAR

NYID DANG, T'A LE HU THOG THU, GSER DGON RGYUD PA ZHABS DRUNG
SKAL BZANG RAB RGYAS, 'PHRIN LAS RGYA

MTSO; KHRI ZUR NGAG DBANG DPAL BZANG DANG KHRI BA 'BYUNG GNAS,
MDUNG NAG ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG BLO

GSAL; T'A LE ZHABS DRUNG 'JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSO, YU GUR ZHABS
DRUNG YE SHES CHOS 'PHEL, TSEN TSE

BLA MA 'JAM DBYANGS, YIL THER ZHABS DRUNG KUN DGA' BSTAN 'DZIN
SOGS BRGYA LHAG PHEBS, LCAGS

PHAG LOR KHRI ZUR NGAG DBANG DPAL BZANG LA DA LO BSTAN PA 'DI LA
CHAG SGO SHIN TU CHE BAS DRAG PO'I SBYIN SREG LDUG

DGOS KYI BKA' PHEBS NYIN GOR DMAG BKRA SHIS LHUN POR SHOR 'DUG
CHU GLANG LOR AA KYA 'JAM DBYANGS RGYA

MTSO LA BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM GYI DBANG DANG, LCANG SKYA MCHOG
SPRUL, YONGS 'DZIN MDUNG NAG ZHABS

DRUNG BCAS LA CHOS BKA' MANG DU GNANG, SHING STAG LOR CHU BZANG
DU SNYAN DNGAGS DANG RTZIS KYI RGYUN SPEL,

SHING YOS LO MJUG SKU 'BUM DU PHEBS, ZI NA TSANG LA NGED KYI SKU
GONG MA GNYIS DGUNG LO DON GSUM DON BZHI

LAS MA BZHES, NGA RANG YANG LO TSOD DE TZAM YIN, DGON SDE CHEN
PO 'DI NGA LA DRIN CHE, NGA RANG GIS KYANG PHAN

GANG THOGS BYAS KHUL YIN, DA RES MJAL RGYU BYUNG BAS DON 'GRUB
GSUNGS, ME 'BRUG LOR DGON LUNG SMON

LAM SKABS, NGA RANG MI LO LON YIN STABS YANG YANG SMON LAM GSUNG
CHOS 'CHAD RGYU AE YONG MI SHES, DE RES HUR

THAG BYED DGOS GSUNGS TE CHAG MED DU PHEBS, GNYIS PA'I TSES GCIG
NYIN CHU BZANG GI TSOGS DBUR PHEBS

TE BLA BRANG DU PHYIR THON 'PHRAL, DGON PA 'DI DGON CHEN DU SONG
'DUG DGE BSKOS KYIS SKOR BA BYED LUGS,

DBU MDZAD KYIS SKAD RGYAG LUGS, GRVA MANG GIS 'DON PA GSUNG TSUL
THAMS CAD LEGS PO RED, DA BZANG

BSAM DON GRUB GSUNGS, BSNYUN TSUL BZHES PAR ZHABS BRTAN MANG DU
BSGRUBS, DGON PA DANG WANG BSOD

NAMS RDO RJES ZHABS BRTAN PHUL BAR SPYIR NGA RANG LA RANG DBANG
MED CING, SGOS SU NA TSOD SMIN STABS ZHU RGYU KHAG

PO 'DUG CES DANG, KHRI ZUR NGAG DBANG DPAL BZANG GIS SPYAN CHAB
BTANG STE NAN ZHUS BYAS PAR, SNGAR LO NGA

RANG GI NYAMS LA MI ZHIG GIS KHYED KYI TSE TSAD BDUN CU DON
GNYIS YIN ZER BA ZHIG BYUNG BAR, NGED NAS RJE RNAM

RGYAL DPAL 'BYOR DON GSUM BZHES 'DUG PAR NGED KYANG DE TZAM SDOD
RTZIS YIN BYAS KYANG MI DES LO GRANGS BRTZIS

PAS DON GNYIS LAS MA BYUNG BA ZHIG SHAR GSUNGS TE KHONG DANG,
DPON CHUNG MKHAN PO RIN CHEN GRAGS PA GNYIS

LA GANG CI'I BYA BZHAG DON SKOR GYI LUNG BSTAN BCAS SBA GSANG
MED PAR BSTZAL NAS LNGA PA'I TSES BCO BRGYAD

@095 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

KYI NYI MA RTZE SHAR LA GSHEGS, DGONGS RDZOGS RGYA CHER BSGRUBS,
GSUNG RTZOM POTA GCIG LHAG TZAM DANG, SHI

RE THU 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS 'PHEL DPAL BZANG GIS BRTZAMS PA'I RNAM
THAR CHEN MO DPAG BSAM LJON BZANG BYA

BA SNANG, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN RAB RGYAS LCANG
SKYA MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE DANG SKU MCHED DU 'KHRUNGS

PA DBUS NAS THUGS GNYER DANG, RVA SGRENG KHRI CHEN LAS CHOS MANG
DU GSAN, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SNGA PHYIR

BYON NAS KUN MKHYEN MCHOG DANG THUGS 'BREL SHIN TU ZAB PA BYUNG,
DE'I SPRUL SKU RVA LO THANG NAS 'DAN MA'I

RIGS SU SA LUG LA 'KHRUNGS PA BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN BSHAD SGRUB
NYI MA NGES PA GSAR RNYED KYI SKABS LAGS, RAB

BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SA GLANG LA CHOS SDE BTAB NAS BRGYA DANG DGU
'DAS PA RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA STAG LO'I

ZLA BA BZHI PAR CHU BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG GIS SER RTZUD
GRAGS PA LHUN GRUB 'CHAD NYAN BLA MA DANG, STAG

LUNG LHA RAMS PA RIN CHEN DANG, DKA' BCU MCHOG LDAN GNYIS DGE
RGAN DU BSKOS TE 'CHAD NYAN GSAR

'DZUGS MDZAD, LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE SNGA PHYIR 'DIR PHEBS DUS
ZHAL NAS, NGED KYI MNAL LAM DU, DGON

PA'I PHYOGS BZHIR GA-YU 'BRUG GSUM DANG, GSER 'BRUG GCIG 'DUG
PA'I GSER 'BRUG DE'I RNGA RTZER GA-YA'

LTA BU'I SPRIN LING GCIG GIS GOS KYANG MA 'GYANGS PAR SANGS NAS
'OD KYIS NAM MKHA' KHYAB PA DANG, YANG

DGON PA'I SHAR GYI NAM MKHA' LA ZLA BA NYA BA BZHI RIM GYIS SHAR
BA'I MTHAR THO RANGS SKAR CHEN LTA BU MANG PO DANG,

SKAR CHUNG TSAD MED BSGRIGS NAS 'OD GSAL BA RMIS PAS DGON PA
'DIR RJE'I BSTAN PA 'DZIN SKYONG SPEL GSUM

NUS PA'I SKYES BU DAM PA KHYAD PAR CAN BZHI DANG, GRVA BA TSUL
MTHUN MANG PO YOD PA'I LTAS SU SNANG ZHES DANG,

RTZOD RGYUG BZHES DUS, CHOS GRVA TSUGS NAS LO MANG MA SONG YANG
RIGS LUNG BYED LUGS SOGS YAG PO RED, PHYIS

SU 'DI LA BKRA SHIS SGO MANG LTA BU ZHIG YONG PA'I LTAS BZANG
'DUG CES DANG, YANG GNAS 'DI SHIN TU LEGS,

BDE MCHOG GI GNAS DANG MTSUNGS PAR 'DUG PAS MA RGYUD LA SGRUB PA
BYED MKHAN YOD TSE NYAMS RTOGS SKYE SLA BAR

'DUG GSUNGS, ME PHAG LOR RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG DPAL BZANG
KHRIR BSKOS, 'DI DUS 'CHAD

NYAN SHIN TU 'PHEL BAS RJE CHU BZANG BAS KYANG THUGS KHENGS PA'I
GSUNG GNANG, SHING LUG LOR T'A LE HU THOG

THU SKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN DAR RGYAS KHRIR BZHUGS, YANG BSKYAR
RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG DPAL BZANG,

LCAGS GLANG LO NAS DKA' BCU NGAG DBANG SHES RAB, ME LUG LOR KHRI
BA SNGA MA GSHEGS PAS SA SPREL LO SAR TSES

GCIG NYIN CHU BZANG RJE NYID KYIS KHRI BYIN GYIS BRLABS TE RNAM
DPYOD 'GRAN ZLA MED PA'I MKHAS DBANG ZHVA DMAR

LHA RAMS PA BLO BZANG 'BYUNG GNAS BSKOS, SLAR YANG T'A LE HU
THOG THU, MDO BA MKHAN CHEN DBANG PHYUG

RGYA MTSO SOGS RIM PAR BZHUGS SHING 'CHAD NYAN GONG 'PHEL BSTAR
CHAGS LA NYAMS PA MED CING, LCANG SKYA

RIN PO CHE DANG CHU BZANG MCHOG SPRUL SKU MCHED RNAM GNYIS KYIS
RTZE'I RNAM RGYAL GRVA TSANG NAS DBYANGS DPON SOGS

BLANGS; GDANGS DANG SA GAR BSLABS, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL NAS SDE KHRI
RIN PO CHE GDAN DRANGS DBANG ZHUS

TE DUS 'KHOR GRVA TSANG GSAR DU BTZUGS, ` JO KHANG CHEN MO THAR
LAM GSAL BYED GLING NA JO BO SH'AKYA MU NI,

@096 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

DE'I GA-YAS NA MI 'KHRUGS PA DANG 'JAM DBYANGS, GA-YON NA SMAN
BLA DANG, RDOR SEMS RNAMS GTZO BOR BYAS

PA'I SANGS RGYAS STONG SKU, STENG THOG GA-YAS PHYOGS NA TSE LHA
RNAM GSUM GYIS GTZOS LI MA KHANG, RGYAB NGOS SU

BKA' BSTAN GNYIS SOGS GSUNG RAB LHA KHANG, GA-YON DU MCHOD RTEN
BYA RUNG KHA SHOR DANG BDE GSHEGS MCHOD

RTEN BRGYAD SOGS THUGS RTEN LHA KHANG, MDUN RAB GSAL NA MKHAN
SLOB CHOS GSUM GYIS GTZOS GU RU MTSAN

BRGYAD LHA KHANG, RGYA MTHONG GI DBUS SU RVA SGRENG KHRI CHEN
GYI 'DRA THANG GOS SKU, GA-YAS GA-YON DU GNAS BCU'I

LOGS BRIS, STENG 'OG KUN TU SKYES RABS RGYAS BSDUS KYI ZHAL
THANG BYIN CAN MANG PO SOGS LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHES

GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD DE KUN GZIGS MTHONG BA DON LDAN, RONG BO NO
MON HAN, THANG RING RGYAL BA TSANG

SOGS AAM SOG GI BLA CHEN BRGYA PHRAG BRGAL BAS SNGA PHYIR RAB
GNAS MDZAD PA'I BYIN CAN, ` MTSAN NYID 'DU

KHANG CHEN MOR 'CHAD NYAN GSAR BTZUGS SKABS 'DZUM BZHAD MDZAD PA
MANG POS MTHONG BAR GRAGS PA'I RJE

'DZUM BZHAD MA SOGS RTEN MTHA' YAS, ` CHU BZANG BLA BRANG DU
THUB PA GSUNG 'BYON MA, CHOS RJE DON

RIN PA'I PHYAG RJES GSAL BAR BAB PA'I RDO, LHA MO'I PHO BRANG
SOGS RTEN GSUM GYI GAN MDZOD LNGA, GZHAN

YANG BYAMS KHANG, KLU DBANG RGYAL PO'I LHA KHANG SOGS MANG,
LCANG SKYA BLA BRANG, GZHAN GSER KHRI BLA BRANG

PHUN TSOGS BKOD MDZES, ZHVA DMAR BLA BRANG, MAL GRUB CHEN NGAG
DBANG MCHOG GRUB RGYA MTSO'I SKYE BRGYUD

KYI BLA BRANG SOGS SGAR KHAG MANG, RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SA
GLANG LA DGON PA BTAB NAS LO NYIS BRGYA DANG

GCIG RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA STAG LA 'CHAD NYAN BTZUGS NAS GO
GNYIS PA SA BYA 'DI YIN NO, ` ,GSER

KHOG TU, BTZAN PO DGON DGA' LDAN DAM CHOS GLING 'DEBS PA PO
BTZAN PO DON GRUB RGYA MTSO YUL DBUS DGA'

BA GDONG DU 'KHRUNGS, GZHON NU NAS RAB TU BYUNG STE SGO MANG
GRVA TSANG DU 'DAN MA TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO'I NYE GNAS

MDZAD; GUNG RU SANGS RGYAS BKRA SHIS BSTEN TE GZHUNG LUGS LA
SBYANGS, DVAGS PO GRVA TSANG DU YANG BZHUGS,

MKHAS GRAGS CHE BAS RGYAL DBANG GONG MAS SE CHEN RAB 'BYAMS PA
LA, BSAM SGANG BA DANG 'DI PA GNYIS SHES

RAB SU CHE DRIS DUS, ZHABS DRUNG GIS SHES RAB SHOG BTZAN PO CHE,
ZHIB PO MED KYANG RTZOD PA SHUGS SHIN TU

CHE ZHUS SNANG, LHA LDAN DU RAB 'BYAMS PA TSUGS PA'I LO GNYIS
PAR SMON LAM GRVA SKOR MDZAD, LO SNGA MAR

DOM NYAG PA'I TSAB GNANG BA YIN YANG ZER, THUGS NGAR CHE ZHING
ZHAL TSA BAS LNGA PA CHEN PO'I 'BRAS SPUNGS DAM

BCA' LA BZHENGS NAS MDZES LAM CUNG ZAD KYANG MA MDZAD PAR BGRO
GLENG TSA BO PHUL BAS SDE SRID BSOD NAMS

CHOS 'PHEL GYI DGONGS PHOG YOD KYANG, RGYAL DBANG NAS RAB 'BYAMS
PA DON GRUB RGYA MTSOS BSTAN PA'I GAD

BDAR YAG PO BYAS SONG ZHES DGYES GZIGS CHE BAS SKYON MA BYUNG,
DPON SDE BAS PO TA LAR BKA' 'GYUR TSAR

PHUD LA MNGAGS PAS THOS DON LA LUNG GI SGO NAS NGES PA RNYED DE
BKA' GNANG SKOR SHOG DRIL DU BTAB, GONG

NAS SHAR PHYOGS SU PHEBS NA 'GRO DON 'BYUNG BAR GSUNGS NAS DRE'U
BZHI SOGS GNA' SKYES BCAS MDO SMAD DU

MNGAGS; KVA RING DKA' BCUS BSNGAGS BRJOD DANG BKUR GZOS RGYA
CHER MDZAD, TE THUNG DGON,

@097 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MCHOD RTEN THANG, THUR CHEN DGON RNAMS KYIS GDAN 'DREN ZHUS,
SEMS NYID DGON PA'I KHRI DANG,

CHU RTA LA SKU 'BUM KHRIR BZHUGS, 'BRU GU'I SAR DGON PA BTAB, DO
LON SGOM PA SKU TSAB TU BZHAG

GSER KHOG GSAR TSUGS LA B'A ZA SGOM PA 'GRO DGOS GSUNGS NAS
KHRID, SA BYI LA DGON LUNG KHRIR BZHUGS

PA'I LO GSUM PA LCAGS STAG LA SE CHEN HUNG THA'I JI DANG, AERTI
NI TA'I CHING GNYIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG BYAS TE CHOS

SDE 'DI BTAB, GRVA RGYUN DANG SU RUG SDUD 'JAGS BYAS, GNAS GZHI
GSAR 'DZIN GYI NYIN RJE BSAM SGANG

PA'I GRVA BA NOR BU BKRA SHIS DANG, PHUN TSOGS YON TAN ZER BA
GNYIS KYIS DUNG DKAR SOGS DNGOS 'BUL

PHUL; NOR BU RI, BKRA SHIS THANG, PHUN TSOGS LUNG PA, YON TAN
LUNG PA STE DGON GNAS KYI

MING DANG 'BUL MKHAN GNYIS KYI MING RANG 'GRIG BYUNG BAS RTEN
'BREL NGO MTSAR BAR GLENG, DE DUS RGYA'I BON

PO A'U'U SHAN ZHIN GYIS SA BRTAGS PA DANG SA 'DUL BYAS PAS BON
DE'I NYA KHOG DANG MKHAR RNGA DENG SANG NANG RTEN

GRAS SU YOD ZER, DE NAS LO NGO BZHI PA CHU SBRUL LA LNGA PA CHEN
PO 'DIR PHEBS, MANG LA DKON BRTZEGS DBU

NAS SHOG SDEBS GSUM BZHI TZAM GYI BKLAG LUNG DANG, NYID DPON
GA-YOG SUM CU SKOR LA PHYAG DRUG PA'I DBANG

BZHI BYIN RLABS KYI TSUL DU GNANG, GTZUG LAG KHANG KUN RVA SOGS
'DI LTAR BGYIS KYI LJAGS BKOD DANG,

LHA MO, DRAG RGYAL MA, GSUNG RGYAL DGRA LHA SKYES GCIG BCAS
SRUNG MA GSUM LA DGON GNAS GNYER GTAD

MDZAD PAS DAR RGYAS CHE NGES BYUNG, BYAMS CHEN CHOS RJE'I DUS
KYI BKA' 'GYUR MTSAL PAR GLEGS SHING GLEGS

THAG RGYA LUGS DNGOS GTZANG CHA TSANG GIS THOG DRANGS DNGOS 'BUL
GZABS, NYID NAS YA MA R'A DZA DUNG PHYUR

BCU BDUN GSUNGS PA ZHABS BRTAN DU PHUL, BKA' 'GYUR DE DA LTA
'BRAS SPUNGS SU BZHUGS SHING RGYAL DBANG

GIS LUNG YANG DE THOG NAS GSAN 'DUG DE LTAR LO NGO BCU DRUG TZAM
BSKYANGS TE SHING SBRUL LA GSHEGS,

GDUNG ZHUGS LA SBYANGS PAR DBU THOD LA 'JIGS BYED KYI SKU SOGS
BYIN RTEN MANG DU PHEBS, ` RDO RJE 'CHANG

HOR SMIN GROL CHOS KYI RGYAL PO 'PHRIN LAS LHUN GRUB NI, SNGON
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DGA' BA'I TOG TU 'KHRUNGS

TE KLU'I RGYAL PO LAS BYUNG BA'I YID BZHIN GYI NOR BU SEMS
BSKYED PA'I RDZAS SU PHUL NAS THUGS BSKYED, 'DI

DGE SLONG PAD MA'I NGANG LDAN DANG DUS MNYAM PAR BSHAD, DE NAS
'PHAGS PA MA 'GAG PA, DPAL 'BRAS

RDO RJE, COG RO KLU'I RGYAL MTSAN, SLOB DPON DHARMA, B'A LA,
SLOB DPON ZLA BA GZHON NU, BYANG SEMS

ZLA BA RGYAL MTSAN, DPAL LDAN GON PA BA, SKYER SGANG BA, KE'U YE
SHES 'BYUNG GNAS, MKHAS BTZUN

GZHON NU DON GRUB, TSA KHO NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA, KUN MKHYEN LEGS
PA DON GRUB SOGS KYI SKU'I SKYE BA BZHES

SHING; SKU TSE 'DIR MDO SMAD LHO RGYUD CHOS 'KHOR DANG NYE BA'I
BTZAN MO SNAR YAB HOR NYA SHUL SKYAG GE DANG YUM

MAL ZA CHOS MO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I MJUG CHU KYI
LA 'KHRUNGS, SEMS DPA' SPRUL SKU GONG

MA LA RAB BYUNG ZHUS, YUL DBUS SGO MANG DU DPON SLOB SGA RU BA
NGAG DBANG DPAL 'BYOR LA BRTZI BZHAG THOG

MAR GSAN, STAG TSANG RVA BA STOD DU ZHAL SNGA NAS DAM CHOS RNAM
RGYAL BA LA BSDUS TSAD BSLAB, SLAR

@098 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

YANG SGO MANG DU PHAR PHYIN DBU MA 'DUL MDZOD RNAMS GSAN TE
GLING BSRE DKA' BCU MDZAD DUS MKHYEN RAB DANG

NA TSOD, BZHUGS GRAL GSUM GYI MKHAS PA'I KHROM THOG CHOD PA
BYUNG, GTZANG DU MNGA' RIS DRUNG BA LA LAM

RIM LTA KHRID SOGS DANG, DGE 'PHEL DU CHOS RJE DGE LEGS DAR
RGYAS PA'I DRUNG NAS ZHI LHAG DANG BCU GSUM

MA'I BSKYED RDZOGS KYI KHRID GSAN TE BSGOMS PAS ZHI GNAS KYI
RTOGS PA 'KHRUNGS, BSKYED RDZOGS KYI DMIGS

RNAM SBYANGS PAS GTZO 'KHOR GYI RNAM PA GSAL ZHING, GAR STABS
MDZAD PAS RGYAN CHA 'KHROL BA'I SGRA THOS PA LTA BU

BYUNG BAS BSKYED RIM RAGS PA SKYE BA LA DKA' TSEGS CHER MI 'DUG
GSUNGS, RGYUD SMAD DU ZHOGS PA BLO BZANG

DON YOD LAS RGYUD 'GREL PHAL CHER DANG BSKYED RDZOGS KYI LJAGS
BSHAD, 'DZIN CHOS RNAMS GSAN BZHIN PA'I

SKABS GZHUNG GI BKA' BSGYUR GYIS SO GCIG PA CHU 'BRUG LA DGA'
LDAN BKRA SHIS BSGO MANG GI KHRIR PHEBS TE SHING

'BRUG BAR BZHUGS, KHRI GSEB TU BYANG CHUB ME TOG 'KHRUNGS PAS
BYANG CHUB KYI SEMS MNGA' BA'I LTAS SU GLENG,

PO TI BZHI'I t'IKKA DANG THAL 'PHRENG ZUR BKOL BCAS BTANG BAS
RIGS LUNG SMRA BAS SA STENG KHYAB, GRAGS CHE

BA DPON SLOB BLO GROS RGYA MTSO, BKA' 'GYUR BA SBYIN PA RGYA
MTSO, LCANG SKYA GONG MA, THAR SHUL RAB 'BYAMS

PA CHOS SKYONG RGYA MTSO, BE RI RAB 'BYAMS PA, SOG PO RAB 'BYAMS
PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS, T'A 'ON

PA TING 'DZIN RGYA MTSO BSAM BLO KshE tA P'A LA, 'DUL BA CHOS
RJE HOR SKAL LDAN SOGS PO TI LNGA DANG MDO SNGAGS

LA KHO BO'O SNYAM PA'I MKHAS DBANG DPAG MED THON, PHA BONG KHA
BA DPAL 'BYOR DAR RGYAS PA LAS MGON PO'I

CHOS SKOR GSAN PAR CHOS RGYUN GYIS GZHAN LA PHAN THOGS PA'I
MTSAN LAM BYUNG, ZHE BZHI PA SHING SBRUL LA,

MERGAN HUNG THE JIS ZHUS PA BZHIN, GZHUNG GIS SMIN GROL NO MON
HAN GYI CHO LO GNANG STE BTZAN PO DGON DU

PHEBS; DE DUS SNGAGS KHANG ZHES RTZIG SKOR GYI DKAR PHIGS DANG
'DU KHANG, GRVA SHAG 'GA' LAS MED LA,

GRVA BA YANG 'BROG BTZUN SNGAGS GRVA PA SUM CU BZHI BCU SKOR LAS
MI 'DUG KYANG MTSAN NYID BTZUGS SHING, GRVA BA

GSAR DU BSDUS TE GRVA RIG GNAS LEGS BSHAD BANG MDZOD GSAR RTZOM
DANG PHAR PHYIN BTANG BAS BLO GSAL

BA MANG DU THON, GRVA TSOGS KYANG BDUN BRGYA BRGYAD BRGYA LONG
NGES RGYUN DU DANG, DGON MA YANG RGYANG GRAGS

LA NYE BA'I 'PHEL RGYAS BYUNG, SA RTA LA DBUS SU PHEBS, 'BRAS
SPUNGS CHIBS RVA STENG DU BZHUGS TE GONG

GI BKA' LTAR RDUL TSON GYI DKYIL 'KHOR BZHENGS TE DKYUS GCIG LA
GSANG 'DUS KYI DBANG TSAR BO BRGYAD

BSKUR; RDUL TSON GSHEGS PA DANG, DE RJES ZHI BA'I SPYIN SREG
DANG 'O THUG BSGRUB PA SOGS RGYUD DANG MKHAS

PA'I GSUNG LTAR MDZAD, RAS BRIS LA BRTEN NAS KYANG GSANG 'DUS
DBANG NYER GCIG GNANG, BDE MCHOG

L'U AI PA DANG 'JIGS BYED DBANG YANG GRANGS DE MTSUNGS, 'JAM
MGON BLO GROS RGYA MTSO, LCANG SKYA GONG MA,

'DUL BA CHOS RJE HOR SKAL LDAN, HOR NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS, KUN
MKHYEN GONG MA BCAS NANG SLOB BDUN

TZAM LA MGON PO'I BSNYEN SGRUB YIG CHUNG DMAR NAG BE'U BUM NAG
PO, GTOR CHEN RNAM BSHAD RNAMS KYI

PHYAG LEN KHRID BCAS GNANG, GONG SA LNGA PA'I SLOB MA'I NANG NAS
'JAM DPAL ZHAL LUNG GI BKA' BAB YIN PAS

@099 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GSUNG RGYUN BZHIN LCANG SKYA GONG MA DANG, KUN MKHYEN BLA MA
GNYIS KYIS KHRID YIG KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS PA RE

MDZAD PAS DENG SANG LAM RIM CHEN MO'I DNGOS BSTAN, BKA' GDAMS
GZHUNG PA'I BSHAD SROL GYI KHRID RGYUN

GYIS SA STENG KHYAB PA 'DI BYUNG BAS YAB SRAS THAMS CAD KYI
'PHRIN LAS KYI KHYAB BRDAL BLA NA MED PAR SEMS, NYID

KYANG SHAR SGOM LA THUGS 'DRIS PAS PHEBS BZHUD KYI SKABS CHIBS
YOB GCIG NAS GCIG TU ZHABS 'JOG PA'I

BAR LA LAM KHRID TSAR GCIG 'GRO BAR GSUNG RGYUN LAS 'BYUNG, LAN
GNYIS PA ME STAG LOR PHEBS DUS KYANG

KUN MKHYEN BLA MAR MGON PO SNYING ZHUGS KYI RJES GNANG, MNGA'
RIS CHOS BSTAN PA NAS BRGYUD PA'I KshE tA P'A

LA YAB YUM GYI BSNYEN SGRUB LAS GSUM, YAB YUM SROG 'KHOR THUN
MONG MA YIN PA DANG, KshE tA P'A LA SPREL

KHRID MA'I CHOS SKOR 'BOD RBAD GSANG GSUM SNGAGS 'GRIG DANG BCAS
PA CHIG BRGYUD DU GNANG, 'DI'I SNGAGS

'GRIG SHES MKHAN SNGAR YANG DKON NGES SU SNANG ZHES KUN MKHYEN
NYID GSUNGS, DON GSUM PA SHING KHYI LA SLAR

YANG PHEBS SKABS, KUN MKHYEN MCHOG GIS GSOL BA BTAB STE, GDUGS
DKAR LHA NYER LNGA MA'I DBANG

LEGS LDAN MCHED GSUM GYI RJES GNANG BCAS, SGROL DKAR GYI RJES
GNANG DANG KHRID, NYID KYI RNAM THAR

GSUNG DGOS ZHUS PAS, ZLA SHAS GCIG LA DAM PA DU MA'I RNAM THAR
DANG, NYID LA MNAL LAM DU GZHON

DUS NAS RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA YANG YANG ZHAL GZIGS SHING HE RU
KAS RJES SU BZUNG BA'I MTSAN MA SNGA PHYIR BYUNG BA

DANG; MDUN DU TSOGS BDAG DMAR PO GLANG GDONG PHYAG GNYIS PA, RIN
PO CHE'I SNOD NOR BUS BKANG BA

BSNAMS NAS BZHUGS PA RGYUN DU RMIS SHING RGYAL PO AINDRA BO DHI
YANG YANG RMIS TSUL GSUNGS, GZHAN KLU RGYAL DGA'

NGO MTSAR BA MANG, KUN MKHYEN BLA MAR KHYED RANG BOD DU BZHUGS
YUN RING NAS CHU MI THUB PAS NGA DANG MNYAM

DU MDO SMAD LA PHEBS NA BSTAN PA LA PHAN THOGS RGYA CHEN PO YONG
GSUNGS PA LA, BDAG NI TSE LA LTOS PA MED

PAR SGRUB PA BYED PA'I DAM BCA' YOD PAS MI 'GRO ZHUS, NGAS
GZHUNG LA ZHUS NAS DBANG MED DU 'GRO DGOS

BYUNG NA JI LTAR BYED GSUNGS PAR, GZHUNG GIS SONG GSUNG YANG NGA
MI 'GRO GZHUNG GIS NGA LTA BU'I GRVA RKYANG

GCIG LA BYED RGYU GANG YOD, GSOD NA'ANG LUS SROG LA LTAS PA MED
CES ZHUS PAS 'O NA DE KA MDZOD GSUNGS,

DUS KUN TU NANG LUGS KYI BSLAB BYA LO RGYUS KYI SGO NAS BSTAN PA
'DZIN TSUL, SNYAN BRGYUD KYI GDAMS PA MANG DU

GNANG BAS 'DI PA DANG, MERGAN BLA MA GNYIS KYI BKA' DRIN GYIS
PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I DNGOS GRUB BRNYES

GNYIS MI THUB PAndI TA'I, ,SGYU 'PHRUL 'GUGS
