,BLA MA'I ZHAL NAS, RGYA CHER BSHAD

NA SNYAN BRGYUD ZHAL SHES 'JIG ,GCIG TU BSGRIL NA SNYAN BRGYUD
THOR BU NYAMS, ,DE'I PHYIR RGYUD DANG BLA MA'I

BKA' STZAL DON, ZUNG 'DRIL LTOS CAN SHOD CIG GDAMS NGAG 'DRA,
,ZHES GSUNGS PA SOGS MANG DU SNANG YANG

GSANG BA'I GNAS DPOG PAR DKA' ZHING ZUR TZAM LAS MA BRIS, DON
BZHI PA SHING PHAG LA 'DIR PHEBS TE LO NGO

@100 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BZHI'I BAR DU CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO BSKOR, DON BRGYAD PA SA YOS LA
ZHI BAR GSHEGS, SKAL LDAN 'JUG NGOGS ZER

BA'I RNAM THAR GYI YI GE ZHIG KYANG MTHONG, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO
BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO NI, TZONG KHA BDE KHAMS

KYI SA'I CHA BYA KHYUNG DGON GYI NYE 'DABS KHROM TSA GONG NGA
ZER BAR RVA'I RIGS LAS YAB TSE GZUNGS BYAMS DANG,

YUM GA-YANG MO SKYID KYI SRAS SU LCAGS 'BRUG DGUN ZLA THA MA'I
TSES BCO LNGA LA SKU 'KHRUNGS, MTSAN LA NGAG DBANG

DGE 'DUN BTAGS, ZAS GOS KYI SBYIN GTONG DANG, CHOS MTHUN GYI
RTZED MOS THAMS CAD NGO MTSAR,

DGUNG LO DRUG BDUN STENG BYA KHYUNG DU PHEBS TE LO SHAS DER
BZHUGS, YI GE DANG DPE 'DZIN BSLAB, BYA KHYUNG

MKHAN PO LAS DGE BSNYEN BSGRUBS, ME PHAG LOR GSER KHOG BLA GRVA
SPYI DANG, MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG RNAMS

KYIS KUN MKHYEN GONG MAR THUGS BRTAG ZHUS PA'I MNAL LAM DU, NAM
STOD LA SKU GONG MA'I SKU PANG DU NYID KYI

DBU BZHAG NAS 'DUG PAR BLA MA'I SKU MDUN NAS NYAL BA 'DI MA LEGS
DGONGS PA DANG MNAL SAD, YANG

MTSAN SMAD LA RMI LAM BZUNG BAR SNGAR BZHIN BYUNG BAS NGA'I BLA
MA'I SPRUL SKU 'KHRUL MED DU 'DUG GSUNGS

THUGS DGYES, THUGS GNYER LA SBYANGS DGOS KYI ZHAL BKOD KYANG
BSTZAL, RGYAL BA YAB SRAS, MAL

GRUB CHEN, LA MO GNAS CHUNG BCAS KYI LUNG DANG, JO SH'AKA RNAM
GSUM, 'BRAS SPUNGS 'JIGS BYED

BCAS KYI MDUN DU ZAN RIL PHUL BA THAMS CAD MTHUN PAR BYUNG BAS
THAG BCAD DO DGUNG LO DGU PA SA BYI LA

GDAN SAR BKOD, CHU BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN LAS RAB BYUNG
DANG DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, RBU DPON SLOB BLO

BZANG DPAL LDAN DGE RGAN DU BSTEN, BTZAN PO'I BSDUS GRVA YONGS
RDZOGS THUGS 'DZIN GYIS SER RTZUD NGAG

DBANG BLO BZANG SOGS MDUN DU BOS TE RIGS LAM LA SBYANGS, DGE
RGAN PA BAN RGUD DGON GYI KHRIR PHEBS

PA'I TSAB TU DKA' CHEN BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA SLOB DPON DU BSTEN,
THUGS DKAR ZHING ZHAL TSA BAS ZHABS

BSKUL NAN TAN MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PA'I SKABS GSER KHRI
SPRUL SKU 'JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSO DAM BCA'

'JOG PAR PHEBS SKABS, 'DI BAS 'GRO GLENG TSA GAD DE BA BTANG
BA'I SNYAN PA DBUS SU YANG BYUNG BAS DE KA'I

RANG GRVA BA RNAMS YID DGA' BA BYUNG, 'BRUM BYOL LA KAN CHEN
DGON DU PHEBS DUS 'DAN MA GRUB CHEN LAS

DBANG LUNG RJES GNANG KHRID SOGS MANG DU GSAN, SNGA DRO GCIG
GSANG 'DUS BDAG BSKYED TSANG MA THUGS

'DZIN GYIS PHYI DRO RGYUG SPRAD PAS DGE RGAN GYIS DE RING GI
THUGS 'DZIN 'DI 'DRA NGO MTSAR CHE, GZHAN RNAMS

KYANG 'DI BZHIN MDZAD NA LHAG PAR BDAG LA BKA' DRIN CHE ZHUS,
DE'I RGYU MTSAN GZHAN GYIS ZHUS DUS SNGON GYI

BAG CHAGS ZHIG GI STABS RED GSUNGS SNANG, KUN MKHYEN BLA MAS
KYANG SPRUL SKU SHIN TU GSAL SHOS THUGS RAB

CAN ZHIG BYUNG GSUNGS 'DUG LCAGS BYI LOR PHUN TSOGS LUNG PA'I RI
KHROD DU GZIMS KHANG SAR BZOS MDZAD

PAR TSOGS 'DU'I STENG NAS THUGS GNYER LA GNOD CING DGOS PA MED
'DRA ZHUS PAR, NGA'I BSLAB SBYANGS LA

GNOD DOGS 'DI 'DRA ZER BA LEGS RUNG, KHANG BA 'DI MI MKHO MA ZER
RJES SOR KHYED TSOL MKHO BA'I DUS

GCIG YONG SHAS CHE GSUNGS, CHU STAG BAR LO LNGA TZAM LA SLOB
CHUNG GNANG STE 'CHAD NYAN DMAR, LO DER RI KHROD

@101 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

DU SKU MTSAMS KYI SKABS MNAL LAM DU, MI NAG PO BRJID LDAN ZHIG
GIS, KHYED DA LO DBUS SU PHEBS, RJES

SOR PHEBS MI THUB ZER BA ZHIG BYUNG BA LTAR PHEBS RGYUR THAG
BCAD, NYIN GCIG NOR BU'I RI'I DAR COG LA ME

SHOR BAR NGA'I 'GRO 'DUG LA MI BLTA, DGON SPYI LA SNGAR LTAS
ZHIG RED, ZHAG GSUM LAS MI 'GYANG BAR RGYAB

RI'I RTZER DAR COG 'DZUGS PA DANG, DGE 'DUN MANG GIS DUNG SKAD
DANG, DGRA LHA DPUNG BSTOD MDZAD NA

BZANG GSUNGS PA PHYI LO RGYA DMAG GIS DGON PA MER BSREGS KYANG
SHING SBRUL LOR SLAR GZHI ZIN PA LA DGONGS

'DRA; DBUS PHEBS SKABS MTSO SNGON PO'I STENG NAS GRVA GZUGS
GNYIS SKAM LA 'GRO BA LTAR YONG BA THAMS CAD KYIS

MTHONG; RGYAL BA YAB SRAS DANG, DGON SDE RNAMS LA DNGOS 'BUL
DANG MANG 'GYED GZABS, PAn CHEN

RIN PO CHE'I GZIMS CHUNG NANG DU NYID KYI ZHABS BZHAG PA DANG
BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I TSOGS DUNG 'BUD PA DUS

MNYAM PA DANG, SGO MANG DU GSAR ZHUGS KYI GRVA JA BTANG STE NYID
TSOGS MJAL LA PHEBS PA DANG RTOGS BRJOD

MDUN LEGS MA GSAR TSUGS KYI DBU BSKUL BA DUS 'GRIG BYUNG BAS
THUGS DGYES TE PHYIS SU MDUN LEGS MA LA

'GREL BA ZHIG KYANG MDZAD, GRVA TSANG GIS BLA CHEN LUGS KYI GZOS
SGO ZHUS KYANG NYID NAS GRVA RKYANG DKYUS MA'I KHROD DU

THUGS GNYER GTZOR 'DON DANG, CHOS MTSAMS SU DGE 'PHEL SKYOR LUNG
SOGS SU DPE MTSAMS MDZAD SKABS

SU; SKU CHINGS GROL BA MED PAR NAM NYIN MTSAN DU 'DZIN SKYOR KHO
NA GNANG, GSER DGON GYI GRVA RGYAN RGYUD SMAD

MKHAN PO GNANG MKHAN GRAGS PA LHUN GRUB DGE RGAN DU BSTEN NAS
DPE KHRID DANG DOGS GCOD NAN TAN MDZAD

PAS PHYIS SU YANG DA LTA SEMS LA CHOS THAN THUN RE 'BYOR RGYU
DANG, MDO SNGAGS LA GO PHYOGS RE 'CHAR RGYU BYUNG BA DGE

BSHES KHONG GI DRIN YIN GSUNGS, CHU YOS LOR DGE 'PHEL DU DPE
MTSAMS SKABS MNAL LAM DU, MI GCIG

GIS KHYED KYI MDO SMAD KYI DGON PA ZHIG SONG ZER BA ZHIG BYUNG
BAS THUGS MA BDE BAR RIM GRO MDZAD, GZHAN

'GA' RES MDO SMAD KYI BSTAN PA 'PHO 'GYUR 'DI LA BLTAS NA, NYID
DE PHYOGS KYI BSTAN PA'I BDAG PO YIN

GSHIS RE ZHIG LHO MON PHYOGS SU GSANG PHEBS SAM, GNAS NGES MED
LTA BU MDZAD NA ZHUS PAR, RANG NGOS NAS

BSTAN 'GRO LA GNOD PA DANG, KHRIMS 'GAL GYI NYES PA PHRAN BU
YANG BSGRUBS MED, SNGON GYI LAS GCIG YIN

NA GANG DU SONG YANG DER SLEBS YONG, BSTAN PA LA PHAN THOGS MI
THOGS GANG LTAR NA YANG, DE DON YID

BZHAG BYAS DKON MCHOG LA RGYAB RTEN BCOL TE LHA BLA MAR GSOL
'DEBS DANG, RIM GRO GANG LCOGS BSGRUB

'DUN LAS BTANG SNYOMS SU SDOD RTZIS MIN GSUNGS, RGYAL BA YAB
SRAS SOGS THAMS CAD LA LUNG ZHUS YANG YANG

MDZAD DE RIM GRO 'TSEM MED MDZAD PAS SBRUL LOR PHUN TSOGS LUNG
PA'I RI KHROD DU GRVA BA LNGA BCU TZAM 'TSOGS RGYU

BYUNG; SKABS DER KHANG BA GZHAN MED PAR SNGAR GYI GZIGS CHUNG
DER 'TSOGS CHOG PA BYUNG BAS THAMS CAD YID

CHES KYIS SPYAN CHAB NA BZA' BANG BA TZAM BTANG, NYER BDUN PA ME
RTA LO GZHUNG NAS CHO LO, THAM KA BKA'

SHOG SOGS KYI GZENGS BSTOD BCAS PE CING DU MI SNA MKHAN POR
PHEBS DGOS BYUNG BAR, PHAL CHER GYIS DUS

TSOD 'DIR RGYA NAG LA PHEBS RGYU DE GA 'DRA YIN ZHES ZHU MKHAN
BYUNG YANG, MDO SMAD KYI BSTAN PA'I LA RGYAR DGONGS,@102 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BSTAN 'GYUR TSAR GCIG THUB PA'I GSER SKU MI TSAD SOGS RTEN KHYAD
'PHAGS MANG PO DANG BCAS PHEBS TE

RTEN RNAMS MTSO SNGON NAS GONG LAM BRGYUD RI KHROD LA BSKUR,
NYID ZI LING DU PHEBS, SER MO PA PHAL CHER CHU

BRAG NAGS GSUM LA GAB, RGYA MI'I CHAS GOS GYON TSAD LA 'BROS
DGOS PA DANG, GRONG YUL DU KHYIM PA'I CHAS

KYIS LTO 'TSOL BA, GZAN SHAM STENG DU GOS DKAR NAG GYON DGOS
PA'I DUS YIN PAS THAMS CAD LA MJAL

'DOD CHE YANG SU YONG MA NUS, NYID NAS ZI LING AAM BHAN LA THABS
MKHAS KYIS BSTUN TE NGA'I GRVA BA TSO PHYOGS

PHYOGS SU 'THOR BA NGA'I RTZAR YONG RGYU LA BKAG CHA MED PA DGOS
TSUL ZHUS PAS RGYA DPON GYIS KYANG, BLA MA 'DI LA

MJAL 'DOD KYI SER SKYA SU YANG MA 'GOG PAR THONGS ZHES SGO YIG
PHYOGS KUN TU SBYAR BAS RGAN 'KHOGS KHUR TE

YONG BA TSUN GYI MJAL MI TSAD MED PA BYUNG, DE NAS BZUNG GRVA BA
RNAMS RAB BYUNG GI RTAGS DANG BCAS BAG YANGS

SU SONG CHOG PA BYUNG BAS BKA' DRIN GYI KHUR SHUN TU LCI, NYING
SHA MKHAR, AOR DU SU, THU MED, CHA HAR

SOGS SU CHOS SBYIN 'GYED BZHIN PAR PHEBS, DGE BSNYEN SOGS KYI
SDOM PA 'BOG SKABS DGUN GRANG SGANG GI

LHAGS PA MDA' LTAR BRGYUGS KYANG BLA GRVA TSANG MAS NA BZA'
SBUBS CAN 'PHUD PA SOGS BSTAN PA'I DMIGS RKYEN

LA GANG PHAN MDZAD, CANG GYA KO'U NAS LHA SRAS DRUG PAS BSUS TE,
THUGS YID GCIG 'DRES KYI BLA SLOB TU

GYUR; PHO BRANG DU RGYAL POR MJAL SKABS TSUR YANG PHYAG GNYIS
KYIS NANG MDZOD KHA DAR BSTZAL, DRI BA MANG PO

MDZAD PA SO SO LA LAN SKABS SU GANG BAB PHUL BAS BLON PO RNAMS
KYIS, GONG MA'I MDUN DU 'TSAB NYAMS DANG

SPOBS PA MA ZHAN PAR LAN 'DI 'DRA 'BUL THUB PA NGO MTSAR CHEN PO
RED ZER BA BYUNG, LNGA BCU'I BA YAR LA

BSTAN 'GYUR PAR PHUD SOGS PHUL BAR GONG NAS KYANG MKHAN PO
BYINGS LAS LHAG PA'I MTHONG GZOS MDZAD, SKU

GONG MA'I DNGOS SLOB BKA' 'GYUR BA BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS LAS
RDOR 'PHRENG DANG MI TRA YONGS RDZOGS KYI DBANG

GSAN; RGYAL DBANG MCHOG DANG BOD GZHUNG GI BSTAN SRID LA RGYA,
DE'I NANG NAS MDO SMAD KYI BSTAN PA'I ZHABS

'DEGS SU PHAN NGES KYI ZHU DON GANG YOD NANG BLON RNAMS BRGYUD
DE ZHUS PAS AA MDO PHYOGS SU BLA MA SER MO PA

RNAMS RANG GNAS SU CHOS SPYOD LA GNAS CHOG PA BYUNG, GONG NAS
CAR KO CHI DANG, BI CHE CI SOGS PHEBS SKYEL LA ZI

LING BAR GTONG GNANG GIS ME LUG ZLA BA BZHI PA'I TSES GSUM LA
RGYAL KHAB NAS CHIBS BSGYUR, CHA HAR DU PHEBS

SKABS GRVA BA LNGAS BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS PAR, NGA BSNYEN PAR
RDZOGS NAS LO BCU MA SONG BAS GZHAN GYI MKHAN PO BYED

MI RUNG BA 'DUL BA RANG LUGS RED, MI YONG GSUNGS KYANG RJES
BSNYEGS KYIS MKHAR SNGON BAR DU 'ONG BAR, NGA BLA

TSUGS 'DZIN MKHAN GYIS 'DUL BA LA PHOD TSOD BYED MI RUNG GSUNGS
TE RAB 'BYAMS PA SBYIN PA BZANG PO LAS

BSGRUB TU BCUG ,AOR DU SU, ZI LING SOGS BRGYUD PHUN TSOGS LUNG
PA'I RI KHROD DU PHEBS, DA DUNG YANG GRVA

BA RNAMS YO BYAD MA 'DZOMS PAR PHU DUNG GYON ZHING ME LCAGS GLOR
BTAGS, GZAN RE RKED PAR BCINGS NAS

TSOGS SU 'DU PA GZIGS PAS THUGS KYIS MA BZOD PAR PHYIN CHAD ZHVA
ZLAM SOGS TSUL MTHUN BYED DGOS KYI BCA'

KHRIMS MDZAD, RJE ZHVA LU PA PHOD ROD PHYOGS SU BZHUGS PA GDAN
DRANGS, TSOGS CHEN, RGYUD PA, SNGAGS

@103 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

PA; GSO RIG BCAS GRVA TSANG BZHI BTZUGS, DGE BSKOS SOGS SO SOR
BSKOS NAS SGRIG LAM ZHAL 'DON

SOGS KYI ZHAL BKOD MTHIL PHYIN PA DANG, 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD PA'I
SROL BTOD PAS RIM PAS JE RGYAS SU GYUR,

MDO SNGAGS KYI DAM BCA' TSUGS PAS GRVA MANG YANG THUGS SHIN TU
SPRO NAS, DE RING DGE 'DUN 'DI TZAM 'TSOGS

NAS BRTZI BZHAG DANG, BGRO GLENG MIG GIS MTHONG RGYU BYUNG BAS
SKYID KYI NYI MA SHAR, DUS 'DIR SANGS RGYAS

DNGOS SU BYON YANG 'DI LAS LHAG CI MDZAD, SPRUL BA'I SKU 'DI
DANG MI 'BRAL BAR GYUR CIG GSUNG BA BYUNG,

DBUS SU PHEBS NYIN DGON PA GSAR 'DEBS KYI SA BSLANGS DANG
SBYANGS PA MDZAD PAS SPYIR RTEN 'BREL LEGS

SHING; KHYAD PAR SEMS NYID SKU SKYE BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS RGYA
MTSO'I ZHABS GRAS NOR BU RGYA MTSO, BSTAN

'DZIN DAR RGYAS, 'PHRIN LAS RAB RGYAS BCAS 'ONGS NAS ZHO THUD
MANG DU PHUL, SA LA BSDAD 'PHRAL 'BRUG SGRA

CHEN PO BYUNG BAS HAR LANG RGYAB STE KHYED KYI SKU DON THAMS CAD
'BRUG BZHIN 'ONG RGYU YIN ZHUS PAS DPON SLOB

THAMS CAD BZHAD MO RE ZHIG MTSAMS MI CHOD PA LTA BU BYUNG, DPON
GA-YOG 'GA' RE'I SDINGS SU PHEBS NAS RGYAB

RI LA NYAL RI DANG, THANG LA YAR 'PHEL THANG BTAGS TE PHYIN CHAD
NGA'I DGON PA 'DI BRTAN PO YONG RGYU RED

GSUNGS; DE NAS BOD DU BYON, LO GSUM TZAM THUGS GNYER GYI 'PHRO
'THUD THOS BSAM 'PHEL ZHING, DGE

'PHEL DU DPE MTSAMS ZHIG GI SKABS SNGON NAS MNAL LAM DU NAR MA
'ONGS PA'I 'BROG MO GZHON NU MA ZHIG

YOD PA DES BSTAN 'GYUR BZHENGS DGOS KYI BSKUL MA ZHUS PA BZHIN
RIM BZHENGS DANG, JO BO'I SKU CHE CHUNG

SOGS RTEN MANG DU BZHENGS, STAG RTZE JO BO YANG PHYAG TU 'BYOR
BA BCAS JO BO GSUM LA RGYUD SMAD DANG, BSTAN

'GYUR LA RGYUD STOD KYIS RAB GNAS RGYAS PA MDZAD, SA BYA LOR
CHOS SDE GSAR GSO GRUB PAS LO SNGA PHYIR GDAN

'DREN NAN CHE BA BZHIN LCAGS PHAG LOR RTEN MCHOG RNAMS DANG LHAN
DU PHEBS DUS JO BO RIN PO CHE BZHUGS TSUL

JI LTA BAR GDAN DRANGS PAS THAMS CAD NGO MTSAR, LO DER GONG MA
YUNG tING GIS KYANG NYAMS GSOS KYI DNGUL

DANG; RDO RING GI YI GE DGON PAR KVAN H'O ZI'I PEN GNANG, DE NAS
SHING STAG BAR DGON PA'I 'CHAD NYAN

KYANG NYID RANG NAS MDZAD, THUGS BREL DANG CHAR CHU CI BYUNG
YANG BRTZI BZHAG CHAG MED, DOGS 'DRI, DOGS

SLONG; 'DZIN GRVA RES MOS KYIS SKU MDUN DU DAM BCA' 'DZUGS PA,
GSAR BU RNAMS LA YIG KLOG DO DAM

MDZAD DE GZENGS BSTOD, DMA' 'BEBS GANG DGOS 'PHRAL DU MDZAD PAS
'CHAD NYAN SHIN TU 'PHEL, SKYOR

SBYONG GI DO DAM PA RGYUN DU GTONG ZHING, DE'I RJES NYUL BYED
MKHAN GZHAN DANG, SKU NYID KYANG MNGON CHUNG GIS

PHEBS PAS ZHABS GRAS TSOS KHYI SMYON MANG BA 'DUG ZHUS DUS,
KHYED TSO DANG NGA MI 'DRA, AA BO LA KHYI SMYON GYIS

BZUNG MI YONG GSUNGS, MNAL LAM DU, RJE RIN PO CHE DANG NYID GSOL
ZHO LHAN DU BZHES SHING, RJE'I ZHAL

NAS; KHYED KYI SEMS BSKYED TSUL CHOG PA 'DUG SNYIGS MA'I DUS
'DIR SEMS CAN DMU RGOD 'DUL BA LA LTA BA

'DI LA REM DGOS GSUNGS PAS MTSON DE 'DRA MANG, BOD NAS 'ONG BA'I
DRUNG YIG LHA BRIS, RKOS MKHAN,

LDER BZO PA, LCAGS MGAR TSAG PA, BAL BO'I GSER MGAR SOGS SHES
RIGS SNA TSOGS PAS LO NGO BZHI'I

@104 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BAR GRVA TSANG LA GANG DGOS GSAR DU BSGRUBS, RME RU RAB 'BYAMS
PA BLO GROS RAB 'BYOR 'CHAM DPON DU BSKOS

TE 'CHAM GSAR RNYING GI SKOR DANG 'BRU GU'I DPON SLOB RGYANG
RTZE PA'I PHYAG LEN GYI ZHVA NAG GI 'CHAM BCAS BTZUGS,

RGYAL ME TOG THANG PA BLO GROS RAB YANGS KYIS RGYAL GYI DUNG
TSIGS BSLAB, DGON 'DI DANG, GA-YAG RI, 'BRU

GU DGON BCAS SU BYAMS SKU RE SOGS RTEN BZHENGS MANG DU MDZAD,
CHU BYA LOR 'BRU GU DGON GYI KHRIR BZHUGS,

SHING STAG LOR GONG MA'I BKA' ZI LING AAMBHAN LA BABS TE PHO
BRANG DU 'BYON DGOS BYUNG BAR BRTEN GSUM PA'I

BCU GCIG NYIN TSOGS DBUR PHEBS NAS LAM RIM DANG, SNGAGS RIM DBU
NAS CHOS THUN RE GNANG, DPON

SLOB ZHVA LU PA LA GDAN SA GTAD, SLONG BA PO RNAMS LA ZAS GOS
KYI SBYIN PA, MCHOD 'BUL, MANG 'GYED

SOGS RGYAS PAR MDZAD DE TSES BCU BDUN NYIN CHIBS BSGYUR, ZLA BA
LNGA PA'I TSES BZHI LA LHA KHANG SER POR

BABS; TSES BRGYAD LA GONG MAR 'TSAMS ZHUS PHUL PAS KHAMS 'DRI
DANG GSOL RAS TSAD MED GNANG, GONG

MA'I BKA' BZHIN CHAR 'BEBS MDZAD PA 'PHRAL TU BABS PAS BKA'
BZANG PO DANG BDAG RKYEN MDZAD, SHING

YOS LOR NGA LA SEMS KHUR CHE BA LHA SA'I SMON LAM GTONG RGYU
KHAS BLANGS PA 'DI YIN PAS LO RJES MAR CIS KYANG

GTONG THUB PA BYED DGOS, DE LAS 'GYANGS NA GA 'DRA YIN MI SHES
GSUNGS TE PE CING NAS PHYAG MDZOD RAB

'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BZOD PA, MDO SMAD NAS SKU MCHED DA'I CHING,
PHYAG MDZOD, SPYI GNYER

RAB 'BYAMS PA NOR BU BCAS DBUS SU BTANG, NYID TSAD BYOL LA MTSO
BDUN DU PHEBS, DER AU CU MU

CHIN WANG SOGS LA DBANG RJES GNANG LUNG KHRID MANG DU BSTZAL, ME
'BRUG LHA LDAN SMON LAM NYIN BCU DRUG LA

DGE 'DUN NYI KHRIR NYE BAR MANG 'GYED, TSOGS DBU'I 'BUL BA SOGS
TSANG MA'I THUGS 'GAN BZHES PAR

DNGUL SRANG BZHI KHRI LHAG TZAM SONG, SMON LAM GROL NAS GDAN SA
GSUM DANG, BKRA SHIS LHUN PO, ,

RGYUD STOD SMAD, KHAMS TSAN, MI TSAN BCAS LA DGA' STON GYI MANG
'GYED KYANG RGYA CHEN PO BSGRUBS,

NYID SKU KHAMS MA BDE BAR RIM LOD LA BRTEN MTSO BDUN DANG, SAR
SHAN DON ZER BA'I CHU NGOGS SPANG LJONGS

SU GZIMS GUR LA BZHUGS KYANG PHAN SKYED MA BYUNG BAR STON THA'I
NYER DGU'I NYI SHAR LA DO LON NOR DU ZHI BAR

GSHEGS; DGONGS RDZOGS RGYA CHER BSGRUBS SHING, SKU GDUNG LA GONG
MAS KYANG MCHOD 'BUL DANG, RANG

YUL DU GDAN 'DREN LA TSE RING CAR GO CHI BTANG STE ME SBRUL ZLA
BA DANG PO'I TSES BRGYAD LA GDAN SAR BABS TE

GDUNG CHOG SOGS GANG RGYAS ZHUS, RJE 'DI LA MNAL LAM DANG LUNG
BSTAN NGO MTSAR BA, GZIGS SNANG MANG ZHING

SKYE BA BRGYA TZAM GSAL BAR DRAN PA SOGS RNAM THAR MANG, DE'I
SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO GSER

DGON GYI BYANG NGOS GANGS DKAR MTHON PO'I LHA ZHOL SKYER LUNG DU
YAB RTA MGRIN SKYABS DANG YUM BHO DHI'I SRAS SU ME

SBRUL LA 'KHRUNGS, BSHES GNYEN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN LAS DGE
BSNYEN DANG, LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJE LAS RAB

TU BYUNG, SA YOS LOR DBUS SU THUGS GNYER LA PHEBS, LCANG SKYA
RIN PO CHE LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS DANG MNGON

BYANG GI DBANG GSAN, PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES, BLA MA BYAMS
PA, RVA SGRENG SNGAGS RAMS PA SOGS LAS

@105 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GSAN PA RGYA CHE, KUN MKHYEN SKU 'PHRENG GNYIS PAS GSAN SBYONG
GNANG TSUL GYI BSLAB BYA DANG SKU KHAMS CUNG ZAD

BSNYEL BAR TSE DBANG DANG RTA MGRIN RJES GNANG SOGS RKYEN SEL
'GA' ZHIG DANG THUGS BZHED KYI CHOS BKA'

MTHA' YAS PA GNANG, RNAL 'BYOR MA DANG RE MA TI'I ZHAL GZIGS PAR
GRAGS, GONG MA'I GSER ZHAL MJAL

BAS DGYES GZIGS DPE MED BYUNG, PE CING DU SKU ZHABS RIN PO CHE
PHEBS SKABS GZIMS SHAG TU GSOL STON

PHUL ZHING 'DOD CHOS ZHUS, ZUNG GRU ZIR LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE'I
MDUN NAS RIM LNGA GSAL SGRON GYI BSHAD LUNG MNYAM

DU GSAN PA SOGS THUGS 'BREL SHIN TU ZAB, DE'I SPRUL SKU 'JAM
DPAL CHOS KYI BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS PA AU

LAN MU RA'I PHYOGS SU YAB PHYUGS RDZI DON GRUB TSE BRTAN DANG
YUM DKAR MO SKYID KYI SRAS SU SA BYA LA 'KHRUNGS PA CHEN

HU CHOS RJE DANG, SDE BA CHOS RJE SOGS KYIS LHA DANG BLA MAR
LUNG ZHU DANG, KHYAD PAR THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE LA BLO

RTZE GTAD DE RJE DE NYID KYIS THAG BCAD, SKU'I RKYEN SEL GYI RIM
GRO SOGS SKABS SU GANG BAB LA MDZES LAM DU MA

SONG BA'I ZHAL BKOD DANG SPYAN DMIGS ZHAL BZHUGS KYI BAR DU
GNANG BAS SKU DON LAM 'GRO BYUNG, CHU BZANG HU

THOG THU LAS RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS, KUN GZIGS MTHONG BA DON LDAN
MCHOG DANG SGO MANG CHOS GRVAR MNYAM PHEBS

KYIS THUGS NANG SHIN TU NYE BAS, SA BYI LOR BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU
GDAN DRANGS, TSOGS MANG LA DGA' LDAN LHA

BRGYA MA'I KHRID GANG RGYAS GNANG, BLA BRANG CHEN MO NAS DNGUL
SRANG DGU BRGYA SOGS DNGOS 'BUL GZABS, SMAN

'DUS POT CHEN 'GA' RE DANG, 'DZAM GLING SPYI BSHAD SOGS GSUNG
RTZOM MANG, GSER GYI RGYAL KHAB TU 'PHRIN

LAS 'PHEL BA'I MOD LA LNGA BCU PA SA KHYI LA GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL
SKU SEMS NYID PHYOGS SU SA PHAG LA 'KHRUNGS PA

SKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO YUL DBUS BKRA SHIS
SGO MANG DU THUGS GNYER GYI SKABS SO, ` ,CHOS

SDE 'DI DANG PO BTZAN PO DON GRUB RGYA MTSOS RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG
PA'I LCAGS STAG LA BTAB, DE NAS LO NYIS BRGYA

BA SA BYA 'DI YIN, SA GLANG DANG LCAGS YOS ZER BA'ANG SNANG, DE
NAS HOR 'PHRIN LAS LHUN GRUB SHING SBRUL LA

PHEBS TE 'CHAD NYAN BTZUGS, SKU TSE MTHAR PHYIN GYI BAR DU
BSKYANGS NAS MTSAN NYID BLA MA MAL DKA' BCU

BSKOS; CHU BZANG GONG MA BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN YANG
GDAN SAR BZHUGS, SMIN GROL SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG

BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSOS THUGS KHUR CHE BZHES KYIS BSKYANGS TE RAB
BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SHING STAG LO NAS RBU DPON

SLOB BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN LA TSOS SRID GNYIS KA GTAD, 'DI PA KUN
GROL NO MON HAN GONG MA BLO BZANG RIN

CHEN CHOS GRAGS RGYA MTSOS ZHVA LU BA LEGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYI
SKYE BAR NGOS BZUNG BAS ZHVA LU PAR GRAGS, AANG

DKAR GYIS SHA SA NA SNGAGS DUNG PHYUR DGUS, YE SHES MGON PO
DNGOS GYUR BA, ,ZHVA LU GRUB CHEN BLA MA ZHES

BSNGAGS; 'DI PA DANG DGON LUNG SUM PA CHOS RJE PHUN TSOGS RNAM
RGYAL GNYIS DBUS NAS PAn CHEN RIN PO

CHE'I MDUN NAS BSNYEN RDZOGS SGRUB SKABS SNE RING DANG CHOS GOS
GNANG BA GRVA SA GSAR 'DZIN GYI LUNG BSTAN DU

GLENG; SPRUL PA'I SKU NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO
SOGS SKYE RGYUD BZANG BA RIM PAR PHEBS,

'DIR MTSAN NYID GRVA TSANG GNYIS YOD PAS PHYIS SU YANG 'DAN MA
SPRUL SKU DPAL LDAN THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO, T'A LE

@106 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

HU THOG THU SKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN RAB RGYAS, GSER TOG SPRUL SKU
YE SHES THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO RNAMS DANG,

GRVA TSANG 'OG TU SER RTZUD LHA RAMS PA 'PHRIN LAS DPAL BZANG
SOGS BZHUGS 'DUG GRVA TSANG 'OG SGO MANG

YIG CHA DANG, GRVA TSANG GONG SE RA'I YIG CHA'I STENG NAS 'CHAD
NYAN SHIN TU LEGS, ` ,RJE 'PHRIN LAS LHUN

GRUB LA GONG SA LNGA PAS 'DUS PA'I DBANG GNANG SKABS SLOB MA'I
GTZO BOR BZUNG NAS 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS KYI

GLEGS BAM GNANG STE LUNG BSTAN PA DANG, SGOM SDE NAM MKHA' RGYAL
MTSAN GYIS RDO DRIL GTAD DE 'DI'I BDAG

PO GYIS GSUNG BA'I MTSAN LAM BYUNG ZHING, DBUS PHEBS GNYIS PA'I
SKABS KUN MKHYEN GONG MAS RGYUD GRVA ZHIG

'DZUGS RGYU'I SNYAN SGRON ZHUS PA SOGS KYIS GSAR BTZUGS MDZAD,
RGYUD SMAD KYI PHYAG LEN NGOS GTZANG ZHING

BLA RABS RIM PAR 'DZIN SKYONG LEGS, PHYIS SU YU GUR SMAN CHU
DGON PA SMON NE BLA MA 'JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSO

YANG BZHUGS, 'DI PA ZHING LA GSHEGS KHAR NYE GNAS LA, GDUNG
ZHUGS GRUB NAS NYIN BDUN LA ZHAL

MA 'BYED GSUNGS KYANG, ME MA ZHI BAS GDUNG RUS TZAM YANG MA LON
DOGS NYIN GSUM PAR ZHAL PHYE BAS,

'JIGS BYED KYI SKU ZHABS BUS YAN CHAD LHA BZO MKHAS PAS BZHENGS
PA LTA BU'I BYON LEGS GRUB TSAR, DE MIN

TSIG MAR 'DUG PA NANG RTEN DU YOD, SMAN PA DANG SNGAGS GRVA STE
GRVA TSANG LNGA YOD PA'I GDAN RABS MA RNYED, `

JO KHANG DU, JO BO LO KI SHVA RA GSUNG 'BYON, SH'AKYA MU NI'I
'DRA COG STAG RTZE JO BO, 'DI SH'AKYA MU NI'I

NANG RTEN DU BZHUGS YANG ZER, JO BO MI BSKYOD RDO RJE'I 'DRA COG
TZAN DAN JO BO SOGS MANG, ` TSOGS

CHEN 'DU KHANG, RGYUD PA GRVA KHANG, SNGAGS PA GRVA KHANG, AEM
CHI GRVA KHANG, LA KHA GRVA TSANG GONG 'OG GI 'DU KHANG,

GNAS CHUNG, DGA' GDONG BSTAN MA BCAS KYI BTZAN KHANG, LHA MO'I
PHO BRANG RNAMS SU RTEN MTHA' YAS PA

BZHUGS; ` ,BTZAN PO BLA BRANG, CHU BZANG BLA BRANG, ZHVA LU BLA
BRANG, M'A BLA BRANG SOGS SGAR KHAG KYANG

MANG; MCHOD GZHIS SNGAR 'BROG SDE B'A ZA TSO BRGYAD, B'A TSO BA
BZHI SOGS YOD 'DUG LA, SPRUL PA'I SKU RIM

BYON GYI 'PHRIN LAS KYIS MTSO SNGON PHYOGS DANG, SHAR RGYA
MTSO'I BAR GYI DAD LDAN YONGS KYI BSOD NAMS GSOG

PA'I ZHING YIN NO, ` ,BRAG LUNG RI KHROD DANG, PHUN TSOGS LUG RI
KHROD GNYIS KAR TSOGS CHEN NAS SKAL BA

GTONG ZHING, PHYI MA 'DIR HOR SGOM PA BLA MA BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG
PO YUN RING BZHUGS, 'DI PAS GSER

DGON DANG DBUS SU THUGS GNYER GNANG, DPON SLOB GSER KHANG PA
SOGS LAS CHOS BKA' DU MA GSAN NAS

RGYUN YANG SPEL, MGON PO'I ZHAL GZIGS PA'I LO RGYUS GRAGS CHE,
SKU TSE SMAD ZAB LUNG RI KHROD DANG NYE BAR SGRUB

PA LA GCIG TU GZHOL, SKU 'DA' KHAR SENG GE NYAL STABS KYIS
GSHEGS, DA LTA SKYE RGYUD KYANG SNANG, DGON LAG LA

THU GU, THUR CHEN, SHING LUNG, BUM PA CHOS LUNG, RGYA RDOG BAN
RGUD, RAB RGYAS DGON, T'A BAN

DGON; GRUNG SHAN STAG LUNG RNAMS YOD, ` ZHVA KHOG STOD KYI 'DUL
BA DGON BSHAD SGRUB DAM RGYAS GLING NI

SE CHEN CHOS RJE SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN PAS BTAB, CHI KYA AE KHE
AU 'DUR CHOS RJE DANG, 'DUL BA BLO BZANG

DGE DAR BAS DAR BAR BYAS ZHES SUM PAS BSHAD, BEE SER TU 'DUL BA
DGON GYI GSAL KHA MI SNANG, SE CHEN

@107 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CHOS RJE DE LA RGYAL DBANG GIS BKA' GNANG STE BTAB PA DGA' LDAN
DAM CHOS GLING AUN 'DUR CHOS RJE DON GRUB RGYA

MTSOS BSKYANGS, SLAR 'DUL BA CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN GYIS
DAR RGYAS MDZAD, RVA STOD LUGS KYI BSDUS

GRVA; SGO MANG PA'I PHAR PHYIN BCAS 'CHAD NYAN YOD TSUL BSHAD DE
DA LTA MED, DGE 'DUN BRGYA PHRAG GSUM TZAM

LONG ZHING THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE KHRIR BZHUGS TE SNGAR YOD
'GRIG LAM MA NYAMS PA'I STENG GLING GSEB TU PHU DUNG MI

GYON ZHING RTA MI ZHON PA SOGS KYI TSOGS GTAM MDZAD, RGYA MI
DRAG ZHAN GYIS SNGAR BLA MA SER MO BA LA BRTZI 'JOG

GANG YANG MED KYANG DE NAS BZUNG BRTZI BKUR SOGS BSTAN PA'I DBU
'PHANG MTHO BAR GYUR, BLA BRANG TSOMS CHEN

DU THUB PA GTZO 'KHOR GSUM, RIGS GSUM MGON PO, SLOB DPON PAD MA,
AA TI SHA RJE RIN PO CHE

BCAS LHA DGU'I SNANG BRNYAN BYIS PA LO BRGYAD KYI BONGS TSOD
TZAM GSAR BZHENGS, RGYU MTHUD MDZAD DE 'DU KHANG

GSAR BZHENGS SOGS PHYAG RJES RLABS CHE, NYID KYI GZIGS SNANG GI
RGAL 'CHAM BTZUGS, ` DGON GSAR

BSHAD SGRUB GLING NI RGYAL SRAS YE SHES GRAGS PA'I LUNG BSTAN
BZHIN SUM PA DPON SLOB KYI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS

PA'I CHU GLANG LA BTAB CING RGYAL SRAS NA BZA' NANG RTEN DU
BZHUGS, 'DI'I LUNG MDOR MO'I P'E SHANG GI MKHAR

YOD; ` NOM CI DGON DGA' LDAN BDE CHEN GLING NI AA RIN RAB 'BYAMS
PA BLO GROS RGYA MTSOS BTAB,

` BO KHOG TU, THA YAN CHI CHUNG BA DGA' LDAN RIN CHEN GLING NI
DGON LUNG BA BZANG SKOR DKA' BCU KUN DGA'

BZANG POS BTAB, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG KUN DGA', DE'I SPRUL
SKU DPAL LDAN 'OD ZER, DA LTA'I SPRUL

SKU DKON MCHOG BSTAN 'DZIN 'BYUNG GNAS GUNG THANG 'JAM DBYANGS
BLA MA LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS BSGRUBS,

` GA-YAS NGOS LUNG DKAR DU BZANG SKOR DKA' BCU'I SPRUL SKU DPAL
LDAN 'OD ZER, DGA' LDAN RTZIS GSAR GYI

DRUNG YIG ZHU MKHAN DE NYID KYIS RMANG BTING, SUM PA DPON SLOB
PAS DAR RGYAS MDZAD PA BKRA SHIS RTZE'I RI KHROD

BSAM GTAN GLING, ` THA YAN CHI CHE BA NI DGON LUNG BA HA KYA
SGOM PA DON RIN PA SOGS BSDAD PA LAS

CHAGS; ` WANG RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG YE SHES KYIS BTAB PA'I
WANG RI KHROD DUS 'KHRUG GI RJES SU MA

CHAGS; ` STAG RI NA RI KHROD PA KHA SHAS DANG, RGYA'I LHA KHANG
MANG, MGON PO RANG BYON CHU 'JIGS BSRUNG

BA'I LO RGYUS CAN SNANG, ` DE'I STOD DU AOR AO RI KHROD ZE BA
YOD, ` GA-YAG RIR YANG SMIN GROL SPRUL PA'I

SKUS BYAMS KHANG BZHENGS, RI KHROD PA BCU LHAG BZHUGS SO, ,TZONG
CHU BYANG RGYUD DMAR GTZANG BRAG ,DGON

LUNG; CHU BZANG, GSER DGON SOGS KYI SKABS SO,, ,,

MTHON PO BCU GSUM SOGS DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA DU MAS BSTEN PA'I
GNAS 'JU LAG CHU RGYUD DU, BTZAN

PO DGON GYI KA RTZA RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BTAB
PA BYA RGOD RTZE'I RI KHROD, ` BAN RGUD DGON

NI SUM PAS HOR CHOS RJES BZUNG ZER ZHES BSHAD, BEE SER DU RGYAL
DBANG LUNG BZHIN HOR RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO

BZANG DON GRUB KYIS BTAB PA'I CHOS LUNG THOS BSAM GLING GRVA
TSOGS BDUN CU SKOR PHAR PHYIN BLO BZANG DGONGS

RGYAN DANG DBU MA'I 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD BZHIN PA DANG, ` YANG DES
BTAB PA'I GRVA TSOGS BZHI BCU SKOR DGE LUGS

@108 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SNGAGS GRVA DPE 'GRE BSHAD SGRUB GLING ZER BA GNYIS SNANG BA
GANG RIGS YIN 'DRA, ` YANG BEE SER DU SPU'I CHOS

SDE DANG BSKYED RDZOGS GLING GNYIS MERGAN HUNG THA'I JIS SBYIN
BDAG BYAS NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS LHUN GRUB PAS

BTAB; GZHIS DGON SNGAGS LUGS TSOGS PA BRGYAD CU SKOR GSUNGS PA
NGO MA 'PHROD, ` KAN CHEN DGON

THEG CHEN THAR BA GLING 'DEBS PA BO PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS
RGYAN GYI THUGS SRAS STONG NYID RTOGS PA'I GRUB CHEN

BZHI'I NANG TSAN BSAM BLO BA 'DAN MA TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO NI
HAL TZI'I SAR YAB 'DAN MA KLU 'BUM PHYUG DANG YUM

DKAR MO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU BA'I ME PHAG LA 'KHRUGS,
BROS STABS KYIS ZIN SGAR DU BYON NAS RAB

TU BYUNG, SUM PA SLOB DPON PA'I BKA' LTAR LU'U KY'A DGE 'DUN DAR
RGYAS DANG MNYAM DU DGON LUNG DU PHEBS,

'DUL KHRIMS GTZANG BA'I TSAD DU GRAGS, RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHE LAS
BSDUS TSAD DANG, SUM PA DPON SLOB

LAS PHAR PHYIN GSAN, DBUS SU PHEBS NAS RGYAL BA YON TAN RGYA
MTSOR MJAL, SGO MANG DU GUNG RU SANGS

RGYAS BKRA SHIS BSTEN TE DBU PHAR, 'DUL MDZOD, RNAM 'GREL, BYAMS
CHOS YONGS RDZOGS LA SBYANGS,

GRUB DBANG BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA LA GTZANG RGYAL GYIS NAG BKAL TE
SPYAN BTON KYANG GRUB RTAGS KYIS SPYAN GSAR

DU SKYES TE 'DI PA SOGS DGE BSHES DU MA LA LEGS BSHAD GSER
'PHRENG GI LUNG GNANG, DVAGS PO GRVA TSANG DU YANG

PO TI LNGA'I SLOB GNYER TSAR GCIG BRTZIS, GRVA TSANG 'DI 'GRIG
LAM SHIN TU ZHIB PAS SKYID 'DOD CAN GYIS NUS

DKA' BA YOD GSUNGS, SLAR 'BRAS SPUNGS SU PHEBS, PAn CHEN RIN PO
CHES SE 'BRAS KYI MKHAN PO MDZAD

SKABS YIN PAS LHA SA'I SMON LAM DU DGE LUGS KYI GRVA SKOR GSAR
'DZUGS LA SNGAR NAS BKA' PHEBS NA GTZANG

BAS BKAG DOGS DAM BCA'I DUS KYIS GTUGS DUS DPON SLOB SO SO LA
BKA' PHEBS TE DPE CHA BLTA MI DGOS

PAR 'PHRAL DU DAM BCA' 'JOG THUB PA SGO MANG NAS 'DI PA DANG,
CHU BZANG PA DKON MCHOG CHOS BZANG,

BLO GSAL GLING NAS 'BRUG STAG PA DANG, DOM NYAG PA GNYIS LA TSAG
BTZUGS PA BZHIN, DPE MED PA'I

DAM BCA' BZHAG MKHAS GRAGS CHE BA BYUNG, DVAGS POR RGYAL SRAS
RIN PO CHE LAS GCOD KYI GDAMS PA

RDZOGS PAR GSAN, HAR BSAM GYI GRVA RGYUN DON LA 'DI PAS GTZANG
BAR ZHU GTUGS KYIS DPON BSOD NAMS

CHOS 'PHEL LA BKA' BKYON PHOG GZHUNG GI PHYAG RDZAS LA ZAN PAS
'PHRAL RKYEN SNANG TSOD LTA BUS GNAS CHUNG NAS

CHO 'PHRUL 'JIGS SU RUNG BA SNGA PHYIR BYUNG, SGO MANG DGE BSKOS
GNANG, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE LAS BSNYEN

RDZOGS DANG LAM KHRID 'JIGS BYED KYI DBANG SOGS CHOS BKA' MTHA'
YAS PA GSAN ZHING RJE DE NYID KYI GSUNG LTAR

LTUNG BSHAGS BRGYA PHRAG DANG SBRAGS NAS GRANGS GSOG MDZAD PAS
SDIG PA DAG PA'I MTSAN MA BYUNG, GZHAN DUS

'KHOR DBANG SOGS GSAN PA'I BRGYUD PA ZHUS DUS DBEN SA SNYAN
BRGYUD KYI NYE BRGYUD GSUNG BAR DOGS PA BYED

MKHAN SNANG YANG, CHOS KYI KHUNGS RGYAL BA TZONG KHA BA DANG,
'JAM PA'I DBYANGS, RDO RJE 'CHANG LA

GTUGS PA LAS SA RDO RI BRAG LA GTUGS PA DAG PAR 'DOD PA NI
PHYOGS ZHEN KHO NAR ZAD CES TSAD MA'I SKYES BU

MANG PO ZHAL MTHUN DU GSUNGS, DGE 'PHEL DU GCOD DMIGS DANG SHER
SNYING LA CHIG DRIL MDZAD, DBEN

@109 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

DGON GYI LTAG SNAR THANG, BYANG CHEN SOGS SU BZHUGS, RTA NAG
'GOS KYI SGRUB PHUG TU 'DUS PA'I RIM

GNYIS LA SBYANGS, SNGAR NAS CHO 'PHRUL MA CHAD PAR YOD PA LAS
SKABS 'DI NAS LHAG PAR CHO 'PHRUL YA MA ZUNG

DNGOS NYAMS RMI LAM THAMS CAD DU BYUNG, RTA MGRIN DANG, GUR DRAG
GI BZLAS DMIGS KYIS LHAG PAR

CHO 'PHRUL CHER BYUNG, SKABS CIG MNAL LAM LA BRTEN RJE T'A RA NA
THA LAS DE'I LUGS KYI LTA KHRID GSAN BZHED

NAS PAn CHEN RIN PO CHER ZHUS PAS, KHONG ZHAL 'GYUR TE KHO'I DE
HVA SHANG GI LTA BA YIN GSUNGS PAS PHEBS

'DUN GSHOL, BKA' BSGO ZHUS PAS, 'JIGS RTEN KHAMS KYI NAD GDON
THAMS CAD 'DI LA 'THIM PAR

GYUR CIG GSUNGS NAS LJAGS PHU GNANG BAS RANG GCES 'DZIN SPONG
DGOS PA'I BRDAR DGONGS, YOL DKAR

ZHES PA ZHI BYED KYI GRUB THOB MANG DU BZHUGS PA DER RDE'U DANG
ME TOG BDZUD LEN MDZAD, NA BZA' ZAD NAS

GCER BU MIN TZAM DU SONG, BKA' BRGYUD RTOGS LDAN ZHIG GIS GTUM
ME BSGOMS NYES PAS KHAMS ZAG PA LA

DMIGS RNAM SKYONG TSUL BSTAN PAS LDOG THUB PA BYUNG, KHONG CHOS
DGE LUGS LA 'DI 'DRA'I GDAMS PA YOD

SGO NAS CHOS RGYAL LA BSNYEN PA MDZAD PAS

CHO 'PHRUL THAG NYER 'ONG MI NUS PAS ZLA GCIG TZAM THUGS SOS BDE
BA BYUNG, NYIN CIG LAB SGRON GYI ZHAL GZIGS

NAS; BU MO'I CHOS LUGS LA DE 'DRA BYAS PAS MI YONG GCOD GYIS
DANG AA MAS GROGS BYED GSUNGS NAS GDAMS

PA MANG DU BSTZAL, CHOS RGYAL GSHEGS GSOL DANG, YI DAM NYER BSDU
MDZAD, CHO 'PHRUL GANG BYUNG

NYID SNYING RJE SNYING PO CAN GYI RTOGS PA THUGS RGYUD LA

'KHRUNGS PA NA GNAS CHUNG GIS BAB PHUL, BSTOD PA RANG RTZOM DU
YANG, RGYA CHER RIN CHEN BYANG CHUB SEMS

MCHOG DANG, ,MTHA' BRAL DBU MA'I LTA BA RNAM DAG GNYIS, ,ZUNG
'BREL SGRUB LA BRTZON PA'I RNAL 'BYOR

CHOS KYI GEGS SU DGONG TE 'BUL

'PHRO BCAD, SPYIR THA MAL RANG DGA' BA ZHIG LA LHA'I BUS BDUD
KYIS KYANG BAR CHAD MI RTZOM NA CHOS SKYONG KHYAD

PAR CAN GYIS LTA CI SMOS, RKYEN NGAN LAM DU SLONG NUS PA'I DAM
PA 'DI LTA BU LA THUGS DAM GYO BOGS 'DON DU

'GRO BAS BLA MA YI DAM GYI THUGS RJE ZER BA GNAS SKABS SKYID
THAMS BDE THABS SHIG DANG, DNGOS GRUB ZER

BA 'DZOMS ZHING LONG BA ZHIG LA BYED PA TSE 'DI SNANG GI 'DOD
KHA MA BRI BAS CHOS KYI DRI MI BRO LA, RKYEN BZANG DAN

GDAMS NGAG SNYING GI THIG LER 'CHAR 'ONS PA, KUN SHES KYI SHAR B

@110 (TSONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GNYIS CHAR GYIS SNYAN BRGYUD SPRUL PA'I GLEGS BAM BZHAG STE BYIN

KYANG GSHEGS PA DANG THUG ,DBU THOD BTZUN MA'I DGON ZHIG TU YOD

LUNG KHRI MDZAD DUS SKYID SHOD SPRUL SKU DER PHEBS, THU'U BKVAN
DKA' BCU TSUL KHRIMS RIN CHEN, LI'U KYA

DKA' BCU, PHYIS SU SGOM ZHIS GRUB CHEN DU GRAGS PA L'U'U KYA DGE
'DUN BLO GROS SOGS MANG PO LA KHRID DMIGS

RTEN GSER ZANGS KYIS BTUM PA GTZUG LAG KHANG

RUNG NAS RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL

BSGRUBS; SGROL DKAR RJES GNANG SOGS GSAN, DGON LUNG DANG GSER
DGON GNYIS KAR BSDUS TSAD

LA SBYANGS, SHING YOS LOR DBUS SU BYON NAS 'BRAS SGO MANG CHOS
GRVAR ZHUGS, RGYAL BA 'JAM DPAL RGYA

MTSO LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, AERTI NI PAndI TA MKHAN PO'I CHO LO
GNANG, BA RI DGE BSHES KHYAB BDAG

MA SOGS DANG, MDO SMAD DU YANG KUN MKHYEN

MA, CHU BZANG NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN

B'A ZA KHRI RGAN DON YOD RDO RJE, KO

RTZA SKAL BZANG MCHOG GRUB, SHAR BA BLA MA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN
RNAMS BSTEN TE MDO SNGAGS KYI GSAN BSAM

LAG BRGYUD MA YANG GSAN SNANG, DGON LUNG TSOGS

MDZAD, SKU 'BUM, GSER KHOG ,CHU

BZANG; MCHOD RTEN THANG SOGS KYI MKHAN PO MDZAD DE SPYI SOGS KYI
CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER BSTZAL, SEMS NYID AA

KHYUNG SPRUL SKU LAS GCOD KYI SKOR GSAN, BLA MAS MA CIG GI ZHAL
THANG, GCOD tAm, CHOG BU BCAS GNANG

PO 'KHRUNGS, SDE DGE PA SMIN GROL NGAG DBANG RGYA MTSO LA ZHAL
GYI CHOS SKOR RDZOGS PAR GNANG BAS DE NYID KYIS

SDE DGE RGYAL PO DANG SA SKYA'I BDAG CHEN SOGS LA PHUL BAS CHOS
BRGYUD 'DI'I 'PHRIN LAS CHE BA BYUNG, SEMS

NYID SPRUL SKU DANG DPON SLOB GSER KHANG PA SOGS DAM PA DU MAS
RJE 'DI'I ZHABS LA GTUGS TE CHOS ZHUS,

DON BZHI BA ME LUG LOR GSHEGS, THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE KHRIR
BZHUGS SHING SLOB CHUNG DU RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG

DBANG BKRA SHIS BSKOS, MGON KHANG NAS MAR PHEBS DUS CHOS SKYONG
GNYAN PA'I STABS YIN NAM SA SKYA'I MGON

YOD PA DER BZHUGS, 'DAN MA GRUB

DE'I ZHAL GZIGS LTAR GYI MGON PO ZHAL GYI 'CHAM

SGAR BA DANG DVAGS PO ZHABS DRUNG GIS BDAG

RKYEN CUNG ZAD RE BYAS PAR GSUNGS, ` SGRUB SDE DGA' LDAN CHOS
RDZONG NI, SROG MKHAR RI RTZER SKYA SER 'GAS

BRANG KHANG BRTZIGS TE SUM PAR PHUL BA LAS CHAGS SHING, DA LTA
LUNG MTHIL DU SPOS, 'DI GNYIS KYI DGON

BDAG SUM PAS BYED, ` DE DANG NYE BAR RI KHROD BKRA SHIS LHA RI,
` LO DKAR RI KHROD BSHAD SGRUB PAD

DKAR GLING NGAM THEG CHEN CHOS GLING GONG BA DGE BSHES NGAG
DBANG YE SHES KYIS GSAR DU BZUNG STE SKU PHRENG RIM

BYON LA 'JAGS, ` SE RA LUNG DU GRAGS PA TE THUNG DGON CHUNG BA
DGA' LDAN DAM CHOS GLING NI, DGON CHE

BA LAS LO BCU GNYIS KYI RJES ZER BAS LCAGS RTA DANG LCAGS LUG
GANG RUNG YIN 'DRA, THOG MAR RI KHROD PA 'GA'

ZHIG BSDAD, SUM PA SLOB DPON PA DAM CHOS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DGON
CHE BA'I BLA MA MDZAD SKABS ZHAL BKOD

DANG; RJES SU SRAN CHANG BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS LA BKA' GNANG, TE
THUNG RIN CHEN RGYAL MTSAN GYIS GROGS

BYAS TE 'CHAD NYAN BTZUGS, DE'I 'BREL GYIS SUM PA YE SHES DPAL
'BYOR YANG KHRIR BZHUGS TE SNGAR SA SKYA'I

DUS BZHENGS PA'I H'A SU ME ZHES PA'I LHA KHANG LA ZHIG GSOS
MDZAD, ` BYANG RGYUD STOD DU, RGYA RDOG DGON

GONG MA SEMS NYID GNAS BRTAN PA DANG LA LAS SEMS NYID AA LAG ZER
BAS BTAB ZER, BEE SER DU MA DGON

DANG MTHUN PA'I MDO'I BSHAD GRVA, TSOGS PA BRGYA SKOR ZER SNANG,
` SEMS NYID DGON DGA' LDAN DAR

RGYAS GLING NI, SNGAR SA 'DI DMU RGOD CING LTA LOG GIS MUN RUB
PA LTA BUR YOD PAR, RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I

SHING SPREL LA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO PHEBS NAS
BYIN GYIS BRLABS PAS CHOS KYI SNANG BA RGYAS,

DGON PA 'DEBS PAR LUNG BSTAN, MTSAN YANG BSTZAL, DE'I RJES SEMS
DPA' SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG PHUN

TSOGS RNAM RGYAL PA BYON, RGYAB RI'I RTZE NAS BUD MED GOS DKAR
CAN ZHIG GIS MDA' DAR LAN GSUM GA-YAB

PAS DGE SLONG CHOS GOS GYON PA BRGYA PHRAG GIS GTZOS DGE 'DUN
MANG PO 'DUS PA'I MTSAN LAM BYUNG BA DGON PA

TSUGS RGYU'I LTAS DANG, RGYAB RIR RDO RJE GA-YU SGRON MA GNAS
PAR GSUNGS PA'I LUNG BSTAN DUS BABS LTA BUS

MES PO SHES RAB RGYA MTSO ZER BA LHO KHA BRGYUD RKANG 'GROS KYIS
DBUS SU SONG, GZHUNG NAS 'BUL DPON PAR

BSKOS; BOD PA 'BYUNG GNAS SOGS DPON GA-YOG 'BUL SDUD LA PHYIN,
RGYU DNGOS GANG BYUNG BCAS DBON

PO KUN DGA' RGYA MTSO DBUS SU MNGAGS, DES RGYAL BA YAB SRAS LA
DNGOS 'BUL DANG SGO MANG GRVA TSANG LA MANG

'GYED BTANG, PAn CHEN CHOS RGYAN LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS BSGRUBS, GONG
SA NAS SNGAR RGYUN GTAN CHAGS

DGOS TSUL DANG, BKA' SHOG GIS GZENGS BSTOD MDZAD, SGO MANG MKHAN
PO LHAG RU BYAMS PA LHUN GRUB

PAS KYANG GRVA TSANG GI SKU DON SNGAR BZHIN BSGRUBS NA BLA RABS
RIM BRGYUD DU BYAMS 'JAM DBYANGS KYI RNAM 'PHRUL

DU MA 'BYON PA SOGS 'BYUNG 'GYUR 'GA' ZHIG RMI LAM GYI TSUL DU
LUNG BSTAN, LHA SA'I JO BO DANG SKU RGYU GCIG

PA'I THUB SKU SANGS RGYAS KYI RAB GNAS MA PHYIS SU THOR BA BZHES
PA'I LO RGYUS CAN, TZAN DAN GYI RNAM SRAS GSER

CHEN RJE'I PHYAG NAS MA 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS RJE BRGYUD SGO MANG
DPON SLOB GUNG RU CHOS 'BYUNG BA'I PHYAG NAS 'ONG

@113 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BA'I BYIN CAN BKA' SHOG BCAS GNANG, DBUS SU GTONG THEBS LAN
GRANGS DU MAR KHYER, RJES MA'I SKABS

SHIG DBON PO 'BUL DPON PAS DGON PA 'DEBS RGYU'I DON DU BLA MA
ZHIG DGOS TSUL GZHUNG LA ZHUS PAR YER BA

LHA RI'I GDAN SA PA MKHAN CHEN TSE BRTAN DON GRUB PA GNANG PAS
DPON GA-YOG MNYAM DU PHEBS, DBON PO GRUB

PA BZANG BO, DBON PO DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO, DBON PO BLO GROS RGYA
MTSO, SMAN ZHI'I DPAL LDAN, RGAD PO TSE

RGYAL 'BUM, KLU RTZE, LHA RGYAL SKYABS SOGS ZHANG TSAN GTZO BO
RNAMS DANG GROS MTHUN BGYIS, RAB BYUNG BCU BA'I

MJUG CHU PHAG LA DGON PA'I RMANG BTING, GRVA KHANG KA BA BCU
DRUG CAN BZHENGS, SNGAR SGO MANG DPON SLOB GUNG RU

CHOS 'BYUNG DANG BYAMS PA LHUN GRUB RNAM GNYIS NAS 'BUL DPON PA
KHU DBON GYI BLA RABS LA CHOS SKYONG DPAL LHA

BSTEN DGOS GSUNGS PA BZHIN BSTEN, GSO SBYONG BTZUGS TE NAM YIN
LA BZA' BTUNG BZANG POS BSNYEN

BKUR ZHUS PAS GSO SBYONG GI LEGS NYES KHA ZAS KYI 'JOG PA LTA
BUR YOD, GRONG MI RNAMS LA GNANG SBYIN,

MCHOG GSUM GYI YON TAN, DGE 'DUN GYI BSNYEN BKUR DANG RAB TU
BYUNG BA'I PHAN YON, KHAMS DANG BSTUN PA'I

BSTOD BKUR SOGS MCHOD YON GNYIS KAS THABS MKHAS CHE BAS LTA NGAN
GYI ZHEN PA RIM GYIS ZHI, GZHI GSUM

GYI PHYAG LEN RKANG TSUGS, LHA RI MKHAN CHEN KHONG GSHEGS KHAR
DGON LUNG PA SLOB DPON DAM CHOS RGYAL MTSAN

PA'I PHYAG GI BZUNG NAS DGON PA 'DI LUGS GNYIS KYI SGO NAS MI
NYAMS GONG 'PHEL BSTAN PA'I ZHABS 'DEGS

SU 'GYUR BA ZHIG YONG MI YONG NYID LA RAG LAS GSUNGS TE GDAN SAR
'KHOD, GRONG BA RNAMS LA SKYABS 'GRO DANG

DE'I PHAN YON SOGS BSLAB BYA MDZAD PAS THAMS CAD BLO SNA BSGYUR,
ME STAG LOR BTZUG LAG KHANG BZHI THOG

BRTZIGS; RAB BYUNG BSNYEN RDZOGS MANG DU BSGRUBS, DGE 'DUN BRGYA
LHAG 'DUS, BSDUS TSAN GSUM

DU PHYE NAS MTSAN NYID BTZUGS, BSDUS GRVA DANG RNAM 'GREL LE'U
DANG PO GSUM GYI RTZOD GRVA 'PHEL BA BYUNG,

RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I CHU SPREL LOR 'DU KHANG KA BA DRUG CU
CAN BZHENGS, DGON LUNG NAS BANG KY'A DBU

MDZAD SOGS BLANGS NAS TSOGS 'DON SKOR GYI DBYANGS RTA 'DUR, ROL
MO 'BUD DKROL 'CHAM DANG BCAS

PA BSLAB CING, CHOS SRID GNYIS KYIS LO NYI SHU'I BAR BSKYANGS TE
DGON LUNG KHRIR PHEBS, BLA MA RJES MA SDE

BA ZHABS DRUNG LA ZHU DGOS KYI NGAG BKOD LTAR KHONG LA ZHUS PAS,
NGA'I SGAR THOG NA RAB 'BYAMS PA DON GRUB

RGYA MTSO 'DUG SKU YON 'DI LAS CHE BA MED, RI BO RTZE LNGAR
PHEBS RGYU RED, KHYER RANG TSOS ZHUS DANG

NGAS ROGS BYED GSUNGS, BTZAN PO DPON SLOB LA ZHUS PAR, KHYED
SEMS NYID SER RTZUD KYI YUL NGAN PAR

NGA RANG YONG NAS PHAN MI THOGS ZHES BKYON KYANG NAN ZHUS BYAS
PAR ZHAL GYIS BZHES, BDE GSANG 'JIGS

GSUM; KUN RIG GI CHOG PHYAG RGYA, MGON PO'I GTOR SGRUB RNAMS
BTZUGS, DUS RGYUN PHYAG 'BEB,

MTSANG 'BRU, ZHAL MNA' DANG DAM BSGRAGS PA SOGS ZHAL SHIN TU TSA
BAS BLA MA BTZAN PO MAR THOGS ZER,

DE RJES 'DUL BA SLOB DPON DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL PA MTSO KHAR PHEBS
PA KHRIR ZHUS, DGON PA'I BYANG DU BYANG

CHUB MCHOD RTEN BRTZIGS, 'OD DPAG MED KYI LI SKU DANG MCHOD
RDZAS DU MA BSGRIGS, DPON SLOB 'DI

@114 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BZHI'I RING MCHOD YON ZUNG 'BREL GYIS BSKYANGS PAS 'PHEL RGYAS
BYUNG, SNGAR DGON LUNG DPON SLOB KYIS 'JU

LAG LA ZAM PA BTZUGS PA'I STENG BRGYUD, MCHOD GZHIS B'A ZA'I JAG
PAS RGYA'I DMAG DNGUL BCOM PAS DGON

LUNG GI STENG DU DMAG SLEBS, 'BUL DPON PA NYID KYIS GZHI BZUNG,
'BRI GUNG SKU SKYES BSOD NAMS SENG GE

LNGA MCHOD NANG SO BZOD PA, PRA TI NANG SO DKAR PO DANG NANG SO
NOR BU SOGS SGOM SDE KHAG GIS KHUR BLANGS TE RGYU

DNGOS KYI 'GRO SGO LA MA 'DZEMS PAR RGYA DANG ZLUM PAS CHOS SDE
PHAN TSUN 'BREL ZAB CHE, 'DI SKABS RANG ZHABS KYI

RKUN JAG 'GA'I BYED SPYOD KYIS KLU SKYABS KYI DMAG BUD, NYID KYI
DBON PO DAM CHOS SOGS GTZO BO RNAMS BZUNG

NAS MKHAR DU BTZON LA BCUG 'GA' ZHIG RGYA DANG 'PHRIN NAS MI
TSAB STER RGYU BYAS PAR, 'BUL DPON PAS

NGED KYI TSA BO MKHO BAR MA ZAD, NGA RANG RGAS 'KHOGS PAS KHYI
RGAN KHA'I SE'U YIN YANG MI SROG LA RAB 'BRING MED,

SROG THAMS CAD LA DGOS PAS MI TSAB MI STER, STONG 'KHOR RIN PO
CHER ZHUS NA RANG RE LA THUGS MNYES PAS PHAN

THOGS YOD 'DRA BYAS PA LTAR RJE MDO RGYUD RGYA MTSO NYID LA
ZHUS, KHONG GAN JU'I DPON PO'I RTZAR PHEBS ZHOR GRONG

LANG MKHAR DANG NYE BAR ZHAG PHYI NYIN NYI SHAR LA DPON GA-YOG
'GA' GSANG STABS KYIS BTZON KHANG SGOR BYON,

BKAG MI SO SO'I MING GI BOS PA THOS PAS RJE 'DI'I GSUNG AE YIN
SNYAM PA SHAR 'PHRAL SGO HAR GYIS PHYE, PHYI ROL

TU 'ONG BAR NYID KYI NA BZA' LA 'JUR BCUG STE MYUR 'GROS KYIS
MKHAR SGOR THON, DE NAS PHYI MIG MA LTA BAR

SONG GSUNGS PA BZHIN BYAS PAS BDE BAR THAR BA SOGS NI, DAD GUS
RTZE GCIG CING CHOS SRID KYI BLO KHOG

DKYEL CHE BA'I LUGS SU SNANG, 'DI PA LCAGS STAG LA GSHEGS, TSA
BO DAM CHOS KUN DGA' DANG, YANG

TSA SHES RAB RGYA MTSO GNYIS KYIS DPON SA RIM PAR BZUNG STE MI
RABS SNGAR GZHUNG GI 'BUL DPON RGYUN CHAGS PA

BYUNG; LNGA PA ZI NA CHOS RJE CHOS DPAL 'BYOR, BDE YANG DPON
SLOB DKON MCHOG LHA DBANG, THAR BO

CHOS RJE BKRA SHIS RGYAL MTSAN, 'DI PAS CHU 'BRUG LOR BYAMS PA
NYE SRAS BRGYAD KYI LHA KHANG RTEN BRTEN PA

BZHENGS; DGON LUNG KHRIR BZHUGS, TA LE CHOS RJE DGE 'DUN RGYAL
MTSAN, LOM PA DPON SLOB

SANGS RGYAS BKRA SHIS, CHAR DPON SLOB BSAM GTAN BZANG PO, DPON
SLOB STAG LUNG PA BLO BZANG BSTAN

PA CHOS KYI NYI MA'I DUS, MI NGAN 'GA'I BYED LUGS KYIS DPON SLOB
NYID DANG YUL MI'I GTZO BO PHAL CHER RGYA MKHAR

DU BZANG BTZON LA BCUG PA SOGS NYEN CHEN PO BYUNG YANG RJE 'DIS
DRAG PO'I MNGON SPYOD KHO NAS RGYA DPON RNAMS

TSAR BCAD PAS BDE 'JAGS BYUNG, DPON SLOB MU NE PA BLO BZANG DON
GRUB KYIS 'CHAD NYAN GYI RTING BSKUL

MDZAD PAS PHAN SLEB CHE, LHO RGYUD AA MCHOG MU TO PA SGO MANG
DON SLOB KUN DGA' 'OD ZER, TOB TSANG

DPON SLOB GRAGS PA DAR RGYAS, KHONG GIS ME 'BRUG LOR STONG 'KHOR
MDO RGYUD RGYA MTSO GDAN DRANGS, KUN

RIG GI DBANG ZHUS, ` GDAN RABS BCO LNGA PA NI, SDE 'DIR BKA'
DRIN DANG THUGS RJE CHE BA SEMS NYID

SPRUL SKU BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO BA YIN LA, DE NYID
KYI 'KHRUNGS RABS TI PHU GSANG SNGAGS STONG BO,

SEMS MYI'I YANG MES BLA MA THAR GYI SRAS NYI MA'I BSHES GNYEN
'DI RJE CHOS KYI NYI MAS MDZAD PA'I 'KHRUNGS RABS

@115 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SU MI GSAL, DE'I PHYI MA BLA MA BKRA SHIS KYI SRAS AA KHYUNG BLA
MA KUN DGA' BSHES GNYEN, MTSO STENG DU BZHUGS

TE GRUB PA BRNYES, MTSO BDAG RGYAL MO SOGS SDE BRGYAD DBANG DU
'DUS, RMA CHEN LA RDO RJE THEG PA'I DBANG

BSKUR; DMAG ZOR MA BRAN DU 'KHOL, GDUL BYA MANG DU BYUNG, DE'I
PHYI MA PHYUG PO RGYAL GYI SRAS 'DUL

BA 'DZIN PA SBYIN PA RGYA MTSO, SBYIN PA RGYA CHER BTANG BAS DGE
SLONG NOR SBYIN DU GRAGS, DE NAS YAB TSE 'BUM

DA GE'I SRAS 'BUL DPON PA KUN DGA' RGYA MTSO, 'DI YAN LA SPRUL
SKU'I NGOS 'DZIN MA MDZAD KYANG THAMS CAD

SEMS NYID RANG LA 'KHRUNGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU 'DI PA GRONG LANG
MKHAR DU SUN KYA GCOD PA'I SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU

GCIG PA'I SHING LUG LA 'KHRUNGS, ZLA NGO KHA SHAS NAS NGA BOD
YIN, GRVA BA DANG DGON PA RTEN 'DI DANG 'DI

YOD CES GSUNGS PA LA RGYA MI 'GAS, 'DI 'DRA LAB PA LTAS NGAN YIN
ZER BAR BRTEN, SKU LUS MI GTZANG

BAS BKRUS, KHYI'I SHA KHRAG BYIN, KHYOD KYIS MI LAB DGU LAB CES
LJAGS LA LCAGS BSREGS BCUG

DPON PO SHES RAB RGYA MTSOS NGOS 'DZIN KHYER BA MA 'PHYUG PAR
BZHES, BTZAN PO DPON SLOB LA ZHUS PAR SPRUL

SKU 'KHRUL MED KYI LTAS SHAR KYANG PAn CHEN RIN PO CHER ZHUS
GSUNGS, RBU NANG SO RGYAL MTSAN NGO GA-YOG DBUS

SU SONG NAS, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN LA ZHUS TE THAG BCAS,
NYID KYI 'DRA SKU DANG ZHAL BKOD BSTZAL,

YUM GYI SPRUL SKU STER MA 'DOD PAR YOD KYANG, BLA MA PAn ZHVA
CAN ZHIG NYID TSANG LA PHEBS PA RMIS, PHYI NYIN

SKU RTZA RNAMS 'BYOR, PAn CHEN 'DRA SKU MO LA RTEN SKAL DU BYIN
PA RMI LAM DANG MTSUNGS PAS SPRUL SKU SBYIN PAR KHAS

BLANGS; DGUNG LO BRGYAD PA CHU STAG LA GDAN SAR BKOD, RTEN DANG
GRVA BA 'GA' ZHIG NGOS 'DZIN GNANG, BRDA TSA

SGOM RGAN BLO LDAN SHES RAB PAS DGE BSNYEN BSGRUBS, DPON SLOB
BLO BZANG DPAL 'BYOR BA DGE RGAN DU BSTEN,

YI GE BSLAB PAR SMRA MI BDE ZHING YIG 'BRU RE RE NYIN LNGA DRUG
LA 'DZIN DGOS PA BYUNG, RGYA PHRUG LKUG PA 'DI 'DRA

SPRUL SKU YIN DGOS MED ZER MKHAN SNANG, BRDA TSA SGOM RGAN GYIS
PAn CHEN GSUNG LA 'KHRUL BA GA LA YOD,

GRIB SKYON YIN 'GRO GSUNGS NAS RNAM 'JOMS SME BRTZEGS GNYIS KYI
BYAMS BKRUS DANG GRIB SEL, 'JAM

DBYANGS DMAR SER DANG 'JAM DKAR GYI RJES GNANG SNGAGS KYI BZLAS
LUNG BCAS BSTZAL, DMIGS BRTZE MA

'BUM GCIG DANG AA RA PA TZA 'BUM PHRAG BCU'I LJAGS BSNYEN GNANG
BAS RIM GYIS SMRA BDE ZHING LOB SKYEN,

MKHAN CHEN BSAM GTAN BZANG PO LAS RAB TU BYUNG, SHING 'BRUG LOR
STONG 'KHOR MDO RGYUD RGYA MTSO SMAD NAS

PHEBS PA DANG MJAL, 'JAM DKAR DANG MGON PO'I RJES GNANG BSTZAL,
ME RTA LA RGYAL SRAS BLO BZANG BSTAN

'DZIN LAS DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, RGYUD SDE'I CHO GA GANG YOD BSKANG
GSO BCAS THUGS 'DZIN GRUB CING PHAL CHER

LA BSNYEN PA MDZAD, BCU DRUG PA LCAGS KHYI LA DGON LUNG DU CHOS
GRVAR ZHUGS, LO NGO BRGYAD KYI RING THUGS GNYER

LA 'GRUS, NYER GSUM PA ME SBRUL LOR GLING BSRE'I DKA' BCU MDZAD,
PHYI LOR BYA KHYUNG BRGYUD GONG MA'I

BZHUGS GNAS CHOS LUNG RIN CHEN BRAG TU PHEBS, DBON PO SHER RGYAM
PA DANG GROS BSTUN GYIS DBUS SU PHEBS

RGYU BYAS, DE DUS GDAN SA'I LHA KHANG DANG GRVA SHAG PHAL CHER
ZHIG RAL DU SONG, KHOG ZHUGS KYI SRUNG MA RGYANG

@116 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BSRING; SKU KHOG GNAS NAS DBYUNG, GRVA BA GRONG DU 'THOR BA SOGS
NYAMS CHAG CHE BAS, RANG GRVA WA SE

BSOD NAMS SOGS KYIS KHRIR BZHUGS DGOS KYI GSOL BA NAN CHER BTAB
PA BZHIN, CHU STOD ZLA BA'I TSES

BCU'I NYIN KHRI 'DON MDZAD, GRVA BA BSDUS PAS BDUN CU LHAG
BYUNG, 'CHAD NYAN DANG GZHI GSUM GYI PHYAG

LEN NYAMS PA SLAR GSOS, DGON LUNG KHRI THOG PA MKHAN CHEN BLO
BZANG RGYA MTSO LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS,

MGON PO'I GTOR SGRUB CHAD 'DUG PA NYID NAS RDO RJE SLOB DON
GNANG STE BCU GNYIS PA'I MAR NGOR NYIN LNGA

TSUGS; NYER DGU'I NYIN BSKANG GSO RGYAS PA BTANG STE GTOR RGYAG
DANG PHYOGS NAS 'ONG BA'I SBYIN BDAG

KHA SHAS BCOM MKHAN GYI MING KHROM BSGRAGS MDZAD PAS PHAN THOGS,
LHA MOR GSOL KHA BTANG BAR RGYAS PA'I

MTSAN MA BYUNG, 'DU KHANG DANG BYAMS PA'I THANG SKU 'DOM LNGA PA
BZHENGS, DGON LUNG DU SHING BYI'I SMON

LAM YONGS RDZOGS BTANG, SNGAR LCAGS BYA'I LOR RANG DPON LA KHRAL
MA 'THEN PA'I RKYEN GYIS B'A THUR THU'I JI'I

DMAG BUD, MDA' ZHABS KYI RKUN JAG 'GA'I BYED SPYOD KYIS GONG MA
CHEN POR DGONGS PHOG BYUNG,

LCAGS LUG LOR ZI LING DMAG CHEN SLEBS, RGYAL BA YON TAN RGYA
MTSO'I THUGS DAM RTEN LHA MO'I SKU THANG GI

MDUN DU ZAN BSGYUR BAR BRTEN NYID DPON GA-YOG BDUN CU SKOR DMAG
THOG TU SLEBS, MI DANG DUD 'GRO'I

MGO RKANG LAG GCOD PA, NANG KHROL 'BYIN PA, MGO DANG YAN LAG
SNGA SHAD PHYI SHAD BYAS PA, LAG PAR

THOG PA, MDUNG RTZER 'DZIN PA MANG PO, MTSON CHA'I RIGS MI 'DRA
BA DU MA DANG, BKYIG BRDUNG BYED

PA'I KHRIMS KYI YO BYAD SNA TSOGS BZUNG BA'I DMAG DPUNG GRANGS
MED PAS 'O RING 'O THUNG, HA HA SOGS KYI SGRAS

SNYING 'GAS PA, TSE'I 'DU BYED MA BTANG BAR GSHIN RJE'I GRONG
KHYER DU SLEBS PA LTA BU'I NANG DU THUGS TSOM MED

PAR ZHUGS, DPON LA ZHU MKHAS KYIS RANG SDE PHYOGS GTOGS DANG
BCAS PA DKAR THON, BDAG RKYEN BKUR

GZOS CHE BA BYUNG RUNG, GZHAN SDE NAG CAN 'GA' ZHIG SHOR BAS
SLAR YANG NYID GRVA BGRES BCU LHAG BCAS DMAG

SGAR DU BKAG ZHABS PHYI THAMS CAD PHYIR BROS, NYID NAS SPYI BOR
BLA MA SKYABS GNAS KUN 'DUS SU MOS

TE NYIN MTSAN MED PAR BLA MA RGYAL SRAS PA'I GSOL 'DEBS BLO GROS
RAB YANGS MA GSUNGS, KHA BA CHEN PO

BABS PAS DMAG MIS BZOD DKA' BA BYUNG, DPON CHEN DMAG STONG PHRAG
BCAS DGON PAR 'ONG BA DANG

MNYAM DU NYID KYANG PHEBS, DMAG DPON GCIG BSAD PA'I GO KHRAB
GRVA SHAG CIG NAS THON PAS GRVA BA 'GA'

BZUNG NAS GSOD PAR BRTZAMS, RJE 'DIS DPAL LDAN LHA MO ZHES GSUNG
MTHON POS 'BOD BZHIN BRGYUG

DPON LA ZHUS PAS 'PHRAL DU BTANG, KHO LA 'JIGS SNANG SNA TSOGS
BYUNG BA SOGS CHOS SKYONG GI 'PHRIN LAS GA-YEL

BA MED PAS NYEN CHEN PO MA BYUNG RUNG, SNGA PHYIR DUS 'KHRUGS
KYIS GTZES PAS THUGS SKYO STE CHU SPREL LOR DBUS

SU BYON, GONG SA YAB SRAS LA 'BUL NOD, RTEN LA MCHOD 'BUL, CHOS
SDE KHAG LA MANG 'GYED BTANG,

LNGA PA CHEN POS AE RTI NI DAR HAN CHOS RJE'I CHO LO DANG GZIGS
PA CHE, SLOB DPON 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PA LAS

CHOS BKA' CI RIGS GSAN, RGYAL SRAS BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA
MTSO BLA MA'I GTZO BO DANG SKU BCAR GYIS RANG

@117 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

YUL BLOS GTONG RTZIS MDZAD PAR RJE DE NYID DANG, CHOS SKYONG
KHAG GI LUNG PHEBS LA BRTEN CHU BYA'I LOR PHYIR PHEBS,

SHING KHYI LA GNAS CHUNG BTZAN KHANG BRGYAB, LANG JU'I DPON PO
SHI TZONG YE DANG MCHOD YON DU 'BREL, GONG

GI BKA' LTAR DE'I SA SGO BYAS, ME BYI LOR DPON KLU SKYABS LA
ZHUS NAS BKA' 'GYUR GDAN DRANGS, THOS

BSAM DAR RGYAS GLING GI KHRI MDZAD, DER LHA MO'I TSES GTOR DGON
LUNG LTAR BTZUGS, LCAGS 'BRUG

LOR DPON PO SHES RAB RGYA MTSO GSHEGS, PHYI LOR GTZUG LAG KHANG
SUM THOG BZHENGS, 'CHAD NYAN SOGS

THUGS 'DOD LTAR MA BYUNG BA LA SKYO BA'I RGYU MTSAN GYI YI GE
SGO 'BYOR DANG, BLA MA CHOS SKYONG LA DGONGS ZHU SKYABS

'JUG GI YI GE BTZAN KHANG SGO LOGS SU SBYAR TE GNAS NGES MED
MDZAD RGYU'I THUGS 'DUN CHOS SKYONG GIS BSHOL,

SHING BYA'I LOR KHRI KHUR 'JOG RTZIS MDZAD PAR SER SKYA THAMS
CAD KYIS 'CHAD NYAN MA GTOGS LAS DON RGAN PA

TSOS BSGRUB RGYU DANG, GRONG BAS RKUN JAG GI KHRIMS BSDAM RGYU
KHAS BLANGS PAS BZHUGS, RGYAL SRAS RIN PO

CHE'I BKA' LTAR 'DU KHANG DU BYAMS SKU DANG, DGON PA'I BYANG
NGOS SU DBYEN ZLUM MCHOD RTEN BRTZIGS,

LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE, SMIN GROL BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL
MTSAN SOGS BLA CHEN RNAMS LA DNGOS 'BUL, SKU

'BUM SOGS CHOS SDE KHAG LA MANG 'GYED, DGON LUNG DU TSOGS PA
NYIS STONG BZHI BRGYA LHAG LA BZHES CAN SE'U

THOG GIS GANG BA RE DANG JA RAS KYI 'GYED PHUL, CHU BZANG RIN PO
CHER ZHUS TE RJE'I GOS SKU BZHENGS, MCHOD

RDZAS DU MA BSGRIGS, 'GRIG LAM DANG 'DZIN SKYOR SBYANG GI RTING
BSKUL, CHOS GRVA'I RTZOD PA, CHO GA CHOS

SPYOD RAB GNAS SBYIN SREG BSKANG GSO SKOR GYI DBYANGS RTA 'DUR,
GTOR MA'I BCA' BZO, ROL

MO 'BUD DKROL BCAS DGON LUNG GI PHYAG LEN DANG, LCANG SKYA THAMS
CAD MKHYEN PA'I GSUNG SGROS LTAR BSLAB

PAS NYAMS GSOS SOR CHUD, 'DI YAN NYID KYIS BSGRIGS PA'I DKAR
CHAG SHEL DKAR ME LONG LAS BTUS,

CHU SBRUL LOR AERTI NI AERKHE'I BLA MAR MTSO SNGON AURGER BYON,
RIM GRO DANG CHOS 'BREL BSTZAL, SHING 'BRUG

LO NAS RANG DGON DU LHA KHANG GYAN DGU, RGYAL BA'I GZIMS KHANG
GYAN BCO BRGYAD NYIS THOG SNGAGS KHANG

GYAN BCO LNGA SUM THOG BRGYAB, ME PHAG NAS BZUNG DUS CHOS RNAMS
LO RE BZHIN JE RGYAS SU BTANG, 'DUL

MDZOD RES MOS LA DBU PHAR ZUR BKOL BCAS RDZOGS PAR BRTZI BZHAG
LA GNANG, RTZOD GRVA 'PHEL BAS RGYAL

SRAS ZHAL SNGA NAS BRGYUD GZHUNG LA ZHUS PA'I BKA' LAN 'DI SKABS
'BYOR BAS DKA' BCU'I MING BTAGS DGON

LUNG LTAR DANG, GRVA JAR RGYAN 'JUG TSOGS 'DON DU BTZUGS, YAR
SKYED KYI MGO BRTZAMS NAS RING PO MA

LON PAR CHU YOS DUS 'KHRUGS KYI GZHI THENGS, DMAG DPON YENG THE
DUS, KY'A DO YE, CANG TZONG YE

DMAG DANG BCAS SLEBS PAR NYID DPON GA-YOG BSU BAR BYON, SNGAR
DKAR RTAGS BYIN YOD PA MA KHYER BAS

BSDIGS BRDUNG SROG LA BRGOL BA BYAS, ZHABS PHYI RNAMS CI BYA
GTOL MED DU SONG, NYID NAS SKRAG RGYU CI

YOD; SKYES MTHAR 'CHI DGOS PA RED, SHI NA YANG DGA' LDAN DU SKYE
BA'I SMON LAM 'DEBS ZHES BYAMS

PA'I DAM GZUNGS DBU BSKUL BA THAMS CAD 'UR GYIS GSUNGS PAS RGYA
RNAMS HA LAS, LANG JU'I YA MON PA

@118 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

ZHIG GIS DKAR RTAGS KHYER YONG BAS 'PHRAL DU BTANG, LUG BRGYA
DANG DNGUL RDO TSAD GNYIS MDZOD SNON DU

BYIN; DMAG GROGS SONG BAS DPON THE TUS LHAG PAR TSIM, NYID LA
DNGOS 'BUL PHUL TE ZI LING DU SONG,

SHING 'BRUG NAG ZLAR YO GUNG YE, ZI GUNG YE, ZI LING DANG LANG
JU'I TZONG YE DMAG 'BUM PHRAG BRGAL BA

BCAS SLEBS, NYID DGON PAR BZHUGS MA TSUGS PAR SHING LUNG SER
LDING DU BYON PA DMAG SGRA DU TSA DRAG

GIS GDAN DRANGS, NYEN GUNG YE NAS DGON PA ZHUGS LA SBYAR RGYU'I
YI GE BABS SONG BAS LHA KHANG GNYIS TZAM

MA BSREGS NA KHRIMS SROL LA MI RUNG, GZHAN LA SKYON MI BYED,
NYID DGE 'DUN BCAS SA BZANG ZHIG TU

BSKYAL CHOG CES DNGUL SRANG SUM BRGYA'I BDAG RKYEN GNANG, LNGA
BA'I TSE BZHI'I NYIN LHAG KHANG GNYIS DANG,

BCO LNGA'I NYIN DGON PA YONGS RDZOGS MER BSREGS, DE SKABS GSUNG
MGUR DU, PHRAN BDAG GIS MCHOG

GSUM BTZUG TU BSTEN, ,MGON DGRA LHA RNAMS LA GNYER GTAD DANG,
,MI CHEN PO RNAMS LA MTHUN

'JUG BYAS, ,DON BSTAN PA'I BYA BA'I ZHABS TOG LA, ,RANG BLO TSOD
DANG BSAM TSOD LA BSTUN NAS, ,

LUS NGAG GI KUN SPYOD 'BANGS SU BKOL, ,CES 'BYUNG BA LTAR BSTAN
'GROR SMAN PA'I LHAG BSAM THUGS LA

BZHAG STE ZHABS 'DEGS SU GANG 'GYUR LE SHOR MED PA MDZAD 'DUG
NA'ANG 'DUS BYAS KYI RANG BZHIN BCOS SU

MA BTUB PA NGES PAR 'BYUNG BA'I YUL YIN NO, ,RGYA'I SKYEL MA
BCAS DPON GA-YOG CHU BZANG DU BYON, DBYAR

GNAS DANG RIGS GRVA'I CHOS THOG TSUGS, DE NAS RGYA LDOG THAR GO
ZI RA SEMS NYID MES PO RDO RJE THAR GYIS SBRA

DKAR BZUNG BA'I SA GA-YUNG DRUNG 'KHYIL DU GZHI PHABS, SKYEL MA
RNAMS PHYIR THON KHAR RGYA MI ZHIG GIS, GSER

KHOG SOGS DGON PA RNAMS MER BSREGS, GRVA BA YOD TSAD BSAD, LUS
PA RNAMS LHAN PA SER BO TZAM YANG

GYON SA MED PAR MA ZAD BLA RGAN LO DRUG CU BDUN CU CAN TSOS RAL
BA 'JOG DGOS 'DUG ZER, 'ON KYANG KHYED

TSO ZI LING TE'I PHANG GI YIN PAS DGON PA BRGYAB NAS SDOD AE
'JUG SNYAM, NYID DPON GA-YOG GRVA CHAS KYIS ZI

LING DU PHEBS CHOG 'DRA ZHES GSANG GTAM BYAS PA LTAR NYID NAS
BLA CHAS DANG, ZHABS PHYI BYINGS GOS SER

SBUBS MA GYON NAS PHEBS, B'A ZA'I RU MTHA' ZHAG SKABS GRVA BTZUN
SKYA CHAS CAN DRUG GIS MJAL, RAL

RTZUD TSON RE YOD PA BSTAN, 'DI 'DRA BYAS NAS PHEBS MI RUNG ZHES
NGUS NAS ZHUS PAR SEMS GSO BTANG,

LAM NAS BOD THUGS TSAD KYIS DE BZHIN LAB, RGYA MI RNAMS GRVA BA
'DI TSOS SROG SKYEL DU 'GRO BA AE YIN ZER,

MKHAR SGOR MI RTA'I GRANGS THO BTAB STE NANG DU KHRID, LHAG
KHANG ZHIG TU BZHAG PHYI NYIN DPON GUNG YE LA THUG

PAR DGYES NYAMS CHE BA BYUNG, RGYA MI 'GAS MJAL NAS BOD SKAD
LAB, GCIG GIS LVA BA'I 'OG NAS GZAN

SHAM BSTAN, RGYU MTSAN DRIS PAR, DGON LUNG BA YIN YON BDAG GIS
BOS NAS 'ONG, GRVA CHAS GYON MA PHOD

ZHUS PAS GRVA CHAS GYON BCUG DPON SLOB RNAMS BSHAGS BSDAM DANG
GOS BRAL GYI LTUNG BA BYIN GYIS BRLABS,

BSTAN 'BAR MA'I SMON LAM MDZAD, DPON CHEN POS GNANG SBYIN DANG
SHING BZO PA BZHI MNGAGS TE DGON PA

BRGYAB CHOG PA'I BKA' GNANG, NYID NAS DGON LUNG PA 'GAR GRVA
CHAS GYON BCUG TSUL, SPYIR SER MO BA THAMS

@119 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CAD GRVA CHAS BYAS CHOG PA'I BDAG RKYEN DGOS TSUL NAN CHER ZHUS
PAR, SER CHAS BYAS NAS CHOS DANG MI MTHUN

PA'I LAS BYED MKHAN TSO TSAR GCOD BYAS PA YIN, THAMS CAD GYIS
NGUR SMRIG GYON MI CHOG PA MIN ZHES BKA' PHEBS

BZANG PO BYUNG, RGYA LDOG DGON DU 'DU KHANG BRGYAB, LNGA MCHOD
DANG SHIN SBRUL CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM, DPYID

CHOS BCAS TSUGS, ZI LING NAS SA TSIGS YI GER BRIS TE SEMS NYID
LA SPRAD, THO LE THANG CHEN SA BKRA

LEGS PAS DER DGON PA BTAB, RGYA LDOG NAS DGE 'DUN PA RNAMS
PHEBS, DGON PA 'PHEL RGYAS DANG

'CHAD NYAN BZANG, 'DI DKA' BCU NGAG DBANG CHOS 'DZIN GYIS
BSGRIGS PA'I RNAM THAR MU TIG 'PHRENG MDZES

LAS BRIS, SUM PAS DUS 'KHRUGS KYI RJES SU 'BRU GU'I SAR SPOS NAS
CHOS RJE 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSOS BZUNG ZHES

BSHAD; DE'I PHYI MA SEMS NYID BSOD NAMS BSTAN 'DZIN, ZHI DUL BAG
YOD KYI NGANG TSUL LHUR BZHES PA

ZHIG GO ,DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG MCHOG GRUB NYI MA CHU RTA LO
BA, KUN MKHYEN MCHOG DANG THU'U BKVAN RIN PO

CHE SOGS LAS ZAB RGYAS KYI GDAMS PA MANG DU GSAN PAS THUGS DAM
NYAMS RTOGS KYI KLONG RDOL BA ZHIG YIN LA,

GSUNG RTZOM ZAB DON SNYAN BRGYUD KYI PHYI MTSAMS CHU MIG BRGYA
RTZA'I PHYAG LEN NGAG 'DON MA CIG DGONGS RGYAN

SOGS YOD SNANG, DA LTA'I YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN MCHOG GRUB, LCANG
SKYA RIN PO CHE YE SHES BSTAN PA'I RGYAL

MTSAN LAS CHU BZANG JO KHANG DU RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS, BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL DU CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, BKA' POT LNGA DANG,

RIG GNAS SOGS THUGS GNYER YONGS SU RDZOGS, BCU DRUG PA RJE BLO
BZANG DPAL 'BYOR, MKHAN BRGYUD GSOL

'DEBS SU 'DI PA BCO LNGA PA BYAS SNANG, BLO BZANG DAM CHOS,
MKHAN CHEN BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN, BLO BZANG

CHOS 'DZIN, BSOD NAMS BSTAN 'DZIN, ,SGO MANG MKHAN SPRUL BSOD
NAMS 'OD ZER, 'DI'I GONG MA SGO MANG

BLA MA DAM CHOS NI, SEMS NYID BAN SKOR DU 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO
NYER GCIG BAR KHYIM DU BZHUGS, KHYIM GYI NYES

PAS THUGS SUN TE BROS STABS KYIS DBUS GTZANG DU BYON, LCANG SKYA
NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN LAS RAB BYUNG

DANG; PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, 'BRAS
SGO MANG CHOS GRVAR BSAM BLO MI THUNG BSOD

NAMS RGYAL MTSAN BSTEN NAS GSAN BSAM MDZAD PAS MKHAS PA'I PHUL
DU PHYIN, KUN MKHYEN GONG MA LA YANG KHAS

LEN ZHUS, DAM BCA' THON NAS RGYUD SMAD DU SNGAGS LA SBYANGS,
DPAL LDAN THAL 'GYUR PA'I LUGS KYI

STONG NYID MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PAR GRAGS CHE ZHING KLONG RDOL BLA
MAS KYANG TSAD LDAN DU BZHED, KUN MKHYEN MCHOG

GIS PHA BONG KHAR LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO'I BSHAD LUNG BSTZAL BA
GSAN TE PHYIS SU KHRI CHEN NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN,

SUM PA MKHAN CHEN YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR SOGS LA GNANG PAS SMAN YON
CHE BA BYUNG, GZHAN YANG LAM RIM CHEN

MO'I BSHAD LUNG, KHRID CHEN BRGYAD, BSKYED RDZOGS KYI KHRID SOGS
'CHAD NYAN DANG, RTEN 'BREL

MTHA' DPYOD CHEN MO, RTEN 'BREL BSTOD tIKA RNAMS LJAGS RTZOM
MDZAD DE 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM PA'I PHYAG RJES

RLABS CHE BA BSKRUN, GZHUNG GI BKAS SGO MANG MKHAN POR MNGA'
GSOL, RI BO DGE 'PHEL SOGS DBEN

GNAS DU MAR SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN LA GZHOL BAS NYAMS RTOGS KYI
KLONG RDOL, GUNG RU CHOS 'BYUNG GI SKYE BA DRAN,

@120 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RANG YUL DU PHEBS MA THUB PAR TSAB LTA BUR GZHUNG NAS GNAS BCU'I
ZHAL THANG BSKUR, DGUNG LO GYA GSUM

BZHUGS; DE'I RJES MA 'DI NYID PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYI
BKAS RJE GONG MA'I GO SAR BTON, STONG

'KHRO BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO LA RAB BYUNG ZHUS, RANG DGON DU BKA'
POT YONGS RDZOGS LA SBYANGS, NYER

GSUM PA LA DBUS GTZANG DU BLA MA BYAMS PA RIN PO CHE, RGYAL SRAS
'JIGS MED GRAGS PA SOGS LA GTUGS,

YI DAM MGON 'JIGS GNYIS KYI ZHAL GZIGS, CHOS SDE 'DI NYID 'DZIN
SKYONG GI KHUR BZHES, THUGS DAM

LA RTZE GCIG TU GZHOL BAS BSKYED RDZOGS KYI RTOGS PA BRNYES,
SPYOD PA'I BRTUL ZHUGS SNA TSOGS MDZAD PA'I

RKYEN GYIS DGON PA NAS MA CHAGS PAR BYA BRAL GYI RNAM PAS DBUS
PHYOGS SU BSKOR, TZA RIR 'KHOR LO SDOM PA

YAB YUM GYI DBANG BSKUR BA DNGOS SU MDZAD, BAL BO KHO KHOM GRONG
KHYER GHADHA ZER BA BRGYUD RGYA GAR GYI GNAS

CHEN RNAMS MJAL, SHING GI RIR RNAL 'BYOR GYI DBANG PHYUG CHEN PO
MI TRA DZO KI DENG SANG GI MI GSUM GYI BONGS

TSOD DANG MNYAM PA MJAL, MDO SMAD DU BYON PA NYE TSAN RNAMS KYIS
BZUNG NAS CHUR BSKYUR RTZIS BYAS PA RDZU

'PHRUL GYIS THAR, SLAR DBUS SU PHEBS PA RAS CHUNG PHUG TU BZHUGS
NAS SKAL LDAN RNAMS SMIN GROL LA BKOD

MJAL, MDO SMAD DU BYON PA NYE TSAN RNAMS KYIS BZUNG NAS CHUR
BSKYUR RTZIS BYAS PA RDZU

'PHRUL GYIS THAR, SLAR DBUS SU PHEBS PA RAS CHUNG PHUG TU BZHUGS
NAS SKAL LDAN RNAMS SMIN GROL LA BKOD

PA'I MTHAR ZHI BAR GSHEGS, RLUNG GI RNAL 'BYOR LA NUS PA THON
PAS RGYAL KHAMS BSKOR BA LA DKA' TSEGS

MED PA BYUNG, RJE DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BYANG SEMS SA BRGYAD PA BA
ZHIG YIN ZHES GSUNGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG

LUNG RTOGS CHOS 'BYOR RGYA MTSO, ME STAG LO BA, SKU PHRENG GSUM
KA 'KHRUNGS YUL CIG CING 'BRI'I RIGS

YIN; SEMS NYID MCHOG GRUB NYI MA LAS RAB TU BYUNG, DGON LUNG DU
BSDUS TSAD DANG DBUS SU DBU PHAR

LA SBYANG, GUNG RU'I PHAR PHYIN, 'GREL BA DON GSAL, STONG THUN
SKAL BZANG MIG 'BYED RNAMS THUGS

'DZIN MDZAD DE SKYOR SBYANGS DANG, DMIGS BRTZE MA 'BUM THER
BRGYA ZHAL 'DON MDZAD, PAn CHEN BSTAN

PA'I NYI MA LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, BDE LAM GYI KHRID DANG, 'KHOR
CHEN GYI DBANG GSAN, KHRI CHEN RNAM

GSUM; KE'U TSANG BLA MA RNAM GROL, HOR SPRUL PA'I SKU RNAMS LA
CHOS ZHUS, RANG DGON GYI KHRIR LO NYI SHU

BZHUGS TE LUGS GNYIS KYIS BSKYANGS, CHU BZANG JO KHANG RAB GNAS
DUS KUN MKHYEN GSUM PA LA RTEN

'BREL BSTOD PA'I BSHAD LUNG ZHUS, DGON DER SDE KHRI RIN PO CHE
LAS DUS 'KHOR GYI DBANG GSAN, STAG

LUNG MKHAN RGAN DANG, SUM BHA SPRUL SKU LA'ANG CHOS 'BREL MNOS,
LO MTSAMS MANG PO SBREL NAS RDO RJE

'JIGS BYED DANG MKHA' SPYOD MA'I BSNYEN PA MDZAD PAS PHYI MAS
ZHAL GZIGS, MNGON SHES SHIN TU GSAL,

DA LTA DGUNG LO DRUG CUR SLEBS SHING LEGS MDZAD YAR LDAN DU YOD,
GRAGS PA 'PHRIN LAS, PHYUG PO BLA MA

ZUR ZHI 'PHRIN LAS CHOS 'PHEL, SNGO GO BLA MA TSOGS 'PHEL RGYA
MTSO, SEMS NYID SPRUL PA'I SKU BLO BZANG

MCHOG GRUB NYI MA, TOB TSANG ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG RGYA MTSO,
RGYA YIG SLOB CHUNG BSOD NAMS LHUN GRUB,

'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN 'DZIN, SPOS KHANG ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG CHOS
KYI RGYA MTSO, 'BRU GU'I LHA RAMS PA

LHUN GRUB BSTAN 'DZIN, KO RTZA DPON SLOB SKAL BZANG MCHOG GRUB,
RGYA LDOG LHA RAMS PA DON GRUB RGYA MTSO,

@121 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

SGO MANG MKHAN PO SKU PHRENG GSUM PA'I BAR BYON TE, BTZAN PO'I
BSDUS GRVA, GUNG RU'I SKABS DANG PO,

DAM CHOS KYI RTEN 'GREL SOGS YIG CHA SNA TSOGS PA'I STENG NAS
'CHAD NYAN MDZAD, DPYID CHOS ZLA BA GNYIS,

DBYAR STON DGUN GSUM LA ZLA CHOS TE, SAS ZLA'I DUS BZANG NYIN
BDUN, DBYAR GNAS RING CHOS THOG

DGU BA'I TSE BRGYAD NAS SMON LAM, DBEN SA LUGS KYI 'CHAM LCAGS
MKHAR DANG BCAS PA, DE'I BCU DRUG

NAS JO MCHOD SMON LAM NYIN BDUN, LNGA MCHOD NYIN BDUN MJUG TU
GTOR RGYAG RGYAL ZLA'I NANG MGON

PO'I BSNYEN SGRUB, LO SAR GTOR SGRUB DANG TSES GTOR BCAS MI
NYAMS GONG 'PHEL DU GNAS SHING CHU PHAG LA

CHOS SDE BTAB NAS LO NYIS BRGYA DANG NYER BDUN PA RAB YID SA BYA
YIN LA RI KHROD KYANG YOD, MCHOD GZHIS

GZUNGS PA, HA SDE, 'BUM RGYAL, PHYUG PO, BAN SKOR TE SEMS NYID
TSO LNGA DUD KHA STONG PHRAG BRGAL

BA SNANG, ` 'BRU GU DGON DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING NI, BTZAN PO
DON GRUB RGYA MTSOS SEMS NYID GNAS

BSTAN PA, DO LON SGOM PA, B'A ZA SGOM PA SOGS 'BRU GU'I RI KHROD
NA YOD PA RNAMS LA GRVA BA BSDUR BCUG

CHA RKYEN NYID NAS GNANG STE RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SHING SPREL
LOR BTAB, SUM PAS 'BRUG LOR BTAB PAR

BSHAD; DO LON SGOM PA SKU TSAB TU BSKOS, SMIN GROL NO MON HAN LA
DGON PA PHAN TSUN GTAD, AA

RIG DPON SLOB KYIS MTSAN NYID BTZUGS, SEMS NYID GNAS BRTAN PAS
BZUNG ZER BA YANG SNANG, BAR

SKABS CHU 'JIGS KYIS NYEN PAS THU'I BKVAN RIN PO CHES SUM BDO
ZER BAR DGON GNAS SPOS, GDAN RABS

NI; BTZAN PO DON GRUB RGYA MTSO, THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO, DPAL LDAN
RGYA MTSO, RGYANG RTZE BLO BZANG RGYA

MTSO NI, 'ON PO YID BZHIN NOR BU ZER BA'I 'DI KA'I GRONG MI CIG
DBUS SU SONG, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG

CHOS RGYAN LA RANG DGON DU SRAD RGYUD LCAGS MKHAR 'DZUGS MKHAN
GYI BLA MA ZHIG DGOS TSUL ZHUS PAR 'DI PA GNANG

STE LCAGS MKHAR DANG LHA MO'I LAS TSOGS SOGS SNGAGS PHYOGS KYI
SKOR 'GA' BTZUGS, NGAG DBANG BZANG PO,

PHUN TSOGS RGYA MTSO, BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO, BKRA SHIS DON GRUB,
RJE NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN

LAS; BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHREL RJE NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS RGYA MTSO,
SMIN GROL BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA

MTSO CHU BYI LOR BZHUGS, BYAMS SKU BZHENGS, 'PHRIN LAS DAR
RGYAS, RJE NGAG DBANG 'JAM DPAL

BSTAN 'DZIN, RGYA LDOG BLA MA LHA RAMS PA BSAM GTAN BZANG PO,
'DI LA SKYE RGYUD YOD, YANG 'PHRIN

LAS DAR RGYAS, BLO BZANG BSAM 'GRUB, NGAG DBANG RAB RGYAS,
'PHRIN LAS BSTAN 'DZIN, BLO

BZANG TSUL KHRIMS, 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO, RJE NGAG DBANG THUB
BSTAN YAR 'PHEL, 'PHYOR RTZANG SLOB

CHUNG NGAG DBANG DAR RGYAS, BLO BZANG SKAL BZANG, NGAG DBANG
BSTAN 'DZIN, ` B'A ZA KHRI RGAN BLO

BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS, 'DI LA KLONG RDOL BLA MAS MDO SMAD
DU SONG STE CHOS BSGRUB TSUL THAMS CAD

THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE LA ZHUS NAS KHONG GIS GANG GSUNG BZHIN
BYAS NA PHUGS SU LEGS PA ZHIG 'BYUNG ZHES GSUNGS

PA BZHIN RJE DE NYID KYI ZHABS BSTEN, MDO SNGAGS KYI GSAN PA
SPYI DANG, RNAL 'BYOR MA'I CHOS SKOR YONG SA@122	(TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RDZOGS GSAN TE NYAMS BZHES LA GCIG TU 'GRUS, RNAM THAR DPON SLOB
GSER KHANG PAS MDZAD PA YOD SNANG,

DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG LUNG RTOGS 'PHRIN LAS CHOS 'PHEL CHU
SBRUL LO BA DA LTA BZHUGS, CHU BZANG NGAG DBANG

THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG YANG B'A ZA KHRI RGAN DON YOD RDO RJE,
NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS, ` KO RTZA ZHABS

DRUNG SKAL BZANG MCHOG GRUB, 'DI PAS SPYIR BLA MA MANG PO DANG,
KHYAD PAR BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU KUN MKHYEN

YAB SRAS THAMS CAD KYI ZHABS LA GTUGS TE GDAMS NGAG LA ZHUN THAR
BCAD PAS DPON SLOB GSER KHANG PAS

KYANG LAS BZHI DANG, BCU CHA'I SBYIN SREG GI KHRID, BSNYEN SGRUB
KYI RIM PA MANG PO GSAN ZHING PHYAG LEN DU

BSTAR PAR THOS, DE'I SPRUL SKU BSTAN 'DZIN MCHOG GRUB NYI MA
SHING LUG LO BA, 'DAN MA TSANG LAS RAB

BYUNG DANG, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, CHOS KYI RGYA
MTSO, SKAL BZANG DNGOS GRUB, 'JAM

DBYANGS BZANG PO, SLAR YANG B'A ZA KHRI RGAN, YANG KO RTZA SKAL
BZANG MCHOG GRUB, NGAG DBANG BSTAN

'DZIN; SEMS NYID LHA RAMS PA BLO BZANG 'OD ZER, RDO RAMS PA BLO
BZANG DAR RGYAS RGYA MTSO, TZAG

GRA BLO BZANG LEGS BSHAD NYI MA, HOR BLA MA BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN
'DZIN, SMIN GROL 'JAM DPAL CHOS KYI

BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS, ` SPOS KHANG ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG CHOS
KYI RGYA MTSO DON BZHI PA LCAGS PHAG LA

GSHEGS; 'DI'I GONG MA TSUL KHRIMS BRGYAG PA YIN, KHONG DANG, NAG
KHO DGE BSHES DON YOD BSTAN

'DZIN; DPA' RE RIN CHEN SOGS DUS THOG DER DGE BSHES GRAGS CHE,
TSUL KHRIMS BRGYAG PA LA THUGS

NGAR GYI RNAM PA CHE, SDE GZHUNG MI DRAG BZOD PA BRGYAG PAS NGA
BZOD PA BRGYAG PA, KHYOD TSUL KHRIMS BRGYAG PA,

NGED GNYIS BOD KYI BRGYAG PA GNYIS YIN ZHES KU RE BYAS PAR, NGED
GNYIS MI 'DRA, NGA TSUL KHRIMS BRGYAG

PA YON TAN GYIS BRGYAG KHYOD BZOD PA BRGYAG PA PHYIS SA BRGYAG
BYAS PAS GSER KHRI MA BYUNG ZER, SPOS

KHANG MKHAN PO BYUNG, THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE'I THUGS BZHED BZHIN
DGE RGAN LA KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED ZHABS

PHAR PHYIN STON MO MA BRGAL YANG BSKO DGOS BYUNG BAS, KHONG GI
BZHED PA MA GRUB PAR GSAR BA TSOS GSAR BA

TSO'I DGE RGAN BYED GIN SNANG ZHES SMRAS SKAD, NGAG DBANG BSTAN
'DZIN, YANG TZAG GRA SLOB CHUNG SKU SKYE BLO

BZANG LEGS BSHAD NYI MA, SHIN 'BYUNG ZHABS DRUNG SKAL BZANG
DNGOS GRUB, 'DI GNYIS LA SKYE RGYUD YOD,

SEMS NYID CHOS MDZAD RNAM SNANG RDO RJE, BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN
RAB RGYAS KYI BAR BZHUGS TE GDAN SA BSKYANGS,

RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SHING SPREL LA CHOS SDE BTAB NAS SA BYA
YAN LO NYIS BRGYA DANG DRUG SONG, RI KHROD KYANG

YOD; GNAS BDAG BRAG DKAR, 'DI LA JO BO PHYING DKAR PA GNAS
SHING, KA DROD MCHED DGU

SOGS DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA MANG, GANGS RI DANG SNGAR SENG GE YOD
ZER, BKA' GDAMS GLEGS BAM

LAS; DE YI GZHUNG LA 'JUG NGOGS YOD, ,DANG, TOG LA RIN CHEN 'BAR
BA YOD, ,CES PA'I

TOG 'DI DANG, 'JUG NGOGS 'JU LAG LA NGOS 'DZIN SNANG, TZA RI'I
GNAS LHAG DGON PA'I BYANG

SHAR NGOS SU BDE MCHOG BLA MTSO AE WAm GYI DBYIBS CAN, GZHAN BDE
MCHOG DKAR PO, MGON PO, LHA

@123	(TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MO; CHOS RGYAL BLA MTSO DMAR PO GRU GSUM STE MTSO LNGA, MTSO
RTA'I CHU DGON PA'I GZHUNG DU 'BAB, STONG

'KHOR MDO RGYUD RGYA MTSOS BDE MCHOG DANG LHA MO'I BLA MTSO NGOS
BZUNG, GNAS SGO PHYE, BRAG LA ZHABS RJES

BZHAG GANG ZHIG YID LA DRAN PA TZAM GYIS KYANG, ,MCHOG DANG THUN
MONG DNGOS GRUB MA LUS PA, ,

STZOL MDZAD NYER BZHI'I CHA SHAS GA-YU MTSO LA, ,BDAG CAG LUS
NGAG YID GSUM GUS PAS 'DUD, ,CES

PA MTSO MJAL PA RNAMS LA 'DON RGYUR LJAGS RTZOM GNANG, KUN
MKHYEN MCHOG DANG THU'U BKVAN GONG MA GNYIS

KYANG PHEBS, GNAS SGO BRAG RI SUM RIM GYI DBYIBS SU YOD PA'I
PHYI SGO DPA' BO STAG BAR BA GA-YU 'BRUG

NANG MA MKHA' 'GRO SRIN MOS BSRUNG BA'I SGO BAR MA LA RIGS GSUM
MGON PO'I GZUNGS RANG BYON, PHYI MA LA

GE SER GYIS GRO KHRAB MANG PO GTER DU SBAS ZER, BRAG LA RMOG
DANG MDA'I RJES, ZHABS RJES, SGO KHYI'I

RJES RNAMS GSAL, 'BRUG MOS BRAG LA RI MO BRIS PA'I MIG MANG DANG
YI GE RNAM PA MANG BAS 'BRU GU THOGS YANG

ZER; KA DROD GNAS BSHAD SPOS KHANG ZHABS DRUNG CHOS DBANG RGYA
MTSOS BSGRIGS PA YOD, SMAD KYI CHAR MTSO

GOR DBEN GNAS BDE CHEN GSANG RDZONG, 'DIR B'A ZA KHRI RGAN
BZHUGS, ` MCHOD RTEN THANG NI, RJE

MDO RGYUD RGYA MTSO GDAN DRANGS, DGON PA 'DEBS PAR ZHUS PA ZHAL
GYIS BZHES, MCHOD GZHIS TSO GSUM

GYIS RANG RANG GI SAR 'DEBS RGYU'I 'DOD DBANG BZUNG BAR, RJE
NYID NAS SA BKRA LEGS PA ZHIG BTZAL DGOS

GSUNGS TE MCHOD RTEN THANG DU PHEBS RGYU BYAS, SNGON KARMA ROL
PA'I RDO RJE LANG JUS SU PHEBS SKABS 'JU LAG

CHU 'GRAM DU KLU GDUG PA CAN ZHIG GNAS PA DAM LA BTAGS PA'I DAM
RTAGS SU MCHOD RTEN BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD

BZHENGS PAS MCHOD RTEN THANG DU THOGS, MCHOD RTEN BZHENGS PA'I
SHUL DENG SANG YANG YOD, PRA SGOM GYIS

'JU BTUL SKABS DAM LA BTAGS ZER BA'ANG SNANG, 'DI DANG NYE BAR
KLU BDUD MGO DGU PA'I GNAS RBA KLONG

'KHYIL PA'I CHU MIG YOD, GNAS 'DI'I PHUR 'DAN MA GRUB CHEN GYI
ZHAL SLOB RI KHROD PA KHA SHAS YOD PA'I STENG DU

RGYA TIG DOB TSANG, SNGO KHO GSUM GYI GRVA BA RNAMS BSDUS NAS
RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I ME PHAG LOR BTAB,

TSOGS 'DON SKOR DANG 'GRIG LAM ZHAL BKOD GNANG, 'DAN RNAM DU RJE
DE NYID KYIS DGON PA'I RMANG BTING

BA STONG 'KHOR SPRUL SKUR PHUL ZHES BSHAD, LNGA PA CHEN POS BKRA
SHIS DAR RGYAS GLING ZHES PA'I MTSAN BSTZAL,

PAn CHEN CHOS RGYAN GYI GSUNG LTAR TSANGS PA SRUNG MAR BSTEN,
SUM PA'I CHOS 'BYUNG DU BDE RGU SGOM PA ZHIG

BSDAD PA'I GZHI'I STENG DU RJE MDO RGYUD RGYA MTSOS DAR BAR BYAS
ZHES 'BYUNG, DE RJES 'DAN MA GRUB CHEN LA ZHUS

TE MTSAN NYID TSUGS, 'GRIG LAM BKRA SHIS SGO MANG LTAR LA YUL
DUS DANG BSTUN PA'I BKOD KHYAB MDZAD,

DBU PHAR, 'DUL MDZOD BSDUS GRVA BCAS KYI BRTZI BZHAG BTANG, RJE
DE NYID KYI PHYAG BZHES MDZAD SROL GYI

DBANG GIS SDE 'DI 'DUL KHRIMS LA GCES SPRAS CHE ZHING 'DOD CHUNG
CHOG SHES LTA GRUB GTZANG BA'I MIG LTAS DUS PHYIS

BAR YOD, DGON 'DI RANG NAS SLOB GNYER BYAS PAS MKHAS BTZUN BZANG
'DZOMS CHES MANG ZHING DBUS GTZANG

SOGS GRVA SA GZHAN NAS KYANG DGE BSHES THON PA MANG, STONG SKOR
LNGA PA RJE NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS

@124	(TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

ZHAL BDAG MDZAD, BCA' YIG BZHAG 'CHAD NYAN GONG 'PHEL GYI THABS
TSUL LHUR BZHES, LONGS

SPYOD BKREN PA LA DZAM DKAR GTER SGRUB MDZAD PAS DENG SANG YANG
GRVA RKYANG RNAMS CHA RKYEN GYIS MI PHONGS ZER,

LAM RIM, BSKYED RDZOGS, LCAGS MKHAR SOGS KYI KHRID, RDO RJE
'PHRENG BA SOGS SPYI DANG ZUR BKA'I

DBANG MANG DU GNANG, 'JIG RTEN GYI SPROS PA CHUNG PAS BZHUGS
'DUN CHE BA BZHIN RGYUN BZHUGS MDZAD,

CHU STAG BCU PA'I MAR NGOR NYID NAS RDO RJE SLOB DPON GNANG STE
DBEN SA LUGS KYI LCAGS MKHAR ZUR BCU DRUG PA

'CHAM BCAS TSUGS, NYER DGU'I NYIN GTOR RGYAG MDZAD PAR 'BRUG
SGRA DRAG PO DANG THOGS RGYUG PA SOGS KYI

LTAS BYUNG, RIM GRO GZHAN YANG MANG DU BSGRUBS PAS CHU YOS DUS
'KHRUGS SKABS DMAG CHEN DGON PAR

SLEBS KYANG SKYON MA BYUNG BA THUGS RJE'I MTHUR GLENG, ZI LING
DPON POS BTZON DU BCUG PAR RDZU 'PHRUL GYIS

THAR; GSAR RNYING GNYIS KA'I PHYOGS LA GSAN PA RGYA CHE ZHING
GRUB MTHA' RIS MED LTA BUR SNANG NA'ANG SDE 'DIR

RIM GROR YANG RNYING BON GYIS CHO GA BYAS MI CHOG PA BCA' YIG TU
BKOD, CHOS SKYONG LA GTAD GNYER GNANG BAS

DENG SANG YANG DE 'DRA BYED MKHAN BYUNG NA MI SHIS PA DNGOS SU
'BYUNG, RJE DRUG PA 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN 'DZIN

RGYA MTSOS KYANG CHOS RGYAL PHYI SGRUB KYI GTOR CHEN SHIN TU
GNYAN CHA CAN BTZUGS PA'I RGYUN DA LTA GNAS, ` RGYUD

SMAD DGE BSHES SNGO KHO CHOS RJE GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO'I SKU SKYE
SNGO KHO SLOB ZUR NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN NI, RJE BSOD

RNAMS RGYA MTSO'I THUGS ZIN GYI SLOB MA, DE NYID KYI GSUNG BSHAD
'JIGS BYED BSKYED RIM ZIN BRIS KYANG YOD,

PHYAG DPE MANG DU BSGRIGS, SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN DANG BKA' BSTAN
BZHENGS, DBUS SU PHEBS NAS

DAM PA 'GA' ZHIG LAS CHOS BKA' CI RIGS GSAN, SKU YON DANG NYAMS
LEN 'GRAN ZLA MED, DGON

'DIR YANG SKU DRIN CHE BA'I TSAD DU BRTZI, SKU 'DA' SKABS HIG GI
SGRA DRAG PO THON PA DANG GZIMS MAL NAS SKU

'PHAR BA BCAS ZHAL DBUGS MI MNGON PAR GYUR CES RAB RGAN 'JAM
DBYANGS GSUNGS, DGUNG LO DON

GRANGS BZHUGS, ` SNGO KHO BLA MA DAM CHOS DGON 'DI'I DGE BSHES,
SKYED TSAL 'DUL BA LUNG RIGS GTER

MDZOD CHA TSANG THUGS LA YOD, PHYAG RDOR YI DAM DU BSTEN, SNGAGS
NUS CHE BAS NA BZA', DBU SKRA,

BZHES 'PHRO SOGS STENG GRIB KYI GNOD PA LA PHAN, RGYUN DU RTZA
'JUG MNGON RTOGS RGYAN SOGS ZHAL 'DON DANG,

GZHUNG LAS PA LO DGU MDZAD, KHRIR PHEBS NAS MTHO DMAN SU LA YANG
NGO DGA' ZOL 'JOG MI MDZAD PAR 'GRIG

LAM SHIN TU DAM, MI TSOS KLOG TU NGAN LAB GANG BYAS MKHYEN CING
DE RIGS ZUR BTON NAS TSOGS GTAM LA

BTANG BAS 'CHUN CHE BA BYUNG, DGUNG LO DON GRANGS BZHUGS, NYIN
ZHIG SKU BSNYUN GYI RNAM PA CUNG ZAD MED PAR

GRVA BA 'GA' BOS NAS ZHAL CHEMS LTA BU MANG DU GNANG, THAMS CAD
KYIS RLUNG KHAMS YIN SNYAM SKU MDUN DU BCAR

NAS BSRUNG, NYIN GNYIS PA'I MTSAN MO THO RANGS KHAR CHOS GOS
GYON DGOS GSUNGS PAR SNGAR LTAR SNANG BRTAGS

MA BYAS KYANG SKU CHOS MNABS 'PHRAL THUGS DAM GYIS GSHEGS, GDUNG
ZHUGS 'BUL BYAS PAR RING BSREL MANG DU

BYON; ` DOB TSANG DPON SLOB NGAG DBANG NYI MA DBUS KYI DGE
BSHES, CHU YOS DUS 'KHRUGS SKABS GRVA TSANG SPYI

@125	(TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GNYER GNANG, DMAG CHEN DGON PAR BABS PA THABS MKHAS KYI MDZAD
SGO LEGS PAS PHYIR SLOG DGON

PA'I NYE 'DABS RGYA THANG DU DMAG SGAR BTAB, 'DI THAD 'JU LAG
PHAR KHA'I KHYA ZI ZER BA'I NAGS KHROD DU LCANG

SKYA MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE DGUNG LO BRGYAD PA DMAG BYOL GYIS
BZHUGS PA RGYAS SHES NAS SPRUL SKU MI SPROD NA DGON PA

GTOR RGYU YIN CES BSDIGS PAR, RJE 'DI DANG SER SKYA DRAG RIGS
GROS BSTUN GYIS SPRUL PA'I SKU NYID LA ZHUS

TE THUGS THAG BCAD PA LTAR PHEBS RGYU BYAS, 'DI SKABS DMAG SGAR
DU SER MO PA ZHIG SONG PHYIN MGO 'BREG NGES

LTA BUR YOD CING, LHAG PAR DGON LUNG NAG YIG TU THEBS PA BCAS
LCANG SKYA BLA BRANG PA RNAMS 'GRO MA NUS

PAR; RJE 'DIS MCHOG SPRUL NYID RGYAB TU KHUR, SNGO KHO GZUNGS
RGYAL BYAMS DANG DPON GA-YOG GSUM DMAG

THOG TU BYON PA'I LAM KHAR, 'DI PAS DE RING NGED CAG LA CI YONG
MI SHES, 'ON KYANG RJE NYID LA SKYON MA BYUNG

NA NGED GNYIS BSAD KYANG THUGS LA BZUNG BAS 'THUS ZHUS PAR, DA
LAN SU LA YANG SKYON MED, NGED RGYA NAG

TU 'GRO, KHYED RJES SOR DER SHOG GSUNGS, DA RES SKYON MA BYUNG
NA, NGED RGYA NAG TU MI 'GRO BYAS PAR

AA HA DE BDEN, KHYOD 'DI NAS SGOM SDE BYED RGYU YIN 'DUG GSUNGS
PA PHYIS SU BLA MA BYED RGYU'I LUNG BSTAN DU GLENG,

SNGO KHO DOB TSANG GNYIS SKU BDAG YIN KHUL GYIS T'A ZHIN LA NGO
SPROD BYAS, 'DI RNAM THAR DU GSUNG TSUL DANG CUNG

MI MTHUN, SPRUL PA'I SKU NYID KYI GSUNG GI ZUR RE RES DPON CHEN
RNAMS KYI SPOB PA RMEG MED DU BCOM PAS THAMS

CAD HA LAS, RGYA NAG NAS PHYIR PHEBS SKABS RJE 'DI PA CHED GNYER
GYIS MJAL BAR BYON, DNGOS 'BUL

PHUL TE SKYABS 'JUG ZHUS PAR, NYID NAS NGED KYI DON DU SROG LA
MA LTOS PAR DKA' LAS MYONG BA SEMS NA YOD

TSUL DANG, CHO LO GNANG RTZIS MDZAD PA DGOS MED DU DGONGS DANG
DU MA BLANG, DES NA RTEN SKAL ZHIG GAL

CHE ZHUS PAR LCANG SKYA GONG MA'I THUGS DAM RTEN RGYAL SRAS BLO
BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN PA'I ZHAL THANG GIS GTZOS,

RTA PHRUGS GOS SOGS KYI GNANG SBYIN DANG 'PHRAL PHUGS KYI GSUNG
GLENG NANG SBYAR BSTZAL PAS LHAG PAR MGU ,DGUNG

LO GYA GRANGS BZHUGS, ` BDE RGU DAR RGYAS RGYA MTSO DBUS SU
PHEBS, SGO MANG DU THUGS GNYER GNANG,

DPON SLOB BYAMS PA'I DNGOS SLOB, LAM RIM LA BSHAD SGRUB GNYIS
KA'I SGO NAS MYONG BA THON, MDO SMAD

DU BYON NAS NYAMS LEN 'BA' ZHIG MDZAD BZHED KYANG NYID LA BLA
MA'I 'OS BAB CHE ZHING MI RTZA RNAMS 'DOD DBANG

BTZAN PAS KHRI KHUR BZHES DGOS BYUNG, BYAMS KHANG CHEN MO ZHIG
GSOS MDZAD, CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM BTZUGS,

LAM KHRID KYI SGO NAS GDUL BYA BSKYANGS PAS NYAMS LEN PA MANG DU
'PHEL, PHYOGS PHEBS LA YANG PHU DUNG MI

BZHES PA SOGS 'DUL BA'I KUN SPYOD SHIN TU DAG DGON LUNG GI KHRIR
YANG BZHUGS, ` RJE MDO RGYUD RGYA

MTSO'I DNGOS SLOB SNGO KHO KHRI RGAN GYI SPRUL SKU BSOD NAMS
DPAL BZANG, 'DI LA ZUR BA RGYA KO YANG ZER,

GNAS BRTAN BA KU LA'I RNAM 'PHRUL DU GRAGS, GRVA SAR MA PHEBS
SHING MTHUN SNANG DU SKU YON GYI RNAM PA MI STON

KYANG MNGON SHES THOGS PA MED, 'GA' RES PHYAG MO ZHUS NA SKABS
SU MA 'BREL BA DU MA GSUNG BAS 'PHRAL DU

BZHAD GAD 'BYUNG YANG RJES SOR THOG TU 'BAB NGES KYI NGO MTSAR
BA YOD, RJE THU'U BKVAN ZHABS DANG, SHING

@126	(TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

ZA DPON SLOB SOGS KYIS PHYAG MO ZHU BA GNANG, GANG GSUNG 'GRUB
PA'I BDEN TSIG CAN ZHIG TU SNANG,

GYA GSUM PA LA GSHEGS, GDUNG ZHUGS 'BUL SKABS SPUR KHANG STENG
DU 'JA' TSON ZLUM PO SHAR BA THAMS CAD

KYIS MTHONG, ` RGYA TIG DPON SLOB NGAG DBANG CHOS LDAN RGYA
MTSO'AM DKON MCHOG YAR 'PHEL BA, STONG SKOR

RIN PO CHE DANG MNYAM DU BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS, THUGS GNYER
GNANG, KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED

ZHABS; BKA' 'GYUR BA 'JIGS MED RAB RGYAS SOGS BSTEN NAS GSAN PA
RGYA CHE, KHRIR BZHUGS NAS

'CHAD NYAN DMAR ZHING, DGE BSHES RNAMS LA 'PHROS PA DOGS SLONG
GIS DUS 'DA' BA MDZAD PAS SKYED THON,

'GRIG KHRIMS DAM, RGYUN DU 'DOD CHUNG CHOG SHES KYIS SGRUB PA
NYAMS LEN LA GZHOL, 'JU LAG CHU 'GRAM

'DAN RGAN PA'I SGRUB GNAS PHUG RIS RI KHROD DU BZHUGS, SGAR
GZHIS NAS CHA RKYEN TZAM YANG LA MA BLANGS PAR

DKA' SPYAD KYIS NYIN MTSAN KHOR YUG TU 'BAD PAS MA nI DUNG PHYUR
LO GSUM LA GRUB, SKU MCHED DGE SLONG ZHIG

YOD PA SKU CHAS SKYEL BAR SONG, KHYOD SDOD LA MA nI THON GSUNGS,
PAR NYIN SHAS BSDAD, NYIN ZHIG RJE'I SKU

THANG ZHIG BKRAM PA'I STENG NAS 'OD DKAR PO KHONG GI SPYI GTZUG
TU ZUG PA MTHONG, THUN GROL NAS ZHUS PAR,

KHYOD 'KHRUL SNANG YIN 'GRO, GZHAN LA MA BSHAD CES DAM DOG
MDZAD, NYID DANG 'DZIN GRVA GCIG PA RAB

RGAN 'JAM DBYANGS PAS, KHYOD MA nI DUNG PHYUR BSGRUBS PHYIN MDO
SNGAGS KYI 'PHROS PA BYAS NA, DKA'

GNAS RNAMS 'CHAD RTZOD GANG LA YANG SNGAR DANG MI 'DRA BA'I GO
BA ZAB MO ZHIG RNYED 'DUG PA DGE SBYOR GNAD DU

SONG BA'I RTAGS RED CES SNGO KHO SPRUL SKU LA GSUNGS, 'BYUNG
'GYUR MNGON SUM DU GZIGS PAS GANG GSUNG

BSLU BA MED PA SOGS NYAMS RTOGS KLONG DU GYUR, ZAB LUNG RI KHROD
BTAB, GSUNG RTZOM YANG DGE LDAN

LEGS 'GREL, 'JIGS BYED BSKYED RIM RTZOM 'PHRO, MGUR TSAN THOR
BU, KUN MKHYEN BAR MA'I DRUNG

NAS RTEN 'BREL BSTOD PA'I BSHAD LUNG GSAN PA'I ZIN BRIS DANG,
KHA GYA'I DAR RGYAS LAS DMIGS BRTZE MA'I

LAS TSOGS KYI KHRID GSAN PA'I GSUNG BSHAD ZIN BRIS BCAS YOD,
DGUNG LO DON GRANGS BZHUGS, GDUNG

RUS LA DUNG GA-YAS 'KHYIL GYI DBYIBS CHUNG NGU GNYIS BYUNG, `
TSANG NGA DPON SLOB DKON MCHOG RGYA MTSO PA BKRA

SHIS 'KHYIL GYI DGE BSHES, RGYA TIG GONG MA DANG RAB RGAN 'JAM
DBYANGS GSUM 'DZIN GRVA GCIG RIGS

LUNG 'GRAN ZLA MED, MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR
RTZIS LA MKHAS, DUS 'KHOR THUGS NYAMS

SU BZHES, THU'U BKVAN CHAB SHOG TU RGYA TIG GONG MA DANG 'DI PA
GNYIS LA SNGAGS BRJOD CHE, SKU TSE SMAD DU

LO GRANGS BZHI BCU LHAG LA NYIN MTSAN SBREL TE DGE SBYOR 'BA'
ZHIG MDZAD, DBYANGS CAN MA'I ZHAL GZIGS

PAR GRAGS, KHRI KHUR BZHAG NAS KYANG SKU TSE 'KHYONG GI BAR DGON
PA'I SKU DON GTZO BO RNAMS LA ZHAL BKOD

DANG DE BSTUN BSGRUBS PA ZHIG YOD PAS DUS 'KHOR GRVA TSANG TSUGS
THUB PA YANG RJE 'DI'I 'PHRIN LAS SU SNANG,

DGUNG LO DON GRANGS BZHUGS, ` THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE KHRIR
BZHUGS TE DGON LUNG HOR ZHIS DKA' BCU

DANG; SEMS NYID SKU SKYE GNYIS RIM PAR SLOB CHUNG DU BSKOS, PHYI
MA 'DI'I SKYE RGYUD MANG 'DU RI KHROD DU

@127	(TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

YOD; 'DU KHANG GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD, BDE LAM GYI KHRID GNANG, DE

DKAR GNYIS SBRAGS KYI SGRA GSAL ZHING YUN RING BYUNG BA DPON

RGYA DGE BSHES BLO BZANG 'JIGS MED SOGS DGE

PA RAB RGYAS PA DBUS SU PHEBS, BYAMS SNYING

TSANG DPON SLOB NGAG DBANG NYI MA'I SKU

BAR GRAGS, BRGYAD CU PA LA GSHEGS,
