@128	(TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MDUN NAS THOG MAR THAL SKAD BTANG BA LEGS ZHES THUGS DGYES PA'I
GSUNG PHEBS, KUN MKHYEN YAB SRAS,

TSANG NGA DPON SLOB SOGS MKHAS GRUB KYI BLA MA NYI SHU LHAG LAS
CHOS BKA' RGYA CHER GSAN, DUS 'KHOR GRVA TSANG

GSAR TSUGS KYI DANG PO'I GDAN SA PA MDZAD, ` SKYA BO ZHABS DRUNG
NGAG DBANG YON TAN 'PHEL RGYAS, 'DI'I

SNGON DU SKU PHRENG GNYIS TZAM SONG ZHING, DANG PO DGON LUNG DGE
BSHES ZHIG YIN, 'DI PA SKU 'BUM CHOS

GRVAR ZHUGS, THUGS RAB CHE ZHING SKU YON BSLAB SBYANGS LA SHIN
TU 'GRUS, 'DUL BA'I KUN SPYOD RNAM PAR

DAG CING TSOGS BSAGS SGRIB SBYONG GIS MTSAN NYAMS LEN RGYUN
SKYONG MDZAD, DUS 'KHOR KHRIR BZHUGS,

SA CHOG DANG SBYIN SREG TSUGS, ` SNGO KHO BSOD NAMS DPAL BZANG
GI SPRUL SKU 'JAM DPAL BSTAN 'DZIN NYI MA

NI; 'BYUNG 'GYUR GZIGS PA'I SNYAN PA CHE, THUGS RGYUD 'BYONG
ZHING TSUGS THUB PAS GZHAN GYIS GTING

MI DPOG PA ZHIG YIN YANG, SO DGU PA LA GSHEGS, SKYE BRGYUD YOD
ZER, ` RGYA TIG DKON MCHOG

YAR 'PHEL GYI SPRUL SKU 'DI PA CHOS SRID KYI MKHYEN RGYA CHE
ZHING GZHAN PHAN 'BA' ZHIG LA GZHOL BA ZHIG GO ` ,TSANG

NGA DKON MCHOG RGYA MTSO'I SPRUL SKU GDUL BYA NYAM THAG LA BRTZE
BA CHE BA DANG, 'DOD CHUNG CHOG SHES KYIS BYA BTANG

LTA BUR SNANG, ` BDE RGU MKHAN SPRUL YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN KHRIR
BZHUGS PA 'GA' ZHIG GI BYED SPYOD KYIS ZUR

BZHUGS MDZAD, 'DI SKABS DGOS DBANG DU MAS STONG SKOR RIN PO CHE
PE CING DU BZHUGS PA LA ZHUS TE MTSAN

GYIS KHRI BYIN GYIS BRLABS, SKYA BO DPON SLOB SLOB CHUNG DU
BSKOS, ` THUR CHEN DGON PA'I GRVA BA, BKRA

SHIS 'KHYIL GYI DGE BSHES MA nI BLA MA ZHES GZHAN PHAN CHE BA
BSHAD SGRUB CHOS RGYA MTSO KHRIR BZHUGS, ` BKRA SHIS

CHOS GLING PHUR RTZA LHA RAMS PA'I SPRUL SKU KHRIR BZHUGS PA
ZHAG SHAS NAS GSHEGS, ` MA KHYE DPON SLOB SLAR YANG

BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS BZHENGS PA'I DUS

GSUM SANGS RGYAS KYI LHA KHANG, 'DI GSAR BZHENGS SKABS AA TZA RA
'GAS RTEN SNA MANG PO RJE NYID LA PHUL BA

NANG BZHUGS MDZAD, 'DI DANG MNYAM DU KHAMS STONG 'KHOR, ZI LING
STONG 'KHOR DU LHA KHANG 'DRA MTSUNGS

GSUM BZHENGS, RAB GNAS 'DI NAS GNANG BAR KHAMS STONG 'KHOR GYI
LHA KHANG DU PHYAG NAS BABS ZHES RJE

GSER KHANG PA GSUNG, NAD GZHI CHEN POS BTAB PA RNAMS BSKOR
GRANGS BSAGS NA SANG DRAG TU 'GRO BA MYONG

BAS GRUB, RJE DE NYID KYIS MAN NGAG LTAR BZHENGS PA'I CHOS RGYAL
NANG SGRUB KYI ZHAL THANG RNGAM BRJID CAN,

MGON PO ME THUB MA, LHA MO 'GANG CAN, 'DU KHANG DU RJE MDO RGYUD
RGYA MTSOS RAB GNAS MDZAD PA'I TSE DPAG

MED; BKA' 'GYUR TSAR GSUM, BSTAN 'GYUR TSAR GCIG BCAS SKU GSUNG
THUGS RTEN CHE GRAS DKAR

CHAG CAN MANG, BYAMS KHANG CHEN MOR RJE MDO RGYUD RGYA MTSO'I
'DRA SKU, 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA

RGYA MTSO'I SKYE RGYUD BDE RGU SGAR PHUN TSOGS

MNGON DGA', RGYA TIG SGAR BA, SNGO KHO NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN
BZANG PO SOGS KYI SKYE BRGYUD ,SNGO KHO SGAR KHAG

BKA' 'GYUR TSAR GNYIS, BSTAN

@129	(TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

'GYUR TSAR GCIG BCAS PHYAG DPE DANG RTEN GSUM MTHA' YAS PA
BZHUGS, MCHOD GZHIS SNGO KHO, 'JU

LAG PA STOB TSANG CHU RGYUD PA DANG BYANG NGOS JAG RUNG BA SOGS
MANG, RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I ME PHAG LA

CHOS SDE BTAB NAS LO NYIS BRGYA DANG GSUM PA SA BYA 'DI'O, `
,SNGON MDO RGYUD RGYA MTSOS DUG CHU ZHIG BDUD RTZI'I

MING BTAGS PA NAS CHU DE KHRAG MKHRIS KYI NAD LA SHIN TU PHAN
PA'I SMAN CHU YOD PA'I SMAN THANG, GZHAN YANG PHYOGS

'DIR SMAN CHU RIGS MI 'DRA BA MANG BAR SNANG NGO, ` DGON LUNG
RGYA ZHVA RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO GROS KYIS BTAB PA RGYA

ZHVA DGON DGA' LDAN DAR RGYAS GLING NGAM SER RTZUD DGON, 'DI CHU
LUNG DGON DANG GCIG CING L'U KY'A BLA MA

SHES RAB NYI MAS BTAB KYANG ZER, SNGAR SEMS NYID DGON KYANG 'DI
DANG NYE BAR YOD PAS RNAM THAR 'GA'

ZHIG TU SER RTZUD DGA' LDAN RAB RGYAS GLING ZHES 'BYUNG BA 'DI
GNYIS GANG RUNG NGAM NGO MA 'PHROD, ` DMAR ZHI

RI KHROD NI SHES RAB NYI MA'I SKU SKYE SHES RAB RDO RJES BTAB, `
TE THUNG DGON CHEN THOS BSAM DAR RGYAS GLING NI L'U

KY'A BLA MA SHES RAB NYI MAS SA LUG LA BTAB ZER SNANG, SNGAR SA
SKYA DANG, KARMA'I SKYES BU DAM PA MANG DU BYON,

DE DAG GS GNANG BA'I RTEN GSUM MA MANG, STAG LUNG BLO BZANG NYI
MAS KYANG KHRI MDZAD, L'U KY'A ZHABS DRUNG DANG,

DE'I SPUN ZLA DPON PO THO SI SOGS LO'U SHI BAN YONGS RDZOGS KYIS
KUN GROL GONG MA KHRIR GDAN DRANGS, KHONG

GIS DGON PAR BCA' YIG BZHAG SKYABS MGON BAR MA YAR LUNG DGON DU
PHEBS SKABS 'DI NAS 'JIGS

BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I DBANG SOGS CHOS BKA' RGYA CHER BSTZAL,
BSNYEN RDZOGS BRGYA DANG SO GCIG RAB

BYUNG DGE TSUL CHES MANG BA BSGRUB PAR GSUNGS PAS GRVA 'TSOGS
RGYAS 'DRA, DA LTA YANG RGYUD GRVA TSANG GNYIS KAR

MDO SNGAGS KYI 'CHAD NYAN SKYONG BZHIN PAR YOD, ` TE THUNG BRAG
DGON NI, SNGAR SA PAn YAB SRAS KYIS RI

BO RTZE LNGA DANG BYIN RLABS MNYAM PAR BSNGAGS SHING SA SKYA'I
SGRUB SDE MCHOG DGA' GLING CHAGS, RGYA NAG TAS MING

GI DUS SA SKYA PA CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DANG, DGE LUGS BLA MA KLU
'BUM BSAM GTAN SENG GE GNYIS DPON KLU

SKYABS DANG MCHOD YON BYAS, RGYA BOD HOR GSUM GYI SBYIN BDAG
RNAMS KYIS RGYU RKYEN SBYAR TE DBUS RIR BYAMS

SKU RANG BYON LNGA LDAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUM, LHO RIR SANGS RGYAS 'OD
SRUNG DANG, STON PA THUB PA'I DBANG PO'I

'PHEL GDUNG NANG BZHUGS KYI THUB PA MCHOG ZUNG BCAS, LOGS RIS LA
GNAS BRTAN BCU DRUG NUB

RIR KUN BZANG GTZO 'KHOR, BYANG RIR RI BO GRU 'DZIN GYI RTEN SNA
LAS BZHENGS PA'I GRU 'DZIN SPYAN RAS GZIGS

DANG 'DRA MTSUNGS, DE NYID BZHENGS SKABS GRU 'DZIN PHYOGS NAS NE
TZO DKAR BO YID 'PHROG PA CIG 'ONG NAS

DNGOS SU THIBS PA'I BYIN CAN GTZO 'KHOR LNGA, SHAR RIR RI BO
RTZE LNGA'I RTEN 'DAM LAS BSKRUN PA'I 'JAM DBYANGS

SMRA SENG GTZO 'KHOR GSUM, LDEBS BRIS SU DVANGS BSIL GYI ZHING
BKOD YOD PA BCAS LHA KHANG LNGA BZHENGS,

SKU BRNYAN DE DAG GI NANG DU BOD DANG RGYA GAR NAG GI GNAS CHEN
DU MA'I RTEN SNA, SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS MANG

PO'I RING BSREL, MKHAS GRUB TSAD LDAN DU MA'I NA BZA' SOGS
BGRANG LAS 'DAS PA BZHUGS, KLU 'BUM

PA RJE BSAM GTAN SENG GES GNAS DER BDE MCHOG SGRUB PHUG TU SGRUB
PA YUN RING MDZAD PAS TSE LHA DANG MKHA'

@130	(TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

'GROS ZHAL GZIGS TE LUNG BSTAN PA BZHIN SGRUB SDE MCHOG DGA'
GLING GNAS SPOS TE LHA KHANG DANG GRVA KHANG PHIGS

NAS RI KHROD BZUNG, DGE 'DUN SUM BCU LHAG BYUNG, LHA KHANG DU
RNAM 'DREN 'OD SRUNG DANG BDAG CAG GI

STON PA SOGS SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS MANG PO'I 'PHEL GDUNG, RGYA
GAR PAn GRUB, JO 'BROM YAB SRAS,

SA CHEN GONG MA GNYIS, SA PAn KHU DBON, MAR MI RAS CHUNG, 'JAM
DBYANGS GTZANG BA BDUN BRGYUD

SOGS SKYE CHEN DU MA'I SKU GDUNG DANG SKU BAL GYI RING BSREL
GYIS GTAMS PA'I RJE YAB SRAS GSUM, 'JIGS BYED

DPA' CIG 'JAM DPAL GZHON NUR GYUR BA, MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA, LHA
MO PHYAG BZHI MA, CHOS

RGYAL YAB YUM SOGS MTHA' YAS PA SNANG, SUM PAS GTZANG BA RGYUD
PA ZHIG GIS BTAB CES BSHAD, KUN

MKHYEN 'JIGS MED ZHABS KYIS DGE 'PHEL RI KHROD PA RGAN GYA'I SKU
SKYE 'DIR MNGAGS, NYIN GUNG BAR DU THUN

MI GROL BAS THAMS CAD DAD GUS CHE, SHON H'A ZI SOGS RGYA DGON
KHA SHAS, L'U KY'A SHES RAB NYI MA'I MTSAMS

KHANG; DER JIGS BYED BYIN CAN LO RGYUS CAN, MCHOD RTEN BRGYA
RTZA BRGYAD DU GRAGS PA'I MCHOD RTEN LHA

KHANG; ` TA'I THUNG MKHAR NANG DU RDO RJE 'CHANG GI LHA KHANG,
'DI'I NANG RTEN GYI LO RGYUS NI, GRUB CHEN TE

LO BA LA RDO RJE 'CHANG GI ZHAL GZIGS, DZHI KshIm GYI SKU BRNYAN
BZHENGS PA'I MTSAN MA BRNYES KYANG SGRUB DKA' BAR

DGONGS PA NA, DZHEE KshIm LAS GRUB PA'I RDO RJE 'CHANG GI SKU
BRNYAN MTHO GANG BA ZHIG NAM MKHA' NAS BABS PA RTEN DU

BZHES; NGA NI KHYOD KYI RTEN SKAL LO, ,MTHA' NI GDONG DMAR YUL
DU 'GRO, ,ZHES SOGS GSUNG LAN DU MAR

BYON; KHONG GIS N'A RO BA LA GNANG, RJE MAR BAS N'A RO BA'I SKU
GDUNG DANG RUS RGYAN RNAMS SPYAN 'DREN SKABS NGA

YANG 'GRO GSUNGS NAS BYON PA BRO BO LUNG DU BZHUGS, DE NAS 'PHAN
N'A LEN DRA GDUNG CHOS RJE BCO BRGYAD PA'I

PHYAG TU BYUNG BA HOR CHA HAR RGYAL POS BOD KHAMS LA DBANG
BSGYUR SKABS SKU BRNYAN 'DI DANG, N'A RO BA'I SKU GDUNG

SOGS GDAN DRANGS PA'I RJES SU BOD KYI LHA 'DRE RNAMS 'BRANGS
PA'I CHOS 'PHRUL GYIS RTEN RNAMS KHU KHUR THU'I LA'I

PHAR NGOS GANGS NANG DU SBAS, N'A RO BA'I GDUNG DA LTA DER
BZHUGS SHING, SKU BRNYAN 'DI RDZU 'PHRUL GYIS

GNAS 'DIR BYON, MI ZHIG GIS MTHONG NAS DPON KLU SKYABS LA BSHAD,
DES RANG KHYIM DU GDAN 'DREN

PAR BRTZAMS KYANG THABS GANG GIS MA NUS, 'DIR LHA KHANG CHUNG
NGU ZHIG GYIS ZHES GSUNG BYON, LHA KHANG

BZHENGS NAS MCHOD BKUR BGYIS, MI RABS 'GA' SOG MTSAMS BLA MA LHO
SDINGS PA BYA BAS LHA KHANG RGYA BSKYED,

DA LTA'I RDO RJE 'CHANG GI SKU 'DI NYID BZHENGS, SKU BRNYAN SNGA
MA GZUNGS GZHUG TU PHUL, GZHAN YANG YE

SHES PA DNGOS SU ZHUGS PA'I CHOS RGYAL GYI SMAN SKU SOGS BRIS
'BUR GYI SKU BRNYAN DU MA, DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS

KYI BLUG SKU SNGON GRO TSANG NAS GDAN 'DREN SKABS RJES SU PHYUGS
'BRANGS PA DANG, GSUNG BYON PA'I LO RGYUS CAN,

DNGUL GYI BKA' 'GYUR, BSTAN 'GYUR MTSAL BRIS, LHA KHANG RGYAB
LOGS KYI MCHOD RTEN CHEN PO GNYIS

SOGS SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG, SNGAR NAS THOS BSAM DAR RGYAS
GLING GI DGE 'DUN PA RNAMS KYIS RDO RJE 'CHANG

GI DUS MCHOD CHEN MO GTONG BZHIN PA LA, ME LUG LOR KUN GROL RIN
PO CHE NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS RGYA MTSOS

@131	(TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SBYIN BDAG GNANG STE CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM GYI PHYAG LEN BTZUGS,
GSUNG CHOS GNANG, GTOR RGYAG MDZAD,

DGE 'DUN STONG PHRAG GCIG DANG LNGA BRGYA 'DUS, ZHVA NAG GI
'CHAM RJE NYID KYIS BSLAB, THO SI DPON PO

KLU RGAN GYIS SHON H'A ZI ZER BA'I DGON PAR GDAN DRANGS, LHA
KHANG DU BLOS BSLANGS GSUM YOD PA'I NANG DU

PHAR 'BYON TSUR 'BYON MDZAD, RGYA MI ZHIG CHUS KHYER BA THUGS
DMIGS TZAM GYIS BTON, 'DI DUS SMON LAM

GYI TSOGS DBU MDZAD SKABS RTEN GYI LO RGYUS SHIG YOD NA LEGS TE
MI 'DUG DGONGS PA NA, TSES GNYIS KYI MTSAN

MOR MGON PO GUR GYI GZIGS SNANG BYUNG, PHYI NUB GZUGS MI MTHONG
BA'I SGRAS RTEN GYI BYUNG TSUL LUNG BSTAN

PA BZHIN DKAR CHAG PAD DKAR LJON BZANG BYA BA LJAGS RTZOM MDZAD
PA'I BAR YANG YOD, DENG SANG YANG L'U KY'A

DPON SLOB SKU PHRENG DANG, DPON KLU SKYABS MCHOD YON GYIS DGON
CHEN DANG ZUNG 'GREL DU SKYONG, SMON

LAM LA DGON SGRUB SDE BZHI'I DGE 'DUN RNAMS MNYAM DU 'TSOGS,
DGON CHEN DANG CHU LUNG DGON PA'I SLOB

GNYER BA RES MONG KYIS SMON LAM GRVA SKOR DANG TSOGS GLENG BYED
PA SOGS LUGS GNYIS KYI YO LANG CHE, ` JAG

RUNG YAR LUNG THUR CHEN DGON DGA' LDAN BYAMS PA GLING NI, RTA
NAG SPRUL SKU KU SHRI BLO BZANG BSTAN PA CHOS KYI

NYI MAS BTAB, SUM PA'I CHOS 'BYUNG DU DGA' LDAN CHOS SDING ZHES
'BYUNG, BAR SKABS SHIG NAS 'DAN

MAS BZUNG ZER YANG RNAM THAR DU MI GSAL, KUN GROL GONG MA DVAGS
PO BLO BZANG RIN CHEN CHOS GRAGS RGYA MTSO

GSER DGON DU PHEBS, CHU BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS GTZOS
TSOGS MANG GIS CHOS 'BREL ZHUS,

DE DUS JAG RUNG DGON RNYING GSER DGON GYI LE LAG YIN PAS GDAN
SA'I SNYAN GSAN PHUL, MGON KHANG DU

SPRUL SKU CHOS DBYINGS RGYA MTSO'I PHYAG BRIS LHA MO'I THANG KA
YOD PA DNGOS SU GZIGS SNANG LA BYUNG BAS ZHAL BZHES

MDZAD; NYID KYI SO DGU PA LCAGS GLANG LOR DER CHIBS BSGYUR, PRA
TI NANG SO, 'BRI GUNG NANG SO,

THANG RID GONG NGA SPRUL SKU, JAG RUNG NANG SOS GTZOS TSO DRUG
SGOM SDE BCU GSUM GYIS BSU BA ZHUS,

RAS GUR CHEN PO AA MNGON MTSAR DU 'DZIN PA DER GDAN DRANGS, 'BUL
BA PHUL, YAS GTAM LA, NGA

TSO DRUG SGOM SDE BCU GSUM TSOD NA YOD DUS, NGA TSO'I SGOM SDE
YA GYAL NANG SO BZANG PO RGYAL MTSAN GYIS RGYAL

DBANG LNGA PA GDAN DRANGS LUGS, RAS GUR CHEN PO 'DI BZOS LUGS,
JAG RUNG PAS KHRI 'BUL BRGYAB

TSUL; NANG SOS BONGS TSOD RNGA MONG DANG MNYAM PA'I RTA DKAR PO
LA, RNA BA'I SPU MDOG GZHAN YIN PA CHA

'GRIG PHUL TSUL SOGS ZHUS, LHA MO LA GSER SKYEMS PHUL BA DNGOS
SU BZHES, BLA MA PHYUG RTZI SLOB CHUNG DU

BSKOS; 'JA' MO DKA' BCUR KHYED LA 'JIGS PA CHEN PO ZHIG YONG
'DUG DE DUS NGA SLEB YONG GSUNGS,

DE NAS LO GSUM PA CU YOS DUS 'KHRUG SKABS DGON RNYING ME LA
BSREGS, DE DUS 'JA' MO DKA' BCU LA RGYAB

RI'I RTZE NAS RJE 'DIS 'BOD PA'I SNANG BA BYUNG STE BROS PAS
THAR, YUNG tING GNAM SKYONG KHRIR BZHUGS LNGA PA ME

LUG LOR BRAG 'GAG TU DGON GSAR THOS BSAM DAR RGYAS GLING BTAB,
GONG MAS DGA' LDAN LEGS TSOGS

GLING DU BSNGAGS, RGYAS SHI MIN ZI ZER, MKHAR GYI DPON POS LOG
SGRUB ZHUS PA THABS MKHAS DANG GRUB@132 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RTAGS KYIS DBANG DU BSDUS, BYAMS SKU THOG TSAD NYE SRAS MI
TSAD LHAG TZAM GYIS BSKOR BA BZHENGS, GONG

MA'I MDZOD KYI BKA' BSTAN GNYIS GDAN DRANGS, MCHOD RDZAS RNAM
GRANGS MANG BA PHUL, SU MI THE ZER

BA'I SA NAS SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI SKU RGYA NAG LI RNYING MI TSAD
TZAM PA GTER NAS BYON PA'I TSUL DU PHEBS PA GZHAN DU

GDAN 'DREN PAR BRTZAMS KYANG MA NUS, RJE 'DI'I BKAS DGON GSAR
BAR TSEGS MED DU SPYAN DRANGS TE

RTEN GTZOR BZHUGS, DA LTA YANG 'OD 'PHRO ZHING 'JA' TSON 'CHAR
BA SOGS RTAGS DANG BYIN RLABS CHE BAR

YOD; GZHI GSUM DANG DBU PHAR GYI 'CHAD NYAN BTZUGS DUS BZHI'I
CHOS THOG DANG CHOS GRVA'I 'GRIG LAM SOGS

BKRA SHIS SGO MANG DANG, SNGAGS PHYOGS KYI PHYAG LEN RGYUD
SMAD DANG, LHA MO'I DBYANGS SOGS RGYAL DANG MTHUN PAR

MDZAD; 'BAG 'CHAM YANG RJE NYID KYIS BSLAB, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG
YE SHES LA BCA' YIG ZHUS, 'DU

KHANG RTEN BZHENGS, GRVA SHAG BCAS LCAGS PHAG LOR GRUB, DGON
GSAR RNYING GNYIS KA'I KHRIR LO NYER

LNGA BZHUGS TE BKA' DRIN TSAD MED PAS BSKYANGS, RJE 'DI NYID
KYI SLOB CHUNG PHYUG RTZI SLOB RGAN PA KHRIR BSKOS,

KHONG LCANG SKYA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN DANG GRVA THOG
MNYAM, DGE BSHES BZANG, LUNG RTOGS YON

TAN LA MNGA' BRNYES PA ZHIG STE 'CHAD NYAN DMAR BAS 'PHEL
RGYAS BYUNG, DOB TSANG PADMA BSTAN SENG GI SRAS

DOB TSANG BLA MA DGON PA RNYING PA'I GRVA RGYUN, DBEN GNAS DU
MAR SGRUB PA TSE DANG BSNYAMS PAS RTOGS PA BRNYES

SHING MGON PO DNGOS SU 'KHOR BA DE NYID KYI SPRUL SKU BSOD
NAMS DBANG PHYUG STONG YON MA CIG SKYABS LA 'KHRUNGS

PAS STONG YON ZHABS DRUNG DU GRAGS, DAR RGYAS NO MIN HAN, SUM
PA MKHAN CHEN, KUN MKHYEN

'JIGS MED ZHABS SOGS BLA MA MANG DU BSTEN NAS MDO RGYUD MAN
NGAG GI GTER DU GYUR, KHRIR LO NYI SHU LHAG

BZHUGS; 'DZIN GRVA 'OG MAR BSDUS GRVA CHE CHUNG, BLO RTAGS
SOGS RNAM 'GREL GYI GZHUNG TSAN 'GA' BTZUGS,

RGYUN JA DANG GRVA JA'I GTONG THEBS BZHAG RGYAN 'JUG TSOGS
'DON DU BTZUGS TE ZHAL 'DON GZHAN MI CHOG

PA BYAS, 'DU KHANG CHEN MOR BYA 'DAB GSAR DU BSKRUN, LOGS BRIS
SU SANGS RGYAS STONG SKU SOGS BZHENGS,

GRVA BA SLOB GNYER PA RNAMS KYI SKU TSE'I DON DU TSE LHA RNAM
GSUM GYI SKU BRNYAN BRGYA PHRAG DU MA BSGRUBS, 'CHAD

NYAN YUN RING MDZAD PAS DGE BSHES THON PA MANG, SKABS SHIG DAR
RGYAS NO MON HAN LA CHOS GSAN PAR

PHEBS TE GSAN 'PHRO LA GSHEGS, GDUNG ZHUGS LA SBYANGS PAR RING
BSREL DKAR SNGON MANG DU BYON, DVAGS

PO SPRUL SKU KUN GROL NO MON HAN BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN RGYA
MTSO BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS RGYAL GYI GDUNG RGYUD AA LAG SHA GUNG LA
'KHRUNGS, DAR RGYAS NO MON HAN YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN, PAn CHEN
THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DPAL

LDAN YE SHES SOGS LA GTUGS, MDO SNGAGS KYI GSAN BSAM RGYA CHER
MDZAD, 'DI KA'I KHRIR BZHUGS

SKABS KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED SMRA BA'I NYI MA GDAN DRANGS TE
NYID KYIS GTZO MDZAD, RGYA RDOG SMON LAM LHUN

GRUB; SER RTZUD DGON PA'I BLA MA NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS, TE
THUNG DGON CHEN GYI BLA MA KHRI GDAN ZUR,

MTSAN NYID GRVA TSANG GI SLOB DPON DON GRUB BKRA SHIS SOGS SER
SKYA NYIS STONG LHAG GIS RDOR 'PHRENG DANG KRI YA

@133 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SBRAGS PA'I DBANG YONGS RDZOGS, ZHOR LA SGRUB THABS RIN
'BYUNG, LHO BRAG SNYAN BRGYUD KYI RJES GNANG

SOGS GSAN, SA LAM RNAM BZHAG KYANG LJAGS RTZOM ZHUS, SKYABS
RJE MCHOG NAS 'DI KAR RGYUD GRVA GSAR

'DEBS MDZAD, DER BCA' YIG KYANG BZHAG BA RI DON GRUB BKRA SHIS
BLA MAR BSKO BZHAG GNANG,

KHONG GIS DANG POR DGONGS PA NAN TAN ZHUS KYANG, RJES SOR
RGYUD GRVA DE NYID CHOS 'CHAD NYAN, KUN SPYOD

SOGS GANG THAD NAS CHES KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS PA ZHIG BYUNG BAS,
DGE BSHES PA YANG LHAG PAR SPRO BA 'PHEL

TE; RANG RE'I SA CHAR RGYUD GRVA'I 'GRIG LAM 'DI 'DRA'I TSAD
LDAN YONG BA RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA KHO NA'I

BKA' DRIN YIN, NGED KYANG SNGAR YIN NA GCIG BUR DGE SBYOR ZHIG
BYED RTZIS YOD KYANG DA NI MA SHI BAR DU DGONGS

PA ZHU RGYU MIN GSUNGS TE LO BCO LNGAR KHRI MDZAD SNANG, PHYIS
SU AA KHYI RGYAL MTSAN ZER BA DBUS KYI RGYUD SMAD DU

SONG NAS DBYANGS DPON BYAS PA ZHIG YOD PA DES BLA MA RGYUD
MCHOD DANG 'BREL BA'I 'CHAD NYAN, BDE GSANG

'JIGS GSUM GYI CHO GA SBYIN SREG THIG RDUL TSON, GTOR CHEN GYI
DBYANGS ROL SOGS RGYUD SMAD PHYAG

LEN ZHIB BTOD, KUN MKHYEN MCHOG DANG POR 'DIR PHEBS DUS SKU
DNGOS DPON GA-YOG NYUNG BSDUS SNGON LA

PHEBS; KHAL RTA RJES LUS BRGYAB PA RGYA GRONG ZHIG TU ZHAG BAB
BYAS, MTSAN MO CHAR THOG BRGYAB PAR NYID LA

GSOL BA BTAB PAS PHYI NYIN NAM LANGS DUS GRONG THAMS CAD CHUS
KHYER BA'I SHUL NA GNAS TSANG KHANG BA GCIG PU

LUS PA'I GRUB RTAGS BSTAN PAS GSANG RNAM LAS, CHU KLUNG
'KHRUGS PAS 'DABS 'BREL GRONG KHYER CHE, ,

BCOM PA'I KHROD NAS NYID LA SKYABS 'TSOL RNAMS, ,NYER 'TSE LAS
GROL SNOD BCUD RTEN 'BREL LA, ,

MNGA' BSGYUR NAM YANG BSLU MED SKYABS KYI MCHOG ,CES GSUNGS
SO, ,'DI SKABS DBUS KYI DGE BSHES

GRAGS CHEN MANG BAS SLOB GNYER SHIN TU DMAR BA BYUNG, STONG
YON SPRUL SKU RJE DRUNG MKHAN PO AA LAG SHA WANG GI

SRAS SU 'KHRUNGS, SKU GZHON NU NAS YI GE DANG RIG GNAS MTHA'
DAG BSLAB, DBUS SU BYON NAS DBU

PHAR SOGS GZHUNG TSAN DU MAR SBYANGS SHING, KLONG RDOL BLA MA
SOGS LAS MDO SNGAGS KYI GSAN PA RGYA CHE, AA

LAG SHA WOR GYI DGON PA BTAB, THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHES LHA
BTZUN PAndI TA ZHES BSNGAGS BRJOD CHE BA DE NYID

KHRIR LO NGO GNYIS GSUM LAS MA BZHUGS KYANG DGE 'DUN GYI SPYI
RDZAS DANG 'GRIG LAM LA DAG THER, 'CHAD NYAN

GYI RTING BSKUL, TSUL MTHUN SLOB GNYER BA RNAMS LA GZIGS
BSKYANGS DANG, TSUL MIN LOG SPYOD MKHAN

RNAMS LA TSAG 'DZIN GANG DRAG GNANG BAS PHYIS 'BYUNG MIG RKYEN
LA PHAN PA'I SKU DRIN CHE BA BYUNG, DVAGS PO SKU

'PHRENG GSUM PA BLO BZANG CHOS DAR RGYA MTSO KHRIR BZHUGS, 'DI
PA CHU BZANG RIN PO CHE'I SKU TSAR 'KHRUNGS SHING

MKHYEN RAB GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA BAS SPYI SGOS KYI DON LA THUGS
DPYOD ZHIB PA ZHIG YOD, DAR RGYAS NO MON HAN

GYI SPRUL SKU THO YON 'BYUNG GNAS DAR RGYAS KYIS KHRI YUN RING
BZUNG ZHING RGYUN JA'I GTONG THEBS SBYOR 'JAGS

GNANG; DA LTA LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE'I SKU TSA RJE DRUNG SPRUL
SKUS KHRI MDZAD BZHIN PA YIN, DGON 'DI'I KHROD NAS,

SHEL DKAR DANG 'BRAS SPUNGS 'DUL BA MKHAN PO, SER BYES MKHAN
PO ZLA GRAGS, GRO MKHAN PO LHA RAMS

@134 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

PA GRAGS PA CHOS DAR, KHAL KHA T'A KHU RE'I BLA MAR SDE BA
GZHUNG NAS BTANG BA M'A LHA RAMS PA CHOS DAR, DE

NYID KYIS SKU 'BUM DUS 'KHOR BLA MA YANG GNANG, GSER KHOG LA KHA
GRVA TSANG GI BLA MA BA RU LHA RAMS PA BYAMS

PA; MKHAN CHEN NO MON HAN GYI DGON PA'I BLA MA GYANG LHA RAMS
PA DANG, AA LAG SHA DGON PA SHAR NUB

GNYIS; WANG GI Y'A MON GYI DGON PA, TE THUNG DGON CHEN, SER
RTZUNG CHU LUNG BCAS KYI KHRIR BZHUGS

PA 'JA' MO BLA MA SOGS MDO DBUS KYI CHOS SDE DU MA'I KHRIR
PHEBS PA 'GA' DANG LHA RAMS PA NYI SHU SKOR BYUNG,

'BRAS SPUNGS DGE BSHES M'A RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS
MING BTAGS CHE KHAG MA BYAS KYANG SLOB GNYER

BZANG BAS SKU PHYOGS THUGS MNYES NAS BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU 'GRO
BAR BSKUL, SDE SRID SANGS RGYAS RGYA MTSO'I


PHYOGS THUGS MNYES NAS BRKA SHIS 'KHYIL DU 'GRO BA BSKUL, SDE
SRID SANGS RGYAS RGYA MTSO'I

RTZIS KYI DNGOS SLOB DPA' RE AA BSTAN ZER BA'I GRAGS CHEN ZHIG
KYANG BYUNG, DE'I TSA BO DPA' RE GRAGS PA,

'DI LAS AA RIG SNYAN GRAGS SOGS KYIS RTZIS BSLAB, DPA' RE BLO
GROS, DPA' ZHAR NGAG DBANG PHUN

TSOGS; SANGS RGYAS 'PHRIN LAS, PHUN TSOGS YON TAN RNAMS KUN
MKHYEN BAR MA 'DIR PHEBS SKABS

ZHABS PHYIR KHRID, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, 'DZIN
GRVA GCIG PA'I SLOB GNYER PA SHA STAG

DPA' THUNG YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN MDO SNGAGS GNYIS KAR MKHAS
SHING NYAMS LEN BZANG BAS GSHEGS SKABS

THUGS DAM MNGON TSAN CAN LA BZHUGS, MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS THAMS
CAD LA MKHAS PA'I TSAD DU BYED PA

DPA' RE 'JIGS MED DAM CHOS SOGS BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI DGE BSHES
GRAGS CAN MANG, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS

PA'I ME LUG LOR CHOS SDE BTAB NAS LO BRGYA DANG NYER GSUM PA
BYA 'DI'O, ` ,PA SGOM CHOS KYI RDO RJE LA PRA SDE

SGAR BA BCU GSUM YOD PA'I NANG TSAN PRA STI RAB RGYAS DGON NI,
PHA SDE TSO BA'I BLA DPON ZUNG 'BREL SGAR BA'I

NANG SO RIM BRGYUD KYIS BYED, SNGAR GRVA BA RNAMS JAG RUNG
DGON PA'I GRVA RGYUN YIN LA, BAR SKABS SHIG PRA STI

NANG SO DPAL BZANG GIS DGON PA BTAB STE SGER TSUGS BZUNG, KUN
GROL GONG MA'I SPRUL SKU'I DOGS GNAS TE

THUNG PHYOGS SU 'KHRUNGS PA NGAG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL RGYA MTSO
BLA MAR BLUS, DE'I SPRUL SKU 'JA' SKYA'I TSO BAR 'KHRUNGS

PA BLO BZANG BSHAD SGRUB NYI MA, GSER DGON DANG DBUS SU THUGS
GNYER GNANG, MKHAS BTZUN BZANG

'DZOMS SU GRAGS, SKU 'PHRENG GSUM TZAM PHEBS, PRA STI NANG SO
SENG GE ZER BA'I CHOS SRID KYI MKHYEN RGYA

CAN ZHIG YOD PA SKU GSHEGS PA'I THOD RUS LA AA YIG RANG BYON
BYUNG BAS THAMS CAD DAD DE SPRUL SKU BLUS PA LA

MKHAN PO TSANG DU GRAGS, GSER DGON DANG DBUS SU PHEBS, KLONG
RDOL BLA MA SOGS LA GTUGS, ZAB

CHOS MANG DU GSAN, SKU TSE RIL BOR SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN LA
GZHOL, DE'I SPRUL SKU DPON SLOB GSER KHANG

BAS THAG BCAD PA DA LTA SKU 'BUM DU THUGS GNYER GYI SKABS SO,
,DGON 'DIR GZHI GSUM GYI PHYAG LEN,

'JIGS BYED, KUN RIG GNAS BRTAN MCHOD CHOG SMAN BLA, BSKANG
GSO, 'CHAM,

GTOR RGYAG SMON LAM GYI PHYAG LEN NGOS GTZANG ZHING, 7 GONG MA
CHEN PO'I ZHABS BRTAN GYI DGON PA

PHOG DNGUL CAN GYI GRAGS YIN, THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE KHRIR
BZHUGS, SLOB CHUNG DU PRA STI ZHABS DRUNG BSKOS,

@135 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

` THUNG SHAN DU STAG LUNG DGON DGA' LDAN DAM CHOS GLING NI,
RTA NAG SPRUL SKU KU SHRI BLO BZANG BSTAN PA CHOS KYI NYI

MAS BTAB, 'DI'I GONG MA RTA NAG PA KUN DGA' RNAM SRAS NI PAn
CHEN YE SHES RTZE MO'I SKYE PAR GRAGS,

BKRA SHIS LHUN POR SBYANG BA MDZAD, PAn CHEN CHOS RGYAN GYI
DNGOS SLOB THUGS ZIN YIN ZHING DE'I BKA' LTAR

AA MDOR BYON, 'BUM GLING GI BYAMS SKU CHEN MO LA GSER CHAB
GSOL, HAN STAG LUNG DGON PAR MTSAN

NYID BTZUGS, DER GSHEGS PA'I SPRUL SKU KU SHRI 'DI NYID YIN
LA, KHONG BYA KHYUNG NYE 'DABS MDO BA ZHES

PAR 'KHRUNGS, SGO MANG DU SLOB GNYER DANG, NGAM RING DU GRVA
SKOR MDZAD, BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I SNGAGS

PA BLA MAR PHEBS, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE'I LUNG BSTAN BZHIN MDO
SMAD DU BYON, HAN STAG LUNG, MCHOD

RTEN THANG, SEMS NYID DGON, TE THUNG DGON CHEN RNAMS KYI BLA
MA MDZAD, JAG RUNG GI YAR LUNG

DGON DANG, CHOS SDE 'DI NYID BTAB, DGON 'DI GNYIS KYI MCHOD
GZHIS CHED DU RGYA NAG PHO BRANG DU BYON,

BDE SKYID RGYAL POS GZIGS PA CHE BAS PHO BRANG NANG GI CHA
KVAN BE'I BLA MA MDZAD, SNGA PHYIR BOD DU LAN BZHI,

RGYA NAG TU LAN BZHI PHEBS, DGON LUNG KHRIR BZHUGS, GSUNG
RTZOM DANG LUNG BSTAN 'GA' ZHIG SNANG,

DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL, DE'I SPRUL SKU KU SHRI
BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO

BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MA PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYI MDUN
NAS DGE TSUL SGRUB DUS JA SAG BLA MA BLO BZANG THUB

BSTAN RGYA MTSOS GTZOS DGON PA'I LAS SNES STON CHEN PHUL TSUL
YOD PA STAG LUNG DPAL LDAN THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO

PA YIN LA, KHONG GIS SDE BZHI'I DKAR CHAG KYANG BRTZAMS, SUM
PAS RTA NAG SPRUL SKUS BTAB RJES SU,

AE RTI NI CHOS RJE BLO GROS BSTAN DAR BAS BSKYANG BAR GSUNGS
SHING, 'DI'I SPRUL SKU KLONG RDOL BLA MA'I DNGOS

SLOB DGUNG LO BRGYA BZHUGS PA MKHAN RGAN BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN
RGYA MTSO, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG 'JAM DBYANGS

RGYA MTSO STE SKYE RGYUD RIM BYON LA KHRI RGAN TSANG ZER,
GNYIS KA'I 'KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS DPAL LDAN PAS

BSGRIGS PA SNANG, ` 'BRI GUNG DGON DGA' LDAN LEGS BSHAD GLING
NI SNGAR 'BRI GUNG GI 'BUL SDUD PA ZHIG GI

GZHI DGON LUNG NUB NGOS RONG BO ZER BA'I SA CHAR CHAGS PA NANG
SO BZANG PO RGYAL MTSAN GYI GZHIS RGYA DMAG GIS

BCOM TSE GZHI SRUNG BZANG PO RIN CHEN BROS NAS JAG RUNG SMAD
DU 'ONG BA DES BTAB, DA LTA YANG CHOS SKYONG AA

PHYI MA BSTEN, ` T'A BAN DGON CHOS 'KHOR DAR RGYAS GLING NI AA
LOD RAB 'BYAMS PA DPAL 'BYOR RGYA MTSOS

BTAB; ` 'BRUG SUG GI BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING AOR SO DKA' BCU
BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG POS RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS

PA'I SA BYA LOR BTAB, PRA STI ZHABS DRUNG BSTAN PA 'OD ZER
GYIS SA LUG LOR BTAB PA BKRA SHIS LUNG BA'I

SGRUB SDE RI BO DGE 'PHEL, ` RGYAL DBANG GI DNGOS SLOB 'GAG
SHING RAB 'BYAMS PA GRAGS PA RGYA MTSOS BTAB

PA RGYA YAG DGON CHOS 'KHOR DAR RGYAS GLING, PHYIS SU THU'U
BKVAN RIN PO CHE KHRIR BZHUGS, DGON SPO RGYU'I

GNAS GZIGS DANG 'BUBS THEBS LJAGS BKOD GNANG BA BZHIN BLA
BRANG GI KHANG SKOR DANG, 'DU KHANG DBUS

'BUB; SPEN PAD GYO THOG CAN, CHOS RVA SGO KHANG RUNG KHANG
BCAS BSGRUB CING, 'DU KHANG SHOD KYI GYAN BCU

@136 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

DRUG LA, RJE NYID KYI 'KHRUNGS RABS, BSKAL BZANG GI SANGS
RGYAS STONG, KUN RIG GI LHA TSOGS,

RAS BRIS MTHONG BA DON LDAN, SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI RNAM THAR,
RGYA MTHONGS SU THUB DBANG, RGYAN DRUG

MCHOG GNYIS, RJE RIN PO CHE SOGS BLA BRGYUD RAGS RIM, GRUB
THOB BRGYAD CU, GNAS BRTAN BCU

DRUG SBUG TU TSE DPAG MED KYI SMAN SKU CHE BA, THUB PA'I LI
SKU, NYID KYI DBU ZHVA GOS BER BZHUGS GDAN

RGYAB YOL, GSER GOS SNA TSOGS LAS BSGRUB PA'I MCHOD RDZAS,
BTZAN KHANG NANG MAR RGYAL PO SKU LNGA'I 'BAG

SKU MI TSAD LONG BA MAN NGAG BZHIN GYI GZUNGS GZHUG CAN, SMON
LAM LA BKRAM RGYU'I BYAMS PA'I GOS SKU CHEN

MO; DGON LUNG GI PHYAG LEN LTAR GYI 'CHAM GSAR 'DZUGS MDZAD DE
BZANG GOS KYI 'CHAM LVA, ZHAL 'BAG

DANG PHYAG MTSAN, JA TSUL GYI THEBS RGYA MI CHUNG BA BZHAG
CHOS GRVA GSAR TSUGS SKABS 'DZIN GRVA SO SOR BRTZI

BZHAG GNANG BA'I MJUG TU DAM BCA' TSUGS TE RJE NYID BZHENGS
SEMS BSKYED DANG CHOS 'KHOR GYI BGRO GLENG

GNANG; RGYAN 'JUG GNYIS BGRES GZHON TSANG MAR ZHAL MNYAM GSUNG
RGYU YOD PAS DPON SLOB TSANG MAS 'UR

'DON MDZAD, MJUG TU BSTAN 'BAR MA GSUNGS TE RTEN 'BREL
BSGRIGS, GONG MAR MKHYEN BCUG STE

DGE TSOGS GLING ZHES PA'I PEN BSTZAL, SLOB CHUNG DU 'DAN MA
BLA MA DANG, DE NAS MAR TSANG CHOS RJE BLO

BZANG BSOD NAMS, H'U KYA CHOS RJE, AE SEN RAB 'BYAMS PA MCHOG
LDAN RGYA MTSO RNAMS RIM PAR BSKOS,

'CHAD NYAN LEGS, ` PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE RGYA PHEBS SKABS SKU
'BUM NAS PHYAG BTEGS TE ZI LING MKHAR DU

BZHUGS; DE NAS PHUN GRUNG YE'I MKHAR, 'DI'I THAD KYI CHU PHAR
KHA'I BRAG SDEBS SU DMAR GTZANG BLA CHEN

BZHUGS; DE NAS KON TI TZI, TZONG CHU'I ZAB RING BRGYUD DE NEM
BE MKHAR, DE NAS LO BA CHING,

DE'I NYIN SOG POS THANG GE RI TA PA ZER BA'I BING KU SHAN GYI
LA RING PO THON TE MAR BAB 'PHRAL BING KU ZHES PAR

BZHUGS; TA'I TUNG DU 'JU LAG GI CHU CHEN BRGAL TE HO CO'U YI,
DE NAS THOD JO YE, DE NAS SA GZHI

DMAR NGAM GROG SBUGS RING BA BRGYUD ZUNG SHAN STAG LUNG GI BLA
MA LAS SNE DANG, KLU SKYABS THO'U ZI SOGS KYIS

BSUS TE KRONG LING MKHAR, DE NAS LUNG PA DOGS PO ZHIG BRGYUD
KUN GROL NO MON HAN, THUR CHEN DGON GYI

ZHABS DRUNG NANG SO BCAS KYIS BSUS TE PHING CHING H'U, DE NAS
STAG LUNG DGON, 'BRI GUNG DGON,

RGYA YAG DGON RNAMS KYIS BSUS TE ZUNG SHAN, DE NAS LA CHUNG
ZHIG DANG, SDE GRONG 'THOR TZAM YOD PA'I

'GRAM BRGYUD KHVANG KO DE NAS THANG CHEN PO BRGYUD, LA CHUNG
DANG, GCONG RONG DOGS PO LA BYAS SAN

YAN JING, DE NAS CHU MED PA'I THANG BRGYUD HUN TZI, DE NAS TE
RE SU ZHES PA, SOG PAS WO PIR 'BOD

PA BYE THANG CHEN PO BRGYUD, LCAGS RI'I PHYIR THON YIN PHING
SHU, SA 'DI TZONG 'DU DANG AA LAG SHA GNYIS KYI

SA MTSAMS YIN, DE NAS BYE THANG MANG PO BRGYUD AE KHE TO LON,
AE LE SU HO TOG DE NAS SHIN TU

BGROD DKA' BA'I AE LE SU TA BA ZHES PA'I BYE MA'I LA CHUNG
MANG PO BRGAL TE YE KHE THUNG GE DE NAS HU LAN,

HOS THU TO LON, HO YOR HO TOG AO LON HO TOG LCAGS RI PHYI MA
THU MUR H'A LA KA ZHES PA NAS THON THANG

@137 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CHEN PO BRGYUD PHIN CHING H'U, DE NAS NYING SHA MKHAR, DE NAS
RMA CHU KHAR PHEBS GSUNGS, ` D'U KU LAR,

MTSO SNGON PO RO CHU 'GAG NAS RIM GYIS PHEBS TE YO LE THU,
LJON SHING GNAM LA BSNYEGS PA 'DRA BA'I NAGS RONG

BRGYUD CHA GAN THO KHO, RI KLUNG KUN LCAGS RIS SBREL BA RGYA'I
LCAGS RI PHYI MA'I NANG BRGYUD GO KYA MKHAR NAS ZAN

NYEN JING GI MKHAR GYI BAR GYI YUL GRU PHAL CHER SPANG DANG
LJON SHING, ZA SHING ME TOG LEGS, SKU 'BUM,

ZI LING MKHAR, BLA CHEN DANG NYE BA'I PHED KRUNG YI, NAN 'BE
MKHAR, DE'I PHYI ROL ZAM PA RING PO DANG

BCAS PA'I TSONG 'DUS KYI LAM SRANG CHEN PO BRGYUD LOB CHING,
DE NAS ZAB CING RING BA'I DPYA 'PHRANG CHEN PO

BRGYUD SE RI TI DUNG, TE THUNG NANG SO BZOD PA RIN CHEN DANG
DPON PO SHES RAB GRAGS, SER LUNG DGON

PA; TA'I TUNG DGON PA, CHOS RJE KLU SKYABS YON MCHOD BSDOMS
PAS 'BUL BA PHUL, DE NAS CHU CHEN

PO'I ZAM PA BGROD PA'I NYE 'DABS RTA 'JAM, SA MDOG DMAR ZHING
NGAM GROG SBUGS RING BA BRGYUD GRONG LING

MKHAR GYI NYE 'DABS, DE NAS PHING TING CHANG, GRONG KHYER CHEN
PO LCAGS RIS BSKOR BA'I NYE 'GRAM ZAN

YON TZANG DU RDO KHRI ZHIG 'DUG PA'I STENG NAS SPYAN RAS GZIGS
KYI RJES GNANG BYAS GSUNGS, DE NAS LAM BAR

DU SHING GI SGO DANG RI'I NGOS LA 'OBS CHEN PO BSHAR CING
GA-YAS GA-YON GYI RI RTZER LJON SHING BYA RA BLTA BA LTA BU,

RI SUL 'GAR NAGS TSAL YOD PA'I RTZVA BZANG ZHING CHU MED PA'I
SBUBS BRGYUD SA KHAD YANGS PA LAN JU'I SA CHAR

GTOGS PA YUNG THA'I CHING, DE NAS SOG PO RNAMS SGO BER 'BOD PA
RTVA CHU MED PA'I THANG CHEN PO BRGYUD LCAGS

RI'I PHYIR THON, LU THANG GI SA'I CHA YING PHAN SHU, DE NAS
CHU MED STABS LE BAR BRGYA BZHI BCU BCAD DE NYING

SHA'I SA CHA CHANG LU'U SHUR 'BOD PA'I GROG GZHUNG 'DAM GYIS
GANG BA'I GSEB LA BYA DANG SBRUL DKAR KHRA MANG DU YOD

PA; DE NAS DRUNG WI, DE NAS DHI RI SU KHU DO'I MKHAR SO PHAG
GI LCAGS RI DANG LJON SHING GIS BSKOR BA'I

'GRAM BRGYUD JIN LU H'U'U, DE NAS SHI KO ZA'I MKHAR GYI NYE
'DABS, DE DANG KHAD NYE BA'I SHI KO ZI'I

GTZUG LAG KHANG MI GCIG GIS NYI MA BCU GCIG LA GRUB PAR GRAGS
PA RGYA PHIBS DANG BCAS PA NA THUB PA'I SKU RANG

BYON GZHU 'DOM DO TSAD DANG GAD LOGS KYI PHUG PAR DUS GSUM
SANGS RGYAS KYI LHA KHANG SOGS YOD, DE NAS

YUL LJONGS KHA YAR BRGYUD JANG YE PHU ZER BA'I GRONG KHYER GYI
'KHRIS NA LHA KHANG ZHIG SNANG BA'I NYE 'GRAM, DE NAS

SNGON SANGS RGYAS KYIS LUNG BSTAN PA'I GLANG RU LUNG BSTAN GYI
GTZUG LAG KHANG MCHOD RTEN GO MA SA LA GANDHAR RGYA

RNAMS KYI NGOS 'DZIN PA DE CHU PHA RI'I SAR MIG RGYANG GANG GI
TSOD NA YOD PA KONG WU'U ZHES PA'I MKHAR DANG MI RING

BAR BZHUGS, DE NAS GRONG DANG GRONG KHYER MANG PO BRGYUD SPYAN
RAS GZIGS GTZUG LAG KHANG GA-YU THOG CAN

DANG; NYING SHA MKHAR LCAGS RI SHIN TU RGYA CHE BA'I GRONG
KHYER NANG DU T'A PAS THA ZER BA'I MCHOD RTEN DKAR PO

CHEN PO, DRIN BZO'I LHA KHANG DU GRAGS PA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG
GA-YU THOG CAN NANG DU DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS BZHUGS

PA; LCAGS RI'I PHYIR SANGS RGYAS MAR ME MDZAD KYI SKU CHOS
DANG LHUNG BZED YOD PA'I MCHOD RTEN GTZUG LAG KHANG

DANG BCAS PA SOGS KYI 'GRAM BRGYUD, NAGS TSAL 'THUG PO'I BAR
DU LAM SNAM BU BRKYANGS PA 'DRA BA LA BYAS

@138 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

JING CHU PHU'U, DE NAS RMA CHUR GRAGS PA YAR RGYAB GTZANG PO
LAS SUM 'GYUR GYIS CHE BA GNAM SNGON ZHUN MA LTA BUR

DMAR BA'I MDANGS CHAGS PA DER RGYA'I GRU GZINGS NYIS THOG SHIN
TU CHE BA BTANG STE PHEBS PAR GSUNGS 'DUG

SUM PAS RANG RNAM DU, GLANG RI'I 'DABS KYI RMA CHU'I KHAR YOD
PA'I MCHOD RTEN GOM LA SA LA ZHES PA DE BLA MA MA

nI PA ZHIG GIS LCAGS YOS LOR ZHIG GSOS CHED PHYI'I MCHOD RTEN
'DOMS PHYED GNYIS PA DE BSHIG SA BRKOS

PAS RDO SNGO DKAR SHIN TU SRA BA'I NANG DU, RDO'I MCHOD RTEN
BUM STOD YAN MI LUS KYI TSAD TZAM THON, BUM PA'I

MDUN NGOS ZA MA TOG ZHIG GI NANG DU CHOS GOS NGUR DMAR ZHIG DANG
DPE CHA CHUNG NGU ZHIG BUM SMAD RDO LAS SKYES

PA 'DRA BAS BRKOS KYANG MA PHED, BUM PA'I STENG NA PHOR KHA
TZAM GYI BU GA DGU SNANG, MDUN DU RMA CHU, SHAR DU RI BO

RTZE LNGA DANG NYING SHA MKHAR, NUB TU LANG JU'I CU GU MER GYI
LHA CHEN BDE BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS YOD PAS GLANG RU LUNG

BSTAN GYI MDO DANG CHA 'DRA ZER ZHES BSHAD, 'PHROS DON MANG PO
BRIS PA DGOS MED LTA BUR SNANG YANG RANG LA 'DI

PHYOGS RGYUS GANG YANG MED PAS DPYAD GZHIR BKOD CING, GONG 'OG
'DI RNAMS SUM PA MKHAN PO THUGS RGYUS CHE BA

LA BSAM, NYID KYI CHOS 'BYUNG GZHIR BZHAG LA LO RGYUS GANG
NGES KYIS BRGYAN NAS BRIS PA YIN LA, 'ON KYANG

BLA MA 'GA'I MTSAN DANG DGON SDE NGO MA THUG PA DANG NOR BA'I
THE TSOM CAN MANG PAS SLAR DGON CHEN SO SO'I DGON

LAG DANG SGER TSUGS CAN HOR KHONGS SU LUS PA RNAMS CHAD BSAB
SOGS ZHUS DAG GIS ZHIB RGYAS BYUNG NA LEGS,

` PHO ROD PHYOGS SU, LUNG DKAR GYI ZHVA DMAR PRA STI DGON BKRA
SHIS CHOS GLING NGAM DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING

NI RGYAL SRAS BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI LUNG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI
LUNG BSTAN BZHIN PRA STI NANG SO GRAGS PA LHUN GRUB PAS BTAB,
STAG

LUNG KU SHRIS DAR RGYAS MDZAD, BSHAD SGRUB KYI GRVA BZANG,
THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHES 'DU KHANG GSAR BZHENGS

DANG KHRIR BZHUGS PA'I SLOB CHUNG DU BZANG RIN RAB 'BYAMS PA
NGAG DBANG DAR RGYAS BSKOS, ` DOR ZHI DGON

NI; GONG SA LNGA PA'I SLOB MA DOR ZHI NGAM RING RAB 'BYAMS PA
DAM CHOS RGYAL MTSAN PAS BTAB, DU KU LAR,

HAR SDONG DOR SHE RAB 'BYAMS PAS GRAS KHUL D DGON PA 'DEBS
RTZIS 'DUG PAR YI MA THUGS RJE CHEN PO

BCU GCIG ZHAL DANG CHOS SKYONG DMAG ZOR MA 'GAB TSUL MOL ZHING
MING DGA' LDAN CHOS GLING BTAGS GSUNGS PA

'DI AE YIN BRTAG ` RTZANG BLA MA KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN GYIS
BTAB PA NAG YANGS DGON GONG MA TSOGS RDZOGS

GLING; ` SNGAGS RAMS PA SHES RAB BLO GROS KYIS BTAB PA NAG
YANGS DGON 'OG MA BKRA SHIS CHOS 'KHOR GLING,

'DI DANG NYE BAR 'DAN MA CHOS RJES BZUNG BA'I ZHAL GZIGS RI
KHROD YOD, ` RGYAB RTZE RAB 'BYAMS PAS BTAB

PA GYANG RING DGON GONG MA DGA' LDAN PHUN TSOGS GLING, ` DGON
'OG MA 'GU CHOS RJE CHOS RGYA MTSOS RAB BYUNG

BCU GCIG PA'I ME RTA LA BTAB PA CHOS RJE MTHU STOBS RGYA MTSO
DANG RGYA DPON SUN CANG JUN MCHOD YON GYIS THUB

DBANG; MAR ME MDZAD, RGYAL BA SENG GE NGA RO RNAMS BZHUGS PA'I
LHA KHANG BDUN, MCHOD RTEN GNYIS

BCAS BZHENGS TE LNGA PA CHEN POS DGA' LDAN CHOS GLING DU
BSNGAGS, SER BYE'I BU DGON RJE BTZUN PA'I YIG

CHA LA 'CHAD NYAN LEGS, ` SNGAR SMOS DE DAG GI BAR NA HOR SHUG
CHA'I DGON, 'DIR HOR GRUB CHEN ZER

@139 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BA'I SKYE BRGYUD CAN BZHUGS, LHO BA DGON CHUNG, ` SNGO SHUR RI
KHROD, ` YOD KHRANG SHING RA DGON DU,

THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE YANG KHRIR BZHUGS TE SLOB CHUNG DU
KHYUNG TSA ZHABS DRUNG DKON MCHOG DAR RGYAS BSKOS, GZHAN

YANG DGON PHRAN DANG SGRUB SDE MANG, BYANG STOD 'JU LAG GANGS
DKAR NAS RDZA RGYUD RING BO YOD PA LA GZHI BRJID

'PHAGS SU GRAGS PA'I YUL LHA CHEN PO GNAS, DE'I RGYAB PHYOGS
PHO ROD YIN LA, SMAD DU ZUNG SHAN MKHAR

NAS SHAR NGOS RGYA DANG THUG ,BYANG NGOS LA AA LAG SHA DANG
'BREL, TZONG KHA DPA' RE PHO ROD GSUM GA'I STOD

MTSO SNGON PHYOGS LA THUG SNANG, ` LANG GRU'I SDE BZHI NI, GONG
SMOS RGYA YAG DGON NAS LANG GRU'I SA SNE ZIN

CING; LE BAR LNGA TZAM NA CANG YE PHU'I MKHAR CHUNG, JU GU MER
DU H'A HO'U ZI, DER BYAMS PA LHA CHEN

GYI SKU GZHU 'DOM SO DRUG CAN 'BUM GLING BYAMS SKU DANG 'DRA
MTSUNGS, GA-YAS GA-YON DU GTZO BO'I SKU TSAD

PHYED KYI BZHENGS SKU GSUM RE, RDO RING DU, GA-YAS NA 'PHAGS
PA SH'A RI'I BU, ,SPYAN RAS GZIGS

DANG KHRO RGYAL SKU, ,GA-YON PHYOGS 'PHAGS PA KUN DGA' BO,
,MTHU CHEN THOB DANG KHRO RGYAL SKU, ,'DI

DRUG SKU TSAD LO BCU YIN, ,ZHES BSHAD, RTZE THOG TU STON PA'I
'BUR SKU, NANG GI STENG NGOS RNAMS SU

SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS DGRA BCOM CHOS SKYONG SOGS KYI BRIS SKU
SNA TSOGS, LHA KHANG BRGYAD THOG BZO DKA' BA

BYUNG BAR RGYA'I SHING BZO'I RIG PA SLOB MKHAN M'U BAN YE ZER
BA'I LHA RGYA MI RGAN PO'I GZUGS KYIS 'ONG, ZAN

YAG PO STER NA LHA KHANG BZOS CHOG PAR MOL BA BZHIN BYAS PAS
MTSAN GCIG GRUB PA'I LO RGYUS SNANG, RDO RING

DU LHA CHEN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYI BZO, ZHES DANG, 'JAM PA'I
DBYANGS KYIS BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA'I

GNAS ZHES 'BYUNG, SNGAR LUNG PA 'DI THAMS CAD CHUS GANG BAS
CHU GI MER DU THOGS, DE SKABS CHU 'GRAM

DU RGYA MI PHYUGS RDZI ZHIG GIS PHYUGS SKYONG BA'I TSE RI'I
NANG NAS SGO PHYE 'AM MA PHYE ZHES PA'I SGRA LAN 'GA' THOS,

PHYI NYIN SGO PHYE ZHES LAN BTAB PAS LHA SKU RANG BYON BYUNG,
CHU RNAMS NUB KYI RI BRAG LAM PHRANG DOG PO BRGYUD NAS

THON PA'I NGAG RGYUN SNANG, RGYA MI PHYUGS RDZI DE'I 'DRA
BRNYAN YIN ZER BA'I 'JIM SKU ZHIG KYANG 'DUG SMAN

'DAM GYI TSE DPAG MED KYI NYE SRAS KYI 'KHOR CAN DANG, 'JIGS
BYED LA CHOS SKYONG DU MAS BSKOR BA BZHUGS PA'I

LHA KHANG GNYIS, GZHAN YANG MGON PO RANG BYON GYI LHA KHANG
YANG YOD PAR GRAGS, GE SER GTZO 'KHOR DANG

RGYA LHA MANG PO CAN GYI LHA KHANG, SGO KHANG DU LHA SKU KHA
SHAS, GA-YON GYI RI RTZER MCHOD RTEN CHEN PO, GA-YAS

NGOS BRAG KHUNG NYI SHU RTZA DRUG YOD PA PHAL CHER 'GRO LAM
CHAD, SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS KYI 'JIM SKU DU MA SNANG,

RDO RING DU, BRAG KHUNG NYI SHU RTZA DRUG NA, ,SANGS RGYAS KYI
SKU 'DRA MANG PO BZHUGS, ,'DI DAG SRID

PA CHAGS PA'I LHA, ,GSOS NA RGYAL KHAMS BDE'O ZHES DKAR CHAG
RNYING BAR BSHAD TSUL DANG, 'PHAGS

PA GLANG RU LUNG BSTAN LAS, ,MCHOD RTEN GO MA SA LA YI, ,NUB
PHYOGS GO SHANG BYA BA NA, ,SANGS RGYAS

BDE BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS SKU, ,BZHUGS NAS YANGS PA'I RGYAL KHAMS
BSRUNG, ,ZHES PA SKU GZUGS 'DI

LA ZER, ZHES BSHAD LA, DE YANG SHAR SMAD NYIN LAM KHA SHAS NA
GLANG RU LUNG BSTAN PA'I GNAS SU NGOS 'DZIN

@140 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

PA ZHIG YOD PAS YIN 'DRA, SNGAR LHA KHANG LA BOD KYI BAN DE
DBYI DGE BZHUGS, YON TAN CHE, SEMS CAN

THAMS CAD KYI 'GRO DON MDZAD, LAS KA'I MING NI ME'O ZHEN THUNG
H'U'I KU SHRI BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN, LHA

KHANG MING NI GONG ZHEN ZI ZHES RDO RING LAS 'BYUNG BA GA-YO
DGE 'BYUNG YIN PAR BSHAD, T'AS MING CANG THUNG LO

BCU GSUM PAR ZHIG GSOS BGYIS GRUB PA NAS, 7 GONG MA T'O BKVANG
NYER DGU PA RAB YID SA BYA YAN LO SUM BRGYA

DANG GO DRUG SONG, ` 'DI DANG NYE BA'I NUB TU, LHO BA RI
KHROD, RGYAS CHAN PHANG ZI ZER, 'DIR

AO RGYAN GYI SGRUB KHANG, GSHEGS BZHUGS MDZAD PA'I SHUL, RDO'I
SRO KHANG RANG GRUB, LHA MO'I PHO BRANG

BRAG PHUG TU DRE'U'I RJES SOGS YOD PAR GRAGS, LHA CHEN GYI
GA-YAS 'BYOR LDAN RI LA DNGUL RDO MANG BAS SNGAR

DNGUL GYI BZO GRVA BTZUGS TE RIN PO CHE'I 'BYUNG KHUNGS LTA
BUR SNANG, ` 'DI'I SMAD DU RGYAS P'E LIN ZIR 'BOD

PA KARMA RI KHROD NI, SNGON NAS YOD PA'I SGRUB GNAS BYIN CAN
YIN KYANG, PHYIS SU KARMA BLA CHEN MANG POS

SGOM SGRUB MDZAD CING MI RIGS KHA SHAS CHAGS PAS DE LTAR
THOGS, GNA' DUS ZHIG RNAL 'BYOR BA BZHIS GNAS

'DIR SGRUB PA YUN RING MDZAD, MTHAR THAMS CAD NAM MKHA' LA
'PHUR, GCIG RGYANG RING DU 'PHUR MA

NUS PAR NYE 'KHOR GYI BRAG LA BAB PA'I LO RGYUS DANG, SNGAR
DUS CHEN RNAMS SU SGRA SNYAN SNA TSOGS THOS RGYU SNANG,

LHA KHANG THUB PA'I DBANG PO SOGS SKU BRNYAN MANG, THANG
KHRO'U RGYAL RABS GNYIS PA RGYA NAG THE TZUNG GIS BDE

CHEN LHA KHANG DU BSNGAGS, T'A'I MING GSUM PA YUNG LOS ZHIG
GSOS BGYIS, CANG THUNG LO BDUN PAR,

THA'I GYEN LI GUS, SHIN THUNG H'U'I KU SHRI BSOD NAMS RGYAL
MTSAN, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLA MA BZOD PA DPAL,

DGE TSUL DHARMA SHRI SOGS KYIS LHA KHANG GYAN GSUM SKOR LAM
GNYIS, GA-YAS GA-YON DU KHANG GYAN NYI SHU RE, RGYAL

CHEN KHANG, THUB PA GRONG GSHEGS KYI LHA KHANG, MCHOD RTEN
GSUM, RNGA KHANG CONG KHANG BCAS BZHENGS,

MTSAN BSOD NAMS LHA KHANG DU GSOL BA'I LO RGYUS RDO RING DU
BKOD PA NAS, GONG MA T'O BKVANG NYER DGU PA

RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SA BYA YAN LO BRGYA DANG GNYIS SONG, `
GRO TSANG RI KHROD SHANG PHAD ZIR 'GRO TSANG BRAG DPON

SLOB SKU PHRENG GSUM GYI GDUNG RTEN, DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS NYE
SRAS BCAS KYI SKU BRNYAN 'DI DANG GSHAM GSAL

RGYA DGON PHAL CHER LA BZHUGS, ` ZHVA GUS KHRANG DU, GNAS
BRTAN BCU DRUG 'JIGS BYED, BDE

MCHOG KYEE RDOR, PHYAG RDOR 'KHOR CHEN, MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA
DANG PHYAG BZHI PA, GUR MGON,

CHOS RGYAL, LHA MO RNAMS DANG, GRO TSANG SKU 'PHRENG GI GDUNG
RTEN 'DIR BZHUGS PAR BSHAD PA'ANG SNANG,

` TSEN PHUNG DUNG DU, SANGS RGYAS STONG SKUR GRAGS PA'I LHA
SKU MANG PO, TSE DPAG MED, SPYAN RAS GZIGS,

BAR DO'I 'PHRANG GI RNAM PA 'BUR BZOS, ` SHANG GUS KHRANG DU,
THUB PA GRONG KHYER MA'I SKU BRNYAN BZHUGS

KHANG CAN, 'DI RANG BYON DU GRAGS KYANG YIG RNYING DU SKU RGYU
SHING LAS BZHENGS PAR BSHAD, DBU GTZUG TU

THUB SKU CHUNG NGU ZHIG BZHUGS PA RANG BYON YIN ZER BA DANG
NANG BZHUGS SU PHUL BA DE NAS THON KYANG ZER, THUB

DBANG GNAS BRTAN BCAS, 'JIGS BYED, BDE MCHOG MGON CHOS GSUM
SOGS BZHUGS,

@141 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RDZA MKHAN GYI BZO GRVA YOD, GONG 'OG 'DI RNAMS STAG LUNG DPAL
LDAN PA'I SDE BZHI'I DKAR CHAG RNAM DAG ME

'CHANG; SPYAN RAS GZIGS, RTA MGRIN DBYUG TO CAN BZHUGS KHANG
KHANG, ` THU BO ZIR DBU LA TSE DPAG MED

BZHUGS PA'I JO BO RANG BYON YOD PAR BSHAD PAS SNGAR SMOS THUB
SKU DANG GCIG GAM BRTAGS, ` GRONG YANG

ZIR; TSE DPAG MED, KYEE RDOR, ` HUNG H'A ZIR THUB PA MYANG
'DAS KYI RNAM PA CAN, 'DI NYE 'KHOR

RI RGYUD LA THUB SKU GZIMS STABS KYI RNAM PA GSAL BA'I TSAB TU
BZHENGS ZER, ` MIS TH'O ZIR, RDO RJE

'CHANG; SPYAN RAS GZIGS, RTA MGRIN DBYUG TO CAN BZHUGS KHANG
YOD PA RANG BYON DU GRAGS, SNGAR

'OD DANG RNGUL CHU 'BYUNG ZHING SHIN TU GNYAN, DUS PHYIS KYANG
GNAS SKOR BA GDON GYIS BRLAM PA 'DRA MDUN DU

'JIGS SNANG GIS 'GRO MI THUB 'DUG GZHAN LHA KHANG RTEN BCAS
MANG, ` LANG GRU'U MKHAR NAS LHO PHYOGS

LE BAR SUM CU NA HE MO DUNG DU GRAGS PA PHAG MO SDE, SDE
BZHI'I GRANGS SU MI 'DREN, SNGAR SA 'DIR BSHAN

PA GRANG THU ZER BA ZHIG YOD PA'I LAG NAS BU MO LO RGYAD LON PA
ZHIG GIS GLO SNYING LAN DU MAR NYOS, NYIN

GCIG BSHAN PA RIN BSNYOGS PAR RJES 'DED KYIS SONG, BU MO LNGAS
TSOGS SKOR BA MTHONG, BSHAN PAS

RIN MA THOB PA'I YUS KYIS GTZO MO'I SKU LA 'CHANG BAS BAR
SNANG LA 'PHAGS, SKU LUS 'GRO BA'I ZHING DU BZHAG

PA LA PHYIS SU SMAN 'DAM SRAB MOS GA-YOGS, GZHAN BZHI NAM
MKHAR 'PHUR, BSHAN PA DAD PA THOB,

DA LTA YANG BSHAN PA RNAMS KYIS MCHOD PA'I SROL 'DUG SNGAR DUS
BZANG RNAMS SU GSANG GNAS NAS BDUD

RTZI DMAR PO DNGOS SU 'BAB PA HOR RGYAL ZHIG GI BTZUN MOS 'DI
'DRA BUD MED KYI RKANG 'DREN ZHES MNGAL SGO

GSER GYIS BCAD PAS BKRA MI SHIS PA BYUNG, MAN LUNG GU RUS
SNGAR 'DOM GANG LHAG TZAM DANG, DENG DUS

MTHO GANG TZAM GYIS ZHABS SA LA MA REG PA BSHAD, BYE MA'I RI
BRAG DMAR PO'I BRAG PHUG TU BZHUGS PA'I SGOR

LHA KHANG BZHENGS, RI'I NANG DU SKOR LAM BTOD PA 'GRO THUB
TZAM YOD, 'DI'I STENG DU SNGAR GYI GLO SNYING YOD

PA GNAS MJAL BA RNAMS RTEN DU ZHUS PAS TSAR SKAD DANG, DENG
SANG BRAG PHUG GIS DMAR RTEN DU ZHU MKHAN

MANG ZHING NAD GDON LA PHAN PA MYONG GRUB TU SNANG, GA-YAS SU
STON PA'I SMAN SKU MI TSAD TZAM GYI NANG DU BSHAN

SKU DU MA, LOGS BRIS LA CHO 'PHRUL GYI BKOD PA, LHA KHANG ME
SKYON GYIS 'JIG PAR PHAG MO'I SKU LA GNOD PA

MA BYUNG, 'DI RGYA YUL GYI RDO RJE PHAG MO PHYIN CAN BZHI'I
NANG TSAN YIN LA, GZHAN GSUM GROD LANG, SHU'U

GRU; SHAN TUN GSUM NA YOD PAR GRAGS, MAN LUNG PAS PHAG MO'I
BYANG NGOS NA BYAMS PA GLO NYAL DU GRAGS PA

DBU GTZUG NAS ZHABS MTHIL BAR NYIN LAM PHYED YOD PA, RGYANG
NAS BLTAS NA GSAL BOR MTHONG NUS PA ZHIG

'DUG GSUNGS, SA NGAR NGAR DU GRAGS PA THU SHAN THO'I ZER BA'I
RI RGYUD LA NGOS 'DZIN, ZHAL SHAR DANG

DBU LHOR BSTAN PA'I RNAM PA GSAL, BSHANG GCI 'DOR BA SOGS 'OS
MIN BYAS PAS MI SHIS PA 'BYUNG ZHING DAD

GUS BYAS NA TSE BSOD 'PHEL BA'I 'BRAS BU MTHONG CHOS SU
'BYUNG, YANG LAM YIG 'DI'I NUB NA SPRUL PA SDE@142 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

YOD PAR BSHAD KYANG BYANG SHAR DU YOD SNANG, ` PHAG MO SDE NAS
LE BAR LNGA NA KYIN TH'A ZI STE LHO DBANG SDE RGYAL PO

GSER GYI SKA RAGS CAN GYI DUR SAR GRAGS, YIG RNYING ZHIG TU
'GRO MGON 'PHAGS PAS RGYAL PO GSER GYI SKA

RAGS CAN LA DBANG CHEN GNANG ZHES PA LTAR NA HOR SE CHEN GYI
DUR SA YIN NAM ZER MKHAN SNANG, LHA KHANG

DBUS MAR BZHUGS PA'I THUB SKU SOGS SA PAn GYIS BZHENGS, SKU
RGYU'I 'JIM PA LA SME RTZEGS DANG RNAM 'JOMS

KYI BUM CHUS SBAGS PAR LHA DE GNYIS THIM PA'I GZIGS SNANG
BYUNG, 'BAD RTZOL CHEN PO MA DGOS PAR GRUB,

BYIN RTEN MANG PO NANG BZHUGS SU PHUL, RAB GNAS SKABS 'JA' 'OD
'KHRIGS PA SOGS YE SHES PA DNGOS SU

ZHUGS PA'I RTAGS MTSAN BYUNG, GUR MGON GYI GZUNGS GZHUG TU
GCOD PA BRAM ZE NAG PO'I SGOM THAG DANG

DBU SKRA, RJE NYID KYI PHYAG DPE TSAN BCAS BZHUGS TE BKA'
BSGOS, RGYAL PO 'KHOR BCAS LA DBANG GNANG

BA'I DKYIL STEGS KYI RDO GRU BZHI, 'DI SKABS KYI DBANG LA
BSHAD TSUL MI 'DRA BA SNANG, 'GRO MGON GYIS

BZHENGS PAR GRAGS PA'I DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS NYE SRAS DANG BCAS
PA, LHA KHANG GZHAN RNAMS SU CHOS RJE SA

PAn; RDO RJE 'CHANG, TSE DPAG MED, GUR MGON, MGON PO PHYAG
BZHI PA RNAMS DANG, BYAMS

CHEN CHOS RJE'I SKU BRNYAN KYANG BZHUGS PAR BSHAD, YIG RNYING
DU, 'PHAGS PAS 'DIR 'PHRENG BA'I DBANG

DANG LAS BZHI'I SBYIN SREG GNANG BAR, DRAG PO'I SBYIN SREG
SKABS KHRO BO MTSON CHA THOGS PA SNA TSOGS PAS

BSTAN PA SPYI'I DGRA BGEGS DNGOS SU BKUGS NAS THAB TU BCUG
PA'I GNAS SU BKRA SHIS SGO MANG MCHOD RTEN

BZHENGS TSUL DANG, NANG BZHUGS SU AU RGYAN NAS SPYAN DRANGS
PA'I SANGS RGYAS 'OD SRUNG GI RING BSREL BYA SGONG

TZAM; MKHA' 'GRO MA MANG PO'I RTEN DANG RDZAS SNA, SLOB DPON
PADMAS BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA'I RTEN SNA,

BLA MA DRI MA MED PA'I PHYAG PHRENG SOGS KYIS GTAMS PA'I TZAN
DAN GORSHA SHA'I MCHOD RTEN DANG, GSER ZHUN MA

KHRU GANG BCAS BLA MA DRU MA MED PAS RGYAL BU DKON MCHOG
'BANGS LA GNANG BA RNAMS YOD PAR BSHAD, SNGAR

DUS CHEN RNAMS SU 'JA' 'OD 'CHAR, DRI BZANG 'THUL, ROL MO'I
SGRA DANG ME TOG GI CHAR 'BEBS PA'I

LTAS NGO MTSAR BA SNANG, KY'A CHING KHRI LO BDUN PA'I DUS RDO
CHAR BYUNG BA MCHOD RTEN GYI RTZE NAS 'JA' 'OD BYUNG

BAS ZHI, RGYAB RIR GUR MGON DANG RI GZHAN LA 'KHOR RNAMS GNAS
KYANG ZER, ` 'DI GNYIS KYI BAR DU

ZHIS B'O TING ZIR 'OD ZER CAN DANG RGYA LHA SNA TSOGS YOD PA'I
LHA KHANG MANG PO, ` B'O TING ZI ZER BA YANG YOD,

` MKHAR NAS NUB NGOS LE BAR SUM CU NA LEN H'A ZI STE, PADMO
SDE, DER KHRO NAG GI BLUG SKU MI TSAD TZAM THUB

PA GRONG KHYER MA'I RNAM CAN BZOD PA RING MO'I SKU GDUNG DU
GRAGS PA YOD, 'GA' ZHIG GIS NANG RTEN DU GDUNG

RIL BO, KHA CIG GIS GDUNG RUS, GZHAN DAG TSEMS GNYIS BZHUGS
PAR 'DOD PA DANG DROD DANG LDAN ZER

BA SOGS BSHAD TSUL MI 'DRA BA MANG, STAG LUNG PA'I DKAR CHAG
TU DBU LA GTZUG TOR YOD PA MO'I 'DRA BRNYAN

YIN TSE THOR COG DANG, THUGS KA YAN KHAM SA'I 'DAG PAS BCAD
LA, GZHAN KHONGS STONG YIN PA MTHONG,

RGYANG NAS BLTAS NA GSON NYAMS CHE ZHING DAD PA 'DREN PA ZHIG
'DUG CES BSHAD, 'DI NYID 'JAM DBYANGS

@143 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SA PAn GYI SKU SRING, RJE DE NYID HOR PHEBS KYI RJES SU BYA
BRAL GYIS 'DIR BYON, ZHAL 'DZOMS PAR CHOS RJE'I

ZHAL NAS, BZOD PA RING MO BYON LAGS SAM, ,SA KHA RJES KYIS
GANG LAGS SAM, ,KHYI RGAN 'GRAM PA BCAGS

LAGS SAM, ,GSUNGS PAR, MOS, SA SKYA PAn CHEN BYON LAGS SAM,
,RDO RJE PHRENG BA GNANG LAGS SAM, ,

DAM NYAMS KYIS SA KHA GANG LAGS SAM, ,DMYAL BA'I DPYANG RDO
BYAS LAGS SAM, ,ZHES ZHUS PAR GRAGS,

BZOD PA RI KHROD DU SGOM SGRUB YUN RING MDZAD, SPRUL BA SDER
CHOS RJE NYID SKU BSNYUNG SKABS MOS PHYOGS DER YANG

YANG GZIGS, MI MTHONG TSAD LA DRIS, LAN CIG PAn CHEN GSHEGS
PA'I GTAM GSAN 'PHRAL, BOD PHYI

RABS PHYI RABS NYAL NAS 'CHI, ,BZOD PA RING MO LANGS NAS 'CHI,
,GSUNGS NAS SKU 'DAS SKAD,

'DI'I GA-YON NGOS SU CONG CHEN PO ZHIG YOD PA SA 'OG NAS THON
PA DANG, LHA KHANG GI DKYIL GDUNG RANG BYON DU

GRAGS; STONG 'KHOR MDO RGYUD RGYA MTSOS BTON PA'I SMAN CHU
SNANG, LHA KHANG RNAMS SU DUS GSUM SANGS

RGYAS; BYAMS PA, NYE SRAS BRGYAD, 'JIGS BYED, BDE MCHOG KYEE
RDOR, 'KHOR CHEN,

MGON CHOS LNGA, SPYAN RAS GZIGS, TSE DPAG MED LONGS SPRUL
GNYIS, 'OD ZER CAN SOGS DANG,

RGYA LHA YANG MANG PO, LNGA PA CHEN POS SA PAn GYIS MDO PHYOGS
KYI CHOS BKA' RGYA CHER BSTZAL BA'I GNAS SU GSUNGS,

PHYI'I RI SNAR MCHOD RTEN CHEN PO, 'DIR BZOD PA RING MO SKU
'DAS PAR BSHAD PA DANG, PAn CHEN GYIS

DBANG GNANG SKABS BUM CHU DANG RDUL TSON GSHEGS KYANG ZER, LHA
CHUNG LUNG PA'I CHU 'GRAM GYI PHA BONG LA BZOD

PA RING MO'I ZHABS RJES, CHU MED PAR ZHABS KYIS PHA BONG
BSGYUR BA'I SHUL DU CHU MIG THON PA'I NGAG RGYUN SNANG,

DER BYAMS MGON GTZO 'KHOR DANG THUB PA MCHOG ZUNG BCAS BZHUGS
PA'I LHA KHANG GNYIS, BZAD PA RING MO

ZHES BRIS PA'ANG YOD, DES NA BZAD LUNG PA ZHIG YIN 'DRA LA, SA
PAn MU STEGS DANG RTZOD DUS KYI SKU ZLA YIN

MIN DPYAD PAR BYA'O, ` ,MKHAR NAS BYANG NGOS LE BAR LNGA NA
H'I TZANG ZI STE RGYA MTSO SDE, YIG RNYING DU SA SKYA

PAn CHEN GYIS GNAS 'DIR CHOS 'KHOR RGYA CHER BSKOR CES BSHAD,
HOR GO DAN RGYAL PO LA KLU NAD GTONG MKHAN

GYI KLU BDUD DAM LA BTAGS, DE DUS KYI GNAS SGOR GRAGS PA'I
KHRON CHU BYIN RLABS CAN DU BRTZI BA YOD,

RTEN GTZO MCHOD RTEN BYIN CAN, DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS NYE SRAS,
RDO RJE 'CHANG, RNAM SNANG, TSE

DPAG MED, GNAS BRTAN BCU DRUG SOGS DANG, RVA BA'I 'KHYAMS LOGS
SU BRIS SKU SNA TSOGS, 'JIGS

BYED; CHOS SKYONG DU MA BZHUGS PA'I MGON KHANG, RGYA'I BKA'
'GYUR DANG, RGYA BAN SMUG CHAS CAN GYI

SDE YANG YOD, ` 'DI NAS BYANG NYIN LAM LHAG TZAM NA YOD CHANG
RDO RJE PHAG MO BRAG LA RANG BYON, SKU MDOG

DKAR PO, ZHABS MTHIL NAS SGRUB CHU 'BAB PA, 'DIR RGYAS H'USA
H'USA ZH'A RBER BA'I RDO'I RIL BU ZUR CAN,

ZHIB BRDUNG CHU DANG SBYAR NAS GRI KHAR BYUG NA YANG tI SOGS
RIN PO CHE'I RIGS BZO SLA BA YOD, NYIN LAM GSUM

LHAG TZAM NAS AA LAG SHA BYE MAR THON, ` MKHAR NAS LE BAR BZHI
BCU NA, P'E TH'A ZI SHAR SPRUL BA SDE,

HOR GO DAN GYIS CHOS RJES SA PAn SPYAN DRANGS, ME LUG LA MCHOD
YON ZHAL 'DZOMS, DGA' STON DANG

@144 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GSUNG GLENG SKABS DU MAR MDZAD, LAN CIG PAn CHEN GYIS RUS SBAL
LA SPU MED TSUL GSUNGS PAR, RGYAL

POS PAGS PA GSER MDOG 'JA' 'OD 'KHYUG PA CIG BSTAN TE RUS SBAL
GYI PAGS PA YIN ZER, 'DI LA YON

TAN GZHAN CI YOD GSUNGS PAS, 'JAM ZHING LEGS PA 'DIS CHOG MOD,
KHYOD KYIS RUS SBAL LA SPU YOD

PA MA TSOR 'DUG ZER, CHOS RJE RANG GIS DE'I MGO NAS BZUNG STE
SANGS RGYAS STONG GI SKU SPU RIS SU YOD PA BSTAN

TE 'DI BSKAL BA BZANG PO'I BYANG SEMS GANG 'DUL GYI LUS BZANG
BA YIN, RUS SBAL 'DRA BA CIG YOD RUNG

RUS SBAL MIN GSUNGS PAS RGYAL BLON RNAMS ZHAL TSA, DE'I RKYEN
GYIS NYAMS SAD PHYIR SGYU MA MKHAN LA GTZUG

LAG KHANG BKOD PA CHES BKRA BA SPRUL BCUG RGYAL POS CHOS RJE
GDAN DRANGS TE LHAN DU PHEBS, SGO SRUNG GI

KHRO BO LA BKA' BSGOS, SHIS BRJOD MI 'GYUR LHUN PO MA 'PHRAL
BRTZAMS KYIS PHYAG NAS GTOR, STAN LA BZHUGS

NAS SGYU MA BSHIG PAR BRTZAMS KYANG BSHIG MA NUS, CHOS RJES
KYANG 'DI DKON MCHOG GI RTEN BYAS PA YIN

PAS 'JIG MI THUB, KHYED TSOS BLA MCHOD THAG RING BO NAS BOS TE
DMA' CI PHEBS BYED PA 'DI BYA BA LEGS PO

MIN GSUNGS PAS, RGYAL PO 'JIGS TE PHYAG BYAS PA LAM YIG DANG
CHOS 'BYUNG 'GA' RE LAS BSHAD, CHOS

RJE NYID 'DI NAS LO LNGA TZAM BZHUGS, ZAB CHOS MANG DU GNANG,
BDUN CU PA LCAGS PHAG LA GSHEGS,

GDUNG ZHUGS 'BUL ZHUS PAR, DBU THOD LA KYEE RDOR, 'JAM
DBYANGS, BDE MCHOG THUB DBANG,

BUS MO'I GDONG LA SPYAN RAS GZIGS KHA SAR BA nI, SGROL MA, MI
GA-YO BA, PHYAG SOR LA BYAMS PA, AA YIG

DANG H'Um YIG 'BUR DOD, SNYAN GONG GNYIS LA RNAM RGYAL MCHOD
RTEN, RING BSREL KYANG MANG DU PHEBS, DGRA

BCOM ZHIG DANG BYANG SEMS ZHIG GI SKU RUS DANG RING BSREL,
GZHAN RING BSREL BCU, GSER DNGUL DANG

SNAG TSAS BRIS PA'I GZUNGS SNGAGS DANG CHOS TSAN MANG PO,
SATZTSA 'BUM LHAG BCAS NANG BZHUGS KYI GDUNG RTEN

BKA' GDAMS MCHOD RTEN GYI DBYIBS CAN LAG 'DOM BCU DRUG YOD PA
BZHENGS, DPAL SA SKYA'I GDAN SAR

GSER GDUNG BZHENGS 'DUG KYANG GONG SMOS RANG BYON RNAMS PHAL
CHER MCHOD RTEN 'DI NANG DU BZHUGS ZHES

DKAR CHAG RNYING BAR BSHAD, CHOS RGYAL 'PHAGS PA SOGS KYIS RAB
GNAS MDZAD, MCHOD RTEN BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD

DU GRAGS PA'I MCHOD RTEN CHE CHUNG DU MA 'DUG PA MIS GRANGS MI
LON CING MKHA' 'GRO'I SPRUL PA'I MCHOD RTEN YIN

PAS SPRUL BA SDE THOGS YANG ZER, STAG LUNG PA'I DKAR CHAG TU,
BYANG SEMS RUS SBAL RNAM CAN GYI PAGS PA

RGYA MTSO'I SDE'I KLU BDUD 'DUL CHED CHOS RJE NYID KYIS BSNAMS
NAS BYON ZHES DANG, NYID DPON GA-YOG BCUS NYIN

GCIG LA MCHOD RTEN RNAMS THABS SNA TSOGS KYIS BGRANG BAR
GRANGS NGES CAN MA BYUNG ZHING, ZHE BRGYAD DANG ZHE

DGU LAN 'GAR MTHUN PAS ZHE DGU YIN ZER BA'I NGAG SGROS BDEN
'DRA ZHES BSHAD, RVA BA'I PHYI LOGS SU

MCHOD RTEN DKAR PO KHANG CHUNG CAN, SO PHAG GI MCHOD RTEN
GRANGS MED, SA 'BUM KHA SHAS YOD PA RGYA BAN

GNAS SRUNG 'GA' ZHIG GI DUR SA YIN, 'GRO MGON 'PHAGS PA'I DUS
SA SKYA'I DGON SDE DGE 'DUN STONG TZAM

YOD PA CHAGS, LHA KHANG CHE BA'I RGYAB KYI MCHOD RTEN NANG
BZHUGS TSA 'BUM SNGAR GYI 'GANG CAN, SA PAn

@145 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

YAB SRAS KYI SKU DUS LHA KHANG BRANG KHANG SOGS MIG DANG YID
'PHROG PA'I NGO MTSAR BA DU MA YOD PA ME 'JIG SOGS

KYIS RIM PAS NYAMS, T'A'I MING RGYAL RABS KYI MGO TZAM DUS
GZAR ZHIG GI SKABS LHA KHANG MCHOD RTEN BCAS

LA ME SBYAR BA SLAR ZHIG GSOS BGYIS PA'I YI GE SNANG, KHANG
ZHIG RGYAL POS GNAM 'OG LA DBANG BSGYUR BA'I THOG

MAR YANG LHA KHANG NYAMS GSOS BGYIS, LHA KHANG CHE BAR DBUS SU
RDO RJE 'CHANG, GA-YAS GA-YON DU PHYAG RDOR

DANG SGROL MA, GA-YAS SU THUB DBANG, GA-YON DU MCHOG ZUNG,
DE'I GA-YAS SU SANGS RGYAS MTHONG BA DON YOD,

GA-YAS GA-YON DU RAB 'BYOR DANG 'OD SRUNG, GTZO BO'I GA-YON DU
'OD DPAG MED, GA-YAS GA-YON DU DPA'

PO SER PO DANG MDZES DGA' SNGON PO, DE'I GA-YON DU SMAN GYI
BLA MA, GA-YAS GA-YON DU RTA THUL DANG MING CHEN,

SHAR NUB KYI GRAL LA NYE SRAS BZHI RE, GA-YAS GRAL MTHAR RTA
MGRIN DBYUG TO CAN, 'DIS SNGON LHA KHANG LA

ME 'JIG BYUNG BAR ZHABS YA GCIG CHU 'GRAM DU BZHAG PHYAG GIS
CHU GTOR BAS ME ZHI BA'I NGAG RGYUN SNANG,

GA-YON GYI GRAL MTHAR MI GA-YO BA SNGON PO, GNAM RGYAN LING
TSE CHE BA DRUG GI DBUS MA LA THUB DBANG GNAS BRTAN

BCU DRUG GA-YAS SU GTZUG TOR 'KHOR BSGYUR LA KHRO BCU, GA-YON
DU THUB DBANG NYE SRAS KYIS BSKOR BA,

MDUN DBUS MAR KUN RIG GA-YAS GA-YON DU MI 'KHRUGS PA DANG TSE
DPAG MED GSUM GYI DKYIL 'KHOR,

LING TSE CHUNG BA NYIS BRGYA DRUG CU'I NGOS SU SGO STENG DU KHRO
BO BZHI, GZHAN RNAMS LA BSHAGS LHA SO LNGA, RGYAL

BA RIGS LNGA SOGS SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS NYAN RANG BCAS LHA
SKU NYIS STONG DRUG BRGYA YOD PAR YIG RNYING DU

BSHAD; GA-YAS GA-YON GYI LOGS BRIS PHRENG DRUG RE YOD PA'I
GA-YAS KYI DANG POR 'BRI KHUNG BKA' BRGYUD KYI BLA

RABS; RDO RJE 'CHANG, TE LO, N'A RO, MAR BA, MI LA, SGAM PO
BA, PHAG GRU SOGS,

GNYIS PAR THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA RJE BLO BZANG GRAGS PA, 'JAM
DKAR PA, GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN SOGS,

GSUM PAR DUS 'KHOR GYI LHA SKU KHA SHAS, BZHI PAR SNA TSOGS
GRUB PA'I RGYUD LAS GSUNGS PA'I RIGS KYI YUM

LNGA; GSHIN RJE GDONG DRUG GI YUM LNGA, 'KHOR CHEN YUM LNGA'I
LHA TSOGS, 'JIGS BYED SOGS, LNGA

PAR SGROL MA, RNAL 'BYOR RGYUD LAS 'BYUNG BA'I RGYAL BA RIGS
LNGA, 'JAM DBYANGS, DBYANGS CAN

MA; SPYAN RAS GZIGS DKAR DMAR GNYIS, RNAM RGYAL MA, LO GYON MA
RIGS KHA SHAS, LAS GSHIN

BCAS; DRUG PAR 'OD ZER CAN MA LHA LNGA, RNAM SRAS, DZAm NAG
DZAm SER, DUS 'KHOR NAS BSHAD PA'I

MCHOD PA'I LHA MO BCU GNYIS, LAS GSHIN DMAR BO, GA-YON NGOS
DANG POR SA SKYA PAn CHEN, RDO RJE

'CHANG; BDAG MED MA, BIRWA BA SOGS SA SKYA'I LAM 'BRAS BRGYUD
PA, GNYIS PAR SA BZANG PAn CHEN,

'KHOR CHEN BLA BRGYUD, BU STON RIN PO CHE, LO CHEN SH'AKYA
BZANG PO SOGS, SNA TSOGS YUM, GSUM

PAR DUS 'KHOR NAS GSUNGS PA'I YUM DRUG PHRENG BA BZHI PAR
GSHIN RJE GDONG DRUG RIGS LNGA, 'JIGS

BYED ZHAL GSUM SOGS RIGS LNGA, GSHED DMAR RIGS LNGA, 'KHOR
CHEN RIGS LNGA, LNGA PAR NYI SBAS

LUGS KYI SGROL MA NYER GCIG DRUG PAR PHYAG RDOR GTUM PO, MI
GA-YO BA RIGS GNYIS, RDO RJE RNAL

@146 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

'BYOR RIGS GNYIS, RIGS MA BCU DRUG SGO'I STENG NGOS DUS 'KHOR,
THUB DBANG, CHOS RGYAL

BDUN; RIGS LDAN NYER LNGA, SRAS TSANGS DBANG DANG LHA DBANG,
TSANGS DBANG SRAS 'OD SRUNG,

DUS ZHABS PA CHE CHUNG, KHA CHE ZLA MGON, 'BRO LO TZ'A PA SOGS
DUS 'KHOR BLA BRGYUD, SGO CHEN GA-YAS

LOGS SU 'KHOR LO SDOM PA RIGS LNGA, MGON PO PHYAG BZHI PA DANG
DE'I BLA BRGYUD, SGO'I GA-YON LOGS SU KYEE

RDO RIGS LNGA, BDAG MED MA, KU RU KULLE, YANG KYEE RDOR RIGS
KHA SHAS, GUR MGON LHA MGON

BCU GNYIS, KHYUNG CHEN SNGON PO SOGS YAB KYI PHO NYA, RU 'DREN
SDE BZHI SOGS YUM GYI SPRUL BA'I PHO NYA,

DE NYID KYI BLA BRGYUD, PHYI'I SHAR GYI BYA 'DAB GONG MAR, 'OD
DPAG MED KYI SKU BCU GNYIS, PHYOGS

GZHAN GSUM LA BYANG CHUB CHEN PO'I MCHOD RTEN ZHE DGU, LHA
KHANG LA RNYING SKYON CHE ZHING SNGON NAS YOD PAR BSHAD

KYANG CHOS RJE YAB SRAS KYI SKU DUS PHYIN YIN PA LOGS BRIS BLA
SKU 'GA' ZHIG GIS SHES PAR NUS SO, ,YI DAM

BSTAN SRUNG DU MA'I SMAN SKU SNA TSOGS BZHUGS PA'I LHA KHANG
GSAR BA 'GA' ZHIG SNANG, T'A'I MING BCU GSUM

PA WAN LI RGYAL PO'I DUS RDO RING BTZUGS PA NAS RAB BYUNG BCU
BZHI PA'I ME PHAG PAR LO NYIS BRGYA DANG BCU LHAG

SONG; DE'I STENG DU T'O BKVANG NYER DGU PA SA BYA YAN GYI BGRANG
BYA NYER GSUM BSNAN PAS NYIS BRGYA SO GSUM

LHAG TZAM YIN LA, RDO RING DER KARMA PA SPRUL SKU RGYAL MTSAN
'DI 'KHRUNGS SA SHIN TU HU, KARMAR BZHUGS,

AA STAN RGYAL PO AUR TU SI BE THU SOGS KYIS GDAN DRANGS, AUR
DU, THU MED, KHAL CHEN, CHI KHAR,

KHAL KHA BCAS KYI RGYAL BLON 'BANGS BCAS CHOS LA BCUG THOGS PA
MED PA'I RAL GRI MDUD PA BRGYAB,

RAKSHA SRIN PO THAMS CAD BDE LA BKOD, CUNG LON NAS LHA KHANG
BKA' 'GYUR MANG BO BZHENGS, SHAR HOR

RGYAL GYI DMAG PO CHE NUB PHYOGS SU SONG NAS RGYA MKHAR CHEN
PO BLANGS, DMAG DPON MANG PO DANG DMAG MI 'BUM

PHRAG BSAD PAS, CHANG PHE ZHES PA'I RGYA DMAG KHRI PHRAG MANG
PO DER SLEBS, LO ZLA MANG POR THAG MA CHOD PAR

KARMA'I BLA GRVA SUM BRGYA TZAM BYON NAS RGYA BOD HOR GSUM GYI
GZHUNG LA NOR RDZAS GRANGS MED PA BYIN, RGYA DANG SOG

PO'I DMAG CHEN RANG YUL DU SLOG SEMS CAN MANG PO'I SROG BLUS,
STAG LOR 'DI KA'I MCHOD RTEN RNAMS ZHIG

GSOS MDZAD, KARMA'I SKU GDUNG BZHUGS PA'I LHA KHANG MCHOD RTEN
LA GANG GIS GNOD PA BYED NA RGYAL PO'I KHRIMS

KYI CHAD PA GCOD PA YIN ZHES 'BYUNG YANG, SA PAn GYI GDUNG
RTEN LA DGOS DBANG GIS DE LTAR BTAGS PA MIN

NA KARMA SKU 'PHRENG GANG GI YANG SKU GDUNG NGOS 'DZIN MI 'DUG
CES STAG LUNG PAS BSHAD, 'DI'I LHO NA DUNG RI

ZI'I LHA KHANG, DER THUB DBANG, SMAN BLA, 'OD DPAG MED, NYE
SRAS, SPYAN RAS GZIGS,

'JIGS BYED, MGON CHOS LHA RNAM, 'DI'I MGON PO RANG BYON DU
GRAGS, HONG YANG KHRON GYI SA NAS T'A ZHIN

ZHIG GIS RNGA CONG GI SGRA THOS PAS NGO MTSAR SKYES TE LHA
KHANG LA SRI ZHU BGYIS PA'I NGAG RGYUN SNANG, ` MKHAR DANG

SPRUL PA SDE'I BAR NA T'A HO YE ZER BA'I GSER ZANGS KYI THUB
SKU MI TSAD TZAM BZHUGS PA'I LHA KHANG, T'A'I MING

YUNG LO'I DUS GZUNGS GZHUG PHUL, DE'I RGYAL RABS THA MA KHRUN
DRIN LO BCU DRUG PA'I LO NGAN ZHIG LA RGYA SPRANG

@147 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MANG POS SKU GZUGS PHYI ROL TU BTON, DPRAL BAR RIN PO CHE YE
MIN GRU 'OD 'TSER BA ZHIG YOD PA MTSON

BRGYAB NAS LEN GRAB BYAS PAR ZHAL NAS SGRA GRAGS, ME STAG LTA
BU'I 'OD BYUNG, MTSON RGYAG MKHAN BRGYAL

NAS KHRAG SKYUGS, PHYI NYIN NAS SKU BRNYAN SBAS, LO NGAN 'DZUR
RJES RANG GNAS SU BZHUGS TE MCHOD CES

RGYA'I DKAR CHAG TU 'BYUNG, CHOS RJE SA PAn GYI BLUG SKU, RGYA
BZHENGS KYI GNAS BCU, ` SDE BZHI'I DBUS

SU LANG GRU'U MKHAR, 'DI NANG CHIN YIN ZI ZER BA'I MCHOD RTEN
KHANG BRTZEGS BCU GSUM CAN, TE YIN

ZIR GRAGS PA DE MTSUNGS, GZHAN 'JIM SKU KHA SHAS YOD PA'I LHA
KHANG, 'DI DANG NYE BAR MTSO CHUNG GNYIS,

DE DANG 'DABS 'BREL BAR KHANG MIG KHA SHAS PHRENG BSGRIGS PA'I
NANG DU THUB PA MYANG 'DAS DANG DUS GSUM SANGS

RGYAS; BKA' 'GYUR, RGYA YIG PO TI MANG PO, RIN PO CHE SNA
TSOGS BZHU BTUL BLUGS SU BYAS PA'I CONG

CHEN PO, HO GYA ZI'I BZHI SKOR NA DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS LHA
KHANG GNYIS, MGON KHANG, RDO RJE 'CHANG,

'JAM DBYANGS, TSE DPAG BKA' 'GYUR TSAR GNYIS, ` BAN KO ZIR
RNAM SNANG, DUS GSUM

SANGS RGYAS, SA'I SNYING BO, GZUNGS GRVA LNGA, SMAN BLA, GNAS
BCU, RNAM SRAS RNAMS KYI SKU,

` DUNG PHO ZIR THUB DBANG RDO RJE 'CHANG GI LHA KHANG, ` PAD
MO ZIR STON PA'I SKU, SHU PHO ZIR DUS GSUM SANGS

RGYAS; ` NUB SGO'I PHYI NGOS SU RGYA GAR PHA DAM PA RANG BYON,
DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS, TSANGS PA GSUNG

'BYON; GONG GI BAN KO ZI NAS 'DI'I BAR STAG LUNG PA'I DKAR
CHAG TU MI 'DUG KYANG GZHAN NAS 'BYUNG BAS

BRIS; ` SHAR SGO'I PHYI NA GSER ZANGS KYI SGROL SKU RANG BYON,
` LHO SGO'I PHYI NA Z'A L'O KHRI ZER BA'I LHA KHANG DU

'JIGS BYED ZHAL PHYAG YONGS RDZOGS, RGYA PAn KHA SHAS KYI SDOD
GNAS, ` BYANG SGO'I NANG TO TH'A ZIR KA MA LI SHI'I

MCHOD RTEN DU GRAGS PA YOD, 'DI 'GA' ZHIG GIS KARMA PAKSHI'I
GDUNG RTEN DANG, YANG KA MA LA SHI LA

'DIR PHEBS PA RGYA'I BSHAN PA MI BZHIS MKHAL MA MNYED DE
BKRONG BA'I SKU GDUNG MCHOD RTEN DU BZHENGS MKHAN

SNANG; KARMA PAKSHI BRGYAD CU PA CHU LUG LA MTSUR PHU NAS
GSHEGS GDUNG RUS LA LHA SKU DANG RING BSREL, THUGS

LJAGS SPYAN GSUM PHEBS PA RANG GI GDAN SA GONG 'OG TU BZHUGS,
DE'I SPRUL SKU RANG BYUNG RDO RJE RAB BYUNG LNGA

PA'I SHING SPREL LA 'KHRUNGS, HOR YUL DU LAN GNYIS PHEBS, RJES
MA'I SKABS NGA DRUG PA SA YOS LA HOR

RGYAL PO'I PHO BRANG DU GSHEGS, GDUNG RUS KHA SHAS GDAN SAR
SPYAN DRANGS, KHA SHAS NANG BZHUGS SU PHUL

BA'I GDUNG RTEN KHANG BRTZEGS KYI DBYIBS LTA BU MTHO KHYAD
BZHENGS PA 'DI LA NGOS 'DZIN CING HOR RNAMS CHOS RJE

'DI BAR SNGA MA'I MTSAN GYIS 'BOD PA ZUR NYAMS PAS KA MA LI
SHIR GRAGS, SGO KHYIM GYI SNANG BRNYAN KYANG SKU SHA

SRAB PA SOGS RJE RANG BYUNG BA'I 'DRA SKU YIN ZHES DKAR CHAG
RNAM DAG ME LONG LAS BSHAD, MKHAR 'DI NAS

THANG CHEN BAR MA CHAD PAR NUB STOD RGYA NAG CUNG GAR, KLA KLO
SOGS RGYA NAG GI CHAB 'OG YIN PA DANG MA

YIN PA'I YUL GRU DU MA BRGAL NAS RGYA GAR BYANG STOD LA 'BREL
BAR SNANG, ` LANG GRU'U NAS NUB BYANG NYIN LAM

DRUG BDUN TZAM GYI SAR KAN GRU'U MKHAR, DER KHRI SKOR BCU GSUM
GYI SA LA DBANG BA GONG MA'I BLON CHEN KAN

@148 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GRU'U THE TUS ZHIG GIS RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO GDAN
DRANGS, RGYAL PO'I LUNG GIS DMAG KHRI PHRAG BCU GSUM

TZAM GYIS M'A THIS ZI NAS BSUS, GNAS 'DI RGYAL PO LCAGS 'BAR
GYI SRAS BLO GROS 'PHEL GYIS YE SHES KYI RAL

GRIS KLU BDUD BTUL BA'I GNAS SU NGOS BZUNG, THANG DKYIL DU PHA
BONG SHO 'DRA BA KA BZHI'I TSOD KYI 'GRAM

NAS DRANG SRONG GOS SNGON PO GYON PA ZHIG GIS GSER PHOR BA
GANG PHUL BA KUN GYIS MTHONG, TSE LA DBANG BA'I RIG

'DZIN ZHIG YIN GSUNGS, PHO BRANG NANG DU PHEBS NYIN MI DPON
GYI GA-YOG RNAMS GYIS CHIBS SENG GER MTHONG,

SPOS PHUL BA'I DUD PA LA MUN PA SEL BA'I NYI ZLA SHAR, LHA'I
BU ZHES PA RGYA YIG LA GSAL BA BYUNG, MI DPON

GYIS SKYE BA GSUM TZAM GSAL BAR DRAN, SNYING BO DON GSUM GYI
ZAB CHOS GNANG, KHROM LA BLA MA SPYAN RAS

GZIGS KYI SGRUB THABS LO TZ'A BAS RGYA NAG YU GUR SOG PO RNAMS
SO SO'I SKAD DU BSGYUR, DU THANG MNGA' 'OG GI

BTZON RNAMS BTON, BTZUN GSAR BRGYA TZAM RAB TU BYUNG, MI DPON
GYIS SPOS SBAR BAS, RJE 'DI

NYID RGYAL BA RGYA MTSO'I 'PHRIN LAS PA YIN ZHES SPOS THAL LA
RGYA NAG GI YI GE GZUGS SU BYUNG, CHA GAR GYI RGYAL

RGYUD KYIS GTZOS PA'I DPUNG KHRI PHRAG TZAM ZHIG RGYA NAG GI
LCAGS RI PHYI MA'I NANG DU SHOR BAS THAMS CAD 'JIGS

SHING SKRAG PA NYID KYIS RGYU DNGOS KYIS TSIM PAR BYAS TE RANG
YUL DU BTANG, MKHAR NANG DU THUB PA MYANG 'DAS

KYI SKU BRNYAN SHIN TU CHE BA, PHYI ROL BYE MA'I GAD PA LA SA
PAn GYI PHYAG RJES DANG RDO LA ZHABS RJES 'BUR BTOD,

` 'DI NAS NYIN LAM TZAM NA, GA-YU'I SGROL MA RANG BYON NANG
BZHUGS SU PHUL BA'I SGROL MA DANG, RTA MGRIN

RANG BYON BZHUGS PA'I LHA KHANG NGO MTSAR CAN, KLU BDUD BTUL
BA'I MGO LUS MNAN PA'I GNAS DANG,

YE SHES KYI RAL GRI NANG BZHUGS SU YOD PA'I MCHOD RTEN, BRAG
NGOS SU LHA KHANG NYER LNGA, BRAG LA BRKOS

PA'I LHA SKU KHA SHAS, LHA KHANG GSAR BA GNYIS 'DU KHANG BCAS
DANG MI NYAG RGYAL PO'I MCHOD SDONG DU GRAGS PA'I

BRAG RI CHEN PO'I MDUN NGOS RTZIG PA LA ZHAL BA BRGYAB PA LTA
BU YOD, GA-YAS ZUR DU BRAG LA GE SER STA RMIG TE

RJES YOD PAS M'A THIS ZI'AM BOD DGON DGA' LDAN DAM CHOS GLING
NI KHYUNG TSA DGE BSHES RAB BRTAN GYIS BTAB,

DE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG RNAM RGYAL GYIS KYANG 'DI'I BLA MA
MDZAD, TSOGS CHEN DANG RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GNYIS YOD,

RGYAL DBANG LA NANG SO DPON SHES RAB YON TAN GYIS GTZOS RA
KHYUNG GNYIS KYIS BRGYA 'BUL BYAS, GDAN SAR

MKHAS GRUB DU MA DANG, BDE RGU ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS
RGYA MTSO, LHA RAMS PA NGAG DBANG SHES

RAB; 'BRING SHOS DKA' BCU DPAL LDAN TSUL KHRIMS RNAMS RIM
BZHUGS KYI RJES SU THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE

KHRIR BZHUGS, SLOB CHUNG DU RGYUD PA'I KHRI PA KHYUNG NAG
ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS BSKOS, SKU TSAB

TU GSER KHRI SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN NYI MA GTAN BZHUGS
MDZAD, 'DI BA LANG GRU'I PHYOGS SU 'KHRUNGS PA

SKYES BU DAM PA MANG PO'I LUNG BSTAN BZHIN THU'U BKVAN MCHOG
GIS BDAG GNANG STE KHRI BKA' 'GYUR PA SBYIN PA RGYA

MTSO'I SKYE BAR NGOS BZUNG YANG, 'JAM MGON AA ME'I SKYE
'PHRENG SOGS DGOS DBANG GIS KHRI NGAG DBANG

DPAL BZANG GI SPRUL SKUR GSUNGS, LCAGS STAG LOR BLA BRANG BKRA
SHIS 'OD 'BAR GYI RTEN BRTEN PA SPYAN DBYE'I

@149 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CHO GA BSGRUB PA'I DGA' STON DANG 'BREL BAR GO SAR BTON, SA
KHYI LOR DBUS SU PHEBS TE THUGS GNYER GNANG,

DA LTA SKU PHRENG RIM BYON BZHUGS, 'DU KHANG GSAR BSKRUN DANG
RAB GNAS, BDE LAM GYI KHRID SOGS SNGA

PHYIR BKA' CHOS YANG MANG DU GNANG, AAMBHAN BRGYUD GONG MAR
MKHYEN BCUG STE PEN GYI GSOL RAS ZHU BA DANG,

LHO PHYOGS DMAG THOG NAS PHA ROL BA'I DMAG MANG PO CHAM LA
PHAB PA'I SKAD SNYAN GYI ZHU SHOG PHUL BA DUS MTSUNGS SU

BYUNG BAS GONG NAS THUGS SHIN TU DGYES TE RTEN 'BREL LA DGONGS
RMAD BYUNG RGYAL BA'I GLING ZHES MTSAN BSTZAL,

'BRING SHOS BLA MA BKRA SHIS DPAL LDAN DANG, LHA RAMS PA NGAG
DBANG SHES RAB SOGS KYI SKYE BRGYUD BLA BRANG,

MCHOD GZHIS BA NANG, SNGO ZA, RGYAB ZI, PHAN SHU'U, HANG NO'U,
'BRING SHO'U, KHYUNG ZHI,

KHYUNG TSA, KHYUNG NAG RA CHU, RA RGYAG SOGS RA KHYUNG TSO BCU
BZHI'I DPON CHEN BZHI, DPON CHUNG BCU'I

MNGA' 'BANGS GTOS CHE, ` GNAS SKOR BA 'GA' ZHIG BSDAD PA LAS
CHAGS PA'I RGYA DGON DGA' LDAN CHOS

'KHOR GLING, ` MDUN NGOS KYI LUNG PAR, RGYAL BU BLO GROS 'PHEL
GYI BLA MA AA WA DHU TI BA GSUM GYI BZHUGS

GNAS SU GRAGS PA'I STOD SMAD BAR GSUM GYI SGRUB SDE NGOS
GTZANG BA GSUM YOD PAS THU'U BKVAN RJES, MDO SMAD

BOD YUL BYANG GI MTHA', ,RA KHYUNG ZHES BYA'I SA PHYOGS 'DIR,
,GNA' DUS BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' CHE, ,

RGYAL BU BLO GROS 'PHEL ZHES PAS, ,KLU BDUD GDUG PA BTUL BA'I
GNAS, ,BSIL THANG BYA BA YUL 'DI

STE; ;BLA MA AA WA DHU TI BA, ,RNAM GSUM BZHUGS PA'I SA CHA
YANG, ,DGON PA GONG 'OG BAR GSUM

GYI; ;GNAS 'DI YIN ZHES KUN LA GRAGS, ,BRAG LA BRKOS PA'I
MCHOD RTEN DANG, LHA KHANG NGO MTSAR

CAN DU MAS, ,RI LUNG GANG BA LA DPAGS NA, ,KHYAD 'PHAGS GNAS
SU NGES PA SKYED, ,LHAG PAR

BRAG LA BRKOS PA YI, ,SGRUB KHANG DBEN ZHING NYAMS DGA' MANG,
,GNA' DUS SGRUB LA GZHOL BA YI, ,

SKAL LDAN MANG DU BYUNG BAR NGES, ,YUL 'DI'I 'BROG PA'I MI
RNAMS NI, ,DAD PA CHE ZHING GA-YO SGYU CHUNG,

MTHA' GNYIS MA LHUNG 'BYOR BA LDAN, ,'THAB RTZOD MED PAR PHAN
TSUN MTHUN, ,ZHES GSUNGS SO,

` YU GUR DU BHA TA RU BA ZER BA'I PHA TSO GCIG DANG, SGOM
GRVA'I SHUL GYI GYANG RO 'GA' DA LTA YANG YOD PAS BSAM

YAS SRUNG MA BKUG PA'I GNAS BHA TA HOR GYI SGOM GRVAR NGOS
'DZIN, SOG SKAD DU SHA RA AURGE ZHES PA GUR SER

PO'I MING YIN PAS AU RGE SGRA LOG STE YU GUR ZER BAR SNANG
ZHES HOR GUR SER SA CHAR YANG BSHAD, DA DUNG YANG

DKOR BDAG GDUG RTZUB SHIN TU CHE ZHING, RGYAL GSOL DANG PHYOGS
MTHUN PA'I MCHOD THABS YOD 'DUG

DER HOR SGOM PAS BTAB PA'I BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING, ` LHO BA NANG
SO'I LHA KHANG, ` KO KYA ZHABS DRUNG GI LHA

KHANG; ` HAS ZI RI KHROD, 'GU ZHABS DRUNG GIS BTAB PA'I LUNG
SKYA DGON PA, NYID DANG KHYUNG TSA ZHABS

DRUNG; RONG 'GAD ZHABS DRUNG SOG RIM BYON GYIS SKYONG, ` CHOS
RJE NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG GIS BTAB PA

BE RIN RI KHROD NI YIL GER ZHABS DRUNG RIM BYON GYIS SKYONG, `
DKA' BCU SHES RAB GYIS BTZUGS PA'I BLAN

PO LUNG GI SGRUB SDE, ` SMAN CHU DGON DU SMON NE BLA MA, BZANG
RIN ZHABS DRUNG, YIL GER ZHABS DRUNG

@150 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SOGS KYI SKYE BRGYUD BZHUGS, ` LUNG SER RI KHROD, ` HO YOR AE
KHE'I RI KHROD, SO KYA BLA MAS BTAB PA

RTA MGO DGON SOGS DGON PHRAN MANG, MCHOD GZHIS YANG YIL GER
TSO BA, RONG 'GANG TSO BA SOGS TSO BA BRGYA

DANG LNGA'I DPON 'BANGS RGYA CHE, ` KAN GRU'I MKHAR GYI NUB
STOD NYIN LAM KHA SHAS NA SHUS GRU'I ZER BA'I RGYA NAG

GI GRONG KHYER, DE'I NUB TU KY'A YI BKVAN TE SNGON RGYA NAG GI
SA MTSAMS LCAGS RI SHING SGO CAN DMAG MI BCAS

SDOD PA'I GNAS YOD LA, GONG MA CHEN LUNG GI DUS DE'I PHYI ROL
ZLA LAM DANG ZHAG LAM DU MAS CHOD PA'I SA LA DBANG

BSGYUR; SHUS GRU'I PHYOGS 'DIR, SNGON BAL YUL GYI L'A SAR ZHES
PAR 'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYA GAR DU BYON

NAS GRUB PA THOB PA MANYDZU SHRI GRUB BE'AM RJE BTZUN GRAGS
PA, GSANG MTSAN LAS RAB RDO RJER 'BOD PAS BLA

MA'I LUNG BSTAN BZHIN RGYA HOR GYI YUL DU BYON, HOR GYI DPON
PO HO LO CHI'I BLA MCHOD MDZAD, DGUNG LO

DON BZHI PA SHING YOS LO'I THA SKAR ZLA BA'I YAR TSES LA NGA
RANG ZHAG BDUN MTSAMS LA SDOD RGYU YIN PAS DE'I BAR DU

SU YANG MA YONG GSUNGS, TSES DGU'I NYIN ZHAG GRANGS TSANG BAS
NANG DU SONG SKABS BLA MA MI SNANG BAR KHRI THOG TU

NA BZA' BZHUGS PA'I DKYIL DU SKU RGYU ZHUN THIG 'DRA BA'I 'JAM
DBYANGS DMAR SER GYI SKU KHRU GANG BA PHYAG GA-YAS

KYI PAD STENG RDO RJE RTZE LNGA PA DANG, GA-YON GYI PAD STENG
GLEGS BAM YOD PA ZHIG RNYED PA RTEN DU BZUNG, HO LO

CHI'I SRAS NOM CHI THA'I JI SOGS KYIS LHA KHANG NANG DU, TZAN
DAN GYI RIGS GSUM MGON PO'I SKU BZHENGS KYANG

PHYI BA'I RGYAL POS DMAG DRANGS TE MER BSREGS, DE RJES SA
PAndI TA PHEBS SKABS RTEN DE'I LO RGYUS GSAN PAR

BRTEN; RGYAL BLON 'BANGS BCAS KHRID DE PHYOGS KUN TU BTZAL BAS
BYANG NGOS MCHOD RTEN 'DRA BA'I RI'I RTZA BA

NAS 'JAM DBYANGS SKU DE 'OD LHANG NGER BZHUGS PA RNYED, HOR SE
CHEN GYIS LHA KHANG GSAR BA, DUS GSUM

SANGS RGYAS, GNAS BRTAN BCU DRUG BCA BZHENGS TE SA PAn LA RAB
GNAS ZHUS, DGON CHUNG ZHIG KYANG

BTAB; RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO PHEBS DUS NYID KYIS 'JAM
DBYANGS SENG CHIBS 'JA' TSON GYIS BSKOR

NAS BYON PA GZIGS, ZHABS PHYI TSOS MI DKAR KHYI DKAR KHRID PA
MTHONG, GNAS 'DIR ZLA BA GSUM

BZHUGS; BRAG KHUNG GSAR DU BRKOS PA'I NANG DU 'JAM DBYANGS KYI
SKU BZHENGS NAS SNGAR GYI 'JAM DBYANGS

RANG BYON NANG BZHUGS SU PHUL, GZHAN PHYAG MTSAN RDO RJE NANG
RTEN DU BZHUGS PA'I PHYAG RDOR, SANGS

RGYAS KYI RING BSREL, RGYAL BA RANG GI PHYAG 'PHRENG, SA PAn
GYI DBU RGYAN SOGS RTEN DU BZHAG PA'I SPYAN RAS

GZIGS BCAS BZHENGS, RJE NYID DGE 'DUN SUM BRGYA DANG BCAS PAS
RAB GNAS MDZAD, DE NAS LO

MANG RABS SONG RJES GO TAM RGYAL POS DMAG RGYAB NAS GNOD TSABS
CHE BAS RE ZHIG SDOD MKHAN MA BYUNG, MTSAMS

ZHIG KA CU'I PHYOGS KYI ZI KYA DGE SLONG DPAL LDAN BSOD NAMS
ZHES PAS GNAS 'DZIN BYAS YOD SKABS, RGYA

NAG WAN LI KHRIR BZHUGS ZHE GSUM PAR SHUG CU MKHAR GYI RGYA
DPON JO BO HU YE ZER BA DAD PA MJAL DU 'ONG BA

LA; 'JAM DBYANGS KYI SPRUL BA'I RGAD POS KHRE THUG BYIN PA
SOGS KYIS LHAG PAR GUS PA 'PHEL, GZHAN LA

DGE BSKUL GYIS LHA KHANG LEGS PAR PHUB STE SMON LAM BTAB, GONG
MA KHANG ZHI'I DUS ZI KYA DGE SLONG SBYIN PA RGYA

@151 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MTSOS ZHIG GSOS BYAS, DE SKABS RA LJAGS AERKHE NANG SO DANG,
ZU KYA CANG LO YE GNYIS KYIS 'JAM

DBYANGS KYI MDUN NGOS SU LHA KHANG CHE LEGS ZHIG PHUB, DER
BYAMS PA BZHENGS BSAM YANG STONG 'KHOR MDO

RGYUD RGYA MTSOS RAB GNAS SKABS LHA KHANG 'DIS RJES SOR 'DU
KHANG YONG BAR 'DUG CES LUNG BSTAN, STONG

'KHOR PA RANG NAS DGON PA 'DEBS BZHES KYANG ZHU MKHAN MA BYUNG
BAR LUS, DGON CHE BA THOG MAR 'DEBS

PA BO 'GU CHOS RJE CHOS RGYA MTSO NI, LANG GRU'I PADMO'I SDE'I
CHAR GTOGS 'GU TSO BAR 'KHRUNGS, KHA TI KA

PA'I KO ZI'I GDUNG RGYUD, BLA MA GE GEN ZHES PA LAS GZHON DUS
NAS RAB TU BYUNG, BKRA SHIS CHOS 'PHEL

GLING DANG, KHA TI KA GNYIS SU YUN RING BZHUGS TE THOS PA
MDZAD, YUL DU BYON PAS LANG GRU'I ZUN T'A LO

YES BLA MAR BKUR, YON MCHOD GNYIS LANG GRU'I PADMO'I SDE'I RI
KHROD DANG, GYANG RING DGON PA BTAB,

ZUN T'A LO YE KAN GRU'I THE TU'I BYAS SKABS LUNG GSUM PHYOGS
KYIS CHOS LUNG LHA KHANG DU MA nI BUM SGRUB LA GDAN

DRANGS; DE GROL NAS 'JAM DBYANGS MJAL BAR PHEBS, DER RAB BYUNG
BSNYEN RDZOGS MANG DU BSGRUBS,

PHYIR PHEBS, DER RAB BYUNG BSNYEN RDZOGS MANG DU BSGRUBS,

PHYIR PHYIPHEBS KHAR DUNG DKAR LUS PA SOGS RTEN 'BREL 'GRIGS PA
PHYOGS DE'I DPON 'BANGS KUN GYIS DGON PA

'DEBS PAR ZHUS PAS THUGS DGYES, ZUN T'A LO YE LA BKA' GNANG
BAS DES KYANG SUG JU'I RGYA BOD KYI SEMS

LA YOD NA SHIN TU LEGS 'DUG NGAS KYANG MTHUN RKYEN ZHU ZER BA
LTAR DBUS SU RGYAL BA YAB SRA LA ZHU SHOG PHUL

BA'I LAN DU GRVA TSANG BTAB NA BSTAN PA LA PHAN PA YONG PA'I
LUNG BSTAN DANG, LNGA PA CHEN POS DGON PA'I MING

DGA' LDAN TSOGS BSAGS GLING BKA' SHOG PHYAG THAM BCAS BSTZAL,
RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHES BCA' YIG KYANG

GNANG BA BZHIN RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SHING STAG LOR DGON PA
BTAB, DPON 'BANGS DAD LDAN SO SOS

DBYAR GNAS DANG CHOS THOG GTONG MKHAN MANG DU BYUNG BA'I THOG
MA THOG SHUL SE CHEN CHOS RJES BTANG BA'I CHOS

THOG LA BSHAD GRVA YANG BTZUGS PAS MDUNG NAG 'JAM DBYANGS DGON
ZHES SNYAN PAR GRAGS, 'GU CHOS RJE BSHEt

RJES DE'I TSA BO LHA RAMS PA BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSOS KHRI MDZAD
PA 'KHRUNGS SA LA JU, GYANG RING DANG SER BYES

SU SLOB GNYER MDZAD, BSDUS GRVA RIGS LAM YANG GSAL ZHES PA
BRTZAMS, NAGS YANG BKRA SHIS DGE

'PHEL GLING GI KHRI YANG MDZAD, ` LANG DU DOR SHU'I CHOS RJE
SER BYED PA MTSAN MA RNYED, SLAR YANG LHA RAMS

PA BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO, 'DI'I SPRUL SKU 'GU TSO BAR
'KHRUNGS, ` CHOS RJE GONG MA'I TSA BO BLO BZANG BSTAN

'DZIN KYANG RING DANG SER BYES SU SLOB GNYER MDZAD, HAL HA
PHYOGS SU 'BUL BSDUD GNANG STE 'JAM DBYANGS

LHA KHANG GSUM THOG BZHENGS, ` SUG JU'I KO KYANG HOS RJE NGAG
DBANG RAB BRTAN DBUS SU LAN GNYIS BYON KYANG

GRVA SAR BZHUGS MA THUB PAS RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHE'I LUNG BSTAN
BZHIN DGON LUNG DU SLOB GNYER DANG GLING BSRE,

RGYA NAG TU LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE'I ZHABS PHYI BYON KYANG SKU
GZIGS MA BDE BAS SGOM ZHIS GRUB CHEN GYI LUNG BSTAN LTAR

'JAM DBYANGS KYI MDUN DU BZHUGS, KHRIR PHEBS TE DBANG RJES
GNANG SOGS MANG PO GNANG, CHU YOS

DUS 'KHRUGS KYI 'JUG TU DGON LUNG RI KHROD DU BZHUGS TE CHOS
BKA' RGYA CHEN PO GNANG, DE'I SPRUL SKU KO KYA@152 (TZONG CHU'I BYANG RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO THU'U BKVAN
RIN PO CHE'I DNGOS SLOB THUGS NANG SHIN TU NYE,

SGOM ZHIS DGE 'DUN BZANG PO'I SPRUL SKU MCHOG GRUB RGYAL MTSAN,
` SLAR YANG BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN,

SPRUL SKU LANG JU'I PHYOGS SU 'KHRUNGS, ` 'GU ZHABS DRUNG NI 'GU
TSO BAR 'KHRUNGS, NAGS YANGS DGE 'PHEL

GLING DU RAB TU BYUNG, DGUNG LO DGU BA LA GNAS 'DIR PHEBS, BCU
GNYIS PA LA KHRIR BZHUGS, BCO

LNGA PA LA GNANG BA ZHUS TE BOD DU PHEBS PAR DGONGS KYANG DVAGS
PO ZHABS DRUNG GI LUNG BSTAN LTAR GYANG RING DU

SLOB GNYER DANG MTSAN BTAGS MDZAD, ` SUG JU'I B'A LUNG PA CHOS
RJE BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB DGON LUNG GLING

BSRE PA, SPRUL SKU SUG JUR 'KHRUNGS, ` SUG JU'I M'A GYANG CHOS
RJE NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS DGON LUNG DGE

BSHES; 'DIS BKA' 'GYUR BZHENGS, SPRUL SKU HOR ZHABS DRUNG GI SKU
MCHED DU 'KHRUNGS, ` SUG

JU'I GA-YAS RU'I PHYOGS SU 'KHRUNGS PA CANG YIN CHOS RJE 'JAM
DBYANGS RGYAL MTSAN SGO MANG DGE BSHES, SPRUL

SKU SUG JU'I KADHAR 'KHRUNGS, ` SLAR YANG 'GU ZHABS DRUNG BZHUGS
TE 'DU KHANG KHYAD 'PHAGS BZHENGS,

DVAGS PO RIN PO CHE'I BKA' BZHIN SBYIN BDAG BSKUL TE ME SPREL LA
CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM GSAR 'DZUGS DANG,

GZHAN CHOS RGYAL GTOR SGRUB 'CHAM BCAS BTZUGS, RAB BYUNG BCU
GNYIS PA'I LCAGS KHYI LOR RGYA YAG ZHABS

DRUNG TSA GAD HO THOG THUS DGON 'DI'I DKAR CHAG MDZAD SNANG, DE
LAS 'DI BTUS LA CHOS SDE BTAB NAS BRGYA

DANG DON LNGA PA SA BYA 'DI YIN, PHYIS SU THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE
KHRIR BZHUGS, RA RGYAGS DPON SLOB SLOB

CHUNG DU BSKOS, ` GZHAN PHUR TSANG LHA KHANG, ` TING KYA RAB
'BYAMS PA SNYAN GRAGS RGYA MTSOS DAR BAR

MDZAD PA'I DGON CHUNG BA CHOS 'KHOR GLING YER KHU ZHABS DRUNG,
KO KYA ZHABS DRUNG, M'A TSA ZHABS DRUNG,

THOG SHU'I ZHABS DRUNG, CANG YEN ZHABS DRUNG, GCUR ZHABS DRUNG
SOGS DGON CHE CHUNG GNYIS KAR BLA MA

MANG PO DANG, MCHOD GZHIS MDUNG NAG GI SA SNE THO'U LE NAS BZUNG
MDUNG NAG KHA GSUM SDE DRUG PHUR TSA

DPON PO, KHYUNG TSA DPON PO, M'A TSA DPON PO, GLING DPON PO SOGS
KYI MNGA' 'BANGS TSO BA DRUG DANG

GA-YAS RU SOGS RGYA CHE, ` GZHAN RA RGYAGS DPON SLOB KYI SGAR, `
YER KHU LHA KHANG, SA PAn GYI ZHABS

RJES BZHUGS PA'I LHA KHANG, ` BSHES GNYEN LHA KHANG, ` CHOS LUNG
MDO'I BKRA SHIS LHA KHANG, ` 'JAM

DBYANGS DGON GYI MCHOD GZHIS SNE NA BLO BZANG LHA KHANG SOGS
YOD, ` BYANG NGOS KYI CHU PHAL CHER TZONG 'JU LAG

GNYIS SU 'BAB PA LAN JU'I MKHAR GYI STOD TZAM NAS RMA CHU DANG
RIM BZHIN 'DRES LA, CHU NAG MTSO SNGON GYI BYANG

PHYOGS NAS BYUNG STE SUG JU DANG, GAN JU MKHAR GNYIS KYI BAR
BRGYUD BYANG SHAR DU 'BAB PAR BSHAD,

'JU LAG RGYUD DANG, DPA' RE PHO ROD, KAN LANG SHUS GSUM SOGS KYI
SKABS SO,, ,,

@153 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

*, ,TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,

*, ,BYANG GI TZONG CHU DANG LHO'I RMA CHU'I BAR DU, THUB BSTAN
SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR RJE BLA MA'I MDO SNGAGS ZUNG

'BREL GYI BSTAN PA 'DI NYID RGYUN RING DU GNAS PA'I RTEN 'BREL
GYI MTSAN MA TZONG LA RING MOR GRAGS PA SHAR DU

LAN JU DANG NYE ZHING, NUB TU YANG NYIN ZHAG DU MA'I BAR DU YOD
PA'I RI RGYUD SHIN TU RING BA 'DI LA LHO BYANG

GNYIS SU YOD PA'I BYANG RGYUD TZONG SRIB KYI GNAS KYI SNYING BO
SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING NI, JING GIR RGYAL RABS

THA MA THO GAN THE MUR GYI LO NYER LNGA PA RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I
ME BYA'I LOR RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO GNAS 'DIR SKU

BLTAMS; LTE BA BCAD PA'I KHRAG 'DZIN MAR LHUNG BA LAS TZAN DAN
GYI LJON PA CHEN PO YAL 'DAB 'BUM DANG

LDAN PA, 'DAB MA RE RE LA RGYAL BA SENG GE NGA RO'I SNANG BRNYAN
RI MO MKHAN GYIS BRIS PA LTAR SKYE MCHED RDZOGS

SHING YID 'PHROG PAS MTSAN PA RANG BYON DU 'KHRUNGS PAS GNAS KYI
MING LA YANG SKU 'BUM DU THOGS, RJE DGUNG

LO GSUM PA LA KARMA ROL BA'I RDO RJE'I DRUNG DU DGE BSNYEN GYI
SDOM PA BZHES SKABS YAB YUM GNYIS LA, BYIS PA

'DI SA MTHON PO LA GNAS PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' CHEN PO ZHIG
YIN PAR 'DUG PAS GCES SPRAS GANG DRAG

GYIS; NGA'I RMI LAM DU PHYOGS DER TZAN DAN GYI LJON SHING SHIN
TU CHE BA ZHIG SKYES 'DUG PA'I GRIB BSIL DU SROG

CHAGS GRANGS MED PA NGAL GSO BAR RMIS PAS MI RING BAR LTE KHRAG
BOR BA'I SA DER LJON SHING KHYAD PAR CAN SKYE BAR

'DUG SHING DES MA 'ONGS PA NA 'GRO BA RNAMS PHAN THOGS PAR 'GYUR
ZHES LUNG BSTAN, 'KHRUNGS SAR

TZAN DAN SKYES PA DANG, DE'I LO MA 'BUM LA SANGS RGYAS KYI SKU
'BUM THON TSUL RJE NYID KYIS KYANG ZHVA LU LCOG CHEN

PA LA GSUNGS SNANG, RJE DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PA'I SKABS SU YUM
GYIS DBU SKRA DKAR PO'I LAN BU DANG BCAS

MDO SMAD DU 'BYON PAR GSOL BA BTAB PAS RJE DPON GRAGS PA RGYAL
MTSAN SKU TSAB TU MNGAGS TE YUM DANG AA CE

GNYIS LA RJE RANG GI SKU THANG RE DANG BDE MCHOG BUM SKU, RGYAL
BA SENG GE NGA RO'I SKU PAR BCAS GNANG STE, KHO

BO SKYE SA DER 'DI'I SKU 'BUM PHRAG BTAB PA NANG RTEN BYAS, TZAN
DAN GYI SDONG BO NYID SNYING POR BYAS PA'I MCHOD

RTEN ZHIG BZHENGS NA BDAG DER 'ONG BA DANG KHYAD PAR MED CES
BKA' GNANG, YUM GYIS THUGS KHUR BZHES

TE PAD SPUNGS MCHOD RTEN BZHENGS, RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SA PHAG LA
RJE MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS NAS LO BRGYA DANG

ZHE GCIG 'DAS SHING, T'A'I MING KYA CHING KHRIR BZHUGS SO DGU PA
RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I LCAGS SPREL LOR SGOM PA

RIN CHEN BRTZON 'GRUS KYIS GNAS GZHI BZUNG STE LO BCU BDUN SONG
BA'I RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I ME GLANG WAN LI

GNAM LO LNGA PAR BYAMS MGON DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PA'I SKU TSAD
RTEN DANG BRTEN PAR BCAS PA BZHENGS, NANG

RTEN DU SANGS RGYAS KYI 'PHEL GDUNG BYA SGONG MA, YAB KLU 'BUM
DGE'I DBU THOD LA 'JAM DBYANGS KYI SKU 'BUR

@154 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

DOD DU YOD PA SOGS BZHUGS, RJE 'KHRUNGS PA'I ME BYA NAS NYIS
BRGYA DANG NYER DRUG 'DAS SHING, WAN LI

GNAM LO BCU GCIG PA RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I CHU LUG LOR ZHING SKYONG
NANG SOS GDAN DRANGS TE RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS

RGYA MTSO GNAS 'DIR PHEBS, SA 'DUL MDZAD CING CHOS SDE BTAB,
'DUL BA CHOS RJE SNGA MA BRTZON 'GRUS

RGYAL MTSAN BZANG PO BLA MAR BSKOS, DE NAS LO LNGA PA SA KHYI
LOR RGYAL BA'I BKA' BZHIN MCHOD SDONG CHEN MO

BYANG CHUB MCHOD RTEN GYI DBYIBS SU BSGYUR, CHU LUG NAS LO NYER
GCIG PA CHU YOS LA RGYAL BA YON TAN RGYA MTSO

SOG YUL NAS YAR PHEBS SKABS 'GRIG LAM SOGS LA DAG THER MDZAD,
'DUL BA CHOS RJE PHYI MA 'OD ZER RGYA

MTSO DGUNG LO ZHE BDUN PA LA GDAN SAR BSKOS PA LTAR NA DGUNG
SNYING ME SBRUL DU MNGON, DE NAS LO DGU SONG

PA'I RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I CHU BYI LA 'CHAD NYAN GSAR DU BTZUGS TE
LO LNGA'I BAR DU BSKYANGS, ` KHRI THOG GNYIS

PA GO'U BA CHOS RGYA MTSO RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I ME SBRUL LA KHRIR
BZHUGS, ` SLAR YANG 'OD ZER RGYA MTSO BZHUGS,
