GDAN RABS RNA BA'I BCUD LEN DU, LCAGS PHAG LO NAS KHRI YANG
BSKYAR LO GNYIS GSUNGS PA YIG NOR RAM

BRTAG RE BDUN PA CHU PHAG LA 'DAS, ` 'PHAN PO PA SHES RAB DPAL
BZANG GIS SA SBRUL LOR SDE BA CHOS

RJE LA RDOR 'PHRENG DBANG ZHUS, DGON SDE'I BYANG NGOS SU MCHOD
RTEN BZHENGS, ` CHU BZANG RNAM RGYAL DPAL

'BYOR T'A'I MING KHRUN tI GNAM LO BCU DRUG PA RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG
PA'I CHU RTA'I LOR HAL HA NAS BYON PA AE RTI NI

HUNG THA'I JIS RGYU RKYEN SBYAR TE SNGAR GYI BYANG CHUB MCHOD
RTEN RIN CHEN SNA TSOGS KYI PHRA RGYAN CAN DNGUL GDUNG CHO

'PHRUL MCHOD RTEN GYI RNAM PAR BZHENGS PA LA RJE 'DIS RAB GNAS
MDZAD, ` RGYAL BA CHOS RJE BKRA SHIS DON

GRUB; RGYAL DBANG GI BKA' BZHIN SE CHEN RGYAL PO'I BLA MCHOD
KYANG MDZAD, ` BTZAN PO DON GRUB RGYA MTSO

RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I CHU RTA LA KHRIR BZHUGS, ` GDONG KHAB
CHE SHOS DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I DUS CHU 'BRUG

LOR LNGA PA CHEN PO GNAS 'DIR PHEBS, DGON PA'I MDUN NGOS RGYAL
BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I BZHUGS KHRI'I

STENG NAS LAM RIM CHOS THUN GCIG GNANG, ` KHYUNG THAR BA BSOD
NAMS RIN CHEN, ` RA KHO CHOS BKRA

SHIS; ` RDO SBIS BYAMS PA DPAL BZANG, ` GZIMS KHANG GONG MA 'JAM
DBYANGS DPAL 'BYOR, `

LI THANG BA BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS, ` DKAR PO PA YON TAN BLO GROS, `
KHYUNG THAR PA SANGS RGYAS LHUN GRUB, `

AA KY'A SHES RAB BZANG PO KHANG ZHI RGYAL PO KHRIR BZHUGS NYER
LNGA PA ME STAG LA BZHUGS, RGYAL BA'I BZHUGS GNAS

BLA BRANG CHEN MO DANG, BZHUGS KHRI NGO MA'I KHRI STENG DU KHANG
PA, 'DU KHANG KVA BA BRGYAD CU CAN RNAMS GSAR

BZHENGS; ` STAG MTSER BLO BZANG RDO RJE RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I
LCAGS LUG LA BZHUGS, ` CHU BZANG

BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN KHANG ZHI SO LNGA PA ME BYI LOR
KHRIR BZHUGS, DE'I BCU GSUM PA SA BYI LO RGYAL BA

SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO 'KHRUNGS, GSER GDUNG CHEN MO'I MCHOD RTEN
RGYA BSKYED CING LHA KHANG DANG RGYA PHIBS GSAR

BSKRUN; ` SKYOR MO LUNG BA 'JAM DBYANGS RGYAL MTSAN CHU SBRUL LA
BZHUGS, RGYAL BA DGUNG LO DGU PA ME

SPREL LA 'DIR PHEBS, ` RGYAL MKHAN PO NO MO HAN BLO BZANG DON
GRUB KHANG ZHI NGA DRUG PA ME BYA LA KHRIR

@155 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

BZHUGS; ` SER DRIS TSUL KHRIMS RIN CHEN RE GCIG PA MTSO SNGON
DUS 'KHRUGS SKABS SHING 'BRUG LOR RGYA

DPON RNAMS BGROS THOG NAS BSKOS, ` STAG MTSER BLO BZANG DAR
RGYAS DON GCIG PA SA BYA LA BZHUGS, `

RA KHO DPON SLOB SHES RAB CHOS 'BYOR NGA DGU PA LCAGS PHAG LA
BZHUGS, GONG BA MTSAN SGROGS MKHAN CHEN

DGE 'DUN DON GRUB RE BDUN PA SHING STAG LA BZHUGS, MI DBANG GIS
BDAG RKYEN MDZAD DE LCAGS SPREL LOR

LHA KHANG CHEN MO'I STENG DU GSER GYI RGYA PHIBS BZHENGS, ` ZI
NA NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA CHEN LUNG GNAM LO DRUG

PA NGA DGU PA LCAGS BYA LA BZHUGS, ` GSER TOG NO MO HAN NGAG
DBANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN RE GSUM PA

ME STAG LA KHRIR BZHUGS, DGON PA'I BYANG NGOS SU MCHOD RTEN SGO
BZHI MA BZHENGS, CHING WANG BSTAN 'DZIN

DBANG PHYUG DANG, DPON MO AERKHE SHAR GNYIS KYIS LHA KHANG CHEN
MOR GSER ZANGS KYI MDA' YAB PHUL, `MI

NYAG BLO GROS DAR RGYAS DON LNGA PA SA SBRUL LA BZHUGS, LO DER
LCANG SKYA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA GNAS 'DIR

PHEBS; ` CHU BZANG RIN PO CHE NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG
NYER BRGYAD PA CHU SPREL LA BZHUGS, `

STAG MTSER YE SHES SKAL BZANG NGA BRGYAD PA CHU RTA LA BZHUGS,
AA KY'A BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DANG,

JUN WANG DKON MCHOG BKRA SHIS GNYIS KYIS BDAG RKYEN MDZAD DE LHA
KHANG CHEN MO GSAR BZHENGS KYI DKAR CHAG

TSANGS SRAS DGYES PA'I GLU DBYANGS KUN MKHYEN GNYIS PAS MDZAD,
'JAM DBYANGS CHOS KYI RGYAL PO DKON

MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG BO DGUNG LO SO BRGYAD PA SHING BYA ZLA BA
DRUG PA'I TSES BRGYAD NYIN KHRIR ZHABS SEN

BKOD; GDAN 'DREN GYI MI SNA 'BYOR RGYU'I DGUNG MO MNAL LAM DU,
BKA' SHOG CIG BYUNG BA LJAGS KLOG

MDZAD NAS THAM KAR GZIGS PAR SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI THAM KA RGYAL
ZER BA ZHIG BYUNG BAS GSANG RNAM LAS, MDO

SMAD YUL GYI GDAN SA CHEN PO KUN, ,'KHOR LO GSUM GYIS SKYONG BAR
MDZAD PA'I TSE, ,SPYAN RAS GZIGS

KYIS LUNG BSTAN BSKUL MA MDZAD, ,GZHAN PHAN SNYING RJE'I ROL BA
KHO NAR NGES, ,ZHES GSUNGS LA, GDAN

SA CHEN PO 'DI ZHVA SER GYI BSTAN PA'I RTZA LAG GZHAN DANG MI
'DRA BA YIN PAS CHOS SRID GNYIS KYI SGO NAS THUGS KHUR

CHE BZHES MDZAD DE, SLOB GNYER BA RNAMS LA RANG RANG GI BLO KHA
MTHO DMAN DANG BSTUN GZHUNG CHE CHUNG SO SO'I

STENG NAS 'DZUB KHRID, KHAS LEN SKYOR BA, BGRO GLENG GTONG LUGS
SLOB PA, TSIG RGYUG DANG DON RGYUG

LEN PA, TSUL MTHUN YON TAN CAN SU YIN YANG GZHAN LAS KHYAD DU
THON PA'I BDAG RKYEN MDZAD PA SOGS RTING

BSKUL SGO DU MA NAS MDZAD PAS 'CHAD NYAN ME LTAR 'BAR, SNGA SOR
RGAN PA RNAMS CHOS GRVAR SONG MI CHOG PA LTA

BU'I DPE NGAN ZHIG 'DUG PA DGAG PHYIR LAM RIM 'DZIN GRVA BTZUGS
TE BGRES PA RNAMS DER PHEBS RGYU BYAS,

GZHAN YANG SGRIG LAM NYAMS PA RNAMS GSOS SHING YUL DUS DANG
BSTUN PA'I GSAR 'DZUGS KYANG 'GA' ZHIG

MDZAD; MCHOD YON TSANG MAS 'DUN PA GCIG DRIL GYIS ZHUS PA BZHIN
BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI BCA' YIG PADMA

DKAR PO'I 'PHRENG BA BRTZAMS, NAM BZHUGS SU SPYI CHOS CHAG MED
KYI STENG GSANG BDE 'JIGS GSUM, PHYAG

RDOR 'KHOR CHEN SOGS KYI DBANG, SNAR THANG BRGYA RTZA, SGRUB
THABS RIN 'BYUNG SOGS KYI RJES GNANG,

@156 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

BKA' GDAMS GZHUNG DRUG CHOS CHUNG BRGYA RTZA SOGS CHOS 'KHOR
RGYA CHEN BSKOR BAS BGRES GZHON MTHA'

DAG NAS SANGS RGYAS DNGOS SU MTHONG BA'I MOS GUS TSAD MED CING,
RJE NYID NAS KYANG NGED LA BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL

DANG; SKU 'BUM GNYIS 'DUG SA'I MING TZAM MA GTOGS KHYAD MED
GSUNG RNAM PA KUN TU BDAG GIR BZHES TE

SKYONG BAR MDZAD PAS BLA MA GDAN ZUR DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DUS
THOG DER BZHUGS PA ZHIG LA DNGOS SLOB DU

MA GYUR BA MED, LCAGS PHAG LOR KHA TI KHA PA SMAN PA DKON MCHOG
YAR 'PHEL GYIS ZHUS TE BRGYAD STONG PA'I

LJAGS LUNG GNANG SKABS SKAL LDAN 'GA' ZHIG LA MTHONG SNANG KHYAD
PAR CAN BYUNG TSUL GSANG RNAM DU, 'BROM

RJES STONG CHEN THIG LE'I SPRO BSDU BZHIN, ,GZUGS SKU'I BKOD PA
DBYINGS SU SDUD PA'I BRDAR, ,GRE PHUG

AA YIG 'OD KYI RANG BZHIN CAN, ,SKAL LDAN DU MA'I MIG LA MNGON
SUM BSTAN, ,ZHES GSUNGS LA,

RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS AA LAS BYUNG ZHES BRTAN GA-YO MTHA' DAG
GI 'BYUNG GNAS SU GSUNGS PA BZHIN PHYIS 'BYUNG

GI RTEN 'BREL KHYAD PAR CAN YANG YIN PAR SEMS, ` MGON KYA GRAGS
PA RGYAL MTSAN SO DGU PA SA BYI LA

BZHUGS; AA KY'A ZHABS DRUNG RIN CHEN DANG, LA SAR T'A BLA MA BLO
BZANG CHOS DAR GNYIS KYIS MTHUN RKYEN

SBYAR TE ME SPREL LOR 'DU KHANG RGYA BSKYED, RA KHO DPON PO
SANGS RGYAS LHUN GRUB KYIS TSONG RA'I NANG DU BDE GSHEGS

MCHOD RTEN BRGYAD BZHENGS, ` CHU BZANG RIN PO CHE NGAG DBANG
THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG SLAR YANG RAB BYUNG

BCU GSUM PA'I ME BYA LOR BZHUGS, CHEN LUNG KHRIR BZHUGS ZHE BZHI
PA SA PHAG LOR SNANG BA MTHA' YAS PAn

CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES CHIBS BSGYUR BAR GANG CI'I NGOS NAS ZHABS
'GYUR TSAD MED ZHUS, CHE SHOS PA NGAG

DBANG BSTAN PA RE BZHI PA LCAGS BYI LOR SKYABS MGON PAn CHEN RIN
PO CHE'I BKAS GDAN SAR BZHUGS,

` ZI NA MKHAN CHEN NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS DAR RGYAS NGA GNYIS PA
RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SHING SPRUL LA KHRIR

BZHUGS; ` THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MA NGA
GSUM PA SA BYA LA BZHUGS, DGE 'DUN BGRES

GZHON TSANG MA'I BLO SNA CHOS LA DBANG MED DU BSGYUR TE GANG
GSUNGS GUS PAS DANG BLANGS KYIS 'CHAD NYAN YAR ZLA

LTAR RGYAS, KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED SMRA BA'I NYI MA GDAN DRANGS TE
RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM, BKA' 'GYUR BA

'JIGS MED RAB RGYAS LA BKA' 'GYUR GYI LUNG GNANG BCUG NYID NAS
KYANG THOGS MED BKA' 'BUM,

LCANG SKYA ROL BA'I RDO RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM, NYID KYI BKA' 'BUM
SOGS KYI LUNG, PHYAG CHEN, 'JIGS

BYED DANG N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD BSKYED RDZOGS SOGS KYI MYONG KHRID
DANG, CHU BYI LA BDE LAM GYI KHRID GNANG SKABS DA

LAN GYI BSHAD PA 'DI NGED RANG GIS SKU 'BUM LA 'JOG PA GZAB NAS
BZHAG PA'I KHUL YIN, 'DI 'DRA'I 'JOG

PA 'JOG MKHAN YANG DKON, MTSAR YANG CHE BAS THAMS CAD KYIS CHU
ZOS LA MA GTONG BAR NYA RA MDZOD CES

NAN TAN DU GDAMS PA SOGS CHOS SRID KYI BKA' DRIN TSAD MED PAS
BSKYANGS, ` GRO TSANG MKHAN CHEN BLO

BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MA LNGA BCU PA RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU
GLANG LA KHRIR BZHUGS, ` SER RIS MKHAN CHEN

DKON MCHOG RNAM RGYAL NGA GNYIS PA SA RTA LOR BZHUGS, AA RIG DGE
BSHES 'OD ZER LA LAM RIM CHEN MO'I

@157 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

BSHAD LUNG DANG, THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHER 'JAM DBYANGS ZHAL LUNG
GI KHRID ZHUS, ` MI NYAG MKHAN CHEN

TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN PA'I NYI MA ZHE BRGYAD PA CHU KHYI LA BZHUGS,
AA KY'A RIN PO CHER LHA KHANG CHEN MO GSAR BZHENGS

KYI SNYAN BSKUL ZHUS, 'DI'I RNAM THAR RGYAS PA NOR BU'I DO SHAL
GUNG THANG 'JAM DBYANGS KYIS MDZAD, T'A

LA'I HU THOG THU SKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN RAB RGYAS RGYA MTSO NGA
DRUG PA SHING BYI LOR BZHUGS, ` AA KY'A BLO BZANG

'JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSO BZHI BCU PA RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I ME YOS LA
BZHUGS, ME BYI'I LOR LHA KHANG CHEN MO BZO

BKOD RMAD DU BYUNG BA GSAR BSKRUN MDZAD, HAL HA RJE BTZUN DAM
PA, SDE KHRI RIN PO CHE 'JAM DBYANGS THUB

BSTAN NYI MA SOGS MKHAS GRUB DU MA SLOB MAR 'DUS SHING, RDOR
DBYINGS DBANG SOGS CHOS RGYUN MANG PO SPEL

BAS 'PHRIN LAS RGYA CHE, DE'I SPRUL SKU YE SHES SKAL BZANG MKHAS
GRUB RGYA MTSO ME GLANG LO BA PE CING DU THAM KA BLA

MA MDZAD, ` ZI NA LHA RAMS PA BSOD NAMS BSTAN 'DZIN KUN MKHYEN
BAR MA LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA

BZHES PA NAS BCAS MTSAMS LAS CUNG ZAD KYANG MI 'DA' BA'I 'DUL
'DZIN GYI SNYAN PA CHE, RE DRUG PA ME YOS

LA GDAN SAR BZHUGS, ` MDO BA MKHAN CHEN BLO BZANG DBANG PHYUG
RGYA MTSO SO BDUN PA LCAGS RTA LA

BZHUGS; ` MGON KYA SPRUL SKU CHOS BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO SO LNGA
PA CHU SPREL LA BZHUGS, ` SHING BZA'

DPON SLOB BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS NGA LNGA PA CHU BYA'I LOR BZHUGS,
` ,CHE SHOS DPON SLOB NGAG DBANG BSHAD SGRUB

BSTAN PA'I NYI MA SUM CU PA ME BYI LOR BZHUGS, ,PHYIS SU BKRA
SHIS 'KHYIL NAS BKA' 'GYUR BA CHEN PO DKON

MCHOG DPAL 'DZIN GDAN DRANGS, BKA' 'GYUR LUNG GSAN, ` STAG MTSER
BLO BZANG MKHAS GRUB NYI MA

SO DRUG PA SA YOS LA KHRIR BZHUGS, ` GSER TOG MKHAN CHEN YE SHES
THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO SO LNGA PA LCAGS 'BRUG

LA BZHUGS, RIN 'BYUNG TSAR GSUM SOGS DBANG RJES GNANG, LUNG
KHRID KYIS MTSON PA'I CHOS SBYIN MI

ZAD PA'I SGO PHYE, ` RGYA YAG MKHAN PO BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI
MA NYER DRUG PA CHU RTA LOR BZHUGS, ,'DI'I

SKU THOG DANG PO PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN DANG, GONG SA
LNGA PA'I SLOB MA RGYA YAG 'GAG SHING RAB 'BYAMS PA

GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS RGYAL DBANG LA SKU 'BUM BCA' YIG ZHUS,
DE'I RJES MA SMAN PA DPON SLOB BLO BZANG

DAR RGYAS LA GZHUNG NAS AERTI NI CHA GAN HU THOG THU'I CHO LO
GNANG, RJE'I GOS SKU CHEN MO GDAN DRANGS, DE'I

RJES MA LHA LDAN DU GRVA SAR GSHEGS ZER BA TZAM LAS GSAL CHA MA
BYUNG, GONG MA SPRUL SKU GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN

DANG MTSAN MTHUN PAS, KHYE'U MIG GI DGA' STON SOGS 'KHRUNGS RABS
SU 'DREN, ` BUM PA DPON SLOB

NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI NYI MA NGA BDUN PA SHING SPREL LA GDAN SAR
PHEBS, RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM PAR BRKOS KYI RTING

BSKUL GNANG, ` GRO TSANG MKHAN PO SKAL BZANG BKRA SHIS RGYA MTSO
LNGA BCU PA SA BYI'I LOR KHRIR BZHUGS, ` ,

CHE SHOS YONGS 'DZIN NGAG DBANG 'JAM DBYANGS DBANG RGYAL KUN
MKHYEN BAR MA'I DRUNG NAS BSNYEN RDZOGS

BSGRUBS PAS MTSAN ZUR LA 'JAM DBYANGS BSNAN, RE BRGYAD PA LCAGS
STAG LOR KHRIR BZHUGS, ` MTSAN

SGROGS MKHAN PO DGE 'DUN DON GRUB KYI SKYE BRGYUD DGE 'DUN BKRA
SHIS NYI MA LO BCU GSUM, ` RGYA YAG MKHAN

@158 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

PO BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS SLAR YANG LO GCIG ` ,CO NE ZHABS DRUNG
SKAL BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO ME LUG LOR

BZHUGS; 'DI'I SKU THOG DANG PO CO NE CHOS RJE SBYIN PA DAR RGYAS
KYI SKU DPON CHOS RJE BLO BZANG NYI MA YIN, DE'I

RJES MA MI NYAG TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN PA'I NYI MA DANG SKU MCHED DU
'KHRUNGS, DE NAS KHRI THOG NGA LNGA PA LA, DPON

SLOB THAMS CAD THUGS 'DUN CHIG DRIL GYIS SNGAR NAS GSOL BA YANG
YANG BTAB PA BZHIN, 7 KUN GZIGS

MTHONG BA DON LDAN BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO
LCAGS KHYI ZLA BA GSUM PA'I TSES BCO LNGA'I NYIN

'JIGS BRAL CHOS KYI KHRI LA DBANG BSGYUR TE CHOS SRID LEGS TSOGS
KYI SGO BRGYA 'BYED PA'I SKABS SO, ,RAB

BYUNG BCU PA'I CHU BYI'I LO NAS 'CHAD NYAN GSAR 'DZUGS KYIS DAR
RGYAS BYUNG YANG BAR SKABS DUS 'KHRUGS DBANG

GIS NYAMS CHAG CUNG ZAD BYUNG BAR BRTEN, MKHAN THOG NYER GSUM PA
RA KHO SHES RAB CHOS 'BYOR GYIS PAn

CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG YE SHES LA BKA' LUNG DANG
MTSAN ZHUS PAR MTSAN NYID ZUR DU PHYE NA LEGS

SHING MING LA BSHAD SGRUB GLING THOGS, 'PHEL RGYAS KYI CHED DU
GNAS BCU THON GSUNGS PA BZHIN MTSAN NYID GRVA

TSANG ZUR DU PHYE STE BSDUS GRVA 'DZIN GRVA GSUM, RTAGS RIGS,
BLO RIGS GZHUNG GSAR, RJE BTZUN PA'I

SKABS DANG PO, SGO MANG SKABS DANG PO, SKABS BZHI PA, DBU MA,
MDZOD, 'DUL BA, DKA'

RAMS BCAS 'DZIN GRVA BCU GSUM DANG, CHOS THOG GI RIM PA YANG,
DGUN CHOS ZLA CHOS GCIG DPYID

CHOS ZLA CHOS GNYIS, DBYAR CHOS ZLA BA GCIG DBYAR GNAS KYI RING
CHOS THOG ZLA BA PHYED GNYIS, STON CHOS

ZLA CHOS, STON CHOS RJES MA ZLA PHYED BCAS CHOS THOG BDUN YOD,
DKA' RAMS PA LA LAM RIM DANG, GZHAN

LA BKA' POTA LNGA'I 'CHAD NYAN 'GRAN ZLA MED CING, GDAN RABS RIM
BYON MKHAS BTZUN BZANG GSUM 'DZOMS

PA TSAR DU BSGRIGS PAS THUB BSTAN YONGS KYI 'BYUNG KHUNGS GCIG
BUR GYUR CING, 'DI NAS THON PA'I DGE

BA'I BSHES GNYEN DU MAS SA STENG BRGYAN BZHIN BZHUGS, ` RGYUD PA
GRVA TSANG NI, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS

RGYAN GYI BKA' LTAR ZI NA CHOS RJE LEGS PA RGYA MTSOS RAB BYUNG
BCU GCIG PA'I SA GLANG LOR CHO GA PHYAG LEN 'CHAD

NYAN THAMS CAD RGYUD SMAD DANG MTHUN PA GSAR DU BTZUGS PAR
BSHAD, SKAL LDAN GYIS, LCAGS MO YOS LO

SKU 'BUM DU, ,MKHAS PA LEGS PA RGYA MTSO YIS, ,SNGAGS KYI BSHAD
GRVA 'DZUGS PAR MDZAD, ,CES

GSUNGS PA SNGA PHYI'I KHYAD TZAM LAS GUNG 'GRIG DE'I RJES SU
CHOS RJE BSOD NAMS RIN CHEN, DAM CHOS

PHUN TSOGS, GRAGS PA BKRA SHIS, AA KY'A SHES RAB BZANG PO, CHU
BZANG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL

MTSAN; NGAG DBANG DPAL LDAN, STAG MTSER BLO BZANG RDO RJE, DGE
LEGS DPAL LDAN, KHYUNG THAR DON

GRUB 'OD ZER, ZI NA DPON PO NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG, SGO ME GRAGS
PA RGYA MTSO, BLO BZANG RIN CHEN, NGAG

DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN, RA KHO NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN, 'DI
LA AANG DKAR GYIS, MA SANG BYIS PA'I

SPYOD 'GROS KYIS, ,'GRO KUN RJES SU 'DZIN MDZAD PA'I, ,MKHAS
GRUB RA KHO ZHABS DRUNG ZHES BSNGAGS,

ZI NA NGAG DBANG RGYA MTSO, RA KHO SHES RAB CHOS 'BYOR, MI NYAG
BLO GROS DAR RGYAS, AAN JA SU BLO BZANG

@159 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

KUN DGA', AA KY'A BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, DKAR PO BLO
BZANG TSANGS DBYANGS, STAG MTSER

YE SHES SKAL BZANG, BUM PAR TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO, DGA' LDAN YE
SHES SKAL BZANG, BA JUS SHES RAB

LHUN GRUB, MGON KYA GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN, AA 'BRUG BLO BZANG
CHOS GRAGS, ZI NA ZHABS DRUNG NGAG

DBANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO, CHE SHOS NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA, KHRI
KA BA 'JAM DBYANGS DON GRUB, SER DRIS

DKON MCHOG RNAM RGYAL, MI NYAG TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN PA'I NYI MA, AN
JA SU BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS, ZI NA

DGE BSHES BSOD NAMS BSTAN 'DZIN, BUM PAR CHOS KYI NYI MA, MGON
KYA BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO, NIS

LUNG NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS RGYA MTSO, CHE SHOS DPON SLOB BSTAN
PA'I NYI MA, GRO TSANG SKAL BZANG BKRA SHIS RGYA

MTSO; GSER TOG SPRUL PA'I SKU YE SHES THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO, RGYA
YAG MKHAN PO BSTAN PA'I NYI MA, MTSAN

SGROGS MKHAN SPRUL BKRA SHIS NYI MA, AOR DU SU DGE BSHES BSHAD
SGRUB NYI MA, CO NE ZHABS DRUNG SKAL BZANG

BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO, ZI NA SKAL BZANG DAR RGYAS RGYA MTSO, KE
KYA BSOD NAMS BSTAN PA'I NYI MA, SER

DRIS DKON MCHOG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO, TSE 'BRUM ZHABS DRUNG SER
BYES PA BSHAD SGRUB DGE LEGS RAB RGYAS,

AN JU SU 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN 'DZIN NYI MA, HOR SDING SGOM PA'I
SKU SKYE BLO BZANG DGE LEGS RGYA MTSAN,

ZI NA LHA RAMS PA'I SPRUL SKU BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN 'DZIN RNAM RGYAL
DA LTA BZHUGS, ` DUS 'KHOR GRVA TSANG RIGS

LDAN BLO GSAL GLING NI SHING BZA' DPON SLOB KYI BKA' BZHI NA,
CHE SHOS DPON SLOB BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I NYI

MAS GSAR DU BTZUGS, MKHO BA'I YO BYAD SPYI 'JOG SOGS THOG MTHA'
BAR GSUM GYI MGO 'DREN DANG DUS

'KHOR DBANG CHEN BSTZAL, 'DU KHANG BZO BKOD PHUN SUM TSOGS PA
BSGRUB PAS CHOS SRID GANG NAS KYANG BKA'

DRIN CHE, GDAN SA RIM PAR STAG MTSER DGE BSHES BSTAN 'DZIN SKAL
BZANG, SGO DMANG LHA RAMS PA

DPA' RE BLO BZANG CHOS DAR, CHE SHOS YONGS 'DZIN 'JAM DBYANGS
DBANG RGYAL, PHE KY'A HU THOG THU NGAG

DBANG 'OD ZER, STONG CHE'I DGE BSHES YE SHES SKAL BZANG, SER
DRIS SPRUL SKU DKON MCHOG BSTAN 'DZIN

RGYA MTSO, 'DI LA BZIMS KHANG GONG MA ZER, AA KY'A GRONG BA CHU
DKAR ZHABS DRUNG DGE LEGS BLO BZANG BSTAN

'DZIN NYI MA, WANG KYA DGE BSHES DKON MCHOG CHOS 'PHEL, SMAN PA
BLA MA NY'A KYA DGE BSHES KYI SPRUL SKU

STAG MTSER PA LUNG RIGS NOR BU RGYA MTSO, MKHAN PO BLA MA'I
SPRUL SKU MI NYAG PA BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS, TSAS DAM

THO YON 'JAM DBYANGS DAR RGYAS, AA PAK KA PE CING CHOS RJE BLO
BZANG DAR RGYAS KYI SKU SKYE PE CING ZHABS DRUNG

CHOS KYI SPYAN LDAN BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DA LTA
BZHUGS, ` SMAN PA GRVA TSANG NI THOG MAR CHU BZANG

BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BTZUGS KYANG MTSO SNGON DU 'KHRUGS
KYIS MA GNAS, DUS 'KHRUGS KYI RJES SU

HOR GE AMBHAN GYI BKA' LTAR SLAR YANG GSAR DU BTZUGS, AEM CHI
SNYAN GRAGS KYIS SLOB DPON BYAS, BLA

RABS KHA SHAS KYI MTSAMS CHU BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG MKHAN
POR BZHUGS, GRO PAndI TA BLO BZANG BSTAN

PA'I RGYAL MTSAN ME GLANG LOR DPON SLOB TU BZHUGS, GRVA KHANG
GSAR BZHENGS DANG 'CHAD NYAN LEGS PO

@160 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

MDZAD; DE NAS ME RGAN CHOS RJE SHES RAB BSTAN 'DZIN, HOR HU THOG
THU DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO, RGYA YAG

MKHAN PO BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS, CHU RU KHA PA ZHABS DRUNG BLO
BZANG DAR RGYAS, CHE SHOS NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA,

SER DRIS ZHABS DRUNG DKON MCHOG RNAM RGYAL, MI NYAG BSTAN PA'I
NYI MA, GRO TSANG MKHAN PO BLO BZANG BSTAN

PA'I NYI MA, ZI NA LHA RAMS PA, BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN, MDO BA MKHAN
PO DBANG PHYUG RGYA MTSO, NGAG DBANG

RAB RGYAS, NY'A KYA DGE BSHES RGYAL MTSAN NOR BU, BLO BZANG DKON
MCHOG NYI MA, STAG MTSER MKHAS

GRUB NYI MA, SU NYID NGAG DBANG DAM CHOS, BKRA SHIS BLA MA NGAG
DBANG 'JAM DBYANGS, GZIMS KHANG

GONG MA'I PHYAG MDZOD BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL, 'DI'I SKU SKYE ZHABS
DRUNG BKRA SHIS THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO DA LTA RGYUD

PA'I BLA MA DBU MDZAD YON TAN LEGS, GRO KYA ZHABS DRUNG ZAN
KHRON DGE BSHES BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSOS BKA'

CHOS MANG DU GNANG ZER, AO THOG SHOG AA BA KA ZHABS DRUNG BLO
BZANG MTHU STOBS NYI MA, CHU RU KHA PA NGAG

DBANG BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS, PHE KY'A ZHABS DRUNG CHUNG BA ZAN
KHRON PA NGAG DBANG SKAL BZANG, CO NE ZHABS

DRUNG SKAL BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN, CHE SHOS YONGS 'DZIN, ZI NA SKAL
BZANG DAR RGYAS RGYA MTSO, SKYE KYA BSOD

NAMS BSTAN PA'I NYI MA, AUR DU SU AU SHIN SHOG PAKSHI NGAG DBANG
CHOS 'PHEL, GRO TSANG BRAG SPRUL BA'I SKU

BLO BZANG DBANG PHYUG SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO, BA JU ZHABS DRUNG
BSHAD SGRUB 'PHRIN LAS RAB RGYAS, MI NYAG

ZHABS DRUNG DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB CHOS KYI NYI MA, AN JA SU BLA
MA 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN 'DZIN NYI MA, DE'I

SKU MCHED CHA DKAR BLA MA DGE LEGS BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN NYI MA,
SER BYES LHA RAMS PA BLO BZANG CHOS DAR,

DA LTA BKRA SHIS BLA MA YE SHES MKHAS GRUB NYI MA BZHUGS, GRVA
TSANG PHYI MA GSUM GYI BLA RABS RTZAD GCOD PA BOD KYI

BSAM YAS BZHENGS PA LAS KYANG DKA' LAS CHE BA BYUNG RUNG MTSAN
THO TZAM CHA TSANG KHUL DU YOD, ` RTEN GYI GTZO

BO MCHOD SDONG CHEN MO'I NANG BZHUGS KYI BYANG CHUB LJON SHING
SKU BRNYAN DANG YIG 'BRU RANG BYON NGO MTSAR CAN NI,

BKA' GDAMS GLEGS BAM LAS, RE 'GA' GSOL 'DEBS DBYANGS KYI GZUGS,
,RE 'GA' YIG 'BRU

GZUNGS KYI GZUGS, ,GRAGS PA CAN GYI DGE SLONG NGO, ,BSTAN GNAS
BAR DU YANG YANG 'ONG, ,ZHES

PAS RJE RANG GI SPRUL PAR LUNG BSTAN PAR TSAD MAR GYUR PA'I
SKYES CHEN DU MA ZHAL MTHUN DU GSUNGS LA, BYANG RI

LHUN PO BRTAN PA'I RTZER, ,BDAG GIS BYIN BRLABS SENG GE'I SKU,
,SKU GDUNG DAM PA DER GNAS TE, ,

THUGS RJE'I 'OD ZER PHYOGS BCUR 'PHRO, ,DAD LDAN BRGYA PHRAG DU
MA SDUD, ,THUGS RING 'DON ZHING MCHI MA

'BYIN; ;DE NI RDO RJE GDAN DANG MTSUNGS, ,GANG NAS BLTAS KYANG
LHANG NGER GSAL, ,BDAG GI SPRUL

BA DAM PA ZHIG ,RES 'GA' DGE SLONG NYID DU STON, ,DES NI GNAS DE
SKYONG BAR BYED, ,CES GONG 'OG

DKYUS GCIG TU GSUNGS PA DGA' LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG DU SNAR THANG
BYANG CHEN LA SBYAR YANG, KHRI RIN PO CHE 'OD ZER BA

DANG; KUN MKHYEN GONG MAS RJE DANG, DGA' LDAN GYI LUNG BSTAN DU
SBYAR, BSTAN GNAS BAR DU YANG

YANG 'ONG YANG SPRUL PA STONG PHRAG DU MA YANG YANG 'ONG BA'I
DON YIN PAR 'CHI MED RDO RJE'I GLU LAS GSAR BAR

@161 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

GSUNGS; GZHAN YANG, MDOR NA GNAS MCHOG DE DAG TU, ,DANG PO BZHI
GRVA NAS BZUNG STE, ,THA MAR

STONG PHRAG PHYED DANG GSUM, ,BSLAB PA GSUM LDAN SH'AKYA'I SRAS,
,'GRO BA KUN GYI MGON DU 'GYUR, ,GNAS

DER PHYOGS DANG PHYOGS MTSAMS NAS, ,'DUN LDAN DPAG MED 'DU BAR
'GYUR, ,PHYIR YANG LAS CAN

PHYOGS BCUR 'PHRO, ,PHYI YI RGYA MTSO DAG DANG MTSUNGS, ,CHU BO
BRGYA YIS DGANG MI NUS, ,DE TZAM ZHIG GIS

BRI MI NUS, ,ZHES KYANG GSUNGS PA DGE 'DUN GYI 'DU 'GOD, GNAS
KYI BKOD PA, RTEN GYI KHYAD PAR

GANG NAS BSAMS KYANG GNAS 'DIR LUNG BSTAN PAR NGES LA, GNAS
MCHOG DE DAG CES PAS GCIG KHO NA LA

SBYOR BA KHEGS PAR GSUNGS PAS RANG GI DAD PA'I GSOS SU BKOD DO,
,MCHOD SDONG GI GA-YON DU LCANG SKYA GONG

MA BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYI SKU GDUNG, DE'I MDUN DU RA KHO GONG
MA DANG, CHE SHOS GONG MA GNYIS KYI DNGUL GDUNG,

MCHOD SDONG GA-YAS SU BA SO RJE DRUNG DKON MCHOG NYI MA'I DNGUL
GDUNG, DE'I MDUN AA KY'A GONG MA GNYIS KYI

DNGUL GDUNG, BYAMS PA'I GSER SKU, RJE'I ZHABS RJES GSAL BAR DOD
PA'I RDO KHYAD 'PHAGS, MDUN

GYI KUN RVA'I STENG DU, KHRI CHEN RGYA NAG PA BLO BZANG NYI MA,
GSER TOG GONG MA, STAG MTSER YE SHES SKAL

BZANG; YONGS 'DZIN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN BCAS KYI DNGUL GDUNG, KUN
RVA'I NANG DU, RGYAL BA TSUL KHRIMS

MA; DE DANG LHAN DU RGYAL BA SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS 'DI'I DRUNG
DU PHUL PA'I GTZUG PHUD DAM 'BYAR CAN, THUB

SKU SNAR THANG THOG THUB MA DANG LHAN DU RJE'I TSEMS 'KHRUL MED
DANG, BYAMS PA RIN PO CHE'I TSEMS, RGYAL BA

SENG GE NGA RO DANG, RJE'I GOS SKU CHEN MO, KHRI BLO GROS RGYA
MTSO'I THUGS DAM RTEN RIN PO CHE SNA TSOGS KYI BKA'

'GYUR GYIS GTZOS BKA' BSTAN TSAR KHA SHAS DANG MCHOD RDZAS GNAD
CHE BA BZHUGS, RGYA MTHONG NGOS SU SNANG

BRNYAN BYIN CAN DU MA DANG, RTZE THOG TU LDEBS RIS LA CHE SHOS
LHA BZOS BZHENGS PA'I CHOS RGYAL BYIN CAN, LHA KHANG

GI MDUN DU SDONG PO'I RTZA BRGYUG PA'I LJON SHING GI STENG DU
SKU GZUGS DANG DBYANGS GSAL SOGS KYI YIG 'BRU RANG

BYON CAN DNGOS SU MJAL RGYU SNANG BA LA DGA' LDAN GSAR MAR
GRAGS, GSUM YOD PA'I NANG GI GCIG BSKAMS

PA; RJE'I BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG GTZO BO GSUM GYI NANG NAS CUN
GAR NYAMS PA'I RTAGS SU CHOS SKYONG GIS LUNG

BSTAN CING, KUN MKHYEN BAR MAR PHUL TE 'DI KAR BYAMS SKU KHRU
GSUM PA BZHENGS, LHAG GIS GNAS BCU

DANG RJE'I SKU DU MA BZHENGS TE GDAN SA BLA BRANG RANG GI RTEN
GRAL DU BZHUGS, 'DU KHANG CHEN MOR RJE NGA 'DRA

MA; RGYAL MCHOG BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO DANG SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO,
PAn CHEN GONG MA RNAMS KYI BZHUGS KHRI,

LHA BAB MCHOD RTEN, MI 'KHRUGS PA'I SMAN SKU CHE BA, RGYAL BA
'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO DANG PAn CHEN GONG MA

GNYIS KYI 'DRA SKU, BDE GSHEGS BRGYAD DANG, BYAMS PA'I GSER SKU
SOGS RNAM GRANGS MANG BA, STENG

GI MTHONGS STENG LHA KHANG DU, RJE BDAG NYID CHEN POS YUM LA
SKYES SU BSKUR BA'I ZHAL THANG AA MA ZHES GSUNG

LHANG LHANG BYON PA GTZO 'KHOR DGU PA, TZAN DAN DMAR PO LAS GRUB
PA'I JO SKU, THANG GI RGYAL RABS THE'U

DZUNG YAB SRAS DANG, THANG ZAN SLOB DPON MCHOD YON GYIS BZHENGS
PA'I RGYA NAG LI RNYING JO BO BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD@162 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I' BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

KYI NANG TSAN, MTSO SNGON DUS 'KHRUG DUS DMAG MI BRKAM CHAGS CAN
'GAS SKU LA RAL GRI RGYAB PAS AA TSA ZHES

GSUNG BYON PAS 'JIGS TE RTEN GZHAN LA GNOD 'TSE BZLOG PA'I BYIN
CAN, TZAN DAN GYI JO BO LO KI SHVA RA,

GUNG RU MKHA' 'GRO MAS BZHENGS PA'I RJE'I SKU BRNYAN, AANG DKAR
BLA MA 'JAM DBYANGS MKHAS BTZUN RGYA MTSOS

PHUL PA'I MI LA'I SKU LA RGYAL MCHOG SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO SKU NA
PHRA DUS KYI DBU LOS MDZES PA SOGS BYIN RTEN BGRANG

GIS MI LANG BA BZHUGS, MGON KHANG DU SPRUL SKU SLE CHUNG PA'I
PHYAG BZO RJE'I GSER SKU NYID KYI DBU SKRA BUBS

TSANG BZHUGS PA GTZO 'KHOR GSUM PAS GTZOS GSER SKU DANG ZHAL
THANG MANG, LI MA KHANG DU, RGYA GAR SHAR

NUB LHO DBUS KYI LI SKU, CHOS RGYAL LI MA, RGYA NAG LI MA,
DZHIKshIm SOGS GRANGS MANG BA, RAB GSAL DU, RDO

RJE GDAN GYI PAndI TA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I BSHES GNYEN GYI
PHYAG BZO AA SHO THA LAS BSGRUBS PA'I JO BO LO KI SHVA

RA; THUB DBANG GI BOD LI BYIN CAN BCAS LI SKU SUM BRGYA BRGAL BA
SOGS DANG, NANG RTEN SKOR BZHUGS,

LI MA KHANG GSAR BA, LHA KHANG CHEN MO'I GA-YAS KYI BYAMS KHANG
DU, SGOM CHEN RIN CHEN BRTZON 'GRUS KYIS

BZHENGS PA'I BYAMS PA DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PA'I SKU TSAD, GA-YAS
PHYOGS SU SGOM CHEN DE NYID KYI SKU GDUNG RIL

BOR BZHUGS PA'I MCHOD RTEN DANG, GA-YON DU CHOS RJE 'OD ZER RGYA
MTSO'I GDUNG RUS MCHOD RTEN, CHOS GRVA'I

LTAG GI 'JAM DBYANGS KUN GZIGS LHA KHANG DU, CHE SHOS LHA BZO
BLO BZANG BSHES GNYEN GYIS BZHENGS PA'I

'JAM DBYANGS KUN GZIGS, 'DI'I NANG RTEN DU RJE RANG GIS AA CE LA
GNANG BA'I 'DRA THANG GSUNG 'BYON

BZHUGS; GA-YAS SU RJE RIN PO CHE, GA-YON DU RGYAL BA SENG GE NGA
RO'I SNANG BRNYAN CHE BA SOGS DANG, CHOS RJE

DON GRUB RIN CHEN GYI ZHABS RJES DANG PHYAG DBYUG GI RJES GSAL
BAR BAB PA'I RDO PHA BONG, THAMS CAD MKHYEN

PA'I LHA KHANG DU RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I BUR TSA SOGS
NANG RTEN DU BZHUGS PA'I BYANG CHUB MCHOD RTEN, LHA

KHANG GSAR BA'I NANG DU RJE'I GSER SKU CHE BA SOGS BZHUGS, BKA'
'GYUR CHOS 'KHOR LHA KHANG, LHA KHANG

CHEN MO'I GA-YON NGOS JO KHANG DU, CHOS RJE 'OD ZER RGYA MTSOS
BZHENGS PA'I RJE BTZUN BYAMS PA DGUNG LO BDUN

PA'I TSAD, STENG DU CHOS RJE SMON LAM RIN CHEN GYIS PHUL BA'I
RJE'I GSER SKU CHE BA SOGS DANG, ZI NA KU SHRI

DPAL 'BYOR RGYAL MTSAN DANG, KU SHRI DPAL 'BYOR RIN CHEN KHU
DBON GYIS BZHENGS PA'I MGON KHANG DU

'JIGS BYED MGON CHOS SOGS KYI SNANG BRNYAN, LI KYA HUN THA'I BLA
MAS RGYAL BA SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I ZHABS

BRTAN DU ME BYA LOR BZHENGS PA'I ZHABS BRTAN LHA KHANG DU GNAS
BCU GTZO 'KHOR, CHOS RGYAL GNAS PA'I RDO

PHA BONG DANG, RAB GNAS SBYIN SREG GNANG BAR TZAN DAN GYI SDONG
PO YIG 'BRU RANG BYON CAN 'KHRUNGS SHING,

'JAM DBYANGS SGAR BA'I GZIMS KHANG SKYED TSAL DU YANG YIG 'BRU
RANG BYON GYI TZAN DAN LJON PA 'KHRUNGS PA YA

MTSAN PA'I GNAS SU SNANG, RGYUD KHANG DU RGYAL BA MI PHAM PA'I
SMAN SKU CHE BA, GA-YAS SU RGYAL BA SKAL BZANG

RGYA MTSO'I BZHUGS KHRI'I STENG DU, ZI NA CHOS RJE LEGS PA RGYA
MTSO'I THUGS LJAGS SPYAN GSUM SOGS NANG RTEN DU

BZHUGS PA'I RJE'I SKU CHE BA, GA-YON DU 'JIGS BYED BCU GSUM MA'I
BLOS BSLANGS SOGS DANG, GZHAN YANG

@163 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

BLOS BSLANGS KHANG, DKYIL 'KHOR KHANG, BTZAN KHANG 'OG MAR DAM
CAN SKU RANG BYON DRAG RTZAL CAN, 'DU

KHANG STENG DU, LAS BZHI'I 'PHRIN LAS KYI RTAGS MTSAN SHIN TU
MYUR BA SKYES BU CHEN PO'I SKU SOGS LA PAn CHEN

RIN PO CHES PHUL BA'I SPYAN GZIGS MANG, RAB GSAL DU RJE'I YUM
GYI DBU THOD LA 'BRU GSUM GYI YI GE 'BUR

DOD DU GSAL BA RTEN GTZOR BZHUGS SHING, GZHAN NANG RTEN MANG, `
SMAN PA GRVA TSANG GI 'DU KHANG DU,

BYAMS PA DANG RJE'I SKU CHE BA BYIN CAN SOGS DANG, STENG GI LI
MA KHANG, MGON KHANG, BTZAN KHANG DU DAM CAN

SENG ZHON GYI SKU CHE BA BYIN CAN, ` DUS 'KHOR GRVA KHANG DU
THUB PA'I GSER SKU CHE BA, DUS 'KHOR GSER SKU

KUN RVA CAN SOGS MANG DU BZHUGS, ` BTZAN KHANG CHEN MO NI, RGYAL
BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS SPRUL PA'I

CHOS RGYAL CHEN PO CHOS SDE'I SRUNG MAR BKA' BSGOM GNYER DU
GTAD, KLU RGYA'I HOR TSANG GI MI RGYUD LA CHOS SKYONG

KHOG ZHUGS KYI DAM BZHAG MDZAD PA BZHIN 'PHRIN LAS GA-YEL MED DU
BSGRUB BZHIN PA LAS, RAB BYUNG BCU

PA'I CHU LUG NAS LO BRGYA DANG DGU 'DAS SHING, KHANG ZHI'I GNAM
LO SO GCIG PA RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I CHU

SPREL LOR STAG MTSER BLO BZANG RDO RJES GSAR DU BZHENGS, KHANG
ZHI KHRIR BZHUGS NGA GCIG PA CHU 'BRUG LA SKU

RTEN CHOS RJE BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYIS GSUNG RGYAL GYI SKU BRNYAN
KHYAD 'PHAGS DANG, DE NAS LO NYER DGU 'DAS

PA'I LCAGS BYA LA SKU RTEN CHOS RJE RIN CHEN DPAL LDAN GYIS SKU
GZHAN GSANG YUM BLON PO BCAS BZHENGS, BTZAN

KHANG CHUNG BAR RTA MGRIN DPA' GCIG DANG SKU RTEN PA RGYAL MTSAN
BZANG POS BZHENGS PA'I BLON PO RDO RJE DRAG LDAN

GYI SKU SOGS DANG, SPYI SO CHEN MOR RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA
MTSO'I SKU DUS NAS RGYAL BA NA RIM GYIS 'BRAL SPANGS

MDZAD PA LNGA PA CHEN MOS RTEN SKAL DU GNANG BA'I LHA MO'I NAG
THANG ME THUB MA GTZO 'KHOR BZHUGS, RMA CHEN

KHANG; MCHOD KHANG DBUS MAR GSER ZANGS KYI TZAN DAN JO BO DANG,
RGYAL BA BYAMS PA GTZO 'KHOR SOGS

BZHUGS; PAR KHANG DU RJE RIN PO CHE, RGYAL TSAB, MKHAS GRUB BCAS
KYI GSUNG 'BUM CHA TSANG, BRGYAD

STONG; RGYAN 'JUG MDZOD RTZA, RNAM 'GREL RTZA BA'I PAR SOGS CHOS
RGYUN GYI GTER DU BZHUS SA?, SGAR KHAG

LA BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS KHANG GSAR GYI 'DU KHANG NANG DU, ME
'JIGS SKABS SKYON MA BYUNG BA'I GSER SKU BYIN CAN

DU MA DANG, ZHAL THANG MANG PO, BKA' 'GYUR, GZIMS KHANG GONG,
PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE'I GZIMS

KHANG DU, PAn CHEN GONG MA'I 'DRA SKU SOGS DANG, GZIMS CHUNG
PHUG TU PAn CHEN GONG MA'I BZHUGS KHRI

SOGS BYIN CAN MANG, GZHAN YANG ZI NA SGAR BA, MI NYAG SGAR BA,
'JAM DBYANGS SGAR BA, THU'U BAKVAN

SGAR BA THEG CHEN CHOS MDZOD, CHU BZANG SGAR BA PHUN TSOGS MNGON
DGA', GSER TOG SGAR BA, AA KY'A

SGAR BA, CHE SHOS SGAR BA, STAG MTSER SGAR BA, RA KHO SGAR BA,
MGON KYA SGAR BA, BUM PAR SGAR BA,

MTSAN SGROGS SGAR, MA KYA SGAR, P'A JUS SGAR, RGYA YAG SGAR, AAN
JA SU'I SGAR, GRU'U KYA SGAR, PH'E KYA

SGAR; NYE KYA SGAR, KE KYA SGAR, TSE 'BUM SGAR, TSA GAN CHOS
RJE'I SGAR, SU NYID SGAR, NIS LUNG

SGAR; AOR DU SU'I SGAR, AO'I HAN SGAR, CHA HAR SGAR, GONG BA
SGAR, DGA' LDAN SGAR, SKU RTEN

@164 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,) CHOS
RJE DANG BLON PO'I SGAR BA SOGS SGAR KHAG CHE CHUNG GRANGS MANG,
MKHAN RGYUD RNAM THAR DANG, RTEN GYI

DKAR CHAG ZHIB PAR KUN MKHYEN GDAN RABS MU TIG 'PHRENG BA DANG,
GSER TOG PA'I KHA SKONG RNA BA'I BCUD

LEN GNYIS KAR GSAL BAS RGYAS PAR 'DIR MA BKOD, GNAS KYI DPYAD
YANG SA PADMA 'DAB BRGYAD, GNAM

'KHOR LO RTZIBS BRGYAD, RGYAB RI MDZES SHING LHUN CHAGS PA, MDUN
RI 'BRU SNA TSOGS SBUNGS PA LTA BU, LHO

PHYOGS LHA MO RIR AU RGYAN RANG BYON, NUB PHYOGS BRAG GI RIR
BYAMS SKU RANG BYON, BYANG PHYOGS STAG RIR 'OD

DPAG MED RANG BYON, LHO PHYOGS RGYANG GRAGS GSUM NA GANGS RI'I
'PHRENG BA, ME MTSAMS RGYANG GRAGS

GNYIS NA SING LAG THANG, NUB PHYOGS RGYANG GRAGS GSUM NA GANGS
RI'I 'PHRENG BA, ME MTSAMS RGYANG GRAGS

GNYIS NA SING LAG THANG, NUB PHYOGS RGYANG GRAGS ZUNG NA GA-YER
MO THANG, BYANG DU TZONG CHU 'BAB PAR GNAS

BSTOD LAS GSUNGS, GNAS 'DIR RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I ME BYA LA RJE
BDAG NYID CHEN PO 'KHRUNGS NAS BZHI BRGYA

GO GSUM, RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS CHOS SDE GSAR BTAB KYI
RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I CHU LUG NAS NYIS BRGYA RE

BDUN; CHU BYI 'CHAD NYAN GSAR TSUGS NAS NYIS BRGYA SO BDUN PA
RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SA BYA 'DI YIN
