NO; ` ;MCHOD GZHIS LAS, CHAS KYAG, PHYOGS PA, ZI NA, KLU 'BUM MI
NYAG ZHING SKYONG BCAS TSO

DRUG GI DPON 'BANGS RGYA CHE ZHING, MDOR NA CHOS SRID GANG NGOS
NAS MNGON PAR MTHO BAS THU'U BKVAN RJES,

DE NAS BLO BZANG RGYAL BA SKU BLTAMS PA'I, ,GNAS MCHOG LUMBA'I
SKYED TSAL GNYIS PA RU, ,CHOS DANG SRID

KYI 'BYOR BA RLABS CHE BA'I, ,SKU 'BUM CHOS SDE MJAL BAR PHEBS
LAGS SAM, ,SDE 'DIR LONGS SPYOD RGYA

MTSO'I DPAL LA 'GRAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB BYA BA RLABS 'PHRENG BZHIN DU
'PHYUR, ,PHYOGS BCU'I DGE 'DUN

NGANG BA'I KHYU BZHIN 'DU, ,BAG DRO BYIN CHES SNANG BA 'GYUR
LAGS SAM, ,'JAM DBYANGS BYIS PA'I TSUL

BZUNG LTE BA'I MTSAL, ,BOR BA'I SA LA 'KHRUNGS PA'I TZAN DAN
LJON, ,SNYING BOR BZHUGS ZHES GRAGS PA'I

MCHOD SDONG CHE, ,BYIN BRLABS GZI 'OD 'BAR BA MJAL LAGS SAM,
,ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR RO, ,

` 'DI DANG NYE BA HVANG ZI SGANG NGAM SA BZANG LA KHAR, THU'U
BAKVAN RIN PO CHES CHU GLANG LA BYA KHYUNG KA BUG ZHABS

DRUNG LA LTO 'PHYE'I THIG 'DEBS SU BCUG SGOM KHANG GSAR BZHENGS
MDZAD DE BTAB PA DGE LDAN CHOS SDINGS SU

THOG MAR 'BRAS SGO MANG 'GAG SHING BA BRAG RGYAB SNGAGS RAMS
PA'I SLOB MA RGYAR RTZANG SGOM CHEN BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN

BZHUGS SHING BKA' CHOS MANG DU GNANG, DE RJES AA KY'A YONGS
'DZIN BLO BZANG NYI MA BZHUGS, RI BO RTZE

LNGAR YANG PHEBS, SGOM SGRUB TSE DANG BSNYAMS, THOG MA'I BLO
SBYONG DANG, LAM RIM CHEN MO'I GSUNG BGROS

KYI BRDA GO DKA' BA SOGS LA 'GREL BA MDZAD, GZHAN YANG SEMS NYID
BLO BZANG YON TAN LA SKU ZHABS MCHOG

NAS SGRUB PA LA BSKUL BA'I BSLAB BYA GNANG ZHING 'GRO 'DUG MA
MANG, MANG NA BA LANG GI PAGS PA DMAR BSHUS

BYAS PA 'DRA BA'I SAR 'CHI YONG GSUNGS PA BZHIN PHYIS DE 'DRA
ZHIG NAS GSHEGS PAR GRAGS, DUS THOG DER

'DI GSUM BSHAD SGRUB GANG NGOS NAS 'GRAN ZLA DANG BRAL BAR BYED,
KUN MKHYEN BAR MA SKU 'BUM KHRIR BZHUGS

DUS LTAG SGO BRGYUD SKU MDUN LA NAM 'DOD DU PHEBS TE MDO SNGAGS
GNYIS KA'I DPE KHRID ZHUS PAS MANG THOS SGRUB

@165 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

LA GZHOL BA'I BU CHEN THUGS NANG SHIN TU NYE, ` SENG GE RDZONG
DGE 'PHEL CHOS 'KHOR NI, SNGON HOR GYI DUS

DPON SENG GE ZHES PA'I MKHAR YOD PAS SENG GE MKHAR DU GRAGS, BAR
SKABS MKHAR DE STONGS NAS YUN RING

SONG BA NA, SKU 'BUM DU RGYUD GRVA THOG MAR 'DZUGS MKHAN ZI NA
CHOS RJE LEGS PA RGYAL MTSAN BZHUGS TE SGRUB

SDE CHAGS, DE RJES SKU 'BUM MKHAN PO AA KY'A SHES RAB BZANG PO
SNGA PHYIR BZHUGS NAS GZHI GSUM GYI PHYAG LEN

DANG; DUNG DKAR SPRUL SKU TSANGS DBYANGS 'BRUG SGRA MI SNA MKHAN
POR PHEBS PA'I LAM DU GDAN DRANGS TE RGYAL

PO LUGS KYI THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I LAS BYANG NYI MA'I SNYING BO'I
SGO NAS MA nI RIL SGRUB BTZUGS, GTZUG LAG KHANG

GSAR BZHENGS SOGS 'DZIN SKYONG RMAD DU BYUNG BA MDZAD, GZHAN
YANG CHU RU KHA PA BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS SOGS

SKYES MCHOG DU MA BZHUGS, BYA KHYUNG MKHAN ZUR ZI NA CHOS RJE
KHU DPON GNYIS DANG, ZI NA AE RTI NI NANG

SOS RIM PAR BSKYANGS, DE RJES AA KY'A BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL
MTSAN GYIS 'DZIN BDAG MDZAD BZHIN RAB

BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME GLANG LOR 'DU KHANG GSAR BZHENGS GNANG
BA'I DKAR CHAG BZHUGS, ` BSTAN LUNG

DAR RGYAS DGON NI, GCAN TSA BZANG PO BKRA SHIS PAS RGYAL BA BSOD
NAMS RGYA MTSO'I SKU RING LA KLU 'BUM TSO

BRGYAD YON BDAG TU BSKUL NAS BTAB, DE NAS DGE LEGS BKRA SHIS,
SKAL LDAN BKRA SHIS, SKAL

BZANG RGYA MTSO, NGAG DBANG DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I BAR DANG,
GZHIS DGON SNGAGS GRVA ZHES BEE SER DU BSHAD,

SUM PAS RONG BA PHA BZHI DKA' BCUS BZUNG GSUNGS, ` KHYUNG TSA
MKHAN PO BSTAN RIM PA'I DKAR PO CHOS

LUNG; ` ZUR TSANG RAB 'BYAMS PA'I ZUR TSANG RI KHROD, ` TZONG
CHU'I RGYAB NGOS SU CHE SHOS RI KHROD,

` BUM PA RI KHROD, ` ZI NA'I LA SAR RI KHROD, ` RVA KHU'I
GA-YANG 'BA', ` GSER TOG DGON MKHAS

BTZUN DAR RGYAS GLING NI THOG MAR RI KHROD PA BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS
BTAB ZER LA, GSER TOG SKU THOG DANG PO LAN

JUS AOR TSO BA CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSOS RA MO
CHE'I GSER TOG BZHENGS PAS GZHUNG GIS GSER

TOG TA'I CHING GI CHO LO GNANG, DE'I SKU SKYE HAN STAG LUNG PA
BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS RNAM RGYAL, DE'I SPRUL SKU

MTSO SNGON PA NO MON HAN NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, DE'I
SPRUL SKU MTSO SNGON BE SI PHYAG RDOR SKYABS KYI

SRAS NGAG DBANG 'JAM DPAL RDO RJE CHU BZANG GONG MAS RAB BYUNG
BSGRUBS, DBUS LA PHEBS PA LHA SAR GSHEGS,

DE'I SPRUL SKU YE SHES THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO SKU NA RIM GYI GZHIS
DGON 'DZIN SKYONG LEGS SHING, LO LTAR SKU 'BUM

RGYUD PA DBYAR GNAS CHOS BAR LA PHEBS, ` RGYA SGO DANG NYE BAR
RA KHO RI KHROD 'DEBS PA BO DPON SLOB SHES

RAB CHOS 'BYOR RA KHO ZHES PA CHU GLANG LA 'KHRUNGS, DBUS SU SGO
MANG CHOS GRVAR SBYANGS PA MDZAD PAS MKHAS

PA CHEN POR GYUR, KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA DANG, KHRI
CHEN DGE 'DUN PHUN TSOGS, BYA BRAL

BLO BZANG RIN CHEN SOGS BSTEN, GYA GSUM PA SHING PHAG LA RI
KHROD 'DIR GSHEGS, AANG DKAR ZHABS

DRUNG GIS, TSE DANG SGRUB PA BSNYOM PA YIS, ,RJE BTZUN MI LA'I
RNAM THAR CAN, ,ZHES BSNGAGS, DE'I

SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO CHU BZANG RIN PO CHE
DANG SKU MCHED DU 'KHRUNGS, ` ,HOR SDING RI KHROD,

@166 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

RGYA RTZE RI KHROD, ` MI NYAG RI KHROD, ` GZIMS KHANG GONG MA'I
RI KHROD GTZO RGYAL, ` ZI NA BSAM GRUB

GLING NI, ZI NA BLA MA CHOS 'PHAGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BTAB, ZI
NA'I RUS NI BOD LA RUS CHEN BZHI YOD PA'I YA

GYAL LDONG YIN, DE YANG GNAM LDONG DKAR PO SA SKYA, NYI LDONG
SER BO ZI NA, SA LDONG GRO BO GON LING DU GRAGS

SHING; MI PHYED LDONG DANG, LDONG PHYED ZI NA ZER, SNGON ZI NA
RDO RJE RGYAL MTSAN BYA BA, MDO KHAMS SPO 'BOR SGANG

DU DMU RGOD GDUG RTZUB CAN GYI DPUNG MANG PO ZHIG YOD PA CHAM LA
'BEBS PA'I STOBS CAN ZHIG BYUNG, DE'I BU

ZI NA KLAN PA DANG, ZI NA DGE BSHES SKU MCHED GNYIS KA DBUS
GTZANG DU PHYIN, GCEN GYIS DER GZHI

BZUNG BA'I RGYUD LA RDZONG CI RGYAL MTSAN BZANG PO DANG, DPON
RDO RJE RIN CHEN RNAMS BYUNG, GCUNG SA SKYAR

BYON TE PO TI MANG PO THUGS 'DZIN GNANG, MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG
LA SBYANGS PAS MKHAS PAR GYUR, SLOB

GNYER MTHAR PHYIN TE SGRUB PA MDZAD PA'I BCAD RGYA'I SKABS 'JAM
PA'I DBYANGS DANG SGROL MA'I ZHAL MNGON SUM DU

GZIGS; BYANG PHYOGS HOR GYI RGYAL KHAMS SU SONG LA SANGS RGYAS
KYI BSTAN PA DAR BAR GYIS SHIG CES SGROL MAS

LUNG BSTAN, GTZANG DANG SKYOR MO LUNG, LHA SA GUNG THANG GSUM
NAS DGE BSHES BZANG SHOS RE ZHABS PHYIR

KHRID DE BYANG DU BYON, JING GIR GNAM GYI RGYAL PO PHO BRANG
SHANG TOR BZHUGS PA DANG MJAL, RGYAL POS KHYED

BZHI GANG NAS YONG, MI RIGS GANG YIN, YON TAN CI SHES ZHES DRI
BA GNANG, NGED BZHI GTZANG SA SKYA

NAS 'ONGS, MI RIGS BOD YIN, YON TAN SANGS RGYAS KYI CHOS ZHES
BYA BA DE SHES LAGS ZHUS, RGYAL PO

NA RE, SANGS RGYAS KYI CHOS NGAS SHES, NGA SA CHEN PO 'DI THAMS
CAD KYI BDAG PO YIN, 'JIG RTEN 'DI

NA NGA LAS CHE BA GZHAN SU YANG MED, KHYED TSO DE LTA BU'I YON
TAN CAN YIN NA DA LTA RANG CHAR PHOBS GSUNGS,

KHONG BZHIS SPYAN BTZUM STE SE GOL BRDAB PAS 'PHRAL DU CHAR
RGYUN GYIS RI KLUNG THAMS CAD NYAL 'GRO'I GOS KYIS

KHEBS; DA CHAR CHOD ZER BAR SNGAR BZHIN 'PHRAL DU BCAD PAS,
RGYAL PO 'KHOR BCAS KYIS GNAM LA DBANG

'DUG ZER NGO MTSAR DANG MTHONG GZOS CHEN PO MDZAD, LO DE'I DGUN
RGYAL PO PHO BRANG DU CHIBS BSKYOD KHAR

RI BO RTZE LNGA NA 'JAM DBYANGS DANG, PO TA LA NA SPYAN RAS
GZIGS RANG BYON YOD 'DUG PAS MJAL DU 'GRO RGYU'I

DGONGS PA ZHUS PAR KHYED BZHI YON TAN CAN DU SNANG BAS NGED KYI
RGYAL KHAB TU 'DUG DGOS GSUNGS, NAN

BSKYED PAS 'O NA ZI NA DGE BSHES 'DIR 'DUG DGOS GSUNGS TE DGONGS
PA MA KHROL, JING GIR RGYAL PO LA

SRAS BZHI YOD PA'I CHE BA GNYIS PHYOGS GZHAN GYI RGYAL POR
BSKOS, 'BRING PO AO GO T'A RANG GI GDAN SA LA BZHAG

CHUNG BA THO LO NO YON DANG, BTZUN MO ZO ROG T'A GNYIS LA HO SI
LI SE CHEN RGYAL PO SKU MCHED GSUM BYUNG YANG,

ZI NA TZE 'JO BYIS PA'I DUS NAS BU SKAL GYI TSUL DU BSKYANGS PAS
MCHED BZHIR GRAGS, DUS DER RGYAL BU AEN

CEN GO THAN GYIS BYANG NGOS SU 'JAM MGON SA PAndI TA GDAN
DRANGS, SPRUL PA'I SDE'I YID CHI RTZE ZHES BYA BAR

DBANG DANG BKA' CHOS DU MA ZHUS TE GSAN SKABS, SE CHEN GYIS, SA
SKYA PAndI TA NGED KYI BLA MCHOD DU 'BYON

DGOS ZHES GDAN 'DREN GYI MI SNA BTANG BAR, RGYAL BUS, NGA MI
RGAD PO LA BLA MA DANG CHOS MIN PA BSAM RGYU

@167 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

MED PAS BKA' DE 'DRA MI GNANG DGOS ZHUS, 'O NA KHONG GI DPON PO
'GRO MGON 'PHAGS PA 'DIR THONGS

GSUNGS; SKU NA GZHON PAS BSNYEN RDZOGS MA BYAS ZHUS PAR, 'O NA
SA SKYAR RDZONGS LA BSNYEN RDZOGS SGRUB

RTING 'DIR THONGS ZHES LUNG BUNG BA BZHIN 'PHAGS PA RIN PO CHE
BOD DU BYON PA'I ZHABS PHYI RGAN PA'I GRAS SU ZI NA

MKHAN PO SHES RAB YE SHES DPAL BZANG PO BRDZANGS, DBUS GTZANG GI
CHOS SDE CHE PHRA MTHA' DAG RNYED BKUR

GYIS TSIMS PAR MDZAD, RGYAL PO'I BZHED PA BSGRUB PHYIR RGYAL
KHAB TU PHEBS PAR 'GRO MGON 'PHAGS PA DANG,

SE CHEN RGYAL PO GNYIS MCHOD YON DU GYUR, MKHAN POS LUGS GNYIS
KYI ZHABS 'DEGS THUGS ZIN NGES BYUNG

BAS MCHOD YON GYIS, KHYOD LA GNANG SBYIN DU STER RGYU'I SA CHA
MI SDE GANG LA 'DOD MOS YOD PA ZHUS SHIG GSUNGS

PAR; 'O NA NGAS BOD KYI SA CHA GANG BZANG BLTAS NAS SNYAN SGRON
'BUL PAS NGA LA GROGS 'U LAG BKA' SHOG

BCAS GNANG 'TSAL ZHUS TE BOD DU 'ONGS, SHAR TZONG KHA, SU RGAN,
KHRI KHA, SPEN THOG GDUNG KHANG,

'GA' GAM CU, BYANG NGOS SU BHI TI SDE, CHED DUM SDE, KHANG SAR
SDE, LA SONG SDE, RIN CHEN GLING PAS

MTSON PA'I SA CHA SDE DGON BGRANGS KYIS MI LANG BA ZHIG YI GER
BRIS TE PHYIR 'KHOR GYIS GONG DU PHUL BAR, YI

GE NANG 'KHOD THAMS CAD SHES SU CHUG GI LUNG PHEBS, MCHOD YON SO
SO NAS MU TIG GI 'JA' SA RE RE DANG,

ZON JU DBEN GYI RTZA BA'I DBEN shI'I LAS KA GNANG, RGYAL PO GONG
MA YAB YUM GYIS BSKYANGS PA'I SRAS YAR ZI

NA RTZE 'JO LA THA'I CHING SANG GI LAS KA ` BLO GROS DPAL BZANG
LA JUNG DUNG GI LAS KA DANG T'A'I ZI GUNG GI GSER

DAM; DPAL 'BYOR BZANG PO LA THUNG JI'I LAS KA MI CHEN LAB MA
THAR LA RGYAL PO DUNG THOG RE TSAN BZHIN

RES DPON DU BSKOS, PHYIS SU ZI NA DPAL 'BUM LA STAG MGO NOR BU
GSUM PA GNANG STE TZONG KHA'I KHRI DPON

DU BSKOS, HOR GYI RGYAL RGYUD RNAMS DANG ZI NA'I RGYUD PA PHAN
TSUN GNYEN BSNOL, HOR GYI RGYAL RABS RDZOGS

NAS T'A'I MING GI SKABS SU YUNG LO GNAM LO BRGYAD PAR, ZI NA BLA
MA CHOS 'PHAGS RGYAL MTSAN DBU BLAR BKUR,

KOO SHRI'I LAS KA SA RIS MI SDE, BA SO'I THAM KA 'JA' SA BCAS
GNANG, LO BCU PA'I STENG TS'I TRI KHRAN ZI'I

LAS KA ZON TE KHRIR BZHUGS GNYIS PAR, THUN HU KYIN KYO KOO
SHRI'I LAS KA DANG, DNGUL THAM BSTZAL,

KHONG GIS ZI NA BSAM 'GRUB GLING GI DGON 'DI BTAB, GTZUG LAG
KHANG BZHENGS, T'A'I MING TRIN THUN

RGYAL PO LO BRGYAD PAR ZI NA BLA MA DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN DANG,
T'A'I MING KYA CIN GYIS BLA MA BSOD NAMS LEGS

PA; RGYAL PO'I GNAM LO ZHE GSUM PAR BLA MA DPAL 'BYOR LEGS PA,
WAN LI LO LNGA PAR BLA MA DPAL 'BYOR

RGYAL MTSAN BCAS LA LAS KA GONG GSAL LTAR GNANG, T'A'I MING
KHRUN TIN KHRIR BZHUGS BDUN PA'I DUS MA

NAN WANG 'BANGS GYEN LOG GIS ZI LING MKHAR BLANGS PA, ZI NA'I
DPUNG SHED KYIS TSUR BLANGS TE RANG 'JAGS

KYIS GONG DU PHUL BA'I BDAG RKYEN DU BLA MA DPAL 'BYOR RIN CHEN
LA KON TING KOO SHRI'I CHO LO DANG, GSER GYI

THAM KA 'JA' SA BCAS DANG, ZI LING MKHAR GYI TRUN KON NA PHE LU
CHE BA GCIG BCAS GNANG CHA DANG GZENGS

BSTOD MDZAD, 'DI KHU DBON GYIS SKU 'BUM DU MGON KHANG BZHENGS,
T'A'I MING SHUN TRI KHRIR BZHUGS LO

@168 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

BCU PA'I TSE, BLA MA DPAL 'BYOR PHUN TSOGS LA ZI NA YE KYO'U
ZI'I CHO LO, GONG MA DAG LA GNANG BA'I THUN

H'U CIN KYO KOO SHRI'I LAS KA'I STENG DU KON TING T'A KOO SHRI'I
LAS KA BRTZEGS MA GNANG, T'A'I MING RABS RDZOGS

NAS JUR CHID MAN JU RGYAL PO'I MTSAN JUS RGYUGS TE KHANG ZHI
GNAM LO SO BDUN PAR BLA MA DPAL 'BYOR DAR RGYAS

LA LUNG LAS 'JA' SA RGYAL RABS GONG MA'I DUS LTAR GNANG, BLA MA
NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG LA LNGA PA CHEN POS AERTI

NI T'A LE CHOS RJE'I CHO LO DANG, ZI NA SGAR BA 'DI RGYAL BA
TZONG KHA BA'I 'KHRUNGS SA YIN PA DANG, 'KHOR

DAG PA RNAM BRGYAD KYI GTZO BO RTOGS LDAN 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO ZI
NA'I ZHAL NGO YIN TSUL, RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I

BSTAN PA DAR BA NAS DA LTA'I BAR ZI NA'I BLA DPON RIM BRGYUD
KYIS SPYIR SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA, KHYAD PAR

ZHVA SER GYI BSTAN PA LA KHUR BLANGS LHAG BSAM CHE TSUL, LHAG TU
THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO AAL

THAN GSER GYI RGYAL POS GDAN DRANGS SKABS, LAM BAR DU ZHABS TOG
PHUN SUM TSOGS PA BSGRUBS SHING, SKU

'BUM BYAMS PA GLING GI DGON PA'I GZHI 'DZIN DGOS TSUL YON BDAG
MTHA' DAG LA BKA' PHEBS KYANG ZI NA

TSANG GIS BYAS PA TZAM GZHAN GYIS MA BYUNG 'DUG PA DANG, LO LTAR
SKU 'BUM GRVA TSANG LA ZLA BA DKAR PO'I NANG DU

SMON LAM GTONG BZHIN PA YIN PA'I RGYU MTSAN BCAS BKA' SHOG ZHIB
RGYAS BSTZAL, 'DI PA BYA KHYUNG DANG, SKU

'BUM RGYUD PA'I KHRIR PHEBS, DE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG TSUL
KHRIMS DAR GYAS SKU 'BUM RGYUD PA DANG, KHRI CHEN

GNYIS KAR BZHUGS TE 'CHAD NYAN GYIS MTSON PA'I 'DZIN SKYONG
LEGS, ZI NA BLA MA NGAG DBANG RGYA MTSO YANG

SKU 'BUM DU RGYUD GRVA TSANG GI MKHAN PO ZUNG DANG, BYA KHYUNG
KHRIR BZHUGS, GDAN RABS RNAMS SU NGAG DBANG

BSTAN PA BRIS 'DUG DE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MA
YIN, ZI NA CHE CHEN CHOS RJE YE SHES DAR

RGYAS KYIS SE RA THEG CHEN GLING DANG, ZI NA NGAG DBANG RGYA
MTSOS SKU 'BUM DU SLOB GNYER MDZAD PAS MKHAS

PAR GYUR, RGYAL BA TSANGS DBYANGS RGYA MTSO'I DUS ZI NA BLO
BZANG MKHAS MCHOG LA GZHUNG NAS AERTI NI NANG SO'I

CHO LO GNANG, YUNG tING RGYAL PO KHRIR BZHUGS LO DANG POR, MTSO
SNGON SDE GZAR GYI RKYEN GYIS SA RIS MI SDE

'JA' SA BCAS GONG BZHES MDZAD KYANG CHEN LUNG KHRI LO BCU BZHI
PA LA, ZI NA NANG SO DKA' BCU SHES RAB

RNAM RGYAL DANG, KHRI LO NYER BDUN PAR NANG SO RAB 'BYAMS PA
NGAG DBANG DPAL LDAN GNYIS LA RIM BZHIN

ZI NA BKVANG GI LAS KA BKA' SHOG BCAS GNANG, PHYI MA 'DIS KHO
RANG GI RGYU CHAS DANG, DGE BSKUL GYIS

DNGUL SRANG BZHI BRGYA DRUG CU SKOR GYIS MGON KHANG, SRANG BZHI
BRGYA LNGA BCU SKOR GYIS GSANG 'DUS LHA KHANG,

SRANG BRGYAD BRGYA LHAG GIS GNAS BCU DANG, BCU GCIG ZHAL GYIS
LHA KHANG RNAMS GSAR BZHENGS, SRANG

BDUN CU LHAG GIS MKHAR GYI PHYI'I BYANG CHUB MCHOD RTEN LA ZHIG
GSOS BYAS PA'I GNAS BCU LHA KHANG DU RTEN GTZO

DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS, RNAM SNANG, RJE RIN PO CHE, GNAS BCU, DGE
BSNYEN SBYIN BDAG BCAS GSER

GSOL MA, BCU GCIG ZHAL LHA KHANG DU THUGS RJE CHEN PO, SGROL
DKAR LJANG STE RJE GTZO 'KHOR GSUM LA NANG

BZHUGS RING BSREL SRAN MA CHUNG BA'I TSAD TZAM DU MA SOGS 'GANG
CHE BA MANG, GZHAN ZI NA'I LHA KHANG GONG

@169 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

'OG NA SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG YANG BZHENGS NAS MI RABS MANG
DU SONG STABS BLA MA GANG GI DUS SU TSUL JI LTAR

BZHENGS PA'I LO RGYUS NGO 'PHROD PA DKA' YANG THO TZAM NI, LHA
KHANG GONG NA, SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI LHA KHANG,

GNAS BRTAN BCU DRUG GI LHA KHANG, GSANG 'DUS LHA KHANG, MGON
KHANG, 'DU KHANG GSUM THOG BCAS

PA'I NANG RTEN DU GSER DNGUL GYIS BZHENGS PA'I BKA' 'GYUR TSAR
GNYIS, MTSAL SNAG GIS BRIS PA'I BSTAN

'GYUR TSAR GCIG GSER DNGUL GYI YUM TSAR GSUM DANG, SKYA PO TA
GCIG GONG MA RNAMS KYI SKU GDUNG

MCHOD RTEN NYI SHU LHAG TZAM DANG, MKHA' 'GRO MA'I DBU THOD,
RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I DBU ZHVA MU

TIG GI RGYAN CAN, BYAMS CHEN CHOS RJE'I DBU ZHVA, PAn CHEN BLO
BZANG CHOS RGYAN GYI SKU CHOS DANG SKU GZAN,

CHOS SKYONG LNGA KA'I NAG THANG PHYAG THAM MA LNGA, RGYAL BA
SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I SKU 'GAG SKU GZAN SKU SHAM, GSOL

LHAM; GZHAN SKYES CHEN DAM PA DU MA'I DBU ZHVA, GOS BER, ZHABS
LHAM SOGS MANG DU BZHUGS, LHA KHANG

'OG MAR, DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS KYI LHA KHANG, GNAS BCU'I LHA
KHANG, MGON KHANG, RGYAL CHEN LHA KHANG

BCAS KYI NANG RTEN DU, GSER DNGUL SPEL MA'I BKA' 'GYUR, GSER
'BUM, DNGUL 'BUM RJE RIN

PO CHES GNANG BA'I DUNG DKAR GA-YAS 'KHYIL NANG BZHUGS SU YOD
PA'I MCHOD RTEN MI TSAD TZAM, RJE DE NYID KYI

GSOL PHOR, MKHA' 'GRO MA'I DBU THOD BCAS BZHUGS LA, SNGAR LO
MANG PO'I BAR DU SKU 'BUM TSOGS

CHEN RGYUD PA BCAS GDAN DRANGS TE CHO 'PHRUL DUS MCHOD LA BSNYEN
BKUR PHUL SNANG, ` MDO BA SGAR GSAR, `

SKU 'BUM GYI LUNG MDAR ZI LING MKHAR, DER MKHAS PA MI GSUM GYI
SKU GDUNG BZHUGS PAR GRAGS PA'I BYAMS

KHANG DANG, DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS LHA KHANG, PHYI MA'I LAS 'BRAS
STON PHYIR DU RGYAS BZHENGS PA'I GSHIN

RJE'I LHA KHANG, ` MKHAR GYI NYE 'DABS SU THUB PA MYANG 'DAS
MA'I LHA KHANG, RGYA GAR GRUB CHEN ZHIG GI SGRUB

KHANG DU DE'I SNANG BRNYAN BZHUGS, ` DGON PA'I MDUN NGOS LUNG PA
CHU DKAR DU THOG MAR CHOS RJE DON RIN PA

BZHUGS; MNAL LAM DU YI DAM GYIS ZHAL GZIGS, SANG PHOD LUNG PA
'DI'I MDAR YONG ZHES PHYAG MDZUB

BTZUGS TE LUNG STON SA GNAS 'DI YIN, PHYIS SU SKAL LDAN DNGOS
SLOB DGE SLONG DPAL 'BYOR LAGS KYIS

SGRUB SDE BTZUGS, LO LTAR RIGS GRVA'I STENG SMAN PA GRVA TSANG
SNGO SMAN LA PHEBS, `KHYUNG THAR RI KHROD,

`SMAD DU, DENG SANGS STAG MTSER DPON SLOB KYIS KHA 'DZIN MDZAD
PA'I SHA RDZONGS SGRUBS SDE NI, KARMA ROL PA'I

RDO RJE, CHOS RJE DON GRUB RIN CHE, 'DUL BA CHOS RJE 'OD ZER
RGYA MTSO RNAMS YUN RING BZHUGS, GRUB

CHEN GNAM SNGON RAB 'BYAMS PAS KARMA PA'I SKU GDUNG MCHOD RTEN
DANG GTZUG LAG KHANG BZHENGS, DE RJES

HAN STAG LUNG SKU SKYES SGRUB SDE GSAR DU BTZUGS, LNGA PA CHEN
MOR ZHUS TE MGON CHOS GNYIS LA GNYER GTAD

DANG; MTSAN DGA' LDAN SKYED TSAL BSTZAL, DE RJES SHA RDZONG SGOM
CHEN DPA' RE STONG SHAG PA BZANG PO BKRA

SHIS SAM NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG GZHON NU NAS RAB TU BYUNG, GZHUNG
LUGS LA SBYANGS, STAG LUNG SKU SKYE'I

ZHABS PHYIR 'DIR PHEBS, DPYID SOS RONG BO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU
GRUB CHEN SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I ZHABS LA

@170 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

GTUGS; STON DGUN 'DIR BZHUGS TE SGRUB PA YUN RING MDZAD, STAG
LUNG SKU SKYE'I ZHABS PHYIR DBUS

SU YANG PHEBS, LA MO CHOS SKYONG LA, 'DIR BZHUGS KARMA PA'I SKU
GDUNG DE 'KHRUL MED YIN MIN ZHUS PAS YIN

PAR LUNG BSTAN, SGRIG DANG KUN SPYOD KYI SROL BZANG PO BTZUGS,
DE RJES SKU 'BUM MKHAN PO STAG MTSER

BLO BZANG RDO RJE, CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN, CHU RU KHA
BA GRUB CHEN BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS, BLO BZANG

RDO RJE'I SPRUL SKU, SMRA ZHABS DRUNG, SKU 'BUM MKHAN PO STAG
MTSER BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS, 'DI LA AANG

DKAR GYIS, RGYAL BA BRTZON 'GRUS 'BAR ZHES PA'I, ,LUNG BSTAN
THOB PA'I GRUB THOB CHE, ,STAG MTSER

BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS ZHES BSNGAGS, SKU 'BUM RGYUD ZUR AAN JA SU
BLO BZANG KUN DGA' RNAMS KYIS RIM BSKYANGS

LA; PHYI MA 'DI PA'I SKABS RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I MJUG TU 'DU
KHANG GSAR BZHENGS KYI DKAR CHAG AA KY'A

BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD, GZHAN STAG MTSER DPON SLOB YE
SHES SKAL BZANG GIS GZHI BZUNG,

GNAM SNGON ZHABS DRUNG DANG, SGRUB SDE'I SBYIN BDAG RNAMS KYI
DAD 'BUL GYIS CHOS RJE NYID DGUNG LO DON BZHI

PA RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA PHAG LA MGO BRTZAMS TE THUB PA'I
DBANG BO, BYAMS MGON, MI 'KHRUGS PA

BCAS KYI SKU BRNYAN NANG BZHUGS KHYAD 'PHAGS BCAS GSAR BSKRUN
GYI DKAR CHAG KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED

ZHABS KYIS MDZAD, STAG MTSER MKHAN SPRUL BLO BZANG MKHAS GRUB
NYI MAS KYANG SLAR YANG 'DU KHANG GSAR BZHENGS

GNANG; MDUN NGOS SU KARMA ROL BA'I RDO RJES RJE BLA MA DGUNG LO
GSUM PA'I DUS DGE BSNYEN BSGRUB PA'I DBU

SKRA DOR SHUL DU SKYES PA'I SHUG SDONG BZHUGS SHING, RJE SKAL
LDAN GYIS, SKYES RI'I GSER KHANG DBEN GNAS

DANG; ;'UR DGU'I SHA RDZONG DGON PA DANG, ,DA NA DIG YANG DIG
'BUM GLING DANG, ,BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL LA

SOGS PA YI, ,SGRUB SDE'I DGON YANG SHIN TU MANG, ,ZHES SGRUB
GNAS GRAGS CHEN DU GSUNGS SO, ,

` ZA KHAR GYI RI KHROD, 'DI DANG NYE BAR ZA KHAR SMAN CHU YOD, `
AAN JA ZIR STAG MTSER YE SHES SKAL

BZANG GIS 'DU KHANG ZHIG GSOS DANG, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG NYI
MAS GSAR BZO MDZAD, ` RA RGAN RI KHROD

BCAS YOD PA PHAL CHER SUM PA'I GSUNG LTAR LA RNAM THAR KHUNGS
DAG GIS ZUR BRGYAN TE BKOD DO, ` ,GRO TSANG

LHA KHANG KO TAm SDE BZHENGS PA BO GRUB CHEN MTSO SNYING BA'AM
GLANG DKAR PAR GRAS PA, HE BLA MA SANGS RGYAS BKRA

SHIS NI LHO BRAG GRO BO LUNG NAS 'KHRUNGS, LHA DANG BLA MAS LUNG
BSTAN BZHIN MDO SMAD DU BYON, MTSO SNYING DU

SGRUB PA YUN RING MDZAD, DE SKABS GLANG DKAR PO ZHON NAS PHEBS
BZHUD MDZAD CES SUM PA DANG, 'GA'

RES GLANG DKAR PA'I SPRUL SKU HE BLA MAR 'DOD PA SNANG, LCANG
SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJES RGYA SKAD DU MTSO SNGON LA HE ZER

BAS MTSAN DE LTAR THOGS 'DRA GSUNGS, RIM GYIS DGON LUNG BRAG TU
PHEBS, TSOGS BDAG BSGRUBS PAS

RGYAL PO'I PHO BRANG CHEN PO CIG MTHONG PA'I MTSAN MA BYUNG,
T'A'I MING THOG MA HUNG BU RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SA SBRUL

LA KHRIR BZHUGS NAS RING PO MA LON PA'I SKABS BLA MCHOD CIG
SPYAN 'DREN PAR DGONGS TE RTZIS MKHAN RNAMS LA

BRTZIR BCUG NUB KYI SA'I MTHAR 'BROG DGON GYI RI SUL CIG NA BLA
MA GRUB THOB CHEN PO ZHIG BZHUGS PA GDAN

@171 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

DRANGS NA LEGS TSUL ZHUS PAR BANG CHEN PA BTANG, RI BRAG DANG
NAGS TSAL 'DRES SHING GCAN ZAN SNA TSOGS

RGYU BA'I SA PHYOGS BGROD DKA' BA ZHIG NA DU BA THON PA'I SAR
PHYIN, BRAG PHUG TU KHONG GCIG BU SGRUB PA LA GZHOL

BA MTHONG BAS YID 'PHROG SLAR LOGS NAS RGYAL POR RGYU MTSAN PHUL
BAS THUGS DGYES, GSER YIG PA

BRDZANGS NAS GDAN 'DREN ZHUS PA ZHAL GYIS BZHES, 'BYON LUGS DANG
GRA SGRIG CI 'DRA DGOS ZHUS PAR DE

'DRA GANG YANG MI DGOS, TSES GRANGS 'DI 'DRA CIG LA PHO BRANG DU
THON PA BYAS CHOG GSUNGS, DE NYIN BSU

BA'I GRA SGRIG BCAS SGO SO SO NAS SGUG SKABS SHIG DGE SLONG CHOS
GOS RNAMS GSUM CAN GLANG PO CHE DKAR PO LA

ZHON TE NAM MKHA' NAS BYON PA RGYAL POS GZIGS, 'JA' DANG ME TOG
GI CHAR SOGS LTAS GZHAN YANG BYUNG,

TE'I SHI'I LUNG GIS BSNGAGS, RGYAL PO'I GSOL STON GYI SKABS SHIG
NYID KYI BZHES CHANG SNOD BCAS RJE 'DI LA

GNANG BA NAM MKHAR GTOR, BLON PO CHOS LA GNAG PA 'GA' ZHIG GIS
DE 'DRA'I LUGS SROL MED TSUL GYI SNYAN

PHRA RGYAL PO LA ZHUS, BKA' LAS DA LAN DMIGS BSAL YIN, PHYIN
CHAD DE 'DRA MI 'GAB TSUL BLA MA RANG

LA GOR CHUGS GSUNGS PA BZHIN BYAS PAS, GRUB CHEN PA NAS SPYIR
DGE SLONG GIS CHANG MI 'THUNG, KHYAD

PAR DE SKABS GONG MA'I MNGA' ZHABS KYI YUL GRU ZHIG TU ME 'JIG
BYUNG BA LA AE PHAN SNYAM PAS YIN ZHUS, CHER

MA 'GYANGS PAR GONG MA'I MDZOD YOD PA'I MKHAR ZHIG LA ME SHOR
BAR THABS GANG GIS KYANG MA PHAN PA'I SKABS BLO

BUR DU SPRIN 'KHRIGS, CHANG DRI CHIL LE BA'I CHAR GYIS ME ZHI
TSUL GONG DU SNYAN ZHUS BYUNG BAR DUS TSOD DANG 'GRIGS

PAS LHAG PAR DAD, LAN CIG GONG NAS BLA MA DGUNG LO MTHO BAS MI
RTZA GAR YOD KYI BKA' 'DRI BYUNG BAR RGYU

MTSAN ZHUS, MI SNA BTANG STE SKU MCHED RNAMS BOS, RJE NYID DGON
LUNG BRAG PHYOGS SU PHEBS BZHED CHE BA

BZHIN 'BYON PAR GNANG, GTZUG LAG KHANG BZHENGS DGE 'DUN GYI SDE
TSUGS TE BSTAN PA LA BYA BA MDZAD

DGOS TSUL DANG, SKU MCHED RNAMS DE KAR BSDAD NAS BLA MA'I ZHABS
TOG ZHUS NA RIGS RGYUD KYIS DPON PA BYAS

CHOG CING KHO BOS RJES SU 'DZIN SOGS GZIGS PA CHE, DPON GA-YOG
RNAMS BRAG TU GZHI CHAGS, GRO LUNG

PA YIN PAS GRO TSANG DANG, MAR BA'I RIGS GTORS YOD PAS MAR TSANG
DU THOGS ZHES BSHAD SNANG, PHYOGS

BZHIR SA 'DUL GYI MCHOD RTEN BZHI DANG, DBUS SU LHA KHANG
BZHENGS PA'I RTEN GTZO DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS,

NYE SRAS, GA-YON NGOS MGON KHANG DU MGON PO PHYAG BZHI PA DANG,
GUR MGON 'KHOR BCAS KYI 'BUR SKU,

LDEBS BRIS SU MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA 'KHOR DPAL MGON DON LNGA,
MGON PO PHYAG BZHI PA 'KHOR BCAS, DMAG

'KHRUG CIG GI SKABS DKON GNYER GYIS BSKUL BA BYAS 'PHRAL ZHABS
GA-YAS PA SA LA BZHAG PA'I CHOS RGYAL BYIN CAN

BCAS BZHUGS, AA PHYI MA YOD PAS AA PHYI MGON KHANG DU GRAGS,
GA-YAS KYI LHA KHANG DU SA SKYA'I MCHOD RTEN CHEN

PO; LOGS RIS LA 'BRAS SPUNGS MCHOD RTEN LTA BU BZHI'I SGO KHYIM
DU RDO RJE 'CHANG RE DANG, BANG RIM RNAMS

SU DUS 'KHOR, BDE MCHOG KYEE RDOR, SKYO LUGS 'JIGS BYED SOGS BLA
MED DANG, RGYUD SDE GZHAN

GSUM GYI LHA TSOGS GRANGS MED PA, RDO RJE PHUR BA SOGS RNYING
PHYOGS KYI YI DAM DU MA, SENG KHRIR RGYAL CHEN@172 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

BZHI; 'OD ZER GYI SNE LA CHOS SKYONG SNA TSOGS, PHYOGS SKYONG
BCU, KLU CHEN BCAS DANG, BANG RIM GYI

KVA BA RNAMS MCHOD LHA PHYAG DU MA YOD PAS BTEGS PA SOGS NGO
MTSAR BA'I BKOD PA NYID KYI GZIGS SNANG DU

GRAGS SHING, RDO RJE 'CHANG GI LHA KHANG BZHENGS RGYU'I RTEN
'BREL DU DGONGS ZHES GRO TSANG MKHAN PO SKAL BZANG

PAS GSUNGS, DA LTA LHA TSOGS RNAMS SNGAR DANG MI MTHUN PA KVA
RING NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS LHUN GRUB KYIS ZHIG

GSOS MDZAD PA'I DKAR CHAG YOD PAR GSUNGS PAS DE DUS BSGYUR RAM
SNYAM, RGYAL POS RGYU RKYEN SBYAR TE LHA

KHANG MANG PO GSAR BSKRUN GYIS KO TAm SDE ZHES RDO RJE GDAN
GNYIS PAR BSNGAGS, GONG MA YUNG LOS SNGAR BZHIN

BKUR TE RJE RIN PO CHE PHO BRANG DU SPYAN 'DREN PA'I MTHUN SGRUB
KYANG ZHUS, YUNG LO KHRIR BZHUGS BCU GNYIS PA'I

SA ZLA'I TSES BCO LNGA LA SKU 'DAS, GDUNG RIL BOR 'JIM BYUGS LA
TSUL KHRIMS KYI DRI NGAD LDANG ZHING NA BZAR

SKYI CHAGS PA'I BYIN CAN DA LTA JO KHANG DU BZHUGS, KUN MKHYEN
'JIGS MED ZHABS DANG, RJE CHOS KYI NYI

MA YAB SRAS KYIS GRUB MTHA' SA SKYA BKA' RGYUD GANG RUNG LA
'KHOR LO SDOM PA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYIS MCHOG GI DNGOS

GRUB BRNYES SHING, SKU GDUNG GI THUGS KAR DROD YOD PA SOGS BDE
MCHOG RANG BYON DANG BYIN RLABS MNYAM

GSUNGS; SUM PA'I CHOS 'BYUNG DU, T'A'I MING HUNG BUS MCHOD PA'I
KARMA HE BLA MA'I DPON PO BSAM GTAN

BLO GROS, DES SE 'BRAS KYI BSAM BLO KHANG TSAN DANG, CHU SPREL
LOR 'DIR GZHI BZUNG, YUNG LO ZON TE

GNYIS KYI SKU RING LA DPON PO BSAM GTAN BZANG POS JO BO DANG RDO
RJE 'CHANG GI SKU BZHENGS, ZI YON BCU

GSUM DANG MCHOD GZHIS LUNG BA BDUN GYI LHA SDE GNANG ZHES
'BYUNG, NYID KYI SKU TSA DPAL LDAN BZANG PO DANG

BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN SKU MCHED LA YUNG LO BCU PAR GSER THAM
BYUNG, KHYAD PAR DPAL LDAN BZANG PO LA

SNGA PHYIR BSNGAGS BRJOD KYI BKA' YIG DANG JO SKU RANG BYON
GNANG STE PHO BRANG NAS 'DI BAR ZHAG RE BZHIN BZHUGS

SA'I LHA KHANG MDZOD THOG NAS BZHENGS, JO KHANG RIN CHEN 'OD
'BAR GYI RTEN GTZOR BZHUGS, DE'I RGYAB TU

GONG MA ZON TES YAB KYI DGONGS RDZOGS SU BZHENGS PA'I LHA KHANG
SRID SKYONG GLING DU BSNGAGS PA 'DI GSAR BSKRUN

SKABS 'JA' TSON ZLUM PO DANG KA BA LTA BU, 'KHOR LO'I RTZIBS LTA
BU SNA TSOGS SHAR BA'I RI MO LOGS RIS SU

BKOD; RGYAL PO'I DAD PA'I STOBS KYIS RDO RJE 'CHANG GI SKU
BRNYAN NAM MKHA' NAS BABS, RGYA RNAMS LA

YUNG LO'I SKU GDUNG DU GRAGS, RDO RING DU GONG MA'I THUGS DGONGS
RDZOGS TE LHA YUL NAS MI YUL GYI 'GRO BA SEMS

CAN GYI DON LA BYON ZHES 'BYUNG LA, BRAG SPRUL BA'I SKU BLO
BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS MDZAD PA'I DKAR CHAG RTZOM

'PHRO ZHIG KYANG YOD, KVA RING DKA' BCUS BYAMS KHANG DANG LHA
MO'I PHO BRANG BZHENGS PAR LI KY'A SGOM CHEN SHES

RAB SENG GES 'JIGS BYED KYI SGO NAS RAB GNAS MDZAD PA'I DKAR
CHAG CAN, LHA KHANG SO SO'I NANG DU YU SHEL

GYI BZHUGS KHRI, MCHOD STEGS SOGS GNANG CAN SHA STAG PHYI RU RDO
LA BZOS PA'I LAN KAN, RGYAL PO'I

BKAS RANG RANG GI LO RGYUS RGYA BOD KYI YI GE NYIS BSGRIGS YOD
PA'I RDO RING, CONG DANG RNGA BO CHE KHYAD MTSAR, SGO

'BYED GCOD LA GLANG BO CHE'I SKAD KYI GDANGS YIN ZER BA'I 'GYUR
BA MI 'DRA BA SOGS BKOD PA DANG BYIN BRLABS

@173 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

KYIS KHYAD DU THON PAS THU'U BKVAN RJES, GRUB CHEN GLANG DKAR
BAR GRAGS TE BLA MAR, ,YUNG LO ZON TE

GNYIS KYI BDAG RKYEN LAS, ,BSKRUN PA'I KO TAm SDE YI GTZUG LAG
KHANG, ,RTEN DANG BRTEN PAR BCAS PA

MJAL LAGS SAM, ,NGO MTSAR CAN GYI RDO KHRI NYIS BRTZEGS STENG,
,MTHONG BA TZAM GYIS DAD PA 'DREN PA

YI; ;RDO RJE 'CHANG GI SKU BRNYAN BYIN BRLABS KYI, ,GZI 'OD 'BAR
LA PHYAG MCHOD BGYIS LAGS SAM, ,

GZHAN YANG JO BO SH'AKYA MU NI SOGS, ,SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN BYIN
CAN MANG PO YIS, ,KHYON YANGS GTZUG

LAG KHANG KUN GANG BA LA, ,DNGOS BSHAMS YID SPRUL MCHOD PA 'BUL
LAGS SAM, ,ZHES GSUNGS SO, ,

DE DANG NYE BA'I DGON LUNG BRAG TU GRUB CHEN GYIS DGE RGYAS BDE
CHEN GLING BTAB, KHYAMS RA'I LDEBS BRIS SU

KO TAm SDE'I LHA KHANG LA RGYAL POS SRI ZHU MDZAD TSUL DANG MI
RTZA RNAMS RGYA NAG TU YONG TSUL GYI BKOD PA BRIS SNANG, BLA

MA DPAL LDAN BZANG PO'I SKU TSA BSAM GTAN BZANG PO, RIN CHEN
BZANG PO, RIN CHEN BZANG PO, DON YOD BZANG PO, DKON

MCHOG BZANG PO, NAM MKHA' BZANG PO, DPAL LDAN RGYAL MTSAN, DPAL
'BYOR BZANG PO, DPAL

LDAN RGYA MTSO, KUN DGA' RIN CHEN, KUN DGA' SNYING RJE SOGS NANG
SO GONG 'OG GI BLA MA NA RIM GYIS BSKYANGS

SHING THAMS CAD GONG MA TA'I MING RIM BYON GYIS BKUR, KUN DGA'
BSTAN 'DZIN LA GONG MA SHUN tI'I GSER

YIG BYUNG, GONG SMOS DPAL LDAN RGYAL MTSAN GYIS RGYAL ME TOG
THANG DU GSER GYI RGYA PHIB BZHENGS PAS GSER

TOG BZANG PO ZHES BSNGAGS, RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO GDAN
DRANGS, RDO RJE 'CHANG GI LHA KHANG GRONG

DANG 'DRES PAS DGON PA ZUR DU 'DEBS DGOS TSUL ZHUS PAR BRTEN,
DGON GNAS LUNG BSTAN CING BKRA

SHIS LDING KHA ZHES MTSAN GNANG, SKYID SHOD SDE BA CHOS RJE
PHEBS, BKA' CHOS MANG DU GNANG, DNGOS

'BUL GANG BYUNG GRVA TSANG GI MTHUN RKYEN DU SBYAR, MCHOD RTEN
YANG DU MA BZHENGS, LNGA PA CHEN PO ME SBRUL LA

'KHRUNGS PA'I LO GSUM PA SA LUG LA NANG SO DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO
DANG, CHOS RGYAL PHUN TSOGS GNYIS KYIS SBYIN

BDAG BYAS BSAM BLO LI KYA RAB 'BYAMS PA SHES RAB MCHOG LDAN GYIS
SNGAR GYI RGYAL BA'I LUNG BSTAN LTAR LHAS SNGO

TING DU GRO TSANG DGON BKRA SHIS LHUN PO BTAB, SKAL LDAN CHOS
'BYUNG DU, CHOS RJE SHES RAB MCHOG LDAN

GYIS; ;SA MO LUG LA GRO TSANG DU, ,GRVA TSANG BTZUGS SHING DGON
YANG BTAB, ,DE NAS LO GRANGS SO BZHI

SONG GSUNGS PA KUN MKHYEN BSTAN RTZIS RE'U MIG TU GZHIR BZHAG
MDZAD PAS KHUNG CHE BAR MNGON LA LCAGS PHAG

ZER BA'ANG SNANG, DGON BDAG BRAG DPON SLOB SKU 'PHRENG GIS MDZAD
LA, DE'I SKYES RABS AANG DKAR

ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG MKHAS BTZUN GYIS BSGRIGS PAR, BDE LDAN
ZHING DU SANGS RGYAS SNANG BA MTHA' YAS KYI

SRAS KYI THU BO BHU MI GARBHA, DGA' LDAN TZAN DAN GARBA, KHYIM
BDAG ME SKYES, TZANTRA GO MI, N'A RO BA, GSER

GLING PA CHOS KYI GRAGS PA, TI PHU BA, 'JAM DBYANGS ZHING GI YUL
GRU CHE, ,BDE BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS CANG

NAN DU, ,BDEN PA BSRUNG BA'I DAM TSIG CAN, ,TSE HO SHANG, SPYAN
SNGA PA TSUL KHRIMS 'BAR, 'JIG

RTEN DBANG POS YONGS BZUNG BA'I, ,GRU 'DZIN NYE 'DABS NAN CING
DU, ,WANG HO SHANG, 'JAM DBYANGS

@174 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,) WAN
LI'I GTZUG GI RGYAN, ,NAM MKHA' MDZOD LA MNGA' BRNYES SHING,
,'GRO 'DI'I BSOD NAMS MCHOD

SDONG CHE, ,TSUL KHRIMS BZANG PO, RGYAL TSAB DAR MA RIN CHEN,
'JAM DBYANGS GZHON NU'I SPRUL PA'I

ZHING; ;RTZE MO LNGA YI GNAS MCHOG NA, ,SGYU 'PHRUL BYE BA'I
MTHU GRUB PA, ,HEE KYIN, GNAM BSKOS GONG

MA ZON TE YIS, ,SRID DANG ZHI BA'I GTZUG RGYAN DU, ,MNGON PAR
BSNGAGS PA'I 'PHRIN LAS PA, ,RIN CHEN

BZANG PO, MA DAG SGYU MA'I LUS LA YANG, ,DAG PA YE SHES SKU
BRNYES PA'I, ,ZUNG 'JUG 'GRUB PA'I SHING

RTA CHE, ,CHOS LDAN RAB 'BYOR, SKYABS MCHOG DPAL BZANG, 'DREN
MCHOG RATNA WARNGHA, THUB BSTAN

SPEL BA'I 'PHRIN LAS KYIS, ,RGYA KYA THEG CHEN CHOS GLING BTAB,
,SGOM CHEN BI DZAR, 'JAM DBYANGS BDE SKYID

GONG MA YIS, ,DKON MCHOG MTHU STOBS YONGS 'DZIN ZHES, ,YONGS KYI
SPYI BOR DBANG BSKUR BA'I, ,

'DREN PA MCHOG LA GSOL BA 'DEBS, ,ZHES PA 'DI GLANG DKAR GYI
RIGS DPON DPAL 'BYOR BSTAN 'DZIN

YIN PA, BDE SKYID RGYAL POS DKON MCHOG MTHU STOBS YONGS 'DZIN
DANG SHES RAB BZANG PO ZHES BSNGAGS

SHING KON TING JING JO'U H'ANG TZI T'A KOO SHRI'I CHO LO GNANG,
GRUB CHEN GYI GDAN SA DGON LUNG BRAG BZHUGS SA'I

MTHIL MDZAD PAS BRAG DPON SLOB TU GRAGS, GSUNG MGUR ZHIG TU,
RGYA RGAN 'KHOR GYI BSKOR KYANG THOS

PA BTZAL, ,RGYA MKHAR NANG DU MI TSE SUM NYIS BRGAL, ,ZHES
'BYUNG BAS RGYA MKHAR DU YANG YUN RING BZHUGS

'DRA; KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA, LCANG SKYA NGAG DBANG
BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN, BYA KHYUNG RGYU NE MKHAN

PO SOGS BSTEN NAS LUNG RTOGS YON TAN LA MNGA' BRNYES, 'JAM
DBYANGS DKAR PO'I MA SH'I LAS SBYOR

MDZAD PAS MYU GU 'KHRUNGS, 'JIGS BYED BSNYEN MTSAMS GNANG BAR
NYAMS SNANG DANG 'BYUNG 'GYUR LUNG

BSTAN; YANG RDZONG RI KHROD DU BZHUGS SKABS NE TZO ZHIG DANG
DKA' GNAS DRI LAN MDZAD PA SOGS GSUNG

'BUM POTA GNYIS MA LONGS TZAM YOD, SUM PA MKHAN POS KYANG 'DI
NYID LAS KUN MKHYEN GONG MA NAS BRGYUD

PA'I MAN NGAG GSUM SOGS GSAN, DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU GYA LNGA TZAM
BZHUGS, DE NYID KYI GCUNG NGAG DBANG

NOR BU 'KHRUNGS RABS GRAS MIN KYANG, AANG DKAR GYIS, YID BZHIN
'KHOR LO'I GRUB BRNYES TE, ,'CHI

MED TSE LA DBANG 'BYOR BA, ,NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG NOR BU ZHES
BSHAD, SKU MCHED GNYIS KA GDAN SA'I KHRIR

BZHUGS SHING AANG DKAR GYI BLA MA DANG ZHANG PO YIN, NGAG DBANG
NOR BU'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG NYI

MA GUNG THANG RIN PO CHE'I DNGOS SLOB, SKYE BRGYUD LA SMAN PA
TSANG ZER, SKU TSA NGAG DBANG BRTZON 'GRUS SAM

BRTZON 'GRUS BZANG PO LA YANG GONG MAS THOB BYUNG, KHU BO BRAG
DPON SLOB KYIS KHYOD DA LTA BLA MA DPON PO BYAS,

SNGAGS PA RGYU RKA DANG MI NGAN GSHU BA LTA BU'I GROGS NGAN DANG
'GROGS NAS LAS 'BRAS DRANG PO MA BYAS NA RJES SOR

KHYOD KYI GSHU CHAD NAS RGYU RKA LA THUG PA ZHIG YONG YANG BYAR
MED, DE DUS SKYABS 'GRO, AA RA PA TZA, YA MA RA

DZA RNAMS THON ZHES LUNG BSTAN BKA' BKYON GYI TSUL DU GNANG, CHU
YOS DUS 'KHRUGS SKABS LAN JUR LO

BDUN LHAG MA BTZON DU BCUG SKYABS 'GRO SA YA SOGS THUGS DAM
NYAMS RTOGS KHYAD PAR CAN 'KRUNGS,

@175 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

THAM KA SHOR PA ZHUS NA SLAR GNANG ZER KYANG 'JIG RTEN GYI BYA
BZHAG LA YID GTAD MED PAR DGONGS NAS RTZOL

SGRUB MA GNANG, SNGAR KHU BO LA CHER MI GUS KYANG RANG YUL DU
BYON NAS BLA MA'I MCHOG SPRUL BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI

MA GDAN SAR BKOD, DE NYID LANG GRU'I NAGS YANGS SU RAB BYUNG BCU
GNYIS PA'I SHING BYI LOR 'KHRUNGS, GONG

BA DPON SLOB DGE RGAN DU BSTEN TE RANG DGON DU BSDUS GRVA DGU
PHAR BCAS DANG ZHAR BYUNG RIG GNAS LA SBYANGS,

NYI SHU PA LA SUM PA MKHAN CHEN LA BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS, NYER LNGA
PA LA DBUS SU PHEBS, 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG

DU THUGS GNYER PHUL PHYIN GNANG, SDE KHRI LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO
DANG 'DZIN GRVA GCIG ,KLONG RDOL BLA MA DANG

BRAG RGYAB DPON SLOB SOGS BSTEN, GNAS CHEN DU MAR MJAL SKOR DANG
CHOS LUNG GI RJE'I MANdAL GYI STENG DU

NAndAL MANG PO PHUL BAS RDO LA BDUD RTZI BAB, GCOD KYI NYAMS
BZHES LA BRTEN BYANG CHUB KYI SEMS RNAM PA

GNYIS KYIS GZHI BZUNG, RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA'I RIM GNYIS LA
THUGS DAM LHUR MDZAD PAS NANG MCHOD KYI BDUD

RTZI KHOL TE 'PHYUR BA BYUNG, YI DAM GYI LHAS RJES SU BZANG BA'I
GZIGS SNANG KHYAD PAR CAN MANG, KUN CHEN

BAR MA LAS RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM DANG, BKA' 'GYUR BA RAB RGYAS LAS
BKA' 'GYUR LUNG GSAN, THU'I BKVAN

RIN PO CHE, GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS, MI NYAG BSTAN PA'I NYI
MA SOGS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG

DU BSTEN, SKU 'BUM DU SMAN PA DANG TSOGS CHEN KHRI GNYIS KAR
BZHUGS, SPYI CHOS DANG 'DOD CHOS DU MA

BSTZAL; RE BZHI PA RAB YID ME YOS LO HOR ZLA GSUM PA'I TSE BCU
DGUR GSHEGS DUS NAM MKHAR 'JA'

'OD CHOS 'BYUNG GI RNAM PA CAN SHAR, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG
DBANG PHYUG SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO, SKU 'BUM DU

THUGS GNYER DANG DBEN GNAS DU MAR THUGS DAM 'PHEL, BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL DU YANG YANG PHEBS TE SDE KHRI RIN

PO CHE DANG, RJE DHVA DZA'I MTSAN CAN LAS BKA' CHOS GSAN BZHES
MANG DU MDZAD, YANG RDZONG DU MA DROS PA'I

PHO BRANG BZHENGS, ZHE BRGYAD PA LCAGS PHAG LA SKU 'BUM KHRIR
PHEBS TE GANG CI'I MDZAD SGO SHIN TU LEGS, RJE

BRTZON 'GRUS BZANG PO'I SPRUL SKU MKHAN CHEN SKAL BZANG BKRA
SHIS RGYA MTSO RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA PHAG LA

'KHRUNGS PA GRO TSANG GONG MAS NGOS 'DZIN MDZAD, THU'U BKVAN RIN
PO CHE LAS RAB BYUNG DANG GRO TSANG GONG MA LAS

BSNYEN RDZOGS BSGRUBS, SKU 'BUM DU THUGS GNYER MDZAD DE CHU BYA
LOR RGYUD PA DPON SLOB TU PHEBS, HAL

HA SEN NO YON PHYOGS SU 'GRO DON DANG SKU 'BUM KHRIR BZHUGS,
SKYE BRGYUD RGYUD PA TSANG DU GRAGS, ` GDAN

RABS DANG PO PHUN TSOGS RNAM RGYAL GA-YUNG BA'I RIGS LAS RAB
BYUNG DGU PA'I MJUG ME STAG LA 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG

LO BRGYAD PA LA SHES RAB CHOS LDAN ZHES PA LAS YI GE 'BRI KLOG
BSLAB, BCU GSUM PA SA STAG LOR MTSO KHAR

RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO LAS RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS, BCO BRGYAD
PA CHU LUG LA DBUS SU BYON, KHRI BYAMS

PA RGYA MTSO LAS DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, MNGA' RIS GRVA TSANG DU MKHAN
PO DON LEGS PA BSTEN TE LO GSUM LA BSDUS

TSAD SBYANGS, 'BRAS SPUNGS SU DBU PHAR 'DUL MNGON YONGS RDZOGS
LA SBYANGS TE NYER LNGA PA LCAGS STAG LA GSANG

PHUR DKA' BCU'I GRVA SKOR MDZAD PAS SHAR KVA RING DKA' BCU ZHES
SNYAN GRAGS KYIS GANGS LJONGS KHYAB, 'GAL

@176 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

RKYEN LAM DU SLONG BA'I GDENG DANG LDAN PAS CHOS SKYONG GIS
'PHRIN LAS BSGRUBS, MDO SMAD DU YANG NYIN MTSAN

GNYIS KAR DPE GZIGS KYIS TSIG DON LA DPYAD PA MDZAD PAS SNGAR
LAS KYANG THUGS GNYER 'PHEL, ZHE BDUN

PA RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I CHU BYI'I LOR DGON LUNG GI KHRIR BZHUGS,
GRO TSANG GSER TOG PAS GDAN DRANGS TE GRO

TSANG DU LNGA MCHOD GRAL DBU MDZAD, RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHE'I MDUN
DU DAM BCA' PHUL BA BZHIN NGA DRUG PA LCAGS

BYA NAS LO NYER GSUM GYI BAR DU DGE 'DUN BZHI BRGYA NYE BA LA
BSNYEN BKUR ZHUS TE BZANG SPYOD SMON LAM BTZUGS,

TZI N'A PA RNAMS DRUG CU'I THOG MAR NGOS 'DZIN PA'I SHING BYI
LOR GRO TSANG NANG SOS BKRA SHIS LDING KHAR LTO 'PHYE'I

THIG DANG, RDO BTAGS PA'I MTHA' LAS BYUNG BA'I RUNG KHANG GCOD
PA SOGS GZHI TSUGS PA TZAM BYAS TE NYID KYI

DON GNYIS PA ME GLAN LO 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD PAR GSOL BA BTAB PAS
SDIG PA 'DAGS PA'I THABS SU ZHAL BZHES

MDZAD TSUL GSUNGS PA BEE SER DANG MTHUN, SA LUG LA BZHED PA LTAR
NA NGAG BZHI PA YIN, SKYONG NGAL LA MA

GZIGS PAR BKA' POTA LNGA'I 'CHAD NYAN YANG DAG PA MDZAD, SKYABS
'GRO LTA BU'I DMIGS SKOR RE RE'I NANG

DU LAM GYI GNAD YONGS RDZOGS 'DRIL BA'I GDENG THOB, ZHING LA
GSHEGS KHAR SEMS CAN PHAL CHER NYAL NAS

NAS 'CHI, NGA KVA RING DKA' BCU LANGS NAS 'CHI ZHES BZHENGS TE
THAL SKAD BTANG NAS GSHEGS PAR GRAGS,

DE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS LHUN GRUB SNGAR GZHIS SU
'KHRUNGS, BKRA SHIS LHUN POR RNAM 'GREL DANG,

'BRAS SPUNGS SU PO TI YONGS RDZOGS, SMIN GROL GLING GTER STON
LAS KYANG GDAMS PA GSAN, GZHUNG

GIS MTSAN SGROGS MKHAN POR BSKOS, MDO SMAD DU RANG DGON GYI
KHRIR LO MANG POR BZHUGS, DGON

DER PHUN TSOGS KUN 'BYUNG ZHES PA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG BZHI
BZHENGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU SNANG RA BA NGAG DBANG 'JAM

DBYANGS DBU SU THUGS GNYER DANG, RANG DGON GYI KHRIR BZHUGS,
GONG MA PHUN TSOGS LHUN GRUB PA DANG

RNAM GNYIS DBUS LA LAN GNYIS RE PHEBS, SKU MI BDE BA'I 'TSUB
SLONG LTA BU YOD PA KUN MKHYEN SKU 'PHRENG

GNYIS PAS CHOS SKYONG LA NGO CHEN MDZAD PAS ZHI, DE'I SPRUL SKU
DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN SNANG RAR

'KHRUNGS; KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED ZHABS KYI BKA' LTAR DGUNG LO BCU
DGU PA LA BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS,

ZHI DUL GYI KUN SPYOD, CHOS SRID KYI MKHYEN PA, ,MDO SNGAGS KYI
BSLAB SBYANGS GANG THAD NAS BSTAN PA'I RGYAN

DU CHE BA ZHIG YIN 'DUG NGA GNYIS PA LA RANG DGON GYI KHRIR
BZHUGS, LO LNGA'I RING 'CHAD NYAN GYIS MTSON

PA'I MDZAD SGO SHIN TU LEGS, DA LTA'I 'DI PA YANG DPON PO RAB
'BYAMS PA TSOGS GNYIS RGYA MTSOS KHUR LEN

GYIS BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS TE MKHYEN RAB PHUL
PHYIN GYI SNYAN PA CHE, MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS KUN

LA SBYANGS PA MTHAR PHYIN PA MDZAD, DUS 'KHOR RDO RJE 'DZIN PAR
BZHUGS TE RIG GNAS SKOR LA RTING BSKUL

LEGS PAS PHAN SLEB BYUNG, SKU 'PHRENG GONG MA RNAMS KYI RNAM
THAR MDOR BSDUS RJE BLA MA DHVA DZA'I ZHAL SNGA NAS

KYIS MDZAD PA YOD, ` GDAN RABS GNYIS PA KVA RING DPON PO RAB
'BYAMS PA LHUN GRUB RGYAL MTSAN, DE

NAS KVA RING SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS SOGS RIM BZHUGS
KYIS 'GRIG KHRIMS DAM ZHING, 'DUS TSOGS

@177 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

SUM BRGYA LHAG LA SGO MANG YIG CHA DON BDUN CU BLO RTAGS, BTZAN
PO'I BSDUS GRVA BCAS BKA' POTA 'CHAD NYAN

GYI RGYUN BSTAR CHAGS SU GNAS, GRVA TSANG RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I SA
LUG LA BTZUGS PAR BZHED PA LTAR NA NYIS BRGYA

SO GCIG PA DANG, SHING BYI LTAR NA NYIS BRGYA NYER DRUG PA PAS
BYA 'DI YIN NO, ,'DU KHANG PHUG TU KVA RING DKA'

BCU PA'I SKU GDUNG LA SMAN 'DAM LJIBS BYUGS SNANG BRNYAN TSUL,
SMAN BLA BDE GSHEGS BRGYAD, DUS GSUM

SANGS RGYAS KYI LHA KHANG, RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I GZIMS
CHUNG DU NYID KYI 'DRA SKU, LHA MO'I MGON

KHANG TSES GTOR SKABS GRVA RGAN RNAMS LA ZHAL GZIGS PAR GRAGS
PA, BRAG BLA BRANG BAM 'GRUB NOR BU'I BANG

MDZOD DU THUB DBANG, 'JAM DBYANGS, SGROL DKAR GYI SNANG BRNYAN
LDER BZO CHE LEGS, RJE'I RNAM THAR RAS

BRIS BRGYA DANG NGA GSUM PA, KHRO LO'I PHYAG ZHABS KYI RJES GSAL
BA'I RDO AANG DKAR ZHABS DRUNG GIS PHUL BA

SOGS SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN BGRANG LAS 'DAS SHING, DKAR CHAG BLO
GSAL MGUL RGYAN MU TIG CHUN PO BYA BA

YOD; KVA RING BLA BRANG DU SPYAN RAS GZIGS SEMS NYID NGAL GSO
SOGS NANG BRNYAN MANG, GZHAN GONG BA

SGAR; 'DIR GONG BA GONG MA LO THE YES DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU GYA
GRANGS BRGAL BA LA THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHES GNA'

DUS KYI LO RGYUS MANG PO BKA' 'DRI MDZAD SNANG, ` RDO RJE 'CHANG
DANG NYE BAR GRO TSANG GZHIS KA GONG 'OG

SNGAR DE'I NANG SO GNYIS KYIS LA MO DANG BYA KHYUNG MA 'GRIGS PA
'DUM PAR BYAS, GZU SKAL DU NANG RTEN 'GA'

ZHIG GDAN DRANGS PA'I RJE'I GAndI DENG SANG NANG 'OG MA'I GRONG
KHYIM DU BZHUGS, GAn GA-YOG DNGOS BYA KHYUNG

NA YOD ZER, MKHAS PA MI GSUM GYIS SPYAN DRANGS TE BLA CHEN RAB
BYUNG DANG BSNYEN RDZOGS MDZAD PA'I THUB SKU

PHYIS SU RJE RIN PO CHES GTZUG PHUD PHUL ZHING DPRAL BAR RING
BSREL DUNG GA-YAS 'KHYIL GYI DBYIBS SU YOD PAS

STON PA DUNG GA-YAS 'KHYIL DU GRAGS PA DANG RJE'I SNAM SBYAR
GRVA BZHIR PAD MA RE DANG YAS MAS SU NOR BU'I GRVA RTAGS

CAN NANG GONG MAR BZHUGS LA, GZHAN BA SO'I RGYAL BA RIGS LNGA,
BKA' 'GYUR, MA nI DUNG GIS SGRUB

PA'I 'JIM BZO'I THUGS RJE CHEN PO BCU GCIG ZHAL RGYAL PO LUGS
DANG, DPAL MO'I LUGS GNYIS, GRUB

CHEN GLANG DKAR BA'I GOS BER DANG SKU 'GAG DMAR PO, DBU ZHVA SER
PO DANG ZHVA NAG GSER JUS MA, RGYAL

BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I GOS BER DANG THOD dAM, LNGA PA CHEN
MO'I SKU SHAM, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES KYI

ZHABS CHAG PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYI SNE RING, PHYAG PHYIS,
SDE BA CHOS RJE'I SNE RING DUNG DKAR

TSANGS DBYANGS 'BRUG SGRA'I SNE RING, NYI THANG NGAG DBANG GZHON
NU GRAGS PA'I SKU CHOS, LO SEMS DPA'

DANG; RGYAL SRAS RNAM GNYIS KYI SKU 'GAG RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD
PA'I SKU 'GAG KUN MKHYEN BAR MA'I

SGOM ZHVA, THU'U BKVAN CHOS KYI NYI MA'I NA BZA' LVA BA, MNGA'
RIS NGAG DBANG 'JAM DBYANGS MKHYEN BRTZE

BSTAN RGYAS KYI SKU 'GAG LCAGS ZAM SPRUL SKU'I RIGS LNGA DANG
SKU CHINGS, MKHAN CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS DBYINGS

KYI SKU CHOS DANG PAn ZHVA, RJE DPAL 'BYOR GYA MTSO'I RIGS LNGA
COD PAN CAN, SNE RING, SGOM ZHVA, RGYU NE

GRUB CHEN GYI DBU ZHVA, NGO BYI SGOM CHEN GYI SKU 'GAG BRAG DPON
SLOB KYI SKU CHINGS, MDZO MO MKHAR 'JAM

@178 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

DBYANGS NYI MA'I SNE THUNG SOGS NANG RTEN MANG, SUM PAS HOR
RGYAL DANG T'A'I MING GIS GNANG BA'I GSER THAM

CAN GRO TSANG, KHA TI KA MDZO MO MKHAR, BRTAN PO, COG TZA KO
SHRI ,DNGUL THAM CAN STONG BA ZIN,

ZHING SKYONG, BLU 'BUM, MDO BA, MI NYAG ,MAR RTZANG GI KO SHRI
DANG, SMAD PA GA-YI DGE ,KHYI LI, YEN

BSHU; CANG JO'I KO SHRI, 'U CHEN, CI SHANG CHAN SHRI, ZI YON
CHUNG BA LI DANG BA SO'I THAM KA CAN SO SO LA LHA

KHANG CHE BA RTEN GSUM CAN YOD PAR BSHAD CING, LA LA NGO 'PHROD
PA LTA ZHOG YI GE YANG DAG MIN MA 'TSAL RUNG

DPYAD PA'I RTEN DU BKOD DO, ` ,KO TAM SDE'I LHA KHANG RGYAB LOGS
SU TZONG THAR RI KHROD, ` KYE LAG `

RGYA DPON RI KHROD, ` MDUN NGOS SHING CHEN RI KHROD, ` KO TAM
SDE NAS SHAR DU RGYANG GRAGS BCU LHAG

'DAS PA NA TSO LNGA'I NANG TSAN KVA RING GI RGYUD PA ZHIG YUL
GRONG DU CHAGS PA LAS SHAR KVA RING ZHES GRAGS PA'I MI RGYUD

LA JO NANG GI GRUB MTHA' 'DZIN PA'I KVA RING JO BZANG BYA BA
KARMA ROL BA'I RDO RJE'I SKU GDUNG GI DKAR CHAG MDZAD

MKHAN DE DANG, KVA RING DKA' BCU SOGS BLA RABS RIM BYON PHAL
CHER MKHAS GRUB SHA STAG TU SNANG LA, LHA

KHANG RTA BRGYA MAR GRAGS PA KVA RING BSAM 'GRUB GLING DU, DUS
GSUM SANGS RGYAS, MCHOG ZUNG GNYIS,

SEMS DPA' BRGYAD, KHRO BO GNYIS SOGS BZHUGS PA'I RGYA PHIBS NYIS
BRTZEGS CAN, 'DU KHANG, KYEE

RDOR BZHUGS PA'I LHA KHANG KVA BZHI MA THOG KHANG DANG BCAS PA
BZHENGS NAS LO BZHI BRGYAR NYE BA SONG GSUNGS, `

YAR NANG RDO RJE BRAG DMAR, ` JO THOS RI KHROD, ` JO KYA'I RI
KHROD, ` GTZANG RAB GSAL DANG DMAR

SH'AKYA MU NI GNYIS KYI BZHUGS GNAS PADMO CHOS RDZONG NGAM PHU
LA YANG RDZONG BCAS GRO TSANG LA BU DGON BCU YOD PAR

SUM PAS GSUNGS, 'DI DANG BRAG DKAR SPEL RDZONG, AAN CHUNG GNAM
RDZONG, SHA RDZONG BZHI LA MDO SMAD

KYI RDZONG CHEN BZHIR GRAGS, GRO TSANG GONG MAS 'JIGS BYED ZHAL
GZIGS PA'I SGRUB KHANG, ` THANG RING

DGON DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING 'DEBS PA PO RGYAL BA BLA MA
BSAM BLO PA DGE 'DUN RIN CHEN NI, RAB BYUNG

BCU PA'I LCAGS LUG LA 'KHRUNGS, NYI SHU PA LA DBUS SU PHEBS TE
THUGS GNYER DANG GLING BSRES DKA' BCU

GNANG; NYER DGU PA LA 'BRAS SPUNGS RGYAL BA BLA MAR BZHUGS, SO
BZHI PA LA MDO SMAD DU BYON, SNGAR RGYAL

BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS ZHABS KYIS BCAGS TE DGE 'DUN GYI SDE
TSUGS PA'I RTEN 'BREL BSGRIGS, PAn

CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN GYIS DKA' BCU DON GRUB RGYA MTSO LA
BKA' LUNG DANG DGON PA'I MTSAN GNANG BA BZHIN

NYID KYI ZHE DGU PA SA LUG LA BTAB, GZHI GSUM GYI PHYAG LEN DANG
GRVA TSANG BTZUGS, GONG BA CHOS RJE GRAGS

PA RIN CHEN SLOB CHUNG BAR BSKOS, SHING KHYI'I DBYAR RJE NYID
DANG, RTOGS LDAN CHOS MDZAD DGA' BA DPAL

BZANG; GA-YI DGE'I DPON SOGS MCHOD YON THAMS CAD KYIS SDE BA
CHOS RJE DRUG PA'I SMON LAM GYI MGON DU SPYAN

DRANGS; DBANG LUNG RJES GSUM GYI BKA' CHOS MANG DU ZHUS SNANG,
BDUN CU BA LA GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU

BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I CHU RTA LA 'KHRUNGS,
DBUS SU THUGS GNYER DANG PAn CHEN CHOS

RGYAN LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS PA'I MTSAN MTHU STOBS RGYA MTSO,
LNGA BA CHEN MO'I BKA' LTAR BYAMS SKU DANG JO SKU

@179 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

BZHENGS PA LHA LDAN JO KHANG DU ZHAG BDUN BZHUGS TE BYIN GYIS
BRLABS PAR GSOL BA BTAB, LCAGS PHAG

LOR MDO SMAD DU GDAN DRANGS TE RANG DGON GYI RTEN GTZOR BZHUGS,
LANG GRU'U GYANG RING DGON DANG KAN

GRU'U M'A THIS DGON PA'I BLA MA GNANG, ` SHING GLANG LOR LCANG
SKYA GONG MA GRAGS PA 'OD ZER KHRIR BZHUGS, RAB

BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I THOG MA ME YOS LA DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS LHA
KHANG, BYAMS KHANG, MGON KHANG BCAS

BZHENGS; DBU PHAR DANG MDZOD 'DUL ZHIB KHRID KYIS 'CHAD NYAN
DMAR BA BYUNG, ` GYUNG BSOD NAMS

DAR RGYAS CHOS SDE 'DI DANG BYAMS PA 'BUM GLING SOGS DGON SDE DU
MA'I KHRIR BZHUGS SHING SKYE RGYUD YOD, `

'DAN MA GRUB CHEN TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO, LAM PA BRTZON 'GRUS
TSUL KHRIMS, LDANG NGA TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO,

CHU KHA PHUN TSOGS BZANG PO, NYIN ZHA NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS,
GONG BZHI GRAGS PA BKRA SHIS, SHAR BA DGE

'DUN 'OD ZER, SKYA THI BSOD NAMS SHES RAB, ` RGYAL BA BLA MA'I
SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN,

` GONG BA NGAG DBANG SBYIN PA 'BRAS SGO MANG DU THUGS GNYER DANG
MTSAN BTAGS GNANG, TE THUNG DGON DANG

SER LUNG SOG KYI BLA MA MDZAD, ` GA-YUNG NGAG DBANG RGYA MTSO,
BE RI BLO BZANG SHES RAB, BU LUNG BSTAN

PA LHUN GRUB, SKRA TSA BLO GROS RGYA MTSO, MANG RA BLO BZANG
BKRA SHIS, CHEN HU BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN, AA

MGON NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS, LDANG NGA NGAG DBANG DON GRUB, CHU
KHA BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS, ` HOR GYA

BLO BZANG SENG GE DBUS SU BYON BKA' POTA KYI GSAN SBYONG MDZAD,
RGYAL DBANG GIS CHOS RJE GNANG, LNGA PA

CHEN PO RGYA PHEBS DUS 'DI K'I KHRI BA YIN PAS, NYID GRVA TSANG
BCAS SKU 'BUM DU MJAL BAR BYON, DGON

PAR DKA' BCU'I MING BTAGS TSULGS RGYU'I BKA' GNANG, MKHAR SNGON
DDU BYON TE JA SAG BLA MA'I GO SAR

BZHUGS; RANG DGON DU DNGUL SRANG SUM BRGYA LHAG GIS 'BUM SOGS
PAR MANG DU BSKRUN TE SKU 'PHRENG RIM

BYON GYIS BSKYANGS, ZAN GYA BLO BZANG DGE LEGS 'BRAS SGO MANG DU
THUGS GNYER DANG, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG

YE SHES LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS BSGRUBS, RGYUD SMAD DU PHEBS NAS
SNGAGS LA SBYANGS PA PHUL PHYIN GNANG, KUN

MKHYEN GONG MA DGE 'PHEL DU BZHUGS PA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS, LAM RIM
CHEN MO'I BSHAD LUNG LAN KHA SHAS

DANG DBANG RJES GNANG SOGS MDO SNGAGS KYI ZAB KHRID DU MA GSAN
TE THUGS NYAMS SU BZHES PAS DBU MA'I LTA BA

BRNYES SHING 'JIGS BYED KYI ZHAL GZIGS PAR GRAGS, KHRIR LO LNGA
BZHUS NAS 'CHAD NYAN DANG, DBU MA'I

YIG CHA BRTZAMS PA PAR YOD, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I CHU BYI LO
SMAD RGYUD DANG SGO BSTUN PA'I RGYUD GRVA BTZUGS

TE GONG BA NGAG DBANG YE SHES KHRIR BSKOS, ` GA-YUNG RGYAL MTSAN
NOR BU, GONG BA NGAG DBANG YE SHES DBUS

KYI DGE BSHES, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE LA BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS, MDO
SMAD DU LO DKAR DGON THEG CHEN CHOS GLING

GSAR DU BZUNG STE KHRI MDZAD, GRO TSANG GI KHRIR YANG BZHUGS,
PHUN TSOGS SGANG DU BZHUGS SKABS RGYAL BA

TSANGS DBYANGS PA DANG THUGS 'DRIS BYUNG BAS RANG DGON DU GDAN
DRANGS TE CHOS ZHUS, ` CHAG GA BLO BZANG

DAR RGYAS, ` SKYA TI BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO RGYA NAG TU PHEBS,
LCANG SKYA ROL BA'I RDO RJE DANG 'BREL ZAB CHE

@180 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

BAS CHEN LUNG GIS HU THOG THU'I CHO LO GNANG, AA PAG GA SHE RA
THA LAR DGON PA BTAB, ` CHEN HU BLO BZANG

DGE LEGS, NAN KY'A NGAG DBANG BZANG PO, GA-YU BLO BZANG RNAM
RGYAL, CHU KHA NGAG DBANG DON GRUB, BE

RI GRAGS PA RIN CHEN, ` SKU 'BUM RGYA YAG BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG PO,
KHONG GIS RJE'I SKU LI MA CHE TSAD, TSE SKU

KHRI PHRAG BZHUGS PA'I ZHAL THANG GRAS MTSUNGS LNGA BCU, 'DU
KHANG ZHIG GSOS THEBS SU DNGUL SRANG LNGA BRGYA BCAS

SBYOR 'JAGS GNANG, ` SLAR YANG GONG BA NGAG DBANG YE SHES, MDO
BA NGAG DBANG SENG GE ZI NAS YE SHES

DPAL 'BYOR, SKRA TSA PHUN TSOGS RGYA MTSO, MA GRANG NGAG DBANG
DON GRUB, GA-YUNG NGAG DBANG RGYA MTSO,

NYIN ZHA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN, ` CHU KHA BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I
RGYAL MTSAN RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SHING PHAG

LA 'KHRUNGS, 'BRAS SGO MANG DU THUGS GNYER DANG GSANG PHU'I DKA'
BCU GNANG, RVA SGRENG KHRI CHEN LAS BSNYEN

PAR RDZOGS, SMAD DU AO THOG BE LI'I BLA MAR BYON, 'DI KA'I
KHRI'I SKABS PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES SKU

'BUM DU PHEBS PA MJAL BAR SNE RING SOGS RTEN CHAS BSTZAL, LANG
GRU'I KYANG RING DANG YONG CHING SOGS KYI

KHRI MDZAD, NA SA TZUN DUS BKA' GNANG BZHIN SBRA NAG PHYOGS KYI
GONG MA'I SKU DON SNGA PHYIR BSGRUBS PAS THEN

CHIN T'A BLA MA'I CHO LO DANG DE BSTUN GZHUNG NAS KYANG MKHAN
CHAS GNANG, 'DU KHANG JO KHANG GNYIS ZHIG GSOS

GNANG STE SNGA MAR GUNG THAGN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYIS RAB GNAS
MDZAD, PHYI MA LA CHU BZANG RIN PO CHER RAB

GNAS DANG THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I DBANG ZHUS, RE BZHI BA SA STAG LOR
LCANG SKYA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA GDAN DRANGS

PAR CHOS 'BREL BSTZAL, DGUNG LO GYA LNGA BZUGS, ` GA-YUNG 'JAM
DBYANGS BLO GROS DPAL 'BYOR, NYIN

ZHA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS RGYA MTSO, GONG BA BSTAN PA RGYA MTSO,
'GU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG

GNAS BCU RAB 'PHEL GLING GI LI KY'A NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA
MTSO'I BAR PHEBS TE SGO MANG YIG CHA'I STENG NAS

'CHAD NYAN GYI RGYAL MTSAN BSGRENGS, GRVA GRANGS LNGA BRGYA LHAG
LA, ` RGYAB RI'I NGOS SU RGYAL BA GONG MAS

BTAB PA LHA LUNG RI KHROD THAR BA GLING, GZHAN YANG BKRA SHIS
CHOS 'KHOR GLING, DGA' LDAN LHUN GRUB

GLING; DGA' LDAN BSAM 'GRUB GLING 'BUM KHANG THANG SOGS TZONG
LA'I GA-YON PHYOGS KYI RGYUD DU DGON CHE CHUNG

BCO BRGYAD, 'GAG RTZA BA YAN PHYOGS SU DGON SGRUB SDE DRUG BCAS
DGON LAG NYER BZHI MCHOD GZHIS LUNG BA

GSUM YOD CES BSHAD, 'DI DANG GRO TSAD DGON BKRA SHIS LDING KHA
GNYIS DUS MNYAM DU BYUNG, ` SHAR NGOS

GA-YO DGE LUNG BAR GA-YO DGE 'BYUNG GI SGRUB KHANG, ` B'A JO'I
DGON BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS GLING NI, SE CHEN

CHOS RJE RGYAL BA'I PHRIN LAS PA SBYIN PA RGYA MTSO NYI THANG
DGON 'DABS KAR GYI RIGS SU 'KHRUNGS, 'DI BAR

PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN DANG, LNGA PA CHEN MO GNYIS KAS
JUR CHU RGYAL BO 'DI STOBS SHIN TU CHE BA ZHIG YONG

'DUG PAS RANG PHYOGS KYI SBYIN BDAG LA AE KHUG LTOS GSUNGS PA
BZHIN RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I LCAGS 'BRUG

LOR MUG TUN DU PHEBS PA TZAM GYIS YUL KHAMS BKRA SHIS PA BYUNG
BAS RGYAL POS BLA MCHOD DU BKUR SHIG SPREL LO

MJUG SHAR RGYAL PO'I RGYAL KHAB CHEN POR DUS 'GYUR GIS LI'I TZIS
T'A MING KHRUNG CING RGYAL PO'I RGYAS LA BLANGS KYANG

@181	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

'DZIN RGYU MA BYUNG BAR JUR CHING LA SHOR TE MANG BKUR RGYAL
PO'I RGYAS SAR SHUN TZI THOG MAR PHEBS PA'I NYI SKAR DUS

TSOD SOGS LUNG BSTAN, RGYAL PO DANG LHAN DU PE CING DU PHEBS,
GONG MA GSER KHRIR BZHUGS RJES CHAB SRID

BRTAN PA'I CHED DU PHO BRANG DBUS KYI ZIN SHAN ZER BA'I RI'I
RTZE MOR MCHOD RTEN BZHENGS PA'I MDUN DU LHA MO DANG

GDONG CAN GNYIS KYI RTEN THUG GSUM BTZUGS, THUG DE GSUM DENG
SANG RGYU MTSAN MA SHES PAR RGA LUGS KYI

CHIS GVAN ZER BA'I SHING RING BO GSUM DU BSGYUR 'DUG PHYI ROL
GYI RGYAB TU CHAB SRID KYI SRUNG BA LTA BUR, LHA KHANG

SER BO RTEN BCAS BZHENGS, SKABS 'GA' ZHIG TU RTEN 'BREL GYI BCOS
MKHAR GYI STENG NAS RA DUG 'BUD

CING SKOR BA BYED PA'I SROL MDZAD PA DENG SANG BAR DU SNANG, DE
LTAR BKA' DRIN CHE BAS BKVAN TING GI LAS KA

DANG CHOS SDE GSAR BSKRUN LA PEN GNANG, BYAMS PA CHOS MCHOG RGYA
MTSO GONG MA KHANG ZHIS BKUR TE, RGYAL BO

NYID NAS RJE YAB SRAS GSUM SOGS RTEN GSUM 'GANG CAN DU PHUL,
CHEN LUNG GIS 'JAM DBYANGS LHUN

GRUB RGYA MTSO PA GDAN DRANGS TE MUG TUN DU GZHI RTZA RAB RGYAS
GLING BTAB NAS 'CHAD NYAN TZUGS, 'DI GSUM

SKU MCHED YIN, DA LTA YANG DPON RGYUD KYIS 'DZIN BDAG BGYID
CING, 7GONG MA NA RIM GYIS GZIGS PA CHE,

BLO BZANG LEGS BSHAD NYI MAS DBUS SU THUGS GNYER DANG LHA RAMS
PA MDZAD RTING MDO SMAD DU BYON, RANG

DGON DU MTSAN NYID BTZUGS PA BLO BZANG DON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN,
BYAMS PA RGYAL MTSAN, 'JAM DBYANGS

'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO, BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS NYI MA SOGS RIM BYON
GYIS BSKYANGS, B'A JO'I NANG SO SOGS

KYIS ZHUS TE THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE SHING YOS LA KHRI DAG SLOB
CHUG DU PHU TSA DKA' BCU BSKOS SNANG, GRVA GRANGS

NYIS BRGYA BRGAL ZHING, 'DU KHANG DU TZAN DAN JO BO, SMAN BLA
BDE GSHEGS BRGYAD, STENG DU RJE BDAG NYID

CHEN MO'I TSEMS RING BSREL CAN, RJE'I SKU CHINGS, RGYAL BA YAB
SRAS NA RIM GYI NA BZA', KHANG ZHI RGYAL PO'I

DBU ZHVA GNYIS, PHYAG 'PHRENG GSUM, GSER DANG YU SHEL GYIS
BRGYAN PA'I PHYAG GRI, NYA'I KHA SPU'I YU BA CAN

GYI CHIBS LCAG GSER GYI GA'U SHEL DANG MU TIG GI MGUL RGAN,
KYO'U TZI, BEEd'U RYA'I LHUNG BZHED, PADMA RA

GA'I ME DAM, GA-YANG ti'I SYAN GZIGS, CHOS RJE PA RANG GI PHYAG
'PHRENG, KYO'U RTZI, 'DU KHAG RGYAB KYI LHA

KHANG DU PHO BRANG GI BKA' 'GYUR MTSAL PAR DUB NAS PO TA BZHI
GSER BRIS THUM DANG GLEGS SHING GLEGS THAG SOGS

KHYAD THON GYI BKOD MDZES, ZHAL THANG PAn CHEN 'KHRUNGS RABS
SOGS DANG, DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS LHA

KHANG; MGON KHAG BCAS YOD, SUM PAS MERGEN CHOS RJE LI KYA SA KAR
BLA MAS BZUNG ZHING SNGAR THANG RING

DGON GYI LE LAG YIN YANG DENG SANG SGER TSUGS BZUNG BAS SER DRIS
RI KHROD KYANG 'DI'I DGON LAG YIN PAR

BSHAD; ` LUNG BA'I PHUR B'A JO'I RI KHROD, ` SKU 'BUM STOD DU ZI
LING STONG 'KHOR DGON NI, RJE MDO

RGYUD RGYA MTSO SKU 'PHRENG GI GDAN SA YIN LA, DE YANG SANGS
RGYAS LOG PAR DAD SEL GYI SKU'I SPRUL BA ZHIG LA BSOD

SNYOMS PHUL TE DA CHOS 'DZIN PA'I SMON LAM BTAB PA BRAM ZE'I
ZKHYE'I GO 'PHANG, DGA' LDAN DU BYAMS DGON

SRAS PO ZHI BA'I BLO GROS, ZHING 'DIR THUB PA'I DRUNG DU ZHI
BA'I SGRA DBYANGS, SUM CU RTZA GSUM DU LHA'I BU SPRIN@182 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

GYI 'PHRENG BA, KHA BA CAN DU SRONG BTZAN CHOS BLON THU MI
SAMBHOtA, AU RGYAN THUGS SRAS GA-YU SGRA SNYING PO,

'BROM RJE'I SRAS MCHOG DGE BSHES PO TO BA, 'DUL 'DZIN GRAGS PA
RGYAL MTSAN, SMRA BA'I KHYU MCHOG GRAGS

PA 'JIGS MED, DE NAS STONG 'KHOR ZLA BA RGYAL MTSAN NI, BOD CHEN
PO'I SA'I CHA BAR KHAMS STONG 'KHOR

DU; TZAR NGOS ZHES PA'I SAR RONG BU LONG PA ZER BA SPRANG BO
KHYO SHUG GI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I ME SPREL LA

'KHRUNGS; RGYAL BA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO DANG DGUNG MNYAM YIN, YAB
KYIS BON PO'I BLA MA ZHIG LA BRTAG PA

BYAS PAR, KHYOD KYI BUS BSTAN PA ZLA BA BZHIN DU GSAL BA DANG,
NGED CAG BON GYI BSTAN PA MUN NAG BZHIN

DU SEL PA'I SNGA LTAS BYUNG 'DUG ZER, SKU GZHON NU NAS RAB BYUNG
DANG SEMS DPA' BKRA SHIS RGYAL MTSAN

SOGS YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN, MI NYAG RAB SGANG PHYOGS SU THUGS
GNYER MDZAD, NAG 'JIGS SKOR GSUM

DANG; DMAG ZOR MA GTZO BOR BSTEN, DBUS SU THOG MAR SER BYES KRE
BOR PHEBS KYANG GNYER MA BYUNG BAS

SER SMAD RONG BO KHAMS TSAN DU PHEBS, RONG PO KARTI CHOS RJE
MJAL, BSDUS GRVA NAS BZUNG, PHAR PHYIN,

DBU TSAD, 'DUL MDZOD SOGS LA ZHIB PAR SBYANGS, 'DI SKABS RGYAL
BA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO, PAn CHEN

BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA, SE RA RJE BTZUN PA RNAMS ZHAL 'DZOMS DUS YIN
'DUG RANG YUL DU PHEBS TE

SNGON BON PO'I DGON GNAS BON KHANG SGANG BA ZHES PA'I SA CHA
BSLANGS TE STONG 'KHOR DGON GSANG CHEN RDO RJE GLING

BTAB; GNAS GZHI GTZUG LAG KHANG LE LAG BYAMS SKU THOG TSAD LNGA
PA SOGS RTEN BRTEN PA YONGS RDZOGS

GSAR DU BSKRUN, GZHI GSUM GYI PHYAG LEN DANG, MDO SNGAGS KYI
'CHAD NYAN BTZUGS, LCAM SRING CHOS

SKYONG DU BSKOS, BKA' 'GYUR BZHENGS, HOR DPON ZHIG GIS DMAG
KHRID DE DGON 'JOM DU 'ONG BAR,

KUN GYIS MTHONG SAR CHOS SKYONG GIS DPON DE'I SNYING BLANGS TE
'DU KHANG DU 'PHANGS PAS KHO 'PHRAL DU SHI GLO SNYING

PHYING BAS BTUMS TE CHOS SKYONG GI SKU BRNYAN GYI PHYAG TU PHUL
BA DA LTA YOD, YANG CHOS RJE GZHON NU ZER BA ZHIG

GIS GZA' RBAD PA GZIMS CHUNG GI KA STENG DU BAB KYANG GNOD PA
LTA ZHOG GZHAN DU 'GRO MA NUS PA SNYING RJES

BTANG; CHOS RJE KHO YANG RING MIN RAG KHROM ZER BA'I 'PHRANG NAS
GA-YANG DU LHUNG BAS NUS MTHU DANG, CHOS

SKYOD GIS 'PHRIN LAS BSGRUB PA'I SNYAN GRAGS CHE, GYA GCIG PA ME
'BRUG LA GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU YON TAN

RGYA MTSO BAR KHAMS WA TO BHO ZHES PAR RAB BYUNG DGU BA'I ME
SBRUL LA 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR BSAM

'GRUB RTZER MKHAN CHEN DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN PA'I DRUNG DU RAB
TU BYUNG, MKHAN PO DANG, DKA' BCU

BSOD NAMS DON GRUB SOGS LAS DBANG LUNG RJES GNANG SOGS CHOS BKA'
MANG DU GSAN, 'JIGS BYED

DANG MGON DKAR SOGS LHA DU MA'I ZHAL GZIGS DANG, SKYE BA MANG PO
DRAN, RDZA BKRA SHIS BSAM 'GRUB

GLING; RTE SHOD, SPO MDA' SOGS ZHABS KYIS BCAGS, BSTAN 'GRO'I
DON DU DAR RTZE MDO DANG, 'BUM

GLING PHYOGS GNYIS GANG LA PHEBS NA LEGS PA'I BRTAG PA MDZAD PAR
PHYI MA BZANG BAR BABS TE RONG BO KIRTI

DGON; D'A TSANG DGON, DMU DGE DGON, ZUNG CHU DGON RNAMS SU
PHEBS, MDZOD DGE PHYOGS SU RA RONG

@183 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

DPON SLOB CHOS GRAGS RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I THUB DBANG DANG,
RJE'I RTOGS BRJOD GNYIS GZIGS PAS THUGS

DAD 'KHRUNGS SHING, PHAN TSUN BLA SLOB TU 'BREL BA'I MNAL LTAS
NGO MTSAR BA RNAM GNYIS LA BYUNG BAS MJAL

PHRAD MDZAD, DAM PA DE NYID KYI DRUNG NAS CHOS BKA' MTHA' YAS PA
GSAN PAR LTAS KYANG KHYAD PAR CAN DU MA

BYUNG; MDZOD DGE DPON PO GRAGS PA BSOD NAMS KYIS ZHUS TE RNAM
THAR NGO MTSAR CAN MANG PO BZHAG SDOM CHU

BZANG RTZE RGYAL GYI SGAR THOG SOGS SU MDZAD, TA MGRIN GYI RNAL
'BYOR BA SHES RAB SENG GE YANG ZHABS LA BTUD,

KLU SHOD DU CHOS BKA' DU MA GNANG, CHOS RJE DPAL LDAN BZANG PO
SOGS DGE 'DUN GYI TSOGS DANG, CO NE

DPON KHAG GIS BSUS TE YONGS 'DU'I RGYAL KHAB TU PHEBS, ZLA BA
GCIG TZAM BZHUGS, THO JU BRGYUD,

GZHONG BA KHA GSUM DU CHOS MANG PO GNANG, SLOB DPON PAD MA'I
ZHAL GZIGS, 'BRUG MTSOR PHEBS DUS

MTSO SMAN GYI GZUGS BSTAN, DPON SLOB THAMS CAD MTSO MJAL YA
MTSAN PA BYUNG BAS DMAG ZOR MA'I BLA

MTSO YIN NAM GSUNGS, BYAMS PA 'BUM GLING DANG, HAN STAG LUNG,
KHA GYA, RGAN GYA BCAS DANG,

SLAR YANG THO'U JU, TSA RDOR, KHU SHA KHRA BO BRGYUD CO NER
PHEBS, DER RGYUD SDE SPYI RNAM RIG 'DZIN ROL BA'I

DGA' STON BRTZAMS, BZHAG SDOM DU LHA SRIN GDUG PA CAN DU MA
BTUL, SLOB DPON PADMAS BDUD SRIN

BTUL BA'I GNAS SU GRAGS PA STAG TSANG LHA MO'I GNAS SGO PHYE,
NYER GSUM PA LA MTSO KHAR RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS

RGYA MTSO MJAL BAR CHAB TSA THEG CHEN GLING DU PHEBS, BSNYEN
RDZOGS DANG CHOS BKA' MANG PO ZHUS, AAL THAN

GYI MCHOD GNAS SU LO 'GA' BZHUGS, RGYAL BA'I BKA' LTAR CHA HAR
DU PHEBS, RDZU 'PHRUL GYIS MTSUN LHA

MCHOD PA'I RGYUN BCAD, T'A'I MING WAN LI RGYAL POS GZENGS BSTOD
ZHUS, THU MED SOGS KYIS GDAN 'DREN

BYUNG YANG MA PHEBS PAR CHU RTA LA DBUS SU PHEBS, 'BRI CHU'I
KHAR LAS GSHIN GYIS THOD DBYUG ZAM PA'I TSUL

DU BZHAG PA'I MTSAN MA BYUNG 'PHRAL DAR LAM CHAGS, SE 'BRAS DGE
GSUM BTZUN MO TSAL, YER BA

SOGS DGON SDE CHE PHRA DU MAR MANG 'GYED DANG, SDE BA SKYID SHOD
PA DPON GA-YOG LA RDOR 'PHRENG DBANG GNANG,

SE RA'I MKHAN KHRIR LO SHAS BZHUGS, PHYIR LAM 'BRI GUNG BRGYUD,
RJE DRUNG SHES RAB DBANG BOR CHOS 'BREL

ZHUS; CHAB MDO BYAMS PA GLING SOGS LA BYAS RANG DGON BKRA SHIS
LHUN POR PHEBS, SO GCIG PA ME PHAG

LA GSHEGS, SKU GDUNG RIL BO KHAMS STONG 'KHOR DU BZHUGS, DE LA
SPRUL SKU HAL HA MANYDZU SHRI, AUR DU

SU MANYDZU SHRI NGAG DBANG 'JAM DBYANGS LHUN GRUB, BAR KHAMS
STAG BZANG DU 'KHRUNGS PA RGYAL BA RGYA MTSO 'DI

DANG BCAS GSUM SA BYI LOR 'KHRUNGS, NANG SO BSOD NAMS RGYAL
MTSAN SOGS KYIS GONG MA'I SPRUL SKUR THAG

BCAD DE STONG 'KHOR KHRI THOG TU PHEBS, DVAGS PO MKHAS MCHOG
CHOS RJE'I SKU SKYE BLO BZANG BSTAN PA RGYA MTSO'I

DRUNG NAS RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS, SNGAR ZLA PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS,
BYANG PHYOGS SU 'BROG SDE CHEN PO ZHIG 'BYUNG,

DE NGA'I GDUL BYAR 'GYUR ZHES LUNG BSTAN PA THOG TU BABS TE,
SHING RTA DGUNG LO BDUN PA LA MTSO KHAR KHO LO

CHI'I SDE THOG TU PHEBS, AAL THAN GDUNG RGYUD SKU MCHED KYIS
BSNYEN BKUR ZHUS, JI GIN SGAM BRAG TU LHA

@184 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

MO'I ZHAL GZIGS, STONG CHE, KHRI KHA, AA RIG SOGS SU PHEBS,
PHYIR PHEBS KYIS LO GSUM BCAD RGYA LA

BZHUGS PA GROL MTSAMS, PHUR TSA'I DPAL SHUL SOGS KYI DPON KHAG
SO SOS GDAN DRANGS, 'JI SKA LHA MO

DAR THANG DU, PHUNG TSA'I DPON PO SHES RAB GRAGS, DBAL SHUL DPON
'BUM SKYABS YAG MGO LOG DPON

AA SKYONG, TSE 'BUM THAR RNAMS KYIS CHOS MANG DU ZHUS, RMA CHU
LA GRU RGYAB STE, DBAL SHUL DPON CHOS

RGYAL RIN CHEN KHRO RGYAL BYAMS SOGS KYIS BSNYEN BKUR, KIRTI, DA
TSANG, DMU DGE ZUNG CHU'I SDE DGON

RNAMS DANG MTSO KHAR PHEBS, RGYA SOG GI CHINGS MDZAD, SKYID SHOD
SDE BA CHOS RJE LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS BSGRUBS,

RDOR 'PHRENG GI DBANG GSAN, AO ROD DU GDAN DRANGS, DBUS SU
PHEBS, RGYAL BA YON TAN RGYA MTSO MJAL,

SLAR MTSO KHA DANG DPA' RE YUL GRU, LANG GRU'U SDE BZHIR PHEBS,
NGA GNYIS PA SA YOS LOR GSHEGS KYANG

MNGAL DU SRID PA 'DZIN MA DGOS PAR SUG CHU'I 'GRAM DU RGYA PHRUG
LO BCU DGU CAN ZHIG GI PHUNG PO DUR KHROD DU

BSKYAL BAR BYA 'PHUR BA BZHIN SKAD CIG LA 'PHOS NAS NGA STONG
'KHOR BA YIN ZHES NGOS BZUNG BAR BRTEN GONG

MA'I SKU GDUNG DANG MNYAM DU STONG 'KHOR DU PHEBS, LAM NAS CHU
BZANG RNAM RGYAL DPAL 'BYOR BA'I DRUNG NAS

RAB BYUNG GSAR SGRUB KYIS MTSAN 'JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSOR BTAGS,
DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG MTHA' YAS PA

GSAN; DU K'U LAR, 'BROG MI'I RNAM THAR BZHIN GRUB PA'I DBANG
PHYUG CHEN PO RNAMS SLAR RANG GI PHUNG BO LA

NI 'JUG PA BSHAD KYANG GRONG 'JUG RGYUD NAS 'DRA'I LAS SLA BA MA
BSTAN ZHES DPYAD GZHI MDZAD PAR SPYIR

DGOS PA SHIN TU CHE LA, 'DI NI RJE SKAL LDAN GYIS, SNGAGS BSTAN
PA'I CHOS KYI BCUD BZANG BOS, ,THUGS BRTZE

BAS RONG 'JUG BDE LAM NAS, ,DPAL MDO RGYUD RGYA MTSO'I SKYE BA
BZHES ZHES TSAD LDAN DU BZHED SNANG, ME KHYI

LOR DBUS SU BYON, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN LAS BSNYEN
RDZOGS BSGRUBS, MTSAN MDO RGYUD RGYA MTSOR

BTAGS; 'BRAS SPUNGS SU LNGA PA CHEN PO MJAL, SDE SRID BSOD NAMS
CHOS 'PHEL DANG KU SHRI HAN GNYIS

KYIS BKUR GZOS TSAD MED ZHUS, RGYAL BA LA MDO MKHAR DU DGON PA
'DEBS RGYU'I SA CHA'I GSOL RAS ZHUS

PAR BKA' SHOG BSTZAL, SLAR MTSO KHA BRGYUD MDO MKHAR DU PHEBS,
DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING BTAB,

'DU KHANG MGON KHANG SOGS GSAR DU BSKRUN, CHU 'BRUG LOR KAR
THANG MAR KHU'I MTSO MOR LNGA PA CHEN MO MJAL,

SHING SBRUL LA RGYA NAG TU PHEBS GONG MA BDE SKYID KYIS CHAN ZHI
MANYDZU SHRI'I LUNG LAS PHUL, RI BO RTZE LNGA BRGYUD MTSO KHA

DANG BAR KHAMS STONG 'KHOR DU PHEBS, SNYING THANG DU BKRA SHIS
DAR RGYAS GLING GSAR DU BSKRUN, DMU DGE

NAS DKA' BCU SH'AKYA RGYA MTSO SOGS KYIS GDAN DRANGS, DE DANG
MTSO KHAR LAN MANG POR PHEBS, DPA' RE'I

SA CHAR SMAN CHU DANG BDE MCHOG GI BLA MTSO NGOS BZUNG, GNAS SGO
PHYE, BRAG LA PHYAG RJES BZHAG RONG BO DGON

DANG GNYA' GONG BRAG DKAR DU PHEBS, DMU DGE DGON DU BYAMS KHANG,
MGON KHANG, 'DU KHANG,

GZIMS KHANG RNAMS BZHENGS TE SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN DU MA DANG,
BKA' 'GYUR, BSTAN 'GYUR BZHUGS,

ZHE LNGA PA CHU PHAG LA GSHEGS, DE'I SPU SKU BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO
SNANG RA'I GRAM PA NANG DU, GCAN TSA'I DPON

@185 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

RGYUD GTZUG TOR SKYABS DANG, YUM 'BUM MO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SHING
BYI LOR 'KHRUNGS, ME STAG ZER BA'ANG

SNANG; SKU MCHED BRGYAD YOD PA'I CHE BA YIN, LA MO ZHABS DRUNG
BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYI DRUNG NAS

RAB TU BYUNG, PHYIS SU BSNYEN RDZOGS KYANG 'DI LAS BSGRUBS, T'A
LA'I HU THOG THU BSHAD SGRUB RGYA MTSO, RTZE

GDUNG ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG KUN DGA' YONGS 'DUS DANG, CHOS DPAL
'BYOR, L'I KYA DON YOD PA,

YONGS 'DZIN BLO BZANG NYI MA, SLOB DPON BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS,
MTSUNGS MED NAM MKHA' BSAM 'GRUB,

RJE DPAL LDAN CHOS SKYONG, SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS RGYAL
MTSAN, GA-YER GSHONG SNGAGS RAMS PA

SOGS LAS GSAR RNYING GI DBANG RJES GNANG LUNG MAN NGAG RGYA CHER
GSAN PAS GRUB MTHA' RIS MED LA MKHAS,

BAR KHAMS STONG 'KHOR DANG CO NE DGON CHEN SOGS SU PHEBS, CHU
YOS DUS 'KHRUGS SKABS GA-YER GSHONG DU

BZHUGS; MDO MKHAR DMAG GIS GTOR BA SLAR YANG RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS
PA'I ME 'BRUG LOR DA LTA'I STONG

'KHOR DGON THUB BSTAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING 'DI BTAB, GCUG NGAG
DBANG RNAM RGYAL GYI SRID KYI DON DU SKU RIM

MDZAD PAS KUN MKHYEN SKU 'PHRENG GNYIS PA GZHIS DER 'KHRUNGS,
SKU 'KHRUNGS MA THAG NAS BSRUNG BA DANG GANG

CI'I DO DAM, DGE TSUL BSGRUBS TE RDOR 'PHRENG SOGS CHOS BKA' DU
MA PHUL, GDAN SAR 'GOD RGYU SOGS

'GAN BZHES BKA' DRIN GZHAL DU MED, RE DGU CHU SPREL LOR RI BO
RTZE LNGAR PHEBS PA'I PHYI LO YAR PHEBS KYI

LAM DU GSHEGS, CHU SPREL NAG ZLAR RGYA NAG TU CHIMS BSGYUR BA LO
DE'I BDUN PA'I BCU GSUM LA DER GSHEGS

KYANG ZER, CHU BZANG RIN PO CHE NAS SKU GDUNG ZHUGS 'BUL MDZAD
SKABS GDUNG KHANG NAS DBU THOD MTHEB RGYA

TZAM YAR TE MDUN COG STENG DU BAB PA LA RANG BYON MANG DU PHEBS,
NYID KYI SLOB MA BYANG CHUB BZANG POS MDZAD

PA'I RTOGS BRJOD TSIGS BCAD MA SNANG, DE'I SPRUL SKU 'JAM
DBYANGS BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO NI LA MO'I LUNG

BSTAN DU, CHU BKRA SHIS GA-YANG CHAGS RMA CHU ZER, ,CHU DE YI
PHAR NGOS SHING GI RI, ,RI GYAD PA KHA NA NOR

BU YOD, ,CES PA DANG MTHUN PAR RONG BO SHING LE KHAR SHING KHYI
LOR 'KHRUNGS, LCAGS 'BRUG LOR SKU 'BUM

DU CHU BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG GI DRUNG NAS RAB TU BYUNG,
BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, RNAM

DPYOD 'GRAN ZLA MED PA'I SNYAN GRAGS CHE, 'JAM DBYANGS KYI GZIGS
SNANG BYUNG BA BAR CHAD KYI LTAS LA BUR

GYUR; KUN MKHYEN DRUNG NAS RIG GNAS SKOR DPE KHRID DANG, DBANG
LUNG KHRID MAN NGAG GI RGYUN 'DOD PA

BZHIN BZHES, CHEN LUNG KHRIR BZHUGS BZHI BCU PA SHING LUG PE
CING DU GONG MAR 'TSAMS ZHUS LA PHEBS,

RGYAL POS KYANG GZIGS BSKYANGS DPE MED MDZAD, DBUS SU PHEBS KHAR
BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU BYON, KUN

MKHYEN MCHOG NAS TSUL GNAS THOS BSAM SGOM PA MDZAD TSUL GYI
BSLAB BYA DANG, GSOL STON THOG DNGUL SRANG

SUM BRGYA SOGS KYI PHEBS RDZONG GNANG, SER SMAD CHOS GRVAR BKA'
POT YONGS RDZOGS LA SBYANGS, PAn CHEN

YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN, PHA BONG KHA BA RGYA

MA SOGS RTZOD MED DUM LA CHOS BKA'I

@186 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

RGYUN BZHES, 'BRAS SPUNGS GTZANG PA MKHAN PO, MKHAN PO SKAL
BZANG DNGOS GRUB LA YANG CHOS 'BREL

GSAN; SHING 'BRUG SMON LAM TSES BCU GSUM NYIN LHA LDAN DU DAM
BCA' BZHAG PA DPE MED BYUNG BAS BDAG

RKYEN DU, TSA RDOR NO MON HAN GYIS 'PHRUL DU SER SMAD MKHAN
KHRIR BSKOS PA'I BKA' BSGYUR GNANG, 'GRIG

LAM GYI RTING BSKUL DANG, 'CHAD NYAN PHUL DU PHYIN, LCAGS PO RI
DANG, ZHVA LU'I MKHAN PO YANG MDZAD,

LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO'I YANG 'GREL, KUN GZHI'I 'GREL BA, SENG
GDONG CHOS SKOR, RTA MGRIN CHOS SKOR

SOGS GSUNG RTZOM MANG, SLOB MA 'BRU LA MKHAN CHEN, DUNG DKAR
SPRUL SKU, DAG PA SPRUL SKU, DE MO

YONGS 'DZIN RIN CHEN RGYAL MTSAN, NO MON HAN SPRUL BA'I SKU,
BYANG RTZE BLO BZANG DGE LEGS, SER SMAD

NAS BLO BZANG THUGS RJE, GRAGS PA MKHAS GRUB, GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO
GSUM, STONG 'KHOR DANG MCHOD RTEN

THANG GNYIS KA'I KHRI BA RTA 'ON NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG, RI BO
RTZE LNGA'I DBYAR GNAS BLA MA BLO BZANG SHES RAB, MCHOD

RTEN THANG MKHAN PO DON GRUB RGYA MTSO, RGYAL RONG PHYOGS BZHI
DPON PO BYAMS PA PHUN TSOGS SOGS MANG, ME RTA

LOR RANG YUL DANG, LUG LOR RGYA NAG TU PHEBS, ZHE LNGA PA SA RTA
LA GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU SKAL BZANG

SHING BZA' DPON SLOB LAS RAB BYUNG

MIG ME LONG DANG, HANG NGE LA LA

MTSOR MJAL, SER SMAD CHOS GRVAR

THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED SKAL BZANG DGUNG

LO BDUN LAS MA BZHUGS, DA LTA THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO
LCAGS 'BRUG LO PA SKU 'BUM DU THUGS

GNYER DANG, CHU BZANG RIN PO CHE LAS RAB BYUNG BSNYEN RDZOGS RIM
PAR BZHES, RJE GSER KHANG PA'I ZHABS

PAD RGYUN RING BSTEN, DA LTA PHO BRANG DU THAM KA BLA MA MDZAD,
` DGON 'DIR THOG MAR SE RA'I YIG CHA'I

'PHRUL SMON LAM DANG, RDUL TSON LA BRTEN

MTSO'I DNGUL GDUNG MCHOD RTEN KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED SDES BZHENGS
PA, SPRUL SKU SKAL BZANG 'JAM DBYANGS

PAR BCAS PA, ` STONG 'KHOR BLA BRANG,

DRUNG BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS RGYA MTSO'I SKYE RGYUD KYI

SOG PO BLA BRANG SOGS SGAR KHAG DANG, ` MCHOD GZHIS SNGAR MDO
RGYUD RGYA MTSO LA, KU SHRI HAN GYIS MDO

KHU THUL, RDO NYI ZLA, THAR WON KHU THUL, LA

DER BLANGS PA NAS BZUNG ZI LING STONG 'KHOR

RI KHROD CIG TU DE'I 'DRA SKU YA MTSAN CAN

@187 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

DGON SOGS TZONG LA BYANG RGYUD KYI SKABS SO, , , ,

TZONG LA LHO RGYUD KYI GNAS KYI SNYING BO CHOS SDE CHEN PO BYA
KHYUNG THEG CHEN YON TAN DAR RGYAS GLING NI, MDO SMAD

BSTAN PA'I MES PO CHOS RJE DON GRUB RIN CHEN YUL BYANG PHYOGS
KYI RGYUD 'DIR SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'KHRUNGS YUL YI GE

RNAMS SU MI GSAL YANG REB SKONG DON RIN NYIN YIN ZER MKHAN
SNANG, GZHON NU NAS RAB TU BYUNG, DBUS

SU SNYE THANG PA BKRA SHIS SENG GE SOGS LA PHAR PHYIN DANG BYAMS
CHOS, SNAR THANG DU SKYO TSUL LA BRTEN TE BCOM

LDAN RIGS DPAL GYI BU CHEN SDONG STON RIGS PA'I SENG GE LAS RNAM
GES LA GSAN SBYONGS MDZAD, DE'I TSE RIGS

PA'I DGAG SGRUB CUNG ZAD 'CHAR DKA' BAR BYUNG NAS ZHVA LUR BYON,
THUGS RJE CHEN PO RANG BYON GYI DRUNG DU

GSOL BA BTAB CING ZHABS LA KHRAG RDOL GYI BAR DU SKOR BA MDZAD
PAS MKHYEN PA'I KLONG RDOL, DE KAR GRVA SKOR

MDZAD DUS BU STON RIN PO CHES TSOGS SU BGRO GLING GNANG BA KHAS
BLANGS LEGS PAR ZIN PAS SHAR PHYOGS PA RIGS

PA'I DPA' BO ZHES SNYAN GRAGS KYIS KHYAB, BLA MA YE SHES DPAL BA
LA 'JIGS BYED DBANG SOGS GSHED SKOR

RDZOGS PAR GSAN, MCHIM BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DRUNG DU MDO SNGAGS
KYI CHOS MANG PO GSAN SKABS SHIG KHYOD KYI

GNAS DANG GDUL BYA MDO SMAD DU YOD, KHYAD PAR BYA KHYUNG DANG
SHA SPRANG ZER BA GNYIS SU DGON PA THOB, BSHAD

SGRUB GANG 'PHEL GYIS, SGOS SU BYA KHYANG DU SGRUB PA MDZOD,
SLOB MA MKHAS GRUB MANG BO 'ONG, 'GRAN ZLA DANG

BRAL BA GCIG 'BYUNG, DE LA NGA'I MING 'DI THOGS DANG BSTAN PA LA
PHAN THOGS KHYAD PAR CAN 'BYUNG ZHES LUNG

BSTAN PA SPRUL PA'I GLEGS BAM LAS, RVA SGRENG GI CHU MIG RING MO
LAS GTZANG DU SONG BA DANG, DE NAS GNAS

DER 'OD ZER 'PHRO TSUL SOGS MTHUN NAM SNYAM ZHES KUN MKHYEN BLA
MA GSUNGS LA, 'JIGS BYED KYI GDAMS

NGAG SKOR LA THUGS RTZOL MDZAD SKABS KYANG 'JIGS BYED DANG DNGOS
SU MJAL 'DOD NA MDO SMAD DU SONG

GSUNGS; AA MDOR PHEBS TE SHING KUN SDE GSAR GYI MKHAN PO MDZAD,
MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS DU MA GSUNGS,

DGOS DBANG GIS SLAR YANG DBUS SU PHEBS, YO BYAD MANG DU BSNAMS
PAS BDE BA CAN DANG SNAR THANG SOGS

LA BSNYEN BKUR RGYA CHEN PO DANG GTZUG LAG KHANG BZHENGS, YAB
CHOS SDINGS SU RTOGS LDAN BSAM GTAN DPAL

BA LA ZHI BYED GSAN, SGRUB PA LA GCIG TU SGRIL BAS ZHI LHAG LA
DBANG THOB STE PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO'I RTOGS PA 'KHRUNGS,

MDO SMAD DU PHEBS TE BLA MA'I BKA' BZHIN THOG MAR SHA SBRANG
DGON BTAB, BYA KHYUNG GI GNAS TSOL BAR RMA CHU

KHAR BYA KHYUNG GI BRAG MTHONG BA'I GRONG ZHIG TU RGAN MO BZHIN
MI SDUG PAR STON PA ZHIG GIS GA-YOG MO LA THANG MA BSDU

RAN 'DUG GO ,BRAG BYA KHYUNG NAS CHAR BA YONG BA SLEBS SONG ZER,
RGAN MO DE LA BRAG BYA KHYUNG GANG YIN DRIS

PAS RGAN MOS KHROS TSUL GYIS CI BYED RGYU YIN PHA GI RED ZER
BSDIGS MDZUB DANG BCAS 'BAR BZHIN DU BSTAN,

RGAN MO DE KHRO GNYER CAN MA'I SPRUL BA YIN, SA 'DUL DANG NGO
SPROD LHAN GCIG MDZAD CES GSUNGS, NGAG

RGYUN LA, SE GU BYA KHYUNG DU RI KHROD BZUNG, SGROL MA'I ZHAL
GZIGS TE LUNG BSTAN GYI GNAS 'DI MIN ZHES

BSKUL BA BZHIN DGON GNAS 'TSOL CHED DGU RONG BRGYUD SNANG RAR
BYON, DER RGAN MO ZHIG GIS BYA KHYUNG GI

@188 (TZANG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

GNAS BSTAN, SNANG RA'I GSER KHANGS BZHENGS, BON BYA TSANG DU NYE
TSAN BUD MED CIG YOD PAS GSOL

TSIGS DRANGS, YUR LAS KYIS MNAR BA LA THUGS BRTZE BAS YUR MNAN
DANG MCHOD RTEN BRTZIGS PAS YUR MA

CHAD; MOS RVA PHYAR GYI BZHUGS GDAN PHUL BA GSER GDUNG NANG RTEN
DU BZHUGS PA DA LTA RTEN SKAL DU ZHUS

CHOG SKAD SNANG, RDZU 'PHRUL GYIS ZLA BA DRUG PAR RMA CHU LA DAR
LAM SNAM BU BRKYANGS PA 'DRA BA SPRUL TE PHEBS PA'I

GRONG MING LA DAR DANG, LA BRGYAB PAR RJES 'BRANG KHYI RGAN ZHIG
YOD PA LUS PAS KHYI RGAN LAR GRAGS, THOG

MAR KHYUNG LTAG TU BZHUGS, BON PO RIR BON DGON ZHIG YOD PA'I
GTZO BO DES SPYAN DRANGS, BZHUGS GDAN

GYIS MTSAN DNGOS 'BUL PHUL BAS RTEN 'BREL 'GRIG NYID NAS LHAM
SOGS GNANG BA YUL 'DON PA'I BRDAR

GO NAS MTHU RES BYAS, DANG BO CUNG ZAD 'TSUB NYAMS LTA BU LA,
ZHING BA'I BTZUN CHUNG 'DIS SLOB DPON

GYIS LA SGRUB PA TSUGS GSUNGS PA LTAR BYAS PAS 'PHRAL DU BON
RNAMS NANG 'THOR, 'GA' ZHIG RTZUB RING DU

SONG; KHA CIG LUNG PHRAN 'GAR BSDAD PAS LUS RID CING BSGUL
BSKYOD MED PAR SHI BA'I SAR BON GYONG NANG

DU THOGS, LAN CIG DPE KHAL BKAL BA'I DRE'U ZHIG YOD PA GLO BUR
DU BOR BA BTZAL BAS RGYAB RI'I 'DABS

NE'U GSENG DANG LJON SHING THO RE BA YOD SAR CHU 'THUNG NAS NYAL
'DUG PA THABS CI BYAS KYANG MA SLONG TSUL ZHUS

PAS; NGED TSO 'DUG SA NOR BA YIN 'DUG DER 'GRO GSUNGS TE GNAS
DER DGON PA BTAB, GRVA TSOGS

BRGYA PHRAG BRGAL BA LA PHAR TSAD KYIS THOG DRANGS BYAMS CHOS
RNAMS DANG, BRTAG GNYIS SPYOD 'JUG SOGS KYI

BSHAD PA RGYA CHEN MDZAD, KLU RGYAL GTZUG NA RIN CHEN GYI PHO
BRANG CHU MIG GNYAN PO YOD PA'I GSENG GI STENG DU

GTZUG LAG KHANG BZHENGS PA PHYIS SU MGON KHANG DU GRAGS, 'JIGS
BYED ZHAL PHYAG YONGS RDZOGS, MGON

PO PHYAG DRUG PA SOGS CHOS SKYONG RNAMS KYI SKU BRNYAN BZHENGS
PA'I BYIN RLABS KYIS SDE 'DIR BSHAD SGRUB YUN RING

DU GNAS PA THUGS BZHED LTAR BYUNG, YI DAM RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED LA
SGRUB PA RTZE GCIG TU MDZAD PAS RMI LAM DU

ZHAL GZIGS, MNGON SUM DU MTHONG BAR GSOL BA BTAB PAS SANG PHOD
LUNG PA 'DI'I MDAR 'ONG ZHES RI

ZHIG LA MDZUB MO BTZUGS, YI DAM GYI SPRUL PA'I SKU 'BYUNG BAR
DGONGS NAS RJE'I YAB YUM GNYIS LA BDUD

RTZI RIL BU, 'JAM DBYANGS RIL BU, SRUNG MDUD RNAMS BSKUR, KHYE'U
KHYAD PAR CAN 'KHRUNGS PA YOD,

'KHRUNGS MA THAG RIL BU 'DI RNAMS 'O MA DANG SBYAR TE ZHAL DU
DRONGS, SRUNG MDUD 'DI THOGS, GRIB LA

'DZEM; BKUR STI DANG RIM GRO CHER GYIS, ZHES NYE GNAS MNGAGS PA
NAM LANG KHAR 'BYOR BAR SKU 'KHRUNGS

PA DANG DUS 'GRIG DE DUS SKU 'BUM PHU CHU DKAR RI KHROD DU
BZHUGS, RJE NYID YAB YUM GNYIS KYIS GDAN

DRANGS PAR, BU CHUNG 'DI NGA LA BYIN GSUNGS PAS 'BUL BAR KHAS
BLANGS, RJE DGUNG LO GSUM PA LA GNAS

YON SHA BA RDZONG DU KARMA RO PA'I RDO RJE LAS DGE BSNYEN
BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO BZHI BA'I DUS YAB YUM GNYIS BU

CHUNG 'BUL BAR BYON SKABS PHYOGS 'DI 'DRA ZHIG NAS NGED LA SLOB
MA CIG 'ONG BAR 'DUG PAS LTOS GSUNGS PA

BZHIN BYAS PAS SKYA KA'I GZHUNG DU MI MANG DMAG 'DRA BA 'ONG
BA'I MTHONG SNANG DANG, RIM GYIS JE NYUNG DU SONG

@189 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

BA SA BZANG SGANG LA SLEB TSE MI STAG ZHON GCIG TU MTHONG BAS
GCIG STAG SGANG DANG, GRVA BAS SO BYAS PA'I SGANG

LA SO TI LA SGANG DU GRAGS, DE NAS BZUNG SKU DRUNG DU BCAR TE
THOG MAR, BDE MCHOG KYEE RDOR, 'KHOR

CHEN; RTZE MO SOGS RGYUD SDE GONG 'OG DU MA'I DBANG GNANG, GSANG
MTSAN DON YOD RDO RJER BTAGS, RAB

BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, MTSAN BLA MA'I LUNG BSTAN DANG
MTHUN PAR GSOL, 'JAM DBYANGS YAB YUM

GYI SGO NAS SHES RAB BSKYED PA'I THABS MDZAD, NYIN GCIG RTZED
MO'I RNAM PAS GA-YENG BA LA 'GRAM LCAG BTANG

NAS SGOR BTON, RJES SU GRVA BA ZHIG BLTAR MNGAGS PAR RGYAB RI'I
RTZE'I RGYAB LOGS SU ZHAL SBUB KYIS BSHUMS

TE PHYAG GIS SA 'DRAD KYIN BZHUGS, RE ZHIG NA BZHENGS TE RDO
MANG PO BTUS GRAL PHYI NANG KHA SHAS YOD PA

BSGRIGS NAS PHYAG DBANG 'JOG PA'I STANGS KA GSUNG CHER BSGRAGS
TE THAMS CAD KYI PHYAG YUG YUG DANG,

DBUS SU SKYIL DKRUNG GIS BZHUGS TE CHOS 'CHAD PA'I TSUL MDZAD PA
SOGS CHOS RJE NYID LA ZHUS PAS RTEN 'BREL

LEGS GSUNG SLAR 'BOD PA GNANG, BAR CHAD SUNG BA'I LHA 'KHOR
CHEN, SHES RAB BSKYED PA'I LHA 'JAM

DBYANGS AA RA PA TZA NA, TSE LHA TSE DPAG MED DZE TA RI, MTHUN
RKYEN SGRUB PA'I LHA SRAS, MI DANG MI MA

YIN PA'I GNOD PA LAS SKYOB CING 'PHRIN LAS SGRUB PA'I LHA MGON
PO PHYAG DRUG PA RNAMS NGA'I YI DAM KHYOD LA STE RAB

YIN ZHES DBANG DANG RJES GNANG SOGS CHOS SKOR CHA TSANG PHYAG
LEN BCAS ZHIB PAR BSLAB STE BSNYEN SGRUB DANG

GTOR MA RE MA CHAG PA GYIS GSUNGS, BRAG STENG DU SPYIL BU
BRTZIGS PA'I NANG DU AA RA PA TZA NA BSGRUB BCUG

PAS SPYIL BU'I RTZVA'I RTZE RNAMS SU SNGAGS DANG PHYAG MTSAN
GRANGS MED PA GUR PHIBS PA LTA BU'I GZIGS SNANG YAB

YUM GNYIS KAR BYUNG, BCU BDUN PA LA DBUS SU PHEBS PA'I RDZONG
BRDA' DO DAM DANG THUGS GNYER MDZAD

TSUL GYI ZHAL GDAMS GNANG BAS RJES KYANG BKA' DRIN CHE BA'I BLA
MA GCIG TU MDZAD, PHEBS KHAR LAM YA GI NAS

PHA RGAN NGA LA LAN GSUM LTOS GSUNGS PA THUGS BSNYEL GNANG BAS
CUNG ZAD MA RANGS PA'I RNAM PAS BU GZHON NU

GCES PAR BSKYANGS KYANG MTHAR BUS PHA RGAN 'DOR RAM GSUNGS NAS
SPYIL BU BRAG GA-YANG DU BSKYUR BA 'JA'

GUR GYIS BAR SNANG DU YUN RING BZUNG BA PHYIS DGON PAR SPYAN
DRANGS TE MCHOD RTEN DANG LHA KHANG BZHENGS SHING,

DA LTA YANG DUS CHEN RNAMS SU 'JA' GUR 'CHAR BAR GRAGS, MNGON
MKHYEN THOGS MED MNGA', RJE DBUS

SU PHEBS RJES SU YANG SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG PO GSAR DU
BZHENGS, SKU 'DA' PHAR NYE DUS MTHUN SNANG DU

LHA RNAMS KYIS SIL SNYAN DANG ME TOG SOGS MCHOD SPRIN DU MAS
MCHOD CING BYANG PHYOGS RNGA SGRA SGROGS PA ZHES BYA BA'I

DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I ZHING DU 'BYON PAR NAM MKHA' LAS SGRA MNGON
SUM BYUNG, RJE 'DI NYID KYI RNAM PAR

THAR BA YONGS GRAGS RAGS RIM LA, BYA KHYUNG MKHAN ZUR RTA GDONG
BLO BZANG CHOS DBYINGS KYIS BSGRIGS PA'I

YI GE ZHIG YOD PA LAS KYANG CUNG ZAD BTUS TE BKOD, ` GDAN RABS
GNYIS PA T'A DBEN GZHON NU SENG GE'I

SLOB MA GZHON NU BYANG CHUB 'OD ZER GYIS RJE'I RAB BYUNG DANG
DGE TSUL GYI SLOB DPON MDZAD, ` DE NAS RJE BLO

GROS RGYA MTSO, ` AA 'GRON DKA' BCU SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN, 'DI
MKHAS GRUB GNYIS 'DZOMS DON RIN

@190 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

PA'I SKYE BAR GRANGS, RGYAL BA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO'I THUGS SRAS,
MDO SMAD MUN PA'I SMAG RUM NA, ,AA

'GRON GSAL BA'I SGRON ME SHAR, ,ZHES BSNGAGS BRJOD MDZAD, DGON
PA YUN RING DU BSKYANGS, RDO RJE

'PHRENG BA SOGS CHOS KYI CHAR PHAB, MCHOD SDONG SA 'BUM LA GRANG
GSER LJIBS BYUGS KYI SRI ZHU DANG, GTZUG

LAG KHANG MANG DU BZHENGS, GTZANG BA GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN NAM
RGYA MTSO, ` BZANG PO 'OD ZER, ` THAR

BA BZANG PO 'KHRUNGS YUL LHO BRAG GRVA SA GSANG PHU, LHO BRAG PA
BLO GROS RGYA MTSO GRVA SA GSANG PHU NYI MA THANG, `

BYAMS PA GLING PA BSTAN PA RIN CHEN GRVA SA RVA STOD, 'DIS RAB
BYUNG BCU BA'I CHU PHAG LA MTSAN NYID KYI BSHAD

GRVA BTZUGS, ` SKYOR MO LING BA BYAMS PA DAR RGYAS GRAVA SA RA

SA GSANG PHU NYI MA THANG, ` GTZANG 'GA' KHUR BA DGE 'DUN TSUL
KHRIMS BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I THOS BSAM GLING

BDE 'BYOR BA, ` GTZANG BA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS 'DI BEE SER DU MI
SNANG, ` AO ROD HO SHOD PA 'BRAS

YE SHES RGYA MTSO RGYAL DBANG LNGA PA'I SLOB MA YIN, 'BRONG RTZE
BLO BZANG GI RI MO NAG PO SKOR GSUM, MGON

DKAR; DMAG ZOR MA, DUNG SKYONG MA RNAMS KYI SKU THANG GRA TSAR
SOGS DNGOS 'BUL KYANG SNGA PHYIR MANG, LHAL

HA RJE BTZUN DAM PA BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN SPYI BLA

MDZAD; RJE BTZUN DAM PA MKHAN RABS SU MI BRTZI YANG RTA KHRAL
YONGS SGO SOGS LUGS GNYIS KYI PHYAG RIS

CHE; ` GTZANG DBANG LDAN PA NGAG DBANG DON GRUB BKRAS LHUN THOS
BSAM GLING BDE 'BYOR BA, THUR LA BA
