YOD RGYAL MTSAN, RVA LA NO MON HAN YANG

ZER; KHRI TSUL KHRIMS DAR RGYAS RAB BYUNG GI MKHAN PO YIN, ` SGO
ME AA JO BA 'BRAS DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO,

DPE RNYING ZHIG TU AA RIG DAM CHOS RGYA MTSO ZER 'DUG ` ,'BRAS
BSAM BLO MI NYAG STAG PHYUG PA 'PHRIN LAS RGYA

MTSO; ` AO ROD PA 'BRAS BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN, HAL HA RJE BTZUN
DAM PA'I DBU BLA MDZAD, BYA KHYUNG NO

MON HAN ZER, ` AO ROD PA 'BRAS BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN, HAL HA RJE
BTZUN DAM PA'I DBU BLA MDZAD, BYA KHYUNG NO

YOD KYANG RNAM THAR MI GSAL, ` SGO ME KA ZHAR BA 'BRAS KLU 'BUM
DPAL 'BYOR RGYA MTSO MKHAS GRAGS CAN YIN

'DUG 'DU KHANG RGYA 'PHUG DANG, BKRA SHIS SGO MANG GSAR BZHENGS,
` GTZANG BA NGAG DBANG LHUN GRUB,

GRVA SA BKRAS LHUN THOS BSAM GLING BRANG MO CHE BA, ` ZHING
SKYONG GRAGS PA BKRA SHIS TZONG KHA'I KYANG KYAR 'KHRUNGS,

LHUN GRUB RGYA MTSO LAS RAB TU BYUNG, BSHES GNYEN DON GRUB RGYA
MTSO BSTEN, PHAR TSAD DBU GSUM LA SBYANGS,

MDO SMAD KYI CHOS SDE PHAL CHER DU GRVA SKOR MDZAD, DBUS SU
PHEBS, 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG DU PO TI LNGA LA

SBYANGS; PAn CHEN CHOS RGYAL LA BSNYEN RDZOGS DANG CHOS BKA' CI
RIGS NOD, MDO SMAD DU PHEBS TE SKU 'BUM

KHRI DANG RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SHING YOS LA 'DI GA'I KHRIR
PHEBS TE 'CHAD NYAN 'PHEL, GOS SKU CHEN MO DANG

'DU KHANG DBUS 'PHUG BLA BRANG SKOR GSAR BZO, BDAG 'JUG SOGS
GSAR 'DZUGS BCAS LO BCO LNGA'I

RING DGON PA CHOS SRID GNYIS KYIS BSKYANGS, DBUS PHEBS LAN GNYIS
PA'I THOG RGYAL DBANG LNGA PA, SDE SRID

@191	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

POR BSKOS, T'A LA'I HUNG THA'I JIS DGON PAR MGO 'DON GYI BDAG
RKYEN, DRUG CU'I THOG CHU DKAR RI

KHROD DU 'DAS RTAGS BZANG BKRA SHIS, ` MTSO SNGON PA KHU RAA
NANG BZHUGS KYI JO BO 'JAM DPAL

RDO RJE BZHENGS, ` GCAN TSA'I NANG STOD PA SER BYES BSAM BLO YE
SHES RGYA MTSO'AM NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS NI

KHRI NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN GYI KHU BO YIN, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS
PA'I SA SPRUL LA KHRIR PHEBS, LO NGO DRUG TZAM

BZHUGS; GDAN SA BZHAG NAS RE GCIG PA LA GSHEGS, ` RONG BA'I
RTZAB SER BYES BLO BZANG CHOS

BAR DRAN, SKU BTZA' DUS GROD PUS BTUMS PA

DANG DBU'I DKYIL DU 'BUR BO YOD PA ZHIG BYUNG, YAB KYI RMI LAM

GNYIS SU RGYAL MTSAN CHEN PO RE 'DUG PA RMIS TE RJE SKU MCHED

BYAS PAR, THO RANGS SHIG GZIGS SNANG

LA; GTZO BO DE'I KHANG THAD KYI NAM MKHAR RVA HU LAS MDA' GZHU
BKANG STE GZAS YOD PA BYUNG BA'I NYEN GUNG

KHO'I KHA NAS KHRAG LDOG PO GNYIS SKYUG STE SHI GZHAN 'GA' RE
RTAS BRDABS, 'GA' RE GUM, LA LAS 'GYOD

TSANGS ZHUS, 'PHRAL 'KHOR DANG TING NGE 'DZIN LA DBANG 'BYOR TE
LAS BZHI GRUB, LO GSUM TZAM NAS

GDAN SA BZHAG STE RTA GDONG DKAR BO'I RI KHROD GSAR 'DZUGS DANG
GTZUG LAG KHANG RTEN BCAS BZHENGS, CHOS

RJE DON RIN PA'I RNAM THAR SOGS BKA' RTZOM POT GCIG YOD PA'I DPE
BRAG NYI PHYAG MDZOD KHANG PAR YOD SNANG,

AANG DKAR ZHABS DRUNG GIS, SNYING RJE'I MTHU LAS 'DAB CHAGS
KYANG, ,SKU LUS DAG LA TSAD 'CHANG BA, ,

GRUB CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS DBYINGS ZHES BSNGAGS, ,SKU TSE RING
ZHING 'GRO DON RGYA CHE, KHYA DGE DPON SLOB,

STAG TSANG DPON SLOB GNYIS KYIS KYANG ZHABS LA GTUGS 'DUG ` RVA
LO SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSAM 'GRUB

'KHRUNGS SA GTZANG RGYA MKHAR, YUM LAS 'KHRUNGS DUS GROD 'DRA
BA'I MER MER ZHIG BTZAS PA THANG DU

'PHANGS; BYA ROG GNYIS KYIS BSRUNG 'DUG PA BLTAS PAS BYIS PA
ZHIG YIN 'DUG RJE BTZUN RVA LO'I SKYE

BAR GRAGS, ,BKRAS LHUN THOS BSAM GLING DU BZHUGS, ,PAn CHEN BLO
BZANG YE SHES KYIS THUGS RTZIS CHE

BA'I SLOB YIN, ZHI DUL GYI KUN SPYOD LEGS PAS MTHONG BA TZAM
GYIS DANG BA 'DREN, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS

PA'I ME BYI LA 'DI KA'I KHRIR PHEBS, LO BCU'I RING LA GDAN SA
BSKYANGS, BYAMS KHANG, GSER GDUNG

STENG SHOD, BLA BRANG DU 'DU KHANG STENG SHOD, CHOS GRVA'I SKOR
RNAMS DANG, GZHAN YANG SMAN BLA'I PHO BRANG, BCU

BZHENGS GRANGS MANG, SA BYI LOR

GSHEGS; ` ZI NA SER BYES BSAM BLO BA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG SA
GLANG LA KHRIR PHEBS, RJE'I GOS SKU RJE BTZUN

'PHEL RGYAS BYUNG, SKU 'BUM RGYUD KHRIR

YANG BZHUGS, ` MKHAS PA CHEN PO LA MO GRAGS RGAN DU GRAGS PA BLO

ZHABS DRUNG 'BRAS YE SHES RGYA MTSO, 'DI LA NGAG DBANG BSTAN
'DZIN DANG NGAG DBANG RGYAL MTSAN ZER BA YANG

SNANG; ` RONG BO'I RTZA BA RGYU NI GZHON PA SER BYES BLO BZANG
BKRA SHIS GRUB CHEN CHOS DBYINGS PA'I GCUNG PO

YIN; ` RGYUD SMAD DGE BSHES NGAG DBANG NOR BU RONG BO'I RTZA BAR
YAB GU RU SKYABS, YUM SKYA ZA'I SRAS SU

'KHRUNGS; RGYAL BA SKAL BZANG BA'I RNAM THAR TU TSUL KHRIMS DAR
RGYAS GSUNG SNANG, BYA KHYUNG DU CHOS 'GRIMS

DANG BCU BDUN PA LA DBUS SU BYON, SER BYES SU SLOB GNYER DANG
NYER LNGA PA LA GLING BSRE, NYER BRGYAD

PA LA LHA SA'I MTSAN BTAGS BYUNG, PO TI LNGA DANG GSER 'PHRENG
TSANG MA THUGS 'DZIN MDZAD, RGYUD SMAD

DU PHEBS, SNGAGS KYI DAM BCA' THON, RANG YUL DU PHEBS, BAR SKABS
MGON KHANG GI RTEN RNAMS LA

NYAMS ZHIG BYUNG BA GNYAN CHE BAS ZHIG GSOS MA NUS PA'I 'TSUB
DANG, SRI NGAN KHA ZHUGS KYIS MKHAN THOG LNGA

TZAM KHRI KHA NAS GRONGS, GDAN SAR SDOD PA LA 'TSER SNANG YOD PA
LTA BU'I SKABS, 'DI PA MKHAN POR BSKOS

PA ME SPREL LOR KHRIR BZHUGS, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES, LA MO
GNAS CHUNG SOGS KYI LUNG BSTAN LTAR

BRAG DKAR SNGAGS RAMS PAS SRI MNAN DANG, RGYAL BA SKAL BZANG
RGYA MTSO SKU 'BUM DU BZHUGS PA LA ZHUS

PAS MGON KHANG ZHIG GSOS DGOS PAR GSUNGS PA LTAR AA KY'A NANG SO
DANG KHONG MCHOD YON GYIS ZHIG GSOS

MDZAD PA SOGS KYIS SRI NGAN RGYUN CHAD, SER BYES LTAR GYI GLING
BSRE DKA' BCU'I MING BTAGS DANG BZHI PA'I

SMON LAM GSAR 'DZUGS LA RTING GNON GYI BKA' SHOG PAn CHEN BLO
BZANG YE SHES DANG, RGYAL BA SKAL BZANG

RGYA MTSO GNYIS LA ZHUS, BDE BA KHANG LHA KHANG RTEN BCAS GSAR
BZHENGS, GDAN SAR LO DRUG TZAM BZHUGS,

HAL HA NAS BKA' 'GYUR GDAN DRANGS, BDE YANGS SU ZUR BZHUGS NGOS
DGUNG LO BDUN BCU'I NANG ZHI BAR

GSHEGS; GDUNG GI ZHUN THIG LA 'JAM DBYANGS KYI SKU PHEBS PA NANG
BZHUGS KYI MCHON RTEN GSER GDUNG

KHANG NA BZHUGS, ` RONG BO'I MTSER PHUG 'ON RGYA BA NGAG DBANG
CHOS GRAGS BYA KHYUNG DU GZHUNG GSAR BAR

DANG; DE 'PHROS SER BYES SU SBYANGS, SMON RAMS PA MDZAD, RTZIS
SNYAN DANG GSAL MKHAS, LCAGS GLANG

LOR KHRIR PHEBS, CHU YOS MTSO SNGON DUS 'KHRUGS SKABS KYANG GRVA
DPON SLOB RNAMS 'DOD CHUNG CHUG SHES KYI TSAD DU

RTZIS KYANG BSLAB, SGRIGS MA DANG RTZIS

KYIS SKU TSE MTHAR PHYIN, ` ZIN

CHU PHAG LOR 'KHRUNGS, SKU 'BUM DU BSDUS

GRVA DANG, SER BYES SU GZHUNG LA SBYANGS, DKA' BCU'I MTSAN BTAGS
MDZAD, SGRUB KHANG BA'I ZHABS LA

GNANG, SKU 'BUM KHRIR YANG

GCAN TSA'I GONG YUR YAB DKON MCHOG

@193 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

NAS GZHIS DGON RTA GDONG DKAR POR BZHUGS, TOR GE AAMBHAN GYIS
BSKOS PA BZHIN LCAGS KHYI LOR KHRIR

BZHUGS; 'CHAD NYAN GONG 'PHEL DANG, 'DU KHANG GI YO BSRANG, KUN
MKHYEN SKU 'PHRENG BAR MA DANG,

KHRI NGAG DBANG SNYAN GRAGS GNYIS KYIS BSNGAGS BRJOD CHE, THUN
BZHI CHAG MED KYIS PHYAG 'PHRENG BCU GSUM TZAM

LA GRANGS GSOG GI ZHAL 'DON LA SHIN TU 'GRUS, DON GSUM PA LA
GSHEGS, ` BDE KHANG PA BLO BZANG

RAB BRTAN, SKYES RI'I GSER KHANG RI KHROD DANG NYE BA'I 'DABS
TSER PHUG TU YAB GNAM LHA 'BUM DANG, YUM

PADMA MTSO'I SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I MJUG CHU PHAG LA
'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO BCU PA LA SGOM CHEN DGE

'DUN BDE LEGS PA'I DRUNG DU RAB TU BYUNG, BCU BZHI PA ME BYIN LA
BYA KHYUNG CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, MKHAS GRUB

RVA LO PA LA BRTZI BZHAG GSAN, BCO BRGYAD PA LA SKU 'BUM DU DAM
BCA' BZHAG NYER GCIG THOG DBUS SU

PHEBS; SER BYES GRVA TSANG DU BSAM BLO DGE BSHES AA KA NGAG
DBANG BRTZON 'GRUS DGE RGAN DU BSTEN TE DBU

PHAR 'DUL MDZOD THAMS CAD SBYANGS, NYER DRUG PA LA GLING BSRE
MTSAN BTAGS DANG, NYER DGU PA LA RJE

SGRUB KHANG PAR BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS, 'JAM DPAL ZHAL LUNG GI KHRID
GSAN, SO GNYIS PA LA RGYUD SMAD DU

PHEBS; MKHAN CHEN DGE 'DUN PHUN TSOGS PA LA 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS
KYI BSHAD LUNG SOGS DANG, GZHAN

YANG PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES, BLA MA BYAMS PA RIN PO CHE,
BZOD PA BZANG PO, SE RA PAndI TA, BRAG

DKAR SNGAGS RAMS PA SOGS BSTEN TE GSAN PA RGYA CHE, KHYAD PAR
GUR SMON DU YUN RING BZHUGS, RVA KHO

TSANG; LHA RI TSANG, KHONG GSUM GYIS RDO RJE 'CHANG DON YOD
MKHAS GRUB PA LA 'JIGS BYED BSKYED RDZOGS

SOGS ZAB KHRID MANG PO ZHUS, SO LNGA PA LA RANG YUL DU PHEBS,
BYA KHYUNG DU DAM BCA' BZHAG DE'I PHYI LO RI

KHROD DGA' LDAN CHOS 'PHEL GLING DU SGRUB PA MDZAD, LNGA BCU BA
CHU BYI LA BYA KHYUNG KHRIR BZHUGS, LCAGS BYA'I

BAR LO NGO MTHONG BCU'I RING LA LAM RIM CHEN MO'I BSHAD LUNG
SOGS SPYI CHOS SGER CHOS KYI CHAR PHEBS, MDZOD

KYI BRTZI BZHAG DANG DRUG PA'I SMON LAM, SMON LAM RAB 'BYAMS
PA'I MING BTAGS RNAMS GSAR 'DZUGS,

'CHAD NYAN LEGS PAS DKA' RAMS GANG BZANG THON, GSER GDUNG RIN PO
CHER GRANG GSER LJIBS BYUGS

DANG SGO KHYIM NGOS LA RIN PO CHE SNA TSOGS KYI PHRA RGYAN, NANG
DU DNGUL DKAR LAS GRUB PA'I CHOS RJE DON RIN PO

CHE'I SNANG BRNYAN KHRI BCAS BZHENGS, GSER CHAB DANG SGO RGYAN
LAS MGO RTZOM NYIN MCHOD SDONG GZI BYIN RGYAS

SHING BDUD RTZI BABS, BDE BA KHANG SOGS LHA KHANG BCU'I RTEN
BRTEN PA MANG PO LA ZHIG GSOS DANG, RGYUD

KHANG GSAR BZHENGS SOGS PHYAG RJES RGYA CHE, KHRI ZUR NAS KYANG
RTEN BZHENGS DANG GRVA TSANG LA BSNYEN BKUR MANG

DU ZHUS, LCANG SKYA ROL BA'I RDO RJE BYA KHYUNG DU PHEBS PAR
CHOS 'BREL DANG, MI NYAG GONG MA BLO BZANG DAR

RGYAS LA RDOR PHRENG YONGS RDZOGS GSAN, 'DUL BA'I DUS TSIGS DANG
DBU MA'I RING SONG GI BSHAD PA, BLO

SBYONG SKOR SOGS GSUNG RTZOM POTA GCIG GDONG 'JUG BLA BRANG DU
BZHUGS, AA GRO SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN GYI SKYE

BAR LUNG GIS ZIN, DGUNG LO GYA BZHI BZHUGS, RNAM THAR REB TZA
STOD MA'I REB DGE BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG

@194 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

BLO GSAL SOGS KYIS ZHUS TE DKA' BCU BLO BZANG DON LDAN GYIS
BRTZAMS PA SNANG, ` NGAG DBANG DON GRUB

NI MDO BA MAR NANG DU YAB DPON PO TSE MKHAR DANG, YUM 'JA' MO'I
SRAS SU 'KHRUNGS, BYA KHYUNG DANG SER

BYES SU SKU YON SBYANGS, LHA RAMS PA MDZAD DE SMAD RGYUD DU
PHEBS, KHRI NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN SOGS BSTEN

TE GSAN RGYA CHE, CHU KHYI LOR KHRIR PHEBS, GSER GDUNG CHUNG BA
LA ZHIG GSOS MDZAD, KHRI NGAG DBANG

MCHOG LDAN GYIS GSER GDUNG LA GOS BZANG BSGRIGS KYI NA BZA' DANG
GRANG GSER LJIBS BYUGS SOGS BKUR STI

MDZAD CING, KHYAD PAR RGYA PHIBS LTA BU'I SRI ZHU RLABS CHE BA
BSKRUN BZHED KYI GSUNG GLENG YOD PAR BRTEN RJE

'DI PA DBON PO RAB 'BYAMS PA GTZANG BA MKHAN ZUR BLO BZANG RAB
BRTAN SOGS KYIS BSKUL MA ZHUS PA BZHIN

RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA 'BRUG LOR SKU GDUNG LHA KHANG STENG
DU RGYA PHIBS GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD, MTSO SNGON

DPON KHAG MANG POS MCHOD GNAS SU BSKUR ZHING, CHING WANG RDO RJE
PHA LAM GYI SKU BSRUNG MDZAD, DON

BDUN PA LA GSHEGS, ` DPAL CHOS MKHAN PO BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS SAM
NGAG DBANG MKHAS GRUB RGYA MTSO, GCAN

TSA'I RI LAM DU AAKY'A'I RIGS LAS YAB RDO RJE TSE BRTAN, YUM
SGROL MA SKYID KYI SRAS SU LCAGS YOS LOR 'KHRUNGS,

KHRI NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN GYIS RANG GI KHU BO'I SPRUL SKUR NGOS
BZUNG, BYA KHYUNG DANG SER BYES, SBYANGS PA DANG

GLING BSRE MDZAD, RGYAL BA SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO DANG KHRI CHEN
LAS CHOS MANG DU GSAN ZHING BKA' LTAR DPAL

CHOS MKHAN SA LO BDUN BSKYANGS, KHRI RIN PO CHE NAS RGYA PHIBS
SKYEL BAR BTANG SKABS GZHUNG NAS MKHAN PO'I

CHO LO GNANG, BYA KHYUNG NAS GDAN SA'I SNYAN 'BUL ZHUS PAR THUGS
DGYES TE SA 'BRUG LA KHRIR PHEBS, SA SBRUL

LOR LCANG SKYA ROL BA'I RDO RJE BYA KHYUNG DU GDAN DRANGS, TSOGS
CHEN GYIS CHOS 'BREL ZHUS, 'CHAD NYAN SOGS

'DZIN SKYONG LEGS, RE BZHI BA SHING RTA LA GSHEGS, ` RTZA BA CHE
BA BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAL MTSAN, YAB MGON PO

TSE BRTAN, YUM MTSO MO, LCAGS 'BRUG LA 'KHRUNGS, CHUNG DUS GRUB
CHEN BLO BZANG DBYINGS CHOS GDONG

RI RTZER LJONGS RGYUR PHEBS PA'I DRUNG DU RAB TU BYUNG, BYA
KHYUNG DU ZUR BKOL YAN CHAD SBYANGS, BCU GSUM

PA CHU 'BRUG LA DBUS SU PHEBS, SER BYES SU SLOB GNYER DANG GLING
BSRE, LHA RAMS PA MDZAD, SMAD

RGYUD DU PHEBS, RGYAL BA YAB SRAS, KHRI RIN PO CHE, BLA MA BYAMS
PA SOGS BSTEN, BYA KHYUNG DU RGYUD PA

GSAR 'DZUGS KYI RDO RJE SLOB DPON LO BCU GNYIS MDZAD, 'CHAD NYAN
SGRUB MCHOD SOGS KYI SROL BTOD,

ZANG ZING GI PHYAG RJES KYANG MANG, DRANG NGES RNAM 'BYED KYI
BSHAD PA SOGS GSUNG RTZOM 'GA' RE SNANG, RE

GCIG PA LA KHRIR PHEBS TE LO BCU GSUM BZHUGS, LAM RIM DANG SKYES
RABS SOGS KYI BSHAD PA, DBANG

RJES GNANG SOGS BKA' CHOS GANG 'DOD GNANG, NYIN RER BDE GSANG
'JIGS GSUM CHAG MED, BSTOD

CHEN BZHI, RNAM RGYAL GZUNGS RING ZHAL 'DON, BRGYAD STONG CI
'GRO DANG RNAM RGYAL MA'I SKU BRGYA RTZA RE PHYAG

PAR CHAG MED SOGS RNAM THAR 'GANGS CHE, DBUS GTZANG DU RNAM DKAR
DGE SGRUB, PAn CHEN GONG MAR BYA

KHYUNG LA BKA' SHOG ZHUS, GYA DRUG PA LA GSHEGS, SPRUL SKU RANG
GZHIS SU 'KHRUNGS, ` CHU BZANG RIN PO

@195 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

CHE NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG BYA KHYUNG DU PHEBS SKABS,
LHA KHANG CHEN MO'I NANG DU, NGAS RDOR DRIL ZHIG

'DIR BZHAG YOD GSUNGS TE, BYANG SEMS ZHIG GI PHYAG MTSAN PAD
SDONG LAS RDOR DRIL ZHIG BLANGS, DE SNGAR CHOS

RJE DON RIN PAS BZHAG PA YIN PAS DE'I SKYE BAR GRAGS, BA YAN
STAG DGON PA NAS KUN RIG GI DBANG GNANG

SKABS; GRVA RGAN 'GAS DBANG GNANG TZAM MA GTOGS PA 'DRI SNGAGS
PA SUM BRGYAS ZHI KHRO DAM PA RIGS BRGYA

'DON PA MA GTOGS KUN RIG 'DON MKHAN MED ZHUS, GROL NYIN BKA'
CHOS 'DI LA 'TSOGS PA'I SKYE PHO MO

RNAMS SONG, GRVA BA RNAMS BZHUGS GSUNGS, KHONG GIS DBU MDZAD
NYIN GCIG LA 'JIGS BYED DANG CHOS

RGYAL GSUNGS TE DRUG CU BA ZHIG BSNGOS, DE NAS BZUNG SNGAGS PA
RNAMS 'THOR ZHIG LA SONG, ZHI KHRO TSUGS

RGYU LTA ZHOG GNAS GCIG TU 'TSOGS DBANG YANG MA BYUNG, RAB BYUNG
BCU GSUM PA'I CHU 'BRUG LA KHRIR

PHEBS; TSA PHUG TU, MKHAN PO HO THOG THUS DKAR SPRO'I THOG BYA
KHYUNG GI KHRIR PHEBS PA BKA' DRIN CHE, SNGAR

DED DPON GA-YOG GDAN 'DZOMS PAR KHRI RIN PO CHE NAS GANG GSUNG
BZHIN PHRAN RANG GIS THUB TSOD KYI PHAN THOGS

BYAS KHUL YIN, DA NYID KYI PHYAG TU 'PHROD PAS SEMS BDE ZHUS PAR
KHYED KYI GANG GSUNG THAMS CAD BDEN,

DUS DBANG GIS CI 'DRA 'BYUNG SHES DKA' YANG KHYED RNAM PAS GROGS
DAN MDZAD NA YAG PO YONG 'GRO ZHES DANG,

RTZA BA BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN GYIS KYANG KHRI CHEN GONG MA'I
GSUNG BZHIN RAB GTAN BZHUGS SHIG DANG, MA MTHA'

LO BCU BZHUGS DGOS ZHUS PAR, KHYED KYIS NANG GTZANG BA'I GTAM
CHOS BRGYAD DANG MA 'DRES PAR GNANG BA

BKA' DRIN CHE, NGAS KYANG DKON MCHOG LA GSOL BA BTAB STE ZHABS
'DEGS CI 'BYOR ZHU SNYAM PA YOD GSUNGS,

KHRI 'DON SKABS STAG LUNG 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PAS MAndAL BSHAD PA
LEGS PA ZHIG PHUL, LO NGO BCU

BZHUGS; ` GDONG 'JUG ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS 'KHRUNGS
SA RONG BO'I SKYA YIS, YAB GU RU

TSE RING, YUM GA-YA' MTSO SKYID, MKHAN CHEN NGAG DBANG CHOS
GRAGS KYIS SPRUL SKUR NGOS BZUNG, BYA KHYUNG

DANG SER BYES SU SLOB GNYER, KHRI NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN, PHUR BU
LCOG PA, MKHAN PO DPAL 'BYOR GRAGS

PA SOGS LAS CHOS BKA' GSAN, BYA KHYUNG DU RGYUD PA BLA MA DBU
MDZAD DANG, DPON SLOB BRGYUD, LCAGS

GLANG LA KHRIR PHEBS, LO NGO BZHIR BZHUGS, ` MDO BA DPON CHUNG
NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'PHEL MDO BA MAR NANG

DU YAB DPON PO DAR RGYAS, YUM CHOS SKYID KYI SRAS SU ME YOS LA
'KHRUNGS, BYA KHYUNG DANG, SER BYES SU SLOB

GNYER; BYA KHYUNG BLA MA DBU MDZAD DANG DPON SLOB, SHING 'BRUG
LA GDAN SAR BYON, ` THU'U BKVAN

RDO RJE 'CHANG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MA DGUNG LO NGA GCIG PA ME
LUG BDUN PA'I NYER GNYIS LA KHRI 'DON MDZAD,

'CHAD NYAN SPYI DANG SGER CHOS BDE LAM GYI GZAB KHRID SOGS LUGS
GNYIS CHAR NAS NAM 'PHANG MTHO BAR MDZAD,

DGON PA 'DI DGE LDAN BSTAN PA'I CHU MGO LTA BU YIN TSUL GONG MAR
MKHYEN BCUG STE BSTAN RGYAS GLING ZHES PA'I TZI

PEN DANG, DE DANG MNYAM DU MDO SMAD 'DIR ZHVA SER BSTAN PA'I
LUGS SROL KHO NA GTZOR 'DON LAS GRUB

MTHA' SNA TSOGS GANG 'DOD BYAS MI CHOG PA'I GSER YIG BABS, NGA
GSUM PA SA BYA LOR KUN MKHYEN 'JAM

@196 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

DBYANGS BZHAD PA KHRIR GDAN 'DREN ZHU RGYU'I MTSAMS SBYAR TE ZUR
BZHUGS MDZAD, ` 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS

KYI RGYAL PO KUN MKHYEN DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO LO DE'I
DRUG PA'I YAR TSES BZANG POR MI 'JIG CHOS

KYI KHRI LA ZHABS SEN BKOD, CHOS GRVA'I BRTZI BZHAG TSOGS MANG
LA 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS SKOR GYI RJES

GNANG; GRVA DPON SLOB THAMS CAD NAS RJE BLA MA'I BSTAN PA DANG
RANG RANG GI 'DI PHYI'I DON THUGS LA BZHAG

STE SPYI BSLAB PA GSUM DANG, SGOS SU DGE 'DUN GYI SGRIG LAM KUN
SPYOD, CHOS 'CHAD NYAN GAN CIR BRTZON PA

GNANG DGOS TSUL GYI BSLAB BYA, RJE NYID SKU DON RGYA CHE BAS
SLOB CHUNG DU KHRI ZUR GDONG 'JUG ZHABS DRUNG RIN

PO CHE BSKO BZHAG GIS 'CHAD NYAN CHAG MED DANG LAS SNA SO SOR
RANG RANG LA KHUR DU BAB PA'I SGRIG LAM GNON TSUL

SOGS PHAN PA'I THABS GANG YOD KYI RTING BSKUL MDZAD PAS 'CHAD
NYAN GYIS MTSON PA'I LEGS TSOGS THAMS CAD

YAR ZLA LTAR 'PHEL, ` RTZA BA CHUNG BA NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS BYA
KHYUNG RANG GI GLING BSRE, BLA MA DBU MDZAD

DANG RGYUD PA'I KHRI, LCAGS PHAG LOR KHRIR BZHUGS, ` STAG LUNG
BA 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PA SE RAR SLOB

GNYER DANG GLING BSRE MDZAD, BLA MA DBU MDZAD RGYUD PA SLOB DPON
MKHAN KHRI RNAMS LA RIM PAR BZHUGS,

BGRO GLENG BZANG BA RE BTANG BA LA YANG THUGS DGYES PA'I BSNGAGS
BRJOD SOGS SLOB GNYER LA RTING BSKUL CHE, `

ZI NA TSUL KHRIMS DAR RGYAS RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME SBRUL LOR
KHRIR BZHUGS, GSER GDUNG CHEN MO'I LHA

KHANG GI ZHIG GSOS DANG, SMAN PA GRVA TSANG GSAR 'DZUGS, SKU
'BUM KHRI YANG MDZAD, ` SDONG NGE DGE

'DUN CHOS 'PHEL BYA KHYUNG DANG SER BYES SU SLOB GNYER, MDO DBUS
GNYIS KAR GLING BSRE MING BTAGS

GNANG; 'DI KA'I RGYUD PA'I BLA MA GNYIS DANG, TSOGS CHEN KHRIR
BZHUGS, BKA' CHOS 'GA' YANG

GNANG; ` GCAN TSA SBYIN PA KUN BZANG GCAN TSA'I RI BZANG RTZAR
SNGAGS RGYUD BZANG BA ZHIG TU 'KHRUNGS, BYA

KHYUNG DANG SER BYES GNYIS KAR SLOB GNYER MTHAR PHYIN THOGS LHA
RAMS PA MDZAD, SER BYES KHAS LEN GYI KHUNGS

GTUG SA'I MKHAS GRAGS SHIN TU CHE, BLA MA BYAMS PA RIN PO CHE,
PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES, YONGS

'DZIN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN, SER RTZE DGE BSHES THOGS MED SOGS DAM
PA MANG PO'I ZHABS BSTEN, RANG

DGON DU RGYUD KYI SLOB DPON DANG GDAN SAR PHEBS, 'CHAD NYAN GYI
PHAN THOGS SHIN TU CHE, PO TI LNGA'I RTZA BA

DANG; BRGYAD STONG PA'I BSHAD LUNG YONGS 'DZIN GSUNG RGYUN LTAR
GNANG, ZUR DU BZHUGS NAS KYANG LAM

RIM CHEN MO'I BSHAD LUNG, 'JAM DPAL ZHAL LUNG, LAM GTZO'I KHRID
SOGS CHOS RGYUN MI ZAD PA'I SGO PHYE,

ZHAL 'DON BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM, RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM, YONGS 'DZIN
GSUNG 'BUM SOGS POTA BDUN CU

TZAM LA DUS RGYUN DPE GZIGS, MA nI DUNG PHYUR GNYIS LHAG SONG
ZHES ZHAL NAS GSUNGS, DGUNG LO SMIN

PAR BZHUGS, ` SKA PHUG PA BLO BZANG DON GRUB SKU THOG DANG PO
SKA PHUG SGOM CHUNG NI, SKA PHUG TSO GSUM GYI

NANG TSAN LHA GONG DU, SKA PHUG SGOM CHEN PA'I SKU MCHED MGON PO
ZER BA'I SRAS SU 'KHRUNGS, RUS GCAN TSA,

CHUNG NGU NAS RAB TU BYUNG, AAN CHUNG GNAM RDZONG DU MDZOD DGE
AEM CHI ZHU BA RJE BTZUN DAM PA'I SKU 'PHRENG

@097 GCIG GI YONGS 'DZIN DU SGROL MAS LUNG BSTAN PAR GRAGS PA
DE'I DRUNG DU PHEBS, 'DI AANG DKAR ZHABS

DRUNG GI YANG BLA MA YIN, CHOS BKA' MANG DU GSAN, SGRUB PA
SNYING POR MDZAD, HAL HA'I PHYAG MDZOD CIG

DANG 'GROGS RI BO RTZE LNGAR BYON, SGRUB PA MDZAD BZHIN DER
GSHEGS, DE'I SKU SKYE 'JAM DBYANGS DBANG

PHYUG GCAN TSA'I RUS LAS SKYA KY'A GRONG GI DPON TSANG DU
'KHRUNGS, NA PHRA MO NAS RAB TU BYUNG, LA MO BDE

CHEN DU SLOB GNYER DANG DGE BSKOS THON, 'GRO DON MDZAD MUR RANG
YUL DU GSHEGS, DE'I SKU SKYE MKHAN PO

'DI LA GDONG SNAR SE KYA'I RIGS LAS YAB LO MO DANG, YUM 'BA'
GO'I SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I

LCAGS SPREL LA 'KHRUNGS, SKA PHUG GI SHING THOG MTHONG NA NGA'I
RED ZER BA DANG, LHA RI SNGAGS RAMS PA'I PHYAG

BRIS LA BLTAS NAS NGA LA YANG 'DI 'DRA YOD ZER BAR BRTEN, LHA RI
BAS KHYOD GANG GI YIN GSUNGS PAR, NGA SKA

PHUG KHYUG LA TSANG GI YIN, NGA'I GYON PA 'GA' ZHIG SGAM NANG NA
YOD ZHUS PAS SKA PHUG SKU SKYER NGOS BZUNG STE BKA'

LTAR GDONG SNA BA DANG KA BUG GNYIS 'DZOMS KYIS LHA RIR GDAN
DRANGS SKABS DUNG DKAR DANG DBON PO BLA MA

SOGS NGOS BZUNG, DGUNG LO BDUN PA DER LHA RI BA BLO BZANG 'BYUNG
GNAS LAS RAB TU BYUNG, SKU ZHANG SHA LDANG

AA LAGS DAR RGYAS LAS YIG KLOG DANG 'DON CHOS BSLAB, RTZA BA BLO
BZANG RGYAL MTSAN LHA RIR 'GREL BA BZHI

SBRAGS GSAN PAR PHEBS SKABS KHONG DANG MNYAM DU SGRUB THABS RGYA
MTSO SOGS MANG DU GSAN, BCO LNGA PA SHING

KHYIL BYA KHYUNG DU PHEBS, DGE BSHES GZI LUNG DPON CHUNG DANG
KHO TSE DGE BSHES BLO BZANG BSOD NAMS GNYIS

RIM BZHIN DGE RGAN DU BSTEN, CHOS SPYOD RGYAN 'JUG BSDUS GRVA
PHAR PHYIN SOGS 'DZIN SKYOR RTZOD GSUM LA

'GRUS; MKHAN ZUR BDE YANGS PA LAS DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, NYER BDUN PA
ME KHYI LA DBUS SU BYON, DGUN

CHOS LA SGO MANG CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS
LAS BRTZI BZHAG GSAN, RGYAL BA 'JAM

DPAL RGYA MTSO, KHRI YONGS 'DZIN NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS, GTZANG
DU PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE RNAMS MJAL,

BSTAN RGYAS GLING DU SGO MANG ZUR BA DGE 'DUN BDE CHEN LA BSNYEN
RDZOGS ZHUS, PHAG LOR PHYIR PHEBS, BYA KHYUNG

DU SLOB GNYER 'PHRO MTHUD, LCAGS YOS LA MTSAN BTAGS THON, SUM
RTAGS, RTZIS DKAR NAG SGRA

YIG RIGS BRIS 'BUR GYI SKU SOGS 'DRI BRKOS LA MKHAS, SNGA PHYIR
LHA RI BA, BDE KHANG BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN

RTZA BA BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN, MDO BA NGAG DBANG DON GRUB, CHU
BZANG NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG KUN

MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA, THU'U BKVAN CHOS KYI NYI MA, BKRA
SHIS 'KHYIL BKA' 'GYUR BA 'JIGS MED

RAB RGYAS, AA RIG DGE BSHES CHEN MO, GSER KHANG BA BLO BZANG
BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO, GA-YER GSHONG

DGE 'DUN ZLA GRAGS, RNYE BA DPON SLOB BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI
MA SOGS BLA MA MANG DU BSTEN PAS THOB RGYA CHE,

DON GNYER MKHAN LA DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG GANG DGOS 'PHRAL DU 'DOMS
PA LA SKYO NGAL MED, GZHAN GYI YON

TAN CHUNG NGU LA MI BRNYAS SHING DGYES GZIGS MDZAD, DGUNG LO
BZHI BCU BA SA PHAG LA, TSA GAN NO MON

TAN BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN PA'I BKA' BZHIN
MGUR RNAM RGYAL GLING GI KHRIR PHEBS, TSES

@198 (RTZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RAM CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

GTOR DANG, BLA BRANG GSAR BZHENGS SOGS 'DZIN SGO LEGS, ZHE DRUG
PA SHING SBRUL LA LA MO NAS LHA MDUN

BLA MAR BSKOS, AE RTI NI SHI RE THU'I CHO LO DANG THAM KA GNANG,
GNAM RDZONG BKRA SHIS THANG DGON PAR BYA KHYUNG

RGYUD PA PHEBS SKABS BKA' CHOS MANG DU GNANG, DZONG NANG BSTAN
RGYAS GLING DU RGYUD PA'I DBYAR CHOS SKABS,

MKHAN PO DGE 'DUN CHOS 'PHEL, BLA MA BDU MDZAD SBYIN PA KUN
BZANG SOGS TSOGS YONGS LA 'JIGS BYED

DBANG DANG, 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS BSHAD LUNG GNANG, 'DU KHANG LA
RGYUD PAS RAB GNAS MDZAD PAR

YON GZABS, BDE KHANG ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG NOR BU, MOG KYA SPRUL
SKU, GSANG SGROGS SPRUL SKU SOGS

LA 'JIGS BYED KUN RIG GI DBANG SOGS MANG DU GNANG, BYA KHYUNG
NAS PHEBS PA'I SLOB GNYER BA RNAMS LA

GNAS DER DAM BCA' 'JOG BCUG RE GNYIS PA LCAGS BYA LA AA RA PA
TZA'I SGRUB KHANG DU DGE BSHES 'GA' DANG

BCAS SKU MTSAMS NGOS 'JAM DBYANGS NANG SGRUB KYI RIL SGRUB
MDZAD, GRVA MANG LA RJES GNANG DANG RIL BU

BKYE; SMAN PA GRVA TSANG GI BLA MA DANG PO BDE YANGS ZHABS DRUNG
GIS DGONGS ZHUS MDZAD PAR RJE 'DI PA BZHUGS,

KHRI 'DON SKABS RGYUD PA BLA MA LHA RAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS
KYIS DUS 'KHOR RTZA RGYUD KYI DBU NAS GNANG NA

RTEN 'BREL 'DUG ZHUS PAR BRTEN MKHAN PO BLA BRANG NAS BKA' 'GYUR
PO TI GCIG LHU 'DON BYAS PA RGYUD DER

'DUG PAS DGYES TE CHOS THUN GCIG GNANG, CHOS RJE DAR RGYAS RGYA
MTSO RGYA NAG NAS 'BYOR TE DUS 'KHOR GRVA

TSANG 'DZUGS DGOS ZHUS PAR ZUR DU MI DGOS GSUNGS NAS SMAN GRVA
BSGYUR TE KHYI LO NAG ZLA'I DUS CHEN LA DUS

'KHOR BTZUGS, 'DZUGS STON DU MANG JA NYIN THUB DANG 'GYED, DNGUL
MAn CHE LEGS SOGS SBYOR 'JAGS,

GRVA TSANG LA SUS 'KHOR LHAN SKYES KYI RJES GNANG, KUN RIG GI
DBANG, SGROL MA NYER GCIG RJES GNANG SOGS

GNANG; RE BZHI PA CHU PHAG LA BYA KHYUNG KHRIR PHEBS, BTZI GZHAG
SKABS DOGS GCOD MANG PO GNANG, LO

GNYIS PA'I THOG ZUR DU BZHUGS, CHOS RJE DON GRUB RIN PO CHE'I
DUS BZHENGS PA'I LHA KHANG CHEN MO'I ZHIG GSOS

RAB GNAS DANG BCAS PA, SNGA PHYIR DBANG RJES GNANG MANG PO DANG,
BYA KHYUNG DU CHOS THOG DANG PHEBS RES

KYIS 'GYED MA CHAG RGYUD PAR BDE MCHOG GI DBANG DANG SNGAGS
BTU'I RJES GNANG BSTZAL, DON GNYIS

NAS DON BZHI'I BAR CHU SER GYI BSNYUN BZHES PA CHU BYA LOR
DVANGS, SNGAR DBU SKRA DKAR POR YOD PA LA DE NAS

BZUNG DBU SKRA SMIN MA SOGS GNAG SNUM GZHON SHA RGYAS, DON BDUN
PA LA DPON PO BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN

DBUS SU BRDZANGS, GLANG LO'I DPYID BYA KHYUNG DU LAM GTZO'I
BSHAD LUNG, SA STAG LA AA CHUNG GNAM RDZONG

DU; RGYUD PA'I DBYAR GNAS SKABS DGE BSHES NGAG DBANG SNYAN GRAGS
SOGS LA 'DOD CHOS MANG PO DANG MANG

'GYED GNANG, YOS LOR BYA KHYUNG DU DPYID CHOS BTANG, LCAGS SBRUL
LA BSTAN RGYAS GLING DU RGYUD PA'I DBYAR

GNAS SKABS BDE MCHOG BLOS BSLANGS BRTZIG BCUG PA 'DU KHANG DU
BZHUGS, GNAM RDZONG DGON GSAR GYI

'DU KHANG ZHIG GSOS RAB GNAS BCAS MDZAD, GYA BDUN PA ME KHYI LA
BYA KHYUNG DU MANG 'GYED DANG CHOS BKA'

MANG DU GNANG, GYA BRGYAD PA ME PHAG LA ZHI BAR GSHEGS, RNAM
THAR MDOR BSDUS BYA KHYUNG DGE BSHES JU

@199 (RTZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

NANG NGAG DBANG SNYAN GRAGS KYIS MDZAD SNANG, ` NGAG DBANG BSOD
NAMS MDO BA YAR NANG DU 'KHRUNGS, BYA

KHYUNG DANG SER BYES SU SLOB GNYER MDZAD, SBYIN PA KUN BZANG
DANG GRVA THOG DGUNG LO MNYAM ZHING, LHA RAMS

PA YANG LO SNGA PHYI YIN, RGYUD SMAD DANG BYA KHYUNG RGYUD PAR
SNGAGS LA SBYANGS, DE SKABS LEGS BSHAD SNYING

PO'I BSHAD LUNG GNANG, GZHUNG LAS PA, BLA MA DBU MDZAD, RGYUD
BLA RNAMS BRGYUD KHRIR ZLA BA DGU BZHUGS

TE RANG YUL DU GSHEGS, ` MDO BA MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG DON GRUB KYI
SPRUL SKU ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG DBANG PHYUG

RGYA MTSO MTSO SNGON PE SI PHYAG RDOR SKYABS KYI SRAS SU RAB
BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SHING RTA LOR 'KHRUNGS, BDUN

PA LA PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE'I DRUNG DU RAB BYUNG DGE TSUL, CHU
BZANG DANG SER BYES SU SLOB GNYER, RGYAL BA

'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO LA BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS, CHU KHYI LOR MCHOD
RTEN SKIS DGON PA'I KHRI DANG, SO GNYIS PA

SHING GLANG LA 'DI KA'I KHRIR LO BZHI BZHUGS, SKU 'BUM DANG CHU
BZANG DGON GYI KHRI YANG MDZAD, ` MDO BA

SKU PHYOGS RGAN PA GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN NI, RMA 'GRAM MDO BA YAR
NANG DU KHYIM SHIN TU BKREN PA ZHIG LA 'KHRUNGS,

DGUNG LO NYER DRUG BAR DU BYA KHYUNG SPYI BA'I RANG 'THAG PA
BYAS, H'A TZI BAN DE ZHES SNYING RJE'I YUL DANG, GRVA BA

TSO LA CHU BLANGS TE SLONG BRGYAB PAS MTHUN RKYEN BYAS TSOGS
CHOS 'GRIM, 'BYON BZHUD SKABS BKA' GDAMS

GLEGS BAM KHUR NAS BYON PAR KHREL BGAD BYED MKHAN MANG, NYER
BDUN STENG DBUS SU PHEBS, SER BYES

SU LO NYER GNYIS LA SLOB GNYER MDZAD, THUGS 'DZIN HA CANG SKYEN
PAR MA GRAGS KYANG PHAR PHYIN SKABS BYAMS

CHOS SDE LNGA, 'GREL BA DON GSAL, RNAM BSHAD SNYING PO RGYAN,
RJE BTZUN PA'I PHAR PHYIN YONGS RDZOGS,

ZUR BKOL BCAS THUGS 'DZIN GNANG, PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES LA
LO SNGA PHYIR PO TI LNGA'I BSHAD PA,

RTAG BRTAN GZUNGS 'DUS LUNG, SGROL MA NYER GCIG GI RJES GNANG
SOGS GSAN, YONGS 'DZIN YE SHES

RGYAL MTSAN PA LA BRGYAD STONG PA DANG, LAM RIM CHEN MO'I BSHAD
LUNG, BDE LAM KHRID SNGA PHYIR TSAR BCO

BRGYAD; MYUR LAM DANG 'JAM DPAL ZHAL LUNG TSAR RE, GUNG THANG
'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYIS ZHU GNANG

MDZAD 'BRAS SPUNGS SU 'DUL BA MDO RTZA DANG, GZHAN MNGON RTOGS
RGYAN, RNAM 'GREL BSHAD LUNG BCAS

GNANG BA GSAN, DBU MA'I SKABS RIGS TSOGS DRUG BZHI BRGYA BA,
SPYOD 'JUG 'JUG tIKA DGONGS PA

RAB GSAL, RNAM 'GREL RTZA BA, RJE BTZUN PA'I SPYI DON SKAL BZANG
MGUL RGYAN, MDZOD KYI SKABS MDZOD

RTZA DANG CHOS MNGON RIN CHEN 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA, 'DUL BA MDO
RTZA BCAS THUGS 'DZIN MDZAD, 'TSO CHAS

NA BZA' SHIN TU BKREN PA DKA' SPYAD LHUR BLANGS, RGYAL BA 'JAM
DPAL RGYA MTSOS NA BZA' LAN 'GA'

GNANG; GANGS LJONGS NA MKHAS PA'I TSAD BYED, GZIMS KHANG CHOS
MDZAD LA AANG KI LEN GI 'JUG MKHAN

NGA YIN ZHES ZHAL PHO MDZAD, SER BYES GLING BSRE'I DKA' BCU
THON, SER RTZE'I DGE BSHES THOGS MED,

DGE BSHES SNYAN GRAGS, BLA MA 'JAM DBYANGS PA, DGE RGAN KONG YE
DKA' BCU SOGS LAS RJE'I GSUNG

'BUM DANG BKA' 'GYUR LUNG, DGE RGAN LAS RIM LNGA GSAL SGRON DANG
LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO'I BSHAD LUNG

@200	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

YANG GSAN, BAR SKABS RVA KHA BRAG TU PHEBS NAS LEGS BSHAD SNYING
PO DANG, RIM LNGA GSAL SGRON THUGS

'DZIN MDZAD, KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED DBANG PO DBUS PHEBS RJES MA'I
SKABS ZHABS LA GTUGS, BKA'

CHOS GANG GNANG LA PHEBS NAS DA NGA'I YON TAN RGYA MTSO LTA BU
ZHIG NYAN SONG GSUNGS, PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN

YE SHES, YONGS 'DZIN RIN PO CHE, KUN MKHYEN BLA MA GSUM BLA MA'I
GTZO BO DANG, MTSAN SMOS SKABS KYANG

SPYAN CHAB BSIL, PHYAG THAL MO SBYOR, BSNGAGS BRJOD GZHAN GYI
BLOR MI SHONG BA MDZAD, KUN MKHYEN MDO

SMAD DU PHEBS SKABS MJAL ZHU DANG SKYABS ZHUS SKABS SPYAN CHAB
BSIL BAS KUN MKHYEN MCHOG NAS DE 'DRA MA

BYED SLAR 'PHRAD 'ONG GSUNGS, YONGS 'DZIN RIN PO CHE NAS KHYED
RVA KHA BRAG TU BZHUGS NA MTHUN RKYEN NGAS

SBYOR GSUNGS PA LTAR BZHUGS THAG BCAD, KHRI RGYA NAG PAS SMAD DU
PHEBS DGOS NAN ZHUS KYANG ZHAL BZHES MA

GNANG; RGYAL BA 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSOS 'DI PA MDUN DU BOS, GONG
MA'I MDUN NA CHOS KYI NANG BLON ZHIG

YOD PA GSER KHRI RGYA NAG PA TSANG YIN, KHYED CIS KYANG 'GRO
DGOS, NGES PAR MI 'GRO NA KHYED GCIG NA DGE

BSHES; GNYIS NA SA THAG RING GI GRVA BA YIN PAS CHAD PA 'GREL MI
THUB 'DUG ,PHYIN CHAD NGED KYI ZHAL BLTA

MI CHOG GSUNGS, BLA MA YONGS 'DZIN GYI GSUNG DE ZHUS PAS DE LA
KHO BOS THUGS BSTUN BYAS CHOG GSUNGS,

YONGS 'DZIN RIN PO CHE NAS RJE'I SKU BRNYAN, LAM RIM CHEN MO
BCAS GNANG NAS THUGS DAM DGE SBYOR DANG

RJE'I BSTAN PA LA BYA BA MDZAD TSUL SOGS 'PHRAL PHUGS KYI BSLAB
BYA DPYIS PHYIN PA BCAS DGONGS KHROL GNANG,

DBANG MED DU GSER KHRI TSANG DANG LHAN DU CHU BZANG LA PHEBS,
KUN MKHYEN MCHOG BYA KHYUNG KHRIR BZHUGS SKABS

YIN PAS DGON PAR DAM BCA 'DZOG DGOS KYI GSUNG NANG GNANG BAS
PHEBS, DPON SLOB THAMS CAD

GDAN 'DZOMS SAR DAM BCA' BZHAG KUN MKHYEN MCHOG NAS, DBU PHAR
GNYIS LA DBUS NA TSAD 'JOG

SA YIN, DE MI 'GRO NA MDZOD 'DUL THONGS GSUNGS KYANG PO TI LNGA
LA LAN THOG SPA MA BYUNG, DA PO TI LNGA 'GRO

RGYU MA RED, SNYAN NGAG BKOD LA THONGS GSUNG STE SKU MDUN NAS
DGE BSHES 'GA' BZHENGS, DPAL LDAN

YON TSOGS MA'I GZHUNG 'GOD GNANG BA NA, DA 'DI TSOS CI 'DRA TSO
GTONG RGYU YIN PA CHA GSUM YANG GTONG RGYU

YIN 'DRA ZHES SHAGS PHUL, KUN MKHYEN NAS CHA GSUM RGYAL BA'I
BKA' LAS 'BYUNG BA ZHIG MIN NAM, GTANG

MI CHOG GAM GSUNGS PAR LAGS, CHA GSUM BTANG STE NGA BGEGS YIN
NAM, PHYOGS SKYONG NGAM SDE BRGYAD

YIN ZHUS PAR BZHAD MO YUN RING MDZAD, DE NAS YON TSOGS MA LA
BSHAD PA BRGYAB PAS, DA TSIG BKRA

GYIS GSUNGS, KHYED BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL LA 'GRO GSUNGS PAR, RGYAL
BA'I BKA' GNANG TSUL ZHUS PAS DGONGS

PA KHROL, ZANG ZING GI SKYES DANG SNYE RING JO ZHVA BCAS GNANG,
MAR LAM THU'U BKVAN TSANG LA BKA' CHOS ZHIG

NYON GSUNG BA BZHIN, GSER KHRI TSANG DANG RNAM GNYIS DMAR GTZANG
DU PHEBS, RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI

RJES GNANG GSAN, GSOG SBYANGS DANG RTA MGRIN BSNYEN CHEN THONGS
GSUNG BA BZHIN LTUNG BSHAGS 'BUM

THER GCIG GI RING LA BRKYANGS PHYAG 'BUM THER BCU GSUM DANG TZAN
DAN JO BO LA ZHABS SKOR 'BUM BSAGS,

@201 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

RTA MGRIN LA BSNYEN CHEN BTANG, RGYA NAG NAS LO BCU BZHUGS PA'I
LO DRUG GI RING GSER KHRI TSANG LA, LAM

RIM CHEN MO'I BSHAD LUNG, BDE LAM, MYUR LAM, 'JAM DPAL ZHAL LUNG
RNAMS KYI KHRID, RNAM BSHAD SNYING

PO RGYAN, BRGYAD STONG PA'I BSHAD PA SOGS MTHA' YAS PA GNANG,
DON GNYIS PHUL BYUNG GLING DGON PA'I

KHRIR LO BDUN BZHUGS, KHRI PA SNGA MA RNAMS RGYA 'DRE'I CHO
'PHRUL GYIS GRONGS CHAD BYUNG YANG RTA MGRIN GYI SGOS RGYA

'DRE BTUL, KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA SKU 'PHRENG SNGA
PHYI'I RNAM THAR DANG LEGS BSHAD RNAMS

'GRAN ZLA MED PA'I BSNGAGS BRJOD MDZAD DE SKU GONG MA'I GSANG
RNAM TSOGS 'DON DANG, PO TI LNGA'I YIG CHA

BTZUGS; NYID NAS KYANG PO TI PHAL CHER THUGS 'DZIN DANG, SKU
SNGA PHYI'I 'KHRUNGS RABS RNAM THAR GSER

THANG BZHENGS, GRVA TSOGS BRGYAD BRGYA TZAM DU 'PHEL ZHING DENG
SANG YANG 'CHAD NYAN BZANG SKAD SNANG, SMAD

DU BZHUGS RING LAM RIM CHEN MO DANG, BDE LAM, THOG MA'I BLO
SBYONG RNAMS THUGS 'DZIN GNANG BA SOGS

THOS BSAM SGOM GSUM GYIS DUS 'DAS, DGON LUNG WANG TSANG GIS RJE
'DI PA LA LAM RIM CHEN MO'I BSHAD

LUNG GSAN TSUL THU'I BKVAN RIN PO CHER ZHUS PAS THUGS YID 'PHROG
STE, RNAM GNYIS BKA' BGROS KYIS KHRI RGYA

NAG PA LA KHYED KYI DGE BSHES DE NGED LA LO GSUM GA-YOR, DE NAS
PHYIR BSKYAL CHOG CES GSUNG SHOG GNANG BAS

'PHRAL DU PHEBS, THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE GZHAN DON DGONGS KYANG
WANG TSANG, BA ZA TSANG, ZHANG BA SGOM CHEN

SOGS KYIS GTZOS DGE 'DUN LNGA BRGYA SKOR LA LAM RIM CHEN MO'I
BSHAD LUNG SOGS CHOS BKA' MANG DU GNANG,

ZHAL NAS SNGAR KUN MKHYEN MCHOG GIS THU'U BKVAN TSANG LA CHOS
'BREL ZHOG GSUNGS PA RTA MGRIN GYI SGO NAS RGYA 'DRE

'DUL RGYU DANG 'DI SKABS RANG YUL DU 'ONG RGYU'I MTHUN RKYEN DU
GZIGS PA RED, DE MIN NA RGYA NANG NAS LUS

RGYU RED GSUNGS, SMAD NAS YANG BSKYAR GDAN 'DREN PA 'BYOR YANG
MA PHEBS, BYA KHYUNG DU DUS 'KHOR,

RGYUD PA, MKHAN KHRI RNAMS LA RIM BZHIN PHEBS, RGYUD DANG BKA'
POTA LNGA'I 'CHAD NYAN ZLA MED, SGER DU

'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS BSHAD LUNG TSAR GSUM, BDE LAM BLA MCHOD KYI
KHRID SOGS RGYA GANG CHE GNANG STE, BSTAN

PA LA BYA BA MDZAD, KHRI ZUR NAS GZIMS CHUNG GRVA SHAG CIG GSAR
BZOS GNANG, NGA'I BLA MA DUS GSUM MKHYEN

PA 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PAS SNGAR SNE RING GNANG BA DE KHRI LA
SDOD RGYU DANG, JO ZHVA GNANG BA JO BO RJE BOD DU LO

BCU BDUN BZHUGS PA BZHIN, DA PHAN NGA LO BCU BDUN SDOD RGYU'I
LUNG BSTAN GNANG BA YIN GSUNGS PA LTAR

CHAD LHAG MED PAR BZHUGS, JO BO RJE'I SKU 'DRA CHUNG NGU ZHIG
BZHENGS TE LAM RIM CHEN MO DANG, BDE LAM

NYAMS BZHES MDZAD, BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM GYI RIM GNYIS KYI RNAL
'BYOR MI MNGON PAR LHUR BZHES,

DGUNG LO GYA BRGYAD BZHUGS, GSHEGS NYIN KYEE RDOR ZHAL 'DON
DANG, NYAMS MGUR MANG PO GNANG BZHIN

THUGS DGA' SPRO'I NGANG NAS ZHI BAR PHEBS, SPRUL SKU LHA SAR
GA-YU THOG GUNG LA 'KHRUNGS PA GA-YU THOG CHOS MDZAD

ZER BA DE YIN, ` BIS THANG ZHABS DRUNG YE SHES DAR RGYAS 'BRAS
BSAM BLO BIS MDO MI TSAN DU BZHUGS, DGE

BSHES CHEN POR GYUR, BYA KHYUNG KHRIR PHEBS NAS CHER MA LON PAR
GSHEGS, ` DH'I TSA'I DGE BSHES NGAG@202	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

DBANG 'OD ZER LCANG SKYA'I RTZA BAR YAB PHYAG RDOR TSE RING, YUM
TSE RING SKYID KYI SRAS SU 'KHRUNGS, 'BRAS SGO]

MANG KLU 'BUM KHAMS TSAN DU BZHUGS, MKHAS SNYAN CHE, BYA KHYUNG
KHRIR BZHUGS, RGYAB RI'I RTZER SENG GE SGRA'I LHA

KHANG DANG DH'I TSA'I BYAMS KHANG GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD, ` MDO BA
NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN MDO BA'I MKHAN PO

NGAG DBANG DON GRUB DANG, NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'PHEL GNYIS KYI DBON
PO YIN, BYA KHYUNG DANG SE RAR THUGS

GNYER; BYA KHYUNG GZHUNG LAS PA DANG RGYUD BLA RNAMS BRGYUD
KHRIR PHEBS, LO BZHI BZHUGS, SKU BRNYAN 'GA'

BZHENGS; DPON SLOB GSER KHANG PA'I SLOB MA MDZAD DE KHRI ZUR
'PHRAL RI KHROD 'GRIM, ` BDE YANGS

ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG NOR BU MTSO SNGON MANG RAR 'KHRUNGS, MKHAN
CHEN NGAG DBANG NOR BU'I SKYE BAR NGOS

BZUNG; LA MO BDE CHEN DANG BYA KHYUNG DU SLOB GNYER, LAM RIM
CHEN MO THUGS 'DZIN GYIS DPYAD PA LA 'GRUS,

BYA KHYUNG SMAN PA BLA MA DANG LA MO'I BDE CHEN GYI KHRI, SA YOS
LO 'DI KA'I KHRIR PHEBS PA MI RUNG BAR ZUR DU BZHUGS,

`BLO BZANG DBANG PHYUG MDO BA YAR NANG DU 'KHRUNGS, SKU 'PHRENG
MANG PO CAN MDO BA'I SGRA BA TSANG ZER BA'I SKYE

BAR NGOS BZUNG, BYA KHYUNG DANG SER BYES SU THUGS GNYER DANG SE
RA'I GLING BSRE MDZAD, RGYUD SMAD DU PHEBS,

KHRI NGAG DBANG SNYAN GRAGS THO LING MKHAN POR PHEBS PA'I ZHABS
PHYIR PHYIN, SKABS 'GAR SKU TSAB DANG,

DGON PA KHA SHAS KYI BLA MA MDZAD, YUL DU BYON NAS GZHUNG LAS PA
DANG, BLA MA DBU MDZAD RGYUD KHRI RNAMS

LA PHEBS, DUS 'KHOR GYI DBANG, 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS KYI BSHAD
LUNG GNANG, KHRIR PHEBS NAS LUGS

GNYIS KYIS GDAN SA BSKYANGS, ZUR BZHUGS THOG ZHI BAR GSHEGS, `
ZU NANG MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG SNYAN

GRAGS MTSO SNGON GA-YON RU JU NAS JA SAG GI MNGA' ZHABS SU ME
KHYI LOR 'KHRUNGS, RUS RVA TSA, YAB DKON

MCHOG SKYABS, YUM SGROL MA MTSO, DGUNG LO BDUN THOG RVA TSA CHOS
RJE'I DRUNG DU 'BRI 'DON KLOG GSUM

SBYANGS, BRGYAD PAR DGE BSHES NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA LAS DGE BSNYEN
DANG RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS, BCU GSUM

PA LA BYA KHYUNG DU PHEBS, MKHAN CHEN NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS LAS
DGE TSUL DANG DGE RGAN ZHUS TE CHOS GRVAR

ZHUGS; SLOB GNYER RTZER SON, LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO DANG, 'GREL BA
DON GSAL SOGS KYI TSOGS RGYUG NYER

GCIG PA LA MKHAN CHEN NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS, SO
BDUN PA LA GLING BSRE, SNGA PHYIR DGE

RGAN NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS, THU'I BKVAN RIN PO CHE, GUNG THANG
'JAM PA'I DBYANGS, AA RIG DGE

BSHES CHEN MO, MKHAN CHEN SBYIN PA KUN BZANG, KA PHUG PA, SGAR
BA TSANG, GSER KHANG PA SOGS LA

GTUGS; DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG GI GSAN RGYA CHE, NYAMS LEN BZANG,
ZHE DGU PA LA GZHUNG LAS PA, LNGA BCU

BA LA BLA MA DBU MDZAD PA, NGA GSUM NAS RGYUD PA'I KHRI MDZAD
MUS NGA DGU'I THOG MKHAN KHRIR PHEBS, LO BRGYAD

KYI RING 'CHAD NYAN TSAD MED DANG, BLA BRANG ZHIG GSOS KYANG
PHUL PHYIN GNANG YANG GEGS DBANG GIS 'DU KHANG

CHEN MO ME BZHES BYUNG, SPYI RDZAS SOGS NYAMS CHAG CHE, RE BDUN
LA ZUR DU BZHUGS, LAM RIM CHEN MO

ZHAL 'DON SOGS NYAMS BZHES 'PHEL, DON DRUG PA LCAGS GLANG LA ZHI
BAR GSHEGS, SPRUL SKU YANG

@203	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

'KHRUNGS; ` MDO BA MAR NANG HAN 'DZIN 'JAM DBYANGS RGYAL MTSAN,
CHU SPRUL LOR BA YAN KA BZHI KHUG

ZER BAR YAB MGON PO SKYABS DANG YUM RGYA MO SKYID KYI SRAS SU
'KHRUNGS, 'DI PA'I SKU GONG MA BYA KHYUNG BLA MA GNANG,

LCAGS MKHAR ZUR BCU DRUG PA GSAR 'DZUGS MDZAD 'DUG  DGUNG LO BDUN
PAR RTZA BA BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN

LAS RAB TU BYUNG, BCU GCIG LA BYA KHYUNG GI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS,
RTZA BA CHUNG TSANG LA DGE TSUL DANG BSNYEN RDZOGS

ZHUS; GZHUNG GSAR BAR DU SLOB GNYER DANG, NYER GCIG PA CHU GLANG
LA DBUS SU PHEBS, SER BYES SU

SLOB GNYER DANG, RVA SGRENG KHRI CHEN LAS BKA' CHOS MANG DU
GSAN, NYER LNGA LA RANG YUL DU BYON, SO GNYIS

LA DUS 'KHOR BLA MAR PHEBS, LO NGO LNGA MDZAD, DRUG CU BA CHU
'BRUG LA KHRIR PHEBS, MGON KHANG GI SNANG

BRNYAN RNAMS GSAR BZHENGS, ZUR DU BZHUGS NAS THUGS DAM 'PHEL MUS
SA BYA DON BDUN PA LA SLEBS,

`CHU BZANG SPRUL BA'I SKU BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN RAB RGYAS ME
SBRUL LA KHRIR PHEBS, LO GCIG BZHUGS, DE GONG

'DU KHANG GSAR BZHENGS KYI THUGS KHUR BZHES NAS BYA KHYUNG GI
DGON BDAG MDZAD, GZHUNG LAS PA, BLA MA

DBU MDZAD GRVA TSANG GSUM GYI KHRI PA RNAMS NYID NAS BSKO BZHAG
GI 'GAN KHUR BZHES, ` KHA MANG BU RGYUD CHE BA

CHOS 'PHEL DON GRUB, KA MDO'I SA CHA HOR TSANG DU YAB PADMA TSE
RING, YUM DKAR MO SKYID KYI SRAS SU ME SBRUL

LA 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PA LA DGE LEGS CHOS 'PHEL LAS RAB
TU BYUNG, SLOB DPON NGAG DBANG

DGE LEGS LAS DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, BCU GCIG LA BYA KHYUNG CHOS GRVAR
ZHUGS, PO TI LNGA LA SLOB GNYER MTHAR

PHYIN; NYER GCIG PA LA CHU BZANG SKU GONG MA LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS,
SO GSUM PA LA GLING BSRE, ZHE BDUN LA

GZHUNG LAS PA, DE NAS RGYUD BLA GNYIS LA RIM PHEBS KYIS RE GNYIS
PA ME BYA LA KHRIR PHEBS, RE LNGA LA ZUR

BZHUGS KYIS THUGS DAM GONG 'PHEL NGOS SA BYA DON BZHI PA'O, `
KHRE MAR SPRUL SKU YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN KA

KY'A'I BE KYAR YAB RGYAL MTSAN, YUM MGON MO SKYID LA SHING STAG
LO 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PA LA MKHAN PO

YE SHES DAR RGYAS LAS RAB TU BYUNG, BCU PA LA BA YAN STON THA'I
DGON DU PHEBS 'DON CHOS LA SBYANGS, BCO

LNGA PA BYA KHYUNG CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, DPON SLOB CHOS 'PHEL DON
GRUB PA BSTEN GZHUNG GSAR BAR DU THUGS GNYER,

NYI SHUB CHU BYA LA DBUS SU PHEBS SER BYES SU SLOB GNYER MTHAR
PHYIN, MTSAN BTAGS MDZAD, PAn CHEN

RIN PO CHE LA BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS, RANG YUL DU BYON, SUM CU'I
THOG NAS GZHUNG LAS PA LO MANG MDZAD, BZHI

BCU BA LA DUS 'KHOR BLA MA GNANG, GRVA KHANG ZHIG GSOS SOGS LO
SHAS 'DZIN SKYONG LEGS, ZHE BDUN PA LCAGS

BYI LA KHRIR PHEBS, CHOS SRID GANG THAD NAS LEGS LAM MDZAD, ZUR
BZHUGS KYIS GSER KHANG MCHOG GI

ZHABS LA GTUGS, 'DI PA LUGS GNYIS KYI MKHYEN RGYA CHE ZHING,
THUGS BSKYED BZANG BA BCAS BYA KHYUNG

NGANG DU BZHUGS NA PHAN THOGS CHE YANG SGRUB PA LA GZHOL 'DUN
SOGS GANG CI'I RKYEN GYIS KA MDO'I GDONG DMAR

SNA'I RI KHROD DU BZHUGS, NYAMS BZHES PHUL PHYIN GYIS SA BYA NGA
DRUG PA YIN, ` MGON THANG ZHABS DRUNG BLO

BZANG YON TAN GCAN TSA'I SA AA 'DAR CHA GAN GRONG DU, AA KY'A
NANG SO'I RGYUD PA YAB DPON PO BLO BZANG RAB

@204	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

BRTAN; YUM LHA RI'I SRAS SU CHU SPREL LA 'KHRUNGS, 'DI PA'I GONG
MA MGON TSANG DKA' BCU NGAG DBANG TSUL

KHRIMS ZHES BYA KHYUNG GI DGE BSHES CHE KHAG TSE DANG SGRUB PA
SNYOMS PA ZHIG YIN 'DUG  DGUNG LO BDUN PA LA MKHAN

ZUR BDE YANGS PA LAS RAB TU BYUNG, BCU GSUM NAS BYA KHYUNG CHOS
GRVAR LO SHAS SLOB GNYER DANG RGYUD DU YANG

PHEBS; NYER DGU BA LA BLA MA DBU MDZAD, SO GCIG PA LA RGYUD PA'I
BLA MA, SO BZHI BA SHING SPRUL LA MKHAN POR

PHEBS; SKU NAS SOGS GANG NGOS NAS GZHON YANG STABS 'GRIG GI
DBANG ZER, LO GCIG NAS DGONGS

PA ZHUS, DA LTA SO BRGYAD PA LA SLEBS, KHA MANG BU RGYUD SKAL
BZANG LEGS BSHAD KA MDO THANG ZHING LA KHA ZHES

PAR YAB SRID THAR, YUM TSE RING MO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU CHU BYI LOR
'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR SKYE LA DGON

DU RANG GI KHU BO MKHAN PO YE SHES SKAL BZANG LAS RAB TU BYUNG,
DGU LA BYA KHYUNG DU PHEBS KLOG 'DON SBYANGS,

BCU GSUM LA CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, BCO LNGA LA MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG
BSOD NAMS LAS DGE TSUL DANG, NYER

GNYIS LA MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG 'OD ZER LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS BSGRUBS,
RGYUD PA MKHAN PO YE SHES SKAL BZANG GI

BKA' BZHIN NYER GSUM PA SHING KHYI LA DBUS SU BYON, SE RA BSAM
BLOR BZHUGS, PO TI LNGA LA YANG BSKYAR

SLOB GNYER GNAD SMIN, SO DGU BA LCAGS STAG LA GLING BSRE MDZAD,
SLOB GNYER BZANG BA'I GRAGS PA BYUNG,

ZHE DGU LA YUL DU PHEBS, BYA KHYUNG RGYUD GRVA 'GRIM, NGA GCIG
LA BLA MA DBU MDZAD, NGA BZHI BA LA RGYUD KHRI, NGA

LNGA BA ME RTA LA MKHAN KHRIR PHEBS, SA BYA LA ZUR BZHUGS MDZAD
PA DGUNG LO NGA BRGYAD DU PHEBS, ` SKU

'BUM KHRI BA CHE SHOS MKHAN PO RE GSUM PA SA BYA LA KHRIR PHEBS,
LCAGS KHYIR ZUR DU BZHUGS, ` MKHAN PO

SKAL BZANG NOR BU NI, TSA PHUG KA KY'AR YAB 'BUM ME DANG, YUM BO
COG SKYID KYI SRAS SU LCAGS GLANG LOR

'KHRUNGS; BDUN PA LA MTSER MO CHER MDO BA CHOS RJE'I DRUNG DU
RAB TU BYUNG, DGU BA LA BYA KHYUNG DU PHEBS,

MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG 'OD ZER SOGS LA GTUGS, SLOB GNYER DANG MTSAN
BTAGS GNANG, RE GCIG

PA LA GZHUNG LAS PA, RE LNGA LA BLA MA DBU MDZAD, RE DRUG PA LA
RGYUD KHRI, BDUN CU BA LCAGS KHYI LA KHRIR

BZHUGS TE GDAN SA SKYONG BZHIN PA'I SKABS SO, ,

RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG NI, RGYUD SMAD SNGAGS RAMS PA NGAG DBANG
BKRA SHIS RGYA NAG NAS YAB 'KHOR BSTUN RGYAL

DBANG SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO, KHRI NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN, LA MO
CHOS SKYONG BCAS LA LUNG BSTAN ZHUS TE RAB

BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME YOS LA GSAR DU BTZUGS, THOG MAR MKHAN POR
BSKOS PAS LCAGS 'BRUG BAR BSKYANGS,

DE NAS RIM PA BZHIN, RVA DGE BSHES, DKA' BCU BLO BZANG LHUN
GRUB, MDO BA DKA' BCU NGAG DBANG

BZANG PO, GDONG 'JUG ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS, MDO BA'I
DPON CHUNG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'PHEL,

RTZA BA CHUNG PA NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS, STAG LUNG BA 'JAM DBYANGS
GRAGS PA, SDONG DE DGE 'DUN CHOS 'PHEL,

GCAN TSA'I LHA RAMS PA SBYIN PA KUN BZANG, MDO PA'I LHA RAMS PA
NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS, MDO PA'I BON

@205	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

CHUNG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN, MDO BA'I DGE BSHES GRAGS PA RGYAL
MTSAN, BIS THANG ZHABS DRUNG YE SHES

DAR RGYAS, ,MDO BA SGAR BA'I ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG DBANG PHYUG 
BA YAN DGE BSHES YE SHES SHES RAB, MTSO

SNGON JU NANG DGE BZHES NGAG DBANG SNYAN GRAGS, KA MDO'I DGE
BSHES YE SHES SKAL BZANG, KHA MANG BU RGYUD

CHOS 'PHEL DON GRUB, MKHAR NANG ZHABS DRUNG 'PHRIN LAS DAR
RGYAS, MGON TSANG ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG YON

TAN; KA MDO'I SE RA'I DGE BSHES SKAL BZANG LEGS BSHAD, TSA PHUG
DPON SLOB SKAL BZANG NOR BU, MTSO

SNGON PA R'A TSA ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO LCAGS
KHYIR KHRIR BZHUGS,

DUS 'KHOR GRVA TSANG NI, ZAN KHRON PHYAG THO THAD CHOS RJE RAB
'BYAMS PA DAR RGYAS RGYA MTSOS SBYIN DAG

BYAS; ZI NA TSUL KHRIMS DAR RGYAS MKHAN POR BZHUGS THOG RAB
BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME SPRUL LA DANG POR

SMAN PA GRVA TSANG BTZUGS, BLA MA BDE YANGS ZHABS DRUNG BLO
BZANG NOR BU 'CHOD, KA PHUG ZHABS DRUNG BLO

BZANG DON GRUB DUS SNGAR GYI SBYIN BDAG GIS ZHUS TE DUS 'KHOR
GRVA TSANG DU BSGYUR, DE NAS RIM PAR MDO BA'I

DGE BSHES GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN, KHU RA ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG
'OD ZER, MDO BA DPON SLOB NGAG DBANG

BANG PO'I SPRUL SKU 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN 'DZIN, DH'I TSA'I DGE
BSHES NGAG DBANG 'OD ZER, ZHONG SHAN

RAB 'BYAMS PA 'JAM DBYANGS TSUL KHRIMS, SNGA KYA'I DKA' BCU NGAG
DBANG BSOD NAMS, MDO BA'I

ZHING BO SKYE'I ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS, KHRE DMAR
ZHABS DRUNG YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN, AA 'DZI

ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS, RVA TSA SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG
DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO, GDONG 'JUG ZHABS DRUNG

SKAL LDAN CHOS GRAGS, DA LTA COG TZA DKA' BCU NGAG DBANG 'JAM
DBYANGS BZHUGS, CHU BZANG PA'I

GDAN RABS DANG KLU 'BUM PA'I GDAN RABS GNYIS SU BRGYAD PA GSER
KHANG PA BLO GROS RGYA MTSO AA KRO BAR NGOS

BZUNG YANG SNGAR BSHAD PA DE RGYAL BA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG
DU MDO SMAD PA SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN ZHES PA

DANG; SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG DANG YANG MTHUN, AA KRO BAS
DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO'I ZHABS ZIN PA LA

RTZOD PA MED, GSER KHANG PA'I RJES LA BYAMS GLING PA BSTAN PA
RIN CHEN GYIS RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I MJUG CHU PHAG

LA MTSAN NYID BTZUGS PAR BSHAD PAS KYANG DUS TSOD RAG TZAM SHES,
GANG LTAR AA KRO BA'I SKU GDUNG LA DENG

SANGS SER GDUNG CHUNG BA ZER, KLU 'BUM PAS, JO BO RJE 'KHRUNGS
NAS LO SUM BRGYA NYER BRGYAD RAB BYUNG

LNGA BA'I SA BYA LA CHOS RJE DON RIN PA 'KHRUNGS, NYID KYI ZHE
GCIG PA RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SA GLANG LA BYA KHYUNG BTAB,

ZHE DGU BA ME BYA LA RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO 'KHUNG, RJE'I NYER
DGU, NYID KYI DON BDUN PA RAB BYUNG DRUG

PA'I SHING GLANG LA GSHEGS, DES NA CHOS RJE 'KHRUNGS LO NAS RAB
BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SA PHAG BAR LO LNGA BRGYA DANG

SO CIG BYA KHYUNG DGON BTAB NAS BZHI BRGYA DANG GO GCIG, GSHEGS
NAS BZHI BRGYAD DANG BZHI ZER

SNANG; DE BZHIN BRTZIS NA 'KHRUNGS NAS DRUG CU SKOR DGU SONG BAS
LNGA BRGYA DANG ZHE GCIG, BYA KHYUNG BTAB

NAS LO LNGA BRGYA DANG GCIG GSHEGS NAS BZHI BRGYA RE BZHI BA RAB
BYUNG BCU BZHI BA'I SA BYA 'DI YIN 'DUG PAS,

@206	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

YUL MDO SMAD KYI CHOS SDE TSAN PO KUN GYI PHYI MOR GYUR BA YIN
NO, ,RTEN GYI GTZO BO GSER GDUNG KHANG DU,

SNGAR CHOS RJE RIN PO CHE'I DUNG RIL BO NANG BZHUGS KYI SA 'BUM
BDAG RKYEN ZHAN PAR YOD PA RAB BYUNG BCU

BA'I CHU LUG LA RGYAL BA ? RNAMS RGYA MTSO GNAS 'DIR PHEBS
SKABS, GZHAN LA DGE BSKUL DANG, NYID

NAS GSER PHON CHE BA GNANG STE ZHAL BKOD MDZAD PA BZHIN, GDAN SA
PA SOGS KYIS THUGS KHUR BZHES TE

RMANG DGE SA LA BTZUGS PA'I MCHOD RTEN BZHENGS PA GSER ZANGS
KYIS BTUMS PA SOGS BKA' DRIN CHE BA BYUNG

BAS; RGYAL BA'I YAB MYUR DON GRUB RIN CHE DANG, RGYAL BA'I DBANG
BO BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL, ,

RGYAL BA'I SRAS MCHOG BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSO'I SDE, ,RGYAL BA YAB
SRAS GSUM LA GSOL BA 'DEBS, ,ZHES

SER SKYA TSANG MAS 'DOM PA'I SROL DAR, DENG SANG YANG SA GA ZLA
BA SOGS SU RO SHIN TU ZHIM PA'I BDUD RTZI MYONG

RGYU YOD PA 'BAB CING, DE'I RTAGS SU MCHOD RTEN GYI GSER MDANGS
DMAR POR 'GYUR BA DANG, DRI ZHIM

GYIS DGON PA'I GLING KHYAB PA MTHUN SNANG DU GRUB PAS THU'I
BKVAN RJES, RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I YONGS SU 'DZIN PA

MCHOG ;DON GRUB RIN CHEN ZHES GRAGS MA 'ONGS DUS, ,RNGA SGRA
SGROGS PA'I ZHING DU 'TSANG RGYA BA, ,DE

YI RING BSREL MCHOD RTEN 'JAM LAGS SAM, ,BYIN BRLABS PHUNG PO
SPUNGS PA'I RTEN DE LA, ,BSTAN PA

DAR ZHING 'JIG RTEN BDE BA YI, ,DGE BA'I LTAS SU DUS TSES BZANG
BO LA, ,BDUD RTZI 'BAB PA LJAGS KYIS

MYANGS LAGS SAM, ,ZHES GSUNGS SO, ,DE'I MDUN DU BZHUGS KHANG
SHEL SGO CAN GYI NANG DU LO KI SHVA RA'I

SNANG BRNYAN GSUNG 'BYON MA 'DI 'PHAGS YUL NAS PHEBS TE PU RANGS
BZHI SDE'I GTZUG LAG KHANG GI RTEN GTZOR

BZHUGS PA BZHI SDE'I GDUNG RGYUD RDZOGS PAR BRTEN RTEN SUM RNAMS
GZHUNG BZHES BYAS, SKU 'DI SGAR DPON

D'A'I CHING BA'I THUR GYIS DANG RTEN DU BLANGS, KHRI CHEN NGAG
DBANG MCHOG LDAN THO LING MKHAN POR BZHUGS SKABS

BLUS TE THUGS DAM RTEN MDZAD, SLAR YANG SANGS RGYAS KYI 'PHEL
GDUNG JO BO RJE'I GDUNG RUS MNGA' RIS STOD

DU 'KHYAR BA SOGS NANG BZHUGS SU PHUL BA'I BYIN CAN, SA SKYA
GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYI THUGS DAM RTEN THUB

DBANG GRONG KHYER MA DPAL CHOS MKHAN PO HU THOG THUS PHUL BA
GNYIS DGONG 'DI'I RTEN GTZOR SBYOR 'JAGS

GNANG; GA-YAS SU KHRI NGAG DBANG SNYAN GRAGS KYI PHYAG MDZOD BYA
KHYUNG BAS DAN ZHUS RJE'I SNANG BRNYAN KHYAD

'PHYAG 'TSAL DBU'I STENG DU KHRI NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN DGA' LDAN
KHRI PA'I SKABS BZHES PA'I GDUGS, GA-YON

DU KHRI NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS KYIS GNANG BA'I JO BO, CHOS RJE
DON RIN PA DANG RJE RIN PO CHE RNAMS GNYIS KYI SKU

BRNYAN RGYA NAGLI MA SOGS DANG, DPON SLOB GSER KHANG PAS GNANG
BA'I THUB PA GRONG KHYER MA LO RGYUS CAN,

GSANG 'DUS 'JAM RDOR SMAN SKU, BDE KHANG BA'I SKU GDUNG, 'JIGS
BYED BCU GSUM MA'I BLOS BSLANGS,

TZANDAN GYI BDE MCHOG LHA LNGA'I BLOS BSLANGS, SKU RGYAB 'KHOR
MAR RGYUD SMAD SNGAGS RMAS PA NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS

KYIS RGYA NAG NAS SPYAN DRANGS PA'I BKA' BSTAN, THE'U DUNG KLU
SKYABS KYIS PHUL BA'I GSER DNGUL GYIS BZHENGS

PA'I BKA' 'GYUR, STAG LO'I THUGS DAM GYI YUM, DH'I TSA'I BYAMS
KHANG DU, BYAMS MGON, 'JAM

@207	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

DBYANGS, SPYAN RAS GZIGS, CHOS RJE DON RIN PA DANG RJE'I SKU,
AARA PA TZA'I LHA KHANG DU RJE BDAG

NYID CHEN POS 'JAM DBYANGS SGRUB PA'I GZIMS SPYIL SNYING BOR
BYAS TE BZHENGS PA'I MCHOD RTEN, MDO BA

ZHABS DRUNG, ZAN KHRON PA CHOS RJE DAR RGYAS RGYA MTSO GNYIS
KYIS DNGUL GYIS BTUMS PA'I SGO KHYIM DU TZAN DAN

GYI 'JAM DBYANGS DANG RJE'I GSER SKU, MDUN NGOS SU RJE BLA MA
DGUNG LO GSUM PA, BZHI BA, BRGYAD

PA RNAMS KYI SNANG BRNYAN GSUM DANG, RGYAL BA SENG GE NGA RO,
SGO'I STENG NA SNGAR GYI GZIMS SPYI GDUNG MDOG

MA BSGYUR BA, STENG DU AA RA PA TZA'I YIG 'BRU RANG BYON DNGOS
SU SNANG, ` BYAMS PA CHU GZIGS KYI LHA KHANG

NA BYAMS MGON, SPYAN RAS GZIGS DANG MTHU CHEN THOB GTZO 'KHOR,
DE'I GA-YAS SU SDE BA CHOS RJE'I SGRUB

KHANG BRAG PHUG ' GSER GDUNG CHUNG BA'I LHA KHANG DU AA KRO'I
GSER GDUNG DANG, GTZANG BA CHOS RJE GRAGS PA

RGYAL MTSAN GYI SKU GDUNG SOGS GDUNG RTEN KHA SHAS, JO SKU BYAMS
'JAM DBYANGS BCAS, SGROL DKAR

LJANG; NOR RGYUN MA YAB YUM, AA KY'A NANG SOS BZHENGS PA'I BYAMS
PA, SENG KHRI KHANG DU CHOS RJE DON

GRUB RIN CHE, RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO, RJE BTZUN DAM PA
GSUM GYI BZHUGS KHRI BYIN CAN, DER

SPYAN GZIGS SU KU SHRI HAN GYI KHRAB DANG RAL GRI SOGS YOD, `
DE'I GA-YAS SU SDE BA CHOS RJE BSTAN 'DZIN BLO

BZANG RGYA MTSO YUN RING BZHUGS, MI MA YIN 'GA' ZHIG BTUL, NYID
KYI SO BRGYAD PA LCAGS RTA LOR BYAMS

MGON BZANG PO'I BZHUGS STANGS CAN LHA KHANG BCAS BZHENGS, CHOS
SKYONG BEG RTZE LA GTAD DE MGON KHANG

DANG RTAG GTOR BTZUGS, RVA LO SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSAM 'GRUB
KHRI'I SKABS ZHIG GSOS MDZAD PAR RTAG GTOR

GYI SGROM ZHAL PHYE BAS SHANGS KHRAG SHOR BA SOGS SHIN TU GNYAN
PAR GRAGS, 'DI 'GA' ZHIG GIS SKU GDUNG LHA

KHANG DU BZHUGS KYANG ZER, YANG DE NYID KYIS STAG RTZE LHA KHANG
DU DBYER ZLUM MCHOD RTEN DGE 'DUN GYI DBYEN

SEL ZHING THUGS MTHUN 'PHEL RGYAS KYI SPEL TSIG BCUG PA BZHENGS,
SKU MCHED SDE BA YID BZHIN PA SOGS GTZANG

BAS GTZES PAS AA MDOR PHEBS PA BA YAN RTZVA MDZOD THANG SOGS SU
GZHI PHAB NAS RE ZHIG BZHUGS SNANG, SNGAR

GYI DRE'U NYAL SA GA-YANG SU KHUG TU CHOS RJE DON RIN PA RANG
GIS BZHENGS PA'I LHA KHANG CHEN MO'I NANG DU RGYAL BA RIGS

LNGA; RDO RJE PHAG MO RANG BYO, THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE MCHOD
MJAL ZHIG LA PHEBS SKABS SU 'DI SHIN TU ZIL

CHE ZHING, LDEM LDEM GA-YO BA ZHABS PHYI TSOS KYANG MTHONG ZHING
RJE DE NYID LA GSUNG BYON SNANG, 'KHOR DU SEMS

DP''A BCU DRUG GI SNANG BRNYAN, MGON PO DANG LHA MO, STENG DU
LHA 'DRE'I GNOD 'TSE ZHI PHYIR BZEHNGS PA'I

SLOB DPON PAD MA'I SKU, 'DU KHANG CHEN MOR RJE GSER KHANG BAS
SBYOR 'JAGS KYI RJE'I SKU SOGS BRIS 'BUR GYI

SNANG BRNYAN MANG PO, SNAR THANG BKA' 'GYUR TSAR GNYIS, STENG GI
BTZAN KHANG DU DAM CAN SKU BRNYAN,

GTER NAS BTON PA'I RDO RJE, SRUNG MA 'DI GNAS 'DIR RANG BZHIN
GYIS 'KHOR ZHING, 'PHRIN LAS BSGRUB

PA'I LO RGYUS MANG, ` RI RTZE'I LHA KHANG DU THUB PA BDUD 'DUL
GTZO 'KHOR, RGYUD KHANG DU, BDE GSANG

GI BLOS BSLANGS RGYA NAG MA DANG SANGS RGYAS STONG SKU, ` DUS
'KHOR GRVA KHANG, BDE BA KHANG GNYIS SU RTEN

@208	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

MANG; RGYAB RI'I RTZER SENG GE SGRA DANG, GSHAM DU KLU MA DROS
PA'I LHA KHANG, CHOS GRVA'I 'OG GROG KHAR BRAG

DKAR SNGAGS RAMS PAS KHRAM PA ZA LAR NAG SHANG GI GA-YANG GZHI'I
STENG BRTZIGS PA'I SRI GNON 'BUM PA, 'DI

MAN CHAD CHUS DAM GROG BYAS 'DUG KYANG DE YAN LAG GNOD PA MI
SRID SNANG, MKHA' 'GRO MA BLO BZANG CHOS SGRON

GYIS KYANG DGON PAR PHAN GROGS BZANG PO MDZAD, DE LTA BU'I CHOS
SDE CHEN PO 'DI GANG DU BTAB PA'I GNAS

NI; 'BROG RI CHEN PO DGA' LDAN DANG DBYIBS MTSUNGS LA, CHU DANG
BUD SHING RGYANG RING ZHING, LOG

'TSOS DBEN PAS THA MAL RANG DGA' BAS BRTEN DKA' YANG 'DIR BZHUGS
DGE 'DUN RNAMS ZANG ZING GI 'DU

LONG LA MI DGYES PAR 'DOD CHUNG CHOG SHES, TSUL GNAS BSHAD SGRUB
LA BRTZON PAS GRAGS CHEN GZHAN LA 'GRAM

CHU MI LDANG BA'I TSUGS THUB PA, GRVA TSANG DU BTZAN PO'I BSDUS
GRVA, KHYUNG PHRUG PA'I SKABS DANG PO, RJE BTZUN

PA'I DBU MA, BDE LEGS NYI MA'I 'DUL BA, DRUNG CHEN PA'I MDZOD
RNAMS BRTZI BZHAG LA GTONG, RGYUD

KYI 'CHAD NYAN SMAD RGYUD DPE 'GRE DANG, DUS 'KHOR LA YANG 'CHAD
NYAN LEGS, DPYID CHOS DANG DBYAR

CHOS BZLA CHOS, BYAR GNAS KYI RING CHOS THOG  STON CHOS DANG DGUN
CHOS GNYIS BCO LNGA'I CHOS THOG

BZHI PA DANG GCIG PA'I SMON LAM, LNGA MCHOD DGU GTOR DANG LO
RNYING LCAGS MKHAR BCAS LA 'TSAM SOGS

CHOS SPYOD KYI BYA BA GANG THAD NAS MKHAS PA KUN GYIS RTZOD MED
DU BSNGAGS PA'I GNAS TE THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHES

KYANG; DE NAS DON MED SKYE BO'I 'DU LONG DANG, ,'DOD YON CHE BAS
CHOS LA GA-YEL BA YI, SKYON BRAL

DGON PA'I MTSAN NYID TSANG BA'I GNAS, ,BYA KHYUNG BRAG GI CHOS
SDER PHYIN LAGS SAM, ,DE NA MANG THOS

KLOG PA MKHAS RNAMS DANG, ,SDOM BRTZON SGRUB LA GZHOL BA MANG PO
YIS, ,THUB BSTAN 'DZIN CING SPEL

BA'I RNAM THAR LA, ,YID GA-YOS DAD PA GTING NAS 'KHRUNGS LAGS
SAM, ,ZHES GSUNGS LA, CHU BZANG

THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG, GSANG SGROGS SPRUL SKU, RTZA BA CHUNG BA
NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS, 'BRAS KLU 'BUM PA

NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN BZHIS BSGRIGS PA'I GDAN RABS YOD KYANG,
DPE RNAMS RNYED DKA' BAS CUNG ZAD

ZHIB PAR BTUS, MDO BA RGAN PA SOGS 'GA' RE'I RNAM THAR LA DNGOS
SLOB KYI GSUNG SGROS BSNAN TE SANGS

RGYAS MOS PA'I BSTAN PA LA PHYIR MI LDOG PA'I LUNG BSTAN THUB
PA'I SMON LAM GYI RTEN DU BRIS SO, ,DER BLA BRANG CHE

KHAG GI SKOR LA, CHU BZANG BLA BRANG, DBAL SHUL BLA BRANG THEG
CHEN CHOS KYI PHO BRANG, RTZA BA CHE CHUNG GI BLA

BRANG GNYIS, KHA MANG BU RGYUD BLA BRANG, DPON SLOB CHE BA'I BLA
BRANG, SKYA MDA' BLA BRANG, DHA'I TSA BLA BRANG,

BRAG KHANG BLA BRANG, JO NANG BLA BRANG, ZI NA BLA BRANG, SDONG
NGES BLA BRANG, STAG LUNG BLA BRANG, SNA

KYA BLA BRANG, GDONG 'JUG BLA BRANG, R'A BLA BRANG, HAN 'DZIN
BLA BRANG, BIS THANG BLA BRANG, ,MDO

BA CHE CHUNG GI BLA BRANG GNYIS, AA 'DZIN BLA BRANG, KA BUG BLA
BRANG, BSAM 'GRUB DGA' 'KHYIL, SGAR

BA BLA BRANG, MKHAN PO BLA BRANG STE MANG, BYANG NGOS LCAGS THAG
KHA SGANG DU RJE DBUS PHEBS SKABS DAR COG

BTZUGS PAR GRAGS PA'I LAB TZE BDE LDAN LHUN PO, DE DANG NYE BAR
KHRI NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS DANG, NGAG

@209	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)
DBANG SNYAN GRAGS GNYIS KYI 'KHRUNGS SA 'TSAMS RING YOD, ` DONG
LAG NI BYA KHYUNG RGYAB NGOS SU DHA'I TSA'I

DGON, DE'I PHUR KHYUNG RGYA'I RI KHROD BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING
NI SKAL LDAN RNAM THAR TU, DGE BA'I BSHES

GNYEN BSTAN PA RIN CHEN GYIS KHYUNG RGYA'I SGRUB SDE BTZUGS
GSUNGS PA DE YIN 'DRA, KHA 'DZIN SKU 'BUM NAS

MDZAD; ` KHA SHA MTHIL DU RJE GSER KHANG PAS BZHENGS PA'I MCHOD
RTEN KHANG BRTZEGS KYI RNAM PA CAN CHE BA,

` SKYES RI'I GSER KHANG SNGAR NAS SGRUB GNAS GRAGS CHEN LA SKYID
SHOD SDE BA CHOS RJE LA MNAL LAM DU PAn CHEN RIN

PO CHE NAS BSKUL BA LTAR RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I ME YOS LA 'DIR
PHEBS, SGRUB PA MDZAD, PHYAG TSA BZHUGS

PA'I RNAM RGYAL MCHOD RTEN BZHENGS, DE BSTUN DAM PA DU MAS BSTEN
PA'I GNAS YIN, ` ZHONG SHAN RI

KHROD DU, BI SHVA KARMAS THUB PA'I SKU BRNYAN BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD
BZHENGS PA'I NANG TSAN GCIG BZHUGS, CHOM

RKUN 'GA' ZHIG GIS SKU RGYU GSER YIN PAR BZZUNG STE SKU LA STA
RES BSNYN MA THAG DDANG NGAS SKRAG BYUNG, 'BROS

PAR BRTZAMS KYANG SGO KHANG DER KHRAG BSKYUGS TE SHI 'GA' ZHIG
GIS MTHONG SNANG LA SKU'I 'OD ZER GYIS GTZUG

LAG KHANG KHYAB PA BYUNG BAS MTSAN LA LHA CHEN DPAL 'BAR GRAGS
ZHES MKHAN CHEN DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR

TU GSUNGS, DKAR CHAG TU, KO'U SHRI BLA MA DKAR PO ZHES PA RGYA
NAG THANG THO RGYAL PO'I BLA MA BYAS, RGYAL

POS ZHABS TOG BSGRUBS TE JO BO 'DI GDAN DRANGS, GRUB PA'I GNAS
MCHOG KSYES RI 'I GSER KHANG GI MDUN

NGOS SU ZHUGS, GA-YAS GA-YON GYI MAR ME MDZAD DANG BYAMS PA
GNYIS NI, SA PAn DANG, 'GRO

MGON 'PHAGS PA'I DGONGS RDZOGS SU RGYAL POS BKA' GNANG LTAR TA'I
SI TU BYANG CHUB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BZHENGS

ZER 'DUG ` MTSER MO CHE'I RO KHROD, ` SHAR NGOS SU RGYU NI RGAN
PA BLO BZANG CHOS DBYINGS KYIS BTAB PA RTA

GDONG DKAR PO, ` SMA RA GRUB CHEN GYIS BTAB PA SKYA YUL DGON,
'DI DANG NYE BAR RTZE THANG MKHAN PO

DPAL 'BYOR GRAGS PA 'KHRUNGS SA SKYA YUS YOD LA, DE NYID KYIS
BYA KHYUNG 'DU KHANG STENG DU GSER ZANGS KYI RGYAL

MTSAN CHA PHUL, ` TIG RGYA'I DGON NAM BRAG DMAR DGON, ` BRAG
LUNG DGON NI GTZAN TSA MKHAN PO

NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS BTAB, GRVA BA BRGYA LONGS, BKA'
'GYUR DANG, MI LA'I RNAM THAR GYI THANG

KA SOGS RTEN MANG, ` KA NGO DGON PA KA RO SNGAGS RAMS PAS BTAB,
SKU 'PHRENG GSUM PHEBS,

` GCAN TSA'I MA nI CHU'I 'KHOR LA CHOS RJE DON GRUB RIN CHEN
DANG, KARMA ROL BA'I RDO RJE SOGS KYIS RAB GNAS

MDZAD; NANG GI GCIG LA DUS BZANG RNAMS SU RIL BU 'BAB, 'DI KHRI
NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN 'KHRUNGS

SA DKAR MO PHUG DANG NYE, ` BYANG GONG BA'I DBAL SHUL BLA BRANG
GZHIS KA DANG NYE BAR KHU RA ZHABS DRUNG GIS

BTAB PA DGE PHYUG DGON LA MO TSANG GIS BDAG BYED, KUN MKHYEN BAR
MA RAB BYUNG GI MKHAN PO DGE PHYUG CHOS

RJE 'DUL 'DZIN DON GRUB RGYA MTSO 'DI NAS BZHUGS, ` LHO NGOS RMA
KHA DANG NYE BAR SHA RDZONG TSANG GI THANG TSE

SGAR; ' AAN 'DAR CHA GAN MKHAR NANG DGON, ' GRVA TSANG TSANG GI
SGOM RIS RI KHROD, ` SGOM ZHIS TSANG

GI SGOM ZHIS DGON, ` BSTAN PA TSANG GI BON PO RGYUD MKHAR NANG
DGON, ` GONG YU TSANG GI DKAR PO

@210	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

GDONG DGON PA, ` KHO TSE TSANG GI KHO TSE MKHAR NANG DGON PA,
BIS THANG TSANG GI KA KY'A BRAG KHANG DGON,

STAG LUNG TSANG GI MKHAR SNGAGS DGON PA, ` AA KA NGAG DBANG
BRTZON 'GRUS SNA KY'AR 'KHRUNGS, SER BYES SU

SBYANGS PA MDZAD PAS MKHAS GRAGS CHE, RJE SGRUB KHANG PA'I SLOB
MA DANG, KHRI NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN PA'I

DGE RGAN YI, SKU TSE SMAD LA RANG YUL DU PHEBS, 'KHRUNGS GZHIS
DNAG NYE BAR SNA KYA' DKON 'DI BTAB,

DE RJES SKU THOG GCIG GI MTSAN MA SHES, DE NAS NGAG DBANG MKHAS
BTZUN, BLO BZANG 'JAM DBYANGS

BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I NYI MA, THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE LAS RAB
BYUNG BSGRUBS, DA LTA ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG

MKHAS GRUB RGYA MTSO SA KHYI LO 'KHRUNGS PA BZHUGS, BA YAN
GZHUNG DU MKHAR DANG NYE BAR SKU PHYOGS SO TSANG GI BA

YAN STON THA'I DGON PA GRVA BA BRGYA LONGS ZHING 'BYOR BA CHE, `
CHU RU KHA BA TSANG GI SMAD THA'I DGON PA GSAR

SPOS KYI GNAS LA THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHES GZIGS, GRVA GRANGS LNGA
BCU, ` SO TSANG GI GA-YU TSA DGON TE BU

DGON NYI SHU RTZA LHAG YOD, MCHOD GZHIS LA, DH'I TSA NANG SO,
MTSER PHUG DPON PO, CO KYA DPON

PO; LUNG BZANG DPON PO BCAS KYI MNGA' 'OG TU RONG BO NYIN THUB
BCU, AAN 'DAR CHA GAN DPON PO,

KHO TSE DPON PO, MDO BA YAR NANG MAR NANG GI DPON PO GNYIS, SHIS
ZHIN DPON PO LNGA'I MNGA' ZHABS

GCAN TSA NYIN THUB BRGYANG YOD, ` YANG BA YAN MKHAR DANG NYE BA
'GAG TSA'I SAR GRO TSANG SKU 'PHRENGS SGOM CHEN

ZHIG GIS BTAB PA KYA KYA'I DGON PA THEG CHEN CHOS GLING, 'DI
DANG NYE BA'I 'BA' 'OG TU AA KA BSOD NAMS

BZANG PO 'KHRUNGS, DGON 'DIR RAB BYUNG MDZAD, SER BYES SU THUGS
GNYER DANG, RA KHA BRAG TU

SGRUB PA YUN RING MDZA,D BLA MA BYAMS PA DANG, ZHOG SDON YOD
MKHAS GRUB PA'I SLOB MA, RGYAL MCHOG

SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS THUGS NANG NYE ZHING MTHUN RKYENG GANG
DGOS GNANG, RJE'I GSUNG LUNG RGYUN GANG YOD PHYOGS

PHYOGS NAS BTZAL TE PHYOGS BSNGOMS SU GNANG BA'I LUNG RGYUN
KLONG RTOL BLA MA SOGS KYIS SPEL BAS RANG BSTAN 'DI

LA PHYAG RJES CHE, ' DAS RTAGS SU THUS MA TSIG PAR PHEBS PA NANG
BZHUGS SU PHUL BA'I RJE'I SKU SER BYES BSAM

BLO KHANG TSAN DU BZHUGS, DE LA RIM PAR SPRUL SKU GNYIS PHEBS,
MTSAN LA 'BA' 'OG ZHABS DRUNG ZER, `NA

ZA'I STAG DGON PA, ` 'KHYAG CHU DGON PA GRVA GRANGS LNGA BCUR
NYE, ` SKYID ZIL DGON RNAMS THANG RING GI

DGON LAG YIN, ` BA'I CO'I DGON LAG SER DRIS DGON SKU 'BUM SER
DRIS DPON SLOB, RI KHUNG TSANG,

SER DRIS MA nI PA GSUM SKYONG ZHING, PHYI MA'I SPRUL SKU RDO
SBIS NAS 'KHRUNGS PA BLO BZANG 'OD ZER DA LTA

BZHUGS; AA MGON RI KHROD BCAS YOD, ` BYA KHYUNG STOD NA SGO ME
STOD SMAD GNYIS YOD PA'I SMAD DU MCHOD

RTEN SKIS DGON CHEN DGAA' LDAN BKRA SHIS DAR RGYAS GLING NI,
THOG MAR SMRA BA'I KHYU MCHOG SGO ME GRAGS PA RGYA

MTSOS BTAB PA YIN LA, 'DIPA RMA CHU KHA'I SGO ME HOR KY'A NAS
'KHRUNGS PAS HOR KY'A'I GRAGS RGAN ZER, DBUS

SU PHEBS, KLU 'BUMS PHYI KHANG GONG MA'I RA SKOR DU MTSAN
'KHYONGS SKABS GZIMS DKROG BYED DU BRDUNG BA'I

RDO KONG DANG, GSHAG TU MGRIN PA DANG GDUNG MA SPREL BYED 'CHAR
LONG RTEN DU YOD 'DUG GRVA THOG DER SGO MANG

@211	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

DGE BSHES CHE GRAS YIN PA TZAM DU MA ZAD, SMRA NGAN TSAR GCOD PA
LA RNAM DPYOD MCHOG TU GYUR PA'I MTSAN NYID

OS ZHUS PAS DE RNYING MA'I CHOS YIN

MKHYEN GONG MAS LCAGS PHAG DGUN CHOS LA DKA' RAMS 'DZIN GRVAR
PHAR PHYIN STON MO'I DAM BCA' BZHAG SKABS, THOG MAR BYA BRAL RAB
'BYAMS PA RAG MA BZHENGS BGRO GLENG

PHUL; KUN MKHYEN NAS, KHYI'I LUS RTEN CAN GYI BYANG SEMS KYI LUS
RTEN KHYI'I LUS RTEN DANG, BYANG

SEMS DE'I LUS RTEN LA BDE 'GRO'I LUS RTEN GYIS MA KHYAB PAR ZHAL
GYIS BZHES, GZHAN MANG POS KHAS LEN DE

BSGRUB KYANG RIGS LUNG MA THENGS, DE RJES GRAGS RGYAM PA BZHENGS
NAS, KHYED LA RE CHEN PO YOD DE KHAS

LEN DE GANG DANG MI MTHUN PAR 'DUG ZER TSOGS GTAM YONG TZAM
BTANG NAS DGE 'DUN NYI SHU NAS BGRO GLENG

PHUL; RANG RGYAL LA ZHUGS GNAS BRGYAD 'THAD GSUNGS PAS, GRAGS
RGYAM PA JA LAS, 'KHOR GSUM

GYI STONG 'UR BYAS, YIG CHA DANG MI MTHUN ZER, YANG NYAN THOG
CIG CHAR BA SRID PA THA MA'I TSE RANG RGYAL LAM

DU 'JUG PA YOD MED DRIS PAS RNAM 'BYOR SPYOD PA'I DBU MA RANG
RGYUD PA'I LUGS LA MED GSUNGS, KHONG GIS

LUNG DANGS PAR DE KUN BTUS LUGS RED GSUNGS PAS, NGAR NGAR BYAS
'KHRAB GIN BZHUGS, DPON SLOB

KYIS DAM BCA' CI 'DRA BYUNG GI BKA' 'DRI GNANG DUS KHAS LEN MI
MANG DANG MI MTHUN KYANG BLO RTZE 'DUG CES

GZUR GNAS KYI LAN PHUL, KUN MKHYEN RNAM THAR BKA' RTZOM DU,
MTSAN NYID STON 'KHOR BON PO'I BSVOO

SGRA DANG, MU TO'I RGYANG 'BOD 'DI GSUM NGES PA CI ZHES ZHAL
RZED DANG, 'DZAM GLING GSAL BYED BCU GNYIS

BDAG PO 'DI, ,SPRIN DANG KHUG SNA RDUL GYI NYES PA YIS, ,MI SDOD
GLING BZHIR CHU SKYES CHU SKYES TSAL BZHAD NA, ,

RGYAL SRAS TSOGS GNYIS CAN RNAMS JI LTAR SDOD, ,CES TSOGS GNYIS
KYI 'DAB GSHOG RGYAS PA'I RGYAL SRAS DPA'

BO MANG POS BYANG NAS BYANG GI RGYUD DU SHER PHYIN SPEL BAR DAM
BCAS PA'I THUGS SMON GYI STENG DU SLEBS PA'I DUS SU

GSUNGS PAS DAD PA'I GNAS SO, ,MDO SMAD DU SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I
ZHABS LA GTUGS, THOS BSAM SGOM

GSUM GYI MDZAD PA LEGS, ME GLANG LA SLAR YANG DBUS SU BYON KUN
MKHYEN GONG MA DANG MJAL, BYANG CHUB

RLUNG 'KHOR GYI KHRID DGOS ZHUS PAS DE RNYING MA'I CHOS YIN,
KHYED DGE BSHES CHEN PO ZHIG GIS CHOS NGO MI SHES

PA AE YIN GSUNGS, 'DI PA THUGS NGAR CHE BAS THOG MAR CHOS 'BREL
TZAM LAS DAG SNANG CHEN PO MED KYANG MDO

SNGAGS KYI LEGS BSHAD NGO MTSAR BA DU MAS THUGS YID RANG DBANG
MED PAR PHROGS PAS MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA THOB

STE 'JIGS BYED KYI BSKYED RDZOGS SOGS CHOS BKA' MANG PO ZHUS, MI
GZHAN LA AA MA AA MA DGE 'PHEL RAB

'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG SANGS RGYAS TSAR 'DUG CES BCOS MIN GYI
BSNGAGS BRJOD MDZAD, SKU 'BUM RGYUD

PA'I KHRIR BZHUGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA GLANG LA DGON 'DI
BTAB ZER, 'CHAD NYAN BTZUGS,

LCAGS BYI LOR SKU 'BUM CHOS GRVAR RGYAL BA SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOR
BGRO GLENG PHUL ZHING, SHING SBRUL LOR KHRI CHEN

SPRUL SKU BSTAN PA'I NYI MA SPYAN DRANGS TE ZLA BA GCIG GI RING
DBANG RJES GNANG KHRID LUNG MANG PO GSAN 'DUG PAS

SKU TSE RING PO BZHUGS 'DRA, DE'I SPRUL SKU GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN
RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I LCAGS KHYI LA SGO ME@212	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

LCANG RA'I MGON KYAR 'KHRUNGS, SKU 'BUM DU CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, DE
KA'I RGYUD PA DPON SLOB MDZAD, KUN

MKHYEN 'JIGS MED DBANG PO SOGS LAS CHOS BKA' GSAN BZHES DANG,
KUN MKHYEN SKU 'BUM KHRI BRJE MTSAMS

SA BYI NAS LO BCUR GDAN SA MDZAD DE ZHE BRGYAD PA ME BYA LA
GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU MGON KY'A CHOS BSTAN 'DZIN

RGYA MTSO CHU BZANG DGON PA'I NYE 'DABS SU RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM
PA'I SA KHYI LA 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PA

LA CHU BZANG GONG MA LAS RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS, SKU 'BUM CHOS GRVAR
ZHUGS, BSDUS TSAD LA THUGS GNYER

DANG; NYER GNYIS PA LA AA RIG DGE BSHES LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS
BSGRUBS, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL BKA' 'GYUR

BA 'JIGS MED RAB RGYAS LAS BKA' 'GYUR LUNG GSAN, YUL DBUS BKRA
SHIS SGO MANG DU, MDUNG NAG

ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG BLO GSAL YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN GZHUNG LA
SBYANGS, BSHES GNYEN DU MA LAS GDAMS

PA MTHA' YAS PA GSAN, NYER BDUN PA SHING BYI LA RANG YUL DU
PHEBS RGYUD GRVAR SNGAGS LA GSAN SBYONG MDZAD,

NYER DGU BA ME STAG LA SKU 'BUM RGYUD PA DPON SLOB DANG, SO LNGA
PA RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI BA'I CHU SPREL LOR TSOGS

CHEN KHRIR BZHUGS, SPYI CHOS YONGS GRAGS LA BDE GSANG 'JIGS
GSUM, MI 'KHRUGS PA, TSE DPAG

LHA DGU'I DBANG CHEN SOGS DANG, SGRUB THABS RIN 'BYUNG, SNGAR
THANG BRGYA RTZA, BA RI BRGYA RTZA,

MGON CHEN BCU GSUM SOGS KYI RJES GNANG, PAn CHEN GSUNG 'BUM SOGS
SGER CHOS MTHA' YAS PA BSTZAL,

MTHUN RKYEN GYI NOM PA GNANG STE NYID KYI GDAN SA MCHOD RTEN
SKIS DGON RNYING SRID PA CHAGS PA'I LHA DGU'I NANG

TSAN DU GRAGS PA SGO RTZE'I BRAG RTZAR GNAS SPOR, GTZUG LAG
KHANG RTEN DANG BRTEN PAR BCAS PA RMAD DU BYUNG BA

BZHENGS; SPROS BCAS KYI THUGS DAM LA 'GRUS, SDOM KHRIMS SHIN TU
DAG CING BKA' GDAMS RNAM THAR

GTZANG MA LHUR BZHES TE DBEN PA'I GNAS SU SGRUB PA SNYING BOR
MDZAD PA ZHIG YIN SNANG, DE'I SPRUL SKU SGO ME KA ZHAR

DPON TSANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI BA'I SA
KHYI LA 'KHRUNGS PA GDAN SAR BZHUGS, GONG

MAS MKHYEN PA'I DGON PA GRVA BA SUM BRGYA LA MDZOD NAS PHOG
THON, SGO MANG GI YIG CHA'I STENG NAS 'CHAD NYAN

SKYONG ZHING, DPYID CHOS DANG PO, DPYID CHOS GNYIS PA, DBYAR
CHOS RNAMS ZLA CHOS DANG, TSO BA

BZHI'I RES KYIS DBYAR GNAS KYI RING CHOS THOG  DPYID CHOS GSUM
PA, STON CHOS DANG PO DANG, GNYIS PA,

DGUN CHOS RNAMS BCO LNGA'I CHOS THOG  GRVA BA RES MOS 'KHOR BA'I
LNGA MCHOD CHOS THOG ZHAG NYER LNGA, GCIG

PA DANG DRUG PA'I SMON LAM, LO RNYING LCAGS MKHAR, LNGA MCHOD
DANG GCIG PA'I SMON LAM LA 'CHAM DANG GOS

SKU; ` SPYI BLA BRANG GI MGON PO'I GTOR SGRUB SOGS CHOS SPYOD
LEGS, ` BLA BRANG DU 'JAM DBYANGS KUN

GZIGS KYI SMAN SKU CHE BA, BKA' 'GYUR, CHOS SKYONG MGON PO
BSTEN, 'DU KHANG PHUG TU GNAS BRTAN

SMAN SKU, RJE'I SKU GSAR BZHENGS, BYAMS SKU THOG TSAD, BKA'
'GYUR TSAR GNYIS, STENG SHOD

LI MA KHANG DU TZAN DAN JO BO, SMAN BLA BDE GSHEGS BRGYAD, JO
SKU, KARMA ROL BA'I RDO RJES BZHENGS

PA'I BDE MCHOG BYIN CAN, MGON KHANG DU LHA MO DANG, GNAS CHUNG
ZHAL THANG BYIN CAN SOGS BZHUGS,

@213	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

` SGAR KHAG LA, STAG PHYUG SKU THOG DANG PO TSE 'GU STAG PHYUG
TU 'KHRUNGS, 'BRAS BSAM BLO PA 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO

BYA KHYUNG KHRI LA BZHUGS MKHAN DE YIN 'DRA, KA ZHAR TSANG SKU
PHYOGS DGA' LDAN PA, GONG MA SKU 'BUM RGYUD PA'I

KHRIR BZHUGS, SKU THOG 'DI PA MGON KY'A SPRUL SKU'I YAB DANG SKU
MCHED, NIS LUNG GONG MA NGAG DBANG CHOS

GRAGS SKU 'BUM RGYUD PA'I KHRIR BZHUGS, KUN MKHYEN BAR MA SKU
'BUM KHRIR BZHUGS SKABS BDE LAM GYI KHRID

SEMS BSKYED MCHOD PA DANG BCAS PA, 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS SKOR, SNAR
THANG BRGYA RTZA'I RJES GNANG LUNG

BCAS; BDE MCHOG SNGAGS BTU, DBEN SA BKA' 'BUM, BKA' GDAMS GZHUNG
DRUG CHOS

CHUNG BRGYA RTZA SOGS GSAN PAR GDAN RABS SU GSUNGS, GZHAN DBON
PO ZHIG GI SPRUL SKU BCAS BLA BRANG GCIG

TU BLA MA GNYIS BZHUGS, NIS LUNG SNGAGS RNAMS PA NO YON CHOS
RJE, 'DI THAMS CAD LA SKYE RGYUD YOD CING

GDAN SA MDZAD, SKU 'BUM DU YANG, MGON KY'A, STAG PHYUG  NIS
LUNG, DGA' LDAN PA RNAMS

LA SGAR BA YOD, PHYIS SU CHU BZANG RIN PO CHE'I SKU TSAB DKA'
BCU 'JAM DBYANGS SHES RAB, MDO BA MKHAN

CHEN BLO BZANG DBANG PHYUG RGYA MTSO, SKU 'BUM KHRI PA MTSAN
SGROGS SPRUL SKU RGYUN RING DANG, SGO ME SKU 'BUM

LHA RAMS PAS KUN MKHYEN BLO RTAGS RTZI BZHAG LA BTANG STE 'DZIN
GRVA GSAR DU BTZUGS, AAN JA SU ZHABS

DRUNG 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN 'DZIN NYI MA, DRED KHOG ZI LING SGAR
DPON TSANG GI DGE BSHES, DA LTA STAG

PHYUG SPRUL SKUS 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD, ` MCHOD GZHIS TSE DGU SDE
LNGA, SGO ME GA-YU TSA, KA ZHAR SDE BDUN,

LCANG RA SDE LNGA, RMA KHAR HOR KY'A BCAS DANG, 'DI DANG NYE BAR
KUN BZANG SNYAN GRAGS RGYA MTSO'I BZHUGS

GNAS TING KY'A RI KHROD YOD, ` DGON PA'I GA-YAS KYI LUNG PA'I
PHUR HOR LDING RI KHROD NI, 'BRAS 'GAG SHING

PA HOR LDING SGOM CHEN BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BTAB, 'DIS
SKYID GRONG DU YONGS 'DZIN ZHABS LA GTUGS,

RANG YUL DU DGON RI KHROD GNYIS KAR GNAS BCU'I PHYAG MCHOD
BTZUGS, KUN MKHYEN BAR MA'I THUGS ZIN

GYI SLOB MA YIN, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN
SKU 'BUM RGYUD PA'I KHRIR BZHUGS, DA LTA MGON

KY'A BLA BRANG DANG NANG GCIG GIS DGON PA SKYONG, ` GZHAN HOR
KY'A DGON SOGS KYANG YOD SNANG, SGO ME

STOD SMAD KYI MTSAMS SU SBOM RA'I SRING MO ZO DGU GA-YANG MTSO
PHYUG MO YOD, ` SGO ME GONG MAR KHAM RIS SKU THOG

GONG MAS BTAB PA GSANG SNGAGS BDE CHEN GLING BAR SKABS SU KUN
MKHYEN 'JIGS MED ZHABS LA PHUL BA 'DZIN

BDAG MDZAD, BYANG KY'A BLA MA SOGS TSANG MAS ZHUS TE BCA' YIG
BSTZAL, MGRON GNYER DKA' BCU SHES

RAB RGYA MTSO SKU TSAB TU MNGAGS, DES DNGUL SRANG BZHI BRGYA
SKOR GYI RGYU SBYAR LA BRTEN 'JIGS BYED SGRUB MCHOD

TSUGS; CHOS MDZAD RAB 'BYAMS PA BKRA SHIS SOGS BLA MA RIM BSKOS
KYIS BSKYANGS PAS DUS 'KHOR SGRUB

MCHOD; LNGA MCHOD, SMON LAM SOGS NGOS GTZANG YOD, MUG TUN DU
SKYES PA'I RGYA BAN THEG CHEN BKRA

SHIS 'KHYIL GZHUNG GSAR BAR DU SLOB GNYER BYAS, KUN MKHYEN MCHOG
NAS SGO MER SONG GSUNGS PA BZHIN

'DI NGOS SU PHEBS TE SKYO SHAS SHUGS 'BYUNG GIS SMYUNG GNAS SOGS
DGE SBYOR GYI TSUGS SHIN TU LEGS PAS THEG

@214	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

CHEN SMYUNG GNAS PA ZHES MIG LTAS BYED SA ZHIG BYUNG, ` DPON
SLOB GSER KHANG PAS MTSAMS KHANG BRTZIGS PA

LAS CHAGS PA CHOS LUNG GSER DGON, ` SHUGS CHU RI KHROD, ` CHU
TSAN DANG NYE BAR BAD KHOR RI

KHROD; ` GLANG MA'I CHU 'GRAM DU, STONG 'KHOR 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN
'DZIN RGYA MTSOS ME KHYI LOR BTAB PA

BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING GRVA GRANGS BRGYA BRGAL, MCHOD GZHIS TSO
BRGYAD KYI RONG 'BROG MANG, 'DI'I NUB NGOS

SU SHA RA HO THO'I MKHAR, DE DANG NYE BAR SNGAR KONG JO BOD DU
PHEBS SKABS YUL LA THUGS 'PHRENG BA'I TSUL

GYIS LAM DU CI 'GOR MDZAD DUS BLON PO MGAR GYI 'PHRUL LAS YAB
YUM GYIS GSER DNGUL GYI NYI ZLA'I DOD PHUL BA

GZIGS 'BUL ZHUS PAR GRAGS PA NA RA SA RA'AM RDO NYI ZLA YOD, `
RMA CHU'I KHUG SO NUB NGOS NA AA RIG GI SA CHA

YOD CING, 'BRONG BA RDO RJE'I BU AA RIG DANG, PAD MA DBANG DRAG
BLA MA MGON SPRUN GSUM GYI SNGA MA RMA

CHEN GANGS BSKOR LA SONG SKABS AA YIG RIG PAS MI RGYUD LA MING
DE LTAR GRAGS  PHYI MA GNYIS KYI RGYUD PA NYAN TSO

RU BA DAG YIN ZER BA SNANG LA, YANG CHU NAG GA-YA' SNGON GYI
RDZA 'DABS SU GZHI BDAG GI BU ZHIG SKYES PAR AA

RIG BANDER GRAGS PA DBANG PHYUG ZER, DPA' RTZAL MI PHAL BA DANG
MI 'DRA BA BYUNG, DE'I BU DGU YOD PA'I

MI RGYUD LAS AA RIG TSO DGU BYUNG BA DENG SANG DUD STONG LHAG
TZAM YOD PA 'DI YIN ZHES BSHAD, RGYAL BA BSOD

NAMS RGYA TSO'I RNAM THAR TU, AAG CHEN THANG NAS LAM BDE BA ZHIG
LA RIM GYIS PHEBS SKABS RMA CHEN SBOM RA'I

RGYUD DU GRAGS PA'I DPON SANGS RGYAS SKYABS GA-YOG 'KHOR DANG,
GZHAN YANG SKYE BO'I TSOGS DU MA DANG BCAS

TE BSU BA LA 'ONGS, DPON GYIS YE SHES KYI SPYAN DNGOS SU MTHONG
ZHES GSUNGS LA, AA RIG DKAR PO THANG

DU BZHUGS SGAR BTEGS SKABS, RTA STONG PHRAG DANG PHYUG KHRI TSOR
NYE BA'I 'BUL BA, 'JA' 'OD KYI GUR

DANG LHA'I ME TOG GI CHAR BABS, SKYE BO MTHA' DAG LA THAR BA'I
SA BON BSKRUN, LNGA PA CHEN PO YANG GDAN

DRANGS TE DKAR PO THANG DU, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BSOD NAMS RGYA
MTSO'I BZHUGS KHRI'I STENG NAS SOG BON GYI

KHROM CHE BAR THUGS RJE CHEN PO PHYAG BZHI BA'I RJES GNANG
GNANG, AA RIG RNAMS KYIS RTA BRGYAD BRGYA, GSER

ZHO LNGA BCU SOGS KYI 'BUL BA, YOL KOR GYI SGAR BTEGS NAS BYIN
RLABS ZHU BA'I 'TSANG KA DANG, DE NAS

RIM GYIS PHEBS PAS SKYE RGU PHAL CHER RAB BYUNG GI RTAGS TZAM
'DZIN PA LA YANG MOS PA CHER BYED 'DUG PA CHOS RGYAL

MES DBON GYI MDZAD PA GNAS 'PHOS PAR SNANG ZHES GSUNGS, HANG
NGE'I GZHUNG LAS KHYUNG THOD DANG NYE BAR AA

RIG STOD PA BRGYA SKOR LA GDUGS DKAR RJES GNANG MDZAD TSUL
SNANG, GUNG AURGE ZER BA'I GCONG GZAR

GZUG SHIN TU CHE BA NGOS DANG, YA MA THU'I CHU RNAMS KYANG LHO
NGOS RMA CHUR 'BAB, ` HANG NGE'I GZHUNG DU,

PHUN TSOGS RNAM RGYAL GLING 'DUS SDE DANG BCAS PA GSAR BSKRUN
GYI RAB GNAS SA STAG LOR RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS

RGYA MTSOS MDZAD, DGON PA'I ZHAL BKOD GNANG, 'DUS SDE'I SLOB
DPON CHOS RJE BRTZON 'GRUS BZANG

PO BSKOS PAR GSUNGS PA SKU 'BUM DU CHOS SDE GSAR BTAB KYI SLOB
DPON DE YIN 'DRA, SKU 'BUM GDAN

RABS SU BRTZON 'GRUS RGYAL MTSAN BZANG PO GSUNGS, SNGON DUS
BSHAD SGRUB KYI SROL CHES CHER DAR BAS SKAL

@215	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG DU, SNGON TSE CO NE'I YER BA DANG, ,MEN JU'I
CHOS SDE CHOS RDZONG DANG, ,MDZO MO MKHAR

DANG BIS MDO DANG, ,HANG NGE BYA MDO'I DGON SOGS SU, ,MDO SNGAGS
BSHAD GRVA YUN RING DAR, ,

ZHES GSUNGS LA DA LTA BTZUN PA RE GNYIS SDOD PA'I DGON CHUNG
ZHIG YOD, BEE SER DU, AAS DPAL NO YON

GYI SA CHAR BSHAD PAS, DES RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO LAN KHA
SHAS RANG GNAS SU GDAN DRANGS, KHANG

PA KA DRUG MA TZAM GYI RGYA GUR GYI NANG DU DAR ZAB RIN PO CHE
SOGS KYIS BKANG BA DANG, RTA SGA SRAB DANG BCAS

PA STONG PHRAG TZAM, SPU NAG LUG SOGS GRANGS MED LTA BU DANG, DO
DAM PA DUD CHEN BCU PHRAG TZAM PHUL,

HOR ZLA BCU GCIG PA'I GRANG NGAD KYI SKABS RJE DE NYID KYI ZHAL
GYI RLANGS PA LAS ME TOG PAD MA DKAR PO ZHIG BYUNG

BA'I STENG AA YIG ZHIG 'DUG PA GSAL BAR MTHONG, SPOS KYI DUD PA
NAM MKHA' LA GDUGS LTAR PHUB PAS YA

MTSAN PA BYUNG, ` MKHON STON RNAM THAR TU, RMA CHEN SBOM RA'I
MGUL GYI KHREB CES BYA BA'I SA NAS 'JIGS

BYED KYI RNAL 'BYOR BA SH'AKYA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DBUS SU 'ONG BA
LA BAR CHAD MED PA'I DON DU ZLA BA GSUM MTSAMS

BCAD; LHA LA GSOL BA BTAB PAS MTSAMS GROL KHAR MYUR DU 'GRUL
TSAN MANG PO 'GYOGS, BYAMS CHEN

CHOS RJE'I SKU SKYE DANG MJAL, DON 'GRUB CES LUNG BSTAN, DBUS SU
PHYIN, SE RA'I MANG JA BSKOL

BA'I DUNG GTONG KHAR RMI LAM DU, DA NANGS KHYOD KYI BLA MA BYAMS
CHEN CHOS RJE'I SKU SKYE LA MJAL YONG, SEMS

DGA' BAR GYIS ZER, SPOS BSKOR LA PHYIN PAS, RJE 'DI MTHONG MA
THAG RMI LAM DU BYUNG BA DANG 'DRA ZER

NAS DGA' ZHING CHOS DU MA DANG, BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SLOB DPON ZHUS
PAR BSHAD PA DE LA 'DIR LHO BA'I GCOD

PA SGRUNG ZER, 'JIGS BYED KYI RNAL 'BYOR BAR YONGS SU GRAGS, MI
GCIG GRIR SHI BA 'DRER SKYES,

DES SKYES PA BUD MED MANG PO'I SEMS DKRUGS TE SMYO BA DANG, GRIR
SHI BA GRANGS MANG BYUNG, LAN GCIG

BUD MED GCIG SMYOS PA GCOD PA'I RTZAR KHRID PA BROS TE SDONG
BO'I RTZE DANG, BRAG GA-YANG 'GRIM PAS MA ZIN,

SGRUNG LA ZHUS PAS, DE MA SHI THABS MED GSUNGS, NAN GYIS ZHUS
PAS GANG NA 'DUG LTOS ZER, BRAG GA-YANG

MIS MI THAR BA ZHIG TU SDONG BO CHIG SKYE CIG GI RTZER SNANG
TSUL ZHUS PAS MTHONG SAR PHEBS, PHAt GCIG BRGYAB

PAS SDONG BO DANG BUD MED MNYAM DU BRAG RTZAR LHUNG, YANG GCOD
PA ZHIG GIS NAD PA ZHIG RI GNYAN GNAS SAR

KHRID PAS, RMI LAM DU, RGAD PO AAG TSOM CAN ZHIG BYUNG NAS,
KHYOD 'DRA BA LA NGAS RKANG PA BRKUMS MI

YONG; YANG 'DIR SGRUNG MI YONG BA GYIS DANG NGAS NAD PA KHYOD LA
BYIN CHOG ZER BA BYUNG, PHYI NYIN LAM SGUGS

KYIS SGRUNG LA THUG DER PHEBS RGYU NGO CHEN GYIS BSHOL BAS YONG
GSUNGS TE RTZAS PAR GANG BREGS TE BSNAMS PHYIR

PHEBS; DE'I DGUNG MO RMI LAM DU RGAD PO BYUNG BAR AAG TSOM MI
SNANG ZER, DA LTA MTSO SNGON DU YOD PA'I AA

RIG LHO BA HU THOG THU 'DI'I SKYE RGYUD YIN, ` RJE'I DNGOS SLOB
MEN JU CHOS RJE DPAL LDAN BKRA SHIS DBUS

PHEBS ZHIG GI SKABS, RVA RGYA NAS RMA CHU LA GRUB RGYAB STE THON
MTSAMS, BON PO RGAN PO LO DRUG CU BRGAL BA

ZHIG BYUNG, RGYANG NAS PHYAG BTZAL TE BSKOR BA BYED PA LA, DRUNG
'KHOR ZHIG GIS, NGED BAN DE TSO CIG

@216	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

YIN; KHYOD BON POR SNANG BAS 'DI BZHIN BYED PA CI YIN DRIS PAR,
NGA BON PO'I DRANG SRONG ZHIG YIN,

SBOM RA'I MGUL DU LO DGU'I BAR DU BSGRUB PA BYAS, DENG SANG RI
BRAG GCIG NA YOD, ZHAG 'GA'I SNGON RMA

CHEN 'KHOR BCAS BAR SNANG GANG BAR BYAS NAS BSU BA LA LANG SONG,
DA LTA JA THER DKAR PO 'DI LA BSKOR BA

BYED CING 'DUG BLA MA 'DI SKYES BU DAM PA ZHIG YIN THAG CHOD,
MJAL KA DANG CHOS 'BREL GCIG ZHU BA YIN,

DE MA GTOGS PA'I SHES 'DOD CI YANG MED ZER, SGAR TSIGS GSUM GYI
BAR DU NYIN RE BZHIN PHYAG DANG BSKOR

BA BYED CING BSKYAL, SKU 'KHOR TSOR BLA MA 'DI LA THA MAL BA'I
SEMS MA SKYED, SANGS RGYAS KYI 'DU SHES SKYED

LA MNYES PA SGRUBS SHIG CES ZER NAS RANG GNAS SU SONG BAR RNAM
THAR TU BSHAD PAS DE LTA BU'I BAN BON GYI GRUB

THOB DANG, RNAL 'BYOR BA MANG DU BYUNG BAR MNGON, YUL MI RNAMS
RANG BZHIN GYIS DAD PA CHE BAS LHA SA'I

JO BOS GSUNG BYON PA DANG, RGYAL BA RIN PO CHE SPYAN RAS GZIGS
DNGOS SU SNANG BA BYUNG BA'I LO RGYUS YA MTSAN

PA MANG LA, KUN GZIGS LNGA BAS KYANG, DKAR BO THANG DU 'BOD PAR
AA RIG CES, ,DUS KUN GA-YO

MED BRTAN PA'I DUD GUS MTHU, ,LHUN PO 'BUM GYIS MTSON MIN KHYAB
'JUG GI ,SHUGS DRAG DPUNG GI

STOBS KYIS 'PHROG NUS MIN, ,ZHES GSUNGS LA, DA LTA SA GANG DU
YANG SNGA DUS KYI STENG NA YOD PA DKON

PAS AA RIG DGE BSHES KYIS, SNGAR AA MDO'I SNOD BZANG, BOD KYI
CHOS BZANG BAS SNOD BCUD 'DZOMS

PA RED, DA LTA AA MDO'I DUG GSUM GYI STENG DU BOD PA'I DUG GSUM
GYI SNOD KHA BRGYAB PAS YAG PO MI 'DUG

GSUNGS PA YANG GO DGOS PA ZHIG SNANG, DA DUNG YANG SA GZHAN LA
BLTAS NA 'BYOR BAS BRGYAN CING RANG BZHIN

DRANG BA DANG DAD PA CHE GRAS SU SNANG NGO, ,SNGON DUS AA RIG
CHU TSAN YAN CHAD NAS RMA CHEN GANGS RI AA CHEN

GANGS RGYAB BAR DU 'BROG RU YOD LA, DPON RGYUD MA CHAD PAR YOD
PA PHYIS RGYA 'OG TU CHUD PAS DPON 'PHRIN

LAS RGYA MTSO DANG, MKHAS GRUB GNYIS LA BE HU BYUNG, RE RE'I
MNGA' 'OG LA BE JANG LNGA RE ZER, MKHAS

GRUB SHOG BE JA NGA BLO BZANG TSE RING DUS AA RIG SDE MANG RMA
LHO RGYUD DU 'ONGS, GTZANG AA RIG PA GTZANG GLU BA RGYAL

'BUM SKOR SNGAR NAS YOD PA DANG 'BREL TE BSDAD, DER RVA NGAN
GYIS GTZES PAS RMA CHU LHO GSHI STOD SMAD DU

CHAGS; TSE RING BU DBANG PHYUG DUS MGO LOG GIS BCOM PAS SLAR
MTSO KHAR SONG, DE'I BU MCHOG LDAN

YIN; ` AA RIG PHO SKOR DGE BSHES BYA BRAL NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS
CHUNG DUS NAS DBUS SU PHEBS, RVA STOD

DU YUN RING SBYANGS PAS RNAM 'GREL LA DUS THOG DER SE 'BRAS DGE
GSUM NA 'GRAN ZLA MED, KUN MKHYEN BAR

MA LAS LO KHA KYIS RGAN KYANG DAD 'DUN GYIS DGE RGYAN DU BSTEN,
STAR KHA'I BAG PHOR GNANG BA RTEN DU

MDZAD DE NGA 'BYOR BAS MI PHONG BA 'DI'I DRIN GSUNGS GZHAN LA
YANG MJAL KHA 'JOG MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG DGE

LEGS KYI 'PHROR SGO MANG MKHAN PO'I 'OS SU THAMS CAD LA RE BA
CHE YANG HAR LDONG KHAMS TSAN GYIS KHUR BLANGS PAS

SKAL BZANG DNGOS GRUB LA BYUNG, RANG YUL DU THON NAS BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL DU YANG YANG PHEBS TE KUN MKHYEN MCHOG

LAS LTA MGUR 'GREL BA TSIG GI SGRON ME'I BSHAD LUNG DANG PHYAG
CHEN KHRID GSAN, 'DI RANG RE LA SHIN TU MKHO

@217	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

GSUNGS TE DUG SBYONG MAN NGAG GCIG BRGYUD MA ZHUS PAR GNANG BA
SMAN YON CHEN POR GYUR, DNGOS 'BUL DANG

DGON PAR MANG 'GYED LAN 'GA' GNANG, THOG MAR NAGS RDO RDZONG NAS
