DGON PA BTAB STE, BSDUS GRVA

BRTZAMS; LEGS PO BYUNG MTSAMS SKU BSNYUNG, MTSAN NYID BZHAG STE
BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS, KUN

MKHYEN MCHOG LA GSANG 'DUS DBANG ZHUS, GSER RDO TSAD LNGA, MAR
RGYA MA STONG PHRAG BDUN DANG, MDZO

SGA THAG CAN BRGYA SOGS DNGOS 'BUL GTOS CHE, GRVA TSANG DU RGYUD
MTSAN NYID GANG BTZUGS NA LEGS ZHUS PAR

MTSAN NYID BTZUGS NA LEGS, YUN RING GNAS, MING LA DGA' LDAN CHOS
'KHOR GLING THOGS GSUNGS,

DENG SANG DGON PA MTSO SNGON GYI STOD DU YOD PA LA AA RIG GUR
SGAR ZER, GRVA TSOGS BZHI BRGYAR NYE ZHING MDO'I

'CHAD NAN LEGS BYA BRAL BSOD NAMS KYI DGE PHRUG GZUNGS SHUL DGE
BSHES BYAMS PA DAR RGYAS DBUS

NAS PHEBS TE ZHAL 'DZOMS SKABS BSOD NAMS PA NAS BYAMS PA LA KUN
MKHYEN MCHOG GIS YONGS 'DZIN RIN PO

CHES SKYES BU DAM PA DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' CHEN PO YIN,
KLONG RDOL BLA MA RTOGS PA MTHO, GRUB CHEN

YIN; BYIN RLABS CHE GSUNGS TSUL DE'I DGE PHRUG SNANG LUG BLA MA
RNAM RGYAL ZER, DES GUR SGAR ZHIG BTAB

PA RBA NAG GIS BCOM, NYID KYIS RVA RGYA DGON 'THEN PA LAM BAR
NAS RTA DANG BCAS PA GA-YANG DU LHUNG,

KHRI CHEN SPRUL SKU BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS, AA RIG RAB 'BYAMS PA
MKHAS BTZUN LA 'BRONG THA'I MDOR DGON PA

'DEBS DGOS TSUL BKA' GNANG, SA PHYOGS DER SNGAR YANG 'GA' ZHIG
GIS DGON 'DEBS PA'I STA GON

BYAS KYANG, GZHI BDAG NAG PHYOGS PA'I STABS LUS PA'I RGYU MTSAN
ZHUS PAS, GZHI BDAG LA GTOR MA DANG

'PHRIN BCOL GNANG BAS RI CHEN PO ZHIG 'DUG PA'I NANG NAS 'BRUG
SGRA LTA BU'I SGRA CHEN ZHIG YUN RING DU GRAGS PA

DER 'KHOD TSANG MAS THOS ZER 'DUG MNGA' RIS HU THOG THU'I SPRUL
SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS AA RIG PHO

SKOR DU 'KHRUNGS, THOG MAR GTZANG SGAR DANG DE NAS DBUS SU
PHEBS, KUN MKHYEN SKU DBON DKON MCHOG

SENG GE DGE RGAN DU BSTEN, RGYAL BA 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSOS HU THOG
THU'I CHO LO DANG, SHING NAGS BLA MAR

BSKOS; DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS DA LTA BZHUGS
SHING DGON SDE 'DZIN SKYONG MDZAD, ` HANG

NGE BYA MDO'I DGON DANG NYE BAR SPEL THANG DU, TZA RI DANG BYIN
RLABS MNYAM PAR GRAGS PA'I GNAS CHEN BRAG

DKAR SPEL RDZONG NI, DE'I DKAR CHAG 'BRI KHUNG DBUR SMYON CHOS
KYI GRAGS PA, MTSAN GZHAN RIG 'DZIN

DKON MCHOG BSTAN SKYONG BZANG POS KAR MA'I GSUNG RGYUN BZHIN
BSGRIGS PA LAS, MA 'ONGS SNYIGS MA LNGA YI

DUS; ;SLOB DPON PAD MA 'BYUNG GNAS NYID, ,KHRI GSHOG RGYAL MO'I
MTSO LA PHEBS, ,MTSO MTHA'

GA-YER MO THANG GI DKYIL, ,DAM SRI SPUN DGU DAM LA BTAGS, ,BLA
GTER CHOS GTER MANG DU SBAS, ,

GNAS SGO CHOS SGO GSAL BAR MDZAD, DE NAS SROD DANG THO RANGS LA,
,SRIN PO KHRAG GI RAL BA CAN, ,

SRIN MO MI SDUG MCHE BA CAN, ,DE GNYIS BCAS PA'I 'DRE SRIN BDUN,
,BROS NAS SPREL RDZONG BRAG LA GNAS, ,

BRAG PHUG SGRUB PA MDZAD PA DANG, ,SLOB DPON DBANG DRAG 'BAR BA
YIS, ,TING NGE 'DZIN LA BZHUGS

@218	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

PA'I TSE, ,SRIN POS BRAG SGO PHA BONG BKAB, ,RDO RJE GSOR BAS
STENG NAS BYON, ,TING 'DZIN THUGS

KYIS NGANG NAS KYANG, ,'DUS MO'I RDZONG GI GA-YON PHYOGS KYI,
,BRAG STOD ME LCE MCHED 'DRA LA, ,BRAG

ZHABS MUN PA 'KHRIGS PA YI, ,MTSAMS SU LDANG NAS YOD PA LA,
,GNAM LCAGS RDO RJE BRGYAB NAS KYANG, ,

THAL BA'I RDUL PHRAN BZHIN DU BRLAGS, ,DE LTAR BSGRAL BA'I RJES
SHUL DANG, ,SRIN PO PHO GDONG MO GDONG

SOGS; ;DA LTA MNGON SUM GSAL BAR YOD, SRIN PO YID KYIS SMON LOG
BRO, ,DE YI DBANG GIS

MA 'ONGS DUS, ,SRIN POS SPRUL BA'I MI RNAMS 'GAS, ,CHOS DANG YI
GE SGROGS PA DANG, ,BSTAN

PA GNOD BYED TSUL 'CHAL RNAMS, ,MI SNYAN SNA TSOGS BYED PA DANG,
,BSHAN PA LAG DMAR YUL 'GA'

PHUNG; ;DE NYID 'DUL BA'I GNYEN PO RU, ,SLOB DPON SPREL RDZONG
BRAG DKAR GYI, ,YANG RDZONG BRAG GI

PHUG TU BZHUGS, ,RDO RJE KLO DKAR PHO BRANG NAS, ,SGRUB PA MDZAD
NAS BZHUGS PA'I TSE, ,LUS PO MI

YI LUS PO LA, ,MGO BO SPREL GYI MGO CAN BYUNG, ,GNAS 'DI'I SRUNG
MA NGA YIN ZER, ,DAM LA BTAGS

NAS BSTAN BSRUNG BCOL, ,DBANG BSKUR DAM BTAGS MTSAN GSOL BA,
,GNYEN SPREL ZLA BA CHEN PO'O, ,

DE NAS PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS, ,MA 'ONGS DAM SRI SRIN PO YI,
,GNOD PA MI 'BYUNG SMON LAM BTAB, ,

GTER KHA LA SOGS MANG DU SBAS, ,BSGRUB PA'I GTOR MA BRGYAB PA'I
TSE, ,ZHABS BROL SOGS MDZAD PA

YI; ;ZHABS RJES BRAG LA MANG DU BYUNG, ,PHYOGS BZHI'I BRAG LA
ZHABS RJES BZHAG ,LUNG GSUM

'DUS PA'I SPREL RDZONG BRAG DKAR 'DI, ,SNGON DUS SRIN PO 'DUL
BA'I GNAS YIN PAS, ,MTHA' 'DUL

GNAS KYI NANG NAS CHE BA 'O, ` ,GNAS MCHOG RDO RJE KLO DKAR GSAL
BA'I NANG, ,RIGS LNGA SA BON DBU

MA RO RKYANG TSUL, ,SKU GSUM YI GE RIGS DRUG SKYE SGO GCOD, ,GU
RU SID RDHI RANG BYON 'BUR DOD BZHUGS, ,

DE'I NANG STOD LA BDE GSHEGS DKYIL 'KHOR KHANG, ,'GRO NA LUS
RGYAN BKROL NAS GOS SRAB GYON, ,MAR ME

DPAL 'BAR BZUNG NAS SONG GYUR TE, ,STENG GI NAM MKHA' DAG LA
MJAL BA NA, ,BDE MCHOG GSANG 'DUS

KYEE RDOR 'JIGS BYED SOGS, ,RGYUD SDE BZHI YI DKYIL 'KHOR 'BUR
DOD BZHUGS, ,DE NAS PHYIR BUD

GA-YON GYI PHYOGS SONG DANG, ,DAG PA SHRI'I SHEL GYI PHUG PA
YOD, ,MAR ME DPAL 'BAR GSAL NAS DER

SONG DANG, DAG PA MKHA' SPYOD DPAL GYI TZA RU TRA, ,MNGON SUM
LHUN GYIS GRUB PA'I GZHAL YAS KHANG, ,

RANG BYUNG 'BUR DU BYON NAS BZHUGS PA LA, ,RONG CHEN BZHI DANG
MTSO BZHI RANG BYON BZHUGS, ,LHA TSOGS

NYIS STONG BRGYAD BRGYA 'BUR DOD BZHUGS, ,RTZE LA MKHA' 'GRO
GDONG CHEN BZHI SOGS GSAL, ,MTHONG

BA TZAM GYIS NGAN SONG SGO MO 'GAGS, ,DE NAS PHYIR BUD SNGAR
LTAR MAR ME DANG, ,SHING RING RTZE LA DPAL

'BAR GSAL BOR BYED, ,GONG DU SONG DANG KHANG BRTZEGS GSUM TSAD
LA, ,BDE GSHEGS THUGS SPRUL

BYA KHYUNG GA RU tA, ,DBU GZENGS BAR SNANG DAG LA 'PHYO BA LA,
,RVA PHRAG YID BZHIN NOR BUS SPRAS PA YI, ,

NOR BU MTHONG BAS DBUL PHONGS SDUG BSNGAL SEL, ,GSHOG PA GA-YAS
GA-YON PHYOGS SU BRGYANG BA LA, ,

@219	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

PHYAG ZHABS MJUG SGRO LA SOGS GSAL BAR BZHUGS, ,MTHONG BA TZAM
GYIS KLU DANG SA BDAG SOGS, ,

GDUG PA'I NAD RIGS KUN LAS GROL BAR 'GYUR, ,KHYUNG GI GA-YAS
PHYOGS SANGS RGYAS STONG SKU BZHUGS, ,

GA-YON PHYOGS 'BRI GUNG 'JIG RTEN GSUM MGON BZHUGS, ,DE YI
GA-YAS PHYOGS PHUG PA'I LOGS NGOS KYI, ,

ZHABS RJES STENG NAS DPAL 'BAR YAR LA BSTAN, ,DKYIL 'KHOR ZHABS
NAS YAR LA MJAL BA DANG, ,

'OG MIN CHOS DBYINGS PHO BRANG NGO MTSAR CHE, ,PHYOGS BZHI DBUS
LNGA RGYAL BA RIGS LNGA BZHUGS, ,DBUS

DANG PHYOGS MTSAMS CHE MCHOG RIGS LNGA BZHUGS, ,'DI LA MTHONG
TSUL SNA TSOGS 'BYUNG BAR 'GYUR, ,

DE YI PHYI LOGS NGOS KYI BRAG NGO LA, ,AU RGYAN PAD MA 'BYUNG
GNAS GSAL BAR BZHUGS, ,DE YI GA-YON

PHYOGS BKA' BRGYAD SGROM BU'I TSUL, ,CHOS 'KHOR GDUGS DANG TOG
GIS MDZES PA LA, ,ZHI KHRO DAM PA

RIGS BRGYA GSAL BAR BZHUGS, ,DE'I GA-YON KHRO BO BCU SOGS GSAL
BAR YOD, ,DE'I GA-YON DPAL

LDAN LHA MO GSAL BAR BZHUGS, ,ZUR GYI PHUGS LA AU RGYAN SGRUB
CHU BZHUGS, ,'THUNG DANG KHRUS BYAS NAD

GDON SDIG SGRIB DAG ,'DI NYID PHUG LA GNAS SGO 'DI GSUM GSAL,
,DE NAS PHYIR THON SGOR SONG GA-YAS

GA-YON GYI, ,SGO 'GRAM PHYI RIM RGYAL CHEN SDE BZHI YOD, ,DE YI
LOGS GCIG GA-YON GYI LUNG PA LA, ,

PHUG SGO SHAR LHO MTSAMS SU LTA BA YOD, ,DE YI STENG NAS YAR
BLTAS MJAL BA NA, ,STAG SGROL THIG LE BRGYAD

CU'I DKYIL 'KHOR BZHUGS, ,SGO NGOS GA-YAS LA GLANG PO RIN CHEN
DANG, ,SGO YI STENG NA JO BO BCU GCIG

ZHAL; ;PAD MA 'BYUNG GNAS BDUD RTZI 'KHYIL BA DANG, ,RJE BTZUN
MI GA-YO LA SOGS GSAL BAR BZHUGS, ,

ZUR GYI NGOS LA TSE DPAG MED MGON DANG, ,RDO RJE PHAG MO LA SOGS
GSAL BAR BZHUGS, ,SGO ZUR YEL

KHA'I TSUL GYIS RDO LA BRDUNG, ,LHA GNAS KUN TU BSGRAG PA'I 'JAL
DANG MTSUNGS, ,ZUR NAS KAS GDONG

GONG LA YAR MJAL NA, ,SPYAN RAS GZIGS DANG CHOS MCHOG GSAL BA
DANG, ,GZA' MCHOG RVA HU LA

NI GSAL BAR YOD, ,GNAS DE'I SGO RNAMS SKABS SHIG DBYE BAR 'GYUR,
,SGO NGOS MTHONG LA MAR BA

LO TZ'A DANG, ,DAM PA SANGS RGYAS PA SOGS GSAL BAR BZHUGS, ,SGO
'GRAM BAR MTSAMS STENG NAS AU RGYAN

GYI; ;ZHABS RJES RDO YOD DE LA GUS PAR MDZOD, ,DE NAS SGRIB KYI
NGOS LA PHUG PA NI, ,ZHAL GYI

SGO PHYOGS BYANG LA LTA BA YOD, ,DER SONG MAR ME DPAL 'BAR SOGS
KHYER NA, ,SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG

GNAS LHUNG BZED LA, ,RGYA YIG RANG BYON MNGON SUM GSAL BAR YOD,
BSKAL BA YAR DAR KHA YAR BSTAN

NAS YOD, ,DE 'OG BSKAL BA BAR SKAGS KHA BZUR YOD, ,DA LTA BSKAL
BA'I SNYIGS MAR SBUB NAS BZHUGS, ,

DUS DANG BSKAL BA'I RTAGS SOGS DE LAS BSTAN, ,DE NAS SONG BAR
GSHONG LA MTSO 'KHYIL YOD, ,DE

YI THUR NAS YAR LA SONG BA'I DUS, ,MKHA' 'GROS PHUL BA'I TSOGS
DANG MCHOD PA YOD, ,DE YI MDUN

NGOS AU RGYAN BZHUGS KHRI'I TSUL, ,DE YI 'OG TU DPAL 'BAR GSAL
BA LA, ,GTER GYI SGROM BU'I STENG DU

GTER YIG GSAL, ,DE NAS PHAR SONG GA-YON PHYOGS LOGS NGOS LA,
,SHEL GYI BRAG LA GA-YU MDOG CHAGS

@220	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

PA YOD, ,DE DKYIL STENG LA SANGS RGYAS SMAN BLA YI, ,BEEd'URYA
YI LHUNG BZED NGOS BZHI'I NANG, ,RIN

CHEN SNA TSOGS SMAN GYIS BKANG NAS KYANG, ,RIN CHEN GSER DNGUL
SGROM BU'I NANG DU RDZONGS, ,RGYA NI RIM

PA BDUN GYIS BTAB NAS BZHUGS, ,REG MTHONG MU GE NAD LAS GROL BAR
'GYUR, ,STENG PHYOGS GA-YON

NGOS RANG BYON 'BUR DOD DU, ,SANGS RGYAS SMAN BLA MCHED BRGYAD
GSAL BOR BZHUGS, ,DUG GSUM

NAS SEL SANGS RGYAS SMAN GYI BLAS, ,BZHI BRGYA RTZA BZHI'I NAD
KUN GROL BAR BYED, ,DE NAS YAR SONG

PHUG PA'I SE NGOS LA, ,PHUG PA CUNG TZAM YOD PA DER SONG DANG,
,PHYOGS RNAMS KUN LA LHA TSOGS RANG

BYON BZHUGS, ,SKYES BU LAS NGAG RNAMS KYIS MTHONG BAR 'GYUR,
,PHAL BA RNAMS KYIS DE NYID MTHONG BA

DKA'; ;DE NAS PHYIR THON GA-YON GYI NGOS PHYOGS NA, ,PHUG SGO
SHAR LHO MTSAMS SU LTA BA YOD, ,

DE LA MAR ME DPAL 'BAR GSAL KHER NA, ,LAM GYI GA-YAS PHYOGS BRAG
GI NGOS LOGS LA, ,DRAG PO PHUR BA

PHUR SRUNG BCU DRUG BZHUGS, ,DE NAS YAR LA RIM GYIS SONG BA'I
TSE, ,GA-YON PHYOGS NGOS LA RGYUS YOD

KYIS BLTAS NA, ,GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG GZHAL YAS KHANG GRUB LA,
,RTA BABS SGO KHANG KA BA BZHI SOGS

GSAL; ;CHOS 'KHOR GDUGS DANG RGYAL MTSAN GSAL BA'I DBUS, ,THUB
PA GNAS BRTAN BCU DRUG

LHUN GRUB BZHUGS, ,SGO 'GRAM RGYAL CHEN SDE BZHI GSAL BAR
BZHUGS, ,PHUG LAM 'DOD 'JO BA YI NU

MA YOD, ,LAS CAN RNAMS LA 'O MA DNGOS SU YOD, ,'GRO BA GANG GI
KHONG DU DE SONG NA, ,TSE 'DI

'DOD PA'I DON RNAMS YID BZHIN 'GRUB, ,DE YI PHUG SONG 'DOM GSUM
BABS MTSAMS NA, ,DBYAR

GYI DUS SU CHU 'KHYIL LAM MI THAR, ,STON DANG RGYUN DU SONG NA
THON TZAM YOD, ,DE NA GNAS SGO GTER KHA

'GA' ZHIG YOD, ,DE NAS PHYIR BUD LAM GYI SGO 'GRAM LA, ,GA-YAS
PHYOGS BAR DO'I 'PHRANG LA 'DZUL

BUD NA, ,PHYI MA BAR DO'I DNGANGS SKRAG ZHI BAR 'GYUR, ,PHAR
TSUR BRAG GI NGOS LA GNAS SGO MANG, DE

RNAMS GTER KHA MANG DU YOD PA LA, ,MJAL BA'I SKAL BA RANG RANG
LAS KYIS SHES, ,SHAR GYI GNAS 'DI'I

SGO LA 'ONG BA'I DUS, ,SGO 'GRAM GA-YAS DANG GA-YON GYI BRAG RI
NI, ,DAR DKAR YOL BA 'THEN 'DRA GNYIS

KYI BAR, ,NAM MKHA' MTHONG TZAM YOD PA'I GA-YAS PHYOGS NGOS,
,LHO NGOS LUNG PA MGO BYANG BSTAN PA YOD,

SONG DANG BRAG KYANG DAR PHYAG 'DRA BA'I GNAS, ,PHUG PA KHA NI
LHO RU BLTA BA YOD, ,DPAL 'BAR GSAL BAR

BYAS NAS MJAL BA NA, ,RGYA BA BYAMS PA NYE BA'I SRAS BRGYAD
BZHUGS, ,DE NAS PHYIR THON LHO PHYOGS

NGOS LOGS SU, ,LAM NGO SHES TZAM YOD PA DER SONG NA, ,NUB PHYOGS
BRAG DKAR DAR PHYAR LTA BU YOD, ,

DE'I NGOS PHUG PA KHA SHAR BLTA BA YOD, ,MAR ME GSAL BAR BYAS
NAS MJAL BA NA, BDE BA CAN GYI ZHING BKOD

GSAL BAR BZHUGS, ,DE YI NGOS LA RANG BYON MANG DU YOD, ,DE PHYIR
SKOR LAM ZHUGS NAS GA-YAS NGOS

LA; ;MTHO RIS THAR BA'I THEM SKAS ZHE DGU LA, ,GOM DOR RE RES
'KHOR BA RGYAB KYIS PHYOGS, ,DER

THON GA-YON PHYOGS BRAG NGOS SPYAN RAS GZIGS, ,RIGS KYI BU KHYOD
BDE BA CAN DU 'GRO, ,ZHES GSUNGS

@221	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

LUNG BSTAN MOS LA GSOL BA THOBS, ,RGYAB PHYOGS SPANG DANG BRAG
GI SGO MTSAMS SU, ,PHUG SGO YOD PA

MAR ME GSAL BYAS NAS, ,BCOM LDAN RNAM SNANG SEMS DPA' BRGYAD
'KHOR BZHUGS, ,DE NAS TSUR THAD

LAM LA 'ONG BA'I DUS, ,BRAG NAG 'JIGS RUNG ZHIG YOD DE YI STONG,
,AU RGYAN PADMA'I ZHABS RJES DNGOS

SU YOD, ,DE NAS BRAG GI GONG NAS YAR SONG NA, ,BRAG STOD ME LCE
'BAR 'DRA YOD GSHAM LA, ,

GSHIN RJE PHO DONG MI DONG 'JIGS PA YOD, 'DRE SRING BSGRAL BA'I
RJES SHUL LA SOGS YOD, ,DE YI SKOR

LAM MTHA' YAS BRAG PHUG GSUM, NGAN SONG GSUM GROL GDON SRI DE LA
'DZUL, ,DE NAS YAR GONG RTZE LA

SONG GYUR NA, ,KHYAD PAR CAN GYI SGRUB GNAS MANG DU YOD, ,PHUG
PA'I DBUS LA AU RGYAN BZHUGS PA LA,

MCHOD BSHAM PHYAG RNGA SOGS KYI RJES RNAMS YOD, ,BRAG DMAR RIN
CHEN SHEL GYI GZHAL YAS KHANG, ,

RIGS LNGA RIGS GSUM DAM PA RIGS BRGYA BZHUGS, ,RANG SNANG DAG PA
RAB 'BYAMS GZHAL YAS SU, ,BKA'

BRGYAD LHA TSOGS BDUN BRGYA NYI SHU BZHUGS, ,PHUG PA GZHAN LA
RIGS LNGA'I ZHING KHAMS BZHUGS, ,LHA

TSOGS BKOD PA DPAG TU MED PA BZHUGS, ,GU RU MTSAN BRGYAD LA SOGS
GSAL BAR BZHUGS, PHYI LA

RIGS GSUM MGON PO'I SNYING BO SOGS, ,RANG BYON YI GE LA SOGS
GSAL BA BZHUGS, ,BSGRUB PA BKA'

BRGYAD DKYIL 'KHOR YONGS RDZOGS LA, ,SGROM BU DGU BSKOR GTER
GNAS MANG DU BZHUGS, ,RGYUS YOD

RNAMS KYIS BLTAS NAS BLANGS GYUR NA, ,SINDHU RA ZHES BYANG SEMS
DKAR DMAR YOD, ,RANG RANG 'DOD PA

GANG DGOS LEN RGYU YOD, ,LO RGYUS GSO RIG BSHAD RGYUD 'GREL BAR
GSAL, ,NUB BYANG MTSAMS SU THAR

LAM THEM PA'I SKAS, ,LAM GSUM BGROD PAS SGRIB GSUM BYANG BAR
'GYUR, ,DE'I THAD SMAD LA GSHIN

RJE CHOS RGYAL DANG, ,DMYAL BA TSA GRANG BDUD SRIN SGRA SKAD
SGROGS, ,BLO GSAL SKYE BOS DPYAD NA GSAL

BAR YOD, ,'GRO DUS THAL MA GYUR BA THEN PAR BYANG, ,GNAS SGO
GA-YON PHYOGS RI ZUR GDA' BA'I

GSHAM; ;SMAN CHU BDUD RTZI RO DRUG NUS LDAN 'BAB, ,'THUNG DANG
KHRUS BYAS YON TAN BCU BDUN STER, ,

NAD GDON SDIG SGRIB 'DAG PAR THE TSOM MED, ,DE NAS RI ZUR PHYAG
RJES LA SOGS DANG, RANG BYON YIG

'BRU RANG GIS BLTAS NA GSAL, ,GA-YAS KYI PHYOGS SU CHU BZANG
BRAG DKAR ZHES, ,PHO RI DPA' BO RNAMS

KYI BZHUGS GNAS YIN, ,LUNG PA GCIG LA RMA CHEN SBOM RA DANG,
,ZHABS RJES GSAL BA MI PHYUGS NAD

RIMS GROL, ,GA-YON GYI PHYOGS NA SPEL MO BRAG CES PA, ,MO RI
DPA' BO RNAMS KYI BZHUGS GNAS YIN, ,

MDUN GYI PHYOGS SU ZHING SKYONG RAL BA CAN, ,GA-YON GYI PHYOGS
SU BTZUN MO BRANG DMAR MA, ,GNYIS PO

BKA' SRUNG ZHING SKYONG YAB YUM YIN, ,ZHES 'BYUNG LA, YIG SKYON
YIN NAM DPYAD MI BZOD PA RE GNYIS

SNANG BA'ANG SOR GNAS SU BKOD CING, ,PHYOGS BZHI MTSO BZHI DANG,
,MTSAMS BZHI LHA RI GNYEN PO

BZHI NANG DU TSUD PA'I PHYI BSKOR, ,BAR SKOR DPAG TSAD GSUM,
,NANG BSKOR DA LTA'I BSKOR LAM 'DI LA

RGYANG GRAGS DRUG GI DBANG DU BYAS PA'I BSKOR TSAN DANG, PHAN
YON SOGS MANG DU BSHAD SNANG YANG TSIG TSOGS@222	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

LA 'DZEMS NAS MA BRIS, DE NAS SGO ME RMA CHU'I RAB RGAN DANG
NYE, BYA KHYUNG MAN DU, LA MO TSANG GI AOB

SO DGON, ` KHA MANG BU RGYUD DGON, ` KA MDO BKRA SHIS CHOS
RDZONG NI, SNGON GYI DGON RNYING ZHIG LA

KUN MKHYEN BAR MA DE NYID KYIS 'DU KHANG DANG, GZIMS KHANG GSAR
BSKRUN GYIS 'DZIN BDAG MDZAD SKABS

THAMS CAD KYIS SA NGAN 'DIR 'DI 'DRAS CI BYED ZHUS PAR AA MDO'I
SA'I NANG GI LHA SA LTA BU DE 'DI YIN GSUNGS

SHING; ;THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHES RGYU MTSAN ZHUS DUS KYANG 'DI SA
SHIN TU BZANG, NGA YANG RJES SOR 'DI

NAS GTAN SDOD CIG BYED BSAM PA YOD CES DGONGS GZHI CAN GYI GSUNG
PHEBS, THUGS RJE CHEN PO LHA LNGA'I

DBANG GNANG SKABS GZIMS KHANG STENG DU 'JA' TSON SNA LNGA DBYIBS
ZLUM PO SOG GUR CHE BA'I TSAD TZAM ZHIG SHAR

BA THAMS CAD KYIS MTHONG, DER 'DUS RNAMS LA TSOGS GSOG SGRIB
SBYONG, NYES SPYOD SNA GCIG SPONG BA TSUN

CHAD KYI DAM BCA' RE BYED DGOS GSUNGS TE THABS MKHAS KYIS DGE
BA'I LAM LA SBYAR BAS BKA' DRIN SHIN TU CHE,

KHRI BA DANG PO MGAR RTZE RAB 'BYAMS PA THOG MAR MGAR RTZE DGON
DU BSDUS GRVA BLO RTAGS PHAR PHYIN BCAS SBYANGS,

MGAR RTZE KHRI RGAN TSANG LA BRTZI BZHAG NYAN, DE NAS BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL DU BSDUS GRVA BLO RTAGS BCAS LA DAM BCA'

RTZE THON BZHAG STE GZHUNG GSAR NAS ZHUGS, DBU PHAR GNYIS KA'I
RING LA 'DZIN GRVA'I SKYOR DPON BYAS,

SLOB GNYER BA'I AANG DANG, KHRIMS GTZANG DANG DGE SBYOR LEGS,
KHA STABS CHE BAS TSOGS 'DU'I RGAN

PA LA BZHAG KYANG SEMS LAD 'GRO ZHES MGYOGS PAR DGONGS PA ZHUS,
MDZOD NAS RGYUD LA PHEBS, SNGAGS

KYI DAM BCA' YANG THON, 'DI KA'I KHRIR BSDAD, LO GSUM NAS DGONGS
PA ZHUS TE GDAN SA RANG DU

LO MTSAMS MANG PO DANG MGAR RTZE'I SHEL DGON DU TSE DANG SGRUB
PA BSNYAMS, DE NAS RNGA BA GRAGS PA GUNG THANG

'JAM PA'I DBYANGS DANG 'DZIN GRVA GCIG DGE BSHES BZANG, GCOD KYI
'GRO PHAN CHE BAS ZA LAR RNAMS

KYANG GUS, DE NAS HOR TSANG SHES RAB, SA RA STOBS LDAN, 'DIS
PHAN THOGS CHE, DA DUNG YANG

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL NAS GDAN SA PA RIM BSKOS KYI MUR YOD, SKU ZHABS
GZIMS KHANG DU BZHUGS MAL DANG,

GDUNG SKAL MCHOD RTEN SOGS BZHUGS, RMA CHU KHA'I RGYA ZHUR SDE
KHROD DU BLA CHEN DGONGS PA RAB GSAL 'KHRUNGS

PA'I NGAG RGYUN SNANG, ` DAN TIG SHEL GYI YANG DGON NI, RGYAL BU
DON GRUB KYI MDO LAS, YUL YA BA'I

RGYAL BO DGE BA'I SRAS RGYAL BU DON GRUB KYIS BAL GYI GLANG BO
CHE RANG GI DGRA ZLA'I RGYAL PO LA SBYIN PAR BTANG BAS YAB

RGYAL POS, RGYAL BU BTZUN MO SRAS, SRAS MO BCAS LO BCU GNYIS
KYI BAR DU RI BO DAN DIG GNAS SU SPYUGS,

RI'I DRUNG NA CHU CHEN PO BRGAL BAS MI THAR BA DANG, RI DE LA
DGE SLONG AA CI TA BYA BA SGOM LA LO BRGYAR GNAS PA

ZHIG YOD PA DANG, GNAS DE NAS KYANG RGYAL BUS RANG GI BTZUN MO
SRAS MING SRING BCAS SBYIN PAR BTANG BA'I

RGYAL BU BDAG CAG GI STON PA DANG, DGE SLONG NI MO'U 'GAL GYI
BU, YAB YUM ZAS GTZANG DANG SGYU 'PHRUL,

BTZUN MO SOGS GRAGS 'DZIN MA SOGS SU GSUNGS PA'I GNAS SU NGOS
'DZIN, YANG NGAS BSTOD ZHIG TU,

SNGON RGYAL BU DRI MED KUN LDAN GYIS, ,LO BCU GNYIS BAR DU SGRUB
PA MDZAD CES DANG, DUNG RI'I GA-YU MTSO

@223	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

RGYAL BU DE'I SPYAN CHAB 'KHYIL BA DANG, BDUD RI HA SHANG YANG
DAN TIG SHAR PHYOGS KYI RI LA NGOS 'DZIN PA SNANG

ZHING; GANG LTAR DANG PO RGYAL BU DON GRUB KYIS BYANG SEMS KYI
SPYOD PA RLABS PO CHE MDZAD PA'I SGO NAS BYIN GYIS

BRLABS; MKHAS PA MI GSUM GYIS BLA CHEN PO BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS,
GNYUG MAR GNAS PA'I THE'I RANG SPUN

DGU BYA BA MI MA YIN STOBS LDAN RNAMS KYIS BLA CHEN PO LA GNAS
PHUL, SBA KHOR YE SHES GA-YU DRUNG SOGS DBUS

GTZANG GI MI BCUS BLA CHEN ZHABS LA GTUGS TE PHYI DAR GYI BSTAN
PA'I DBU BRNYES, BRGYA BYIN SOGS 'DOD PA

KHAMS KYI LHA'I GTZO BOR GYUR BA 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA MANG PO
MTSAN MOR LHAGS TE 'OD KYIS SNANG BAR BYAS, MCHOD

PA BYAS TE CHOS NYAN PAS DE DAG YID TSIMS PAR MDZAD PA'I GNAS
DANG, RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO PHEBS

TE SKU MTSAMS YUN RING DU GNANG, DPAL 'KHOR LO SDOM PA'I ZHAL
GZIGS, BDE MCHOG LHA LNGA'I CHOS TSAN

'GA' ZHIG THUGS RTZOM GNANG, RGYAL BU'I SGRIB SBYONG GI GNAS
DANG, BDE MCHOG GI PHO BRANG YIN ZER BA'I

SGRUB KHANG, GRUB PA'I RGYAL MO'I CHE CHU, PHYAG RDOR GYIS KLU
RGYAL GDUG PA CAN BTUL BA'I GNAS DANG KLU'I

GZUGS RANG BYON, RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I SGRUB KHANG,
'DI'I NANG DU BDE MCHOG ZHAL GZIGS

PAS THUGS 'UR BA LTA BUS BZHUGS MAL NAS BRAG LA BSNYEL BA'I SKU
RGYAB, DBU ZHVA SNE RING BCAS KYI RJES,

BRAG LA PHYAG MDZUB DANG, RDO STENG DU ZHAL DKAR YU RING BCAS
KYI RJES GSAL BAR DOD PA, BYAMS PA RANG

BYON GYI BRAG RI, DGE SLONG AA CI TA'I SGRUB KHANG, MKHAN PO'I
BLA BRANG DU RGYAL BU DON GRUB KYI YANG ZER,

RJE BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I YANG ZER CHIB YOB DANG, ZHABS LHAM DU
GRAGS PA'I RDO, SANGS RGYAS STONG SKU

BZHUGS PA'I MKHAS PA MI GSUM GYI SGRUB KHANG DU BLA CHEN BSNYEN
PAR RDZOGS, AA RIG DGE BSHES KYI MTSAMS

KHANG; JO KHANG, BYAMS KHANG, KLU RGYAL KHANG SOGS BZHI SKOR DU
YOD PA'I 'DU KHANG, GRVA GRANGS

BRGYA LHAG GIS GZHI GSUM GYI PHYAG LEN SKYONG, DAN DIG NAS GNAS
MTHIL DU 'GRO BA'I LAM DU GNAS BRTAN

BCU DRUG SGROL MA NYER GCIG RIGS GSUM MGON PO SOGS RANG BYON DU
NGOS 'DZIN PA'I BRAG RI, LHA

SA'I NANG DU NYI ZLA RANG BYON, 'OD SRUNG GI DUS NAS BZHENGS PAR
GRAGS PA'I LHA SKU SHIN TU MANG PO BZHUGS PA

BLA CHEN RNAM THAR TU, CIG CHAR 'JUG PA'I RNAL 'BYOR BA ZHES BYA
BA DGE BA'I PHYOGS CI YANG BYED PA'I LOG RTOG

CAN MANG BAS DE DAG DGAG PA'I CHED DU LHA KHANG MCHOD RTEN DPAG
TU MED PA BZHENGS, TSON RTZI YANG YUL DER

BYUNG; BZO YANG RANG NYID KYIS MDZAD DE 'DUS BYAS KYI DGE BA'I
RTZA BA LA BRTZON PAR MDZAD GSUNGS PA DE

YIN 'DRA ZHES DPYOD LDAN 'GA' ZHIG GLENG, GNAS MTHIL DU, AU
RGYAN SGRUB KHANG 'DAG SBYAR CAN, MCHOD

RTEN SA LA GANDA, MCHOD RTEN GNAM 'BAB TU GRAGS PA BANG RIM DANG
PAD 'DAB GSAL BAR DOD PA'I BRAG

RI; RGYAL BA GONG MA'I BZHUGS KHRI BCAS DANG, ` THIS PA RI KHROD
NI, SNGON DAR RGYAS CHE YANG DA LTA STONGS

ZHING; BLA CHEN BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI KHA SKONG RGYA'I SLOB DPON
GNYIS KYANG 'DI NAS YIN ZER BA SNANG MOD DENG SANG

BOD YIN NO, ,YANG TIG TU 'GRO BA'I LAS KHAR RGYAL BA'I BZHUGS
KHRI, ` YANG TIG GI GNAS SGO RGYAL BA BSOD

@224	(TZANG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

NAMS RGYA MTSOS GSAR DU PHYE, DER SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS KYI SKU
DANG, BKRA SHIS RTAGS BRGYAD SOGS RANG

BYON MANG DU BYUNG, AU RGYAN GYI ZHAL GZIGS, GTER BSRUNG GTER
DANG BCAS PA'I SNANG BA SHAR TE BRAG

NGOS NAS CHOS GTER DANG, 'CHI MED TSE'I BUM PA'I GTER YOD PA
BZHES RTZIS LA 'GA' ZHIG GIS BRAG GA-YANG

CHE BAS MI 'GAB TSUL ZHUS PAS THUGS 'PHEL GYI DBANG GIS BTANG
SNYOMS SU MDZAD PA RNAM THAR TU GSAL, GZHAN

YANG SPRUL SKU BSOD NAMS YE SHES DBANG BO, RGYAL SRAS DON YOD
CHOS RGYA MTSO, SDE BA CHOS RJE RNAMS PHEBS,

AU RGYAL SGRUB KHANG, TSE CHU BUM PA BKA' 'GYUR RANG BYON DU
GRAGS PA'I BRAG RI YA MTSAN CAN BZHUGS, `

THO'U BA DGON, ` KA THO DGON, THO KYA'I DGON BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN
GLING, ` BIS KYA'I DGON,

DGA' LDAN DAR RGYAS GLING, ` NOR BA DGON, 'DI GSUM KHVA TA'I
KHA'I DGON LAG PHYI MA DA LTA YANG

SMON LAM LA 'GRO, TSE TAN DGON, 'DI DANG DAN TIG SOGS SGAR BA
KHAG DRUG GI 'DZIN BDAG TSE TAN

MKHAN PO DANG ZHABS DRUNG SKU 'PHRENG GIS BYED, SNGA MA BO'U SKU
SKYE DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO, BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN

SOGS RIM PAR BYON PA LAS DA LTA RVA LO THANG NAS 'KHRUNGS PA BLO
BZANG 'JIGS MED RAB BRTAN CHU BZANG DU

THUGS GNYER GYI SKABS LA, SKU THOG DANG PO BO'U TSUL GRAGS PA
YIN NAM SNYAM, PHYI MA STAG GRUB CHEN GYI SKYES

RGYUD YIN ZER, ` GONG KYA'I DGON, 'DI YIN BOD YIN, ` RGYA HOR
GYI SA CHAR, BA JO'I DGON LAG

KHYIS LI ZI'AM SMAN CHU'I DAR RGYAS RI KHROD, MA nI PAS MI 'BRUG
LA BTAB CES BSHAD, ` 'BUM KHANG THANG

DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING NI WA'ANG KY'A DKA' BCU BLO BZANG
BRTZON 'GRUS KYIS BZANG, ` SHANGS BAR ZI,

BKA' MA LOG NI, CHOS RGYAL KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN DANG, DE'I SRAS
BZHI PA KHRI SDE STONG BTZAN RGYAL PO'I SKU RING LA,

MTHA' DMAG DGAG PHYIR BOD YUL GYI PHYOGS BZHIR SGO SRUNG BSKOS,,
BOD DMAG KHRI PHRAG MANG PO KHYER NAS BHA

TA HOR GYI SGOM GRVA BCOM STE GA-YUL RGYAL, GNANG SPYAD NAS
PHYIR BYON DUS DMAG GI NANG NAS SKYEN PO BTUS PA'I

DPA' BO MI DGU, DMAG MANG PO DANG BCAS HOR BOD KYI MTSAMS SU
BZHAG NGED RNAMS CI TZAM NAS LOG

YONG ZHUS PAR, RGYAL PO'I LUNG GIS NGED KYI BKA' MA BYUNG BAR
LDOG TU MED GSUNGS PAS DE PHYIN DPA' BO MI

DGU'I RGYUD PA LA BKA' MA LOG TU THOGS, DER YUN RING BAS BKA' MA
LOG GI BOD 'BROG GIS DE MANG DU BYUNG,

SENG CHEN GYIS BLON PO SANG+GAHA CHING YANG SANG RUS PA BKA' MA
LOG YIN ZER SNANG, DER NAMS KYI CHE RGYUD LAS CHAD PA

SHAR TZONG KHA MTSO SNGON GYIS MTHIL NA YOD PAR BSHAD PA DE'I LE
LAG YIN LA, GNAS 'DIR RGYAL DBANG BKA'

BZHIN SKYAR BO BAS BKOD KHYAB DANG, DAR HAN CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG
DPAL 'BYOR SOGS KYIS STAG LOR BTAB

PA BSAM GTAN DAR RGYAS GLING, BLA MA MI NYAG PA SOGS KYIS 'CHAD
NYAN BTZUGS PA DA LTA YOD, ` ZAN

KHRON PHYAG THO THANG DU, GCAN PHUG RI KHROD, ` AU SHI BRAG NI,
YUL DBUS DANG MTHA' 'KHOB KYI MTSAMS

'DZIN RTZA DRES MA'I RI'AM AU SHI RIR 'DOD MKHAN SNANG MOD MING
MTHUN PA TZAM LA BSAM NA RUNG GI DNGOS LA

GOR RE NA NI 'DUL 'DZIN GONG MA DAG GIS BOD SA TSIGS KYI MTHA'
'KHOB TU NGOS BZUNG STE RNAM BZHAG MANG PO

@225	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

MDZAD PA DANG 'GAL BAR 'GYUR ZHING, RI KHROD BKRA SHIS DAR RGYAS
GLING NI BO'I TSUL GRAGS PAS BTAB PAR BSHAD LA,

DE NI AANG KAR ZHABS DRUNG GI GNAS BSTOD DU, CHES KHYAD 'PHAGS
MKHAS GRUB ZLA MED PA, RJE

SMON LAM BSTAN 'DZIN GRAGS PA ZHES, ,BYANG HOR YUL MUN PA'I
GLING CHEN DU, ,CHOS BSTAN PA'I SGRON

ME SBOR NUS PA'I, ,MGON TSAD LDAN DAM PA DE RU 'KHRUNGS, ,ZHES
BSNGAGS PA LANG SKYA GONG MA'I DNGOS

SLOB SMON RAMS PA BSTAN 'DZIN GRAGS PA DANG GCIG GAM SNYAM, DER
THUB SKU RANG BYON DANG, THUB PA MYANG

'DAS SNANG BRNYAN BZHUGS ZHING, TSOGS KHRO LO RGYUS CAN ZHIG
KYANG YOD, ` AU SHI BRAG DGON CHEN BSHAD

SGRUB CHOS 'KHOR GLING NI, BSAM BLO AA ZHANG MANYDZU SHRIS RGYAL
BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOR LUNG BSTAN ZHUS TE BTAB,

BLA RABS DRUG GI RING DGON PA YAR 'PHEL DU GYUR TE SNGAR SHUL DU
MA SHONGS PAR, KHRI SBYIN PA RGYA MTSO'I DNGOS

SLOB AA ZHANG SHI RE THU DANG B'A BO'I NANG SO GNYIS KYIS RGYAL
DBANG LNGA BAR ZHUS TE DGON PA LUNG PA'I PHUG TU SPOS,

DE NAS THANG RING RIN CHEN SHES RAB, GRO TSANG SHES RAB RIN
CHEN, B'A CU PHUN TSOGS RGYAL MTSAN,

DA SHUG NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS, PHUN TSOGS RGYAL MTSAN, SHI RA
TSUL KHRIMS GRAGS PA, RGYA BLO BZANG

'OD ZER, MDO SMAD NGAG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL, B'A CU LHUN GRUB CHOS
'PHEL, YIG CHA SGO MANG DANG MTHUN

ZHES BEE SER DU BSHAD, AA ZHANG SHI RE THU NI LNGA BA RGYA NAG
TU PHEBS DUS LHA KHANG SER PO'I BLA MA MDZAD MKHAN DE

MO TSAL DGON PA'I GZHI BTING, RGYAL THOG THU, ZAN SPANG ZHABS
DRUNG

RNAMS LA SKYE RGYUD KYANG SNANG, ` KHVA TI KAR, RJE'I DNGOS SLOB
MI DBANG GTZUG NA MDZES PA'I TI SHRI GNYIS

KYI NANG TSAN BYANG BLA MA CHOS KYI RGYAL POS T'A'I MING YE
DBANG RGYAL PO'I TI SHRI MDZAD DE DGON 'DI BTAB, GZHAN

YANG LANG JU'I PHYOGS SU CHOS SDE 'GA' DANG, DBUS SU'ANG BTZUN
MO TSAL DGON PA'I GZHI BTING, RGYAL

PO GSHEGS NAS CHOS LA MI GUS PA'I BLON PO RNAMS KYIS SKU LA
MTSON BSNUN TE BKRONGS PA NA KHRAG 'O MAR BAB CES

GRAGS; RJE RIN PO CHES, RGYAL BA'I DAM CHOS 'DZIN PA'I RGYAL
SRAS MCHOG ,DGONGS PA GSAL DANG

DE SRAS THU BO NI, ,YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN ZHES BYAS SA PHYOGS DER,
,SNGON CHAD BSTAN PA SHIN TU RGYAS MDZAD

NA'ANG; ;DUS KYI DBANG GIS SHIN TU NYAMS PAR GYUR, ,TSUL DE
GZIGS NAS BSTAN PA SPEL SLAD DU, ,

BKA' NYAN GDUL BYA GZHUNG LUGS CHEN PO LA, ,SBYOR BA'I THUGS
KHUR BSNAMS ZHES GLENG BA THOS, ,ZHES

DANG; ;MDO SMAD CES BYA'I RGYAL KHAB DER, ,LHA MI'I BSOD NAMS
ZHING GI MCHOG ,THUB PA'I BRTUL

ZHUGS LEGS ZUNGS NAS, ,LUNG GI BSTAN PA 'DZIN PA'I GZHI, ,CHOS
SDE CHEN PO RNAMS PA LNGA, ,NYID

KYIS LEGS PAR BTZUGS SO ZHES, ,BKA' BSTZAL GSUNG YIG 'PHROD PA'I
TSE, ,YIN NI DGA' BAS

BSKYOD PA LAS, ,SNYING NAS NGO MTSAR CHEN PO SKYES ZHES BSNGAGS
BRJOD DANG, DA DUNG YANG CHOS SDE BTZUGS

PA LNGA BO LA, NGANG TSUGS LA GZHI BYAS PA'I RNAM PAR DAG PA'I
GZHUNG LA THOS BSAM BYED PA RNAMS YAR 'PHEL

DU GYUR NAS, PHYOGS KUN TU SNYAN PA RGYAS PA'I THUGS KYIS BSNYEL
BA MI MNGA' BA'I KHUR CHEN PO BSNAMS

@226	(RTZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

DGOS KYI ZHAL GDAMS BCAS GNANG BA'I YI GE GNYIS BKA' 'BUM THOR
BUR BZHUGS, RJE DBUS PHEBS

SKABS DANG, PHYIS SU YUM GYI ZHU YIG 'BUL MKHAN 'BRI GUNG GI
'PHRIN LAS PA DE YIN PAS YUM LA BSKUR BA'I

ZHAL THANG NGO MA 'DI BAR BZHUGS PA'I NGAG RGYUN 'DUG LA, RJE
SKU GA-YAS GA-YON DU RGYAL TSAB 'DUL 'DZIN BCAS

BZHUGS PA RTZA THANG GZHAN PHAN CHEN MO ZHES PA'I KHA BYANG CAN
RJE RANG GI SHANGS MTSAL GYIS BZHENGS PAR GRAGS PA

DENG SANG MJAL RGYU SNANG, YANG 'GA' RES KU SHRI BSOD NAMS BZANG
POS JO SKU BYIN CAN ZHIG GDAN DRANGS,

GTZUG LAG KHANG GANG DU BZHENGS PAR DGONGS PA'I PHYI NYIN KHA BA
BABS PA'I STENG DU BYIS PA'I RKANG RJES GSAL BA

RJES 'DED KYIS PHYIN PAS TZAN DAN SDONG BO ZHIG GI RTZAR SLEBS,
RTZE MO NA KHVA TA ZHIG SKAD SNYAN PAR SGROGS SHING

KHA NAS CHU GSER SKUD LTA BU DAN DANG LNGA LNGA'I RAM PAR THON
PA'I LTAS BYUNG BAS DER GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG DGON

PA BTAB PAS KHVA TA'I KHAR GRAGS SHING, BSOD NAMS SENG GE DPAL
'BYOR BZANG PO, BSOD

NAMS RIN CHEN, BSOD NAMS DPAL BZANG, BSOD NAMS DON 'GRUB SOGS
KYIS RIM PAR BSKYANGS TE

RTEN BZHENGS MDZAD TSUL, 7 GONG MA RIM BYON GYI BKA' SHOG DANG
RDO RING RNAMS SU GSAL ZER, SUM PAS BYANG

DAR MA'I BZHUGS GNAS PHYIS SU BO'U TSUL GRAGS PAS BZUNG KHVA TI
KA'I MKHAR NANG GI GSANG 'DUS DGON ZHES

BSHAD LA, BEE SER DU, RGYA NAG RGYAL PO HU MA AU LUS DRUNG CHEN
CHOS RGYAL LA T'A KU SHRI'I LUNG LAS DANG DGON

GNAS 'DEBS YUL SHES SU BCUG PA DANG, RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA
MTSO PHEBS TE DGON GNAS BYIN GYIS

BRLABS; MGON KHANG LA RAB GNAS MDZAD, TI KU SHRI BSOD NAMS RTZE
MO LA BKA' GNANG STE SE RA RJE

BTZUN PA'I YIG CHA'I STENG NAS 'CHAD NYAN BTZUGS, GDAN SAR RIM
BZHIN LI KY'A SHES RAB MCHOG LDAN, KHVA

TA'I KA SHES RAB GRAGS PA, LIN THO'I BA 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO,
KHA THIG KA SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN, KA KY'A

SHES RAB RIN CHEN, DGON RNYING SHES RAB YON TAN, 'PHRIN LAS RNAM
RGYAL, KA SKYA SHES RAB MCHOG

LDAN BAR BSHAD LA, RJE SKAL LDAN GYIS KU 'PHONG RAB 'BYAMS PAS
'CHAD NYAN MDZAD BZHIN PA'O GSUNGS,

SDE BA CHOS RJE'I RNAM THAR TU, NANG SO BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I
DGONGS RDZOGS SU, NANG SO BSOD NAMS DON

GRUB DANG, GNYER BA SANGS RGYAS RIN CHEN SOGS DPON GA-YOG RNAMS
KYIS GDAN DRANGS, DRE'U BRGYA SOGS

PHUL; 'DOD CHOS KYI CHAR PHAB, DE KA'I BLA MCHOD PHYAG RDOR GYI
RNAL 'BYOR BA RTZANG BA RAB 'BYAMS PAS CHOS

ZHUS; KHVA TI KA DANG AU SHI BRAG GI RTEN MJAL MDZAD GSUNGS,
KHVA TI KHA'I TSONG DPON GYIS GDAN DRANGS

PA'I RJE GLING 'PHUR MA'I SKU PAR PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES KYI
PHYAG PAR DU GRAGS PA, RI BO PO TA LA'I RDO LA

SANGS RGYAS GTZO 'KHOR GYI SKU RANG BYON, RI BO RTZE LNGA'I RDO
LA MTHONG SNANG SNA TSOGS GZUGS BRNYAN DU 'CHAR BA,

TZANDAN GYI MCHOD RTEN CHE CHUNG LNGA LA SANGS RGYAS STONG GI
SKU BZHUGS PA'I KHYAD 'PHAGS, SANGS RGYAS 'OD SRUNG GI

TSEMS RIL BO BZHUGS PA'I MCHOD RTEN CHEN PO SNGON DUS BZANG
RNAMS SU 'OD 'PHRO BA'I BYIN CAN BCAS RTEN

MANG; ` BKA' 'GYUR BA SPRUL BA'I SKU'I DGON L'A KY'A ZI, ` CANG
KY'A ZI NI SDE BA CHOS RJE'I RNAM THAR TU,

@227	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

KHVA TI KAR PHEBS DUS RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYIS DNGOS SU
RJES SU BZUNG BA'I LI KY'A SLOB DPON SHES RAB

SENG GE RANG GI GZHIS DGON CANG KY'A BRAG TU GDAN DRANGS, GTZUG
LAG KHANG GSAR BZHENGS LA RAB GNAS

DANG; ZAB CHOS MANG DU GSAN PAR GSUNGS PA DER MNGON, ` SMON LAM
HU THOG THU'I DGON, ` GRU KY'A ZI,

` LANG PHAN ZHABS DRUNG GI DGON HU'U KY'A ZI, ` PHE KY'A BLA
MA'I DGON, ` WANG KY'A ZI, ` ZHIN KY'A ZI,

'DI GNYIS WANG KY'A ZHABS DRUNG GIS SKYONG, 'BUM KHANG ZHABS
DRUNG GI DGON MI KY'A ZI, ` KAN KY'A ZI STE

SAMBHIR DGON, 'DI MDZO MO MKHAR LAS LOGS SU CHAD PAR BSHAD
SNANG, ` SENG GE RI KHROD, 'DIR

SPRUL SKU ZHIG BZHUGS, ` MDO BA DGON DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING,
` KAN KY'A DPON GYI DGON, `

HA TZI ZI, ` HAN KY'A ZI, ` 'BUM GLING PHUR RGYA ZA KONG JO YUN
RING DU BZHUGS PA'I BYIN BRLABS KYI

MTSAN MA LAS SGROL SKU RANG BYON DU PHEBS SHING, LHA KHANG GI
PHYI ROL TU SENG LDENG GI NAGS TSAL GYIS MDZES PA,

SNGON YID DGE LUNG PAR BLA MA GRUB CHEN ZHIG BZHUGS PA'I NYE
GNAS KYIS CHU TSAGS GNYI RIM PAR BOR TE THE TSOM

PA'I MUR YOD THOG NANG GCIG KHA BA'I STENG DU RI BONG GI RJES
BAB PA DED PAS BRAG PHUG 'DIR SLEB, SGROL

SKU ZHIG GI DRUNG DU SNGAR GYI CHU TSAGS GNYIS KYANG SNANG, BLA
MA LA ZHUS PAS, KHONG PHEBS TE SGROL SKU RTEN SGAM

DU BZHUGS TE BSNAMS, TSA CHU KHA'I ZHAG SAR NANGS DUS SGROL SKU
MI BZHUGS PA BTZAL BAS 'DIR RNYED, DE

LTAR LAN KHA SHAS GDAN 'DREN ZHUS KYANG PHYIR PHEBS PAS 'DIR
BZHUGS SU GSOL ZHES DKAR CHAG TU BSHAD,

YID DGE LUNG NI GA-YO DGE LUNG PA DANG, BLA MA GRUB CHEN GA-YO
DGE 'BYUNG YIN NAM ZER MKHAN SNANG, THU'U

BKVAN RIN PO CHES, GRUB DBANG SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSOS YIG DRUG GI
,RIL SGRUB MDZAD CHEN NAM MKHA'I KHYON

GANG BA'I, ,SANGS RGYAS ZHAL GZIGS BSTOD BSNGAGS MDZAD PA'I
GNAS, SGROL MA PHUG GI GNAS BRTAN

MJAL LAGS SAM, ,ZHES GSUNGS LA, LHA KHANG RI KHROD BCAS YANG
KY'A ZHABS DRUNG RIM BYON GYIS SKYONG,

'DI'I LE LAG KAN GO'I ZI, KO KY'A ZI, PHUN KY'A ZI ZHES SUM PAS
BSHAD, PHYI MA 'DI CHU'I PHAR KHA NA

YOD; MI LA'I SGRUB PHUG ZER BA'I DBEN GNAS SU MI LA'I SKU RANG
BYON BZHUGS, ` BYAMS PA 'BUM GLING

GYI BYAMS CHEN 'DI NGAG RGYUN 'GAR KONG TZES BZHENGS PA YIN ZER
ZHING, DE'I RGYU MTSAN GYIS KONG TZE'I MING LA

YANG BZO KONG TZE DANG KONG TZE 'PHRUL GYI RGYAL PO ZHES BSHAD,
'GA' ZHIG DE BON PO ZHIG YIN PA GZHI RAB BZHAG

NAS; DANG PO STON PA GSHEN RABS KYI SKU YIN PA LA PHYIS SU GTZUG
TOR SOGS BSNAN TE BYAMS SKU'I RNAM PAR

BSGYUR ZER SNANG, DE DANG MTHUN PAR THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHES,
,GNA' DUS GSHEN RAB LO'U GYIN RNAM

PA STE, ,DA LTA MCHOG GI SPRUL SKU'I CHA BYAD DU, ,BSGYUR LA
RGYAL BA'I BYIN BRLABS ZHUGS PA YI, ,

'BUM GLING BYAMS CHEN SKU BSNYAN MJAL LAGS SAM, ,LHA SKU MCHOD
RTEN SPYI BLUGS RDOR DRIL SOGS, ,

RNAM PA SNA TSOGS BRAG LA RANG BYON DU, ,BYUNG BAS PHYOGS MTSAMS
'KHOR YUG KUN GANG BA'I, ,GNAS KYI

NGO MTSAR LTAD MO GZIGS LAGS SAM, ,ZHES DANG, SKAL LDAN CHOS
'BYUNG DU, KONG TZE 'PHRUL RGYAL

@228	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RAM CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

GYIS BYAMS SKU CHEN MOS THOG DRANGS BYAMS SKU 'BUM THER BZHENGS,
'DI LA RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO,

SPRUL SKU BSOD NAMS YE SHES DBANG BO, STONG 'KHOR YON TAN RGYA
MTSO, RGYAL BA RGYA MTSO, SDE BA ZHABS

DRUNG RNAMS CHED GNYER GYIS MJAL BAR PHEBS, STAG LUNG CHOS RJE
'PHRIN LAS DPAL BZANG GIS GNAS 'DIR

MCHOD RTEN GSAR BZHENGS TSE, MCHOD RTEN RTZE'I NAM MKHA' DANG,
NANG DU MAR ME 'BAR BA STAG LUNG

TSOGS PAS MTHONG, MCHOD RTEN LA 'JA' 'OD ZUG CES GSUNGS LA GNAS
KYI CHE BA KIRTI BSTAN RAB PAS RTA

LOR RNAM RGYAL GLING DU MDZAD PA SOGS DKAR CHAG LE TSAN GSUM
MTHONG, KONG TZE NI, TZI NA'I YUL GYI SKYES

MCHOG RNAM BZHI'AM, BOD KYI NAG RTZIS PA DAG LA LEN PA MI BZHIR
GRAGS PA'I NANG TSAN KHUNG PHU'U TZI'AM KHUNG

TZI ZHES PA ZUR CHAG PA YIN ZHING, DE NI SANGS RGYAS 'JIG RTEN
DU BYON NAS LO HA CANG MI MANG TZAM NA, tI'U

WANG RGYAL RABS KYI MJUG TZAM tI'U WING WANG GI DUS SU RGYA NAG
ZHING SA BCU GSUM GYI YA GYAL SHAN DUNG GI YUL DU

BYUNG; RGYAL SRID 'PHO 'GYUR MANG PO BYUNG YANG RGYAL PO'I
KHRIMS SROL DANG, MI DRAG ZHAN 'BRING GSUM GYI MI

CHOS BYED LUGS THAMS CAD 'DIS BRTZAMS PA'I SHE'U ZHES PA'I LUGS
KYI BSTAN BCOS KHO NA LA TSAD MAR MDZAD

PAS RGYAL SRID KYI SLOB DPON YIN ZHES KONG TZE'I GZUGS DANG MING
BYANG LA RGYAL PO NA RIM GYIS PHYAG BYED PA'I SROL

DA LTA'I BAR DU YOD, 'DI'I RIGS RGYUD LA GONG MAS DA LTA YANG
GUNG GI LAS TSAN GNANG PA YIN ZHING MI

RABS BDUN CU TZA GRANGS SONG BAR GRAGS, 'DI'I RNAM TAHR RGYA YUL
DU GRAGS CHE YANG RGYAL PO DZU 'PHRUL BAN

DANG BZO LA MKHAS PA'I LO RGYUS MI SNANG, GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I
DBYANGS KYIS RGYA BZA' KONG JO BOD DU PHEBS

PA'I LAM KHAR BLON PO MGAR LA SGRUB SDOD MDZAD DE BRAG LA BYAMS
CHEN BRKOS ZER BA DANG, 'GA' ZHIG TU RDZU

'PHRUL GYIS SHA BA BZUNG STE ZHING RMOD PA DANG, BRAG LA BYAMS
CHEN KHRU BRGYAD CU BA BZHENGS PAR BSHAD KYANG KY'A ZI

GZHAN DE 'DRA STON RGYU MI SNANG, DE DUS GONG MA'I PHO BRANG
ZHING NGAN H'Um YIN PAS DER JO BO'I BZHUGS KHRI DA LTA'I

BAR DU YOD LA, DE NAS KONG JO STONG 'KHOR DU PHEBS, RDO NYI ZLA
NAS MGAR GYIS PHEBS RJES ZIN PA GRAGS CHE

BAS 'DI PHYOGS PHEBS LAM 'KHRUL MED DU SHES PAS KONG JO LA SGRA
NOR BA 'DRA GSUNGS, DPYOD LDAN 'GA'

ZHIG GIS MA nI BKA' 'BUM DU, RGYA NAG KE SHING KHRI SGO NAS RGYA
RJE KONG TZE 'PHRUL GYI RGYAL PO'I SRAS KONG TZE 'PHRUL

CHUNG BYA BA'I SRAS MO LHA CIG KONG JO GSUNGS 'DUG PAS SRAS MOS
BZHENGS PA LA YAB KYI MING BTAGS 'DRA YANG

ZER; YANG KHAM NGOS 'BUM LHA MDUN DU, RNAM SNANG CHEN PO'I RDO
SKU KHRU BCO BRGYAD YOD PA KONG JOS

BZHENGS PAR BSHAD PA'ANG SNANG, GANG LTAR SNANG BRNYAN DNGOS
GZHI BZANG PO'I BZHUGS STANGS CAN LA SA

GNON MNYAM BZHAG GI STENG NA LHUNG BZED NANG DU 'KHOR LO CAN,
SRID DU KHRU GYA BRGYAD ZER BSTOD SMAD GANG

YANG MA 'DZOL BA'I THIG LDAN SHIN TU BYON LEGS YA MTSAN CAN,
GZHAN THUB PA MYANG 'DAS SOGS BYAMS SKU

RIGS MI 'DRA BA 'BUM PHRAG DANG SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS KYI SKU
BRNYAN MTHA' YAS PA, SPYAN RAS GZIGS RANG

BYON DANG SGRUB CHU BZHUGS, ` DE DANG NYE BAR LHA MDUN DGEN SUS
BTAB MA NGES, PHYIS SU DAR RGYAS CHER

@229	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

SONG NAS BLA MA RIN CHEN RGYA MTSO, SHES RAB RGYA MTSO, TSUL
KHRIMS RGYA MTSO, TSE DBANG RGYA MTSO SOGS

DANG; DENGS SAGNS GA-YUNG SKU SKYE 'PHRIN LAS SUL KHRIMS, 'JAM
DBYAANGS BLO GROS DPAL 'DZIN, ZHABS

DRUNG RGYAL MTSAN SOGS NA RIM GYIS SKYONG ZHING CHOS SPYOD 'PHEL
PAR YOD, MKHAR NAG CHOS 'BYUNG DU, RMA

CHU'I 'GRAM DU SPRUL BA'I LHA KHANG, BZO KONG TZE 'PHRUL RGYAL
GYIS BZHENGS PA'I BYAMS PA 'BUM GLING DU RJE RIN

PO CHE'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING KHRI THOG DPON POS SMON LAM CHEN MO
BTZUGS ZHES BSHAD LA, LOO KYA TUN NAS KA NO

THAN PAR PHAL CHER 'BUM GLING GI LE LAG YIN ZHING GA-YUNG SKU
SKYES RIM BYON GYIS 'DZIN BDAG BYED, ` P'EE BLA

MA ZER BA'I GRUB THOB CIG GIS BZHENGS PA BDE BA CAN GYI ZHING
BKOD DU GRAGS PA'I RDZONG THOG LHA KHANG DU THUGS RJE

CHEN PO RANG BYON, SKU DNGOS DE MCHOD RTEN DKAR PO SOGS SU
GZINGS KYI STENG NAS LO LTAR GDAN 'DREN GYIN

YOD PA SNGA MA ZHIG KLUS SPYAN DRANGS TE 'DI SKU TSAB YIN ZER
MKHAN SNANG ZHES 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS GSUNGS,

GZHAN YANG LHA KHANG MANG PO DANG, BRAG RI SHIN TU NGO MTSAR CAN
LA LO RGYUS MANG, ` L'U KY'A ZI, ZHAD KY'A ZI,

B'EE TH'A ZE'AM MCHOD RTEN DKAR PO MTHONG BA KUN 'DREN NI, BKA'
BCU NGAG DBANG DGE 'DUN GYIS BSGRIGS

PA'I DKAR CHAG TU, TSE LO NYI KHRI'I DUS RGYAL PO KRI KRIS SBYIN
BDAG BYAS, RGYU RIN PO CHE SNA TSOGS LAS DUS

MTSAN MO GCIG LA MCHOD RTEN BYE BA PHRAG GCIG BZHENGS PAR SANGS
RGYAS 'OD SRUNG GIS RAB GNAS MDZAD,

RIM GYIS LHA KLU MI GSUM GYI YUL SO SOR BYON TE BSOD NAMS KYI
ZHING DU BZHUGS PA'I NANG TSAN YIN ZHES THU'U

BKVAN RIN PO CHES 'BUM GLING KHRI RIN PO CHER GSUNG TSUL SNANG,
LO RGYUS 'GAR STON PA MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS NAS

LO NYIS BRGYA LHAG TZAM NA DGRA BCOM PA MA TINGKA BAS SANGS
RGYAS KYI RING BSREL BUM PA GANG, THEG PA CHI CHUNG GI

GLEGS BAM MANG PO, SANGS RGYAS KYI SKU BRNYAN RAS BRIS BCAS
BSNAMS TE PHEBS PAR, HAN MING DHI RGYAL PO

'KHOR BCAS DAD PA SKYES TE MCHOD YON RNAMS KYIS RING BSREL GYI
SNYING BO CAN GYI MCHOD RTEN MANG PO BZHENGS

PA'I NANG TSAN DANG, 'DI LAS 'OD ZER 'PHROS PA SOGS KYI MTHONG
SNANG LAS RGYAL RAS RJES MA 'GA' ZHIG

GIS DAD PA'I SGO NAS ZHIG GSOS PHUL BAR BSHAD, BOD KYI SA MTSAMS
RGYA'I MCHOD RTEN DKAR CHUNG DU NGOS

'DZIN MKHAN SNANG MOD, GZHAN DU YANG NGOS 'DZIN YOD PAS GCIG TU
MA NGES PA 'DRA, ` LOO KYA TUN BDE

MCHOG RANG BYON 'DI LA LO RGYUS 'DRA MIN 'DUG KYANG, BA SO RJE
DRUNG GIS MDZAD ZER BA'I DKAR CHAG DANG, PAn

CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYI GSUNG MTHUN PAR PHAM MTHING BA CHUNG
BAS LAS RGYAL BRTEN NAS MCHOG GI DNGOS GRUB

BRNYES PA YAB YUM GNYIS KA'I SKU MA NYAMS PAR BZHUGS PA LA BDE
MCHOG RANG BYON DU GRAGS PAR GSUNGS PA RJE

GSUNG ZUR DANG MTHUN PAS 'KHRUL BA MED LA, DE YANG BOD RNAMS
KYIS BLA BO PHAM MTHING PAR 'BOD CING

BAL YUL DU AA DE BA CHEN POR GRAGS PA DANG, DE'I GCUNG BAL BO
MEE TRI BA'AM DUS 'KHOR BA, DE'I GCUNG

THANG CHU BA'AM THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I BSHEGS GNYEN ZER, 'DI GSUM
SKU MCHED DANG N'A RO BA'I SLOB MA YIN,

GCEN PHAM MTHING BA CHE BA'I SLOB MA'I GTZO BO SU MA TI KIRTI
STE BLO GROS BZANG PO, YONGS GRAGS LA BAL BO BHADANTA

@230	(TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

ZER BA DES THANG CHU BAS NGAG GI DBANG PHYUG BSGRUBS PA'I DNGOS
GRUB KYI RJAS KYI LHAG MA BZHES PAS THOS PA 'DZIN

PA'I MCHOG TU GYUR, THANG CHU BA BOD DU BSOD SNYOMS LA PHEL DUS
RONG DU SMIG TU BRNAG TI LA MNGON PA GSAN,

SGRUB PA'I SGO NAS BSKYED RIM LA BRTAN PA THOB, THUN MONG GI
DNGOS GRUB CI RIGS PA YANG GRUB, PHYIS SU

MU STEGS KYI PAndI TA GCIG DANG RNAL 'BYOR MA GCIG RTZOD PAS
PHAM PAR MDZAD PAS KHYED PHYI'I RGYA MTSO LA THUG GI

BAR DU BSKRAD KYI ZER, NGA BDE MCHOG GI RNAL 'BYOR BA LA GANG
YANG MI LTO GSUNGS TE BSRUNG BA MA BYAS PAR BTANG

SNYOMS SU BZHUGS, KHONG GNYIS KYIS BSKRAD PA'I 'KHOR LO BYAS PAS
LAN KYANG ZER, GANG LTAR RGYA NAG RI

BO RTZE LNGAR DNGOS GRUB KYI RDZAS 'GA' ZHIG 'TSOL DU 'GRO
GSUNGS PA SUS KYANG BSHOL MA THEBS PAR BOD NAS TSUR

BYON; MI NYAG TU RGYAL PO LA DBANG BSKUR BA'I BLA MA MDZAD CING
RE ZHIG BZHUGS, LJONGS RGYU BAS RGYA NAG GI

YUL MTHAR RI DKAR PO GNAM LA LANGS PA 'DRA BA GZIGS, CI YIN DRIS
PAS PHYI'I RGYA MTSO YIN ZHUS, SNGAR

GYI DE DRAN NAS NGAS DE DUS BSRUNG BA ZHIG BYAS NA BZLOG PA LA
TSEGS MED DE DA BAL BO RGAN POS RANG YUL MA MTHONG

BA YIN 'DUG GSUNGS SLAR LOG THUGS PHAB NAS RGYA NAG GI PHYOGS
GCIG TU BHA DAN TA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG

ZHES PA'I BDE MCHOG GI LHA KHANG BZHENGS TE, DER BZHUGS NAS 'GRO
BA DPAG TU MED PA SHRI TZAKRA SAM BHA RA'I

SGO NAS SMIN CING GROL BAR MDZAD, DENG SANG GI BAR DU DPAL BDE
MCHOG GI CHOS DAR ZHING RGAS PAR GRAGS

ZHES BU'I BDE MCHOG CHOS 'BYUNG DU GSUNGS PAS PHAM MTHING BA
CHUNG BA 'DI LA NGOS 'DZIN DGOS PA 'DRA LA, TU BAG MAR BYI

HA'I MING YIN ZHING DGON PA'I MING LA BHA DHA ZI ZER BAS KYANG
SHES SAM SNYAM, YANG CHOS 'BYUNG

DE NYID LAS, PHAM MTHING PA SKU MCHED BHZI'I CHE BA CHOS KYI BLO
GROS LA BLA MA N'A RO BAS RGYA NAG RI BO RTZE LNGAR SONG NA

DNGOS GRUB THOB PAR LUNG BSTAN PA BZHIN DER BZHUD DE, PHYIS 'DIR
SONG CHA MED CIG BYUNG ZHES KYANG GSUNGS,

RGYA'I YIG RNYING NGAG RGYUN DKAR CHAG TU BKOD PAR, BLA BO PHAM
MTHING PA CHUNG BA LA RJE BTZUN RNAL 'BYOR MAS

LUNG BSTAN TE PHYOGS 'DIR PHEBS, ZAS 'TSONG GI BU MO ZHIG PHYAG
RGYAR BSTEN, LO BCU GNYI KYI BAR DU

BRAG SGO BCAD DE SGRUB PA MDZAD PAS ZUNG 'JUG SKU BRNYES, T'A'I
MING KHRON HV'A RGYAL PO KHRIR BZHUGS LO GNYIS

PA ME KHYI LO'I STON DUS, LO YUN ZER BA'I RGAD PO ZHIG GI GA-YOG
PO GNAS DER ZHING RMOD DU PHYIN PA'I MDUN DU

RI BONG GNYIS PHAR RGYUG TSUR RGYUG BYED PA DANG BRAG SGO 'BYED
DAM ZHES PA'I SGRA LAN GSUM GRAGS, ZHIB TU NYAN

PAR BRAG DMAR GYI DKYIL NA SGRA DE 'BYUNG BAS SKRAGS TE KHYIM DU
LOGS NAS BSHAD, LO YUN GYIS KHYOD GNYID

LOGS PA'I RMI LAM YIN NA SANG YANG GRAGS 'ONG, DE DUS PHYE ZHES
LAN THOB BYAS, DE BZHIN BYAS PAS

'BRUG LDIR BA LTA BU'I 'UR SGRA DAG SA GA-YOS, 'JA' TSON BCAS
BRAG SGO PHYE BA'I NANG NAS YAB YUM ZHAL SBYOR

DU BZHUGS PA'I SKU MA NYAMS PA THON, LO DE NAS DA LTA'I SRID
GSAL KHRIR BZHUGS BCU GCIG PA LCAGS YOS

BAR SUM BRGYA RE BDUN SONG, ZAS 'TSONG GI BU MO NI, PHAM MTHING
BA YUL 'DIR PHEBS DUS, BU MO

LO BCU GNYIS CAN ZHIG GI DPRAL BAR BSGRUB PA'I SENGNDHU RA'I
DGA' 'KHYIL 'PHOS PAS MTSAN LDAN DU DGONGS,

@231	(RTZANG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGUD BSHAD PA,)

DE'I MA RGAN MO LA SBYIN BDAG BCOL TE NYE LOGS DER SGRUB PA
MDZAD, NYIN GCIG BU MOS 'TSO BA PHUL TE SANG

NYE BA RNAMS KYIS MO RMA PHAR KHA'I GRONG ZHIG TU BAG MAR BYIN
PAS 'BRO BA'I SKAR MA LA SLEBS SONG, AA MA RGAS

NAS 'ONG MI NUS, SBYIN BDAG GZHAN ZHIG BTZAL DGOS 'DRA ZHUS,
KHYED SANG THAD 'DIR SLEB DUS BZHON

PA LAS BAB NAS NGA LA PHYAG GSUM BTZAL NA RTEN 'BREL BZANG
GSUNGS, PHYI NYIN SKYEL MI RNAMS KYIS BU MO RTA

LAS 'BAB MA BCUG KYANG, MOS YI KYIS PHYAG 'TSAL BA'I MOS PA DANG
GSOL BA BTAB PAS DE 'PHRAL RLUNG

CHEN PO GA-YOS TE BU MO GAR SONG CHA MED DU GYUR ZER, PAn CHEN
DPAL LDAN YE SHES, LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE SKU

'PHRENG SNGA PHYI, THU'U BKVAN RDO RJE 'CHANG, KUN MKHYEN BLA MA
SKU 'PHRENG BCAS KYIS YAB YUM GYI SKU LA NA BZA'

RUS RGYAN, PHYAG MTSAN SOGS CHA THAMS CAD PHUN SUM TSOGS PA
DANG, BRAG PHUG SGO LA LAN KAN YOL BA LHA KHANG

GI ZHIG GSOS GANG DGOS, DGON PAR BDE MCHOG SGRUB MCHOD BTZUGS,
GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS

KYIS YAB YUM GYI SKU LA GSER CHAB PHYAG GIS BYUGS PAS GSANG
RDZAS SHIN TU BSIL BA'I REG BYA CAN ZHAL DU GSOL

BAS ZAD MI SHES PA PHYAG TU BAB TSUL RNAM THAR TU, MKHA' DBYINGS
TIL GANG LTAR BZHUGS RGYAL RNAMS KYI, ,

THUGS RJE'I DROD KYIS SPANGS DANG RTOGS PA'I KHAMS, ,BZHUS PA'I
BTUNG BA RIN CHEN 'DI GSOL BAS, ,

RDO RJE'I LUS KYI GRONG KHYER MTHON POR 'PHAGS, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA
BZHIN DPAG DKA' LA, SDE KHRI RIN PO

CHE 'JAM DBYANGS THUB BSTAN NYI MAS KYANG RMI LAM LA BSNYAD BAL
BO KHA SHAS DANG GSUNG 'PHROS BYUNG TSUL ZUR TZAM

THOS KYANG SMRA GA LA NUS, SNGON GYI CHOS 'BYUNG 'GAR THEG DMAN
'GOG SNYOMS PA MANG PO RI LA BZHUGS PA SA

BSKOS PAS THON TE SANGS RGYAS 'OD SRUNG GANG NA BZHUGS, RGYAL PO
KRI KRI GANG NA BZHUGS, ZHES GSUNG

PHEBS TSUL SNANG LA, DE BZHIN GZHAN DON DU BSKAL BA'I BAR DU
'GOG PA LA SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA'I BYANG 'PHAGS

KYANG YOD PA DANG, DE LAS KYANG RGYUD DU, BSKAL BA BSKAL BA
STONG DU YANG, ,YE SHES MNGON SBYOR GYIS

GNAS BYA, ,ZHES PA LTAR YE SHES KYI TSOGS JI TZAM 'PHEL STOBS
CHE BA BZHIN BSOD NAMS KYI TSOGS 'PHEL BAR

'GYUR BA SNGAGS BLA MED KYI KHYAD CHOS YIN ZHING, DAG MA DAG GI
SGYU LUS THOB NAS RNAM SMIN GYI LUS RAGS PA

DANG RTEN BRTEN PA'I 'BREL BA CHAD MA CHAD KYI KHYAD PAR YOD
KYANG RTEN DE LA GANG 'DOD DU 'BYUNG 'JUG BYED NUS

PA 'DRA LA, BRTEN PA SANGS RGYAS PA'I TSE RTEN GYI LUS RAGS PA
YANG RNAM SMIN GYI CHA DAG NAS 'TSANG RGYA BAR

GSUNGS SHING, SLOB MI SLOB GANG LTAR YANG SKU GDUNG DU GRAGS PA
TZAM LAS ZUNG 'JUG DKYIL 'KHOR RGYAL MCHOG 

GI LHA'I SPRUL BA YIN PAS GSANG SNGAGS BLA MED KYI LAM LA BRTEN
NAS TSE GCIG LA 'TSANG RGYA BAR 'DOD PA'I SGRUB PA

BO RNAMS KYI MIG RKYEN DU CHE ZHING MTHONG THOS DRAN REG DON
LDAN DU THE TSOM MED PA NI, GUNG THANG RIN PO CHES,

ZUNG 'JUG SAR GSHEGS GRUB MCHOG PHAM MTHING BA, ,RAGS PA'I ZA MA
TOG GI BKOD PA'I LUS, ,DPA'

BO RNAL 'BYOR MAR BCAS SKUR BZHENGS TE, ,SKYES DGU'I MGON POR
SGYU MA'I GAR GYIS RTZEN, ,ZHES DANG,

RJE CHOS KYI NYI MAS, LOO KYA TUN TU BAL BO PHAM MTHING BAS,
,RDO RJE PHAG MO RGYA MO'I RNAM PA CAN, ,PHYAG@232 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

RGYAR BZHES TE ZUNG 'JUG BRNYES PA YI, ,SKU GDUNG YID BZHIN NOR
BU MJAL LAGS SAM, ,DE YI DRUNG

DU PHYI NANG GSANG MCHOD DANG, ,TSOGS KYI 'KHOR LO RDO RJE'I GLU
GAR GYIS, ,DPA' BO MKHA' 'GRO'I TSOGS

RNAMS MNYES BYAS TE, ,MKHA' SPYOD 'GRUB PA'I GSOL BA BTAB LAGS
SAM, ,ZHES GSUNGS SO, ,

GNAS KYI NGO BO YANG, DANG PO BRAG KHUNG GCOD BYED KYI BRAG RI
RTZAR LHUNG BA LA YAB YUM ZHAL SBYOR GYI RNAM PA DANG,

SGRUB KHANG GI MDUN NGOS GA-YAS GA-YON NA DBANG PHYUG YAB YUM
GYI RTAGS KYI RNAM PA THAD SOR GNAS SHING DUR KHROD

KYI MI RO'I GZUGS SOGS BDE MCHOG GI GNAS KYI KHYAD CHOS TSANG BA
DANG, MDUN GYI LUNG BA GA-YAS GA-YON DANG,

RMA CHU YANG THUR DU 'BAB PAR GZHIR BZHAG KYANG SNANG TSOD LA
GYEN DU 'GRO BA'I NYAMS 'CHAR LA, RI KLUNG DMAR

HANG NGE BA SOGS KYIS NANG RDO RJE'I LUS KYI GNAS LUGS MTSON
ZHING PHYI NANG GI RTEN 'BREL LAS GNAS KYIS GANG

ZAG BYIN GYIS RLOBS NUS SU SNANG NGO, ` ,DE'I RGYAB NGOS KAN
GO'U ZIR, BRAG RIN PO CHE SPUNGS PA LTA BU LA

AA KA RU'I NAGS DANG, DRI ZHIM PO'I ME TOG NGO MTSAR BA'I CHU
MIG SOGS KYIS BRGYAN PA'I SGRUB PHUG TU

THUGS RJE CHEN PO RANG BYON BZHUGS, DKAR CHAG TU T'A'I MING YUL
LO RGYAL PO'I DUS, YUL 'DI'I MI GCIG

PHYUGS 'TSOR PHYIN PAS BRAG KHA BYANG BSTAN ZHIG NA, RI BONG
GNYIS 'GRO 'ONG BYED PA DANG BRAG NANG NAS SGO PHE'AM

ZHES PA'I SGRA THOS PA ZLA BO LA BSHAD PAS PHYE ZHIG SMRAS PA
BZHIN BYAS PAS, BRAG LA SGO RANG DOD DU SONG BA'I NANG

NAS; YU SHEL LAS GRUB PA'I SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI SKU BYUNG BA RANG
YUL DU LAN KHA SHAS KHYER KYANG, 'PHRAL

DU BRAG PHUG TU PHYIR PHEBS PA'I GNAS DER DGON CHAGS, PHYIS SU
SNGAR GYI SNANG BRNYAN RANG BYON NANG BZHUGS

SU PHUL TE 'JIG RTEN GSUM LHAG PAR DBANG DU BYED PA'I SPYAN RAS
GZIGS KYI SKU 'DI BZHENGS PA YIN ZHES

GSUNGS LA, GZHAN YANG RGYAL BA LUNG RTOGS RGYA MTSO'I ZHABS
LHAM, THUB PA MYANG 'DAS KYI SKU CHEN PO

BCAS BZHUGS, ` KHUN KY'A ZI, ` BO'U KY'A ZI, ` H'UNG TZOR ZI, `
KHRI GYIN HUNG HVA ZI'AM MDZO MO

MKHAR NI, RJE'I DNGOS SLOB MI DBANG GTZUG NA MDZES PA'I TI SHRI
GNYIS KYI NANG TSAN BYAMS CHEN CHOS RJE SH'AKYA

YE SHES, 'KHRUNGS LO SHING RTA LA BZHED PA LTAR NA RJE LAS LO
GSUM GYIS BGRES, SNGON GNAS RJES DRAN

SOGS MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I YON TAN GYIS PHYUG RGYAL CHEN RNAM
THOS SRAS KYIS RJES SU BZUNG BAS RJE'I RGYAL

TSAB TU, GONG MA T'A'I MING RGYAL POS SPYAN DRANGS, 'GRAN ZLA
MED PA'I BLA MAR MNGA' GSOL, MCHOD

YON GYIS HVA YAN ZI ZHES PA'I DGON PA BTAB, DGE LDAN PA'I PHYAG
LEN DAR BAR MDZAD, DBUS SU PHEBS,

SE RA CHOS SDINGS SU RJE'I CHOS 'KHOR BSKOR BA'I ZHABS TOG DANG
ZHAL BKOD ZHUS TE SE RA THIG CHEN GLING BTAB,

SLAR PHO BRANG LA BYON PA NA T'A'I MING RGYAL PO GSHEGS KYANG,
SRAS ZON TES GUS MCHOD CHEN PO MDZAD PA LAS SNYAN

GRAGS DANG GZHAN DON MTHA' YAS PA BYUNG, YANG DBUS SU GDAN BTEGS
PA MDZO MO MKHAR DU PHEBS PA'I

MOD LA SKU GSHEGS PAR DGA' LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG DU GSUNGS LA, BEE
SER DU, CHOS RJE RGYA NAG TU BYON PA'I

MAR LAM SA 'DIR DGON PA BTAB NA LEGS ZHES LUNG BSTAN, RGYA NAG
TU ZHING 'PHOS PA'I SKU GDUNG YAR GDAN

@233 (TZONG CHU'I LHO DANG RMA CHU'I BYANG RGYUD BSHAD PA,)

DRANGS SKABS, 'DI THANG SHING RTA 'DAM DU ZUG PA BZHIN 'GROR MA
NYAN PAS SNGAR GYI GSUNG DRAN TE YUNG LO RGYAL

POS MKHAR BRTZIGS, GSER GDUNG SOGS RTEN MANG PO BZHENGS, BU CHEN
SENG GE BZANG PO GDAN SAR

BZHAG CES GRAGS, RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO GNAS 'DIR PHEBS,
DBANG CHOS RAB BYUNG BSNYEN RDZOGS

MANG DU GNANG, RJE YON TAN RGYA MTSO SOG YUL DU 'KHRUNGS PA'I
GTAM SNYAN THOG MAR 'BUL MKHAN GYI GRAS NANG

SO MDZO MO MKHAR PA YANG 'DI NAS YIN ZHES BSHAD, YANG BYAMS CHEN
CHOS RJE RGYA NAG NAS LI THANG GI SA CHA BRGYUD

DE DBUS SU PHEBS, MAR LAM MTSO SNGON, TZONG KHA, ZI LING, MDZO
MO MKHAR, KA JU, 'PHAGS

PA SHING KUN, THO'U JU, MEN JU, ZI NGAN BU, SHAN ZI, AU THA'I
SHAN RNAMS BRGYUD DE PHO BRANG

DU PHEBS, DE DUS GNAS 'DI BYIN GYIS BRLABS NAS BU CHEN SH'AKYA
TSUL KHRIMS KYIS DAM CHOS THAR GLING BTAB,

SA SKYA BA BSOD NAMS YE SHES KYIS RGYUD SDE BZHI'I GRVA BTZUGS
ZER BA NI SKAL LDAN GYIS, BYAMS CHEN RJE DANG,

DRUNG SHA RI'I BUS MDZO MO MKHAR DU LHA KHANG BZHENGS, DGE 'DUN
GYI SDE BTZUGS GSUNGS PA DANG MTHUN NAM

SNYAM LA, CHOS RJE PA DGUNG LO GYA GNYIS BZHES PA SHING YOS ZLA
BA BCU BA'I NYER BZHI'I NYIN 'DAS PA'I SKU GDUNG

MCHOD RTEN RGYAL PO'I BKA' LTAR CHOS RJE BSOD NAMS SHES RAB,
CHOS RJE SENG GE BZANG PO GNYIS KYIS MDZO MO

MKHAR DU GDAN DRANGS NAS GTZUG LAG KHANG KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS PA
BSKRUN TE BZHUGS SU GSOL, DE LA BRTEN

NAS DGE 'DUN GYI SDE YANG CHAGS TE DA LTA MA NYAMS PAR YOD
GSUNGS TE, THU'U BKVAN RJES, MI DBANG T'A

MING RGYAL PO'I BSOD NAMS DANG, ,BYAMS CHEN CHOS RJE'I 'PHRIN
LAS ZUNG 'BREL GYIS, ,BSKRUN PA'I

MDZO MO MKHAR GYI GTZUG LAG KHANG, ,PHYI RTEN NANG RTEN YOD DGU
MJAL LAGS SAM, ,KHYAD PAR RGYAL BA

GNYIS PA'I BU CHEN MCHOG ,BYAMS CHEN CHOS RJE SH'AKYA YE SHES
KYI, ,RING BSREL SNYING POR BZHUGS PA'I

MCHOD RTEN DANG, ,DE YI THUGS DAM RTEN RNAMS MJAL LAGS SAM,
,ZHES GSUNGS SO, ,SDE BA

CHOS RJE PHEBS TE RTEN MJAL, RTZANG BA BKA' BCU BA DANG, NANG
SOS GTZO BYAS PA'I RGYA BOD KYI GDUL BYA

KHRI PHRAG DU MA LA CHOS GSUNG TSUL RNAM THAR TU SNANG, BYAMS
CHEN CHOS RJE'I SKU GDUNG, RGYAL POS BZHENGS

PA'I 'DRA SKU, BKA' 'GYUR GSER BRIS KHYAD 'PHAGS DANG GSER DNGUL
SPEL MA, BSTAN 'GYUR MTSAL PAR,

CHOS RJE'I THUGS DAM RTEN TZAN DAN LAS GRUB PA'I BDE MCHOG LHAN
SKYES, BDE MCHOG BRIS SKU, RNAM RGYAL

MCHOD RTEN, DBU ZHVAS GCOS NA BZA' CHA TSANG, BZHUGS KHRI NYA
PHYIS SOGS KYI PHRA CAN, GSOL PHOR

YU RING, TSA GSER GYI GSOL THAB SOGS NGO MTSAR BA, CHIBS SGA CHA
TSANG SRAB BCAS BZHUGS, SPRUL

SKU ZHIG BZHUGS PA'I SKYE RGYUD TSOL, ` MA YIN ZI, GONG SMOS 'DI
DAG GI CHU RNAMS DNGOS BRGYUD CI RIGS

KYIS BYANG NGOS NAS BABS TE RMA CHU DANG 'DRES PAS PHYOGS MTHUN
DU BKOD DO, ,BYA KHYUNG DGON MA LAG SOGS

TZONG LA LHO RGYUD KYI SKABS TE BYANG RGYUD RDZOGS SO,, ,,

@234 (LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

*, ,LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,

*, ,GNYIS PA LHO RGYUD KYI TSUL JI LTAR GLENG BAR BYA ZHE NA, DE
YANG B'A YAN HA RI'I KHA TSUR BLTA'I

CHU RNAMS RMA GA-YANG PHYUG MO'I GZHUNG DU 'BAB PA RMA CHU'I MGO
YIN LA, DE NAS LHO NGOS SU 'BAB PA GNYAN PO GA-YU

RTZE'I GA-YON NAS THON, RIM GYIS BYANG DU 'KHYOG PA DKAR DBUR
RKA CHU DANG, TSA GAN PE SHING GI MDUN NAS

DME CHU 'DRES TE NUB NGOS DRANG BOR BGROD PA'I KHUG SO GCIG GSHI
MDO DANG RTZE MDOR GSHI CHU DANG RTZE CHU 'DRES

SHING; RVA RGYA NAS SLAR YANG BYANG DU 'BAB PA 'BAL MDO NAS SHAR
NGOS DRANG BOR 'BAB PA'I KHUG SO GCIG

LOO KYA TUN NGOS NAS BYANG DU 'KHYOG PA RIM GYIS SHAR DU RGYA
NAG ZHING SA BCU GSUM GYI NANG TSAN LAN JU'I MKHAR MO

CHE'I MDUN LA BYAS SOG YUL DU 'BAB BO, ,RTZE MDO'I SHAR NGOS HA
CANG MI RING BA NA BSANG GI GYE MO'I GONG BA

YOD LA, DE LAS CHU GSUM BYUNG BA'I CHU NAG BYANG DU THON PA MGON
SHUL CHU DMAR DANG MNYAM DU DGU CHU DANG

'DRES; BSANG CHU SHAR DU 'BAB CING, KHAG CHU LHOR 'GRO BA KHO
TSE'I GZHUNG BRGYUD KHYUNG 'BROG NAS KLU CHU

DANG 'DRES PA'I DGU KLU BSANG GSUM YANG RIM GYIS RMA CHUR 'BAB
LA, STAG TSANG LHA MO, 'BRING KHOG

GZA' TSONG, AA SKYID BCAS KYI CHU RNAMS PHYOGS 'DRES KYIS RONG
SMAD BANG TSANG DGON BYAS RGYAL BZANG GNAM

RTZE'I RI 'DABS NAS GSER THANG GI CHU DANG 'DRES PA ZI KO'U
MKHAR DANG, KE JU'I MKHAR BRGYUD NAS LHOR 'GRO

ZHING; ZUNG JU'I RGYA CHU, DMU DGE RONG CHU NAG TSA KHO YAG SHA
LA'I TSUR NGOS KHRI BCU'I GZHUNG GI CHU RNAMS

RIM PAR 'DRES TE BKVAN ZHAN DU 'BAB, RDO RJE'I MGO GA-YU RTZE'I
MDUN NAS THON PAS DE DANG, MGO LOG

SMRA CHU, SMAD NGOS KYI RA CHU DANG TSA BA KHA GSUM GYI CHU BCAS
THAMS CAD DNGUL CHUR GRAGS PA CHU CHEN DANG 'DRES

TE RGYAL RONG NGOS BYAS CHIN DU PHUR 'GRO BAS DE DAG GI CHU
RGYUD LTAR GO RIM THAR CHAGS SU BRI BAR BYA'O, ,

DE YANG SNGON RMA 'GRAM STOD KYI SA THAMS CAD LA GLING RJE GE
SER RGYAL POS DBANG BSGYUR, DE NYID KYI 'KHRUNGS

LO LCAGS BYI DANG CHU SBRUL LA 'DOD MKHAN GNYIS SNANG BA GANG
YIN YANG RAB BYUNG DANG PO TSUGS KHA MA'I DRUG CU SKOR

DER GTOGS LA, RLANG BYANG CHUB 'DRE BKOL DANG, SMRi TI DZNY'A NA
KIRTI SPYAN DRANGS TE CHOS ZHUS DANG,

GTZUG LAG KHANG BZHENGS PAR BSHAD PA SKYANG SHES NUS, 'KHRUNGS
SA YANG CHAB TSA DGON GYI NYE 'DABS RDZA

SRIB GNOS RDZA CHU'I RGYUD MTSO GOR KHA YIN ZER BA DANG, RGYU
DAR GYI DAR SA NAG LUNG YIN YANG ZER, GANG LTAR

'DI'I LO RGYUS LA 'DRA MIN SNA TSOGS SNANG NGO, ,DA LTA SA 'DI
PHAL CHER MGO LOG GIS BZUNG, DE YANG BAR

KHAMS LHO MGO LOG GI YUL NAS 'BRU RIGS KYI DPON ZHIG 'ONGS TE
DPON RABS MANG PO'I BAR DU 'GU KHO'I LUNG

PAR BSDAD PA'I DPON CHEN ZHIG BSTAN PA SNGA DAR GYI DUS NAS YOD,
BAR SKABS SHIG 'BRU LHA RGYAL ZHES PA

BYUNG; DE'I BU AA 'BUM, DES KA THOG GI BLA MA DANG BON PO 'GA'
ZHIG LA CHOS ZHUS PAS SNGAGS BON GYI

@235 (LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CHOS GNYIS CHAR SPYOD PA'I SNGAGS PA GNYAN POR BRTZI, YUL DPON
GLING RJE DANG 'GAL NAS YUL BUD, RDO

ROL STOD GAS LUNG GI MA MO BZHI MDO SOGS SU RU BA BYAS TE BSDAD,
DE'I TSE SMAR ROL STOD GNYAN RTZE DPON,

BAR MKHAR RE DPON, SMAD SA LE DPON GYI SA YIN, MKHA' RE'I ZHABS
KYI MI MA TSA'I MI RGYUD LA MA TSA'I GONG

MA RAB BRGYAD ZER BA'I BLA MA MANG PO BYUNG, 'THU DPON 'BANGS
'DZEMS PAS GA-YUL SPRAD, GNYAN RTZE'I DPON

LHANG CHEN 'BUM BSAD PAS GNYAN MKHAR SA GSUM GYIS MGO BTAGS, AA
'BUM SDE BCAS SMAR GYI SNGO MTSO

KHAR 'ONGS, BU GSUM YOD PA'I CHE BA 'BUM SKYABS, 'BRING BO 'BUM
DGE CHUNG BA 'BUM YAG

CHE BA GNYIS KYIS KHYIM RE BZUNG, CHUNG BA PHA KHYIM DU BSDAD
PAS MGO LOG KHA GSUM DU GRAGS, RA MDO YAN

MNGA' 'OG TU BCUG PAS, MGO LOG AA 'BUM DE MTSO CHEN 'KHYIL BA
'DRA, BOD LA LA MTSO KHA'I SBRANG MA

'DRA; ZHES GLU LEN, AA 'BUM GA-YU RTZ'I RI LTAD ZHIG LA PHYIN
SKABS LUNG KHA'I BYI'U MTSO ZER BA'I KHAR BRO

BTAB; KHO RANG GNYID DU SONG BA'I RMI LAM DU, SA GNAM DMAG GIS
BKAS, KU CO'I SGRAS GNYAN

SRAS SHIG KHYER RO ZER 'PHRAL GNYID SAD, BYA ZHIG GIS SBRUL ZHIG
KHYER BA LA ZHVA 'PHANGS, KI BTON PAS BYA

DES SBRUL THANG LA 'PHANGS PA MTSO NANG DU 'PHYONG, BZANG LTAS
SU GO STE DER BSDAD, NUB MO RMI LAM DU MTSO

NANG NAS BUD MED MDZES MA ZHIG THON TE, MO'I BU'I SROG BLUS PAS
KHYOD YAB GNYAN RTZ'I MDUN DU 'KHRID,

DE'I MDUN NA PHYAR KHRA GCIG DBYUG BRDAB GCIG KHYI GCIG YOD DE
GSUM KA SLONG ZER KHRID DE SONG,

SHEL KHANG ZHIG GI NANG DU MI DAR GYI LA THOD CAN, SMA RA DANG
SMIN MA RING BA, DAR SNGON GYON PA ZHIG KHRI STENG

NA 'DUG 'DZUM ZHING KHYOD LA CI DGOS DRIS PAR DE GSUM BSLANG BAS
BYIN PA RMIS, SRAS MO'I DNGOS GRUB

GNANG BA'I LTAS SU SHES, RANG YUL DU SONG NAS BSDAD SKABS RMI
LAM DU, GNYAN PO GA-YU RTZES SNGO MTSO'I

NANG 'DI NAS GA-YAG DKAR NAG GNYIS 'DZING 'ONG, NAG PO DE KHYOD
KYIS SOD DANG, NGAS KHYOD KYI BU'I

CHUNG MA SBYIN ZER BA RMIS, SKABS SHIG DE LTAR BYUNG BAR GA-YAG
NAG PO DE MDSAS BSAD, DE NUB RMI LAM LA,

GA-YU RTZES SANG KHYOD KYI SPRA SGOR NA BUN 'THIB NAS 'BRUG SGRA
SGROGS DUS LTOS DANG SENG LCAM DKAR MO GA-YU RAL RGYAS

PA ZHIG 'ONG, DE LA MDA' DAR GYIS REG NA NGA'I BU MO CHE BA YIN
ZER BA BYUNG, PHYI NYIN GNYAN GYI MTHONG

DUG GIS MDA' DAR GA-YAB PA LAS REG PA MA BYUNG BAS SHOR, NUB DER
RMI LAM DU, SANG GA-YU 'BRUG

SNGON MO ZE BA RGYAS PA ZHIG 'ONG, DE LA REG ZER KYANG REG MA
NUS, DE NUB SANG MTSO MGO BRAG GA'U'I RTZAR

SHOG BSANG THONGS DANG SBRUL ZHIG RGYUG 'ONG, DE LA MDA' DAR
GA-YOBS SHIG ZER BA LTAR BYAS PAS GNYAN

MO LAG TU CHUD, BU'I KHYIM THAB BYAS, MING LA GNYAN MO DNGOS
GRUB ZER, CHU GLANG ZHIG NOR KHYUR 'ONGS,

NOR 'PHEL TE 'BYOR BA RGYAS, BU CHE BA SHI BA'I GEGS SEL DU 'BUM
BRIS 'PHRAL GNYAN MO LA BU BTZAS PAS 'BUM

SKYABS DANG, PHAG LOR SKYES PAS PHAG THAR TU BTAGS, AA 'BUM LO
GO GSUM LON DUS GNYAN RTZES ZER

BA LTAR GNYAN MO GNYAN YUL DU BTANG, GO BDUN DUS NYIN GCIG RMA
RGYAL SKYOB PA DANG SPYAN RAS GZIGS

@236 (LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

DBANG RNAMS, ,DBYER MED THA DAD MED BDAG GI YI DAM YIN, ,DE RING
DE DAG GI DRUNG DU NGA 'GRO YIN, ,

BU DANG TSA BO 'BANGS THAMS CAD BDE BAR SMON, ,ZHES GLU BLANGS
TE 'DAS, PHAG THAR GYI RING LA GNYAN GYI

DNGOS GRUB KYIS SMAR ROL MA LAG DRUG GI SA CHA DANG MI SDE LA
DBANG BYAS, SMAR ROL CHEN MO MDA' GSER GZHONG

DANG; KHO LE SGANG THOG TU MKHAR RDZONG GNYIS BRTZIGS, T'A'I
MING ZON TE NAS THAMG LO YE ZHES KHRI DPON GYI

LUNG LAS GNANG, KHO RANG LA BU BZHI YOD PA'I GCIG KA THOG PA BLA
MA CHOS 'BUM YIN, CHE BA RDO RJE 'BUM LA RDO

ROL GYI SA CHA MI SDE, 'BRING PO PADMA 'BUM LA 'DZIN RKA'I 'KHOG
CHUNG BA PADMA YAG LA SMAR ROL GYI SA CHA DANG

MI SDE BYIN, RNGA KHOG GI MI SDE, GSER KHOG GI KHRAL, GA-YU DANG
RTZANG KHOG GI SA CHA MI SDE RNAMS THUN MONG

DU BZHAG STE GYA DGU BA LA 'DAS, RDO RJE 'BUM GYI BU CHE BA 'BUM
PHYUG RGYAL DANG, CHUNG BA DBANG CHEN 'BUM,

'BUM PHYUG RGYAL LA BU GNYIS BYUNG BA'I CHE BA AA SKYONG, 'DI
STOBS 'BYOR MNGA' THANG MTHO, BU BDUN BYUNG

BAS DPON GONG MA, KHANG RGAN, KHANG SAR, RME NYO TSANG, SDE NANG
MTSO 'GRAM PA, SDE NANG RAB

KHA MDA'I DPON RIGS THAMS CAD AA SKYONG GI RGYUD PA, BYA GSHONG
TSANG, BLA MA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO, BLA MA

YON TAN RGYA MTSO, BLA MA 'GYUR MED MCHOG GRUB, DHI: PHUG CHOS
RJE'I SPRUL SKU, BLA MA BSOD NAMS RAB DGA'

SOGS BYUNG, SMAR HOR BA TSANG YANG 'DI'I TSA RGYUD, AA SKYONG GI
NU BO RGYAL MTSAN GYI RGYUD PA TSE RGYAL 'BUM LA

DPAL BZA' BU DRUG BYUNG BAR MKHAR RE DPAL SKOR ZER, ZHVA DMAR
BDUN PA GAR DBANG YE SHES SNYING PO

YANG 'DI LA 'KHRUNGS, SMAR ROL 'DZI MDA' MAN DANG, SMAR RONG
SMUG MDA' YAN GYI DPON RIGS RNAMS

'DI'I RGYUD PA YIN, YANG DE'I MI RGYUD DPAL BZA'I BU LNGA ZER
BA'I RGYUD DU BLA MA BSOD NAMS RIM CHEN,

` 'DZAM THANG GTZANG BA SKU SKYE DANG 'DZAM THANG CHOS RJE'I SKU
SKYE, GTZANG SPRUL SKU RNAMS KYANG 'KHRUNGS, DBANG

CHEN 'BUM GYIS SMAR NYIN SPU TSA'I SA CHA CHEN PO GDONG DU MKHAR
GYANG KHANG BZHI BRTZEGS RDO KHANG GI YANG THOG CAN

MKHAR MGO NAG MA ZER BA BRTZIGS, DE'I BU NAG THER DANG, BLA MA
KARMA RIN CHEN, DANG PO LA NAG

THER BU BZHIR GRAGS PA BYUNG BA'I RGYUD PA MANG DU MCHED PAS DME
TSANG SOGS RGYA CHE, 'DI'I RGYUD PAR KARMA DGU

BA DBANG PHYUG RDO RJE DANG, SI TU CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYI SLOB
MA KARMA YONGS 'DZIN ZER BA'I MKHAS GRUB GNYIS

LDAN ZHIG DANG, BLA MA KARMA TSUL KHRIMS, DRI MED ZHING SKYONG
MGON PO'I SLOB MA BLA MA KUN BZANG BSTAN

'DZIN; BLA MA NOR BU RGYA MTSO, 'DI SMAN LA MKHAS, BLA MA BSTAN
'DZIN, 'DAN SGOM CHOS GRAGS

KYI SKYE BA DBANG MDA' SPRUL SKU, BLA MA BSOD NAMS TSE RING, BLA
MA RIN CHEN RNAM RGYAL, BLA MA AU RGYAN

RIN CHEN, BLA MA RIG GROL, BLA MA 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO, BLA MA
KLONG YANGS SOGS GZHAN PHYOGS KYI DAM

PA MANG DU THON, PHEG THAR GYI BU CHUNG BA PAD MA YAG GIS GNYAN
NANG DU GZHI BZUNG BA'I RGYUD PA AA SKYONG GI

MNGA' 'OG TU YOD, GZHAN MGO LOG NGANG BA TSANG, NYOB LO TSANG,
'PHIS LE TSANG SOGS MANG,

LCAGS MO'I RIGS LA KARMA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I SGAR CHEN DU
BZHUGS PA LCAGS MO KU SHRI, LCAGS MO LHUN PO RTZE'I

@237 (LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

YONGS 'DZIN DAG, SDE DGE'I BLON RIGS AA LO BA TSANG GI MI RGYUD
LA SI TU CHOS KYI 'BYUNG GNAS 'KHRUNGS,

DENG SANG PADMA 'BUM, DANG CHEN, AA SKYONG GSUM LA MGO LOG KHA
GSUM ZER, DMAG ZOR MGON

PO'I BU BSOD NAMS BSTAN PA GNYAN PO GA-YU RTZE'I 'KHOR DU SKYES
PA BABS PAS, GA-YU RTZE DGE BSNYEN BSGRUB

PAS DENG SANG MI 'BAB, RMA CHEN GYI BRAN GA-YOG GI GRANGS YIN
YANG LO GCIG LA ZHAL LAN RE TZAM LAS MI MTHONG,

SA STENG GI RTZI SHING NAGS TSAL DANG CHU KUN LA BDAG BYED DGOS
PAS MI KHOM, BSANG GTONG MKHAN MANG BAS

BZA' BTUNG 'BYOR KYANG DMAR BSANG GNOD, DKAR BSANG BDEN STOBS
BRJOD DE BSNGOS NA THOB KYANG ZA

LONG MI 'DUG ZER BA THOS TE, DMAR BSANG NI PHYI ROL MU STEGS
PA'I PHYUGS KYI MCHOD SBYIN DU GRAGS PA'I LOG

CHOS RANG GZHAN LA GNOD TSUL DAM PA MANG POS SKABS DU MAR GSUNGS
LA, DE LAS KYANG 'DI 'DRA'I NGAG LA YID

RTON PA'I SNYIGS DUS KYI MI RNAMS PHAN DU RE NAS GNOD PA'I RGYU
BSGRUB MI RIGS PA 'DIS KYANG SHES SO, ,PADMA

'BUM GYI SAR RVA STON THUGS MCHOG RDO RJE'I SKYE BA DKON MCHOG
THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS BTAB PA'I SKYID LUNG RI KHROD

DAM SKYID RA'I DGON, GYI LUNG SPRUL PA'I SKU NYID MGO LOG DPON
RGYUD DU 'KHRUNGS, LO BRGYAD DGU NAS

DPA' RTZAL PHUN SUM TSOGS, BCU BZHI'I DUS RDO GRUB CHEN LAS RAB
TU BYUNG, DGE RTZE 'GYUR MED TSE DBANG

MCHOG GRUB BSTEN NAS RIG GNAS LA SBYANGS, SER BYE'I DGE BSHES
BSOD NAMS DON GRUB LA LAM RIM CHE

CHUNG SOGS GSAN, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I
DBYANGS KYI DRUNG NAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS,

PHAR PHYIN BSHAD PA DANG 'JIGS BYED DBANG SOGS ZHUS, GSHI CHEN
BSOD NAMS DPAL LDAN LAS RNYING BKA'

MANG PO DANG, AA MCHOG DGE BSHES LA YANG CHOS MANG DU GSAN, RDO
RJE GA-YUNG DRUNG ZER BA'I RI LAS GTER

BTON; ` SNGO MDOR DGON GSAR BSAM 'GRUB BDE LDAN AA MCHOG SPRUL
PA'I SKU NAS BTAB, KHU 'JO

DPON PO BYAMS PA BSTAN DAR SOGS KYIS BSKYANGS, PHYOGS DER ZHVA
SER GYI DGON SDE 'DI GCIG BU, GNA'

DUS BAR BZHIR DGE DGON CHEN PO BZHI DANG, BDAG PO PHYOGS BZHI
ZER BA YOD KYANG MGO LOG NAG THER GYIS

GTZES PAS DA LTA SHUL LAS MED, BDE LDAN GYI RGYAB RI LHA YAR
SPUN GSUM DANG, MDAR GA-YU RTZE'I SGO SRUNG

ZLA BA'I GSER KHRAB SOGS GZHI BDAG GRAGS CAN MANG, KARMA CHOS
DBYINGS RDO RJE'I 'KHRUNGS YUL MKHAR RE

RGYUD SDE DGON, DBANG CHEN STOD PAR RGYAL THANG GCOD KYI BLA
BRGYUD DU BZHUGS PA KUN MKHYEN GANGS PA'I MI

RGYUD DANG GDUNG RTEN, 'DI GANGS CAN CHOS RJE SH'AKYA BSHES
GNYEN YIN NAM SNYAM, DBANG CHEN SMAD PAR

'PHRANG GNYIS BAR GYI RNYING DGON KA THOG PAS 'DZIN BDAG BYED,
MGON PO BING GI GNAS SU GRAGS PA MGO

LOG LCAGS RI, DER DOM TSA HU TZI'I LHA KHANG GI SHUL, 'GU MDAR
KARMA BCU BA YE SHES RDO RJE 'KHRUNGS, KHANG

RGAN DU LUNG DKAR DGON, AA SKYONG GI SAR MCHOD RTEN BLA MS
BZHENGS PA'I MCHOD RTEN, BAR BZHIR

CHOS RGYAL MYA NGAN MED KYI BZHENGS PA'I MCHOD RTEN BRGYA RTZE
BRGYAD KYI NANG TSAN YIN ZER BA'I MCHOD RTEN BKRA

SHIS SGO MANG, RDO CHU DANG 'DZI CHU 'DRES PA'I RDO CHU'I STOD
DU GRUB DBANG KUN BZANG GZHAN PHAN PA'I BZHUGS

@238 (LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GNAS SHUG CHEN STAG MGO DANG, SNGON GYI LDONG RIGS RNAMS GYES
PA'I SA RDOR KHANG DRUG TU GRAGS PA DANG,

'DZI RKA PHYOGS LA CHOS RJE DOL BO PA'I DNGOS SLOB DKON MCHOG
BZANG GIS BTAB PA'I 'DZAM THANG CHOS SDE SOGS

SNANG; SMAR CHU, RDA CHU, RMA CHU GSUM GYI 'DZOMS SU GNYAN PO
GA-YU RTZE, DE'I MTHA' SKOR DU SNGO PHUG STAG MO

RDZONG; 'PHAG GE YANG RDZONG, SHA KHYI RA MA RDZONG, AA RTZE
KHRAB RDZONG, 'BRANG MO'I RTA RDZONG SOGS RDZONG

CHEN BCO BRGYAD DU GRAGS PA YANG YOD DO, ,

RMA KHOG PO TI'I MDO SOGS SU DPAL SHUL STOD SMAD, 'DI DAG LDONG
GI RIGS YIN TE, RI RTZE MO

GSUM DE LDONG LA THOB, ,LDONG ZHVA MGO MTHO BA DE YI DON, ,ZER
BA LTAR MNGA' THANG CHE, ,BE RI YANG

LDONG RIGS, KARMA ZHVA DMAR GSUM PA CHOS DPAL YE SHES KYI SLOB
MA NGOMS PA BYA BRAL NAM MKHA' RGYAL MTSAN

LUS MA SPANGS PAR MKHA' SPYOD DU GSHEGS PA'ANG LDONG, DE'I MI
RIGS NGAM SHOD DU YOD, MDO KHAMS

'DIR LDONG SHUL CHEN BCO BRGYAD DU GRAGS PA DPAL SHUL, RAG SHUL,
PHYAG SHUL SOGS LAS DPAL

SHUL NI, LDONG DPAL CHEN SKYABS KYI MI RIGS LA SKABS SHIG DPAL
SHUL PHUR BA THAR ZER BA MDOG NAG CING,

LUS RING LA GUG PA, RA SKAD 'DON PA ZHIG BYUNG BAS MING NGAN LA
LDONG MI NAG GUG GU RA SKAD ZER, DE'I

YUL RMA KHOG RVA RGYA CHU KHA SOGS YIN, LDONG 'BRU 'KHRUGS DUS
LDONG MI NAG LA RMA CHEN GYIS BSAM CHOD KYI RAL GRI

RTZE DGU BA DNGOS GRUB TU BYIN PAS GA-YUL LAS RGYAL, 'ON KYANG
LDONG MI NAG, SRAS GE LI, GZHAN DBAL

SHUL DPON RIGS AA SKYABS DANG BU CHUNG 'BANGS BCAS SMAR ROL RONG
GI SA CHA SAG TU ZHES PAR 'ONGS, GE LI'I

BU GE TZE, GE 'PHAN, GE RGYAL, BAN DE SKYABS BZHI, MI NAG GSHEGS
DUS KYI ZHAL CHEMS LTAR BON

PO ZHIG GIS PHAG BDE'I RDZA RGYAL GYI ZHOL DU GDUNG BZHUS, GDUNG
RUS DANG, BSAM CHOD KYI RAL GRI

RTZE DGU BA DPAL CHEN RGA LOS GRUB RTAGS KYIS BCAG KYANG SLAR
YANG REG GCOD KYI RAL GRI RTZE GSUM PAR GYUR BA

DE DANG, GO MTSON RNAMS NANG BZHUGS KYI MCHOD RTEN BZHENGS PA DA
LTA YANG YOD SKAD, SA SGRON GYI RTEN

'BREL BRTAG PAR PHA GE LIS MGUL GA-YU PHUL BA LA, GE LI GA-YU
RGYAL KHEB THANG CHE ZER, BU GE TZES MTSAL

THUB CIG PHUL BAR, GE TZE BYI'U KHRAG KUN LA DMAR ZER, GE 'PHAN
GYIS MDA' ZHIG PHUL BAS, GE

'PHAN NYAG PHRAG DGRA LA DPA' ZER, GE RGYAL GYIS SNAM DMAR 'DOM
GANG PHUL BAR, GE RGYAL RTA SHA KUN

LAS LOD ZER, BAN ZHAR GYIS KHA DAR ZHIG PHUL BAS, BAN DE'I KHA
DAR DGUNG LA DAR ZER BA BYUNG,

LO RGYUS GZHAN DU PHUR BA THAR GYI BU GE LI, GE TZE, GE 'PHAN
GSUM, GE LI DANG GE TZE'I RGYUD PA 'BUM

SKYABS YAG DANG KHRO KHO SOGS YIN, GE 'PHAN GYI RGYUD PA DPAL
SHUL BAN DPON ZER BA'I RGYUD DU KUN MKHYEN

BLA MA 'KHRUNGS, YANG GE 'PHAN GYI RGYUD PA TSAN GCIG YANG
BSKYAR RVA RGYA CHU KHAR SONG BA'I RGYUD PA SOG PO DANG AA

MDO PHYOGS SU 'PHEL BA DBAL MANG SOGS YIN ZER, DE'I RGYUD PA
TSANG CIG LHO PHYOGS GA-YO KHOG RTZANG

KHOG SGEG KHOG RNAMS BZUNG BAS GE 'PHAN GA-YU RTZANG SGEG GSUM,
GSER STOD DANG SNYI STOD DU CHAGS PA

@239 (LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GE 'PHAN RNYING BA DANG SBRA SKOR MA GNYIS LA GE 'PHAN STOD BZA'
TSANG, DA LTA YANG GE 'PHAN GYI BU RGYUD BAR KHAMS

SOGS SU MANG, GE TZE'I RGYUD PA GE TZE MA LAG THONG GSUM DU
GRAGS PA RGYA CHE, ZLA CHU STOD STE DGE'I MNGA'

ZHABS KYI DPON RIGS RNAMS KYANG GE TZE'I MI RGYUD YIN, GE TZE
DPON PO DANG GE TZE KHRO SHUL KYANG 'DI LAS GYES,

RGYAL GYI MI RGYUD BAR KHAMS SU YOD KYANG SA SGRON RTEN 'BREL

GYI DBANG GIS DPON RIGS MA BYUNG, PHUR BA THAR GYI SNGON MI

RGYUD PA GYES PAS THANG SKOR THOGS,

MTSAMS SU RI KHRO BTAB SRE KHRI CHEN MCHOG

TSANG BTZUGS NAS 'CHAD NYAN PA RIM PAR GTONG,

GLING GI MCHOD BZHIS RVA KHOG TSO BA BRGYAD KYI 'BROG SDE

LHA MO'I RGYU GRVAR MTSAN BTAGS BLANGS,

RJE PHRENG BA'I DBANG ZHUS, 'DI PAS SHING BZA'

DPON SLOB LA MI TRA RDOR PHRENG GNYIS KA ZHUS TE DNGUL RTA RMIG
MA SUM CU DANG RTA NOR SUM BRGYA LHAG PHUL DBUS

SU LAN GNYIS PHEBS, RGYAL BA YAB SRAS LA 'BUL NOD GZAB, DE NYID
KYIS SBYIN BDAG BYAS TE 'BRAS SGO

MANG 'BUL SDUD PA 'PHAN PO SMAN PA NGAG DBANG SBYIN PAS BYAMS ME
GDGON DGA' LDAN RNAM RGYAL GLING BTAB,

SKU BRNYAN BYIN CAN, BKA'

TSE RING, NYID DANG RUS GTOGS MDZOD

@243	(LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RIGS RGYUD KYI DON DU KUN MKHYEN MCHOG NAS DNGUL BUM LA RI GTER
BCUG PAS MI RABS MANG POR DAR, RJES

SOR ZHIG RANG RE MCHOD YON GYI BAR LA SEL 'JUG CES 'BYUNG 'GYUR
LUNG BSTAN, 'DI DANG THOG MNYAMS PA

DPON TSE BRTAN BZANG GI RGYUD PA MTSO GOR KHA BA, RAB BRTAN GYI
BU AA 'BRUG GIS RMA RME 'DRES MTSAMS SU SA

BZUNG; LO BRGYAD CU LHAG BSDAD KYANG DGRA RKUNG DANG GYOD ZER BA
RNA BAS THOS MA MYONG BAR GRANGS, 'DI

LA BU BDUN BYUNG BA'I RGYUD PA SO SOR GYES, THAMS CAD KYI SPYI
NAS GSER DNGUL SPEL MAS BKA' 'GYUR BZHENGS,

FMI RABS PHYI MA RNAMS LA YANG YUM RGYAS 'BRING BSDUS GSUM,
BSKAL BZANG THAR MDO RNAMS GSER DNGUL

GYIS BZHENGS MKHAN BYUNG, CHE BA BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS SDE DGER
LAN MANG PO SONG STE DPON CHEN DAG 'DRIS CHA

BYAS; CO NE DPON DANG PHU NU BSGRIG 'DI'I BU AA BU'I BLA MA, TSA
BO KLU 'BUM THAR GYI BLA MA GNYIS 'BRAS

SGO MANG BA, PHYI MAS MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS KYI ZHABS
PHYI LO SHAS ZHUS, DBUS NAS TZAN DANG JO

SKU RTZE KHRU GANG BA ZHIG DANG, CO NE NAS BKA' 'GYUR GDAN
DRANGS PA GNYIS KA DA LTA TSA GANG PE SHING DU BZHUGS,

RAB BRTAN GYI BU CHE 'OG LCAGS RGYAL GYI SDE KHROD DU THE BO BUM
PA'I RU BA MANG BAS BUM SKOR ZER, 'BRING PO AA

SNYING LA'ANG RGYUD PA YOD, 'BRING 'OG AA KLUM PHA KHYIM DU
BSDAD DE MDA' DMAR GZHUNG GI SA BZUNG BA'I RGYUD

PA PHYI RA STOD SMAD BAR GSUM DU GRAGS, HU RA STOD SMAD BAR GSUM
KYANG 'DI'I RGYUD PA, HU RA BAR

MA'I RGYUD DU KIRTI MCHOG SPRUL THUB BSTAN NYI MA 'KHRUNGS, ` AA
KLUM GYI BU CHUNG BA'I RGYUD PA SENG GE'I BLA MA

TSUL KHRIMS RIN CHEN, 'DI LHA MO'I CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS TZAM DANG,
BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU YUN RING BZHUGS TE

MTSAN BTAGS BLANGS, THUGS RGYUD 'JAM ZHING SKU YON CHE, GUNG
THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS LAS BSNYEN

PAR RDZOGS TE ZAB CHOS MANG DU MNOS, RANG YUL DU RVA BONG DGON
BKRA SHIS CHOS 'PHEL GLING BTAB,

DGON MING SKYABS MGON MCHOG NAS GNANG, ` RME CHU RME GDONG YAG
NAS NUB NGOS SU 'BAB PA'I STOD DU NGAGS

TSANG DANG CHOS RJE'I LHA SDE, SHAR KHOG KA RING KHIS NAS BYUNG
BA'I RE CHU RGYUD LA'I GSER TE'U NAS 'DRES,

DER STAG TSA'I SGAR, MDZOD DGE STOD MA DANG AA SKYID 'BROG TU,
MDO RTZA PHUB RNAMS YOD, ` BIS DGA'

BO LUNG ZER BA'I RI KHROD SOG PO SE RA BA ZLA BA GRAGS PAS BTAB,
'DI PA 'KHRUNGS SA AA SKYID RONG RU, DBUS

SU SER BYES CHOS GRVA 'GRIMS, GZHUNG NAS MKHAN CHAS 'BUL SDUD LA
BTANG, SOG POR DMAR SGUG KHO

KHU'I DKON MCHOG GI RTZAR BABS, KHO'I BU MO NA GI YOD PA LA
GDUGS DKAR BZLOG CHEN TSUGS, NYIN

GUNG GTOR MA 'PHANG, YON BDAG LA BU MOR DE RING LAS LHAG PA'I
TSE MED, SEMS KHRAL MA BYED, NGAS

KUN RIG 'DON GSUNGS PAR NAD PA DE'I TSOD MIN PAS RIM GRO ZHIG
GNANG NA ZHUS KYANG MA GSAN PAR KUN RIG

GSUNG; MDUN BSKYED NANG NAS MO TSE 'PHOS, DE NAS BZUNG 'PHRIN
LAS 'UR LANGS PA LTA BUS SPRA NAG

TSUN DBANG DU BSDUS, MNGON SHES DANG GRUB RTAGS MANG, RVA LO'I
SKYES PAR GRAGS, DBUS SU GTONG

THEBS LAN GSUM KHYER, RJES MA'I SKABS SER 'BRAS DGE GSUM LA GRO
MA MAR KHU PHUL, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL

@244	(LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

DU YANG MANG 'GYED BTANG, RI KHROD BTAB STE 'JIGS BYED KYI SGRUB
MCHOG DANG, GZHI GSUM GYI PHYAG LEN

NGOS GTZANG BA TSUGS, LO LTAR MA nI DUNG PHYUR RE SGRUB THEBS
BZHAG DA LTA SPRUL SKU YOD, SHING BZA'

SPRUL SKU'I DOGS GNAS SHIG BLUS PA'ANG DER BZHUGS, DBUS KYI DGE
BSHES 'GA' ZHIG KYANG YOD SNANG,

'DIR DANG POR PHEBS, RTA RGOD MA BRGYA DANG DNGUL SRANG SUM

KYIS 'DI PA'I MTHA' NAS SGAR GZHI 'DZIN, AA MA TSANG ZHES THUGS

YUL DME RKYEN DU BZHAG STE SDOM NAS 'ONGS

MKHYEN GONG MA GDAN DRANGS TE SGROL

DKAR RJES GNANG ZHUS, 'DI DANG AA BKRA GNYIS KYIS LHA MO DANG
KIRTI'I DGON GSAR TSUGS LA ZHABS TOG

BSGRUBS; BZHAG SDOM BLA MA BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN KIRTIR BZHUGS

DA LTA SPRUL SKU YANG YOD, BLA MA DAR RGYAS RGYA MTSO BKRA SHIS

@245	(LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SU BYED PA ZHIG BYUNG, MDZOD DGE DPON

'BANGS NA RIM GYIS KUN MKHYEN BLA MA SKU PHRENG YAB SRAS, RGYAL
TSAB NO MON HAN, KHRI CHEN RGYAL MTSAN,

SENG GE DANG SHAR SKU 'PHRENG, AA RIG DGE BSHES CHEN MO, SHING
BZA' RIM BYON SOGS BLA CHEN DU MA'I

ZHABS LA GTUGS SHING, MI TRA RDOR 'PHRENG GIS MTSON ZAB RGYAS
CHOS KYI BDUD RTZI LA SBYONG BA'I LAS BSOD CAN

DU SNANG,

RMA CHU SHAR NAS NUB TU 'KHYOG PA RMA RME 'DRES MTSAMS SU TSA
GANG PE SHING DGA' LDAN RAB RGYAS GLING JI LTAR

BYUNG TSUL NI, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DE NYID RGYA PHEBS
KYI DUS SKYABS MGON MCHOG LA, SNGON GLING

RJE GE SAR GYIS BZUNG BA'I YUL MDZOD DGE PHYOGS DE MI RABS DU
MAR 'DUG KYANG, DA PHAN CHAD GANG 'DRA YONG

MI SHES DE'I SA GNAD ZIN SA ZHIG TU DGON PA ZHIG BYUNG NA PHAN
THOGS YOD PA 'DRA STE KHYED KYIS DGON PA ZHIG THOB

BA'I NANG NAS DGON SA 'DI LEGS

TSUL BYUNG BA BZHIN DGON PA 'DEBS RTZIS MDZAD KYANG MDZOD DGE
DPAL DGON SOGS KYIS SA MA PHUL, 'DIR

ZHIG 'DEBS GSUNG BRAG LUNG GONG MAR GNAS

GZIGS KYIS SA BRTAG BSLANG DANG BKRA SHIS GSO SBYONG MDZAD, HOR
TSANG GSER KHRI RIN PO CHER BKA' GNANG

BZANG DKA' BCU DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO SOGS

TSANG BTZUGS, RDO RAMS PA TSANG DANG TSAR TSA'I DGE LEGS RGYA
MTSO GNYIS KYIS TSOGS GLENG BYAS TE RTEN 'BREL

BSGRIGS; SKYABS MGON RDO RJE 'CHANG YANG LAN SNGA PHYIR PHEBS,
RJES MA'I SKABS DRIL BU LUGS KYI BDE MCHOG

GI DBANG GNANG STE DGOS PA CAN GYI GSUNG GNANG TSUL RNAM THAR
LAS 'BYUNG, ME LUG LOR BCA' YIG KYANG BZHAG

KHRI CHEN NYID TSOGS CHEN KHRIR PHEBS SA BYA'I BAR LO DGU'I RING
PHAL CHER 'DIR BZHUGS, PAn CHEN CHOS RGYAN GYI

GSUNG 'BUM LUNG SOGS BKA' CHOS MANG DU GNANG, DGE TSUL SLONG KHA
SHAS BSGRUBS, THUGS DAM LA RTZE GCIG

TU GZHOL BA'I THUN GSENG DU GSUNG MGUR BSTZAL BA GDAN RABS SU
GSAL LA GNAS KYI CHE BAR SNANG, DE RJES

KHRI CHEN ZAM TSA SPRUL BA'I SKU GDAN SA PAR BSKOS, MDZOD DGE
DPAL MGON GYIS RTA BA GNYIS BRGYA TZAM KHRID DE

LA MO ZHABS DRUNG DKAR PO'I JA THAB STENG NAS PAn CHEN RIN PO
CHER RTA DNGUL GYI 'BUL BA SPAM MTHO BA BTEGS,

KHO RANG 'CHI KHAR SKU ZHABS SGO MANG TSANG LA DGON PA 'DEBS MA
BCUG PA LA SEMS 'GYOD CHEN, DA DGON PA GANG

LA 'DEBS NA MA 'DEBS CHUG CES KHA CHEMS BZHAG PA BZHIN BSOD RDOR

DU GNAS PA LTA BUS SA SHIN TU RTZUB PA'I STABS KYIS 'DI PHYOGS
SU SA GNON GYI DGON PA ZHIG 'DEBS RGYU'I THUGS

RTEN BRTEN PA GSER TSON BCAS KHYAD MTSAR

BLO GROS SOGS GDAN SA PA RIM BSKOS KYIS BSKYANGS PAS 'CHAD NYAN

@247	(LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RJE'I DNGOS SLOB RONG BO LJAGS NAG PA SOGS BYUNG, PHYI'I MA'I
RGYUD PA KHRA SHUL BYAMS SHUL GNYIS SU GYES PA'I SNGA

MA KLU CHU'I RGYUD KYI RTZE DBUS YIN LA, PHYI MA'I RGYUD PA RTZE

SKYE BAR GRAGS, BE LUR KARMA BKRA SHIS KYI

DBUS SU LAN GNYIS PHEBS PA'I SNGA MA'I

DBUS SU PHEBS DUS 'DI PAS RTA TSAG RIN PO CHE'I ZHABS BRTAN DU

BSNYEN RDZOGS BSGRUBS, GCOD RGAN
