@248	(LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO L;OG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CHOS RGYAL GYI SRAS TSE RING AEL DU CHI'I SRAS MKHA' 'GRO DANG,
DAR RGYAL PO SHOG THU GNYIS, SNGA MA'I SRAS 'A'I CHING, CHOG TH

GYUD PA DA LTA MTSO SNGON JU NANG SAG GI SDE KHROD DU YOD TSUL
DANG, YANG DAR RGYAL LA

BTZUN MO GSUM YOD PAS THOG MTHA' GNYIS LA SRAS RE RE DANG,
'BRING PO LA SRAS GSUM STE LNGA YOD CES RGYA BOD

HOR SOG GI LO RGYUS LAS GSUNGS LA, MKHA' 'GRO LA SRAS MED PAR
BSHAD PA DANG, DAR RGYAL LA SRAS BZHI

LAS MED PAR BSHAD PA'ANG SNANG, BDAG GIS MTHONG BA'I YI GE ZHIG
TU JU NANG DAR RGYAL PO SHOG THUS BTZUN

MO GNYIS BSDUS PAR, CHE BA'I SRAS ME RGAN NO YON BSTAN 'DZIN TSE
BRTAN, TA'I CHING HO SHUS CHI TSE DBANG

BSTAN 'DZIN, KHEN THAR DGA' LDAN BO SHOG THU GSUM, CHUNG BA'I
SRAS DPAL 'BAR TA'I CHING DANG,

TSE DBANG RAB BRTAN GNYIS LAS PHYI MA LA BU MED, ME REGAN NO YON
GYI SRAS LHA SKYABS ME RGAN TA'I CHING DE'I

SRAS JA SAG TSE DBANG RAB BRTAN, JA SAG DBANG PHYUG RAB BRTAN,
CHING WANG BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG PHYUG

GSUM; JA SAG TSE DBANG RAB BRTAN GYI SRAS RDO RJE TSE BRTAN YIN
YANG RGYUD PA MED, JA SAG DBANG PHYUG

RAB BRTAN GYI SRAS NGAG DBANG DAR RGYAS, BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN,
SHES RAB 'PHRIN LAS, KUN

DGA' SENG GE, KHRI CHEN RGYA NAG PA'I SPRUL SKU DANG LNGA, NGAG
DBANG DAR RGYAS LA WANG BYUNG BAS BAN MUG MA SAG

TU GRAGS PA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN LA RGYAL SA GTAD DANG, 'DIS
7GONG MAR BOD SOG GI MTSAMS SU 'OD BRKO

DGOS TSUL ZHUS PA'I RKYEN GYIS JA SAG GI THOB BLANGS TE NU BO LA
BYIN PAS 'PHRIN LAS JA SAG ZER, DE'I SRAS

MGON PO RDO RJE JA SAG DANG CHOS MDZAD BZANG PO, SNGA MA'I SRAS
SU SHING BZA' SPRUL BA'I SKU 'KHRUNGS PAS RVA

RGYA SU RUG CHING DU GRAGS, KHEN THAR GYI SRAS BSTAN LA RIGS
SRAS MA BYUNG BAS RUS DE RNAMS JA SAG GNYIS

LA BGOS PAS 'GAL GA SU MDA' BZHI YANG 'DI'I SDE KHROD DU YOD DO,

DPAL 'BAR D'A'I CHING GI SRAS ZER KHE D'A'I CHING, CHOG THU
D'A'I CHING, MKHAN PO NO MIN HAN GSUM,

PHYI MA 'DI'I RNAM THAR GZHAN DU GSAL, DANG PO LAS SRAS MED,
'BRING PO'I SRAS GUNG BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL

MTSO SNGON DUS 'KHRUGS SKABS RONG PHYOGS SU PHEBS DGOS BYUNG,
BTZUN MO BOD BZA' ZHIG DANG 'GROGS PAS

SRAS KLU 'BUM 'KHRUNGS, PHYIS SOG POR DPON MO GDUGS DKAR ZHES PA
SRAS RAB BRTAN DANG BCAS KHAB TU

BZHES PA'I SRAS KYIS RGYAL SA BZUNG, 'DI SA BSKOR LA PHEBS SKABS
MGO LOG GI DMAG GIS BKRONGS PAS

KLU 'BUM LA JA SAG BYUNG DE'I DPON RGYUD MDA' LNGA DANG BCAS PAS
SHAR GYI LCANG MA'I SDONG BO CHIG SKYES, LHO'I

RKYANG MTSO'I MTSO RGAN, NUB KYI SHO DO RDZA GOR, BYANG GI KHAG
MA TSUN GYI SA BZUNG STE YAB MES GONG MA'I DUS

LTAR BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU LNGA MCHOD SMON LAM GYI BSNYEN BKUR
BGYID BZHIN PA LAGS, ` 'DI DANG NYE BA KHAG

CHU'I RGYUD DU KHO TSE LHAG SDE YOD LA, DE NI SPREL LOR SKYABS
MGON MCHGO GIS AURGER RDOR 'PHRENG GNANG BA'I YON

DU PHUL BA'I RU BA RNAMS DANG, HA RA SHI RUG NA YOD PA'I LHA SDE
BCAS AER KHE TO TO NA'I SA STONG PAR YOD PA

BZUNG; DE DANG LA KHA SPRUL PA'I SKUS PHUL BA'I RGAN GYA NA
GNYIS KAR KHRI PA GTONG BZHIN MCHIS, BTZAN

@249	(LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MO SNA ZER BAR SNGON BTZAN GDUG PA CAN PHYI DROR DE'I THAD DU MI
ZOG SONG TSAD 'CHI BA ZHIG YOD PA KA THOG PA MTHU

STOBS RDO RJES DAM LA BTAGS, PHYAG MDZUB KYIS PHYAG RDOR GYI RDO
SKU BZHENGS PAR BSHAD PA DENG SANG RDO KHA

MIG CAN DU GRAGS PA DE YIN NAM SNYAM, HOR SMIN GROL YANG 'DI NAS
'KHRUNGS, LA MO BLO BZANG DGE LEGS

RGYAL MTSAN GYI SKU DUS CHOS DPAL JA SAG DANG NANG MA MTHUN PA'I
STABS KYIS, 7 GONG NAS RJE NYID LA JA SAG

GI THOB GNANG STE SKU PHRENG RIM BYON GYIS BLA DPON SBRAGS NAS
SKYONG, ` THOR GOD TSE DBANG RAB BRTAN GYIS YUNG

tING RGYAL PO'I DUS RGYAL NGO LOG PAS TO RGE AMBHAN GYIS KHRIMS
LA SBYAR, RUS GCIG PA'I DAR RGYAS ZER BA LA JA

SAG SPRAD, DE'I BU JA SAG TSE BRTAN RDO RJE LA BU MED PAS AA KHU
YONG SHA BO DKON MCHOG LA JA SAG BYUNG,

DE'I BRAG MA CIG TSE RING, DE'I BU JA SAG BSOD NAMS RAB BRTAN,
MDA' GNYIS DANG BCAS DA LTA

BLA MTSO'I GZHUNG GNA' DUS SOG POS BA LANG LA CHU BLUD SA BA
LANG DAR TE DANG NYE BAR YOD, JE SKAL LDAN RGYA

MTSO'I BZHUGS GNAS SANGS RGYAS STONG GI BLA RIR GRAGS PA'I GNAS
JI GIN DANG, BLA MTSO'I GNAS BSHAD RJE

DE NYID KYI GSUNG MGUR LAS 'BYUNG BA ZUR TZAM LOGS SU BKOD DO,

` DAR RGYAL BO SHOG THU MTSO SNGON GYI RGYAB NGOS SU BZHUGS PA
LA, DE DUS THU MED JO LO CHI RMA CHU'I LHO MDZOD

DGE GLING 'DUL NA YOD PA'I THA'I JI 'GA' ZHIG GIS LUG GU'I SHA
SOR 'PHROD PA SOGS BZUNG NAS STON MO PHUL,

SA CHA BZANG BA DANG RU SDE MANG PO MED TSUL ZHUS PAS RU SDE
DANG BCAS PA BZHI BTEGS NAS RTE 'BAL GYIS BZUNG,

DE RJES ZHIG THU MED RU 'THOR BAS THU MED 'THOR KHA LUG GUR TSO
BUD ZER BA'I GTAM DPE BYUNG, THU MED NI

CHAD SA HAL HA DANG, DANG PO MTSO KHA NAS BSDAD, CHOG THU MTSO
KHAR BYUNG DUS 'DAM KHOG TU BROS, DER

RGYAL BA YAB SRAS 'TSAMS ZHUS PA MANG DU BTANG BA'I LO RGYUS
YOD, HO LO CHI CHO LO'I MING YIN YANG RNAM THAR

'GAR DAG BTON TE 'KHOR LO CHE BZHES BRIS PA'ANG SNANG, PHAG THAR
HO LO CHI ZER BA ZHIG KYANG BYUNG BAS AA MCHOG

SGROG CHU'I KHAR PHAG THAR CHU THAG GI SHUL YOD PA'ANG 'DI'I YIN
NAM SNYAM, RANG LO LNGA THOG TZAM DU ZHES PA'ANG

THU MED HO LO CHI ZHIG GI SRAS YIN, DENG SANG TSOGS NA GSUNG
PA'I YE SHES BSKAL BA MA'I RTA 'DI LA THU MED KYI

RTA ZER, KHRI RGAN TSANG DBUS SU MA PHEBS GONG PHYOGS 'DIR GRONG
CHOG LA PHEBS DUS BLA RGAN 'GAS 'THEN PA

THUGS NA NGES PA TSSOGS SU BTZUGS, PHYIS LA MO TSANGGI DGONGS
DZOGS LA PHEBS SKABS LA MO'I GRVA BA 'GAS

GNYIS KA SKYOR MO LUNG GI SKYOR RTA LA MKHAS PA GNYIS KYIS SO
SOR KHRID PA RGYUN, SKYOR RTA KUN MKHYEN BAR MAS

DUS 'KHOR GRVA TSANG LA BTZUGS PA 'DI YIN NO, ,LA MO'I RTA YAB
RJE DHVA DZA'I ZHAL SNGA NAS DANG, BYING 'DREN

RONG PHRUG RNAM GNYIS LA BZHUGS PA BSDUR NAS 'GA' RE LA BSLAB
SNANG, DA LTA DBYANGS RGYUN GNYIS KA DKON

PAS DON GNYER CAN YOD NA 'TSOL RIGS SO, ,THU MED KYI MI RGYUD
DUR BED TSOGS 'PHEL TZAM LAS GZIGS

MA MYONG GSUNGS PA THOS, THOR GOD DANG ZHAN DU YANG THU MED ZER
BA 'GA' RE YOD KYANG 'DI'I RGYUD PA YIN

@250	(LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOGS SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MIN MA SHES LA, RNGA RGOD SPRUL SKUS RDOR JE THA'I JI YANG THU
MED HO LO CHI'I MI RGYUD DU BSHAD DO, ,DPON DAR

RGYAL GYIS CO NE YAN CHAD KYI RONG PHYOGS THAMS CAD DANG, REB
GONG STOD SMAD, RNGA BA RA MDO, ZUNG JU'I

SA TSUN CHAD LA DBANG BSGYUR, 'DI'I SRAS RNAMS KYI NANG NAS BSOD
NAMS STOBS KYI DBANG PHYUG TA'I CHING HO

SHUL CHI TSE DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN JU NANG NGAM JO NANG RGYAL PO
'DAB CHAGS RNA BA CAN DU GRAGS PA DE NYID LA, NGA'I

RU SDE MA RUNGS PA 'DI RNAMS BU 'BRING PO 'DI'I BSOD NAMS KYIS
MA NON NA GZHAN TSOS NON DKA' GSUNGS

SNGAR DPON BSTAN SKYONG GIS DBANG BSGYUR BA'I RU SDE RNAMS DANG,
REB GONGS STOD SMAD, RONG TZO CHEN BCO

BRGYA; RNGA BA RVA MDO, THE BO GZA' TSONG SOGS MNGA' 'BANGS SU
GNANG, 'DI LA BTZUN MO GSUM

YOD PAS CUN GAR BZA' RNAM RGYAL SGROL MA'I SRAS DON GRUB DBANG
RGYAL CHER MA 'GYANG BAR GSHEGS PAS GONG

GSAL ME RGEN TA'I CHING GI SRAS BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG PHYUG SRAS DOD
DU BLANGS, DPON MO AER KHE SHA RA DANG

MTSAMS SBYAR, YAB YUM 'DI GNYIS LA SRAS MING SRING LNGA BYUNG
BAS DGA' LDAN BSAM GRUB DANG, CHOS

'PHEL THA'I JI GNYIS CHUNG DUS GSHEGS, SRAS CHUNG BA RDO RJE PHA
LAM MA 'KHRUNGS PA'I STOD TZAM YAB DANG,

'KHRUNGS NAS CHER MA 'GYANG BAR YUM YANG GSHEGS, 7GONG NAS YAB
MES GONG MA RNAMS GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA

GSUNG SRAS CHUNG LA CHING WANG GI THOB DANG, DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD
BAR DU ZHANG PO KHE BE THU KUN LAS DON SHES

DGOS KYI BKA' PHEBS, CHING WANG 'DI NYID LCAGS STAG LOR GSHEGS,
RIGS SRAS MED PAS GONG SMOS

JA SAG DBANG PHYUG RAB BRTAN GYI SRAS NGAG DBANG DAR RGYAS JUN
WANG GI THOB BYUNG BA YIN NO, ,DPON GONG MA

RIM BYON 'DI DAG GIS SKYABS MGON RGYAL BA YAB SRAS DANG, KUN
MKHYEN BLA MA SKU 'PHRENG SOGS MDO DBUS KYI

BLA CHEN MANG POR BSNYEN BKUR ZLA MED PA ZHUS, GTZANG DBUS KYI
GDAN SA BZHI, CHOS SDE CHEN PO BKRA SHIS

'KHYIL; SKU 'BUM, BYA KHYUNG SOGS LA MANG 'GYED MANG DU PHUL,
RGYAL BA'I BKA' 'GYUR RO COG GSER

DNGUL 'BA' ZHIG GIS TSAR 'GA' ZHIG BZHENGS PA SOGS SKU GSUNG
THUGS RTEN GSAR BSKRUN BGRANG LAS

'DAS; GZHUNG SA DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG GI BSTAN SRID LA RGYA'I DON
DANG, 7 GONG MA CHEN MO'I CHAB SRID KYI DON DU

PHA ROL GYI RGOL BA'I DPUNG CHEN LAN GRANGS DU MAR PHEBS PA SOGS
BOD CHOS RGYAL GYI MDZAD RGYUN PHYAG BZHES SU

BSTAR BA SHA STAG YIN YANG, MKHYEN GTER SMRA BA'I DBANG PHYUG
RJE BLA MA DHVA DZA'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYIS RGYAL BOD HOR

SOG LO RGYUS SU ZHIB PAR BKA' BSTZAL BAS GRUB ZIN SGRUB PA'I
NGAL BA MA DGOS SO, ,'DI DUS KYI AURGE'I ZHABS

SDOD PA SKU TSAB BLA MA, BCU GSUM DU RAL DPON PO, DAR HAN DPON
PO, DBAL MANG JE SANG DPON

PO; SHES RAB JE SANG, DRUNG YIG AA BI CI SOGS CHOS SRID KYI
'GYING BAG CAN SHA STAG YIN NO, ,SKU

TSAB BLA MA BLO BZANG YAR 'PHEL MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS KYI MKHYEN
RGYA CHE ZHING, RNAM THAR ZUR TZAM YAB RJE DHVA DZA'I

ZHAL SNGA NAS KYI GSAN YIG TU 'BYUNG LA, DES BRTZAMS PA'I SNGAR
THANG LO TZ'A BA'I BKLAG THABS KYI tIKKA DANG

SUM RTAGS RTZA BA'I MCHAN 'GREL LA PAR YANG YOD, DBAL MANG DPON
PO NGAG DBANG RGYA MTSO RIG GNAS THAMS

@251	(LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CAD DANG LHAG PAR RTZIS LA MKHAS PAS BSKAL LI'I PHED DAG SOGS LA
MA LTOS PA'I LNGA BSDUS MGYOGS RTZIS GNAS

YANGS, DBAL SHUL CHOS RJE SOGS KYIS RIM PAR BSKYANGS, KU MKHYEN
GONG MA KHRIR BZHUGS TE DGON PA'IMIG GSAR

SPEL MANG DU YOD PA'I PHAL CHER PHRAN GYIS RTZIS 'PHRO GSAR SPOS
KYI GRAS SU BKOD YOD LA, DPON MO AER KHE SHA RA

DBUS PHEBS KYI DUS GZHUNG DU BLA SMAN DANG DRUNG YIG ZHUS PA'I
BOD PA BI CI CI LAS YI GE BSLAB PAS DA LTA BKRA SHIS

'KHYIL GYI YIG NAG GI SLOB RGYUN KYANG 'DI LAS BRGYUD PA YIN NO,
,SHES RAB RJE SANG LA YANG PHU LUNG BA'I GZA'

'DZIN MYONG BYANG GI MCHAN SOGS BRTZAM CHOS THOR BU SNANG, DGE
BA'I BSHES GNYEN KHA GYA'I DAR RGYAS PA SMAN

PA'I KHRI'I DUS SOG POR 'BUL SDUD LA PHEBS PA'I SGAR KHAR 'DI PA
'ONGS, BLA MA SU RED DRIS PAR KHA GYA'I DAR

RGYAS RED BYAS, PHYI NYIN JA DRANGS TE RTZA SHES KYI TSIG 'GA'
ZHIG DRIS PA'I LAN LA MGU NAS DE 'PHRAL SGAR GZHI

MTHAR BLANGS, DPE KHRID ZHUS, GZHAN TSOL 'DI RIGS BSHAD RGYU MED
PAR MA ZAD RANG RE BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL

BA TSO LA'ANG KHAG SE RED ZHUS SKAD, SMAN PA'I KHRI'I RING GTONG
SGO THAMS CAD DANG SGRUB MCHOD SBYIN BDAG GI KHUR

KYANG 'DI GCIG BUS BLANGS PAS DBANG RNON CHOS KYI RJES 'BRANGS
YA RABS LUGS SU SNANG, MDA' TSAN GYI SA

YAN PA'I YAR THANG DU DGON PA BTAB KYANG YUN RING MA GNAS, DPON
NGAG DBANG WANG NYID GSHEGS KHAR GU

RU SIDDHI DUNG PHYUR GCIG BTON PA'I PHRENG BA MGUL DU YOD PA 'DI
MA BLANGS BAR SPUR ZHUGS SBYANGS BYAS NA GSAR

RNYING GI RTAGS GNYIS YONG RGYU YOD GSUNGS PA LTAR BYAS PAS MGUL
PHRENG MES MA TSIG CING DBU THOD LA THUB DBANG

DANG PHYAG NGAR LA 'JIGS BYED DPA' CIG GI SKU RANG BYON BYUNG,
DE'I SRAS BKRA SHIS 'BYUNG GNAS, DE'I

SRAS LHUN CHAGS SHIGN, GSUM KAR 7GONG MA BDAG PO CHEN PO NA RIM
GYIS JUN WANG GI THOB DAG, CHE CHIN

PAD LHUN CHAGS SHING, GSUM KAR7 GONG MA BDAG PO CHEN PO NA RIM
GYIS JUN WANG GI THOB DANG, CHE CHING

MAN ZHES BKA'I DGONGS BLON BYUNG, GSER GYI BKA' 'GYUR BZHENGS,
RVA RGYA DANG CO NE NAS BKA' 'GYUR

GNYIS BLANGS, KUN GZIGS MCHOG LA RDO RJE PHRENG BA'I DBANG ZHUS,
BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SMON LAM LAN DU

MAR BTANG BA SOGS GONG MA RIM BYON GYI MDZAD RGYUN MA NYAMS PAR
BSKYANGS, WANG BKRA SHIS 'BYUNG GNAS

NYID GSHEGS KHAR KUN MKHYEN SKU PHRENG GSUM PA SKU NA PHRA DUS
KYI SKU 'GAG DANG, GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS

KYI SKU LCUG GNYIS SKU LA 'BRAL MED BSNAMS YOD PA LEN BCUG SKU
ZHABS GDAN 'DREN DU BTANG STE KHONG PHEBS

RING LA LA KHA TSANG DGE SLONG YAG PO ZHIG YIN PAS SNGAGS BSRUNG
ZHUS GSUNGS SKU GSHEGS, MNGON SHES GSAL BAS

GANG GSUNG SDE KHRI RIN PO'I CHE NAS KYANG TSAD MAR MDZAD PA
ZHIG YIN NO, ,'DI'I MNGA' ZHABS SU GTER SNGON RU SDE

BCAS DANG, 'BRUG LO'I SKU SKYES SOGS BLA SPRUL SKYE BRGYUD CAN
'GA' RE SNANG,

AURGE GRVA TSANG GSANG SNGAGS SMIN RGYAS GLING NI, DA RGYAS BO
SHOG THUS DBUS NAS RGYAL BA'I SKU TSAB TU BA

SO RJE DRUNG DKON MCHOG NYI MA GDAN DRANGS, ZHABS BRTAN GRVA
TSANG TSUGS, BDE THANG MKHAN PO BLO BZANG TSANGS

DBYANGS, DBAL SHUL CHOS RJE SOGS KYIS RIM PAR BSKYANGS, KUN
MKHYEN GONG MA KHRIR BZHUGS TE DGON PA'I@252 (LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MTSAN DE DUS GNANG, KHRI RGAN SDE RGAN RNAM GNYIS KYIS BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL DANG GNYIS 'DZIN MDZAD, SDE KHRI RIN

PO CHE HA CANG SKU NA SMIN PA NAS MGO RTA BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG
LO SUM CU LHAG BZHUGS PAS MGO RTA SHI RE THU ZHES

GRAGS; DE RJES RGYUD PA DPON SLOB 'JAM DBYANGS DPAL LDAN, DBAL
MANG BLO BZANG DON GRUB, 'DI BAS GRVA

TSANG GSAR TSUGS DUS KYI PHYING GUR LA DPE BLANGS TE TSOGS GUR
GRU BZHI BZOS, DBYAR SKU RIM CHEN MO TSUGS,

SKABS SKABS SU GRVA MANG DANG, DUS RGYUN RES MOS PA JE MANG DU
BTANG STE ZHABS BRTEN BSGRUB, RONG BO

ME RGAN CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG RGYA MTSO, THAR MI CHI BLO BZANG DON
GRUB, GLING DON GRUB RGYA MTSO, KHYA DGE

SPRUL PA'I SKU BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS BAR DANG, DPON BE SIS DPON
TSANG GI LAS DON MKHYEN SKABS SKYABS MGON

BAR MA YANG KHRIR BZHUGS, BCA' YIG MU TIG PHRENG BA BZHAG JUN
WANG NGANG DBANG DAR RGYAS KYI DUS RJE

DE NYID MCHOD YON DGONGS MTHUN GYIS GRVA GRANGS BRGYA DANG
BRGYAD RGYUN SDOD BYED RGYU DANG, RE RER LO GCIG LA

SEL BUG JA BAG SUM CU RE, 'DZIN GRVA GSUM PHYE STE LAM RIM, DGE
TSUL SLONG GI BSLAB BYA, BSKYED

RDZOGS BCAS KYI 'CHAD NYAN, SGRUB MCHOD, GTOR CHEN, GTOR SGRUB,
BZLOG CHEN BZHI SOGS

KYI PHYAG LEN, RIG GNAS BSLAB RGYUN BCAS BTZUGS, KHRI PA, BLA MA
DBU MDZAD, DGE BSKOS,

DGE RGAN SOGS BSKO BA'I SROL BTOD PA BZHIN, RGYUD PA SLOB ZUR
BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA KHRI PA DANG, RDO

RAMS PA NGAG DBANG MCHOG GRUB BLA MA DBU MDZAD DU BSKOS, DE NAS
KHRI CHEN BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS, RGYUD

PA SLOB ZUR BLO BZANG SBYIN PA, DPA' RE DKON MCHOG BDE CHEN SOGS
RIM PAR BZHUGS TE LO SUM CU TZAM GYI

RING DAR RGYAS KHO NA BYUNG BAS YONG SHA NAS SKU TSAB BLA MA,
NGAG DBANG DKON MCHOG CHOG LA DPON PO'I

BLA MA, 'JAM DBYANGS BKRA SHIS, KHYU MCHOG DAR HAN CHOS RJE,
PHYAG MDZOD BLA MA, KHYU MCHOG

DKA' CHEN, MGO TSA BLA MA, THOG SHUL CHOS MDZAD, DPAL MANG BLA
MA DGE LEGS, BLA MA BLO LDAN,

BLA MA CHOS 'PHEL, AA GYA BU TSA'I DAR HAN DKA' BCU, GA-YIS CHEN
BLA MA BLO LDAN, SOG RU NO YON RAB

'BYAMS PA SOGS DKA' RAMS GANG MANG THON, CHO HOR DGE RGAN BLA MA
DANG BKRA SHIS DPAL LDAN SOGS BLA

BRANG DPON TSANG GI KA BA DANG, GDUNG MA LTA BU'I SHES RGYA YOD
THANG CAN DU BRTZI, BAR SKABS SHIS GRVA TSANG BRTAN

CHED KHANG BA 'PHUG DGOS ZHES SKYABS MGON MCHOG LA ZHUS PAR,
KHANG PA 'PHUG MI DGOS MOD, CIS KYANG

DGOS NA CHU DMAR MGO GONG BZANG GSUNGS KYANG DAR HAN DKA' BCU
SOGS KYIS YUL BSGYUR NAS 'GRO MI THUB

CES WANG LA ZHU NAN BYAS PAS SENG GE THOD BAR DU MKHAR TZAM
BRTUNGS KYANG LUS, DPON JU NANG GI KU TSE STOD

LA 'BAL GYI KHE REB DANG, LHA BKRA SOGS SU YOD DUS NAS DBAL MANG
GRVA TSANG YIN, DBAL MANG DPAL

SHUL GYI RIGS LAS CHAD CING, AA GNAM RGYA LI BLA MA ZER BA LTA
BU'I BAG CHAGS CAN NUS LDAN ZHIG BYUNG,

PHEBS LAM ZHIG MGO LOG JAG PAS BCOM PAR SKU CHAS KHROD KYI DUNG
DKAR RANG GRAGS BYUNG BAS BCOM RDZAS

RNAMS PHYIR PHUL, DUNG RAG GSHOG CAN DA LTA BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI
GZIMS KHANG DU YOD, LAN CIG ZANGS

@253 (LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

DKAR GYI TSONG BA KHAMS SU 'GRO MKHAN GYI STENG DU JAG PA BRGYUG
STE BLANGS, PHAL CHER ZHIG RMAS TE RANG YUL DU

SONG; RMAS MA GCIG ZLA BO RNAMS KYIS MA MTHONG BAR LUS PA GRONG
STE ZHIG TU PHYIN, NYE TSAN GYI BUD MED ZHIG

DANG THUG PAS DER RE ZHIG BSDAD, YUL BA RNAMS KYIS SHI BA YIN
SNYAM RGYA LI BLA MA GDAN DRANGS, 'PHO BA

GSUNG BAR HIG MA GNANG, SNGAS RTA PHUL BA YANG MA BZHES PAR
PHEBS, DE NYIN 'PHO BA GNANG BA'I DUS

TSOD DER MI DE DRAN MED DU BRGYAL BA SANGS NAS, NGA LA RGYA LI
BLA MAS 'BOD PA'I SNANG BA DANG SNA LA GSUR DRI

ZHIG KYANG BYUNG BAS YUL BAS SHI GRAS SU BZHAG YOD 'DRA ZHES
MGYOGS PAR RANG YUL DU THON, 'DIR RU GSAR

DU 'ONGS TE LHA BKRA'I THANG DU YOD PAS SKABS RTA KHA SHES JAG
PAS DED PAR, CHOS SKYONG SKU THANG GI SNYAN SHAL 'THEN

TE KHYED YOD NA JAG DPON DE THAL PHUNG STEN DU 'PHEN TSUGS ZHES
GSUNGS MA THAG JAG DPON GLO BUR DU RTAS KHUR

TE RU MTHA'I THAL PHUNG STENG DU 'PHANGS PA SOGS GRUB PA'I RTAGS
MNGON TSAN CAN MANG, DE'I TSA BO RIN CHEN

RGYA MTSO DBUS KYI DGA' LDAN DGE BSHES, DKA' BCU DANG KHAMS TSAN
DGE RGAN BYAS, DOG RA RA YUS MA

ZHES PA'I SPYI KHANG BRGYAB, LNGA BA CHEN POS KHAMS TSAN LA BKA'
SHOG GNANG, RANG YUL DU DPON JU NANG

YAB YUM GYI THAR MI CHI DANG, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL PHYING GUR DUS
KYI DGE BSKOS BYAS, LUNG DKAR DANG BKRA

SHIS SKA RAGS KYI BAR NAS RI KHROD BZUNG NAS BZHUGS PAR DBAL
SHUL BLA RGAN GYI SGOM KHANG DU GRAGS, PHYIS

SOG YUL DU DGUNG LO MTHON PO LA THUGS DAM GYIS GSHEGS, KHU DPON
AU RGE'I BLA MCHOD DU BKUR BAS BZHUGS

YUL THAG RING GSUNG DPON JU NANG YAB YUM GYI BKAS NYID DU SKOR
BCAS BA'I GZHUNG DU 'ONGS, PHYIS GAD

DMAR GYI SA GNANG, GNAM MTSO SOG RU SOGS KYANG DER YONG NAS DBAL
MANG DANG MNYAM DU BSTAD PAS,

DBAL MANG, GNAM MTSO, SOG RU, KHYU MCHOG YONG SHA, GAD DMAR SMAD
NA MGO TSA, BLO

BZANG SBYIN PA TSANG GI MI RTZA AA RIG AEM CHI SOGS GRVA TSANG
GI SHOG CHEN PO YOD STABS HA THON WANG GI DUS DE'I STENG

DU GRVA TSANG GANG YOD BSDUS, SPA RI'I RGYA SGO TSUN CHAD KYI SA
CHA BSNAN NAS 'PHRIN LAS DAR RGYAS ZER BA BCU DPON

DU BSKOS, SOG RU NO YON RAB 'BYAMS PA DANG, DBAL MANG DPON PO
DPAL LDAN GNYIS ME DE CHI YIN

PAS GRVA TSANG GCIG PHUL KYANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL LA SMON LAM
BTANG, HA THON WANG GI RJES SU RANG RANG GI PHYOGS

SU SONG BA, NANG SO'I SKOR, AA GYA BU TSA'I TSO BZHI, RGAN GYA
TSANG, DBANG LO TSANG, AUS TZANG

MKHAN PO TSANG GI SKOR, DPAL MCHOG TSANG, SHA BU NAR DGE SLONG
TSANG, KHU BDE JE SANG BLA MA DANG KHU

BDE SNGAGS RAMS PA SOGS KYANG GRVA TSANG YIN, PHYIS SU RNYING
MA'I GRVA TSANG DANG PHUR BA'I 'CHAM TSUGS TE GRVA BA

GANG MANG DE'I GRAS SU BCUG PA DANG, RTZE CHU'I PHYI LOGS SHA
BO'I BZHUGS KHRI'I THANG DU WANG GI AU RGE BZUNG BA

DANG; SNGAR LHA BA BLO LDAN LA DPON NGAG DBANG WANG GIS SKU
PHEBS ZHUS PAR, TSANGS PA BABS, MDO SMAD

'DI LA RGYAL PO SKU LNGAS SKYONG RES YOD, DA LTA NAS 'DZIN DU
YIN PAS SKYON MED, DA NAS LO BCU GSUM

PA NA GNAS CHUNG GIS 'DZIN RES 'BAB, DE DUS KHYOD SDIG GROGS
KYIS BSKYOD NAS RTZA BA'I BLA MA DANG SEL 'JUG

@254 (LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GNAS CHUNG GIS BAR CHAD GTONG ZHES GSUNGS, DE NAS BRTZIS PA'I LO
BCU GSUM PA LA RAB 'PHRIN SHES RAB

WANG DANG THUG SKYABS MGON MCHOG NAS RDO RJE PHRENG BA GNANG DUS
YIN PAS KHONG LA SKYABS 'TSOL ZHUS PA CHOS

'BREL LA BKAR NAS NGO CHEN MDZAD KYANG KHO RANG BSAD, RTA NOR
NYIS BRGYA DANG LUG SUM BRGYA BLANGS TE KHYIM

TSANG MDA' TSAN GRAS NAS PHUD PAS DAM TSIG LA SEL ZHUGS, LHA BA
BLO LDAN KHO PHUNG BO MA BDE BAR YOD SKABS

KYANG BCU GSUM DU RAL DPON PO MNGAGS NAS SKU PHEBS RGYAG BCUG
SKU DON GANG ZHUS LA LAN DANG, RIGS

RGYUD RJES MA TSOR 'BAB DGOS TSUL ZHUS PAR, LHA KHOG 'DI DANG
NGED GNYIS SNGON NAS 'BREL CHE, DAD PA

CHE ZHING RANG BZHIN BRTAN, SKU ZHABS RIN PO CHE'I BKA' PHEBS
YOD PA BCAS BABS PA YIN, PHYIN CHAD

DE 'DRA MI YONG GSUNGS, SKU GROL NAS KYANG KHO BO DA RES NAD
'DIS MI 'PHYUD PAR 'DUG DPON TSANG LA

KHYED KYIS KHRAL 'DI GCIG MA PHAB PHYIN LO 'GA'I RJES NAS RU SDE
'THOR TE JI GIN SGAM BRAG LA BLTAS RDZA PHA GI'I PHAR

NANG NAS KHA CHU 'KHRO TE GCIG MA BSTAD NA NGA'I RNA BA CHOD CES
ZHUS ZER BA SOGS RKYEN DU MAS SOG DU 'THOR

BAS DGON PA NYAMS CHAG TU SONG, SKU RTEN PA NI MGO RTA SHI RE
THU'I BLA SE'I GRAS YIN, NYIN GCIG DNGUL

SDER ZHIG GNANG STE KHYOD KYIS 'DI'I NANG DU GTOR SUL RE ZHOG LA
'BRAS SPUNGS CHOS SKYONG LA GTOR BSNGOS THONGS,

KHO BOS KYANG PHYIN CHAD DU STE 'DI RNAM DE LA GTAD DGOS GSUNGS,
KHO RANG GI NYAMS SNANG LA YANG MI DKAR RTA

DKAR ZHON PA ZHIG GIS 'PHONGS SU BLANGS TE MKHA' DBYINGS MTHON
POR KHYER, YUL KHAMS MANG PO BSTAN,

THUR BLTAS PAS SHIN TU GTING RING BA'I GCONG RONG 'GA' NA ME
'BAR BA MTHONG BAS DE GAN YIN DRIS PAR,

DMYAL KHAMS YIN ZER, ZUNG ZAD 'JIGS ZHUM PA ZHIG BYUNG BA, NGA
RMA CHEN YIN, DED DANG GNAS

CHUNG GNYIS SNGON NAS KHYOD DANG LAS 'BREL CHE LAS GTOR BSNGOS
LA 'BAD NA TSE 'DIR SRUNG SKYOB BYED, PHYI MAR

DMYAL KHAMS YIN ZER, CHUNG ZAD 'JIGS ZHUM PA ZHIG BYUNG BAR, NGA
RMA CHEN YIN, DED DANG GNAS

CHUNG GNYIS SNGON NAS KHYOD DANG LAS 'BREL CHE LAS GTOR BSNGOS
LA 'BAD NA TSE 'DIR SRUNG SKYOB BYED, PHYI MAR

YANG KHYOD MA GI TSOR 'GRO MI DGOS PA ZHIG YIN GSUNGS, RNAM DAG
SMON LAM MA DANG GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG MA

TSAR 'BUM RE BTON PAS TSANGS PA DANG RMA CHEN BABS, RMA CHEN GYI
LUNG BZHIN SHER SNYING 'BUM KYANG BTON,

RMI LAM DANG DPYAD RNO BAS KUN MKHYEN YAB SRAS RNAMS KYIS KYANG
TSAD MAR MDZAD PA ZHIG YOD DO, ,DE DUS KHYU

MCHOG LHA PA ZER BAR DAM CAN DNGOS SU 'BAB CING, SKU PHEBS KYI
TSE PHYAG GNYIS PHAN TSUN BRDE BA'I STENG KA

MDZAD NA SBUD PA'I SGRA 'UR ZHUR GRAGS PA KUN GYIS THOS PA ZHIG
KYANG SNANG STE ZHAR BYUNG NGO, ,ME BYA LOR DPON BKRA

SHIS 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS GRVA TSANG 'DZUGS PAR DGONGS YAB RJE DHA
RDZA'I ZHAL SNGA NAS LA BKA' BROS BYUNG BA LAN

GYI GSUNG SHOG KYANG MTHONG BAS DGONGS BZHED SGRUB PA'I THABS LA
PHYI RABS RNAMS 'BAD RIGS SO, ,'ON KYANG

DA LTA'I BAR AU RGE'I DBU BLA GCIG LAS GCIG LHAG ZAM MA CHAD PAR
BYON TE DUS RIM GYI GTOR SGRUB SOGS CHAGS

MED KYI SROL BSKYANGS, SLOB DPON PADMAS LUNG GIS ZIN PA'I RTZE
'DUS RE, KUN MKHYEN BLA MAS DGON PA GSAR

TZUGS KYI SKAR 'DZIN MDZAD PA'I GNAS SHA BO RI RRTZE SOGS RTZE
DRIG SNYING BDUN, 'BAL GYI MTHON PO BCU GSUM

SOGS DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA MANG PO GNAS SHING, BKA'I GDAMS GLEGS
BAB LAS LUNG BSTAN PA'I GNAS

@255 (LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

DNGOS GZHI RTZE 'BAL GYI GZHUNG 'DI NYID YIN LA, SHAR GYI LUG
MGO'I LAM TZE, LHO'I MDZOD DGE NYID MA'I

SA CHU GOR GOR, NUB KYI RDO LA LHA CHEN, BYANG GI GNYAN RI RDZA
DMAR GYI BAR WANG GI SAR GTOGS SHING SNOD

BCUD KYI 'BYOR BA RGYA CHEN LA NGO MTSAR BA YOD DO, ,RTZE MDOR
KUN MKHYEN GONG MA YUN RING BZHUGS PA'I GNAS LA

BKRA SHIS CHOS RDZONG BTAGS, DER THUGS DAM GYI RTEN RTZE GZHUNG
BYAMS PAR GRAGS PAS 'BYUNG 'GYUR LUNG,

BSTAN; BKA' RTZOM 'GA' ZHIG GIS MJUG TU MI PHAM MDUN SA THEN
CHEN CHOS KYI GAN MDZOD DU SBYAR ZHES 'BYUNG,

'DI NAS NYIN LAM TZAM GYI SA KO SRIB TU GTZANG SKAR DON GRUB RAB
BRTAN GLING 'DEBS PA BO GTZANG SPRUL,

SKU BSTAN PA RGYA MTSO PA YIN LA, 'DI'I GONG MA GTZANG NAGS MA
NAS 'KHRUNGS PAS GTZANG DGER THOGS,

TSUL KHRIMS SHIN TU DAG CING DGE SBYOR LA BRTZON, LHA MO CHOS
SKYONG DU 'GO BA ZHIG BYUNG BA DE YIN NO, ,'GA'

RES RTZANG DGE RAB 'BYAMS PA ZHES PA SE RAR THUGS GNYER YUN RING
MDZAD PA ZHIG YIN YANG ZER, SPRUL BA'I

SKU BSTAN RGYAN PA NI AA RIG SMRA SKAM AA MYES CHOS SKYABS DANG,
YUM DKAR RIS KYI SRAS SU ME SBRUL LA 'KHRUNGS,

RONG BO DGON CHEN DU RNAM 'GREL LA SBYANGS, RANG RE RNAM 'GREL
LE'U DANG PO GNYIS BZUNG STE MKHAN CHEN DGE

'DUN RGYA MTSOR RGYUG PHUL BAR 'DI MA BRJED PA GYIS DANG KHYAD
LA DGOS DUS SHIG YOD GSUNGS, PHYIS SER

BYES SU THUGS GNYER DUS PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES PHEBS SKABS
MNGA' RIGS DGE BSHES THOGS MED DANG

MNYAM DU RNAM 'GREL TSOGS GLENG MDZAD, SKU ZLA DGE BSHES PA
GZHUNG LUGS GANG LA'ANG THOGS PA MED PAS

MTSAN DE LTAR GRAGS SHING, GRVA SA SER 'BRAS DGE GSUM GYI DGE
BSHES RNAMS KYIS DPE KHRID DANG DOGS GCOD

BYED YUL GYI SKU YON CAN YIN YANG LUNG RIGS KYIS TSAR BCAD PAS
PAn CHE MCHOG THUGS MNYES NAS DE RING AA

MDO ZHABS DRUNG GIS THOG MED THOGS BCAS BYAS SONG SHES ZHAL
RTZED DANG, SER BYES DPON SLOB BYAMS PA

SMON LAM LA ZHABS SRUNG 'DI LHA RAMS PA BYAS NAS LO KA RTZE SONG
GSUNGS, KHONG GSAR BA YIN ZHUS PAR,

'DI 'DRA ZHIG KHA DOG DKAR DMAR DU YOD KYANG LHA RAMS 'OS GSUNGS
PAS CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS NAS LO LNGA BA LA LHA

RAMS PA BYUNG, DPON SLOB BYAMS PAS KYANG 'DI BA BSE TSANG GI
SPRUL SKU YIN GSUNGS MKHAN YOD KYANG BDEN

PA 'DRA, 'DIS RIGS LUNG BTANG NA KLU 'BUM SBYIN RGAN KHO DRAN
YONG GSUNGS, DE DUS KUN MKHYEN BAR

MA DBUS SU BZHUGS PA'I DRUNG NAS BKA' CHOS GANG GNANG CHAG MED
GSAN, KHONG PHUR BU LCOG TU ZHABS THANG

LA YANG YANG PHEBS SKABS BYAS BRAL SPYI SHAR TU SKAR LNGAS BRANG
MGO RE NYOS TE GUNG TSIGS LAN LNGA 'DREN RGYU BYUNG PAS

BSOD NAMS BSAGS YOD CES YI RANG MDZAD, MDO MDZAD DU YANG RJE DE
NYID DANG MKHAN CHEN DGE 'DUN RGYA

MTSO RNAM GNYIS LO RER LAN MI MJAL BA MI SRID SKAD, LAN CIG BLA
BRANG DU MJAL BAR BYON SKABS SKYABS MGON

MCHOG PHYOGS PHEBS KYI CHED RTA GREN LA KHAL BRGYAB NAS YOD PAR
GTZANG TSANG PHEBS KYI 'DUG ZHUS PAS PHEBS RGYU

BSHOL; SKU MDUN DU 'PHROS PA DOGS GCOD ZHUS PAR SOG TSONG SLAR
LOG GI BAR BAN PHYING KHA BTING BA'I STENG

DU DPE CHA PO TI MANG PO ZHAL PHYE NAS BKA' LAN SGRO 'DOGS CHOD
PA GNANG, SHING BYA BLA CHOS SDE 'DI YI BTAB

@256 (LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

STE 'CHAD NYAN BTZUGS, LHA SA'I JO BO DANG SKU TSAD MNYAM PA'I
JO SKU DBUS LI DKON PA'I RTEN GTZOR BZHUGS,

RJE YAB SRAS, RGYAL BA PAn CHEN SKU 'PHRENG GI GSUNG 'BUM GYI
GTZOS PHYAG DPE MANG DU BSGRIGS, ME SPREL LOR

SKYABS MGON MCHOG NAS GSANG SNGAGS SMIN RGYAS GLING DU RDO RJE
'PHRENGS PA'I DBANG GNANG BA GSAN TE BRTAN

BZHUGS MTSAMS SBYOR KYANG PHUL, SA PHAG LA 'DU KHANG GZIMS KHANG
BCAS GSAR BSKRUN GRUB PA'I RAB GNAS

KYANG RJE DE NYID LA ZHUS, DE DUS KHONG GIS BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI
BSDUD GRVA TSANG MANG PO DPAR NAS BSNAMS PA GRVA

MANG LA BKRAM, KHYED KYI DGON PA LEGS PO 'DUG KYANG MCHOD RDZAS
MED GSUNG SLAR PHEBS NAS MCHOD RDZAS

'GA' ZHIG DANG PHRENG 'GYED KYANG BSKUR, SKU ZHABS NAS RDZOM
BSKUL MDZAD PA BZHIN SKYES RAB BBSTAN

'GREL BA DANG, RNAM 'GREL GYI YIG 'JIG KYANG MDZAD, DE SKABS PAN
CHEN RIG PA'O CHE SKU 'BUM DU BZHUGS

PA 'JAL, GSER NAG GI MNDAL LA GA-YU BYUR GYI TSOM BU BKOD PAS
THOG DRANGS KYI 'BUM GSUM PHUL PAR GRAGS

DGON PAR BCA' YIG ZHUS, PAn CHEN MCHOG NAS KHYED KYIS MGO LOG
'DUL THABS LA REM DGOS TSUL DANG,

DGYES GZIGS GZENGS BSTOD CHE BAR MDZAD PAS MTSAN SNYAN LHAG PAR
'PHEL, DER RJE DHRAM BDZRA LA MKHA'

SPYOD CHOS SKOR YONGS RDZOGS ZHUS, MTSAN GCIG DE'I 'PHO KHRID
GNANG BA GSAN NAS TSUR PHEBS DUS GZIMS

BRDA' BTANG BAR MKHA' SPYOD KYI BSU BA YIN GSUNG MJUG RDZOGS KYI
BAR GSAN PA CHER MI 'GYANGS PAR GSHEGS

PA'I BRDAR SNANG, PAn CHEN RNAM THAR TU GTZANG SKU SKYES KYIS
GSAR BSKRUN CHOS SDE LEGS BSHAD GLING LA BCA'

YIG BZHAG CES GSUNG, DGUNG LO ZHE BZHI PA LCAGS BYI LOR GSHEGS,
SNGAR LHA PA BLO LDAN LA DGON PA'I

MTSAN ZHUS PAR, DHA'I: DON GRUB RAB BRTAN BKRA SHIS RAB RGYAS
SAM, ,ZHES SOGS DANG, DGON

PA'I 'PHEL RGYAS DANG 'DZIN SKYONG GI DON ZHUS PAR, LO NI LO
GCIG BYI BA'I LO DE LA, ,ZHES SOGS DANG,

DGON PA SU LA GTAD ZHUS PAR, SHAR GYI PHYOGS KYI DGE BA'I BSHES
GNYEN LA, ,SNYING NAS RTZE GCIG BZHIN

DU GSOL BTAB NA, ,KHYOD KYI BSTAN PA SHAR LHO'I MTSAMS SU RGYAS,
,CHOS LUGS MI GCIG BSTAN PA

GNYIS PO DE, ,BSHES GNYEN KHYOD KYI DBANG DU 'DU BAR NGES, ,ZHES
DANG, SHAR CES PA LA THE TSOM

SKYES NAS GSAL BAR GSUNG DGOS ZHUS PAR, SHAR PHYOGS MANG RUNG
RGYAL PO'I PHO BRANG MIN, ,SHAR PHYOGS

RJE BTZUN BLA MA'I PHO BRANG DU, ,NYAMS DGA' BKRA SHIS DPAL BE'U
GA-YAS SU 'KHYIL, ,'GRO'I MGON PO

LEGS LDAN NAG PO'I SRAS, ,'JAM DBYANGS MTSAN CAN RJE BTZUN RED
MDA' BA, ,RTZA BA'I BLA MAR SPYI

BOR BZUNG BA NA, ,RTA LUG MTSAMS SU BSTAN PA RGYAS ZHES 'BYUNG,
,LUNG BSTAN CHIG THUB DAR GYI MDUD

PA YIN, ,ZHES PA'I LUNG BSTAN YOD PAR BRTEN, SKYABS MGON MCHOG
LA GTZANG SGAR BA'I LAS SNE THAMS

CAD DANG, AURGE'I WANG BCAS KYIS DGON DER PHEBS RGYU DANG 'DZIN
SKYONG DGOS TSUL NAN CHER ZHUS PA LTAR

LCAGS GLING LOR ZHAL BDAG MDZAD, GZHI MO GLAS DRUG 'DI SA GNAS
BZANG BAS DGON PA DER SPOS NA 'DU

KHANG NGA RANG GIS 'PHIB CHOG GSUNGS KYANG DANG BLANGS MA BYUNG,
RGYUD PA SLOB ZUR DKON MCHOG BDE CHEN PA KHRIR

@257 (LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BSKOS TE LUGS GNYIS KYIS BSKYANGS, DA LTA 'DZIN GRVA BCU GSUM
GYIS SER BYES YIG CHA'I STENG NAS MDO'I

'CHAD NYAN DANG, RGYUD PA DANG DUS 'KHRO GRVA TSANG BCAS MDO
SNGAGS ZUNG 'BREL SMON LAM, RIGS GRVA

LNGA MCHOD STOGS GRVA SA CHEN PO'I CHOS SPYOD KYI SROL BZANG YAR
LDAN DU YOD, GONG DU CHOS LUGS MI GCIG CES

PA'I DON LTAR YANG SPRUL DOGS GNAS GNYIS BYUNG BA CHOS SKYONG DE
NYID LA ZHUS PAR, GANGS CAN BOD YUL ZHES

SOGS KYIS PHYOGS GANG YIN, RGYAL PO GANG YI MNGA' 'BANGS YIN
TSUL, THAG NYE RING GI TSAD BCAS GSAL

BAR GSUNGS PAS SHA BU NAR DU NI GU GDUGS DKAR SKYABS KYI SRAS SU
'KHRUNGS PA DUN THUB BSTAN YAR

MAR BSTEN TE BKA' CHOS MANG

DAR RGYAL GYI DUS RNAM GNYIS SOG POR

@259 (LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

ZUNG 'JUG LAM, ,MNGON DU GYUR DANG RNAM PAR GOMS PA YI, ,SKYES
'PHAGS DAM PA PHYAG 'OS RNAMS

LA 'DUD, CES PA GNANG 'DUG STE 'GANG CHE, SDE KHRI RIN PO CHE AU
RGE'I KHRI'I DUS GSHEGS, DBU THOD

LA HAm YIG GSAL BAR BYON PA RJE DE NYID KYI PHYAG TU YOD SNANG,
DE'I SBRUL SKU THOR GOD THU MED NAS 'KHRUNGS PA

'DIR BZHUGS, `MIG DMAR DGE BSHES 'JAM DBYANG DON GRUB PA DGA'
LDAN DGE BSHES, PHYIS SU

'DI NAS 'CHAD NYAN MANG DU GNANG BAS DA LTA BLA BRANG DANG, KA
KOR SPRUL PA'I SKUS BRTZAMS PA'I RNAM THAR YANG

YOD SKAD THOS, `GZHAN YANG MTSAMS SKOR TSANG, SGRA BA'I MKHAN
PO, DBAL SHUL MKHAN PO, SKYI

CHE CHUNG, RI BYES CHE CHUNG, SMRA KHAMS SPRUL SKU, SGOM THAR
TSANG, GTZAN DGE BSHES, RNYE TSANG,

YI NGOGS SNGAGS RAMS PA, SBRA YOD TSANG, AA RIG KHRI PA, SGRO
TSANG SPRUN SKU SOGS SKYE BRGYUD CAN GYI SGAR

KHAG MANG BAR SNANG, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI SNGA MO'I GRVA RGYUN
'JAM DBYANGS AA RDZIS, 'JAM DBYANGS RAG

PA; 'JAM DBYANGS KHA CHE STE GTSANG SGRA GYI 'JAM DBYANGS GSUM
DU GRAGS PA PA'ANG BYUNG, JA SAG SBA NAG

NAS 'KHRUNGS PA ROG GYA'I BRTZI BZHAG TSANG NGAG DBANG MKHYEN
RAB DANG, DE'I KHU BO 'JAM DBAYNGS  ZER BA

BYUNG BA'I GNYIS KA SHES GNYEN TSAD LDAN PHYI MA 'DI 'JAM
DBYANGS GSUM GANG RUNG YIN NAM SNYAM MO, ,

MCHOG GZHIS GLU BA RGYAL 'BUM SKOR SOGS RMA LHO RGYUD KYI AA RIG
GI SDE CHE, ` 'DI NAS NYIN LAM BUNG MA LONGS

PA'I SA KHYUNG MGON RI'I MDUN DU RVA RGYA DGON BKRA SHIS KUN BDE
GLING NGAM BSHAD SGRUB BYAMS PA GLING, PHYIS

DGA' LDAN BKRA SHIS 'BYUNG GNAS SU GRAGS, 'DI 'DEBS PA PO AA RIG
DGE BSHES RGYAL MTSAN 'OD ZER BA

YIN; 'DI LA BYAMS PA DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN YANG ZER, AA RIG KHYEB
KYI SAR MA KHYE 'PHAGS PA SKYABS

DANG; AA SKYID BZANG PO COG SKYID KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU
GNYIS PA'I ME RTA LOR 'KHRUNGS, CHUNG DUS NAS

MI GZHI DANG SHES RAB LEGS PAS RGYA LI SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN
DAR GYIS YAB YUM LAS BSLANGS TE BSKYANGS,

BCU BDUN PA LA DBUS SU BRDZANGS, SER BYES SU LO BCU GSUM GYI
RING THUGS GNYER MDZAD, RNAM BSHAD

SNYING NGA RGYAN, MDZOD tIKA THAR LAM GSAL BYED, RJE BTZUN PA'I
SPYI THAL PHAL CHER THUGS LA BZUNG,

LHA RAMS PA'I DAM BCA'I NYIN DANG POR KLU 'BUM DGE BSHES BLO
BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BGRO GLING BTANG BAS

GRANGS CAN PA'I LUGS LA AA RIG LUNG BAR RTZVA MI SKYE ZHES KHAS
BLANGS KYANG TSIG 'KHRIR BRTZIS TE 'GANG CHUNG BAR

BYED; 'ON KYANG BDAG SKYES 'GOG TSUL LAS BRTZAMS PA'I RTEN 'BREL
GYI 'JOG MTSAMS YIN PAS DPYAD BYA

SNANG; NYIN GNYIS PAR RGYA SENG GE SONGS MDZOD 'DUL GYI DGE
BSHES GZHON PA MANG PO LANGS PAS MDZOD NAS

'DZIN MTSAMS LA NANG 'GAL 'GA' ZHIG BYUNG YANG SPYIR SLOB GNYER
BA GRAGS CAN YIN PAS SHOR GRAS SU MED PAR

AANG DANG BYUNG, RGYUD SMAD DU SNGAGS LA SBYANGS, PHUR BU LCOG
TU LO DRUG GI RING RJE NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA'I

DRUNG NAS ZAB CHOS GSAN PA DANG SGOM SGRUB KYI ZHOR RJE'I MDO
SNGAGS KYI LAM RIM GNYIS BZUNG STE SKU 'DA' KHA'I

BAR ZHAL 'DON MDZAD, RGYAL SRAS BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI LAS SLOB KYANG
GNANG, LO DRUG LA BLA MA'I RGYAL TSAB

@260 (LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MOG LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MDZAD DE YONGS 'DZIN NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS LA BKA' 'GYUR GYI
LUNG PHUL BA SOGS 'CHAD SPEL RGA CHER GNANG,

PAn CHEN MCHOG BLA MA'I GTZO BO LA DUS 'KHRO GYI DBANG GSAN
SKABS LUS NGAG YID GSUM LONGS SPYOD BCAS

'BUL BA'I DAM BCA' MDZAD PA BZHIN PHYIS DGON PA YANG PHUL,
BSNYEN RDZOGS KYANG RJE 'DI LA ZHUS SAM SNYAM,

RGYAL MCHOG SKAL BZANG GYA MTSOR CHOS 'BREL GSAN, KHRI NGAG
DBANG MCHOG LDAN LA SANGS RGYAS DNGOS KYI 'DU

SHES KYIS MJAL KHA LAN GCIG ZHUS, LCANG SKYA ROL BA'I RDO RJE
BKA' CHOS BKA' CHOS MANG PO MNYAN, DBANG GNANG

NA DGE BSHES 'DRA MANG DUS DBANG BRDA SPROD TZAM MDZAD, GZHAN
PA'I DUS CHA GSUM GCIG GI THUGS BREL

LAS MI SNANG, SANGS RGYAS DNGOS KYI 'DUS SHES YOD CES GSUNGS,
PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE'I BKAS RANG YUL DU

DGON PA 'DEBS PAR BSKUL BA BZHIN MDO SMAD DU 'BYON KHAR SGO LA'I
NANG DU KLING RDOL BLA MA PHEBS TE PHAN TSUN

PHYAG NAS BZUNG THUGS SMON GNANG, RVA RGYA BKRA SHIS LJONGS SU
NYID KYI ZHE BZHI PA SA GLANG LOR CHOS SDE 'DI NYID

BTAB PA YIN LA, DE YANG PHA CHOS LE'U NYER DRUG PA LAS, RVA RI
RTUL DANG BRAL BA STE, ,ZHES DANG,

RGYA RIG PA'I CHU BO MDUN DU 'BAB CES PAS GNAS KYI MING, GDONG
KHA BZHI TSAD MED BZHI LDAN LAS, ,ZHES

SOGS KYIS BYANG DU B RAG DMAR BYEN LANG GI GDONG BZHI BSTAN PA
SOGS GNAS KYI DPYAD, DED MKHA' 'GRO'I

RGYAL MTSAN BSGRENGS PA 'DRA, ,ZHES DANG, CHOS DGE BCU'I 'OD ZER
SPRO BAR BYED, ,CES PAS

'DEBS PA BO'I MTSAN SGRA GSAL BAR THON PA SOGS SPRO DGOS MANG DU
YOD KYANG YI GE LA 'JIGIS NAS BZHAG

DGON PA PAN CHEN RIN PO CHER PHUL BAR AE RTI NI ME RGAN MKHAN
PO'I CHO LO DANG, MTSAN NYID TSUGS DGOS KYI

BKA' PHEBS BZHIN SER BYES LTAR GYI 'CHAD NYAN BTZUGS, BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL GYI DGE BSHES KHRI RGAN GRVA RGYUN YI

NGOGS BLA MA KUN BZANG KHRIR BSKOS TE BRTZI BZHAGS GTONG BCUG LO
SHAS NAS SA GNOD CHE BA LA STONG CHE'I MKHAR

NAG BON POS SA 'DUL BYAS, DANG POR GRVA TSOGS BZHI BRGYA TZAM
'DUS PA AA RIG DANG SOG PO'I RU 'THOR BAS

BRGYA MA LONGS TZAM LA BABS, RJE NYID 'BROG K HROD PHEBS BZHUD
KYI SAR THUD GANG BYUNG MNYAM BRDZI BYAS PA'I THUD

GDAR GNYIS RE MDZO KHAL BYAS TE GRVA MANG LA BGOS, JA MAR NAS
GSUM GYI PHOG BUD, PHYING BA DANG RAS KHA

GANG RNYED KYIS GRVA BA RANG RANG GI LUS TSAD DANG BSTUN PHYING
'GAG BZOS, GZANG SHAM, ZHVA ZLAM, THA

NA 'TSEM SKUD YAN CHAD NYID NAS GNANG, RKANG BRO TZAM GYI GRVA
BA GZHAN DU 'GRO NA NGAS BTZEMS PA'I GYON PA

ZHOG LA SONG, GNYOM CHUNG SDOD MKHAN RE BYUNG NA DGOS GSUNGS,
'DI LAS DGA' BYAS NA NGAS THUB KYANG

HA CANG BRGYAG NA GRVA BA 'DI LA DRAN RGYU MANG, RAN TZAM YIN,
GLA BA MI TSO MI RDZUD TZAM GYI DPE LTAR NGAS GOS,

MTSAN NYID ZER RGYU DE MI MANG POS RTZOD DGOS PA ZHIG RED, RTZOD
PA DKA', RJE'I BSTAN PA DANG MJAL

'JAL LA BAG CHAGS CI THEBS GYIS, SKYOR SBAYNGS LA RIM GSUNGS PAS
LO GCIG LA RNAM BSHAD SNYING BO RGYAN SKYOR

MKHAN NYER LNGA DANG, GZHAN LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO, RJE BTZUN PA'I
PHAR PHYIN SOGS SKYOR MKHAN MANG ZHES AA

RIG GSUNG RAB ZER, LHA KHANG DANG SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN KYANG
MANG DU BZHENGS TE LO NYER BZHI'I BAR BSKYANGS,

@261 (LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CHU BYI LOR SHING BA'I SPRUL BA'I SKU LA GDAN SA GTAD DE NYID
BYA BTANG GI TSUL GYIS MDO SMAD KYI SGRUB SDE PHAL CHER

DANG; RNGA BA GRAGS PA KA MDO'I KHRI'I DUS DER PHABS, SA CHA 'DI
TSO LUNG PA DMAR PO SNOD BCUD LA BRTAGS

NA YI DVAGS LAS TSE 'PHOS PA'I SPREL PHRUG GI RGYUD 'DRA, STOD
SMAD KYI SOG PO RTZED MO LA DGA' BAS LHA, RONG

BA REB GONG 'KHRUNGS PA LA DGA' BAS LHA MIN, RNGA BA AA RIG GLEN
PAS DUD 'GRO LAS TSE 'PHOS 'DRA ZHES GSUNG

'PHROS MDZAD, HANG NGE MDO AA RIG CHU SNGON GYI KHA NA LCANG
MA'I NAGS YOD PA RTZO MO NGO ZER BAR YUN RING BZHUGS,

SDONG PO RNAMS LA SNYAN SHAL 'THEN, RGYU MTSAN ZHUS PAR, 'DI
PHAL BA MIN, 'DI RE RE'I RTZA BA NAS

BSKAL BZANG GI SANGS RGYAS RE RES THUGS BSKYED PA GRANGS MI ZIN
GSUNGS, AA RIG ZHO MA PHUG TU YANG BZHUGS,

NYAN THOS 'GOG SNYOMS PA BZHUGS PAR GRAGS PA'I GNAS LHA KHANG
LUNG BA'I BRAG PHUG DANG, STONG 'KHRO MKHAR

NANG GNYIS SU DBYAR DGUN RES MOS KYIS BZHUGS SA'I MTHIL GNANG,
'DI NAS KYANG DGON PAR SNAM PHRUGS,

RTZE ZHVA SOGS KYI 'GYED YANG YANG BSKUR, PHYAG TU GSER GANG
BYUNG DBUS GTZAN DU MANG 'GYED DANG, RGYAL

GANG YOD KYIS GSUNG RAB DANG THANG KA MANG DU

SBRA NAG KHA GSUM GYI RKUS KHRIMS

GCOD RGYUR SHAR SPRUL PA'I SKU LA RGYU MTSAN ZHUS, DONG RTZE
GANG RNYED BSAGS NAS THE GU GANG MTSAMS LA RGYUD TE

SPRANG PO LNGA BRGYA DRUG BRGYA LA SPRANG 'GYED GTONG, THER GU
PHYIR BLANGS TE YANG BSKYAR SKYONG GSOG BYED, 'GRIG

LAM DAG THER SOGS KYI CHED DGON PAR GDAN DRANGS PAR DGUN GCIG
BZHUGS, SHING BZA' DPON SLOB

KYIS KHA SHOM LAG SHOM MA BYAS NA MTSAN NYID GRVA TSANG GI THA
SNYAD MED CES RNAM 'GYUR SOGS BSLAB STE RTZOD GRVA SHOG

CHEN PO BYUNG 'DUG PAR, 'DANG RGYOBS, BSAM BLO MA BTANG NA GI
BTAB PA'I NYES BYAS GCIG THAL

MO BRDAB PA'I GCIG, HAB CHA BRGYAB PA'I GCIG SOGS 'BYUNG GSUNGS,
'GRIG 'GAL MANG PO LA, NGAS

'DIR DGON PA ZHIG BTAB PA GRVA BA GNYOM CHUNG DPE CHA RE LHA
MKHAN AE YONG BSAM PA YIN, KHYED RANG TSOS TSONG

KHYED SPOGS DANG RGYU NOR GSOG GI BSDAD NA GRVA BA YA RAB TSO'I
MIG LTOS LA GNOD PAS NYI MA DE RING NAS SKU KHAMS

BDE MO GYIS ZHES ZAM SO RE'I 'GYED GNANG STE GNAS NAS DBYUNG,
DGON PA RGYA ZA'I TSAG LO DANG BONG STAG RU LO

SOGS LA GTAD DGOS ZHUS PAR, DE 'DRA MA ZER, BSTAN PA CHOS SKYONG
GIS BSRUNG BA MA GTOGS, JAG DPON

GYIS BSRUNG ZER BA MED CES GSUNGS, NAN BYAS PAR, BOS NAS JA DANG
ZHO THUD BRGYUD, 'U CAG GI MING 'DOGS

GCIG YIN, DED TSO DGE BSHES GNYEN, KHYED TSO MI DGE BA'I BSHEGS
GNYEN, DENG SANG MI DGE BA'I BSHES

GNYEN NUS PA CHE BAS KHYED TSO LA DGON PA GTOD ZER GI NGA'I GSER
PHRAN TSEGS PO 'DI CHOS KYI NGO RTZI DANG, SKU

'DRA'I ZHAL GSER LA BSAM PA YIN 'DI LA SRANG RE SRANG RE YOD,
NGA LA RTA KHA SHAS YOD PA'I NANG NAS 'DAM KHA

BTANG STE RE RE LONGS, NGAS AA MCHOD DGUNG ZHAG GI BSAM PA
'DZIN, DA PHYIN CHAD DMAG KHA JAG KHA MA BSKOR,

GA-YAS ZUR NA, ,'BRONG MA LA BU 'KHYIL AA RIG

RNAMS; MTSO 'THUNG GI RDZA LA GSHAR NA BZANG, ,ZHES LUNG BSTAN
YOD PAS MGON PO GDONG LA BUD NA BZANG

BA'I BKOD KHYAB MDZAD, DON BRGYAD PA LA SGO ME TING GYA RI KHROD
KYI NYE 'DABS GNAS GZHI PHUR PHEBS, 'CHIS

BTZAL BAS 'DI RNYED, 'DI NAS RMA CHEN GYI GANGS RI MTHONG BAS DE
LA MGO BSTAN NAS 'CHI DGOS TSUL DANG,

MKHAR RDO'I DPAR LAM RIM TSOGS ZHING DU RMA CHEN BKOD PA LAS

NGES DANG POR THUGS BSKYED PA'I RNAM 'DREN THAMS CAD GZIGS PA

DU PHEBS RGYU DANG SPRUL SKU DGOS TSUL ZHUS PA

SPRUL SKU MI YONG, YOD NA LHAG PAR MI YONG,

DANG SNGAGS RIM CHEN MO GNYIS KHYIS DED KYANG

RE LONGS MTSAMS RTAGS AE THON GYI RE BAS

BDUN PHRAG MANG PO SBREL NAS LHA MO BSKUL KYANG RTAGS MA THON
ZHES RJE 'DI NYID LA ZHUS PAR, KHYED TSOS SMYO RTAGS

BSTAN 'DUG RANG RE TSOS NGA'I CHOS SKYONG DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL
YIN, LHA MO YIN BYAS PA NGA'I RGYAL PO GONG MA

RGYAL PO YIN BYAS PA DANG KHYAD PAR MED, RANG GI TSUL KHRIMS KYI
BSRUNG TSOD, THOS BSAM GYI BYAS TSOD LA

DPAG NA LHA 'DRE GANG RUNG RGYA MI THONG SHI LTA BU ZHIG LA GANG
YOD BYIN NAS NGA'I DON DAG THAMS CAD 7GONG MA RGYAL

POR ZHUS ZHES BSKUL BSKUL BA DANG KHYAD CI YOD GSUNGS PA DANG,
YANG SBYIN BDAG CIG GIS LUG LA SPYANG KHUS

SNANG BA'I DON DU PHYAG MO ZHUS PAR, KHYOD LA LUG CI TZAM 'DUG
GSUNGS PA LA, 'DI 'DRA ZHIG YOD ZHUS

PAS; LUG DGA' MO 'DUG, DE THAMS CAD TSONGS LA DBUS PHYOGS KYI
DGON SDE CHE PHRA RNAMS DANG, MDO

SMAD 'DI'I DGON SDE YOD DO COG LA ZHAL 'DEBS SEMS MI PHAM PA
ZHIG SGRUBS, LHAG MA KHYOD RANG GI KHA RGYAB

KYI JEN GYIS GSUNGS PA KHOS RTZE MOR GO BA LA, KHO BOS KHYOD LA
BDEN PA YIN, KHYOD KYIS SPYANG KHU RGYUG SNOD BZUNG

BSTAD? NA RGYUG GI LOS 'DUG GSUNGS PA DANG, SNGON GYI DGE TSUL
SLONG RNAMS KHYIM NAS NGES PAR BYUNG STE SDOM PA

GSUM BLANGS PAS RAB BYUNG ZER BA RED, DENG SANG SDOM PA BLANGS
TSAR NAS SLAR KHYIM GYI BYA BYED THAMS CAD

KYI DBANG GRVA BA DES 'DZIN DGOS PAR 'DUG PAS RAB BYUNG MA RED,

@263	(LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

ZER DGOS GSUNGS PA SOGS GANG GSUNG GZHAN DANG MI MTHUN PA'I
NYAMS MTSAR LTA BU LA, DPYAD NA NUS PA

DANG GO RGYU CHE ZHES BLA MAS GSUNGS PA THOS PAS GSUNG SGROS
PHAL CHER BKOD PA YIN NO, ,BOD SOG GI BLA DPON

CHE PHRA DU MA DANG, SKU 'BUM SOGS BYANG RGYUD, LA MO BDE CHEN
SOGS LHO RGYUD KYI DGON SGRUB SDE MANG POR

DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG GI CHAR PHAB PAS LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE, TSA
GAN NO MIN HAN, BTZAN PO NO MIN HAN,

STONG 'KHOR NO MIN HAN SOGS SLOB MA SKYES CHEN DAM PA MANG DU
BYUNG, YANG NYID KYI ZHAL CHEMS SU, DNGUL

RDO TSAD BDUN CU YOD, 'DIS JO SKU ZHIG BZHENGS TE SE RAR SKYOL,
KHYED RANG GIS RDO TSAD BDUN CUS JO

SKU ZHIG BZHENGS NAS RVA RGYAR BZHUGS DGOS GSUNGS PA THUGS SRAS
SHING BZA' DPON SLOB KYIS SPRUL SKU'I BRDAR

DGONGS AA RIG RAB BE TSANG LA TSA GAN NO MIN HAN GYI YANG SPRUL
DANG SKU MCHED DU 'KHRUNGS PA BLO BZANG BSTAN

'DZIN CHOS 'PHEL GDAN SAR BKOD PA PHYIS AA RIG GUR SGAR DU
BZHUGS, ` RJE NYID KYI GDAN SA BA SHING BZA'

SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS NI, AA RIG GI SAR YAB MGON SHUL
PHYAG RDOR SKYABS DANG, YUM AA RIG BZA'

SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS NI, AA RIG GI SAR YAB MGON SHUL
PHYAG RDOR SKYABS DANG, YUM AA RIG BZA'

TSE DBANG SKYID GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA YOS
LOR 'KHRUNGS, BRGYAD PA LA GTZANG BA BLO BZANG

CHOS 'PHEL LAS RAB TU BYUNG, BCU BA LA DGE BSHES CHEN MO MJAL,
SHING BZA' SGOM CHEN PA'I SPRUL SKUR

NGOS BZUNG, GONG MA DE NYID 'DUL 'DZIN KHYAD PAR CAN AA RIG GRU
SHING BZO BA'I RGYUD PA ZUR CHAG NAS SHING

BZAR GRAGS PA'I RGYUD DU 'KHRUNGS PA ZHIG YIN NO, ,BCU GSUM PA
LA KHRI 'DON DANG RE ZHIG RANG DGON GYI

CHOS GRVA 'GRIM, RTAGS GSAL GO DKA' BA BYUNG BAR DBYANGS CAN MA
DMAR MO BSGRUB PAS SKYED THON,

BCU BDUN PA LA DGE BSHES PA'I BKAS DBUS SU BYON, SER BYES GRVA
TSANG DU BYA BRAL DNGOS GRUB DGE RGAN DU

BSTEN TE LO BCU GSUM GYI RING LA YIG CHA SHOG CHEN STONG LHAG
BZUNG STE TSOGS RGYUG KYANG PHUL, PAn CHEN MCHOG

NAS RGYAL DBANG 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSOR RAL RIM CHEN MO'I BSHAD
LUNG GNANG BA GSAN, DE NAS BZUNG GSUNG

RAB LA DPYOD PA'I SGO CUNG ZHIG RNYED PA BLA MA'I THUGS RJE YIN
GSUNGS, BSNYEN RDZOGS KYANG RJE DE NYID LA ZHUS,

DBYANGS CAN DGYES PA'I BLO GROS ZHES PA'I KUN BSHAD KYI MTSAN
KYANG BSTZAL, YONGS 'DZIN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN,

KLONG RDOL BLA MA, RGYAL SRAS BSKAL BZANG MTSAN CAN, RA LA SPRUL
SKU, LCAGS RA NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS

SOGS LA CHOS MANG DU GSAN, LHA RAMS PA'I DAM BCA' AANG DANG
BYUNG, RGYUD SMAD CHOS GRVA LO BZHI 'GRIM,

SNGAGS KYI DAM BCA' DANG DGE BSKOS THON, AO THOG GI CHAR 'CHAD
NYAN MDZAD BZHIN PAR LO GCIG TZAM

BZHUGS; BLA MA DGE BSHES PA'I GSUNG BZHIN CHU BYI LOR RANG YUL
DU BYON, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE'I SKU TSAB

SLOB DPON TSOGS BSAGS PA BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN DANG, BLA MA DGE
BSHES PA RNAM GNYIS NAS CHOS SDE'I KHRIR

BSKOS PA LO DE'I RGYAL ZLA'I YAR TSES LA KHRI 'DON MDZAD, 'CHAD
NYAN DMAR ZHING GZHI BYES GNYIS KAR RDO RJE

PHRENG BA'I DBANG BCO LNGA LHAG MI TRA LAN BZHI, DUS 'KHOR DBANG
BCUR NYE BA, BDE GSANG SOGS

KYI ZUR BKA'I DBANG GRANGS MANG, LAM RIM CHEN MO, 'GREL BA BZHI
SBRAGS, LEGS BSHAD SNYING BO,

@264	(LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BRGYAD STONG SOGS KYI BSHAD LUNG TSAR KHA SHAS, BDE LAM, PHYAG
CHEN, BLA MCHOD SOGS KHRI KYI RNAM

GRANGS SHIN TU MANG PO BCAS CHOS BKA' MTHA' YAS PA GNANG, SKU
'BUM KHRIR BZHUGS TE MDZAD RGYUN RGYA CHE

YANG GDAN RABS SU GSAL, RONG BO DGON CHEN DANG, LA MO BDE CHEN
GYI KHRI YANG MDZAD, AA RIG

SBRA NAG KHA GSUM, ZAM TSA, MGO LOG RNAMS LA JAG RKUS KYI KHRIMS
BSDAMS, SMAD KYI SBYIN BDAG

'GA' ZHIG GI NGOR AUR DU SUR PHEBS, AO TOG TA BE LI'I DGON PA
SPOS TE BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR GLING ZHES

BTAGS; RE DRUG PA SHING SPREL LA RANG DGON DU GSHEGS, MA GSHEGS
PA'I SNGON 'BROM STON PA PHEBS

'DUG STE SHA BA GCIG LA CHIBS SNANG GSUNGS, GSHEGS NAS KYANG
THUGS DAM SGROL MA'I PHYAG GA-YON PA'I SRIN

MDZUB KYI RTZE NAS BDUD RTZI'I RGYUN THUGS DAM GROL GYI BAR
BABS, SKU TSE SNGON MAR YANG RJE'I MA YUM SHING BZA'

AA CE DANG, GRUB CHEN NA KHA BA THAR BA'I RGYAL MTSAN YIN PAR
GRAGS SO DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I DBANG

PHYUG TSUL KHRIMS PHUN TSOGS, DA LTA BZHUGS SHING SBRA NAG NAS
MDZOD DGE BAR GYI 'BROG SDE PHAL MO CHER MI TRA

RDOR PHRENG SOGS CHOS RGYUN MANG DU SPEL BAS 'PHRIN LAS KHYAB
BDAL GYI SKABS SO, ,` SDE 'DIR DGE BSHES

CHEN MO'I SKU DUS NAS RNAM BSHAD SNYING BO RGYAN, RTZA 'JUG GI
TIKA CHEN, LAM RIM CHE CHUNG SOGS GZHUNG

CHEN NAG PO 'DZIN SKYOR GTZO BOR BTON PA'I 'CHAD NYAN SER BYES
NANG BZHIN LA, RGYUN JA CHAG MED, ZLA

CHOS DRUG DANG, ZHAG BCO LNGA'I BAR CHOS GNYIS, CHO 'PHREL SMON
LA, LNGA MCHOD SMON LAM, BZANG

SPYOD SMON LAM, DE DAG GI SKABS KYI PHOG JA TSUL SOGS 'GRIG BCAD
GTAN CHAGS PA'I THOG SHING BZA' DPON

SLOB NYID NAS RGYUD DUS 'KHOR SMAN GRVA GSUM BTZUGS, RGYUD PA'I
CHOS GRVAR RGYUD GZHUNG LE'I BCU BDUN PA

YONGS RDZOGS, DUS 'KHOR LA BSDUS RGYUD LE'U DANG PO, SPYOD 'JUG
CHEN MO, 'JAM DPAL MTSAN

BRJOD; SMAN PAR MDO SDUD PA, BSHAD RGYUD DANG, RTZA BA THUGS
RGYUD RNAMS ZHAL 'DON DANG, RAB

BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I MJUG GI ME STAG NAS BZUNG BDE GSANG 'JIGS
GSUM, DUS 'KHOR, KYEE RDOR,

'KHOR CHEN, THIG LE BCU DRUG, RNAM SNANG MNGON BYANG, RDOR
DBYINGS, KUN RIG GDUGS

DKAR; TSE DPAG STE DKYIL 'KHOR BCU GNYIS, SHING BZA' 'DI PAS
GSAR 'DZUGS MDZAD PA THUGS RJE

CHEN PO RGYAL BA RGYA MTSO, MI 'KHRUGS PA RNAMS KYI SGRUB MCHOD
RDUL TSON LA BRTEN PA NAG ZLA'I TSES BRGYAD NAS

BCU BZHI BAR LO LTAR CHAG MED, BCO LNGA'I NYIN RANG RANG GI KHA
SKONG SBYIN SREG  YANG GSANG SGRUB MCHOD DANG

'BREL BAR BSKANG BSKUL GTOR BZLOG DBANG GI SBYIN SREG BCAS DANG,
STON DUS KYANG RAS BRIS LA BRTEN PA

DANG MJUG GI SBYIN SREG MED PA MA GTOGS SNGAR BZHIN BSGRUB SROL
YOD, LO RE BZHIN BKA' 'GYUR DAG TSAR,

SHER SNYING 'BUM, LO MJUG TU LCAGS MKHAR ZUR BCU DRUG PA BDUN
SGRUB, MGON PO'I GTOR CHEN,

GDUGS DKAR BZLOG CHEN, YANG GSANG GTOR BZLOG SOGS KYI DUS RIM
BSTAR CHAGS SU GNAS, BLA MA'I

ZHAL CHEMS LTAR DNGUL RDO TSAD SUM CU DANG DNGOS PO SNA TSOGS
PAS RGYU SBYAR GYIS BZHENGS PA'I JO SKU LHA SA'I JO

@265	(LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BO'I SKU TSAD LAS LHAG PA PHRA RGYAN PHUN SUM TSOGS PA CAN DANG,
SMAD NAS GDAN DRANGS PA'I SGROL MA'I SKU BRNYAN,

RGYAN DRUG MCHOG GNYIS SOGS LI SKU GRANGS MANG KUN DGA' RA BA
DANG BCAS PA, SHING BZA' GONG MA'I SKU

GDUNG RIL BO NANG BZHUGS KYI MCHOD RTEN, DNGUL SRANG KHRI PHRAG
LHAG GIS BZHENGS PA'I GSER GYI BKA' 'GYUR,

SDE DGE NAS GDAN DRANGS PA'I BKA' BSTAN, BYAMS PA'I GOS SKU KHRU
BRGYAD CU PA SOGS SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN

BGRANG LAS 'DAS SHING, LUGS GNYIS KYI GZI BYIN CHE BAS, 7GONG MA
CHEN POS KYANG LEGS BSHAD GLING

ZHES BSNGAGS, BKA' 'GYUR DANG RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM SOGS PAR KYANG
MANG DU BZHUGS SO, ,RAB BYUNG

BCU GSUM PA'I SA GLANG LA CHOS SDE BTAB NAS LO GO BDUN PA SHING
GLANG 'DI YIN NO, ` ,RGYAL BA LUNG RTOGS RGYA

MTSO'I YANG SPRUL DOGS GNAS ZHIG AA RIG TU 'KHRUNGS PA SHING
BZA' GONG MAS DBUS SU BRDZANGS, PHYIR PHEBS

NAS GDAN SA GTAD PAS DA LTA SHING BZA' TSANG DANG RNAM GNYIS NAS
SPYI BLA MKHAN PO GNANG ZHING SKYE BRGYUD KYANG

YOD; ;RGYA LO GONG MA SER BYES BYA BRAL DGE BSHES STAG PHRUG CES
PA GRONG YUL DU MI PHEBS PAS AA RIG 'JOG

'THI'I LHA RI TE 'U DKAR ZHES PA'I MDUN DU DGON PA BTAB PA MGO
LOG GIS GTOR, DE NAS HANG NGE RI RGAN

GYI 'DABS SGAR CHAG TU SPOS PA RVA NGAN GYIS GTZE BAS 'JANG
CHUNG DU SPOS KYANG DA LTA STONGS, DE'I RJES MA BLO

BZANG BSTAN DAR, DE'I SPRUL SKU RONG BO MKHAN CHEN GYI SKU TSAR
'KHRUNGS PA DGE 'DUN YAR 'PHEL, GA-YER

GSHONG DGE 'DUN ZLA GRAGS KYI RNAM THAR TU DGE SLONG 'JAM
DBYANGS GRAGS PA RGYA LI SGAR DU GDAN DRANGS BEG TZE

BE'U BUM GYI LUNG SOGS ZHUS TSUL DANG, DE DUS RGYA LI TSANG GIS,
NGED RDZONG SER MA nI RIL SGRUB LA PHYIN SKABS

SHIG MAN LA LAM DU, THANG CHEN PO ZHIG GI DKYIL NA MTSO RGYA
KHYON DANG LDAN PA MTHA' NA MI MANG POS BSKOR BA ZHIG

GI LOGS GCIG NA STONG 'KHOR RIN PO CHE DANG, LOGS GCIG NA GA-YER
GSHONG GONG MAS CHOS GOS RNAM GSUM

SNE RING BCAS SGRON NAS BZHUGS 'DUG PAS, NGAS DGON PA 'DI RANG
LO ZHE DRUG GI DUS BTAB PA YIN PAS

KHYOD KYIS NGES PA GYIS ZHES GSUNGS PA DANG, MTHA' SKOR GYI MI
RNAMS KYIS MTSO DE LAS RANG RANG GI SKAL BA

BTUNG ZIN PA DANG MA ZIN PA SNA TSOGS LA, KHO BOS RANG GI SKAL
BA BTUNG ZIN PAS NGOMS PA'I SNANG BA SHAR BA

ZHIG BYUNG ZHES BLA MA DGE SLONG PA LA ZHUS, KHONG GIS PHYIS
RNAM THAR LA GZIGS PAS DGON PA BTAB LO JI LTA BA

BZHIN 'DUG CES 'BYUNG BA DGE 'DUN YAR 'PHEL KHONG YIN NAM SNYAM,
DA LTA'I 'DI PA LCAGS SBRUL LOR RGYA

BZA' NAS 'KHRUNGS, RGYA BZA'I KHRI RGAN GYIS RVA RGYAR GDAN SAR
BKOD DE NYID ZUR BZHUGS MDZAD PAS GZHIS

KA 'DI PAR 'JAGS SHING SKU ZHABS RNAM GSUM GYI GRANGS YIN NO,,

GSER KHANG PA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO AA RIG CHU STOD DU
RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I LCAGS BYI LOR

'KHRUNGS; LO BDUN PA LA KA KOR SPRUL PA'I SKU'I DRUNG NAS RAB
BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, AA RIG DGE

BSHES KYIS RA YOB 'JAM DBYANGS KUN DGA'I SPRUL SKUR THAG BCAD,
RJE DE'I DRUNG NAS 'JIGS BYED KYI DBANG

DANG; LAM RIM CHEN MO SOGS GSAN, BCU GSUM PA LA RVA RGYA'I CHOS
GRVAR ZHUGS, RNAM BSHAD SNYING

@266	(LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BO RGYAN, LEGS BSHAD SNYING BO, RJE BTZUN PA'I DBU MA, MDO RTZA
RNAMS BZUNG STE BKA' POTA YONGS

RDZOGS LA SBYANGS, SHING BZA' DPON SLOB LA DBU PHAR GYI BSHAD PA
DANG, MNGON RTOGS RGYAN YUM RGYAS

'BRING BSDUS GSUM DANG SBYAR BA'I BSHAD LUNG YUM GSUM GNOD 'JOMS
KYI STENG NAS GANG BA GSAN, RNAM

'GREL DPE KHRID TSAR GSUM DANG THAR LAM GSAL BYED LA YANG DPE
KHRID ZHUS, NYI SHU PA LA RJE DE NYID LAS BSNYEN

PAR RDZOGS, BRGYAD STONG PA DANG RJE'I MDO SNGAGS KYI LAM RIM
GNYIS, 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS, RIM

LNGA GSAL SGRON, 'GREL CHEN DRI MED 'OD RNAMS KYI BSHAD LUNG
DANG, LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO'I BSHAD LUNG

TSAR GNYIS, LAM RIM BLO SBYONG, BLA MCHOD, BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM
GYI BSKYED RDZOGS SOGS KYI

KHRID; GSANG 'JIGS DANG PHRENG BA'I DBANG, N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD
MA'I BYIN RLABS SOGS SNGA PHYIR GSAN,

RVA ZA SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I DNGOS GRUB SHING BZA' DPON
SLOB KYI DRUNG DU CHOS ZHUR PHEBS PA LA LAM KHRID

'JAM DPAL ZHAL LUNG DANG, STAG PHU'I SGROL MA'I CHOS SKOR SOGS
'GA' ZHIG ZHUS, RGYUD GRVAR 'DON CHA

DANG SNGAGS LA SBYANGS, RVA RGYA'I NYE 'KHOR RGOD PO RDZONG DU
YUN RING BZHUGS, MTSO SNYING DU LO NGO MTHONG GSUM

SKU MTSAMS BSDAMS, GSER KHANG DU 'DAG SBYAR GYIS LO MTSAMS KHA
SHAS GNANG BAS GSER KHANG PAR GRAGS,

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYI DRUNG NAS
LAM GTZO'I KHRID SMIN RGYAS SEMS BSKYED MCHOD PA

DANG BCAS PA MNOS, BYA KHYUNG DU AA RA PA RTZA'I SGRUB KHANG NAS
SKU MTSAMS MDZAD, GSER GDUNG LA BDUD

RTZI BABS, DER SNGA PHYIR LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO, LAM RIM CHEN MO,
BE BUM SNGON PO RNAMS KYI BSHAD

LUNG; BLA MCHOD MYUR LAM DANG SBRAGS PA'I KHRID GNANG, KHRI KAR
SRIN PO RI'I RDZA 'DABS PHUG PA 'GOL BO

ZHIG TU YUN RING BZHUGS, BDE CHEN DU MAR KHA'I SKU PHYOGS NGAG
DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN LA RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM GYI

LUNG DANG, SKU PHYOGS SGAR BA TSANG LA YANG GSANG GI DBANG SOGS
ZHUS, DE KA'I TSOGS MANG LA SNGA PHYIR BDE

SANG 'JIGS GSUM GYI DBANG DANG, LEGS BSHAD SNYING BO'I BSHAD
LUNG, BLA MCHOD KYI KHRID GNANG,

RONG BOR GRUB GNAS RNAM DANG SGRUB SDE PHAL CHER LA PHEBS, DGO
CHEN DU LAM RIM CHEN MO'I BSHAD LUNG

TSAR GNYIS, MYUR LAM DANG LEGS BSHAD SNYING BO'I BSHAD LUNG, RVA
RGYAR LAM RIM CHEN MO'I BSHAD LUNG

GNANG; ZI LING BRGYUD 'BRI GUNG BA BZA' GRUB CHEN LAS KHRID CHEN
BRGYAD, BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM

GYI BSKYED RDZOGS KYI KHRID, BCU CHA'I SKOR RNAMS GSAN, LANG
GRU'I SDE BZHIR GNAS 'BREL DANG SHING PHUNG

ZIR DGUN DPYID 'JIGS BYED LA BSNYEN PA BTANG, MCHOD RTEN THANG
DU BDE LAM KHRID DANG DUS 'KHOR GYI

DBANG GNANG, LDAN MA TSANG LA PAn CHEN CHOS RGYAN GSUNG 'BUM
DANG, KOR RTZA SPRUL SKUR BKA' DBANG

MANG PO ZHUS, RGYA THANG GI BRAG KHUNG NAS MTSAMS MDZAD, LOO KYA
TUN DU AOm GSUM MA'I SBYIN SREG 'BUM

GCIG DANG KHRI DRUG PHUL, AA 'GANG DANG KO'U BA DGON DU SKU
MTSAMS, DGON LUNG RGYUD GRVAR RDUL TSON GYI

STENG NAS GSANG 'DUS KYI DBANG, LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO'I BSHAD
LUNG, GSER KHOG TSOGS CHEN LA LAM

@267	(LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA STOD MGO LOG SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RIM CHE CHUNG GI BSHAD LUNG, CHA GAN GVO LAR ZLA BA LNGA TZAM LA
YI DAM GYI BSNYEN MTSAMS GNANG, SKU 'BUM

DU MYUR LAM GYI KHRID DANG PHRENG BA'I DBANG, PHRA TI ZHVA DMAR
DANG RAB RGYAS GNYIS KAR BDE LAM GYI KHRID,

JAG RUNG DGON CHEN DU BLA MCHOD KYI KHRID BSTZAL, DAN TIG DANG
YANG TIG TU YANG PHEBS, RI BO RTZE LNGAR

GNAS MJAL DANG RE ZHIG BZHUGS, MKHAR SNGON POR MKHAR SNGON TSANG
GIS ZHUS TE LAM RIM CHEN MO'I BSHAD

LUNG DANG GSANG BDE 'JIGS GSUM GYI DBANG, PE CING DU TZANG DAN
JO BO MJAL, AA LAG SHAR LAM RIM

CHEN MO'I BSHAD LUNG, DUS 'KHOR GYI DBANG TSAR GSUM SNGA PHYIR
GNANG, TA'I THUNG DGON CHEN DU L'U KYA

ZHABS DRUNG GIS ZHUS NGOR LAM RIM CHEN MO'I BSHAD LUNG, DUS
'KHOR GYI DBANG, GRO TSANG DU LAM RIM

CHEN MO'I BSHAD LUNG, STONG 'KHOR DGON DU RDO RJE PHRENG BA'I
DBANG, SU LA DGON DU BYANG CHUB GZHUNG LAM

GYI BSHAD PA, SHUG CHUR THOG MA'I BLO SBYONG GI KHRID, MI NYAG
RDZONG DU THAL BZLOG DANG 'JUG tIKA SBYAR BA'I

GZAB BSHAD, BYA MDOR BDE LAM GYI KHRID, RIM LNGA GSAL SGRON GYI
BSHAD PA, RONG BO DGON CHEN DU

BLO SBYONG NYI MA'I 'OD ZER GYI KHRID, GRVA TSANG LA RNAM 'GREL
BTZUGS, SHING BZA' SPRUL SKUR LHO BRAG SNYAN BRGYUD

KYI DBANG PHUL, CHOS LUNG GSER DGONG DU LO GSUM SKU MTSAMS
MDZAD, KHRI KAR GONG BA GRVA TSANG LA SEMS

BSKYED MCHOD PA, RNYE ZHAL SNGA NAS LA DUS 'KHOR GYI DBANG GNANG
BA SOGS MDO SMAD LHO BYANG GI BSHAD SGRUB KYI

SDE MANG PO DANG GONG MA'I RGYAL KHAB YAN ZHABS KYIS BCAGS TE
THUB BSTAN SNYING BO RJE BLA MA'I LUGS BZANG BSHAD

SGRUB ZUNG 'BREK GYIS SPEL BA'I LEGS MDZAD 'GANG CHE BAR SNANG,
'DI TZAM DGUNG LO RE BRGYAD PA YAN GYI RNAM

THAR GYI YI GE MTHONG BA LAS BTUS LA SMAD CHA'ANG YOD SNANG STE
MA MTHONG NGO, ,SLOB MA SKYES CHEN DU MA 'DUS SHING,

YI DAM GYI SGRUB BSNYEN DANG MCHOD PA 'BUL BA NYAMS LEN GYI
MTHIL BYED PA'I BYA BTANG SA KHYAB SA LTA BU YOD, ` SKU

MCHED BLO BZANG BSTAN PA RGYA MTSO BA YANG CHOS SDE 'DI KA'I
GRVA RGYUN PHU BO GSER KHANG BA'I ZHABS BSTEN TE DBEN

GNAS DU MAR SGRUB PA SNYING BOR MDZAD, CHOS RGYUN RGYA CHER SPEL
BAS TSE BLOS BTANG GI SLOB MA MI NYUNG TZAM BYUNG,

`SHAR GO DGE BSHES DGE LEGS BZANG BO, SER BYES SU THUGS GNYER
DANG, ZHVA LUR RJE BLO GSAL BSTAN

SKYONG BA'I DRUNG NAS RDOR DBYANGS KYI DBANG GSAN TE DGA' LDAN
TSOGS MANG LA GNANG, RANG YUL DU 'DU KHANG

CHEN MO ZHIG GSOS DANG LI MA KHANG GSAR DU BSKRUN, NYID KYI DGE
RGAN KHYUNG NGE BLA MA'I SPRUL SKU BLUS TE RNAM GNYIS

NANG GCIG TU YOD, GZHAN YANG SHING BZA' GONG MAS BLUS PA AA RIG
RE KHROD PA'I SPRUL SKU BSTAN PA CHOS 'PHEL

RGYAL MTSAN SOGS BLA SPRUL DRAG ZHAN BGRANG BA LAS 'DAS SHING
SGAR KHAG KYANG DE MTSUNGS YOD SNANG STE ZHIB PAR MA

NGES SO, ,MCHOD GZHIS KYANG SBRA NAG KHA GSUM, RTA BO GONG 'OG
SOGS RGYA CHE, `GSER LAG DGON

RGYA BZANG KHRI BAS BTAB STE SKU 'PHRENG RIM BYON GYIS SKYONG, `
'BAL MDOR THAR SHUL GONG MAS DGON PA BTAB

PA DA LTA STONGS, MANG RA'I GZHUNG 'JAG RA'I SUM MDOR MANG RA BA
RGYAL MTSAN SENG GE'I SGRUB KHANG, MANG

CHU DANG NYE BA SHING LUNG MDOR SNGAR LA ME'I AURGE BZUNG, RGYAL
DBANG BDUN PA'I BZHUGS KHRI YOD, MANG RA'I

@268	(RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MKHA' 'BRO MA BRGYA TZA BRGYAD DU GRAGS PA SA DMAR 'DRES PA'I
BRAG RI MANG PO, GNYAN CHA CHE BAS BGRANG MI RUNG

ZER; KUN MKHYEN GSUM PA DBUS PHEBS PHYIR LAM 'KHYAM RUR BYON,
'DIR DGON PA ZHIG YOD NA BZANG

GSUNG PHYAG NAS GNANG, PHYIS THA NO CHI'I MTSAMS KHANG DU ZHABS
DKAR BA BZHUGS, 'KHYAM RU DANG CHOS

BZANG GNYIS KAR LHA KHANG RE BZHENGS, CHOS BZANG GI RKANG TSA'I
DGON YUN RING MA GNAS, SNGA MA BDE

CHEN DKA' RAMS 'KHYAM RU'I AA LAG TSUL KHRIMS SNYAN GRAGS KYIS
BZUNG, RVA RGYA'I DKA' RAMS GCIG BCAS

GRVA GTZANG SUM CU MA LONGS TZAM 'TSOGS, KHONG PHAN DGONGS KYI
THUGS BSAM BZANG BAS SKU DON TSEGS MED

'GRUB PA'I SKU BSOD CAN, BDE CHEN 'DU KHANG GSAR BZHENGS LA
ZHABS TOG BSGRUBS, NYID NAS KHUR

BZHES KYIS 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYI GSUNG TSE GCIG NYAMS LEN BGRES
GZHON TSANG MAS BZUNG, BDE LAM GYI

STENG NAS LAM KHRID SKYONG, 'KHYAM RU TSO BCU GNYIS KYIS MCHOD
GZHI BYAS, CHO GA TSUGS NA ZHES LAN DU MAR

ZHUS KYANG NGED TSOS BLA MA LA GSOL BA 'DEBS GSUNG BLA MCHOD SGO
NAS DMIGS BRTZE MA DUNG PHYUR MANG PO SONG,

GTOR MA LAS BDUD RTZI SER BO BABS, MGON PO RGYAS PA'I GTOR SGRUB
TSUGS SKABS MGON 'JIGS GNYIS

KA'I GTOR MA LAS BDUD RTZI RO SBRANG RTZI 'DRA BA BYUNG, RJE'I
BSTAN PA LA THUGS RUS CHE BAS RKYEN 'GA' ZHIG

GIS NYIN RE BZHIN 'JIGS BYED DPA' GCIG SOGS RTZA SNGAGS CI
'GRUB, KHRO BCU BRGYA RTZA, CHOS RGYAL GTOR

CHOG DANG DRUG CU PA CHAG MED, GSER KHANG DPON SLOB KYI BKA'
BZHIN DGU RONG DGE RGAN DANG DPON GA-YOG

RNAMS KYIS LCAGS MKHAR BTZUGS PAS LAS 'GRUB PA'I RTAGS THON, RJE
BLA MA, MI 'KHRUGS PA, KLU

DBANG; 'JAM DBYANGS DKAR PO, SGROL DKAR RNAMS KYI SKU BYE BA RE
PAR DU BTAB, DZAM LHA'I GTER

SGRUB DANG GA-YANG 'BOD BYIN 'BEBS BCAS TSUGS PAS HCOS MTHUN GYI
'TSO BAS MI 'PHONG ZHING, DENG SANG MTSO

SNGON DU GUR SGAR BZUNG STE GZHI GSUM GYI PHYAG LEN NGOS GTZANG
YAR LDAN DU YOD DO, ,LHO RGYUD KYI THOG MA RMA

STOD MGO LOG SOGS KYI SKABS SO,, ,,

*, ,RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,

SMAD KYI CHA RMA CHU 'KHYIL LUGS KYI DBANG GIS SA DBYIBS NOR BU
DGA' 'KHYIL GYI TSUL DU YOD PA'I KHUG SO

GNYIS KYI BYANG NGOS DGA' BA 'KHYIL BA'I KHUG MTSAMS RMA KHA
DANG NYE BAR, ` RMA MGUR RNAM RGYAL GLING NI, LA

MO BLO GROS RGYA MTSOS BTAB, DE NYID STON PA'I 'KHOR DU RGYAL PO
GSAL RGYAL, SLOB DPON PADMA'I DNGOS SLOB

GRUB CHEN KA YA BA DI, 'BROM STON THUGS SRAS SPYAN SNGA TSUL
KHRIMS 'BAR, DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA BSOD

NAMS RGYAL MTSAN, SPYAN SNGA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN RNAMS KYI
SKU'I SKYE BA BZHES SHING, DE NAS TSOGS GNYIS RGYA MTSO

'KHRUNGS SA YUL DBUS LA MO, TSER GSEB TU RAB TU BYUNG, 'BRAS SGO
MANG CHOS GRVA MTSAN NYID DANG, RGYUD SMAD

@269	(RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

DU SNGAGS LA SBYANGS PAS MKHAS PA CHEN POR GYUR, BLA MA DBU
MDZAD GNANG SKABS RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I

BKAS MDO SMAD DU BYON, RNGA SGAR BYANG CHUB GLING SOGS SUB
ZHUGS, THU MED HO LO CHIS BKUR, DE'I SPRUL SKU

THU MED RGYUD DU 'KHRUNGS PA BLO GROS RGYA MTSO YIN LA, PAn CHEN
BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN GNYIS LHA MO'I ZHAL THANG DANG,

ZHAL POT GNANG STE GNYER GTAD MDZAD PAS CHOS SKYONG 'DI GNYIS
SKU PHRENG RIM BRGYUD LA 'GO BA BYUNG, RNGA

SGAR DANG LO EDO RJE BRAG SOGS SU RGYUN RING BZHUGS, CHOG THUS
LOG SGRUB ZHUS PA BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO

DANG; BA THUR HONG THA'I JIS BCOM STE 'DI PA MCHOD GNAS SU BKUR,
DNGOS 'BUL DANG RONG 'BROG GI

SDE TSAN CHE BA PHUL, MKHAS GRUB 'DZOMS PAS CHOS PA RIN PO CHES
GUS 'DUD DANG, SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSOS

ZHABS LA GTUGS, KHRI SBYIN PA RGYA MTSOS KYANG GTZUG PHUD PHUL,
RGYA NAG GI RGYAL SA JUR CID KYIS THOB PA'I

PHYI LO RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I ME KHYI'I LOR CHOS SDE 'DZUGS
BZHED KYIS RMA 'GRAM 'DIR BYON TE GUR SGAR BZUNG

BA PHYIS SU ZUR CHAG PAS MGUR DU GRAGS, GTZUG LAG KHANG MANG DU
BZHENGS, DGE 'DUN BRGYA PHRAG

GSUM TZAM 'DUS, BKA' POTA KYI 'CHAD NYAN BTZUGS, 'DAN MA CHOS
RJE 'OD ZER BKRA SHIS BLA MAR

BSKOS; SUM PAS TSOGS GNYIS RGYA MTSO DANG, BEE SER DU 'DI PAS SA
STAG LOR BTAB PAR BSHAD KYANG,

JE SKAL LDAN GYIS KUN GZIGS LNGA BA RGYA PHEBS KYI CHU 'BRUG LOR
BRTZAMS PA'I CHOS 'BYUNG DU, ME PHO KHYI LO RMA

MGUR DU, ,SPRUL SKU BLO GROS RGYA MTSO DANG, ,CHOS RJE 'OD ZER
BKRA SHIS GNYIS, ,THUGS ,THUN

BSHAD PA'I GRVA YANG BTZUGS, ,DE NAS LO GRANGS BDUN TZAM SONG,
,ZHES GSUNGS SO, ,LNGA PA RGYA NAG

TU PHEBS DUS SHI RE THANG DU CHIBS BSU DANG CHOS BKA' MANG PO
GSAN, RTA SUM BRGYAS MTSON KHRI 'BUL PHUL,

GDAN SAR CHOS RJE 'OD ZER BKRA SHIS PA'I RJES SU, ,D'A LE CHOS
RJE, KA RING DPAL LDAN CHOS GRAGS,

MANG RA BLO BZANG BSTAN SKYONG, SGO ME DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO, BA
YAN BLO GROS NOR BU, KHA THI KA DON GRUB

BKRA SHIS, KHAM RA BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN BAR DU 'CHAD NYAN
BSKYANGS, LHA SA'I JO BO DANG SKU TSAD MNYAM

PA'I SH'AKYA MU NE'I GSER SKU GZI 'OD 'BAR BA, MKHAS GRUB KHYUNG
BO'I DBU THOD SOGS RTEN BYIN CAN MANG,

DGOS DBANG GIS CHOG THU'I GZUGS BRNYAN DNGUL LAS BZOS PA DKOR
BDAG TU BKUR, PAn CHEN RIN PO

CHES GNANG BA'I LHA MO'I BRIS THANG BDE CHEN DU SPYAN DRANGS PA
SLAR 'PHUR TE 'DIR PHEBS, 'DU KHANG NUB NGOS

SU BZHUGS TE SRUNG MA'I GTZO BOR BSTEN, BLO GROS RGYA MTSO'I
SPRUL SKU BDE CHEN 'DEBS PA PO NGAG DBANG BLO

BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN NI, SRIN PO RI'I LHA ZHOL CHOS
TSA'I YANG BZANG NGAM MGAR KHU THANG DU GRAGS PAR

YAB SNYING BO SKYABS, YUM KLU BZA' BO COG GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB
BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I LCAGS BYI LA 'KHRUNGS,

DE DUS SBRA NANG DU DRAG ZHAN SU 'ONGS KYANG 'JIGS SNANG DANG
KHA BA BABS DUS SBRA STENG DU MI CHAGS PA KUN GYIS

MTHONG; SKU BLTAMS TSE YU, LA BLA MA PAn CHEN ZER BA ZHIG GIS
MKHAR GSIL GYI RTZE MO BSTAN NAS 'DI LA 'JUS

GSUNGS PA'I NYAMS SNANG ZHIG SHAR BA'I MOD LA 'KHRUNGS, DE MA
THAG TU SPYAN PHYE NAS BZHUGS, MTSAN

@270	(RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RTAGS SHES PA'I RGYA MI ZHIG LA BSTAN PAS 'DI KHYIM DU GNAS NA
DPON CHEN DANG, RAB TU BYUNG NA BLA CHEN ZHES

NGO MTSAR BA'I LUNG BSTAN BRGYA BA, RGYAL DBANG LNGA PA DANG, LA
MO'I CHOS SKYONG GNYIS KYIS GONG MA'I SPRUL

SKUR THAG BCAD CING NGOS 'DZIN GSAL, 'DAN ZHIS TSANG GI DRUNG
NAS RAB TU BYUNG, DGUNG LO BCU

GNYIS PA LA GRAGS RGAN PA DANG MNYAM DU DBUS SU PHEBS, RGYAL
DBANG LAS DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, SGO MANG

GRVA TSANG DU KHRI BLO GROS RGYA MTSO 'CHAD NYAN LAS THOG PA'I
DRUNG DU BRTZI BZHAG GSAN, ZHABS BSNYUNG BAS LA MO

CHOS SKYONG GI LUNG DANG BSTUN RANG YUL DU MI PHEBS THABS MED
BYUNG BA'I TSE, NGA MTSAN MO ZHIG BROS 'GRO NA MA

GTOGS MKHAS MANG 'DI TZAM BZHAG NAS NYIN MO JI LTAR 'GRO GSUNG
SPYAN SKRANG BA TZAM GYI SPYAN CHAB BTON PAR

GRAGS RGAN PAS THUGS GSO ZHUS TE BCU GSUM PA LA RANG YUL DU
BYON, SLAR YANG THUGS STOBS BSKYED DE NYI

SHU PA SA LUG LA DBUS SU PHEBS, CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS TZIS MDZAD
KYANG BSNYUNG NAS MA THUB, LCAGS SPREL LOR

GRAGS RGAN PA, AA KY'A NANG SO DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO, DPA' RE CHOS
LUNG CHOS RJE DPAL 'BYOR BZANG PO

SOGS DANG MNYAM DU LNGA PA CHEN POR BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS, RTA NYIS
BRGYA, RNGA MONG BRGYA SOGS KYI 'BUL BA

BTEGS; RJE GRAGS RGAN PA RGYUD SMAD DU BZHUGS PA D'A'I CHING
NANG SOS RJE 'DI'I YONGS 'DZIN DU NAN GYIS

GDAN DRANGS TE YAB SRAS LHAN GCIG LCAGS SPREL LO MJUG RANG YUL
DU CHIBS BSGYUR, BTZAN PO DGON DU

HOR SMIN GROL 'PHRIN LAS LHUN GRUB LA CHOS BKA' MANG PO GRAGS
RGAN PA DANG LHAN DU GSAN, GZHAN YANG KHRI

CHEN DPAL LDAN GRAGS PA, GRAGS RGAN PA SOGS SNGA PHYIR BLA MA
LNGA BCU RTZA GRANGS BSTAN, GSAN YIG POTA

GNYIS YOD 'DUG RMA MGUR BTAB NAS LO SO BDUN PA CHU KHYI LOR
D'A'I CHING NANG SOS KHUR LEN GYIS LHA KHANG

GZHUNG DU MGUR GYI TSOGS YONGS DANG, MANG 'BAL BYA GSUM, SBRA
NAG KHA GSUM, 'BUM RGYAL BU

RGYUD; BA'I YAN TSUN GYI BTZUN KHRAL BSDUS TE LA MO BDE CHEN
CHOS GLING PHYAG BTAB, PHYIS SU GONG MAS DGE

TSOGS GLING ZHES PA'I TZI PEN GNANG, DGE 'DUN 'PHEL RGYAS KYI
CHED DU PHYOGS BZHIR GTZUG LAG KHANG BZHI

BZHENGS; LUNG BSTAN ZHIG TU, NYA ZHES BYA BA'I PHA ROL DU, ,NYOL
ZHES BYA BA'I RI BO YOD, ,LA

ZHES BYA BA'I DGON PA 'DEBS, ,ZHES RI ZHOL PO BDE CHEN GYI DGON
GNAS SU LUNG BSTAN KYANG DA LTA'I GNAS

'DIR DGOS DBANG GIS BTAB PAR GRAGS, DPON SLOB GRAGS RGAN PA BLO
BZANG BKRA SHIS THOG MA'I 'CHAD

NYAN MKHAN POR MNGA' GSOL, NYID KYANG CHOS GRVAR PHEBS, DPON
SLOB DE NYID LAS RDOR PHRENG GI DBANG,

BKA' 'GYUR GYI LUNG SOGS GSAN PAS MKHYEN DPYOD PHUL DU PHYIN,
BZHI BCU PA RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I

SA YOS LA DBUS SU PHEBS, DRUG PA RIN PO CHE TSANGS DBYANS RGYA
MTSO, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA

SOGS LA 'BUL CHEN DANG CHOS SDE RNAMS SU MANG 'GYED SOGS RGYA
CHER BSGRUBS, LCAGS STAG LOR KUN MKHYEN

'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE RANG DGON DU GDAN DRANGS, CHOS
DANG ZING ZING GI BSNYEN BKUR TSAD MED

PAS MCHOD, PHAN TSUN THUGS YID SHIN TU GCUG PA'I GSUNG 'PHROS
NAR MA, NYID DANG KHRI CHEN SPRUL PA'I

@271	(RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SKU; DPON SLOB GRAGS PA'I ZHAL SNGA NAS RNAM PA GSUM GYI THOG
DRANGS, DGE 'DUN 'DUS PA KHRIR NYE BA

RNAMS KYIS NYIN GNYIS KYI RING LTA KHRID GZAB BSHAD KYIS BRGYAN
PA DANG, LHO BRAG SNYAN BRGYUD KYI LUNG RJES

GNANG TSANG MA, GZHAN 'DOD CHOS DU MA SMIN RGYAS SU MNOS, KUN
MKHYEN MCHOG GIS ZHABS DRUNG RIN PO

CHE LAS MGON PO ZHAL GYI RJES GNANG GSAN, ME BYA LOR RNAM GNYIS
NAS DPON JU NANG DANG, BSTAN SKYONG

NANG MA MTHUN PA'I BAR CHINGS MDZAD DE RTZOD PA ZHI BA'I CHOD
YIG KYANG BZHAG MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG SPYI'I MOS PA

BZHIN RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I RAB
BYUNG GI MKHAN PO DANG, DBANG LUNG DU PHUL

BAS AA CHI THU AI TSIG GEN TSA GAN NO MON HAN ZHES LUNG LAS KYIS
GZENGS BSTOD, GZHAN YANG STONG 'KHOR

NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO, KHRI CHEN SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG
BSTAN PA'I NYI MA, GRAGS RGAN SPRUL SKU NGAG

DBANG BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO SOGS KYI MKHAN PO MDZAD,
ME LUG LOR RGYAL BA RIN PO CHE MANG RA'I

AARGE'I STENG DU GDAN DRANG,S TSE DBANG SAN CING DNGOS 'BUL SPAM
MTHO BA PHUL, SNGA PHYIR DBUS GTZANG

DU LAN LNG ABYON TE MCHOD 'BUL MANG 'BYED GRANGS MANG ZHING, LAN
DZOS MA'I SKABS CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM GYI NYIN

GCIG LA GSER ZHO RE, DNGUL SRANG RE, GOS CHEN KHA PHYED RE'I
'GYED PHUL BAR LA MO'I 'GYED CHEN DU

GRAGS; LA MO CHOS SKYONG GIS, SKYID SHOD KYI MDZO MO DKAR MO DE,
,BYANG GI PHYOGS SU 'CHOR NYEN

YOD; ;CES PA'I LUNG BSTAN BZHIN RJE RIN PO CHE'I SNANG BRNYAN
GRUB CHU LAN 'GA' PHEBS PA'I BYIN CAN RGYAL

DBANG RANG GI THUGS DAM RTEN GTZO SPYAN RAS GZIGS GSUNG 'BYON
MA, STON PA SANGS RGYAS KYI RING BSREL,

LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN GYI TSEMS RING BSREL 'BAB PA, LNGA PA CHEN
POS 'JIGS BYED BSNYEN CHEN GNANG DUS KYI THOD

PHRENG SOGS BYIN RTEN MANG DU GDAN DRANGS, LA MO DGON CHEN, LO
RDO RJE BRAG DGON RONG, SKYER

STENG SOGS KYI DGON PA GSAR DU BTAB PA DANG RNYING BA ZHIG GSOS,
GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG, RTEN GSUM

BZHENGS MCHOD SOGS MDZAD PA GANG NGOS NAS RLABS CHE, SPYIR RGYA
HOR GYI YUL GRUR 'KHOD PA'I BLA CHEN MANG PO

ZHIG GIS YUL SROL DANG BSTUN PA'I CHOS 'DUL BA'I BCAS KHRIMS
PHRA MO JI BZHIN GNANG DKA' BAR SNANG YANG,

'DI PA THA NA PHYI DRO ZHO DANG 'O MA TZAM YANG MI BZHES PA'I
RNAM THAR GTZANG BA, BKA' MCHID CHOS DANG LDAN PAS

YID 'PHROG PA, THUGS BSKYED BZANG BAS MDUN DU SLEBS PA TZAM GYIS
SBAG PHEBS SHING, LOG SGRUB SBYOR

BA'I SKYE BO MA RUNGS RNAMS KYANG NGANG GIS 'DUD PA, CHOS SRUNG
SPYI DANG, KHYAD PAR GONG MA'I DUS NAS BSNYEN

BSGRUB MDZAD PA'I DPAL MGON ZHAL BZHI PA DNGOS SU BRAN LTAR
'KHOL ZHING, SKU DRUNG NAS DE'I RJES GNANG

THOB STE BYA NAG GAD PA SOGS DAM TSIG DANG 'GAL BAS GDONG LTAG
PAR GCUS NAS 'CHI BA LA NYE BA 'GAR

BKA' BSGO NGANG BA'I MOD LA SOS PA SOGS GTAM YA MTSAN PA MANG LA
MTSO GA-YAS SU GA-YON RU'I DPON

KHAG THAMS CAD KYI DBU BLAR GYUR PAS AURGE'I PHYI NANG BAR GSUM
GYI BKOD PA SOGS SRID KYI LO LANG BRGYA BYIN LHA'I

PHO BRANG DANG MTSUNGS ZHES RGYAL MCHOG SKAL BZANG MTSO GSUNG,
MGUR DU BDE GSUNG 'JIGS GSUM@272 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SOGS BTZUGS TE SNGAGS GRVAR BSGYUR, RE DGU PA SA SPREL LOR ZHI
BAR GSHEGS, ZHAL CHEMS BZHIN BKRA

SHIS 'KHYIL KHRI CHEN NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS GDAN DRANGS, BDUN
PHRAG GCIG BZHUGS, ZHAL 'DON SOGS

MDZAD PA GANG CIS THAMS CAD KYIS YID 'PHROG DPON CHUNG BLO BZANG
DON GRUB DANG, JE SANG DPON PO

SOGS MI CHEN 'GAS BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS, DE KA'I 'OD ZER TSIS KOR
ZER BAS DBUS SU KUN MKHYEN BLA MA'I DRUNG

NAS DBANG GI 'PHRUL 'KHOR GYI LUNG KHRID THOB 'DUG PA KHRI RIN
PO CHE NAS GRVA BA 'GA' BTANG STE NYAN BCUG JA

SAG GI KHUR BLANGS KYIS MDO DBUS GNYIS KAR DGONGS RDZOGS, THUGS
LJAGS SPYAN GSUM MA NYAMS PAR

PHEBS PA NANG BZHUGS KYI SKU GDUNG MCHOD RTEN PHRA BKOD PHUN SUM
TSOGS PA GSER 'BA' ZHIG GIS BZHENGS,

DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN AA RIG
KLU TE'U ZHOL DU AA MYE'I RIGS LAS YAB LA KA

TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO, YUM BKRA SHIS SKYID KYI SRAS SU SA BYA
LOR 'KHRUNGS, KHRI CHEN BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS THUGS

KHUR BZHES TE CHU GLANG LOR GDAN SAR BKOD, CHOS MGON ZHU PA
YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN, DGUNG LO

BCO BRGYAD PA LA MANG RA'I GNAS SU DPE 'DZIN MDZAD SKABS TSANGS
PA DANG RMA CHEN, KHRI SHOR MTSO SMAN

SOGS KYIS DNGOS SU GUS 'DUD DANG, GTOR 'BUL 'PHRIN BCOL MA CHAG
NA LAS BZHI BSGRUB PAR KHAS

BLANGS; MGON PO ZHAL GYI GZIGS SNANG BYUNG, DBUS GTZANG DU LAN
GNYIS PHEBS PA'I DANG PO'I

SKABS PHRA NYE NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS KYI GTZOS KHAMS TSAN GYIS
RTZOD PA BTANG BAS HAR SDONG DANG PRA NYE GNYIS

'DZIN MDZAD, RGYA NAG GIS JA SAG GI THOB GNANG STE BLA DPON
SBRAGS MA MDZAD DGOS BYUNG BAS SHE'U LUNG DANG

MANG RA SOGS SU AURGE BTAB STE SOG YUL DU RGYUN BZHUGS GNANG,
'BYOR BAS BRGYAN CING LUGS GNYIS

KYI BYA BZHAG RGYA CHE YANG SPYOD LAM ZHI DUL DANG TSUL KHRIMS
DAG BSTAN PA SPYI DANG BYE BRAG LA THUGS RUS CHE BAS

'PHEL THABS GANG 'GYUR MDZAD, AURGE YANG GUR CHEN GRANGS MANG
ZHING, LHA GUR GSUM LA GANYDZI RAS

BRGYAN PA SOGS KYIS MTSO SNGON DPON KHAG GI KHROD NA GZI BYIN
CHE BA'I TSAD BYED, MGUR DU DUS 'KHOR TSUGS,

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DUS 'KHOR RGYA NAG PA GNAS MJAL DU PHEBS PA'I
RJES LA LA MO RAB 'BYAMS PA YOD PAS DUS

'KHOR DBYANGS BSLAB, KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED DBANG PO RANG DGON
DANG AURGER LAN MANG PO DANG, SNGA

PHYI'I 'BREL GYIS KHRI CHEN 'JIGS MED RIGS PA'I SENG GE YANG
DBUS PHEBS YAR LAM MAR LAM GNYIS KAR AURGER

GDAN DRANGS, KHRI CHEN SPRUL PA'I SKU NAS KYANG NGAG DBANG DGE
LEGS MKHAN PO'I SKABS ME SPREL LOR, 'DI

PA DBUS PHEBS RJES MA'I DUS T'A 'ON GZIMS SHAG TU GSOL JA ZHUS,
ZHVA MO ZHIG PHUL BA RTEN 'BREL LEGS

GSUNGS TE PHRAG PAR BKAL BZHIN SGO MANG CHOS GRVA'I MTHAR PHEBS,
DBU ZHVA BZHES TE GRVA MANG DANG LHAN DU

THAL SKAD BTANG, GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS LA YANG MJAL
'DZOMS SOGS YAB SRAS THAMS CAD DANG

THUGS 'BREL SHIN TU ZAB, LHA LDAN DU RGYAL BA 'JAM DPAL RGYA
MTSOS BSNYEN RDZOGS BZHES SKABS LHUNG BZED

'GRIM PA PO MDZAD, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE RGYA PHEBS SKABS GANG
CI'I GRA BSGRIGS DANG, DNGOS 'BUL

@273 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

STON MO KHYAD THON ZHUS, RE BRGYAD PA LA GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU
PHAN BDE DBANG PHYUG MKHAS BTZUN RGYA MTSO

DNGUL RI'I ZHOL DU SNGA MA'I RIGS LAS YAB THUB BSTAN RAB RGYAS,
YUM BDE SKYID KYI SRAS SU 'KHRUNGS, BCU

DRUG PA LA DBUS SU BYON, MNGON SHES GSAL, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO
BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO'AM NGANG DBANG

MCHOG GRUB BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN TZONG KHA MI NYAG GI SAR YAB
CHOS SKYONG BKRA SHIS, YUM MTSO KHO'I SRAS SU CHU

'BRUG LOR 'KHRUNGS, GSER KHANG DPON SLOB BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN
RGYA MTSO LAS RAB TU BYUNG, CUNG

ZAD 'TSUB PAS ZI LING AMBHAN GYI BKOD PA LTAR SKU 'BUM CHOS
GRVAR PHEBS, MKHYEN RAB CHE ZHING BLA MA LA GUS,

LCAGS KHYI SA ZLA'I DUS CHEN LA, 7 KUN MKHYEN SKU 'PHRENG GSUM
PA BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO'I

DRUNG DU BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS TE DA LTA THUGS GNYER 'PHEL BA'I
SKABS SO, ` ,LA MO BDE CHEN GI KHRI THOG DANG PO MDO

SNGAGS THUB BSTAN YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHEN
PO GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO'AM NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG

BKRA SHIS NI, ,'BAL GZHUNG GI SAR NYA MTSO'I DPON RGYUD DU GRAGS
PA YAB TSE RING DGE DANG, YUM CHOS

SGRON ZER BA TING NGE 'DZIN RGYAL PO'I SHOG GRANGS NYI SHU TZAM
RANG SHUGS KYIS BLO LAS THON PA DE'I SRAS SU RAB BYUNG

BCU GCIG PA'I ME PHAG LOR YUM LA BDE NYAMS DANG BCAS TE
'KHRUNGS, CHUNG NGU NAS RI DVAGS KYI SHA MI ZA,

PHU DUNG MI GYON PA SOGS KYIS ZHANG PO RGYAL MTSAN RIN CHEN GYIS
'DI GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA BAS GTZANG SBRA DGOS TSUL

NAN CHER BYAS, DGUNG LO BCU BAR ZHANG PO'I DRUNG NAS DGE BSNYEN
DANG, BCU GNYIS PA LA DE NYID LAS

RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL BZHES, BCO BRGYAD PA LA DBUS SU PHEBS
KHAR YUM GYIS ZHABS SPYI BOR BLANGS TE GUS

'DUD PHUL, DBUS SU RGYAL BA RIN PO CHER BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS, YUL
DU 'BYON RTZIS MED KYANG ZLA BO KARMA

SKYABS SOGS KYIS KHYED MI 'GRO NA NGED TSO MI 'GRO ZHES DBANG
MED KYIS 'BYON DGOS BYUNG, NYER LNGA BA LCAGS

PHAG LO'I NANGS GCIG DBUS NAS CHOS GRVAR GRVA MANG BGRO GLENG
MDZAD PA THUGS LA DRAN TE PHYAG THAL MO BRDABS,

RGYAN 'JUG GI TSIG 'GA' ZHIG ZHAL NAS THON, DBUS PHEBS KYI THUGS
'DUN MNAN NA MI BZOD PA 'KHRUNGS

TE YAB YUM LA GSUNGS PAR NGED TSO LA CHA RKYEN MI 'DUG TSUL ZHUS
PAS MED NA YANG MED GSUNG GSAN DGONGS MA

GNANG; AA KHU DBANG SKYABS ZER BAS GROGS BYAS TSA GNAN NO MON
HAN DANG LHAN DU LO DER DBUS LA PHEBS,

SGO MANG GRVA TSANG DU BSDUS GRVA NAS ZHUGS DPON SLOB BLO GROS
RGYA MTSO DANG, DON GRUB RGYA MTSO KHRIR RIM BZHIN

BZHUGS PA'I DRUNG NAS BRTZI BZHAG GSAN, THOG MAR MI 'GA' ZHIG
GIS RKI RGAN CHOS GRVAR SONG NAS CI BYED,

'GRO 'DUG TZAM YANG MI SHES ZER BRNYAS BCOS BYAS KYANG SKYES
SBYANGS KYI SHES RAB ME 'BAR BA LTA BUS 'DZIN GRVA

BDUN RE'I BRTZI BZHAG MNYAM DU BZUNG, SMRA BA'I KHYU MCHOG TU
GYUR TE MKHAS GRAGS SHIN TU CHEN, SNGAR BSNYEN

RDZOGS BSGRUBS KYANG BRDA DON MA 'PHROD GSUNG, NYER DRUG PA LA
RGYAL DBANG MCHOG GIS MKHAN SLOB SBRAGS MA

DANG; PHA BONG KHA BA 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PAS GSANG STON, SGO
