@274 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BYA KHYUNG RVA LO BA LA 'DI PAS KHYED CHOS GRVAR LO DU SONG DRIS
PAR NGA GSAR BA YIN, LO BCU DRUG LAS MA SONG, KHYED

CI TZAM SONG GSUNGS, LO BDUN SONG ZHUS PAS, KHYED RDZUN MA LAB
GSUNG HA LAS PAR BYED, DAM

BCA' BA GZHAN RNAMS ZHUNG 'GRO RGYA CHE ZHING NYID GSAR BA YIN
STABS DE TZAM RE MI CHE YANG BSHAD PA DANG DAM

BCA' GNYIS KA KHYAD THON PA BYUNG, 'GA' RES SMA 'BEB RTZIS BYAS
KYANG ME DANG SMA RA'I DPER SONG, SGO

MANG BLA MA DON GRUB RGYA MTSO THUGS DGYES TE BLA BRANG DU BOS,
KHYED KYIS GRVA TSANG DANG MA SOG GI LA RGYA LA PHAN PA BYAS

ZHES LEGS DAR DANG, GRVA TSANG GI BRTZI BZHAG GI RGYUG KYANG 'DI
BAR BZHES 'JUG PA SOGS THUGS RTZIS SHIN

TU CHE, SO GNYIS PA LA BKA' 'GYUR GYI LUNG GSAN SKABS KYANG
BRTZI BZHAG MA CHAG, THAR SHUL CHOS SKYONG RGYA

MTSOS MDO SNAGS KYI YON TAN LHA 'BAB BYED TSUL MED ZER BA RED
DE, BDE CHEN CHOS RJE 'DI PHA YUN

THUNG NGU DE TZAM LA YON TAN YONGS SU RDZOGS SONG BAS LHA 'BAB
'BAB RED, DE LAB THUB PA MA RED CES PHYAG

THAL MO SBYOR, SO GSUM PA SA LUG LA RGYUD SMAD DU BYON, PHA BONG
KHA PA NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS PAn

CHEN SDOM RGYUN CIG BSGRUB NA LEGS ZHES GSUNGS PAS RGYAL DBANG
GIS MKHAN PO, PHA BONG KHA PA NGAG DBANG

BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS LAS SLOB, TSUL KHANG PA LEGS PA DON GRUB KYIS
GSANG STON, DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS

GRAGS PAS DUS GRO PA, CHOS RJE NA BZA' GLING BA SOGS KYIS KHA
SKONG MDZAD DE BSKUR NAS BSGRUBS, DGE

SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PA SOGS BLA MA MANG PO LAS CHOS GSAN,
TSA GAN NO MON HAN GYI YONGS 'DZIN DU

GDAN 'DREN ZHUS PAR, DPON SLOB BLO GROS RGYA MTSOS KHYED DGA'
LDAN KHRI LA PHEBS RGYU DE BZHAG NAS,

MGUR GYI KHRI LA 'GRO RGYU RED MOD CES LAN 'GA' DANG, SGO MANG
BLA MA THOR GOD PA SOGS DGE BSHES MANG POS

DBUS SU BZHUGS NA 'PHRAL PHUGS SU PHAN SLEB CHE BA'I GSUNG
GNANG, DE SKABS RGYUD PA MKHAN PO KHRI SBYIN PA

RGYA MTSO YIN PAS KHONG LA D'A'I CHING NANG SO SOGS KYIS SNGA
PHYIR DGONGS PA NAN ZHUS BYAS PAR, 'DI PA'I YON

TAN GYIS DGA' LDAN KHRI PA DANG SGO MANG BLA MA GNYIS KAS GCIG
GIS DGA' LDAN KHRI BYED DGOS, GCIG GIS SGO

MANG BLA MA BYED DGOS ZER GI YOD PA KHYED TSOGS GO BA DE RED,
BSKO RGYU KHRAL MA RED, YON TAN GYI 'OS BAB RED,

DA KHYED TSOS BSNYEN BKUR ZHU TSUL NGA LA SHOD DE NAS PHEBS CHOG
MI CHOG GNAS SHES YONG GSUNGS PAR, GANG

LCOGS KYI ZHABS TOG BSGRUB PAR KHAS BLANGS, DPON SLOB DE NYID
SNGAR LA MO'I GRVA RGYUN DANG THUGS ZHEN CHE BAS

'DI PAR PHEBS DGOS TSUL GYI BKA' NAN BSTZAL, 'DI BAS ZHABS DRUNG
NYID LA LO 'GA'I BAR DU NGA RGYUD LA 'GRO

BKA' CHOS TSO'I 'PHRO NYAN NAS MYUR BAR YONG ZHUS PA DE KA'I
RTZIS MDZAD PA NA, YANG BSKYAR DPON SLOB BKA'

'GYUR PAS BKA' BKYON TE KHYED TSANG GIS HA MA GO 'DUG DA LTA
DBANG YOD SKABS SPYAN DRANGS NA LEGS,

RJES SOR THOB SHIN TU DKA', SPRUL PA'I SKU LA SKU YON 'BUL BA
DANG DGON PA GSAR 'DEBS BYED RGYU'I MTSON

PHYOGS DE'I BSTAN 'GROR PHAN KHYAD SHIN TU CHE BAS NGED KYIS
DBANG YOD BYAS PA YIN GSUNGS, LCAGS SPREL LO

MJUG RANG YUL DU PHEBS PA LCAGS BYA'I MGOR 'BYOR, MGUR DU PHEBS
NYIN GRVA SLOB SUM CU TZAM GYIS ZAM

@275 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,) STENG NAS SER
SBRENGS BYAS PAR GRVA TSANG 'DI RED DGONGS THUGS CUNG ZAD SKYO
BA BYUNG, MDO SMAD KYI GRVA SA PHAL

CHER LA DAM BCA' BZHAG PAS MKHAS GRAGS KYIS SA STENG KHYAB, SKU
'BUM DU BZHUGS SKABS SMIN GROL CHOS KYI

RGYAL PO JI LING DU PHEBS PA DANG MJAL, BKA' CHOS MANG DU GSAN,
CHU KHYI LOR 'CHAD NYAN GYI KHRI KHUR THOG

MAR BZHES TE BRTZI BZHAG GSUNG CHOS CHAG MED DANG, BCA' YIG
BLANG DOR GSAL BA'I ME LONG MDZAD, BCA'

KHRIMS RNAM PAR DAG PA'I 'GRIG LAM BTZUGS, 'CHAD NYAN LA THUGS
BRTZON SHIN TU CHE ZHING, NYIN LTAR

DGE BSHES RNAMS LA 'PHROS PA, GZHON PA RNAMS LA DPE KHRID, TSIG
RGYUG DON RGYUG BGRO GLENG GTONG

LUGS SOGS RTING BSKUL TSA NAN MDZAD PAS MKHAS PA'I BSTI GNAS SU
GYUR, GZHI BA RNAMS KYANG RANG GI NUS

TSOD KYI DGE SBYOR LA BSKUL, CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM, BYAMS PA GDAN
'DREN, DUS BZANG, SA GA'I

SMON LAM, GZHI GSUM GYI PHYAG LEN BCAS GSAR 'DZUGS DANG, KHYIM
PA RNAMS LA BSNYEN GNAS SOGS

SKABS SU GANG BABS KYIS 'BREL TSAD DON LDAN MDZAD, ZHE BRGYAD PA
SHIN KHYI LA GRVA BA SLOB GNYER PA SUM CU TZAM

DANG BCAS DBUS SU PHEBS, GRVA TSANG GIS PHYIR MYUR DU 'BYON DGOS
KYI ZHU BA DANG KHYAD PAR ZHABS DRUNG RIN

PO CHE CHIBS SKYEL LA BKRA SHIS CHOS 'BYUNG BAR DU BYON, SPYAN
CHAB BSIL TE GSOL BA BTAB PAS NYID LA YANG

SPYAN CHAB BYUNG ZHING ZHAL BZHES MDZAD, RIM GYIS GDAN SA GSUM
DANG, RGYUD STOD SMAD, BKRA SHIS

LHUN PO, RVA SGRENG, YER BA SOGS LA MANG 'GYED, GSANG SGO'I
SKABS YIN 'DUG KYANG SKU ZHABS YAS PHYIN

LA 'BUL NOD GZAB, KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE LA
CHOS BKA' CI RIGS DANG MDO SNGAGS

KYI DOGS GCOD MANG DU ZHUS, SNGAR NAS MCHED GROGS KYANG YIN PAS
THUGS YID GCIG TU 'DRES, DBU

MA LUNG RIG GTER MDZOD LJAGS RTZOM GYI BSKUL MA MDZAD PAS THAR
'DOD YONGS KYI BLO MIG PHYE, DE DUS PAn CHEN

BLO BZANG YE SHES KYANG MJAL KHA DAM YANG 'DI BAR MJAL KHA LAN
GNYIS DANG SKU CHOS SOGS RTEN MANG PO BSTZAL,

YONGS 'DZIN BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA DANG CHOS BKA' MANG PO GSAN RES
MDZAD, BLA BRANG PHYAG MDZOD CHEN MO

NAS LO GCIG TZAM BZHUGS DGOS ZHUS PAR, KHAL RTA BYANG NA YOD,
GRVA BA RNAMS GNAS BSKOR BYED BZHIN

LHA SA SOGS SU YOD PAS YUN RING SDOD MI THUB TSUL GSUNGS PAS, DE
LAS SLA, KHAL RTA GRVA BA THAMS CAD

GTZANG DU BLANGS NAS MTHUN RKYEN PHUL CHOG ZHUS, MDO SMAD NAS
ZHABS DRUNG SPRUL PA'I SKU'I GSUNG SHOG 'BYOR

BAS MGYOGS MYUR DUS SU PHEBS, DER YANG DAR HAN DPON POS SGO MANG
GRVA TSANG GI BLA MA DANG, SMAN

RAMS PA CHAGS PA CHOS 'PHEL GYIS GZHUNG NAS DGON CHEN ZHIG GI
BLA MAR BSKO RTZIS YOD TSUL ZHUS PAS, 'PHRAL

DU MA PHYIN NA DE NAS THABS MI RNYED GSUNG SKU DON BSGRUB 'PHRO
BYAS TE SHING PHAG LO MJUG RANG DGON DU PHEBS,

'CHAD NYAN GTZOR 'DON NGOS ME GLANG LOR KHRI CHEN SPRUL SKU
BSTAN PA'I NYI MA, THAR SHUL CHOS SKYONG RGYA MTSO,

SHA SPRANG 'JAM DBYANGS BLO GROS, BYANG CHUB MI LA, HOR TSANG BA
NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA SOGS KYIS GTZOS

REB SKONG, BYA KHYUNG, TSO LNGA SOGS KYI GRVA STONG PHRAG LHAG
LA PHRENG BA DANG KRi YA SPRAS PA'I DBANG YONGS RDZOGS,

@276 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RNAM SRAS BKA' BCO LNGA'I RJES GNANG SOGS DANG, SNGA PHYIR ZHABS
DRUNG SPRUL PA'I SKU SOGS LA RJE RIN PO CHE,

MKHAS GRUB, RGYAL BA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO SOGS KYI GSUNG 'BUM,
BKA' GDAMS GLEGS BAM, BKA'

GDAMS CHOS 'BYUNG, DPE CHOS, BE'U BUM SNGON PO, RIGS TSOGS SOGS
RGYA GZHUNG KHA SHAS, SPYAN

SNGA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN GYI GSUNG MANG PO, BLO SBYONG DU MA,
RNAM BSHAD SNYING PO RGYAN, GLENG 'BUM CHEN MO,

SBRAGS SOGS KYI BSHAD LUNG, LAM RIM MYONG KHRID TSAR MANG PO,
RDOR 'PHRENG SOGS LAN DU MAR GNANG STE

DBEN SA BKA' 'BUM, MAR MI RAS CHUNG GSUM GYI RNAM MGUR, LAM RIM
CHEN MO, 'GREL BA BZHI

CHOS KYI CHAR PHABS, BLA BRANG DANG LHA KHANG GSAR BSKRUN SKABS
MTHUN RKYEN THAMS CAD NYID NAS SBYAR, GRVA

SLOB MANG POS GSANG 'DUS KYI SGO NAS RAB GNAS GANG RGYAS, GZHI
BYES DGE 'DUN STONG PHRAG BRGAL BAR RAB

YON DANG, BLA CHEN RNAMS LA 'BUL BSHAD DANG BCAS DNGOS 'BUL
GZAB, JU NANG GI AURGE BZHUGS

SKABS SHIG SPANG LA ME MCHED PA NYID NAS GZIGS 'PHRAL ZHI BAS
GRONG KHYER SOGS 'TSIG PA ZHI BAR BYED PA'I

BDEN PA'I BYIN BRLABS GRUB PA'I RTAGS SU GLENG, CHU LUG LOR SKU
'BUM DU PHEBS TE 'DU KHANG CHEN MO GZIGS

PAS PHYIR PHEBS 'PHRAL RONG 'BROG SO SOR 'BUL SDUD MDZAD DE
SHING SPREL LA 'DU KHANG GSAR DU BSKRUN PA BYA LOR

LOGS BRIS BCAS GRUB, GTZANG KHANG DU CHOS SHUL LHA BZOS 'JAM
DBYANGS KUN GZIGS KYI SKU THOG TSAD GNYIS

PA SOGS SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG DU BZHENGS, KUN GZIGS LA BSTOD
PA BRTZAMS, LO MJUG ZHABS

DRUNG RIN PO CHE, KHRI SPRUL MCHOG BCAS BLA MA DGE 'DUN STONG
LHAG GIS RAB GNAS MDZAD, MCHOD RDZAS DANG

MCHOD ME'I THEBS SU BZHON KHAL MANG PO BZHAG, BKA' 'GYUR SOGS
RTEN GSUM GSAR BSGRIG MANG, TSOGS

SU MA nI BUM SGRUB DANG MANG 'GYED SHIN TU MANG BAR BSTZAL, RAS
KHA GOS SNA TSUN CHAD BSAGS TE BAG KHUG BZOS

PA GRVA MANG LA 'GYED DU GTONG BAS MTSON DAD RDZAS CHUD ZOS SU
MI GTONG, SKABS 'GAR 'KHRUG CHEN DU MA

BSDUMS PA SOGS MDZAD PA NGO MTSAR BA MANG, ME KHYI LOR ZHABS
DRUNG SPRUL PA'I SKU DANG THUGS BSTUN GYIS RAB

'BYAMS PA DANG DKA' BZHI'I GRVA SKOR GYI SROL BTZUGS, DAM BCA'
DANG GTONG SGO GANG CI 'GRIG BCAD

MDZAD; HOR SMIN GROL CHOS KYI RGYAL PO GDAN DRANGS, MGON PO'I
CHOS SKOR ZHUS TE DE'I GTOR SGRUB BTZUGS,

BA SO RJE DRUNG NGAG DBANG DKON MCHOG NYI MA YANG PHEBS, SKU
MCHED LA KHA GRUB CHEN GYIS LAS BZHI'I SBYIN SREG

MDZAD; KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA MDO SMAD DU PHEBS TE
BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GSAR BTAB KYI LCAGS

STAG LOR MJAL BAR JU NANG AUGER PHEBS, 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS SKOR
GYI RJES GNANG LUNG BCAS GSAN,

KUN MKHYEN MCHOG NAS ZHABS 'BRANG SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA DU MA LA 'DI
PAR CHOS 'BREL ZHUR BCUG LA MO BA TSOS

GSHIN RJE'I NGAR DBYANGS 'THEN PA LA ZHU DAG MDZAD PA SOGS THUGS
YID GCIG 'DRES KYI GSUNG GLENG SHIN TU

'PHEL; KUN MKHYEN BLA MA BDE CHEN DU PHEBS RGYU'I SNYAN BSKUL
ZHUS PA BZHIN ZLA BSHOL BDUN PA SNGA MA'I TSES

BCU GSUM LA CHIBS BSGYUR, CHOS BKA' GSAN BZHES SOGS RNAM THAR
'GANG CHE, CHU 'BRUG LOR BYA

@277 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

KHYUNG GI KHRIR PHEBS, GDAN SA PHAN TSUN DU 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD
THOG SPRUL LOR MANG GZHUNG DU SENG GE'I NYAL

STABS KYIS ZHI BAR GSHEGS, GDUNG ZHUGS LA PHUL BA'I DBU THOD DUM
BU GSUM DU BKAS PA LA BDE GSANG

'JIGS GSUM GYI SKU KHRA LAM ME BA DANG, THUGS LJAGS SPYAN GSUM
PHEBS PA SKU GDUNG MCHOD RTEN DU BZHUGS,

'DI DANG GA-YER GSHONG SNGAGS RAMS PA'I PHYAG BZO RNAM SNANG GI
SKU ZHIG YOD PA GNYIS KA LAS PHYIS SU BDUD RTZI

BABS; MDO DBUS GNYIS KAR DGONGS RDZOGS RLABS CHEN BSGRUBS, DBU
MA DANG 'DUL BA'I THAL 'PHRENG,

CHOS 'BYUNG SOGS YIG 'JOG MANG, DNGOS SLOB KYANG TSA GAN NO MON
HAN, GSER, KHRI BLO BZANG BSTAN

PA'I NYI MA, THAR SHUL CHOS SKYONG RGYA MTSO, GA-YER GSHONG 'JAM
DBYANGS BLO GROS, ZHVA DMAR NGAG

DBANG 'PHRIN LAS, DKA' CHEN SMON LAM PA, LCANG SKYA GONG MA'I
DRUNG YIG THIGS PA BLO BZANG NYI MA,

MOG KYA' 'JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSO, AA THIS BSTAN PA RGYA MTSO, AA
LAG DPAL LDAN BKRA SHIS SOGS MANG,

DE LAS DKA' CHEN SMON LAM DPAL 'BYOR NI, BYA KHOG TU ZIN 'DAR
PHYAG MDZOD ZER BA'I TSA RIGS YAB KHAM

DRIS DANG, YUM BO COG SKYID KYI SRAS SU LCAGS SPREL LA 'KHRUNGS,
GZHON DUS NAS MDZAD SPYOD KHYAD PAR DU

'PHAGS; MTSAN DGE 'DUN SKYABS SU BTAGS, BDE CHEN DU CHOS GRVA
'GRIM, GRAGS RGAN PA LA

DGE TSUL DANG BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS PA'I MTSAN NGAG DBANG MGON PO
DANG, RJE DE NYID LAS LAM RIM CHEN MO,

'JAM DPAL ZHAL LUNG, RGYAL BA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG 'BUM,
BKA' GDAMS GLEGS BAM,

BLO BZANG BKA' 'BUM SOGS MANG DU GSAN TE SGO GSUM GYIS BLA MAR
BSTEN TSUL GZHAN GYI BLOR MI SHONGS PA

MDZAD; KHONG ZHING GSHEGS KHA'I BSNYUNG GA-YOG SKU GDUNG GI BYA
BA, SPRUL SKU PHEBS PA'I MTHUN RKYEN SOGS

GANG DGOS BSGRUBS, BLA MA GZHAN MANG BOR YANG CHOS 'BREL ZHUS,
TSUL KHRIMS DAG CING, SKYABS 'GRO

LTA BA'I DPYAD PA, YIG DRUG, SMYUNG GNAS RNAMS THUGS DAM GYI
GTZO BO DANG, GSER KHRI RIN PO CHE'I BKA'

LTAR PHYOGS SO SOR SMYUNG GNAS DANG MA nI'I DGE BSKUL MDZAD PAS
GSUM PA MKHAN POS KYANG ZHABS LA GTUGS, GO BZHI PA LA

GSHEGS; BU SLOB GZHAN PHAL CHER 'OG TU 'BYUNG, ; GRAGS RGAN BLO
BZANG BKRA SHIS KYI SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN

'DZIN RGYA MTSO RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME SPREL LA 'KHRUNGS,
DGUNG LO RE DRUG BZHUGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG

DBANG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, BDE CHEN CHOS GRVAR
ZHUGS, DGE BSHES BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS

DGE RGAN DU BSTEN, DBUS SU PHEBS NAS THUGS GNYER MTHAR PHYIN PAR
MDZAD, RANG DGON DU BLA BRANG

RTEN BRTEN PA BZHENGS, KUN GZIGS LHA KHANG LA GA-YU THOG PHIBS,
JO SKU GSAR BSKRUN DUS ZHAL

'DEBS MANG DU PHUL, ZLA CHOS GCIG GI GTONG THEBS DNGUL SRANG
LNGA BRGYA BZHAG SKU PHRENG GNYIS KA BDE

CHEN KHRIR BZHUGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS RGYA
MTSO BYA KHOG TU YAB NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS DANG,

@278 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,) YUM BUN CHANG
GI SRAS SU SA SPREL LA 'KHRUNGS, DA LTA BDE CHEN DU THUGS GNYER
GYI SKABS LAGS, ` ZHVA

DMAR NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS NI, RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I LCAGS
GLANG LOR ZHVA DMAR RIGS SU 'KHRUNGS,

YAB LA KARMA SKYABS ZER, DBUS SU BYON, SGO MANG GRVA TSANG DU
THUGS GNYER MDZAD, RIGS PA SMRA BA'I RTZER

SON; GDAN SA GSUM GYI MKHAS MANG GI KHROD NA DUS THOG DER 'DI
PA'I RTZOD ZLA THUB MKHAN DKA' BAR GLENG,

SMON LAM GRVA SKOR DANG RGYUD SMAD DU PHEBS, AA MDOR BYON NAS
KYANG DGE BSHES NGA MKHAS ZER MKHAN MANG PO

LUNG RIGS KYIS TSAR BCAD PA'I SNYAN GRAGS CHE, KHYAD PAR KUN
MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA BDE CHEN DU

PHEBS SKABS STON CHEN DANG PO'I BZHUGS GRAL DU, MKHYEN GTER DKA'
BCU NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS PA DANG,

MNYAM DU TSOGS GLENG MDZAD PAS PHYOGS GLANG DANG CHOS GRAGS
GNYIS DAM PA'I CHOS KYI BRGAL BRTAG LA GDAN

'DZOMS PA LTAR GYUR TE MCHOD YON THAMS CAD SNGON MED PA'I DGA'
STON GYIS MNYES, DKA' BCU PAS YIG

CHA GSAR BA'I KHAS LEN BSKYAR BAS RTOG GE MGO MKHREGS KYI SPYI
LUGS KYIS DE LTAR NA RTZOM PA PO DAG RTZOD PA PO

GNYIS KA LA 'KHOR GSUM BYAS PAS, DKA' BCU PA THUGS 'JIGS NYAMS
LTA BUS KHYOD DKOR GYIS TSOS

'DUG ZHUS, DE KA RANG, NGA TSIG ZIN DANG, KHYOD 'TSIG DGOS YIN
PA'I PHYIR GSUNGS, KHONG

BA PHYIS SU BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI KHRI MDZAD, GDUL BYA RGYAS PAS
DA NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS KYI LUNG BSTAN THOG LA

BABS SONG ZHES THUGS SKYO NYAMS MDZAD, 'DI PAR 'GA' ZHIG GIS
'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA TSANG MKHAS

GRAGS CHEN PO RED, DON LA GA 'DRA YIN ZHUS PAR, RGYAN DRUG MCHOG
GNYIS DANG NGA'I BLA RGAN GNYIS SRANG

LA GZHAL NA NGA'I BLA RGAN GYIS RGYAN DRUG MCHOG GNYIS DRUNG NAS
'GRO GSUNGS, NGA BZHI PA SHING RTA LA KHRIR

PHEBS; RE DRUG PA ME RTA'I BAR BSKYANGS, DE'I RJES MA NGAG DBANG
BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO MTSO SNGON SA CHAR AA

RIG GI RGYUD ZHVA DMAR YI DAM GYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI
BA'I ME YOS LA 'KHRUNGS, ZHVA DMAR NGAG DBANG

'PHRIN LAS KYI YANG SPRUL DU NGOS BZUNG, BDE CHEN DU SLOB GNYER
DANG KHRIR PHEBS NAS 'CHAD NYAN GNANG,

KUN SPANGS MDZAD DE DPON SLOB GSER KHANG BA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS,
SLOB MA'I GTZO BOR GYUR, RI BO RTZE

LNGAR LO GSUM BZHUGS NAS RGYA TSIGS BRGYUD MGAR THAR DU BYON, MI
NYAG DGE BSHES TSUL KHRIMS RNAM RGYAL PA

LA GTUGS, LAM RIM CHEN MO, LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO, SNGAGS RIM CHEN
MO RNAMS THUGS LA BYANG

BAR BZHUGS PA SOGS NGO MTSAR BA'I YON TAN DANG LDAN PAS BLA MA
THUGS KHENGS, SA BYA LOR DBUS LA PHEBS

LAM NAS GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU DGE 'DUN BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG PO
GONG MA'I SKU MCHED BAN MUG ZER BA'I

SRAS SU CHU BYI LA 'KHRUNGS PA DA LTA BZHUGS, ` GSER KHRI SPRUL
PA'I SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MA NI, MTSO

SNGON GA-YAS RU SHOG RMA CHU'I 'GRAM YANG BZANG DU LA MO'I
AURGER TSA GAN NO MON HAN GYI SKU'I GCEN AU'I CHING

THA'I JI DANG, KLU MO SKYID GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU
GNYIS PA'I LO GSUM PA SA SPRUL LA 'KHRUNGS, SKU

GONG MA KHRI CHEN BLO GROS RGYA MTSO RGYA NAG NAS YAR PHEBS TE
'KHRUNGS GZHIS MI NYAG TU BZHUGS SKABS, NO MON

@279 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

HAN SKU MCHED MJAL BAR PHEBS, DGON PAR GDAN 'DREN ZHUS PAR,
KHYED KYI DGON PA DER KHANG PA

GSUM THOG YOD PA ZHIG RGYOB, NGA GDAN MA DRANGS KYANG 'ONG RGYUD
YIN ZHES DANG, GCEN PO THA'I RJI'I MING

DRIS NAS LAN KHA SHAS ZHAL LA BLANGS, PHAR BLTA SNA MDZES PA MIG
LA BYAMS PO, DPA' RTZAL CAN ZHIG

YOD 'DRA GSUNGS TE DGYES SOR SHIN TU CHE BA MDZAD PA SPRUL SKU
'KHRUNGS PA'I RTAGS SU GLENG, GZHAN YANG

GSUNG GI PHEBS SGO DU MAS LCAGS RTA LOR MTSO SNGON KHRI PA T'A
LE HUR THA'I JI GSHEGS PA'I DGONGS RDZOGS KYI

SAR; LCANG SKYA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS
LDAN DANG NO MON HAN RIN PO CHE RNAM GNYIS ZHAL

'DZOMS SKABS NAG SBYAR GYI GSUNG 'PHROS GNANG BA BZHIN PAn CHEN
RIN PO CHE, LA MO DANG GNAS CHUNG LUNG

BSTAN ZHUS PAR YANG SRID DU NGOS BZUNG, AEM MCHI NGAG DBANG RGYA
MTSO LAS KLOG BSLAB, CHU BYA LOR

BDE CHEN DU PHEBS, TSA GAN NO MON HAN LAS RAB BYUNG BZHES, MTSAN
'JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSO BTAGS,

ME GLANG NAS LO BZHI TZAM GYI BAR AURGE'I STENG DU BZHUGS, SA
STAG LOR LCANG SKYA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID KYI

BZHUGS SGAR DU PHEBS TE MJAL 'DZOMS MDZAD, LCAGS SPRUL LO NAS
BZUNG PHAR PHYIN SOGS PO TI LNGA LA

THUGS GNYER DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD, LCAGS STAG LOR KUN MKHYEN 'JAM
DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE BDE CHEN

DU PHEBS PA'I DRUNG DU DAM BCA' DANG RIGS LUNG GNANG BAS THUGS
DGYES PA'I RTZER SON, 'DOD CHOS DU MA

GSAN; LCAGS YOS LOR LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE DGON LUNG DU PHEBS PA
MJAL, RDO BCAL DU BGRO GLENG MDZAD

PAS RNAM DPYOD KYIS THUGS KHENGS TE SNYAN GRAGS DANG STOBS 'BYOR
GYIS THUGS GNYER GNANG LO TZAM LAS GSHAG

MA RANG MA BYUNG DOGS KYANG, KHRI RIN PO CHE'I YANG SPRUL 'KHRUL
MED KYI RTAGS DANG, DGE RGAN SLOB DPON

PA GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA BAS SNYAN BSKUL BA DANG, TSA GAN NO MON
HAN SKYES CHEN DAM PA GZHAN 'GRAN MED PA

BCAS DAD GUS 'PHEL TSUL GYI BSNGAGS BRJOD MDZAD, SKU GONG MA'I
PHYAG DPE, RTEN GSUM, DAM

RDZAS CHA TSANG GNANG, BA SO'I LTAR KHRID DANG, BDE MCHOG LUS
DKYIL GYI DBANG GNAG BA GSAN, GSER

KHOG DGON DU DAM BCA' BZHAG, DPON SLOB HOR SPRUL PA'I SKU SOGS
KYIS BGRO GLENG PHUL, DGE BSHES M'A

BSAM GTAN DAM BCA' BSAD PAR RJE 'DI SOGS LA MO PA RNAMS KYIS
BGRO GLENG BTANG, SKU 'BUM DU YANG

DAM BCA' DANG RIGS LUNG GTONG RES MDZAD, SKABS DER BDE CHEN DPON
SLOB BYA KHYUNG GI KHRIR PHEBS PA'I

SLOB CHUNG GI TSUL DU BLA MA'I BZHUBS KHRI'I STENG NAS 'DZIN
GRVA BCU GNYIS LA NYIN RER BRTZI BZHAG GNYIS RE DANG

SKABS 'GAR SROD CHOS KYANG GNANG, BRTZI BZHAG TSAR BSTUN BZHUGS
KHRI'I RTZAR RANG GI 'DZIN GRVA DANG MNYAM

DU MDZOD DANG RNAM 'GREL GYI THUGS GNYER, ZHAR BYUNG BSAGS
SBYANGS MDZAD PA SOGS RNAM THAR YA MTSAN,

DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PA'I DUS BDE CHEN DPON SLOB PA LAS 'JIGS BYED
DBANG THOG MAR GSAN ZHING RIM GYIS

KYEE RDOR LHA DGU RDOR PHRENG, BLA MA DE DANG GA-YER GSHONG BA
RNAM GNYIS LAS RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM, LNGA BA'I RNAM

@280 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

THAR DU KLU LA'I GOS BZANG SOGS GSAN PA MTHA' YAS, KHYAD PAR
SPYAN SNGA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN GYI GSUNG GI GRAS

DON DAM BYANG CHUB SEMS KYI BLO SBYONG, BLO SBYONG MKHAS PA'I
YID 'PHROG BYANG CHUB DON GNYER GYI BLO SBYONG, BKA'

'BUM LEGS BSHAD RGYA MTSO, BDUD RTZI LEGS GDAMS, LEGS BSHAD 'JIG
RTEN MUN SEL, 'JIG

RTEN BYA BA'I RNAM BZHAG, BLO SBYONG RNAM DAG GTZUG NOR, GANG
ZAG MCHOG DMAN LA PHAN GDAGS TSUL,

RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR, SNYAN BRGYUD NOR BU'I
'PHRENG BA, LTA KHRID SNYAN BRGYUD KYI GDAMS

PA ZAB MO, GZHAN DON GNYER RTZA 'GREL, THOG MA'I BLO SBYONG NYON
MONGS GDUNG GSEL, BA TSAB LO TZ'A BA

DANG SHAR BA GNYIS KYI DRIS LAN BCAS GSAN PA 'DI DAG GI LUNG
RGYUN DE PHYOGS SU DUS PHYIS BAR DU YOD SNANG,

SHING RTA LO'I ZLA BA BRGYAD PAR DGE BSHES DU MA'I 'KHOR DANG
BCAS GA-YER GSHONG, RONG BO DGON, GNYAN

GONG BRAG DKAR BCAS BRGYUD BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS, KHYAB BDAG
RDO RJE 'CHANG KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS

BZHAD PA'I DRUNG NAS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN GNAM GYIS SA BKAB PA
DU MAS THOG DRANGS DGE 'DUN 'DUS PA KHRI

PHRAG BRGAL BA DANG LHAN DU MI TRA'I DBANG YONGS SU RDZOGS PA
GSAN, CHOS THUN GYI BAR DU DAM BCA' BTZUGS

TE LUNG DANG RIGS PA'I DGA' STON SPEL, SKYABS MGON SKAL BZANG
RGYA MTSO SNGON DU PHEBS PAR MJAL

'DZOMS; RGYAL DBANG MCHOG DANG LHAN DU TSA GAN NO MON HAN RIN PO
CHE'I DRUNG NAS CHOS BKA' DU MA,

GZHAN YANG SGRUB THABS BRGYA RGYAM SOGS DANG, THAR SHUL CHOS
SKYONG RGYA MTSO'I DRUNG NAS BDE GSANG 'JIGS

GSUM GYI DBANG DANG SKYED RDZOGS KYI KHRID, DE NYID KYI GSUNG
RTZOM TSANG MA, GA-YER GSHONG 'JAM DBYANGS

BLO GROS LAS SA SKYA'I GSER CHOS BCU GSUM, SGRA MI SNYAN PA'I
TSE SGRUB KYI KHRID LUNG, LCAN SKYA GONG MA'I GSUNG

'BUM SOGS GSAN, CHU STAG LOR DBUS SU PHEBS, RGYAL BA YAB SRAS LA
'BUL BA, SER 'BRAS DGE

GSUM LA MANG 'GYED, BKRA SHIS LHUN POR PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN
PA BLO BZANG YE SHES LA BSNYEN RDZOGS

ZHUS; 'DUS PA MANG POR 'DOD CHOS BSTZAL CING, KHRI NGAG DBANG
MCHOD LDAN LA RVA PO TA KYI LUNG PHUL,

TSUR YANG ZAB CHOS 'GA' GSAN, CHU YOS SMON LAM THOG GRVA SKOR PA
BLO BZANG DRI MED SOGS LA BGRO GLENG GNANG

BAS MKHAS GRAGS KYIS KHYAB, LO DER RANG YUL DU BYON, SO BRGYAD
PA ME RTA LA KHRIR PHEBS, LUGS

GNYIS KYI SGO NAS ZHE DRUG PA SHING STAG BAR DU BSKYANGS, LCAGS
PHAG LA RDZONG DKAR DAR RGYAS GLING DU CHOS RJE MA

nI PA SOGS DE PHYOGS KYI SGRUB SDE BCO BRGYAD KYI BLA MA PHAL
CHE BAS GTZOS 'DUS PA MANG PO LA RDOR 'PHRENG DBANG,

CHU GLANG LOR BDE CHEN DU MI TRA'I DBANG GNANG, SHING STAG LA
'JAM DBYANGS GONG MAS GSER GYI RGYAL KHAB TU

SPYAN DRANGS PA HOR ZLA BDUN PA'I TSES BCU LA BDE CHEN NAS PHYAG
BTEGS, DGU PA'I ZLA NANG PE CING DU 'BYOR,

GONG MAR MJAL DUS GONG NAS DBU MA'I LTA BA'I DKA' GNAS LAS
BRTZAMS TE DRI BA MANG PO GNANG BAR LAN

PHUL; ' LCANG SKYA MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE DANG ZHAL 'DZOMS, GONG
NAS CHAN SHI'I LUNG DANG THAM KA PHUL,

SHING YOS LA THU'U BKVAN GONG MAS DGONGS PA ZHUS LTABS THAM GA
BLA MA GNANG DGOS BYUNG, CHEN LUNG RGYAL PO KHRI

@281 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BZHUGS ME 'BRUG NAS LCAGS SPREL BAR PHAL CHER DBYAR STON MTSO
BDUN DANG, DGUN DPYID PHO BRANG DU BZHUt,

RGYAL SRAS BCU BDUN PA SOGS LA CHOS BKA' RGYA CHER GNANG, CHU
KHYI LO NAS LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE DANG RNAM GNYIS

KYIS GONG GI BAS BSTAN 'GYUR SOG SKAD DU BSGYUR, SHING BYI LOR
PE CING DU YUNG HVA DGON DGA' LDAN BYIN

CHAGS GLING GSAR DU BSKRUN, SHING GLANG LOR DGON DER CHO 'PHRUL
SMON LAM DANG, MTSAN NYID, RGYUD

PA; SMAN PA, SGRA SNYAN BCAS KYI GRVA TSANG SO SOR BTZUGS TE,
LHA LDAN SMON LAM NANG BZHIN MING BTAGS

SROL PHYE, 'DI YAN SKYABS MGON SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I
RNAM THAR TU GSAL BAS THO TZAM BTUS,

SMAD CHA RGYAB SKU PHYOGS BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RAB RGYAS KYI
BSGRIGS PA YOD KYANG MA MTHONG, GSUNG RTZOM PHAR

PHYIN MTHA' DPYOD, 'DUL BA'I LAS CHOG GI tIKKA THUB BSTAN GSAL
BA'I SGRON ME, BZANG SPYOD tIKKA THAR 'DOD

'JUG NGOGS, BYAMS SMON tIKKA THAR LAM GSAL SGRON, MA CIG GI GCOD
GZHUNG RGYAS PA, BRGYA RTZA'I

RNAM BSHAD SOGS PO TA BZHI TZAM YOD PA AE PHU BLO BZANG DON GRUB
KYIS DPAR DU BRKOS, KUN MKHYEN SU 'PHRENG

GNYIS PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS CHED GNYER GYIS MI TRA'I
DBANG ZHUS PAR, NGAS KHYED KYI GONG

MA'I MDUN NAS DBANG NYAN DUS NYIN GCIG NGA'I THAD NAS PHYAG
PHRENG 'THOR SONG, BZHI DE MA THAG DAN,

YANG BSKYAR BTZAL BAS GCIG BCAS LNGA RNYED PA PHUL BAS KHYED
KYIS DBANG 'DI LAN LNGA BSKUR BAR 'DUG CES LUNG

BSTAN; DA SNGA BZHI LAS MA SONG, DA NI TSOD MTHO BAS TSANG MA
DKA' BA 'DRA YANG CHOS BDAG PO LA SPROD RGYU

BYUNG BA SKAL BA SHIN TU BZANG BAS NUS TSOD CIG CIS KYANG 'BUL
DGOS GSUNGS TE BLA MED YONGS RDZOGS GNANG,

DON BZHI BA CHU RTA LA BDE CHEN DU ZHI BAR GSHEGS, KUN MKHYEN
BAR MA GDAN, DANGS, GDUN MDUN DU MYUR

'BYON GSUNG RTZOM MDZAD, DE'I SPRUL SKU 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN 'DZIN
'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO, MCHO GA-YAS

RU ME RGAN T'A'I CHING GI RGYUD PA DBANG PHYUG RAB BRTAN GYI
SRAS SU 'KHRUNGS PA LCAGS YOS LOR RGYA NAG TU PHEBS PA'I

PHYI LO GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG
DPAL LDAN 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO NI, CHU

BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG GI MAN LAM DU, SHAR PHYOGS KYI NAM
MKHA' NAS KHA TOG SNA TSOGS PA'I 'JA'

TSON ZAB PA LTAR CHU BZANG GI THAD DU ZUG, DE'I STENG DU LJA
YDANG LHA MO MANG PO MCHOD RDZAS THOGS PAS MDUN BDAR

TE BLA MA CHEN PO SNE RING DANG, CHOS GOS MNAB PA ZHIG PHEBS
BYUNG BAR SU YIN DRIS PAS GSER KRI YIN ZER BA

ZHIG BYUG BA BZHIN DE NYID KYI GSOL DPON NGAG DBANG LHUN GRUB
KYI TSA BOR CHU SPRUL LOR 'KHRUNGS, ME BYA LOR CHU

BZANG DU GDAS DRANGS, BDUN PA SA PHAG LA CHU BZANG THUB BSTAN
DBANG PHYUG LAS RAB BYUNG DAN, PAn

CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DPAL LDAN YE SHES SKU 'BUM DU PHEBS
PA'I DRUNG NAS LCAGS BYI LOR DGE TSUL BSGRUBS,

SHING 'GRUB LA GONG MAR 'TSAMS ZHUS DANG, ME LUG LA CHU BZANG DU
CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS TZAM MDZAD NAS DBUS SU

PHEBS; SA BYAR RANG YUL DU PHYIR BYON DUS CHU BZANG TSOGS SU
ISANGS RGYAS KYI 'PHRIN LAS RGYUN MI 'CHAD PA'I TSUL

GYI BGRO GLENG GNAG BAS THAMS CAD KYIS RTEN 'BREL SHIN TU LEGS
ZHES BSNGAGS BRJOD PHUL NYER BZHI PA ME@282 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

'BRUG LOR CHU BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG GIS MKHAN PO, KHRI
ZUR NGAG DBANG DPAL BZANG GIS LAS SLOB,

T'A LE HU THOG THUS GSANG STON, KHRI PA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS DUS GO
BA MDZAD DE BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, SNGAR RGYAL

DBANG MCHOG LA ZHUS TE BYA KHYUNG PA MDO BA GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN
GDAN DRANGS PA'I DRUNG NAS LAM RIM CHEN MO'I

BSHAD LUNG SOGS BKA' CHOS MANG DU GSAN, KYA KHYIN RGYAL PO'I DUS
PHO BRANG GI THAM KA BLA MA MDZAD, ZHI

DUL GYI KUN SPYOD GTZANG BAS MKHAS BTZUN 'DZOMS PA, SKYABS MGON
LUNG RTOGS RGYA MTSO KHRI 'DON SKABS

GANGS LJONGS SU PHEBS PA SOGS RNAM THAR RGYA CHE, DE'I SPRUL SKU
NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA SKU

'BUM MI NYAG TSO BAR DA LTA'I LA MO 'DI PA DANG SKU MCHED DU
'KHRUNGS, SKU 'BUM DU THUGS GNYER GNANG,

RGYA NAG TU PHEBS NAS CHER MA 'GYANGS PAR GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU
BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO CHOS TSA'I DPON

RGYUD DU 'KHRUNGS, DE YANG CHOS TSA'I KHYA DO'I RGYUD PAR LA MO
BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DANG, DE'I

GCEN AER KHE THA'I JI LA KHRI SPRUL BSTAN PA'I NYI MA GNYIS RIM
PAR 'KHRUNGS PAS SNGA MAR BZANG PHYI MAR YANG BZANG

BYAS PAS 'KHRUNGS GZHIS LA YANG BZANG DU GRAGS, THA'I JI'I TSA
BO DRAG MO DANG RGYAL MTSAN GNYIS, 'DI LA

MO CHOS SKYONG GIS YUL BRAG DKAR ZHES BYA'I LHA ZHOL NAS, ,MING
RGYAL MTSAN ZHES BYA'I SKYES BU 'BYUNG, ,

BSOD NAMS KYI STOBS KYIS KHA LO BSGYUR, ,MI DE YIS BSTAN PA
SKYONG BAR BYED, ,CES LUNG BSTAN PA

BZHIN SBRA NAG SDE BA BDUN GYI DPON PO BYAS, PHYOGS DE'I BOD
DPON ZHIG LA 'DI LAS BZANG BA MA BYUNG SKAD,

GONG NAS SHEL TOG SNGON PO DANG RMA BYA'I SGRO'I THOB BYUNG BA
DE NYID KYI TSA RGYUD YIN LA, PE CING DU GONG MAR 'TSAMS

ZHUS GRUB STE BDE CHEN DU THUGS GNYER GONG 'PHEL DU YOD, `GRAGS
RGAN SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA

MTSO NYID KYI BCU DGU BA SHING STAG NAS RE DRUG PA LCAGS GLANG
BAR KHRIR BZHUGS TE LUGS GNYIS KYI SKYONG KHUR ZLA

MED PA MDZAD PAS MKHAS GRUB MANG DU BYON, ` RNYE PA SGOM CHEN
BLO BZANG NAM MKHA'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG BSTAN

'DZIN NYI MA CHU STAG NAS LCAGS PHAG BAR KHRIR BZHUGS TE TSAR
GCOD RJES 'DZIN LE SHOR MED PA MDZAD PAS

'GRIG LAM NYAMS GSOS DANG 'CHAD NYAN GONG 'PHEL DU GYUR PAS BKA'
DRIN CAN DU BRTZI, ` AA RIG DGE BSHES

CHEN MO BYAMS PA DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN LCAGS PHAG NAS LO GSUM
TZAM BZHUGS, DBANG LUNG RJES GNANG MANG

DU BSTZAL, PHYOGS 'DI'I SER SKYA DRAG ZHAN KUN GYI BLO SNA CHOS
LA BSGYUR BAS BKA' DRIN CHE BA'I BSNGAGS BRJOD DA

LTA'I BAR GNAS, `THAR SHUL SPRUL SKU NGANG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL TE
'DI'I GONG MA MKHAS GRU CHEN PO CHOS SKYONG RGYA

MTSO NI, RA DAN PHYOGS SU BDUD SHUL, BAN SHUL, PHAN SHUL, MGON
SHUL, SMAN SHUL SOGS LDONG RIGS SHUL

CHEN MANG DU YOD PA'I NANG NAS THAR SHUL RIGS SU 'KHRUNGS, CHUNG
DUS PHYUGS 'TSO SKABS MNAL LAM DU, BUD

MED RGYAN LDAN DRE'U ZHON PA ZHIG GIS MING CHOS SKYONG RGYA MTSO
GYIS, BAR CHAD THAMS CAD NGAS SEL ZER BA ZHIG BYUNG

BA KHU BOR BSNYAD PAS MTSAN DE LTAR THOGS, DBUS SU SGO MANG CHOS
GRVAR ZHUGS, DPON SLOB HOR GYI GRVA RGYUN

YIN; DUS THOG DER MKHAS PA'I KHROM THOG CHOD PAS KUN MKHYEN GONG
MA CHOS GRVAR GSAR ZHUGS KYI SA SPREL DGUN

@283 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CHOS DAM BCA'I BGRO GLENG SKABS, DGE BSHES SU BZANG GZIGS PAS
GRVA RGAN RNAM DPYOD LEGS PA 'GA'

RE'I 'PHROR, GRVA BA SKU GZUGS CHE LA SMRA BRJOD GTZANG BA, RNAM
DPYOD LEGS SHOS ZHIG BZHENGS NAS,

KUN BTAGS NGO BO NYID MED PA ZER BGRO GLENG BYAS PAS DAM BCA' BA
YANG SA 'OG LA THIM 'GRO BA LTAR 'DUG

RGYUS YOD CIG LA SU YIN DRIS PAS, BYA BRAL RAB 'BYAMS PA CHOS
SKYONG RGYA MTSO YIN, DA LTA DGE BSHES 'DI

LAS CHE BA MED ZER SKAD, 'JIGS BYED CHOS 'BYUNG DU, DE DUS BDAG
CAG GRVA BA BLO GSAL BA 'DZIN

GRVA SO SO NA MANG PAS, BYA BRAL RAB 'BYAMS PA CHOS SKYONG RGYA
MTSO, HOR SKAL LDAN, LCANG SKYA ZHABS

DRUNG RIN PO CHE, RTAG BRTAN MKHAN PO PRA DZNY'A D'A NA, AA DAR,
DAR BE SOGS RGAN PA RNAMS KYIS KYANG

BGRO GLENG DMAR BA MJUG CHOD LA'ANG RTZOD, BAR BA RNAMS KYANG SO
SO'I DAM BCA' DANG RIGS LUNG GIS NAM

LANGS PA SHIN TU MANG ZHES DANG, 'GAL 'DU'I PHUNG PO DANG BRJOD
BRAL LA YIG CHA RTZOM PAR SMRA BA MA YIN PAS

YIG 'JOG LEGS PAR THUB PA'I MKHAS DBANG YANG DON SHER GNYIS,
LCANG SKYA CHOS SKYONG GNYIS, SKAL

LDAN GNYIS, 'JAM DBYANGS GNYIS SOGS TE RE MANG BYUNG GSUNGS LA,
DON SHER GNYIS NI THOR GOD DON

GRUB RGYA MTSO DANG, NYI THANG SHES RAB SBYIN PA GNYIS, SKAL
LDAN GNYIS KYI GCIG 'DUL BA CHOS RJE HOR SKAL

LDAN YIN 'DRA LA, PHYIR MA RNAMS LA SHES, DRUNG BA RGYAL TSAB
PA, RTA PHUG PA, LCANG SKYA GONG MA, BKA'

'GYUR BA SBYIN PA RGYA MTSO SOGS BLA MA MANG DU BSTEN, LCAGS
PHAG LOR MDO SMAD DU PHEBS, BRAG DKAR

SPEL RDZONG, NAGS RDO RDZONG, GAD PA GA-YANG RA SOGS SU SGRUB PA
MDZAD PAS SGYU LUS BRNYES SHING, NAG PO

SPYOD PA'I RNAM 'PHRUL DU GRAGS PA BYUNG, 'BAL GYI MANG RA'I
RGYAB TU GUR DGON BTAB NAS BZHUGS, BLA

MCHOD KHRID YIG LAM RIM ZIN BRIS, BAR DO'I 'PHRANG SGROL GYI
'GREL BA SOGS RTZOM PA MANG, LCAGS

STAG LOR KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA MJAL BAR BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL DU PHEBS, 'DOD LHA DU MA'I RJES

GNANG DANG LJAGS RTZOM GRAS TSIG GSAL TSAD MA'I RNAM BSHAD KYI
LUNG, 'JIGS BYED CHOS 'BYUNG GI STOD CHA'I

BSHAD LUNG BCAS GSAN, MDO SNGAGS KYI DKA' GNAD LAS BRTZAMS PA'I
DOGS GCOD MANG PO ZHUS,

LAN GYIS DGE BSHES PA THUGS 'PHROG STE DAD PA'I RNAM 'GYUR LHUR
BLANGS, KUN MKHYEN MCHOG NAS KYANG SNGAR

GYI DGE BSHES BGRES PA YIN PAS GUS PA CHEN PO DANG THUGS DAM CI
MDZAD BKA' 'DRI GNANG BAR SDIG SGRIB SBYONG

PHYIR GZUNGS SNGAGS 'GA' 'DON GI YOD CES KHENGS SKYUNG MDZAD,
KHYED DGE BSHES CHEN PO YIN PAS NYAMS

KHRID CI RIGS SKYONG GI YONG 'GRO GSUNGS PA'I LAN DU, LAM KHRID
LA MOS PA MA CHAD TZAM BYED KYIN BDOG ZHUS

PAS THUGS SHIN TU DGYES TE BKA' DRIN CHE, PHYIN CHAD DE BZHIN
MDZAD DGOS GSUNGS, DGUNG LO MTHON

POR SLEBS KYANG THUGS DAM LA NYIN MTSAN MED, MTSAN MO TZOG BUR
BZHUGS, SHA GTAN NAS MI BZHES,

DPE GZIGS LA SHIN TU 'GRUS KYANG SPYAN LA 'GRIB PA MED PA GRVA
SAR BZHUGS NAS BZUNG MCHOD ME RE CHAG MA MYONG

BA DANG, NGA'I DON DU RANG GZHAN SUS KYANG SROG GCOD BYED MA
MYONG BA DE'I STABS YIN GSUNGS, ME BYA DANG

@284 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SA KHYI'I LO GNYIS LA KHRI CHEN RGYA NAG PA'I MCHOG SPRUL LA BDE
GSANG 'JIGS GSUM GYI DBANG, DE DAG GI BSKYED

RDZOGS KYI KHRID SOGS CHOS KYI CHAR PHABS, SUM PA MKHAN CHEN RAB
BYUNG GI MKHAN PO DANG, STOBS LDAN

SNGAGS RAMS PAS 'DI PA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS PAS NYAMS RTOGS MAN NGAG
GI GTER DU GYUR, GSHEGS KHAR

SKU SKYE 'BYON PAR NAN ZHUS PAS SBYIN BDAG ZHIG LA RTEN 'BREL
BSGRIGS TE 'KHRUNGS, SKYE BA DRAN GSAL CHE,

SA BYA LOR KHRI CHEN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA THAR SHUL DGON DU GDAN
DRANGS TE RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS, SNGA PHYIR CHOS BKA'

YANG MANG PO GSAN, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU THUGS GNYER LA BZHUGS PA

DE'I SPRUL SKU 'DI PA MTSO SNGON SOG RIGS SU 'KHRUNGS, DBUS SU

KHRIR PHEBS, SKYA SER RNAMS LA

YIG DRUG DUNG PHYUR MANG PO, SMYUNG GNAS STONG PHRAG DU MA SRUNG

SKU DGE 'DUN CHOS SKYONG RGYA MTSO MTSO SNGON SA CHAR YAB RDO
RJE RAB BRTAN DANG, YUM DPAL 'DZOMS KYI SRAS SU

BZHI NAS NYI SHU RTZA GRANGS BAR BDE CHEN

DU SLOB GNYER DANG, 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD, NYER DGU NAS DPON SLOB
GSER KHANG PA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS,

LDAN THE BO SPRUL BA'I SKU RIN PO CHE LAS

CHOS BKA' MANG DU GSAN, KHRONG GIS KYANG SKU YON CHE YANG SBAS
NAS DMAN CHA 'DZIN PA, 'DOD CHUNG CHOG

SHES YA MTSAN ZHES BSNGAGS BRJOD MDZOD PA THOS, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL
DU SNGA PHYIR RJE SHES RAB RGYA MTSO PA LAS BKA'

CHOS GSAN BZHES MDZAD, DENG SANG BDE CHEN DGONG MA LAG, KHRI KA
GONG 'OG SBRAG NAG SOGS SU 'GRO DON

BKRA SHIS KLU KYA NAS 'KHRUNGS, DBUS KYI DGE

BSHES; DPON SLOB GRAGS RGAN PA LA BSTEN, STONG NYID RTOGS PAR
GRAGS SHING, RTEN 'BREL BSTOD

tIKA BLO BZANG DGONGS RGYAN SOGS GSUNG RTZOM MANG, DE'I SPRUL
SKU 'DI PA DGON PA'I LHA SDE NOR BA NAS

'KHRUNGS; CHUNG NGU NAS 'JIGS BYED LA YI DAM MDZAD DE MKHYEN RAB
RDOL BA LTA BUS 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM

LA MKHAS, KUN MKHYEN BAR MA LAS PHYAG CHEN KHRID SOGS GSAN
ZHING, YAR NANG RNYE PA SPRUL SKU, AA RIG

DGE BSHES SOGS LA GTUGS, 'DI KA'I KHRIR BZHUGS TE 'CHAG NYAN
'GRIG LAM LA ZHIB TSAGS SHIN TU CHE BAS

AUS CING THA'I JI'I RIGS SU 'KHRUNGS,

SOGS BRIS 'BUR GYI SKU BRNYAN MANG DU BSKRUN,

SNAR THANG NAS BKA' 'GYUR GNYIS GDAN DRANGS PA BCAS NANG BZHUGS

BZHAG MA nI ZLA CHOS KHA SHAS BZUNG BAS RIL BU 'PHUR BA'I RTAGS
MTSAN BYUNG, SUM RTAGS SOGS BRTZAMS

'KHRUNGS GZHIS SBRA NAG RKANG TSA NAS YAB DPAL RTZE

CHO GA CHOS SPYOD PHAL CHER THUGS 'DZIN

CHOS RGYUN RING 'GRIMS PAS THUGS GNYER SHIN

PHEBS, RIG GNAS THAMS

@287 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GRAGS RGYA MTSO NYID KYI SUM CU PA CHU KHYI LA KHRIR BZHUGS
BZHIN PA'O, ,'DI RNAMS GDAN RABS LAS CUNG ZAD

BTUS SHING GSUNG SGROS KYIS BRGYAN TE BKOD LA, ` GZHAN DER
BZHUGS PA SGO MANG MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG TSUL

KHRIMS NI, AU RUR YAB TSE BRTAN BKRA SHIS, YUM BO YAG GNYIS KYI
SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU

RTA LA 'KHRUNGS, BDE CHEN DANG DBUS SU THUGS GNYER MTHAR PHYIN
TE LHA RAMS PA GNANG, KUN MKHYEN

SKU 'PHRENG GSUM PA DBUS PHEBS KYI SKABS YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN
NAS DPE KHRID ZHUS, GZHUNG NAS SGO MANG

MKHAN POR BSKOS PAS RIGS GRVA LAN GNYIS BANG BA SOGS SKU DRIN
CHE BAS DMIGS BSAL GYIS SGO MANG GRVA KHANG

STENG NAS GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU TSUL KHRIMS GRAGS PA, SNGA MA'I
'KHRUNGS GZHIS SU BYA THAR RE DANG,

SKYID RIS KYI SRAS SU 'KHRUNGS, BDE CHEN SGAR BA BLA BRANG DU
BLANGS NAS DO DAM MDZAD, MGON KHANG DU RGAD

PO AA RA DKAR PO CAN ZHIG RGYUN DU GZIGS PA SOGS MTHONG SNANG
SNA TSOGS DANG MNGON SHES GSAL KYANG CHER MA

'GYANGS PAR GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS SNANG
RAR TSE RING MKHAR DANG, LHA MO GNYIS

LA 'KHRUNGS PA LA DPON SLOB GSER KHANG PA NAS DGUNG LO BCU BDUN
PAR SKYER STENG TSOGS CHU LEN PA SOGS GRVA

RKYANG DKYUS MA LTAR MDZAD DE MKHAN SAR MA BTON NA LEGS TSUL
GSUNGS KYANG CUNG ZAD NGAG THUNG BAS GSHEGS,

DA LTA'I DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS STONG CHE NAS YAB RNAM
RGYAL DANG, YUM GTZUG GO'I SRAS SU SA BYA LA 'KHRUNGS,

BDE CHEN CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, MKHYEN RAB CHE BAS THUGS GNYER SHIN
TU LEGS, ` RTEN YANG LA MO NA RIM GYI

SKU GDUNG MCHOD RTEN, RJE'I SNANG BRNYAN GRUB CHU MA, KHRI CHEN
BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS SBYOR 'JAGS

MDZAD PA'I GSER ZANGS KYI RGYAL BA RDO RJE 'CHANG GI SKU BRNYAN
KHRU LNGA PA NYE BA'I SRAS CHEN BRGYAD, RJE'I SNANG BRNYAN

KHRU GSUM PA, BYAMS 'JAM DBYANGS KYIS KU SOGS GRANGS MANG, MAR
KHA'I SKU PHYOG SNGAG DBANG BSTAN

'DZIN GYIS BZHENGS PA'I JO KHANG DU, GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I
DBYANGS NAS SPRUL PA'I BZO BOR BSNGAGS PA DE NYID

KYI PHYAG BZO JO SKU BZHUGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I ME KHYI LA
RMA MGUR BTAB NAS NYIS BRGYAD DANG BZHI, DE'I

CHU KHYI LA BDE CHEN BTAB NAS BRGYA DANG GYA BZHI BA SHING GLANG
'DI YIN NO, ,BDE CHE, RNGA BA, MGUR

TE RNGA MGUR KHA GSUM DANG, GYER THANG, NGANG RONG SOGS DGON MA
LAG NYER LNGA YOD, ` DGON PA'I

GA-YAS KYI CHU RGYUD DU GYER THANG RI KHROD BYAMS CHEN CHOS
RDZONG SKAL LDAN DNGOS SLOB RNGA BA CHOS RJES BTAB, PHYIS

SU LA MO GRAGS RGAN PA BZHUGS ZER BA DANG, TSA GAN NO MON HAN
GYIS SA SBRUL LOR BTAB, SNGAGS RAMS

PA RNGA BA 'JAM DBYANGS BLO GROS KYIS SMAN CHOG CHEN MO BTZUGS
ZER BA YANG SNANG, KUN MKHYEN BAR MA DGUNG

LO BDUN PA'I STENG 'DIR PHEBS TE KLOG SLOB PA SOGS KYI BZHUGS
GNAS MDZAD CING, DE DUS KUN MKHYEN

GONG MA'I DNGOS GRUB GRAGS PA LHUN GRUB BZHUGS SNANG, ` DGON
GSAR BKRA SHIS RAB BRTAN STONG 'KHOR

BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS BTAB, DE'I DRUNG DU GNAS 'DIR KUN MKHYEN
BAR MAS RDOR 'PHRENG DBANG GSAN,

` RNGA SGAR BYANG CHUB GLING NI, RNGA KHOG NAS BYON PA'I BLA MA
RDOR BZANG GIS BTAB, GUR MGON CHOS SKYONG DU

@288 (MRA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BSTEN PAS SA SKYAB BA ZHIG YIN 'DRA ZER, GDAN SA PA 'GA'I RJES,
RTZANG RI PHUG PA CHOS RJE DGE 'DUN

RGYAL MTSAN GYIS LAM RIM GYI SGO NAS GDUL BYA BSKYANGS, DU MA
SGRUB PA LA BTZUD, YANG GDAN RABS 'GA'

NAS RNGA BA CHOS  RJE SMON LAM BKRA SHIS KYIS GZHI GSUM BTZUGS,
RJE SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I DBU BLA DGE PHYUG RAB

'BYAMS PA SANGS RGYAS RGYA MTSO, NOR BZANG RGYA MTSO, DGE LEGS
DPAL LDAN SOGS GDAN SAR RIM PHEBS

KYIS BSTAN PA LA BYA BA MDZAD, BDE CHEN NAS DPON SLOB RIM BSKOS
KYIS SKYONG BAR YOD, SANGS RGYAS RGYA

MTSO'I SKU GDUNG DANG MGON KHANG GNYAN PO, RNGA BA'I SANGS RGYAS
STONG SKU, N'A RO'I BUM CHU'I RGYUN SOGS

RTEN BYIN CAN MANG DU BZHUGS, ` SNANG RA'I RTA BRGYA'I LHA KHANG
DU DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS, ` TOG SPRUL SKU

NGAG DBANG DPAL 'BYOR GYI GDAN SA TOG SGAR BA, D'I'I GONG MA TOG
NOR BU'I MTSAN CAN ZHES PA KUN MKHYEN

BAR MA DGUNG LO LNGA'I SKABS YONGS RDZOGS DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA
PHUL TE MTSAN NOR BU RGYAL MTSAN GSOL MKHAN

DE YIN 'DRA, DA LTA'I DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA RGYA MTSO KHO TSE'I NANG
DU PADMA DON GRUB DANG SKAL BANG SGROL MA GNYIS

LA ME BYI LOG 'KHRUNGS, ` SNANG RA'I GSER KHANG NI, CHOS RJE DON
GRUB RIN CHEN BYA KHYUNG GI GNAS 'TSOL

SKABS SNANG RA'I AA MYES DON GRUB SENG GE'I RTZAR PHEBS, BYA
KHYUNG GI GNAS STON MKHAN KHRO GNYEN CAN MA'I SPRUL

BAR GRAGS PA'I RGAN MO YANG 'DI PA'I YIN, DES SBYIN BDAG BYAS TE
BZHENGS ZER BA DANG, MI NYAG BSOD

NAMS ZER BA LA RGYA JU THIG PA ZHIG GIS LUNG BSTAN, SPRUL BA'I
KHRA ZHIG 'PHRUL BA'I RJES BSNYEGS PAR 'DI KA'I

SA 'BUR ZHIG GI STENG DU BABS PA DER LHA KHANG BZHENGS YANG ZER,
CHOS RJE DON RIN PAS SA SDE'I BSHAD PA

GNANG; PHYIS BYA KHYUNG DU LHA KHANG CHEN MO DANG LHAN DU RAB
GNAS MDZAD PAS 'DIR YANG ME TOG BABS PA RTEN

SGROM DU BZHUGS PA DA LTA YOD, DAM CAN SRUNG MAR BSKOS TE RTEN
THANG CHOS RJE'I SHANGS KHRAG GIS BZHENGS,

GNYAN CHA SHIN TU CHE, DUS PHYIS KUN MKHYEN BAR MAS SENG ZHON
GYI SMAN SKU BZHENGS, DE'I BSKANG 'PHRIN

BTZUGS PAS 'TSUB CUNG ZAD CHUNG, DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS, NYE SRAS
BRGYAD, MI GA-YO BA SNGON PO,

RTA MGRIN BE CON CAN RNAMS BZHUGS, LCANG SKYA GONG MA DANG SKAL
LDAN DNGOS SLOB RONG BO GRUB CHEN NI GU BA BLO

BZANG DON GRUB, DE'I THUGS SRAS BLO BZANG MCHOG LDAN PA GNYIS
KYIS SGRUB SDE BTAB STE YUN RING BZHUGS,

'DI NAS DGU RONG NGOS KYI LA BRGYUD NA RONG BOR SLEBS, ` DGU
RONG MTHIL DANG NYE BAR RIGS GSUM MGON

PO'I GZUGS SOGS YIG 'BRU RANG BYON DANG, PHYAG ZHABS KYI RJES
MANG BA'I GNAS 'GANG CHEN DER SKAL LDAN

GYI SGRUB KHANG YOD, ` SNANG RA'I GRONG BRGYAD DAM BDUN NI,
SNANG RA, GLAS GSUM, TSO BZHI,

DPON PO 'BUM YAG RGYAL

@289 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GZIMS KHANG DU NA BZA' SOGS RTEN MANG, CHOS TSA DANG GCAN TSA

THOB GNANG, DBON PO YUM ME LA CHEN HU BLO

BZHENGS PAR GRAGS PA'I BYIN CAN, SPRUL SKU BSOD

RING YANG SNANG BA BDE BA BYUNG GSUNGS,

GSUM, MA nI DUNG PHYUR DGU SOGS

DANG NE GU GRUB CHEN GYIS LHA KHANG RNAMS SU SKU

GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG DU BZHENGS, BRAG LA RANG BYON DANG BRKOS
PA'I SKU BNYAN MANG, RGYA DMAG GIS

BYUNG BA MDZAD, NYE 'DABS KYI GRONG KHYIM ZHIG

RJE CHEN PO LA THUGS DAM MDZAD DE NYIN MTSAN

SHAR, GSHEGS KHAR GDUNG RTAGS DGOS

nI THANG DU GRAGS, KUN MKHYEN BAR MA'I

DGONGS 'GREL DANG BCAS PA 'CHAD PA

'DZIN GYI KHROD NA RGYAL MTSAN GYI TOG LTAR

SHING, RNAM THAR DANG 'BREL BA'I

GSOL 'DEBS RIN PO CHE'I 'KHRI SHING BYA BA MDZAD, NGA GCIG PA SA
RTA LOR CHOS SDE BTAB, DGE 'DUN

CHEN MO'I BSHAD LUNG SOGS

LTAS DANG, LOGS BRIS RNAMS LAS GRUB

SOGS YIN, NYID KYI KHU BO RIG GNAS LA

BA DPAL DA LTA BZHUGS, SKU YON LEGS,

RI KHROD BTAB NAS LO BRGYA DANG NYER BRGYAD PA SHING GLANG 'DI
YIN, ` SGANG BA PHYOGS KO'U BA DGON GSAR NI,

THOG MAR KO'U PA GZHON NU BYANG CHUB 'OD ZER BZHUGS, DE NI KHRI
KA'I AAR SKONG DU 'KHRUNGS, T'A DBON

GZHON SENG LA GTUGS, 'GAG ZA'I LUNG PAR CHU MED PAS KLUNG CHEN
PO BTON, KO'U BA RI 'PHUG PAR

GRAGS; MKHAS GRUB KYI SNYAN PA CHE BAS HOR MOG KHAG GNYIS KYIS
BLA MCHOD DU BKUR, CHOS RJE DON GRUB

RIN CHEN GNAS 'DIR GDAN DRANGS TE CHOS MANG DU ZHUS, BYA KHYUNG
GI KHRI DANG RJE'I RAB BYUNG GI LAS SLOB MDZAD,

DPON RGYUD RIM PAR BYUNG BA LAS BLA MA CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS
RI KHROD RGYA BSKYED, 'DU KHANG RUNG KHANG GSAR

BZHENGS BYAS PAS DGON GSAR DU THOGS, DE'I DBON PO KO'U BA BKA'
BCU CHOS RGYA MTSO NI, RMA 'GRAM

KHRI KA 'OG MA'I SKAR MA THANG DU RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I LCAGS LUG
LA YAB BSOD NAMS RIN CHEN, YUM PAD MA MTSO'I

SRAS SU 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PA NAS BCU BDUN GYI BAR DGON
GSAR DU BLA MA GONG MA LAS YIG KLOG NAS

BZUNG CHOS MANG DU GSAN, BCU BZHI BA SHING SPREL LA RGYAL BA
BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I DRUNG DU RAB TU BYUNG, STONG

'KHOR YON TAN RGYA MTSO DANG, SPRUL SKU BSOD NAMS YE SHES DBANG
PO SOGS LA GTUGS, BCU BDUN PA

ME PHAG LA KHU BO CHOS RGYAN GYIS MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE DBUS SU
PHEBS, DGA' LDAN DU KHRI MNGON DGA' BA BYAMS

PA RGYA MTSO LAS DGE TSUL BSKYAR NAS BSGRUBS, SGOM SDE NAM MKHA'
RGYAL MTSAN LA CHOS 'BREL GSAN, 'BRAS

SPUNGS SGO MANG CHOS GRVAR CHU BZANG PA BYAMS PA LHUN GRUB DANG,
ZHVA SER RAB 'BYAMS PA BRTZON 'GRUS RGYA MTSO

RIM PAR BSTEN TE BSDUS GRVA, DBU PHAR, 'DUL MDZOD RNAMS GSAN,
NYER DRUG PA ME SPREL LA GLING

BSRE'I DAM BCA' BZHAG ME BYA LA GTZANG DU PHEBS, DKYIL KHANG PA
SANGS RGYAS RGYA MTSO BSTEN NAS RNAM

'GREL LA SBYANGS, NGAM RING DU GRVA SKOR MDZAD, SA KHYI LA DBEN
DGON DU PAn CHEN CHOS RGYAN LA BSNYEN RDZOGS

ZHUS; CHOS BKA' RGYA CHER GSAN, RTOGS PA KHYAD PAR CAN 'KHRUNGS,
SMAD RGYUD DU CHOS RJE RNAM RGYAL DPAL

BZANG LA 'DUS PA'I BSKYED RDZOGS SOGS ZHIB TU GSAN, 'BRAS SPUNGS
SNGAGS PA SLOB DPON NAM MKHA' BZANG

PO; NYI SDINGS SEMS DPA' CHEN PO NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO,
STAG LUNG BRAG PA BLO GROS RGYA MTSO BCAS LA

BKA' CHOS GSAN, SO BZHI BA SHING 'BRUG LA RANG YUL DU PHEBS DUS
PAn CHEN RIN PO CHER ZHU YIG PHUL BAS

'BRAL MED RJES 'DZIN GYI ZHAL BZHES BSTZAL, ZHE BDUN PA ME SPRUL
LA SKU 'BUM KHRIR BZHUGS, SA LUG

LOR SDE BA CHOS RJE PHEBS PA LA GUS 'DUD DANG CHOS GSAN, CHU
PHAG LOR KHRI'I DGONGS PA ZHUS TE SKAR MA THANG

DU LHA KHANG BZHENGS, AAN CHUNG GNAM RDZONG, RGOD PO RDZONG,
BRAG DKANG RI KHROD SOGS SU SGRUB PA LA GZHOL,

DGON GSAR NYAMS GSOS DANG RI KHROD LHUN GRUB CHOS RDZONG GI GZHI
BTING STE ME STAG BAR DER BZHUGS, SA 'BRUG

LOR REB SKONG DU BYON, CHOS PA RIN PO CHE SOGS SKAL LDAN MANG
POR CHOS KYI BDUD RTZI BSTZAL, SA SBRUL LOR

SKU 'BUM DU SDE BA CHOS RJE'I DRUNG DU RDOR 'PHRENG GSAN, RE
LNGA PA SHING PHAG HOR ZLA DANG PO'I NANG DU SKU 'BUM MJAL

@293 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BZHED KYIS PHEBS, HOR ZLA GSUM PA'I NYER LNGA LA TZONG KHA'I SA
CHA AA TZE ZER BAR SKU GSHEGS, GDUNG RUS

LA DUNG GA-YAS 'KHYIL BYON PA NANG BZHUGS KYI MCHOD RTEN 'DIR
YOD, DE'I GDAN SA PA NYID KYI DBON PO 'JAM

DBYANGS DPAL LDAN GYIS KUN MKHYEN GONG MA DANG, GA-YER GSHONG
SNGAGS RAMS PA'I ZHABS BSTEN, CHOS

SKYONG MGON PO LA GTZO BOR MDZAD DE LO BZHIN GTOR CHEN SROL
BTZUGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU CHOS TSA NAS 'KHRUNGS

PA BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN, DE'I SPRUL SKU DGE 'DUN LHUN PO RGAN
GYAR 'KHRUNGS, DA LTA'I 'DI PA CHOS TSA'I RI

BO TSANG NAS 'KHRUNGS PA RIM BYON GYIS DGON PA'I 'DZIN SKYONG
DANG, MCHOD GZHIS HOR MOG KHAG GNYIS KYI BLA

DPON SBRAGS MA MDZAD, ` DE'I LE LAG SKAR MTHANG GI LHA KHANG
DANG, MGON KHANG GNYAN PO RMA KHAR YOD,

` 'DI'I PHAR KHAR KO'U PA CHOS RGYA MTSO'I BZHUGS GNAS LHUN GRUB
CHOS RDZONG, RMA KHA DANG NYE BAR GCO AA LAG

GIS BZHENGS PA'I LHA MDUN BYAMS PA, ,` KYA KYA'I PHUR GSANG
SGROG BDE CHEN NAM BSHAD SGRUB 'PHEL RGYAS GLING

NI GNYAN THOG RAB 'BYAMS PAS BZUNG ZER, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I
CHU RTA LOR GA-YER GSHONG SNGAGS RAMS

PA GDAN DRANGS, BKA' CHOS DANG GZHI GSUM GYIS PHYAG BZHES, SMAN
CHOG DANG BDE MCHOG TSOGS 'DON

SOGS 'GRIG LAM ZHAL BKOD, BLA TSAB BZHAG STE RIM PAR BSKYANGS,
PHYIS SU BDE CHEN SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG

DE'I SPRUL SKU SNYAN GRAGS RGYA MTSO KYA

SRAS SU CHU 'BRUG LA 'KHRUNGS, GRVA BA

BRGYA LONGS TZAM DANG, BYAMS KHANG YOD, DA LTA YANG GA-YER
GSHONG CHE BAS KHA 'DZIN DANG, KO'U PA SPRUL

SKU KHRIR BZHUGS, THAR SHUL SGAR KHAG YANG YOD, ` DO KYA'I TSIS
KAR LHA RI BSAM GTAN GLING 'DI 'DEBS

PA BO TSIS KA'I SNGAGS RAMS PA RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SHING BYI
LA TSIS KAR 'KHRUNGS, SDE BA CHOS RJE DANG,

SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I DNGOS SLOB BDE MCHOG DANG THUGS RJE CHEN
PO'I RNAL 'BYOR BA, SKAR YIG SOGS RTZOM PA

MANG DU MDZAD MKHAN AA 'GRON MKHAS BTZUN RGYA MTSO'I SKYE BAR
GRAGS, SUM CU'I BAR DU KHYIM DU BZHUGS

TE RNYING CHOS LA SBYANGS, NYER MKHO'I RTZOM PA 'DRA MDZAD, DE
NAS DGE LUGS LA DAD PA SKYES TE THABS

MKHAS KYIS SO LNGA BA SA KHYI LA DBUS SU PHEBS, RAB TU BYUNG
BA'I MTSAN YE SHES BSAM GRUB DANG, PAn

CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES LA BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS PA'I MTSAN BLO
BZANG 'BYUNG GNAS, SMAD RGYUD DU BZHUGS TE MKHAN

PO BSAM BLO MI THUNG DANG, KHRI CHEN NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN BCAS
LA 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS, KHRID CHEN BRGYAD

SOGS GSAN, GZHI GSUM DANG RGYUD SDE'I PHYAG LEN LA MKHAS, BYA
KHYUNG BDE KHANG PA DANG MNYAM DU ZHOG

DON YOD MKHAS GRUB PA LAS DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG MANG DU GSAN,
THUGS DAM NYAMS BZHES LA 'GRUS, SO

DGU BA CHU STAG LA RANG YUL DU BYON, LHA RI GONG MA DANG, YAR
NANG SGAR RNYING SOGS SU SGRUB PA MDZAD,

LHA DANG BLA MA'I LUNG BSTAN LTAR ZHE GNYIS PA SHING SBRUL LA RI
KHROD BTAB, 'DZIN SKYONG LEGS PAS DGE 'DUN

DAM ZHING CHOS SPYOD 'PHEL BAS GZHAN LAS KHYAD DU THON, KUN

PHYAG CHEN CHOS DRUG SOGS MNOG CHE BA DANG, KHRI CHEN BSTAN PA'I

@297 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

B'A KYA, 'JA' MO RNAMS LA 'CHAM BTZUGS, SKU 'PHRENG GSUM BYON
PA'I RJES MA DENG SANG YOD, ` BON

GYI BLA MA KHYUNG MOS BZUNG BA'I BON DGON ZHIG YOD PA BCAS STONG
CHE GRVA TSANG BZHI ZER, SUM PAS AA RIG 'PHRIN

LAS YAR 'PHEL GYI STONG CHE'I DGON 'OG MA ZHES BSHAD PA BRTAGS,
` AA THIS DGON BSAM GTAN GLING AA

THIS BSTAN PA RGYA MTSOS BTAB, 'DI PA STONG CHE'I SE KYA NAS
'KHRUNGS, DBUS SU PHEBS, DE'I SBRUL

SKU RU NGAN BE HU'I RGYUD DU 'KHRUNGS PA MTSAN MA NGES, DE'I
SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO KHRE TZE NAS

YAB BUN CHANG PO DANG, YUM PHU SA NE GNYIS LA LCAGS SBRUL LOR
'KHRUNGS, BDE CHEN KHRIR BZHUGS, `

KAB RON GA-YU BZANG DANG NYE BAR DGON RONG BRAG SKYA RDO RJE
RDZONG NI, RONG BO CHOS PA RIN PO CHE'I GDAN SA,

BZHUGS SA'I MTHIL DU MDZAD, GRVA GRANGS MANG NA THUGS MTHUN
KHRIMS GTZANG YONG DKA' BAS GRVA GRANGS MA MANG,

GANG BZHUGS GRONG CHOG LA GTAN NAS SONG MI CHOG GSUNGS, SGRUB
KHANG GI BRAG GAS PA NYE GNAS KYIS ZHUS

PAR; SKYON MED GSUNGS PHYAG MDZUB GNYIS BRAG LA BTZUGS PA 'DAM
PA BRDZIS PABZHIN ZUG PA'I RJES LA DPON

SLOB GSER KHANG PAS GSER PHUL BA MJAL RGYU 'DUG SGRUB KHANG DER
BDE MCHOG BLOS BSLANGS, LDEBS

BRIS LA SANGS RGYAS STONG SKU, LAM RIM TSOGS ZHING, CHOS PA RIN
PO CHE RANG GIS GSUNG BKOD GNANG STE,

NYID KYI SKU LA SLOB MA BCO BRGYAD KYIS BSKOR BA RANG RANG GI
MTSAN BYANG CAN, GSHAM DU GRONG CHOG LA GTAN NAS

SONG MI CHOG CES PHYAG BRIS GNANG, SKAL LDAN DNGOS SLOB SHA
SBRANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS SGRUB SDE BTAB PA NAS

GZHI GSUM GYI PHYAG LEN MA CHAG RAS BRIS LA BRTEN BDE GSANG
'JIGS GSUM GYI BDAG 'JUG DANG, RDUL

TSON GYI SGOS DUS 'KHOR SGRUB MCHOD SBYIN SREG BCAS BTZUGS, SHAR
DANG LA MO GNYIS KAS 'DZIN BDAG

MDZAD; LUNG BA'I PHUR RGYAL BA YANG DGON PA'I SGRUB GNAS SNGON
MO RDZONG YOD, 'DI PA YANG TIG PHYOGS

NAS 'KHRUNGS, TAN TIG MTHIL, YANG H'A MTHIL, KHA SHA MTHIL TE
MTHIL GSUM DU GRAGS PA'I DGON

PA BTAB, ` MKHAR GYI GA-YON KO RA'I LUNG PAR JO JO'I LHA KHANG
NI, 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS SA PAn KUN

DGA' RGYAL MTSAN HOR RGYAL GYIS GDAN DRANGS TE MTSO SNGON DU
PHEBS SKABS KHRI KA'I RGYA MKHAR CHOD RTEN RTZAD

GCOD MDZAD DE GNAS 'DI PHEBS, RGYA LPOS DAD 'BUL GYI MU TIG
DRE'U KHAL GCIG BSKUR BA 'BYOR BAS

DE LA GZHI BYAS LHA KANG RTEN PAR BCAS PA BZHENGS, RAB GNAS
MDZAD DUS SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS

MANG PO THIM PA'I GZIGS SNANG SHAR, MU TIG GI RGYA SKAD KREN
GRU'I ZUR CHAG PAS JO JO'I LHA KHANG DU GRAGS ZER,

'DI DANG POR CHOS RJE LHUN GRUB RGYA MTSOS BZHENGS PA'I LO RGYUS
SNANG, LHA KHANG NANG DU SMAN 'DAMS LS GRUB

PA'I THUB SKU CHE BA, 'DI LA PHYIS SU MI NYAG TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN
PA'I NYI MAS GSER ZANGS DBU RGYAN PHUL,

DKAR CHAG BRTZAMS LHA KHANG GSAR BZHENGS LA STENG DU GANYDZI RA
DANG, KHRI TSAB DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN AA YAG

SHES RAB DBANG PHYUG GIS RAB GNAS MDZAD, ` RMA CHU BRGYUD NAS RE
ZHIG NA LHA DKAR PO BYA BA YOD LA,

GYON PA ZHIG THIM PA PHYUGS RDZI 'GAS MTHONG

@298 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

ZER BA DANG, RJE SKAL LDAN GYIS PHA BONG LA BYAMS SKU RANG BYON
YOD PAR GSUNGS, DE NANG BZHUGS KYI BYAMS

SKU LHA KHANG BCAS BZHENGS, 'DI LA LHA RANG SKYES YANG ZER,
PHYIS SU ME SKYON BYUNG BA RNYE BLO BZANG BSTAN

PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS ZHIG GSOS DANG, THAR SHUL DGE 'DUN CHOS
SKYONG RGYA MTSOS RAB GNAS MDZAD, DE

DUS PHA BONG STENG DU 'BRU GSUM RANG BYON YOD PA MANG POS MTHONG
SNANG, BYAMS KHANG GNYIS YOD PA'I GONG MA

RNYING SKYON CHE BA DPON SLOB GSER KHANG BSAS RTEN BRTEN PA GSAR
DU BSRKUN TE RNYE ZHAL SNGA NAS LA RAB GNAS GNANG

BCUG , 'DI'I RGYAB NGOS SRIN PO RI'I ZHOL KUN BZANG ME LONG BRAG
DKAR DU BRAG DKAR SNGAGS RAMS PA BLO

BZANG BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYIS SGRUB SDE BTAB SDE MKHA' SPYOD
DPAL GYIS GUR KHANG DU MTSAN GSOL, RGYAB RINR

SGROL MA GNAS PAR NYID KYIS MDZAD PA'I GNAS BSTOD LAS BYUNG,
BRAG LA CHOS RGYAL DANG, YIG BRU SOGS

RANG BYON MANG, NUS MTHU'I GRAGS PA CHE, SGRUB KHANG NYE 'KHOR
DU BRAG LA BRKOS PA'I BRUB KHUNG DA LTA YOD,

CHOM RKUN GYIS GTZES PAS PHYIS SU RI KHROD BDE LDAN DU SPOS,
THOG MA RA SA RKOS SKABS TSOGS ZANGS NANG DU MCHOD

RDZAS DANG DNGUL PHRAN TSEGS YOD PA BYUNG, DER DGE 'DUN PA NYI
SHU RTZA GRANGS BZHUGS PA THUGS MTHUN KHRIMS

GTZANG; TSONG DANG BUN SKYEN GTAN NAS MED CING, ZLA BA GNYIS PA
DANG GSUM PAR MCHOD PA BYE BA RE PHUL NAS

GRVA BA PHAL CHER SKU MTSAMS LA BZHUGS, 'JIGS BYED LHA BCU GSUM
MA DANG, DRIL BU LUS DKYIL, KUN

RIG GI BDAG 'JUG MGOS CHOS LHA MO GSUM GYI GTOR CHOG SRUNG MA'I
GTZO BO LHA MO LA BYED, SNGAGS

RAMS PA'I DUS NAS BTZUGS PA'I GZHI GSUM GYI PHYAG LEN MA NYAMS
SHING NGOS GTZANG BA YOD, GONG BA GRVA TSANG

GI DGON LAG BDE CHEN MAR KHA'I SKU PHYOGS SKU PHRENG GIS
SKYONGS, ` JO JO'I LHA KHANG DANG NYE BAR GONG BA GRVA

TSANG THOS BSAM DAR RGYAS GLING NI, GONG DGE DKA' BCUS BTAB, SKU
'PHRENG GSUM TZAM PHEBS KYANG DA

LTA SKYE RGYUD MED, DES NA SKAL LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG DU, GONG DGE
DKA' BCU BAS KHRI KAR SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN

PA'I BYA BA BYAS, LHA DKAR PO LA ZHABS TOG MDZAD GSUNGS PA DE
YIN LA, SDE BA CHOS RJE'I RNAM THAR TU'ANG

KHRI KA NAS GONG BA RAB 'BYAMS PA BSOD NAMS LHUN GRUB DPON
GA-YOG ,AA MTSO RAB 'BYAMS PA DPON GA-YOG

DBUS GTZANG NAS BYON PA'I MKHAS PA CHEN PO DON GRUB RGYA MTSO
SOGS KYIS BKA' CHOS ZHUS TSUL DANG, BRAG

DKAR SNGAGS RAMS PA'I RNAM THAR TU, GONG PA'I SKU SKYES HU THOG
THU B'A THUR THA'I JI SOGS KYIS BLA MAR BKUR

TSUL SNANG, MTSAN SGROGS MKHAN PO DGE 'DUN DON GRUB KYIS 'DZIN
BDAG MDZAD, DE NI KHRI KA'I GONG

BAR RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SA SPEL LA 'KHRUNGS, BCU GSUM PA LA
DBUS SU BYON, SGO MANG DU SLOB GNYER

DANG; NYER BDUN PA LA SMON LAM GRVA SKOR MDZAD, KUN MKHYEN 'JAM
DBYANGS BZHAD PA, BYA BRAL BLO

BZANG RIN CHEN, BRAG DKAR SNGAGS RAMS PA RNAMS BSTEN, PO TA LA'I
MGRON GNYER LO TZ'A PA DANG,

NYER BRGYAD PA LA 'DUL BA BLA MAR BSKOS, RGYA NAG GI MI SNAR LAN
GNYIS PHEBS, MTSAN SGROGS MKHAN PO

DANG; MDO SMAD DU RE BDUN PA SHING STAG LA SKU 'BUM KHRIR
BZHUGS, MI DBANG DANG THUGS 'BREL CHE BAS

@299 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MGO 'DREN GYIS LHA KHANG CHEN MO'I STENG DU GSER GYI RGYA PHIBS
BZHENGS, SNGA PHYIR RDO RJE PHRENG BA TSAR GSUM,

MI TRA TSAR GNYIS, DUS 'KHOR DBANG CHEN, RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM LUNG
SOGS BKA' CHOS TSAD MED GNANG,

DE'I KYE RGYUD DGE 'DUN BKRA SHIS NYI MAS RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI
PA'I SHING 'BRUG LOR DGON PA ZHIG GSOS MDZAD PA

GRUB TZAM LA GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU DA LTA'I 'DI PA ME LUG PA
'KHRUNGS, MTSAN DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA'I

NYI MA; SKU 'BUM CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, ` DGA' LDAN DAR RGYAS GLING
NI, MI NYAG BLO GROS DAR RGYAS KYIS

BTAB; DE'I SPRUL SKU TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN PA'I NYI MA 'DI KA'I
KHRIR BZHUGS SHING, 'DU KHANG STENG DU GSER

GYI GANYDZI RA BZHAG ,AA RIN YE SHES SKAL BZANG AA RIN DU
'KHRUNGS, DBUS KYI DGA' LDAN DGE BSHES GRAGS

CAN; GSUNG RTZOM YANG KHA SHAS SNANG, SKU 'BUM RGYUD PA'I KHRI
DANG, 'DI NAS RGYUN BZHUGS MDZAD

PAS SKU 'PHRENG RIM BYON GYIS SKYONG BZHIN PAR YOD, ` GLING
TSA'I SHANGS BLA MA'I RI KHROD BSAM GTAN GLING,

` SE KYA'I DGON DU DBUS KYI DGE BSHES RTZER SON SE KYA LHA RAMS
PA RGYUN RING BZHUGS, PHYIS SU DPON SLOB

GSER KHANG BAS DGON NAS SPOS TE LHA KHANG GSAR DU BSKRUN, GZHI
GSUM GYI PHYAG LEN DANG, NYER RER

BLA MCHOD SMAN BLA GSUNG BZHIN STONG MCHOD CHAG MED, KUN RIG
BDAG 'JUG BCAS BTZUGS, 'DI GSUM

SKU 'BUM LE LAG RVA ZA GRVA TSANG BSAM GTAN CHOS GLING NI, RVA
ZA GONG MA NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS RGYA

MTSOS BTAB, 'DI PA RVA ZA NAS 'KHRUNGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU BYA KHOG
BLA BRANG DU YAB MGON PO DANG, YUM LU GU

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU YOS LOR 'KHRUNGS, BDE CHEN DU SLOB GNYER DANG,
RNAM BSHAD DGONGS PA RAB GSAL

'DZIN SKYOR MDZAD, DE KA'I KHRIR BZHUGS, RVA ZA DGON GRONG DANG
'DAB 'BREL DU YOD PAS LHA KHANG

SOGS RANG BABS SU BZHAG ,GRVA GTZANG BDUN TZAM ZHABS PHYIR
KHRID, DPON SLOB GSER KHANG BA'I DRUNG DU

PHEBS; GRONG DANG THAG RING PA'I DGON PA BTAB, HA CANG THUGS TSA
BAS 'KHRIMS SHIN TU DAM,

DENG SANG GRVA GTZANG BZHI BCU TZAM 'TSOGS PA GRONG DU GTAN NAS
SONG MI CHOG CING, PHA MA LTA BU NA SHI GAL CHEN LA

DGONGS PA ZHUS TE SONG YANG SDOD BYAS MI CHOG ,KUN 'JIGS GNYIS
KYI BDAG 'JUG DANG, TING PHOR

STONG DU NYIN BZHIN MCHOD PA CHAG MED, GZHI GSUM GYI PHYAG LEN
NGOS GTZANG, RKUN MA NYES CAN 'GA'I

RKYEN GYIS RGYA DMAG GIS LO RDO RJE BRAG LA ME MCHOD DANG, BDE
CHEN DANG MGUR GNYIS GTOR THAG CHOD DUS LA

MO SPRUL BA'I SKU DANG, KHRI RGYA NAG PA'I MCHOG SPRUL GNYIS
RANG DGON DU BZHUGS MA NUS PAR BYOL SKABS,

BLA MA 'DIS THUGS STOBS BSKYED DE RGYA DPON LA ZHU MKHAS DANG
DNGOS PO'I 'GRO SGO BYAS PAS DGON PA GNYIS

GNAS THUB PA BYUNG BAS BKA' DRIN CHE BAR GLENG, DE'I SPRUL SKU
DGE 'DUN BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO BDUD SHUL

KLU'U TSANG LA 'KHRUNGS PA DA LTA BZHUGS, ` GRU'U AA LAGS KYIS
BTAB PA AA DAR CHOS 'PHEL GLING NI, RONG BO

NAS BYON PA'I BLA MA RONG ZHIS KYIS BZUNG BAS RONG ZHIS GRVA
TSANG DU GRAGS, 'DI'I SPRUL SKU MTSO SNGON PHYOGS NAS

'KHRUNGS PA GANGS DKAR WANG GIS BLA MAR BKUR, SRI BSRUNG MDZAD,
DBUS SU PHEBS, GZHUNG NAS

@300 (RMA CHU'I SMAD RGYUD KHRI KA SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SNAR THANG BKA' 'GYUR SOGS THON PHYAG TU GNANG, DE'I SPRUL SKU
GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN, AA RIN RONG BO

TSANG NAS 'KHRUNGS, BDE CHEN GYI DGE BSHES, DE KA'I KHRIR
BZHUGS, TSUL KHRIMS DAG CING DGE SBYOR

LA GZHOL, KHRI CHEN SPRUL SKU'I YONGS 'DZIN MDZAD, BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL DU GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYI

DRUNG DU PHEBS, RGYU MTSAN ZHUS PAR, YONGS 'DZIN GSUNG GNAS
BCU'I PHYAG MCHOD KYI DPE GNANG,

PHYIR PHEBS BSTUN GNAS BCU'I GSER THANG BZHENGS TE MCHOD CHOG
BTZUGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU BSTAN 'DZIN

GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO YAB RTA MGRIN DANG, YUM BO KHO'I SRAS SU
LCAGS STAG LA 'KHRUNGS, BDE CHEN DU THUGS

GNYER DANG, SGRUB SDE SKYONG BZHIN LA, 'DIR ZHAL GRANGS BZHI BCU
LHAG TZAM BZHUGS, GZHI GSUM

GYI PHYAG LEN NGOS GTZANG ZHING, 'GRIG KHRIMS SHIN TU DAM, RGYAL
BA SKU 'PHRENG ZHIG GI GDUNG RUS STENG DU AA

YIG GSAL BA DBYIBS DONG TZE LTA BU ZHIG DANG, GZHUNG GIS GNANG
BA'I BKA' 'GYUR, TZONG KHA BRGYAD

DGON GONG 'OG ZER, SUM PA'I CHOS 'BYUNG

MAR CHOS PA RIN PO CHE PHEBS, SPAN

'DI MGON PO RDO RJE'I SPRUL BAR GRAGS, 'GA'

RES ZHAL GYI RNAM 'PHRUL YIN YANG ZER, DGON RONG GE GNAS 'TSOL
SKABS 'DIS KHRID NAS BYON, KHO RANG

RI DVAGS GSHOR DUS KYI SDOD GNAS BRAG KHUNG LEGS PA KHRAG SOGS
RDZAB KYIS SBAGS PAS STON MA PHOD PAR DE DANG

NYE BA'I BRAG SKYIBS SHIG BSTAN, PHYAG DPE KHAL 'DREL BOR BA
BTZAL BAS KLU SKYABS SDOD NAS BRAG PHUG TU

NYAL BA GZIGS PAS DER SGRUB GNAS BZHENGS PA'I NGAG RGYUN SNANG,

SLOB RGYA DGE BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN

GYIS GZHI BZUNG BAS DGON PA CHAGS, PHYIS SU DE DANG NYE BAR SGAR
GONG GIS DPON SLOB GSER KHANG PA'I

GZIMS KHANG BZHENGS PAR NYID NAS ZHABS KYIS BCAGS, BLON CHOS RI
KHROD PA RGYUN BZHUGS MDZAD, THAR

BRTZON PA CHIG DRIL MDZAD, YI DAM GYI LHA

BZHUGS, LAM RIM CHEN MO'I

BSHAD LUNG TSAR KHA SHAS DANG, RDOR 'PHRENG DBANG SOGS KYANG
GNANG, NYID KYI GONG MA'I SGRUB GNAS SU LHA

BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS BSGRIGS PA'I RNAM THAR

MTSAN AA RIG GI SAR YAB BSTAN 'DZIN DANG,

YUM 'DZOMS SKYID LA CHU KHYI LOR 'KHRUNGS, CHUNG DUS DGON PA KHA
LHOR BLTA ZHIG DU 'GRO BA YANG YANG RMIS,

PA 'DI RED GSUNGS, STONG 'KHOR DPON SLOB

SA ZLA'I BCU BDUN NAS CHU STOD ZLA BA'I TSES

BZHI BAR DPON SLOB GSER KHANG PAS GTZOS, 'KHOR SGRUB PA'I RGYAL

BKUR ZHUS, SNGA DRO MCHOD PA DANG PHYI DRO NAGS KYA'I SNA KHAR
KLU GDUG PA CAN GNAS PA'I CHU MIG CIG YOD PA'I

SAR DPON SLOB KYIS LAM RIM CHEN MO'I BSHAD PA GNANG BA GRVA MANG
DANG MNYAM DU GSAN, DPON SLOB DE NYID

CHEN DU TSOGS CHOS 'GRIM, SGRUB SDE 'DI

'DOD CHUNG CHOG SHES, YI DAM GYI BSNYEN

PO'I THIG RDUL TSON, DBYANGS RTA PHYAG LEN GANG

SHIS CHOS GLING KHYUNG SHES SNGAGS RAMS PAS BTAB, DE'I SKYE
BRGYUD BAN GSAR RIM BYON GYIS SKYONG BAR YOD,

RGAN GYIS DGON LUNG PHUR MTSAMS

SHES RGYA NAG TU PHEBS DUS NYID KYI SKU TSAB BLA MA

ZHIG DGOS ZHUS PAR KHYED TSO'I YUL NA HOR MO'I SGOM RGAN ZER BA
ZHIG YOD DAM GSUNGS, YOD ZHUS PAS,

DE LAS LHAG PA'I BLA MA MI DGOS GSUNGS PAR BRTEN THAMS CAD KYIS
GUS 'DUD LHUR BLANGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU

AA YAG SBYIN PA RGYA MTSO DME KYA'I AA YAG TSANG DU 'KHRUNGS,
DBUS SU BYON, THUGS GNYER GZHAN 'GRAN

MED; DGA' LDAN KHRIR NYE BA NA RANG YUL DU PHEBS, DME KYA DANG
CHOS TSA'I GRVA BA BSDUS, 'DU KHANG GRVA

KHANG BCAS PHIBS TE GSHONG MO CHER DGON PA BTAB, DE'I SPRUL SKU

SNGAGS RGYUD DU YAB RTA MGRIN DANG YUM RIN MO'I SRAS SU
'KHRUNGS, BDE CHEN CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, SLOB GNYER

DBYANGS CAN MA'I BSTOD PA SOGS RTZOM PA

'GA' RE SNANG, BDE CHEN DANG RNGA MGUR SOGS PHYOGS 'DI'I DGON PA
PHAL CHER GYI SKYONG KHUR GNANG,

SPOS TE DGON GSAR BKRA SHIS RAB BRTAN

GNYER GNANG, THAR SHUL DPON SLOB KYI

NYID LA PHUL BAR, RIN CHEN DGE 'PHEL ZHES PA'I

@303	 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BZANG DPAL 'BYOR GYIS GZHI BZUNG BAS DGON PA BYANG CHUB BDE CHEN
GLING CHAGS, 'DI LA AA YAG SHES RAB

YANG ZER, DBUS SU BYON, RNAM 'JOMS KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA NUS LDAN DU
GRAGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG

BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN CHOS TSA'I AO RUNG DU YAB KLU 'BUM DANG,
YUM LHA MO RGYAL GYI SRAS SU ME SPREL LA 'KHRUNGS

PA DA LTA BZHUGS, ` 'DI DANG NYE BAR MCHOD RTEN DRIL GSIL MA NI,
DAM PA RGYA GAR RI BO RTZE LNGAR PHEBS

SKABS 'DIR BYON, NAM MKHAR 'PHUR PA SOGS RDZU 'PHRUL SNA TSOGS
BSTAN PA RGAD PO ZHIG GIS MTHONG,

KHO DAD DE BSNYEN BKUR ZHUS, RNAL 'BYOR DBYUG PA RTEN SKAL DU
BZHAG DE DANG SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS DU

MA'I SKU GDUNG, CHOS SKU'I RING BSREL MANG DU BSAGS PA NANG
BZHUGS KYI MCHOD RTEN BZHENGS, RNAL

'BYOR BA CHOS GA-YUNG DRUNG BYA BAS RAB GNAS MDZAD, PHYIS SU
GUNG RU'I MKHA' 'GRO MAS ZHIG GSOS KYIS SKU

DKAR GSOL, MCHOD 'BUL SMON LAM GNANG BAS 'JA' DANG ME TOG GI
CHAR SOGS NGO MTSAR BA'I LTAS BYUNG,

LO RGYUS RNAMS MNGON SHES KYIS GZIGS NAS GSUNG ZHES LU KYA DBON
PO SHES RAB DPAL BZANG GI DKAR CHAG

LAS 'BYUNG, NAM MKHA' LAS DRIL CHUNG GI SGRA BYUNG BAR YUL MI
RNAMS KYIS BLTAS PA'I PHA DAM PA RDZU 'PHRUL

GYIS GSHEGS PA MTHONG BA'I LO RGYUS DANG, DA LTA YANG DUS BZANG
RNAMS SU DRIL BU'I SGRA THOS RGYU YOD PAS MCHOD

RTEN DRIL GSIL MAR GRAGS, YANG CHOS RGYAL MYA NGAN MED KYIS ZHAG
GCIG LA MCHOD RTEN BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD RDZU

'PHRUL GYIS BZHENGS PAR GRAGS PA'I NANG TSAN YIN, 'BRAS SPUNGS
SKOR LAM DU YANG 'DI 'DRA GCIG YOD

CES THAR SHUL DPON SLOB 'DI PAS GSUNG ZHES THOS, GONG SMOS MCHOD
RTEN DKAR PO, JO'U JO'U,

THUGS RJE CHEN PO RANG BYON, LHA DKAR PO BZHI LA KHRI KA'I BYIN
RLABS CAN GYI RTEN BZHIR GRAGS, RMA CHU'I

SMAD LA MO DANG KHRI KA'I SKABS SO,, ,,

*, ,DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,

DGU CHU NI, STOD DU KA RONG YA RONG BDE RONG GSUM, BAR DU MTSO
RONG B'A RONG BSE RONG GSUM,

SMAD DU THE'U RONG NO'U RONG DGU RONG STE RONG DGU'I CHU RNAMS
GCIG TU 'DRES NAS REB GONG GZHUNG BRGYUD DGU

RONG MDO NAS RMA CHUR 'BAB, 'DI LA LHO BYANG DANG STOD SMAD BAR
GSUM DU PHYE BA'I GNAS DNGOS GZHI REB TSA

LUNG PA GSUM GYI GONG BA REB GONG GSER MO LJONGS SU RONG BO DGON
BDE CHEN CHOS 'KHOR GLING YOD LA, DE YANG

YUL DBUS GNYAN CHEN THANG LHA'I ZHOL 'DAM KHOG RONG PO'I SAR
'KHRUNGS SHING GSO DPYAD LA MKHAS PA, RIG

SNGAGS GRUB PA'I RNAL 'BYOR BA ZHIG LA, 'GRO MGON 'PHAGS PAS GUR
MGON CHOS SKYONG DU GTAD, SA SKYA'I

GSER MGON DANG PHYAG MKHAR GNANG, KHYOD AA MDOR SONG, RI RDO
RJE'I DBYIBS 'DRA BA'I RKED PAR KHYOD KYI

RIGS RGYUD KYIS SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA 'DZIN PA'I DGOS PA YOD
GSUNG LUNG BSTAN PA BZHIN MDO SMAD DU

@304	 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

PHEBS; LAM DU MDO BA ZER BA'I SA CHAR, RKUN JAG GIS GTZES PA LA
DRAG ZOR BRDAB PA BRAG LA PHOGS,

DE MA THAG BRAG SNA CHAD PAS LHA RJE BRAG SNA BAR GRAGS, SNYAN
BZANG PHYOGS SU GZHI PHABS TE BZHUGS, DE'I SRAS

RONG CHEN MDO SDE 'BUM LA SRAS DGU 'KHRUNGS PA'I CHE BA GSUM RAB
TU BYUNG, GCEN PO RONG BO BSAM GTAN

RIN CHEN GYIS CHOS RJE DON RIN PA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS, ZAB CHOS
MANG DU GSAN, SA DKYIL T'A BE HU DANG

MCHOD YON DU 'BREL, CHOS SDE CHE CHUNG BCO BRGYAD DANG, DGON
KHUG GI SAR CHOS SDE 'DI BTAB, LHA KHANG

DANG DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS BZHENGS, DE'I GCUNG GRAGS PA RGYAL
MTSAN, GZHON NU NYID NAS TSE 'DI'I KHRI BA

BTZAN CHOD KYIS SGRUB PA SNYING BOR MDZAD, THUGS RJE CHEN PO
ZHAL GZIGS, DE'I GCUNG BLO GROS SENG GES DGE

BA'I BSHES GNYEN DU MA LAS GSAN PA RGYA CHE, TSUL KHRIMS DAG
CING RIG GNAS LNGA LA MKHAS, TAS MING ZON  

TES BLA MAR BKUR, RGYAL PO 'KHOR BCAS LA RNAM 'JOMS DKAR PO'I
RJES GNANG PHUL, SKU CHOS NYI ZER LA

'GEL BA'I GRUB RTAGS BSTAN, T'A KU SHRI'I LAS TSAN GYIS GZENGS
BSTOD, RANG DGON DU GSER KHANG,

MGON PO RVA SKYES LHA KHANG DANG, LHA KHANG BTZAN PO MAR GRAGS
SOGS BZHENGS, REB GONG STOD SMAD THAMS

CAD MNGA' ZHABS SU BCUG STE BTZUN KHRAL BSDUS, GDUNG RGYUD DER
CHOS KYIS MTHO BA'I SKYES BU DANG, 'JIG

RTEN GYIS MTHO BA'I MI CHEN DU MA RIM PAR BYUNG BA LAS, DBON PO
DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN LA YANG ZON TE KHRI LO

GNYIS PA ME LUG LOR LAS THAM GYIS GZENGS BSTOD, DE BZHIN DON
GRUB RIN CHEN, BLO GROS MCHOG GRUB,

DON GRUB SENG GE BLO GROS DPAL LDAN SOGS LA'ANG KU SHRI BYUNG
SNANG, BAR SKABS CUNG ZAD NYAMS CHAG TU SONG

BA NANG SO GU RUS HOR CHING GE SI'I RGYUD TA'I CHANG CHU KHUR
DPON LA MGON 'DREN BCOL, YER BA CHOS RJE SOGS

KYIS KHUR BLANGS TE RAB BYUNG BCU BA'I SHING SBRUL LOR GTZUG LAG
KHANG, RNAM RGYAL MCHOD RTEN, PHYOGS BZHIR

SA 'DUL GYI MCHOD RTEN BZHI, BKA' 'GYUR GSER BRIS, RJE RIN PO
CHE'I STONG SKU GSER THANG BCAS

BZHENGS; DPON GYIS AA RIG CHOS RJE MNGAGS NAS THO BTZUN BSDU BA
SOGS SOG PO DANG MCHOD YON DU 'BREL

BA'I MGO TSUGS, GSER LJONGS RGYAL THANG DU RONG BO MKHAR 'BUM
RGYAL LA BLA MA GRUB THOB CIG GIS SRAS SNYAN

GRAGS CAN GSUM 'BYUNG BAR LUNG BSTAN PA SKU MCHED BZHI BYUNG,
CHE BA BLA MA DMAR DMAR DU GRAGS PA'I

MKHAS GRUB CIG BYON PA CHER MA 'GYANGS PAR GSHEGS, DE 'OG CHOS
PA RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL

MTSAN NI, MI LA BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE, LO RAS PA BDE BA SKYONG,
ZHANG ZHUNG CHOS DBANG GRAGS PA, RTOGS

BRJOD SNYAN NGAG LHUN PO RTZOM MKHAN DHARMA'I ZHAL SNGA NAS SOGS
KYI SKYE BA BZHES SHING, SKU TSE 'DI RAB BYUNG BCU

PA'I LCAGS SBRUL LOR 'KHRUNGS, BCU BZHI BAR CHOS RJE RIN CHEN
BSAM 'GRUB LAS RAB TU BYUNG, RGYUD SDE DU

MA'I DBANG SOGS GSAN, BSNYEN PA BTANG STE BDAG 'JUG MA CHAG PA
MDZAD, MI LA'I MGUR 'BUM

GZIGS PAS THUGS DAD 'KHRUNGS PA'I RKYEN GYIS RJE BTZUN ZHAL
GZIGS, NYI SHU PA LCAGS BYI LA CO NE CHOS RJE

SANGS RGYAS RGYAL MTSAN LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, NYER GSUM PA CHU
YOS LA RGYAL BA YON TAN RGYA MTSO'I ZHABS ZHU

@305	 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

ZHUS TE DBUS SU PHEBS, NYER BZHI PA SHING 'BRUG LOR ZLA SHAS
SHIG RVA STOD CHOS GRVA 'GRIMS, 'JAM DBYANGS

BLA MA DKON MCHOG CHOS 'PHEL LA CHOS ZHUS, LO DE'I DBYAR RGYUD
GRVAR ZHUGS, STAG LUNG BRAG PA BLO GROS RGYA MTSO

LA RIM LNGA'I DMAR KHRID SOGS SNGA PHYIR CHOS MANG DU GSAN, ZLA
BA PHYED GNYIS KYI RING LA KHRID BSKYANGS PAS

NYAMS RTOGS 'KHRUNGS, GZHAN YANG PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA,
SPYIL BU CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG CHOS

GRAGS; KHRI DGE 'DUN RGYAL MTSAN, CHOS GNYER GRAGS PA, GZIMS
KHANG GONG, GZHU KHANG PA DGE LEGS

LHUN GRUB, SNGAGS PA CHOS RJE NAM MKHA' BZANG PO, GRUB CHEN
BRTZON 'GRUS SNYING BO, LAM PA RAB 'BYAMS

PA BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA BCAS KYI ZHABS PAD BSTEN TE DBANG KHRID,
MAN NGAG RGYAB RTEN LUNG BCAS 'DOD

RGUR GSAN, NYER BRGYAD PA SA SPREL LA STAG LUNG BRAG PA'I DRUNG
DU BSNYEN RDZOGS BSKYAR DU BSGRUBS, 'DUL

KHRIMS MIG 'BRAS BZHIN DU BSRUNG BA'I SNYAN GRAGS CHE, LO DER
RANG YUL DU PHEBS TE RONG BO DGON LUGS

GNYIS KYIS BSKYANGS, SO LNGA PA SHING YOS NAS SGRUB PA LA GCIG
TU GZHOL, SGRUB GNAS RONG BO'I BKRA SHIS

'KHYIL DANG DGON RONG BRAG SKYA RDZONG GNYIS BZHUGS SA'I MTHIL
DANG, GZHAN BYA KHYUNG, SKU 'BUM, DAN

TIG DGON LUNG RGYAL SRAS SGRUB PHUG GNYA' GONG BRAG DKAR, ZHOM
PHUG RNAMS SU BZHUGS SHING, ME TOG

DANG RDE'U BCUD LEN GYI 'TSO BA MDZAD, KO'U PA CHOS RGYA MTSO,
SKYID SHOD SDE BA CHOS RJE, 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS

KYIS RJES SU BZUNG BA LI KY'A SHES RAB SENG GE BYAMS PA SPRUL
SKU DGE 'DUN DPAL BZANG RGYA MTSO BCAS LA CHOS

ZHUS SOGS BSHAD SGRUB ZUNG 'BREL GNANG, SO BDUN PA ME SBRUL LA
SLAR YANG DBUS SU PHEBS, 'JAM

DBYANGS STAG LUNG BRAG PA MJAL, BSLAB KHRIMS GTZANG BAS BLA MA'I
THUGS MNYES, BLA MA SNGA MA RNAMS DANG,

CHOS RJE LCANG LO CAN PA, RGYAL KHANG RTZE BA CHOS 'BYOR RGYA
MTSO, MKHON STON DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB, DE MO LHA

DBANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN, RTA TSAG NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI DBANG
PHYUG RJE DRUNG BSTAN PA RGYA MTSO, SEMS

DPA' NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO RNAMS LA CHOS BKA' RGYA CHE
BA GSAN, SE 'BRAS DGE GSUM LA BSNYEN BKUR

ZHUS; RVA SGRENG BSAM YAS SOGS GNAS RTEN KHYAD PAR CAN RNAMS
MJAL, SA RTA LOR RANG YUL DU PHEBS,

'PHAGS PA SHING KUN, LANG JU SDE BZHI, CU GU MER GYI BYAMS CHEN
SOGS MJAL, RI BO RTZE LNGAR 'BYON BZHED

YOD PA LI KY'A SLOB DPON PAS BSHOL, SHING SPREL NAS RONG BO DGON
DU 'DU KHANG GSAR PHIBS MDZAD, CHU

'BRUG LOR KUN GZIGS LNGA PA MTSO KHAR PHEBS PA MJAL TE THUGS RJE
CHEN PO'I RJES GNANG SOGS GSAN,

'BUL NOD GZAB, DBUS GTZANG DU SNGA PHYIR BLA MA RNAMS LA 'BUL BA
DANG, DGON SDE CHE PHRA LA MANG 'GYED

BSNYEN BKUR DPAG MED ZHUS TE 'BREL TSAD DON LDAN MDZAD, GDUL BYA
RNAMS CHOS DANG ZANG ZING GIS

BSKYANGS; DON DGU PA SA PHAG LOR RJE BTZUN MI LA'I SKU NYAMS
DANG BCAS TE GSHEGS, ZHAL CHEMS LTAR RJE

SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSOS DGON SGRUB SDE GNYIS KAR BSHAD SGRUB GONG
'PHEL GYIS THUGS DGONGS RDZOGS PAR MDZAD

DO; ;RNAM THAR GYI YI GE RGYAS PA MTHONG BA DON LDAN BYA BA YOD
SNANG, ` GRUB CHEN SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO NI, CHOS

@306	 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

PA RIN PO CHE DANG YUM MI GCIG PA'I MCHED DU RAB BYUNG BCU BA'I
ME LUG LA BLTAMS, 'KHRUNGS RABS SU,

SH'A RI'I BU, RIGS LDAN PAD DKAR, SLOB DPON SANGS RGYAS
BSKYANGS, 'BROM RJE'I THUGS SPRUL KHYE'U DKAR

PO; PHU CHUNG BA GZHON NU RGYAL MTSAN, BO DONG PHYOGS LAS RNAM
RGYAL, RGYAL TSAB DAR MA RIN CHEN, 'BRAS

SPUNGS MKHAN THOG BZHI BA DPAL LDAN SENG GE GRUB CHEN THAR BA'I
RGYAL MTSAN, SGOM SDE NAM MKHA' RGYAL MTSAN

RNAMS BZHUGS SHING, NYI THANG SPRUL SKUS MDZAD PA'I 'KHRUNGS
RABS LAS, MDO SMAD RONG BO'I CHU GTER DU, ,

THOS BSAM NOR BUS PHYUG PA'I GLING, SPRUL BYED BSAM GTAN RIN
CHEN ZHES, ,YONGS 'DZIN MCHOG GI ZLOS

GAR BSGYUR, ,ZHES CHOS SDE 'DEBS PA PO BSAM GTAN RIN CHEN YIN
PAR GSUNG LA, DE NAS RONG STON BLO

BZANG GRAGS PA, RONG BO'I BLA MA SKU MDUN PA BSAM 'GRUB RIN
CHEN, 'DI PA 'JAM DBYANGS DKAR POS

DNGOS SU BYIN GYIS BRLABS SHING, DPUNG BA LA 'JAM DBYANGS BZHUGS
PA RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS

GZIGS TE BSNGAGS BRJOD MDZAD, MGAR RTZE SHES RAB NYI MA, DE'I
SPRUL SKU 'DI PA YIN PAR GRAGS,

DGUNG LO BZHI LNGA NAS CHOS PA RIN PO CHES KLOG BSLAB, BDUN PA
LA DGE BSNYEN DANG, BCU PA LA RAB TU BYUNG,

MTSAN SKAL LDAN TSOGS GNYIS BTAGS, BCU GCIG PA ME SBRUL LA YAB
SRAS MNYAM DU DBUS SU PHEBS,

DGA' LDAN DU STAG LUNG BRAG PA MJAL, DGE TSUL BSGRUB, SKAL LDAN
RGYA MTSOR MTSAN GSOL, DGUN CHOS

LA BYANG RTZE'I CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, RJE TSUL KHRIMS CHOS 'PHEL
DANG, GTZANG BA DKA' CHEN BLO GROS RNAM RGYAL GNYIS

LAS LO GSUM LA BSDUS GRVA, ,RGYAL RONG BA MKHAS GRUB BSTAN PA
DAR RGYAS BLA MAR BSTEN TE, LO BDUN LA DBU

PHAR; 'DUL MDZOD, RNAM 'GREL ZUR BKOL DANG BCAS PA SBYANGS, NYI
SHU BA ME STAG LA GSANG PHUR DKA'

BCU'I GRVA SKOR MDZAD DUS RJE'I KA BA THOB, LO DER LHA SA'I JO
BO'I DRUNG DU PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN LA BSNYEN

RDZOGS ZHUS, KHRI TSUL KHRIMS CHOS 'PHEL, DVAGS PO BSOD NAMS NYI
MA SOGS LAS CHOS BKA' 'GA' ZHIG

GSAN; NYER GCIG PA ME YOS LA YUL DU 'BYON KHAR MKHAS GRUB BSTAN
PA DAR RGYAS KYIS SOGS YUL DU MA 'GRO ,

RANG YUL DGON PAR SONG ZHES LAN GSUM GSUNGS, MKHAS GRUB SANGS
RGYAS YE SHES KYI SPRUL SKU SOG YUL DU

'BYON PA DANG 'GROGS NAS PHEBS, CHOS PA RIN PO CHE MJAL, KO'U PA
CHOS RGYA MTSO RONG BO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU

PHEBS PA'I DRUNG NAS AA 'GRON MKHAS BTZUN DANG MNYAM DU GSANG
'DUS DBANG SOGS MANG DU GSAN ZHING,

'DI DANG, SDE BA CHOS RJE BSTAN 'DZIN BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO, 'DAN
MA TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO STE SNYAN BRGYUD MNGA'

BDAG RGYA MTSO'I MTSAN CAN GSUM GYIS GTZOS, RGYAL SRAS BLO BZANG
BSTAN 'DZIN, LI KY'A SHES RAB SENG GE

LA MO BLO GROS RGYA MTSO, STONG 'KHOR MDO RGYUD RGYA MTSO SOGS
BLA MA SO GSUM BSTEN, LAM RIM 'BRING BO THUGS

'DZIN DANG, SNGA PHYIR DAN TIG YANG TIG AAN CHUNG GNAM RDZONG
SOGS RMA KLUNG PHYOGS KYI DBEN GNAS DU

MA DANG, YAR NANG GRUB PA THOB PA'I GNAS BRGYAD, RDZONG NYIN
BRAG PHUG MAR NANG BRAG DKAR, GNYA'

GONG BRAG DKAR, GSHAG RAL GONG 'OG JI GIN SGAM BRAG STAG TSANG
LHA MO, NYANG TSANG STAG LUNG BRAG SHIS

@307	 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

DGE LUNG BA SOGS MDZOD DGE KHA GYA TSO DRUG TSUN CHAD KYI DBEN
GNAS BRGYA PH RAG DU MAR THUN DRUG THUN BZHI'I

RNAL 'BYOR LA CHU BO'I RGYUN BZHIN DU GZHOL, DGON CHEN DU MTSAN
NYID DANG, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SGRUB SDE

BTZUGS; DGUNG LO SHIN TU MTHO BA'I SKABS SU YANG DPE GZIGS RGYUN
MI CHAD, SPYIR PO TI LNGA, DE'I NANG

NAS DBU PHAR, KHYAD PAR DBU MA LA ZHIB GZIGS KYIS ZHAL NAS, NGAS
LO BCU GCIG BCU GNYIS NAS BDUN

CU'I BAR LO DRUG CU'I RING SLOB GNYER DANG MA BRAL BAR BYAS PAS
DA GZOD RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB KYI DON GO BA ZHIG

BYUNG; LAR TSE STOD LA SLOB GNYER BYAS PA GCIG BUS MI CHOG TSE
SMAD LA DGOS, LHAG PAR 'CHI KHA SLOB GNYER

DANG 'GROGS NAS SONG NA, PHYI MA'I SLOB GNYER DANG BSRE THUB PA
'BYUNG, DE LA BSRE BA ZER BA YIN GSUNGS

PA SEMS LA 'DZIN DGOS PA ZHIG TU SNANG, SLOB RGYUD KYIS MDO SMAD
LHO BYANG PHAL CHER KHYAB STE SGRUB SDE DU MA TSUGS,

DPON JU NANG GIS GUS MCHOD RGYA CHE ZHING MA YUM DGONGS RDZOGS
LA GRVA BA BRGYA PHUL, ME 'BRUG LOR DPON

DBUS SU 'BYON KHAR KAB RON CHU TSAN DU BYON DUS, RJE 'DI BRAG
SKYA RDO RJE RDZONG DU SPYAN DRANGS, RKYEN SEL GYI

CHOS BKA' DU MA ZHUS, RJE 'DIS KYANG DPON LA GNANG SBYIN MANG DU
MDZAD, GRVA TSANG LAN GSUM GYI BAR GTAD

PA BCAS SBYIN BDAG GI GTZO BO DANG, GZHAN YANG CHE RGU DU MAS
GTZUG TU BKUR ZHING 'PHRIN LAS KYI MTSO RDOL

KYANG BSHAD SGRUB KYI TSUGS MA SHOR BAR BSTAN PA'I MDZES RGYAN
KHO NA MDZAD, DON GCIG PA ME SBRUL LA BKRA SHIS

'KHYIL DU SKU GSHEGS, SKU GDUNG ZHUGS LA PHUL TE ZA MA TOG TU DE
KAR BZHUGS PA DGUNG GCIG RONG BO DGON

DU 'PHUR, DER RIN PO CHE'I MCHOD RTEN BZHENGS TE LO MANG PO
BZHUGS PA, LAM CIG MCHOD RTEN NAM MKHA'

LA GSHEGS TE RONG BO MAR NANG DU BYON NAS DA LTA DE NA 'GRO BA'I
DON MDZAD CES BYANG CHUB MI LA NGAG DBANG BSOD

NAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL PO LAS
BSHAD LA, CHU DMAR BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS

MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR YANG YOD SNANG, SLOB MA'I GTZO BO, BSHAD
PA'I RGYAL TSAB BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS, SGRUB

PA'I RGYAL TSAB BYA BTANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO, SRAS KYI THU BO
MA nI PA BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO, THUGS SRAS MA nI PA

SHES RAB BKRA SHIS, 'PHRIN LAS PHYOGS MTHAR RGYAS PA GA-YER
GSHONG 'JAM DBYANGS BLO GROS, SDE SNOD RGYA

MTSO'I MNGA' BDAG 'BE SHES RAB MCHOG LDAN, SGO ME GRAGS PA RGYA
MTSO, MKHAR GONG TSE BRTAN RGYA MTSO GSUM

DANG; KUN DGA' BO DANG MTSUNGS PA'I RIM GRO BA CHU DMAR BLO
BZANG RGYA MTSO, GNAS BRTAN THOS BSAM RGYA

MTSO SOGS NYE BA'I SRAS STON SGOM BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA BYUNG,
KUN MKHYEN GONG MA DBUS SU PHEBS LO SNYUNG GZHI

ZHIG BYUNG BA, RJE 'DI RGAN GYA PHYOGS SU PHEBS PA'I DRUNG NAS
'JAM DBYANGS NAG PO'I RJES GNANG GSAN BSTUN

SKU SNYUNG DVANGS PAS, RNAM THAR BKA' RTZOM DU, YONG KHAR GRUB
PA'I DBANG PHYUG ZLA MED PA, ,SKAL LDAN RGYA

MTSOR SKYABS 'JUG RTA PHUL TE, ,'JAM DBYANGS NAG PO'I RJES GNANG
MDZAD PA NA, ,NYAMS DANG GRIB KYI

TSOGS RNAMS RANG SAR DENGS, ,ZHES GSUNGS LA, MDZAD SPYOD LA
THUGS DAD TSAD MED PA 'KHRUNGS TE,

CHOS PA KHO NA ZER BA 'DI RED, NGAS KYANG 'DI 'DRA ZHIG NAM
'ONGS NA DGONGS PA DANG, BYANG CHUB KYIS SEMS

@308	 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

DANG; GNAS LUGS MNGON DU GYUR TE CHOS KUN SGYU MA LTA BUR GZIGS
PAS RIM GNYIS KYI RNAL 'BYOR LA DBANG

'BYOR PA'I BSNGAGS BRJOD DANG, RGYA GAR CHU BO GANG+G'A TSUN NA
MKHAS GRUB GNYIS 'DZOMS KYI BLA MA 'DI PA LTA BU

DKON BYAS CHOG NGAS KHONG GI GSUNG MGUR 'DI TSO NA BZA' BZANG
POS DRIL TE, NGA RANG GI SNGAS MGO LA BZHAG

NAS SKABS SKABS BLTA GI YOD, KHYED TSOS KYANG BLA MA 'DI'I GDAMS
NGAG 'DI TSO NYAMS SU LONGS DANG DES CHOG

'DUG 'DI LTA BU YOD BZHIN DU NYAMS SU MI LEN PAR GZHAN DU 'TSOL
BA DGOS PA MED CES DPE DANG BCAS

GSUNGS PAR RNAM THAR LAS 'BYUNG, ZHING GSHEGS KHAR RONG BO'I MI
SKYA TSO LA CHOS PO TI RE KHYER SHOG GSUNGS

PAR; RONG BO'I MGON POS BRGYAD STONG DPAR MA ZHIG KHYER YONG,
ZHAG GCIG BZHAG PHYIR KHYER DUS PHYAG

MKHAR LA KHA DAR BTAGS TE GNANG, SKU SKYE 'BYON DGOS ZHUS PAR,
MI PHAL CHER SHI NAS RANG YUL DU SKYE BA

CHAGS ZHEN GYI STABS YIN 'DRA, RONG BO NANG SO 'DI MI BSOD NAMS
CAN ZHIG YIN 'DUG PAS YONG CHAD BYAS

YOD GSUNGS PA BZHIN SPRUL BA'I SKU NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS RGYA
MTSO RIGS RUS DER RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SA

RTA LOR 'KHRUNGS, BA SO RJE DRUNG NGAG DBANG DKON MCHOG NYI MA
LAS RAB TU BYUNG, THOS BSAM GLING DU GSAN

BSAM MDZAD, MKHAN CHEN DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO DANG 'DZIM GRVA GCIG
NYI SHU BA ME GLANG LA DBUS SU PHEBS,

PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES DANG, RGYAL BA TSANGS DBYANGS RGYA
MTSO MJAL, 'BRAS SPUNGS SU THUGS GNYER LA

BZHUGS SKABS 'TSO BA BKREN PAS, 'BRO GRUB CHEN SBYIN PA RGYA
MTSOS DGE 'PHEL DU GDAN DRANGS, DZAMBHA LA

DKAR PO'I BSNYEN SGRUB GNANG BAS LONGS SPYOD 'BAD MED BYUNG,
RGYAL BA RIN PO CHES NO MON HAN GYI CHO LO

GNANG; KHRI CHEN DGE 'DUN PHUN TSOGS, BYANG RTZE CHOS RJE DON
GRUB RGYA MTSO SOGS LA CHOS GSAN, KUN

MKHYEN GONG MAR MDO SNGAGS KYI BKA' CHOS MANG PO, MA TI LUGS KYI
'JAM DBYANGS DKAR PO'I SGRUB THABS

BDUD RTZI'I 'OD CAN DANG, DBON CHUNG BSTAN 'DZIN DAR RGYAS DANG
RNAM GNYIS KYIS DBYANGS CAN MA'I SGRUB

THABS BDUD RTZI'I BUM BZANG GSUNG RTZOM GYI BSKUL MA ZHUS, DE
DUS PHUL BA'I MDZOD GOS KHYAD 'PHAGS KYI BLA BRE

DA LTA BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL 'DU KHANG CHEN MO'I SBUG BZHUGS KHRI'I
STENG GI GNAM RGYAN DU YOD LA BKA' BCU RIN PO CHE

NGA'I BLA MA YIN ZHES THUGS DGYES PA'I RANG BZHIN 'BA' ZHIG
MDZAD, NYER LNGA PA CHU RTA NAS SNGAGS 'CHANG 'JAM

DBYANGS BLO GROS LA ZAB CHOS YOD DGU GSAN, NGA LNGA PA CHU BYI
LA RANG DGON DU BSHAD SGRUB KYI SDE THAMS CAD 'DU

PA'I SMON LAM GYI PHYAG SROL BTZUGS, NGA BDUN PA SHING STAG LA
RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG BTAB, RE GNYIS PA SA LUG LA

GSHEGS; SKU LUS TSUL KHRIMS KYI DRI NGAD LDANG BA, RDO LA ZHABS
RJES DOD PA, SPOS RING LA MDUD PA BTAB

PA; 'PHO BA BTAB PAS RO KHRI THOG NA YOD PA THANG LA 'PHANGS PA
SOGS MNGON SHES DANG, GRUB RTAGS MNGON

MTSAN CHE BA'I RNAM THAR MANG, GSUNG 'BUM POT CHUNG GCIG PAR YOD
LA, LHA BZANG DANG, CUNG GAR

'KHRUGS TSUL MTSO SNGON NYAMS RKYEN SOGS KYI LUNG BSTAN MANG,
DE'I SPRUL SKU DGE 'DUN 'PHRIN LAS RAB RGYAS

NI; GNYAN THOG DPON RIGS SU YAB BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG YUM DPAL
MO SKYID KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU

@309	 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GNYIS PA'I MJUG LCAGS SPREL LOR 'KHRUNGS, RJE SKAL LDAN GSHEGS
NAS LO RE BZHI BA YIN, STONG 'KHOR

BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO DANG, KHRI RGYAL MTSAN SENG GE GNYIS KYIS
RJE GONG MA'I SPRUL SKUR THAG BCAD, DGE SLONG

BLO BZANG SHES RAB LAS KLOG BSLAB, MKHAN CHEN DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO
LAS RAB TU BYUNG, DGUNG LO DGU BA SA

'BRUG LA DGE 'DUN STONG GIS BSUS TE DGON CHEN DU PHEBS, TSOGS
CHEN 'DU KHANG DU KHRI THOG PA RGYAL MKHAN

CHEN DANG, NANG SO NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS BSTAN 'DZIN SOGS KYIS
BSNYEN BKUR, SKU 'BUM SHAR GYI BLA

BRANG CHEN MOR PHYAG PHAB, BCU GSUM PA CHU SPREL LA CHOS GRVAR
ZHUGS, MKHAN CHEN LAS BDE GSANG 'JIGS

GSUM; KUN RIG SOGS KYI DBANG, 'JIGS BYED RIM GNYIS KYI KHRID
DANG, KHRI RIN PO CHE LCANG LUNG DGE

'DUN BSTAN 'DZIN LAS SNAR THANG BRGYA RTZA, RIN 'BYUNG, SKAL
LDAN GSUNG 'BUM, DPON SLOB BLO BZANG

RGYAL MTSAN NAM 'JAM DBYANGS RIN CHEN ZUR CHOS KYI DGE RGAN DU
BSTEN TE BKA' GDAMS GLEGS BAM SOGS

LUNG MANG RAB, MKHAN CHEN 'PHRIN LAS LAS DBEN SA BKA' BUM, SANGS
RGYAS YE SHES BKA' 'BUM,

YONGS 'DZIN BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS LAS DVAGS PO BKRAS RNAM PA'I
SHRA MA nA'I SGRUB THABS, AA RIG DGE BSHES

BYAMS PA DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN LAS RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM, DPON SLOB
BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO LAS MI TRA, RDOR

'PHRENG; DRIL BU PHYI NANG, GDUGS DKAR LHA MANG DANG LHA BCU
BDUN MA, MGON CHEN BCU GSUM, RNAM

SRAS BKA' BCO LNGA, SKYID SHOD BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO'I YI DAM
SGRUB SKOR, LNGA BA'I YI DAM SGRUB SKOR SOGS

GSAN PA RGYA CHE, BCU BDUN PA LA RGYUD PA'I KHRI DANG, NYI SHU
BA SA YOS LA THOS BSAM GLING GI KHRIR BZHUGS,

NYER GCIG PA LCAGS 'BRUG LA MKHAN CHEN LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS,
SHING SPREL LOR DGON LUNG DU L CANG SKYA ROL

BA'I RDO RJER MDZAD, CHOS 'BREL ZHUS, SHING BYA LOR DAR HAN RAB
'BYAMS PA THUB BSTAN DAR RGYAS DANG,

DRUNG 'KHOR SH'A RI'I BU GNYIS PE CING DU MNGAGS PAR LCANG SKYA
RIN PO CHES MGO 'DREN ZHUS TE CHOS LO BYUNG BA ME PHAG

LOR PHYIR 'KHOR, GRUB DBANG SANGS RGYAS SPRUL SKU MERGAN HU THOG
THU DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS LA ZHAL TA

PHEBS TE, RIGS LDAN RNAM GNON ZHE BDUN PA CHU SBRUL LOR DUS
'KHOR GRVA TSANG GSANG SNGAGS DAR RGYAS GLING

GSAR BTZUGS KYI KHRIR BZHUGS, MDZOD DGE STOD DU LAN KHA SHAS
DANG, MTSO SNGON LA PHEBS GDUL BYA RGYAS,

SA PHAG LA SKU 'BUM DU PAn CHEN RGYA NAG TU PHEBS PA MJAL, DUNG
DKAR GA-YAS 'KHYIL, SKU GSUNG THUGS

RTEN; NA BZA', NYER SPYAD, MCHOD RDZAS MANG PO, GSER SRANG LNGA,
DNGUL RTA RMIG MA SUM CU, GOS

CHEN DGU BCU LHAG RTA BRGYA SOGS DNGOS 'BUL GTOS CHE BA PHUL, LO
SNGA PHYIR BLA MCHOD DANG, PHYAG CHEN KHRID

SOGS GSAN, ZHE BDUN PA ME RTA LA DBUS SU PHEBS, RGYAL BA 'JAM
DPAL RGYA MTSO MJAL, KHRI 'BUM

BRTEGS; PAn CHEN RIN PO CHER YANG DNGOS 'BUL GZAB, YONGS 'DZIN
YE SHES RGYAL TSAN LAM KHRID

GSAN; RGYAL BAS GNANG SKYES DANG, GZENGS BSTOD MKHAN CHAS, PHYAG
MDZOD RAB 'BYAMS PA DON GRUB RGYA

MTSO LA NANG SO'I CHO LO GNANG, PHYIR PHEBS TE 'JA' MO GRUB CHEN
NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA, YONGS 'DZIN BLO

@310	 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BZANG RGYA MTSO, RONG BO BLA MA DGE 'DUN MKHAS MCHOG BIS PA MI
PHAM ZLA BA RNAMS LA GUR MGON GSANG KHRID

BSTZAL; SA BYA LOR CHU BZANG DU LCANG SKYA MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO
CHER MJAL 'DZOMS DANG GNAS LA THUGS CHAGS PA'I

TSUL MDZAD, SEMS NYID DGON DU SEMS NYID SPRUL SKU LA SKAL LDAN
MGUR 'BUM GYI LUNG, LCAGS PHAG LA BRAG

DKAR SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS ZHUS TE
TSOGS CHEN LA KUN RIG DBANG DANG, SKAL LDAN

GSUNG 'BUM GYI LUNG SOGS BSTZAL, SNGA PHYIR PIR THOGS DBANG BO
DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO LA BKA' GNANG STE SKAL

LDAN RNAM THAR BDUN THANG, MI TRA RDOR PHRENG GI DKYIL THANG,
SNAR THANG NAS BKA' BSTAN GDAN 'DREN SOGS

PHYAG RJES RGYA CHE, NGA LNGA BA SHING STAG LA GSHEGS, LAM
GTZO'I 'GREL BA SOGS BKA' RTZOM 'GA' SNANG, DE'I

SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS RGYA MTSO NI, LCANG SKYA GONG
