MA'I SKU TSA SKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN RNAM RGYAL GYI SRAS SU SHING

YOS LOR 'KHRUNGS, CHU BZANG LCANG SKYA BLA BRANG DU KHRI SPRUL
BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN SENG GE LAS RAB TU BYUNG,

GDAN SAR BKOD BSTUN 'BRAS KLU 'BUM PA SOG PO DGE BSHES BSTAN
'DZIN, YONGS 'DZIN DNGOS SLOB RGYA

PO'I 'JAM DBYANGS GNYIS YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN, MTSAN ZHABS PA
TSUGS TE BSDUS GRVA, BLO RTAGS, DON

BDUN CU, PHAR PHYIN BCAS LA SBYANGS, THAL PHRENG ZUR BKOL PHAL
CHER THUGS 'DZIN MDZAD, LHA MO'I

GSER KHRI SPRUL BA'I SKU, DPON SLOB GSER KHANG PA, YONGS 'DZIN
GNYIS SOGS LAS SNGA PHYIR CHOS BKA' MANG

DU GSAN, NYER GSUM PA LA DBUS SU PHEBS, BYANG RTZE'I GRVA TSANG
DU DGE BSHES BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN PA BSTEN

NAS DBU PHAR LA SBYANGS, SE 'BRAS LA MANG 'GYED DANG, DE KAR
BZHUGS RING LO LTAR GRVA TSANG LA DNGUL tAm

RE'I 'GYED, ZHAL SNGA NAS BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS PA LAS BKA' CHOS
'GA' ZHIG GSAN, PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN

BSTAN PA'I NYI MA LA BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS, NYER BDUN PA LA GDAN
SAR PHEBS, BSTAN 'GYUR SOGS PHYAG DPE

GSAR BSGRIGS POTA STONG DU NYE BA NANG BZHUGS KYI DPE MDZOD
KHANG DANG MGON KHANG BZHENGS, SHING RTA'I LOR CHU
 
BZANG JO KHANG RAB GNAS LA BYON, TSOGS CHEN 'DU KHANG KHYAMS
BCAS BZHENGS, CHING WANG BSKUL NAS

TSOGS CHEN RGYUN JA'I THEBS SU JA LAN CHEN BRGYA BZHAG BLA BRANG
NAS KHUR BZHES KYIS SPYI KHANG PHIGS TE SDE BA ZUR

BSKOS MDZAD, 'CHAD NYAN DANG 'GRIG LAM RTING BSKUL RGYUN CHAGS
PA GNANG BAS 'PHEL RGYAS BYUNG, RIG

GNAS THAMS CAD DANG KHYAD PAR GSO RIG LA MKHAS PAS SMAN GYI 'GRO
PHAN CHE, TSUL KHRIMS DAG PA'I TSAD DU

BYED; ZHE DGU PA LA GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU CHU BZANG RIN PO
CHE'I SKU TSAR 'KHRUNGS PA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS RGYA

MTSO CHER MA 'GYANGS PAR GSHEGS, SLAR YANG RIGS RGYUD DE NYID DU
MCHOG SPRUL RIN CHE BLO BZANG SKAL LDAN

BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN RAB YID AS LUG LOR 'KHRUNGS PA GDAN SAR
MNGA' GSOL BA'I SKABS LAGS, `RJE

SKAL LDAN PA DGUNG LO NYER BZHI BZHES PA RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I
LCAGS RTA LOR, PHU BO CHOS PA RIN PO CHES

NGAS KHYOD GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA ZHING RIGS PA DVANGS PA ZHIG SNANG
BAS JO JO NANG SO LA MA BSTUN PAR DBANG YOD BYAS

NAS RAB TU BYUNG, DBUS SU BYANG RTZE GRVA TSANG LA BZHAG DON
SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA SPYI DANG, SGOS SU RJE RIN PO

@311	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CHE'I BSTAN PA 'DI LA PHAN PA ZHIG AE YONG GI RE BA DANG, DE
BZHIN 'GRUB PA'I SMON LAM BTAB YOD PAS PHYIN

CHAD BSTAN 'GRO LA PHAN THABS PHYOGS RIS MED PA DANG, BSHAD
SGRUB GNYIS LA NUS PA CI YOD KYI BAR DU 'DUN

PA GTONG DGOS PAS, DANG PO BSHAD GRVA TSUGS GSUNGS PA BZHIN
MTSAN NYID GRVA TSANG THOS BSAM GLING BTZUGS,

THOG MA'I NYIN GRVA BA LNGA LA BRTZI BZHAG GNANG BA PHYIS SU
BLON CHOS KHRI BA SOGS BLA MRA 'OS PA LNGA BYUNG, CHOS THOG GI

SKABS SU 'CHAD NYAN DANG, CHOS MTSAMS RNAMS SU DBEN GNAS DU MAR
SGRUB PA MDZAD, SO BRGYAD PA SHING

SPREL LA 'DU KHANG GI LAS MGO BRTZAMS, DAD 'BUL GANG BYUNG GRVA
TSANG GI PHYOGS SU BTANG STE CHOS SRID GNYIS KYIS

BSKYANGS; CHOS 'BYUNG DU, LO BCUR 'CHAD NYAN BSKYANGS, DE NAS
RAB 'BYABS PA BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS

BLA MAR BSKOS ZHES DANG, GSUNG M GUR LAS, LO NYER BZHI LON TSE
GRVA TSANG BTZUGS, ,LO DE NAS LNGA BCU NGA

DRUG BAR, ,LO SUM CU SO GSUM GRVA TSANG BSKYANGS, ,ZHES GSUNGS
LA, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI BA'I SHING GLANG 'DI RJE

SKAL LDAN PA 'KHRUNGS NAS LO NYIS BRGYA DANG NGA DGU GRVA TSANG
BTZUGS NAS NYIS BRGYA SO DRUG GSHEGS NAS BRGYA

DANG GYA DGU BA YIN NO, ` ,DE NAS BLON CHOS KHRI RIN PO CHE BLO
BZANG CHOS GRAGS NI, BLON CHOS SAR RONG BO'I

RIGS SU 'KHRUNGS, CHOS PA RIN PO CHE NAS RAB BYUNG DANG, RJE
SKAL LDAN PA RNAM GNYIS LAS ZAB CHOS MANG DU

GSAN; 'DI NAS RNAM 'GREL DBU PHAR BCAS DANG, DBUS SU BYANG RTZE
GRVA TSANG DU 'DUL MDZOD SOGS BKA'

POTA YONGS RDZOGS LA SBYANGS PAS RIGS SMRA RTZER SON, RANG DGON
DU DAM BCA' BZHAG KHRIR BZHUGS NAS RTZI

BZHAG 'GRO CHE ZHING RIGS LAM SLOB PA, DPE 'DZIN SKYOR SBYANGS
KYI RTING BSKUL RGYUN BSKYANGS PAS PHAN SLEB CHE BA

BYUNG; ;YI NGOGS BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO NI TSO BZHI'I BGE BSNYEN
GYI RGYUD PA SOG RUR MCHED PA'I RIGS SU RAB

BYUNG BCU BA'I ME 'BRUG LA 'KHRUNGS, RGYAL BA YON TAN RGYA MTSO
GSHEGS LO YIN, BCU GCIG PA LA SKAL LDAN

RIN PO CHE LAS RAB TU BYUNG, CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, 'DI PA'I BCO LNGA
BA LA GRVA TSANG BTZUGS 'DUG PAS THOG MA'I

DUS KYI GRA RGYUN 'DRA, LI KYA'I SHES RAB SENG GE LAS ME TOG
BCUD LEN SOGS MANG PO DANG, SKYED SHOD SDE BA CHOS

RJE; KO'U PA CHOS RGYA MTSO, AA 'GRON MKHAS BTZUN RGYA MTSO SOGS
LA CHOS GSAN, BCU BDUN PAR MDO SMAD

BSHAD GRA PHAL CHER DU GRVA SKOR, STAG LUNG DPAL RI'I GA-YAS
PHYOGS LHUN GRUB RDZONG GI RTZE DANG, GA-YUL LUNG MTHONG

RTZE; BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL RNAMS SU SGRUB PA MDZAD PAS BLA MA THUGS
GNYES, NYER BRGYAD PA'I STENG RJE SKAL LDAN PA LA

BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS, SO GCIG PA LA CHOS PA RIN PO CHE'I BKA'
BZHIN DBUS SU BYON, LO NGO GNYIS LA DGA'

LDAN BYANG RTZER BZHUGS, DPON SLOB DGE 'DUN BSTAN DAR BA DANG,
MNGA' RIS PA DPAL LDAN RGYAL

MTSAN; GLING YAG PA DKON MCHOG CHOS 'PHEL BCAS LA CHOS ZHUS, SA
BYI NAS 'BRAS SPUNGS SU SGO MANG CHOS

GRVAR ZHUGS, DPON SLOB SGA RU BA NGAG DBANG DPAL 'BYOR GYI ZHABS
BSTEN, THUGS GNYER YANG DAG

MDZAD; KUN GZIGS LNGA BA'I DRUNG NAS 'PHRENG DBANG YONGS RDZOGS,
LAM RIM SNGAGS RIM SOGS RJE'I GSUNG

'BUM PHAL CHER GYI LUNG GSAN, BKRA SHIS LHUN POR LAN GNYIS
PHEBS, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN GYIS@312 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BZHED CHOS GANG 'DOD DGYES BZHIN DU GNANG, GSANG PHUR DKA' BCU'I
MTSAN BTAGS DANG RGYUD SMAD DU

PHEBS; DPON SLOB GSER KHANG PA DAM CHOS RNAM RGYAL LA 'GREL BA
BZHI SBRAGS, BSKYED RDZOGS PHAL CHER

GSAN; DKYIL 'KHOR RNAMS KYI BRI THIG SOGS BYANG CHUB, RGYUD PA
CHU BZANG, CHU MIG LUNG, LAM PA,

SKYOR MO LUNG RNAMS SU CHOS PAR BTEGS SKABS DE DAG GI RTEN MJAL
YANG MDZAD, RI BO DGE 'PHEL DU GRUB CHEN

DOM RA BA DGE LEGS DAR RGYAS BSTEN TE LO GSUM TZAM ZAB CHOS MANG
PO GSAN, RANG YUL DU PHEBS NAS GRVA TSANG

GI 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD, RONG BO DGON SGRUB SDE GNYIS KAR SPYI CHOS
DANG SGER CHOS MANG DU GNANG, DPON SLOB

RIN PO CHE DANG YAB SRAS GNYIS KYIS BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME SBAR
SKABS, THOG MAR YUL DER THAL MO KHONG STONG SBYOR

SHES MKHAN TZAM YANG DKON PAS PHYAG 'TSAL DUS 'PHRENG BA SNYIM
PAR 'JUG DGOS PA'I 'GRIG MDZAD PA DUS PHYIS

BAR DU YOD, PHYOGS PHYOGS SU PHEBS TE YIG DRUG GI SGO NAS 'GRO
DON MDZAD, RE GSUM PA SA RTA LA GSHEGS,

SKAL LDAN GSHEGS PA'I PHYI LO YIN, GSUNG MGUR POT CHUNG GCIG
SNANG, BLA MCHOD KHRID YIG LA LUNG YOD,

` KHRI RGAN BLO BZANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS PA NI, CHE CHEN NANG SO
BSOD NAMS KYI TSA BOR 'KHRUNGS, BLON CHOS KHRI RIN

PO CHE LAS RAB TU BYUNG, RGYAL RONG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS KYI SKYE
BAR GRAGS, DGON CHEN DU RNAM 'GREL LA SBYANGS,

BYANG RTZE GRVA TSANG DU THUGS GNYER RDZOGS TE LHA RAMS PA
MDZAD, BEE SER DU KLU 'BUM BSTAN PAS 'CHAD NYAN SKYONG

ZHES BSHAD, KHRI BLO GROS RGYA MTSO LA BSNYEN RDZOGS DANG CHOS
BKA' MANG DU ZHUS, MDO SMAD DU KHA GYA'I DBU MDZAD

TSUL KHRIMS BKRA SHIS PA BSTEN NAS CHOS RGYUN MTHA' YAS PA GSAN,
RGYAL MO RONG NAS GDAN 'DREN NAN CHE BA'I

'DOD MOS BSGRUBS, DBUS GTZANG DU PHEBS NAS MCHOD 'BUL MANG 'GYED
RGYA CHER BGYIS, 'DI KA'I KHRIR

SNGA PHYIR BZHUGS PA BSDOMS PAS LO SUM CU BSKYANGS, 'KHRUNGS
KHYIM STONGS PAS SA ZHING KHANG PA BCAS SBYOR

'JAGS KYIS KHRI PA BLA BRANG GSAR DU BSKRUN, DUD TSANG BCU YOD
PA GRVA TSANG GI MCHOD GZHIS SU PHUL, CHU GLANG

LOR GSHEGS, TSUL KHRIMS DAG CING NGES 'BYUNG DANG BYANG CHUB KYI
SEMS GNYIS NYAMS BZHES KYI MTHIL DU

MDZAD PA ZHIG TU SNANG, ` SHAR SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS
RGYA MTSO, ` SLAR YANG KHRI RGAN BLO BZANG BSTAN PA

DAR RGYAS, RTIS TSANG MA nI PA SHES RAB BKRA SHIS, RDZONG DKAR
CHUNG BA NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN

LAS; ` MKHAN CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO NI, TSO
BZHI'I RGYUD DU RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SA LUG

LOR 'KHRUNGS, GONG MA BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO'I SPRUL SKUR NGOS
BZUNG STE DGUNG LO BCU BA SA 'BRUG LA GDAN SAR

BKOD; RONG BO'I SKU DBON BLA MA DNGOS GRUB PA'I SPYAN SNGAR RAB
TU BYUNG, CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, RTZOD PA LA

THUGS SHIN TU 'GRUS, RONG BO SPRUL SKU 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO DANG
MNYAM DU RNAM 'GREL TSOGS GLENG MDZAD, RJE

BTZUN PA'I YIG CHA'I STENG NAS PHAR PHYIN LA RTZOD PA GNANG DUS
GUNG RU'I YIG CHA LA THUGS MOS BYUNG STE PHYAG BRIS

DANG GZIGS RTOG GNANG, CHU DMAR SGOM CHEN BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO
LAS, BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM KUN RIG

RNAMS KYI DBANG, GA-YER GSHONG 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PA, BDE CHEN
DPON SLOB BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS,

@313 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

DPON SLOB CHOS 'PHEL RGYA MTSO SOGS LA CHOS GSAN, NYER LNGA PA
CHU LUG LOR BYANG NGOS SU GNAS MJAL DANG

SBRAGS TE THOG MAR LA MO BDE CHEN DU PHEBS, DAM BCA' BZHAG GRVA
TSANG 'DUS TSOGS CHE ZHING, 'CHAD NYAN

SLOB GNYER RGYAS SGANG YIN 'DUG CHU BZANG, DGON LUNG GNYIS SU
GRVA SKOR DANG, BYA KHYUNG DANG SKU 'BUM DU

DAM BCA' STABS MA 'GRIG SHING SPREL LOR BDE THANG MKHAN PO,
BYANG CHUB MI LA, 'BE SKU SKYE NGAG DBANG THEG

MCHOG DBANG PHYUG GTZOS DKA' BCU MCHOG LDAN, TZA YUS PHUN TSOGS
SOGS DANG 'GROGS TE DBUS LA

PHEBS; 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG BLA BRANG DU KUN MKHYEN 'JAM
DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE MJAL, DBU PHAR

'DUL MDZOD KYI BRTZI BZHAG DANG, DBANG RJES GNANG LUNG KHRID
MTHA' YAS PA GSAN, DGE TSUL DANG BSNYEN

RDZOGS KYI MKHAN PO ZHUS TE BKA' DRIN CHE BA'I BLA MA GCIG TU
MDZAD, KUN MKHYEN RJES SU NYI THANG BA BLO BZANG

SHES RAB, CUNG GAR BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS, KHONG MDO SMAD DU PHEBS
PA'I BLA TSAB TU RGYAL SRAS YE SHES GRAGS PA

DANG CUNG GAR BA PHYIR PHEBS BCAS KYI RING LA CHOS GRVA 'GRIM,
RGYAL PO LHA BZANG LHO 'BRUG NAS PHYIR SE RAR

PHEBS DUS BSAM BLO MI THUNG DANG RNAM GNYIS KYIS SE RAR DAM BCA'
BZHAG RGYAL POS KYANG 'PHROS PA MANG PO

BYAS; SER BYES MKHAN PO BLO BZANG NOR BU DANG 'DI PA GNYIS NAS
RNAM MKHYEN GYIS JI LTA BA LA GZIGS PA'I

GZIGS NGOR JI LTA BA RTOGS PA'I RNAM MKHYEN YOD MED SOGS LAS
BRTZAMS TE BGRO GLENG GTONG RES BYAS, KUN

MKHYEN PHA BONG KHAR BZHUGS RING LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO'I BSHAD
LUNG SOGS BKA' CHOS GANG GNANG PHAL CHER

GSAN; 'JAM DBYANGS BDE BA'I RDO RJE LA LAM RIM CHEN MO'I BSHAD
LUNG, CHU BZANG RI KHROD DU BYA BRAL BLO

BZANG RIN CHEN LA YANG CHOS GSAN, SO DRUG PA SHING RTA LA LHA
RAMS PA BYAS, ME BYA LA CUNG GAR GYI DMAG DBUS

SU 'BYOR, BZHI BCU PA SA KHYI'I SMON LAM RJES SU LHA SAR DGE
BSHES SU BZANG BRTAG DGOS KYIS DGE BSHES

BRGYA LHAG TZAM RTZOD PA TSUGS, 'BRAS SPUNGS NAS LA MO NAM MKHA'
GONG DU PHUD, DE RJES AANG DANG 'DI PA,

GNYIS PA SE RA NAS HAL HA ZHABS DRUNG, GSUM PA DGE LDAN NYAG
RONG T'A 'ON PA ZHIG LA BYUNG, GDAN SA'I

THOG MAR 'DI PA LA DPAL 'KHOR CHOS SDE, SE RA PA LA GNYAL SDE
DRUG DGE LDAN PAS BYAMS PA GLING 'DAMS PA

BCAS DGON SDE BRGYA LHAG GI BLA MA BSKOS, CUNG GAR DPON GYIS
GRONG DANG DGON PA'I BAR THAG DRIS PAR BLO GLING

NAS GZHUNG LAS PA DGE BSHES TRE BO KHON THAR DANG, SGO MANG NAS
'DI PA GNYIS KYIS MDZOD LTAR ZHUS, LO

DER KHRI DGE 'DUN PHUN TSOGS PA'I RJES SU DPAL 'KHOR CHOS SDE
DANG, RTZE CHEN CHOS SDE ZUNG 'BREL GYI MKHAN

POR PHEBS, MKHAS GRUB GZIMS KHANG DKAR POR BZHUGS GDAN 'JAGS,
GNAS BRTAN SKU SKYE BLO BZANG

BSTAN 'DZIN LAS DPAL CHOS DANG, DE NYID KYI BZHUGS GNAS LHAN
BRAG SNGON GNYIS KAR CHOS MANG DU GSAN,

DE BA BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I THOS BSAM GLING BDE 'BYOR BA, SNGAGS
GRVA RGYUN RING 'GRIM, RDO RJE 'DZIN PA DKON

MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN GYI SPRUL SKU'I YONGS 'DZIN DANG, SA SKYA SOGS
GTZANG DBUS GNYIS KAR BLA MA MANG PO BSTEN,

GSAN RGYA SHIN TU CHE, SKU TSE SMAD DU GONG MA'I BKAS MKHAR
SNGON POR PHEBS, DER GSHEGS, 'JIGS BYED

@314 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BYAD GROL SOGS BRTZAMS CHOS 'GA' RE SNANG STE ZHAR BYUNG NGO,
,BLA MA 'JAM DBYANGS PA DPAL CHOS SU GDAN

DRANGS; RDOR 'PHRENG DBANG DANG, KONG BO BSTAN PA RGYAL MTSAN
LAS BKA' 'GYUR, SGO MANG DAM CHOS PA LA

'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS, KHRI DGE 'DUN PHUN TSOGS, KHRI NGAG DBANG
MCHOG LDAN, AA KA BSOD NAMS BZANG

BO; KUN MKHYEN THUGS SRAS BDE YANGS PA GDONG DKAR SHOD PA YON
TAN DAR RGYAS SOGS BLA MA MANG PO BSTEN TE

GSAN PA MDZAD, DVAGS PO DGE BSHES DON GRUB DBANG RGYAL DPAL CHOS
SU SKU DRUNG BSNYEN PAR SGRA SNYAN DNGAGS,

MDO SNGAGS KYI DOGS GCOD MANG POS BZHED PA BSGRUB, DVAGS PO BLO
BZANG SBYIN PAS LCANG SKYA'I GSUNG 'BUM

LUNG NYAN, DPAL CHOS ZUR NAS NIM CHOS LUNG DU RE ZHIG BZHUGS,
NGA GSUM PA LCAGS PHAG LOR MI DBANG

GIS BKA' SHOG BKRAM PA BZHIN DBUS SU PHEBS, ZHOGS DON YOD MKHAS
GRUB DANG, BLA MA BYAMS PA RIN PO

CHE LAS LAM KHRID GSAN, BRTAN BZHUGS 'BUL MKHAN MDZAD, CHU BYI
LOR RONG BO MON HAN, GA-YER

GSHONG DPON SLOB, NANG SO BSOD NAMS DAR RGYAS GSUM GYIS GDAN
'DREN PA BTANG BA LTAR, RANG YUL DU

PHEBS; HANG NGE GUNG AURGE BRGYUD CHU SNGON BRGAL, 'BA' MDO NAS
RMA CHUR GRU BRGYAB, CHU NAG RKA CHEN RKA

CHUNG; NYIG SHIG CHE CHUNG, ZI MA'I GROG RKED YAN STAG GA-YAG
GLANG MA RGYA 'DAL, LA BDUN, MTHA' SMUG

NAS MAR BDE CHEN DGON, MGAR RTZE SGAR, DAR ZHING, AA 'GRON SGAR,
BSE NYA LUNG GI PHU BRGAL,

RGYAB NGOS LUNG BA'I PHU GA-YER GSHONG DU THOG MAR PHEBS, PHYIR
LAM SO NAG RONG BO, KYANG KYA'I SDE BA,

'PHRANG LA BYAS, BIS PA MAN RGYAL THANG DU SER SBRENGS BCAS DGON
CHEN DU PHEBS, KHRIR LO BDUN BZHUGS,

LAM RIM CHEN MO'I BSHAD LUNG GNANG, GSAN MKHAN BDE CHEN SLOB
DPON NOR BU RGYA MTSO, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL

DPON SLOB SGRO TSANG GRUB CHEN, DKAR RIS SLOB DPON BLO BZANG DAR
RGYAS, GRVA TSANG SLOB DPON HOR RGYA TSANG,

RGYUD PA SLOB DPON DON GRUB, SGIS STENG SLOB DPON SHES RAB BSTAN
'DZIN, SA DKAR SHAR SLOB DPON

BZANG PO, BIS MDO GRVA TSANG DANG SHEL DGON THUN MONG GI SLOB
DPON CHU DMAR TSANG, KHA SO SKU SKYE SOGS

MANG; KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED ZHABS KYIS, MERGAN CHOS RJE NGAG
DBANG RGYA MTSO'I NGAG NAS RNAM THAR GSAN

PA BZHIN ME STAG LOR YONGS 'DZIN DU GDAN 'DREN BTANG PA'I SNGON
TZAM DU MNAL LAM LA, KUN MKHYEN GONG MA

BYON NAS RJE NYID LA PHYAG DBANG ZHUS PAR, NGA KHYED KYI SLOB MA
YIN PAS MI RUNG ZHES ZHUS KYANG MA GSAN PAR

'BUL DGOS BYUNG, MI SNA 'BYOR 'PHRAL BLA MA'I BKA' YIN 'GRO DGOS
GSUNGS TE KYIL KHYIM, KHUG PA'I

GZHUNG; BIS SNGON LA, GSER CHEN BRGYUD DE PHEBS, GSANG 'JIGS
GNYIS KYI DBANG, SKAL LDAN RGYA

MTSO'I GSUNG 'BUM SOGS THUGS BZHED GANG YOD PHUL, DBUS PHEBS DUS
PAn CHEN LA RTZA BAR DU CHIBS SKYEL

DANG; DBUS NAS PHYIR PHEBS BSTUN LCAGS 'BRUG LOR SKU NA SMIN
YANG LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO'I BSHAD LUNG

DANG; 'JAM DPAL ZHAL LUNG GI KHRID GNANG BA'I RGYUN GYIS DA LTA
SA STENG KHYAB, KUN MKHYEN DRUNG NAS RGYAL THANG

BA'I GCOD GZHUNG, DBYANGS CAN MA DMAR MO'I RJES GNANG SOGS BZHED
CHOS DU MA GSAN CING DGON CHEN DU

@315 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GDAN DRANGS, SGRUB GRVA BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU YANG LHAN RGYAS
PHEBS, SO BDUN GYI DGUNG GEGS SEL PHYIR RIG

GNAS KUN MKHYEN MA ZHES PA'I ZHABS BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS 'DI YANG
BRTZAMS, GUNG THANG SKU GONG MA LA MI TRA

GNANG; KUN MKHYEN GONG MAS BAR CHAD MI 'BYUNG BA'I CHED DU GSHED
DMAR THOG MAR GNANG BA LTAR GYI PHYAG LEN

DANG; YE SHES PA MA PHEBS PAR GDUNG MDUN DU SKYABS 'JUG ZHUS,
PHYI NYIN NAS THE BU DKA' BCU, DPA'

RE SPRUL SKU SOGS LA RIM PAR BABS, DGON CHEN DU RDO RJE 'PHRENG
BA GNANG, SPRUL PA'I SKU'I THUGS GNYER GYI

CHED DU BSDUS GRVA POT LONGS PA BRTZAMS, SLAR YANG RONG BO'I
KHRIR LO LNGA BZHUGS, 'CHAD NYAN MANG 'GYED

RTEN BZHENGS SOGS THOS BSAM SGOM GSUM, MDZAD PA PHYAG RJES GANG
THAD NAS RGYA CHE ZHING 'DUN MA LEGS PA'I

TSAD DU 'KHYOL BAR ZHAL GYIS BZHES, GYA BDUN PA SHING BYA LOR
GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU DME SHUL DKAR PO

GSHONG DU MKHAN CHEN DRUNG RIN PO CHE'I SKU TSAR 'KHRUNGS PA
DKON MCHOG YAR 'PHEL, KUN MKHYEN BAR MA'I

DNGOS SLOB, DE'I SPRUL SKU DON YOD RGYA MTSO NI CHU MA'I 'BROG
KHROD DU RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA KHYI LOR

'KHRUNGS; DGON CHEN DU THUGS GNYER MDZAD PAS MKHAS PA CHEN POR
GYUR, RIG GNAS THAMS CAD LA

SBYANGS; TSE MGON BLA MA LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, BSLAB KHRIMS
SHIN TU DAG DRUNG BA BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO PA LAS

ZAB CHOS RDZOGS PAR GSAN, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU GUNG THANG 'JAM
PA'I DBYANGS LA GTUGS, MDO SNGAGS KYI

GZHUNG BSHAD MANG DU ZHUS, DER MKHAS PA MANG POS DRI BA BYUNG
BAR KHA WA'I RAB 'BYAMS PA DANG RNAM GNYIS KYIS

LAN DON MTHUN BSTZAL, RDO RJE 'CHANG DHA DZA'I ZHAL SNGA NAS LA
PHUL BA'I ZHU YIG TU, 'DI NA GZHUNG MANG DKA'

GNAS MDUD, RANG STOBS SUG PAS MA GROL BA, ,ZHU 'DOD RTZE GNYIS
MCHIS GYUR NA, ,GSUNG NGAG RAL

GRI RTZOL LAM CI, ,ZHES PA'I LAN DU, KHVA TA'I MGRIN PA KHU BYUG
GI ,DBYANGS SNYAN 'BYUNG BA'I GNAS MIN

KYANG; ;MA MTHONG PHAR ZAD RDUL TSUB TZAM, ,MTHONG YANG MU COR
CIS MI SGROGS, ,ZHES GSUNGS PAS KYANG

DRI BA 'GA' ZHIG MDZAD DAM SNYAM, SHING BZA' DPON SLOB, GA-YER
GSHONG DGE 'DUN ZLA GRAGS SOGS LA

CHOS GSAN, 'DI KA'I KHRIR BZHUGS TE SNGA PHYIR LO BCU BSKYANGS,
TSOGS CHEN DU 'JIGS BYED DBANG SOGS

'CHAD SPEL RGYA CHE, SHAR SPRUL BA'I SKU DBUS PHEBS KYI SKU TSAB
LO GSUM GNANG, BYAMS PA ZHIG GSOS SOGS

'KHOR LO GSUM GYI MDZAD SGO RLABS CHE, GSUNG RTZOM KYANG POTA
LONGS PA YOD, ZHE BRGYAD PA SHING BYA LA GSHEGS,

DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO NI, RKANG TSA'I DA
NA'I SAR YI NGOGS RNAM RGYAL DANG, YUM JO MO'I

SRAS SU ME KHYI LOR 'KHRUNGS, DRUNG YIG SPRUL PA'I SKUS DGE
BSNYEN DANG KHRI SPRUL BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN SENG GE LAS

RAB BUNG, PHYIS BSNYEN RDZOGS KYANG RJE DE NYID LA ZHUS, DPON
SLOB GSER KHANG PA LAS DGE TSUL BSGRUBS,

'DI PA CHOS GRVAR 'JUG DUS DANG GONG MA'I DGONGS RDZOGS SKABS
SDE KHRI RIN PO CHE SKU DNGOS KYIS DGON CHEN DU

PHEBS TE GANG CI'I 'GAN KHUR BZHES, DUS 'KHOR GYI DBANG SOGS
CHOS BKA' MANG DU GNANG BAS BKA' DRIN

CHE BA'I BLA MA GCIG PU MDZAD, DBUS KYI DGE BSHES RTZER SON
BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS PA DANG, SKA SAR LHA RAMS

@316 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

PA DKON MCHOG RGYA MTSO GNYIS RIM PAR DGE RGAN DU BSTEN TE BKA'
POTA LNGAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD,

SHAR SPRUL PA'I SKU BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS RGYA MTSO, DPON SLOB
GSER KHANG BA, SGO DMAR RI KHROD PA, THAR SHUL

DGE 'DUN CHOS SKYONG RGYA MTSO, AA ROL ZHAL SNGA NAS SOGS LAS
GSAN PA RGYA CHER MDZAD, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU

YANG DANG YANG DU PHEBS TE KUN GZIGS MTHONG BA DON LDAN YAB SRAS
RNAMS LAS SNYAN BRGYUD MAN NGAG GI RGYUN

MTHA' YAS PA GSAN PAS SKU PHRENG RIM BYON THUGS 'BREL SHIN TU
ZAB PA BYUNG, SO GSUM PA SA RTA LOR 'DI KA'I

TSOGS CHEN KHRIR BZHUGS TE LUGS GNYIS KYIS BSKYANGS, KHRI KHUR
SPOS 'PHRAL KUN SPANGS MDZAD DE GDAN SA

RANG DANG DAR ZHING BDE 'DZOMS SOGS SU THUGS DAM NYAMS BZHES
GONG 'PHEL DU YOD, ` RGYAL MKHAN CHEN BLO

BZANG NYI MA GLANG GYAR MES PO LDONG DPON GYI RGYUD DU 'KHRUNGS,
RAB TU MA BYUNG GONG KHYIM PA YIG MKHAN MANG PO'I

GRAS SU CHOS 'BRIR BYON PA LA MKHAN CHEN GYIS RAB BYUNG DANG
CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS PA'I BSNGAGS PA BRJOD PAS, RANG

YUL NAS BROS STABS KYIS SGRUB GRVA BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU BLA MA AA
LAGS NOR BU LAS RAB TU BYUNG, DGON CHEN DU

CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, SLOB GNYER SHIN TU LEGS, BSDUS GRVA'I RJES LA
RNAM 'GREL, PHAR PHYIN DBU MA SOGS LA

YANG GRVA THOG DE NA MKHAN CHEN PA DANG RNAM GNYIS DRAG PAR
BRTZI ZHING THUGS NANG SHIN TU NYE, MKHAN CHEN DANG

MNYAM DU LA MO BDE CHEN, BYA KHYUNG, SKU 'BUM, STONG 'KHOR,
BTZAN PO DGON, DGON LUNG, DMAR

GTZANG; GRO TSANG SOGS MTSAN NYID KYI GRVA TSANG RNAMS SU DAM
BCA', MTSAN NYID MED SAR GNAS MJAL,

PHYIR LAM GRO TSANG LUNG PA'I PHUR BIS SNGON LA RGYAB, BYA
KHYUNG MAN RMA KHA BRGYUD, MGUR GYI THANG DU RMA CHU BRGAL,

MGUR DANG SNANG RA'I GSER KHANG, DGU RONG MTHIL, NAG RGYA'I BAR
GYI LAM RNAMS DANG, BAD SKOR KHYUNG BO

SOGS LA BYAS PHEBS, MA nI PA SHES RAB BKRA SHIS KYIS DGON CHEN
DU RDOR 'PHRENG GI DBANG GNANG DUS DAM

BCA' BZHAG PAS BSNGAGS BRJOD KYI GNAS SU GYUR, MKHAN CHEN DBUS
SU PHEBS RJES LO BCU TZAM NA 'DI PA

PHEBS; SGO MANG CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, NYI THANG BLO BZANG SHES RAB,
CUNG GAR BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS GNYIS SLOB

DPON DU BSTEN, BKA' POTA LNGA LA ZHIB TU SBYANGS, LHA RAMS PA
MDZAD, CUNG GAR GYIS RGYAL SOGS MKHAN

SA DRUG BDUN ZHIG MNYAM BSKOS BYED RGYUR SE 'BRAS DGE GSUM GYI
DGE BSHES BCU TZAM NYIN 'GAR BRTZAD PAS

'DI PA RTZER SON TE RGYAL GYI MKHAN POR BSKOS, MDA' DVAGS RGYAL
GSUM 'DZOMS DUS MKHAS PA'I YON TAN

GYIS THAMS CAD ZIL GYIS MNAN, DVAGS PO DGE BSHES DON GRUB DBANG
RGYAL YON TAN SLOB 'DOD PA MKHAN

CHEN DRUNG DU 'DI PAS BRDZANGS, RGYU MTSAN ZHUS PAR MKHAN CHEN
GYIS, THA SNYAD RIG GNAS LA NGA LAS RGYAL

MKHAS RUNG, GANG SHES BSLAB GSUNG 'DUG PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE
SHES DANG KHRI NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN LAS

CHOS GSAN, MI DBANG GIS BLA MAR BKUR TE CHOS KYI BKA' DRIN ZHUS,
MDO SMAD DU PHEBS RGYU'I DGONGS ZHUS

DANG; MTSO SNGON DKON MCHOG WANG GIS GZHUNG LA PHAN THOGS CAN
GYI BLA MA ZHIG DGOS ZHUS PA 'DZOMS PAS 'DI

PA BSKOS TE MTSO SNGON DU RE ZHIG BZHUGS THOG RONG BO'I SPRUL
BA'I SKUS GDAN 'DREN PA BTANG STE 'DIR PHEBS,

@317 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MKHAN CHEN GYIS KHRI'I DGONGS PA ZHUS 'PHRAL KHONG LA GDAN SA
GTAD, LCAGS SPREL NAS CHOS SDE LO BCU GSUM LA

BSKYANGS; THOS BSAM GLING GI 'DU KHANG GSAR DU BSKRUN, DER BCU
GCIG ZHAL, BSTAN 'GYUR SOGS SKU

GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG DU BZHUGS, ME GLANG LOR GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL
SKU DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA NYID KYI

GONG MA'I SKU NYER 'KHRUNGS, NGOS 'DZIN GSAL BAS GDAN SAR BKOD,
,YI NGOGS MKHAN CHEN LAS RAB

BYUNG DANG, LCANG LUNG KHRI RGAN LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, BCU GCIG
PA LA CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, PHAR TSAD LA

SBYANGS; BCU BDUN THOG KHRIR BZHUGS, RGYUN JA CHAD PA SLAR GSOS,
GZIMS KHANG, 'DU KHANG,

BYAMS KHANG BCAS BZHENGS, 'BRAS KLU 'BUM PA HOR NAG NGAG DBANG
RGYA MTSOS ZHABS LA GTUGS SNANG, RDO

SBIS SGO RU'I GRVA TSANG SOGS BSHAD SGRUB KYI SDE BCU LHAG 'DZIN
BDAG MDZAD DE CHOS SRID GNYIS KYIS BSKYANGS,

DE'I SPRUL SKU RGYA ZA NAS 'KHRUNGS PA DGE LEGS THUB BSTAN RGYA
MTSO DGON CHEN DU GSAN SBYONG LEGS, TSOGS

CHEN KHRI MDZAD PA DA LTA ZUR BZHUGS KYI SKABS SO, ` ,DE NAS TSO
'DU MKHAN PO BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS, DGON

CHEN DU MKHAN CHEN LA RDOR 'PHRENG DBANG ZHUS, DE'I SPRUL SKU
RGYA BO NAS 'KHRUNGS PA SNGAGS 'CHANG RDO RJE RNAM RGYAL

DU GRAGS PA MKHAN CHEN GYIS RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS, MDO SNGAGS RIG
GNAS THAMS CAD LA MKHAS, SKU TSE MJUG

TU GRUB CHAS MDZAD, CHAR 'BEBS, SER SRUNG, GRI 'DUL SOGS LA NUS
PA CHE BA'I TSAD BYED, DE LA SPRUL

SKU SNGA PHYI GNYIS BYON PA'I RJES MA DA LTA'ANG BZHUGS, ` SLAR
YANG MKHAN CHEN SHING PHAG LOR KHRIR BZHUGS,

SLOB CHUNG DU LCANG LUNG DGE 'DUN BSTAN 'DZIN BSKOS, ` RONG BO
SPRUL PA'I SKU DGE 'DUN 'PHRIN LAS RAB RGYAS

DGUNG LO NYI SHU PA LA KHRIR BZHUGS, ` LCANG LUNG PA DGE 'DUN
BSTAN 'DZIN RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I LCAGS

SPREL LA 'KHRUNGS, CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS TE LO LNGA BCU'I RING MDO
SNGAGS LA SBYANGS, SENG GE RTZE BSAM 'GRUB BDE

LDAN SOGS SU SGRUB PA LA GZHOL, MKHAN CHEN DANG KUN MKHYEN BAR
MA SOGS KYI SLOB MA, RJE SKAL LDAN GYI ZHAL

GZIGS TE BSKUL MA MDZAD PA BZHIN DE NYID KYI MGUR 'BUM PHYOGS
GCIG TU BSGRIGS, MTHUN RKYEN GANG

DGOS SBYAR PAR DU BSGRUBS, ZHU DAG MDZAD DE PAR BYANG BRTZAMS,
SDE DGE NAS BKA' BSTAN GNYIS GDAN

DRANGS; SHING BYA NAS KHRIR BZHUGS, MNGON MKHYEN MNGA', MGUR MA,
BSLAB BYA, GTOR CHOG SOGS

RTZOM PA 'GA' ZHIG KYANG SNANG, DE'I SPRUL SKU RONG BO'I CHU
DMAR DU 'KHRUNGS, DGON CHEN DU CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS,

RI BO'I RTZE LNGAR BYON PA HAL HA'I PHYOGS SU GZHI CHAGS, DGUNG
LO BDUN CU'I NANG RANG DGON DU PHEBS,

MCHOD RDZAS 'GA' ZHIG SBYOR 'JAGS DANG MANG 'GYED BSTAB, SLAR DE
KAR BYON PA DA LTA BZHUGS ZHES THOS,

` SA GLANG NAS SLAR YANG RONG BO SPRUL PA'I SKU BZHUGS, ` BSE
SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG 'JAM DBYANGS BKRA SHIS

NYID KYI SO GSUM PA LCAGS YOS LA BZHUGS, SHING RTA NAS RGYAL
MKHAN SPRUL DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS LO

BDUN BSKYANGS, ` TSE MGON BLA MA DGE 'DUN MKHYEN RAB SHAR BAR
MA'I SKU MCHED TSE MGON BKRA SHIS DANG,

YUM TSE RING SKYID KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME 'BRUG
LOR 'KHRUNGS, KHU BO RJE NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS

@318 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RGYA MTSOS RGYAL RONG BA'I SPRUL SKU KHRI RGAN MKHAS GRUB BSTAN
DAR GYI SKYE BAR NGOS BZUNG, LCANG LUNG KHRI RGAN LAS

RAB TU BYUNG, RGYAL MKHAN SPRUL, TSO 'DU MKHAN PO SOGS LAS SNGA
PHYIR CHOS BKA' MANG DU GSAN, BCU

GCIG PA LA CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, 'JAM DBYANGS SMRA SENG, DBYANGS CAN
MA DMAR MO GNYIS KYI BSNYEN SGRUB

DANG; 'JAM DBYANGS ZHI KHRO SBRAGS SGRUB THUGS NYAMS SU BSTAR
BAS BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA'I RTAGS MTSAN

BYUNG; RTZOM PA'I KLONG RDOL, ZHOG JA NAS DROS JA'I BAR DPE SHOG
MDA' TSAD LNGA RE ZIN, RJE BTZUN PA'I DBU

MA SOGS GZHUNG CHEN MANG DU BZUNG, BDE CHEN SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG
'JAM DBYANGS DPAL LDAN SOGS LA SGRA

DANG SNYAN NGAG BSLAB, LCANG KYA'I BSE SKU SKYE DANG GNYIS KAS
BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU DAM BCA' BZHAG RIGS

LUNG GIS YID 'PHROG STE GNYIS KA YUL DBUS SGO MANG DU PHEBS,
RIGS SMRA GYI RTZER SON, BSE SKU SKYES DER

GSHEGS; 'DI PA GTZANG BA MKHAN PO LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, PAn
CHEN RIN CHE, KHRI NGAG DBANG CHOS

GRAGS; RGYAL SRAS ZHAL SNGA NAS, KLONG RDOL BLA MA SOGS BSTEN,
GSAN RGYA CHE, SKYOR MO LUNG, DGE

'PHEL SOGS SU THUGS DAM MDZAD, LHAG LHA DU MA'I ZHAL GZIGS,
RGYAB NA THOD LO GSHEGS, 'DI PA BLA

BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS PAS LHA SA'I KHYAMS RAR SHUL DOD
ZER, KUN MKHYEN DRUNG DU BCAR BZHUGS

KYIS BKA' CHOS DANG, BDE MO THANG DU RDOR 'PHRENG GNANG BA GSAN
DUS RTA MGRIN TSE RING GIS DRUNG YIG BYAS TE

GSUNG BSHAD ZIN BRIS BTAB, GZHAN RTZOM PA MANG, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL
TSOGS CHEN KHRI PA'I 'OS SU THAMS CAD

RE BA CHE SKABS RONG BO SPRUL PA'I SKU NAS GDAN 'DREN PA BTANG,
KUN MKHYEN MCHOG LA THUGS BSTUN ZHUS PAS

PHEBS DGOS GSUNGS PA LTAR 'DIR BYON TE RGYUD KHRI DANG, LCAGS
GLANG LOR KHRIR BZHUGS, SGO MANG LTAR GYI

'DZIN GRVA GTUGS SROL BTZUGS, NA BZA'I THEBS SU TVA 'GYED BTANG,
GZIMS KHANG GSAR BSKRUN DU,

SANGS RGYAS SO LNGA DANG BDE GSHEGS BRGYAD KYI SMAN SKU BLA
MCHOD TSOGS ZHING GTZOS THANG KA DRUG CUR NYE BA

BZHENGS; BRGYAD CU PA SHING PHAG LOR RTZE GZHUNG DU GSHEGS, DE'I
SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG MKHYEN RAB DPAL LDAN

'DI NAS THUGS GNYER DANG, HOR TSANG MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE DANG
MNYAM DU DBUS SU PHEBS, SLOB GNYER

DANG SPYOD PA GTZANG, CHU STAG LA RANG YUL DU PHEBS, DPON SLOB
GSER KHANG PA BSTEN, BKA' CHOS MANG DU

GSAN; DBEN GNAS DU MAR YI DAM GYI BSNYEN CHEN SOGS SGOM SGRUB LA
BRTZON, LAM RIM CHEN MO DANG SNGAGS

RIG THUGS LA BYANG BAR BZHUGS PA RGYUN DU SKYOR, DUS 'KHOR DBANG
SOGS KYANG GNANG, GSUNG RTZOM 'GA'

ZHIG SNANG, SO LNGA PA LA GSHEGS, DA LTA SPRUL PA'I SKU BLO
BZANG MKHYEN RAB BZHUGS, SKYE RGYUD RIM BYON LA

RONG BO TSANG ZER, ` GAR RTZE GDONG BA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DBUS
KYI DGE BSHES, KLONG RDOL BLA MA, YONGS

'DZIN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN, KUN MKHYEN BAR MA SOGS LA SNGA PHYIR
CHOS BKA' MANG PO GSAN, LHA RAMS PA

THON; BYANG RTZE MKHAN PO MDZAD, RGYAL BA 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO
DGA' LDAN DU PHEBS DUS BGRO GLENG NGO MTSAR

CAN PHUL BAS DGYES GZIGS CHE BA BYUNG, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS
BZHED KYIS BYON PA SHAR SPRUL BA'I SKU

@319 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

DBUS PHEBS DANG MJAL, GSUNG NAN CHE BAS RONG BOR BYON, ME LUG LA
KHRIR BZHUGS, LCAGS PHAG LOR

GSHEGS; ;MKHAN CHEN SPRUL SKU DON YOD CHOS RGYA MTSO, ` SLAR
YANG RGYAL MKHAN SPRUL DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA'I

NYI MA; ` NANG SO SKU SKYES DGE 'DUN MKHAS MCHOG RONG BO'I RIGS
SU 'KHRUNGS, SNGAR REB GONG SHOG BCU

GNYIS LA CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM GTONG 'JUG MKHAN GYI NANG SO GRAGS
CAN ZHIG BYUNG BA'I SKYE BAR GRAGS, BCU

GSUM PA LA CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, 'JAM DBYANGS ZHI KHRO SBRAGS SGRUB
KYI BSNYEN PA BGYIS PAR BYIN RLABS KYI MTSAN MA

BYUNG; DUS 'KHOR RGYUD PA TSOGS CHEN GSUM GYI KHRIR RIM PAR
PHEBS, RI KHROD YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN GYI BLA MA

YANG GNANG, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI BA'I ME YOS LOR GSHEGS, DE'I
SPRUL SKU DGE 'DUN LEGS BSHAD RGYA MTSO,

BSE 'DI BA DANG SKU MCHED YIN, DGON CHEN DU DBU PHAR RNAM 'GREL
BCAS LA ZHIB PAR SBYANGS, DBUS

GTZANG; RI BO RTZE LNGA, TZAN DAN JO BO SOGS MJAL, TSOGS CHEN
KHRIR BZHUGS, LNGA BCU PA LA

GSHEGS; ;BIS PA NGAG DBANG MI PHAM ZLA BA, MAR NANG TSO LNGAR
BIS THANG 'JA' MO'I RIGS SU RAB BYUNG BCU

GSUM PA'I ME PHAG LOR 'KHRUNGS, MKHAN CHEN DNGOS SLOB BIS PA DGE
BSHES SHES RAB BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYE BAR

NGOS BZUNG, BCU GSUM PA LA CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, RIGS SMRA RTZER SON
BDE CHEN PA SHES RAB 'OD ZER LA SUM

RTAGS SOGS DANG, AA KHYUNG NGAG DBANG MKHYEN RAB LAS SNYAN NGAG
BSLAB, SHING ZA DPON SLOB LA SGRA RIS

DANG; RJE BTZUN PA'I YIG CHA LAS BRTZAMS PA'I DRI BA MANG DU
ZHUS PA'I LAN YANG YOD, SHAR MCHOG SPRUL RIN

PO CHE LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, LCANG LUNG KHRI RGAN, TSE MGON BLA
MA, KHRI RGAN SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG 'JAM

DBYANGS BKRA SHIS, MKHAN CHEN DRUNG YIG SOGS DANG, DGON LUNG DU
WANG SKAL BZANG YE SHES DAR RGYAS,

ZHANG BA SGOM CHEN BLO BZANG ZLA BA RNAMS LAS CHOS BKA' CI RIGS
GSAN, KHYAD PAR THU'U BAKVAN RIN PO CHE'I DRUNG

DU YANG YANG BCAR TE BDE LAM GYI KHRID ZHAL SHES MAN NGAG GIS
BRGYAN PA, SNGAGS LUGS THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I

PHYAG CHEN ZAB KHRID BCAS GSAN PA'I CHOS MTSAMS BYED PA DANG DUS
MTSUNGS SU TSOGS DUNG 'BUD PA, ME TOG

GI CHAR 'DAB MA LNGA DRUG RE YOD PA SA GZHI KHEBS PAR BAB PA
SOGS RTEN 'BREL RANG SHUGS KYIS 'GRIG PA LA BLA MA

MCHOG KYANG THUGS SPRO BA'I NYAMS 'UR BA LTA BU MDZAD 'DUG CING,
ZHAL NAS KYANG, GUNG THANG SPRUL BA'I SKU

DANG; 'DI PA LTA BU'I MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS THAMS CAD LA MKHAS PA
DENG SANG DKON GSUNGS, RGYUD DUS

'KHOR GYI KHRI DANG, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I THOG MA ME YOS LA
TSOGS CHEN CHEN KHRIR PHEBS KYANG LO NANG DER GSHEGS

PAS 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD RGYU MA BYUNG, SHAR SPRUL PA'I SKU DGE 'DUN
'PHRIN LAS RAB RGYAS KYI RNAM THAR SOGS GSUNG

'BUM POTA GSUM TZAM YOD, DUS THOG DER RTZOM PA LEGS PA'I TSAD
BYED, DE'I SPRUL SKU DON YOD BSTAN PA'I

RGYAL MTSAN, ` BRAG DKAR SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL
MTSAN, 'DI PA'I GONG MA BRAG DKAR SNGAGS

RAMS PA BLO BZANG BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS PA NI, BRAG DKAR DU SNGAGS
'CHANG TSE GZUNGS 'BUM DANG, BOL ZA

RDO RJE SMAN GYI SRAS SU 'KHRUNGS, BCU GSUM PA LA RJE SKAL LDAN
RGYA MTSO LAS RAB TU BYUNG STE DGUNG LO NYER DGU'I

@320 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,) BAR ZHABS PAD BSTEN, ZAB
CHOS DU MA DANG LCAGS MKHAR 'PHRUL 'KHOR GYI SKOR ZHIB PAR
BSLAB, BCU

BDUN PA LA BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI SGOM GRVAR ZHUGS, NYI SHU PA LA
RGYAL SRAS BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN LAS BSNYEN PAR

RDZOGS; SUM CU PA LA BLA MA'I BKAS DBUS SU BYON, LO DGUR RGYUD
SMAD DU SNGAGS LA SBYANGS, RDO RJE SLOB

DPON MDZAD DE LCAGS MKHAR LAN 'GA' 'PHANGS, GZHUNG GI BSTAN SRID
LA SDANG BA'I DGRA PHAM PAS GRAGS

SNYAN RGYAS, RVA LO'I SKYE BAR GRAGS, RGYUD GRVA'I GNANG BA ZHUS
NAS LO GSUM LA BKA' CHOS GSAN, YI DAM

'JIGS BYED LA RTZA SNGAGS DUNG PHYUR GSUM SONG, MDO SMAD DU BYON
NAS BYA KHYUNG KHRI DANG, DE'I BLA SRI BCAD,

SGRUB GRVA BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL, RDZONG DKAR, ME LONG BRAG DKAR SOGS
SU 'CHAD SPEL MDZAD, STONG 'KHOR

BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS, RJE 'DI LA ZHAL GZIGS NYAMS RTOGS DANG,
'KHRUNGS RABS KYI GSUNG 'PHROS BYUNG

PA'I LAN DU, BLA MA DANG MCHED GROGS 'GA'I GSUNG SGROS LA, GRUB
CHEN NAG PO SPYOD PA, RONG ZOM CHOS

BZANG; RTZE THANG BYANG MA BA DPAL 'BYOR BSOD NAMS LHUN GRUB
RNAMS YIN TSUL DANG, ZHAL GZIGS NYAMS

SNANG YANG 'GA' ZHIG GSUNGS NAS DE LA NGES PA MED SNYAM, GZHAN
THOS BSAM RGYA CHEN PO MA GRUB KYANG RANG LO NYI

SHU BA LA BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU RJE SKAL LDAN
PA'I ZHABS BSTEN, THUN MONG DANG THUN MONG MA

YIN PA'I NYAMS KHRID NYIN RE BZHIN NYAMS SU LEN PA'I BRTZON PA
LA BCU GSUM BAR DU BYAS PA ZHAL GZIGS DANG

LUNG BSTAN GYI DOD PO YIN SNYAM GSUNGS PA BSTAN PA SPYI LA
DGONGS PA'I RNAM THAR 'GANG CHE, 'JIGS BYED RVA

LUGS KYI GDAMS PA LA MKHAS PAS, NGED DBUS GTZANG DU BSDAD, BREL
BA MED CING DRUNG YIG CIG 'DZOMS

NA; RI BO DGE LUGS PA'I 'JIGS BYED CHOS SKOR CHA TSANG BA DGE DO
BYAS NAS BSHAD CHOG PA ZHIG RTZOM 'DOD

KYANG STABS MA 'GRIGS GSUNGS, GSHEGS KHAR PHUD SKONG DU JA PHUD
BLUG ,H'Um RING BO DRUG BRJOD DE, DA NGA

MI NAG PO 'DI DANG 'GROGS NAS 'GRO ZHES SKU 'DAS, GSUNG 'BUM
POTA GCIG LHA RI TSANG GI PHYAG TU YOD SKAD,

NGAG BYIN RLABS KYI LUNG KHRID DANG SRI MNAN LCAGS MKHAR GYI
LUNG YONGS GRAGS, SHA SBRANG SNGAGS RAMS PA DANG

DUS TSOD RAGS PA MNYAM, RNAM THAR RGYAS PA MKHAN CHEN DRUNG RIN
PO CHEN MDZAD PA BDUD RTZI'I ZEG MA ZHES BYA

BA YOD SNANG, DE'I SPRUL SKU 'DI PA YANG BRAG DKAR DU 'KHRUNGS,
DGON CHEN DU THUGS GNYER DANG, SHAR

SPRUL PA'I SKU SOGS DAM PA DU MA LA CHOS GSAN, ME YOS LOR KHRIR
BZHUGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU DON YOD BSTAN

PA'I RGYAL MTSAN KHRI KA'I STOD RKANG TSA'I PHYOGS SU 'KHRUNGS
PA BZHI BCU'I NANG GSHEGS, ` SMAN TZONG BDE CHEN PA

BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN NI, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME
GLANG LOR SENG GE GSHONG DU 'KHRUNGS, DGE

BSHES SHES RAB BSTAN 'DZIN LAS RAB TU BYUNG, TSO 'DU MKHAN PO'I
YANG SPRUL DOGS GNAS GRAS, BCU BA LA

DGON CHEN DU ZHABS DRUNG DKYUS MA'I LUGS KYIS CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS,
DBU PHAR GYI MTHA' DYPOD 'GA' DANG

GSER PHRENG BLO 'DZIN GYIS SLOB GNYER RDO RUS THUG PA GNANG, NYI
SHU LA LCANG LUNG KHRI RGAN LAS BSNYEN PAR

RDZOGS; DUS 'KHOR DANG RGYUD PA'I SLOB DPON MDZAD, RGYUD KHRI'I
SKABS MERGAN DBU MDZAD BLO BZANG BSTAN

@321 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

'DZIN SMAD NAS YONG, DNGUL SRANG BZHI BRGYA'I RGYU RKYEN SBYAR
BA NYID NAS KHUR BZHES KYIS RGYUD KHANG GSAR BSKRUN

BGYIS; SA SPRUL LOR TSOGS CHEN KHRIR BZHUGS, LAN CIG MTSAN PHYED
MAL DU BZHUGS 'DOD MED PA LTA BUS

RVA SKOR DU 'CHAG PAR GZIMS KHANG BRDIBS, DE NAS BZUNG KHRI BA
SNGA MA 'GA' ZHIG GSHEGS PA'I GEGS ZHI,

RTA MGRIN LCAGS RAL GYI RNAL 'BYOR PA NUS LDAN DU GRAGS, DE NYID
KYI CHOS SKOR DANG, DUS 'KHOR BDAG

'JUG NGAG 'DON SOGS RTZOM PA 'GA' ZHIG SNANG, DUS RGYUN NAM STOD
LAM RIM DANG GSER PHRENG GNYIS SKYOR

ZHING NAM SMAD PHYAG SKOR GTZOR 'DON MDZAD PA SOGS THUGS DAM
NYIN MTSAN MED, TSUL KHRIMS SHIN TU DAG

DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN RGYA BOR 'KHRUNGS, DGON CHEN
DU SLOB GNYER DANG, KHRI KHUR GSUM MTHAR

PHYIN TE ZUR BZHUGS KYI SKABS LAGS, ` BYANG RTZE MKHAN SPRUL DGE
'DUN BSTAN 'DZIN, LCAGS LUG LA KHRI

'DON GNANG BA CHU SPREL LOR ZUR BZHUGS MDZAD, KHRI KA DANG NYE
BA MO KYOG BYA BAR DGON PA ZHIG KYANG BTAB,

` MTSAN SGROGS MKHAN SPRUL NGAG DBANG 'JAM DPAL BSTAN PA RAB
RGYAS, 'DI PA'I GONG MA MTSAN SGROGS MKHAN

CHEN BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS NI, DBUS KYI DGE BSHES RTZER SON, KUN
MKHYEN BAR MA CHOS GRVAR PHEBS PA'I THOG

MA'I DGE RGAN DU BSTEN, MTSAN SGROGS MKHAN PO DANG, RGYA NAG TU
PHEBS DUS CHA RKYEN GANG DGOS SKU ZHABS

NAS GNANG, SKU ZHABS MCHOG RGYA NAG TU PHEBS SKABS 'DI PA YE HOR
DU BZHUGS PA LA KUN MKHYEN GONG MA NAS

BRGYUD PA'I MI TRA'I DBANG YONGS RDZOGS ZHUS, GSAN MKHAN BLA
CHEN DU MA, HAR CHIN WANG RATNA SIDDHI YANG

PHEBS PAS DER BRTEN 'DI PA'I 'PHRIN LAS KYI SGO 'PHAR PHYE, DE
NYID KYI SPRUL SKU 'DI PA THAG GCOD DUS,

LCANG SKYA ROL BA'I RDO RJES SKU ZHABS RIN PO CHE LA, GONG MAR
DNGOS SU ZHU STABS MI 'GRIG PAS KHYED KYIS AAMBHAN

BRGYUD GSUNGS PA BZHIN GONG DU GRE TZE PHUL TE YAB SRAS GNYIS
KYIS THAG BCAD PA ME LUG LOR SKU GONG MA'I GRVA BA

RNAMS KYIS BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU GDAN DRANGS PA LA BKUR GZOS
MDZAD, DGE BSNYEN DANG RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS,

MTSAN 'JAM DBYANGS BSHES GNYEN GNANG, DGON CHEN DANG, YUL DBUS
SGO MANG GRVA TSANG DU THUGS GNYER

MDZAD; 'JOG RI NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS, SA SKYA NA
LENDRA PA GZIMS 'OG SPRUL SKU DANG BYAMS PA

NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LS SOGS LAS GRU GYI CHOS SKOR SOGS
SA DGE'I CHOS MANG DU ZHUS, RANG

DGON DU TSOGS CHEN KHRI DANG, GZIMS KHANG BSKRUN, PE CING DU
SNGA PHYIR BYON, THAM KA BLA MA MDZAD, DER

YANG SGO MANG LHA BTZUN MTHU STOBS NYI MA SOGS SA DGE RNYING
GSUM GYI DAM PA DU MA LAS CHOS BKA' CI RIGS

GSAN; GDAN SAR 'OD DPAG MED KYI STONG SKU RTEN BRTEN PA KHYAD
MTSAR BZHENGS, CHU SBRUL LAM SHING RTA LOR

PHO BRANG DU GSHEGS, GSUNGS RTZOM YANG 'GA' ZHIG SNANG, DE'I
SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS, ` KHRI

SPRUL BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN SENG GE ` SHING ZA BLO BZANG DAR
RGYAS RGYA MTSO, ` DGE 'DUN 'JIGS MED RNAM

RGYAL; RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SHING SPRUL LOR TSE MGON BLA MA'I
SKU TSAR 'KHRUNGS, BCO LNGA PA LA CHOS GRVAR

ZHUGS; KHU BO KHRI RIN PO CHE DANG, CHOS RJE BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO
SOGS LA CHOS GSAN, NYI SHU BA LA DBUS SU@322	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BYON; 'BRAS KLU 'BUM DU DBU PHAR LA SBYANGS, YONGS 'DZIN YE SHES
RGYAL MTSAN SOGS BLA MA MANG DU BSTEN,

BKA' 'GYUR GDAN DRANGS, RANG DGON DU DGE RGAN BSTEN NAS SGRA SA
RIS BCAS DANG, GSANG 'BROG BDE

CHEN SPRUL SKU GDAN DRANGS TE MTSAN SGROGS SPRUL BA'I SKU DANG
RNAM GNYIS KYIS 'JIGS BYED KYI LAS BZHI'I 'PHRUL

'KHOR DANG LCAGS MKHAR PHYAG KHRID BSLAB, SHAR BLA BRANG GI
PHYAG MDZOD GNANG, RGYUD PA'I KHRI DANG, CHU LUG

LOR TSOGS CHEN KHRIR BZHUGS, DPON SLOB GSER KHANG PA LA GTUGS,
THUGS DAM NYAMS BZHES LA 'GRUS,

NGA DGU BA CHU YOS LA GSHEGS, ` DGE 'DUN BSAM 'GRUB RGYA MTSO,
SHAR DGE 'DUN 'PHRIN LAS RAB RGYAS KYI

YONGS 'DZIN MDZAD PA MDO BA'I 'JAM DBYANGS KYI SKYE BAR NGOS
BZUNG, DGON CHEN DU THUGS GNYER MDZAD,

RGYUD PA DANG TSOGS CHEN KHRIR BZHUGS, GRVA TSANG LA RGYUN JA'I
THEBS BZHAG KHRI KHUR SPOS NAS KYANG T'A 'GYED LAN

DU MAR PHUL BA SOGS DGE 'DUN GYI BSNYEN BKUR GZAB, RNAM THAR GYI
YI GE YOD SNANG, ` BDE CHEN SPRUL SKU

'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO, ` RDZONG DKAR CHUNG BA 'JIGS MED LUNG RIGS
RGYA MTSO, CHU 'BRUG LOR BZHUGS,

CHOS RJE SPRUL PA'I SKUS ZHUS TE, RIN 'BYUNG GI RJES GNANG, PO
TI LNGA'I RTZA BA, 'BRAS CHOS SPYOD RAB GSAL

SOGS KYI LUNG, RGYUD GRVAR 'JIGS BYED SNGAGS BTUS DANG CHOS
RGYAL PHYI NANG GSANG GSUM GYI RJES GNANG

BSTZAL; KHRI SPRUL BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN SENG GE PA PHEBS, GZIMS
KHANG RVA SKOR DU NYIN LNGAR DAM BCA' TSUGS

TE GZIGS RTOG ZHUS PAR, GZHUNG GI RTZOD PA LEGS KYANG RNAM DPYOD
ZHAN GSUNG NYID NAS SLOB PA MDZAD,

GSER KHANG DPON SLOB CHED GNYER GYIS GDAN DRANGS, BLO SBYONG NYI
MA'I 'OD ZER GYI BSHAD KHRID DANG, BDE

GSANG 'JIGS GSUM GYI DBANG ZHUS, RJE DE NYID KYI BKA' LTAR RNAM
'GREL 'DZIN GRVA ZUR DU PHYE, GTZANG RTA

NAG PA'I YIG CHA'I STENG NAS GZHUNG RDZOGS PAR RTZOD PA'I SROL
BTZUGS, ` 'DAN SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG MKHAS

MCHOG BSE CHU MAR 'KHRUNGS, TZA YUS ZHAL DRO'I RI KHROD DU GDAN
SAR BKOD, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI CHOS GRVAR

ZHUGS; DGOS DBANG GIS RONG BOR BYON, GZIMS KHANG PHIBS TE GZHI
CHAGS, CHOS GRVAR SLOB GNYER DANG

GRVA TSANG GSUM GYI KHRI MDZAD, BDUN CU PA LA GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL
SKU CHU MAR NAS 'KHRUNGS PA DA LTA BZHUGS,

` MERGAN CHOS RJE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG DGE 'DUN DON YOD, 'DI'I
GONG MA CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG RGYA MTSO, RONG BO

SHA BU NAR DU 'KHRUNGS, DBUS SU PHEBS, MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS LA
SBYANGS, PHYIR PHEBS NAS AURGE GRVA TSANG

GI KHRI DANG, KUN MKHYEN BAR MA'I RIG GNAS SLOB DPON MDZAD, DA
LTA'I 'DI PA DGON CHEN DU CHOS GRVA 'GRIM

ZHING YOD, ` GA-YER GSHONG SPRUL SKU DGE 'DUN RGYAL MTSAN, ` BIS
PA SPRUL SKU DON YOD BSTAN PA'I RGYAL

MTSAN; ` NANG SO SKU SKYE DGE 'DUN LEGS BSHAD RGYA MTSO'I BAR
BZHUGS TE RVA STOD DANG BTZAN PO'I BSDUS GRVA

GTZANG BA RTA NAG PA'I RNAM 'GREL, SE RA RJE BTZUN PA YAB SRAS
KYI BLO RTAGS, DBU PHAR, ZUR BKOL BZHI,

DRUNG CHOS DNGOS GRUB PA'I MDZOD, BDE LEGS NYI MA'I 'DUL BA BCAS
KYI 'CHAD NYAN BSKYANGS, 'GRIG LAM

SKOR BYANG RTZE GRVA TSANG GZHIR BZHAG LA, PHYIS SU DPAL CHOS
MKHAN PO, RGYAL MKHAN PO, BYAMS CHEN MKHAN PO

@323	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RNAMS RIM BZHUGS KYIS SGO MANG RANG GI 'GRIG LAM 'GA' RES ZUR
BRGYAN PA'ANG SNANG, MKHAN CHEN BSDUS GRVA

GSAR RTZOM YANG TSUGS, CHOS THOG DPYID CHOS ZLA BA GCIG SA ZLA'I
TSES GCIG NAS DBYAR CHOS ZLA BA GCIG LA

'DZIN GRVA GTUG RGYU DANG TSOGS GLENG, DBYAR GNAS CHOS THOG ZLA
BA GCIG DANG NYIN BCO LNGA, STON CHOS NYIN

BCU; DGUN CHOS ZLA GCIG LNGA MCHOD NYIN LNGAR GRVA TSANG GSUM
MNYAM TSOGS KYIS RAS BRIS DANG TSOM BU LA BRTEN

PA'I BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM KUN RIG BCAS KYI BDAG 'JUG BLA MCHOD
DANG CHOS SPYOD GANG MANG, 'DI

DANG SMON LAM LA PHYI DRO SGER 'TSOGS KYIS SKU RIM DANG CHOS
GRVA TSUGS, CHOS MTSAMS RNAMS SU YANG GRVA TSANG RGYUN

JA'I STENG RTZOD GRVA CHAG MED, YAR NGO NAM YIN GYI PHYI DRO
SKYOR SBYANGS DANG CHOS GRVA RES MOS, CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM

NYIN BCO LNGAR DGON SDE NYI SHU LHAG GI DGE 'DUN NYIS STONG TZAM
'TSOGS SHING, GOS SKU, BYAMS PA GLING SKOR,

'DI DANG LNGA MCHOD GNYIS KAR 'CHAM GTOR RGYAG BCAS CHOS SPYOD
KYI BYA BA RGYA CHE, DUS PHYIS TSOGS CHEN DU MCHOD

PA BYE BA RE DANG THOS BSAM GLING DU RJE'I STONG MCHOD KYANG
TSUGS SNANG, ` RGYUD PAR SGRUB MCHOD SOGS PHYAG LEN

SKOR SMAD RGYUD LTAR NGOS GTZANG LA, DGUN DPYID KYI CHOS THOG
NYIN NYER LNGA RE, DBYAR CHOS DANG PO NYIN BCO LNGA

LA GLANG GYAR CHOS BAR 'DEGS, DBYAR GNAS CHOS THOG ZLA BA GCIG
DANG NYIN BCO LNGA, STON CHOS NYIN

BCU; ` DUS 'KHOR CHOS THOG GRANGS RGYUD PA DANG MTSUNGS SHING,
NAG NYAR DUS 'KHOR SGRUB MCHOD NYIN

BRGYAD SOGS MDO SNGAGS KYI 'CHAD NYAN, GRVA 'TSOGS, SLOB GNYER
GANG THAD NAS YAR RGYAS SU YOD,

` RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GSANG SNGAGS BANG MDZOD NI, SHAR SPRUL
BA'I SKU NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO PA LA

PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES DANG, RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MAS DNGOS
DANG RMI LAM DU LAN DU MAR LUNG BSTAN PA BZHIN

NYID KYI NGA BDUN PA RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SHING STAG LOR
BTZUGS, 'JA' MO NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA LA ZHVA LU

PA LEGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYI ZHUN THIG LA PHEBS PA'I 'JIGS BYED,
BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM GYI RTZA RGYUD KYI

GLEGS BAM BCAS GNANG NAS SLOB DPON DU BSKOS, DE NAS RIM PAR MDO
PA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS, MDO BA

BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS, RVA NGAN BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS, 'DI PAS RGYUD
KHANG BZHENGS, MKHAN CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG LA

BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM GYI DBANG ZHUS, GDAN RABS SU, GDAN RABS
LNGA PA DUS 'KHOR SKABS SU 'BRI

BAR 'GYUR ZHES PA TZAM LAS MTSAN MI GSAL, SMAN TZONG BDE CHEN
DPON SLOB RGYUD KHRIR BZHUGS PA RNAM THAR TU

GSAL YANG 'DIR MI 'BYUNG, 'ON KYANG LO TSIGS SOGS LA DPYAD RGYU
SNANG, AA RIG CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG

MKHAS BTZUN YOS LOR RGYUD KHRIR BZHUGS, LCAGS MKHAR GYI SLOB
DPON MDZAD PAR LAS 'GRUB PA'I RTAGS

MTSAN BYUNG, MDO BA BLO BZANG 'OD ZER, MDO BA BLO BZANG RGYAL
MTSAN, STAG GE SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG DGE

'DUN BSTAN 'DZIN, 'DI PAS DBUS KYI RGYUD GRVA YUN RING 'GRIM PA
GLANG GYA'I SNGAGS RAMS PA BLO BZANG BKRA

SHIS LA PHYAG LEN SKOR ZHIB PAR DRIS, LAM RIM, BSKYED RIM, tIKKA
CHE CHUNG STE 'DZIN GRVA BZHIR PHYE,

DPYID CHOS DBYAR GNAS GNYIS LA 'DZIN GRVA GONG MAR BDE LAM DANG,
DE 'OG LA DVAGS PO'I BSKYED RIM GYI

@324	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BRTZI BZHAG GSHAM MA GNYIS KAR 'GREL BA'I BSHAD LUNG, STON CHOS
LA 'JIGS BYED BSKYED RDZOGS DANG,

BDE MCHOG CHOS THOG LA DE'I BSKYED RDZOGS KYI BSHAD LUNG, 'JIG
RTEN DBANG PHYUG GI RIL SGRUB BCAS TSUGS,

GSANG 'DUS, BDE MCHOG LHA LNGA DANG LUS DKYIL GYI DBANG SOGS
SPYI SGOS KYI 'CHAD NYAN DMAR, RDOR LEGS

GSOL KHA'I CHED RVA GSOD PA DANG, GTOR SGRUB LA SKAM BSHAS NAS
SHA 'GYED GTONG BA'I SROL NGAN BCAD, KHRI

KHUR 'JOG SKABS YO BYAD LHAG MA GANG YOD DBYAR GNAS KYI THEBS SU
BZHAG GZIMS KHANG DU PHEBS DUS PHYAG

DPE RNAMS DANG, CHOS GOS SNAM SBYAR MA GTOGS BSNAM RGYU MED PA
THAMS CAD KYIS MTHONG BAS LHAG PAR DAD,

DE'I SPRUL SKU DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS, DE'I SPRUL SKU 'JAM
DBYANGS BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO, SDE KHRI RIN

PO CHE 'JAM DBYANGS THUB BSTAN NYI MA LA RAB BYUNG ZHUS, DE'I
SPRUL SKU DA LTA BZHUGS, KHRI RGAN SPRUL SKU DGE

'DUN MKHYEN RAB, ` YI NGOGS CHOS RJE DGE 'DUN MKHAS GRUB KYI
GONG MA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO PA NI, MKHAN

CHEN GONG MA BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO'I SKU MCHED YIN, BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL GYI SGOM GRVAR ZHUGS, GSUNG SKAD BZANG

BAS DBU MDZAD BYAS, 'JIGS BYED DANG THUGS RJE CHEN PO GSANG
SGRUB KYI BSNYEN PA MDZAD PAS BYIN RLABS KYI

RTAGS MTSAN BRNYES, BEG TZES 'PHRIN LAS BSGRUB, SHAR SPRUL BA'I
SKU'I YONGS 'DZIN MDZAD, RE GSUM PA

LA GSHEGS, GDUNG RUS LA YI GE DANG LHA SKU MANG DU BYON, DE'I
SPRUL SKU SANGS RGYAS RGYA MTSO MKHAN CHEN DGE

RGYAM PA'I GCEN SNGAGS PA DPAL 'BUM RGYAL GYI SRAS SU SHING BYA
LOR 'KHRUNGS, DGON CHEN DU PHAR TSAD,

GA-YER GSHONG GONG MA'I BKAS BIS MDO'I GRVA TSANG DU GZHUNG LA
SBYANGS, 'GREL BA DONG SAL, LAM RIM CHUNG

NGU GNYIS THUGS 'DZIN MDZAD, DBUS SU PHEBS LAM NAS BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL DU BYON, MKHYEN GTER NGAG

DBANG BKRA SHIS PA DANG MJAL, 'BO RA, AA MCHOG MGO LOG SOGS
BRGYUD DE DBUS SU PHEBS, MKHAN

CHEN DPAL 'KHOR CHOS SDER BZHUGS PA LA MJAL TE DAM BCA' BZHAG
SGO MANG CHOS GRVAR DPON SLOB BLO BZANG

DAM CHOS PA'I DRUNG NAS BRTZI BZHAG GSAN, MOG KY'A MKHAN CHEN
DGE RGAN DU BSTEN, MERGAN CHOS RJE DANG

'DZIN GRVA GCIG SLOB GNYER SKABS LCAGS PHAG LOR GSHEGS, DE'I
SPRUL SKU 'DI PA MKHAN CHEN GYI SKU TSAR CHU

KHYI LOR 'KHRUNGS, RJE DE NYID LAS BCU GSUM PA LA RAB TU BYUNG,
DGON CHEN DU MDO SNGAGS LA SBYANGS, RIG

GNAS THAMS CAD LA MKHAS, NYER GCIG PA CHU SPREL LA SMON LAM RAB
'BYAMS PA MDZAD, KUN MKHYEN BAR

MAS MGO 'DREN MDZAD DE LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE NAS CHOS RJE'I CHO
LO GNANG, MKHAN CHEN GSHEGS PAR DNGUL SRANG

STONG DANG NYIS BRGYAS MCHOD RTEN BZHENGS, LCAGS BYI LOR RGYUD
KHRIR BZHUGS, BDE MCHOG YI DAM MDZAD,

GSUNG RTZOM YANG 'GA' ZHIG SNANG, BDUN CU PA LCAGS BYA LOR
GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU DGE 'DUN YON TAN RGYA

MTSO CHOS SRID KYI MKHYEN RGYA CHE ZHING RGYUD PA'I KHRI MDZAD,
DE'I SPRUL SKU YI NGOGS NAS 'KHRUNGS PA DKON MCHOG RGYAL

MTSAN DA LTA BZHUGS, ` MKHAR GONG SKU SKYE DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA RAB
RGYAS CHU DMAR DU 'KHRUNGS, DGON CHEN

DU SLOB GNYER BYAS, 'JIGS BYED BSNYEN SGRUB SKABS PHRENG BA'I
MDUD 'DZIN LA AA YIG GSAL BA LAS KHRAG

@325	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

'DZAG PA SOGS NUS MTHU'I GRAGS PA CHE, DRANG SRONG BRAN LTAR
'KHOL BAS RTZED MO'I RNAM PAS ZHABS PHYI TSOR

PHEBS NA LUS GCUS 'GRO BA ZHAL PHU BTAB PAS 'PHRAL DU DVANGS,
JUN WANG NGAG DBANG DAR RGYAS SOGS MTSO

SNGON DPON KHAG 'GA' DANG MCHOD YON DU 'BREL, ZI LING Y'A MIN DU
'DRE NGAN ZHUGS PA LA RIM GRO MDZAD PAS

ZHI; AAMBHAN DGA' NAS RONG 'BROG GI SDE DU MA DANG, BA SO'I THAM
KA SOGS KYIS GZENGS BSTOD BGYIS,

DUS 'KHOR GSAR TSUGS KYI SLOB DPON GNANG, DBUS SU RGYAL BA YAB
SRAS LA 'BUL NOD DANG, GTONG

THEBS BSKUR, GZHUNG NAS AE RTI NI MERGAN HU THOG THU'I CHO LO
GNANG, 'DI PA'I GONG MA SNGAGS 'CHANG SANGS

RGYAS RGYA MTSO BAS SA DGE RNYING GSUM GYI BLA MA MANG PO LAS
CHOS GSAN CING RGYUN SPEL, RJE SKAL LDAN PA'I DNGOS

SLOB; RTA MGRIN GYI RNAL 'BYOR BA NUS LDAN, YI DAM GYI BSNYEN
YIG SOGS CHOS TSAN DU MA, GU RU PAD MA LA

BSTEN PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO'I SGO 'BYED
SOGS RNYING PHYOGS KYI SGRUB 'PHRIN MANG DU SNANG,

` DRUNG YIG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO DME SHUL DKAR PO GSHONG DU
'KHRUNGS, CHUNG DUS NAS YI GE 'BRI KLOG DKA' TSEGS

MED PAR MKHYEN, BCU GCIG PA LA BDE CHEN SGOM PA BLO GSAL RDZONG
DMAR DU BZHUGS PA'I DRUNG DU BYON,

'JIGS BYED KYI DBANG GSAN, BCU GSUM PA LA RAB TU BYUNG, DGON
CHEN DU THUGS GNYER MTHAR PHYIN,

KUN MKHYEN BAR MA SOGS BLA MA BRGYA LHAG BSTEN NAS CHOS RGYUN
YOD TSAD LTA BU GSAN, SPYAN SNGA PA BLO GROS RGYAL

MTSAN GYI GSUNG MANG PO'I LUNG YANG BZHUGS, CHOS 'BREL YOD TSAD
LA SANGS RGYAS DNGOS KYI 'DU SHES MNGA'

BA'I GSUNG RGYUN 'KHRUL MED SNANG STE DAM PA BSTEN NAS RNAM GROL
BSGRUB PAR 'DOD PA RNAMS KYIS BSAM PAR BYA

BA'I GNAS SO, ,KHYAD PAR MKHAN CHEN KHONG GI DRUNG YIG MDZAD DE
PHYAG DPE POT BRGYA LHAG BRI BSHUS DANG

MCHOD DPON SOGS MNYES PA KHO NA BSGRUBS, LAM RIM DMIGS KHRID
DANG BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM GYI RIM

GNYIS KYI NYAMS BZHES SKU TSE DANG BSNYOMS, TSUL KHRIMS DAG CING
'DOD CHUNG CHOG SHES KYIS KUN SPANGS KYI

BRTUL ZHUGS LHUR BZHES, SHAR BLA BRANG RANG NAS BLA CHAS SOGS
MTHUN RKYEN GNANG STE RGYUD KHRIR BSKOS, BKRA

SHIS 'KHYIL DU RDO RJE 'CHANG DHA DZA'I ZHAL SNGA NAS RNAM GNYIS
KYIS CHOS BKA' 'GA' ZHIG GSAN RES MDZAD,

'CHAD SPEL RGYA CHE BAS SHAR SPRUL BA'I SKU DGE 'DUN 'PHRIN LAS
RAB RGYAS, MKHAN CHEN SPRUL SKU DON YOD RGYA MTSO,

RGYAL MKHAN SPRUL SKU BSTAN PA'I NYI MA, BIS PA NGAG DBANG MI
PHAM ZLA BA, AA KHYUNG NGAG DBANG MKHYEN RAB

SOGS SLOB MA MANG DU THON, BRAG DKAR SNGAGS RAMS PA'I RNAM THAR,
MGON PO'I GTOR SGRUB SOGS GSUNG

RTZOM YANG KHA SHAS SNANG, DGUNG LO MTHON PO LA GSHEGS, DE LA
SPRUL SKU SNGA PHYI GSUM BYON PA'I RJES MA DA LTA

DGON CHEN DU THUGS GNYER GYI SKABS LAGS, BRAG DKAR SPRUL SKU BLO
BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, NANG SO

SKU SKYES DGE 'DUN MKHAS MCHOG BIS PA NGAG DBANG MI PHAM ZLA BA,
SLAR YANG BRAG DKAR SPRUL PA'I SKU,

GA-YON RU'I RDZI DKAR BA DGE 'DUN BLO BZANG, DPON RIGS DGE 'DUN
'JIGS MED RNAM RGYAL, BDE CHEN

SPRUL SKU 'JIGS MED GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO, RDZONG DKAR CHUNG BA
'JIGS MED LUNG RIGS, 'DAN SPRUL SKU BLO

@326	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BZANG MKHAS MCHOG GA-YER GSHONG SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN
RGYAL MTSAN, MERGAN CHOS RJE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG

DBANG DGE 'DUN DON YOD, YI NGOGS CHOS RJE'I SPRUL SKU DGE 'DUN
DON YOD RGYA MTSO, DGE 'DUN MKHAS

GRUB; DGE 'DUN BSTAN 'DZIN, RGAN GYA'I HOR SPRUL SKU, CHU KY'A
SKU SKYES BLO BZANG THOGS MED RGYA MTSO,

'DI PA'I GONG MA RIG 'DZIN DPAL LDAN BKRA SHIS DANG PO 'BRAS
SPUNGS DGE BSHES, SMIN GROL GLING DU PHYIN,

RNYING CHOS KYI KHUNG PHYUNG STE MNYAN PAS 'BRAS SPUNGS 'GRIG LA
GCUR TE SPYOD LAM KHANG PA BRGYUD 'BROS DGOS BYUNG,

MDO SMAD DU GTER CHOS KYI SGRUB 'PHRIN SPEL DRAG BAN MIN BON MIN
GYI GTER BRDOL BAS MKHAN CHEN DANG MTHUN

'GRAS SHOR, KHO RANG GIS GTOR MA KHUR BA'I RTZVA GZUGS MANG BO
DGU CHU LA BTANG BA RONG BOR MKHAN CHEN BLA

BRANG DU BYUNG, KHONG GIS KHA PHAR BSKOR LA CHUR SKYOL GSUNG BA
BZHIN BYAS PAR DGU CHU'I GZHUNG GYEN 'DED KYIS

PHYIR SONG, SBYIN BDAG CIG TU RNAM GNYIS GDAN 'DZOMS BYUNG
SKABS, CHU KY'AS RTZVA GZUGS MANG PO BCINGS

NAS BZHAG YOD PAR MKHAN CHEN GYIS PHYAG NAS GTOR TE SNA BO KHYOD
LA NUS PA YOD NA 'DI TSO 'GROR CHUGS AANG

GSUNGS; KHO RANG GIS SNGAGS KYIS GCUN RUNG GCIG TZAM YANG 'PHUD
MA THUB, SNAGS PA MANG DU BSAGS TE

MKHAN CHEN GSHEGS KYI BAR MTHU BYED RGYU BYAS SGRUB PA BTZUGS,
RVA NGAN DPON SLOB BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS

MGON PO'I GTOR CHEN BRDABS PAS, NYIN GCIG CHU KY'AS DA NGED TSO
GROL RAB 'DUG NGED KYI RMI LAM DU,

MI ZHIG GIS KHRAG GZHONG BA GANG KHYER 'ONG NAS THAMS CAD LA
BLUD PA SNGAGS PHRUG MKHAN CHEN LA MOS PA GCIG LA

MDZUB MO BTZUGS KHYED MA GTOGS THAMS CAD KYIS 'THUNG SONG ZHES
BSHAD PA BZHIN SNGAGS PA DE MA GTOGS

THAMS CAD SHI SKYE BRGYUD DENG SANG YANG YOD, KHA SO SPRUL SKU
RNAMS BZHUGS TE RGYUD KYI 'CHAD NYAN BSKYANGS,

` DUS 'KHOR GRVA TSANG AE WAM CHOS LDING NGAM GSANG SNGAGS DAR
RGYAS GLING NI, MKHAN CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG DANG,

'GA' DVAGS SGOM CHEN GYI LUNG BSTAN BZHIN SHAR SKU PHRENG GSUM
PA DGE 'DUN 'PHRIN LAS RAB RGYAS KYIS RAB

BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I CHU SBRUL LOR BTZUGS, MKHAR GONG SKU SKYE
DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS SLOB DPON DU

BSKOS; DE NYID KYIS RGYU RKYEN SBYAR TE GRVA KHANG BZHENGS,
DNGOS SPYAD GANG DGOS, BKA' 'GYUR DNGUL BRIS

SOGS SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG DU BSGRIGS, DUS 'KHOR SGRUB MCHOD
SA GAR BCAS, MTSAN BRJOD KYI

GDANGS; KUN RIG SGRUB MCHOD SOGS BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DANG
SGO BSTUN NAS NGOS GTZANG TSUGS, NANG

SO SKU SKYE DGE 'DUN MKHAS MCHOG BIS PA NGAG DBANG MI PHAM ZLA
BA, SMAN TZONG BDE CHEN DPON SLOB BLO BZANG

BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN, BRAG DKAR SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN
PA'I RGYAL MTSA, MKHAN CHEN DRUNG RIN PO

CHE'I SKU MCHED BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO, 'DI PAS DRUNG YIG ZHAL SNGA
NAS LAS BRGYUD PA'I BKA' CHOS MANG DU SPEL,

DA LTA SKYE RGYUD BZHUGS, BDE CHEN SPRUL SKU 'JIGS MED GRAGS PA
RGYA MTSO, DGE 'DUN BSAM 'GRUB RGYA MTSO,

DGE 'DUN BLO BZANG, BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO, DGE 'DUN
BLO BZANG, BRAG DKAR SPRUL SKU DON

YOD RGYA MTSO, DGE 'DUN MKHAS GRUB, BDE CHEN CHUNG BA SKAL BZANG
BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, CHU KY'A SKU SKYE BLO

@327	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BZANG THOGS MED RGYA MTSO, BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN, DRUG YIG SPRUL
SKU, DPON RIGS BLO GSAL RGYA MTSO'I

BAR BYON, CHOS SDE CHAGS TSUL DANG GDAN RABS RNAMS RDZONG DKAR
CHUNG BA 'JIGS MED LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSOS

BSGRIGS PA'I DKAR CHAG GDAN RABS NGO MTSAR MKHAS PA'I 'JUG NGOGS
LAS BTUS SHING, GZHAN LAS KYANG

CUNG ZAD BRIS, SKYI TSANG DU 'KHRUNGS PA AA LAGS DON GRUB, DGON
CHEN GYI DGE BSHES, DBUS DANG RGYA NAG

TU PHEBS, LCANG SKYA ROL BA'I RDO RJE'I MCHOD DPON BYAS, AONG
NYOD T'A BE LI'I PHYOGS SU DGON PA BTAB,

SKU PHRENG GSUM BYON PA DA LTA SOG YUL DU 'GRO DON BSKYANGS,
'DIR YANG GZHIS KA YOD, GZHAN MKHAR GONG

TSE BRTAN DON GRUB, CHU MA'I 'DUL BA 'DZIN PA, THUGS RJE CHEN
POS RJES SU BZUNG BA SMAN SHUL MKHAN PO,

SGROL MA'I ZHAL GZIGS PA CHU SKYA DGE BSHES SOGS SGRUB PA'I
RGYAL MTSAN 'DZIN PA DU MA DANG MDO DBUS KYI GRVAS

RNAMS SU MING BTAGS CHE KHAG THON PA'I DGE BSHES GANG MANG,BLA
SPRUL CHE CHUNG BGRANG BA LAS 'DAS PA BZHUGS

KYANG ZHIB PAR MA NGES SHING 'GA' ZHIG SKABS GZHAN DU BRI BAR
BYA'O, ` ,RTEN GYI GTZO BO CHOS PA RIN PO CHES

BZHENGS PA'I 'JAM DBYANGS KUN GZIGS KYI SKU BRNYAN RTEN DANG
BRTEN PAR BCAS PA SKYID SHOD SDE BA CHOS RJE

DANG; KO'U PA CHOS RGYA MTSOS RAB GNAS MDZAD PA'I BYIN CAN,
GZHAN YANG CHOS RJE BSAM RIN PAS SA 'DUL

MDZAD PA'I GNAS SU BZHENGS PA SA 'DZIN LHA KHANG DU 'JIGS BYED
RANG BYON, RONG BO'I BLA MA DKAR DKAR

DANG; DMAR DMAR GYI SKU GDUNG, MKHAN CHEN GYI NANG SO NGAG DBANG
BLO BZANG LA GROS BSTUN GYIS SPYI BA'I

'DU KHANG RNYING BA'I RAB GSAL BSTOD DE BZHENGS PA'I BYAMS SKU
SHIN TU CHE BA, CHOS PA RIN PO CHE'I DMAR GDUNG

DBU SKU SKYES PA, DE'I DGONGS RDZOGS SU RJE SKAL LDAN PAS
BZHENGS PA'I RJE'I SKU SOGS BLA MA SNGA PHYI'I GDUNG

RTEN; MA nI PA SHES RAB BKRA SHIS KYIS BZHENGS PA'I THUB PA GNAS
BRTAN BCU DRUG BCAS, RJE RIN PO CHE,

CHOS PA YAB SRAS KYI 'DRA SKU SOGS SKU BRNYAN MANG PO, ` SHAR
BLA BRANG NOR BU GRU 'DZIN DU THUB PA ME THUB MA, SKU

'BUM RTEN GRAS 'JAM DBYANGS DMAR SER ME SKYON SEL BA'I LO RGYUS
CAN, SNYE THANG SGORL MA GSUNG 'BYON,

PAn CHEN BYAMS PA GLING BA'I PHYAG BZO'I RJE SKU, RJE'I SNAM
SBYAR, RGYAL TSAB MKHAS GRUB RNAM GNYIS KYI DBU ZHVA,

'DUL 'DZIN GYI SKU CHOS DOL BU DANG BCAS PA, RGYAL BA SKU
PHRENG, PAn CHEN NA RIM, RJE SKAL LDAN RIM BYON

GYI NA BZA' NYER SPYAD SOGS NANG RTEN MANG DU BZHUGS PA SMON LAM
LA MJAL KHA GTONG, ` YI NGOGS MKHAN CHEN

GONG MAS BZHENGS PA'I BYAMS KHANG RTEN BRTEN PA, BLA BRANG DU
RJE DE NYID KYI SKU GDUNG RIL BO NANG BZHUGS KYI

DNGUL GDUNG, MTSAN SGROGS NGAG DBANG 'JAM DPAL BSTAN PA RAB
RGYAS KYIS BZHENGS PA'I 'OD DPAG MED

KYI STONG SKU'I LHA KHANG DANG BLA BRANG, SMAN TSONG BDE CHEN
BLA BRANG, BSE'I BLA BRANG SOGS SGAR KHAG DU MA DANG,

TSOGS CHEN 'DU KHANG, GRVA KHANG GSUM SOGS SU BKA' BSTAN TSAR
MANG POS GTZOS SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MTHA'

YAS PA BZHUGS SHING, SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG 'BUM, RTA NAG
PA BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN GYI RNAM 'GREL,

MKHAN CHEN BSDUS GRVA DANG RNAM THAR SOGS KYI PAR KYANG SNANG, `
DGU CHU BYANG RGYUD STOD NGOS SU RGYUD ZUR AA RIG

@328	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG MKHAS BTZUN GYIS BTAB PA RDZONG SER BSHAD
SGRUB GLING DA LTA STONGS, 'DI DANG NYE BAR SHEL

TE'U GRUB GNAS, ` RDZONG DKAR BKA' GDAMS PHO BRANG BKRA SHIS
GLING 'DEBS PA BO RTIS TSANG MA nI PA SHES

RAB BKRA SHIS NI, REB GONG STOD DU, GA-YUNG STON RI KHROD PA
DANG, GA-YUNG STON KHRO RGYAL GYI MI RGYUD PHYAG RDOR

RGYAL GYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I ME PHAG LA 'KHRUNGS,
KUN MKHYEN GONG MA LAS LO GCIG GIS BGES,

BSTAN RTZIS RE'U MIG TU STON PA 'KHRUNGS NAS LO NYIS STONG LNGA
BRGYA RE GCIG SONG GSUNGS, BCU GSUM PA SA

PHAG LA KHU BO GSHIN RJE RNAL 'BYOR BA SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN LAS
RAB TU BYUNG, BCU DRUG PA CHU STAG LA DGON CHEN

DU CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, RJE SKAL LDAN PA LAS BSDUS GRVA BRTZIS,
SNGA PHYIR CHOS BKA' MANG DU GSAN, NYI SHU BA ME

RTA LA DBUS SU PHEBS, SGO MANG CHOS GRVAR KHRI DGE 'DUN PHUN
TSOGS DANG 'DZIN GRVA GCIG CING 'BREL SHIN TU

ZAB; 'TSO CHAS BKREN PAS DKA' SPYAD KYIS DBU PHAR 'DUL MDZOD KYI
THAL PHRENG ZUR BKOL BCAS LA SBYANGS,

DPON SLOB BLO GROS RGYA MTSO LAS SPYI CHOS DANG, SGER CHOS GSANG
'JIGS GNYIS KUN RIG SOGS KYI DBANG,

LAM KHRID, LUNG RJES GNANG MANG PO DANG, GZHAN SLOB DPON DON
GRUB RGYA MTSO, DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS

GRAGS PA, RAB 'BYAMS PA CHOS 'PHEL RGYA MTSO SOGS LAS BKA' CHOS
MANG DU GSAN, LNGA BA CHEN PO LAS

BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, NYER LNGA PA LCAGS PHAG LA LHA RAMS PA DANG,
NYER BDUN PA CHU GLANG LA RANG YUL DU PHEBS,

RJE SKAL LDAN PA LA DBU PHAR GYI DKA' GNAD DU MAR DOGS GCOD ZHUS
PAS SHIN TU DGYES, RJE DE NYID ZHING LA

GSHEGS KHAR MA 'ONGS GNAS TSUL DU MA GSUNGS, GRUB CHEN DHARMA
PA, STONG 'KHOR MDO RGYUD RGYA MTSO, BRAG

DKAR SNGAGS RMAS PA, GA-YER GSHONG 'JAM DBYANGS BLO GROS, KHA
GYA'I DBU MDZAD TSUL KHRIMS BKRA SHIS,

BA SO RJE DRUNG BCAS LA CHOS ZHUS, LA MO GRAGS RGAN PA LA RDOR
PHRENG DANG, BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN LAS BLO BZANG

BKA' 'BUM SOGS GSAN, SKAL LDAN SGRUB GNAS BDE YANGS PHU DANG, SE
GU BYA KHUNG GI ZHOL, GSHAG RAL

GONG 'OG STAG TSANG LHA MO RNAMS SU BZHUGS, BRAG SENG GE'I RTZER
SKU MTSAMS DUS MTSAN MA KHYAD PAR CAN

BYUNG; LTA KHRID KYI YIG CHA BRTZAMS, YAR NANG PHYOGS KYI NGUR
SMRIG GI TSAL BU LUS LA GYON TSAD BSAGS NAS MA

nI RIL SGRUB ZLA BA GNYIS GSUM SBREL NAS LAN MANG BSGRUB, PHYOGS
PHYOGS SU YIG DRUG GI 'PHRIN LAS SPEL,

LCAGS SPREL ZLA BA BCU PA'I TSES GCIG LA DU BA MJUG RING SHAR BA
RGYAL BA YUN RING MI BZHUGS PA'I LTAS SU LUNG

BSTAN; SO BDUN PA CHU PHAG LA SGRUB SDE 'DI NYID BTAB, THUB
DBANG GNAS BCU'I GTZOS BLA SKU 'GA',

BYAMS SKU KHRU BCU GNYIS PA DANG, GSUNG RTEN DNGUL 'BUM BZHENGS,
LI THANG NAS BKA' 'GYUR GDAN

DRANGS; ME STAG LO NAS, MTHONG BA DON LDAN SLAR YANG BSTAN PA'I
DPAL, ,'GRO BA'I DON LA ZLA MED YE SHES

SKU; ;SNYING NAS DAD PAS CHOS 'KHOR PAD MOR BSGOMS, ,THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA'I ZHABS LA GSOL BA

'DEBS; ;ZHES PA TSOGS 'DON DU BTZUGS, PHYIS SU TSIG RKANG GNYIS
PA, 'GRO DON ZLA MED RIN CHEN RGYA MTSO'I

ZHABS ZHES PAR BSGYUR, RE GCIG PA ME PHAG NAS DGON CHEN GYI
KHRIR LO BDUN BZHUGS, RONG BO SPRUL PA'I

@329	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SKUS GTZOS DGE 'DUN SUM STONG LHAG LA RDOR PHRENG DBANG GNANG,
SA GLANG LOR KUN MKHYEN GONG MA DBUS NAS

PHEBS PA JU NANG AURGE'I STENG DU MJAL, YUL LUGS KYIS SHA STON
LA LUG MANG PO GSOD PA BCAD NA SNYAM DU

DGONGS PA'I MNAL LAM DU, MI DKAR PO ZHIG GIS LUG MANG PO DED NAS
'GRO GI 'DUG PA CI YIN DRIS PAS,

'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I GSOL TSIGS KYI LUG BDE BA CAN DU SKYEL
RGYU YIN ZER BA BYUNG BAS BTANG SNYOMS

MDZAD; LA MO CHOS SKYONG GIS CHU SBRUL LOR GNANG BA'I LUNG BSTAN
CHEN MOR, BYANG SHAR LA SH'AKYA'I RAB GNAS

PA'I; ;YA MTSAN GYI PHO BRANG BDE BA CHE, ,ZHES SOGS DRANGS NAS
SGO MANG DGON 'DI SHIN TU RGYAS SHING

BSTAN 'GRO'I SMAN YON MCHOG GCIG 'ONG 'DRA ZHES YANG YANG
GSUNGS, RE BRGYAD PA SHING RTA LOR BKRA SHIS

'KHYIL DU PHEBS, KUN MKHYEN MCHOG LA MI TRA'I DBANG YONGS SU
RDZOGS PA GSAN, BDUN CU PA ME SPREL ZLA BA

DANG PO'I NYER GSUM LA 'DAS, GDUNG RUS LA RING BSREL YIG 'BRU
SOGS DANG, THUGS MA NYAMS PAR BYON

PA NANG BZHUGS KYI GDUNG RTEN 'DIR BZHUGS, KUN MKHYEN BLA MAR
SPRUL SKU MYUR 'BYON ZHUS, 'DI DAG

BYAMS CHEN DKAR CHAG DANG, RNAM THAR SHAR SPRUL PA'I SKU 'PHRIN
LAS RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA LAS BTUS, DE'I

SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI CHOS GRVAR
ZHUGS, DBAL MANG BLO BZANG DON GRUB PA DGE RGAN

DU BSTEN, KHONG THUGS MA KHOM TSE SKYOR DPON SKE LA LA DPE KHRID
ZHUS, CHOS SRID KYI YON TAN DPAG PAR

DKA' ZHING, BKA' GDAMS RNAM THAR GTZANG MA LAS MI 'DA' BA ZHIG
YIN 'DUG GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I

DBYANGS LA, KHYED LUNG GI YON TAN GYIS BRGYAD SNANG ZER BA THOS,
RTOGS PA'I YON TAN DE'I 'BRAS BU YIN,

GZHAN DON BYAS NA PHAR PHYIN DRUG DANG BSDU BA BZHI'I SGO SGO
NAS BYED DGOS TSUL GYI SNYAN SGRON 'GANG CAN DANG, NGA

RANG GI DON CHEN PO ZHIG BCOL RGYU YOD PA THUGS LA ZUNGS ZHES AA
RIG DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SHES RAB BRGYUD NAS

ZHUR BCUG PA SKU GSHEGS DUS PHEBS RGYU DANG YANG SPRUL GYI DON
DU DGONGS SNANG, DE'I SPRUL SKU DKON MCHOG BLO

BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN ME SBRUL LO PA, 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS NAS RAB
BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, DE'I RJES MA

MGAR RTZE NAS 'KHRUNGS PA DGON CHEN DU THUGS GNYER GYI SKABS
LAGS, ` GDAN SA PA SKU DBON NGAG DBANG

'PHRIN LAS KYI GONG MA, SANGS RGYAS 'OD SRUNG GI BSTAN PA LA
LDAN GROL GNYIS KYI BDAG NYID DGE SLONG RIN CHEN

SNYING PO'I RNAM 'PHRUL DU GRAGS PA KHA GYA'I DBU MDZAD TSUL
KHRIMS BKRA SHIS PA YIN LA, 'DI PA KHA GYA'I SAR

'KHRUNGS; RONG BO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI DBU MDZAD BYAS, LCANG
SKYA'I RANG RNAM LAS, KHA GYA'I DBU MDZAD LA

SOGS GZHI BYES KYI, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR RJE DE NYID, CHOS PA
RIN PO CHE YAB SRAS LAS ZAB CHOS MANG DU

GSAN; RJE SHES RAB BKRA SHIS DANG RNAM GNYIS RDZONG DMAR DU RJE
DRUNG DKON MCHOG NYI MA'I DRUNG DU BYON, LNGA BA

CHEN PO'I BKA' LTAR PAn CHEN SDOM RGYUN BZHES, MKHAS GRUB DU MAS
BLA MAR BKUR, DE NYID KYI SPRUL SKU 'DI

PA GA-YU 'BRONG KHYUNG GSUM GYI ZHOL AA LA PHUG TU GA-YUNG RIGS
LAS RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SHING PHAG LOR

'KHRUNGS; KHU BO MA nI PA SHES RAB BKRA SHIS KYIS KHA GYA'I DBU
MDZAD KYI SKYE BAR NGOS BZUNG, DGON CHEN DANG

@330	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

'BRAS SGO MANG GRVA TSANG DU THUGS GNYER RDZOGS PAR MDZAD, MDO
SMAD DU BYON NAS BYA BTANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO

LAS BKA' 'GYUR LUNG DANG, GA-YER GSHONG 'JAM DBYANGS BLO GROS
LAS CHOS BKA' CI RIGS GSAN, BLA MA

MA nI BA'I BKA' LTAR DVAGS PO'I LAM KHRID BLO 'DZIN GYIS DMIGS
RNAM BSKYANGS, PHYOGS PHYOGS SU MA nI RIL

SGRUB KYI RGYUN SPEL BA DANG, SGRUB SDE 'DZIN SKYONG GI KHUR
BZHES, 'DUKHANG BTZAN KHANG BCAS BZHENGS, SDE

DGE NAS BSTAN 'GYUR BLUS, DGON CHEN GYI KHRIR BZHUGS, SHEL DGON,
BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL, RGYAL PO'I TSA

RGYAL SOGS KYANG GDAN SA 'DI DANG KHYAD MED DU BSKYANGS, ZHE
BZHI PA SA RTA LA GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO

BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MA CHOS SRID KYI MKHYEN RGYA CAN ZHIG TU
SNANG, DE'I RJES MA 'JIGS MED LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO

NI; AA RIG CHU STOD MTSAMS SKOR TSO BAR YAB BAN DE THAR DANG,
YUM RVA YOB BZA' TSE RING SKYID KYI SRAS SU

'KHRUNGS; GTZANG SGAR DON GRUB RAB BRTAN GLING DU KA KOR ZHAL
SNGA NAS LAS RAB TU BYUNG, DGUNG LO BDUN PA

LA GDAN SAR BKOD, RGYAN 'JUG BDE 'JIGS, KUN RIG SMAN CHOG SOGS
'DON CHOS 'GA' ZHIG

BZUNG; DRUNG RIN PO CHE'I SKU MCHED BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO LAS
'JIGS BYED BCU GSUM MA'I DBANG RJES GNANG

KHA SHAS, SHING ZA DPON SLOB LAS PHRENG BA'I DBANG SOGS GSAN,
RGYUD KHRIR LO GSUM BZHUGS, CHU LUG

LOR DBUS SU PHEBS, 'BRAS SGO MANG CHOS GRVAR DPON SLOB NGAG
DBANG TSUL KHRIMS LA BRTZI BZHAG GSAN,

HOR DGE BSHES BLO BZANG MGON PO, RGYAL SRAS YONGS 'DZIN BLO
BZANG SNYAN GRAGS, GUNG RU BLO GROS BRTAN PA

SOGS LA DPE KHRID ZHUS, CHOS MTSAMS SU BKA' CHOS GANG YOD MA
CHAG PAR GSAN, SA BYI LOR TSE CHOG GLING

SLOB DOPN YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, LO DE'I CHO
'PHRUL ZLA MJUG NAS RANG YUL DU THON

PA'I SNGA NUB SA ZLA'I BCU DGU'I BAR MTSAN MO MAR ME'I 'OD TSUN
CHAD LA BKA' CHOS MANG DU ZHUS, 'GA' ZHIG

PHAR YANG GNANG, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU RDO RJE 'CHANG DHVA DZA'I
ZHAL SNGA NAS LAS LAM KHRID, 'GREL PA BZHI SBRAGS

KYI BSHAD LUNG SOGS GANG MANG DANG, KHRI STAG LUNG PA BLO BZANG
NYI MA LAS 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYI GSUNG 'BUM GYI

LUNG GSAN, KAN CHEN 'DAN MA SPRUL PA'I SKU LA YANG CHOS BKA' CI
RIGS ZHUS, CHU 'BRUG LOR DGON CHEN DU

KHRI 'DON MDZAD PA SHING LUGS LA ZUR BZHUGS KYIS KUN SPANGS
TSUGS BZUNG DBEN GNAS DU MAR NYAMS BZHES LA

'GRUS; GDAN SAR 'DU KHANG DANG GZIMS KHANG GONG 'OG GSAR DU
BSKRUN, AA ROL SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG LUNG

RIGS RGYA MTSOS GTZOS PHYOGS 'DUS BCAS LA MDO MANG, PAn CHEN
CHOS RGYAN, LCANG SKYA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG

CHOS LDAN, YONGS 'DZIN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN SOGS KYI GSUNG 'BUM
DANG, SNGAGS PHYOGS PO TI'I LUNG,

'JAM DBYANGS CHOS SKOR, MGON BKA' BCU GSUM SOGS RJES GNANG,
THUGS RJE CHEN PO DANG RTA MGRIN

GSANG SGRUB KYI DBANG, MDO RTZA'I BSHAD LUNG, MGAR RTZE DGON
GONG MA, MAR NANG BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING

RNAMS SU BDE LAM, BLA MCHOD KYI KHRID, 'JIGS BYED, GDUGS DKAR
LHA BCU BDUN MA'I DBANG SOGS

SNGA PHYIR CHOS BKA' MANG DU GNANG, DGON CHEN GYI GDAN RABS SOGS
RTZOM PA 'GA' ZHIG KYANG SNANG, DE'I

@331	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SPRUL SKU 'BROG PHYOGS NAS 'KHRUNGS PA DA LTA BZHUGS, ` RDZONG
SNGON BKRA SHIS CHOS RDZONG DU RTIS TSANG MA nI PAS

MTSAMS KHANG BRTZIGS TE THUGS DAM MDZAD, PHYIS SU SPONG BA PA
'GA' ZHIG 'DUS PA LA BYA BTANG KUN DGA'

CHOS 'PHEL BAS BDAG RKYEN MDZAD DE SGRUB GRVA TSUGS, BKA' 'GYUR
BA DKA' BCU YON TAN, DKA' BCU

GSAR BA, SKU SKYE 'JAM DBYANGS RGY AMTSO, SKU SKYE TSE BRTAN
RGYA MTSO, DE'I SPRUL SKU KUN DGA' RGYA MTSO RIM

BYON GYIS BSKYANGS ZHES DGE 'DUN ZLA BA GRAGS PA'I CHOS 'BYUNG
KHA SKONG LAS 'BYUNG, MDO BA BLA MA DAR RGYAS KYIS

BTAB PAR BSHAD PA'ANG SNANG, 'DI'I SKYE RGYUD LA RDZONG SNGON
TSANG ZER, DA LTA'I 'DI PA'I GONG MA HOR YI NGOGS

NAS 'KHRUNGS, RVA RGYA'I CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, 'DIR RGYUN BZHUGS KYI
THUGS DAM NYAMS BZHES LA 'GRUS,

MNGON SHES DANG RMI LAM GSAL, 'GRO PHAN CHE, RNYING CHOS LA ZHEN
CHE BAS TSO BZHI GU RU SKYABS KYI SKYE BAR

GRAGS; ` BDE CHEN BYAMS PA GLING NGAM BKRA S HIS CHOS GLING NI,
SKAL LDAN DNGOS SLOB MGON SHUL KUN DGA'

CHOS 'PHEL RGYA MTSOS SGRUB KHANG BRTZIGS TE BUG SGO 'DAG SBYAR
GYIS SGRUB PA YUN RING MDZAD, SLOB MA MANG DU

'DUS PAS RI KHROD CHAGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG 'JAM DBYANGS
DPAL LDAN, MKHAN CHEN GYI RNAM THAR

SOGS GSUNG RTZOM MANG, DE'I SPRUL SKU 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO NI,
NGAG DBANG WANG GI MNGA' ZHABS SHI NE AE

MAG TU YAB KHAMS PA AA BE DANG, YUM BKA' 'BUM SKYID KYI SRAS SU
RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA PHAG LA

'KHRUNGS; RU SKYAS SKYABS SHIG BYIS PA RTA LA BSKYON BZHIN BTAGS
BZHAG PA 'DROG STE STOD SMAD KUN TU BRGYUGS

KYANG SKYON MA BYUNG, RTA ZIN DUS AE SKRAG ZHUS PAR MI GNYIS KYI
GA-YAS GA-YON NAS SKYOR 'DUG PAS MA SKRAG

GSUNGS; MNGON SHES GSAL, DGUNG LO BCU BA LA GDAN SAR BKOD, DGON
CHEN DU RIGS LAM LA

SBYANGS; SHING ZA SPRUL PA'I SKU DANG, DPON SLOB GSER KAHNG PA
LAS 'JIGS BYED, BDE MCHOG KUN RIG

GI DBANG RNAMS GSAN, DGON CHEN GYI RGYUD DUS 'KHOR TSOGS CEN GYI
KHRI BCAS LA RIM PAR BZHUGS, DE

KA'I RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG NAS DBYANGS DPON BLANGS TE 'JIGS BYED
SGRUB MCHOD, RVA RGYAR SLOB MKHAN BTANG STE KUN

RIG SGRUB MCHOD, YIG RIGS MI 'DRA BA DU MAS MTSON RIG GNAS
LNGA'I BSHAD RGYUN BCAS TSUGS, BLA MA LNGA

BCU BA; PAn CHEN CHOS RGYAN GYI GSUNG THUN DRUG RNAL 'BYOR, SDOM
GSUM BSNGO BGRANG RNAMS TSOGS NAS

GSUNG RGYU DANG, GRVA BA RES MOS KYIS LO LTAR YI DAM GYI BSNYEN
PA GTONG RGYU SOGS RTING BSKUL RGYUN BSKYANGS PAS DA

LTA CHOS SPYOD KYI TSUGS SHIN TU LEGS, PHYAG NA RDO RJE'I SPRUL
BAR GRAGS, JI GIN GYI MTSO MJAL SKABS LHA MO'I

DRE'U DANG, CHU SRIN GDONG SOGS KYI GZIGS SNANG BYUNG, RE GCIG
PA LA GSHEGS, 'DI LA SPRUL SKU SNGA PHYI

GNYIS BYON PA'I PHYI MA DA LTA BZHUGS, KUN DGA' CHOS 'PHEL GYI
GCUNG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO DANG, DPON PO

NOR BU RGYA MTSO GNYIS KYIS GDAN SA RIM PAR BSKYANGS, SNGA MA'I
SPRUL SKU DONG RUB CHOS DAR RGYA MTSO, MDO

DBUS GNYIS KAR DAM PA DU MA BSTEN, KHYAD PAR RJE PHUR BU LCOG PA
LAS ZAB RGYAS KYI GDAMS PA RDZOGS PAR

GSAN; BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA DANG, ZAB LAM N'A RO CHOS DRUG
GI SGO NAS RIM GNYIS KYI NYAMS RTOGS KLONG@332 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

DU GYUR, DE'I SPRUL SKU SKAL BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, SKU
PHRENG RIM BYON LA BDE CHEN CHUNG BA ZER,

`MGAR RTZE DGON NI, GA-YU LUNG DPAL GYI DGON PA NA, ,MGAR STON
DAM PA CHOS SDINGS GRUB, ,

CES PA YANG MGAR RTZE THEL 'DI LA NGOS 'DZIN KYANG GRUB GNAS KYI
GRANGS SU MI BGRANG, GRUB THOB DE 'JIG RTEN

MGON PO'I DNGOS SLOB GNYOS MGAR CHOS GSUM GYI NANG TSAN DE LA
'DOD TSE KHONG 'BRI GUNG BTAB PA'I PHYI LO RAB

BYUNG GSUM PA'I LCAGS BYI LA 'KHRUNGS 'DUG GRUB CHEN DE NYID
KYIS BZHENGS PA'I BYAMS KHANG RTEN BRTEN PA

BZHUGS; ` DMU GSAL SGAR DMU GSAL MTSAMS PAS BTAB, 'DI PA BDE
CHEN GYI GRVA BA, DBUS SU MKHAR

RDO BSTEN NAS RNYING PHYOGS MNYAN, RIG GNAS LA MKHAS, DE LA SKU
SKYE SNGA PHYI GNYIS BYUNG BA'I PHYI MA DENG SANG

YOD; 'DI DANG NYE BAR BON GYI DGON CHUNG ZHIG KYANG SNANG, `
KO'U SDE DGON GONG BO YON TAN GYIS BTAB,

SBYAR BYANG 'GAR CHOS DBYINGS STOBS LDAN RDO RJE ZHES 'BYUNG,
SHEL DGON GYI GRVA BA, KHAMS SU RDO GRUB CHEN LA

GTUGS; MDO RGYUD MDZOD ZER BA'I BRTZAMS CHOS POT BCU GSUM LA PAR
YOD, DBANG PHYUG BSGRUBS PAS

'BYOR BA CHE, DE'I SKU SKYE 'DI PA MTSO SNGON WANG 'GRAM NAG LA
'KHRUNGS, ` NYA LUNG DGON KHAMS NAS YONG

BA'I BLA MA NAM MKHAS BTAB, SKYE RGYUD YOD, 'DI GSUM RNYING
DGON, ` RGYAB NGOS SU GA-YER GSHONG DGE

'DUN ZLA GRAGS KYIS BTAB PA RAB DGA' RGYAL MTSAN BRTAN PO, 'DI'I
MCHOD GZHIS DON RI NYIN DU CHOS RJE

DON GRUB RIN CHEN PA 'KHRUNGS ZER BA SNANG, ` SKAL LDAN SGRUB
GNAS BSAM 'GRUB BDE LDAN, DE DANG

'DABS 'BREL DU MKHAR GONG GRUB GNAS, DER RJE SKAL LDAN PA'I BKA'
LTAR DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN TSE BRTAN

RGYA MTSOS BTAB PA MKHAR GONG KLAD STENG DGON, DGON CHEN YAN GYI
DGU CHU NYIN SRIB LA REB GONG STOD, KHRE TZE

YAN LA REB GONG BAR, SPANG DKAR THANG MAN LA REB GONG SMAD DU
GRAGS SHING, REB GONG BAR DU GTOGS PA

STENG GI GZHI MA CHOS RJE DON RIN PA BYA KHYUNG GI GNAS 'TSOL
CHED BYON PA'I GZHI MA 'DIR BZHAG PAS DE LTAR THOGS

SHING; DGON SDE CHAGS ZHES BSHAD KYANG, BSE STON GYIS BTAB PA'I
LO RGYUS GSHAM NAS 'BYUNG LA, GRUB

CHEN DE NYID KYI SKYE RGYUD DU GRAGS PA CHU MA'I BLA DPON ZUNG
'BREL SGA RU ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG BDUD 'JOMS DANG,

SMAN THANG BA'I RI MO'I LUGS 'DZIN SGA RU LHA BZO BLO BZANG SHES
RAB LA SKYE RGYUD YOD, ` SHA SBRANG NI, CHOS RJE

DON GRUB RIN CHEN GYIS BLA MA'I LUNG BSTAN BZHIN BTAB, BYA
KHYUNG DANG 'DI GNYIS SU LO SBREL GYI BAR DU PHAR

TSAD KYI THOG DRANGS, BYAMS CHOS RNAMS DANG, BRTAG GNYIS SPYOD
'JUG SOGS LA BSHAD PA GNANG YANG

BZHED PA LTAR GYI PHAN THOGS MA BYUNG BAS THUGS SKYO BAR GYUR
TE, 'DIR DBON PO SH'AKYA BZANG PO GDAN SAR

BSKOS PAR GSUNGS, NYI MA SHAR MA THAG BANG DU BLANGS PA 'DRA BAS
SHAR BANG ZER RGYU ZUR CHAG ZER, 'DI'I

GNAS BCAG SKABS RI DVAGS PA ZHIG GIS BRANG PHUL BAS, RTEN 'BREL
MI LEGS DGONGS SLAR BYA KHYUNG BTAB

PAS 'DI LA SHA BRANG ZER ZHES PA YANG THOS, DA LTA BYAMS KHANG
ZHIG LAS MED, LHA KHANG LA KHAR RJE DE NYID KYI NA

BZA' CHA TSANG NANG BZHUGS KYI SA 'BUM DENG SANG MJAL RGYU
SNANG, ` GA-YER GSHONG BSAM GTAN CHOS 'PHEL

@333 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GLING 'DEBS PA BO SNGAGS 'CHANG 'JAM DBYANGS BLO GROS NI, LCAGS
YOS LOR SHA SBRANG DU 'KHRUNGS, GNAS

DER BZHUGS TE GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI RIM GNYIS KYI NUS PA THON PA
'JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSO PA LAS RAB TU BYUNG,

'JIGS BYED KYI DBANG DANG 'JAM DBYANGS AA RA PA TZA NA'I RJES
GNANG GSAN, YAB YUM GYI 'DOD MOS BZHIN

'BUR BZO BSLAB PA MKHAS PAR MKHYEN, SKU BRNYAN MANG DU BZHENGS,
BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU RJE SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO

LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, ZAB CHOS MTHA' YAS PA GSAN, RJE DE NYID
KYI GSUNG GIS BSKUL TE DBUS SU BYON,

RGYUD SMAD DANG BKRAS LHUN SNGAGS GRVA 'GRIM, KHRI BLO GROS RGYA
MTSO'I BKAS SNGAGS RAMS PA MDZAD, KHRI CHEN DE

NYID LAS 'JIGS BYED BSKYED RIM GYI KHRID GSAN PA'I ZIN BRIS
KYANG YOD, LCANG SKYA GONG MA, KUN MKHYEN

'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA SOGS MDO DBUS GNYIS KAR BLA MA SUM CU SO
LNGA'I ZHABS PAD BSAM SBYOR GNYIS KYIS

TSUL BZHIN DU BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS RGYUN MANG DU GSAN
PAS LUNG GIS PHYUG CING, KHYAD PAR KUN MKHYEN

MCHOG NAS MI TRA'I DBANG GSAN SKABS DKA' GNAD LA DRI GTUGS MTHA'
CHOD PAR MDZAD DE DKYIL CHOG NOR

BU'I PHRENG BA BRTZAMS PA RGYAL MCHOG SKAL BZANG RGYAL MCHOG
SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS KYANG TSAD MAR MDZAD PA'I BAR DU LUNG
RGYUN BZHUGS,

GZHAN YANG GSUNG RTZOM POT GNYIS TZAM YOD, RGYUD SMAD DU BRAG
DKAR SNGAGS RAMS PA DANG 'DI PA GNYIS LUNG

RTOGS KYI YON TAN LA 'DRA MNYAM GYI GRAGS PA CHE, DGUNG LO ZHE
DRUG PA ME BYI LOR CHOS SDE 'DI NYID BTAB,

SNGAR CHOS PA RIN PO CHE 'DIR RGYUN RING BZHUGS, SGRUB SDE
'DZUGS PAR DGONGS KYANG SA MA PHUL BAS SLAR YANG

SHA SBRANG SDE KHROD DU BSAM BZHIN DU 'KHRUNGS SHING, DGON CHEN
DU 'JAM DBYANGS KUN GZIGS LA GSER 'BUL

RTZIS BYAS PA'I GTAM RJE 'DIS GSAN PAR GSER GSAR DU SGRIG MI
DGOS DBU'I STENG NA YOD GSUNGS PA JI LTA BA

BZHIN BYUNG BAS CHOS PA RIN PO CHE'I SKU'I SKYE BA 'KHRUL MED DU
NGES PA RNYED, DGUNG LO GYA GSUM PA LA GSHEGS,

SGA RU LHA BZO BLO BZANG NYI MAS BSGRIGS PA'I RNAM THAR RGYAS PA
YOD SNANG, DE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG DGE 'DUN ZLA

BA GRAGS PA RGAN GYA STOD MA'I DPON RGYUD YAB LHA 'BUM BKRA SHIS
DANG, YUM GRO BZA' MTSO MO RGYAL GYI SRAS SU

RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SHING STAG LOR 'KHRUNGS, BDE MCHOG
SNYING BO SLOB MA DGOS PAR MKHYEN, DGUNG LO

LNGA BA LA GDAN SAR BKOD, BDUN PA LA MKHAN CHEN DGE 'DUN RGYA
MTSO LAS RAB TU BYUNG SKABS SPYAN LNGA MNGON

SHES DRUG LAS BRTZAMS PA'I BKA' 'DRI ZHUS PAS THAMS CAD NGO
MTSAR, BCU GCIG STENG MTSAN ZHABS TSUGS,

MKHAN CHEN BSDUS GRVA, TSAD MA MDO DANG SDE BDUN, KUN MKHYEN BLA
MA'I BLO RTAGS, PHAR PHYIN SKABS DANG

PO; MKHYEN GTER NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS PA'I DGE 'DUN NYI SHU,
DRANG NGES RNAM 'BYED CHEN MO, RTEN 'BREL

SOGS THUGS 'DZIN GYIS BKA' POT YONGS RDZOGS LA SBYANGS, MERGAN
CHOS RJE LAS SNYAN NGAG BSLABS, RDO RJE

'DZIN PA 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PA LAS MI TRA'I DBANG SOGS NYID KYI
GONG MA NAS BRGYUD PA'I CHOS RGYUN BZHUGS

TSAD GSAN, BCU DRUG PA SA SBRUL LOR SNANG RA'I DGON GSAR BKRA
SHIS RAB BRTAN DU STONG 'KHOR BSOD NAMS

RGYA MTSO LAS KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED ZHABS DANG LHAN DU RDO RJE
PHRENG BA'I DBANG GSAN, DE DUS BKRA SHIS

@334 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

'KHYIL GYI DGE BSHES DA LTA BA DANG, BLO BZANG SBYIN PA SOGS
DANG, DGON CHEN GYI 'JAM DBYANGS DGE 'DUN

BSTAN 'DZIN SOGS DGE BSHES BCO LNGA, BDE CHEN DANG BYA KHYUNG
NAS BYON PA'I RIGS SMRA DU MA BCAS NYIN RE

BZHIN BGRO GLENG TSUGS PAR RJE 'DIS GRVA SKOR MDZAD, KUN MKHYEN
'JIGS MED SMRA BA'I NYI MA YANG DAM BCAR

BZHENGS; MOG GYA MKHAN CHEN 'JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSO LAS LAM RIM
CHEN MO'I BSHAD LUNG, AA RIG DGE

BSHES LAS RJE GSUNG 'BUM GYI LUNG, 'JAM DPAL BSHAD LUNG GI KHRID
SOGS MANG PO, DGON LUNG DU LCANG SKYA

ROL BA'I RDO RJE LA BKA' CHOS DANG DOGS GCOD 'GA' ZHIG ZHUS,
AERTI NI PAndI TA HU THOG THU'I CHO LO BYUNG, JA

SAG BLA MA DKON MCHOG LHUN GRUB KYI GDONG RGYAL BA 'JAM DPAL
RGYA MTSOS KYANG MKHAN CHAS BSTZAL, KUN MKHYEN

BAR MA LAS BKA' CHOS GSAN BZHES MANG DU MDZAD, THUGS YID GCIG TU
'DRES SHING BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL KHRIR

BZHUGS DGOS KYI BKA' GNANG DUS, NGAS DA LTA'I BAR DU PHYOGS 'GRO
GANG BYED LA GZA' SKAR, SBYOR BA,

TSE GRANGS, DUS TSOD, 'GRO PHYOGS THAMS CAD RTZIS DANG BSTUN NAS
BYAS PA YIN, DE BZHIN BYAS TSE GRVA SA

CHEN PO'I 'CHAD NYAN GTONG SGO SNGAR RGYUN MI 'ONG BA'I RGYU
MTSAN DANG DGONGS KHROL MANG 'GYED KYANG ZHUS, KHRI BLO

BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MA LAS RJE DE NYID KYI LJAGS RTZOM RJE BLA
MA LA BRTEN PA'I RIL SGRUB KYI LUNG DANG, MGON

DKAR RJES GNANG GSAN, SHING KHYI LA 'BUM GYI PAR BRKOS TSUGS PA
LO LNGA LA GRUB, SGA RU LHA BZO LA JO BO'I

RNAM THAR BDUN THANG BZHENGS BCUG SA STAG LOR MKHAN CHEN LAS
BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, CHOS PA RIN PO CHE'I

SGRUB KHANG GI SHUL DU 'DU KHANG RGYA BSKYED DE BZHENGS, SDE DGE
NAS BSTAN 'GYUR, SA SKYA'I BKA' 'BUM SOGS

PO TI NYIS BRGYA BZHI BCUR NYE BA GDAN DRANGS, SHING LUG LOR JUN
WANG GI AURGER BYON, KHRI CHEN RJE BSOD

NAMS GRAGS PA DE KA'I KHRI YIN PAS KHONG MCHOD YON LA MGON PO
SNYING ZHUGS KYI RJES GNANG BSTZAL, LCAGS BYI

LOR SKU 'BUM DU PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA MJAL, DGE SLONG
SPRUL BA'I SKU DANG SO SO NAS DNGOS 'BUL

BTEGS TE CHOS 'BREL ZHUS, GDAN SAR GONG MAS BZHAG PA'I BCA' YIG
CUNG ZAD BSDUS PA JE RGYAS SU

BTANG; SNGAR NAS RTING BSKUL RGYUN CHAGS GNANG BAS 'PHEL RGYAS
BYUNG, DGON PA'I SBYIN BDAG YUL SKYONG

SOGS; RBA NAG KHA GSUM LA RGYA DMAG AANG DANG DUS SBYIN BDAG
GRANGS NA JAG PA MANG BAS DGON PA BSHIG

GRABS KYIS DMAG BUD, MI MANG GIS 'THAB DGOS 'BRO DGOS SOGS SNA
TSOGS ZHUS PAR, THUB DBANG

THUGS RJE CAN LA GSOL BA THOBS, RANG CAG STON PA'I RJES 'JUG YIN
PAS MDA' MTSON 'DZIN PA PHAR ZHOG

BSAM NGAN TZAM YANG SKYE MI RUNG GSUNGS, NYIN KHA SHAS NAS DMAG
THAG NYER SLEBS TSE, THAMS CAD 'DU KHANG

DU 'TSOGS LA BRGYAD STONG SGROGS, NGA YANG 'DUG RGYU YIN GSUNGS
PA LTAR BYAS PAS DE 'PHRAL RONG BO NANG SO

SLEBS TE DMAG BSHOL THUB PA BYUNG, DON BRGYAD PA LCAGS LUG LOR
GSHEGS, GDUNG RUS GSER MDOG

'BA' ZHIG TU BYUNG BA DGE LUGS SHA SER RUS SER DU GRAGS PA LTAR
NGO MTSAR BA'I RTAGS SU GLENG, DNGUL SRANG

STONG PHRAG GIS BZHENGS PA'I MCHOD RTEN CHOS SDE'I RTEN GTZOR
BZHUGS, RJE 'DI'I RNAM THAR BIS PA NGAG DBANG

@335 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MI PHAM ZLA BA DANG, KHA SKONG 'GA' DAG ZHABS DRUNG GIS MDZAD PA
LAS BTUS, DE'I SPRUL SKU CHOS PA RIN PO CHE

YAB SRAS KYI DPON RGYUD DU 'KHRUNGS PA BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN RGYAL
MTSAN MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS LA MKHAS PA'I SNYAN

GRAGS CHE, DGUNG LO NYER BDUN BZHUGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU 'JAM
DBYANGS DGE 'DUN RGYAL MTSAN LCAGS BYI LO

BA; GSER KHANG DPON SLOB LAS RAB TU BYUNG, ` GA-YER GSHONG CHUNG
BA DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PA,

CHUNG DUS NAS SNGAGS RAMS PA'I DRUNG DU BYON, SKU GNYER DANG
GSOL DPON MDZAD, DKA' SPYAD KYIS PHYAG

GA-YOG TSUL MTHUN BSGRUBS PAS THUGS ZIN GYI SLOB MAR GYUR, GDAMS
PA MTHA' DAG LHAG LUS MED PAR

GNANG STE GDAN SA GTAD, KUN MKHYEN BAR MA DGON 'DIR PHEBS DUS
KHYED KYI SKU GONG MA DE ZHVA SER GYI BSTAN

PA'I BDAG PO YIN TSUL SOGS SNYAN SGRON MANG TZAM ZHUS 'DUG CHU
BYA LOR GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU BSE CHU MAR

'KHRUNGS PA DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS SHING KHYI LO PA, GA-YER
GSHONG CHE BA DGE 'DUN ZLA GRAGS KYIS THUGS

KHUR BZHES TE GDAN SAR BKOD, RJE DE NYID LAS RAB TU BYUNG, ZAB
CHOS MANG DU GSAN, SA PHAG NAS 'DI

KA'I CHOS SRID KYI 'GAN KHUR BZHES MUS SUM CU PA CHU YOS LA
GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU DA LTA YOD, YAB SRAS SKU

PHRENG RIM BYON GYIS BSKYANGS PAS 'GRIG KHRIMS DAM ZHING, BDE
GSANG 'JIGS GSUM GYI SGRUB MCHOD, SMAN

MCHOG RGYAS PA, MGON PO'I GTOR SGRUB, GA-YER GSHONG GONG MA'I
GSUNG GI LAM KHRID SKYONG RGYU SOGS CHOS SPYOD

YAR LDAN DU YOD, MI LA'I RNAM MGUR SOGS KYI PAR YANG BZHUGS,

SKYA RGAN GNAS MO, 'DI DANG 'DABS 'BREL DU NAD RIGS DU MA LA
PHAN PA'I CHAB TSAN RIGS MANG,

`RJE SKAL LDAN PA'I THUGS LA BYANG CHUB KYI SEMS 'KHRUNGS PA'I
GNAS 'BRU GU CUNG GI RDO KHANG RANG BYON, 'DIR

BRAG DKAR SNGAGS RAMS PA LA LCAGS MKHAR GYI THIG BSLAB PA'I
RDO'I STEGS, ` 'OL MO BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS

KYI RONG BO DGON, 'DI PA SKAL LDAN GYI DNGOS SLOB, SKU PHRENG
BZHI BYON PA'I DA LTA'I 'DI PA MKHAS BTZUN

BZANG 'DZOMS KYI SNYAN PA CHE, DPON SLOB GSER KHANG PA SKU MCHED
RNAM GNYIS, AA ROL DPON SLOB,

'GA' DVAGS ZHABS DRUNG SOGS BSTEN NAS GSAN BSAM MDZAD, ` CHU MA
THANG DA LTA MI SNANG, ` SGRUB SDE

THAMS CAD KYI GTZO BO DANG PHYI MOR GYUR BA BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL NI,
CHOS PA RIN PO CHES SHING GLANG LO NAS GZHI BZUNG,

RJE SKAL LDAN PA LA GNAS 'DIR RI KHROD PA BZHI SDE ZHIG AE TSUGS
LTOS, THOG MAR ZANG ZING GIS BSDUS, RJES

SU CHOS SHOD, MTHAR DON GNYIS 'GRUB PA'I DGOS PA YOD, LAS RGYU
'BRAS DPANG BZHAG GI RI KHROD PA GRAL

MGO NAS GRAL MJUG BAR DU SU MKHAS LA BLO GTOD, DAM PA SNGA MA'I
BCA' KHRIMS LAS MI 'DA' BA GNAD CHE

ZHES SOGS ZHAL BKOD MANG DU GNANG BAS DGUNG LO ZHE GNYIS PA SA
BYI'I LOR BTAB, MNAL LAM DU MI DKAR

PO ZHIG BYUNG STE LUNG BSTAN PA LTAR 'DU KHANG LA BKA' GDAMS PHO
BRANG BTAGS, CHOS PA RIN PO CHES BYAMS

MGON LHA KHANG BCAS DANG, MI LA'I SKU PHYAG BZO MDZAD, RJE SKAL
LDAN PAS RANG GI SKU LA TSAD BLANGS, RTIS

TSANG MA nI PAS PHYAG BZO MDZAD PAS RANG BYON LTA BUR PHEBS PA'I
CHOS PA RIN PO CHE'I SKU BYIN CAN BZHUGS, RI

@336 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

KHROD PA YANG RIM GYIS JE MANG LA SONG STE SGRUB PA BO DGE SLONG
NYIS BRGYA LHAG RE 'DU BA BYUNG, SGRUB PA'I RGYAL TSAB

SHA SBRANG, BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO THOG MA'I SLOB DPON DU BSKOS,
KHONG DBUS GTZANG NAS DRUNG BA RGYAL TSAB PA YAB

SRAS KYI ZHABS LA GTUGS TE RGOD TSANG SGRUB SDER YUN RING
BZHUGS, TZA RIR TSE DANG SGRUB PA SNYOMS BZHED KYANG

GROGS KYIS BSKUL NAS AA MDOR BYON, BYA BTANG GI TSUGS BZANG DRAG
PAS THAMS CAD KYIS MIG LTAS BYED SA

ZHIG YIN, BSOD SNYOMS LA PHEBS DUS TSUN CHAD KYANG WAGS RIGS
DANG PHU DUNG GYON MI CHOG PA DANG, GUNG

TSIGS DUS LAS MI YOL BA SOGS 'GRIG LAM RGOD TSANG GI BCA' YIG
DANG MTHUN PAR MDZAD CING LO MTSAMS KYI

SROL BTZUGS, CHOS PA RIN PO CHE'I YANG SLOB MA'I GTZO BO YIN PAS
ZHING GSHEGS KHAR 'JAM DBYANGS GSANG

SGRUB KYI THANG KA GNANG, SKU TSE SMAD LA KAB RON BRAG SKYA RDO
RJE RDZONG DU BZHUGS, KHRI PA BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS,

SHAR SPRUL BA'I SKU NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO, SGRO TSANG
