DPON SLOB BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS, MKHAN CHEN DGE

'DUN RGYA MTSO, SHAR SKU 'PHRENG GSUM PA DGE 'DUN 'PHRIN LAS RAB
RGYAS PA'I BAR GYIS GDAN SA BSKYANGS,

DE NAS SGRO TSANG DPON SLOB PA'I SPRUL SKU 'JAM DBYANGS BLO
BZANG RGYA MTSO GTAN CHAGS SU BZHUGS PA SKU THOG KHA

SHAS BYUNG, DUS PHYIS DKA' BCU ZHAL SNGA NAS RGYUN RING BZHUGS
TE BSGRUB BYA DU MA BSNYEN RDZOGS DANG CHOS RGYUN

MANG DU SPEL, 'DI PA GNYAN THOG NAS 'KHRUNGS, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL
DU DBU PHAR RNAM 'GREL BCAS DANG,

DBUS SU THUGS GNYER RDZOGS NAS GSANG PHU'I BKA' BCU MDZAD, KLONG
RDOL BLA MA, YONGS 'DZIN YE SHES

RGYAL MTSAN RNAM GNYIS BSTEN NAS CHOS BKA' CI RIGS GSAN, DGUNG
LO GO BZHI BZHUGS, DA LTA SPRUL SKU

YOD; GNAS 'DI 'KHOR LO SDOM PA'I PHO BRANG DNGOS YIN ZHING, DE'I
SGRUB MCHOD DANG TSOGS NAM YOD LA

CHOG ZHAL 'DON MDZAD, CHOS SKYONG GUR ZHAL MNGON SUM DU 'KHOR,
DGON MTHA' NA NAGS TSAL YOD PA

CHOS PA RIN PO CHE'I DBU SKRA DOR BA LAS SKYES ZER, DGON GSHAM
NAGS DKYIL DU SKAL LDAN GYIS SA DANG PO

BRNYES PA'I SGRUB GNAS RAB DGA', RDO'I KHRI, MGUR SDOD GNYIS
SOGS GNAS RTEN NGO MTSAR BA SNANG,

` GNYAN THOG SGAR BKRA SHIS DAR RGYAS GLING 'DAN GRUB CHEN GYIS
BTAB, SHAR DGE 'DUN 'PHRIN LAS RAB RGYAS

SKU TSES 'KHYONG GI BAR SMON LAM SOGS LA PHEBS, DE RJES SKYA SER
GYI 'DOD MOS BZHIN MKHAN CHEN DGE 'DUN

RGYA MTSO BLA MAR GNANG, DE NAS BZUNG MKHAN CHEN NA RIM GYIS
'DZIN SKYONG LEGS, SGA RU LHA BZO'I RGYUD

'DZIN GYI LHA BRIS PA MANG, PHYIS SU BIS THANG DPAL LDAN GYIS
BYAMS SKU DANG, LOGS BRIS LA GNAS BCU'I

RNAM THAR BZHENGS SKABS PHYAG GA-YOG PA TSE RING DON GRUB SOGS
RTZER SON 'GA' ZHIG BYUNG, BYAMS PA'I NANG

BZHUGS SU PIR MANG DU PHUL TE THUGS SMON MDZAD PAS LHA RGYUN DE
DA LTA GONG 'PHEL DU YOD, BYAMS KHANG DKAR

CHAG GA-YER GSHONG DGE 'DUN ZLA GRAGS KYIS MDZAD, GRVA BA PHAL
CHER LA BYAMS KHANG THOG TSAD SOGS RTEN BZHENGS

RGYA CHE, ` SGO DMAR SGAR DGA' LDAN PHUN TSOGS GLING DU, GA-YER
GSHONG DPON SLOB KYIS LCAGS BYA LOR BYAMS

KHANG SUM THOG RTEN BRTEN PA BZHENGS, LHO BRAG DON GNYIS GLING
GI MKHAN ZUR LHA RAMS PA 'JAM DBYANGS

@337 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

KYIS BSKUL NAS 'DOD GSOL SMON TSIG MDZAD, SMON LAM GSAR TSUGS
KYI MGON DU PHEBS, DGOS CHOS

GYA NOM PA GNANG, 'DI'I SDE KHROD NAS SGO DMAR RI KHROD PA BLO
BZANG RGYA MTSO PA 'KHRUNGS, GSER KHANG

DPON SLOB LA GTUGS TE RI KHROD DU BYON, YI DAM BDE MCHOG YAB YUM
LA SNYING PO AOm GSUM MA DUNG PHYUR BDUN

SONG; MKHA' SPYOD MA'I ZHAL GZIGS, DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG GI CHAR
PHABS, TSE BLOS BTANG GI SLOB

MA MANG DU 'DUS, DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU BZHUGS, MOG GYA MKHAN SPRUL
GYIS BRTZAMS PA'I RNAM THAR YOD SNANG,

` BIS PA NGANG DBANG MI PHAM ZLA BAS BTAB PA SKA SAR SGAR DU MA
nI BKA' 'BUM SOGS KYI DPAR YOD, MCHOD

GZHIS SKA SAR DU, LHA RAMS PA DON MCHOG RGYA MTSO 'KHRUNGS, SGO
DMAR LHA RAMS PA'I SKYE BAR GRAGS,

DGON CHEN DANG DBUS SU LHA RAMS PA RGYA MTSO DGE RGAN DU BSTEN
BKA' POT LA SBYANGS, LHA RAMS PA BYUNG, KHRI

'JAM DBYANGS TSUL KHRIMS KYI ZHABS LA GTUGS, THOS BSAM ZUNG
'BREL GYIS LO BZHI BCUR BZHUGS,

MDO SMAD DU BYON NAS DGON CHEN DANG, LA MO BDE CHEN GNYIS KAR
RNAM 'GREL THAR LAM GSAL BYED RTZA 'GREL

GYI DPE KHRID LAN MANG GNANG BAS PHAN THOGS, GRVA TSANG GI KHRIR
BZHUGS NAS KYANG 'CHAD NYAN DMAR,

NGA LNGA PA LA GSHEGS,

` DGU CHU'I GYES BAR DU RDZONG DMAR BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING NI,
SHAR SPRUL BA'I SKU DGE 'DUN 'PHRIN LAS RAB

RGYAS KYIS RGYU RKYEN DANG BKA' GNANG, 'TSO BYED SNGAGS RAMS PA
BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS SA CHOG BYAS, GTZUG

LAG KHANG DANG GZIMS KHANG BCAS GSAR BSKRUN MDZAD, ` RDZONG DMAR
GRUB GNAS NAS MAR THON PA'I DME

SHUL DU DKAR PO GSHONG BKRA SHIS CHOS RDZONG NI, DME SHUL DGE
SLONG SOGS KYIS SA PHUL TE SKYABS MGON RDO RJE

'CHANG 'JIGS MED ZHAGS KYIS RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU SPRUL
LOR BTAB, THOG MAR BSANG MCHOD BTANG

TSE MDUN RI'I THAD NAS 'JA' TSON SHAR BAS NAM MKHA' KHYAB PA'I
LTAS YA MTSAN PA DANG, NYE 'KHOR NA BRAG

DO CHAD SHIN TU GNYAN PAR BRTZI BA SA DGRA LTA BU ZHIG YOD PA LA
GZIGS NAS 'DI MED NA BZANG 'DUG GSUNGS

PAS NYI MA KHA SHAS NAS BRAG DE RANG ZHIG TU SONG BA KUN GYIS
NGO MTSAR DU BRTZI, BLA MA PHAN THOGS CAN ZHIG DGOS

TSUL KHRUS PAR KHRI CHEN BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA THOG MA'I SLOB DPON
DU BSKOS, DE NAS STAG RING SKU SKYE, MGO

STA SPRUL SKU 'JAM DBYANGS MKHAS MCHOG MDZOD DGE RAB 'BYAMS PA
YE SHES DAR RGYAS, GSER KHANG DGA'

BCU; SLAR YANG MDZOD DGE YE SHES, DA LTA BSOD GRAGS SPRUL PA'I
SKU RIN PO CHES 'DZIN SKYONG GIS SKU ZHABS

BLA BRANG BYAMS SKU BCAS DANG, NYID KYI GZIMS KHANG GSAR BSKRUN
MDZAD, KHROS NAG GI MNGON DKYIL

TSOGS 'DON SOGS ZAB DON SNYAN BRGYUD KYI 'PHRIN LAS SPEL BA'I
SDE NGOS GTZANG ZHING, DBUS KYI AE BA LHA

BZOS BZHENGS PA'I DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS, BSOD GRAGS GONG MAS
GNANG BA'I BKA' 'GYUR SOGS SKU GSUNG

THUGS RTEN BZANG, SHING GLANG 'DI YAN LAG DGON PA BTAB NAS LO GO
GSUM SONG, ` MGON SHUL CHU DMAR

RAB RGYAS SGAR, SMAN TZONG BDE CHEN GONG MA BLO BZANG BSTAN
'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BTAB STE RTEN BZHENGS

@338 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MDZAD; ` DGU CHU'I LHO STOD DU 'DAM BU BRAG DKAR GSER KHANG, `
DAR ZHING BDE 'DZOMS SU, YI NGOGS

BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO PA YUN RING BZHUGS, 'JIGS BYED KYI SGRUB PA
MDZAD PAS ZHAL GZIGS, SGRUB SDE

CHAGS PAR BYA BTANG KUN DGA' CHOS 'PHEL PAS BDAG RKYEN MDZAD,
SLOB DPON DU SKYES BU DAM PA'I RNAM THAR

CAN BLA MA DGE LEGS RGYA MTSAN, DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN SHES RAB
SENG GE DANG, SHES RAB DON GRUB,

DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS RNAMS BZHUGS, 'DI PA LAS KUN MKHYEN PAR
MAS CHOS BKA' MANG PO GSAN,

DA LTA MKHAN CHEN RIM BYON GYIS KHA 'DZIN MDZAD, STAG LUNG RI
KHROD PA'I SGRUB KHANG NOR BU YANG RDZONGS, KHONG

AA MTSO NAS 'KHRUNGS, ZUNG SHAN STAG LUNG DU MKHAN RGAN PA LA
GTUGS, DBUS SU GNAS MJAL DANG,

BLA MA MKHAN RGAN PA'I BKRAS RI BO RTZE LNGAR BYON, GSER KHANG
DPON SLOB BSTEN, SMYUNG GNAS BDUN BRGYA

BSRUNGS; 'JAM DBYANGS RIGS LNGA'I ZHAL GZIGS, BKA' 'GYUR THUGS
LA BYANG BAR BZHUGS ZER,

GSER KHANG PA'I GSUNG GIS 'DIR BYON, RI KHROD BZUNG NAS LO SUM
CU TZAM BZHUGS, DKOR ZAS LA

'DZEMS DOGS CHE BAS CHU GTZANG DANG RTZAM RKYANG 'BA' ZHIG
BSTEN, BDE MCHOG YAB YUM, 'JIGS

BYED; DPAL MGON GUR RNAMS KYI ZHAL GZIGS, LHAG PAR MKHA' SPYOD
MA NAM 'DOD GZIGS SHING GANG CI

ZHUS CHOG PA YOD, MNGON SHES THOGS PA MED, MDZE NAD MANG PO GSOS
PA SOGS SMAN GYI 'GRO PHAN CHE,

MA nI CHU 'KHOR MANG DU BTZUGS, DGUNG LO MTHON PO LA GSHEGS,
GDUNG RUS LA YIG 'BRU 'BA' ZHIG

BYUNG BA NANG BZHUGS KYI MCHOD RTEN MKHAN CHEN SPRUL PA'I SKU
NAS BZHENGS TE DAR ZHING DU BZHUGS, ` SGRUB GNAS

BKRA SHIS CHOS RDZONG DANG, LCANG LUNG SGAR SAR GNYIS AA ROL
SPRUL PA'I SKU BLO BZANG LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSOS BZUNG,

AA ROL GONG MA GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO 'KHRUNGS SA BSE DON RI NYIN AA
ROL TSO BA YIN, SHAR 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO'I YANG

SPRUL DOGS GNAS GRAS, NGOS 'DZIN SOGS GNYAN THOG NAS 'KHRUNGS PA
DANG KHYAD MED PA BYUNG BAS RGYAL MKHAN

CHEN BLO BZANG NYI MAS THAMS MKHAS KYIS 'DI PA RONG PO'I KHRI
RGAN SPRUL SKU YIN GSUNGS, DE'I GO SAR MA BTON

KYANG CHOS MDZAD BYAS TE DGON CHEN DU ZHUGS, DBUS SU DGA' LDAN
BYANG RTZER 'GREL BA DON GSAL, RNAM BSHAD

SNYING BO RGYAN, RJE BTZUN PA'I DBU MA, BDE LEGS NYI MA'I DBUL
BA BCASD THUGS 'DZIN GYIS BKA' POT

LA SBYANGS PAS LHA RAMS PA THON, RGYA MA RIN CHEN SGANG DANG L
HO BRAG DON GNYIS GLING GI GDAN SA PA MDZAD,

KLONG RDOR BLA MA LAS RJE YAB SRAS GSUM GYI GSUNG 'BUM LUNG
GNAS, MDO SMAD DU BYON NAS BSE SPRUL BA'I SKU

NAS MGAR RTZE'I KHRIR BSKOS, DER AA KHYUNG SKU SKYE SOGS LA
RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM GYI LUNG GNANG, RDZONG DMAR

DANG AURGE'I BLA MA YANG MDZAD PAS 'GRO PHAN CHE BA ZHIG GO ,DA
LTA 'DI PA LCANG LUNG NAS 'KHRUNGS, DGON

CHEN DU BKA' POT LA SBYANGS, GSER KHANG DPON SLOB LAS BKA' CHOS
MANG PO DANG LAM KHRID TSAR BCU LHAG

GSAN; DGUNG LO NYI SHU BZHES TZAM NAS RI KHROD 'GRIM, DKA' SPYAD
KYIS LHAG LHA DU MA'I BSNYEN SGRUB SOGS

THUGS DAM NYAMS BZHES LA GZHOL BAS NYAMS RTOGS 'KHRUNGS, DKAR PO
GSHONG DU BSOD GRAGS SPRUL PA'I

@339 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

SKU DKON MCHOG RGYA MTSO PA LAS MKHA' 'GRO SNYAN BRGYUD KYI
DBANG SOGS CHOS BKA' DU MA DANG, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL

DU SNGA PHYIR BYON NAS KHRI CHEN RAB BRTAN RGYA MTSO BA'I DBON
PO RDO RAMS PA 'JAM DBYANGS DANG, RJE SHES RAB RGYA

MTSO PA LAS CHOS RGYUN 'GA' ZHIG GSAN, CHOS BKA' 'CHAD SPEL RGYA
CHE BAS SHAR SPRUL PA'I SKU SOGS SKYES CHEN

DU MAS BLA MAR BKUR, SLOB MA GNAS NGES MED DANG 'TSO BA BSOD
SNYOMS KYIS LAM RIM BLO SBYONG LA NYAMS LEN

GYI MTHIL BYED PA'I BYA BTANG BRGYA PHRAG BRGYAL BA YOD, GSUNG
RTZOM YANG POT BZHIR NYE ZHING, DA DUNG YANG

'CHAD RTZOM GYI LEGS MDZAD YAR LDAN GYI SKABS SO, ,

LCANG LUNG PA DPAL CHEN NAM MKHA' 'JIGS MED KYIS BTAB PA'I
KHYUNG DGON, 'DI PAS DBUS DANG

KHAMS SU RNYING CHOS MNYAN TE RGYUN SPEL, RDOR SEMS SGOM BZLAS
DANG 'BREL BAR YIG BRGYA DUNG PHYUR SONG, SNYING

KA'I SNGAGS 'KHOR GYI SGRA THOS ZER, SKYE PHRENG GSUM BYUNG BA'I
PHYI MA DA LTA SNANG, ` SKAL LDAN BZHUGS GNAS

SU SLOB DPON SBYIN PA DAR RGYAS KYIS BZUNG BA SENG GE RTZE, 'DI
RDO RIS KHA SO LHA RI RTZE DANG GCIG CING DME SHUL

SNGAGS RAMS PAS BTAB KYANG ZER, DA LTA KHA SO SPRUL SKU BLO
BZANG BSTAN PA RGYA MTSOS SKYONG,

GSHEGS, DE' PO BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS BTAB PA SGE'U STENG
DGA' LDAN DAM CHOS GLING, ` TSVA RGYAL THAR

PA GLING, SKAL LDAN RNAM THAR TU NYAG RI SKU SKYE RIN PO CHES
TSUGS GSUNGS, NYAG RI BLA MA DKAR DKAR YANG

ZER; PHYIS RGYAL PO'I GLING TSANG GIS TSE MGON BLA MA DGE 'DUN
MKHYEN RAB LA PHUL, RJE DE NYID KYIS 'DU

KHANG; BYAMS KHANG RTEN BRTEN PA BCAS BZHENGS TE SKU PHRENG RIM
BYON GYIS 'DZIN SKYONG MDZAD, ` BDE CHEN RI

KHROD KYANG NYAG RI BLA MAS BTAB PA DA LTA SMAN TZONG BDE CHEN
RIM BYON GYIS SKYONG BAR YOD, SKAL LDAN RNAM THAR

TU; RGYAL PO DKA' BCUS GZHI BZUNG BA'I BDE CHEN SGRUB SDE ZHES
GSUNGS, ` MGAR RTZE GYA SAR BSHAD GRVA

THUB BSTAN CHOS 'KHOR DANG, SGRUB GRVA SHUG GU NYIN, SKAL LDAN
RNAM THAR TU MGAR RTZE DKA' BCU RIN PO CHES

MGAR RTZER BSHAD SGRUB GNYIS KA BTZUGS GSUNGS SHING, KUN MKHYEN
GONG MA'I RNAM THAR TU BSNGAGS BRJOD

MDZAD YUL DE YANG 'DI PA YIN NAM SNYAM, MGAR RTZE BLA MA LCAGS
PHRENG CAN GYIS DGON PA SGROG DGON KHUNG DU SPOS,

DE NAS MA BRTAN PAR KHRI RGAN MKHAS MCHOG RGYA MTSO, NANG RGAN
PA NGAG DBANG SHES RAB, LA KHA GRUB CHEN GSUM

GYIS RONG CHUNG MDOR DA LTA'I DGON PA 'DI BTAB, KUN MKHYEN BAR
MAS MTSAN BSTZAL, SGO MANG YIG

CHA'I STENG NAS MDO'I 'CHAD NYAN TSUGS, DUS BZHI'I CHOS THOG ZLA
CHOS, LNGA MCHOD DANG SA DKAR CHOS

THOG CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM 'CHAM CHEN BCAS BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI
PHYAG BZHES NGOS GTZANG MCHIS, MGAR

RTZER BLA RABS MANG DU BYON KYANG THAMS CAD GDUNG RGYUD RANG GIS
BZUNG, MGAR RTZE SHES RAB NYI MA MKHAS

GRUB KYI GRAGS SNYAN CHE, RONG BO CHOS PA RIN PO CHE'I BLA MA,
GSHEGS KHAR RJE DE NYID LA NGED KYIS MTSAN NYID

KYI BSHAD GRVA ZHIG BTZUGS TE 'CHAD NYAN BYED PA'I SMON LAM BTAB
YOD CES GSUNGS PAS RJE SKAL LDAN RAS PA

DE'I SPRUL SKU YIN PAR GRAGS, KHRI RGAN MKHAS MCHOG GI SPRUL SKU
MGAR RTZE RANG DU 'KHRUNGS PA 'JIGS MED

@340 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

NGAG DBANG 'JAM DBYANGS NGA DU PA SHING SPRUL LA GSHEGS, DE'I
SPRUL SKU RGAN GYA'I SU RUG TU MGAR RTZE BAN

RGAN GYI KHYIM DU 'KHRUNGS PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA YAR 'PHEL ME
RTA LO PA, ` MGAR RTZE GZUNGS 'BUM GYI SRAS

DBON PO SHES RAB NYI MA, 'DI RJE 'JIGS MED RIGS PA'I SENG GE'I
SKU TSA, RJE DE NYID DANG, SHEL DGON DU

BRAG DKAR DKA' BCU RIN PO CHE GDAN DRANGS TE CHOS ZHUS, GA-YER
GSHONG DGE 'DUN ZLA GRAGS LA LAM RIM

BSDUS DON GYI BSHAD LUS GSAN, NGA DGU PA LA GSHEGS PA'I SPUL SKU
DKON MCHOG RGYA MTSO MGAR RTZE YAB TSE

RING DON GRUB LA SHING GLANG LOR 'KHRUNGS, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI
CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, DE NAS BZUNG MGAR RTZE BLA KHAG

GNYIS SU SONG, GNYIS KA'I GZHIS KA SHUG GU NYIN DU YOD, DGON PA
SLOB CHUB RIM BSKOS KYIS SKYONG,

'DU KHANG KHRI RGAN SPRUL SUS BZHENGS, NANG BZHUGS SU DKAR RIS
DGON NAS GDAN DRANGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS

STONG SKU RGYA GAR SHAR LI, GTZO BO JO SKU RGYA LI, STOBS TSANG
'JIGS MED RDO RJES GSER ZANGS KYIS BZHENGS

PA'I TSE DPAG MED KYI STONG SKU DANG BSHAGS LHA SO LNGA SOGS SKU
GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG, 'DI PA 'JIGS MED

SKAL BZANG GI DNGOS SLOB, SMAD DU LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHES GZIGS
BSKYANGS CHE BAS DUR BDE T'A WANG GIS BLA MAR

BKUR; 'DI KAR GZIMS KHANG BZHENGS PA'I NANG DU TZAN DAN JO BO,
DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS, BDER

GSHEGS MCHOD RTEN BRGYAD BCAS BZHUGS, GZHUNG DU GOS SKU DANG
'CHAM LVA BZHAG RNAM THAR RANG

RTZOM YOD SNANG, ` BSE SPRUL PA'I SKU NGAG DBANG 'JAM DBYANGS
BKRA SHIS KYIS 'JAM DBYANGS KUN GZIGS

LTA KHANG BZHENGS, RJE'I PHYAG DPE SNGAG SRIM CHEN MO DRIL TE
MGRIN GZUNGS SU BZHUGS, ` SGE'U STENG,

SHEL DGON, LUG RVA, GA-YA' MA BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL, SHUG GU NYIN TE
DGON LAG GRUB SDE LNGA, SA DKAR

SHAR DANG GLANG GYA'I DGON KYANG SMON LAM LA PHEBS, MCHOD GZHIS
RONG 'BROG TSE LNGA NI, TSO 'DU, BKRA

DRUNG BYANG CBUB, ZHO 'PHONG LA GSHIS GNYIS, AA BAR THE BUD
RNAMS YIN, MGAR RTZE SGAR BA, NANG

SO; BE HU GSUM PHA GCIG LAS BGYS, SNGAG SPA NUS LDAN YIN PAS
RGYAL BO JU NANG GI BLA MCHOD DU BKUR,

DOR GE AAMBHA NA BOD SOG GI DBYE 'BYED LA PHEBS DUS DPON JU NANG
GIS ZHUS TE NANG SO DANG BE HU'I CHO LO BYUNG,

MGAR STON DAM PA CHOS SDINGS LA SRAS GSUM BYUNG BA'I RGYUD PA
MGAR RTZE KHAG GSUM NI BYAS, MGAR RTZE MTHIL

RTZANG SGAR DANG NYE BA MGAR RTZE WO BU THU GSUM LA ZER, ` ZHO
'PHONG SAR RGYAL MKHAN SPRUL DGE 'DUN BSTAN

PA'I NYI MAS 'DU KHANG, BYAMS KHANG, GZIMS KHANG BCAS GSAR
BSKRUN GYIS GA-YA' MA BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL

BTAB; PHYIS SU ZHABS DKAR BAS BZUNG, 'DI NYID KYI LO RGYUS RNAM
THAR RANG RTZOM LAS SHES PAR BYA ZHING

SPRUL BA'I GLEGS BAM BZHI SOGS BRTZAMS CHOS KYANG MANG, DE'I
SPRUL SKU DA LTA YOD, ` SHEL DGON BDE CHEN

CHOS KYI PHO BRANG NGAM BKRA SHIS RDZONG NI, SKAL LDAN GYI NYE
GNAS KUN DGA' BO GNYIS PA CHU DMAR SGOM CHEN BLO

BZANG RGYA MTSOS BTAB, KUN GZIGS MCHOD KHANG BCAS GSAR BZHENGS
MDZAD, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG

BSTAN 'DZIN YANG CHU DMAR NAS 'KHRUNGS, 'DIR 'DU KHANG BZHENGS,
DE'I SPRUL SKU BIS MDO'I KHRI MDZAD

@341 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

PA DGE 'DUN 'PHRIN LAS LHUN GRUB, DA LTA SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG
THOGS MED TSUL KHRIMS BZHUGS, ZHO 'PHONG

SKU SKYE 'JIGS MED BZANG PO BON GYI BLA MA ZHIG GI SKU SKYER BLU
RGYU BYAS PA KHU BOS BTZAN TSUGS KYIS BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL

GYI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, DGE BSHES RTZER SON THON, SMAN GYI 'GRO
PHAN CHE, SKU TSE'I MJUG RI KHROD YID

DGA' CHOS 'DZIN DANG, 'DI GNYIS SU NYAMS LEN RDO RUS THUG PA
GNANG, SDE KHRI RIN PO CHE, RJE SHES

RAB RGYA MTSO, AA ROL SPUL PA'I SKU SOGS LA ZAB CHOS MANG DU
SPEL, DER TE LO, N'A RO, MAR BA, RAS

CHUNG BCAS KYI RNAM THAR PAR YOD, ` GLANG GYA'I SA DKAR SHAR CHU
MIG RDZONG GI RI KHROD, RJE SKAL LDAN GYIS

BTAB ZER BA DANG CHU DMAR BAS BTAB ZER BA'ANG SNANG,

LUG RVA DGON PAD DKAR CHOS GLING CHU DMAR CHUNG BAS BDAG MDZAD
'DI'I MAR ZUR DU RONG BO MAR NANG

LA 'GRO SA GSER KHA'I RGYA LAM YOD, STOD KYI SKYA GA'I NYAG GA
MAN CHAD DANG SMAD KYI GSER KHA'I NYAG GA-YAN CHAD

LA REB GONG GSER MO LJONGS ZER, ` GO'U MO'I GUR KHANG DANG 'DABS
'BREL BAR YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN RI

KHROD NAGS KYA'I RAB 'BYAMS PA RIN CHEN GYIS BTAB CES SKAL LDAN
RNAM THAR TU GSUNGS, PHYIS NANG SO SKU SKYE

DGE 'DUN MKHAS MCHOG PA BLA MAR PHEBS, ZLA RE BZHIN DUS BZANG
NYIN 'TSOGS LNGA RE DANG GNYIS PA'I ZLA

NANG NYIN BCUR BDE MCHOG SGRUB MCHOD LO LTAR CHAG MED KYI SROL
BTOD, DE BSTUN GYI BCA' YIG KYANG BZHAG

` GA-YER GSHONG DGE 'DUN ZLA GRAGS KYI CHOS 'BYUNG KHA SKONG
THUB BSTAN NYIN MOR BYED PA'I SNANG BAR, KHA GYA'I MI

nI PAS BTAB PA RI KHROD BKRA SHIS RTZE, RGYUD PA SLOB ZUR BLO
BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BTAB PA DKAR RIL DGON

GNYIS KYANG YOD PAR BSHAD, ` SPANG DKAR THANG DGON PA RJE SKAL
LDAN RAS PAS BTAB ZER, DA LTA SHAR SKU 'PHRENG

GIS 'DZIN BDAG MDZAD, BYAMS KHANG, RJE'I SKU BRNYAN NYID KYI DBU
SKRA NANG BZHUGS KYI BYIN CAN BZHUGS,

CHOS RGYAL RANG BZHIN GYIS 'OG ` TSO 'DU MKHAN PO GONG MAS BTAB
PA TH'O KYA'I SGAR, ` THUL MO'I DGON BKRA

SHIS RAB BRTAN BRAG DKAR SNGAGS RAMS PA BLO BZANG BSTAN PA RAB
RGYAS KYIS BTAB, 'JAM DBYANGS KYI SKU

BRNYAN KYANG BZHENGS, ` SENG GE'I GSHONG DGON, RVA NGAN DPON
SLOB BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BTAB,

CES BSHAD PA MTHONG YANG GONG 'OG GANG YIN NGOS MA ZIN, SGAR
GONG MA DPAL LDAN CHOS 'BYOR GLING DU JO SKU

DANG; BYAMS SKU LI MA BYIN CAN, THUB PA'I GOS SKU CHEN PO, BKA'
'GYUR, SGAR 'OG MA DGA' LDAN PHUN

TSOGS GLING DU BYAMS SKU NYIS THOG BZHUGS PA'I BYAMS KHANG, BKA'
'GYUR, BYAMS PA'I GOS SKU KHRU BRGYAD

CU BA SOGS BZHUGS SHING SGAR GONG 'OG GNYIS KAR GRVA BA RE DANG
BYAMS KHANG RE THOD GTUGS PA LTA BU'I BRIS

'BUR GYI RTEN BZHENGS GZI BYIN CHE, SMON LAM GYI MGON DU DGON
CHEN NAS DAD ZHEN CHE BA'I BLA MA RE GDAN

'DREN ZHU, 'DI DANG GNYAN THOG SGO DMAR, SKA SAR, TH'O KYA'I
SGAR RNAMS LA KHRE TZE BZHI'I DGON

ZER; ` SGRUB SDE BCO BRGYAD NI, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL, GA-YER GSHONG,
RONG BO DGON, YID DGA',

SA DKAR SHAR, THUL MO, SHEL DGON, SGE'U STENG, TSVA RGYAL, DAR
ZHING, RDO RIS KHA SO,@342	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

YAR NANG BDE CHEN, RDZONG DKAR, RDZONG SNGON, RDZONG SER, RDZONG
DMAR, CHU DMAR DGON,

MKHAR GONG KLAD STENG STE 'DI RNAMS DGON CHEN DU CHO 'PHRUL SMON
LAM LA MNYAM 'TSOGS BYED, DA LTA DE LAS

KYANG MANG BAR SNANG, MCHOD GZHIS RONG BO NANG SO, GNYAN THOG BE
HU, 'JAM BE HU, BSE BE HU,

CHU MA'I BLA DPON, HOR SNANG BE HU, GLANG GYA'I DPON PO, RGYAL
PO BE HU, HOR DPON PO, MDO

PA'I DPON PO BCAS KYI MNGA' 'BANGS RONG BO SDE BDUN, SMAD PA SDE
BDUN, KHRE'U RTZE BZHI, GLANG GYA,

SKYI KHA GSUM, RGYAL PO GLING TSANG, BSE LUNG PA GSUM, CHU KHOG
SHOG BZHI, HOR TSO CHEN DRUG

RONG BO SHA BI NAR, BSE RI CHU BAR GSUM, HOR SNYAN BZANG STENG
'OG STE SHOG BCU GNYIS, GZHAN

SHOG CHUNG DRUG DANG BCO BRGYAD KYI RONG 'BROG GI SDE RGYA CHE,
DE THAMS CAD KYI SPYI BLA RJE SKAL LDAN SKU 'PHRENG RIM

BYON DANG, SPYI DPON NANG SO NA RIM GYIS BYED PAS RONG BO'I BLA
DPON ZER, 'DI DAG PHAL CHER DGU CHU'I

RGYUD DANG 'BREL BAS REB GONG DGU NYIN SRIB TU GRAGS SO, ,

` RJE SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSOS, BOD KHA BA CAN GYI SA PHYOGS SU,
,DPAL AU RGYAN PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS PHEBS,

SPYIR MKHA' 'GRO'I GNAS SGO GRANGS MED PHYE, ,SGOS CIG CHAR
SPRUL BA BRGYA PHRAG BKYES, ,SHAR GNYA' GONG

BRAG DKAR GNAS CHEN DANG, ,GNAS BCU GCIG SHEL GYI DGON PA SOGS,
,MA MKHA' 'GRO'I PHO BRANG BRGYA

PHRAG GI ,SGO PHYE ZHING LHA 'DRE DAM LA BTAGS, ,SNGON AA MDO'I
BSTAN PA SNGA DAR DUS, ,YUL REB GONG

GI GRUB THOB GNAS BRGYAD CES, ,MTSAN SNYAN PA NYI ZLA LTA BUR
GRAGS, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I GRUB PA THOB

PA'I GNAS BRGYAD DAM DGU NI, DGON CHEN GYI RGYAB RI SE KU BYA
KHYUNG GI RI RGYUD DANG 'BREL BAR MTHA' BSKOR

TE GNAS PAS GNAS DANG GRUB THOB SBYAR TE BSHAD NA, DE YANG DBUS
SU, 'BAL GYI MKHAR GONG LA KHA NA, ,

'BOL GYI BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' GRUB, ,CES YUL GYI SA'I LTE BA'AM
SNYING DANG 'DRA BA NI YAR NANG 'PHRANG GI KLAD

MKHAR GONG GDONG GI RI 'DI YIN, GRUB GNAS NGOS SA 'BUR DU SONG
BA'I RI TE'U MTHA' NA MI MA YIN GYIS BSKOR

PA RGYAB SHUL YOD, AA KRON MKHAS BTZUN GYIS, 'PHRANG NGOS 'BUM
GTER RTZA BA NA, ,MA GSOD DPAL

GYI RDO RJE GRUB, ,CES PA DANG DON GCIG GAM DPYAD, ` SHAR DU,
STAG LUNG DPAL GYI RI BO NA, ,SHEL

GYI 'O DE GUNG RGYAL GRUB, ,CES GRUB GNAS KYI BRAG LA MTSAL RIS
DANG 'BRU GSUM RANG BYON YOD, DE'I BYANG

'DABS CHU CHA'I THANG DU CHU STOD NYI MA'I 'KHOR LO GRUB PA
THOB, CHOS GOS NYI THIG LA BKAL, GYO MO'I RDO 'PHRANG

GONG MAR SLOB DPON PADMAS SRIN MO BTUL, KHA GNON DU ZHABS RJES
BZHAG SHEL DKAR GYI NYE LOGS NA LHA RDO

DKAR PO, MI ZI NAG PO SOGS LHA KLU'I RTEN CHAGS PA'I SMAN RDO
DANG RIN PO CHE'I RDO YANG YOD, 'BRI GUNG 'JIG

RTEN MGON PO'I DNGOS SLOB 'BRI GUNG BLA MA RIN CHEN BZANG PO
DPON GA-YOG SA BYI LOR 'DI PHYGS SU PHEBS

PA'I LO RGYUS SNANG LA, DE LTAR NA RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I CHU PHAG
LA 'BRI GUNG 'JIG RTEN MGON PO 'KHRUNGS PA'I

NYER LNGA PA ME PHAG LA PHAG MO GRUB PA'I MDUN DU PHEBS PA'I
PHYI LO'I SA BYI DE YIN DGOS SHING, SA BYI DE NAS BRTZIS

@343	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

PA'I BCU GNYIS PA SA PHAG LA 'BRI GUNG BTAB, DE NAS DRUG PA
SHING 'BRUG LA MA CIG GIS GA-YA' RI'I GTER

SBAS PA YANG SHES DGOS SO, ,KHONG RNAMS THOG MAR BRAG DMAR GSER
KHANG DU BZHUGS, YOS LOR SHAR JAG

BYUNG BA LA STAG TSANG LHA MO NAS MTHUN BSGRUB STE MNGON SPYOD
KYI LTAS BSTAN, BLA MA RIN BZANG GIS MTSO RONG CHU KHAR

ZHABS RJES BZHAG YUL SKYONG DPAL BZANG GIS SHA BA'I RVA MA NYAMS
PA LA ZHON NAS THANG LA RTA BZHIN DU

BRGYUGS; SBA RTZE DANG NYE BA'I SPANG KHA ZHIG TU SHA RU ZUG PAS
DENG SANG YANG SHA RU ZUG ZER, TZONG KHA'I RDOR

BZANG GIS GSER GYI RDO RJE DGU PA NAM MKHAR 'PHANGS PA SA LA MA
LHUNG BAR RTEN MED DU ZHAG GSUM BSDAD,

TSO BZHI'I DGE BSNYEN GYIS RNGA CHEN PO'I STENG DU SKYIL KRUNG
BYAS, PHYAG GIS BSNUN TE RI RTZE BAR DU BRGYUGS,

'BRUG LOR GNYAN DMAR DU PHEBS TE MTSAMS BSDAMS, GZHI BDAG GDUG
PA CAN BTUL, BLA MAS LUNG

BSTAN PA'I SMAN RI NAGS SHOD DANG, BRAG SENG GE GAR YOD RTZAD
GCOD LA PHEBS, BYA ROG GSUM GYIS LAM

SNA BYAS, SHEL DGON BRGYUD REB GONG GI LUNG MDOR SLEBS 'PHRAL,
RGYA MI LTA BU RAL BA THOR TSUGS SU BCING

BA'I GSEB TU MI RKANG BCUG PA ZHIG DANG 'PHRAD, DES KHRID DE
MKHAR GONG GI GDONG SNA'I SUM MDO LA SLEBS,

SKED NAS RAL GRI PHYUNGS TE LAM BSTAN 'PHRAL MI SNANG BAR GYUR,
SNGAR GYI BYA ROG GSUM BRAG SENG GE'I RTZER BABS

TE SKAD BTON, TE KAR BZHUGS SNYAM PA LA, BYA ROG GSUM DE'I
GA-YAS NGOS KYI SPANG STENG LA BABS TE MI

SNANG BAR GYUR, DPON GA-YOG RNAMS BYA BAB SHUL DU PHEBS PAS 'BRI
KHUNG DGON KHANG GI NANG RTEN DPAL MGON

ZHAL GYI BRIS SKU DER BZHUGS PAS TSAD MED PA'I DGA' SPRO SKYES,
BRIS SKU DA LTA RONG BO'I TSO BZHIR BZHUGS,

MTSAN BYA ROG LDING 'PHUR GYI SKUR GRAGS, DER SGRUB KHANG
BRTZIGS, MTSAMS BSDAMS, 'TSO BA CUNG ZAD

BKREN PAS YI DAM LA GSOL BA BTAB PAR, SGRUB KHANG GI GA-YAS NGOS
CHU MIG MANG PO YOD PA DER N'A GA RAKSHA

DANG; KHYUNG GI SGRUB SKOR GTER TU SBAS, KLU GNYAN GNAS PA'I RDO
LEB GRU BZHI'I STENG DU ZHABS RJES ZHOGS

DANG ZAS NOR GYI DNGOS GRUB TSEGS MED 'GRUB PA'I LUNG BSTAN
THOB, DE LTAR MDZAD PA'I ZHAG BDUN NAS RGYA

MI'I RNAM PA MDOG CUNG ZAD SNGO BA'I BZHIN MDZES GNYIS SGRUB
KHANG SGOR 'ONGS, BLA MA AE BZHUGS DRIS,

ZHABS PHYI DES MA BRTAGS PAR BZHUGS BYAS PAS, DE MA THAG DE
GNYIS MDOG SMUG CING KHA RLANGS BTON TE MI

SNANG BAR GYUR, KLU GDUG PA CAN GYI KHA RLANGS NYEN CHE GSUNGS
TE SGRUB PA LA LHAG PAR BRTZON PAS SNGAR LTAR BYUNG,

ZHABS PHYI DES BLA MA DPON GA-YOG MI BZHUGS ZHES NANG DU BOS,
ZAS BYIN TE SGO RTZAR BSKYAL 'PHRAL KHONG GNYIS

SHI BA TSO BZHI DGE BSNYEN GYIS GZIGS, GCIG GI RAL BA'I GSEB NAS
MARGAD DANG, GCIG LA CHU SHEL 'THEB

RDOG TZAM YOD PA BLANGS, THOD PA LCANG LO CAN GNYIS BREG PA'I
NANG DU BCUG RIN CHEN SNA LNGAS BKANG STE NOR

SGRUB MDZAD PAS LUNG PA THAMS CAD KLU'I DKOR NOR GYIS BKANG,
DRAG SNGAGS BZLAS PA'I SAS GTOR BAS

GTOR PHOG TSAD BSDAD, GZHAN RNAMS YAL BA'I LUNG BA DE LA DKOR
LUNG DU GRAGS, LUG LOR RI GLANG CHEN

NYAL 'DRA'I GNAS SU PHEBS, DE'I PHYI LO BLA MAS TSO BZHI DGE
BSNYEN LA LCAGS KYI RDO RJE RTZE DGU PA, DPE PO TI

@344	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

MANG PO, SNGAR GYI MGON PO'I SNANG BRNYAN BCAS GNANG STE STAG
LUNG DPAL RI'I BRAG SENG GE 'DRA BA'I GNAS

GTAD; DE LA SRAS GU RU RIG 'DZIN, PAD MA RIG 'DZIN, RDO RJE RIG
'DZIN GSUM 'KHRUNGS PA DE LAS BKYE

BA RNAMS KYI TSO BZHIR GRAGS, SKABS SHIG MKHAR GONG DU YANG RIGS
RGYUD DE LAS MANG DU 'PHEL BA PHAN TSUN

GNYIS KAR GRUB THOB DANG, KHYAD PAR MKHAR GONG DU MNGON SPYOD
KYI NUS PA CAN MANG PO BYUNG, DA LTA YANG

TSO BZHI, AA GRONG, YI NGOGS GSUM LA SNGAGS SDE KHA GSUM DU
GRAGS SHING, MNGA' BDAG MYANG GI RGYUD 'DZIN

SNGAGS NUS CAN SHA STAG LA, GTER 'GA' ZHIG KYANG SNANG, YUL
SKYONG DPAL BZANG DANG TZONG KHA'I RDOR

BZANG GNYIS LA DPE DANG RTEN MANG DU GNANG, BRAG DMAR GSER KHANG
DANG RI GLANG CHEN NYAL 'DRA'I GNAS

GNYIS SO SOR GTAD, PHYI MA 'DI GNAS MCHOG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL YIN
LA, MTHON PO'I MDO'I DUNG GA-YAS

'KHYIL GYI MTSAN MA YOD SAR GTER 'GA' ZHIG SBAS PA DANG, MKHAR
LUNG GA-YAS KYI BRAG PHUG MGAR BA'I SOL

KHUNG MCHOD RTEN MGO MJUG BZLOG PA BRTZIGS PA LA MGAR BA'I TI
TSAR GRAGS, KLU BDUD BTZAN GSUM DAM

LA BTAGS ZER, RIN CHEN BZANG PO NYID DBUS SU PHEBS,

SHAR LHO SBYANG PHU'I LHA BRAG DKAR PO 'DIR RJE SKAL LDAN GYIS
THUGS RJE CHEN PO KHA SAR BA NI, GNAS BRTAN

BCU DRUG SOGS KYI ZHAL GZIGS, BRAG LA CHOS LONGS SPRUL GSUM,
RIGS LNGA, RIGS GSUM,

SEMS DPA' SEMS MA SOGS RGYUD BZHI'I LHA TSOGS MANG PO, RTEN
'BREL DBYANGS GSAL SOGS YIG 'BRU,

RTE MCHOG B'A LA HAS SRIN YUL NAS SEMS CAN 'GA' ZHIG THAR BAR
BYAS PA'I BKOD PA SOGS RANG BYON BGRANG

LAS 'DAS, BKA' THANG DU, BYE MA RAB DKAR LHA SRIN SDE BRGYAD
BTUL, ,RO H'A LUNG BA KHRA MOR MA YAM

BTUL; ;RO DONG LUNG PA NAG POR SRIN PO BTUL, ,ZHES 'BYUNG BA'I
RO DONG LUNG NAG SPYANG LUNG LA NGOS 'DZIN

CING; LCANG SKYA'I LHA 'DU THANG DU PHA BONG LA SRIN PO GAN
RKYAL GYI RJES GSAL ZER, DE DANG NYE BAR, SPYANG

GI RVA RTZE PHUG PA NA, ,MA GSOD ZHI LI 'UR BA GRUB DANG, YIG
MKHAN NYE GNAS 'UR BA GRUB ZER BA SNANG,

'DIS MA BSAD PA'I SDIG SBYONG LA, BRIS PA MANG PO'I CHOS SHOG
'UR BAS GRUB PA THOB STE NAM MKHA' LA 'PHUR

BA MTSO ZHIG GI KHAR BABS, LAS SGRIB KYIS MTSO BSKAMS PA MTSO
SKAM DANG, YANG 'PHUR TE SHING SDONG ZHIG

GI RTZER BABS PA DE YANG SKAM PAS DENG SANG SDONG SKAM ZER, DE
LA 'GYOD NAS BSAGS SBYANGS LA 'BAD PAS LHA'I

ZHAL MTHONG, SGRUB GNAS BRAG LA LHA SKU YIG 'BRU PHYAG MTSAN
SOGS GSAL,

LHO PHYOGS, 'DAM BU'I BRAG DKAR GSER KHANG DU, ,SLOB DPON 'PHAGS
PA LI KHROD GRUB, ,AA

'GRON GYIS, BRAG DKAR SHEL GYI RI PHUG NA, ,BRAM ZE CHEN PO LI
KHROD GRUB ZER, BRAG LA MCHOD RTEN

RANG BYON GYI RI MO DANG, GTZUG LAG KHANG BZHENGS PA'I SHUL YOD,
'DIR 'PHAGS PA ZER BA'I RI KHROD PA

ZHIG KLU NAD KYI BTAB PAR GSANG BDAG GRUB PAS NAD LAS GROL, NAD
BDAG TING NGE 'DZIN GYIS GZIR BAS

GNYAN NAD RMA RIGS, CHU SER SOGS LA PHAN PA'I SMAN CHU PHUL BA
LA DA LTA 'DAM BU'I CHU TSAN ZER,

@345	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

LHO NUB TU, MTHA' SMUG RDZONG DMAR DGON PA NA, ,AA THU'I SNGAGS
PA GA-YU RDOG GRUB DANG, ,

MTHA' SMUG RDZONG GI BRAG RA NA, AA THU'I SRAS PO GA-YU RDOG
GRUB DANG, AA MTHU GA-YU YI RAL BA CAN YANG ZER,

YI NGOGS SNGAGS PA RNAMS KYI YANG MES YI DAM GYI ZHAL GZIGS, LHA
MOS RIGS RGYUD LA 'GO BA'I SRUNG MAR KHAS

BLANGS; SDE BRGYAD BRAN DU 'KHOL, PHUR BU LA ME 'BAR BAS DPAL
RTZE ME 'BAR DU GRAGS, DGRA BGEGS

KLAD 'GEM ZER BA'I RNGA DUS PHYIS PAR YOD SKAD, BRAG DMAR PO
KHER SKYES KYI STENG NA RDZONG BRTZIGS SHUL DANG,

BRAG 'DABS NA SGRUB PA'I KE'U TSANG YOD,

NUB TU, SHEL DEL CHOS KYI PHO BRANG NA, ,SHEL GYI KA DE'O RGYAL
GRUB DANG, STON PA 'O DE SHAM PO GRUB

ZER; 'DI MA BGRANG NA BRGYAD YIN, MGAR RTZE DGON GONG MA'I PHU
NA ZHI DE'U ZER BA'I RI YOD, GRUB GNAS

KYI BRAG GI DRUNG NA CHU MIG DANG, RI DE LA SHUG NAGS RGYA CHE,

NUB BYANG NA, SKYA RGAN GNAS MO'I PANG BA NA, ,BSE YI RGYAL BA
BYANG CHUB GRUB, ,CES BRAG PHUG NA

YIG 'BRU, RTZE NA RIGS LNGA'I SA BON RANG BYON YOD, DO RI NYIN
NAS KYANG SGRUB PA MDZAD PAS, AA KRON

GYIS; DO RI DPAL GYI RI RTZE NA, ,RGYAL PO'I BLA MCHOD SE STON
GRUB ZER, DER RI RTZE NAS 'PHUR TE RDO LA

SKU RJES BZHAG ,STENG KHAR DGON PA BZUNG BA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG GI
SHING CHA DAM CAN LA GTAD, CHU 'KHOR PHAB

STE NAGS CHEN PO CHU GZHUNG LA DRANGS ZER,

BYANG DU, GONG MO'I GUR KHANG BRAG RTZA NA, ,BON GYI STON PA NAM
MKHA' GRUB DANG, AA 'GRON GYIS, THANG

SKAM BRAG GI RA BA NA, ,SNGAGS BON DRAN PA NAM MKHA' GRUB ZER,
GRUB GNAS BRAG LA AA KAR RANG BYON YOD,

BYANG SHAR DU, BCU GCIG SHEL GYI DGON PA NA, ,KA THOG RDO RJE
DBANG BO GRUB, ,SKAL LDAN GSUNG

DU; SHAR KA THOG NAS BYON PA'I SNGAGS 'CHANG MCHOG ,MTSAN KA BA
RDO RJE DBANG ZHES PA, GNAS SHEL

DGON 'DIR BYON 'JA' LUS BRNYES ZHES DANG, LHA BDE MCHOG RDO RJE
PHAG MO DANG, ,SRAS NYE BA'I SEMS

DPA' MCHED BRGYAD DANG, ,DPAL AU RGYAN PAD MA RANG BYON SOGS,
,SKU RANG GRUB MCHOD RTEN TSA TSA

DANG; ;GSUNG GANtI'I SGRA 'BYIN SHEL BUM DANG, ,THUGS PHYAG
MTSAN RDO DRIL PAD MA DANG, ,GDUGS

RGYAL MTSAN BA DAN ROL MO DANG, ,LHA'I GTZUG TOR LJON SHING PHUR
BU DANG, ,DBYIBS KA BA KA GZHUR SNANG

BA SOGS, ,YA MTSAN PA'I RANG BYON RTEN MANG BZHUGS, ,ZHES
'BYUNG, CHOS PA RIN PO DANG, LI

KY'A SGOM RGAN SHES RAB SENG GE GNYIS 'DIR PHEBS, GRU KYA SGOM
CHEN DGE 'DUN SHES RAB KYIS LHA KHANG BZHENGS,

RJE SKAL LDAN PA YUN RING BZHUGS, BRAG THEM DU, PHYAG ZHABS
DANG, NA BZA'I RJES 'DAM LA BTAB PA

LTA BU BZHAG DE'I DNGOS SLOB 'JAM RAB 'BYAMS PA SBYIN PA RGYA
MTSOS LO BCU GSUM MTSAMS BSDAMS,

DE DAG RJE SKAL LDAN GYIS GRUB THOB TSAD LDAN DU BZHED PAR SNANG
LA, THAMS CAD LHA LUNG DPAL RDOR GYI SLOB MAR

'DOD MKHAN DANG, DPAL RDOR LA GRUB THOB RNAMS KYIS BSKOR BA'I
SPAR YANG SNANG, GANG LTAR SKAL LDAN RAS

@346	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

PAS; SNGON AA MDO'I BSTAN PA SNGA DAR DUS GSUNGS PA NYID TSAD
MAR BYED DGOS, GZHAN YANG, AA

LCAGS GA-YA' MA ME 'BUD, SMAR KHAMS NYI MA THAG STOD, CHU STOD
NYI MA'I 'KHOR LO, SKYID STONG 'KHOR

LO BSGYUR BA, DO MO YE SHES MTSO RGYAL, KHYUNG BO KHYUNG DKAR
TSANGS PA, SKYANG RU CANG SHES, AA GRO MTHU

BA SOGS BAN BON SNGAGS PA'I GRUB THOB MANG DU BYON PAR BSHAD
MOD, T'A RA N'A THAS RANG GI BLA MA GRUB CHEN

BUDDHA GU LTA'I RNAM THAR TU, LHA MO AU MA'I RDO SKU RANG BYUNG
GI DRUNG DU ZHAG 'GA' BZHUGS PAS NUB SNGA MA LA CHO 'PHRUL

CHER BYUNG, GNYIS PA'I THO RANGS KYI DUS SU RDO SKU DE BUD MED
RGYAN GYIS BRGYAN PAR SONG BAS YO BYAD 'GA'

RE PHUL TE RNAL 'BYOR BA NGA RGYAL CHE MI RUNG, TING NGE 'DZIN
CUNG ZAD TZAM 'DUG GRUB PA MA YIN PA NGA PHYAG

MI 'TSAL ZHES ZHUS PAR BSHAD PAS MYONG BA SNA ZIN RES RLOM SEMS
KYIS 'JIG RTEN PA MTHU BO CHE RNAMS KYANG MGO

BSKOR MI THUB LA, GANGS TE SER N'A RO BON CHUNG GIS RNGA ZHON TE
NAM MKHA' LA SONG BA RJE BTZUN MI LAS GZIGS

PA TZAM GYIS RNGA RBAB LA SHOR, 'DI PA 'BRUG PA PAD DKAR GYIS
BON CHUNG MING SRING GNYIS LAS NUS PA CHE SHOS

SRING MO YIN, BON GYI LO RGYUS LA, BSAM YAS SU 'KHRUNGS PA CO SA
BON MO, BLA MA TSE DBANG RIG 'DZIN GYI YUM

CHE'I RIG 'DZIN BRNYES PA DE YIN, N'A RO BON CHUNG DE'I SLOB MA
YIN ZER, STAG LA ME 'BAR GYI SPRUL PA YIN

YANG ZER, GANG LTAR MI LAS MING PO RDZU 'PHRUL GYIS BTUL, SRING
MO PHYAG RGYAR MDZAD DE DVANGS MA DBANG DU

BSDUS PAS THUL ZHES BSHAD LA, BSAM GTAN LA BRTEN PA'I MNGON SHES
DANG PO LNGA PHYI ROL BA DANG THUN MONG BA

YIN ZHING, GONG MA'I SEMS MA THOB KYANG, RDZU 'PHRUL GSANG
SNGAGS SMAN DAG DANG, ,LAS LAS SKYE DANG

RNAM PA LNGA, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA BZHIN SNA TSOGS PA ZHIG YOD PAS
THAR BA 'DOD NA THAR LAM MA NOR BA 'TSOL DGOS

KYI SDUG BSNGAL YANG 'BYUNG SRID PA'I SGRUB THABS KYIS CI ZHIG
BYA, MDOR NA DMA PA GONG MAS, YID NGOR LHA'I

NGA RGYAL GSAL SNANG, GTUM MO RLUNG SBYOR, 'BAR 'DZAG SOGS PHYI
ROL PA LA YANG YOD, THO COS RANG

MTHOR RLOMS PAS CIS PHAN, RANG GI SEMS KYI 'GRO TSOD RTOGS DANG
GAR SLEB MYONG BAS 'GRUB, KHA BO SU

BYAS NGOS ZIN YONG, ZHES GSUNGS PA BZHIN BLUN PO CHU SNA GAR
KHRID MI BYED PAR, MNYAM MED JO BO CHEN PO DANG

RJE BLA MA'I RNAM THAR GTZANG MA'I RJES SU ZHUGS NA 'DI PHYI
GNYIS KAR MNGON MTSAN CHUNG LA SA CHOD CHE BAR 'ONG SNANG

LA; GRUB PA THOB MA THOB YANG, DON DAM PA'I CHOS RANG RGYUD LA
GRUB MA GRUB KYIS 'JOG TSUL RGYAL BA BYAMS

PA MGON POS GSUNGS PAS BKA' BSTAN TSANG MA DBANG BOR BYED PA GAL
CHE'O, ,

RONG BO MAR NANG TSO LNGA'I SA CHAR, SHING LAS KA BKRA SHIS CHOS
RDZONG NI, RONG BO'I YANG MES MDO SDE 'BUM GYI

SRAS 'BRING BO GSUM GYI RGYUD PA YAR NANG MAR NANG GNYIS, RDO
SBIS RONG BO GSUM GYI NANG SO YIN LA BSHAD TSUL

GZHAN YANG SNANG, DE GSUM KAR CHES RJES BSAM GTAN RIN CHEN PAS
DGON SDE BTZUGS, RONG BO'I BLA

MA SKU MDUN PA SOGS KYIS BSKYANGS PAR BSHAD PA'I NANG TSAN YIN
'DRA, 'DI KA'I NANG SO BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO

CHOS PA RIN PO CHE YAB SRAS KYI SKU DPON DU GTOGS SHING YAR NANG
NANG SO BYAS, PHYAG PHYIR DBUS SU LAN GNYIS

@347	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

PHYIN; RTEN GSUM 'GA' ZHIG GDAN DRANGS PA 'DIR BZHUGS, DE'I RJES
MA NANG SO DBANG GRAGS DAR RGYAS

KYIS DBUS SU RGYAL RONG DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS LA TSE DBANG
ZHUS, KHONG GIS TSE SKU BYIN CAN GNANG BA DA

LTA 'DU KHANG DU BZHUGS, DE'I RTEN 'BREL GYIS TSE RING BO BYUNG
ZER, DE'I RJES MA NANG SO BTZAN PO MA DPON JU NANG

GI ZHABS PHYIR DBUS SU SONG, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHER BKA' SHOG
ZHUS, DE'I RJES MA NANG SO RGYA LDAN BLO BZANG

BSAM 'GRUB, 'DI BAR DGON CHEN NAS 'DZIN BDAG GIS MTSAN NYID KYI
'CHAD NYAN YOD KYANG 'DZIN SKYONG

RIM LHOD DU SONG BA LA NANG SO RGYA LDAN GIS RGYAL MKHAN PO BLA
MAR DGOS TSUL GYI 'DOD BTZUGS PAS SHAR BLA BRANG

LA DGONGS PHOG BYUNG, DE'I RKYEN GYIS NANG SOS GTZOS DGON PA'I
CHE BGRES THAMS CAD 'DOD MTHUN GYIS KUN

MKHYEN 'JIGS MED ZHABS KA MDOR BZHUt PA LA DGON PA PHUL BAR, RE
ZHIG 'THEN NA GROS BYED GSUNGS, RAB

BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I LCAGS BYI LOR PAn CHEN RGYA PHEBS DUS SHAR
SKU ZHABS PHYAG MDZOD BCAS SKU 'BUM DU MJAL

BAR BYON, DE SKABS KUN MKHYEN MCHOG NAS MAR NANG NANG SOS NYID
LA DGON PA PHUL KYANG DANG BZHES MA GNANG

TSUL DANG, KHO RANG TSO'I 'DOD MOS KYI BLA MA RE GNANG STE SNGAR
RGYUN GTAN CHAGS DGOS TSUL GYI RGYU MTSAN BYAS

PA'I LAN DU, NGED TSOL 'DOD BSTUN GYI BLA MA BSKO RGYU DKA', DE
'DRA'I BLA MA RE NYID NAS BSKOS CHOG TSUL

DANG; PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE NAS KYANG DE BSTUN GYI BKA' PHEBS
'KHRUN CHOD PA BSTZAL TE YIG DAN BZHAG DE

NAS BZUNG BDAG GIR MDZAD DE 'DU KHANG BSKYAR BSKRUN LA THEBS
DANG, SHING BZO LHA BZO PA BCAS MNGAGS

TE BKOD KHYAB GANG DGOS GNANG, RJE NYID SNGA PHYIR PHEBS NAS
CHOS DANG ZANG ZING GI BKA' DRIN TSAD MED

PAS BSKYANGS, THOG MA'I 'CHAD NYAN PAR DUS 'KHOR SLOB ZUR RAB
BRTAN RGYA MTSO BA BSKOS,

CHOS RJE RDO RAMS PA SER DRIS NI, CHUNG DUS SHEL DGON GYI RI
KHROD PA YIN PAS SER DRIS THOGS, BKRA

SHIS 'KHYIL DU CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, SDE RGAN TSANG LAS BRTZI BZHAG
THGO MAR NYAN, GNAS BRTAN PA DANG BIS

MDO BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS PA GNYIS LA KHAS LEN DRIS, PO TI LHAG MA
RNAMS DANG, CHOS BKA' PHAL CHER TSANGS

SRAS DGYES PA'I RDO RJE LA ZHUS, GRVA THOG DER BGRO GLENG GTONG
MKHAN GYI RTZER SON, RDO RAMS PA THON,

TSOGS CHEN DGE BSKOS BYAS, THOS BSAM GLING ZUR DU PHYE BA'I
'GRIG LAM LA DAG THER DMAR, 'GRIG

LAM SPYI DANG BCA' YIG ZUR 'DEBS RE RE'I GLENG GZHI BYUNG BA
RGYU MTSAN MTHA' DAG NGES SHING LHAG BSAM CHE BA'I

TSAD DU GRAGS, THOR GOD JA SAG GI BLA MA DANG, 'DI KA'I KHRI PA
BYAS, SKU ZHABS DRUNG DU BLA KHAG LA MI

BSKO BA'I MGO 'DREN ZHUS TE KUN RIG CHAG MED KHA 'DON SOGS DGE
SBYOR TSE DANG BSNYAMS, GYA BZHI BA LA

GSHEGS; DE NAS BLA MA DKAR DKAR SPRUL SKU, BLA MA BRAG DKAR BA,
SGO MANG MKHAN SPRUL SKAL BZANG

DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO, RGYAL MKHAN CHEN GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN, 'DI
PAS GRVS TSOGS NYUNG BAS MTSAN NYID LA

SHOG MI 'BYUNG BAR DGONGS TE RGYUD GRVAR BSGYUR, RAB 'BYAMS PA
SHES RAB PHUL BYUNG, RKANG TSA'I ZHANG LA'I

DGE BSHES 'JIGS MED MKHAS MCHOG STAG GE SPRUL SKU DKON MCHOG
RGYA MTSO, KVA RING BSTAN 'DZIN,

@348	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

STAG LUNG SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG NYI MA, TZA YUS THOG KA ZHABS
DRUNG, RDZIS TSANG SMYUNG GNAS PA'I SPRUL SKU, MDZOD

DGE BLO BZANG BSTAN PA, KA MDO'I ZHABS DRUNG DKON MCHOG CHOS
'BYOR, YANG TZA YUS THOG KA ZHABS

DRUNG; TSO 'DU RGYU DZUR DGE 'DUN RGYAL MTSAN GYI SPRUL SKU SOGS
DANG, SNANG RA'I RDO RAMS PA NGAG DBANG

YON TAN, RKANG TSA'I RDO RAMS PA DON YOD SOGS RIM BSKOS KYIS
BSKYANGS, ` RJE SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I

SKU GDUNG RONG BO YAR NANG NA BZHUGS PA RTZOD GLENG BYUNG SKABS
MAR NANG NANG SO BTZAN PO MAS BRKU BAR BRTZAMS

KYANG MA THEGS, NGED GNYIS KHYOD KYI SKU RUS YIN PA MNYAM PO LA
KHYAD BYED DON CI YOD CES YUS GSOL BAS SKU

GDUNG NAM MKHA' LA 'PHUR TE BYON PA 'DIR BZHUGS, YANG MES KYI
DUS SA SKYA NAS GDAN DRANGS PA'I GUR

ZHAL GYI BRIS SKU NANG BZHUGS KYI MGON KHANG SHIN TU GNYAN,
GZHAN YANG NANG RTEN MANG, KUN MKHYEN SKU

'PHRENG GSUM PAS BYAMS CHEN THOG TSAD DANG MNYAM PA, RGYAB YOL
LA GNAS BRTAN BCU DRUG BZHUGS PA NGO

MTSAR BA BZHENGS, GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYIS BZHI BA'I
SMON LAM GYI THEBS BZHAG BLA MCHOD KHRID

DANG; KUN RIG DBANG SOGS CHOS KYI CHAR PHABS, BEE SER DU, DGON
'OG MA'ANG THOG MAR SA SKYA,

SLAR BSAM BLO DPAL LDAN CHOS GRAGS PAS DGE LUGS 'CHAD NYAN
BTZUGS, DA LTA PHUN TSOGS RGYA MTSO'I SKABS

GSUNGS PA 'DI YIN 'DRA, RGYA'I DUS KYI NANG SO KHAG BZHI NI
'PHRANG YAR NANG MAR NANG GI NANG SO 'DI GNYIS DANG,

MGAR RTZE DANG RDO SBIS NANG SO BZHI LA ZER, ` RJE SKAL LDAN GYI
GDAN SA GSUM GYI NANG TSAN BRAG DKAR PHUN TSOGS

GLING DU RJE NYID RGYUN RING BZHUGS, RI KHROD PA BRGYA LHAG
'DUS, LNGA PA CHEN POR MTSAN ZHUS, BSHAD

SGRUB KYI SDE GNYIS KA DBON PO DKA' BCU BA PHUN TSOGS KYIS
BTZUGS PAR BSHAD CING, SGRUB SDE BCO BRGYAD

KYI GRANGS SU 'DREN MKHAN SNANG, CHOS PA RIN PO CHE YAB SRAS
GNYIS, BLA MA DKAR DKAR GRAGS PA LHUN

GRUB; DMAR DMAR PHUN TSOGS DAR RGYAS BZHI SKU MCHED YIN LA, PHYI
MA 'DI DKA' BCU PHUN TSOGS DANG

GCIG GAM SNYAM, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLA MA RONG RGAN DBUS KYI DGE
BSHES GRAGS CAN, RI KHROD 'DIR RGYUN BZHUGS

MDZAD PAS BRAG DKAR TSANG ZER, DE'I SPRUL SKU KA MDO ZHABS DRUNG
DKON MCHOG CHOS 'BYOR, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL

GYI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, SLOB GNYER AANG DANG, RANG DGON GYI KHRIR
BZHUGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU 'JAM DBYANGS

BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU BKA' POTA KYIS MTSON
MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS THAMS CAD LA

MKHAS PAR SBYANGS, KUN GZIGS MTHONG BA DON LDAN MCHOG LA BSNYEN
PAR RDZOGS TE YAS SRAS THAMS CAD LA

CHOS BKA' RGYA CHER GSAN, GRO TSANG DANG MCHOD RTEN SHAR GYI
KHRI GNANG, DA LTA SGRUB SDE SKYONG BAR YOD, STAG

GE DON YOD RGYA MTSO DANG, DE'I DBON PO BRAG DKAR DKA' BCU RIN
PO CHE NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA YUN RING

BZHUGS; 'DI PA 'KHRUNGS SA DGU RMA 'DRES MDO DANG NYE BA BRA
KYONG, GSER KHA PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I

DRUNG DU KUN MKHYEN GONG MA YAB SRAS NAS BRGYUD PA'I GDAMS PA
MANG DU GSAN, DBUS SU PHEBS, KUN

MKHYEN BAR MA LAS LO KHA SHAS KYIS RGAN KYANG GZHUNG GSAR NAS
'DZIN GVA GCIG BYAS, THUGS GNYER LEGS,

@349	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

BLA MA BYAMS PA RIN PO CHE LAS LAM KHRID DANG, BDE GSANG 'JIGS
GSUM GYI BSKYED RDZOGS KYI KHRID LAN MANG

PO GSAN PA'I GSUNG BSHAD THUGS NAS BSNYEL BA MED PAR MA ZAD TSIG
RIS MA NOR BA SKU'I RNAM 'GYUR DANG BCAS

GZHAN LA 'CHAD NUS, SKU ZHABS DANG LHAN DU YANG DGON SNGAGS RAMS
PA LAS SGRUB THABS RIN 'BYUNG DANG,

'PHRUL 'KHOR SOGS KYI KHRID GSAN TSE BCA' SHOMS, DPE RIS 'BRI BA
SOGS MTHA' DAG RJE 'DI DANG, MTSO

KHA'I BSOD NAMS ZLA BA GNYIS KYIS MDZAD, PHYIR PHEBS NAS KUN
MKHYEN LA DGONGS BSTUN ZHUS TE, SLAR

YANG GSER KHA PA'I DRUNG DU PHEBS, MAN NGAG ZHUN THAR BCAD, BLA
MA THUGS SHIN TU MNYES SHING MAN NGAG 'DI

DAG SLAR BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL LA 'PHROD PA ZHIG CIS KYANG DGOS
GSUNGS PA BZHIN THUGS DGONGS RDZOGS PAR

MDZAD; SKU ZHABS NAS NGAG DBANG WANG GI ZHABS BRTAN DU, RENGS
PA'I 'PHRUL 'KHOR BSGRUB SKABS ZHABS

PHYI ZHUS PA SOGS CHA GANG NAS KYANG BKA' BZHIN BSGRUB PA'I TSAD
DU 'KHYOL, SGRUB SDE'I BA LANG 'GA' RKUN MAS

KHYER DUS AU TSUGS KYIS ZHUS PA BZHIN MNGON SPYOD KYI LTAS
BSTAN, 'DI DUS ZHAL NAS, RI KHROD PA CHOS DA

LAN RTAGS SHIG STON DGOS ZER NAS CI DRAG GANG DRAG LA THUG 'DUG
GZHAN BYED RGYU MI SNANG, KA LA RU BA SHA

TSA MED PAR THON BYAS PA YIN, DGUNG GCIG RMI LAM LA 'DU KHANG
PHUG TU, WANG RDO RJE PHA LAM BZHUGS

'DUG PA'I MDUN NA NANG KHROL BTZOS PA MANG PO SPUNGS, PHYAG TU
BLANGS TE ZHAL DU BZHES NYAMS LA RGYU RLON DU GYUR

NAS RGYAB TU 'PHEN GI 'DUG DE NI STAG RGAN GYIS ZAS TSAR BA SLAR
BSKYUGS TE GSOL BA'I BRDAR NGES, KLA

KLO BRAN DU 'KHOL RMIS NA, DE NAS LAS KYI SBYOR BA BRTZAM GSUNGS
YOD AANG GSUNGS, DUS RGYUN MKHAS

NYAMS DANG NUS PA YOD PA'I TSUL MI 'CHOS KYANG BLA MA'I GDAMS
NGAG GIS THUGS RGYUD PHYUG PA RIM GNYIS KYI RNAL

'BYOR LA DBANG ZHING, GSANG CHEN GDAMS PA'I GTER MDZOD DU GYUR
PA ZHIG SNANG, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU YANG

YANG PHEBS, ZAB RGYAS MAN NGAG GI CHAR PHABS, CHOS GRVA'I THAL
SKAD GSAN DUS 'DI GO NA NGAN SONG DU MI

'GRO ZHES THUGS SMON MDZAD PA BZHIN SPRUL PA'I SKU YANG BKRA
SHIS 'KHYIL GYI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, RJES SOR SNGA MA'I

'BREL GYIS GSER KHA SPRUL SKU'I ZHABS BSTEN TE DER BZHUGS, BLA
MA DMAR DMAR GYIS BZHENGS PA'I BYAMS

SKU ZHAL RAS LA RDUL MI CHAGS PA'I BYIN CAN BZHUGS PA'I BYAMS
KHANG, SKU GSHEGS PA'I GDUNG RUS LA YIG

'BRU BYON PA 'JAM DBYANGS DANG, GSHEGS KHAR MI 'KHRUGS PA'I
ZHING DU SKYES PA'I SNGA LTAS ME TOG SNGON PO NAM

MKHA' NAS BABS PA MTHONG BA'I DKAR DGE SOGS RI KHROD PA TSAD
LDAN 'GA' BYUNG BAS DENG SANG YANG THAMS

CAD KYIS DAD GUS LHUR BYED PA ZHIG YOD,

LE BO BSAM 'GRUB BDE LDAN STAG GE SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG DGE 'DUN
BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS BTAB PA YAR NANG

STAG GE RIM BYON GYIS SKYONG, ` SHUGS RI RI KHROD 'GA' DVAGS
ZHABS DRUNG GIS BDAG BYED, ` BIS THANG LA KHA'I

SGAR; ` DE'I RI KHROD BKRA SHIS DGE 'PHEL CHU DMAR GONG MAS BTAB
'DRA, DA LTA BIS PA TSANG GIS SKYONG, ` LUNG

PA'I RKED NA RDO KER LANGS KA BA LTA BU YOD PAS KVA RING DU
THOGS PA'I SAR, KVA RING RI KHROD THAR BA GLING MKHYEN

@350	(DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RAB KYI DBANG PHYUG STAG GE DON YOD RGYA MTSOS BTAB, SKAL LDAN
RNAM THAR TU AA KRONG DKA' BCUS THAR BA GLING

DU SGRUB SDE BTZUGS GSUNGS PA 'DI DANG GCIG MIN BRTAG 'DEBS PA
BO NYID BRA KYONG NAS 'KHRUNGS, RGYAL

SRAS BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN PA'I RNAM 'PHRUL DU GRAGS, CHOS PA
RIN PO CHE YAB SRAS LA GTUGS, ZAB RGYAS

KYI CHOS MANG DU GSAN, GSER KHANG DBEN GNAS, AAN CHUNG GNAM
RDZONG SOGS SU THUGS DAM LA GZHOL,

YUL BA RNAMS KYI 'DOD MOS BZHIN SGRUB SDE 'DI NYID BTAB, THOG
MAR DGE 'DUN 'DUS PA'I LHA GRANGS LA BDE

GSANG 'JIGS GSUM DANG MGON CHOS ZHAL 'DON DU BTZUGS, BCA' YIG
KYANG BZHAG LAM KHRID LAN

MANG DU GNANG BAS LAM RIM CHEN MO THUGS LA BYANG BA RKYANG MANG
RAB 'BYAMS PA DANG, DKA' BCU LHUN GRUB,

RI LAS MI 'BAB PA DANG CHOS BRGYAD MGO SNYOMS KYI DAM BCA' BRTAN
PA TSUL KHRIMS DAR RGYAS DANG, SGOM CHEN

DON GRUB PA SOGS DANG, RDE'U DKAR NAG 'GREM PA'I SLOB MA MANG DU
THON, GSUNG RTZOM LTA KHRID BLO MUN

SEL BYED, GDUGS DKAR SNGAGS DON, MGUR MA DANG BSANG MCHOD 'GA'
ZHIG KYANG SNANG, GYA GSUM

PA LA GSHEGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG DGE 'DUN BSTAN 'DZIN BIS
THANG 'JA' MOR YAB KLU 'BUM RGYAL

DANG; YUM 'JIGS SKYID KYI SRAS SU SA RTA LOR 'KHRUNGS, SKU GONG
MA'I SKU DBON DKA' BCU RIN PO CHE NGAG

ZHUGS, GTZANG SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN

RGYAN TSOGS RGYUG TU PHUL, 'GREL BA DON

CHOS MNGON RIN CHEN 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA,

RJE BTZUN PA'I 'DUL BA SOGS THUGS 'DZIN GYIS BKA' POTA YONGS
RDZOGS LA SBYANGS, MKHAN CHEN MCHOG GIS

BSDUS GRVA GSAR RTZOM GYI PHYAG GA-YOG DANG, KUN MKHYEN BAR MAR
LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO'I BSHAD LUNG 'BUL DUS

YI GE SNYAN 'BUL ZHU BA GNANG, KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED ZHABS, RGYAL
MKHAN PO SOGS BLA BA MANG DU

BSTEN; BDE CHEN DPON SLOB LAS SGRA DANG SNYAN NGAG BSLAB, SPANG
LUG BRAG TU SNGA DRO GCIG LA BDE LAM BYANG

BAR BZUNG NAS KHRID BSKYANGS, DGON CHEN DU RGYUD PA'I KHRIR
BZHUGS TE 'CHAD NYAN GYIS MTSON PHYAG RJES CHE, DE

KA'I RGYUD GRVA NAS DBYANGS DPON BLANGS TE 'JIGS BYED SGRUB
MCHOD DANG MGON PO'I GTOR SGRUB TSUGS, DGUNG

ZA BA YOD MED SOGS LA NYID NAS GZIGS RTOG GIS 'GRIG 'GAL BYUNG
NA GNAS NAS DBYUNG BA SOGS DO DAM

MCHED CHOS 'PHEL RGYA MTSO PAS THUGS DAM GSAL

RUNG SEMS GTAD NA RTAGS RNAMS GSAL

YOD, 'DI LA SPRUL SKU GNYIS BYUNG

DGON CHEN DANG LE BO SOGS SU BZHUGS, KVA

THAG GCAD, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU THUGS GNYER

KYI KHRIR BZHUGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG

ZHES MCHAN BTAB, KshE tA PA LAS 'CHAD NYAN

KshE tA PA LA NI 'BRAS SGO MANG BSAM BLO

BA; DPON SLOB HOR GYI DUS KYI DGE BSHES PO TI LNGA DANG MDO
SNGAGS LA KHO BO'O SNYAM PA'I MKHAS DBANG SHIN TU

GRAGS CAN DU KUN MKHYEN GONG MAS GSUNGS, DE'I SKYE BA BYA KHYUNG
MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG NOR BU YIN ZER, RGYAL

DBANG MTSO KHAR PHEBS DUS BIS MDO'I DKA' BCU BYA BAS MJAL 'DUG
BEE SER DU, BSAM BLO GRAGS PA

RGYA MTSOS BTZUGS, DA LTA DKA' BCU DON 'GRUB PA'I SKABS ZHES
BSHAD GANG LTAR CHOS RJE GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN

PA'I GTZOS SER SKYA KUN GYIS GA-YER GSHONG 'JAM DBYANGS BLO GROS
LA DGON PA PHUL, KHONG GIS 'GA' DAG

PRA NYE NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS PA'I

GRVA TSANG GI GZHI ZIN, DE'I SPRUL SKU BSTAN

THON NAS 'BRAS BLA MA GZHUNG LAS PA

NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS PA'I SKU TSA 'JAM

NAS GNANG, DE'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN LCAGS BYA LA
KHRIR BZHUGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO GROS 'JAM

DBYANGS KYANG KHRI THON ZIN PA'I SKABS SO, ` ,GA-YER GSHONG
CHUNG BA DGE 'DUN BSTAN DAR PAS SA KHYI NAS LO

BCU BSKYANGS; ` SA SPREL LA CHU DMAR SPRUL SKU DGE 'DUN 'PHRIN
LAS LHUN GRUB BZHUGS, ` SHING STAG NAS

BIS THANG DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSOS LO BDUN BSKYANGS, 'DI YON TAN
SPYI DANG LHA BRIS RTZER SON, DE'I SPRUL SKU

DNGOS GRUB DPAL LDAN PHUN TSOGS, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG TSUL
KHRIMS BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO, GSER KHA

BSOD RGYAM PA'I SPRUL SKU DGE 'DUN DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO, CHU
DMAR CHUNG BA LUG RVA SPRUL SKU THUB BSTAN BKRA SHIS

LUNG RIGS NOR BU SOGS THAMS CAD SKYE RGYUD DANG NANG KHAG CAN
SKU 'PHRENG RIM BYON GYIS CHOS SDE'I 'CHAD NYAN GYI

KHUR BZHES BZHIN PAR YOD, SA PAn GYI SHANGS KHRAG GIS BZHENGS
PA'I ZHAL GYI SKU THANG BLA MA BKA' BZHI BAS

SA SKYA NAS SPYAN DRANGS PA NANG BZHUGS KYI MGON KHANG, BLA MA
DE NYID KYIS BZHENGS PA'I BYAMS SKU, GSER

'PHAGS; BYANG CHUB MCHOD RTEN RNAMS DANG, STONG 'KHOR MDO RGYUD
RGYA MTSO'I SKU CHOS NANG BZHUGS KYI GSER

GDUNG; DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS LHA KHANG, BCU GCIG ZHAL GYI LHA
KHANG, SGUR TSANG LHA KHANG DU GRAGS

PA'I BYAMS KHANG, 'DU KHANG RNAMS SU BKA' 'GYUR BRIS MA DPAR MA
TSAR DU MAS GTZOS RTEN GSUM MANG DU

BZHUGS; DBYAR GNAS YONGS RDZOGS DANG, LNGA MCHOD NYIN NYI SHU,
DUS BZHIR ZLA BA RE LA CHOS THOG

BTANG STE SGO MANG YIG CHA GSAR BA'I STENG NAS 'CHAD NYAN 'PHEL
BAR YOD, SMON LAM NYIN NYI SHUR DGON MA

LAG LNGA'I DGE 'DUN RNAMS MNYAM 'TSOGS KYIS SMON LAM GSUNG CHOS
KYI 'DON PHYAG LEN GANG RGYAS, MJUG

TU 'CHAM CHEN GTOR RGYAG DANG BCAS PA SNANG, ` CHU DMAR CHE BA'I
RDO PHUG RI KHROD, STAG GE BAR MAS BTAB

PA ZAB MO RI KHROD BIS THANG DPAL LDAN SKU PHRENG GIS SKYONG, `
RA KHO'I KHANG MO RI KHROD NI, SKAL LDAN RNAM THAR TU,

RGYUD PA CHOS RJES KHANG CHEN RI KHROD BTAB ZER BA DE YIN 'DRA,
DA LTA GA-YER GSHONG CHUNG BAS KHA 'DZIN BYED,

` 'DI RNAMS SU BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM, SMAN BLA, THUGS RJE CHEN
PO, KLU DBANG RGYAL PO SOGS YI

DAM LHAG LHA DU MA'I SGRUB RGYUN YAR LDAN MCHIS, ` GCU 'KHOR
GSANG SNGAGS CHOS SDINGS NI, SNGON 'DI DANG

NYE BA'I KHANG MOR BLA MA RVA KHO BAS BTAB PA'I SGRUB SDE ZHIG
YOD PA KUN MKHYEN BAR MA LA PHUL, RVA KHO BLA MA YE SHES

BSKOS; RIM GYIS RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME BYA LO NAS CHOS
SDINGS 'DIR 'DU KHANG GZIMS KHANG GI GZHI

BTING; ME LUG LOR GRUB STE RAB GNAS SOGS GANG CI'I MGO 'DREN
GYIS GSANG 'JIGS KYI SGRUB MCHOD SOGS

RGYUD SMAD PHYAG LEN NGOS GTZANG TSUGS, THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHES
SNGA PHYIR BDE MCHOG SGRUB MCHOD THEBS SU DNGUL

SRANG NYIS BRGYA DANG CHAS 'JUG CHA 'GRIG LNGA BCU, RDOR DRIL
SUM CU SOGS MCHOD RDZAS GANG DGOS BZHAG

RGYAL MKHAN CHEN GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN PAS 'DU KHANG GSAR BZHENGS
KYI RGYU RKYEN, BSTAN 'GYUR BCAS SBYOR

MA YE SHES, RAB 'BYAMS PA YE SHES

@353 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

DAR RGYAS, RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG RGYAL MTSAN, STAG RING ZHABS
DRUNG, RDO RAMS PA BLO BZANG

NYAN BAR SKABS SU NYAMS PA SNGAGS RAMS PA 'JAM DBYANGS BDE CHEN
BLA MA'I SKABS GSOS, BYAMS KHANG DU

BYAMS SKU CHE BA GA-YAS GA-YON DU RJE DANG KUN MKHYEN BAR MA'I
'DRA SKU, BKA' 'GYUR CHA TSANG, 'DU KHANG DU

JO BO LO KI SHVA RA'I SNANG BRNYAN SOGS MANG BO DANG BSTAN
'GYUR, STENG SHOD DU DAM CAN BTZAN KHANG BCAS

BZHUGS; ` BSE CHANG DU DGON RNYING ZHIG YOD PA RDO SBIS NANG SO
SOGS SER SKYA GROS MTHUN GYIS KUN MKHYEN RIN

PO CHER PHUL, DGON PA 'DEBS YUL GYI SA LA GZIGS TE DGON GNAS
SPOR, GTZANG DGON BYED DGOS

KYI BKOD KHYAB DANG, 'DU KHANG SOGS GSAR BSKRUN GYI MTHUN RKYEN
SBYOR 'JAGS BCAS THUGS RJES BSKYANGS

PAS RDUL TSON LA BRTEN PA'I KUN RIG DANG DUS 'KHOR SGRUB MCHOD
NGOS GTZANG SOGS BSOD NAMS KYI ZHING KHYAD

'PHAGS ZHIG BYUNG SNANG, BLA MA THOG MAR RAB 'BYAMS PA DKON
MCHOG BSTAN 'DZIN SHING SPREL LO PA, DUS

'KHOR CHO GA PHYAG LEN LA MKHAS PA'I RTZER SON, KUN RIG SGRUB
MCHOD BTZUGS, DE NAS DUS 'KHOR PA

MDZOD DGE BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN SOGS RIM PAR BSKOS, ZHANG LA'I
CHOS GRAGS KHRI'I SKABS, DUS 'KHOR

GSAR 'DZUGS BYAS, BSE CHANG SGOM GRVA, HOR BLO GSAL RGYA MTSO
DANG, GSER KHA BSOD RGYAM PA THUN

MONG GIS BTAB ZER, DMAG DPON SGOM GRVA, 'DI BLO GSAL BAS DANG,
SNGA MA BSTAN RGYAM PA ZHES SUM

PAS BSHAD,

BOD DANG ZA LAR GYI MTSAMS SU SNGA DUS GRUB CHEN BRGYAD CUS
BZHENGS SHING, SANGS RGYAS 'OD SRUNG GI

'PHEL GDUNG LHUNG BZED GANG NANG BZHUGS SU YOD PA'I MCHOD RTEN,
DNGOS GTER DU SBAS PAR GRAGS SHING,

SA STEGS LTA BU'I GRU BZHI CHEN PO ZHIG PHYIR THON PA'I STENG DU
DPON SLOB GSER KHANG PAS GSAR BZHENGS MCHOD

RTEN; ;LO'U GYA SGAR, DE'I BDAG PO LO'U KYA'I SKU SKYE DGE 'DUN
PHUN TSOGS GSER KHANG RJE DANG SGO DMAR BLO

BZANG RGYA MTSO SOGS BSTEN TE RI KHROD 'GRIM PA SHA RDZONG DU
BZHUGS, ` 'DAB MA'I SGAR, RDO SBIS NANG SO'I

GZHIS KAR GUR BYIN CAN BZHUGS PA'I MGON KHANG LA BLA MA LUNG
PA'I SGAR YANG ZER, ` GDONG SNA'I SGAR SO MA,

BLO BZANG DGA' BA'I SPRUL SKUS KUN MKHYEN GSUM PA LA DGON GNAS
ZHUS, SGO RIS GRVA TSANG LAS ZUR DU PHYE NAS

BTAB; 'DEBS PA PO LA GDONG SNA'I SKU SKYE ZER, LHA SDE DUD KHA
BRGYA LHAG TZAM YOD, ` MDO RTZE SGAR, ` RTZI

RGYANG SGOM GRVA ` SPEL LUNG SGRUB SDE SKYID PHUG NYI MA RDZONG,
'DI RONG BO DGE RIN GONG MAS DANG, SNGA MA RDZONG DKAR

PAS ZHES SUM PA GSUNGS, ` LCANG SHAR SGAR MKHA' 'GRO MA BLO
BZANG CHOS SGRON GYI NGAG BKOD LTAR, SBYIN BDAG

KHA SHI PAN BSOD NAMS BKRA SHIS DANG, CHOS RJE KUN DGA' LEGS PA
GNYIS KYIS BTAB, CHOS RJE BKRA

SHIS LHUN GRUB, GSER KHANG CHOS RJE 'PHRIN LAS PHUN TSOGS, CHOS
RJE 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO SOGS KYIS GRVA

TSANG BSKYANGS, DE NAS SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO, DE'I SLOB CHUNG DU
RAB 'BYAMS PA PHUN TSOGS BKRA SHIS ZHES SKAL

@354 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG DU GSUNGS, RNAM THAR TU, RGAN GYA'I BLA MA DKAR
DKAR DU GRAGS PA RIN CHEN BKRA SHIS RGYA BOD

GNYIS KAS BRTZI 'JOG CHE BA'I BSOD NAMS CAN GYIS GDAN DRANGS PA
DANG, RGAN GYA'I BLA MA'I GRVA TSANG GI BLA MA

MDZAD TSUL SNANG, 'DEBS PA PO SDE BA CHOS RJE'I RNAM THAR DUG
SAL BA'I DBYIG KYA DKA' BCU KUN DGA' LEGS

PA DANG, KHA GYA'I TZUNG LI BSOD NAMS BKRA SHIS MCHOD YON YIN
'DRA, RGYAS KHA KYA ZI ZER BA 'DEBS

MKHAN SBYIN BDAG MING GIS THOGS SNYAM, DA LTA YANG NANG SO YOD,
LCANG SHAR AA LAGS CHE CHUNG GNYIS LA SKYE RGYUD

KYANG SNANG, BTAB PA'I LO NI RIGS LDAN SA SKYONG GIS CHOS BSTAN
NAS LO BRGYA SONG BAR RAB BYUNG BCU BA'I MJUG

ZAD PA ME STAG YIN PAR KUN MKHYEN BSTAN RTZIS RE'U MIG TU GSUNGS
PAS, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI BA'I SHING GLANG

'DI YAN LA LO NYIS BRGYA DANG SO DGU SONG, CHOS PA RIN PO CHES
BYAMS SKU BZHENGS RGYU'I THEBS DANG MGO 'DREN

MDZAD; DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS LHA KHANG YOD, ` 'DI DANG NYE BAR
SKAL LDAN SGRUB GNAS SHA RDZONG, ` BIS

RA'I SGOM GRVA THANG RING AA LAGS NA RIM GYIS SKYONG, ` RDZONG
DKAR DAR RGYAS PAS BTAB PA AAN GI SGOM GRVA ` SGO

RIS GRVA TSANG SNGON GYI DGON RNYING, GRUB MTHA' SA SKYA, RONG
BO'I KHRI BA BLO BZANG DGA' BAS DGE LUGS SU BSGYUR

TE DGE LDAN 'PHEL RGYAS GLING ZHES BTAGS, RGYAL BLO BZANG NYI MA
GDAN DRANGS TE GRVA TSANG BTZUGS PA NAS SKU

'PHRENG RIM BYON LA 'JAGS, BTZAN PO'I BSDUS GRVA DANG, YIG CHA
GZHAN RNAMS SGO MANG YIG CHA'I STENG NAS

'CHAD NYAN MA NYAMS PAR YOD, DGON LAG BCU GSUM YOD PA NI, LCANG
SHAR MA TOGS PA GONG 'OG GI SGAR

SGOM GRVA 'DI DAG YIN, MCHOD GZHIS RDO SBIS TSO LNGA, SMAD PA
TSO BDUN BCAS SNANG, GUR MGON LHA KHANG DANG,

GNAS BCU'I LHA KHANG GRUB DBANG SKAL LDAN GYI RAB GNAS MA, DE
DUS KYI PHYAG NAS SHING DANG RTZIG LOGS LA ZUG

PA DUS PHYIS BAR YOD, ` NGO MA'I SGAR, ` 'OD DMAR MDO'I SGAR
DANG SOG DGE SGAR DANG, HOR RON

PO'I SGAR GNYIS NA LHA KHANG RE MA GTOGS MED, ` GTER KHA LUNG
SGAR, ` NYA MO SGAR, DUNG RI GA-YU MTSO,

` DE'I ZHOL DU LHA LUNG SGRUB KHANG DU GRAGS PA LHA LUNG DPAL
GYI RDO RJE'I BZHUGS GNAS, DUS BZANG SKABS ROL

CHA'I SGRA THOS PA'I YA MTSAN PA YOD, BLA CHEN BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS
DUS RGYA'I TSONG 'DUS SAR KHA SKONG DGE SLONG 'TSOL

DU PHYIN PA LHA LUNG DPAL GYI RDO RJE DANG MJAL, RGYU MTSAN ZHUS
PAS, NGAS RGYAL PO SDIG CAN BSAD PAS KHA

SKONG MI 'ONG GSUNGS, RGYA'I DGE SLONG GNYIS BKUG BYUNG BA LA
KHA SKONG BCOL ZHES BSOD GRAGS 'DUL BA'I

CHOS 'BYUNG DU GSUNGS PA DANG, 'GA' ZHIG GIS KLONG THANG ZHES
BSHAD PA RMA 'GRAM 'DI YIN 'DUG CES ZER

MKHAN SNANG, ` TUN PHENG ZI, ` KRANG KYA ZI, ` AAM TSO DGON DANG
RI KHROD GNYIS, 'DIR 'DON CHA

SNA TSOGS DANG, SRUNG BA'I RIGS KYI PAR MANG, KUN MKHYEN BAR MAR
SER SKYA GROS MTHUN GYIS PHUL TE BLA MA

BSKO BZHAG KYANG MDZAD SNANG, ` KYIN KRANG ZI'AM AA 'BIS SGAR
BA, ` P'E TZANG T'A ZI'AM STAG LUNG DAR RGYAS

DGON NI, SNGON RJE BTZUN BSOD NAMS RTZE MO'I SKU DBON DU GTOGS
PA BSOD NAMS DAR RGYAS BYA BA LA CHOS

SKYONG GIS SHAR 'DAN KHOG TU SONG NAS KHYIM SO BZUNG NA MI RGYUD
LA BLA DPON ZAM MA CHAD PAR 'BYUNG BAS BSTAN PA

@355 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

LA PHAN PAR 'GYUR ZHES LUNG BSTAN PA BZHIN 'DAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING
DU GZHI CHAGS, CHOS RJE SO NAG PA BYA BA'I TSA

MO CHUNG MAR BLANGS, SRAS BRGYAD BYUNG BA'I 'BRING SO TSA AA
ZHIS ZER BA MDO SMAD DU 'ONGS NAS STAG LUNG GI SA

CHA BZUNG, YUL MI RNAMS KYIS RJE DPON DU BKUR, DE LA SRAS MANG
DU BYUNG, CHE BA LA RGYA NAG GONG MAS

BE HU'I THOB GNANG BAS SMAD MKHAR BE HUR GRAGS, DE'I SRAS
SENG+GE DPA' BYA BAS GTZANG NAS SKYA TI RAB

'BYAMS PA DANG BLA MA YAR BYON SOGS GDAN DRANGS TE CHOS SDE 'DI
NYID BTAB PA YIN NO, ,BLA RABS MANG DU

SONG RJES STAG LUNG GI DPON RTA MGRIN GYIS CHOS RJE RTA NAG PA
KUN DGA' RNAM SRAS GDAN DRANGS TE GRVA TSANG

BTZUGS; 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD, DE NAS THANG KA'I RAB 'BYAMS PA BKRA
SHIS LHUN GRUB, LHA SA RAB

'BYAMS PA, BYAMS PA GLING RAB 'BYAMS PA, SKYOR LUNG RAB 'BYAMS
PA, MA nI PA RNAMS KYIS SPYI BLA

MDZAD; SNGAR SMOS SENG+GE DPA' ZHES BYA BA'I GDUNG RUS LAS GYES
PA'I RGYUD PA ZHIG LA MKHAN PO BZANG BO DON

GRUB 'KHRUNGS, RIGS RUS KYI DBANG GIS DGON PA'I 'DZIN BDAG BYAS,
DE'I RJES MA BKRA SHIS LHUN

GRUB; ZA KHU SGOM CHEN, BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, NGAG
DBANG 'PHRIN LAS RNAM RGYAL, NGAG

DBANG BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS PA'I BAR SKU 'PHRENG RIM PAR BYON,
'DI BA GAN SRANG BYA BAR 'KHRUNGS, DGA'

GDONG CHOS SKYONG GIS GONG MA'I YANG SPRUL DU THAG BCAD, DGA'
LDAN SHAR RTZER CHOS GRVA 'GRIM, KHRI NAM BZANG

BA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS, ` RANG DGON DU KUN MKHYEN PAR MA GDAN
DRANGS TE TSE DBANG ZHUS, AOR DU SU AO

THOG BE LI'I PHYOGS SU 'GRO DON BSKYANGS, RANG DGON DU 'TSAD
NYAN BTZUGS, NYID KHRIR BZHUGS TE

'GRIG LAM SOGS SHAR RTZE LTAR MDZAD, KHONG GSHEGS RJES SE RA
PAndI TA'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG BSTAN RGYAN PA KHRIR

BZHUGS TE BSKYANGS, BCO LNGA DANG NYI SHU LNGA LA DUS BZANG, NYI
SHU DGU LA RNGA CHINGS, ZLA BA DANG POR

CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM MCHOD PA DANG BCAS PA, GZHI GSUM GYI PHYAG
LEN RNAMS GSAR 'DZUGS MDZAD, LCAGS

MKHAR GYI PHYAG LEN SMAD RGYUD LTAR BTZUGS TE LO SHAS LA NYID
KYIS RDO RJE SLOB DPON GNANG, DE RJES SNGAGS 'CHANG

BLO BZANG RIN CHEN RDO RJE 'DIZN PAR BSKOS, DGON PAR MI GUS PA
SOGS PHYOGS LHUNG CAN 'GA' ZHIG BYUNG BA

DRAG PO MNGON SPYOD KYI LAS DANG, KHRIMS SGOR GTUG BSHER SOGS
CHOS SRID NUS MTHU GANG 'PHROD KYIS TSAR

BCAD PAS DGON PA'I CHOS SRID LAS DON GYI RKANG TSUGS, CHU STAG
GSUM PA'I NYER DRUG LA GSHEGS, DE'I

SPRUL SKU KHRI CHEN BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MA YIN LA, BAR
SKABS 'CHAD NYAN NYAMS CHAG TU SONG BA RJE 'DIS SA

'BRUG LOR SLAR BTZUGS, DBUS PHEBS KYI DUS MNGA' RIS SPRUL PA'I
SKUS LUNG BSTAN MDZAD PA BZHIN YIG

CHA DANG 'GRIG LAM SGO MANG LTAR BYAS, NYID NAS THOG MAR BRTZI
BZHAG GNANG, SGO MANG MKHAN PO BLO BZANG

CHOS DAR, KHRI CHEN 'JIGS MED NAM MKHA', GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I
DBYANGS RNAMS KYANG RIM PAR PHEBS

TE TSOGS SU KHRI 'DON DANG, CHOS GRVAR BRTZI BZHAG GNANG BAS DGE
MTSAN CHE BA BYUNG, RJE NYID NAS 'DZIN

SKYONG GI RTING BSKUL LEGS PAS GRVA TSANG TSUGS NAS CHER MA
'GYANGS PAR DON BDUN CU DANG BSDUS GRVA YONGS

@356 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

RDZOGS KYI TSOGS RGYUG 'BUL MKHAN BCU SKOR BYUNG, KUN GZIGS
THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA SPYAN DRANGS TE CHOS

GRVA BYIN GYIS BRLABS PAS 'CHAD NYAN GONG 'PHEL DU GYUR,
'KHRUNGS RABS RIM BYON DANG, RJE 'DI DGUNG

LO NYER DGU YAN GYI RNAM THAR 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYIS MDZAD PA
YOD, DA LTA SPRUL PA'I SKU BLO BZANG DAM CHOS

RGYA MTSOS BSKYANGS PAS GONG MA'I MDZAD RGYUN MTHA' DAG YAR LDAN
DU MCHIS SO, ,SE RA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SBYIN

PA 'KHRUNGS SA MDZO MO MKHAR, SER BYES T'A 'ON KHA MTSAN DU SLOB
GNYER MDZAD, RGYAL PO LHA BZANG GI BLA

MCHOD THUGS RTZIS CHE SHOS YIN, NYANG BRAN GYI GDUGS RI'I YU
BA'I STENG DU RI KHROD BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING BTAB

PAR DA LTA GDUGS YU DGON ZER, T'A 'ON KHAM TSAN DU 'JAM DBYANGS
GSER SKU BZHENGS, PRA TI DGE

BSHES KYI MKHAN PO DANG RTZA BA'I BLA MA YIN, KUN MKHYEN GONG MA
DGE 'PHEL DU BZHUGS DUS CHOS BKA' MANG DU

GSAN ZHING DGE PHRUG GI TSUL LTA BU YOD PAS NYIN GCIG SER BYES
MKHAN PO AE 'ONG GI THUGS BRTAG ZHUR PHEBS

PAR DRUG CU BA ZHIG BZOS LA KHYER SHOG GSUNGS, 'PHRAL DU BZOS TE
PHUL BAR, SGUR CIG GSUNGS TE

DRUG CU BA SOG BRAG TU BRDABS, DA SONG GSUNG PHEBS PAS CUNG GAR
BOD DU 'ONG DUS NYEN MA BYUNG BAR GSANG

STABS KYIS MDO SMAD DU PHEBS THUB PA BYUNG, CO NE DPON GYIS BKUR
TE KLU RI BRAG MGOR GZIMS KHANG PHUG

STE YUN RING BZHUGS, DPON SLOB GRAGS PA BSHAD SGRUB SOGS KYIS
ZHABS LA GTUGS, PHYIS SU RANG YUL

DU PHEBS, DE'I SPRUL SKU NYAN TSA TSANG DU GRAGS PA NGAG DBANG
BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN AOR DU SU'I PHYOGS SU

'KHRUNGS; GONG NAS AERTI NI PAndI TA HU THOG THU ZHES PA'I CHO
LO GNANG, DGON 'DI'I KHRIR BZHUGS, 'DU

KHANG GSAR BZHENGS LA GNANG CHA CHE, KUN MKHYEN BAR MA GDAN
DRANGS TE, 'DU KHANG BYAMS SKU BCAS LA

RAB GNAS ZHUS, GRVA GRANGS BDUN BRGYA SKOR LA MANG 'GYED GNANG
BA RNAM THAR DU GSAL, DE'I SPRUL SKU BLO

BZANG DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU THUGS GNYER MDZAD,
TSA GAN PE SHING GI KHRIR BZHUGS,

DA LTA DKON MCHOG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO THUGS GNYER GYI SKABS
SO, ,DGON 'DABS SU CHOS RJE 'PHRIN LAS

DPAL BZANG GIS BZHENGS PA'I MCHOD RTEN SHIN TU CHE BA, ` DE DANG
NYE BAR STAG LUNG RI KHROD, STAG LUNG

DGON LAG SHAN KRANG ZI, ` SDONG RA ZI, THANG KE ZI, GLANG KYA
ZI, NANG SO ZI, P'E TZANG KHYIS ZI,

YAR NGO DGON PA RNAMS YIN NO, ,GZHAN YANG T'A GRONG ZI, SPIN
BANG KYA ZI, YANG KYA ZI, NYIN KHRON LUNG

PA'I STOD SMAD DU YAR NANG SGAR LNGA, MAR NANG SGAR LNGA ZER
BA'I DGON SGRUB SDE BCU, ` RMA CHU KHAR AA 'GANG

DGON NANG MA'I LHA KHANG DU, GTZO BO THUB DBANG LA GA-YAS GA-YON
DU 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS, SPYAN RAS

GZIGS; GTZO BO'I MDUN NGOS GA-YAS GA-YON DU MI GA-YO BA DANG,
RTA MGRIN DBYUG THO CAN BCAS GTZO

'KHOR LNGA BZHUS PA 'DI LA 'GRO MGON 'PHAGS PAR RAB GNAS ZHUGS
PAR, SKU DNGOS PHEBS MA THUB KYANG

RGYANG NAS PHYAG NAS GTOR BA MNGON SUM DU BABS, ZA LAR GYI DMAG
GIS LHA KHANG DU ME LAN KHA SHAS PHUL DUS

RTA MGRIN SKU RNAM PA 'DI BZHIN LA ZHABS GA-YON PAS LHA KHANG
MNAN, GA-YAS PA RMA CHU'I 'GRAM DU BZHAG  PHYAG

@357 (DGU CHU'I RGYUD SOGS BSHAD PA,)

GIS CHU BLANGS NAS ME GSOD PA SOGS GZHAN GYI GNOD 'TSE BZLOG
PA'I CHO 'PHRUL DANG, MTHONG SNANG SNA TSOGS

BSTAN PAS SKU DNGOS SDER BZO YIN YANG RANG BYON DU THOGS, THU'U
BKVAN RJES, GTZUG LAG KHANG LA KLA KLOS

ME SBAR BA, ,KHRO BO DMAR POS CHU YIS GZHIL MTHONG BAS, ,BYIN
RLABS CAN DU GRAGS PA'I RTA MGRIN SKU, ,

AA 'GANG ZI NA BZHUGS PA MJAL LAGS SAM, ,ZHES GSUNGS SO, ,CONG
'DI SNGON CHUS KHYER NAS THANG

'DIR THON SKABS 'GANG ZER BA'I SGRA RANG GRAGS SU BYUNG BAS LHA
KHANG GI STENG DU BKUR ZHING DGON MING LA AA

'GANG THOGS, BRDUNG NA SER BA SOGS BZLOG NUS PAS BYIN RLABS CHE
BAR GLENG, ` AA 'GANG PHYI MA'I DGON LA

THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHES BYAMS SPRIN GLING ZHES PA'I MTSAN
BSTZAL, ` KA NO THA'I RI KHROD, ` MGON PO BYIN CAN

BZHUGS PA'I MA H'A KA LA'I LHA KHANG, ` TVA MO ZI, ` HO THAN ZI
SOGS RGYA MING CAN GYI LHA KHANG SO SO NA DGE 'DUN

PA BZHUGS, DGU CHU RGYUD RONG BO DGON SGRUB SDE BCO BRGYAD DANG
BCAS PA, KHRE RTZE BZHI'I DGON DANG,

MGAR RTZE DGON MA LAG  RMA KHAR GTOGS PA MAR NANG TSO LNGA'I
DGON SGRUB SDE RNAMS DANG, BIS MDO DGON

MA LAG LNGA, GCU 'KHOR, BSE CHANG DGON, RDO SBIS DGON MA LAG BCU
RGSUM, AA MTSO, STAG  LUNG DGON LE LAG DANG BCAS PA'I SKABS SO,,
